Poetry Text:
sādgī to hamārī zarā dekhiye e.atibār aap ke va.ade par kar liyā baat to sirf ik raat kī thī magar intizār aap kā umr-bhar kar liyā 
ishq meñ uljhaneñ pahle hī kam na thiiñ aur paidā nayā dard-e-sar kar liyā log Darte haiñ qātil kī parchhā.īñ se ham ne qātil ke dil meñ bhī ghar kar liyā 
zikr ik bevafā aur sitamgar kā thā aap kā aisī bātoñ se kyā vāsta aap to bevafā aur sitamgar nahīñ aap ne kis liye muñh udhar kar liyā 
zindagī-bhar ke shikve gile the bahut vaqt itnā kahāñ thā ki dohrāte ham ek hichkī meñ kah Daalī sab dāstāñ ham ne qisse ko yuuñ muḳhtasar kar liyā 
be-qarārī milegī mujhe na sukūñ chain chhin jā.egā niiñd uḌ jā.egī apnā anjām sab ham ko ma.alūm thā aap ne dil kā saudā magar kar liyā 
zindagī ke safar meñ bahut duur tak jab koī dost aaya na ham ko nazar ham ne ghabrā ke tanhā.iyoñ se 'sabā' ek dushman ko ḳhud ham-safar kar liyā 
sadgi to hamari zara dekhiye eatibar aap ke wade par kar liya baat to sirf ek raat ki thi magar intizar aap ka umr-bhar kar liya 
ishq mein uljhanen pahle hi kam na thin aur paida naya dard-e-sar kar liya log Darte hain qatil ki parchhain se hum ne qatil ke dil mein bhi ghar kar liya 
zikr ek bewafa aur sitamgar ka tha aap ka aisi baaton se kya wasta aap to bewafa aur sitamgar nahin aap ne kis liye munh udhar kar liya 
zindagi-bhar ke shikwe gile the bahut waqt itna kahan tha ki dohraate hum ek hichki mein kah Dali sab dastan hum ne qisse ko yun muKHtasar kar liya 
be-qarari milegi mujhe na sukun chain chhin jaega nind uD jaegi apna anjam sab hum ko malum tha aap ne dil ka sauda magar kar liya 
zindagi ke safar mein bahut dur tak jab koi dost aaya na hum ko nazar hum ne ghabra ke tanhaiyon se 'saba' ek dushman ko KHud ham-safar kar liya

hai kahāñ kā irāda tumhārā sanam kis ke dil ko adāoñ se bahlāoge sach batāo ke is chāñdnī raat meñ kis se va.ada kiyā hai kahāñ jāoge 
dekho achchhā nahīñ ye tumhārā chalan ye javānī ke din aur ye shoḳhiyāñ yuuñ na aaya karo baal khole hue varna duniyā meñ badnām ho jāoge 
aaj jaao na bechain kar ke mujhe jān-e-jāñ dil dukhānā burī baat hai ham taḌapte raheñge yahāñ rāt-bhar tum to ārām kī niiñd so jāoge 
paas aao to tum ko lagā.eñ gale muskurāte ho kyoñ duur se dekh kar yūñhī guzre agar ye javānī ke din ham bhī pachhtā.eñge tum bhī pachhtāoge 
bevafā be-muravvat hai in kī nazar ye badal jā.eñge zindagī luuT kar husn vāloñ se dil ko lagāyā agar ai 'fanā' dekho be-maut mar jāoge 
hai kahan ka irada tumhaara sanam kis ke dil ko adaon se bahlaoge sach batao ke is chandni raat mein kis se wada kiya hai kahan jaoge 
dekho achchha nahin ye tumhaara chalan ye jawani ke din aur ye shoKHiyan yun na aaya karo baal khole hue warna duniya mein badnam ho jaoge 
aaj jao na bechain kar ke mujhe jaan-e-jaan dil dukhana buri baat hai hum taDapte rahenge yahan raat-bhar tum to aaram ki nind so jaoge 
pas aao to tum ko lagaen gale muskuraate ho kyon dur se dekh kar yunhi guzre agar ye jawani ke din hum bhi pachhtaenge tum bhi pachhtaoge 
bewafa be-murawwat hai in ki nazar ye badal jaenge zindagi luT kar husn walon se dil ko lagaya agar ai 'fana' dekho be-maut mar jaoge

aañkh uTThī mohabbat ne añgḌā.ī lī dil kā saudā huā chāñdnī raat meñ un kī nazroñ ne kuchh aisā jaadū kiyā luT ga.e ham to pahlī mulāqāt meñ 
saath apnā vafā meñ na chhūTe kabhī pyaar kī Dor bañdh kar na TuuTe kabhī chhūT jaa.e zamāna koī ġham nahīñ haath terā rahe bas mire haath meñ 
rut hai barsāt kī dekho zid mat karo raat añdherī hai bādal haiñ chhā.e hue ruk bhī jaao sanam tum ko merī qasam ab kahāñ jāoge aisī barsāt meñ 
hai terī yaad is dil meñ lipTī huī har ghaḌī hai tasavvur tire husn kā terī ulfat kā pahra lagā hai sanam kaun aa.egā mere ḳhayālāt meñ 
aankh uTThi mohabbat ne angDai li dil ka sauda hua chandni raat mein un ki nazron ne kuchh aisa jadu kiya luT gae hum to pahli mulaqat mein 
sath apna wafa mein na chhuTe kabhi pyar ki Dor bandh kar na TuTe kabhi chhuT jae zamana koi gham nahin hath tera rahe bas mere hath mein 
rut hai barsat ki dekho zid mat karo raat andheri hai baadal hain chhae hue ruk bhi jao sanam tum ko meri qasam ab kahan jaoge aisi barsat mein 
hai teri yaad is dil mein lipTi hui har ghaDi hai tasawwur tere husn ka teri ulfat ka pahra laga hai sanam kaun aaega mere KHayalat mein

aisā banñā sañvarnā mubārak tumheñ kam se kam itnā kahnā hamārā karo chāñd sharmā.egā chāñdnī raat meñ yuuñ na zulfoñ ko apnī sañvārā karo 
ye tabassum ye aariz ye raushan jabīñ ye adā ye nigāheñ ye zulfeñ hasīñ aa.ine kī nazar lag na jaa.e kahīñ jān-e-jāñ apnā sadqa utārā karo 
dil to kyā chiiz hai jaan se jā.eñge maut aane se pahle hī mar jā.eñge ye adā dekhne vaale luT jā.eñge yuuñ na hañs hañs ke dilbar ishāra karo 
fikr-e-uqbā kī mastī utar jā.egī tauba TuuTī to qismat sañvar jā.egī tum ko duniyā meñ jannat nazar aa.egī shaiḳh jī mai-kade kā nazāra karo 
ḳhūbsūrat ghaTāoñ-bharī raat meñ lutf uThāyā karo aisī barsāt meñ jaam le kar chhalaktā huā haath meñ mai-kade meñ bhī ik shab guzārā karo 
kaam aa.e na mushkil meñ koī yahāñ matlabī dost haiñ matlabī yaar haiñ is jahāñ meñ nahīñ koī ahl-e-vafā ai 'fanā' is jahāñ se kināra karo 
aisa banna sanwarna mubarak tumhein kam se kam itna kahna hamara karo chand sharmaega chandni raat mein yun na zulfon ko apni sanwara karo 
ye tabassum ye aariz ye raushan jabin ye ada ye nigahen ye zulfen hasin aaine ki nazar lag na jae kahin jaan-e-jaan apna sadqa utara karo 
dil to kya chiz hai jaan se jaenge maut aane se pahle hi mar jaenge ye ada dekhne wale luT jaenge yun na hans hans ke dilbar ishaara karo 
fikr-e-uqba ki masti utar jaegi tauba TuTi to qismat sanwar jaegi tum ko duniya mein jannat nazar aaegi shaiKH ji mai-kade ka nazara karo 
KHubsurat ghaTaon-bhari raat mein lutf uThaya karo aisi barsat mein jam le kar chhalakta hua hath mein mai-kade mein bhi ek shab guzara karo 
kaam aae na mushkil mein koi yahan matlabi dost hain matlabi yar hain is jahan mein nahin koi ahl-e-wafa ai 'fana' is jahan se kinara karo

na rukte haiñ aañsū na thamte haiñ naale kaho koī kaise mohabbat chhupā le 
kare koī kyā gar vo aa.eñ yakāyak nigāhoñ ko roke ki dil ko sañbhāle 
chaman vaale bijlī se bole na chāle ġharīboñ ke ghar be-ḳhatā phūñk Daale 
qayāmat haiñ zālim kī nīchī nigāheñ ḳhudā jaane kyā ho jo nazreñ uThā le 
karūñ aisā sajda vo ghabrā ke kah deñ ḳhudā ke liye ab to sar ko uThā le 
tumheñ banda-parvar hamīñ jānte haiñ baḌe sīdhe-sādhe baḌe bhole-bhāle 
bas itnī sī duurī ye maiñ huuñ ye manzil kahāñ aa ke phūTe haiñ paaoñ ke chhāle 
'qamar' maiñ huuñ muḳhtār tanzīm-e-shab kā haiñ mere hī bas meñ añdhere ujāle 
na rukte hain aansu na thamte hain nale kaho koi kaise mohabbat chhupa le 
kare koi kya gar wo aaen yakayak nigahon ko roke ki dil ko sanbhaale 
chaman wale bijli se bole na chaale gharibon ke ghar be-KHata phunk Dale 
qayamat hain zalim ki nichi nigahen KHuda jaane kya ho jo nazren uTha le 
karun aisa sajda wo ghabra ke kah den KHuda ke liye ab to sar ko uTha le 
tumhein banda-parwar hamin jaante hain baDe sidhe-sadhe baDe bhole-bhaale 
bas itni si duri ye main hun ye manzil kahan aa ke phuTe hain paon ke chhaale 
'qamar' main hun muKHtar tanzim-e-shab ka hain mere hi bas mein andhere ujale

kahnā ġhalat ġhalat to chhupānā sahīh sahīh qāsid kahā jo us ne batānā sahīh sahīh 
ye sub.h sub.h chehre kī rangat uḌī huī kal raat tum kahāñ the batānā sahīh sahīh 
dil le ke merā haath meñ kahte haiñ mujh se vo kyā loge is kā daam batānā sahīh sahīh 
āñkheñ milāo ġhair se do ham ko jām-e-mai saaqī tumheñ qasam hai pilānā sahīh sahīh 
ai mai-farosh bhiiḌ hai terī dukān par gāhak haiñ ham bhī maal dikhānā sahīh sahīh 
'sājid' to jān-o-dil se faqat aap kā hai bas kyā aap bhī haiñ us ke batānā sahīh sahīh 
kahna ghalat ghalat to chhupana sahih sahih qasid kaha jo us ne batana sahih sahih 
ye subh subh chehre ki rangat uDi hui kal raat tum kahan the batana sahih sahih 
dil le ke mera hath mein kahte hain mujh se wo kya loge is ka dam batana sahih sahih 
aankhen milao ghair se do hum ko jam-e-mai saqi tumhein qasam hai pilana sahih sahih 
ai mai-farosh bhiD hai teri dukan par gahak hain hum bhi mal dikhana sahih sahih 
'sajid' to jaan-o-dil se faqat aap ka hai bas kya aap bhi hain us ke batana sahih sahih

un kī taraf se tark-e-mulāqāt ho ga.ī ham jis se Dar rahe the vahī baat ho ga.ī 
ā.īna dekhne meñ na.ī baat ho ga.ī un se hī aaj un kī mulāqāt ho ga.ī 
tai un se roz-e-hashr mulāqāt ho ga.ī itnī sī baat kitnī baḌī baat ho ga.ī 
kam-zarfī-e-hayāt se tang aa gayā thā maiñ achchhā huā qazā se mulāqāt ho ga.ī 
din meñ bhaTak rahe haiñ jo manzil kī raah se ye log kyā kareñge agar raat ho ga.ī 
aa.e haiñ vo marīz-e-mohabbat ko dekh kar aañsū batā rahe haiñ koī baat ho ga.ī 
thā aur kaun pūchhne vaalā marīz kā tum aa ga.e to pursish-e-hālāt ho ga.ī 
ai bulbul-e-bahār-e-chaman apnī ḳhair maañg sayyād-o-bāġhbāñ meñ mulāqāt ho ga.ī 
jab zulf yaad aa ga.ī yuuñ ashk bah ga.e jaise añdherī raat meñ barsāt ho ga.ī 
gulshan kā hosh ahl-e-junūñ ko bhalā kahāñ sahrā meñ paḌ rahe to basar raat ho ga.ī 
dar-parda bazm-e-ġhair meñ donoñ kī guftugū uTThī udhar nigāh idhar baat ho ga.ī 
kab tak 'qamar' ho shaam ke va.ade kā intizār sūraj chhupā charāġh jale raat ho ga.ī 
un ki taraf se tark-e-mulaqat ho gai hum jis se Dar rahe the wahi baat ho gai 
aaina dekhne mein nai baat ho gai un se hi aaj un ki mulaqat ho gai 
tai un se roz-e-hashr mulaqat ho gai itni si baat kitni baDi baat ho gai 
kam-zarfi-e-hayat se tang aa gaya tha main achchha hua qaza se mulaqat ho gai 
din mein bhaTak rahe hain jo manzil ki rah se ye log kya karenge agar raat ho gai 
aae hain wo mariz-e-mohabbat ko dekh kar aansu bata rahe hain koi baat ho gai 
tha aur kaun puchhne wala mariz ka tum aa gae to pursish-e-haalat ho gai 
ai bulbul-e-bahaar-e-chaman apni KHair mang sayyaad-o-baghban mein mulaqat ho gai 
jab zulf yaad aa gai yun ashk bah gae jaise andheri raat mein barsat ho gai 
gulshan ka hosh ahl-e-junun ko bhala kahan sahra mein paD rahe to basar raat ho gai 
dar-parda bazm-e-ghair mein donon ki guftugu uTThi udhar nigah idhar baat ho gai 
kab tak 'qamar' ho sham ke wade ka intizar suraj chhupa charagh jale raat ho gai

mast nazroñ se allāh bachā.e mah-jamāloñ se allah bachā.e har balā sar pe aa jaa.e merī husn vāloñ se allah bachā.e 
in kī ma.asūmiyat par na jaanā in ke dhoke meñ hargiz na aanā luuT lete haiñ ye muskurā kar in kī chāloñ se allah bachā.e 
bholī sūrat hai bāteñ haiñ bholī muñh meñ kuchh hai magar dil meñ kuchh hai laakh chehrā sahī chāñd jaisā dil ke kāloñ se allah bachā.e 
dil meñ hai ḳhvāhish-e-hūr-o-jannat aur zāhir meñ shauq-e-ibādat bas hameñ shaiḳh jī aap jaise allāh-vāloñ se allah bachā.e 
in kī fitrat meñ hai bevafā.ī jāntī hai ye saarī ḳhudā.ī achchhe-achchhoñ ko dete haiñ dhokā bhole-bhāloñ se allah bachā.e 
mast nazron se allah bachae mah-jamalon se allah bachae har bala sar pe aa jae meri husn walon se allah bachae 
in ki masumiyat par na jaana in ke dhoke mein hargiz na aana luT lete hain ye muskura kar in ki chaalon se allah bachae 
bholi surat hai baaten hain bholi munh mein kuchh hai magar dil mein kuchh hai lakh chehra sahi chand jaisa dil ke kalon se allah bachae 
dil mein hai KHwahish-e-hur-o-jannat aur zahir mein shauq-e-ibaadat bas hamein shaiKH ji aap jaise allah-walon se allah bachae 
in ki fitrat mein hai bewafai jaanti hai ye sari KHudai achchhe-achchhon ko dete hain dhoka bhole-bhaalon se allah bachae

phirūñ DhūñDtā mai-kada tauba tauba mujhe āj-kal itnī fursat nahīñ hai salāmat rahe terī āñkhoñ kī mastī mujhe mai-kashī kī zarūrat nahīñ hai 
ye tark-e-ta.alluq kā kyā tazkira hai tumhāre sivā koī apnā nahīñ hai agar tum kaho to maiñ ḳhud ko bhulā duuñ tumheñ bhuul jaane kī tāqat nahīñ hai 
hamesha mire sāmne se guzarnā nigāheñ churā kar mujhe dekh lenā mirī jaan tum mujh ko itnā batā do ye kyā chiiz hai gar mohabbat nahīñ hai 
hazāroñ tamannā.eñ hotī haiñ dil meñ hamārī to bas ik tamanna yahī hai mujhe ik dafa apnā kah ke pukāro bas is ke sivā koī hasrat nahīñ hai 
phirun DhunDta mai-kada tauba tauba mujhe aaj-kal itni fursat nahin hai salamat rahe teri aankhon ki masti mujhe mai-kashi ki zarurat nahin hai 
ye tark-e-talluq ka kya tazkira hai tumhaare siwa koi apna nahin hai agar tum kaho to main KHud ko bhula dun tumhein bhul jaane ki taqat nahin hai 
hamesha mere samne se guzarna nigahen chura kar mujhe dekh lena meri jaan tum mujh ko itna bata do ye kya chiz hai gar mohabbat nahin hai 
hazaron tamannaen hoti hain dil mein hamari to bas ek tamanna yahi hai mujhe ek dafa apna kah ke pukaro bas is ke siwa koi hasrat nahin hai

sahar qarīb hai tāroñ kā haal kyā hogā ab intizār ke māroñ kā haal kyā hogā 
tirī nigāh ne zālim kabhī hai ye sochā tirī nigāh ke māroñ kā haal kyā hogā 
muqābla hai tire husn kā bahāroñ se na jaane aaj bahāroñ kā haal kyā hogā 
naqāb un kā ulaTnā to chāhtā huuñ magar bigaḌ ga.e to nazāroñ kā haal kyā hogā 
mazāq-e-dīd hī 'sahbā' agar badal jaa.e to zindagī kī bahāroñ kā haal kyā hogā 
sahar qarib hai taron ka haal kya hoga ab intizar ke maron ka haal kya hoga 
teri nigah ne zalim kabhi hai ye socha teri nigah ke maron ka haal kya hoga 
muqabla hai tere husn ka bahaaron se na jaane aaj bahaaron ka haal kya hoga 
naqab un ka ulaTna to chahta hun magar bigaD gae to nazaron ka haal kya hoga 
mazaq-e-did hi 'sahba' agar badal jae to zindagi ki bahaaron ka haal kya hoga

aaj koī baat ho ga.ī vo na aa.e raat ho ga.ī 
jab vo mere saath ho ga.e duniyā mere saath ho ga.ī 
jab vo milne aa.e raat ko merī chāñd-rāt ho ga.ī 
mujh se barham aap kyā hue saarī kā.enāt ho ga.ī 
mar ga.e tire marīz-e-ġham dard se najāt ho ga.ī 
ai dil-e-tabāh ġham ye hai rusvā un kī zaat ho ga.ī 
'purnam' aa ga.e vo mere ghar mutma.in hayāt ho ga.ī 
aaj koi baat ho gai wo na aae raat ho gai 
jab wo mere sath ho gae duniya mere sath ho gai 
jab wo milne aae raat ko meri chand-raat ho gai 
mujh se barham aap kya hue sari kaenat ho gai 
mar gae tere mariz-e-gham dard se najat ho gai 
ai dil-e-tabah gham ye hai ruswa un ki zat ho gai 
'purnam' aa gae wo mere ghar mutmain hayat ho gai

merī āñkhoñ ko baḳhshe haiñ aañsū dil ko dāġh-e-alam de ga.e haiñ is ināyat pe qurbān jā.ūñ pyaar māñgā thā ġham de ga.e haiñ 
dene aa.e the ham ko tasallī vo tasallī to kyā ham ko dete toḌ kar ka.aba-e-dil hamārā hasratoñ ke sanam de ga.e haiñ 
dil taḌaptā hai fariyād kar ke aañkh Dartī hai aañsū bahā ke aisī ulfat se vo jaate jaate mujh ko apnī qasam de ga.e haiñ 
marhabā mai-kashoñ kā muqaddar ab to piinā ibādat hai 'anvar' aaj rindoñ ko piine kī dāvat vā.iz-e-mohtaram de ga.e haiñ 
meri aankhon ko baKHshe hain aansu dil ko dagh-e-alam de gae hain is inayat pe qurban jaun pyar manga tha gham de gae hain 
dene aae the hum ko tasalli wo tasalli to kya hum ko dete toD kar kaba-e-dil hamara hasraton ke sanam de gae hain 
dil taDapta hai fariyaad kar ke aankh Darti hai aansu baha ke aisi ulfat se wo jate jate mujh ko apni qasam de gae hain 
marhaba mai-kashon ka muqaddar ab to pina ibaadat hai 'anwar' aaj rindon ko pine ki dawat waiz-e-mohtaram de gae hain

shahr-e-fasl-e-gul se chal kar pattharoñ ke darmiyāñ zindagī aa jā kabhī ham be-gharoñ ke darmiyāñ 
maiñ huuñ vo tasvīr jis meñ hādse bharte haiñ rang ḳhāl-o-ḳhat khulte haiñ mere ḳhanjaroñ ke darmiyāñ 
pahle ham ne ghar banā kar fāsle paidā kiye phir uThā diiñ aur dīvāreñ gharoñ ke darmiyāñ 
ahd-e-hāzir meñ uḳhuvvat kā tasavvur hai magar tazkaroñ meñ kāġhazoñ par rahbaroñ ke darmiyāñ 
un shahīdān-e-vafā ke naam mere sab suḳhan sar-bulandī jin ko hāsil hai saroñ ke darmiyāñ 
kaisā fan kaisī zehānat ye zamāna aur hai siikh lo kuchh sho'bde bāzīgaroñ ke darmiyāñ 
uḌ gayā to shāḳh kā saarā badan jalne lagā dhuup rakh lī thī parinde ne paroñ ke darmiyāñ 
ye jo ḳhāna hai sukūnat kā yahāñ likh do 'bashīr' phuul huuñ lekin khilā huuñ pattharoñ ke darmiyāñ 
shahr-e-fasl-e-gul se chal kar pattharon ke darmiyan zindagi aa ja kabhi hum be-gharon ke darmiyan 
main hun wo taswir jis mein hadse bharte hain rang KHal-o-KHat khulte hain mere KHanjaron ke darmiyan 
pahle hum ne ghar bana kar fasle paida kiye phir uTha din aur diwaren gharon ke darmiyan 
ahd-e-hazir mein uKHuwwat ka tasawwur hai magar tazkaron mein kaghazon par rahbaron ke darmiyan 
un shahidan-e-wafa ke nam mere sab suKHan sar-bulandi jin ko hasil hai saron ke darmiyan 
kaisa fan kaisi zehanat ye zamana aur hai sikh lo kuchh sho'bde bazigaron ke darmiyan 
uD gaya to shaKH ka sara badan jalne laga dhup rakh li thi parinde ne paron ke darmiyan 
ye jo KHana hai sukunat ka yahan likh do 'bashir' phul hun lekin khila hun pattharon ke darmiyan
Poetry Text

tujh lab kī sifat la.al-e-badaḳhshāñ suuñ kahūñgā jaadū haiñ tire nain ġhazālāñ suuñ kahūñgā 
dī bādshahī haq ne tujhe husn-nagar kī yū kishvar-e-īrāñ meñ sulaimāñ suuñ kahūñgā 
tārīf tire qad kī alif-vār sirījan jā sarv-e-gulistāñ kuuñ ḳhush-alhāñ suuñ kahūñgā 
mujh par na karo zulm tum ai laili-e-ḳhūbāñ majnūñ huuñ tire ġham kuuñ bayābāñ suuñ kahūñgā 
dekhā huuñ tujhe ḳhvāb meñ ai māya-e-ḳhūbī is ḳhvāb ko jā yūsuf-e-kan.āñ suuñ kahūñgā 
jaltā huuñ shab-o-roz tire ġham meñ ai sājan ye soz tirā mash.al-e-sozāñ suuñ kahūñgā 
yak nuqta tire safha-e-ruḳh par na.iñ bejā is mukh ko tire safha-e-qur.āñ suuñ kahūñgā 
qurbān parī mukh pe huī chob sī jal kar ye baat ajā.ib mah-e-tābāñ suuñ kahūñgā 
be-sabr na ho ai 'valī' is dard suuñ hargiz jaltā huuñ tire dard meñ darmāñ suuñ kahūñgā 
tujh lab ki sifat lal-e-badaKHshan sun kahunga jadu hain tere nain ghazalan sun kahunga 
di baadshahi haq ne tujhe husn-nagar ki yu kishwar-e-iran mein sulaiman sun kahunga 
tarif tere qad ki alif-war sirijan ja sarw-e-gulistan kun KHush-alhan sun kahunga 
mujh par na karo zulm tum ai laili-e-KHuban majnun hun tere gham kun bayaban sun kahunga 
dekha hun tujhe KHwab mein ai maya-e-KHubi is KHwab ko ja yusuf-e-kanan sun kahunga 
jalta hun shab-o-roz tere gham mein ai sajan ye soz tera mashal-e-sozan sun kahunga 
yak nuqta tere safha-e-ruKH par nain beja is mukh ko tere safha-e-quran sun kahunga 
qurban pari mukh pe hui chob si jal kar ye baat ajaib mah-e-taban sun kahunga 
be-sabr na ho ai 'wali' is dard sun hargiz jalta hun tere dard mein darman sun kahunga

nain tere shikār karte haiñ dil hamārā figār karte haiñ 
ḳhūb-rū jab siñgār karte haiñ aarsī par bahār karte haiñ 
kisī bedād suuñ chaman meñ aaj phuul saare pukār karte haiñ 
ḳhush-nigāh aur bar meñ sabz libās sarv kuuñ sharmsār karte haiñ 
ahl-e-dil girya-e-nadāmat señ sair abr-e-bahār karte haiñ 
chashm-e-bad-dūr dil-barāñ saare apne 'nāsir' kuuñ pyaar karte haiñ 
nain tere shikar karte hain dil hamara figar karte hain 
KHub-ru jab singar karte hain aarsi par bahaar karte hain 
kisi bedad sun chaman mein aaj phul sare pukar karte hain 
KHush-nigah aur bar mein sabz libas sarw kun sharmsar karte hain 
ahl-e-dil girya-e-nadamat sen sair abr-e-bahaar karte hain 
chashm-e-bad-dur dil-baran sare apne 'nasir' kun pyar karte hain

kiyā mujh ishq ne zālim kuuñ aab āhista-āhista ki ātish gul kuuñ kartī hai gulāb āhista-āhista 
vafādārī ne dilbar kī bujhāyā ātish-e-ġham kuuñ ki garmī dafa.a kartā hai gulāb āhista-āhista 
ajab kuchh lutf rakhtā hai shab-e-ḳhalvat meñ gul-rū suuñ ḳhitāb āhista-āhista javāb āhista-āhista 
mire dil kuuñ kiyā be-ḳhud tirī añkhiyāñ ne āḳhir kuuñ ki jyuuñ behosh kartī hai sharāb āhista-āhista 
huā tujh ishq suuñ ai ātishīñ-rū dil mirā paanī ki jyuuñ galtā hai ātish suuñ gulāb āhista-āhista 
adā-o-nāz suuñ aatā hai vo raushan-jabīñ ghar suuñ ki jyuuñ mashriq suuñ nikle āftāb āhista-āhista 
kiya mujh ishq ne zalim kun aab aahista-ahista ki aatish gul kun karti hai gulab aahista-ahista 
wafadari ne dilbar ki bujhaya aatish-e-gham kun ki garmi dafa karta hai gulab aahista-ahista 
ajab kuchh lutf rakhta hai shab-e-KHalwat mein gul-ru sun KHitab aahista-ahista jawab aahista-ahista 
mere dil kun kiya be-KHud teri ankhiyan ne aaKHir kun ki jyun behosh karti hai sharab aahista-ahista 
hua tujh ishq sun ai aatishin-ru dil mera pani ki jyun galta hai aatish sun gulab aahista-ahista 
ada-o-naz sun aata hai wo raushan-jabin ghar sun ki jyun mashriq sun nikle aaftab aahista-ahista

araq jab us parī ke chehra-e-pur-nūr se Tapke ḳhajil ho gul se shabnam juuñ lahū nāsūr se Tapke 
mirī āñkhoñ se ḳhūnīñ ashk yuuñ girte haiñ palkoñ par lahū suulī ke uupar juuñ sar-e-mansūr se Tapke 
agar kaif-e-suḳhan merā nihāl-e-tāk ko pahuñche surāhī shāḳh ban jaave sharāb añgūr se Tapke 
agar us zulf-mushk-āmez se chunnī meñ baal aave ajab maiñ itr-o-ambar kāsa-e-naġhfūr se Tapke 
karūñ fariyād ro ro yaar ko jab yaad kar 'ājiz' dam isrāfīl kā lohū ho bāñg-e-sūr se Tapke 
araq jab us pari ke chehra-e-pur-nur se Tapke KHajil ho gul se shabnam jun lahu nasur se Tapke 
meri aankhon se KHunin ashk yun girte hain palkon par lahu suli ke upar jun sar-e-mansur se Tapke 
agar kaif-e-suKHan mera nihaal-e-tak ko pahunche surahi shaKH ban jawe sharab angur se Tapke 
agar us zulf-mushk-amez se chunni mein baal aawe ajab main itr-o-ambar kasa-e-naghfur se Tapke 
karun fariyaad ro ro yar ko jab yaad kar 'ajiz' dam israfil ka lohu ho bang-e-sur se Tapke

tujh ruḳh pe mujhe nūr-e-ilāhī nazar aaya jo asl meñ hai so hī kamāhī nazar aaya 
jab chashm kiyā terī taraf ahl-e-nazar ne had-darja fuzūñ rutba-o-jāhī nazar aaya 
tujh zulf-e-pareshāñ pe nazar jis kī paḌī hai dil-jam.ī use na.iiñ vo tabāhī nazar aaya 
mujh ishq kī saugand hai jab ishq ko kholā kuchh aur na dekhā vo sipāhī nazar aaya 
'arshad' mirā dildār kahīñ mujh se judā na.iiñ har vaqt vo mujh dil meñ basā hī nazar aaya 
tujh ruKH pe mujhe nur-e-ilahi nazar aaya jo asl mein hai so hi kamahi nazar aaya 
jab chashm kiya teri taraf ahl-e-nazar ne had-darja fuzun rutba-o-jahi nazar aaya 
tujh zulf-e-pareshan pe nazar jis ki paDi hai dil-jami use nain wo tabahi nazar aaya 
mujh ishq ki saugand hai jab ishq ko khola kuchh aur na dekha wo sipahi nazar aaya 
'arshad' mera dildar kahin mujh se juda nain har waqt wo mujh dil mein basa hi nazar aaya

junūñ ke haat ab maiñ kyā kahūñ dil saḳht hairāñ hai garebāñ kar chukā huuñ nazr aage ab ye dāmāñ hai 
tujhe vājib hai jaanā urs meñ apne shahīdoñ ke sunā huuñ maiñ ki un kā aaj sandal kal charāġhāñ hai 
rahā gar āstāñ par aa ke maiñ fart-e-aqīdat se takalluf bartaraf sarkār kā kyā is meñ nuqsāñ hai 
lage kyūñkar na dil kunj-e-qafas meñ andalīboñ kā jahāñ meñ āj-kal ābād gar kuchh hai to zindāñ hai 
nahīñ lāzim hai denā haath se sheva tarahhum kā huī vaaq.e 'zakā' se kuchh agar taqsīr insāñ hai 
junun ke hat ab main kya kahun dil saKHt hairan hai gareban kar chuka hun nazr aage ab ye daman hai 
tujhe wajib hai jaana urs mein apne shahidon ke suna hun main ki un ka aaj sandal kal charaghan hai 
raha gar aastan par aa ke main fart-e-aqidat se takalluf bartaraf sarkar ka kya is mein nuqsan hai 
lage kyunkar na dil kunj-e-qafas mein andalibon ka jahan mein aaj-kal aabaad gar kuchh hai to zindan hai 
nahin lazim hai dena hath se shewa tarahhum ka hui waqe 'zaka' se kuchh agar taqsir insan hai

ab dil pe yahī hai jo dukhan chhoḌ na jaanā jone u dukhan khan ke ratan chhoḌ na jaanā 
yogan bhare dilbar u nazar-bāz u majlis u phuul u bulbul u chaman chhoḌ na jaanā 
j dost jo hai jot ho diide kuuñ dukhan kī so yuuñ kahīñ har-dam jo ham chhoḌ na jaanā 
gar koī baḳhshtā hai bulā kar iram in.aam bulbul ke achchhe man meñ jo ban chhoḌ na jaanā 
saT khan na ki junūñ laal har yak mulk na bhagnā junūñ suur gagan ya.anī vatan chhoḌ na jaanā 
taqdīr kahāñ khīñch lijāgī so na jaano pan jiiv ke gul-lot jo tan chhoḌ na jaanā 
'bahrī' kuuñ dukhan yuuñ hai ki junūñ nal kuuñ daman hai pas nal kuuñ hai lāzim jo daman chhoḌ na jaanā 
ab dil pe yahi hai jo dukhan chhoD na jaana jone u dukhan khan ke ratan chhoD na jaana 
yogan bhare dilbar u nazar-baz u majlis u phul u bulbul u chaman chhoD na jaana 
j dost jo hai jot ho dide kun dukhan ki so yun kahin har-dam jo hum chhoD na jaana 
gar koi baKHshta hai bula kar iram inam bulbul ke achchhe man mein jo ban chhoD na jaana 
saT khan na ki junun lal har yak mulk na bhagna junun sur gagan yani watan chhoD na jaana 
taqdir kahan khinch lijagi so na jaano pan jiw ke gul-lot jo tan chhoD na jaana 
'bahri' kun dukhan yun hai ki junun nal kun daman hai pas nal kun hai lazim jo daman chhoD na jaana

mire man mane aaj uu dhyān hai ki us mast ḳhūñ-rez kā dhyān hai 
jadāñ te tirā zulf dekhyā huuñ maiñ tadāñ te mirā man pareshān hai 
huā bād-o-bārāñ mirā jiiv aaj tire ishq kā dil meñ tūfān hai 
tujhe jīvte meñ ziyāda mañgūñ tire par mirā jiiv qurbān hai 
diyā huuñ mohabbat mane jiiv maiñ mohabbat mirā jiiv īmān hai 
gunah kyā huā hai so ma.alūm na.iiñ mujhe dekh ke aaj anjān hai 
suraj tilmilātā hai khāne ugaal jo dekhyā tire mukh mane paan hai 
zamīñ par suraj koī dekhyā nahīñ 'ayāġhī' tujhe dekh hairān hai 
mere man mane aaj u dhyan hai ki us mast KHun-rez ka dhyan hai 
jadan te tera zulf dekhya hun main tadan te mera man pareshan hai 
hua baad-o-baran mera jiw aaj tere ishq ka dil mein tufan hai 
tujhe jiwte mein ziyaada mangun tere par mera jiw qurban hai 
diya hun mohabbat mane jiw main mohabbat mera jiw iman hai 
gunah kya hua hai so malum nain mujhe dekh ke aaj anjaan hai 
suraj tilmilata hai khane ugal jo dekhya tere mukh mane pan hai 
zamin par suraj koi dekhya nahin 'ayaghi' tujhe dekh hairan hai

kiyā āñkhoñ ko nazr us kī kahā dil hai so vo bahlā huā huuñ sarf-e-farmā.ish kabhī ye lā kabhī vo lā 
jo ḳhush-chashmoñ kī ulfat meñ diyā barbād jī apnā lagāo us kī turbat par lajā kar nargis-e-shahlā 
gayā huuñ bhuul apne ko payām-o-nāma kyā bhejūñ ḳhayāl-e-dil kā qāsid in dinoñ meñ aah kyoñ chahlā 
ye tifl-e-ashk dāman-gīr hai har aan meñ mujh se bahāne se maiñ laḌke ko rakhūñ kis tarah kar bahlā 
tumheñ ārām zindāñ meñ divānoñ is sabab se hai diyā zanjīr neñ shāyad tumhāre paañv ko sahlā 
junūñ ke ilm ko aalim huuñ merā rutba mat pūchho ki majnūñ dars-e-vahshat kā mire shāgird hai pahlā 
kiya aankhon ko nazr us ki kaha dil hai so wo bahla hua hun sarf-e-farmaish kabhi ye la kabhi wo la 
jo KHush-chashmon ki ulfat mein diya barbaad ji apna lagao us ki turbat par laja kar nargis-e-shahla 
gaya hun bhul apne ko payam-o-nama kya bhejun KHayal-e-dil ka qasid in dinon mein aah kyon chahla 
ye tifl-e-ashk daman-gir hai har aan mein mujh se bahane se main laDke ko rakhun kis tarah kar bahla 
tumhein aaram zindan mein diwanon is sabab se hai diya zanjir nen shayad tumhaare panw ko sahla 
junun ke ilm ko aalim hun mera rutba mat puchho ki majnun dars-e-wahshat ka mere shagird hai pahla

piv saat riij rahnā lazzat ise kate haiñ ap riij phir rijhānā san.at ise kate haiñ 
muj nain ke nagar meñ lālan vatan kiye haiñ jab anjuman ke logāñ ḳhalvat use kate haiñ 
maiñ chhāñv ho piyā sañg laagī rahī huuñ daa.em yak pal judā na honā vaslat use kate haiñ 
gul hor gulāb miyāne na.iiñ kuch farq azal se u piv suuñ mil rahī huuñ ulfat ise kutte haiñ 
hit chor chit bhulāve maiñ aapne piyā kuuñ aaqil jahāñ ke boleñ hikmat use kate haiñ 
chāroñ pahar piyā sañg ka.ī bhāñt kar madan ke sanjog ho rahī huuñ ishrat use kate haiñ 
ruuñ ruuñ rasan karī maiñ 'shāhī' kā nānoñ lene phir phir vo naam lenā rāhat ise kate haiñ 
piw sat rij rahna lazzat ise kate hain ap rij phir rijhana sanat ise kate hain 
muj nain ke nagar mein lalan watan kiye hain jab anjuman ke logan KHalwat use kate hain 
main chhanw ho piya sang lagi rahi hun daem yak pal juda na hona waslat use kate hain 
gul hor gulab miyane nain kuch farq azal se u piw sun mil rahi hun ulfat ise kutte hain 
hit chor chit bhulawe main aapne piya kun aaqil jahan ke bolen hikmat use kate hain 
chaaron pahar piya sang kai bhant kar madan ke sanjog ho rahi hun ishrat use kate hain 
run run rasan kari main 'shahi' ka nanon lene phir phir wo nam lena rahat ise kate hain
Poetry Text

kabhī ḳhud pe kabhī hālāt pe ronā aayā baat niklī to har ik baat pe ronā aayā 
ham to samjhe the ki ham bhuul ga.e haiñ un ko kyā huā aaj ye kis baat pe ronā aayā 
kis liye jiite haiñ ham kis ke liye jiite haiñ bārhā aise savālāt pe ronā aayā 
kaun rotā hai kisī aur kī ḳhātir ai dost sab ko apnī hī kisī baat pe ronā aayā 
kabhi KHud pe kabhi haalat pe rona aaya baat nikli to har ek baat pe rona aaya 
hum to samjhe the ki hum bhul gae hain un ko kya hua aaj ye kis baat pe rona aaya 
kis liye jite hain hum kis ke liye jite hain barha aise sawalat pe rona aaya 
kaun rota hai kisi aur ki KHatir ai dost sab ko apni hi kisi baat pe rona aaya

bāzīcha-e-atfāl hai duniyā mire aage hotā hai shab-o-roz tamāshā mire aage 
ik khel hai aurañg-e-sulaimāñ mire nazdīk ik baat hai ejāz-e-masīhā mire aage 
juz naam nahīñ sūrat-e-ālam mujhe manzūr juz vahm nahīñ hastī-e-ashiyā mire aage 
hotā hai nihāñ gard meñ sahrā mire hote ghistā hai jabīñ ḳhaak pe dariyā mire aage 
mat pūchh ki kyā haal hai merā tire pīchhe tū dekh ki kyā rañg hai terā mire aage 
sach kahte ho ḳhud-bīn o ḳhud-ārā huuñ na kyuuñ huuñ baiThā hai but-e-ā.ina-sīmā mire aage 
phir dekhiye andāz-e-gul-afshānī-e-guftār rakh de koī paimāna-e-sahbā mire aage 
nafrat kā gumāñ guzre hai maiñ rashk se guzrā kyūñkar kahūñ lo naam na un kā mire aage 
īmāñ mujhe roke hai jo khīñche hai mujhe kufr ka.aba mire pīchhe hai kalīsā mire aage 
āshiq huuñ pa māshūq-farebī hai mirā kaam majnūñ ko burā kahtī hai lailā mire aage 
ḳhush hote haiñ par vasl meñ yuuñ mar nahīñ jaate aa.ī shab-e-hijrāñ kī tamannā mire aage 
hai maujzan ik qulzum-e-ḳhūñ kaash yahī ho aatā hai abhī dekhiye kyā kyā mire aage 
go haath ko jumbish nahīñ āñkhoñ meñ to dam hai rahne do abhī sāġhar-o-mīnā mire aage 
ham-pesha o ham-mashrab o hamrāz hai merā 'ġhālib' ko burā kyuuñ kaho achchhā mire aage 
bazicha-e-atfal hai duniya mere aage hota hai shab-o-roz tamasha mere aage 
ek khel hai aurang-e-sulaiman mere nazdik ek baat hai ejaz-e-masiha mere aage 
juz nam nahin surat-e-alam mujhe manzur juz wahm nahin hasti-e-ashiya mere aage 
hota hai nihan gard mein sahra mere hote ghista hai jabin KHak pe dariya mere aage 
mat puchh ki kya haal hai mera tere pichhe tu dekh ki kya rang hai tera mere aage 
sach kahte ho KHud-bin o KHud-ara hun na kyun hun baiTha hai but-e-aina-sima mere aage 
phir dekhiye andaz-e-gul-afshani-e-guftar rakh de koi paimana-e-sahba mere aage 
nafrat ka guman guzre hai main rashk se guzra kyunkar kahun lo nam na un ka mere aage 
iman mujhe roke hai jo khinche hai mujhe kufr kaba mere pichhe hai kalisa mere aage 
aashiq hun pa mashuq-farebi hai mera kaam majnun ko bura kahti hai laila mere aage 
KHush hote hain par wasl mein yun mar nahin jate aai shab-e-hijran ki tamanna mere aage 
hai maujzan ek qulzum-e-KHun kash yahi ho aata hai abhi dekhiye kya kya mere aage 
go hath ko jumbish nahin aankhon mein to dam hai rahne do abhi saghar-o-mina mere aage 
ham-pesha o ham-mashrab o hamraaz hai mera 'ghaalib' ko bura kyun kaho achchha mere aage

maiñ zindagī kā saath nibhātā chalā gayā har fikr ko dhueñ meñ uḌātā chalā gayā 
barbādiyoñ kā sog manānā fuzūl thā barbādiyoñ kā jashn manātā chalā gayā 
jo mil gayā usī ko muqaddar samajh liyā jo kho gayā maiñ us ko bhulātā chalā gayā 
ġham aur ḳhushī meñ farq na mahsūs ho jahāñ maiñ dil ko us maqām pe laatā chalā gayā 
main zindagi ka sath nibhata chala gaya har fikr ko dhuen mein uData chala gaya 
barbaadiyon ka sog manana fuzul tha barbaadiyon ka jashn manata chala gaya 
jo mil gaya usi ko muqaddar samajh liya jo kho gaya main us ko bhulata chala gaya 
gham aur KHushi mein farq na mahsus ho jahan main dil ko us maqam pe lata chala gaya

na kisī kī aañkh kā nuur huuñ na kisī ke dil kā qarār huuñ kisī kaam meñ jo na aa sake maiñ vo ek musht-e-ġhubār huuñ 
na davā-e-dard-e-jigar huuñ maiñ na kisī kī mīThī nazar huuñ maiñ na idhar huuñ maiñ na udhar huuñ maiñ na shakeb huuñ na qarār huuñ 
mirā vaqt mujh se bichhaḌ gayā mirā rañg-rūp bigaḌ gayā jo ḳhizāñ se baaġh ujaḌ gayā maiñ usī kī fasl-e-bahār huuñ 
pa.e fātiha koī aa.e kyuuñ koī chaar phuul chaḌhā.e kyuuñ koī aa ke sham' jalā.e kyuuñ maiñ vo bekasī kā mazār huuñ 
na maiñ laag huuñ na lagāv huuñ na suhāg huuñ na subhāv huuñ jo bigaḌ gayā vo banāv huuñ jo nahīñ rahā vo siñgār huuñ 
maiñ nahīñ huuñ naġhma-e-jāñ-fazā mujhe sun ke koī karegā kyā maiñ baḌe birog kī huuñ sadā maiñ baḌe dukhī kī pukār huuñ 
na maiñ 'muztar' un kā habīb huuñ na maiñ 'muztar' un kā raqīb huuñ jo bigaḌ gayā vo nasīb huuñ jo ujaḌ gayā vo dayār huuñ 
na kisi ki aankh ka nur hun na kisi ke dil ka qarar hun kisi kaam mein jo na aa sake main wo ek musht-e-ghubar hun 
na dawa-e-dard-e-jigar hun main na kisi ki miThi nazar hun main na idhar hun main na udhar hun main na shakeb hun na qarar hun 
mera waqt mujh se bichhaD gaya mera rang-rup bigaD gaya jo KHizan se bagh ujaD gaya main usi ki fasl-e-bahaar hun 
pae fatiha koi aae kyun koi chaar phul chaDhae kyun koi aa ke sham' jalae kyun main wo bekasi ka mazar hun 
na main lag hun na lagaw hun na suhag hun na subhaw hun jo bigaD gaya wo banaw hun jo nahin raha wo singar hun 
main nahin hun naghma-e-jaan-faza mujhe sun ke koi karega kya main baDe birog ki hun sada main baDe dukhi ki pukar hun 
na main 'muztar' un ka habib hun na main 'muztar' un ka raqib hun jo bigaD gaya wo nasib hun jo ujaD gaya wo dayar hun

muddat huī hai yaar ko mehmāñ kiye hue josh-e-qadah se bazm charāġhāñ kiye hue 
kartā huuñ jam.a phir jigar-e-laḳht-laḳht ko arsa huā hai dāvat-e-mizhgāñ kiye hue 
phir vaz'-e-ehtiyāt se rukne lagā hai dam barsoñ hue haiñ chaak garebāñ kiye hue 
phir garm-nāla-hā-e-sharar-bār hai nafas muddat huī hai sair-e-charāġhāñ kiye hue 
phir pursish-e-jarāhat-e-dil ko chalā hai ishq sāmān-e-sad-hazār namak-dāñ kiye hue 
phir bhar rahā huuñ ḳhāma-e-mizhgāñ ba-ḳhūn-e-dil sāz-e-chaman tarāzi-e-dāmāñ kiye hue 
bāham-digar hue haiñ dil o diida phir raqīb nazzāra o ḳhayāl kā sāmāñ kiye hue 
dil phir tavāf-e-kū-e-malāmat ko jaa.e hai pindār kā sanam-kada vīrāñ kiye hue 
phir shauq kar rahā hai ḳharīdār kī talab arz-e-matā-e-aql-o-dil-o-jāñ kiye hue 
dauḌe hai phir har ek gul-o-lāla par ḳhayāl sad-gulsitāñ nigāh kā sāmāñ kiye hue 
phir chāhtā huuñ nāma-e-dildār kholnā jaañ nazr-e-dil-farebi-e-unvāñ kiye hue 
māñge hai phir kisī ko lab-e-bām par havas zulf-e-siyāh ruḳh pe pareshāñ kiye hue 
chāhe hai phir kisī ko muqābil meñ aarzū surme se tez dashna-e-mizhgāñ kiye hue 
ik nau-bahār-e-nāz ko taake hai phir nigāh chehra faroġh-e-mai se gulistāñ kiye hue 
phir jī meñ hai ki dar pe kisī ke paḌe raheñ sar zer-bār-e-minnat-e-darbāñ kiye hue 
jī DhūñDtā hai phir vahī fursat ki raat din baiThe raheñ tasavvur-e-jānāñ kiye hue 
'ġhālib' hameñ na chheḌ ki phir josh-e-ashk se baiThe haiñ ham tahayya-e-tūfāñ kiye hue 
muddat hui hai yar ko mehman kiye hue josh-e-qadah se bazm charaghan kiye hue 
karta hun jama phir jigar-e-laKHt-laKHt ko arsa hua hai dawat-e-mizhgan kiye hue 
phir waz'-e-ehtiyat se rukne laga hai dam barson hue hain chaak gareban kiye hue

bas-ki dushvār hai har kaam kā āsāñ honā aadmī ko bhī muyassar nahīñ insāñ honā

nukta-chīñ hai ġham-e-dil us ko sunā.e na bane kyā bane baat jahāñ baat banā.e na bane 
maiñ bulātā to huuñ us ko magar ai jazba-e-dil us pe ban jaa.e kuchh aisī ki bin aa.e na bane 
khel samjhā hai kahīñ chhoḌ na de bhuul na jaa.e kaash yuuñ bhī ho ki bin mere satā.e na bane

bojh vo sar se girā hai ki uThā.e na uThe kaam vo aan paḌā hai ki banā.e na bane

is nazakat ka bura ho wo bhale hain to kya hath aawen to unhen hath lagae na bane

bojh wo sar se gira hai ki uThae na uThe kaam wo aan paDa hai ki banae na bane 
ishq par zor nahin hai ye wo aatish 'ghaalib' ki lagae na lage aur bujhae na bane

ġhazab kiyā tire va.ade pe e'tibār kiyā tamām raat qayāmat kā intizār kiyā 
kisī tarah jo na us but ne e'tibār kiyā mirī vafā ne mujhe ḳhuub sharmsār kiyā 
hañsā hañsā ke shab-e-vasl ashk-bār kiyā tasalliyāñ mujhe de de ke be-qarār kiyā 
ye kis ne jalva hamāre sar-e-mazār kiyā ki dil se shor uThā haa.e be-qarār kiyā 
sunā hai teġh ko qātil ne āb-dār kiyā agar ye sach hai to be-shub.ha ham pe vaar kiyā 
na aa.e raah pe vo ijz be-shumār kiyā shab-e-visāl bhī maiñ ne to intizār kiyā 
tujhe to vāda-e-dīdār ham se karnā thā ye kyā kiyā ki jahāñ ko umīd-vār kiyā 
ye dil ko taab kahāñ hai ki ho ma.āl-andesh unhoñ ne va.ada kiyā is ne e'tibār kiyā 
kahāñ kā sabr ki dam par hai ban ga.ī zālim ba tang aa.e to hāl-e-dil āshkār kiyā 
taḌap phir ai dil-e-nādāñ ki ġhair kahte haiñ aḳhīr kuchh na banī sabr iḳhtiyār kiyā 
mile jo yaar kī shoḳhī se us kī bechainī tamām raat dil-e-muztarib ko pyaar kiyā 
bhulā bhulā ke jatāyā hai un ko rāz-e-nihāñ chhupā chhupā ke mohabbat ko āshkār kiyā 
na us ke dil se miTāyā ki saaf ho jaatā sabā ne ḳhaak pareshāñ mirā ġhubār kiyā 
ham aise mahv-e-nazāra na the jo hosh aatā magar tumhāre taġhāful ne hoshyār kiyā 
hamāre siine meñ jo rah ga.ī thī ātish-e-hijr shab-e-visāl bhī us ko na ham-kanār kiyā 
raqīb o sheva-e-ulfat ḳhudā kī qudrat hai vo aur ishq bhalā tum ne e'tibār kiyā 
zabān-e-ḳhār se niklī sadā-e-bismillāh junūñ ko jab sar-e-shorīda par savār kiyā 
tirī nigah ke tasavvur meñ ham ne ai qātil lagā lagā ke gale se chhurī ko pyaar kiyā 
ġhazab thī kasrat-e-mahfil ki maiñ ne dhoke meñ hazār baar raqīboñ ko ham-kanār kiyā 
huā hai koī magar us kā chāhne vaalā ki āsmāñ ne tirā sheva iḳhtiyār kiyā 
na pūchh dil kī haqīqat magar ye kahte haiñ vo be-qarār rahe jis ne be-qarār kiyā 
jab un ko tarz-e-sitam aa ga.e to hosh aayā burā ho dil kā bure vaqt hoshyār kiyā 
fasāna-e-shab-e-ġham un ko ik kahānī thī kuchh e'tibār kiyā kuchh na e'tibār kiyā 
asīrī dil-e-āshufta rang lā ke rahī tamām turra-e-tarrār taar taar kiyā 
kuchh aa ga.ī dāvar-e-mahshar se hai ummīd mujhe kuchh aap ne mire kahne kā e'tibār kiyā 
kisī ke ishq-e-nihāñ meñ ye bad-gumānī thī ki Darte Darte ḳhudā par bhī āshkār kiyā 
falak se taur qayāmat ke ban na paḌte the aḳhīr ab tujhe āshob-e-rozgār kiyā 
vo baat kar jo kabhī āsmāñ se ho na sake sitam kiyā to baḌā tū ne iftiḳhār kiyā 
banegā mehr-e-qayāmat bhī ek ḳhāl-e-siyāh jo chehra 'dāġh'-e-siyah-rū ne āshkār kiyā

dard minnat-kash-e-davā na huā maiñ na achchhā huā burā na huā 
jam.a karte ho kyuuñ raqīboñ ko ik tamāshā huā gila na huā 
ham kahāñ qismat āzmāne jaa.eñ tū hī jab ḳhanjar-āzmā na huā 
kitne shīrīñ haiñ tere lab ki raqīb gāliyāñ khā ke be-mazā na huā 
hai ḳhabar garm un ke aane kī aaj hī ghar meñ boriyā na huā 
kyā vo namrūd kī ḳhudā.ī thī bandagī meñ mirā bhalā na huā 
jaan dī dī huī usī kī thī haq to yuuñ hai ki haq adā na huā 
zaḳhm gar dab gayā lahū na thamā kaam gar ruk gayā ravā na huā 
rahzanī hai ki dil-sitānī hai le ke dil dil-sitāñ ravāna huā 
kuchh to paḌhiye ki log kahte haiñ aaj 'ġhālib' ġhazal-sarā na huā 
dard minnat-kash-e-dawa na hua main na achchha hua bura na hua 
jama karte ho kyun raqibon ko ek tamasha hua gila na hua

kitne shirin hain tere lab ki raqib galiyan kha ke be-maza na hua 
hai KHabar garm un ke aane ki aaj hi ghar mein boriya na hua 
kya wo namrud ki KHudai thi bandagi mein mera bhala na hua 
jaan di di hui usi ki thi haq to yun hai ki haq ada na hua 
zaKHm gar dab gaya lahu na thama kaam gar ruk gaya rawa na hua 
rahzani hai ki dil-sitani hai le ke dil dil-sitan rawana hua 
kuchh to paDhiye ki log kahte hain aaj 'ghaalib' ghazal-sara na hua

haiñ aur bhī duniyā meñ suḳhan-var bahut achchhe kahte haiñ ki 'ġhālib' kā hai andāz-e-bayāñ aur 
hai bas-ki har ek un ke ishaare mein nishan aur karte hain mohabbat to guzarta hai guman aur 
ya-rab wo na samjhe hain na samjhenge meri baat de aur dil un ko jo na de mujh ko zaban aur 
abru se hai kya us nigah-e-naz ko paiwand hai tir muqarrar magar is ki hai kaman aur 
tum shahr mein ho to hamein kya gham jab uThenge le aaenge bazar se ja kar dil o jaan aur

hain aur bhi duniya mein suKHan-war bahut achchhe kahte hain ki 'ghaalib' ka hai andaz-e-bayan aur

barbād-e-mohabbat kī duā saath liye jā TuuTā huā iqrār-e-vafā saath liye jā 
ik dil thā jo pahle hī tujhe sauñp diyā thā ye jaan bhī ai jān-e-adā saath liye jā 
taptī huī rāhoñ se tujhe aañch na pahuñche dīvānoñ ke ashkoñ kī ghaTā saath liye jā 
shāmil hai mirā ḳhūn-e-jigar terī hinā meñ ye kam ho to ab ḳhūn-e-vafā saath liye jā 
ham jurm-e-mohabbat kī sazā pā.eñge tanhā jo tujh se huī ho vo ḳhatā saath liye jā 
barbaad-e-mohabbat ki dua sath liye ja TuTa hua iqrar-e-wafa sath liye ja 
ek dil tha jo pahle hi tujhe saunp diya tha ye jaan bhi ai jaan-e-ada sath liye ja 
tapti hui rahon se tujhe aanch na pahunche diwanon ke ashkon ki ghaTa sath liye ja 
shamil hai mera KHun-e-jigar teri hina mein ye kam ho to ab KHun-e-wafa sath liye ja 
hum jurm-e-mohabbat ki saza paenge tanha jo tujh se hui ho wo KHata sath liye ja

zulmat-kade meñ mere shab-e-ġham kā josh hai ik sham.a hai dalīl-e-sahar so ḳhamosh hai 
ne muzhda-e-visāl na nazzāra-e-jamāl muddat huī ki āshtī-e-chashm-o-gosh hai 
mai ne kiyā hai husn-e-ḳhud-ārā ko be-hijāb ai shauq! haañ ijāzat-e-taslīm-e-hosh hai 
gauhar ko aqd-e-gardan-e-ḳhūbāñ meñ dekhnā kyā auj par sitāra-e-gauhar-farosh hai 
dīdār baada hausla saaqī nigāh mast bazm-e-ḳhayāl mai-kada-e-be-ḳharosh hai 
ai taaza vārdān-e-bisāt-e-havā-e-dil zinhār agar tumheñ havas-e-nā.e-o-nosh hai 
dekho mujhe jo dīda-e-ibrat-nigāh ho merī suno jo gosh-e-nasīhat-ne.osh hai 
sāqī-ba-jalva dushman-e-īmān-o-āgahī mutrib ba-naġhma rahzan-e-tamkīn-o-hosh hai 
yā shab ko dekhte the ki har gosha-e-bisāt dāmān-e-bāġhbān o kaf-e-gul-farosh hai 
luft-e-ḳhiram-e-sāqī o zauq-e-sadā-e-chang ye jannat-e-nigāh vo firdaus-e-gosh hai 
yā sub.h-dam jo dekhiye aa kar to bazm meñ ne vo surūr o soz na josh-o-ḳharosh hai 
dāġh-e-firāq-e-sohbat-e-shab kī jalī huī ik sham.a rah ga.ī hai so vo bhī ḳhamosh hai 
aate haiñ ġhaib se ye mazāmīñ ḳhayāl meñ 'ġhālib' sarīr-e-ḳhāma navā-e-sarosh hai 
zulmat-kade mein mere shab-e-gham ka josh hai ek shama hai dalil-e-sahar so KHamosh hai 
ne muzhda-e-visal na nazzara-e-jamal muddat hui ki aashti-e-chashm-o-gosh hai 
mai ne kiya hai husn-e-KHud-ara ko be-hijab ai shauq! han ijazat-e-taslim-e-hosh hai 
gauhar ko aqd-e-gardan-e-KHuban mein dekhna kya auj par sitara-e-gauhar-farosh hai 
didar baada hausla saqi nigah mast bazm-e-KHayal mai-kada-e-be-KHarosh hai 
ai taza wardan-e-bisat-e-hawa-e-dil zinhaar agar tumhein hawas-e-nae-o-nosh hai 
dekho mujhe jo dida-e-ibrat-nigah ho meri suno jo gosh-e-nasihat-neosh hai 
saqi-ba-jalwa dushman-e-iman-o-agahi mutrib ba-naghma rahzan-e-tamkin-o-hosh hai 
ya shab ko dekhte the ki har gosha-e-bisat daman-e-baghban o kaf-e-gul-farosh hai 
luft-e-KHiram-e-saqi o zauq-e-sada-e-chang ye jannat-e-nigah wo firdaus-e-gosh hai 
ya subh-dam jo dekhiye aa kar to bazm mein ne wo surur o soz na josh-o-KHarosh hai 
dagh-e-firaq-e-sohbat-e-shab ki jali hui ek shama rah gai hai so wo bhi KHamosh hai 
aate hain ghaib se ye mazamin KHayal mein 'ghaalib' sarir-e-KHama nawa-e-sarosh hai

wo jin ko pyar hai chandi se ishq sone se wahi kahenge kabhi hum ne KHud-kushi kar li

na tū zamīñ ke liye hai na āsmāñ ke liye tirā vajūd hai ab sirf dāstāñ ke liye 
palaT ke sū-e-chaman dekhne se kyā hogā vo shāḳh hī na rahī jo thī āshiyāñ ke liye 
ġharaz-parast jahāñ meñ vafā talāsh na kar ye shai banī thī kisī dūsre jahāñ ke liye 
na tu zamin ke liye hai na aasman ke liye tera wajud hai ab sirf dastan ke liye 
palaT ke su-e-chaman dekhne se kya hoga wo shaKH hi na rahi jo thi aashiyan ke liye 
gharaz-parast jahan mein wafa talash na kar ye shai bani thi kisi dusre jahan ke liye

diyā hai dil agar us ko bashar hai kyā kahiye huā raqīb to ho nāma-bar hai kyā kahiye 
ye zid ki aaj na aave aur aa.e bin na rahe qazā se shikva hameñ kis qadar hai kyā kahiye 
rahe hai yuuñ gah-o-be-gah ki kū-e-dost ko ab agar na kahiye ki dushman kā ghar hai kyā kahiye 
zahe karishma ki yuuñ de rakkhā hai ham ko fareb ki bin kahe hī unheñ sab ḳhabar hai kyā kahiye 
samajh ke karte haiñ bāzār meñ vo pursish-e-hāl ki ye kahe ki sar-e-rahguzar hai kyā kahiye 
tumheñ nahīñ hai sar-e-rishta-e-vafā kā ḳhayāl hamāre haath meñ kuchh hai magar hai kyā kahiye 
unheñ savāl pe zom-e-junūñ hai kyuuñ laḌiye hameñ javāb se qat-e-nazar hai kyā kahiye 
hasad sazā-e-kamāl-e-suḳhan hai kyā kiije sitam bahā-e-matā-e-hunar hai kyā kahiye 
kahā hai kis ne ki 'ġhālib' burā nahīñ lekin sivā.e is ke ki āshufta-sar hai kyā kahiye 
diya hai dil agar us ko bashar hai kya kahiye hua raqib to ho nama-bar hai kya kahiye 
ye zid ki aaj na aawe aur aae bin na rahe qaza se shikwa hamein kis qadar hai kya kahiye 
rahe hai yun gah-o-be-gah ki ku-e-dost ko ab agar na kahiye ki dushman ka ghar hai kya kahiye 
zahe karishma ki yun de rakkha hai hum ko fareb ki bin kahe hi unhen sab KHabar hai kya kahiye 
samajh ke karte hain bazar mein wo pursish-e-haal ki ye kahe ki sar-e-rahguzar hai kya kahiye 
tumhein nahin hai sar-e-rishta-e-wafa ka KHayal hamare hath mein kuchh hai magar hai kya kahiye 
unhen sawal pe zom-e-junun hai kyun laDiye hamein jawab se qat-e-nazar hai kya kahiye 
hasad saza-e-kamal-e-suKHan hai kya kije sitam baha-e-mata-e-hunar hai kya kahiye 
kaha hai kis ne ki 'ghaalib' bura nahin lekin siwae is ke ki aashufta-sar hai kya kahiye

falsafe ishq meñ pesh aa.e savāloñ kī tarah ham pareshāñ hī rahe apne ḳhayāloñ kī tarah 
shīshagar baiThe rahe zikr-e-masīhā le kar aur ham TuuT ga.e kāñch ke pyāloñ kī tarah 
jab bhī anjām-e-mohabbat ne pukārā ḳhud ko vaqt ne pesh kiyā ham ko misāloñ kī tarah 
zikr jab hogā mohabbat meñ tabāhī kā kahīñ yaad ham ā.eñge duniyā ko havāloñ kī tarah 
falsafe ishq mein pesh aae sawalon ki tarah hum pareshan hi rahe apne KHayalon ki tarah 
shishagar baiThe rahe zikr-e-masiha le kar aur hum TuT gae kanch ke pyalon ki tarah 
jab bhi anjam-e-mohabbat ne pukara KHud ko waqt ne pesh kiya hum ko misalon ki tarah 
zikr jab hoga mohabbat mein tabahi ka kahin yaad hum aaenge duniya ko hawalon ki tarah

koī sāġhar dil ko bahlātā nahīñ be-ḳhudī meñ bhī qarār aatā nahīñ 
maiñ koī patthar nahīñ insān huuñ kaise kah duuñ ġham se ghabrātā nahīñ 
kal to sab the kārvāñ ke saath saath aaj koī raah dikhlātā nahīñ 
zindagī ke aa.ine ko toḌ do is meñ ab kuchh bhī nazar aatā nahīñ 
koi saghar dil ko bahlata nahin be-KHudi mein bhi qarar aata nahin 
main koi patthar nahin insan hun kaise kah dun gham se ghabraata nahin 
kal to sab the karwan ke sath sath aaj koi rah dikhlata nahin 
zindagi ke aaine ko toD do is mein ab kuchh bhi nazar aata nahin

chhalke tirī āñkhoñ se sharāb aur ziyāda khilte raheñ hoñThoñ ke gulāb aur ziyāda 
kyā baat hai jaane tirī mahfil meñ sitamgar dhaḌke hai dil-e-ḳhāna-ḳharāb aur ziyāda 
is dil meñ abhī aur bhī zaḳhmoñ kī jagah hai abrū kī kaTārī ko do aab aur ziyāda 
tū ishq ke tūfān ko bāñhoñ meñ jakaḌ le allāh kare zor-e-shabāb aur ziyāda 
chhalke teri aankhon se sharab aur ziyaada khilte rahen honThon ke gulab aur ziyaada 
kya baat hai jaane teri mahfil mein sitamgar dhaDke hai dil-e-KHana-KHarab aur ziyaada 
is dil mein abhi aur bhi zaKHmon ki jagah hai abru ki kaTari ko do aab aur ziyaada 
tu ishq ke tufan ko banhon mein jakaD le allah kare zor-e-shabab aur ziyaada
Poetry Text

kabhī ḳhud pe kabhī hālāt pe ronā aayā baat niklī to har ik baat pe ronā aayā 
ham to samjhe the ki ham bhuul ga.e haiñ un ko kyā huā aaj ye kis baat pe ronā aayā 
kis liye jiite haiñ ham kis ke liye jiite haiñ bārhā aise savālāt pe ronā aayā 
kaun rotā hai kisī aur kī ḳhātir ai dost sab ko apnī hī kisī baat pe ronā aayā 
kabhi KHud pe kabhi haalat pe rona aaya baat nikli to har ek baat pe rona aaya 
hum to samjhe the ki hum bhul gae hain un ko kya hua aaj ye kis baat pe rona aaya 
kis liye jite hain hum kis ke liye jite hain barha aise sawalat pe rona aaya 
kaun rota hai kisi aur ki KHatir ai dost sab ko apni hi kisi baat pe rona aaya

tang aa chuke haiñ kashmakash-e-zindagī se ham Thukrā na deñ jahāñ ko kahīñ be-dilī se ham 
māyūsī-e-ma.āl-e-mohabbat na pūchhiye apnoñ se pesh aa.e haiñ begānagī se ham 
lo aaj ham ne toḌ diyā rishta-e-umīd lo ab kabhī gila na kareñge kisī se ham 
ubhreñge ek baar abhī dil ke valvale go dab ga.e haiñ bār-e-ġham-e-zindagī se ham 
gar zindagī meñ mil ga.e phir ittifāq se pūchheñge apnā haal tirī bebasī se ham 
allāh-re fareb-e-mashiyyat ki aaj tak duniyā ke zulm sahte rahe ḳhāmushī se ham 
tang aa chuke hain kashmakash-e-zindagi se hum Thukra na den jahan ko kahin be-dili se hum 
mayusi-e-maal-e-mohabbat na puchhiye apnon se pesh aae hain beganagi se hum 
lo aaj hum ne toD diya rishta-e-umid lo ab kabhi gila na karenge kisi se hum 
ubhrenge ek bar abhi dil ke walwale go dab gae hain bar-e-gham-e-zindagi se hum 
gar zindagi mein mil gae phir ittifaq se puchhenge apna haal teri bebasi se hum 
allah-re fareb-e-mashiyyat ki aaj tak duniya ke zulm sahte rahe KHamushi se hum

mohabbat tark kī maiñ ne garebāñ sī liyā maiñ ne zamāne ab to ḳhush ho zahr ye bhī pī liyā maiñ ne 
abhī zinda huuñ lekin sochtā rahtā huuñ ḳhalvat meñ ki ab tak kis tamannā ke sahāre jī liyā maiñ ne 
unheñ apnā nahīñ saktā magar itnā bhī kyā kam hai ki kuchh muddat hasīñ ḳhvāboñ meñ kho kar jī liyā maiñ ne 
bas ab to dāman-e-dil chhoḌ do bekār ummīdo bahut dukh sah liye maiñ ne bahut din jī liyā maiñ ne 
mohabbat tark ki main ne gareban si liya main ne zamane ab to KHush ho zahr ye bhi pi liya main ne 
abhi zinda hun lekin sochta rahta hun KHalwat mein ki ab tak kis tamanna ke sahaare ji liya main ne 
unhen apna nahin sakta magar itna bhi kya kam hai ki kuchh muddat hasin KHwabon mein kho kar ji liya main ne 
bas ab to daman-e-dil chhoD do bekar ummido bahut dukh sah liye main ne bahut din ji liya main ne

ahl-e-dil aur bhī haiñ ahl-e-vafā aur bhī haiñ ek ham hī nahīñ duniyā se ḳhafā aur bhī haiñ 
ham pe hī ḳhatm nahīñ maslak-e-shorīda-sarī chāk-e-dil aur bhī haiñ chāk-e-qabā aur bhī haiñ 
kyā huā gar mire yāroñ kī zabāneñ chup haiñ mere shāhid mire yāroñ ke sivā aur bhī haiñ 
sar salāmat hai to kyā sañg-e-malāmat kī kamī jaan baaqī hai to paikān-e-qazā aur bhī haiñ 
munsif-e-shahr kī vahdat pe na harf aa jaa.e log kahte haiñ ki arbāb-e-jafā aur bhī haiñ 
ahl-e-dil aur bhi hain ahl-e-wafa aur bhi hain ek hum hi nahin duniya se KHafa aur bhi hain 
hum pe hi KHatm nahin maslak-e-shorida-sari chaak-e-dil aur bhi hain chaak-e-qaba aur bhi hain 
kya hua gar mere yaron ki zabanen chup hain mere shahid mere yaron ke siwa aur bhi hain 
sar salamat hai to kya sang-e-malamat ki kami jaan baqi hai to paikan-e-qaza aur bhi hain 
munsif-e-shahr ki wahdat pe na harf aa jae log kahte hain ki arbab-e-jafa aur bhi hain

havas-nasīb nazar ko kahīñ qarār nahīñ maiñ muntazir huuñ magar terā intizār nahīñ 
hamīñ se rañg-e-gulistāñ hamīñ se rañg-e-bahār hamīñ ko nazm-e-gulistāñ pe iḳhtiyār nahīñ 
abhī na chheḌ mohabbat ke giit ai mutrib abhī hayāt kā māhaul ḳhush-gavār nahīñ 
tumhāre ahd-e-vafā ko maiñ ahd kyā samjhūñ mujhe ḳhud apnī mohabbat pe e'tibār nahīñ 
na jaane kitne gile is meñ muztarib haiñ nadīm vo ek dil jo kisī kā gila-guzār nahīñ 
gurez kā nahīñ qaa.il hayāt se lekin jo sach kahūñ ki mujhe maut nāgavār nahīñ 
ye kis maqām pe pahuñchā diyā zamāne ne ki ab hayāt pe terā bhī iḳhtiyār nahīñ 
hawas-nasib nazar ko kahin qarar nahin main muntazir hun magar tera intizar nahin 
hamin se rang-e-gulistan hamin se rang-e-bahaar hamin ko nazm-e-gulistan pe iKHtiyar nahin 
abhi na chheD mohabbat ke git ai mutrib abhi hayat ka mahaul KHush-gawar nahin 
tumhaare ahd-e-wafa ko main ahd kya samjhun mujhe KHud apni mohabbat pe e'tibar nahin 
na jaane kitne gile is mein muztarib hain nadim wo ek dil jo kisi ka gila-guzar nahin 
gurez ka nahin qail hayat se lekin jo sach kahun ki mujhe maut nagawar nahin 
ye kis maqam pe pahuncha diya zamane ne ki ab hayat pe tera bhi iKHtiyar nahin
Poetry Text

har galī kūche meñ rone kī sadā merī hai shahr meñ jo bhī huā hai vo ḳhatā merī hai 
ye jo hai ḳhaak kā ik Dher badan hai merā vo jo uḌtī huī phirtī hai qabā merī hai 
vo jo ik shor sā barpā hai amal hai merā ye jo tanhā.ī barastī hai sazā merī hai 
maiñ na chāhūñ to na khil paa.e kahīñ ek bhī phuul baaġh terā hai magar bād-e-sabā merī hai 
ek TuuTī huī kashtī sā banā baiThā huuñ na ye miTTī na ye paanī na havā merī hai 
har gali kuche mein rone ki sada meri hai shahr mein jo bhi hua hai wo KHata meri hai 
ye jo hai KHak ka ek Dher badan hai mera wo jo uDti hui phirti hai qaba meri hai 
wo jo ek shor sa barpa hai amal hai mera ye jo tanhai barasti hai saza meri hai 
main na chahun to na khil pae kahin ek bhi phul bagh tera hai magar baad-e-saba meri hai 
ek TuTi hui kashti sa bana baiTha hun na ye miTTi na ye pani na hawa meri hai

huī ik ḳhvāb se shādī mirī tanhā.ī kī pahlī beTī hai udāsī mirī tanhā.ī kī 
abhī ma.alūm nahīñ kitne haiñ zaatī asbāb kitnī vaj.heñ haiñ samājī mirī tanhā.ī kī 
jā ke dekhā to khulā raunaq-e-bāzār kā raaz ek ik chiiz banī thī mirī tanhā.ī kī 
shahr-dar-shahr jo ye anjuman.en haiñ ābād tarbiyat-gāheñ haiñ saarī mirī tanhā.ī kī 
sirf ā.īna-e-āġhosh-e-mohabbat meñ milī ek tanhā.ī javābī mirī tanhā.ī kī 
saaf hai chehra-e-qātil mirī āñkhoñ meñ magar mo'tabar kab hai gavāhī mirī tanhā.ī kī 
hāsil-e-vasl sifar hijr kā hāsil bhī sifar jaane kaisī hai riyāzī mirī tanhā.ī kī 
kisī hālat meñ bhī tanhā nahīñ hone detī hai yahī ek ḳharābī mirī tanhā.ī kī 
maiñ jo yuuñ phirtā huuñ mai-ḳhānoñ meñ but-ḳhānoñ meñ hai yahī roza namāzī mirī tanhā.ī kī 
'farhat-ehsās' vo ham-zād hai merā jis ne shahr meñ dhuum machā dī mirī tanhā.ī kī 
hui ek KHwab se shadi meri tanhai ki pahli beTi hai udasi meri tanhai ki 
abhi malum nahin kitne hain zati asbab kitni wajhen hain samaji meri tanhai ki 
ja ke dekha to khula raunaq-e-bazar ka raaz ek ek chiz bani thi meri tanhai ki 
shahr-dar-shahr jo ye anjumanen hain aabaad tarbiyat-gahen hain sari meri tanhai ki 
sirf aaina-e-aghosh-e-mohabbat mein mili ek tanhai jawabi meri tanhai ki 
saf hai chehra-e-qatil meri aankhon mein magar mo'tabar kab hai gawahi meri tanhai ki 
hasil-e-wasl sifar hijr ka hasil bhi sifar jaane kaisi hai riyazi meri tanhai ki 
kisi haalat mein bhi tanha nahin hone deti hai yahi ek KHarabi meri tanhai ki 
main jo yun phirta hun mai-KHanon mein but-KHanon mein hai yahi roza namazi meri tanhai ki 
'farhat-ehsas' wo ham-zad hai mera jis ne shahr mein dhum macha di meri tanhai ki

ḳhaak hai merā badan ḳhaak hī us kā hogā donoñ mil jaa.eñ to kyā zor kā sahrā hogā 
phir mirā jism mirī jaañ se judā hai dekho tum ne Tāñkā jo lagāyā thā vo kachchā hogā 
tum ko rone se bahut saaf huī haiñ āñkheñ jo bhī ab sāmne aa.egā vo achchhā hogā 
roz ye soch ke sotā huuñ ki is raat ke ba.ad ab agar aañkh khulegī to saverā hogā 
kyā badan hai ki Thahartā hī nahīñ āñkhoñ meñ bas yahī dekhtā rahtā huuñ ki ab kyā hogā 
KHak hai mera badan KHak hi us ka hoga donon mil jaen to kya zor ka sahra hoga 
phir mera jism meri jaan se juda hai dekho tum ne Tanka jo lagaya tha wo kachcha hoga 
tum ko rone se bahut saf hui hain aankhen jo bhi ab samne aaega wo achchha hoga 
roz ye soch ke sota hun ki is raat ke baad ab agar aankh khulegi to sawera hoga 
kya badan hai ki Thaharta hi nahin aankhon mein bas yahi dekhta rahta hun ki ab kya hoga

rāste ham se raaz kahne lage phir to ham rāstoñ meñ rahne lage 
mere lafzoñ ko mil ga.ī āñkheñ saare aañsū laboñ se bahne lage 
shahr ke lafz kar diye vāpas apnī zaat apnī baat kahne lage 
ham abhī Thiik se bane bhī na the ḳhud se Takrā.e aur Dhahne lage 
us ne talqīn-e-sabr kī thī so ham jo na sahnā thā vo bhī sahne lage 
ham ne miTTī kī beḌiyāñ kāTīñ toḌā zindān-e-āb bahne lage 
muzhda ai sakinān-e-shahr-e-suḳhan 'farhat-ehsās' sher kahne lage 
raste hum se raaz kahne lage phir to hum raston mein rahne lage 
mere lafzon ko mil gai aankhen sare aansu labon se bahne lage 
shahr ke lafz kar diye wapas apni zat apni baat kahne lage 
hum abhi Thik se bane bhi na the KHud se Takrae aur Dhahne lage 
us ne talqin-e-sabr ki thi so hum jo na sahna tha wo bhi sahne lage 
hum ne miTTi ki beDiyan kaTin toDa zindan-e-ab bahne lage 
muzhda ai sakinan-e-shahr-e-suKHan 'farhat-ehsas' sher kahne lage

bahut mumkin thā ham do jism aur ik jaan ho jaate magar do jism sirf ik jaan se halkān ho jaate 
tum aate to diloñ se khelne kā shauq thā tum ko to mere jism-o-jāñ us khel kā maidān ho jaate 
ham us ke vasl ke chakkar meñ ġhārat ho ga.e āḳhir kiyā hotā jo hijr achchhe-bhale insān ho jaate 
bahut mumkin tha hum do jism aur ek jaan ho jate magar do jism sirf ek jaan se halkan ho jate 
tum aate to dilon se khelne ka shauq tha tum ko to mere jism-o-jaan us khel ka maidan ho jate 
hum us ke wasl ke chakkar mein ghaarat ho gae aaKHir kiya hota jo hijr achchhe-bhale insan ho jate

ḳhudā ḳhāmosh bande bolte haiñ baḌe chup hoñ to bachche bolte haiñ 
suno sargoshiyāñ kuchh kah rahī haiñ zabāñ-bandī meñ aise bolte haiñ 
mohabbat kaise chhat par jaa.e chhup kar qadam rakhte hī ziine bolte haiñ 
nashe meñ jhūmne lagte haiñ ma.anī to lafzoñ meñ karishme bolte haiñ ye ham zindoñ se mumkin hī nahīñ hai jo kuchh murdoñ se murde bolte haiñ 
ham insānoñ ko aatā hai bas ik shor tarannum meñ parinde bolte haiñ 
ḳhamoshī suntī hai jab apnī āvāz to sīnoñ meñ dafīne bolte haiñ 
maiñ paiġhambar nahīñ huuñ phir bhī mujh meñ ka.ī gum-sum sahīfe bolte haiñ 
yahī hai vaqt bolo 'farhat-ehsās' ki har jānib kamīne bolte haiñ 
KHuda KHamosh bande bolte hain baDe chup hon to bachche bolte hain 
suno sargoshiyan kuchh kah rahi hain zaban-bandi mein aise bolte hain 
mohabbat kaise chhat par jae chhup kar qadam rakhte hi zine bolte hain 
nashe mein jhumne lagte hain mani to lafzon mein karishme bolte hain ye hum zindon se mumkin hi nahin hai jo kuchh murdon se murde bolte hain 
hum insanon ko aata hai bas ek shor tarannum mein parinde bolte hain 
KHamoshi sunti hai jab apni aawaz to sinon mein dafine bolte hain 
main paighambar nahin hun phir bhi mujh mein kai gum-sum sahife bolte hain 
yahi hai waqt bolo 'farhat-ehsas' ki har jaanib kamine bolte hain

ba-zāhir to badan-bhar kā ilāqa gher rakkhā hai magar andar se ham ne shahr saarā gher rakkhā hai 
maiñ paspā fauj-e-dil kā āḳhirī zaḳhmī sipāhī huuñ magar ik umr se dushman ko tanhā gher rakkhā hai 
kabhī is raushnī kī qaid se bāhar bhī niklo tum hujūm-e-husn ne saara sarāpā gher rakkhā hai 
musībat meñ paḌā hai in dinoñ merā dil-e-vahshī samajh kar shahr vāloñ ne darinda gher rakkhā hai 
mohabbat kā ḳhudā huuñ maiñ magar aisā ḳhudā jis ne baḌī mushkil se apnā ek banda gher rakkhā hai 
bahut pahle kabhī paidā hue aur mar ga.e the ham isī maazī ne mustaqbil hamārā gher rakkhā hai 
koī īmān vaalā ahl-e-masjid se kahe jā kar ḳhudā ko kyuuñ unhoñne kāfirāna gher rakkhā hai 
chalo ham farhat-'ehsās' apnā masjid se chhuḌā laa.eñ ḳhudā vāloñ ne ik kāfir hamārā gher rakkhā hai 
ba-zahir to badan-bhar ka ilaqa gher rakkha hai magar andar se hum ne shahr sara gher rakkha hai 
main paspa fauj-e-dil ka aaKHiri zaKHmi sipahi hun magar ek umr se dushman ko tanha gher rakkha hai 
kabhi is raushni ki qaid se bahar bhi niklo tum hujum-e-husn ne sara sarapa gher rakkha hai 
musibat mein paDa hai in dinon mera dil-e-wahshi samajh kar shahr walon ne darinda gher rakkha hai 
mohabbat ka KHuda hun main magar aisa KHuda jis ne baDi mushkil se apna ek banda gher rakkha hai 
bahut pahle kabhi paida hue aur mar gae the hum isi mazi ne mustaqbil hamara gher rakkha hai 
koi iman wala ahl-e-masjid se kahe ja kar KHuda ko kyun unhonne kafirana gher rakkha hai 
chalo hum farhat-'ehsas' apna masjid se chhuDa laen KHuda walon ne ek kafir hamara gher rakkha hai

badan aur ruuh meñ jhagḌā paḌā hai ki hissa ishq meñ kis kā baḌā hai 
hujūm-e-girya se huuñ dar-ba-dar maiñ ki ghar meñ sar talak paanī khaḌā hai 
bulātī hai mujhe dīvār-e-duniyā jahāñ har jism īñToñ sā jaḌā hai 
jhiñjhoḌā hai abhī kis zalzale ne zamīñ se zindagī sā kyā jhaḌā hai 
faqat āñkheñ hī āñkheñ rah ga.ī haiñ ki saarā shahr miTTī meñ gaḌā hai 
tumhārā aks hai yā aks-e-duniyā tazabzub sā kuchh āñkhoñ meñ paḌā hai 
maiñ dariyā jaañ bachātā phir rahā huuñ koī sāhil mire pīchhe paḌā hai 
zarā sī sharm bhī kar farhat-'ehsās' badan terā ajab chiknā ghaḌā hai 
badan aur ruh mein jhagDa paDa hai ki hissa ishq mein kis ka baDa hai 
hujum-e-girya se hun dar-ba-dar main ki ghar mein sar talak pani khaDa hai 
bulati hai mujhe diwar-e-duniya jahan har jism inTon sa jaDa hai 
jhinjhoDa hai abhi kis zalzale ne zamin se zindagi sa kya jhaDa hai 
faqat aankhen hi aankhen rah gai hain ki sara shahr miTTi mein gaDa hai 
tumhaara aks hai ya aks-e-duniya tazabzub sa kuchh aankhon mein paDa hai 
main dariya jaan bachata phir raha hun koi sahil mere pichhe paDa hai 
zara si sharm bhi kar farhat-'ehsas' badan tera ajab chikna ghaDa hai

dekho abhī lahū kī ik dhaar chal rahī hai baazū kaTe haiñ phir bhī talvār chal rahī hai 
tahzīb ne ye kaisā muḳhbir lagā rakhā hai har lamha saath ghar kī dīvār chal rahī hai 
kuchh to mirī udāsī hañgāma bhī kiyā kar tū aaj saath mere bāzār chal rahī hai 
tum saath ho to kaisā chipkā paḌā hai dariyā aur ye havā bhī kaisī hamvār chal rahī hai 
kar lo ayādat us kī tum bhī to 'farhat-ehsās' duniyā bahut dinoñ se bīmār chal rahī hai 
dekho abhi lahu ki ek dhaar chal rahi hai bazu kaTe hain phir bhi talwar chal rahi hai 
tahzib ne ye kaisa muKHbir laga rakha hai har lamha sath ghar ki diwar chal rahi hai 
kuchh to meri udasi hangama bhi kiya kar tu aaj sath mere bazar chal rahi hai 
tum sath ho to kaisa chipka paDa hai dariya aur ye hawa bhi kaisi hamwar chal rahi hai 
kar lo ayaadat us ki tum bhi to 'farhat-ehsas' duniya bahut dinon se bimar chal rahi hai

ghar banāne meñ tamām ahl-e-safar lag ga.e haiñ kyā tamāshe ye sar-e-rāhguzar lag ga.e haiñ 
toḌ kar band-e-qabā jism uḌā jaatā hai kaise is ḳhaak kī dīvār ko par lag ga.e haiñ 
sirf ik tujh se bichhaḌne kā nahīñ ḳhauf hameñ saath meñ ab ke ka.ī aur bhī Dar lag ga.e haiñ 
sabza-e-mutazir is darja numū ko pahuñchā dekh ham dar pe tire misl-e-shajar lag ga.e haiñ 
jashn-e-girya to kiyā thā mirī āñkhoñ ne shurūa saath ab shahr ke sab dīda-e-tar lag ga.e haiñ 
kaisī afvāh uḌī tujh se mire rishte kī sab tire chāhne vaale mire ghar lag ga.e haiñ 
husn to hai hī na.ī tarah se ātish-añgez aa.ine ko bhī na.e barq-o-sharar lag ga.e haiñ 
kārḳhāna hai usī husn kā aalam saarā bas jidhar us ne lagāyā hai udhar lag ga.e haiñ 
jis kī pādāsh meñ hai dar-ba-darī kā ye itaab phir usī kaam pe ham shahr-badar lag ga.e haiñ 
'farhat-ehsās' maiñ kyā dekhā jo us ke pīchhe āñkheñ dikhlāte hue ahl-e-nazar lag ga.e haiñ 
ghar banane mein tamam ahl-e-safar lag gae hain kya tamashe ye sar-e-rahguzar lag gae hain 
toD kar band-e-qaba jism uDa jata hai kaise is KHak ki diwar ko par lag gae hain 
sirf ek tujh se bichhaDne ka nahin KHauf hamein sath mein ab ke kai aur bhi Dar lag gae hain 
sabza-e-mutazir is darja numu ko pahuncha dekh hum dar pe tere misl-e-shajar lag gae hain 
jashn-e-girya to kiya tha meri aankhon ne shurua sath ab shahr ke sab dida-e-tar lag gae hain 
kaisi afwah uDi tujh se mere rishte ki sab tere chahne wale mere ghar lag gae hain 
husn to hai hi nai tarah se aatish-angez aaine ko bhi nae barq-o-sharar lag gae hain 
karKHana hai usi husn ka aalam sara bas jidhar us ne lagaya hai udhar lag gae hain 
jis ki padash mein hai dar-ba-dari ka ye itab phir usi kaam pe hum shahr-badar lag gae hain 
'farhat-ehsas' main kya dekha jo us ke pichhe aankhen dikhlate hue ahl-e-nazar lag gae hain
Poetry Text

sunā hai log use aañkh bhar ke dekhte haiñ so us ke shahr meñ kuchh din Thahar ke dekhte haiñ 
sunā hai rabt hai us ko ḳharāb-hāloñ se so apne aap ko barbād kar ke dekhte haiñ 
sunā hai dard kī gāhak hai chashm-e-nāz us kī so ham bhī us kī galī se guzar ke dekhte haiñ 
sunā hai us ko bhī hai sher o shā.irī se shaġhaf so ham bhī mo.ajize apne hunar ke dekhte haiñ 
sunā hai bole to bātoñ se phuul jhaḌte haiñ ye baat hai to chalo baat kar ke dekhte haiñ 
sunā hai raat use chāñd taktā rahtā hai sitāre bām-e-falak se utar ke dekhte haiñ 
sunā hai din ko use titliyāñ satātī haiñ sunā hai raat ko jugnū Thahar ke dekhte haiñ 
sunā hai hashr haiñ us kī ġhazāl sī āñkheñ sunā hai us ko hiran dasht bhar ke dekhte haiñ 
sunā hai raat se baḌh kar haiñ kākuleñ us kī sunā hai shaam ko saa.e guzar ke dekhte haiñ 
sunā hai us kī siyah-chashmagī qayāmat hai so us ko surma-farosh aah bhar ke dekhte haiñ 
sunā hai us ke laboñ se gulāb jalte haiñ so ham bahār pe ilzām dhar ke dekhte haiñ 
sunā hai aa.ina timsāl hai jabīñ us kī jo saada dil haiñ use ban-sañvar ke dekhte haiñ 
sunā hai jab se hamā.il haiñ us kī gardan meñ mizāj aur hī laal o guhar ke dekhte haiñ 
sunā hai chashm-e-tasavvur se dasht-e-imkāñ meñ palañg zāviye us kī kamar ke dekhte haiñ 
sunā hai us ke badan kī tarāsh aisī hai ki phuul apnī qabā.eñ katar ke dekhte haiñ 
vo sarv-qad hai magar be-gul-e-murād nahīñ ki us shajar pe shagūfe samar ke dekhte haiñ 
bas ik nigāh se luTtā hai qāfila dil kā so rah-ravān-e-tamannā bhī Dar ke dekhte haiñ 
sunā hai us ke shabistāñ se muttasil hai bahisht makīñ udhar ke bhī jalve idhar ke dekhte haiñ 
ruke to gardisheñ us kā tavāf kartī haiñ chale to us ko zamāne Thahar ke dekhte haiñ 
kise nasīb ki be-pairahan use dekhe kabhī kabhī dar o dīvār ghar ke dekhte haiñ 
kahāniyāñ hī sahī sab mubālġhe hī sahī agar vo ḳhvāb hai tābīr kar ke dekhte haiñ 
ab us ke shahr meñ Thahreñ ki kuuch kar jaa.eñ 'farāz' aao sitāre safar ke dekhte haiñ 
suna hai log use aankh bhar ke dekhte hain so us ke shahr mein kuchh din Thahar ke dekhte hain 
suna hai rabt hai us ko KHarab-haalon se so apne aap ko barbaad kar ke dekhte hain 
suna hai dard ki gahak hai chashm-e-naz us ki so hum bhi us ki gali se guzar ke dekhte hain 
suna hai us ko bhi hai sher o shairi se shaghaf so hum bhi moajize apne hunar ke dekhte hain 
suna hai bole to baaton se phul jhaDte hain ye baat hai to chalo baat kar ke dekhte hain 
suna hai raat use chand takta rahta hai sitare baam-e-falak se utar ke dekhte hain 
suna hai din ko use titliyan satati hain suna hai raat ko jugnu Thahar ke dekhte hain 
suna hai hashr hain us ki ghazal si aankhen suna hai us ko hiran dasht bhar ke dekhte hain 
suna hai raat se baDh kar hain kakulen us ki suna hai sham ko sae guzar ke dekhte hain 
suna hai us ki siyah-chashmagi qayamat hai so us ko surma-farosh aah bhar ke dekhte hain 
suna hai us ke labon se gulab jalte hain so hum bahaar pe ilzam dhar ke dekhte hain 
suna hai aaina timsal hai jabin us ki jo sada dil hain use ban-sanwar ke dekhte hain 
suna hai jab se hamail hain us ki gardan mein mizaj aur hi lal o guhar ke dekhte hain 
suna hai chashm-e-tasawwur se dasht-e-imkan mein palang zawiye us ki kamar ke dekhte hain 
suna hai us ke badan ki tarash aisi hai ki phul apni qabaen katar ke dekhte hain 
wo sarw-qad hai magar be-gul-e-murad nahin ki us shajar pe shagufe samar ke dekhte hain 
bas ek nigah se luTta hai qafila dil ka so rah-rawan-e-tamanna bhi Dar ke dekhte hain 
suna hai us ke shabistan se muttasil hai bahisht makin udhar ke bhi jalwe idhar ke dekhte hain 
ruke to gardishen us ka tawaf karti hain chale to us ko zamane Thahar ke dekhte hain 
kise nasib ki be-pairahan use dekhe kabhi kabhi dar o diwar ghar ke dekhte hain 
kahaniyan hi sahi sab mubaalghe hi sahi agar wo KHwab hai tabir kar ke dekhte hain 
ab us ke shahr mein Thahren ki kuch kar jaen 'faraaz' aao sitare safar ke dekhte hain

ranjish hī sahī dil hī dukhāne ke liye aa aa phir se mujhe chhoḌ ke jaane ke liye aa 
kuchh to mire pindār-e-mohabbat kā bharam rakh tū bhī to kabhī mujh ko manāne ke liye aa 
pahle se marāsim na sahī phir bhī kabhī to rasm-o-rah-e-duniyā hī nibhāne ke liye aa 
kis kis ko batā.eñge judā.ī kā sabab ham tū mujh se ḳhafā hai to zamāne ke liye aa 
ik umr se huuñ lazzat-e-girya se bhī mahrūm ai rāhat-e-jāñ mujh ko rulāne ke liye aa 
ab tak dil-e-ḳhush-fahm ko tujh se haiñ umīdeñ ye āḳhirī sham'eñ bhī bujhāne ke liye aa 
ranjish hi sahi dil hi dukhane ke liye aa aa phir se mujhe chhoD ke jaane ke liye aa 
kuchh to mere pindar-e-mohabbat ka bharam rakh tu bhi to kabhi mujh ko manane ke liye aa 
pahle se marasim na sahi phir bhi kabhi to rasm-o-rah-e-duniya hi nibhane ke liye aa 
kis kis ko bataenge judai ka sabab hum tu mujh se KHafa hai to zamane ke liye aa 
ek umr se hun lazzat-e-girya se bhi mahrum ai rahat-e-jaan mujh ko rulane ke liye aa 
ab tak dil-e-KHush-fahm ko tujh se hain umiden ye aaKHiri sham'en bhi bujhane ke liye aa 
yuuñ bhī tirā ehsān hai aane ke liye aa ai dost kisī roz na jaane ke liye aa 
yun bhi tera ehsan hai aane ke liye aa ai dost kisi roz na jaane ke liye aa

ab ke ham bichhḌe to shāyad kabhī ḳhvāboñ meñ mileñ jis tarah sūkhe hue phuul kitāboñ meñ mileñ 
DhūñDh ujḌe hue logoñ meñ vafā ke motī ye ḳhazāne tujhe mumkin hai ḳharāboñ meñ mileñ 
ġham-e-duniyā bhī ġham-e-yār meñ shāmil kar lo nashsha baḌhtā hai sharābeñ jo sharāboñ meñ mileñ 
tū ḳhudā hai na mirā ishq farishtoñ jaisā donoñ insāñ haiñ to kyuuñ itne hijāboñ meñ mileñ 
aaj ham daar pe khīñche ga.e jin bātoñ par kyā ajab kal vo zamāne ko nisāboñ meñ mileñ 
ab na vo maiñ na vo tū hai na vo maazī hai 'farāz' jaise do shaḳhs tamannā ke sarāboñ meñ mileñ 
ab ke hum bichhDe to shayad kabhi KHwabon mein milen jis tarah sukhe hue phul kitabon mein milen 
DhunDh ujDe hue logon mein wafa ke moti ye KHazane tujhe mumkin hai KHarabon mein milen 
gham-e-duniya bhi gham-e-yar mein shamil kar lo nashsha baDhta hai sharaben jo sharabon mein milen 
tu KHuda hai na mera ishq farishton jaisa donon insan hain to kyun itne hijabon mein milen 
aaj hum dar pe khinche gae jin baaton par kya ajab kal wo zamane ko nisabon mein milen 
ab na wo main na wo tu hai na wo mazi hai 'faraaz' jaise do shaKHs tamanna ke sarabon mein milen

dost ban kar bhī nahīñ saath nibhāne vaalā vahī andāz hai zālim kā zamāne vaalā 
ab use log samajhte haiñ giraftār mirā saḳht nādim hai mujhe daam meñ laane vaalā 
sub.h-dam chhoḌ gayā nik.hat-e-gul kī sūrat raat ko ġhuncha-e-dil meñ simaT aane vaalā 
kyā kaheñ kitne marāsim the hamāre us se vo jo ik shaḳhs hai muñh pher ke jaane vaalā 
tere hote hue aa jaatī thī saarī duniyā aaj tanhā huuñ to koī nahīñ aane vaalā 
muntazir kis kā huuñ TuuTī huī dahlīz pe maiñ kaun aa.egā yahāñ kaun hai aane vaalā 
kyā ḳhabar thī jo mirī jaañ meñ ghulā hai itnā hai vahī mujh ko sar-e-dār bhī laane vaalā 
maiñ ne dekhā hai bahāroñ meñ chaman ko jalte hai koī ḳhvāb kī tābīr batāne vaalā 
tum takalluf ko bhī iḳhlās samajhte ho 'farāz' dost hotā nahīñ har haath milāne vaalā 
dost ban kar bhi nahin sath nibhane wala wahi andaz hai zalim ka zamane wala 
ab use log samajhte hain giraftar mera saKHt nadim hai mujhe dam mein lane wala 
subh-dam chhoD gaya nikhat-e-gul ki surat raat ko ghuncha-e-dil mein simaT aane wala 
kya kahen kitne marasim the hamare us se wo jo ek shaKHs hai munh pher ke jaane wala 
tere hote hue aa jati thi sari duniya aaj tanha hun to koi nahin aane wala 
muntazir kis ka hun TuTi hui dahliz pe main kaun aaega yahan kaun hai aane wala 
kya KHabar thi jo meri jaan mein ghula hai itna hai wahi mujh ko sar-e-dar bhi lane wala 
main ne dekha hai bahaaron mein chaman ko jalte hai koi KHwab ki tabir batane wala 
tum takalluf ko bhi iKHlas samajhte ho 'faraaz' dost hota nahin har hath milane wala

sho.ala thā jal-bujhā huuñ havā.eñ mujhe na do maiñ kab kā jā chukā huuñ sadā.eñ mujhe na do 
jo zahr pī chukā huuñ tumhīñ ne mujhe diyā ab tum to zindagī kī duā.eñ mujhe na do 
ye bhī baḌā karam hai salāmat hai jism abhī ai ḳhusravān-e-shahr qabā.eñ mujhe na do 
aisā na ho kabhī ki palaT kar na aa sakūñ har baar duur jā ke sadā.eñ mujhe na do 
kab mujh ko e'tirāf-e-mohabbat na thā 'farāz' kab maiñ ne ye kahā hai sazā.eñ mujhe na do 
shoala tha jal-bujha hun hawaen mujhe na do main kab ka ja chuka hun sadaen mujhe na do 
jo zahr pi chuka hun tumhin ne mujhe diya ab tum to zindagi ki duaen mujhe na do 
ye bhi baDa karam hai salamat hai jism abhi ai KHusrawan-e-shahr qabaen mujhe na do 
aisa na ho kabhi ki palaT kar na aa sakun har bar dur ja ke sadaen mujhe na do 
kab mujh ko e'tiraf-e-mohabbat na tha 'faraaz' kab main ne ye kaha hai sazaen mujhe na do

muntazir kab se tahayyur hai tirī taqrīr kā baat kar tujh par gumāñ hone lagā tasvīr kā 
raat kyā so.e ki baaqī umr kī niiñd uḌ ga.ī ḳhvāb kyā dekhā ki dhaḌkā lag gayā tābīr kā 
kaise paayā thā tujhe phir kis tarah khoyā tujhe mujh sā munkir bhī to qaa.el ho gayā taqdīr kā 
jis tarah bādal kā saaya pyaas bhaḌkātā rahe maiñ ne ye aalam bhī dekhā hai tirī tasvīr kā 
jaane kis aalam meñ tū bichhḌā ki hai tere baġhair aaj tak har naqsh fariyādī mirī tahrīr kā 
ishq meñ sar phoḌnā bhī kyā ki ye be-mehr log jū-e-ḳhūñ ko naam de dete haiñ jū-e-shīr kā 
jis ko bhī chāhā use shiddat se chāhā hai 'farāz' silsila TuuTā nahīñ hai dard kī zanjīr kā 
muntazir kab se tahayyur hai teri taqrir ka baat kar tujh par guman hone laga taswir ka 
raat kya soe ki baqi umr ki nind uD gai KHwab kya dekha ki dhaDka lag gaya tabir ka 
kaise paya tha tujhe phir kis tarah khoya tujhe mujh sa munkir bhi to qael ho gaya taqdir ka 
jis tarah baadal ka saya pyas bhaDkata rahe main ne ye aalam bhi dekha hai teri taswir ka 
jaane kis aalam mein tu bichhDa ki hai tere baghair aaj tak har naqsh fariyaadi meri tahrir ka 
ishq mein sar phoDna bhi kya ki ye be-mehr log ju-e-KHun ko nam de dete hain ju-e-shir ka 
jis ko bhi chaha use shiddat se chaha hai 'faraaz' silsila TuTa nahin hai dard ki zanjir ka
Poetry Text

tumhāre ḳhat meñ nayā ik salām kis kā thā na thā raqīb to āḳhir vo naam kis kā thā 
vo qatl kar ke mujhe har kisī se pūchhte haiñ ye kaam kis ne kiyā hai ye kaam kis kā thā 
vafā kareñge nibāheñge baat māneñge tumheñ bhī yaad hai kuchh ye kalām kis kā thā 
rahā na dil meñ vo bedard aur dard rahā muqīm kaun huā hai maqām kis kā thā 
na pūchh-gachh thī kisī kī vahāñ na āv-bhagat tumhārī bazm meñ kal ehtimām kis kā thā 
tamām bazm jise sun ke rah ga.ī mushtāq kaho vo tazkira-e-nā-tamām kis kā thā 
hamāre ḳhat ke to purze kiye paḌhā bhī nahīñ sunā jo tū ne ba-dil vo payām kis kā thā 
uThā.ī kyuuñ na qayāmat adū ke kūche meñ lihāz aap ko vaqt-e-ḳhirām kis kā thā 
guzar gayā vo zamāna kahūñ to kis se kahūñ ḳhayāl dil ko mire sub.h o shaam kis kā thā 
hameñ to hazrat-e-vā.iz kī zid ne pilvā.ī yahāñ irāda-e-sharb-e-mudām kis kā thā 
agarche dekhne vaale tire hazāroñ the tabāh-hāl bahut zer-e-bām kis kā thā 
vo kaun thā ki tumheñ jis ne bevafā jaanā ḳhayāl-e-ḳhām ye saudā-e-ḳhām kis kā thā 
inhīñ sifāt se hotā hai aadmī mash.hūr jo lutf aam vo karte ye naam kis kā thā 
har ik se kahte haiñ kyā 'dāġh' bevafā niklā ye pūchhe un se koī vo ġhulām kis kā thā 
tumhaare KHat mein naya ek salam kis ka tha na tha raqib to aaKHir wo nam kis ka tha 
wo qatl kar ke mujhe har kisi se puchhte hain ye kaam kis ne kiya hai ye kaam kis ka tha 
wafa karenge nibahenge baat manenge tumhein bhi yaad hai kuchh ye kalam kis ka tha 
raha na dil mein wo bedard aur dard raha muqim kaun hua hai maqam kis ka tha 
na puchh-gachh thi kisi ki wahan na aaw-bhagat tumhaari bazm mein kal ehtimam kis ka tha 
tamam bazm jise sun ke rah gai mushtaq kaho wo tazkira-e-na-tamam kis ka tha 
hamare KHat ke to purze kiye paDha bhi nahin suna jo tu ne ba-dil wo payam kis ka tha 
uThai kyun na qayamat adu ke kuche mein lihaz aap ko waqt-e-KHiram kis ka tha 
guzar gaya wo zamana kahun to kis se kahun KHayal dil ko mere subh o sham kis ka tha 
hamein to hazrat-e-waiz ki zid ne pilwai yahan irada-e-sharb-e-mudam kis ka tha 
agarche dekhne wale tere hazaron the tabah-haal bahut zer-e-baam kis ka tha 
wo kaun tha ki tumhein jis ne bewafa jaana KHayal-e-KHam ye sauda-e-KHam kis ka tha 
inhin sifat se hota hai aadmi mashhur jo lutf aam wo karte ye nam kis ka tha 
har ek se kahte hain kya 'dagh' bewafa nikla ye puchhe un se koi wo ghulam kis ka tha

uzr aane meñ bhī hai aur bulāte bhī nahīñ bā.is-e-tark-e-mulāqāt batāte bhī nahīñ 
muntazir haiñ dam-e-ruḳhsat ki ye mar jaa.e to jaa.eñ phir ye ehsān ki ham chhoḌ ke jaate bhī nahīñ 
sar uThāo to sahī aañkh milāo to sahī nashsha-e-mai bhī nahīñ niiñd ke maate bhī nahīñ 
kyā kahā phir to kaho ham nahīñ sunte terī nahīñ sunte to ham aisoñ ko sunāte bhī nahīñ 
ḳhuub parda hai ki chilman se lage baiThe haiñ saaf chhupte bhī nahīñ sāmne aate bhī nahīñ 
mujh se lāġhar tirī āñkhoñ meñ khaTakte to rahe tujh se nāzuk mirī nazroñ meñ samāte bhī nahīñ 
dekhte hī mujhe mahfil meñ ye irshād huā kaun baiThā hai use log uThāte bhī nahīñ 
ho chukā qat.a ta.alluq to jafā.eñ kyuuñ hoñ jin ko matlab nahīñ rahtā vo satāte bhī nahīñ 
ziist se tañg ho ai 'dāġh' to jiite kyuuñ ho jaan pyārī bhī nahīñ jaan se jaate bhī nahīñ 
uzr aane mein bhi hai aur bulate bhi nahin bais-e-tark-e-mulaqat batate bhi nahin 
muntazir hain dam-e-ruKHsat ki ye mar jae to jaen phir ye ehsan ki hum chhoD ke jate bhi nahin 
sar uThao to sahi aankh milao to sahi nashsha-e-mai bhi nahin nind ke mate bhi nahin 
kya kaha phir to kaho hum nahin sunte teri nahin sunte to hum aison ko sunate bhi nahin 
KHub parda hai ki chilman se lage baiThe hain saf chhupte bhi nahin samne aate bhi nahin 
mujh se laghar teri aankhon mein khaTakte to rahe tujh se nazuk meri nazron mein samate bhi nahin 
dekhte hi mujhe mahfil mein ye irshad hua kaun baiTha hai use log uThate bhi nahin 
ho chuka qata talluq to jafaen kyun hon jin ko matlab nahin rahta wo satate bhi nahin 
zist se tang ho ai 'dagh' to jite kyun ho jaan pyari bhi nahin jaan se jate bhi nahin

ġhazab kiyā tire va.ade pe e'tibār kiyā tamām raat qayāmat kā intizār kiyā 
kisī tarah jo na us but ne e'tibār kiyā mirī vafā ne mujhe ḳhuub sharmsār kiyā 
hañsā hañsā ke shab-e-vasl ashk-bār kiyā tasalliyāñ mujhe de de ke be-qarār kiyā 
ye kis ne jalva hamāre sar-e-mazār kiyā ki dil se shor uThā haa.e be-qarār kiyā 
sunā hai teġh ko qātil ne āb-dār kiyā agar ye sach hai to be-shub.ha ham pe vaar kiyā 
na aa.e raah pe vo ijz be-shumār kiyā shab-e-visāl bhī maiñ ne to intizār kiyā 
tujhe to vāda-e-dīdār ham se karnā thā ye kyā kiyā ki jahāñ ko umīd-vār kiyā 
ye dil ko taab kahāñ hai ki ho ma.āl-andesh unhoñ ne va.ada kiyā is ne e'tibār kiyā 
kahāñ kā sabr ki dam par hai ban ga.ī zālim ba tang aa.e to hāl-e-dil āshkār kiyā 
taḌap phir ai dil-e-nādāñ ki ġhair kahte haiñ aḳhīr kuchh na banī sabr iḳhtiyār kiyā 
mile jo yaar kī shoḳhī se us kī bechainī tamām raat dil-e-muztarib ko pyaar kiyā 
bhulā bhulā ke jatāyā hai un ko rāz-e-nihāñ chhupā chhupā ke mohabbat ko āshkār kiyā 
na us ke dil se miTāyā ki saaf ho jaatā sabā ne ḳhaak pareshāñ mirā ġhubār kiyā 
ham aise mahv-e-nazāra na the jo hosh aatā magar tumhāre taġhāful ne hoshyār kiyā 
hamāre siine meñ jo rah ga.ī thī ātish-e-hijr shab-e-visāl bhī us ko na ham-kanār kiyā 
raqīb o sheva-e-ulfat ḳhudā kī qudrat hai vo aur ishq bhalā tum ne e'tibār kiyā 
zabān-e-ḳhār se niklī sadā-e-bismillāh junūñ ko jab sar-e-shorīda par savār kiyā 
tirī nigah ke tasavvur meñ ham ne ai qātil lagā lagā ke gale se chhurī ko pyaar kiyā 
ġhazab thī kasrat-e-mahfil ki maiñ ne dhoke meñ hazār baar raqīboñ ko ham-kanār kiyā 
huā hai koī magar us kā chāhne vaalā ki āsmāñ ne tirā sheva iḳhtiyār kiyā 
na pūchh dil kī haqīqat magar ye kahte haiñ vo be-qarār rahe jis ne be-qarār kiyā 
jab un ko tarz-e-sitam aa ga.e to hosh aayā burā ho dil kā bure vaqt hoshyār kiyā 
fasāna-e-shab-e-ġham un ko ik kahānī thī kuchh e'tibār kiyā kuchh na e'tibār kiyā 
asīrī dil-e-āshufta rang lā ke rahī tamām turra-e-tarrār taar taar kiyā 
kuchh aa ga.ī dāvar-e-mahshar se hai ummīd mujhe kuchh aap ne mire kahne kā e'tibār kiyā 
kisī ke ishq-e-nihāñ meñ ye bad-gumānī thī ki Darte Darte ḳhudā par bhī āshkār kiyā 
falak se taur qayāmat ke ban na paḌte the aḳhīr ab tujhe āshob-e-rozgār kiyā 
vo baat kar jo kabhī āsmāñ se ho na sake sitam kiyā to baḌā tū ne iftiḳhār kiyā 
banegā mehr-e-qayāmat bhī ek ḳhāl-e-siyāh jo chehra 'dāġh'-e-siyah-rū ne āshkār kiyā 
ghazab kiya tere wade pe e'tibar kiya tamam raat qayamat ka intizar kiya 
kisi tarah jo na us but ne e'tibar kiya meri wafa ne mujhe KHub sharmsar kiya 
hansa hansa ke shab-e-wasl ashk-bar kiya tasalliyan mujhe de de ke be-qarar kiya 
ye kis ne jalwa hamare sar-e-mazar kiya ki dil se shor uTha hae be-qarar kiya 
suna hai tegh ko qatil ne aab-dar kiya agar ye sach hai to be-shubha hum pe war kiya 
na aae rah pe wo ijz be-shumar kiya shab-e-visal bhi main ne to intizar kiya 
tujhe to wada-e-didar hum se karna tha ye kya kiya ki jahan ko umid-war kiya 
ye dil ko tab kahan hai ki ho maal-andesh unhon ne wada kiya is ne e'tibar kiya

jab un ko tarz-e-sitam aa gae to hosh aaya bura ho dil ka bure waqt hoshyar kiya

asiri dil-e-ashufta rang la ke rahi tamam turra-e-tarrar tar tar kiya 
kuchh aa gai dawar-e-mahshar se hai ummid mujhe kuchh aap ne mere kahne ka e'tibar kiya 
kisi ke ishq-e-nihan mein ye bad-gumani thi ki Darte Darte KHuda par bhi aashkar kiya 
falak se taur qayamat ke ban na paDte the aKHir ab tujhe aashob-e-rozgar kiya

banega mehr-e-qayamat bhi ek KHal-e-siyah jo chehra 'dagh'-e-siyah-ru ne aashkar kiya

le chalā jaan mirī ruuTh ke jaanā terā aise aane se to behtar thā na aanā terā 
apne dil ko bhī batā.ūñ na Thikānā terā sab ne jaanā jo patā ek ne jaanā terā 
tū jo ai zulf pareshān rahā kartī hai kis ke ujḌe hue dil meñ hai Thikānā terā
