bewafai ka adu ki hai gila lutf mein bhi wo satate hain mujhe 
hairat-e-husn se ye shakl bani ki wo aaina dikhate hain mujhe 
phunk de aatish-e-dil dagh mere us ki KHu yaad dilate hain mujhe 
gar kahe ghamza kise qatl karun to ishaarat se batate hain mujhe 
main to us zulf ki bu par ghash hun chaaragar mushk sunghate hain mujhe 
shoala-ru kahte hain aghyar ko wo apne nazdik jalate hain mujhe 
jaan gai par na gai jaur-kashi baad-e-murdan bhi dabaate hain mujhe 
wo jo kahte hain tujhe aag lage muzhda-e-wasl sunate hain mujhe 
ab ye surat hai ki ai parda-nashin tujh se ahbab chhupate hain mujhe 
'momin' aur dair KHuda KHair kare taur beDhab nazar aate hain mujhe

kyā kare merī masīhā.ī bhī karne vaalā zaḳhm hī ye mujhe lagtā nahīñ bharne vaalā 
zindagī se kisī samjhaute ke bā-vasf ab tak yaad aatā hai koī mārne marne vaalā 
us ko bhī ham tire kūche meñ guzār aa.e haiñ zindagī meñ vo jo lamha thā sañvarne vaalā 
us kā andāz-e-suḳhan sab se judā thā shāyad baat lagtī huī lahja vo mukarne vaalā 
shaam hone ko hai aur aañkh meñ ik ḳhvāb nahīñ koī is ghar meñ nahīñ raushnī karne vaalā 
dastaras meñ haiñ anāsir ke irāde kis ke so bikhar ke hī rahā koī bikharne vaalā 
isī ummīd pe har shaam bujhā.e haiñ charāġh ek taarā hai sar-e-bām ubharne vaalā 
kya kare meri masihai bhi karne wala zaKHm hi ye mujhe lagta nahin bharne wala 
zindagi se kisi samjhaute ke ba-wasf ab tak yaad aata hai koi marne marne wala 
us ko bhi hum tere kuche mein guzar aae hain zindagi mein wo jo lamha tha sanwarne wala 
us ka andaz-e-suKHan sab se juda tha shayad baat lagti hui lahja wo mukarne wala 
sham hone ko hai aur aankh mein ek KHwab nahin koi is ghar mein nahin raushni karne wala 
dastaras mein hain anasir ke irade kis ke so bikhar ke hi raha koi bikharne wala 
isi ummid pe har sham bujhae hain charagh ek tara hai sar-e-baam ubharne wala

jāgtā huuñ maiñ ek akelā duniyā sotī hai kitnī vahshat hijr kī lambī raat meñ hotī hai 
yādoñ ke sailāb meñ jis dam maiñ ghir jaatā huuñ dil-dīvār udhar jaane kī ḳhvāhish hotī hai 
ḳhvāb dekhne kī hasrat meñ tanhā.ī merī āñkhoñ kī banjar dhartī meñ nīndeñ botī hai 
ḳhud ko tasallī denā kitnā mushkil hotā hai koī qīmtī chiiz achānak jab bhī khotī hai 
umr-safar jaarī hai bas ye khel dekhne ko ruuh badan kā bojh kahāñ tak kab tak Dhotī hai 
jagta hun main ek akela duniya soti hai kitni wahshat hijr ki lambi raat mein hoti hai 
yaadon ke sailab mein jis dam main ghir jata hun dil-diwar udhar jaane ki KHwahish hoti hai 
KHwab dekhne ki hasrat mein tanhai meri aankhon ki banjar dharti mein ninden boti hai 
KHud ko tasalli dena kitna mushkil hota hai koi qimti chiz achanak jab bhi khoti hai 
umr-safar jari hai bas ye khel dekhne ko ruh badan ka bojh kahan tak kab tak Dhoti hai

masjidoñ ke sahn tak jaanā bahut dushvār thā dair se niklā to mere rāste meñ daar thā 
dekhte hī dekhte shahroñ kī raunaq ban gayā kal yahī chehra hamāre ā.inoñ par baar thā 
apnī qismat meñ likhī thī dhuup kī nārāzgī sāya-e-dīvār thā lekin pas-e-dīvār thā 
sab ke dukh sukh us ke chehre par likhe paa.e ga.e aadmī kyā thā hamāre shahr kā aḳhbār thā 
ab mohalle bhar ke darvāzoñ pe dastak hai nasīb ik zamāna thā ki jab maiñ bhī bahut ḳhuddār thā 
masjidon ke sahn tak jaana bahut dushwar tha dair se nikla to mere raste mein dar tha 
dekhte hi dekhte shahron ki raunaq ban gaya kal yahi chehra hamare aainon par bar tha 
apni qismat mein likhi thi dhup ki naraazgi saya-e-diwar tha lekin pas-e-diwar tha 
sab ke dukh sukh us ke chehre par likhe pae gae aadmi kya tha hamare shahr ka aKHbar tha 
ab mohalle bhar ke darwazon pe dastak hai nasib ek zamana tha ki jab main bhi bahut KHuddar tha

kuchh din to malāl us kā haq thā bichhḌā to ḳhayāl us kā haq thā 
vo raat bhī din sī taaza rakhtā shabnam kā jamāl us kā haq thā 
vo tarz-e-bayāñ meñ chāñdnī thā tāroñ se visāl us kā haq thā 
thā us kā ḳhirām mauj-e-dariyā lahroñ kā jalāl us kā haq thā 
bārish kā badan thā us kā hañsnā ġhunche kā ḳhisāl us kā haq thā 
rakhtā thā sañbhāl shīsha-e-jāñ tajsīm-e-kamāl us kā haq thā 
bādal kī misāl us kī ḳhū thī tābīr-e-hilāl us kā haq thā 
ujlā thā chañbeliyoñ ke jaisā yūsuf sā jamāl us kā haq thā 
kuchh din to malal us ka haq tha bichhDa to KHayal us ka haq tha 
wo raat bhi din si taza rakhta shabnam ka jamal us ka haq tha 
wo tarz-e-bayan mein chandni tha taron se visal us ka haq tha 
tha us ka KHiram mauj-e-dariya lahron ka jalal us ka haq tha 
barish ka badan tha us ka hansna ghunche ka KHisal us ka haq tha 
rakhta tha sanbhaal shisha-e-jaan tajsim-e-kamal us ka haq tha 
baadal ki misal us ki KHu thi tabir-e-hilal us ka haq tha 
ujla tha chanbeliyon ke jaisa yusuf sa jamal us ka haq tha

saarī hairat hai mirī saarī adā us kī hai be-gunāhī hai mirī aur sazā us kī hai 
mere alfāz meñ jo rañg hai vo us kā hai mere ehsās meñ jo hai vo fazā us kī hai 
sher mere haiñ magar in meñ mohabbat us kī phuul mere haiñ magar bād-e-sabā us kī hai 
ik mohabbat kī ye tasvīr hai do rañgoñ meñ shauq sab merā hai aur saarī hayā us kī hai 
ham ne kyā us se mohabbat kī ijāzat lī thī dil-shikan hī sahī par baat bajā us kī hai 
ek mere hī sivā sab ko pukāre hai koī maiñ ne pahle hī kahā thā ye sadā us kī hai 
ḳhuun se sīñchī hai maiñ ne jo zamīñ mar mar ke vo zamīñ ek sitam-gar ne kahā us kī hai 
us ne hī is ko ujāḌā hai ise luuTā hai ye zamīñ us kī agar hai bhī to kyā us kī hai 
sari hairat hai meri sari ada us ki hai be-gunahi hai meri aur saza us ki hai 
mere alfaz mein jo rang hai wo us ka hai mere ehsas mein jo hai wo faza us ki hai 
sher mere hain magar in mein mohabbat us ki phul mere hain magar baad-e-saba us ki hai 
ek mohabbat ki ye taswir hai do rangon mein shauq sab mera hai aur sari haya us ki hai 
hum ne kya us se mohabbat ki ijazat li thi dil-shikan hi sahi par baat baja us ki hai 
ek mere hi siwa sab ko pukare hai koi main ne pahle hi kaha tha ye sada us ki hai 
KHun se sinchi hai main ne jo zamin mar mar ke wo zamin ek sitam-gar ne kaha us ki hai 
us ne hi is ko ujaDa hai ise luTa hai ye zamin us ki agar hai bhi to kya us ki hai

ab bhī ik umr pe jiine kā na andāz aayā zindagī chhoḌ de pīchhā mirā maiñ baaz aayā 
muzhda ai ruuh tujhe ishq sā dam-sāz aayā nakbat-e-faqr ga.ī shāh-e-sar-afrāz aayā 
paas apne jo nayā koī fusūñ-sāz aayā ho rahe us ke hameñ yaad tirā naaz aayā 
piite piite tirī ik umr kaTī us par bhī piine vaale tujhe piine kā na andāz aayā 
dil ho yā ruuh o jigar kaan khaḌe sab ke hue ishq aayā ki koī mufsida-pardāz aayā 
le rahā hai dar-e-mai-ḳhāna pe sun-gun vaa.iz rindo hushyār ki ik mufsida-pardāz aayā 
dil-e-majbūr pe is tarah se pahuñchī vo nigāh jaise usfūr pe par tol ke shahbāz aayā 
kyuuñ hai ḳhāmosh dilā kis se ye sargoshī hai maut aa.ī ki tire vāste hamrāz aayā 
dekh lo ashk-e-tavātur ko na pūchho mirā haal chup raho chup raho is bazm meñ ġhammāz aayā 
is ḳharābe meñ to ham donoñ haiñ yaksāñ saaqī ham ko piine tujhe dene kā na andāz aayā 
naala aatā nahīñ kan-ras hai faqat ai bulbul mard-e-sayyāh huuñ sun kar tirī āvāz aayā 
dil jo ghabrā.e qafas meñ to zarā par kholūñ zor itnā bhī na ai hasrat-e-parvāz aayā 
dekhiye nāla-e-dil jā ke lagā.e kis se jis kā khaTkā thā vahī mufsida-pardāz aayā 
mudda.ī basta-zabāñ kyuuñ na ho sun kar mire sher kyā chale sehr kī jab sāhib-e-ejāz aayā 
rind phailā.e haiñ chullū ko takalluf kaisā sāqiyā Dhaal bhī de jaam ḳhudā-sāz aayā 
na gayā par na gayā sham.a kā ronā kisī haal go ki parvāna-e-marhūm sā dam-sāz aayā 
ek chupkī meñ gulū tum ne nikāle sab kaam ġhamza aayā na karishma na tumheñ naaz aayā 
dhyān rah rah ke udhar kā mujhe dilvātā hai dam na aayā mire tan meñ koī dam-sāz aayā 
kis tarah maut ko samjhūñ na hayāt-e-abadī aap aa.e ki koī sāhib-e-ejāz aayā 
be-'anīs' ab chaman-e-nazm hai vīrāñ ai 'shād' haa.e aisā na koī zamzama-pardāz aayā 
ab bhi ek umr pe jine ka na andaz aaya zindagi chhoD de pichha mera main baz aaya 
muzhda ai ruh tujhe ishq sa dam-saz aaya nakbat-e-faqr gai shah-e-sar-afraaz aaya 
pas apne jo naya koi fusun-saz aaya ho rahe us ke hamein yaad tera naz aaya 
pite pite teri ek umr kaTi us par bhi pine wale tujhe pine ka na andaz aaya 
dil ho ya ruh o jigar kan khaDe sab ke hue ishq aaya ki koi mufsida-pardaz aaya 
le raha hai dar-e-mai-KHana pe sun-gun waiz rindo hushyar ki ek mufsida-pardaz aaya 
dil-e-majbur pe is tarah se pahunchi wo nigah jaise usfur pe par tol ke shahbaz aaya 
kyun hai KHamosh dila kis se ye sargoshi hai maut aai ki tere waste hamraaz aaya 
dekh lo ashk-e-tawatur ko na puchho mera haal chup raho chup raho is bazm mein ghammaz aaya 
is KHarabe mein to hum donon hain yaksan saqi hum ko pine tujhe dene ka na andaz aaya 
nala aata nahin kan-ras hai faqat ai bulbul mard-e-sayyah hun sun kar teri aawaz aaya 
dil jo ghabrae qafas mein to zara par kholun zor itna bhi na ai hasrat-e-parwaz aaya 
dekhiye nala-e-dil ja ke lagae kis se jis ka khaTka tha wahi mufsida-pardaz aaya 
muddai basta-zaban kyun na ho sun kar mere sher kya chale sehr ki jab sahib-e-ejaz aaya 
rind phailae hain chullu ko takalluf kaisa saqiya Dhaal bhi de jam KHuda-saz aaya 
na gaya par na gaya shama ka rona kisi haal go ki parwana-e-marhum sa dam-saz aaya 
ek chupki mein gulu tum ne nikale sab kaam ghamza aaya na karishma na tumhein naz aaya 
dhyan rah rah ke udhar ka mujhe dilwata hai dam na aaya mere tan mein koi dam-saz aaya 
kis tarah maut ko samjhun na hayat-e-abadi aap aae ki koi sahib-e-ejaz aaya 
be-'anis' ab chaman-e-nazm hai viran ai 'shad' hae aisa na koi zamzama-pardaz aaya

dil se agar kabhī tirā armān jā.egā ghar ko lagā ke aag ye mehmān jā.egā 
sab hoñge us se apne ta.āruf kī fikr meñ mujh ko mire sukūt se pahchān jā.egā 
is kufr-e-ishq se mujhe kyuuñ rokte ho tum īmān vaalo merā hī īmān jā.egā 
aaj us se maiñ ne shikva kiyā thā sharāratan kis ko ḳhabar thī itnā burā maan jā.egā 
ab is maqām par haiñ mirī be-qarāriyāñ samjhāne vaalā ho ke pashemān jā.egā 
duniyā pe aisā vaqt paḌegā ki ek din insān kī talāsh meñ insān jā.egā 
dil se agar kabhi tera arman jaega ghar ko laga ke aag ye mehman jaega 
sab honge us se apne taaruf ki fikr mein mujh ko mere sukut se pahchan jaega 
is kufr-e-ishq se mujhe kyun rokte ho tum iman walo mera hi iman jaega 
aaj us se main ne shikwa kiya tha shararatan kis ko KHabar thi itna bura man jaega 
ab is maqam par hain meri be-qarariyan samjhane wala ho ke pasheman jaega 
duniya pe aisa waqt paDega ki ek din insan ki talash mein insan jaega

bikhar gayā hai jo motī pirone vaalā thā vo ho rahā hai yahāñ jo na hone vaalā thā 
aur ab ye chāhtā huuñ koī ġham baTā.e mirā maiñ apnī miTTī kabhī aap Dhone vaalā thā 
tire na aane se dil bhī nahīñ dukhā shāyad vagarna kyā maiñ sar-e-shām sone vaalā thā 
milā na thā pa bichhaḌne kā ġham na thā mujh ko jalā nahīñ thā magar raakh hone vaalā thā 
hazār tarah ke the rañj pichhle mausam meñ par itnā thā ki koī saath rone vaalā thā 
bikhar gaya hai jo moti pirone wala tha wo ho raha hai yahan jo na hone wala tha 
aur ab ye chahta hun koi gham baTae mera main apni miTTi kabhi aap Dhone wala tha 
tere na aane se dil bhi nahin dukha shayad wagarna kya main sar-e-sham sone wala tha 
mila na tha pa bichhaDne ka gham na tha mujh ko jala nahin tha magar rakh hone wala tha 
hazar tarah ke the ranj pichhle mausam mein par itna tha ki koi sath rone wala tha

firāq-e-yār ne bechain mujh ko raat bhar rakkhā kabhī takiya idhar rakkhā kabhī takiya idhar rakkhā 
shikast-e-dil kā baaqī ham ne ġhurbat meñ asar rakhā likhā ahl-e-vatan ko ḳhat to ik gosha katar rakkhā 
barābar aa.ine ke bhī na samjhe qadr vo dil kī ise zer-e-qadam rakkhā use pesh-e-nazar rakkhā 
miTā.e dīda-o-dil donoñ mere ashk-e-ḳhūnīñ ne 'ajab ye tifl abtar thā na ghar rakkhā na dar rakkhā 
tumhāre sang-e-dar kā ek TukḌā bhī jo haath aayā aziiz aisā kiyā mar kar use chhātī pe dhar rakkhā 
jināñ meñ saath apne kyuuñ na le jā.ūñgā nāseh ko sulūk aisā hī mere saath hai hazrat ne kar rakkhā 
na kī kis ne sifārish merī vaqt-e-qatl qātil se kamāñ ne haath joḌe teġh ne qadmoñ pe sar rakkhā 
ġhazab barse vo mere aate hī mā'lūm hotā hai jagah ḳhālī jo paa.ī yaar ko ġhairoñ ne bhar rakkhā 
baḌā ehsāñ hai mere sar pe us kī laġhzish-e-pā kā ki is ne be-tahāshā haath mere dosh par rakkhā 
zamīñ meñ dāna-e-gandum sadaf meñ ham hue gauhar hamāre ijz ne har ma.arka meñ ham ko dar rakkhā 
tire har naqsh-e-pā ko rahguzar meñ sajda-gah samjhe jahāñ tū ne qadam rakkhā vahāñ maiñ ne bhī sar rakkhā 
amiir achchhā shagūn-e-mai kiyā saaqī kī furqat meñ jo barsā abr-e-rahmat jā-e-mai shīshoñ meñ bhar rakkhā 
firaq-e-yar ne bechain mujh ko raat bhar rakkha kabhi takiya idhar rakkha kabhi takiya idhar rakkha 
shikast-e-dil ka baqi hum ne ghurbat mein asar rakha likha ahl-e-watan ko KHat to ek gosha katar rakkha 
barabar aaine ke bhi na samjhe qadr wo dil ki ise zer-e-qadam rakkha use pesh-e-nazar rakkha 
miTae dida-o-dil donon mere ashk-e-KHunin ne 'ajab ye tifl abtar tha na ghar rakkha na dar rakkha 
tumhaare sang-e-dar ka ek TukDa bhi jo hath aaya aziz aisa kiya mar kar use chhati pe dhar rakkha 
jinan mein sath apne kyun na le jaunga naseh ko suluk aisa hi mere sath hai hazrat ne kar rakkha 
na ki kis ne sifarish meri waqt-e-qatl qatil se kaman ne hath joDe tegh ne qadmon pe sar rakkha 
ghazab barse wo mere aate hi ma'lum hota hai jagah KHali jo pai yar ko ghairon ne bhar rakkha 
baDa ehsan hai mere sar pe us ki laghzish-e-pa ka ki is ne be-tahasha hath mere dosh par rakkha 
zamin mein dana-e-gandum sadaf mein hum hue gauhar hamare ijz ne har marka mein hum ko dar rakkha 
tere har naqsh-e-pa ko rahguzar mein sajda-gah samjhe jahan tu ne qadam rakkha wahan main ne bhi sar rakkha 
amir achchha shagun-e-mai kiya saqi ki furqat mein jo barsa abr-e-rahmat ja-e-mai shishon mein bhar rakkha

zindagī kāvish-e-bātil hai mirā saath na chhoḌ tū hī ik umr kā hāsil hai mirā saath na chhoḌ 
log milte haiñ sar-e-rāh guzar jaate haiñ tū hī ik ham-safar-e-dil hai mirā saath na chhoḌ 
tū ne sochā hai mujhe tū ne sañvārā hai mujhe tū mirā zehn mirā dil hai mirā saath na chhoḌ 
tū na hogā to kahāñ jā ke jalūñgā shab bhar tujh se hī garmi-e-mahfil hai mirā saath na chhoḌ 
maiñ ki biphre hue tūfāñ meñ huuñ lahroñ lahroñ tū ki āsūda-e-sāhil hai mirā saath na chhoḌ 
is rifāqat ko sipar apnī banā leñ jī leñ shahr kā shahr hī qātil hai mirā saath na chhoḌ 
ek maiñ ne hī ugaa.e nahīñ ḳhvāboñ ke gulāb tū bhī is jurm meñ shāmil hai mirā saath na chhoḌ 
ab kisī raah pe jalte nahīñ chāhat ke charāg tū mirī āḳhirī manzil hai mirā saath na chhoḌ 
zindagi kawish-e-baatil hai mera sath na chhoD tu hi ek umr ka hasil hai mera sath na chhoD 
log milte hain sar-e-rah guzar jate hain tu hi ek ham-safar-e-dil hai mera sath na chhoD 
tu ne socha hai mujhe tu ne sanwara hai mujhe tu mera zehn mera dil hai mera sath na chhoD 
tu na hoga to kahan ja ke jalunga shab bhar tujh se hi garmi-e-mahfil hai mera sath na chhoD 
main ki biphre hue tufan mein hun lahron lahron tu ki aasuda-e-sahil hai mera sath na chhoD 
is rifaqat ko sipar apni bana len ji len shahr ka shahr hi qatil hai mera sath na chhoD 
ek main ne hi ugae nahin KHwabon ke gulab tu bhi is jurm mein shamil hai mera sath na chhoD 
ab kisi rah pe jalte nahin chahat ke charag tu meri aaKHiri manzil hai mera sath na chhoD

is taraf se guzre the qāfile bahāroñ ke aaj tak sulagte haiñ zaḳhm rahguzāroñ ke 
ḳhalvatoñ ke shaidā.ī ḳhalvatoñ meñ khulte haiñ ham se pūchh kar dekho raaz parda-dāroñ ke 
gesuoñ kī chhāñv meñ dil-navāz chehre haiñ yā hasīñ dhuñdlakoñ meñ phuul haiñ bahāroñ ke 
pahle hañs ke milte haiñ phir nazar churāte haiñ āshnā-sifat haiñ log ajnabī dayāroñ ke 
tum ne sirf chāhā hai ham ne chhū ke dekhe haiñ pairahan ghaTāoñ ke jism barq-pāroñ ke 
shuġhl-e-mai-parastī go jashn-e-nā-murādī thā yuuñ bhī kaT ga.e kuchh din tere sogvāroñ ke 
is taraf se guzre the qafile bahaaron ke aaj tak sulagte hain zaKHm rahguzaron ke 
KHalwaton ke shaidai KHalwaton mein khulte hain hum se puchh kar dekho raaz parda-daron ke 
gesuon ki chhanw mein dil-nawaz chehre hain ya hasin dhundlakon mein phul hain bahaaron ke 
pahle hans ke milte hain phir nazar churaate hain aashna-sifat hain log ajnabi dayaron ke 
tum ne sirf chaha hai hum ne chhu ke dekhe hain pairahan ghaTaon ke jism barq-paron ke 
shughl-e-mai-parasti go jashn-e-na-muradi tha yun bhi kaT gae kuchh din tere sogwaron ke

dard-e-dil kī unheñ ḳhabar na huī koī tadbīr kārgar na huī 
koshisheñ ham ne kiiñ hazār magar ishq meñ ek mo'tabar na huī 
kar chuke ham ko be-gunāh shahīd aap kī aañkh phir bhī tar na huī 
nā-rasā āh-e-āshiqāñ vo kahāñ duur un se jo be-asar na huī 
aa.ī bujhne ko apnī sham-e-hayāt shab-e-ġham kī magar sahar na huī 
shab the ham garm-e-nāla-hā-e-firāq sub.h ik āh-e-sard sar na huī 
tum se kyūñkar vo chhup sake 'hasrat' nigah-e-shauq parda dar na huī 
dard-e-dil ki unhen KHabar na hui koi tadbir kargar na hui 
koshishen hum ne kin hazar magar ishq mein ek mo'tabar na hui 
kar chuke hum ko be-gunah shahid aap ki aankh phir bhi tar na hui 
na-rasa aah-e-ashiqan wo kahan dur un se jo be-asar na hui 
aai bujhne ko apni sham-e-hayat shab-e-gham ki magar sahar na hui 
shab the hum garm-e-nala-ha-e-firaq subh ek aah-e-sard sar na hui 
tum se kyunkar wo chhup sake 'hasrat' nigah-e-shauq parda dar na hui

rañg bāteñ kareñ aur bātoñ se ḳhushbū aa.e dard phūloñ kī tarah mahke agar tū aa.e 
bhiig jaatī haiñ is ummīd pe āñkheñ har shaam shāyad is raat vo mahtāb lab-e-jū aa.e 
ham tirī yaad se katrā ke guzar jaate magar raah meñ phūloñ ke lab sāyoñ ke gesū aa.e 
vahī lab-tishnagī apnī vahī tarġhīb-e-sarāb dasht-e-ma.alūm kī ham āḳhirī had chhū aa.e 
maslahat-koshi-e-ahbāb se dam ghuTtā hai kisī jānib se koī na.ara-e-yāhū aa.e 
siine vīrān hue anjuman ābād rahī kitne gul-chehra ga.e kitne parī-rū aa.e 
āzmā.ish kī ghaḌī se guzar aa.e to 'ziyā' jashn-e-ġham jaarī huā āñkhoñ meñ aañsū aa.e 
rang baaten karen aur baaton se KHushbu aae dard phulon ki tarah mahke agar tu aae 
bhig jati hain is ummid pe aankhen har sham shayad is raat wo mahtab lab-e-ju aae 
hum teri yaad se katra ke guzar jate magar rah mein phulon ke lab sayon ke gesu aae 
wahi lab-tishnagi apni wahi targhib-e-sarab dasht-e-malum ki hum aaKHiri had chhu aae 
maslahat-koshi-e-ahbab se dam ghuTta hai kisi jaanib se koi nara-e-yahu aae 
sine viran hue anjuman aabaad rahi kitne gul-chehra gae kitne pari-ru aae 
aazmaish ki ghaDi se guzar aae to 'ziya' jashn-e-gham jari hua aankhon mein aansu aae

sher ke parde meñ maiñ ne ġham sunāyā hai bahut marsiye ne dil ke mere bhī rulāyā hai bahut 
be-sabab aatā nahīñ ab dam-ba-dam āshiq ko ġhash dard khīñchā hai nihāyat ranj uThāyā hai bahut 
vaadī o kohsār meñ rotā huuñ DāḌheñ maar maar dilbarān-e-shahr ne mujh ko satāyā hai bahut 
vā nahīñ hotā kisū se dil girafta ishq kā zāhiran ġhamgīñ use rahnā ḳhush aayā hai bahut 
'mīr' gum-gashta kā milnā ittifāqī amr hai jab kabhū paayā hai ḳhvāhish-mand paayā hai bahut 
sher ke parde mein main ne gham sunaya hai bahut marsiye ne dil ke mere bhi rulaya hai bahut 
be-sabab aata nahin ab dam-ba-dam aashiq ko ghash dard khincha hai nihayat ranj uThaya hai bahut 
wadi o kohsar mein rota hun DaDhen mar mar dilbaran-e-shahr ne mujh ko sataya hai bahut 
wa nahin hota kisu se dil girafta ishq ka zahiran ghamgin use rahna KHush aaya hai bahut 
'mir' gum-gashta ka milna ittifaqi amr hai jab kabhu paya hai KHwahish-mand paya hai bahut

har ek ruuh meñ ik ġham chhupā lage hai mujhe ye zindagī to koī bad-duā lage hai mujhe 
pasand-e-ḳhātir-e-ahl-e-vafā hai muddat se ye dil kā daaġh jo ḳhud bhī bhalā lage hai mujhe 
jo āñsuoñ meñ kabhī raat bhiig jaatī hai bahut qarīb vo āvāz-e-pā lage hai mujhe 
maiñ so bhī jā.ūñ to kyā merī band āñkhoñ meñ tamām raat koī jhāñktā lage hai mujhe 
maiñ jab bhī us ke ḳhayāloñ meñ kho sā jaatā huuñ vo ḳhud bhī baat kare to burā lage hai mujhe 
maiñ sochtā thā ki lauTūñgā ajnabī kī tarah ye merā gaañv to pahchāntā lage hai mujhe 
na jaane vaqt kī raftār kyā dikhātī hai kabhī kabhī to baḌā ḳhauf sā lage hai mujhe 
bikhar gayā hai kuchh is tarah aadmī kā vajūd har ek fard koī sāneha lage hai mujhe 
ab ek aadh qadam kā hisāb kyā rakhiye abhī talak to vahī fāsla lage hai mujhe 
hikāyat-e-ġham-e-dil kuchh kashish to rakhtī hai zamāna ġhaur se suntā huā lage hai mujhe 
har ek ruh mein ek gham chhupa lage hai mujhe ye zindagi to koi bad-dua lage hai mujhe 
pasand-e-KHatir-e-ahl-e-wafa hai muddat se ye dil ka dagh jo KHud bhi bhala lage hai mujhe 
jo aansuon mein kabhi raat bhig jati hai bahut qarib wo aawaz-e-pa lage hai mujhe 
main so bhi jaun to kya meri band aankhon mein tamam raat koi jhankta lage hai mujhe 
main jab bhi us ke KHayalon mein kho sa jata hun wo KHud bhi baat kare to bura lage hai mujhe 
main sochta tha ki lauTunga ajnabi ki tarah ye mera ganw to pahchanta lage hai mujhe 
na jaane waqt ki raftar kya dikhati hai kabhi kabhi to baDa KHauf sa lage hai mujhe 
bikhar gaya hai kuchh is tarah aadmi ka wajud har ek fard koi saneha lage hai mujhe 
ab ek aadh qadam ka hisab kya rakhiye abhi talak to wahi fasla lage hai mujhe 
hikayat-e-gham-e-dil kuchh kashish to rakhti hai zamana ghaur se sunta hua lage hai mujhe

tāroñ se merā jaam bharo maiñ nashe meñ huuñ ai sākinān-e-ḳhuld suno maiñ nashe meñ huuñ 
kuchh phuul khil rahe haiñ sar-e-shāḳh-e-mai-kada tum hī zarā ye phuul chuno maiñ nashe meñ huuñ 
Thahro abhī to sub.h kā maarā hai zau-fishāñ dekho mujhe fareb na do maiñ nashe meñ huuñ 
nashsha to maut hai ġham-e-hastī kī dhuup meñ bikhrā ke zulf saath chalo maiñ nashe meñ huuñ 
mela yuuñ hī rahe ye sar-e-rahguzār-e-zīst ab jaam sāmne hī rakho maiñ nashe meñ huuñ 
paa.el chhanak rahī hai nigār-e-ḳhayāl kī kuchh ehtimām-e-raqs karo maiñ nashe meñ huuñ 
maiñ Dagmagā rahā huuñ bayābān-e-hosh meñ mere abhī qarīb raho maiñ nashe meñ huuñ 
hai sirf ik tabassum-e-rañgīñ bahut mujhe 'sāġhar' ba-dosh lāla-ruḳho maiñ nashe meñ huuñ 
taron se mera jam bharo main nashe mein hun ai sakinan-e-KHuld suno main nashe mein hun 
kuchh phul khil rahe hain sar-e-shaKH-e-mai-kada tum hi zara ye phul chuno main nashe mein hun 
Thahro abhi to subh ka mara hai zau-fishan dekho mujhe fareb na do main nashe mein hun 
nashsha to maut hai gham-e-hasti ki dhup mein bikhra ke zulf sath chalo main nashe mein hun 
mela yun hi rahe ye sar-e-rahguzar-e-zist ab jam samne hi rakho main nashe mein hun 
pael chhanak rahi hai nigar-e-KHayal ki kuchh ehtimam-e-raqs karo main nashe mein hun 
main Dagmaga raha hun bayaban-e-hosh mein mere abhi qarib raho main nashe mein hun 
hai sirf ek tabassum-e-rangin bahut mujhe 'saghar' ba-dosh lala-ruKHo main nashe mein hun

jigar ke TukḌe hue jal ke dil kabāb huā ye ishq jaan ko mere koī azaab huā 
kiyā jo qatl mujhe tum ne ḳhuub kaam kiyā ki maiñ azaab se chhūTā tumheñ savāb huā 
kabhī to shefta us ne kahā kabhī shaidā ġharaz ki roz nayā ik mujhe ḳhitāb huā 
piyūñ na rashk se ḳhuuñ kyūñki dam-ba-dam apnā ki saath ġhair ke vo aaj ham-sharāb huā 
tumhāre lab ke lab-e-jām ne liye bose lab apne kaaTā kiyā maiñ na kāmyāb huā 
galī galī tirī ḳhātir phirā ba-chashm-e-pur-āb lagā ke tujh se dil apnā bahut ḳharāb huā 
tirī galī meñ bahā.e phire hai sail-e-sarishk hamārā kāsa-e-sar kyā huā habāb huā 
javāb-e-ḳhat ke na likhne se ye huā mālūm ki aaj se hameñ ai nāma-bar javāb huā 
mañgā.ī thī tirī tasvīr dil kī taskīñ ko mujhe to dekhte hī aur iztirāb huā 
sitam tumhāre bahut aur din hisāb kā ek mujhe hai soch ye hī kis tarah hisāb huā 
'zafar' badal ke radīf aur tū ġhazal vo sunā ki jis kā tujh se har ik sher intiḳhāb huā 
jigar ke TukDe hue jal ke dil kabab hua ye ishq jaan ko mere koi azab hua 
kiya jo qatl mujhe tum ne KHub kaam kiya ki main azab se chhuTa tumhein sawab hua 
kabhi to shefta us ne kaha kabhi shaida gharaz ki roz naya ek mujhe KHitab hua 
piyun na rashk se KHun kyunki dam-ba-dam apna ki sath ghair ke wo aaj ham-sharab hua 
tumhaare lab ke lab-e-jam ne liye bose lab apne kaTa kiya main na kaamyab hua 
gali gali teri KHatir phira ba-chashm-e-pur-ab laga ke tujh se dil apna bahut KHarab hua 
teri gali mein bahae phire hai sail-e-sarishk hamara kasa-e-sar kya hua habab hua 
jawab-e-KHat ke na likhne se ye hua malum ki aaj se hamein ai nama-bar jawab hua 
mangai thi teri taswir dil ki taskin ko mujhe to dekhte hi aur iztirab hua 
sitam tumhaare bahut aur din hisab ka ek mujhe hai soch ye hi kis tarah hisab hua 
'zafar' badal ke radif aur tu ghazal wo suna ki jis ka tujh se har ek sher intiKHab hua

dil churā kar nazar churā.ī hai luT ga.e luT ga.e duhā.ī hai 
ek din mil ke phir nahīñ milte kis qayāmat kī ye judā.ī hai 
ai asar kar na intizār-e-duā māñgnā saḳht be-hayā.ī hai 
maiñ yahāñ huuñ vahāñ hai dil merā nā-rasā.ī ajab rasā.ī hai 
is tarah ahl-e-nāz naaz kareñ bandagī hai ki ye ḳhudā.ī hai 
paanī pī pī ke tauba kartā huuñ pārsā.ī sī pārsā.ī hai 
va.ada karne kā iḳhtiyār rahā baat karne meñ kyā burā.ī hai 
kab nikaltā hai ab jigar se tiir ye bhī kyā terī āshnā.ī hai 
'dāġh' un se dimāġh karte haiñ nahīñ mālūm kyā samā.ī hai 
dil chura kar nazar churai hai luT gae luT gae duhai hai 
ek din mil ke phir nahin milte kis qayamat ki ye judai hai 
ai asar kar na intizar-e-dua mangna saKHt be-hayai hai 
main yahan hun wahan hai dil mera na-rasai ajab rasai hai 
is tarah ahl-e-naz naz karen bandagi hai ki ye KHudai hai 
pani pi pi ke tauba karta hun parsai si parsai hai 
wada karne ka iKHtiyar raha baat karne mein kya burai hai 
kab nikalta hai ab jigar se tir ye bhi kya teri aashnai hai 
'dagh' un se dimagh karte hain nahin malum kya samai hai

jab tak nigār-e-dasht kā siina dukhā na thā sahrā meñ koī lāla-e-sahrā khilā na thā 
do jhīleñ us kī āñkhoñ meñ lahrā ke so ga.iiñ us vaqt merī 'umr kā dariyā chaḌhā na thā 
jaagī na thiiñ nasoñ meñ tamannā kī nāgineñ us gandumī sharāb ko jab tak chakhā na thā 
DhūñDā karo jahān-e-tahayyur meñ 'umr bhar vo chaltī phirtī chhāñv hai maiñ ne kahā na thā 
ik bevafā ke sāmne aañsū bahāte ham itnā hamārī aañkh kā paanī marā na thā 
vo kaale hoñT jaam samajh kar chaḌhā ga.e vo aab jis se maiñ ne vuzū tak kiyā na thā 
sab log apne apne ḳhudāoñ ko laa.e the ik ham hī aise the ki hamārā ḳhudā na thā 
vo kaalī āñkheñ shahr meñ mash.hūr thiiñ bahut tab un pe moTe shīshoñ kā chashma chaḌhā na thā 
maiñ sāhib-e-ġhazal thā hasīnoñ kī bazm meñ sar par ghanere baal the māthā khulā na thā 
jab tak nigar-e-dasht ka sina dukha na tha sahra mein koi lala-e-sahra khila na tha 
do jhilen us ki aankhon mein lahra ke so gain us waqt meri 'umr ka dariya chaDha na tha 
jagi na thin nason mein tamanna ki naginen us gandumi sharab ko jab tak chakha na tha 
DhunDa karo jahan-e-tahayyur mein 'umr bhar wo chalti phirti chhanw hai main ne kaha na tha 
ek bewafa ke samne aansu bahate hum itna hamari aankh ka pani mara na tha 
wo kale honT jam samajh kar chaDha gae wo aab jis se main ne wuzu tak kiya na tha 
sab log apne apne KHudaon ko lae the ek hum hi aise the ki hamara KHuda na tha 
wo kali aankhen shahr mein mashhur thin bahut tab un pe moTe shishon ka chashma chaDha na tha 
main sahib-e-ghazal tha hasinon ki bazm mein sar par ghanere baal the matha khula na tha

vo jo rūTheñ yuuñ manānā chāhiye zindagī se ruuTh jaanā chāhiye 
himmat-e-qātil baḌhānā chāhiye zer-e-ḳhanjar muskurānā chāhiye 
zindagī hai naam johd o jañg kā maut kyā hai bhuul jaanā chāhiye 
hai inhīñ dhokoñ se dil kī zindagī jo hasīñ dhokā ho khānā chāhiye 
lazzateñ haiñ dushman-e-auj-e-kamāl kulfatoñ se jī lagānā chāhiye 
un se milne ko to kyā kahiye 'jigar' ḳhud se milne ko zamānā chāhiye 
wo jo ruThen yun manana chahiye zindagi se ruTh jaana chahiye 
himmat-e-qatil baDhana chahiye zer-e-KHanjar muskurana chahiye 
zindagi hai nam johd o jang ka maut kya hai bhul jaana chahiye 
hai inhin dhokon se dil ki zindagi jo hasin dhoka ho khana chahiye 
lazzaten hain dushman-e-auj-e-kamal kulfaton se ji lagana chahiye 
un se milne ko to kya kahiye 'jigar' KHud se milne ko zamana chahiye

ḳhud apne dil meñ ḳharāsheñ utārnā hoñgī abhī to jaag ke rāteñ guzārnā hoñgī 
tire liye mujhe hañs hañs ke bolnā hogā mire liye tujhe zulfeñ sañvārnā hoñgī 
tirī sadā se tujhī ko tarāshnā hogā havā kī chaap se shakleñ ubhārnā hoñgī 
abhī to terī tabī.at ko jītne ke liye dil o nigāh kī sharteñ bhī hārnā hoñgī 
tire visāl kī ḳhvāhish ke tez rañgoñ se tire firāq kī sub.heñ nikhārnā hoñgī 
ye shā.irī ye kitābeñ ye āyateñ dil kī nishāniyāñ ye sabhī tujh pe vārnā hoñgī 
KHud apne dil mein KHarashen utarna hongi abhi to jag ke raaten guzarna hongi 
tere liye mujhe hans hans ke bolna hoga mere liye tujhe zulfen sanwarna hongi 
teri sada se tujhi ko tarashna hoga hawa ki chap se shaklen ubhaarna hongi 
abhi to teri tabiat ko jitne ke liye dil o nigah ki sharten bhi haarna hongi 
tere visal ki KHwahish ke tez rangon se tere firaq ki subhen nikhaarna hongi 
ye shairi ye kitaben ye aayaten dil ki nishaniyan ye sabhi tujh pe warna hongi

qismat-e-shauq aazmā na sake un se ham aañkh bhī milā na sake 
ham se yaañ ranj-e-hijr uTh na sakā vaañ vo majbūr the vo aa na sake 
Dar ye thā ro na deñ kahīñ vo unheñ ham hañsī meñ bhī gudgudā na sake 
ham se dil aap ne uThā to liyā par kahīñ aur bhī lagā na sake 
ab kahāñ tum kahāñ vo rabt-e-vafā yaad bhī jis kī ham dilā na sake 
dil meñ kyā kyā the 'arz-e-hāl ke shauq us ne pūchhā to kuchh batā na sake 
ham to kyā bhūlte unheñ 'hasrat' dil se vo bhī hameñ bhulā na sake 
qismat-e-shauq aazma na sake un se hum aankh bhi mila na sake 
hum se yan ranj-e-hijr uTh na saka wan wo majbur the wo aa na sake 
Dar ye tha ro na den kahin wo unhen hum hansi mein bhi gudguda na sake 
hum se dil aap ne uTha to liya par kahin aur bhi laga na sake 
ab kahan tum kahan wo rabt-e-wafa yaad bhi jis ki hum dila na sake 
dil mein kya kya the 'arz-e-haal ke shauq us ne puchha to kuchh bata na sake 
hum to kya bhulte unhen 'hasrat' dil se wo bhi hamein bhula na sake

ujālā de charāġh-e-rahguzar āsāñ nahīñ hotā hamesha ho sitārā ham-safar āsāñ nahīñ hotā 
jo āñkhoñ oT hai chehra usī ko dekh kar jiinā ye sochā thā ki āsāñ hai magar āsāñ nahīñ hotā 
baḌe tābāñ baḌe raushan sitāre TuuT jaate haiñ sahar kī raah taknā tā-sahar āsāñ nahīñ hotā 
añdherī kāsnī rāteñ yahīñ se ho ke guzreñgī jalā rakhnā koī dāġh-e-jigar āsāñ nahīñ hotā 
kisī dard-āshnā lamhe ke naqsh-e-pā sajā lenā akele ghar ko kahnā apnā ghar āsāñ nahīñ hotā 
jo Tapke kāsa-e-dil meñ to aalam hī badal jaa.e vo ik aañsū magar ai chashm-e-tar āsāñ nahīñ hotā 
gumāñ to kyā yaqīñ bhī vasvasoñ kī zad meñ hotā hai samajhnā sañg-e-dar ko sañg-e-dar āsāñ nahīñ hotā 
na bahlāvā na samjhautā judā.ī sī judā.ī hai 'adā' socho to ḳhushbū kā safar āsāñ nahīñ hotā 
ujala de charagh-e-rahguzar aasan nahin hota hamesha ho sitara ham-safar aasan nahin hota 
jo aankhon oT hai chehra usi ko dekh kar jina ye socha tha ki aasan hai magar aasan nahin hota 
baDe taban baDe raushan sitare TuT jate hain sahar ki rah takna ta-sahar aasan nahin hota 
andheri kasni raaten yahin se ho ke guzrengi jala rakhna koi dagh-e-jigar aasan nahin hota 
kisi dard-ashna lamhe ke naqsh-e-pa saja lena akele ghar ko kahna apna ghar aasan nahin hota 
jo Tapke kasa-e-dil mein to aalam hi badal jae wo ek aansu magar ai chashm-e-tar aasan nahin hota 
guman to kya yaqin bhi waswason ki zad mein hota hai samajhna sang-e-dar ko sang-e-dar aasan nahin hota 
na bahlawa na samjhauta judai si judai hai 'ada' socho to KHushbu ka safar aasan nahin hota

dil ke bahlāne kī tadbīr to hai tū nahīñ hai tirī tasvīr to hai 
ham-safar chhoḌ ga.e mujh ko to kyā saath mere mirī taqdīr to hai 
qaid se chhūT ke bhī kyā paayā aaj bhī paañv meñ zanjīr to hai 
kyā majāl un kī na deñ ḳhat kā javāb baat kuchh bā.is-e-tāḳhīr to hai 
pursish-e-hāl ko vo aa hī ga.e kuchh bhī ho ishq meñ tāsīr to hai 
ġham kī duniyā rahe ābād 'shakīl' muflisī meñ koī jāgīr to hai 
dil ke bahlane ki tadbir to hai tu nahin hai teri taswir to hai 
ham-safar chhoD gae mujh ko to kya sath mere meri taqdir to hai 
qaid se chhuT ke bhi kya paya aaj bhi panw mein zanjir to hai 
kya majal un ki na den KHat ka jawab baat kuchh bais-e-taKHir to hai 
pursish-e-haal ko wo aa hi gae kuchh bhi ho ishq mein tasir to hai 
gham ki duniya rahe aabaad 'shakil' muflisi mein koi jagir to hai

mai-kada thā chāñdnī thī maiñ na thā ik mujassam be-ḳhudī thī maiñ na thā 
ishq jab dam toḌtā thā tum na the maut jab sar dhun rahī thī maiñ na thā 
tuur par chheḌā thā jis ne aap ko vo mirī dīvāngī thī maiñ na thā 
vo hasīñ baiThā thā jab mere qarīb lazzat-e-ham-sā.egī thī maiñ na thā 
mai-kade ke moḌ par ruktī huī muddatoñ kī tishnagī thī maiñ na thā 
thī haqīqat kuchh mirī to is qadar us hasīñ kī dil-lagī thī maiñ na thā 
maiñ aur us ġhuncha-dahan kī aarzū aarzū kī sādgī thī maiñ na thā 
jis ne mah-pāroñ ke dil pighlā diye vo to merī shā.erī thī maiñ na thā 
gesuoñ ke saa.e meñ ārām-kash sar-barahna zindagī thī maiñ na thā 
dair o ka.aba meñ 'adam' hairat-farosh do-jahāñ kī bad-zanī thī maiñ na thā 
mai-kada tha chandni thi main na tha ek mujassam be-KHudi thi main na tha 
ishq jab dam toDta tha tum na the maut jab sar dhun rahi thi main na tha 
tur par chheDa tha jis ne aap ko wo meri diwangi thi main na tha 
wo hasin baiTha tha jab mere qarib lazzat-e-ham-saegi thi main na tha 
mai-kade ke moD par rukti hui muddaton ki tishnagi thi main na tha 
thi haqiqat kuchh meri to is qadar us hasin ki dil-lagi thi main na tha 
main aur us ghuncha-dahan ki aarzu aarzu ki sadgi thi main na tha 
jis ne mah-paron ke dil pighla diye wo to meri shaeri thi main na tha 
gesuon ke sae mein aaram-kash sar-barahna zindagi thi main na tha 
dair o kaba mein 'adam' hairat-farosh do-jahan ki bad-zani thi main na tha

ibtidā-e-ishq hai lutf-e-shabāb aane ko hai sabr ruḳhsat ho rahā hai iztirāb aane ko hai 
qabr par kis shaan se vo be-naqāb aane ko hai āftāb-e-sub.h-e-mahshar ham-rikāb aane ko hai 
mujh tak us mahfil meñ phir jām-e-sharāb aane ko hai umr-e-rafta palTī aatī hai shabāb aane ko hai 
haa.e kaisī kashmakash hai yaas bhī hai aas bhī dam nikal jaane ko hai ḳhat kā javāb aane ko hai 
ḳhat ke purze nāma-bar kī laash ke hamrāh haiñ kis DhiTā.ī se mire ḳhat kā javāb aane ko hai 
nā-umīdī maut se kahtī hai apnā kaam kar aas kahtī hai Thahar ḳhat kā javāb aane ko hai 
ruuh ghabrā.ī huī phirtī hai merī laash par kyā janāze par mere ḳhat kā javāb aane ko hai 
bhar ke saaqī jām-e-mai ik aur lā aur jald lā un nashīlī añkhḌiyoñ meñ phir hijāb aane ko hai 
ḳhāna-e-tasvīr meñ aane ko hai tasvīr-e-yār aa.ine meñ qad-e-ādam āftāb aane ko hai 
phir hinā.ī hone vaale haiñ mire qātil ke haath phir zabān-e-teġh par rañg-e-shahāb aane ko hai 
gudgudātā hai tasavvur chuTkiyāñ letā hai dard kyā kisī be-ḳhvāb kī āñkhoñ meñ ḳhvāb aane ko hai 
dekhiye maut aa.e 'fānī' yā koī fitna uThe mere qaabū meñ dil-e-be-sabr-o-tāb aane ko hai 
ibtida-e-ishq hai lutf-e-shabab aane ko hai sabr ruKHsat ho raha hai iztirab aane ko hai 
qabr par kis shan se wo be-naqab aane ko hai aaftab-e-subh-e-mahshar ham-rikab aane ko hai 
mujh tak us mahfil mein phir jam-e-sharab aane ko hai umr-e-rafta palTi aati hai shabab aane ko hai 
hae kaisi kashmakash hai yas bhi hai aas bhi dam nikal jaane ko hai KHat ka jawab aane ko hai 
KHat ke purze nama-bar ki lash ke hamrah hain kis DhiTai se mere KHat ka jawab aane ko hai 
na-umidi maut se kahti hai apna kaam kar aas kahti hai Thahar KHat ka jawab aane ko hai 
ruh ghabrai hui phirti hai meri lash par kya janaze par mere KHat ka jawab aane ko hai 
bhar ke saqi jam-e-mai ek aur la aur jald la un nashili ankhDiyon mein phir hijab aane ko hai 
KHana-e-taswir mein aane ko hai taswir-e-yar aaine mein qad-e-adam aaftab aane ko hai 
phir hinai hone wale hain mere qatil ke hath phir zaban-e-tegh par rang-e-shahab aane ko hai 
gudgudata hai tasawwur chuTkiyan leta hai dard kya kisi be-KHwab ki aankhon mein KHwab aane ko hai 
dekhiye maut aae 'fani' ya koi fitna uThe mere qabu mein dil-e-be-sabr-o-tab aane ko hai

kaThin tanhā.iyoñ se kaun khelā maiñ akelā bharā ab bhī mire gaañv kā mela maiñ akelā 
bichhaḌ kar tujh se maiñ shab bhar na soyā kaun royā ba-juz mere ye dukh bhī kis ne jhelā maiñ akelā 
ye be-āvāz banjar ban ke baasī ye udāsī ye dahshat kā safar jañgal ye bela maiñ akelā 
maiñ dekhūñ kab talak manzar suhāne sab purāne vahī duniyā vahī dil kā jhamelā maiñ akelā 
vo jis ke ḳhauf se sahrā sidhāre log saare guzarne ko hai tūfāñ kā vo relā maiñ akelā 
kaThin tanhaiyon se kaun khela main akela bhara ab bhi mere ganw ka mela main akela 
bichhaD kar tujh se main shab bhar na soya kaun roya ba-juz mere ye dukh bhi kis ne jhela main akela 
ye be-awaz banjar ban ke basi ye udasi ye dahshat ka safar jangal ye bela main akela 
main dekhun kab talak manzar suhane sab purane wahi duniya wahi dil ka jhamela main akela 
wo jis ke KHauf se sahra sidhaare log sare guzarne ko hai tufan ka wo rela main akela

kamī na kī tire vahshī ne ḳhaak uḌāne meñ junūñ kā naam uchhaltā rahā zamāne meñ 
'firāq' dauḌ ga.ī ruuh sī zamāne meñ kahāñ kā dard bharā thā mire fasāne meñ 
junūñ se bhuul huī dil pe choT khāne meñ 'firāq' der abhī thī bahār aane meñ 
vo koī rang hai jo uḌ na jaa.e ai gul-e-tar vo koī bū hai jo rusvā na ho zamāne meñ 
vo āstīñ hai koī jo lahū na de nikle vo koī husn hai jhijhke jo rang laane meñ 
ye gul khile haiñ ki choTeñ jigar kī ubhrī haiñ nihāñ bahār thī bulbul tire tarāne meñ 
bayān-e-sham.a hai hāsil yahī hai jalne kā fanā kī kaifiyateñ dekh jhilmilāne meñ 
kisī kī hālat-e-dil sun ke uTh ga.iiñ āñkheñ ki jaan paḌ ga.ī hasrat bhare fasāne meñ 
usī kī sharh hai ye uThte dard kā aalam jo dāstāñ thī nihāñ tere aañkh uThāne meñ 
ġharaz ki kaaT diye zindagī ke din ai dost vo terī yaad meñ hoñ yā tujhe bhulāne meñ 
hamīñ haiñ gul hamīñ bulbul hamīñ havā-e-chaman 'firāq' ḳhvāb ye dekhā hai qaid-ḳhāne meñ 
kami na ki tere wahshi ne KHak uDane mein junun ka nam uchhalta raha zamane mein 
'firaq' dauD gai ruh si zamane mein kahan ka dard bhara tha mere fasane mein 
junun se bhul hui dil pe choT khane mein 'firaq' der abhi thi bahaar aane mein 
wo koi rang hai jo uD na jae ai gul-e-tar wo koi bu hai jo ruswa na ho zamane mein 
wo aastin hai koi jo lahu na de nikle wo koi husn hai jhijhke jo rang lane mein 
ye gul khile hain ki choTen jigar ki ubhri hain nihan bahaar thi bulbul tere tarane mein 
bayan-e-shama hai hasil yahi hai jalne ka fana ki kaifiyaten dekh jhilmilane mein 
kisi ki haalat-e-dil sun ke uTh gain aankhen ki jaan paD gai hasrat bhare fasane mein 
usi ki sharh hai ye uThte dard ka aalam jo dastan thi nihan tere aankh uThane mein 
gharaz ki kaT diye zindagi ke din ai dost wo teri yaad mein hon ya tujhe bhulane mein 
hamin hain gul hamin bulbul hamin hawa-e-chaman 'firaq' KHwab ye dekha hai qaid-KHane mein

tere va.ade ko kabhī jhuuT nahīñ samjhūñgā aaj kī raat bhī darvāza khulā rakkhūñgā 
dekhne ke liye ik chehra bahut hotā hai aañkh jab tak hai tujhe sirf tujhe dekhūñgā 
merī tanhā.ī kī rusvā.ī kī manzil aa.ī vasl ke lamhe se maiñ hijr kī shab badlūñgā 
shaam hote hī khulī saḌkoñ kī yaad aatī hai sochtā roz huuñ maiñ ghar se nahīñ niklūñgā 
tā-ki mahfūz rahe mere qalam kī hurmat sach mujhe likhnā hai maiñ husn ko sach likkhūñgā 
tere wade ko kabhi jhuT nahin samjhunga aaj ki raat bhi darwaza khula rakkhunga 
dekhne ke liye ek chehra bahut hota hai aankh jab tak hai tujhe sirf tujhe dekhunga 
meri tanhai ki ruswai ki manzil aai wasl ke lamhe se main hijr ki shab badlunga 
sham hote hi khuli saDkon ki yaad aati hai sochta roz hun main ghar se nahin niklunga 
ta-ki mahfuz rahe mere qalam ki hurmat sach mujhe likhna hai main husn ko sach likkhunga

tujh se bichhaḌ kar kyā huuñ maiñ ab bāhar aa kar dekh himmat hai to merī hālat aañkh milā kar dekh 
shaam hai gahrī tez havā hai sar pe khaḌī hai raat rasta ga.e musāfir kā ab diyā jalā kar dekh 
darvāze ke paas aa aa kar vāpas muḌtī chaap kaun hai is sunsān galī meñ paas bulā kar dekh 
shāyad koī dekhne vaalā ho jaa.e hairān kamre kī dīvāroñ par koī naqsh banā kar dekh 
tū bhī 'munīr' ab bhare jahāñ meñ mil kar rahnā siikh bāhar se to dekh liyā ab andar jā kar dekh 
tujh se bichhaD kar kya hun main ab bahar aa kar dekh himmat hai to meri haalat aankh mila kar dekh 
sham hai gahri tez hawa hai sar pe khaDi hai raat rasta gae musafir ka ab diya jala kar dekh 
darwaze ke pas aa aa kar wapas muDti chap kaun hai is sunsan gali mein pas bula kar dekh 
shayad koi dekhne wala ho jae hairan kamre ki diwaron par koi naqsh bana kar dekh 
tu bhi 'munir' ab bhare jahan mein mil kar rahna sikh bahar se to dekh liya ab andar ja kar dekh

maiñ ne ai dil tujhe siine se lagāyā huā hai aur tū hai ki mirī jaan ko aayā huā hai 
bas isī bojh se dohrī huī jaatī hai kamar zindagī kā jo ye ehsān uThāyā huā hai 
kyā huā gar nahīñ bādal ye barasne vaalā ye bhī kuchh kam to nahīñ hai jo ye aayā huā hai 
raah chaltī huī is rāhguzar par 'ajmal' ham samajhte haiñ qadam ham ne jamāyā huā hai 
ham ye samjhe the ki ham bhuul ga.e haiñ us ko aaj be-tarah hameñ yaad jo aayā huā hai 
vo kisī roz havāoñ kī tarah aa.egā raah meñ jis kī diyā ham ne jalāyā huā hai 
kaun batlā.e use apnā yaqīñ hai ki nahīñ vo jise ham ne ḳhudā apnā banāyā huā hai 
yūñhī dīvāna banā phirtā hai varna 'ajmal' dil meñ baiThā huā hai zehn pe chhāyā huā hai 
main ne ai dil tujhe sine se lagaya hua hai aur tu hai ki meri jaan ko aaya hua hai 
bas isi bojh se dohri hui jati hai kamar zindagi ka jo ye ehsan uThaya hua hai 
kya hua gar nahin baadal ye barasne wala ye bhi kuchh kam to nahin hai jo ye aaya hua hai 
rah chalti hui is rahguzar par 'ajmal' hum samajhte hain qadam hum ne jamaya hua hai 
hum ye samjhe the ki hum bhul gae hain us ko aaj be-tarah hamein yaad jo aaya hua hai 
wo kisi roz hawaon ki tarah aaega rah mein jis ki diya hum ne jalaya hua hai 
kaun batlae use apna yaqin hai ki nahin wo jise hum ne KHuda apna banaya hua hai 
yunhi diwana bana phirta hai warna 'ajmal' dil mein baiTha hua hai zehn pe chhaya hua hai

sab ko dil ke daaġh dikhā.e ek tujhī ko dikhā na sake terā dāman duur nahīñ thā haath hamīñ phailā na sake 
tū ai dost kahāñ le aayā chehra ye ḳhurshīd-misāl siine meñ ābād kareñge āñkhoñ meñ to samā na sake 
nā tujh se kuchh ham ko nisbat nā tujh ko kuchh ham se kaam ham ko ye mālūm thā lekin dil ko ye samjhā na sake 
ab tujh se kis muñh se kah deñ saat samundar paar na jā biich kī ik dīvār bhī ham to phāñd na paa.e Dhā na sake 
man paapī kī ujḌī khetī sūkhī kī sūkhī hī rahī umDe bādal garje bādal būñdeñ do barsā na sake 
sab ko dil ke dagh dikhae ek tujhi ko dikha na sake tera daman dur nahin tha hath hamin phaila na sake 
tu ai dost kahan le aaya chehra ye KHurshid-misal sine mein aabaad karenge aankhon mein to sama na sake 
na tujh se kuchh hum ko nisbat na tujh ko kuchh hum se kaam hum ko ye malum tha lekin dil ko ye samjha na sake 
ab tujh se kis munh se kah den sat samundar par na ja bich ki ek diwar bhi hum to phand na pae Dha na sake 
man papi ki ujDi kheti sukhi ki sukhi hi rahi umDe baadal garje baadal bunden do barsa na sake

abhī āñkheñ khulī haiñ aur kyā kyā dekhne ko mujhe pāgal kiyā us ne tamāshā dekhne ko 
vo sūrat dekh lī ham ne to phir kuchh bhī na dekhā abhī varna paḌī thī ek duniyā dekhne ko 
tamannā kī kise parvā ki sone jāgne meñ mayassar haiñ bahut ḳhvāb-e-tamannā dekhne ko 
ba-zāhir mutma.in maiñ bhī rahā is anjuman meñ sabhī maujūd the aur vo bhī ḳhush thā dekhne ko 
ab us ko dekh kar dil ho gayā hai aur bojhal tarastā thā yahī dekho to kitnā dekhne ko 
ab itnā husn āñkhoñ meñ samā.e bhī to kyūñkar vagarna aaj use ham ne bhī dekhā dekhne ko 
chhupāyā haath se chehra bhī us nā-mehrbāñ ne ham aa.e the 'zafar' jis kā sarāpā dekhne ko 
abhi aankhen khuli hain aur kya kya dekhne ko mujhe pagal kiya us ne tamasha dekhne ko 
wo surat dekh li hum ne to phir kuchh bhi na dekha abhi warna paDi thi ek duniya dekhne ko 
tamanna ki kise parwa ki sone jagne mein mayassar hain bahut KHwab-e-tamanna dekhne ko 
ba-zahir mutmain main bhi raha is anjuman mein sabhi maujud the aur wo bhi KHush tha dekhne ko 
ab us ko dekh kar dil ho gaya hai aur bojhal tarasta tha yahi dekho to kitna dekhne ko 
ab itna husn aankhon mein samae bhi to kyunkar wagarna aaj use hum ne bhi dekha dekhne ko 
chhupaya hath se chehra bhi us na-mehrban ne hum aae the 'zafar' jis ka sarapa dekhne ko

jis bazm meñ tū naaz se guftār meñ aave jaañ kālbad-e-sūrat-e-dīvār meñ aave 
saa.e kī tarah saath phireñ sarv o sanobar tū is qad-e-dilkash se jo gulzār meñ aave 
tab nāz-e-girāñ mā.igi-e-ashk bajā hai jab laḳht-e-jigar dīda-e-ḳhūñ-bār meñ aave 
de mujh ko shikāyat kī ijāzat ki sitamgar kuchh tujh ko mazā bhī mire āzār meñ aave 
us chashm-e-fusūñ-gar kā agar paa.e ishāra tuutī kī tarah aa.ina guftār meñ aave 
kāñToñ kī zabāñ suukh ga.ī pyaas se yā rab ik ābla-pā vādī-e-pur-ḳhār meñ aave 
mar jā.ūñ na kyuuñ rashk se jab vo tan-e-nāzuk āġhosh-e-ḳham-e-halqa-e-zunnār meñ aave 
ġhārat-gar-e-nāmūs na ho gar havas-e-zar kyuuñ shāhid-e-gul baaġh se bāzār meñ aave 
tab chāk-e-garebāñ kā mazā hai dil-e-nālāñ jab ik nafas uljhā huā har taar meñ aave 
ātish-kada hai siina mirā rāz-e-nihāñ se ai vaa.e agar ma.ariz-e-iz.hār meñ aave 
ganjīna-e-ma.anī kā tilism us ko samajhiye jo lafz ki 'ġhālib' mire ash.ār meñ aave 
jis bazm mein tu naz se guftar mein aawe jaan kalbad-e-surat-e-diwar mein aawe 
sae ki tarah sath phiren sarw o sanobar tu is qad-e-dilkash se jo gulzar mein aawe 
tab naz-e-giran maigi-e-ashk baja hai jab laKHt-e-jigar dida-e-KHun-bar mein aawe 
de mujh ko shikayat ki ijazat ki sitamgar kuchh tujh ko maza bhi mere aazar mein aawe 
us chashm-e-fusun-gar ka agar pae ishaara tuti ki tarah aaina guftar mein aawe 
kanTon ki zaban sukh gai pyas se ya rab ek aabla-pa wadi-e-pur-KHar mein aawe 
mar jaun na kyun rashk se jab wo tan-e-nazuk aaghosh-e-KHam-e-halqa-e-zunnar mein aawe 
ghaarat-gar-e-namus na ho gar hawas-e-zar kyun shahid-e-gul bagh se bazar mein aawe 
tab chaak-e-gareban ka maza hai dil-e-nalan jab ek nafas uljha hua har tar mein aawe 
aatish-kada hai sina mera raaz-e-nihan se ai wae agar mariz-e-izhaar mein aawe 
ganjina-e-mani ka tilism us ko samajhiye jo lafz ki 'ghaalib' mere ashaar mein aawe

tum se na mil ke ḳhush haiñ vo daavā kidhar gayā do roz meñ gulāb sā chehra utar gayā 
jān-e-bahār tum ne vo kāñTe chubho.e haiñ maiñ har gul-e-shagufta ko chhūne se Dar gayā 
is dil ke TūTne kā mujhe koī ġham nahīñ achchhā huā ki paap kaTā dard-e-sar gayā 
maiñ bhī samajh rahā huuñ ki tum tum nahīñ rahe tum bhī ye soch lo ki mirā 'kaif' mar gayā 
tum se na mil ke KHush hain wo dawa kidhar gaya do roz mein gulab sa chehra utar gaya 
jaan-e-bahaar tum ne wo kanTe chubhoe hain main har gul-e-shagufta ko chhune se Dar gaya 
is dil ke TuTne ka mujhe koi gham nahin achchha hua ki pap kaTa dard-e-sar gaya 
main bhi samajh raha hun ki tum tum nahin rahe tum bhi ye soch lo ki mera 'kaif' mar gaya

dekhā to koī aur thā sochā to koī aur jab aa ke milā aur thā chāhā to koī aur 
us shaḳhs ke chehre meñ ka.ī rañg chhupe the chup thā to koī aur thā bolā to koī aur 
do-chār qadam par hī badalte hue dekhā Thahrā to koī aur thā guzrā to koī aur 
tum jaan ke bhī us ko na pahchān sakoge anjāne meñ vo aur hai jaanā to koī aur 
uljhan meñ huuñ kho duuñ ki use pā luuñ karūñ kyā khone pe vo kuchh aur hai paayā to koī aur 
dushman bhī hai hamrāz bhī anjān bhī hai vo kyā 'ashk' ne samjhā use vo thā to koī aur 
dekha to koi aur tha socha to koi aur jab aa ke mila aur tha chaha to koi aur 
us shaKHs ke chehre mein kai rang chhupe the chup tha to koi aur tha bola to koi aur 
do-chaar qadam par hi badalte hue dekha Thahra to koi aur tha guzra to koi aur 
tum jaan ke bhi us ko na pahchan sakoge anjaane mein wo aur hai jaana to koi aur 
uljhan mein hun kho dun ki use pa lun karun kya khone pe wo kuchh aur hai paya to koi aur 
dushman bhi hai hamraaz bhi anjaan bhi hai wo kya 'ashk' ne samjha use wo tha to koi aur

sunte haiñ phir chhup chhup un ke ghar meñ aate jaate ho 'inshā' sāhab nāhaq jī ko vahshat meñ uljhāte ho 
dil kī baat chhupānī mushkil lekin ḳhuub chhupāte ho ban meñ daanā shahr ke andar dīvāne kahlāte ho 
bekal bekal rahte ho par mahfil ke ādāb ke saath aañkh churā kar dekh bhī lete bhole bhī ban jaate ho 
piit meñ aise laakh jatan haiñ lekin ik din sab nākām aap jahāñ meñ rusvā hoge vaaz hameñ farmāte ho 
ham se naam junūñ kā qaa.im ham se dasht kī ābādī ham se dard kā shikva karte ham ko zaḳhm dikhāte ho 
sunte hain phir chhup chhup un ke ghar mein aate jate ho 'insha' sahab nahaq ji ko wahshat mein uljhate ho 
dil ki baat chhupani mushkil lekin KHub chhupate ho ban mein dana shahr ke andar diwane kahlate ho 
bekal bekal rahte ho par mahfil ke aadab ke sath aankh chura kar dekh bhi lete bhole bhi ban jate ho 
pit mein aise lakh jatan hain lekin ek din sab nakaam aap jahan mein ruswa hoge waz hamein farmate ho 
hum se nam junun ka qaim hum se dasht ki aabaadi hum se dard ka shikwa karte hum ko zaKHm dikhate ho

ik ġhazal us pe likhūñ dil kā taqāzā hai bahut in dinoñ ḳhud se bichhaḌ jaane kā dhaḌkā hai bahut 
raat ho din ho ki ġhaflat ho ki bedārī ho us ko dekhā to nahīñ hai use sochā hai bahut 
tishnagī ke bhī maqāmāt haiñ kyā kyā yaanī kabhī dariyā nahīñ kaafī kabhī qatra hai bahut 
mire hāthoñ kī lakīroñ ke izāfe haiñ gavāh maiñ ne patthar kī tarah ḳhud ko tarāshā hai bahut 
koī aayā hai zarūr aur yahāñ Thahrā bhī hai ghar kī dahlīz pe ai 'nūr' ujālā hai bahut 
ek ghazal us pe likhun dil ka taqaza hai bahut in dinon KHud se bichhaD jaane ka dhaDka hai bahut 
raat ho din ho ki ghaflat ho ki bedari ho us ko dekha to nahin hai use socha hai bahut 
tishnagi ke bhi maqamat hain kya kya yani kabhi dariya nahin kafi kabhi qatra hai bahut 
mere hathon ki lakiron ke izafe hain gawah main ne patthar ki tarah KHud ko tarasha hai bahut 
koi aaya hai zarur aur yahan Thahra bhi hai ghar ki dahliz pe ai 'nur' ujala hai bahut

mujh ko gahrā.ī meñ miTTī kī utar jaanā hai zindagī bāñdh le sāmān-e-safar jaanā hai 
ghar kī dahlīz pe raushan haiñ vo bujhtī āñkheñ mujh ko mat rok mujhe lauT ke ghar jaanā hai 
maiñ vo mele meñ bhaTaktā huā ik bachcha huuñ jis ke maañ baap ko rote hue mar jaanā hai 
zindagī taash ke pattoñ kī tarah hai merī aur pattoñ ko bahar-hāl bikhar jaanā hai 
ek be-nām se rishte kī tamannā le kar is kabūtar ko kisī chhat pe utar jaanā hai 
mujh ko gahrai mein miTTi ki utar jaana hai zindagi bandh le saman-e-safar jaana hai 
ghar ki dahliz pe raushan hain wo bujhti aankhen mujh ko mat rok mujhe lauT ke ghar jaana hai 
main wo mele mein bhaTakta hua ek bachcha hun jis ke man bap ko rote hue mar jaana hai 
zindagi tash ke patton ki tarah hai meri aur patton ko bahar-haal bikhar jaana hai 
ek be-nam se rishte ki tamanna le kar is kabutar ko kisi chhat pe utar jaana hai

itnā na apne jaame se bāhar nikal ke chal duniyā hai chal-chalāv kā rasta sambhal ke chal 
kam-zarf pur-ġhurūr zarā apnā zarf dekh mānind josh-e-ġham na ziyāda ubal ke chal 
fursat hai ik sadā kī yahāñ soz-e-dil ke saath us par sapand-vār na itnā uchhal ke chal 
ye ġhol-vash haiñ in ko samajh tū na rahnumā saa.e se bach ke ahl-e-fareb-o-daġhal ke chal 
auroñ ke bal pe bal na kar itnā na chal nikal bal hai to bal ke bal pe tū kuchh apne bal ke chal 
insāñ ko kal kā putlā banāyā hai us ne aap aur aap hī vo kahtā hai putle ko kal ke chal 
phir āñkheñ bhī to diiñ haiñ ki rakh dekh kar qadam kahtā hai kaun tujh ko na chal chal sambhal ke chal 
hai turfa amn-gāh nihāñ-ḳhāna-e-adam āñkhoñ ke rū-ba-rū se tū logoñ ke Tal ke chal 
kyā chal sakegā ham se ki pahchānte haiñ ham tū laakh apnī chaal ko zālim badal ke chal 
hai sham.a sar ke bal jo mohabbat meñ garm ho parvāna apne dil se ye kahtā hai jal ke chal 
bulbul ke hosh nik.hat-e-gul kī tarah uḌā gulshan meñ mere saath zarā itr mal ke chal 
gar qasd sū-e-dil hai tirā ai nigāh-e-yār do-chār tiir paik se aage ajal ke chal 
jo imtihān-e-tab.a kare apnā ai 'zafar' to kah do us ko taur pe tū is ġhazal ke chal 
itna na apne jame se bahar nikal ke chal duniya hai chal-chalaw ka rasta sambhal ke chal 
kam-zarf pur-ghurur zara apna zarf dekh manind josh-e-gham na ziyaada ubal ke chal 
fursat hai ek sada ki yahan soz-e-dil ke sath us par sapand-war na itna uchhal ke chal 
ye ghol-wash hain in ko samajh tu na rahnuma sae se bach ke ahl-e-fareb-o-daghal ke chal 
auron ke bal pe bal na kar itna na chal nikal bal hai to bal ke bal pe tu kuchh apne bal ke chal 
insan ko kal ka putla banaya hai us ne aap aur aap hi wo kahta hai putle ko kal ke chal 
phir aankhen bhi to din hain ki rakh dekh kar qadam kahta hai kaun tujh ko na chal chal sambhal ke chal 
hai turfa amn-gah nihan-KHana-e-adam aankhon ke ru-ba-ru se tu logon ke Tal ke chal 
kya chal sakega hum se ki pahchante hain hum tu lakh apni chaal ko zalim badal ke chal 
hai shama sar ke bal jo mohabbat mein garm ho parwana apne dil se ye kahta hai jal ke chal 
bulbul ke hosh nikhat-e-gul ki tarah uDa gulshan mein mere sath zara itr mal ke chal 
gar qasd su-e-dil hai tera ai nigah-e-yar do-chaar tir paik se aage ajal ke chal 
jo imtihan-e-taba kare apna ai 'zafar' to kah do us ko taur pe tu is ghazal ke chal

dil-e-nākām ke haiñ kaam ḳharāb kar liyā āshiqī meñ naam ḳharāb 
is ḳharābāt kā yahī hai maza ki rahe aadmī mudām ḳharāb 
dekh kar jins-e-dil vo kahte haiñ kyuuñ kare koī apne daam ḳharāb 
abr-e-tar se sabā hī achchhī thī merī miTTī huī tamām ḳharāb 
vo bhī saaqī mujhe nahīñ detā vo jo TuuTā paḌā hai jaam ḳharāb 
kyā milā ham ko zindagī ke sivā vo bhī dushvār nā-tamām ḳharāb 
vaah kyā muñh se phuul jhaḌte haiñ ḳhūb-rū ho ke ye kalām ḳharāb 
chaal kī rahnumā-e-ishq ne bhī vo dikhāyā jo thā maqām ḳharāb 
'dāġh' hai bad-chalan to hone do sau meñ hotā hai ik ġhulām ḳharāb 
dil-e-nakaam ke hain kaam KHarab kar liya aashiqi mein nam KHarab 
is KHarabaat ka yahi hai maza ki rahe aadmi mudam KHarab 
dekh kar jins-e-dil wo kahte hain kyun kare koi apne dam KHarab 
abr-e-tar se saba hi achchhi thi meri miTTi hui tamam KHarab 
wo bhi saqi mujhe nahin deta wo jo TuTa paDa hai jam KHarab 
kya mila hum ko zindagi ke siwa wo bhi dushwar na-tamam KHarab 
wah kya munh se phul jhaDte hain KHub-ru ho ke ye kalam KHarab 
chaal ki rahnuma-e-ishq ne bhi wo dikhaya jo tha maqam KHarab 
'dagh' hai bad-chalan to hone do sau mein hota hai ek ghulam KHarab

phuul barse kahīñ shabnam kahīñ gauhar barse aur is dil kī taraf barse to patthar barse 
koī bādal ho to tham jaa.e magar ashk mire ek raftār se din raat barābar barse 
barf ke phūloñ se raushan huī tārīk zamīñ raat kī shāḳh se jaise mah o aḳhtar barse 
pyaar kā giit añdheroñ pe ujāloñ kī phuvār aur nafrat kī sadā shīshe pe patthar barse 
bārisheñ chhat pe khulī jag.hoñ pe hotī haiñ magar ġham vo sāvan hai jo un kamroñ ke andar barse 
phul barse kahin shabnam kahin gauhar barse aur is dil ki taraf barse to patthar barse 
koi baadal ho to tham jae magar ashk mere ek raftar se din raat barabar barse 
barf ke phulon se raushan hui tarik zamin raat ki shaKH se jaise mah o aKHtar barse 
pyar ka git andheron pe ujalon ki phuwar aur nafrat ki sada shishe pe patthar barse 
barishen chhat pe khuli jaghon pe hoti hain magar gham wo sawan hai jo un kamron ke andar barse

bigḌī baat banānā mushkil bigḌī baat banā.e kaun kunj-e-tamannā vīrāna hai aa kar phuul khilā.e kaun 
tan kī daulat man kī daulat sab ḳhvāboñ kī bāteñ haiñ nau man tel na ho to ghar meñ rādhā ko nachvā.e kaun 
apnā ġham ab ḳhud hī uThā le varna rusvā.ī hogī terā bhed chhupā kar dil meñ nāhaq bojh uThā.e kaun 
chaltī gaaḌī naam kā rishta kyā mohan kyā rādhā aaj ban ke sañvar ke raas rachā ke mohan aaj manā.e kaun 
sāgar paar kī ḳhabreñ dekhe ham-sā.e kā patā nahīñ aaj kā insāñ aalam fāzil us ko ab samjhā.e kaun 
nā-ummīdī nām-e-tamannā apnā muqaddar hijr-e-musalsal dard ke ḳhāristān meñ aa ke dāman-e-dil uljhā.e kaun 
raat bhī kaalī chādar oḌhe aa pahuñchī hai ziine meñ mehñdī lagā.e baiThī soche laT uljhī suljhā.e kaun 
bigDi baat banana mushkil bigDi baat banae kaun kunj-e-tamanna virana hai aa kar phul khilae kaun 
tan ki daulat man ki daulat sab KHwabon ki baaten hain nau man tel na ho to ghar mein radha ko nachwae kaun 
apna gham ab KHud hi uTha le warna ruswai hogi tera bhed chhupa kar dil mein nahaq bojh uThae kaun 
chalti gaDi nam ka rishta kya mohan kya radha aaj ban ke sanwar ke ras racha ke mohan aaj manae kaun 
sagar par ki KHabren dekhe ham-sae ka pata nahin aaj ka insan aalam fazil us ko ab samjhae kaun 
na-ummidi nam-e-tamanna apna muqaddar hijr-e-musalsal dard ke KHaristan mein aa ke daman-e-dil uljhae kaun 
raat bhi kali chadar oDhe aa pahunchi hai zine mein mehndi lagae baiThi soche laT uljhi suljhae kaun

phuul khile haiñ gulshan gulshan lekin apnā apnā dāman

shamshīr-e-barhana maañg ġhazab bāloñ kī mahak phir vaisī hī juuḌe kī guñdhāvaT qahr-e-ḳhudā bāloñ kī mahak phir vaisī hī 
āñkheñ haiñ kaTorā sī vo sitam gardan hai surāhī-dār ġhazab aur usī meñ sharāb-e-surḳhi-e-pāñ rakhtī hai jhalak phir vaisī hī 
har baat meñ us kī garmī hai har naaz meñ us ke shoḳhī hai qāmat hai qayāmat chaal parī chalne meñ phaḌak phir vaisī hī 
gar rañg bhabūkā ātish hai aur biinī shola-e-sarkash hai to bijlī sī kauñde hai parī aariz kī chamak phir vaisī hī 
nau-ḳhez kucheñ do ġhuncha haiñ hai narm shikam ik ḳhirman-e-gul bārīk kamar jo shāḳh-e-gul rakhtī hai lachak phir vaisī hī 
hai naaf koī girdāb-e-balā aur gol surīñ rāneñ haiñ safā hai saaq bilorīñ sham-e-ziyā paañv kī kafak phir vaisī hī 
mahram hai habāb-e-āb-e-ravāñ sūraj kī kiran hai us pe lipaT jaalī kī kurtī hai vo balā goTe kī dhanak phir vaisī hī 
vo gaa.e to aafat laa.e hai har taal meñ leve jaan nikāl naach us kā uThā.e sau fitne ghuñgrū kī jhanak phir vaisī hī 
har baat pe ham se vo jo 'zafar' kartā hai lagāvaT muddat se aur us kī chāhat rakhte haiñ ham aaj talak phir vaisī hī 
shamshir-e-barhana mang ghazab baalon ki mahak phir waisi hi juDe ki gundhawaT qahr-e-KHuda baalon ki mahak phir waisi hi 
aankhen hain kaTora si wo sitam gardan hai surahi-dar ghazab aur usi mein sharab-e-surKHi-e-pan rakhti hai jhalak phir waisi hi 
har baat mein us ki garmi hai har naz mein us ke shoKHi hai qamat hai qayamat chaal pari chalne mein phaDak phir waisi hi 
gar rang bhabuka aatish hai aur bini shola-e-sarkash hai to bijli si kaunde hai pari aariz ki chamak phir waisi hi 
nau-KHez kuchen do ghuncha hain hai narm shikam ek KHirman-e-gul barik kamar jo shaKH-e-gul rakhti hai lachak phir waisi hi 
hai naf koi girdab-e-bala aur gol surin ranen hain safa hai saq bilorin sham-e-ziya panw ki kafak phir waisi hi 
mahram hai habab-e-ab-e-rawan suraj ki kiran hai us pe lipaT jali ki kurti hai wo bala goTe ki dhanak phir waisi hi 
wo gae to aafat lae hai har tal mein lewe jaan nikal nach us ka uThae sau fitne ghungru ki jhanak phir waisi hi 
har baat pe hum se wo jo 'zafar' karta hai lagawaT muddat se aur us ki chahat rakhte hain hum aaj talak phir waisi hi
