kahīñ tum apnī qismat kā likhā tabdīl kar lete to shāyad ham bhī apnā rāsta tabdīl kar lete 
agar ham vāqa.ī kam-hausla hote mohabbat meñ maraz baḌhne se pahle hī davā tabdīl kar lete 
tumhāre saath chalne par jo dil raazī nahīñ hotā bahut pahle ham apnā faisla tabdīl kar lete 
tumheñ in mausamoñ kī kyā ḳhabar miltī agar ham bhī ghuTan ke ḳhauf se aab o havā tabdīl kar lete 
tumhārī tarah jiine kā hunar aatā to phir shāyad makān apnā vahī rakhte patā tabdīl kar lete 
vahī kirdār haiñ taaza kahānī meñ jo pahle bhī kabhī chehra kabhī apnī qabā tabdīl kar lete 
judā.ī bhī na hotī zindagī bhī sahl ho jaatī jo ham ik dūsre se mas.ala tabdīl kar lete 
hamesha kī tarah is baar bhī ham bol uThe varna gavāhī dene vaale vāqi.a tabdīl kar lete 
bahut dhuñdlā gayā yādoñ kī rim-jhim meñ dil-e-sāda vo mil jaatā to ham ye ā.īna tabdīl kar lete 
kahin tum apni qismat ka likha tabdil kar lete to shayad hum bhi apna rasta tabdil kar lete 
agar hum waqai kam-hausla hote mohabbat mein maraz baDhne se pahle hi dawa tabdil kar lete 
tumhaare sath chalne par jo dil raazi nahin hota bahut pahle hum apna faisla tabdil kar lete 
tumhein in mausamon ki kya KHabar milti agar hum bhi ghuTan ke KHauf se aab o hawa tabdil kar lete 
tumhaari tarah jine ka hunar aata to phir shayad makan apna wahi rakhte pata tabdil kar lete 
wahi kirdar hain taza kahani mein jo pahle bhi kabhi chehra kabhi apni qaba tabdil kar lete 
judai bhi na hoti zindagi bhi sahl ho jati jo hum ek dusre se masala tabdil kar lete 
hamesha ki tarah is bar bhi hum bol uThe warna gawahi dene wale waqia tabdil kar lete 
bahut dhundla gaya yaadon ki rim-jhim mein dil-e-sada wo mil jata to hum ye aaina tabdil kar lete

tumheñ kyūñkar batā.eñ zindagī ko kyā samajhte haiñ samajh lo saañs lenā ḳhud-kushī karnā samajhte haiñ 
kisī badmast ko rāz-āshnā sab kā samajhte haiñ nigāh-e-yār tujh ko kyā batā.eñ kyā samajhte haiñ 
bas itne par hameñ sab log dīvāna samajhte haiñ ki is duniyā ko ham ik dūsrī duniyā samajhte haiñ 
kahāñ kā vasl tanhā.ī ne shāyad bhes badlā hai tire dam bhar ke mil jaane ko ham bhī kyā samajhte haiñ 
umīdoñ meñ bhī un kī ek shān-e-be-niyāzī hai har āsānī ko jo dushvār ho jaanā samajhte haiñ 
yahī zid hai to ḳhair āñkheñ uThāte haiñ ham us jānib magar ai dil ham is meñ jaan kā khaTkā samajhte haiñ 
kahīñ hoñ tere dīvāne Thahar jaa.eñ to zindāñ hai jidhar ko muñh uThā kar chal paḌe sahrā samajhte haiñ 
jahāñ kī fitrat-e-begāna meñ jo kaif-e-ġham bhar deñ vahī jiinā samajhte haiñ vahī marnā samajhte haiñ 
hamārā zikr kyā ham ko to hosh aayā mohabbat meñ magar ham qais kā dīvāna ho jaanā samajhte haiñ 
na shoḳhī shoḳh hai itnī na purkār itnī purkārī na jaane log terī sādgī ko kyā samajhte haiñ 
bhulā diiñ ek muddat kī jafā.eñ us ne ye kah kar tujhe apnā samajhte the tujhe apnā samajhte haiñ 
ye kah kar ābla-pā rauñdte jaate haiñ kāñToñ ko jise talvoñ meñ kar leñ jazb use sahrā samajhte haiñ 
ye hastī nīstī sab mauj-ḳhezī hai mohabbat kī na ham qatra samajhte haiñ na ham dariyā samajhte haiñ 
'firāq' is gardish-e-ayyām se kab kaam niklā hai sahar hone ko bhī ham raat kaT jaanā samajhte haiñ 
tumhein kyunkar bataen zindagi ko kya samajhte hain samajh lo sans lena KHud-kushi karna samajhte hain 
kisi badmast ko raaz-ashna sab ka samajhte hain nigah-e-yar tujh ko kya bataen kya samajhte hain 
bas itne par hamein sab log diwana samajhte hain ki is duniya ko hum ek dusri duniya samajhte hain 
kahan ka wasl tanhai ne shayad bhes badla hai tere dam bhar ke mil jaane ko hum bhi kya samajhte hain 
umidon mein bhi un ki ek shan-e-be-niyazi hai har aasani ko jo dushwar ho jaana samajhte hain 
yahi zid hai to KHair aankhen uThate hain hum us jaanib magar ai dil hum is mein jaan ka khaTka samajhte hain 
kahin hon tere diwane Thahar jaen to zindan hai jidhar ko munh uTha kar chal paDe sahra samajhte hain 
jahan ki fitrat-e-begana mein jo kaif-e-gham bhar den wahi jina samajhte hain wahi marna samajhte hain 
hamara zikr kya hum ko to hosh aaya mohabbat mein magar hum qais ka diwana ho jaana samajhte hain 
na shoKHi shoKH hai itni na purkar itni purkari na jaane log teri sadgi ko kya samajhte hain 
bhula din ek muddat ki jafaen us ne ye kah kar tujhe apna samajhte the tujhe apna samajhte hain 
ye kah kar aabla-pa raundte jate hain kanTon ko jise talwon mein kar len jazb use sahra samajhte hain 
ye hasti nisti sab mauj-KHezi hai mohabbat ki na hum qatra samajhte hain na hum dariya samajhte hain 
'firaq' is gardish-e-ayyam se kab kaam nikla hai sahar hone ko bhi hum raat kaT jaana samajhte hain

sab ko duniyā kī havas ḳhvār liye phirtī hai kaun phirtā hai ye murdār liye phirtī hai 
ghar se bāhar na nikaltā kabhī apne ḳhurshīd havas-e-garmī-e-bāzār liye phirtī hai 
vo mire aḳhtar-e-tāle kī hai vāzhūñ gardish ki falak ko bhī nigūñ-sār liye phirtī hai 
kar diyā kyā tire abrū ne ishāra qātil ki qazā haath meñ talvār liye phirtī hai 
jā ke ik baar na phirnā thā jahāñ vaañ mujh ko be-qarārī hai ki sau baar liye phirtī hai 
sab ko duniya ki hawas KHwar liye phirti hai kaun phirta hai ye murdar liye phirti hai 
ghar se bahar na nikalta kabhi apne KHurshid hawas-e-garmi-e-bazar liye phirti hai 
wo mere aKHtar-e-tale ki hai wazhun gardish ki falak ko bhi nigun-sar liye phirti hai 
kar diya kya tere abru ne ishaara qatil ki qaza hath mein talwar liye phirti hai 
ja ke ek bar na phirna tha jahan wan mujh ko be-qarari hai ki sau bar liye phirti hai

na jhaTko zulf se paanī ye motī TuuT jā.eñge tumhārā kuchh na bigḌegā magar dil TuuT jā.eñge 
ye bhīgī raat ye bhīgā badan ye husn kā aalam ye sab andāz mil kar do jahāñ ko luuT jā.eñge 
ye nāzuk lab haiñ yā aapas meñ do lipTī huī kaliyāñ zarā in ko alag kar do tarannum phuuT jā.eñge 
hamārī jaan le legā ye nīchī aañkh kā jaadū chalo achchhā huā mar kar jahāñ se chhūT jā.eñge 
na jhaTko zulf se pani ye moti TuT jaenge tumhaara kuchh na bigDega magar dil TuT jaenge 
ye bhigi raat ye bhiga badan ye husn ka aalam ye sab andaz mil kar do jahan ko luT jaenge 
ye nazuk lab hain ya aapas mein do lipTi hui kaliyan zara in ko alag kar do tarannum phuT jaenge 
hamari jaan le lega ye nichi aankh ka jadu chalo achchha hua mar kar jahan se chhuT jaenge

sab pe tū mehrbān hai pyāre kuchh hamārā bhī dhyān hai pyāre 
aa ki tujh bin bahut dinoñ se ye dil ek suunā makān hai pyāre 
tū jahāñ naaz se qadam rakh de vo zamīn āsmān hai pyāre 
muḳhtasar hai ye shauq kī rūdād har nafas dāstān hai pyāre 
apne jī meñ zarā to kar insāf kab se nā-mehrbān hai pyāre 
sabr TuuTe hue diloñ kā na le tū yūñhī dhaan paan hai pyāre 
ham se jo ho sakā so kar guzre ab tirā imtihān hai pyāre 
mujh meñ tujh meñ to koī farq nahīñ ishq kyuuñ darmiyān hai pyāre 
kyā kahe hāl-e-dil ġharīb 'jigar' TuuTī phūTī zabān hai pyāre 
sab pe tu mehrban hai pyare kuchh hamara bhi dhyan hai pyare 
aa ki tujh bin bahut dinon se ye dil ek suna makan hai pyare 
tu jahan naz se qadam rakh de wo zamin aasman hai pyare 
muKHtasar hai ye shauq ki rudad har nafas dastan hai pyare 
apne ji mein zara to kar insaf kab se na-mehrban hai pyare 
sabr TuTe hue dilon ka na le tu yunhi dhan pan hai pyare 
hum se jo ho saka so kar guzre ab tera imtihan hai pyare 
mujh mein tujh mein to koi farq nahin ishq kyun darmiyan hai pyare 
kya kahe haal-e-dil gharib 'jigar' TuTi phuTi zaban hai pyare

vo ham se duur hote jā rahe haiñ bahut maġhrūr hote jā rahe haiñ 
bas ik tark-e-mohabbat ke irāde hameñ manzūr hote jā rahe haiñ 
manāzir the jo firdaus-e-tasavvur vo sab mastūr hote jā rahe haiñ 
badaltī jā rahī hai dil kī duniyā na.e dastūr hote jā rahe haiñ 
bahut maġhmūm the jo dīda-o-dil bahut masrūr hote jā rahe haiñ 
vafā par murdanī sī chhā chalī hai sitam kā nuur hote jā rahe haiñ 
kabhī vo paas aa.e jā rahe the magar ab duur hote jā rahe haiñ 
firāq o hijr ke tārīk lamhe sarāpā nuur hote jā rahe haiñ 
'shakīl' ehsās-e-gumnāmī se kah do ki ham mash.hūr hote jā rahe haiñ 
wo hum se dur hote ja rahe hain bahut maghrur hote ja rahe hain 
bas ek tark-e-mohabbat ke irade hamein manzur hote ja rahe hain 
manazir the jo firdaus-e-tasawwur wo sab mastur hote ja rahe hain 
badalti ja rahi hai dil ki duniya nae dastur hote ja rahe hain 
bahut maghmum the jo dida-o-dil bahut masrur hote ja rahe hain 
wafa par murdani si chha chali hai sitam ka nur hote ja rahe hain 
kabhi wo pas aae ja rahe the magar ab dur hote ja rahe hain 
firaq o hijr ke tarik lamhe sarapa nur hote ja rahe hain 
'shakil' ehsas-e-gumnami se kah do ki hum mashhur hote ja rahe hain

chaa.e kī pyālī meñ niilī tablet gholī sahme sahme hāthoñ ne ik kitāb phir kholī 
dā.ere añdheroñ ke raushnī ke poroñ ne coat ke button khole tie kī girah kholī 
shīshe kī silā.ī meñ kaale bhuut kā chaḌhnā baam kaaTh kā ghoḌā niim kāñch kī golī 
barf meñ dabā makkhan maut rail aur rickshaw zindagī ḳhushī rickshaw rail motareñ Dolī 
ik kitāb chāñd aur peḌ sab ke kaale collar par zehn tape kī gardish muñh meñ totoñ kī bolī 
vo nahīñ milī ham ko hook button saraktī jiin zip ke daañt khulte hī aañkh se girī cholī 
chae ki pyali mein nili tablet gholi sahme sahme hathon ne ek kitab phir kholi 
daere andheron ke raushni ke poron ne coat ke button khole tie ki girah kholi 
shishe ki silai mein kale bhut ka chaDhna baam kaTh ka ghoDa nim kanch ki goli 
barf mein daba makkhan maut rail aur rickshaw zindagi KHushi rickshaw rail motaren Doli 
ek kitab chand aur peD sab ke kale collar par zehn tape ki gardish munh mein toton ki boli 
wo nahin mili hum ko hook button sarakti jin zip ke dant khulte hi aankh se giri choli

jab naam tirā lījiye tab chashm bhar aave is zindagī karne ko kahāñ se jigar aave 
talvār kā bhī maarā ḳhudā rakkhe hai zālim ye to ho koī gor-e-ġharībāñ meñ dar aave 
mai-ḳhāna vo manzar hai ki har sub.h jahāñ shaiḳh dīvār pe ḳhurshīd kā mastī se sar aave 
kyā jāneñ ve murġhān-e-giraftār-e-chaman ko jin tak ki ba-sad-nāz nasīm-e-sahar aave 
tū sub.h qadam-ranja kare Tuk to hai varna kis vāste āshiq kī shab-e-ġham basar aave 
har sū sar-e-taslīm rakhe said-e-haram haiñ vo said-fagan teġh-ba-kaf tā kidhar aave 
dīvāroñ se sar mārte phirne kā gayā vaqt ab tū hī magar aap kabhū dar se dar aave 
vaa.iz nahīñ kaifiyyat-e-mai-ḳhāna se āgāh yak jur.a badal varna ye mindīl dhar aave 
sannā.a haiñ sab ḳhvār azaañ jumla huuñ maiñ bhī hai aib baḌā us meñ jise kuchh hunar aave 
ai vo ki tū baiThā hai sar-e-rāh pe zinhār kahiyo jo kabhū 'mīr' balā-kash idhar aave 
mat dasht-e-mohabbat meñ qadam rakh ki ḳhizar ko har gaam pe is rah meñ safar se hazar aave 
jab nam tera lijiye tab chashm bhar aawe is zindagi karne ko kahan se jigar aawe 
talwar ka bhi mara KHuda rakkhe hai zalim ye to ho koi gor-e-ghariban mein dar aawe 
mai-KHana wo manzar hai ki har subh jahan shaiKH diwar pe KHurshid ka masti se sar aawe 
kya jaanen we murghan-e-giraftar-e-chaman ko jin tak ki ba-sad-naz nasim-e-sahar aawe 
tu subh qadam-ranja kare Tuk to hai warna kis waste aashiq ki shab-e-gham basar aawe 
har su sar-e-taslim rakhe said-e-haram hain wo said-fagan tegh-ba-kaf ta kidhar aawe 
diwaron se sar marte phirne ka gaya waqt ab tu hi magar aap kabhu dar se dar aawe 
waiz nahin kaifiyyat-e-mai-KHana se aagah yak jura badal warna ye mindil dhar aawe 
sannaa hain sab KHwar azan jumla hun main bhi hai aib baDa us mein jise kuchh hunar aawe 
ai wo ki tu baiTha hai sar-e-rah pe zinhaar kahiyo jo kabhu 'mir' bala-kash idhar aawe 
mat dasht-e-mohabbat mein qadam rakh ki KHizar ko har gam pe is rah mein safar se hazar aawe

tīrgī taaq meñ jaḌī huī hai dhuup dahlīz par paḌī huī hai 
dil pe nākāmiyoñ ke haiñ paivand aas kī soī bhī gaḌī huī hai 
mere jaisī hai merī parchhā.īñ dhuup meñ pal ke ye baḌī huī hai 
gher rakkhā hai nā-rasā.ī ne aur ḳhvāhish vahīñ khaḌī huī hai 
maiñ ne tasvīr pheñk dī hai magar kiil dīvār meñ gaḌī huī hai 
hārtā bhī nahīñ ġham-e-daurāñ zid pe ummīd bhī aḌī huī hai 
dil kisī ke ḳhayāl meñ hai gum raat ko ḳhvāb kī paḌī huī hai 
tirgi taq mein jaDi hui hai dhup dahliz par paDi hui hai 
dil pe nakaamiyon ke hain paiwand aas ki soi bhi gaDi hui hai 
mere jaisi hai meri parchhain dhup mein pal ke ye baDi hui hai 
gher rakkha hai na-rasai ne aur KHwahish wahin khaDi hui hai 
main ne taswir phenk di hai magar kil diwar mein gaDi hui hai 
haarta bhi nahin gham-e-dauran zid pe ummid bhi aDi hui hai 
dil kisi ke KHayal mein hai gum raat ko KHwab ki paDi hui hai

din ko bhī itnā añdherā hai mire kamre meñ saaya aate hue Dartā hai mire kamre meñ 
ġham thakā-hārā musāfir hai chalā jā.egā kuchh dinoñ ke liye Thahrā hai mire kamre meñ 
sub.h tak dekhnā afsāna banā Dālegā tujh ko ik shaḳhs ne dekhā hai mire kamre meñ 
dar-ba-dar din ko bhaTaktā hai tasavvur merā haañ magar raat ko rahtā hai mire kamre meñ 
chor baiThā hai kahāñ soch rahā huuñ maiñ 'zafar' kyā koī aur bhī kamra hai mire kamre meñ 
din ko bhi itna andhera hai mere kamre mein saya aate hue Darta hai mere kamre mein 
gham thaka-haara musafir hai chala jaega kuchh dinon ke liye Thahra hai mere kamre mein 
subh tak dekhna afsana bana Dalega tujh ko ek shaKHs ne dekha hai mere kamre mein 
dar-ba-dar din ko bhaTakta hai tasawwur mera han magar raat ko rahta hai mere kamre mein 
chor baiTha hai kahan soch raha hun main 'zafar' kya koi aur bhi kamra hai mere kamre mein

mirī dāstāñ mujhe hī mirā dil sunā ke ro.e kabhī ro ke muskurā.e kabhī muskurā ke ro.e 
mile ġham se apne fursat to maiñ haal pūchhūñ un kā shab-e-ġham se koī kah de kahīñ aur jā ke ro.e 
hameñ vāsta taḌap se hameñ kaam āñsuoñ se tujhe yaad kar ke ro.e yā tujhe bhulā ke ro.e 
vo jo aazmā rahe the mirī be-qarāriyoñ ko mire saath saath vo bhī mujhe aazmā ke ro.e 
meri dastan mujhe hi mera dil suna ke roe kabhi ro ke muskurae kabhi muskura ke roe 
mile gham se apne fursat to main haal puchhun un ka shab-e-gham se koi kah de kahin aur ja ke roe 
hamein wasta taDap se hamein kaam aansuon se tujhe yaad kar ke roe ya tujhe bhula ke roe 
wo jo aazma rahe the meri be-qarariyon ko mere sath sath wo bhi mujhe aazma ke roe

khulā hai dar pa tirā intizār jaatā rahā ḳhulūs to hai magar e'tibār jaatā rahā 
kisī kī aañkh meñ mastī to aaj bhī hai vahī magar kabhī jo hameñ thā ḳhumār jaatā rahā 
kabhī jo siine meñ ik aag thī vo sard huī kabhī nigāh meñ jo thā sharār jaatā rahā 
ajab sā chain thā ham ko ki jab the ham bechain qarār aayā to jaise qarār jaatā rahā 
kabhī to merī bhī sunvā.ī hogī mahfil meñ maiñ ye umiid liye baar baar jaatā rahā 
khula hai dar pa tera intizar jata raha KHulus to hai magar e'tibar jata raha 
kisi ki aankh mein masti to aaj bhi hai wahi magar kabhi jo hamein tha KHumar jata raha 
kabhi jo sine mein ek aag thi wo sard hui kabhi nigah mein jo tha sharar jata raha 
ajab sa chain tha hum ko ki jab the hum bechain qarar aaya to jaise qarar jata raha 
kabhi to meri bhi sunwai hogi mahfil mein main ye umid liye bar bar jata raha

zindagī un kī chaah meñ guzrī mustaqil dard-o-āh meñ guzrī 
rahmatoñ se nibāh meñ guzrī umr saarī gunāh meñ guzrī 
haa.e vo zindagī kī ik saa.at jo tirī bārgāh meñ guzrī 
sab kī nazroñ meñ sar-buland rahe jab tak un kī nigāh meñ guzrī 
maiñ vo ik rahrav-e-mohabbat huuñ jis kī manzil bhī raah meñ guzrī 
ik ḳhushī ham ne dil meñ chāhī thī vo bhī ġham kī panāh meñ guzrī 
zindagī apnī ai 'shakīl' ab tak talḳhī-e-rasm-o-rāh meñ guzrī 
zindagi un ki chah mein guzri mustaqil dard-o-ah mein guzri 
rahmaton se nibah mein guzri umr sari gunah mein guzri 
hae wo zindagi ki ek saat jo teri bargah mein guzri 
sab ki nazron mein sar-buland rahe jab tak un ki nigah mein guzri 
main wo ek rahraw-e-mohabbat hun jis ki manzil bhi rah mein guzri 
ek KHushi hum ne dil mein chahi thi wo bhi gham ki panah mein guzri 
zindagi apni ai 'shakil' ab tak talKHi-e-rasm-o-rah mein guzri

ummīd se kam chashm-e-ḳharīdār meñ aa.e ham log zarā der se bāzār meñ aa.e 
sach ḳhud se bhī ye log nahīñ bolne vaale ai ahl-e-junūñ tum yahāñ bekār meñ aa.e 
ye aag havas kī hai jhulas degī ise bhī sūraj se kaho sāya-e-dīvār meñ aa.e 
baḌhtī hī chalī jaatī hai tanhā.ī hamārī kyā soch ke ham vādī-e-inkār meñ aa.e 
ummid se kam chashm-e-KHaridar mein aae hum log zara der se bazar mein aae 
sach KHud se bhi ye log nahin bolne wale ai ahl-e-junun tum yahan bekar mein aae 
ye aag hawas ki hai jhulas degi ise bhi suraj se kaho saya-e-diwar mein aae 
baDhti hi chali jati hai tanhai hamari kya soch ke hum wadi-e-inkar mein aae

un kī be-ruḳhī meñ bhī iltifāt shāmil hai aaj kal mirī hālat dekhne ke qābil hai 
qatl ho to merā sā maut ho to merī sī mere sogvāroñ meñ aaj merā qātil hai 
har qadam pe nākāmī har qadam pe mahrūmī ġhāliban koī dushman dostoñ meñ shāmil hai 
muztarib haiñ maujeñ kyuuñ uTh rahe haiñ tūfāñ kyuuñ kyā kisī safīne ko ārzū-e-sāhil hai 
sirf rāhzan hī se kyuuñ 'amīr' shikva ho manziloñ kī rāhoñ meñ rāhbar bhī haa.il hai 
un ki be-ruKHi mein bhi iltifat shamil hai aaj kal meri haalat dekhne ke qabil hai 
qatl ho to mera sa maut ho to meri si mere sogwaron mein aaj mera qatil hai 
har qadam pe nakaami har qadam pe mahrumi ghaaliban koi dushman doston mein shamil hai 
muztarib hain maujen kyun uTh rahe hain tufan kyun kya kisi safine ko aarzu-e-sahil hai 
sirf rahzan hi se kyun 'amir' shikwa ho manzilon ki rahon mein rahbar bhi hail hai

yuuñ hasratoñ ke daaġh mohabbat meñ dho liye ḳhud dil se dil kī baat kahī aur ro liye 
ghar se chale the ham to ḳhushī kī talāsh meñ ġham raah meñ khaḌe the vahī saath ho liye 
murjhā chukā hai phir bhī ye dil phuul hī to hai ab aap kī ḳhushī ise kāñToñ meñ toliye 
hoñToñ ko sī chuke to zamāne ne ye kahā yuuñ chup sī kyuuñ lagī hai ajī kuchh to boliye 
yun hasraton ke dagh mohabbat mein dho liye KHud dil se dil ki baat kahi aur ro liye 
ghar se chale the hum to KHushi ki talash mein gham rah mein khaDe the wahi sath ho liye 
murjha chuka hai phir bhi ye dil phul hi to hai ab aap ki KHushi ise kanTon mein toliye 
honTon ko si chuke to zamane ne ye kaha yun chup si kyun lagi hai aji kuchh to boliye

ruḳh se parda uThā de zarā sāqiyā bas abhī rañg-e-mahfil badal jā.egā hai jo behosh vo hosh meñ aa.egā girne vaalā hai jo vo sambhal jā.egā 
log samjhe the ye inqilāb aate hī nazm-e-kohna chaman kā badal jā.egā ye ḳhabar kis ko thī ātish-e-gul se hī tinkā tinkā nasheman kā jal jā.egā 
tum tasallī na do sirf baiThe raho vaqt kuchh mere marne kā Tal jā.egā kyā ye kam hai masīhā ke rahne hī se maut kā bhī irāda badal jā.egā 
tiir kī jaañ hai dil dil kī jaañ tiir hai tiir ko yuuñ na khīñcho kahā maan lo tiir khīñchā to dil bhī nikal aa.egā dil jo niklā to dam bhī nikal jā.egā 
ek muddat huī us ko ro.e hue ek arsa huā muskurā.e hue zabt-e-ġham kā ab aur us se va.ada na ho varna bīmār kā dam nikal jā.egā 
apne parde kā rakhnā hai gar kuchh bharam sāmne aanā jaanā munāsib nahīñ ek vahshī se ye chheḌ achchhī nahīñ kyā karoge agar ye machal jā.egā 
apne va.ade kā ehsās hai to magar dekh kar tum ko aañsū umañD aa.e haiñ aur agar tum ko ye bhī gavārā nahīñ abr barse baġhair ab nikal jā.egā 
merā dāman to jal hī chukā hai magar aañch tum par bhī aa.e gavārā nahīñ mere aañsū na poñchho ḳhudā ke liye varna dāman tumhārā bhī jal jā.egā 
dil meñ taaza ġham-e-āshiyāñ hai abhī mere nāloñ se barham na sayyād ho dhīre dhīre ye aañsū bhī tham jā.eñge rafta rafta ye dil bhī bahal jā.egā 
merī fariyād se vo taḌap jā.eñge mere dil ko malāl is kā hogā magar kyā ye kam hai ki vo be-naqāb ā.eñge marne vaale kā armāñ nikal jā.egā 
phuul kuchh is tarah toḌ de bāġhbāñ shāḳh hilne na paa.e na āvāz ho varna gulshan pe raunaq na phir aa.egī dil agar har kisī kā dahal jā.egā 
us ke hañsne meñ rone kā andāz hai ḳhaak uḌāne meñ fariyād kā raaz hai us ko chheḌo na 'anvar' ḳhudā ke liye varna bīmār kā dam nikal jā.egā 
ruKH se parda uTha de zara saqiya bas abhi rang-e-mahfil badal jaega hai jo behosh wo hosh mein aaega girne wala hai jo wo sambhal jaega 
log samjhe the ye inqilab aate hi nazm-e-kohna chaman ka badal jaega ye KHabar kis ko thi aatish-e-gul se hi tinka tinka nasheman ka jal jaega 
tum tasalli na do sirf baiThe raho waqt kuchh mere marne ka Tal jaega kya ye kam hai masiha ke rahne hi se maut ka bhi irada badal jaega 
tir ki jaan hai dil dil ki jaan tir hai tir ko yun na khincho kaha man lo tir khincha to dil bhi nikal aaega dil jo nikla to dam bhi nikal jaega 
ek muddat hui us ko roe hue ek arsa hua muskurae hue zabt-e-gham ka ab aur us se wada na ho warna bimar ka dam nikal jaega 
apne parde ka rakhna hai gar kuchh bharam samne aana jaana munasib nahin ek wahshi se ye chheD achchhi nahin kya karoge agar ye machal jaega 
apne wade ka ehsas hai to magar dekh kar tum ko aansu umanD aae hain aur agar tum ko ye bhi gawara nahin abr barse baghair ab nikal jaega 
mera daman to jal hi chuka hai magar aanch tum par bhi aae gawara nahin mere aansu na ponchho KHuda ke liye warna daman tumhaara bhi jal jaega 
dil mein taza gham-e-ashiyan hai abhi mere nalon se barham na sayyaad ho dhire dhire ye aansu bhi tham jaenge rafta rafta ye dil bhi bahal jaega 
meri fariyaad se wo taDap jaenge mere dil ko malal is ka hoga magar kya ye kam hai ki wo be-naqab aaenge marne wale ka arman nikal jaega 
phul kuchh is tarah toD de baghban shaKH hilne na pae na aawaz ho warna gulshan pe raunaq na phir aaegi dil agar har kisi ka dahal jaega 
us ke hansne mein rone ka andaz hai KHak uDane mein fariyaad ka raaz hai us ko chheDo na 'anwar' KHuda ke liye warna bimar ka dam nikal jaega

us ko na ḳhayāl aa.e to ham muñh se kaheñ kyā vo bhī to mile ham se hamīñ us se mileñ kyā 
lashkar ko bachāeñgī ye do-chār safeñ kyā aur un meñ bhī har shaḳhs ye kahtā hai hameñ kyā 
ye to sabhī kahte haiñ koī fikr na karnā ye koī batātā nahīñ ham ko ki kareñ kyā 
ghar se to chale aate haiñ bāzār kī jānib bāzār meñ ye sochte phirte haiñ ki leñ kyā 
āñkhoñ ko kiye band paḌe rahte haiñ ham log is par bhī to ḳhvāboñ se haiñ mahrūm kareñ kyā 
do chaar nahīñ saiñkaḌoñ sher us pe kahe haiñ is par bhī vo samjhe na to qadmoñ pe jhukeñ kyā 
jismānī ta.alluq pe ye sharmindagī kaisī aapas meñ badan kuchh bhī kareñ is se hameñ kyā 
ḳhvāboñ se bhī milte nahīñ hālāt ke Dar se māthe se baḌī ho ga.iiñ yaaro shikaneñ kyā 
us ko na KHayal aae to hum munh se kahen kya wo bhi to mile hum se hamin us se milen kya 
lashkar ko bachaengi ye do-chaar safen kya aur un mein bhi har shaKHs ye kahta hai hamein kya 
ye to sabhi kahte hain koi fikr na karna ye koi batata nahin hum ko ki karen kya 
ghar se to chale aate hain bazar ki jaanib bazar mein ye sochte phirte hain ki len kya 
aankhon ko kiye band paDe rahte hain hum log is par bhi to KHwabon se hain mahrum karen kya 
do chaar nahin sainkaDon sher us pe kahe hain is par bhi wo samjhe na to qadmon pe jhuken kya 
jismani talluq pe ye sharmindagi kaisi aapas mein badan kuchh bhi karen is se hamein kya 
KHwabon se bhi milte nahin haalat ke Dar se mathe se baDi ho gain yaro shikanen kya

sau qissoñ se behtar hai kahānī mire dil kī sun us ko tū ai jaan zabānī mire dil kī 
har naale meñ yaañ TukḌe jigar hotā hai bulbul āsān nahīñ tarz uḌānī mire dil kī 
honī hai shahīd ek na ik roz tamannā mauqūf ho kyā marsiya-ḳhvānī mire dil kī 
piirī meñ bhī miltā hai jo kam-sin koī mahbūb kartī hai vahīñ uud javānī mire dil kī 
taqsīm kiye pāra-e-dil bazm-e-butāñ meñ har ek ke hai paas nishānī mire dil kī 
ik baat meñ ho jaa.e musaḳhḳhar vo parī-rū suntā hī nahīñ sehr-bayānī mire dil kī 
hai abr to kyā chāhe falak ko bhī jalā de bijlī meñ kahāñ shola-fishānī mire dil kī 
zulfoñ meñ kiyā qaid na abrū se kiyā qatl tū ne to koī baat na maanī mire dil kī 
ye bār-e-ġham-e-ishq samāyā hai ki 'nāsiḳh' hai koh se dah-chand girānī mire dil kī 
sau qisson se behtar hai kahani mere dil ki sun us ko tu ai jaan zabani mere dil ki 
har nale mein yan TukDe jigar hota hai bulbul aasan nahin tarz uDani mere dil ki 
honi hai shahid ek na ek roz tamanna mauquf ho kya marsiya-KHwani mere dil ki 
piri mein bhi milta hai jo kam-sin koi mahbub karti hai wahin ud jawani mere dil ki 
taqsim kiye para-e-dil bazm-e-butan mein har ek ke hai pas nishani mere dil ki 
ek baat mein ho jae musaKHKHar wo pari-ru sunta hi nahin sehr-bayani mere dil ki 
hai abr to kya chahe falak ko bhi jala de bijli mein kahan shola-fishani mere dil ki 
zulfon mein kiya qaid na abru se kiya qatl tu ne to koi baat na mani mere dil ki 
ye bar-e-gham-e-ishq samaya hai ki 'nasiKH' hai koh se dah-chand girani mere dil ki

havā-e-tez tirā ek kaam āḳhirī hai ki naḳhl-e-ḳhushk pe māh-e-tamām āḳhirī hai 
maiñ jis sukūn se baiThā huuñ is kināre par sukūñ se lagtā hai merā qayām āḳhirī hai 
phir is ke baa'd ye bāzār-e-dil nahīñ lagnā ḳharīd lījiye sāhib ġhulām āḳhirī hai 
guzar chalā huuñ kisī ko yaqīñ dilātā huā ki lauh-e-dil pe raqam hai jo naam āḳhirī hai 
tabhī to peḌ kī āñkhoñ meñ chāñd bhar aayā kisī ne kah diyā hogā ki shaam āḳhirī hai 
ye lag rahā hai mohabbat ke pahle ziine par ki jis maqām pe huuñ ye maqām āḳhirī hai 
kisī ne phir se khaḌe kar diye dar-o-dīvār ḳhayāl thā ki mirā inhidām āḳhirī hai

'firāq' ik na.ī sūrat nikal to saktī hai ba-qaul us aañkh ke duniyā badal to saktī hai

kisī bekas ko ai bedād gar maarā to kyā maarā jo aaphī mar rahā ho us ko gar maarā to kyā maarā 
na maarā aap ko jo ḳhaak ho iksīr ban jaatā agar paare ko ai iksīr gar maarā to kyā maarā 
baḌe muuzī ko maarā nafs-e-ammāra ko gar maarā nahang o azhdahā o sher-e-nar maarā to kyā maarā 
ḳhatā to dil kī thī qābil bahut sī maar khāne ke tirī zulfoñ ne mushkīñ bāñdh kar maarā to kyā maarā 
nahīñ vo qaul kā sachchā hamesha qaul de de kar jo us ne haath mere haath par maarā to kyā maarā 
tufañg o tiir to zāhir na thā kuchh paas qātil ke ilāhī us ne dil ko taak kar maarā to kyā maarā 
hañsī ke saath yaañ ronā hai misl-e-qulqul-e-mīnā kisī ne qahqaha ai be-ḳhabar maarā to kyā maarā 
mire aañsū hamesha haiñ ba-rañg-e-lāl-e-ġharq-e-ḳhūñ jo ġhota aab meñ tū ne guhar maarā to kyā maarā 
jigar dil donoñ pahlū meñ haiñ zaḳhmī us ne kyā jaane idhar maarā to kyā maarā udhar maarā to kyā maarā 
gayā shaitān maarā ek sajde ke na karne meñ agar lākhoñ baras sajde meñ sar maarā to kyā maarā 
dil-e-sangīn-e-ḳhusrau par bhī zarb ai kohkan pahuñchī agar tesha sar-e-kohsār par maarā to kyā maarā 
dil-e-bad-ḳhvāh meñ thā mārnā yā chashm-e-bad-bīñ meñ falak par 'zauq' tīr-e-āh gar maarā to kyā maarā 
kisi bekas ko ai bedad gar mara to kya mara jo aaphi mar raha ho us ko gar mara to kya mara 
na mara aap ko jo KHak ho iksir ban jata agar pare ko ai iksir gar mara to kya mara 
baDe muzi ko mara nafs-e-ammara ko gar mara nahang o azhdaha o sher-e-nar mara to kya mara 
KHata to dil ki thi qabil bahut si mar khane ke teri zulfon ne mushkin bandh kar mara to kya mara 
nahin wo qaul ka sachcha hamesha qaul de de kar jo us ne hath mere hath par mara to kya mara 
tufang o tir to zahir na tha kuchh pas qatil ke ilahi us ne dil ko tak kar mara to kya mara 
hansi ke sath yan rona hai misl-e-qulqul-e-mina kisi ne qahqaha ai be-KHabar mara to kya mara 
mere aansu hamesha hain ba-rang-e-lal-e-gharq-e-KHun jo ghota aab mein tu ne guhar mara to kya mara 
jigar dil donon pahlu mein hain zaKHmi us ne kya jaane idhar mara to kya mara udhar mara to kya mara

dil-e-sangin-e-KHusrau par bhi zarb ai kohkan pahunchi agar tesha sar-e-kohsar par mara to kya mara 
dil-e-bad-KHwah mein tha marna ya chashm-e-bad-bin mein falak par 'zauq' tir-e-ah gar mara to kya mara

chhāne haiñ tire ishq meñ āshufta-sarī ne duniyā-e-musībat ke bayābān hazāroñ 
ik baar thā sar gardan-e-'hasrat' pe raheñge qātil tirī shamshīr ke ehsān hazāroñ

bahut be-kār mausam hai magar kuchh kaam karnā hai ki taaza zaḳhm milne tak purānā zaḳhm bharnā hai 
abhī saada varaq par naam terā likh ke baiThā huuñ abhī is meñ mahak aanī hai titlī ne utarnā hai 
baḌhe jo habs to shāḳheñ hilā denā ki ab ham ko havā ke saath jiinā hai havā ke saath marnā hai 
mabādā us ko diqqat ho nishāne tak pahuñchne meñ so maiñ ne phuul se dīvār ke raḳhne ko bharnā hai 
yahī ik shaġhl rakhnā hai aziyyat ke dinoñ meñ bhī kisī ko bhuul jaanā hai kisī ko yaad karnā hai 
koī chehra na ban paayā muqaddar kī lakīroñ se so ab apnī hathelī meñ mujhe ḳhud rang bharnā hai 
koī rasta mile kyūñkar mire pā-e-ḳhajālat ko yahāñ to paañv dharnā bhī koī ilzām dharnā hai 
vo har lamha duā dete haiñ lambī umr kī 'tābish' mujhe lagtā hai pyāroñ ko bhī ruḳhsat maiñ ne karnā hai 
bahut be-kar mausam hai magar kuchh kaam karna hai ki taza zaKHm milne tak purana zaKHm bharna hai 
abhi sada waraq par nam tera likh ke baiTha hun abhi is mein mahak aani hai titli ne utarna hai 
baDhe jo habs to shaKHen hila dena ki ab hum ko hawa ke sath jina hai hawa ke sath marna hai 
mabaada us ko diqqat ho nishane tak pahunchne mein so main ne phul se diwar ke raKHne ko bharna hai 
yahi ek shaghl rakhna hai aziyyat ke dinon mein bhi kisi ko bhul jaana hai kisi ko yaad karna hai 
koi chehra na ban paya muqaddar ki lakiron se so ab apni hatheli mein mujhe KHud rang bharna hai 
koi rasta mile kyunkar mere pa-e-KHajalat ko yahan to panw dharna bhi koi ilzam dharna hai 
wo har lamha dua dete hain lambi umr ki 'tabish' mujhe lagta hai pyaron ko bhi ruKHsat main ne karna hai

ai ḳhudā ret ke sahrā ko samundar kar de yā chhalaktī huī āñkhoñ ko bhī patthar kar de 
tujh ko dekhā nahīñ mahsūs kiyā hai maiñ ne aa kisī din mire ehsās ko paikar kar de 
qaid hone se rahīñ niiñd kī chanchal pariyāñ chāhe jitnā bhī ġhilāfoñ ko mo.attar kar de

aur kuchh bhī mujhe darkār nahīñ hai lekin merī chādar mire pairoñ ke barābar kar de 
ai KHuda ret ke sahra ko samundar kar de ya chhalakti hui aankhon ko bhi patthar kar de

kisī sūrat bhī niiñd aatī nahīñ maiñ kaise so jā.ūñ koī shai dil ko bahlātī nahīñ maiñ kaise so jā.ūñ 
akelā pā ke mujh ko yaad un kī aa to jaatī hai magar phir lauT kar jaatī nahīñ maiñ kaise so jā.ūñ 
jo ḳhvāboñ meñ mire aa kar tasallī mujh ko detī thī vo sūrat ab nazar aatī nahīñ maiñ kaise so jā.ūñ 
tumhīñ to ho shab-e-ġham meñ jo merā saath dete ho sitāro tum ko niiñd aatī nahīñ maiñ kaise so jā.ūñ 
jise apnā samajhnā thā vo aañkh ab apnī dushman hai ki ye rone se baaz aatī nahīñ maiñ kaise so jā.ūñ 
tirī tasvīr jo TuuTe hue dil kā sahārā thī nazar vo saaf ab aatī nahīñ maiñ kaise so jā.ūñ 
ghaTā jo dil se uThtī hai mizha tak aa to jaatī hai magar aañkh us ko barsātī nahīñ maiñ kaise so jā.ūñ 
sitāre ye ḳhabar laa.e ki ab vo bhī pareshāñ haiñ sunā hai un ko niiñd aatī nahīñ maiñ kaise so jā.ūñ 
kisi surat bhi nind aati nahin main kaise so jaun koi shai dil ko bahlati nahin main kaise so jaun 
akela pa ke mujh ko yaad un ki aa to jati hai magar phir lauT kar jati nahin main kaise so jaun 
jo KHwabon mein mere aa kar tasalli mujh ko deti thi wo surat ab nazar aati nahin main kaise so jaun 
tumhin to ho shab-e-gham mein jo mera sath dete ho sitaro tum ko nind aati nahin main kaise so jaun 
jise apna samajhna tha wo aankh ab apni dushman hai ki ye rone se baz aati nahin main kaise so jaun 
teri taswir jo TuTe hue dil ka sahaara thi nazar wo saf ab aati nahin main kaise so jaun 
ghaTa jo dil se uThti hai mizha tak aa to jati hai magar aankh us ko barsati nahin main kaise so jaun 
sitare ye KHabar lae ki ab wo bhi pareshan hain suna hai un ko nind aati nahin main kaise so jaun

main jaan-ba-lab hun tark-e-talluq ke zahr se wo mutmain ki harf to us par na aaega

ishq tāsīr se naumed nahīñ jāñ-sapārī shajar-e-bed nahīñ 
saltanat dast-ba-dast aa.ī hai jām-e-mai ḳhātam-e-jamshed nahīñ 
hai tajallī tirī sāmān-e-vajūd zarra be-partav-e-ḳhurshed nahīñ 
rāz-e-māshūq na rusvā ho jaa.e varna mar jaane meñ kuchh bhed nahīñ 
gardish-e-rañg-e-tarab se Dar hai ġham-e-mahrūmi-e-jāved nahīñ 
kahte haiñ jiite haiñ ummed pe log ham ko jiine kī bhī ummed nahīñ 
ishq tasir se naumed nahin jaan-sapari shajar-e-bed nahin 
saltanat dast-ba-dast aai hai jam-e-mai KHatam-e-jamshed nahin 
hai tajalli teri saman-e-wajud zarra be-partaw-e-KHurshed nahin 
raaz-e-mashuq na ruswa ho jae warna mar jaane mein kuchh bhed nahin 
gardish-e-rang-e-tarab se Dar hai gham-e-mahrumi-e-jawed nahin 
kahte hain jite hain ummed pe log hum ko jine ki bhi ummed nahin

dīvār yaad aa ga.ī dar yaad aa gayā do gaam hī chale the ki ghar yaad aa gayā 
kuchh kahnā chāhte the ki ḳhāmosh ho ga.e dastār yaad aa ga.ī sar yaad aa gayā 
duniyā kī be-ruḳhī kā gila kar rahe the log ham ko tirā tapāk magar yaad aa gayā 
phir tīrgī-e-rāhguzar yaad aa ga.ī phir vo charāġh-e-rāhguzar yaad aa gayā 
'ajmal'-sirāj ham use bhūle hue to haiñ kyā jaane kyā kareñge agar yaad aa gayā 
diwar yaad aa gai dar yaad aa gaya do gam hi chale the ki ghar yaad aa gaya 
kuchh kahna chahte the ki KHamosh ho gae dastar yaad aa gai sar yaad aa gaya 
duniya ki be-ruKHi ka gila kar rahe the log hum ko tera tapak magar yaad aa gaya 
phir tirgi-e-rahguzar yaad aa gai phir wo charagh-e-rahguzar yaad aa gaya 
'ajmal'-siraj hum use bhule hue to hain kya jaane kya karenge agar yaad aa gaya

dīdār meñ ik turfa dīdār nazar aayā har baar chhupā koī har baar nazar aayā 
chhāloñ ko bayābāñ bhī gulzār nazar aayā jab chheḌ par āmāda har ḳhaar nazar aayā 
sub.h-e-shab-e-hijrāñ kī vo chāk-garebānī ik ālam-e-nairañgī har taar nazar aayā 
ho sabr ki betābī ummīd ki māyūsī nairañg-e-mohabbat bhī be-kār nazar aayā 
jab chashm-e-siyah terī thī chhā.ī huī dil par is mulk kā har ḳhitta tātār nazar aayā 
tū ne bhī to dekhī thī vo jaatī huī duniyā kyā āḳhrī lamhoñ meñ bīmār nazar aayā 
ġhash khā ke gire muusā allāh-rī māyūsī halkā sā vo parda bhī dīvār nazar aayā 
zarra ho ki qatra ho ḳhum-ḳhāna-e-hastī meñ maḳhmūr nazar aayā sarshār nazar aayā 
kyā kuchh na huā ġham se kyā kuchh na kiyā ġham ne aur yuuñ to huā jo kuchh be-kār nazar aayā 
ai ishq qasam tujh ko ma.amūra-e-ālam kī koī ġham-e-furqat meñ ġham-ḳhvār nazar aayā 
shab kaT ga.ī furqat kī dekhā na 'firāq' āḳhir tūl-e-ġham-e-hijrāñ bhī be-kār nazar aayā 
didar mein ek turfa didar nazar aaya har bar chhupa koi har bar nazar aaya 
chhaalon ko bayaban bhi gulzar nazar aaya jab chheD par aamada har KHar nazar aaya 
subh-e-shab-e-hijran ki wo chaak-garebani ek aalam-e-nairangi har tar nazar aaya 
ho sabr ki betabi ummid ki mayusi nairang-e-mohabbat bhi be-kar nazar aaya 
jab chashm-e-siyah teri thi chhai hui dil par is mulk ka har KHitta tatar nazar aaya 
tu ne bhi to dekhi thi wo jati hui duniya kya aaKHri lamhon mein bimar nazar aaya 
ghash kha ke gire musa allah-ri mayusi halka sa wo parda bhi diwar nazar aaya 
zarra ho ki qatra ho KHum-KHana-e-hasti mein maKHmur nazar aaya sarshaar nazar aaya 
kya kuchh na hua gham se kya kuchh na kiya gham ne aur yun to hua jo kuchh be-kar nazar aaya 
ai ishq qasam tujh ko mamura-e-alam ki koi gham-e-furqat mein gham-KHwar nazar aaya 
shab kaT gai furqat ki dekha na 'firaq' aaKHir tul-e-gham-e-hijran bhi be-kar nazar aaya

ham ne kis din tire kūche meñ guzārā na kiyā tū ne ai shoḳh magar kaam hamārā na kiyā 
ek hī baar huiiñ vaj.h-e-giraftārī-e-dil iltifāt un kī nigāhoñ ne dubārā na kiyā 
mahfil-e-yār kī rah jā.egī aadhī raunaq naaz ko us ne agar anjuman-ārā na kiyā 
tān-e-ahbāb sune sarzanish-e-ḳhalq sahī ham ne kyā kyā tirī ḳhātir se gavārā na kiyā 
jab diyā tum ne raqīboñ ko diyā jām-e-sharāb bhuul kar bhī mirī jānib ko ishārā na kiyā 
rū-ba-rū chashm-e-tasavvur ke vo har vaqt rahe na sahī aañkh ne gar un kā nazārā na kiyā 
gar yahī hai sitam-e-yār to ham ne 'hasrat' na kiyā kuchh bhī jo duniyā se kinārā na kiyā 
hum ne kis din tere kuche mein guzara na kiya tu ne ai shoKH magar kaam hamara na kiya 
ek hi bar huin wajh-e-giraftari-e-dil iltifat un ki nigahon ne dubara na kiya 
mahfil-e-yar ki rah jaegi aadhi raunaq naz ko us ne agar anjuman-ara na kiya 
tan-e-ahbab sune sarzanish-e-KHalq sahi hum ne kya kya teri KHatir se gawara na kiya 
jab diya tum ne raqibon ko diya jam-e-sharab bhul kar bhi meri jaanib ko ishaara na kiya 
ru-ba-ru chashm-e-tasawwur ke wo har waqt rahe na sahi aankh ne gar un ka nazara na kiya 
gar yahi hai sitam-e-yar to hum ne 'hasrat' na kiya kuchh bhi jo duniya se kinara na kiya

maiñ pā sakā na kabhī is ḳhalish se chhuTkārā vo mujh se jiit bhī saktā thā jaane kyuuñ haarā 
baras ke khul ga.e aañsū nithar ga.ī hai fazā chamak rahā hai sar-e-shām dard kā taarā 
kisī kī aañkh se Tapkā thā ik amānat hai mirī hathelī pe rakkhā huā ye añgārā 
jo par sameTe to ik shāḳh bhī nahīñ paa.ī khule the par to mirā āsmān thā saarā 
vo saañp chhoḌ de Dasnā ye maiñ bhī kahtā huuñ magar na chhoḌeñge log us ko gar na phunkārā 
main pa saka na kabhi is KHalish se chhuTkara wo mujh se jit bhi sakta tha jaane kyun haara 
baras ke khul gae aansu nithar gai hai faza chamak raha hai sar-e-sham dard ka tara 
kisi ki aankh se Tapka tha ek amanat hai meri hatheli pe rakkha hua ye angara 
jo par sameTe to ek shaKH bhi nahin pai khule the par to mera aasman tha sara 
wo sanp chhoD de Dasna ye main bhi kahta hun magar na chhoDenge log us ko gar na phunkara

hameñ to ḳhvāhish-e-duniyā ne rusvā kar diyā hai bahut tanhā the us ne aur tanhā kar diyā hai 
ab aksar aa.ine meñ apnā chehra DhūñDte haiñ ham aise to nahīñ the tū ne jaisā kar diyā hai 
dhaḌaktī qurbatoñ ke ḳhvāb se jaage to jaanā zarā se vasl ne kitnā akelā kar diyā hai 
agarche dil meñ gunjā.ish nahīñ thī phir bhī ham ne tire ġham ke liye us ko kushāda kar diyā hai 
tire dukh meñ hamāre baal chāñdī ho ga.e haiñ aur is chāñdī ne qabl az vaqt būḌhā kar diyā hai 
ta'alluq toḌne meñ pahl mushkil marhala thā chalo ham ne tumhārā bojh halkā kar diyā hai 
ġham-e-duniyā ġham-e-jāñ se judā hone lagā thā 'hasan' ham ne magar donoñ ko yakjā kar diyā hai 
hamein to KHwahish-e-duniya ne ruswa kar diya hai bahut tanha the us ne aur tanha kar diya hai 
ab aksar aaine mein apna chehra DhunDte hain hum aise to nahin the tu ne jaisa kar diya hai 
dhaDakti qurbaton ke KHwab se jage to jaana zara se wasl ne kitna akela kar diya hai 
agarche dil mein gunjaish nahin thi phir bhi hum ne tere gham ke liye us ko kushada kar diya hai 
tere dukh mein hamare baal chandi ho gae hain aur is chandi ne qabl az waqt buDha kar diya hai 
ta'alluq toDne mein pahl mushkil marhala tha chalo hum ne tumhaara bojh halka kar diya hai 
gham-e-duniya gham-e-jaan se juda hone laga tha 'hasan' hum ne magar donon ko yakja kar diya hai

koī is dil kā haal kyā jaane ek ḳhvāhish hazār tah-ḳhāne 
maut ne aaj ḳhud-kushī kar lī ziist par kyā banī ḳhudā jaane 
phir huā koī bad-gumāñ ham se phir janam le rahe haiñ afsāne 
vaqt ne ye kahā hai ruk ruk kar aaj ke dost kal ke begāne 
duur se ek chīḳh ubhrī thī ban ga.e be-shumār afsāne 
ziist ke shor-o-shar meñ Duub ga.e vaqt ko nāpne ke paimāne 
kitnā mushkil hai manziloñ kā husūl kitne āsāñ haiñ jaal phailāne 
raaz ye hai ki koī raaz nahīñ log phir bhī mujhe na pahchāne 
koi is dil ka haal kya jaane ek KHwahish hazar tah-KHane 
maut ne aaj KHud-kushi kar li zist par kya bani KHuda jaane 
phir hua koi bad-guman hum se phir janam le rahe hain afsane 
waqt ne ye kaha hai ruk ruk kar aaj ke dost kal ke begane 
dur se ek chiKH ubhri thi ban gae be-shumar afsane 
zist ke shor-o-shar mein Dub gae waqt ko napne ke paimane 
kitna mushkil hai manzilon ka husul kitne aasan hain jal phailane 
raaz ye hai ki koi raaz nahin log phir bhi mujhe na pahchane

pyaar kī na.ī dastak dil pe phir sunā.ī dī chāñd sī koī sūrat ḳhvāb meñ dikhā.ī dī 
kis ne merī palkoñ pe titliyoñ ke par rakkhe aaj apnī aahaT bhī der tak sunā.ī dī 
ham ġharīb logoñ ke aaj bhī vahī din haiñ pahle kyā asīrī thī aaj kyā rihā.ī dī 
bārishoñ ke chehre par āñsuoñ se likhnā hai kuchh na koī paḌh paa.e aisī raushnā.ī dī 
āsmāñ zamīñ rakh kar donoñ ek muTThī meñ ik zarā sī laḌkī ne pyaar kī ḳhudā.ī dī 
ye tunak-mizājī to ḳhair us kī fitrat hai varna us ne chāhat bhī ham ko intihā.ī dī 
ye tanāv qudrat ne do diloñ meñ kyuuñ rakkhā mujh ko kaj-kulāhī dī us ko kaj-adā.ī dī 
pyar ki nai dastak dil pe phir sunai di chand si koi surat KHwab mein dikhai di 
kis ne meri palkon pe titliyon ke par rakkhe aaj apni aahaT bhi der tak sunai di 
hum gharib logon ke aaj bhi wahi din hain pahle kya asiri thi aaj kya rihai di 
barishon ke chehre par aansuon se likhna hai kuchh na koi paDh pae aisi raushnai di 
aasman zamin rakh kar donon ek muTThi mein ek zara si laDki ne pyar ki KHudai di 
ye tunak-mizaji to KHair us ki fitrat hai warna us ne chahat bhi hum ko intihai di 
ye tanaw qudrat ne do dilon mein kyun rakkha mujh ko kaj-kulahi di us ko kaj-adai di

apnā to ye kaam hai bhaa.ī dil kā ḳhuun bahāte rahnā jaag jaag kar in rātoñ meñ sher kī aag jalāte rahnā 
apne gharoñ se duur banoñ meñ phirte hue āvāra logo kabhī kabhī jab vaqt mile to apne ghar bhī jaate rahnā 
raat ke dasht meñ phuul khile haiñ bhūlī-bisrī yādoñ ke ġham kī tez sharāb se un ke tīkhe naqsh miTāte rahnā 
ḳhushbū kī dīvār ke pīchhe kaise kaise rang jame haiñ jab tak din kā sūraj aa.e us kā khoj lagāte rahnā 
tum bhī 'munīr' ab un galiyoñ se apne aap ko duur hī rakhnā achchhā hai jhūTe logoñ se apnā-āp bachāte rahnā 
apna to ye kaam hai bhai dil ka KHun bahate rahna jag jag kar in raaton mein sher ki aag jalate rahna 
apne gharon se dur banon mein phirte hue aawara logo kabhi kabhi jab waqt mile to apne ghar bhi jate rahna 
raat ke dasht mein phul khile hain bhuli-bisri yaadon ke gham ki tez sharab se un ke tikhe naqsh miTate rahna 
KHushbu ki diwar ke pichhe kaise kaise rang jame hain jab tak din ka suraj aae us ka khoj lagate rahna 
tum bhi 'munir' ab un galiyon se apne aap ko dur hi rakhna achchha hai jhuTe logon se apna-ap bachate rahna

ai ahl-e-vafā dād-e-jafā kyuuñ nahīñ dete so.e hue zaḳhmoñ ko jagā kyuuñ nahīñ dete 
is jashn-e-charāġhāñ se to behtar the añdhere in jhūTe charāġhoñ ko bujhā kyuuñ nahīñ dete 
jis meñ na koī rañg na āhañg na ḳhushbū tum aise gulistāñ ko jalā kyuuñ nahīñ dete 
dīvār kā ye uzr sunā jā.egā kab tak dīvār agar hai to girā kyuuñ nahīñ dete 
chehroñ pe jo Daale hue baiThe haiñ naqābeñ un logoñ ko mahfil se uThā kyuuñ nahīñ dete 
tauba kā yahī vaqt hai kyā soch rahe ho sajde meñ jabīnoñ ko jhukā kyuuñ nahīñ dete 
ye jhūTe ḳhudā mil ke Dubo deñge safīna tum hādī-e-bar-haq ko sadā kyuuñ nahīñ dete 
ai ahl-e-wafa dad-e-jafa kyun nahin dete soe hue zaKHmon ko jaga kyun nahin dete 
is jashn-e-charaghan se to behtar the andhere in jhuTe charaghon ko bujha kyun nahin dete 
jis mein na koi rang na aahang na KHushbu tum aise gulistan ko jala kyun nahin dete 
diwar ka ye uzr suna jaega kab tak diwar agar hai to gira kyun nahin dete 
chehron pe jo Dale hue baiThe hain naqaben un logon ko mahfil se uTha kyun nahin dete 
tauba ka yahi waqt hai kya soch rahe ho sajde mein jabinon ko jhuka kyun nahin dete 
ye jhuTe KHuda mil ke Dubo denge safina tum hadi-e-bar-haq ko sada kyun nahin dete

kahāñ tak vaqt ke dariyā ko ham Thahrā huā dekheñ ye hasrat hai ki in āñkhoñ se kuchh hotā huā dekheñ 
bahut muddat huī ye aarzū karte hue ham ko kabhī manzar kahīñ ham koī an-dekhā huā dekheñ 
sukūt-e-shām se pahle kī manzil saḳht hotī hai kaho logoñ se sūraj ko na yuuñ Dhaltā huā dekheñ 
havā.eñ bādbāñ kholīñ lahū-āsār bārish ho zamīn-e-saḳht tujh ko phūltā-phaltā huā dekheñ 
dhueñ ke bādaloñ meñ chhup ga.e ujle makāñ saare ye chāhā thā ki manzar shahr kā badlā huā dekheñ 
hamārī be-hisī pe rone vaalā bhī nahīñ koī chalo jaldī chalo phir shahr ko jaltā huā dekheñ 
kahan tak waqt ke dariya ko hum Thahra hua dekhen ye hasrat hai ki in aankhon se kuchh hota hua dekhen 
bahut muddat hui ye aarzu karte hue hum ko kabhi manzar kahin hum koi an-dekha hua dekhen 
sukut-e-sham se pahle ki manzil saKHt hoti hai kaho logon se suraj ko na yun Dhalta hua dekhen 
hawaen baadban kholin lahu-asar barish ho zamin-e-saKHt tujh ko phulta-phalta hua dekhen 
dhuen ke baadalon mein chhup gae ujle makan sare ye chaha tha ki manzar shahr ka badla hua dekhen 
hamari be-hisi pe rone wala bhi nahin koi chalo jaldi chalo phir shahr ko jalta hua dekhen

misāl is kī kahāñ hai koī zamāne meñ ki saare khone ke ġham paa.e ham ne paane meñ 
vo shakl pighlī to har shai meñ Dhal ga.ī jaise ajiib baat huī hai use bhulāne meñ 
jo muntazir na milā vo to ham haiñ sharminda ki ham ne der lagā dī palaT ke aane meñ 
latīf thā vo taḳhayyul se ḳhvāb se nāzuk gañvā diyā use ham ne hī āzmāne meñ 
samajh liyā thā kabhī ik sarāb ko dariyā par ik sukūn thā ham ko fareb khāne meñ 
jhukā daraḳht havā se to āñdhiyoñ ne kahā ziyāda farq nahīñ jhukne TuuT jaane meñ 
misal is ki kahan hai koi zamane mein ki sare khone ke gham pae hum ne pane mein 
wo shakl pighli to har shai mein Dhal gai jaise ajib baat hui hai use bhulane mein 
jo muntazir na mila wo to hum hain sharminda ki hum ne der laga di palaT ke aane mein 
latif tha wo taKHayyul se KHwab se nazuk ganwa diya use hum ne hi aazmane mein 
samajh liya tha kabhi ek sarab ko dariya par ek sukun tha hum ko fareb khane mein 
jhuka daraKHt hawa se to aandhiyon ne kaha ziyaada farq nahin jhukne TuT jaane mein

umr meñ us se baḌī thī lekin pahle TuuT ke bikhrī maiñ sāhil sāhil jazbe the aur dariyā dariyā pahuñchī maiñ 
shahr meñ us ke naam ke jitne shaḳhs the sab hī achchhe the sub.h-e-safar to dhund bahut thī dhūpeñ ban kar niklī maiñ 
us kī hathelī ke dāman meñ saare mausam simTe the us ke haath meñ jaagī maiñ aur us ke haath se ujlī maiñ 
ik muTThī tārīkī meñ thā ik muTThī se baḌh kar pyaar lams ke jugnū pallū bāñdhe ziina ziina utrī maiñ 
us ke āñgan meñ khultā thā shahr-e-murād kā darvāza kueñ ke paas se ḳhālī gāgar haath meñ le kar palTī maiñ 
maiñ ne jo sochā thā yuuñ to us ne bhī vahī sochā thā din niklā to vo bhī nahīñ thā aur maujūd nahīñ thī maiñ 
lamha lamha jaañ pighlegī qatra qatra shab hogī apne haath larazte dekhe apne-āp hī sambhalī maiñ 
umr mein us se baDi thi lekin pahle TuT ke bikhri main sahil sahil jazbe the aur dariya dariya pahunchi main 
shahr mein us ke nam ke jitne shaKHs the sab hi achchhe the subh-e-safar to dhund bahut thi dhupen ban kar nikli main 
us ki hatheli ke daman mein sare mausam simTe the us ke hath mein jagi main aur us ke hath se ujli main 
ek muTThi tariki mein tha ek muTThi se baDh kar pyar lams ke jugnu pallu bandhe zina zina utri main 
us ke aangan mein khulta tha shahr-e-murad ka darwaza kuen ke pas se KHali gagar hath mein le kar palTi main 
main ne jo socha tha yun to us ne bhi wahi socha tha din nikla to wo bhi nahin tha aur maujud nahin thi main 
lamha lamha jaan pighlegi qatra qatra shab hogi apne hath larazte dekhe apne-ap hi sambhali main

yā rab mirī hayāt se ġham kā asar na jaa.e jab tak kisī kī zulf-e-pareshāñ sañvar na jaa.e 
vo aañkh kyā jo aariz o ruḳh par Thahar na jaa.e vo jalva kyā jo diida o dil meñ utar na jaa.e 
mere junūñ ko zulf ke saa.e se duur rakh raste meñ chhāñv pā ke musāfir Thahar na jaa.e 
maiñ aaj gulsitāñ meñ bulā luuñ bahār ko lekin ye chāhtā huuñ ḳhizāñ ruuTh kar na jaa.e 
paidā hue haiñ ab to masīhā na.e na.e bīmār apnī maut se pahle hī mar na jaa.e 
kar lī hai tauba is liye vaa.iz ke sāmne ilzām-e-tishnagī mire saaqī ke sar na jaa.e 
saaqī pilā sharāb magar ye rahe ḳhayāl ālām-e-rozgār kā chehrā utar na jaa.e 
maiñ us ke sāmne se guzartā huuñ is liye tark-e-ta.alluqāt kā ehsās mar na jaa.e 
masrūr-e-dīd-e-husn hai is vāste 'fanā' duniyā ke aib par kabhī merī nazar na jaa.e 
ya rab meri hayat se gham ka asar na jae jab tak kisi ki zulf-e-pareshan sanwar na jae 
wo aankh kya jo aariz o ruKH par Thahar na jae wo jalwa kya jo dida o dil mein utar na jae 
mere junun ko zulf ke sae se dur rakh raste mein chhanw pa ke musafir Thahar na jae 
main aaj gulsitan mein bula lun bahaar ko lekin ye chahta hun KHizan ruTh kar na jae 
paida hue hain ab to masiha nae nae bimar apni maut se pahle hi mar na jae 
kar li hai tauba is liye waiz ke samne ilzam-e-tishnagi mere saqi ke sar na jae 
saqi pila sharab magar ye rahe KHayal aalam-e-rozgar ka chehra utar na jae 
main us ke samne se guzarta hun is liye tark-e-talluqat ka ehsas mar na jae 
masrur-e-did-e-husn hai is waste 'fana' duniya ke aib par kabhi meri nazar na jae

aañkh uThā.ī hī thī ki khaa.ī choT bach ga.ī aañkh dil pe aa.ī choT 
dard-e-dil kī unheñ ḳhabar kyā ho jāntā kaun hai parā.ī choT 
aa.ī tanhā na ḳhāna-e-dil meñ dard ko apne saath laa.ī choT 
teġh thī haath meñ na ḳhanjar thā us ne kyā jaane kyā lagā.ī choT 
yuuñ na qātil ko jab yaqīñ aayā ham ne dil khol kar dikhā.ī choT 
aur kyā karte ham balā-kash-e-ġham jo paḌī dil pe vo uThā.ī choT 
kahīñ chhuptī bhī hai lagī dil kī laakh 'fānī' ne go chhupā.ī choT 
aankh uThai hi thi ki khai choT bach gai aankh dil pe aai choT 
dard-e-dil ki unhen KHabar kya ho jaanta kaun hai parai choT 
aai tanha na KHana-e-dil mein dard ko apne sath lai choT 
tegh thi hath mein na KHanjar tha us ne kya jaane kya lagai choT 
yun na qatil ko jab yaqin aaya hum ne dil khol kar dikhai choT 
aur kya karte hum bala-kash-e-gham jo paDi dil pe wo uThai choT

shikve ke naam se be-mehr ḳhafā hotā hai ye bhī mat kah ki jo kahiye to gila hotā hai 
pur huuñ maiñ shikve se yuuñ raag se jaise baajā ik zarā chheḌiye phir dekhiye kyā hotā hai 
go samajhtā nahīñ par husn-e-talāfī dekho shikva-e-jaur se sargarm-e-jafā hotā hai 
ishq kī raah meñ hai charḳh-e-makaukab kī vo chaal sust-rau jaise koī ābla-pā hotā hai 
kyuuñ na Thahreñ hadaf-e-nāvak-e-bedād ki ham aap uThā laate haiñ gar tiir ḳhatā hotā hai 
ḳhuub thā pahle se hote jo ham apne bad-ḳhvāh ki bhalā chāhte haiñ aur burā hotā hai 
naala jaatā thā pare arsh se merā aur ab lab tak aatā hai jo aisā hī rasā hotā hai 
ḳhāma merā ki vo hai bār-bud-e-bazm-e-suḳhan shaah kī mad.h meñ yuuñ naġhma-sarā hotā hai 
ai shahanshāh-e-kavākib sipah-o-mehr-e-alam tere ikrām kā haq kis se adā hotā hai 
saat aqlīm kā hāsil jo farāham kiije to vo lashkar kā tire nāl-e-bahā hotā hai 
har mahīne meñ jo ye badr se hotā hai hilāl āstāñ par tire mah nāsiya sā hotā hai 
maiñ jo gustāḳh huuñ ā.īn-e-ġhazal-ḳhvānī meñ ye bhī terā hī karam zauq-fazā hotā hai 
rakhiyo 'ġhālib' mujhe is talḳh-navā.ī meñ muaaf aaj kuchh dard mire dil meñ sivā hotā hai 
shikwe ke nam se be-mehr KHafa hota hai ye bhi mat kah ki jo kahiye to gila hota hai 
pur hun main shikwe se yun rag se jaise baja ek zara chheDiye phir dekhiye kya hota hai 
go samajhta nahin par husn-e-talafi dekho shikwa-e-jaur se sargarm-e-jafa hota hai 
ishq ki rah mein hai charKH-e-makaukab ki wo chaal sust-rau jaise koi aabla-pa hota hai 
kyun na Thahren hadaf-e-nawak-e-bedad ki hum aap uTha late hain gar tir KHata hota hai 
KHub tha pahle se hote jo hum apne bad-KHwah ki bhala chahte hain aur bura hota hai 
nala jata tha pare arsh se mera aur ab lab tak aata hai jo aisa hi rasa hota hai 
KHama mera ki wo hai bar-bud-e-bazm-e-suKHan shah ki madh mein yun naghma-sara hota hai 
ai shahanshah-e-kawakib sipah-o-mehr-e-alam tere ikram ka haq kis se ada hota hai 
sat aqlim ka hasil jo faraham kije to wo lashkar ka tere nal-e-baha hota hai 
har mahine mein jo ye badr se hota hai hilal aastan par tere mah nasiya sa hota hai 
main jo gustaKH hun aain-e-ghazal-KHwani mein ye bhi tera hi karam zauq-faza hota hai 
rakhiyo 'ghaalib' mujhe is talKH-nawai mein muaf aaj kuchh dard mere dil mein siwa hota hai

koī bijlī in ḳharāboñ meñ ghaTā raushan kare ai añdherī bastiyo tum ko ḳhudā raushan kare 
nanhe hoñToñ par khileñ māsūm lafzoñ ke gulāb aur māthe par koī harf-e-duā raushan kare 
zard chehroñ par bhī chamke surḳh jazboñ kī dhanak sāñvle hāthoñ ko bhī rañg-e-hinā raushan kare 
ek laḌkā shahr kī raunaq meñ sab kuchh bhuul jaa.e ek buḌhiyā roz chaukhaT par diyā raushan kare 
ḳhair agar tum se na jal paa.eñ vafāoñ ke charāġh tum bujhānā mat jo koī dūsrā raushan kare 
aag jaltī chhoḌ aa.e ho to ab kyā fikr hai jaane kitne shahr ye pāgal havā raushan kare 
dil hī fānūs-e-havā dil hī ḳhas-o-ḳhār-e-havas dekhnā ye hai ki us kā qurb kyā raushan kare 
yā to is jangal meñ nikle chāñd tere naam kā yā mirā hī lafz merā rāstā raushan kare 
koi bijli in KHarabon mein ghaTa raushan kare ai andheri bastiyo tum ko KHuda raushan kare 
nanhe honTon par khilen masum lafzon ke gulab aur mathe par koi harf-e-dua raushan kare 
zard chehron par bhi chamke surKH jazbon ki dhanak sanwle hathon ko bhi rang-e-hina raushan kare 
ek laDka shahr ki raunaq mein sab kuchh bhul jae ek buDhiya roz chaukhaT par diya raushan kare 
KHair agar tum se na jal paen wafaon ke charagh tum bujhana mat jo koi dusra raushan kare 
aag jalti chhoD aae ho to ab kya fikr hai jaane kitne shahr ye pagal hawa raushan kare 
dil hi fanus-e-hawa dil hi KHas-o-KHar-e-hawas dekhna ye hai ki us ka qurb kya raushan kare 
ya to is jangal mein nikle chand tere nam ka ya mera hi lafz mera rasta raushan kare

sunsān rāstoñ se savārī na aa.egī ab dhuul se aTī huī laarī na aa.egī 
chhappar ke chā.e-ḳhāne bhī ab ūñghne lage paidal chalo ki koī savārī na aa.egī 
tahrīr o guftugū meñ kise DhūñDte haiñ log tasvīr meñ bhī shakl hamārī na aa.egī 
sar par zamīn le ke havāoñ ke saath jā āhista chalne vaale kī baarī na aa.egī 
pahchān apnī ham ne miTā.ī hai is tarah bachchoñ meñ koī baat hamārī na aa.egī 
sunsan raston se sawari na aaegi ab dhul se aTi hui lari na aaegi 
chhappar ke chae-KHane bhi ab unghne lage paidal chalo ki koi sawari na aaegi 
tahrir o guftugu mein kise DhunDte hain log taswir mein bhi shakl hamari na aaegi 
sar par zamin le ke hawaon ke sath ja aahista chalne wale ki bari na aaegi 
pahchan apni hum ne miTai hai is tarah bachchon mein koi baat hamari na aaegi

kahīñ se maut ko laao ki ġham kī raat kaTe mirā hī sog manāo ki ġham kī raat kaTe 
kare na pīchhā mirā zindagī ko samjhā do ye raah us ko bhulāo ki ġham kī raat kaTe 
kaho bahāroñ se ab shāḳh-e-dil na hogī harī ḳhizāñ ke giit sunāo ki ġham kī raat kaTe 
na chāra-gar kī zarūrat na kuchh davā kī hai duā ko haath uThāo ki ġham kī raat kaTe 
kahin se maut ko lao ki gham ki raat kaTe mera hi sog manao ki gham ki raat kaTe 
kare na pichha mera zindagi ko samjha do ye rah us ko bhulao ki gham ki raat kaTe 
kaho bahaaron se ab shaKH-e-dil na hogi hari KHizan ke git sunao ki gham ki raat kaTe 
na chaara-gar ki zarurat na kuchh dawa ki hai dua ko hath uThao ki gham ki raat kaTe

dukhe hue haiñ hameñ aur ab dukhāo mat jo ho ga.e ho fasāna to yaad aao mat 
ḳhayāl-o-ḳhvāb meñ parchhā.iyāñ sī nāchtī haiñ ab is tarah to mirī ruuh meñ samāo mat 
zamīñ ke log to kyā do diloñ kī chāhat meñ ḳhudā bhī ho to use darmiyān laao mat 
tumhārā sar nahīñ tiflān-e-rah-guzar ke liye dayār-e-sañg meñ ghar se nikal ke jaao mat 
sivā.e apne kisī ke bhī ho nahīñ sakte ham aur log haiñ logo hameñ satāo mat 
hamāre ahd meñ ye rasm-e-āshiqī Thahrī faqīr ban ke raho aur sadā lagāo mat 
vahī likho jo lahū kī zabāñ se miltā hai suḳhan ko parda-e-alfāz meñ chhupāo mat 
supurd kar hī diyā ātish-e-hunar ke to phir tamām ḳhaak hī ho jaao kuchh bachāo mat 
dukhe hue hain hamein aur ab dukhao mat jo ho gae ho fasana to yaad aao mat 
KHayal-o-KHwab mein parchhaiyan si nachti hain ab is tarah to meri ruh mein samao mat 
zamin ke log to kya do dilon ki chahat mein KHuda bhi ho to use darmiyan lao mat 
tumhaara sar nahin tiflan-e-rah-guzar ke liye dayar-e-sang mein ghar se nikal ke jao mat 
siwae apne kisi ke bhi ho nahin sakte hum aur log hain logo hamein satao mat 
hamare ahd mein ye rasm-e-ashiqi Thahri faqir ban ke raho aur sada lagao mat 
wahi likho jo lahu ki zaban se milta hai suKHan ko parda-e-alfaz mein chhupao mat 
supurd kar hi diya aatish-e-hunar ke to phir tamam KHak hi ho jao kuchh bachao mat

kuchh mauj-e-havā pechāñ ai 'mīr' nazar aa.ī shāyad ki bahār aa.ī zanjīr nazar aa.ī 
dillī ke na the kūche aurāq-e-musavvar the jo shakl nazar aa.ī tasvīr nazar aa.ī 
maġhrūr bahut the ham aañsū kī sarāyat par so sub.h ke hone ko tāsīr nazar aa.ī 
gul-bār kare haigā asbāb-e-safar shāyad ġhunche kī tarah bulbul dil-gīr nazar aa.ī 
us kī to dil-āzārī be-hech hī thī yaaro kuchh tum ko hamārī bhī taqsīr nazar aa.ī 
kuchh mauj-e-hawa pechan ai 'mir' nazar aai shayad ki bahaar aai zanjir nazar aai 
dilli ke na the kuche auraq-e-musawwar the jo shakl nazar aai taswir nazar aai 
maghrur bahut the hum aansu ki sarayat par so subh ke hone ko tasir nazar aai 
gul-bar kare haiga asbab-e-safar shayad ghunche ki tarah bulbul dil-gir nazar aai 
us ki to dil-azari be-hech hi thi yaro kuchh tum ko hamari bhi taqsir nazar aai

taqdīr kī gardish kyā kam thī is par ye qayāmat kar baiThe be-tābi-e-dil jab had se baḌhī ghabrā ke mohabbat kar baiThe 
āñkhoñ meñ chhalakte haiñ aañsū dil chupke chupke rotā hai vo baat hamāre bas kī na thī jis baat kī himmat kar baiThe 
ġham ham ne ḳhushī se mol liyā us par bhī huī ye nādānī jab dil kī umīdeñ TuuT ga.iiñ qismat se shikāyat kar baiThe 
taqdir ki gardish kya kam thi is par ye qayamat kar baiThe be-tabi-e-dil jab had se baDhi ghabra ke mohabbat kar baiThe 
aankhon mein chhalakte hain aansu dil chupke chupke rota hai wo baat hamare bas ki na thi jis baat ki himmat kar baiThe 
gham hum ne KHushi se mol liya us par bhi hui ye nadani jab dil ki umiden TuT gain qismat se shikayat kar baiThe

ai husn-e-yār sharm ye kyā inqalāb hai tujh se ziyāda dard tirā kāmyāb hai 
āshiq kī be-dilī kā taġhāful nahīñ javāb us kā bas ek josh-e-mohabbat javāb hai 
terī ināyateñ ki nahīñ nazr-e-jāñ qubūl terī navāzisheñ ki zamāna ḳharāb hai 
ai husn apnī hausla-afzā.iyāñ to dekh maanā ki chashm-e-shauq bahut be-hijāb hai 
maiñ ishq-e-be-niyāz huuñ tum husn-e-be-panāh merā javāb hai na tumhārā javāb hai 
mai-ḳhāna hai usī kā ye duniyā usī kī hai jis tishna-lab ke haath meñ jām-e-sharāb hai 
us se dil-e-tabāh kī rūdād kyā kahūñ jo ye na sun sake ki zamāna ḳharāb hai 
ai mohtasib na pheñk mire mohtasib na pheñk zālim sharāb hai are zālim sharāb hai 
apne hudūd se na baḌhe koī ishq meñ jo zarra jis jagah hai vahīñ āftāb hai 
vo laakh sāmne hoñ magar is kā kyā ilaaj dil māntā nahīñ ki nazar kāmyāb hai 
merī nigāh-e-shauq bhī kuchh kam nahīñ magar phir bhī tirā shabāb tirā hī shabāb hai 
mānūs-e-e'tibār-e-karam kyuuñ kiyā mujhe ab har ḳhatā-e-shauq isī kā javāb hai 
maiñ us kā ā.īna huuñ vo hai merā ā.īna merī nazar se us kī nazar kāmyāb hai 
tanhā.ī-e-firāq ke qurbān jā.iye maiñ huuñ ḳhayāl-e-yār hai chashm-e-pur-āb hai 
sarmāya-e-firāq 'jigar' aah kuchh na pūchh ab jaan hai so apne liye ḳhud azaab hai 
ai husn-e-yar sharm ye kya inqalab hai tujh se ziyaada dard tera kaamyab hai 
aashiq ki be-dili ka taghaful nahin jawab us ka bas ek josh-e-mohabbat jawab hai 
teri inayaten ki nahin nazr-e-jaan qubul teri nawazishen ki zamana KHarab hai 
ai husn apni hausla-afzaiyan to dekh mana ki chashm-e-shauq bahut be-hijab hai 
main ishq-e-be-niyaz hun tum husn-e-be-panah mera jawab hai na tumhaara jawab hai 
mai-KHana hai usi ka ye duniya usi ki hai jis tishna-lab ke hath mein jam-e-sharab hai 
us se dil-e-tabah ki rudad kya kahun jo ye na sun sake ki zamana KHarab hai 
ai mohtasib na phenk mere mohtasib na phenk zalim sharab hai are zalim sharab hai 
apne hudud se na baDhe koi ishq mein jo zarra jis jagah hai wahin aaftab hai 
wo lakh samne hon magar is ka kya ilaj dil manta nahin ki nazar kaamyab hai 
meri nigah-e-shauq bhi kuchh kam nahin magar phir bhi tera shabab tera hi shabab hai 
manus-e-e'tibar-e-karam kyun kiya mujhe ab har KHata-e-shauq isi ka jawab hai 
main us ka aaina hun wo hai mera aaina meri nazar se us ki nazar kaamyab hai 
tanhai-e-firaq ke qurban jaiye main hun KHayal-e-yar hai chashm-e-pur-ab hai 
sarmaya-e-firaq 'jigar' aah kuchh na puchh ab jaan hai so apne liye KHud azab hai

kis fikr kis ḳhayāl meñ khoyā huā sā hai dil aaj terī yaad ko bhūlā huā sā hai 
gulshan meñ is tarah se kab aa.ī thī fasl-e-gul har phuul apnī shāḳh se TuuTā huā sā hai 
chal chal ke thak gayā hai ki manzil nahīñ koī kyuuñ vaqt ek moḌ pe Thahrā huā sā hai 
kyā hādisa huā hai jahāñ meñ ki aaj phir chehra har ek shaḳhs kā utrā huā sā hai 
nazrāna tere husn ko kyā deñ ki apne paas le de ke ek dil hai so TuuTā huā sā hai 
pahle the jo bhī aaj magar kārobār-e-ishq duniyā ke kārobār se miltā huā sā hai 
lagtā hai us kī bātoñ se ye 'shahryār' bhī yāroñ ke iltifāt kā maarā huā sā hai 
kis fikr kis KHayal mein khoya hua sa hai dil aaj teri yaad ko bhula hua sa hai 
gulshan mein is tarah se kab aai thi fasl-e-gul har phul apni shaKH se TuTa hua sa hai 
chal chal ke thak gaya hai ki manzil nahin koi kyun waqt ek moD pe Thahra hua sa hai 
kya hadisa hua hai jahan mein ki aaj phir chehra har ek shaKHs ka utra hua sa hai 
nazrana tere husn ko kya den ki apne pas le de ke ek dil hai so TuTa hua sa hai 
pahle the jo bhi aaj magar karobar-e-ishq duniya ke karobar se milta hua sa hai 
lagta hai us ki baaton se ye 'shahryar' bhi yaron ke iltifat ka mara hua sa hai

dīdār kī havas hai na shauq-e-visāl hai āzād har ḳhayāl se mast-e-ḳhayāl hai 
kah do ye kohkan se ki marnā nahīñ kamāl mar mar ke hijr-e-yār meñ jiinā kamāl hai 
fatvā diyā hai muftī-e-abr-e-bahār ne tauba kā ḳhuun bāda-kashoñ ko halāl hai 
āñkheñ batā rahī haiñ ki jaage ho raat ko in sāġharoñ meñ bū-e-sharāb-e-visāl hai 
barsāo tiir mujh pe magar itnā jaan lo pahlū meñ dil hai dil meñ tumhārā ḳhayāl hai 
āñkheñ laḌā ke un se ham aafat meñ paḌ ga.e palkoñ kī har zabān pe dil kā savāl hai 
but kah diyā jo maiñ ne to ab bolte nahīñ itnī sī baat kā tumheñ itnā ḳhayāl hai 
maiñ dāman-e-niyāz meñ ashk-e-chakīda huuñ koī uThā ke dekh le uThnā muhāl hai 
pūchhā jo un se jānte ho tum 'jalīl' ko bole ki haañ vo shā.er-e-nāzuk-ḳhayāl hai 
didar ki hawas hai na shauq-e-visal hai aazad har KHayal se mast-e-KHayal hai 
kah do ye kohkan se ki marna nahin kamal mar mar ke hijr-e-yar mein jina kamal hai 
fatwa diya hai mufti-e-abr-e-bahaar ne tauba ka KHun baada-kashon ko halal hai 
aankhen bata rahi hain ki jage ho raat ko in sagharon mein bu-e-sharab-e-visal hai 
barsao tir mujh pe magar itna jaan lo pahlu mein dil hai dil mein tumhaara KHayal hai 
aankhen laDa ke un se hum aafat mein paD gae palkon ki har zaban pe dil ka sawal hai 
but kah diya jo main ne to ab bolte nahin itni si baat ka tumhein itna KHayal hai 
main daman-e-niyaz mein ashk-e-chakida hun koi uTha ke dekh le uThna muhaal hai 
puchha jo un se jaante ho tum 'jalil' ko bole ki han wo shaer-e-nazuk-KHayal hai

mohabbat kī duniyā meñ mash.hūr kar duuñ mirī sāda-dil tujh ko maġhrūr kar duuñ 
tire dil ko milne kī ḳhud aarzū ho tujhe is qadar ġham se ranjūr kar duuñ 
mujhe zindagī duur rakhtī hai tujh se jo tū paas ho to use duur kar duuñ 
mohabbat ke iqrār se sharm kab tak kabhī sāmnā ho to majbūr kar duuñ 
mire dil meñ hai shola-e-husn raqsāñ maiñ chāhūñ to har zarre ko tuur kar duuñ 
ye be-rañgiyāñ kab tak ai husn-e-rañgīñ idhar aa tujhe ishq meñ chuur kar duuñ 
tū gar sāmne ho to maiñ be-ḳhudī meñ sitāroñ ko sajde pe majbūr kar duuñ 
siyah-ḳhāna-e-ġham hai saaqī zamāna bas ik jaam aur nuur hī nuur kar duuñ 
nahīñ zindagī ko vafā varna 'aḳhtar' mohabbat se duniyā ko māmūr kar duuñ 
mohabbat ki duniya mein mashhur kar dun meri sada-dil tujh ko maghrur kar dun 
tere dil ko milne ki KHud aarzu ho tujhe is qadar gham se ranjur kar dun 
mujhe zindagi dur rakhti hai tujh se jo tu pas ho to use dur kar dun 
mohabbat ke iqrar se sharm kab tak kabhi samna ho to majbur kar dun 
mere dil mein hai shola-e-husn raqsan main chahun to har zarre ko tur kar dun 
ye be-rangiyan kab tak ai husn-e-rangin idhar aa tujhe ishq mein chur kar dun 
tu gar samne ho to main be-KHudi mein sitaron ko sajde pe majbur kar dun 
siyah-KHana-e-gham hai saqi zamana bas ek jam aur nur hi nur kar dun 
nahin zindagi ko wafa warna 'aKHtar' mohabbat se duniya ko mamur kar dun

aate hī tū ne ghar ke phir jaane kī sunā.ī rah jā.ūñ sun na kyūñkar ye to burī sunā.ī 
majnūñ o kohkan ke sunte the yaar qisse jab tak kahānī ham ne apnī na thī sunā.ī 
shikva kiyā jo ham ne gaalī kā aaj us se shikve ke saath us ne ik aur bhī sunā.ī 
kuchh kah rahā hai nāseh kyā jaane kyā kahegā detā nahīñ mujhe to ai be-ḳhudī sunā.ī 
kahne na paa.e us se saarī haqīqat ik din aadhī kabhī sunā.ī aadhī kabhī sunā.ī 
sūrat dikhā.e apnī dekheñ vo kis tarah se āvāz bhī na ham ko jis ne kabhī sunā.ī 
qīmat meñ jins-e-dil kī māñgā jo 'zauq' bosa kyā kyā na us ne ham ko khoTī-kharī sunā.ī 
aate hi tu ne ghar ke phir jaane ki sunai rah jaun sun na kyunkar ye to buri sunai 
majnun o kohkan ke sunte the yar qisse jab tak kahani hum ne apni na thi sunai 
shikwa kiya jo hum ne gali ka aaj us se shikwe ke sath us ne ek aur bhi sunai 
kuchh kah raha hai naseh kya jaane kya kahega deta nahin mujhe to ai be-KHudi sunai 
kahne na pae us se sari haqiqat ek din aadhi kabhi sunai aadhi kabhi sunai 
surat dikhae apni dekhen wo kis tarah se aawaz bhi na hum ko jis ne kabhi sunai 
qimat mein jins-e-dil ki manga jo 'zauq' bosa kya kya na us ne hum ko khoTi-khari sunai

dil ko bhī ġham kā salīqa na thā pahle pahle us ko bhī bhūlnā achchhā lagā pahle pahle 
dil thā shab-zād use kis kī rifāqat miltī ḳhvāb tā'bīr se chhuptā rahā pahle pahle 
pahle pahle vahī andāz thā dariyā jaisā paas aa aa ke palaTtā rahā pahle pahle 
aañkh ā.īnoñ kī hairat nahīñ jaatī ab tak hijr kā ghaav bhī us ne diyā pahle pahle 
khel karne ko bahut the dil-e-ḳhvāhish-dīda kyuuñ havā dekh jalāyā diyā pahle pahle 
umr-e-ā.inda ke ḳhvāboñ ko pyāsā rakkhā fāsla paañv pakaḌtā rahā pahle pahle 
nāḳhun-e-be-ḳhabarī zaḳhm banātā hī rahā kū-e-vahshat meñ to rasta na thā pahle pahle 
ab to us shaḳhs kā paikar bhī gul-e-ḳhvāb nahīñ jo kabhī mujh meñ thā mujh jaisā thā pahle pahle 
ab vo pyāsā hai to har buuñd bhī pūchhe nisbat vo jo dariyāoñ pe hañstā rahā pahle pahle 
vo mulāqāt kā mausam nahīñ aayā ab ke jo sar-e-ḳhvāb sañvartā rahā pahle pahle 
ġham kā dariyā mirī āñkhoñ meñ simaT kar pūchhe kaun ro ro ke bichhaḌtā rahā pahle pahle 
ab jo āñkheñ huiiñ sahrā to khulā har manzar dil bhī vahshat ko tarastā rahā pahle pahle 
maiñ thī dīvār to ab kis kā hai saaya tujh par aisā sahrā-zada chehrā na thā pahle pahle 
dil ko bhi gham ka saliqa na tha pahle pahle us ko bhi bhulna achchha laga pahle pahle 
dil tha shab-zad use kis ki rifaqat milti KHwab ta'bir se chhupta raha pahle pahle 
pahle pahle wahi andaz tha dariya jaisa pas aa aa ke palaTta raha pahle pahle 
aankh aainon ki hairat nahin jati ab tak hijr ka ghaw bhi us ne diya pahle pahle 
khel karne ko bahut the dil-e-KHwahish-dida kyun hawa dekh jalaya diya pahle pahle 
umr-e-ainda ke KHwabon ko pyasa rakkha fasla panw pakaDta raha pahle pahle 
naKHun-e-be-KHabari zaKHm banata hi raha ku-e-wahshat mein to rasta na tha pahle pahle 
ab to us shaKHs ka paikar bhi gul-e-KHwab nahin jo kabhi mujh mein tha mujh jaisa tha pahle pahle 
ab wo pyasa hai to har bund bhi puchhe nisbat wo jo dariyaon pe hansta raha pahle pahle 
wo mulaqat ka mausam nahin aaya ab ke jo sar-e-KHwab sanwarta raha pahle pahle 
gham ka dariya meri aankhon mein simaT kar puchhe kaun ro ro ke bichhaDta raha pahle pahle 
ab jo aankhen huin sahra to khula har manzar dil bhi wahshat ko tarasta raha pahle pahle 
main thi diwar to ab kis ka hai saya tujh par aisa sahra-zada chehra na tha pahle pahle

Duub kar bhī na paḌā farq girāñ-jānī meñ maiñ huuñ patthar kī tarah bahte hue paanī meñ 
ye mohabbat to bahut baa'd kā qissa hai miyāñ maiñ ne us haath ko pakḌā thā pareshānī meñ 
raftagāñ tum ne abas Dhoñg rachāyā varna ishq ko daḳhl nahīñ maut kī arzānī meñ 
ye mohabbat bhī vilāyat kī tarah rakhtī hai hālat-e-hāl meñ ye hālat-e-hairānī meñ 
is liye jal ke kabhī raakh nahīñ hotā dil ye kabhī aag meñ hotā hai kabhī paanī meñ 
ik mohabbat hī pe mauqūf nahīñ hai 'tābish' kuchh baḌe faisle ho jaate haiñ nādānī meñ 
Dub kar bhi na paDa farq giran-jaani mein main hun patthar ki tarah bahte hue pani mein 
ye mohabbat to bahut ba'd ka qissa hai miyan main ne us hath ko pakDa tha pareshani mein 
raftagan tum ne abas Dhong rachaya warna ishq ko daKHl nahin maut ki arzani mein 
ye mohabbat bhi wilayat ki tarah rakhti hai haalat-e-haal mein ye haalat-e-hairani mein 
is liye jal ke kabhi rakh nahin hota dil ye kabhi aag mein hota hai kabhi pani mein 
ek mohabbat hi pe mauquf nahin hai 'tabish' kuchh baDe faisle ho jate hain nadani mein

aao tum hī karo masīhā.ī ab bahaltī nahīñ hai tanhā.ī 
tum ga.e the to saath le jaate ab ye kis kaam kī hai bīnā.ī 
ham ki the lazzat-e-hayāt meñ gum jaañ se ik mauj-e-tishnagī aa.ī 
ham-safar ḳhush na ho mohabbat se jaane ham kis ke hoñ tamannā.ī 
koī dīvāna kahtā jaatā thā zindagī ye nahīñ mire bhaa.ī 
avval-e-ishq meñ ḳhabar bhī na thī izzateñ baḳhshtī hai rusvā.ī 
kaise paao mujhe jo tum dekho sat.h-e-sāhil se merī gahrā.ī 
jin meñ ham khel kar javān hue vahī galiyāñ huiiñ tamāshā.ī 
aao tum hi karo masihai ab bahalti nahin hai tanhai 
tum gae the to sath le jate ab ye kis kaam ki hai binai 
hum ki the lazzat-e-hayat mein gum jaan se ek mauj-e-tishnagi aai 
ham-safar KHush na ho mohabbat se jaane hum kis ke hon tamannai 
koi diwana kahta jata tha zindagi ye nahin mere bhai 
awwal-e-ishq mein KHabar bhi na thi izzaten baKHshti hai ruswai 
kaise pao mujhe jo tum dekho sath-e-sahil se meri gahrai 
jin mein hum khel kar jawan hue wahi galiyan huin tamashai

har ghar meñ koī tah-ḳhāna hotā hai tah-ḳhāne meñ ik afsāna hotā hai 
kisī purānī almārī ke ḳhānoñ meñ yādoñ kā anmol ḳhazāna hotā hai 
raat ga.e aksar dil ke vīrānoñ meñ ik saa.e kā aanā jaanā hotā hai 
baḌhtī jaatī hai bechainī nāḳhun kī jaise jaise zaḳhm purānā hotā hai 
dil rotā hai chehrā hañstā rahtā hai kaisā kaisā farz nibhānā hotā hai 
zinda rahne kī ḳhātir in āñkhoñ meñ koī na koī ḳhvāb sajānā hotā hai 
tanhā.ī kā zahr to vo bhī piite haiñ jin logoñ ke saath zamāna hotā hai 
sahrā se bastī meñ aa kar bhed khulā dil ke andar hī vīrāna hotā hai 
sarmastī meñ yaad nahīñ rakhtā koī bazm se uTh kar vāpas jaanā hotā hai 
har ghar mein koi tah-KHana hota hai tah-KHane mein ek afsana hota hai 
kisi purani almari ke KHanon mein yaadon ka anmol KHazana hota hai 
raat gae aksar dil ke viranon mein ek sae ka aana jaana hota hai 
baDhti jati hai bechaini naKHun ki jaise jaise zaKHm purana hota hai 
dil rota hai chehra hansta rahta hai kaisa kaisa farz nibhana hota hai 
zinda rahne ki KHatir in aankhon mein koi na koi KHwab sajaana hota hai 
tanhai ka zahr to wo bhi pite hain jin logon ke sath zamana hota hai 
sahra se basti mein aa kar bhed khula dil ke andar hi virana hota hai 
sarmasti mein yaad nahin rakhta koi bazm se uTh kar wapas jaana hota hai

āsmāñ tak jo naala pahuñchā hai dil kī gahrā.iyoñ se niklā hai 
merī nazroñ meñ hashr bhī kyā hai maiñ ne un kā jalāl dekhā hai 
jalva-e-tūr ḳhvāb-e-mūsā hai kis ne dekhā hai kis ko dekhā hai 
haa.e anjām is safīne kā nāḳhudā ne jise Duboyā hai 
aah kyā dil meñ ab lahū bhī nahīñ aaj ashkoñ kā rañg phīkā hai 
jab bhī āñkheñ milīñ un āñkhoñ se dil ne dil kā mizāj pūchhā hai 
vo javānī ki thī harīf-e-tarab aaj barbād-e-jām-o-sahbā hai 
kaun uTh kar chalā muqābil se jis taraf dekhiye añdherā hai 
phir mirī aañkh ho ga.ī namnāk phir kisī ne mizāj pūchhā hai 
sach to ye hai 'majāz' kī duniyā husn aur ishq ke sivā kyā hai 
aasman tak jo nala pahuncha hai dil ki gahraiyon se nikla hai 
meri nazron mein hashr bhi kya hai main ne un ka jalal dekha hai 
jalwa-e-tur KHwab-e-musa hai kis ne dekha hai kis ko dekha hai 
hae anjam is safine ka naKHuda ne jise Duboya hai 
aah kya dil mein ab lahu bhi nahin aaj ashkon ka rang phika hai 
jab bhi aankhen milin un aankhon se dil ne dil ka mizaj puchha hai 
wo jawani ki thi harif-e-tarab aaj barbaad-e-jam-o-sahba hai 
kaun uTh kar chala muqabil se jis taraf dekhiye andhera hai 
phir meri aankh ho gai namnak phir kisi ne mizaj puchha hai 
sach to ye hai 'majaz' ki duniya husn aur ishq ke siwa kya hai

guzar ga.e haiñ jo din un ko yaad karnā kyā ye zindagī ke liye roz roz marnā kyā 
mirī nazar meñ ga.e mausamoñ ke rañg bhī haiñ jo aane vaale haiñ un mausamoñ se Darnā kyā 
bujhe hue dar-o-dīvār ko bhī raunaq de ye ḳhvāb ban ke mirī aañkh se guzarnā kyā 
misāl-e-ashk sar-e-dāman-e-hayāt huuñ maiñ mirī ravānī hī kyā aur mirā Thaharnā kyā 
hujūm-e-jalva se jis raah par charāġhāñ thā jo bujh ga.ī hai to us raah se guzarnā kyā 
misāl-e-naqsh-e-qadam apnī hairatoñ meñ huuñ gum vo jā chukā hai to phir intizār karnā kyā 
guzar rahī hai ġhanīmat hai zindagī maanā magar ye ek hī andāz se guzarnā kyā 
guzar gae hain jo din un ko yaad karna kya ye zindagi ke liye roz roz marna kya 
meri nazar mein gae mausamon ke rang bhi hain jo aane wale hain un mausamon se Darna kya 
bujhe hue dar-o-diwar ko bhi raunaq de ye KHwab ban ke meri aankh se guzarna kya 
misal-e-ashk sar-e-daman-e-hayat hun main meri rawani hi kya aur mera Thaharna kya 
hujum-e-jalwa se jis rah par charaghan tha jo bujh gai hai to us rah se guzarna kya 
misal-e-naqsh-e-qadam apni hairaton mein hun gum wo ja chuka hai to phir intizar karna kya 
guzar rahi hai ghanimat hai zindagi mana magar ye ek hi andaz se guzarna kya

girte hue jab maiñ ne tirā naam liyā hai manzil ne vahīñ baḌh ke mujhe thaam liyā hai 
mai-ḳhvār to hai mohtasib-e-shahr ziyāda rindoñ ne yūñhī muft meñ ilzām liyā hai 
vo mil na sake yaad to hai un kī salāmat is yaad se bhī ham ne bahut kaam liyā hai 
har marhala-e-ġham meñ milī is se tasallī har moḌ pe ghabrā ke tirā naam liyā hai 
tujh sā koī rahbar nahīñ ai dūrī-e-manzil ehsān tirā ham ne bahar-gām liyā hai 
ai shaiḳh dil-e-sāf yūñhī to nahīñ miltā ham ne asar-e-rū-e-dil-ārām liyā hai 
sajdoñ meñ vo pahlī se halāvat nahīñ 'kausar' jab se asar-e-gardish-e-ayyām liyā hai 
girte hue jab main ne tera nam liya hai manzil ne wahin baDh ke mujhe tham liya hai 
mai-KHwar to hai mohtasib-e-shahr ziyaada rindon ne yunhi muft mein ilzam liya hai 
wo mil na sake yaad to hai un ki salamat is yaad se bhi hum ne bahut kaam liya hai 
har marhala-e-gham mein mili is se tasalli har moD pe ghabra ke tera nam liya hai 
tujh sa koi rahbar nahin ai duri-e-manzil ehsan tera hum ne bahar-gam liya hai 
ai shaiKH dil-e-saf yunhi to nahin milta hum ne asar-e-ru-e-dil-aram liya hai 
sajdon mein wo pahli se halawat nahin 'kausar' jab se asar-e-gardish-e-ayyam liya hai

jaane kis kī thī ḳhatā yaad nahīñ ham hue kaise judā yaad nahīñ 
ek sho.ala sā uThā thā dil meñ jaane kis kī thī sadā yaad nahīñ 
ek naġhma sā sunā thā maiñ ne kaun thā sho.ala-navā yaad nahīñ 
roz dohrāte the afsāna-e-dil kis tarah bhuul gayā yaad nahīñ 
ik faqat yaad hai jaanā un kā aur kuchh is ke sivā yaad nahīñ 
tū mirī jān-e-tamannā thī kabhī ai mirī jān-e-vafā yaad nahīñ 
ham bhī the terī tarah āvāra kyā tujhe bād-e-sabā yaad nahīñ 
ham bhī the terī navāoñ meñ sharīk tā.ir-e-naġhma-sarā yaad nahīñ 
hāl-e-dil kaise 'tabassum' ho bayāñ jaane kyā yaad hai kyā yaad nahīñ 
jaane kis ki thi KHata yaad nahin hum hue kaise juda yaad nahin 
ek shoala sa uTha tha dil mein jaane kis ki thi sada yaad nahin 
ek naghma sa suna tha main ne kaun tha shoala-nawa yaad nahin 
roz dohraate the afsana-e-dil kis tarah bhul gaya yaad nahin 
ek faqat yaad hai jaana un ka aur kuchh is ke siwa yaad nahin 
tu meri jaan-e-tamanna thi kabhi ai meri jaan-e-wafa yaad nahin 
hum bhi the teri tarah aawara kya tujhe baad-e-saba yaad nahin 
hum bhi the teri nawaon mein sharik tair-e-naghma-sara yaad nahin 
haal-e-dil kaise 'tabassum' ho bayan jaane kya yaad hai kya yaad nahin

hañs rahā thā maiñ bahut go vaqt vo rone kā thā saḳht kitnā marhala tujh se judā hone kā thā 
rat-jage taqsīm kartī phir rahī haiñ shahr meñ shauq jin āñkhoñ ko kal tak raat meñ sone kā thā 
is safar meñ bas mirī tanhā.ī mere saath thī har qadam kyuuñ ḳhauf mujh ko bhiiḌ meñ khone kā thā 
har bun-e-mū se darindoñ kī sadā aane lagī kaam hī aisā badan meñ ḳhvāhisheñ bone kā thā 
maiñ ne jab se ye sunā hai ḳhud se bhī nādim huuñ maiñ zikr tujh hoñToñ pe mere dar-ba-dar hone kā thā 
hans raha tha main bahut go waqt wo rone ka tha saKHt kitna marhala tujh se juda hone ka tha 
rat-jage taqsim karti phir rahi hain shahr mein shauq jin aankhon ko kal tak raat mein sone ka tha 
is safar mein bas meri tanhai mere sath thi har qadam kyun KHauf mujh ko bhiD mein khone ka tha 
har bun-e-mu se darindon ki sada aane lagi kaam hi aisa badan mein KHwahishen bone ka tha 
main ne jab se ye suna hai KHud se bhi nadim hun main zikr tujh honTon pe mere dar-ba-dar hone ka tha

koī dhun ho maiñ tire giit hī gaa.e jā.ūñ dard siine meñ uThe shor machā.e jā.ūñ 
ḳhvāb ban kar tū barastā rahe shabnam shabnam aur bas maiñ isī mausam meñ nahā.e jā.ūñ 
tere hī rañg utarte chale jaa.eñ mujh meñ ḳhud ko likkhūñ tirī tasvīr banā.e jā.ūñ 
jis ko milnā nahīñ phir us se mohabbat kaisī sochtā jā.ūñ magar dil meñ basā.e jā.ūñ 
ab tū us kī huī jis pe mujhe pyaar aatā hai zindagī aa tujhe siine se lagā.e jā.ūñ 
yahī chehre mire hone kī gavāhī deñge har na.e harf meñ jaañ apnī samā.e jā.ūñ 
jaan to chiiz hai kyā rishta-e-jāñ se aage koī āvāz diye jaa.e maiñ aa.e jā.ūñ 
shāyad is raah pe kuchh aur bhī raahī aa.eñ dhuup meñ chaltā rahūñ saa.e bichhā.e jā.ūñ 
ahl-e-dil hoñge to samjheñge suḳhan ko mere bazm meñ aa hī gayā huuñ to sunā.e jā.ūñ 
koi dhun ho main tere git hi gae jaun dard sine mein uThe shor machae jaun 
KHwab ban kar tu barasta rahe shabnam shabnam aur bas main isi mausam mein nahae jaun 
tere hi rang utarte chale jaen mujh mein KHud ko likkhun teri taswir banae jaun 
jis ko milna nahin phir us se mohabbat kaisi sochta jaun magar dil mein basae jaun 
ab tu us ki hui jis pe mujhe pyar aata hai zindagi aa tujhe sine se lagae jaun 
yahi chehre mere hone ki gawahi denge har nae harf mein jaan apni samae jaun 
jaan to chiz hai kya rishta-e-jaan se aage koi aawaz diye jae main aae jaun 
shayad is rah pe kuchh aur bhi rahi aaen dhup mein chalta rahun sae bichhae jaun 
ahl-e-dil honge to samjhenge suKHan ko mere bazm mein aa hi gaya hun to sunae jaun

achchhā hai vo bīmār jo achchhā nahīñ hotā jab tajribe hote haiñ to dhokā nahīñ hotā 
jis lafz ko maiñ toḌ ke ḳhud TuuT gayā huuñ kahtā bhī to vo us ko gavārā nahīñ hotā 
terī hī tarah aatā hai āñkhoñ meñ tirā ḳhvāb sachchā nahīñ hotā kabhī jhūTā nahīñ hotā 
takzīb-e-junūñ ke liye ik shak hī bahut hai bārish kā samay ho to sitārā nahīñ hotā 
kyā kyā dar-o-dīvār mirī ḳhaak meñ gum haiñ par us ko mirā jism gavārā nahīñ hotā 
yā dil nahīñ hotā mire hone ke sabab se yā dil ke sabab se mirā honā nahīñ hotā 
kis ruḳh se tayaqqun ko tabī.at meñ jagah deñ aisā nahīñ hotā kabhī vaisā nahīñ hotā 
ham log jo karte haiñ vo hotā hī nahīñ hai honā jo nazar aatā hai honā nahīñ hotā 
jis din ke guzarte hī yahāñ raat huī hai ai kaash vo din maiñ ne guzārā nahīñ hotā 
jab ham nahīñ hote yahāñ aate haiñ taġhayyur jab ham yahāñ hote haiñ zamānā nahīñ hotā 
ham un meñ haiñ jin kī koī hastī nahīñ hotī ham TuuT bhī jaa.eñ to tamāshā nahīñ hotā 
achchha hai wo bimar jo achchha nahin hota jab tajribe hote hain to dhoka nahin hota 
jis lafz ko main toD ke KHud TuT gaya hun kahta bhi to wo us ko gawara nahin hota 
teri hi tarah aata hai aankhon mein tera KHwab sachcha nahin hota kabhi jhuTa nahin hota 
takzib-e-junun ke liye ek shak hi bahut hai barish ka samay ho to sitara nahin hota 
kya kya dar-o-diwar meri KHak mein gum hain par us ko mera jism gawara nahin hota 
ya dil nahin hota mere hone ke sabab se ya dil ke sabab se mera hona nahin hota 
kis ruKH se tayaqqun ko tabiat mein jagah den aisa nahin hota kabhi waisa nahin hota 
hum log jo karte hain wo hota hi nahin hai hona jo nazar aata hai hona nahin hota 
jis din ke guzarte hi yahan raat hui hai ai kash wo din main ne guzara nahin hota 
jab hum nahin hote yahan aate hain taghayyur jab hum yahan hote hain zamana nahin hota 
hum un mein hain jin ki koi hasti nahin hoti hum TuT bhi jaen to tamasha nahin hota

ishq thā aur aqīdat se milā karte the pahle ham log mohabbat se milā karte the 
roz hī saa.e bulāte the hameñ apnī taraf roz ham dhuup kī shiddat se milā karte the 
sirf rasta hī nahīñ dekh ke ḳhush hotā thā dar-o-dīvār bhī hasrat se milā karte the 
ab to milne ke liye vaqt nahīñ miltā hai varna ham kitnī suhulat se milā karte the 
ishq tha aur aqidat se mila karte the pahle hum log mohabbat se mila karte the 
roz hi sae bulate the hamein apni taraf roz hum dhup ki shiddat se mila karte the 
sirf rasta hi nahin dekh ke KHush hota tha dar-o-diwar bhi hasrat se mila karte the 
ab to milne ke liye waqt nahin milta hai warna hum kitni suhulat se mila karte the

tujh se ab aur mohabbat nahīñ kī jā saktī ḳhud ko itnī bhī aziyyat nahīñ dī jā saktī 
jānte haiñ ki yaqīñ TuuT rahā hai dil par phir bhī ab tark ye vahshat nahīñ kī jā saktī 
habs kā shahr hai aur us meñ kisī bhī sūrat saañs lene kī sahūlat nahīñ dī jā saktī 
raushnī ke liye darvāza khulā rakhnā hai shab se ab koī ijāzat nahīñ lī jā saktī 
ishq ne hijr kā āzār to de rakkhā hai is se baḌh kar to ri.āyat nahīñ dī jā saktī 
tujh se ab aur mohabbat nahin ki ja sakti KHud ko itni bhi aziyyat nahin di ja sakti 
jaante hain ki yaqin TuT raha hai dil par phir bhi ab tark ye wahshat nahin ki ja sakti 
habs ka shahr hai aur us mein kisi bhi surat sans lene ki sahulat nahin di ja sakti 
raushni ke liye darwaza khula rakhna hai shab se ab koi ijazat nahin li ja sakti 
ishq ne hijr ka aazar to de rakkha hai is se baDh kar to riayat nahin di ja sakti

fāsle ke ma.anī kā kyuuñ fareb khāte ho jitne duur jaate ho utne paas aate ho 
raat TuuT paḌtī hai jab sukūt-e-zindāñ par tum mire ḳhayāloñ meñ chhup ke gungunāte ho 
merī ḳhalvat-e-ġham ke āhanī darīchoñ par apnī muskurāhaT kī mish.aleñ jalāte ho
