jab tanī salāḳhoñ se jhāñktī hai tanhā.ī dil kī tarah pahlū se lag ke baiTh jaate ho 
tum mire irādoñ ke Dolte sitāroñ ko yaas ke ḳhalāoñ meñ rāsta dikhāte ho 
kitne yaad aate ho pūchhte ho kyuuñ mujh se jitnā yaad karte ho utne yaad aate ho 
fasle ke mani ka kyun fareb khate ho jitne dur jate ho utne pas aate ho 
raat TuT paDti hai jab sukut-e-zindan par tum mere KHayalon mein chhup ke gungunate ho 
meri KHalwat-e-gham ke aahani darichon par apni muskurahaT ki mishalen jalate ho 
jab tani salaKHon se jhankti hai tanhai dil ki tarah pahlu se lag ke baiTh jate ho 
tum mere iradon ke Dolte sitaron ko yas ke KHalaon mein rasta dikhate ho 
kitne yaad aate ho puchhte ho kyun mujh se jitna yaad karte ho utne yaad aate ho

vahshat ke saath dasht mirī jaan chāhiye is aish ke liye sar-o-sāmān chāhiye 
kuchh ishq ke nisāb meñ kamzor ham bhī haiñ kuchh parcha-e-savāl bhī āsān chāhiye 
tujh ko supurdagī meñ simaTnā bhī hai zarūr sachchā hai kārobār to nuqsān chāhiye 
ab tak kis intizār meñ baiThe hue haiñ log ummīd ke liye koī imkān chāhiye 
hogā yahāñ na dast-o-garebāñ kā faisla is ke liye to hashr kā maidān chāhiye 
āḳhir hai e'tibār-e-tamāshā bhī koī chiiz insān thoḌī der ko hairān chāhiye 
jaarī haiñ pā-e-shauq kī īzā-rasānīyāñ ab kuchh nahīñ to sair-e-bayābān chāhiye 
sab shā.irāñ ḳharīda-e-darbār ho ga.e ye vāqi.a to dāḳhil-e-dīvān chāhiye 
mulk-e-suḳhan meñ yuuñ nahīñ aane kā inqalāb do-chār baar nuun kā elaan chāhiye 
apnā bhī muddatoñ se hai ruq.a lagā huā bilqīs-e-shā.irī ko sulaimān chāhiye 
wahshat ke sath dasht meri jaan chahiye is aish ke liye sar-o-saman chahiye 
kuchh ishq ke nisab mein kamzor hum bhi hain kuchh parcha-e-sawal bhi aasan chahiye 
tujh ko supurdagi mein simaTna bhi hai zarur sachcha hai karobar to nuqsan chahiye 
ab tak kis intizar mein baiThe hue hain log ummid ke liye koi imkan chahiye 
hoga yahan na dast-o-gareban ka faisla is ke liye to hashr ka maidan chahiye 
aaKHir hai e'tibar-e-tamasha bhi koi chiz insan thoDi der ko hairan chahiye 
jari hain pa-e-shauq ki iza-rasaniyan ab kuchh nahin to sair-e-bayaban chahiye 
sab shairan KHarida-e-darbar ho gae ye waqia to daKHil-e-diwan chahiye 
mulk-e-suKHan mein yun nahin aane ka inqalab do-chaar bar nun ka elan chahiye 
apna bhi muddaton se hai ruqa laga hua bilqis-e-shairi ko sulaiman chahiye

kartā hai qatl-e-ām vo aġhyār ke liye das biis roz marte haiñ do-chār ke liye 
dekhā azāb-e-ranj dil-e-zār ke liye 'āshiq hue haiñ vo mire āzār ke liye 
dil ishq terī nazr kiyā jaan kyūñki duuñ rakkhā hai us ko hasrat-e-dīdār ke liye 
qatl us ne jurm-e-sabr-e-jafā par kiyā mujhe ye hī sazā thī aise gunahgār ke liye 
le tū hī bhej de koī paiġhām-e-talḳh ab tajvīz zahr hai tire bīmār ke liye 
aatā nahīñ hai tū to nishānī hī bhej de taskīn-e-iztirāb-e-dil-e-zār ke liye 
kyā dil diyā thā is liye maiñ ne tumheñ ki tum ho jaao yuuñ 'adū mire aġhyār ke liye 
chalnā to dekhnā ki qayāmat ne bhī qadam tarz-e-ḳhirām o shoḳhī-e-raftār ke liye 
jī meñ hai motiyoñ kī laḌī us ko bhej duuñ iz.hār-e-hāl-e-chashm-e-guhar-bār ke liye 
detā huuñ apne lab ko bhī gul-barg se misāl bose jo ḳhvāb meñ tire ruḳhsār ke liye 
jiinā umīd-e-vasl pe hijrāñ meñ sahl thā martā huuñ zindagānī-e-dushvār ke liye 
'momin' ko to na laa.e kahīñ daam meñ vo but DhūñDe hai tār-e-sub.ha ke zunnār ke liye 
karta hai qatl-e-am wo aghyar ke liye das bis roz marte hain do-chaar ke liye 
dekha azab-e-ranj dil-e-zar ke liye 'ashiq hue hain wo mere aazar ke liye 
dil ishq teri nazr kiya jaan kyunki dun rakkha hai us ko hasrat-e-didar ke liye 
qatl us ne jurm-e-sabr-e-jafa par kiya mujhe ye hi saza thi aise gunahgar ke liye 
le tu hi bhej de koi paigham-e-talKH ab tajwiz zahr hai tere bimar ke liye 
aata nahin hai tu to nishani hi bhej de taskin-e-iztirab-e-dil-e-zar ke liye 
kya dil diya tha is liye main ne tumhein ki tum ho jao yun 'adu mere aghyar ke liye 
chalna to dekhna ki qayamat ne bhi qadam tarz-e-KHiram o shoKHi-e-raftar ke liye 
ji mein hai motiyon ki laDi us ko bhej dun izhaar-e-haal-e-chashm-e-guhar-bar ke liye 
deta hun apne lab ko bhi gul-barg se misal bose jo KHwab mein tere ruKHsar ke liye 
jina umid-e-wasl pe hijran mein sahl tha marta hun zindagani-e-dushwar ke liye 
'momin' ko to na lae kahin dam mein wo but DhunDe hai tar-e-subha ke zunnar ke liye

maiñ apne iḳhtiyār meñ huuñ bhī nahīñ bhī huuñ duniyā ke kārobār meñ huuñ bhī nahīñ bhī huuñ 
terī hī justujū meñ lagā hai kabhī kabhī maiñ tere intizār meñ huuñ bhī nahīñ bhī huuñ 
fihrist marne vāloñ kī qātil ke paas hai maiñ apne hī mazār meñ huuñ bhī nahīñ bhī huuñ 
auroñ ke saath aisā koī mas.ala nahīñ ik maiñ hī is dayār meñ huuñ bhī nahīñ bhī huuñ 
mujh se hī hai har ek siyāsat kā e'tibār phir bhī kisī shumār meñ huuñ bhī nahīñ bhī huuñ 
main apne iKHtiyar mein hun bhi nahin bhi hun duniya ke karobar mein hun bhi nahin bhi hun 
teri hi justuju mein laga hai kabhi kabhi main tere intizar mein hun bhi nahin bhi hun 
fihrist marne walon ki qatil ke pas hai main apne hi mazar mein hun bhi nahin bhi hun 
auron ke sath aisa koi masala nahin ek main hi is dayar mein hun bhi nahin bhi hun 
mujh se hi hai har ek siyasat ka e'tibar phir bhi kisi shumar mein hun bhi nahin bhi hun

dil meñ vo shor na āñkhoñ meñ vo nam rahtā hai ab tap-e-hijr tavaqqo se bhī kam rahtā hai 
kabhī sho.ale se lapakte the mire siine meñ ab kisī vaqt dhuāñ sā koī dam rahtā hai 
kyā ḳhudā jaane mire dil ko huā tere ba.ad na ḳhushī is meñ Thahartī hai na ġham rahtā hai 
rishta-e-tār-e-tamannā nahīñ TuuTā ab tak ab bhī āñkhoñ meñ tirī zulf kā ḳham rahtā hai 
chhoḌ jaatī hai har ik rut koī ḳhushbū koī rañg na sitam rahtā hai baaqī na karam rahtā hai 
dil mein wo shor na aankhon mein wo nam rahta hai ab tap-e-hijr tawaqqo se bhi kam rahta hai 
kabhi shoale se lapakte the mere sine mein ab kisi waqt dhuan sa koi dam rahta hai 
kya KHuda jaane mere dil ko hua tere baad na KHushi is mein Thaharti hai na gham rahta hai 
rishta-e-tar-e-tamanna nahin TuTa ab tak ab bhi aankhon mein teri zulf ka KHam rahta hai 
chhoD jati hai har ek rut koi KHushbu koi rang na sitam rahta hai baqi na karam rahta hai

un ko bulā.eñ aur vo na aa.eñ to kyā kareñ bekār jaa.eñ apnī duā.eñ to kyā kareñ 
ik zohara-vash hai aañkh ke pardoñ meñ jalvagar nazroñ meñ āsmāñ na samā.eñ to kyā kareñ 
maanā ki sab ke sāmne milne se hai hijāb lekin vo ḳhvāb meñ bhī na aa.eñ to kyā kareñ 
ham laakh qasmeñ khā.eñ na milne kī sab ġhalat vo duur hī se dil ko lubhā.eñ to kyā kareñ 
bad-qismatoñ kā yaad na karne pe hai ye haal allāh agar vo yaad hī aa.eñ to kyā kareñ 
nāseh hamārī tauba meñ kuchh shak nahīñ magar shāna hilā.eñ aa ke ghaTā.eñ to kyā kareñ 
mai-ḳhāna duur rāsta tārīk ham marīz muñh pher deñ udhar jo havā.eñ to kyā kareñ 
rātoñ ke dil meñ yaad basā.eñ kisī kī ham 'aḳhtar' haram meñ vo na bulā.eñ to kyā kareñ 
un ko bulaen aur wo na aaen to kya karen bekar jaen apni duaen to kya karen 
ek zohara-wash hai aankh ke pardon mein jalwagar nazron mein aasman na samaen to kya karen 
mana ki sab ke samne milne se hai hijab lekin wo KHwab mein bhi na aaen to kya karen 
hum lakh qasmen khaen na milne ki sab ghalat wo dur hi se dil ko lubhaen to kya karen 
bad-qismaton ka yaad na karne pe hai ye haal allah agar wo yaad hi aaen to kya karen 
naseh hamari tauba mein kuchh shak nahin magar shana hilaen aa ke ghaTaen to kya karen 
mai-KHana dur rasta tarik hum mariz munh pher den udhar jo hawaen to kya karen 
raaton ke dil mein yaad basaen kisi ki hum 'aKHtar' haram mein wo na bulaen to kya karen

tamām umr kī tanhā.ī kī sazā de kar taḌap uThā mirā munsif bhī faisla de kar 
maiñ ab marūñ ki jiyūñ mujh ko ye ḳhushī hai bahut use sukūñ to milā mujh ko bad-duā de kar 
maiñ us ke vāste sūraj talāsh kartā huuñ jo so gayā mirī āñkhoñ ko rat-jagā de kar 
vo raat raat kā mehmāñ to umr bhar ke liye chalā gayā mujhe yādoñ kā silsila de kar 
jo vā kiyā bhī darīcha to aaj mausam ne pahāḌ Dhāñp diyā abr kī ridā de kar 
kaTī huī hai zamīñ koh se samundar tak milā hai ghaav ye dariyā ko rāsta de kar 
chaTaḳh chaTaḳh ke jalī shāḳh shāḳh jañgal kī bahut sharār milā aag ko havā de kar 
phir is ke ba.ad pahāḌ us ko ḳhud pukāreñge tū lauT aa use vaadī meñ ik sadā de kar 
sutūn-e-reg na Thahrā 'adīm' chhat ke tale maiñ Dah gayā huuñ ḳhud apne ko aasrā de kar 
tamam umr ki tanhai ki saza de kar taDap uTha mera munsif bhi faisla de kar 
main ab marun ki jiyun mujh ko ye KHushi hai bahut use sukun to mila mujh ko bad-dua de kar 
main us ke waste suraj talash karta hun jo so gaya meri aankhon ko rat-jaga de kar 
wo raat raat ka mehman to umr bhar ke liye chala gaya mujhe yaadon ka silsila de kar 
jo wa kiya bhi daricha to aaj mausam ne pahaD Dhanp diya abr ki rida de kar 
kaTi hui hai zamin koh se samundar tak mila hai ghaw ye dariya ko rasta de kar 
chaTaKH chaTaKH ke jali shaKH shaKH jangal ki bahut sharar mila aag ko hawa de kar 
phir is ke baad pahaD us ko KHud pukarenge tu lauT aa use wadi mein ek sada de kar 
sutun-e-reg na Thahra 'adim' chhat ke tale main Dah gaya hun KHud apne ko aasra de kar

chāñdnī meñ ruḳh-e-zebā nahīñ dekhā jaatā maah o ḳhurshīd ko yakjā nahīñ dekhā jaatā 
yuuñ to un āñkhoñ se kyā kyā nahīñ dekhā jaatā haañ magar apnā hī jalva nahīñ dekhā jaatā 
dīda-o-dil kī tabāhī mujhe manzūr magar un kā utrā huā chehra nahīñ dekhā jaatā 
zabt-e-ġham haañ vahī ashkoñ kā talātum ik baar ab to sūkhā huā dariyā nahīñ dekhā jaatā 
zindagī aa tujhe qātil ke havāle kar duuñ mujh se ab ḳhūn-e-tamannā nahīñ dekhā jaatā 
ab to jhūTī bhī tasallī ba-sar-o-chashm qubūl dil kā rah rah ke taḌapnā nahīñ dekhā jaatā 
chandni mein ruKH-e-zeba nahin dekha jata mah o KHurshid ko yakja nahin dekha jata 
yun to un aankhon se kya kya nahin dekha jata han magar apna hi jalwa nahin dekha jata 
dida-o-dil ki tabahi mujhe manzur magar un ka utra hua chehra nahin dekha jata 
zabt-e-gham han wahi ashkon ka talatum ek bar ab to sukha hua dariya nahin dekha jata 
zindagi aa tujhe qatil ke hawale kar dun mujh se ab KHun-e-tamanna nahin dekha jata 
ab to jhuTi bhi tasalli ba-sar-o-chashm qubul dil ka rah rah ke taDapna nahin dekha jata

saarā aalam gosh-bar-āvāz hai aaj kin hāthoñ meñ dil kā saaz hai 
tū jahāñ hai zamzama-pardāz hai dil jahāñ hai gosh-bar-āvāz hai 
haañ zarā jur.at dikhā ai jazb-e-dil husn ko parde pe apne naaz hai 
ham-nashīñ dil kī haqīqat kyā kahūñ soz meñ Duubā huā ik saaz hai 
aap kī maḳhmūr āñkhoñ kī qasam merī mai-ḳhvārī abhī tak raaz hai 
hañs diye vo mere rone par magar un ke hañs dene meñ bhī ik raaz hai 
chhup ga.e vo sāz-e-hastī chheḌ kar ab to bas āvāz hī āvāz hai 
husn ko nāhaq pashemāñ kar diyā ai junūñ ye bhī koī andāz hai 
saarī mahfil jis pe jhuum uTThī 'majāz' vo to āvāz-e-shikast-e-sāz hai 
sara aalam gosh-bar-awaz hai aaj kin hathon mein dil ka saz hai 
tu jahan hai zamzama-pardaz hai dil jahan hai gosh-bar-awaz hai 
han zara jurat dikha ai jazb-e-dil husn ko parde pe apne naz hai 
ham-nashin dil ki haqiqat kya kahun soz mein Duba hua ek saz hai 
aap ki maKHmur aankhon ki qasam meri mai-KHwari abhi tak raaz hai 
hans diye wo mere rone par magar un ke hans dene mein bhi ek raaz hai 
chhup gae wo saz-e-hasti chheD kar ab to bas aawaz hi aawaz hai 
husn ko nahaq pasheman kar diya ai junun ye bhi koi andaz hai 
sari mahfil jis pe jhum uTThi 'majaz' wo to aawaz-e-shikast-e-saz hai

zindagī be-sā.ebāñ be-ghar kahīñ aisī na thī āsmāñ aisā nahīñ thā aur zamīñ aisī na thī 
ham bichhaḌne se hue gumrāh varna is se qabl merā dāman tar na thā terī jabīñ aisī na thī 
ab jo badlā hai to apnī ruuh tak hairān huuñ terī jānib se maiñ shāyad be-yaqīñ aisī na thī 
bad-gumānī jab na thī tū bhī nahīñ thā mo'tariz maiñ bhī terī shaḳhsiyat par nukta-chīñ aisī na thī 
kyā mire dil aur kyā āñkhoñ kā hissa hai magar chādar-e-shab is se pahle shabnamīñ aisī na thī 
kyā havā aa.ī ki itne phuul dil meñ khil ga.e pichhle mausam meñ ye shāḳh-e-yāsmīñ aisī na thī 
zindagi be-saeban be-ghar kahin aisi na thi aasman aisa nahin tha aur zamin aisi na thi 
hum bichhaDne se hue gumrah warna is se qabl mera daman tar na tha teri jabin aisi na thi 
ab jo badla hai to apni ruh tak hairan hun teri jaanib se main shayad be-yaqin aisi na thi 
bad-gumani jab na thi tu bhi nahin tha mo'tariz main bhi teri shaKHsiyat par nukta-chin aisi na thi 
kya mere dil aur kya aankhon ka hissa hai magar chadar-e-shab is se pahle shabnamin aisi na thi 
kya hawa aai ki itne phul dil mein khil gae pichhle mausam mein ye shaKH-e-yasmin aisi na thi

maze jahān ke apnī nazar meñ ḳhaak nahīñ sivā.e ḳhūn-e-jigar so jigar meñ ḳhaak nahīñ 
magar ġhubār hue par havā uḌā le jaa.e vagarna taab o tavāñ bāl-o-par meñ ḳhaak nahīñ 
ye kis bahīsht-shamā.il kī aamad aamad hai ki ġhair-e-jalva-e-gul rahguzar meñ ḳhaak nahīñ 
bhalā use na sahī kuchh mujhī ko rahm aatā asar mire nafas-e-be-asar meñ ḳhaak nahīñ 
ḳhayāl-e-jalva-e-gul se ḳharāb haiñ mai-kash sharāb-ḳhāne ke dīvār-o-dar meñ ḳhaak nahīñ 
huā huuñ ishq kī ġhārat-garī se sharminda sivā.e hasrat-e-tāmīr ghar meñ ḳhaak nahīñ 
hamāre sher haiñ ab sirf dil-lagī ke 'asad' khulā ki fā.eda arz-e-hunar meñ ḳhaak nahīñ 
maze jahan ke apni nazar mein KHak nahin siwae KHun-e-jigar so jigar mein KHak nahin 
magar ghubar hue par hawa uDa le jae wagarna tab o tawan baal-o-par mein KHak nahin 
ye kis bahisht-shamail ki aamad aamad hai ki ghair-e-jalwa-e-gul rahguzar mein KHak nahin 
bhala use na sahi kuchh mujhi ko rahm aata asar mere nafas-e-be-asar mein KHak nahin 
KHayal-e-jalwa-e-gul se KHarab hain mai-kash sharab-KHane ke diwar-o-dar mein KHak nahin 
hua hun ishq ki ghaarat-gari se sharminda siwae hasrat-e-tamir ghar mein KHak nahin 
hamare sher hain ab sirf dil-lagi ke 'asad' khula ki faeda arz-e-hunar mein KHak nahin

band āñkhoñ se vo manzar dekhūñ reg-e-sahrā ko samundar dekhūñ 
kyā guzartī hai mire baad us par aaj maiñ us se bichhaḌ kar dekhūñ 
shahr kā shahr huā patthar kā maiñ ne chāhā thā ki muḌ kar dekhūñ 
ḳhauf tanhā.ī ghuTan sannāTā kyā nahīñ mujh meñ jo bāhar dekhūñ 
hai har ik shaḳhs kā dil patthar kā maiñ jidhar jā.ūñ ye patthar dekhūñ 
kuchh to andāza-e-tūfāñ ho 'amīr' naav kāġhaz kī chalā kar dekhūñ 
band aankhon se wo manzar dekhun reg-e-sahra ko samundar dekhun 
kya guzarti hai mere baad us par aaj main us se bichhaD kar dekhun 
shahr ka shahr hua patthar ka main ne chaha tha ki muD kar dekhun 
KHauf tanhai ghuTan sannaTa kya nahin mujh mein jo bahar dekhun 
hai har ek shaKHs ka dil patthar ka main jidhar jaun ye patthar dekhun 
kuchh to andaza-e-tufan ho 'amir' naw kaghaz ki chala kar dekhun

dekh kar joban tirā kis kis ko hairānī huī is javānī par javānī aap dīvānī huī 
parde parde meñ mohabbat dushman-e-jānī huī ye ḳhudā kī maar kyā ai shauq-e-pinhānī huī 
dil kā saudā kar ke un se kyā pashemānī huī qadr us kī phir kahāñ jis shai kī arzānī huī 
mere ghar us shoḳh kī do din se mehmānī huī bekasī kī aaj kal kyā ḳhāna-vīrānī huī 
tark-e-rasm-o-rāh par afsos hai donoñ taraf ham se nādānī huī yā tum se nādānī huī 
ibtidā se intihā tak haal un se kah to duuñ fikr ye hai aur jo kah kar pashemānī huī 
ġham qayāmat kā nahīñ vā'iz mujhe ye fikr hai diin kab baaqī rahā duniyā agar faanī huī 
tum na shab ko aaoge ye hai yaqīñ aayā huā tum na mānoge mirī ye baat hai maanī huī 
mujh meñ dam jab tak rahā mushkil meñ the tīmārdār merī āsānī se sab yāroñ kī āsānī huī 
is ko kyā kahte haiñ utnā hī baḌhā shauq-e-visāl jis qadar mash.hūr un kī pāk-dāmānī huī 
bazm se uThne kī ġhairat baiThne se dil ko rashk dekh kar ġhairoñ kā majma.a kyā pareshānī huī 
dāva-e-tasḳhīr par ye us parī-vash ne kahā aap kā dil kyā huā mohr-e-sulemānī huī 
khul ga.iiñ zulfeñ magar us shoḳh mast-e-nāz kī jhūmtī bād-e-sabā phirtī hai mastānī huī 
maiñ sarāpā sajde kartā us ke dar par shauq se sar se pā tak kyuuñ na peshānī hī peshānī huī 
dil kī qalb-e-māhiyat kā ho use kyūñkar yaqīñ kab havā miTTī huī hai aag kab paanī huī 
aate hī kahte ho ab ghar jā.eñge achchhī kahī ye masal puurī yahāñ man-mānī ghar jaanī huī 
arsa-e-mahshar meñ tujh ko DhūñD lā.ūñ to sahī koī chhup saktī hai jo sūrat ho pahchānī huī 
dekh kar qātil kā ḳhālī haath bhī jī Dar gayā us kī chīn-e-āstīñ bhī chīn-e-peshānī huī 
khā ke dhokā us but-e-kamsin ne dāman meñ liye ashk-afshānī bhī merī gauhar-afshānī huī 
bekasī par merī apnī teġh kī hasrat to dekh chashm-e-jauhar bhī ba-shakl-e-chashm-e-hairānī huī 
bekasī par 'dāġh' kī afsos aatā hai hameñ kis jagah kis vaqt us kī ḳhāna-vīrānī huī 
dekh kar joban tera kis kis ko hairani hui is jawani par jawani aap diwani hui 
parde parde mein mohabbat dushman-e-jaani hui ye KHuda ki mar kya ai shauq-e-pinhani hui 
dil ka sauda kar ke un se kya pashemani hui qadr us ki phir kahan jis shai ki arzani hui 
mere ghar us shoKH ki do din se mehmani hui bekasi ki aaj kal kya KHana-virani hui 
tark-e-rasm-o-rah par afsos hai donon taraf hum se nadani hui ya tum se nadani hui 
ibtida se intiha tak haal un se kah to dun fikr ye hai aur jo kah kar pashemani hui 
gham qayamat ka nahin wa'iz mujhe ye fikr hai din kab baqi raha duniya agar fani hui 
tum na shab ko aaoge ye hai yaqin aaya hua tum na manoge meri ye baat hai mani hui 
mujh mein dam jab tak raha mushkil mein the timardar meri aasani se sab yaron ki aasani hui 
is ko kya kahte hain utna hi baDha shauq-e-visal jis qadar mashhur un ki pak-damani hui 
bazm se uThne ki ghairat baiThne se dil ko rashk dekh kar ghairon ka majma kya pareshani hui 
dawa-e-tasKHir par ye us pari-wash ne kaha aap ka dil kya hua mohr-e-sulemani hui 
khul gain zulfen magar us shoKH mast-e-naz ki jhumti baad-e-saba phirti hai mastani hui 
main sarapa sajde karta us ke dar par shauq se sar se pa tak kyun na peshani hi peshani hui 
dil ki qalb-e-mahiyat ka ho use kyunkar yaqin kab hawa miTTi hui hai aag kab pani hui 
aate hi kahte ho ab ghar jaenge achchhi kahi ye masal puri yahan man-mani ghar jaani hui 
arsa-e-mahshar mein tujh ko DhunD laun to sahi koi chhup sakti hai jo surat ho pahchani hui 
dekh kar qatil ka KHali hath bhi ji Dar gaya us ki chin-e-astin bhi chin-e-peshani hui 
kha ke dhoka us but-e-kamsin ne daman mein liye ashk-afshani bhi meri gauhar-afshani hui 
bekasi par meri apni tegh ki hasrat to dekh chashm-e-jauhar bhi ba-shakl-e-chashm-e-hairani hui 
bekasi par 'dagh' ki afsos aata hai hamein kis jagah kis waqt us ki KHana-virani hui

tū phuul kī mānind na shabnam kī tarah aa ab ke kisī be-nām se mausam kī tarah aa 
har martaba aatā hai mah-e-nau kī tarah tū is baar zarā merī shab-e-ġham kī tarah aa 
hal karne haiñ mujh ko ka.ī pechīda masā.il ai jān-e-vafā gesu-e-pur-ḳham kī tarah aa 
zaḳhmoñ ko gavārā nahīñ yak-rañgi-e-hālāt nashtar kī tarah aa kabhī marham kī tarah aa 
nazdīkī o duurī kī kashākash ko miTā de is jañg meñ tū sulh ke parcham kī tarah aa 
maanā ki mirā ghar tirī jannat to nahīñ hai duniyā meñ mirī laġhzish-e-ādam kī tarah aa 
tū kuchh to mire zabt-e-mohabbat kā sila de hañgām-e-fanā dīda-e-pur-nam kī tarah aa 
tu phul ki manind na shabnam ki tarah aa ab ke kisi be-nam se mausam ki tarah aa 
har martaba aata hai mah-e-nau ki tarah tu is bar zara meri shab-e-gham ki tarah aa 
hal karne hain mujh ko kai pechida masail ai jaan-e-wafa gesu-e-pur-KHam ki tarah aa 
zaKHmon ko gawara nahin yak-rangi-e-haalat nashtar ki tarah aa kabhi marham ki tarah aa 
nazdiki o duri ki kashakash ko miTa de is jang mein tu sulh ke parcham ki tarah aa 
mana ki mera ghar teri jannat to nahin hai duniya mein meri laghzish-e-adam ki tarah aa 
tu kuchh to mere zabt-e-mohabbat ka sila de hangam-e-fana dida-e-pur-nam ki tarah aa

apne ham-rāh jalā rakkhā hai tāq-e-dil par jo diyā rakkhā hai 
jumbish-e-lab na sahī tere ḳhilāf haath ko ham ne uThā rakkhā hai 
tū mujhe chhoḌ ke jā saktā nahīñ chhoḌ is baat meñ kyā rakkhā hai 
vo milā degā hameñ bhī jis ne aab aur gil ko milā rakkhā hai 
mujh ko mālūm hai merī ḳhātir kahīñ ik jaal bunā rakkhā hai 
jāntā huuñ mire qissa-go ne asl qisse ko chhupā rakkhā hai 
āsmānoñ ne gavāhī ke liye ik sitāre ko bachā rakkhā hai 
kaam kuchh itne haiñ karne ko 'jamāl' naam ko kal pe uThā rakkhā hai 
apne ham-rah jala rakkha hai taq-e-dil par jo diya rakkha hai 
jumbish-e-lab na sahi tere KHilaf hath ko hum ne uTha rakkha hai 
tu mujhe chhoD ke ja sakta nahin chhoD is baat mein kya rakkha hai 
wo mila dega hamein bhi jis ne aab aur gil ko mila rakkha hai 
mujh ko malum hai meri KHatir kahin ek jal buna rakkha hai 
jaanta hun mere qissa-go ne asl qisse ko chhupa rakkha hai 
aasmanon ne gawahi ke liye ek sitare ko bacha rakkha hai 
kaam kuchh itne hain karne ko 'jamal' nam ko kal pe uTha rakkha hai

udāsī kā samundar dekh lenā mirī āñkhoñ meñ aa kar dekh lenā 
hamāre hijr kī tamhīd kyā thī mirī yādoñ kā daftar dekh lenā 
tasavvur ke laboñ se chuum lūñgā tirī yādoñ ke patthar dekh lenā 
nujūmī ne ye kī hai pesh-goī rulā.egā muqaddar dekh lenā 
na rakhnā vāsta tum mujh se lekin mirī hijrat kā manzar dekh lenā 
tamannā hai agar milne kī mujh se mujhe mere hī andar dekh lenā 
makāñ shīshe kā banvāte ho 'āzar' bahut ā.eñge patthar dekh lenā 
udasi ka samundar dekh lena meri aankhon mein aa kar dekh lena 
hamare hijr ki tamhid kya thi meri yaadon ka daftar dekh lena 
tasawwur ke labon se chum lunga teri yaadon ke patthar dekh lena 
nujumi ne ye ki hai pesh-goi rulaega muqaddar dekh lena 
na rakhna wasta tum mujh se lekin meri hijrat ka manzar dekh lena 
tamanna hai agar milne ki mujh se mujhe mere hi andar dekh lena 
makan shishe ka banwate ho 'azar' bahut aaenge patthar dekh lena

vo kaun haiñ phūloñ kī hifāzat nahīñ karte sunte haiñ jo ḳhushbū se mohabbat nahīñ karte 
tum ho ki abhī shahr meñ masrūf bahut ho ham haiñ ki abhī zikr-e-shahādat nahīñ karte 
qur.ān kā mafhūm unheñ kaun batā.e āñkhoñ se jo chehroñ kī tilāvat nahīñ karte 
sāhil se sunā karte haiñ lahroñ kī kahānī ye Thahre hue log baġhāvat nahīñ karte 
ham bhī tire beTe haiñ zarā dekh hameñ bhī ai ḳhāk-e-vatan tujh se shikāyat nahīñ karte 
is mausam-e-jam.hūr meñ vo gul bhī khile haiñ jo sāhib-e-ālam kī himāyat nahīñ karte 
ham banda-e-nāchīz gunahgār haiñ lekin vo bhī to zarā bārish-e-rahmat nahīñ karte 
chehre haiñ ki sau rañg meñ hote haiñ numāyāñ ā.īne magar koī siyāsat nahīñ karte 
shabnam ko bharosa hai bahut barg-e-amāñ par 'ḳhurshīd' bhī dānista qayāmat nahīñ karte 
wo kaun hain phulon ki hifazat nahin karte sunte hain jo KHushbu se mohabbat nahin karte 
tum ho ki abhi shahr mein masruf bahut ho hum hain ki abhi zikr-e-shahadat nahin karte 
quran ka mafhum unhen kaun batae aankhon se jo chehron ki tilawat nahin karte 
sahil se suna karte hain lahron ki kahani ye Thahre hue log baghawat nahin karte 
hum bhi tere beTe hain zara dekh hamein bhi ai KHak-e-watan tujh se shikayat nahin karte 
is mausam-e-jamhur mein wo gul bhi khile hain jo sahib-e-alam ki himayat nahin karte 
hum banda-e-nachiz gunahgar hain lekin wo bhi to zara barish-e-rahmat nahin karte 
chehre hain ki sau rang mein hote hain numayan aaine magar koi siyasat nahin karte 
shabnam ko bharosa hai bahut barg-e-aman par 'KHurshid' bhi danista qayamat nahin karte

lākhoñ meñ intiḳhāb ke qābil banā diyā jis dil ko tum ne dekh liyā dil banā diyā 
har-chand kar diyā mujhe barbād ishq ne lekin unheñ to shefta-e-dil banā diyā 
pahle kahāñ ye naaz the ye ishva o adā dil ko duā.eñ do tumheñ qātil banā diyā 
lakhon mein intiKHab ke qabil bana diya jis dil ko tum ne dekh liya dil bana diya 
har-chand kar diya mujhe barbaad ishq ne lekin unhen to shefta-e-dil bana diya 
pahle kahan ye naz the ye ishwa o ada dil ko duaen do tumhein qatil bana diya

charāġh-e-hasrat-o-armāñ bujhā ke baiThe haiñ har ek tarh se ḳhud ko jalā ke baiThe haiñ 
na koī rāhguzar hai na koī vīrāna ġham-e-hayāt meñ sab kuchh luTā ke baiThe haiñ 
junūñ kī had hai ki hosh-o-ḳhirad kī manzil hai ḳhabar nahīñ hai kahāñ aaj aa ke baiThe haiñ 
kabhī jo dil ne kahā ab chalo yahāñ se chaleñ to uTh ke ālam-e-vahshat meñ jā ke baiThe haiñ 
ye kis jagah pe qadam ruk ga.e haiñ kyā kahiye ki manziloñ ke nishāñ tak miTā ke baiThe haiñ 
charagh-e-hasrat-o-arman bujha ke baiThe hain har ek tarh se KHud ko jala ke baiThe hain 
na koi rahguzar hai na koi virana gham-e-hayat mein sab kuchh luTa ke baiThe hain 
junun ki had hai ki hosh-o-KHirad ki manzil hai KHabar nahin hai kahan aaj aa ke baiThe hain 
kabhi jo dil ne kaha ab chalo yahan se chalen to uTh ke aalam-e-wahshat mein ja ke baiThe hain 
ye kis jagah pe qadam ruk gae hain kya kahiye ki manzilon ke nishan tak miTa ke baiThe hain

mahshar meñ paas kyuuñ dam-e-fariyād aa gayā rahm us ne kab kiyā thā ki ab yaad aa gayā 
uljhā hai paañv yaar kā zulf-e-darāz meñ lo aap apne daam meñ sayyād aa gayā 
nākāmiyoñ meñ tum ne jo tashbīh mujh se dī shīrīñ ko dard-e-talḳhi-e-farhād aa gayā 
ham chārāgar ko yuuñ hī pahnā.eñge beḌiyāñ qaabū meñ apne gar vo parī-zād aa gayā 
dil ko qalaq hai tark-e-mohabbat ke baad bhī ab āsmāñ ko shikva-e-bedād aa gayā 
vo bad-gumāñ huā jo kahīñ sher meñ mire zikr-e-butān-e-ḳhalḳh-o-naushād aa gayā 
the be-gunāh jur.at-e-pā-bos thī zarūr kyā karte vahm-e-ḳhajlat-e-jallād aa gayā 
jo ho chukā yaqīñ ki nahīñ tāqat-e-visāl dam meñ hamāre vo sitam-ījād aa gayā 
zikr-e-sharāb-o-hūr kalām-e-ḳhudā meñ dekh 'momin' maiñ kyā kahūñ mujhe kyā yaad aa gayā 
mahshar mein pas kyun dam-e-fariyaad aa gaya rahm us ne kab kiya tha ki ab yaad aa gaya 
uljha hai panw yar ka zulf-e-daraaz mein lo aap apne dam mein sayyaad aa gaya 
nakaamiyon mein tum ne jo tashbih mujh se di shirin ko dard-e-talKHi-e-farhad aa gaya 
hum chaaragar ko yun hi pahnaenge beDiyan qabu mein apne gar wo pari-zad aa gaya 
dil ko qalaq hai tark-e-mohabbat ke baad bhi ab aasman ko shikwa-e-bedad aa gaya 
wo bad-guman hua jo kahin sher mein mere zikr-e-butan-e-KHalKH-o-naushad aa gaya 
the be-gunah jurat-e-pa-bos thi zarur kya karte wahm-e-KHajlat-e-jallad aa gaya 
jo ho chuka yaqin ki nahin taqat-e-visal dam mein hamare wo sitam-ijad aa gaya 
zikr-e-sharab-o-hur kalam-e-KHuda mein dekh 'momin' main kya kahun mujhe kya yaad aa gaya

pahlā sā vo zor nahīñ hai mere dukh kī sadāoñ meñ shāyad paanī nahīñ rahā hai ab pyāse dariyāoñ meñ 
jis bādal kī aas meñ joḌe khol liye haiñ suhāgan ne vo parbat se Takrā kar baras chukā sahrāoñ meñ 
jaane kab taḌpe aur chamke suunī raat ko phir Das jaa.e mujh ko ek rupahlī nāgin baiThī milī hai ghaTāoñ meñ 
patta to āḳhir patta thā gunjān ghane daraḳhtoñ ne zamīñ ko tanhā chhoḌ diyā hai itnī tez havāoñ meñ 
din bhar dhuup kī tarah se ham chhā.e rahte haiñ duniyā par raat huī to simaT ke aa jaate haiñ dil kī guphāoñ meñ 
khaḌe hue jo sāhil par to dil meñ palkeñ bhiig ga.iiñ shāyad aañsū chhupe hue hoñ sub.h kī narm havāoñ meñ 
ġhazal ke mandir meñ dīvāna mūrat rakh kar chalā gayā kaun use pahle pūjegā bahas chalī devtāoñ meñ 
pahla sa wo zor nahin hai mere dukh ki sadaon mein shayad pani nahin raha hai ab pyase dariyaon mein 
jis baadal ki aas mein joDe khol liye hain suhagan ne wo parbat se Takra kar baras chuka sahraon mein 
jaane kab taDpe aur chamke suni raat ko phir Das jae mujh ko ek rupahli nagin baiThi mili hai ghaTaon mein 
patta to aaKHir patta tha gunjaan ghane daraKHton ne zamin ko tanha chhoD diya hai itni tez hawaon mein 
din bhar dhup ki tarah se hum chhae rahte hain duniya par raat hui to simaT ke aa jate hain dil ki guphaon mein 
khaDe hue jo sahil par to dil mein palken bhig gain shayad aansu chhupe hue hon subh ki narm hawaon mein 
ghazal ke mandir mein diwana murat rakh kar chala gaya kaun use pahle pujega bahas chali dewtaon mein

phir sar kisī ke dar pe jhukā.e hue haiñ ham parde phir āsmāñ ke uThā.e hue haiñ ham 
chhā.ī huī hai ishq kī phir dil pe be-ḳhudī phir zindagī ko hosh meñ laa.e hue haiñ ham 
jis kā har ek juzv hai iksīr-e-zindagī phir ḳhaak meñ vo jins milā.e hue haiñ ham 
haañ kaun pūchhtā hai ḳhushī kā nahufta raaz phir ġham kā baar dil pe uThā.e hue haiñ ham 
haañ kaun dars-e-ishq-e-junūñ kā hai ḳhvāst-gār aa.e ki har sabaq ko bhulā.e hue haiñ ham 
aa.e jise ho jāda-e-rif.at kī aarzū phir sar kisī ke dar pe jhukā.e hue haiñ ham 
bai.at ko aa.e jis ko ho tahqīq kā ḳhayāl kaun-o-makāñ ke raaz ko paa.e hue haiñ ham 
hastī ke dām-e-saḳht se uktā gayā hai kaun kah do ki phir giraft meñ aa.e hue haiñ ham 
haañ kis ke pā-e-dil meñ hai zanjīr-e-āb-o-gil kah do ki dām-e-zulf meñ aa.e hue haiñ ham 
haañ kis ko justujū hai nasīm-e-farāġh kī āsūdgī ko aag lagā.e hue haiñ ham 
haañ kis ko sair-e-arz-o-samā kā hai ishtiyāq dhūnī phir us galī meñ ramā.e hue haiñ ham 
jis par nisār kaun-o-makāñ kī haqīqateñ phir 'josh' us fareb meñ aa.e hue haiñ ham 
phir sar kisi ke dar pe jhukae hue hain hum parde phir aasman ke uThae hue hain hum 
chhai hui hai ishq ki phir dil pe be-KHudi phir zindagi ko hosh mein lae hue hain hum 
jis ka har ek juzw hai iksir-e-zindagi phir KHak mein wo jins milae hue hain hum 
han kaun puchhta hai KHushi ka nahufta raaz phir gham ka bar dil pe uThae hue hain hum 
han kaun dars-e-ishq-e-junun ka hai KHwast-gar aae ki har sabaq ko bhulae hue hain hum 
aae jise ho jada-e-rifat ki aarzu phir sar kisi ke dar pe jhukae hue hain hum 
baiat ko aae jis ko ho tahqiq ka KHayal kaun-o-makan ke raaz ko pae hue hain hum 
hasti ke dam-e-saKHt se ukta gaya hai kaun kah do ki phir giraft mein aae hue hain hum 
han kis ke pa-e-dil mein hai zanjir-e-ab-o-gil kah do ki dam-e-zulf mein aae hue hain hum 
han kis ko justuju hai nasim-e-faragh ki aasudgi ko aag lagae hue hain hum 
han kis ko sair-e-arz-o-sama ka hai ishtiyaq dhuni phir us gali mein ramae hue hain hum 
jis par nisar kaun-o-makan ki haqiqaten phir 'josh' us fareb mein aae hue hain hum

jab saaz kī lai badal ga.ī thī vo raqs kī kaun sī ghaḌī thī 
ab yaad nahīñ ki zindagī meñ maiñ āḳhirī baar kab hañsī thī 
jab kuchh bhī na thā yahāñ pe mā-qabl duniyā kis chiiz se banī thī 
muTThī meñ to rañg the hazāroñ bas haath se ret bah rahī thī 
hai aks to aa.ina kahāñ hai tamsīl ye kis jahān kī thī 
ham kis kī zabān bolte haiñ gar zehn meñ baat dūsrī thī 
tanhā hai agar azal se insāñ ye bazm-e-kalām kyuuñ sajī thī 
thā aag hī gar mirā muqaddar kyuuñ ḳhaak meñ phir shifā rakhī thī 
kyuuñ moḌ badal ga.ī kahānī pahle se agar likhī huī thī 
jab saz ki lai badal gai thi wo raqs ki kaun si ghaDi thi 
ab yaad nahin ki zindagi mein main aaKHiri bar kab hansi thi 
jab kuchh bhi na tha yahan pe ma-qabl duniya kis chiz se bani thi 
muTThi mein to rang the hazaron bas hath se ret bah rahi thi 
hai aks to aaina kahan hai tamsil ye kis jahan ki thi 
hum kis ki zaban bolte hain gar zehn mein baat dusri thi 
tanha hai agar azal se insan ye bazm-e-kalam kyun saji thi 
tha aag hi gar mera muqaddar kyun KHak mein phir shifa rakhi thi 
kyun moD badal gai kahani pahle se agar likhi hui thi

kuTiyā meñ kaun aa.egā is tīrgī ke saath ab ye kivāḌ band karo ḳhāmushī ke saath 
saaya hai kam khajūr ke ūñche daraḳht kā ummīd bāñdhiye na baḌe aadmī ke saath 
chalte haiñ bach ke shaiḳh-o-barahman ke saa.e se apnā yahī amal hai bure aadmī ke saath 
shā.istagān-e-shahr mujhe ḳhvāh kuchh kaheñ saḌkoñ kā husn hai mirī āvārgī ke saath 
shā.ir hikāyateñ na sunā vasl o ishq kī itnā baḌā mazāq na kar shā.irī ke saath 
likhtā hai ġham kī baat masarrat ke mood meñ maḳhsūs hai ye tarz faqat 'kaif' hī ke saath 
kuTiya mein kaun aaega is tirgi ke sath ab ye kiwaD band karo KHamushi ke sath 
saya hai kam khajur ke unche daraKHt ka ummid bandhiye na baDe aadmi ke sath 
chalte hain bach ke shaiKH-o-barahman ke sae se apna yahi amal hai bure aadmi ke sath 
shaistagan-e-shahr mujhe KHwah kuchh kahen saDkon ka husn hai meri aawargi ke sath 
shair hikayaten na suna wasl o ishq ki itna baDa mazaq na kar shairi ke sath 
likhta hai gham ki baat masarrat ke mood mein maKHsus hai ye tarz faqat 'kaif' hi ke sath

kise ma.alūm thā ik din mohabbat be-zabāñ hogī vo zālim āsmāñ jaane mirī duniyā kahāñ hogī 
kabhī ik ḳhvāb dekhā thā mire pahlū meñ tum hogī kahānī pyaar kī āñkhoñ hī āñkhoñ meñ bayāñ hogī 
lahū dil kā mirī āñkhoñ kā paanī ban ke kahtā hai na ham hoñge na tum hoge hamārī dāstāñ hogī 
kise malum tha ek din mohabbat be-zaban hogi wo zalim aasman jaane meri duniya kahan hogi 
kabhi ek KHwab dekha tha mere pahlu mein tum hogi kahani pyar ki aankhon hi aankhon mein bayan hogi 
lahu dil ka meri aankhon ka pani ban ke kahta hai na hum honge na tum hoge hamari dastan hogi

fasāna ab koī anjām paanā chāhtā hai ta.alluq TūTne ko ik bahāna chāhtā hai 
jahāñ ik shaḳhs bhī miltā nahīñ hai chāhne se vahāñ ye dil hathelī par zamāna chāhtā hai 
mujhe samjhā rahī hai aañkh kī tahrīr us kī vo aadhe rāste se lauT jaanā chāhtā hai 
ye lāzim hai ki āñkheñ daan kar de ishq ko vo jo apne ḳhvāb kī tābīr paanā chāhtā hai 
bahut uktā gayā hai be-sukūnī se vo apnī samundar jhiil ke nazdīk aanā chāhtā hai 
vo mujh ko āzmātā hī rahā hai zindagī bhar magar ye dil ab us ko āzmānā chāhtā hai 
use bhī zindagī karnī paḌegī 'mīr' jaisī suḳhan se gar koī rishta nibhānā chāhtā hai 
fasana ab koi anjam pana chahta hai talluq TuTne ko ek bahana chahta hai 
jahan ek shaKHs bhi milta nahin hai chahne se wahan ye dil hatheli par zamana chahta hai 
mujhe samjha rahi hai aankh ki tahrir us ki wo aadhe raste se lauT jaana chahta hai 
ye lazim hai ki aankhen dan kar de ishq ko wo jo apne KHwab ki tabir pana chahta hai 
bahut ukta gaya hai be-sukuni se wo apni samundar jhil ke nazdik aana chahta hai 
wo mujh ko aazmata hi raha hai zindagi bhar magar ye dil ab us ko aazmana chahta hai 
use bhi zindagi karni paDegi 'mir' jaisi suKHan se gar koi rishta nibhana chahta hai

jo dekhe the jaadū tire haat ke haiñ charche abhī tak isī baat ke 
ghaTā dekh kar ḳhush huiiñ laḌkiyāñ chhatoñ par khile phuul barsāt ke 
mujhe dard dil kā vahāñ le gayā jahāñ dar khule the tilismāt ke 
havā jab chalī phaḌphaḌā kar uḌe parinde purāne mahallāt ke 
na tū hai kahīñ aur na maiñ huuñ kahīñ ye sab silsile haiñ ḳhayālāt ke 
'munīr' aa rahī hai ghaḌī vasl kī zamāne ga.e hijr kī raat ke 
jo dekhe the jadu tere hat ke hain charche abhi tak isi baat ke 
ghaTa dekh kar KHush huin laDkiyan chhaton par khile phul barsat ke 
mujhe dard dil ka wahan le gaya jahan dar khule the tilismat ke 
hawa jab chali phaDphaDa kar uDe parinde purane mahallat ke 
na tu hai kahin aur na main hun kahin ye sab silsile hain KHayalat ke 
'munir' aa rahi hai ghaDi wasl ki zamane gae hijr ki raat ke

agar marte hue lab par na terā naam aa.egā to maiñ marne se dar-guzrā mire kis kaam aa.egā 
use bhī Thaan rakh saaqī yaqīñ hogā na rindoñ ko agar zāhid pahan kar jāma-e-ehrām aa.egā 
shab-e-furqat meñ dard-e-dil se maiñ us vāste ḳhush huuñ zabāñ par raat bhar rah rah ke terā naam aa.egā 
lagī ho kuchh to qāsid āḳhir is kam-baḳht dil meñ bhī vahāñ terī tarah jo jā.egā nākām aa.egā 
isī ummīd meñ bāñdhe hue haiñ TakTakī mai-kash kaf-e-nāzuk pe saaqī rakh ke ik din jaam aa.egā 
yahāñ apnī paḌī hai tujh se ai ġham-ḳhvār kyā uljhūñ ye kaun ārām hai mar jā.ūñ tab ārām aa.egā 
zahe izzat jo ho is bazm meñ mazkūr ai vaa.iz balā se gar gunahgāroñ meñ apnā naam aa.egā 
hazār inkār yā qat-e-ta.alluq us se kar nāseh magar hir-phir ke hoñToñ par usī kā naam aa.egā 
atā kī jab ki ḳhud pīr-e-muġhāñ ne pī bhī le zāhid ye kaisā sochnā hai tujh pe kyuuñ ilzām aa.egā 
paḌā hai silsila taqdīr kā sayyād ke bas meñ chaman meñ ai sabā kyūñkar asīr-e-dām aa.egā 
koī badmast ko detā hai saaqī bhar ke paimāna tirā kyā jā.egā mujh par abas ilzām aa.egā 
unheñ dekhegī tū ai chashm-e-hasrat vasl meñ yā maiñ tire kaam aa.egā ronā ki mere kaam aa.egā 
hamesha kyā piyūñgā maiñ isī kohna-sifālī maiñ mire aage kabhī to sāġhar-e-zarfām aa.egā 
kahāñ se lā.ūñ sabr-e-hazrat-e-ayyūb ai saaqī ḳhum aa.egā surāhī aa.egī tab jaam aa.egā 
chhurī thī kund terī yā tire qātil kī o bismil taḌap bhī tū tirī gardan pe kyuuñ ilzām aa.egā 
yahī kah kar ajal ko qarz-ḳhvāhoñ kī tarah Taalā ki le kar aaj qāsid yaar kā paiġhām aa.egā 
hamesha kyā yuuñ hī qismat meñ hai gintī ginā denā koī naala na lab par lā.iq-e-anjām aa.egā 
galī meñ yaar kī ai 'shād' sab mushtāq baiThe haiñ ḳhudā jaane vahāñ se hukm kis ke naam aa.egā 
agar marte hue lab par na tera nam aaega to main marne se dar-guzra mere kis kaam aaega 
use bhi Than rakh saqi yaqin hoga na rindon ko agar zahid pahan kar jama-e-ehram aaega 
shab-e-furqat mein dard-e-dil se main us waste KHush hun zaban par raat bhar rah rah ke tera nam aaega 
lagi ho kuchh to qasid aaKHir is kam-baKHt dil mein bhi wahan teri tarah jo jaega nakaam aaega 
isi ummid mein bandhe hue hain TakTaki mai-kash kaf-e-nazuk pe saqi rakh ke ek din jam aaega 
yahan apni paDi hai tujh se ai gham-KHwar kya uljhun ye kaun aaram hai mar jaun tab aaram aaega 
zahe izzat jo ho is bazm mein mazkur ai waiz bala se gar gunahgaron mein apna nam aaega 
hazar inkar ya qat-e-talluq us se kar naseh magar hir-phir ke honTon par usi ka nam aaega 
ata ki jab ki KHud pir-e-mughan ne pi bhi le zahid ye kaisa sochna hai tujh pe kyun ilzam aaega 
paDa hai silsila taqdir ka sayyaad ke bas mein chaman mein ai saba kyunkar asir-e-dam aaega 
koi badmast ko deta hai saqi bhar ke paimana tera kya jaega mujh par abas ilzam aaega 
unhen dekhegi tu ai chashm-e-hasrat wasl mein ya main tere kaam aaega rona ki mere kaam aaega 
hamesha kya piyunga main isi kohna-sifali main mere aage kabhi to saghar-e-zarfam aaega 
kahan se laun sabr-e-hazrat-e-ayyub ai saqi KHum aaega surahi aaegi tab jam aaega 
chhuri thi kund teri ya tere qatil ki o bismil taDap bhi tu teri gardan pe kyun ilzam aaega 
yahi kah kar ajal ko qarz-KHwahon ki tarah Tala ki le kar aaj qasid yar ka paigham aaega 
hamesha kya yun hi qismat mein hai ginti gina dena koi nala na lab par laiq-e-anjam aaega 
gali mein yar ki ai 'shad' sab mushtaq baiThe hain KHuda jaane wahan se hukm kis ke nam aaega

jahāñ meñ haal mirā is qadar zabūn huā ki mujh ko dekh ke bismil ko bhī sukūn huā 
ġharīb dil ne bahut ārzūeñ paidā kiiñ magar nasīb kā likkhā ki sab kā ḳhuun huā 
vo apne husn se vāqif maiñ apnī 'aql se sair unhoñ ne hosh sambhālā mujhe junūn huā 
umīd-e-chashm-e-muravvat kahāñ rahī baaqī zarīya bātoñ kā jab sirf telephone huā 
nigāh-e-garm christmas meñ bhī rahī ham par hamāre haq meñ december bhī māh-e-june huā 
jahan mein haal mera is qadar zabun hua ki mujh ko dekh ke bismil ko bhi sukun hua 
gharib dil ne bahut aarzuen paida kin magar nasib ka likkha ki sab ka KHun hua 
wo apne husn se waqif main apni 'aql se sair unhon ne hosh sambhaala mujhe junun hua 
umid-e-chashm-e-murawwat kahan rahi baqi zariya baaton ka jab sirf telephone hua 
nigah-e-garm christmas mein bhi rahi hum par hamare haq mein december bhi mah-e-june hua

diloñ kī or dhuāñ sā dikhā.ī detā hai ye shahr to mujhe jaltā dikhā.ī detā hai 
jahāñ ki daaġh hai yaañ aage dard rahtā thā magar ye daaġh bhī jaatā dikhā.ī detā hai 
pukārtī haiñ bhare shahr kī guzargāheñ vo roz shaam ko tanhā dikhā.ī detā hai 
ye log TuuTī huī kashtiyoñ meñ sote haiñ mire makān se dariyā dikhā.ī detā hai 
ḳhizāñ ke zard dinoñ kī siyāh rātoñ meñ kisī kā phuul sā chehra dikhā.ī detā hai 
kahīñ mile vo sar-e-rāh to lipaT jaa.eñ bas ab to ek hī rasta dikhā.ī detā hai 
dilon ki or dhuan sa dikhai deta hai ye shahr to mujhe jalta dikhai deta hai 
jahan ki dagh hai yan aage dard rahta tha magar ye dagh bhi jata dikhai deta hai 
pukarti hain bhare shahr ki guzargahen wo roz sham ko tanha dikhai deta hai 
ye log TuTi hui kashtiyon mein sote hain mere makan se dariya dikhai deta hai 
KHizan ke zard dinon ki siyah raaton mein kisi ka phul sa chehra dikhai deta hai 
kahin mile wo sar-e-rah to lipaT jaen bas ab to ek hi rasta dikhai deta hai

achchhā huā maiñ vaqt ke mehvar se kaT gayā qatra guhar banā jo samundar se kaT gayā 
zinda jo bach ga.e haiñ saheñ nafratoñ ke dukh apnā galā to pyaar ke ḳhanjar se kaT gayā 
mausam bhī munfa.il hai bahut kyā bharūñ uḌaan rishta havāoñ kā mire shahpar se kaT gayā 
palkoñ par apnī kaun mujhe ab sajā.egā maiñ huuñ vo rañg jo tire paikar se kaT gayā 
vo mel-jol husn o basīrat meñ ab kahāñ jo silsila thā phuul kā patthar se kaT gayā 
maiñ dhuup kā hisār huuñ tū chhāñv kī fasīl terā mirā hisāb barābar se kaT gayā 
kitnā baḌā azaab hai bātin kī kashmakash ā.īna sab kā garmī-e-jauhar se kaT gayā 
sab apnī apnī zaat ke zindāñ meñ band haiñ muddat huī ki rābta bāhar se kaT gayā 
dekhā gayā na mujh se ma.ānī kā qatl-e-ām chup-chāp maiñ hī lafzoñ ke lashkar se kaT gayā 
us ke anā kī vaz.a thī sab se alag 'fazā' kyā shaḳhs thā ki apne hī tevar se kaT gayā 
achchha hua main waqt ke mehwar se kaT gaya qatra guhar bana jo samundar se kaT gaya 
zinda jo bach gae hain sahen nafraton ke dukh apna gala to pyar ke KHanjar se kaT gaya 
mausam bhi munfail hai bahut kya bharun uDan rishta hawaon ka mere shahpar se kaT gaya 
palkon par apni kaun mujhe ab sajaega main hun wo rang jo tere paikar se kaT gaya 
wo mel-jol husn o basirat mein ab kahan jo silsila tha phul ka patthar se kaT gaya 
main dhup ka hisar hun tu chhanw ki fasil tera mera hisab barabar se kaT gaya 
kitna baDa azab hai baatin ki kashmakash aaina sab ka garmi-e-jauhar se kaT gaya 
sab apni apni zat ke zindan mein band hain muddat hui ki rabta bahar se kaT gaya 
dekha gaya na mujh se maani ka qatl-e-am chup-chap main hi lafzon ke lashkar se kaT gaya 
us ke ana ki waza thi sab se alag 'faza' kya shaKHs tha ki apne hi tewar se kaT gaya

pairoñ ko mire dīda-e-tar bāñdhe hue hai zanjīr kī sūrat mujhe ghar bāñdhe hue hai 
har chehre meñ aatā hai nazar ek hī chehrā lagtā hai koī merī nazar bāñdhe hue hai 
bichhḌeñge to mar jā.eñge ham donoñ bichhaḌ kar ik Dor meñ ham ko yahī Dar bāñdhe hue hai 
parvāz kī tāqat bhī nahīñ baaqī hai lekin sayyād abhī tak mire par bāñdhe hue hai 
ham haiñ ki kabhī zabt kā dāman nahīñ chhoḌā dil hai ki dhaḌakne pe kamar bāñdhe hue hai 
āñkheñ to use ghar se nikalne nahīñ detīñ aañsū hai ki sāmān-e-safar bāñdhe hue hai 
pheñkī na 'munavvar' ne buzurgoñ kī nishānī dastār purānī hai magar bāñdhe hue hai 
pairon ko mere dida-e-tar bandhe hue hai zanjir ki surat mujhe ghar bandhe hue hai 
har chehre mein aata hai nazar ek hi chehra lagta hai koi meri nazar bandhe hue hai 
bichhDenge to mar jaenge hum donon bichhaD kar ek Dor mein hum ko yahi Dar bandhe hue hai 
parwaz ki taqat bhi nahin baqi hai lekin sayyaad abhi tak mere par bandhe hue hai 
hum hain ki kabhi zabt ka daman nahin chhoDa dil hai ki dhaDakne pe kamar bandhe hue hai 
aankhen to use ghar se nikalne nahin detin aansu hai ki saman-e-safar bandhe hue hai 
phenki na 'munawwar' ne buzurgon ki nishani dastar purani hai magar bandhe hue hai

laraz uThā hai mire dil meñ kyuuñ na jaane diyā tirā payām to ḳhāmosh sī havā ne diyā 
jalā rahā thā mujhe maiñ ne bhī jalāne diyā ujālā us ne diyā bhī to kis bahāne diyā 
abhī kuchh aur Thahar jaatā mere kahne par vo jaane vaalā thā ḳhud hī so maiñ ne jaane diyā 
vo apnī sair ke qisse mujhe sunātā rahā mujhe to hāl-e-dil us ne kahāñ sunāne diyā 
maiñ shukr us kā na kaise adā karūñ jānāñ shu.ūr mujh ko mohabbat kā jis ḳhudā ne diyā 
karam ke pal meñ ye raushan huā ba-hamdillāh nahīñ bujhegā mirā tujh se ai zamāne diyā 
'shumār' sāmne us ke bhī guftugū ke vaqt jo rañg chehre pe aayā thā maiñ ne aane diyā 
laraz uTha hai mere dil mein kyun na jaane diya tera payam to KHamosh si hawa ne diya 
jala raha tha mujhe main ne bhi jalane diya ujala us ne diya bhi to kis bahane diya 
abhi kuchh aur Thahar jata mere kahne par wo jaane wala tha KHud hi so main ne jaane diya 
wo apni sair ke qisse mujhe sunata raha mujhe to haal-e-dil us ne kahan sunane diya 
main shukr us ka na kaise ada karun jaanan shuur mujh ko mohabbat ka jis KHuda ne diya 
karam ke pal mein ye raushan hua ba-hamdillah nahin bujhega mera tujh se ai zamane diya 
'shumar' samne us ke bhi guftugu ke waqt jo rang chehre pe aaya tha main ne aane diya

har haal meñ rahā jo tirā aasrā mujhe māyūs kar sakā na hujūm-e-balā mujhe 
har naġhme ne unhīñ kī talab kā diyā payām har saaz ne unhīñ kī sunā.ī sadā mujhe 
har baat meñ unhīñ kī ḳhushī kā rahā ḳhayāl har kaam se ġharaz hai unhīñ kī razā mujhe 
rahtā huuñ ġharq un ke tasavvur meñ roz o shab mastī kā paḌ gayā hai kuchh aisā mazā mujhe 
rakhiye na mujh pe tark-e-mohabbat kī tohmateñ jis kā ḳhayāl tak bhī nahīñ hai ravā mujhe 
kaafī hai un ke pā-e-hinā-basta kā ḳhayāl haath aa.ī ḳhuub soz-e-jigar kī davā mujhe 
kyā kahte ho ki aur lagā lo kisī se dil tum sā nazar bhī aa.e koī dūsrā mujhe 
begāna-e-adab kiye detī hai kyā karūñ us mahv-e-nāz kī nigah-e-āshnā mujhe 
us be-nishāñ ke milne kī 'hasrat' huī umiid āb-e-baqā se baḌh ke hai zahr-e-fanā mujhe 
har haal mein raha jo tera aasra mujhe mayus kar saka na hujum-e-bala mujhe 
har naghme ne unhin ki talab ka diya payam har saz ne unhin ki sunai sada mujhe 
har baat mein unhin ki KHushi ka raha KHayal har kaam se gharaz hai unhin ki raza mujhe 
rahta hun gharq un ke tasawwur mein roz o shab masti ka paD gaya hai kuchh aisa maza mujhe 
rakhiye na mujh pe tark-e-mohabbat ki tohmaten jis ka KHayal tak bhi nahin hai rawa mujhe 
kafi hai un ke pa-e-hina-basta ka KHayal hath aai KHub soz-e-jigar ki dawa mujhe 
kya kahte ho ki aur laga lo kisi se dil tum sa nazar bhi aae koi dusra mujhe 
begana-e-adab kiye deti hai kya karun us mahw-e-naz ki nigah-e-ashna mujhe 
us be-nishan ke milne ki 'hasrat' hui umid aab-e-baqa se baDh ke hai zahr-e-fana mujhe

shajar samajh ke mirā ehtirām karte haiñ parinde raat ko mujh meñ qayām karte haiñ 
suno tum āḳhir-e-shab guftugū daraḳhtoñ kī ye kam-kalām bhī kyā kyā kalām karte haiñ 
kahāñ kī zindagī ham ko to sharm maar ga.ī ki terī chiiz hai aur tere naam karte haiñ 
hameñ to is liye jā-e-namāz chāhiye hai ki ham vajūd se bāhar qayām karte haiñ 
agar kabhī mujhe maujūdgāñ se fursat ho to raftagāñ mirī nīñdeñ harām karte haiñ 
lahū ke ghūñT na piitā to aur kyā kartā vo kah rahe the tirā intizām karte haiñ 
hameñ samā.at-e-be-lafz kī ijāzat hai hamāre saath parinde kalām karte haiñ 
abhī to ghar meñ na baiTheñ kaho buzurgoñ se abhī to shahr ke bachche salām karte haiñ 
shajar samajh ke mera ehtiram karte hain parinde raat ko mujh mein qayam karte hain 
suno tum aaKHir-e-shab guftugu daraKHton ki ye kam-kalam bhi kya kya kalam karte hain 
kahan ki zindagi hum ko to sharm mar gai ki teri chiz hai aur tere nam karte hain 
hamein to is liye ja-e-namaz chahiye hai ki hum wajud se bahar qayam karte hain 
agar kabhi mujhe maujudgan se fursat ho to raftagan meri ninden haram karte hain 
lahu ke ghunT na pita to aur kya karta wo kah rahe the tera intizam karte hain 
hamein samaat-e-be-lafz ki ijazat hai hamare sath parinde kalam karte hain 
abhi to ghar mein na baiThen kaho buzurgon se abhi to shahr ke bachche salam karte hain

lubhātā hai agarche husn-e-dariyā Dar rahā huuñ maiñ sabab ye hai ki ik muddat kināre par rahā huuñ maiñ 
ye jhoñke jin se dil meñ tāzgī āñkhoñ meñ ThanDak hai inhī jhoñkoñ se murjhāyā huā shab bhar rahā huuñ maiñ 
tire aane kā din hai tere raste meñ bichhāne ko chamaktī dhuup meñ saa.e ikaTThe kar rahā huuñ maiñ 
koī kamra hai jis ke taaq meñ ik sham.a jaltī hai añdherī raat hai aur saañs lete Dar rahā huuñ maiñ 
mujhe ma.alūm hai ahl-e-vafā par kyā guzartī hai samajh kar soch kar tujh se mohabbat kar rahā huuñ maiñ 
lubhata hai agarche husn-e-dariya Dar raha hun main sabab ye hai ki ek muddat kinare par raha hun main 
ye jhonke jin se dil mein tazgi aankhon mein ThanDak hai inhi jhonkon se murjhaya hua shab bhar raha hun main 
tere aane ka din hai tere raste mein bichhane ko chamakti dhup mein sae ikaTThe kar raha hun main 
koi kamra hai jis ke taq mein ek shama jalti hai andheri raat hai aur sans lete Dar raha hun main 
mujhe malum hai ahl-e-wafa par kya guzarti hai samajh kar soch kar tujh se mohabbat kar raha hun main

judā hue vo log ki jin ko saath meñ aanā thā ik aisā moḌ bhī hamārī raat meñ aanā thā 
tujh se bichhaḌ jaane kā ġham kuchh ḳhaas nahīñ ham ko ek na ik din khoT hamārī zaat meñ aanā thā 
āñkhoñ ko ye kahte sunte rahte haiñ har dam sūkhe ko aanā thā aur barsāt meñ aanā thā 
ik lambī sunsān saḌak par tanhā phirte haiñ vo aahaT thī ham ko na us kī baat meñ aanā thā 
ai yaado tum aise kyuuñ is vaqt kahāñ aa.iiñ kisī munāsib vaqt na.e hālāt meñ aanā thā 
juda hue wo log ki jin ko sath mein aana tha ek aisa moD bhi hamari raat mein aana tha 
tujh se bichhaD jaane ka gham kuchh KHas nahin hum ko ek na ek din khoT hamari zat mein aana tha 
aankhon ko ye kahte sunte rahte hain har dam sukhe ko aana tha aur barsat mein aana tha 
ek lambi sunsan saDak par tanha phirte hain wo aahaT thi hum ko na us ki baat mein aana tha 
ai yaado tum aise kyun is waqt kahan aain kisi munasib waqt nae haalat mein aana tha

dhartī par sab dard ke maare kis ke haiñ āsmān par chāñd sitāre kis ke haiñ 
sunte haiñ vo shaḳhs to ghar hī badal gayā phir ye dil-āvez ishāre kis ke haiñ 
kis sahrā kī dhuul hai sab kī āñkhoñ meñ be-mauj o be-rūd kināre kis ke haiñ 
ab kyā sochnā aisī-vaisī bātoñ pe un hāthoñ ne baal sañvāre kis ke haiñ 
kaun hai is rim-jhim ke pīchhe chhupā huā ye aañsū saare ke saare kis ke haiñ 
kisī pahāḌ kī choTī par chaḌh kar dekho āñkhoñ se ojhal nazzāre kis ke haiñ 
dharti par sab dard ke mare kis ke hain aasman par chand sitare kis ke hain 
sunte hain wo shaKHs to ghar hi badal gaya phir ye dil-awez ishaare kis ke hain 
kis sahra ki dhul hai sab ki aankhon mein be-mauj o be-rud kinare kis ke hain 
ab kya sochna aisi-waisi baaton pe un hathon ne baal sanware kis ke hain 
kaun hai is rim-jhim ke pichhe chhupa hua ye aansu sare ke sare kis ke hain 
kisi pahaD ki choTi par chaDh kar dekho aankhon se ojhal nazzare kis ke hain

jab chalā vo mujh ko bismil ḳhuuñ meñ ġhaltāñ chhoḌ kar kyā hī pachhtātā thā maiñ qātil kā dāmāñ chhoḌ kar 
maiñ vo majnūñ huuñ jo niklūñ kunj-e-zindāñ chhoḌ kar seb-e-jannat tak na khā.ūñ sañg-e-tiflāñ chhoḌ kar 
piive merā hī lahū maanī jo lab us shoḳh ke khīñche to shañgarf se ḳhūn-e-shahīdāñ chhoḌ kar 
maiñ huuñ vo gumnām jab daftar meñ naam aayā mirā rah gayā bas munshi-e-qudart jagah vaañ chhoḌ kar 
sāya-e-sarv-e-chaman tujh bin Darātā hai mujhe saañp sā paanī meñ ai sarv-ḳhirāmāñ chhoḌ kar 
ho gayā tiflī hī se dil meñ tarāzū tīr-e-ishq bhāge haiñ maktab se ham aurāq-e-mīzāñ chhoḌ kar 
ahl-e-jauhar ko vatan meñ rahne detā gar falak laal kyuuñ is rañg se aatā badaḳhshāñ chhoḌ kar 
shauq hai us ko bhī tarz-e-nāla-e-ushshāq se dam-ba-dam chheḌe hai muñh se dūd-e-qulyāñ chhoḌ kar 
dil to lagte hī lage gā hūryān-e-adn se bāġh-e-hastī se chalā huuñ haa.e pariyāñ chhoḌ kar 
ghar se bhī vāqif nahīñ us ke ki jis ke vāste baiThe haiñ ghar-bār ham sab ḳhāna-vīrāñ chhoḌ kar 
vasl meñ gar hove mujh ko rūyat-e-māh-e-rajab rū-e-jānāñ hī ko dekhūñ maiñ to qur.āñ chhoḌ kar 
in dinoñ garche dakan meñ hai baḌī qadr-e-suḳhan kaun jaa.e 'zauq' par dillī kī galiyāñ chhoḌ kar 
jab chala wo mujh ko bismil KHun mein ghaltan chhoD kar kya hi pachhtata tha main qatil ka daman chhoD kar 
main wo majnun hun jo niklun kunj-e-zindan chhoD kar seb-e-jannat tak na khaun sang-e-tiflan chhoD kar 
piwe mera hi lahu mani jo lab us shoKH ke khinche to shangarf se KHun-e-shahidan chhoD kar 
main hun wo gumnam jab daftar mein nam aaya mera rah gaya bas munshi-e-qudart jagah wan chhoD kar 
saya-e-sarw-e-chaman tujh bin Daraata hai mujhe sanp sa pani mein ai sarw-KHiraman chhoD kar 
ho gaya tifli hi se dil mein taraazu tir-e-ishq bhage hain maktab se hum auraq-e-mizan chhoD kar 
ahl-e-jauhar ko watan mein rahne deta gar falak lal kyun is rang se aata badaKHshan chhoD kar 
shauq hai us ko bhi tarz-e-nala-e-ushshaq se dam-ba-dam chheDe hai munh se dud-e-qulyan chhoD kar 
dil to lagte hi lage ga huryan-e-adn se bagh-e-hasti se chala hun hae pariyan chhoD kar 
ghar se bhi waqif nahin us ke ki jis ke waste baiThe hain ghar-bar hum sab KHana-viran chhoD kar 
wasl mein gar howe mujh ko ruyat-e-mah-e-rajab ru-e-jaanan hi ko dekhun main to quran chhoD kar 
in dinon garche dakan mein hai baDi qadr-e-suKHan kaun jae 'zauq' par dilli ki galiyan chhoD kar

hote hote chashm se aaj ashk-bārī rah ga.ī aabrū baare tirī abr-e-bahārī rah ga.ī 
aate aate is taraf un kī savārī rah ga.ī dil kī dil meñ ārzū-e-jāñ-nisārī rah ga.ī 
ham ko ḳhatra thā ki logoñ meñ thā charchā aur kuchh baat ḳhat aane se tere par hamārī rah ga.ī 
TukḌe TukḌe ho ke uḌ jā.egā sab sañg-e-mazār dil meñ ba.ad-az-marg kuchh gar be-qarārī rah ga.ī 
itnā miliye ḳhaak meñ jo ḳhaak meñ DhūñDe koī ḳhāksārī ḳhaak kī gar ḳhāksārī rah ga.ī 
aao gar aanā hai kyuuñ gin gin ke rakhte ho qadam aur koī dam kī hai yaañ dam-shumārī rah ga.ī 
ho gayā jis din se apne dil par us ko iḳhtiyār iḳhtiyār apnā gayā be-iḳhtiyārī rah ga.ī 
jab qadam us kāfir-e-bad-kesh kī jānib baḌhe duur pahuñche sau qadam parhez-gārī rah ga.ī 
khīñchte hī teġh adā ke dam huā apnā havā aah dil meñ ārzū-e-zaḳhm-e-kārī rah ga.ī 
aur to ġham-ḳhvār saare kar chuke ġham-ḳhvārgī ab faqat hai ek ġham kī ġham-gusārī rah ga.ī 
shikva ayyārī kā yāroñ se bajā hai ai 'zafar' is zamāne meñ yahī hai rasm-e-yārī rah ga.ī 
hote hote chashm se aaj ashk-bari rah gai aabru bare teri abr-e-bahaari rah gai 
aate aate is taraf un ki sawari rah gai dil ki dil mein aarzu-e-jaan-nisari rah gai 
hum ko KHatra tha ki logon mein tha charcha aur kuchh baat KHat aane se tere par hamari rah gai 
TukDe TukDe ho ke uD jaega sab sang-e-mazar dil mein baad-az-marg kuchh gar be-qarari rah gai 
itna miliye KHak mein jo KHak mein DhunDe koi KHaksari KHak ki gar KHaksari rah gai 
aao gar aana hai kyun gin gin ke rakhte ho qadam aur koi dam ki hai yan dam-shumari rah gai 
ho gaya jis din se apne dil par us ko iKHtiyar iKHtiyar apna gaya be-iKHtiyari rah gai 
jab qadam us kafir-e-bad-kesh ki jaanib baDhe dur pahunche sau qadam parhez-gari rah gai 
khinchte hi tegh ada ke dam hua apna hawa aah dil mein aarzu-e-zaKHm-e-kari rah gai 
aur to gham-KHwar sare kar chuke gham-KHwargi ab faqat hai ek gham ki gham-gusari rah gai 
shikwa ayyari ka yaron se baja hai ai 'zafar' is zamane mein yahi hai rasm-e-yari rah gai

jo tum se pahle aa.e the un kī kāristānī dekho gaañv se nikle ho to ab shahroñ kī vīrānī dekho 
sote meñ marne kā mauqa.a mil jaatā hai sab logoñ ko phir bhī zinda uTh jaate haiñ logoñ kī nādānī dekho 
rokoge to phaT jā.ūñgā yaaro tum bas itnā karnā kuchh mat kahnā mujh se jab merī āñkhoñ meñ paanī dekho 
sātoñ aalam sar karne ke ba.ad ik din kī chhuTTī le kar ghar meñ chiḌiyoñ ke gaane par bachchoñ kī hairānī dekho 
itne fir.aunoñ ko māroge to kyā tum bach jāoge mūsā-jī ye ġhussa chhoḌo aur apnī āsānī dekho 
jo tum se pahle aae the un ki karistani dekho ganw se nikle ho to ab shahron ki virani dekho 
sote mein marne ka mauqa mil jata hai sab logon ko phir bhi zinda uTh jate hain logon ki nadani dekho 
rokoge to phaT jaunga yaro tum bas itna karna kuchh mat kahna mujh se jab meri aankhon mein pani dekho 
saton aalam sar karne ke baad ek din ki chhuTTi le kar ghar mein chiDiyon ke gane par bachchon ki hairani dekho 
itne firaunon ko maroge to kya tum bach jaoge musa-ji ye ghussa chhoDo aur apni aasani dekho

vo jo vīrān phirā kartā hai us ke sar meñ koī sahrā hogā 
tujh se dil tere parastāroñ kā TūTte TūTte TuuTā hogā 
jhuk ke jo aap se miltā hogā us kā qad aap se ūñchā hogā 
vo jo marne pe tulā hai 'aḳhtar' us ne jī kar bhī to dekhā hogā 
wo jo viran phira karta hai us ke sar mein koi sahra hoga 
tujh se dil tere parastaron ka TuTte TuTte TuTa hoga 
jhuk ke jo aap se milta hoga us ka qad aap se uncha hoga 
wo jo marne pe tula hai 'aKHtar' us ne ji kar bhi to dekha hoga

apne āñchal meñ chhupā kar mire aañsū le jā yaad rakhne ko mulāqāt ke jugnū le jā 
maiñ jise DhūñDne niklā thā use pā na sakā ab jidhar jī tirā chāhe mujhe ḳhushbū le jā 
aa zarā der ko aur mujh se mulāqāt ke ba.ad sochne ke liye raushan koī pahlū le jā 
hādse ūñchī uḌānoñ meñ bahut hote haiñ tajraba tujh ko nahīñ hai mire baazū le jā 
jo bhī ab haath milātā hai tujhe pūchhtā hai aa mire hāthoñ se ye lams kī ḳhushbū le jā 
log us shahr meñ kyā jaane hoñ kaise kaise merā lahja mire iḳhlās kā jaadū le jā 
apne aanchal mein chhupa kar mere aansu le ja yaad rakhne ko mulaqat ke jugnu le ja 
main jise DhunDne nikla tha use pa na saka ab jidhar ji tera chahe mujhe KHushbu le ja 
aa zara der ko aur mujh se mulaqat ke baad sochne ke liye raushan koi pahlu le ja 
hadse unchi uDanon mein bahut hote hain tajraba tujh ko nahin hai mere bazu le ja 
jo bhi ab hath milata hai tujhe puchhta hai aa mere hathon se ye lams ki KHushbu le ja 
log us shahr mein kya jaane hon kaise kaise mera lahja mere iKHlas ka jadu le ja

nibāh baat kā us hīla-gar se kuchh na huā idhar se kyā na huā par udhar se kuchh na huā 
javāb-e-sāf to laatā agar na laatā ḳhat likhā nasīb kā jo nāma-bar se kuchh na huā 
hamesha fitne hī barpā kiye mire sar par huā ye aur to us fitna-gar se kuchh na huā 
balā se girya-e-shab tū hī kuchh asar kartā agarche ishq meñ āh-e-sahar se kuchh na huā 
jalā jalā ke kiyā sham.a saañ tamām mujhe bas aur to mujhe soz-e-jigar se kuchh na huā 
rahīñ adū se vahī garm-joshiyāñ us kī is āh-e-sard aur is chashm-e-tar se kuchh na huā 
uThāyā ishq meñ kyā kyā na dard-e-sar maiñ ne husūl par mujhe us dard-e-sar se kuchh na huā 
shab-e-visāl meñ bhī merī jaan ko ārām azīzo dard-e-judā.ī ke Dar se kuchh na huā 
na dūñgā dil use maiñ ye hamesha kahtā thā vo aaj le hī gayā aur 'zafar' se kuchh na huā 
nibah baat ka us hila-gar se kuchh na hua idhar se kya na hua par udhar se kuchh na hua 
jawab-e-saf to lata agar na lata KHat likha nasib ka jo nama-bar se kuchh na hua 
hamesha fitne hi barpa kiye mere sar par hua ye aur to us fitna-gar se kuchh na hua 
bala se girya-e-shab tu hi kuchh asar karta agarche ishq mein aah-e-sahar se kuchh na hua 
jala jala ke kiya shama san tamam mujhe bas aur to mujhe soz-e-jigar se kuchh na hua 
rahin adu se wahi garm-joshiyan us ki is aah-e-sard aur is chashm-e-tar se kuchh na hua 
uThaya ishq mein kya kya na dard-e-sar main ne husul par mujhe us dard-e-sar se kuchh na hua 
shab-e-visal mein bhi meri jaan ko aaram azizo dard-e-judai ke Dar se kuchh na hua 
na dunga dil use main ye hamesha kahta tha wo aaj le hi gaya aur 'zafar' se kuchh na hua

ham ko divāna jaan ke kyā kyā zulm na Dhāyā logoñ ne diin chhuḌāyā dharm chhuḌāyā des chhuḌāyā logoñ ne 
terī galī meñ aa nikle the dosh hamārā itnā thā patthar maare tohmat bāñdhī aib lagāyā logoñ ne 
terī laToñ meñ so lete the be-ghar āshiq be-ghar log būḌhe bargad aaj tujhe bhī kaaT girāyā logoñ ne 
nūr-e-sahar ne nik.hat-e-gul ne rañg-e-shafaq ne kah dī baat kitnā kitnā merī zabāñ par qufl lagāyā logoñ ne 
'mīr-taqī' ke rañg kā ġhāza rū-e-ġhazal par aa na sakā 'kaif' hamāre 'mīr-taqī' kā rañg uḌāyā logoñ ne 
hum ko diwana jaan ke kya kya zulm na Dhaya logon ne din chhuDaya dharm chhuDaya des chhuDaya logon ne 
teri gali mein aa nikle the dosh hamara itna tha patthar mare tohmat bandhi aib lagaya logon ne 
teri laTon mein so lete the be-ghar aashiq be-ghar log buDhe bargad aaj tujhe bhi kaT giraya logon ne 
nur-e-sahar ne nikhat-e-gul ne rang-e-shafaq ne kah di baat kitna kitna meri zaban par qufl lagaya logon ne 
'mir-taqi' ke rang ka ghaza ru-e-ghazal par aa na saka 'kaif' hamare 'mir-taqi' ka rang uDaya logon ne

ye jab hai ki ik ḳhvāb se rishta hai hamārā din Dhalte hī dil Dūbne lagtā hai hamārā 
chehroñ ke samundar se guzarte rahe phir bhī ik aks ko ā.īna tarastā hai hamārā 
un logoñ se kyā kahiye ki kyā biit rahī hai ahvāl magar tū to samajhtā hai hamārā 
har moḌ pe paḌtā hai hameñ vāsta is se duniyā se alag kahne ko rasta hai hamārā 
ye jab hai ki ek KHwab se rishta hai hamara din Dhalte hi dil Dubne lagta hai hamara 
chehron ke samundar se guzarte rahe phir bhi ek aks ko aaina tarasta hai hamara 
un logon se kya kahiye ki kya bit rahi hai ahwal magar tu to samajhta hai hamara 
har moD pe paDta hai hamein wasta is se duniya se alag kahne ko rasta hai hamara

girte haiñ log garmī-e-bāzār dekh kar sarkār dekh kar mirī sarkār dekh kar 
āvārgī kā shauq bhaḌaktā hai aur bhī terī galī kā sāya-e-dīvār dekh kar 
taskīn-e-dil kī ek hī tadbīr hai faqat sar phoḌ lījiye koī dīvār dekh kar 
ham bhī ga.e haiñ hosh se saaqī kabhī kabhī lekin tirī nigāh ke atvār dekh kar 
kyā mustaqil ilaaj kiyā dil ke dard kā vo muskurā diye mujhe bīmār dekh kar 
dekhā kisī kī samt to kyā ho gayā 'adam' chalte haiñ rāh-rau sar-e-bāzār dekh kar 
girte hain log garmi-e-bazar dekh kar sarkar dekh kar meri sarkar dekh kar 
aawargi ka shauq bhaDakta hai aur bhi teri gali ka saya-e-diwar dekh kar 
taskin-e-dil ki ek hi tadbir hai faqat sar phoD lijiye koi diwar dekh kar 
hum bhi gae hain hosh se saqi kabhi kabhi lekin teri nigah ke atwar dekh kar 
kya mustaqil ilaj kiya dil ke dard ka wo muskura diye mujhe bimar dekh kar 
dekha kisi ki samt to kya ho gaya 'adam' chalte hain rah-rau sar-e-bazar dekh kar

dil markaz-e-hijāb banāyā na jā.egā un se bhī rāz-e-ishq chhupāyā na jā.egā 
sar ko kabhī qadam pe jhukāyā na jā.egā un ke nuqūsh-e-pā ko miTāyā na jā.egā 
be-vaj.h intizār dikhāne se fā.eda kah dījiye ki sāmne aayā na jā.egā 
āñkhoñ meñ ashk qalb pareshāñ nazar udaas is tarah un ko chhoḌ ke jaayā na jā.egā 
vo ḳhud kaheñ to sharh-e-mohabbat bayāñ karūñ naġhma baġhair saaz sunāyā na jā.egā 
behtar yahī hai zikr-e-mohabbat na chheḌiye naqsha bigaḌ gayā to banāyā na jā.egā 
dil kī taraf 'shakīl' tavajjoh zarūr ho ye ghar ujaḌ gayā to basāyā na jā.egā 
dil markaz-e-hijab banaya na jaega un se bhi raaz-e-ishq chhupaya na jaega 
sar ko kabhi qadam pe jhukaya na jaega un ke nuqush-e-pa ko miTaya na jaega 
be-wajh intizar dikhane se faeda kah dijiye ki samne aaya na jaega 
aankhon mein ashk qalb pareshan nazar udas is tarah un ko chhoD ke jaya na jaega 
wo KHud kahen to sharh-e-mohabbat bayan karun naghma baghair saz sunaya na jaega 
behtar yahi hai zikr-e-mohabbat na chheDiye naqsha bigaD gaya to banaya na jaega 
dil ki taraf 'shakil' tawajjoh zarur ho ye ghar ujaD gaya to basaya na jaega

zarā sī der thī bas ik diyā jalānā thā aur is ke ba.ad faqat āñdhiyoñ ko aanā thā 
maiñ ghar ko phūñk rahā thā baḌe yaqīn ke saath ki terī raah meñ pahlā qadam uThānā thā 
vagarna kaun uThātā ye jism o jaañ ke azaab ye zindagī to mohabbat kā ik bahāna thā 
ye kaun shaḳhs mujhe kirchiyoñ meñ baañT gayā ye aa.ina to mirā āḳhirī Thikāna thā 
pahāḌ bhāñp rahā thā mire irāde ko vo is liye bhī ki tesha mujhe uThānā thā 
bahut sambhāl ke laayā huuñ ik sitāre tak zamīn par jo mire ishq kā zamāna thā 
milā to aise ki sadiyoñ kī āshnā.ī ho! ta.āruf us se bhī hālāñki ġhā.ebāna thā 
maiñ apnī ḳhaak meñ rakhtā huuñ jis ko sadiyoñ se ye raushnī bhī kabhī merā āstāna thā 
maiñ haath hāthoñ meñ us ke na de sakā thā 'shumār' vo jis kī muTThī meñ lamha baḌā suhānā thā 
zara si der thi bas ek diya jalana tha aur is ke baad faqat aandhiyon ko aana tha 
main ghar ko phunk raha tha baDe yaqin ke sath ki teri rah mein pahla qadam uThana tha 
wagarna kaun uThata ye jism o jaan ke azab ye zindagi to mohabbat ka ek bahana tha 
ye kaun shaKHs mujhe kirchiyon mein banT gaya ye aaina to mera aaKHiri Thikana tha 
pahaD bhanp raha tha mere irade ko wo is liye bhi ki tesha mujhe uThana tha 
bahut sambhaal ke laya hun ek sitare tak zamin par jo mere ishq ka zamana tha 
mila to aise ki sadiyon ki aashnai ho! taaruf us se bhi haalanki ghaebana tha 
main apni KHak mein rakhta hun jis ko sadiyon se ye raushni bhi kabhi mera aastana tha 
main hath hathon mein us ke na de saka tha 'shumar' wo jis ki muTThi mein lamha baDa suhana tha

ghar se be-zār huuñ college meñ tabī.at na lage itnī achchhī bhī kisī shaḳhs kī sūrat na lage 
ek ik inch pe us jism ke sattar sattar bose liije to bhalā kyuuñ vo qayāmat na lage 
zahr mīThā ho to piine meñ mazā aatā hai baat sach kahiye magar yuuñ ki haqīqat na lage 
ā.īna-aks mire haath tajallī ġhā.eb mere dushman ko bhī yā-rab mirī aadat na lage 
ghar se be-zar hun college mein tabiat na lage itni achchhi bhi kisi shaKHs ki surat na lage 
ek ek inch pe us jism ke sattar sattar bose lije to bhala kyun wo qayamat na lage 
zahr miTha ho to pine mein maza aata hai baat sach kahiye magar yun ki haqiqat na lage 
aaina-aks mere hath tajalli ghaeb mere dushman ko bhi ya-rab meri aadat na lage

ḳhū samajh meñ nahīñ aatī tire dīvānoñ kī dāmanoñ kī na ḳhabar hai na girebānoñ kī 
jalva-e-sāġhar-o-mīnā hai jo ham-rañg-e-bahār raunaqeñ turfa taraqqī pe haiñ mai-ḳhānoñ kī 
har taraf be-ḳhudī o be-ḳhabarī kī hai numūd qābil-e-dīd hai duniyā tire hairānoñ kī 
sahl is se to yahī hai ki sambhāleñ dil ko minnateñ kaun kare aap ke darbānoñ kī 
aañkh vaale tirī sūrat pe miTe jaate haiñ sham-e-mahfil kī taraf bhiiḌ hai parvānoñ kī 
ai jafākār tire ahd se pahle to na thī kasrat is darja mohabbat ke pashīmānoñ kī 
rāz-e-ġham se hameñ āgāh kiyā ḳhuub kiyā kuchh nihāyat hī nahīñ aap ke ehsānoñ kī 
dushman-e-ahl-e-muravvat hai vo begāna-e-uns shakl pariyoñ kī hai ḳhū bhī nahīñ insānoñ kī 
hamrah-e-ġhair mubārak unheñ gul-gasht-e-chaman sair ham ko bhī mayassar hai bayābānoñ kī 
ik bakheḌā hai nazar meñ sar-o-sāmān-e-vajūd ab ye hālat hai tire soḳhta-sāmānoñ kī 
faiz-e-sāqī kī ajab dhuum hai mai-ḳhānoñ meñ har taraf mai kī talab maañg hai paimānoñ kī 
āshiqoñ hī kā jigar hai ki haiñ ḳhursañd-e-jafā kāfiroñ kī hai ye himmat na musalmānoñ kī 
yaad phir taaza huī haal se tere 'hasrat' qais o farhād ke guzre hue afsānoñ kī 
KHu samajh mein nahin aati tere diwanon ki damanon ki na KHabar hai na girebanon ki 
jalwa-e-saghar-o-mina hai jo ham-rang-e-bahaar raunaqen turfa taraqqi pe hain mai-KHanon ki 
har taraf be-KHudi o be-KHabari ki hai numud qabil-e-did hai duniya tere hairanon ki 
sahl is se to yahi hai ki sambhaalen dil ko minnaten kaun kare aap ke darbanon ki 
aankh wale teri surat pe miTe jate hain sham-e-mahfil ki taraf bhiD hai parwanon ki 
ai jafakar tere ahd se pahle to na thi kasrat is darja mohabbat ke pashimanon ki 
raaz-e-gham se hamein aagah kiya KHub kiya kuchh nihayat hi nahin aap ke ehsanon ki 
dushman-e-ahl-e-murawwat hai wo begana-e-uns shakl pariyon ki hai KHu bhi nahin insanon ki 
hamrah-e-ghair mubarak unhen gul-gasht-e-chaman sair hum ko bhi mayassar hai bayabanon ki 
ek bakheDa hai nazar mein sar-o-saman-e-wajud ab ye haalat hai tere soKHta-samanon ki 
faiz-e-saqi ki ajab dhum hai mai-KHanon mein har taraf mai ki talab mang hai paimanon ki 
aashiqon hi ka jigar hai ki hain KHursand-e-jafa kafiron ki hai ye himmat na musalmanon ki 
yaad phir taza hui haal se tere 'hasrat' qais o farhad ke guzre hue afsanon ki

kisī ke hijr meñ yuuñ TuuT kar royā nahīñ karte ye apnā rañj hai aur rañj kā charchā nahīñ karte 
judā.ī kī rutoñ meñ sūrateñ dhuñdlāne lagtī haiñ so aise mausamoñ meñ aa.ina dekhā nahīñ karte 
ziyāda se ziyāda dil bichhā dete haiñ raste meñ magar jis ne bichhaḌnā ho use rokā nahīñ karte 
hamesha ik masāfat ghūmtī rahtī hai paañv meñ safar ke ba.ad bhī kuchh log ghar pahuñchā nahīñ karte 
tanī rassī pe dariyā paar utarnā hī muqaddar ho to phir sīnoñ meñ ġharqābī kā Dar rakkhā nahīñ karte 
hameñ rusvā kiyā is niiñd meñ chalne kī aadat ne vagarna jāgte meñ ham kabhī aisā nahīñ karte 
'hasan' jab laḌkhaḌā kar apne hī paañv pe girnā ho to phir eḌī pe itnī der tak ghūmā nahīñ karte 
kisi ke hijr mein yun TuT kar roya nahin karte ye apna ranj hai aur ranj ka charcha nahin karte 
judai ki ruton mein suraten dhundlane lagti hain so aise mausamon mein aaina dekha nahin karte 
ziyaada se ziyaada dil bichha dete hain raste mein magar jis ne bichhaDna ho use roka nahin karte 
hamesha ek masafat ghumti rahti hai panw mein safar ke baad bhi kuchh log ghar pahuncha nahin karte 
tani rassi pe dariya par utarna hi muqaddar ho to phir sinon mein gharqabi ka Dar rakkha nahin karte 
hamein ruswa kiya is nind mein chalne ki aadat ne wagarna jagte mein hum kabhi aisa nahin karte 
'hasan' jab laDkhaDa kar apne hi panw pe girna ho to phir eDi pe itni der tak ghuma nahin karte

saaf kahte ho magar kuchh nahīñ khultā kahnā baat kahnā bhī tumhārā hai muammā kahnā 
ro ke us shoḳh se qāsid mirā ronā kahnā hañs paḌe us pe to phir harf-e-tamannā kahnā 
misl-e-maktūb na kahne meñ hai kyā kyā kahnā na mirī tarz-e-ḳhamoshī na kisī kā kahnā 
aur thoḌī sī shab-e-vasl baḌhā de yā-rab sub.h nazdīk hameñ un se hai kyā kyā kahnā 
phaaḌ khātā hai jo ġhairoñ ko jhapaT kar sag-e-yār maiñ ye kahtā huuñ mire sher tirā kyā kahnā 
har bun-e-mū-e-mizha meñ haiñ yahāñ sau tūfāñ ain ġhaflat hai marī aañkh ko dariyā kahnā 
vasf-e-ruḳh meñ jo sune sher vo hañs kar bole sher haiñ nuur ke hai nuur kā terā kahnā 
lā sakoge na zarā jalva-e-dīdār kī taab arinī muñh se na ai hazrat-e-mūsā kahnā 
kar liyā ahd kabhī kuchh na kaheñge muñh se ab agar sach bhī kaheñ tum hameñ jhūTā kahnā 
ḳhaak meñ zid se milāo na mire aañsū ko sachche motī ko munāsib nahīñ jhūTā kahnā 
kaise nādāñ haiñ jo achchhoñ ko burā kahte haiñ ho burā bhī to use chāhiye achchhā kahnā 
dam-e-āḳhir tū buto yaad ḳhudā karne do zindagī bhar to kiyā maiñ ne tumhārā kahnā 
paḌhte haiñ dekh ke us but ko farishte bhī darūd marhabā salle-alā salle-alā kyā kahnā 
ai buto tum jo adā aa ke karo masjid meñ lab-e-mehrāb kahe nām-e-ḳhudā kyā kahnā 
in hasīnoñ kī jo tārīf karo chiḌhte haiñ sach to ye hai ki burā hai unheñ achchhā kahnā 
shauq ka.abe liye jaatā hai havas jānib-e-dair mere allāh bajā lā.ūñ meñ kis kā kahnā 
saarī mahfil ko ishāroñ meñ luTā do ai jaan siikh lo chashm-e-suḳhan-go se latīfa kahnā 
ghaTte ghaTte meñ rahā ishq-e-kamar meñ aadhā jāma-e-tan ko mire chāhiye niimā kahnā 
meñ to āñkhoñ se bajā laatā huuñ irshād-e-huzūr aap sunte nahīñ kānoñ se bhī merā kahnā 
chustī-e-tab.a se ustād kā hai qaul 'amīr' ho zamīñ sust magar chāhiye achchhā kahnā 
saf kahte ho magar kuchh nahin khulta kahna baat kahna bhi tumhaara hai muamma kahna 
ro ke us shoKH se qasid mera rona kahna hans paDe us pe to phir harf-e-tamanna kahna 
misl-e-maktub na kahne mein hai kya kya kahna na meri tarz-e-KHamoshi na kisi ka kahna 
aur thoDi si shab-e-wasl baDha de ya-rab subh nazdik hamein un se hai kya kya kahna 
phaD khata hai jo ghairon ko jhapaT kar sag-e-yar main ye kahta hun mere sher tera kya kahna 
har bun-e-mu-e-mizha mein hain yahan sau tufan ain ghaflat hai mari aankh ko dariya kahna 
wasf-e-ruKH mein jo sune sher wo hans kar bole sher hain nur ke hai nur ka tera kahna 
la sakoge na zara jalwa-e-didar ki tab arini munh se na ai hazrat-e-musa kahna 
kar liya ahd kabhi kuchh na kahenge munh se ab agar sach bhi kahen tum hamein jhuTa kahna 
KHak mein zid se milao na mere aansu ko sachche moti ko munasib nahin jhuTa kahna 
kaise nadan hain jo achchhon ko bura kahte hain ho bura bhi to use chahiye achchha kahna 
dam-e-aKHir tu buto yaad KHuda karne do zindagi bhar to kiya main ne tumhaara kahna 
paDhte hain dekh ke us but ko farishte bhi darud marhaba salle-ala salle-ala kya kahna 
ai buto tum jo ada aa ke karo masjid mein lab-e-mehrab kahe nam-e-KHuda kya kahna 
in hasinon ki jo tarif karo chiDhte hain sach to ye hai ki bura hai unhen achchha kahna 
shauq kabe liye jata hai hawas jaanib-e-dair mere allah baja laun mein kis ka kahna 
sari mahfil ko ishaaron mein luTa do ai jaan sikh lo chashm-e-suKHan-go se latifa kahna 
ghaTte ghaTte mein raha ishq-e-kamar mein aadha jama-e-tan ko mere chahiye nima kahna 
mein to aankhon se baja lata hun irshad-e-huzur aap sunte nahin kanon se bhi mera kahna 
chusti-e-taba se ustad ka hai qaul 'amir' ho zamin sust magar chahiye achchha kahna

bichhaḌte dāmanoñ meñ phuul kī kuchh pattiyāñ rakh do ta.alluq kī girāñbārī meñ thoḌī narmiyāñ rakh do 
bhaTak jaatī haiñ tum se duur chehroñ ke ta.āqub meñ jo tum chāho mirī āñkhoñ pe apnī uñgliyāñ rakh do 
baraste bādaloñ se ghar kā āñgan Duub to jaa.e abhī kuchh der kāġhaz kī banī ye kashtiyāñ rakh do 
dhuāñ cigarette kā botal kā nasha sab dushman-e-jāñ haiñ koī kahtā hai apne haath se ye talḳhiyāñ rakh do 
bahut achchhā hai yaaro mahfiloñ meñ TuuT kar milnā koī baḌhtī huī duurī bhī apne darmiyāñ rakh do 
nuqūsh-e-ḳhāl-o-ḳhad meñ dil-navāzī kī adā kam hai hijāb-āmez āñkhoñ meñ bhī thoḌī shoḳhiyāñ rakh do 
hamīñ par ḳhatm kyuuñ ho dāstān-e-ḳhāna-vīrānī jo ghar sahrā nazar aa.e to us meñ bijliyāñ rakh do 
bichhaDte damanon mein phul ki kuchh pattiyan rakh do talluq ki giranbari mein thoDi narmiyan rakh do 
bhaTak jati hain tum se dur chehron ke taaqub mein jo tum chaho meri aankhon pe apni ungliyan rakh do 
baraste baadalon se ghar ka aangan Dub to jae abhi kuchh der kaghaz ki bani ye kashtiyan rakh do 
dhuan cigarette ka botal ka nasha sab dushman-e-jaan hain koi kahta hai apne hath se ye talKHiyan rakh do 
bahut achchha hai yaro mahfilon mein TuT kar milna koi baDhti hui duri bhi apne darmiyan rakh do 
nuqush-e-KHal-o-KHad mein dil-nawazi ki ada kam hai hijab-amez aankhon mein bhi thoDi shoKHiyan rakh do 
hamin par KHatm kyun ho dastan-e-KHana-virani jo ghar sahra nazar aae to us mein bijliyan rakh do

aane vaalī thī ḳhizāñ maidān ḳhālī kar diyā kal havā-e-shab ne saarā lawn ḳhālī kar diyā 
ham tire ḳhvāboñ kī jannat se nikal kar aa ga.e dekh terā qasr-e-ālī-shān ḳhālī kar diyā 
dushmanoñ ne shust bāñdhī ḳhema-e-ummīd par dostoñ ne darra-e-imkān ḳhālī kar diyā 
bāñTne niklā hai vo phūloñ ke tohfe shahr meñ is ḳhabar par ham ne bhī gul-dān ḳhālī kar diyā 
le gayā vo saath apne dil kī saarī raunaqeñ kis qadar ye shahr thā gunjān ḳhālī kar diyā 
saarī chiḌiyāñ uḌ ga.iiñ mujh ko akelā chhoḌ kar mere ghar kā sehn aur dālān ḳhālī kar diyā 
Diary meñ saare achchhe sher chun kar likh liye ek laḌkī ne mirā dīvān ḳhālī kar diyā 
aane wali thi KHizan maidan KHali kar diya kal hawa-e-shab ne sara lawn KHali kar diya 
hum tere KHwabon ki jannat se nikal kar aa gae dekh tera qasr-e-ali-shan KHali kar diya 
dushmanon ne shust bandhi KHema-e-ummid par doston ne darra-e-imkan KHali kar diya 
banTne nikla hai wo phulon ke tohfe shahr mein is KHabar par hum ne bhi gul-dan KHali kar diya 
le gaya wo sath apne dil ki sari raunaqen kis qadar ye shahr tha gunjaan KHali kar diya 
sari chiDiyan uD gain mujh ko akela chhoD kar mere ghar ka sehn aur dalan KHali kar diya 
Diary mein sare achchhe sher chun kar likh liye ek laDki ne mera diwan KHali kar diya

guloñ ko chhū ke shamīm-e-duā nahīñ aa.ī khulā huā thā darīcha sabā nahīñ aa.ī 
havā-e-dasht abhī to junūñ kā mausam thā kahāñ the ham tirī āvāz-e-pā nahīñ aa.ī 
abhī sahīfa-e-jāñ par raqam bhī kyā hogā abhī to yaad bhī be-sāḳhta nahīñ aa.ī 
ham itnī duur kahāñ the ki phir palaT na sakeñ savād-e-shahr se koī sadā nahīñ aa.ī 
sunā hai dil bhī nagar thā rasā basā bhī thā jalā to aañch bhī ahl-e-vafā nahīñ aa.ī 
na jaane qāfile guzre ki hai qayām abhī abhī charāġh bujhāne havā nahīñ aa.ī 
bas ek baar manāyā thā jashn-e-mahrūmī phir is ke ba.ad koī ibtilā nahīñ aa.ī 
hatheliyoñ ke gulāboñ se ḳhuun ristā rahā magar vo shoḳhī-e-rañg-e-hinā nahīñ aa.ī 
ġhayūr dil se na māñgī ga.ī murād 'adā' barasne aap hī kaalī ghaTā nahīñ aa.ī 
gulon ko chhu ke shamim-e-dua nahin aai khula hua tha daricha saba nahin aai 
hawa-e-dasht abhi to junun ka mausam tha kahan the hum teri aawaz-e-pa nahin aai 
abhi sahifa-e-jaan par raqam bhi kya hoga abhi to yaad bhi be-saKHta nahin aai 
hum itni dur kahan the ki phir palaT na saken sawad-e-shahr se koi sada nahin aai 
suna hai dil bhi nagar tha rasa basa bhi tha jala to aanch bhi ahl-e-wafa nahin aai 
na jaane qafile guzre ki hai qayam abhi abhi charagh bujhane hawa nahin aai 
bas ek bar manaya tha jashn-e-mahrumi phir is ke baad koi ibtila nahin aai 
hatheliyon ke gulabon se KHun rista raha magar wo shoKHi-e-rang-e-hina nahin aai 
ghayur dil se na mangi gai murad 'ada' barasne aap hi kali ghaTa nahin aai

yuuñ bhī hone kā patā dete haiñ apnī zanjīr hilā dete haiñ 
pahle har baat pe ham sochte the ab faqat haath uThā dete haiñ 
qāfila aaj kahāñ Thahregā kyā ḳhabar ābla-pā dete haiñ 
ba.az-auqāt havā ke jhoñke lau charāġhoñ kī baḌhā dete haiñ 
dil meñ jab baat nahīñ rah saktī kisī patthar ko sunā dete haiñ 
ek dīvār uThāne ke liye ek dīvār girā dete haiñ 
sochte haiñ sar-e-sāhil 'bāqī' ye samundar hameñ kyā dete haiñ 
yun bhi hone ka pata dete hain apni zanjir hila dete hain 
pahle har baat pe hum sochte the ab faqat hath uTha dete hain 
qafila aaj kahan Thahrega kya KHabar aabla-pa dete hain 
baz-auqat hawa ke jhonke lau charaghon ki baDha dete hain 
dil mein jab baat nahin rah sakti kisi patthar ko suna dete hain 
ek diwar uThane ke liye ek diwar gira dete hain 
sochte hain sar-e-sahil 'baqi' ye samundar hamein kya dete hain

aarzū vasl kī rakhtī hai pareshāñ kyā kyā kyā batā.ūñ ki mire dil meñ haiñ armāñ kyā kyā 
ġham azīzoñ kā hasīnoñ kī judā.ī dekhī dekheñ dikhlā.e abhī gardish-e-daurāñ kyā kyā 
un kī ḳhushbū hai fazāoñ meñ pareshāñ har sū naaz kartī hai havā-e-chamanistāñ kyā kyā 
dasht-e-ġhurbat meñ rulāte haiñ hameñ yaad aa kar ai vatan tere gul o sumbul o raihāñ kyā kyā 
ab vo bāteñ na vo rāteñ na mulāqāteñ haiñ mahfileñ ḳhvāb kī sūrat huiiñ vīrāñ kyā kyā 
hai bahār-e-gul-o-lāla mire ashkoñ kī numūd merī āñkhoñ ne khilā.e haiñ gulistāñ kyā kyā 
hai karam un ke sitam kā ki karam bhī hai sitam shikve sun sun ke vo hote haiñ pashemāñ kyā kyā 
gesū bikhre haiñ mire dosh pe kaise kaise merī āñkhoñ meñ haiñ ābād shabistāñ kyā kyā 
vaqt-e-imdād hai ai himmat-e-gustāḳhi-e-shauq shauq-añgez haiñ un ke lab-e-ḳhandāñ kyā kyā 
sair-e-gul bhī hai hameñ bā.is-e-vahshat 'aḳhtar' un kī ulfat meñ hue chaak garebāñ kyā kyā 
aarzu wasl ki rakhti hai pareshan kya kya kya bataun ki mere dil mein hain arman kya kya 
gham azizon ka hasinon ki judai dekhi dekhen dikhlae abhi gardish-e-dauran kya kya 
un ki KHushbu hai fazaon mein pareshan har su naz karti hai hawa-e-chamanistan kya kya 
dasht-e-ghurbat mein rulate hain hamein yaad aa kar ai watan tere gul o sumbul o raihan kya kya 
ab wo baaten na wo raaten na mulaqaten hain mahfilen KHwab ki surat huin viran kya kya 
hai bahaar-e-gul-o-lala mere ashkon ki numud meri aankhon ne khilae hain gulistan kya kya 
hai karam un ke sitam ka ki karam bhi hai sitam shikwe sun sun ke wo hote hain pasheman kya kya 
gesu bikhre hain mere dosh pe kaise kaise meri aankhon mein hain aabaad shabistan kya kya 
waqt-e-imdad hai ai himmat-e-gustaKHi-e-shauq shauq-angez hain un ke lab-e-KHandan kya kya 
sair-e-gul bhi hai hamein bais-e-wahshat 'aKHtar' un ki ulfat mein hue chaak gareban kya kya

ab tak shikāyateñ haiñ dil-e-bad-nasīb se ik din kisī ko dekh liyā thā qarīb se 
aksar ba-zom-e-tark-e-mohabbat ḳhudā gavāh guzrā chalā gayā huuñ dayār-e-habīb se 
dast-e-ḳhizāñ ne baḌh ke vahīñ us ko chun liyā jo phuul gir gayā nigah-e-andalīb se 
ahl-e-sukūñ se khel na ai mauj-e-imbisāt ik din ulajh ke dekh kisī ġham-nasīb se 
nā ahl-e-nāz ko bhī mile fursat-e-niyāz maiñ duur haT gayā jo vo guzre qarīb se 
ye kis ḳhatā pe ruuTh ga.ī chashm-e-iltifāt ye kab kā intiqām liyā mujh ġharīb se 
un ke baġhair bhī hai vahī zindagī kā daur hālāt-e-zindagī haiñ magar kuchh ajiib se 
samjhe hue the husn-e-azal jis ko ham 'shakīl' apnā hī aks-e-ruḳh nazar aayā qarīb se 
ab tak shikayaten hain dil-e-bad-nasib se ek din kisi ko dekh liya tha qarib se 
aksar ba-zom-e-tark-e-mohabbat KHuda gawah guzra chala gaya hun dayar-e-habib se 
dast-e-KHizan ne baDh ke wahin us ko chun liya jo phul gir gaya nigah-e-andalib se 
ahl-e-sukun se khel na ai mauj-e-imbisat ek din ulajh ke dekh kisi gham-nasib se 
na ahl-e-naz ko bhi mile fursat-e-niyaz main dur haT gaya jo wo guzre qarib se 
ye kis KHata pe ruTh gai chashm-e-iltifat ye kab ka intiqam liya mujh gharib se 
un ke baghair bhi hai wahi zindagi ka daur haalat-e-zindagi hain magar kuchh ajib se 
samjhe hue the husn-e-azal jis ko hum 'shakil' apna hi aks-e-ruKH nazar aaya qarib se

is baat kī nahīñ hai koī intihā na pūchh ai mudda.ā-e-ḳhalq mirā mudda.ā na pūchh 
kyā kah ke phuul bantī haiñ kaliyāñ gulāb kī ye raaz mujh se bulbul-e-shīrīñ-navā na pūchh 
jitne gadā-navāz the kab ke guzar chuke ab kyuuñ bichhā.e baiThe haiñ ham boriyā na pūchh 
pesh-e-nazar hai past-o-buland-e-rah-e-junūñ ham be-ḳhudoñ se qissa-e-arz-o-samā na pūchh 
sumbul se vāsta na chaman se munāsibat is zulf-e-mushk-bār kā haal ai sabā na pūchh 
sad mahfil-e-nashāt hai ik sher-e-dil-nashīñ is barbat-e-suḳhan meñ hai kis kī sadā na pūchh 
kar rahm mere jeb o garebāñ pe ham-nafas chaltī hai kū-e-yār meñ kyūñkar havā na pūchh 
rahtā nahīñ hai dahr meñ jab koī aasrā us vaqt aadmī pe guzartī hai kyā na pūchh 
har saañs meñ hai chashma-e-haivān-o-salsabīl phir bhī maiñ tishna-kām huuñ ye mājrā na pūchh 
banda tire vajūd kā munkir nahīñ magar duniyā ne kyā diye haiñ sabaq ai ḳhudā na pūchh 
kyuuñ 'josh' rāz-e-dost kī kartā hai justujū kah do koī ki shaah kā haal ai gadā na pūchh 
is baat ki nahin hai koi intiha na puchh ai muddaa-e-KHalq mera muddaa na puchh 
kya kah ke phul banti hain kaliyan gulab ki ye raaz mujh se bulbul-e-shirin-nawa na puchh 
jitne gada-nawaz the kab ke guzar chuke ab kyun bichhae baiThe hain hum boriya na puchh 
pesh-e-nazar hai past-o-buland-e-rah-e-junun hum be-KHudon se qissa-e-arz-o-sama na puchh 
sumbul se wasta na chaman se munasibat is zulf-e-mushk-bar ka haal ai saba na puchh 
sad mahfil-e-nashat hai ek sher-e-dil-nashin is barbat-e-suKHan mein hai kis ki sada na puchh 
kar rahm mere jeb o gareban pe ham-nafas chalti hai ku-e-yar mein kyunkar hawa na puchh
