rahta nahin hai dahr mein jab koi aasra us waqt aadmi pe guzarti hai kya na puchh 
har sans mein hai chashma-e-haiwan-o-salsabil phir bhi main tishna-kaam hun ye majra na puchh 
banda tere wajud ka munkir nahin magar duniya ne kya diye hain sabaq ai KHuda na puchh 
kyun 'josh' raaz-e-dost ki karta hai justuju kah do koi ki shah ka haal ai gada na puchh

aise hijr ke mausam kab kab aate haiñ tere alāva yaad hameñ sab aate haiñ 
jāgtī āñkhoñ se bhī dekho duniyā ko ḳhvāboñ kā kyā hai vo har shab aate haiñ 
jazb kare kyuuñ ret hamārī ashkoñ ko terā dāman tar karne ab aate haiñ 
ab vo safar kī taab nahīñ baaqī varna ham ko bulāve dasht se jab tab aate haiñ 
kāġhaz kī kashtī meñ dariyā paar kiyā dekho ham ko kyā kyā kartab aate haiñ 
aise hijr ke mausam kab kab aate hain tere alawa yaad hamein sab aate hain 
jagti aankhon se bhi dekho duniya ko KHwabon ka kya hai wo har shab aate hain 
jazb kare kyun ret hamari ashkon ko tera daman tar karne ab aate hain 
ab wo safar ki tab nahin baqi warna hum ko bulawe dasht se jab tab aate hain 
kaghaz ki kashti mein dariya par kiya dekho hum ko kya kya kartab aate hain

tan-e-tanhā muqābil ho rahā huuñ maiñ hazāroñ se hasīnoñ se raqīboñ se ġhamoñ se ġham-gusāroñ se 
unheñ maiñ chhīn kar laayā huuñ kitne dāvedāroñ se shafaq se chāñdnī rātoñ se phūloñ se sitāroñ se 
sune koī to ab bhī raushnī āvāz detī hai pahāḌoñ se guphāoñ se bayābānoñ se ġhāroñ se 
hamāre dāġh-e-dil zaḳhm-e-jigar kuchh milte-julte haiñ guloñ se gul-ruḳhoñ se mah-vashoñ se māh-pāroñ se 
kabhī hotā nahīñ mahsūs vo yuuñ qatl karte haiñ nigāhoñ se kanakhiyoñ se adāoñ se ishāroñ se 
hamesha ek pyāsī ruuh kī āvāz aatī hai kuoñ se panghaToñ se naddiyoñ se ābshāroñ se 
na aa.e par na aa.e vo unheñ kyā kyā ḳhabar bhejī lifāfoñ se ḳhatoñ se dukh bhare parchoñ se tāroñ se 
zamāne meñ kabhī bhī qismateñ badlā nahīñ kartīñ umīdoñ se bharosoñ se dilāsoñ se sahāroñ se 
vo din bhī haa.e kyā din the jab apnā bhī ta.alluq thā dashahre se divālī se basantoñ se bahāroñ se 
kabhī patthar ke dil ai 'kaif' pighle haiñ na pighleñge munājātoñ se fariyādoñ se chīḳhoñ se pukāroñ se 
tan-e-tanha muqabil ho raha hun main hazaron se hasinon se raqibon se ghamon se gham-gusaron se 
unhen main chhin kar laya hun kitne dawedaron se shafaq se chandni raaton se phulon se sitaron se 
sune koi to ab bhi raushni aawaz deti hai pahaDon se guphaon se bayabanon se ghaaron se 
hamare dagh-e-dil zaKHm-e-jigar kuchh milte-julte hain gulon se gul-ruKHon se mah-washon se mah-paron se 
kabhi hota nahin mahsus wo yun qatl karte hain nigahon se kanakhiyon se adaon se ishaaron se 
hamesha ek pyasi ruh ki aawaz aati hai kuon se panghaTon se naddiyon se aabshaaron se 
na aae par na aae wo unhen kya kya KHabar bheji lifafon se KHaton se dukh bhare parchon se taron se 
zamane mein kabhi bhi qismaten badla nahin kartin umidon se bharoson se dilason se sahaaron se 
wo din bhi hae kya din the jab apna bhi talluq tha dashahre se diwali se basanton se bahaaron se 
kabhi patthar ke dil ai 'kaif' pighle hain na pighlenge munajaton se fariyaadon se chiKHon se pukaron se

bāġh-e-jahāñ ke gul haiñ yā ḳhaar haiñ to ham haiñ gar yaar haiñ to ham haiñ aġhyār haiñ to ham haiñ 
dariyā-e-ma.arifat ke dekhā to ham haiñ sāhil gar vaar haiñ to ham haiñ aur paar haiñ to ham haiñ 
vābasta hai hamīñ se gar jabr hai o gar qadr majbūr haiñ to ham haiñ muḳhtār haiñ to ham haiñ 
terā hī husn jag meñ har-chand maujzan hai tis par bhī tishna-kām-e-dīdār haiñ to ham haiñ 
alfāz-e-ḳhalq ham bin sab mohmalāt se the ma.anī kī tarah rabt-e-guftār haiñ to ham haiñ 
auroñ se to girānī yak-laḳht uTh ga.ī hai ai 'dard' apne dil ke gar baar haiñ to ham haiñ 
bagh-e-jahan ke gul hain ya KHar hain to hum hain gar yar hain to hum hain aghyar hain to hum hain 
dariya-e-marifat ke dekha to hum hain sahil gar war hain to hum hain aur par hain to hum hain 
wabasta hai hamin se gar jabr hai o gar qadr majbur hain to hum hain muKHtar hain to hum hain 
tera hi husn jag mein har-chand maujzan hai tis par bhi tishna-kaam-e-didar hain to hum hain 
alfaz-e-KHalq hum bin sab mohmalat se the mani ki tarah rabt-e-guftar hain to hum hain 
auron se to girani yak-laKHt uTh gai hai ai 'dard' apne dil ke gar bar hain to hum hain

kyā huā husn hai ham-safar yā nahīñ ishq manzil hī manzil hai rasta nahīñ 
do parinde uḌe aañkh nam ho ga.ī aaj samjhā ki maiñ tujh ko bhūlā nahīñ 
tark-e-mai ko abhī din hī kitne hue kuchh kahā mai ko zāhid to achchhā nahīñ 
har nazar merī ban jaatī zanjīr-e-pā us ne jaate hue muḌ ke dekhā nahīñ 
chhoḌ bhī de mirā saath ai zindagī mujh ko tujh se nadāmat hai shikva nahīñ 
tū ne tauba to kar lī magar ai 'ḳhumār' tujh ko rahmat pe shāyad bharosa nahīñ 
kya hua husn hai ham-safar ya nahin ishq manzil hi manzil hai rasta nahin 
do parinde uDe aankh nam ho gai aaj samjha ki main tujh ko bhula nahin 
tark-e-mai ko abhi din hi kitne hue kuchh kaha mai ko zahid to achchha nahin 
har nazar meri ban jati zanjir-e-pa us ne jate hue muD ke dekha nahin 
chhoD bhi de mera sath ai zindagi mujh ko tujh se nadamat hai shikwa nahin 
tu ne tauba to kar li magar ai 'KHumar' tujh ko rahmat pe shayad bharosa nahin

abhī bichhḌā hai vo kuchh roz to yaad aa.egā naqsh raushan hai magar naqsh hai dhuñdlā.egā 
ghar se kis tarah maiñ niklūñ ki ye maddham sā charāġh maiñ nahīñ hūñgā to tanhā.ī meñ bujh jā.egā 
ab mire ba.ad koī sar bhī nahīñ hogā tulūa ab kisī samt se patthar bhī nahīñ aa.egā 
merī qismat to yahī hai ki bhaTaknā hai mujhe rāste tū mire hamrāh kidhar jā.egā 
apne zehnoñ meñ rachā lījiye is daur kā rañg koī tasvīr banegī to ye kaam aa.egā 
itne din ho ga.e bichhḌe hue us se 'az.har' mil bhī jā.egā to pahchān nahīñ pā.egā 
abhi bichhDa hai wo kuchh roz to yaad aaega naqsh raushan hai magar naqsh hai dhundlaega 
ghar se kis tarah main niklun ki ye maddham sa charagh main nahin hunga to tanhai mein bujh jaega 
ab mere baad koi sar bhi nahin hoga tulua ab kisi samt se patthar bhi nahin aaega 
meri qismat to yahi hai ki bhaTakna hai mujhe raste tu mere hamrah kidhar jaega 
apne zehnon mein racha lijiye is daur ka rang koi taswir banegi to ye kaam aaega 
itne din ho gae bichhDe hue us se 'azhar' mil bhi jaega to pahchan nahin paega

guzar chukā hai zamāna visāl karne kā ye koī vaqt hai tere kamāl karne kā 
burā na maan jo pahlū badal rahā huuñ maiñ mirā tarīqa hai ye arz-e-hāl karne kā 
mujhe udaas na kar varna saakh TūTegī nahīñ hai tajraba mujh ko malāl karne kā 
talāsh kar mire andar vajūd ko apne irāda chhoḌ mujhe pā.emāl karne kā 
ye ham jo ishq meñ bīmār paḌte rahte haiñ ye ik sabab hai ta.alluq bahāl karne kā 
ajiib shaḳhs thā lauTā gayā mirā sab kuchh muāvza na liyā dekh-bhāl karne kā 
phir is ke ba.ad hamesha hī chup rahe 'mohsin' ḳhirāj denā paḌā arz-e-hāl karne kā 
guzar chuka hai zamana visal karne ka ye koi waqt hai tere kamal karne ka 
bura na man jo pahlu badal raha hun main mera tariqa hai ye arz-e-haal karne ka 
mujhe udas na kar warna sakh TuTegi nahin hai tajraba mujh ko malal karne ka 
talash kar mere andar wajud ko apne irada chhoD mujhe paemal karne ka 
ye hum jo ishq mein bimar paDte rahte hain ye ek sabab hai talluq bahaal karne ka 
ajib shaKHs tha lauTa gaya mera sab kuchh muawza na liya dekh-bhaal karne ka 
phir is ke baad hamesha hi chup rahe 'mohsin' KHiraj dena paDa arz-e-haal karne ka

abhī se kaise kahūñ tum ko bevafā sāhab abhī to apne safar kī hai ibtidā sāhab 
na jaane kitne laqab de rahā hai dil tum ko huzūr jān-e-vafā aur ham-navā sāhab 
tumhārī yaad meñ taare shumār kartī huuñ na jaane ḳhatm kahāñ ho ye silsila sāhab 
kitāb-e-zīst kā unvān ban ga.e ho tum hamāre pyaar kī dekho ye intihā sāhab 
tumhārā chehra mire aks se ubhartā hai na jaane kaun badaltā hai ā.īna sāhab 
rah-e-vafā meñ zarā ehtiyāt lāzim hai har ek gaam pe hotā hai hādsa sāhab 
siyāh raat hai mahtāb ban ke aa jaao ye 'indirā' ke laboñ par hai iltijā sāhab 
abhi se kaise kahun tum ko bewafa sahab abhi to apne safar ki hai ibtida sahab 
na jaane kitne laqab de raha hai dil tum ko huzur jaan-e-wafa aur ham-nawa sahab 
tumhaari yaad mein tare shumar karti hun na jaane KHatm kahan ho ye silsila sahab 
kitab-e-zist ka unwan ban gae ho tum hamare pyar ki dekho ye intiha sahab 
tumhaara chehra mere aks se ubharta hai na jaane kaun badalta hai aaina sahab 
rah-e-wafa mein zara ehtiyat lazim hai har ek gam pe hota hai hadsa sahab 
siyah raat hai mahtab ban ke aa jao ye 'indira' ke labon par hai iltija sahab

na us ko bhuul paa.e haiñ na ham ne yaad rakkhā hai dil-e-barbād ko is tarha se ābād rakkhā hai 
jhamele aur bhī suljhāne vaale haiñ ka.ī pahle aur us ke vasl kī ḳhvāhish ko sab se baad rakkhā hai 
rukā rahtā hai chāroñ samt ashk o aah kā mausam ravāñ har lahza kārobār-e-abr-o-bād rakkhā hai 
phir is kī kāmyābī kā koī imkān hī kyā ho agar us shoḳh par daavā hī be-buniyād rakkhā hai 
ḳhizāñ ke ḳhushk patte jis meñ din-bhar khaḌkhaḌāte haiñ isī mausam kā naam ab ke bahār-ījād rakkhā hai 
ye kyā kam hai ki ham haiñ to sahī fahrist meñ us kī bhale nā-shād rakkhā hai ki ham ko shaad rakkhā hai 
jise lafz-e-mohabbat ke ma.ānī tak nahīñ aate use apne liye ham ne yahāñ ustād rakkhā hai 
javāb apne ko chāhe jo bhī vo malbūs pahnā.e savāl is dil ne us ke aage mādar-zād rakkhā hai 
'zafar' itnā hī kaafī hai jo vo raazī rahe ham par kamar apnī pe koī bojh ham ne laad rakkhā hai 
na us ko bhul pae hain na hum ne yaad rakkha hai dil-e-barbaad ko is tarha se aabaad rakkha hai 
jhamele aur bhi suljhane wale hain kai pahle aur us ke wasl ki KHwahish ko sab se baad rakkha hai 
ruka rahta hai chaaron samt ashk o aah ka mausam rawan har lahza karobar-e-abr-o-baad rakkha hai 
phir is ki kaamyabi ka koi imkan hi kya ho agar us shoKH par dawa hi be-buniyaad rakkha hai 
KHizan ke KHushk patte jis mein din-bhar khaDkhaDate hain isi mausam ka nam ab ke bahaar-ijad rakkha hai 
ye kya kam hai ki hum hain to sahi fahrist mein us ki bhale na-shad rakkha hai ki hum ko shad rakkha hai 
jise lafz-e-mohabbat ke maani tak nahin aate use apne liye hum ne yahan ustad rakkha hai 
jawab apne ko chahe jo bhi wo malbus pahnae sawal is dil ne us ke aage madar-zad rakkha hai 
'zafar' itna hi kafi hai jo wo raazi rahe hum par kamar apni pe koi bojh hum ne lad rakkha hai

kis se bichhḌī kaun milā thā bhuul ga.ī kaun burā thā kaun thā achchhā bhuul ga.ī 
kitnī bāteñ jhūTī thiiñ aur kitnī sach jitne bhī lafzoñ ko parkhā bhuul ga.ī 
chāroñ or the dhundhle dhundhle chehre se ḳhvāb kī sūrat jo bhī dekhā bhuul ga.ī 
suntī rahī maiñ sab ke dukh ḳhāmoshī se kis kā dukh thā mere jaisā bhuul ga.ī 
bhuul ga.ī huuñ kis se merā naata thā aur ye naata kaise TuuTā bhuul ga.ī 
kis se bichhDi kaun mila tha bhul gai kaun bura tha kaun tha achchha bhul gai 
kitni baaten jhuTi thin aur kitni sach jitne bhi lafzon ko parkha bhul gai 
chaaron or the dhundhle dhundhle chehre se KHwab ki surat jo bhi dekha bhul gai 
sunti rahi main sab ke dukh KHamoshi se kis ka dukh tha mere jaisa bhul gai 
bhul gai hun kis se mera nata tha aur ye nata kaise TuTa bhul gai

dekho to kuchh ziyāñ nahīñ khone ke bāvajūd hotā hai ab bhī ishq na hone ke bāvajūd 
shāyad ye ḳhaak meñ hī samāne kī mashq ho sotā huuñ farsh par jo bichhaune ke bāvajūd 
kartā huuñ niind meñ hī safar saare shahr kā fāriġh to baiThtā nahīñ sone ke bāvajūd 
hotī nahīñ hai merī tasallī kisī tarah rone kā intizār hai rone ke bāvajūd 
paanī to ek umr se mujh par hai be-asar mailā huuñ jaise aur bhī dhone ke bāvajūd 
bojhal to maiñ kuchh aur bhī rahtā huuñ raat din sāmān-e-ḳhvāb raat ko Dhone ke bāvajūd 
thī pyaas to vahīñ kī vahīñ aur maiñ vahāñ ḳhush thā zarā sā hoñT bhigone ke bāvajūd 
ye kīmiyā-garī mirī apnī hai is liye maiñ raakh hī samajhtā huuñ sone ke bāvajūd 
Dartā huuñ phir kahīñ se nikāleñ na sar 'zafar' maiñ us ko apne saath Dubone ke bāvajūd 
dekho to kuchh ziyan nahin khone ke bawajud hota hai ab bhi ishq na hone ke bawajud 
shayad ye KHak mein hi samane ki mashq ho sota hun farsh par jo bichhaune ke bawajud 
karta hun nind mein hi safar sare shahr ka farigh to baiThta nahin sone ke bawajud 
hoti nahin hai meri tasalli kisi tarah rone ka intizar hai rone ke bawajud 
pani to ek umr se mujh par hai be-asar maila hun jaise aur bhi dhone ke bawajud 
bojhal to main kuchh aur bhi rahta hun raat din saman-e-KHwab raat ko Dhone ke bawajud 
thi pyas to wahin ki wahin aur main wahan KHush tha zara sa honT bhigone ke bawajud 
ye kimiya-gari meri apni hai is liye main rakh hi samajhta hun sone ke bawajud 
Darta hun phir kahin se nikalen na sar 'zafar' main us ko apne sath Dubone ke bawajud

koī sañg-e-rah bhī chamak uThā to sitāra-e-saharī kahā mirī raat bhī tire naam thī use kis ne tīra-shabī kahā 
mire roz o shab bhī ajiib the na shumār thā na hisāb thā kabhī umr bhar kī ḳhabar na thī kabhī ek pal ko sadī kahā 
mujhe jāntā bhī koī na thā mire be-niyāz tire sivā na shikast-e-dil na shikast-e-jāñ ki tirī ḳhushī ko ḳhushī kahā 
koī yaad aa bhī ga.ī to kyā koī zaḳhm khil bhī uThā to kyā jo sabā qarīb se ho chalī use minnatoñ kī ghaḌī kahā 
bharī dopahar meñ jo paas thī vo tire ḳhayāl kī chhāñv thī kabhī shāḳh-e-gul se misāl dī kabhī us ko sarv-e-sahī kahā 
kahīñ sañg-e-rah kahīñ sang-e-dar ki maiñ pattharoñ ke nagar meñ huuñ ye nahīñ ki dil ko ḳhabar na thī ye batā ki muñh se kabhī kahā 
mire harf harf ke haath meñ sabhī ā.inoñ kī haiñ kirchiyāñ jo zabāñ se ho na sakā 'adā' ba-hudūd-e-be-suḳhanī kahā 
koi sang-e-rah bhi chamak uTha to sitara-e-sahari kaha meri raat bhi tere nam thi use kis ne tira-shabi kaha 
mere roz o shab bhi ajib the na shumar tha na hisab tha kabhi umr bhar ki KHabar na thi kabhi ek pal ko sadi kaha 
mujhe jaanta bhi koi na tha mere be-niyaz tere siwa na shikast-e-dil na shikast-e-jaan ki teri KHushi ko KHushi kaha 
koi yaad aa bhi gai to kya koi zaKHm khil bhi uTha to kya jo saba qarib se ho chali use minnaton ki ghaDi kaha 
bhari dopahar mein jo pas thi wo tere KHayal ki chhanw thi kabhi shaKH-e-gul se misal di kabhi us ko sarw-e-sahi kaha 
kahin sang-e-rah kahin sang-e-dar ki main pattharon ke nagar mein hun ye nahin ki dil ko KHabar na thi ye bata ki munh se kabhi kaha 
mere harf harf ke hath mein sabhi aainon ki hain kirchiyan jo zaban se ho na saka 'ada' ba-hudud-e-be-suKHani kaha

saverā ho bhī chukā aur raat baaqī hai zarūr dil meñ abhī koī baat baaqī hai 
ye log kis qadar ārām se haiñ baiThe hue agarche hone ko ik vārdāt baaqī hai 
kuchh aur zaḳhm-e-mohabbat meñ baḌh ga.ī hai kasak ye soch kar ki abhī to hayāt baaqī hai 
ye ġham judā hai bahut jald-bāz the ham tum ye dukh alag hai abhī kā.enāt baaqī hai 
jo merī terī mulāqāt kā sabab thā kabhī vo lamha tere bichhaḌne ke saath baaqī hai 
tamām beḌiyāñ to kaaT Daalī haiñ lekin 'jamāl' qaid-e-nafs se najāt baaqī hai 
sawera ho bhi chuka aur raat baqi hai zarur dil mein abhi koi baat baqi hai 
ye log kis qadar aaram se hain baiThe hue agarche hone ko ek wardat baqi hai 
kuchh aur zaKHm-e-mohabbat mein baDh gai hai kasak ye soch kar ki abhi to hayat baqi hai 
ye gham juda hai bahut jald-baz the hum tum ye dukh alag hai abhi kaenat baqi hai 
jo meri teri mulaqat ka sabab tha kabhi wo lamha tere bichhaDne ke sath baqi hai 
tamam beDiyan to kaT Dali hain lekin 'jamal' qaid-e-nafs se najat baqi hai

kis lamhe ham terā dhyān nahīñ karte haañ koī ahd-o-paimān nahīñ karte 
har dam terī maalā japte haiñ lekin galiyoñ kūchoñ meñ elaan nahīñ karte 
apnī kahānī dil meñ chhupā kar rakhte haiñ duniyā vāloñ ko hairān nahīñ karte 
ik kamre ko band rakhā hai barsoñ se vahāñ kisī ko ham mehmān nahīñ karte 
ik jaisā dukh mil kar bāñTā karte haiñ ik duuje par ham ehsān nahīñ karte 
kuchh raste mushkil hī achchhe lagte haiñ kuchh rastoñ ko ham āsān nahīñ karte 
raste meñ jo miltā hai mil lete haiñ achchhe bure kī ab pahchān nahīñ karte 
jī kartā hai bhālū bandar naam rakheñ kaun sī vahshat ham insān nahīñ karte 
'ālam' us ke phuul to kab ke suukh ga.e kyuuñ taaza apnā gul-dān nahīñ karte 
kis lamhe hum tera dhyan nahin karte han koi ahd-o-paiman nahin karte 
har dam teri mala japte hain lekin galiyon kuchon mein elan nahin karte 
apni kahani dil mein chhupa kar rakhte hain duniya walon ko hairan nahin karte 
ek kamre ko band rakha hai barson se wahan kisi ko hum mehman nahin karte 
ek jaisa dukh mil kar banTa karte hain ek duje par hum ehsan nahin karte 
kuchh raste mushkil hi achchhe lagte hain kuchh raston ko hum aasan nahin karte 
raste mein jo milta hai mil lete hain achchhe bure ki ab pahchan nahin karte 
ji karta hai bhaalu bandar nam rakhen kaun si wahshat hum insan nahin karte 
'alam' us ke phul to kab ke sukh gae kyun taza apna gul-dan nahin karte

nazar meñ har dushvārī rakh ḳhvāboñ meñ bedārī rakh 
duniyā se jhuk kar mat mil rishtoñ meñ hamvārī rakh 
soch samajh kar bāteñ kar lafzoñ meñ tahdārī rakh 
fuTpāthoñ par chain se so ghar meñ shab-bedārī rakh 
tū bhī sab jaisā ban jā biich meñ duniyā-dārī rakh 
ek ḳhabar hai tere liye dil par patthar bhārī rakh 
ḳhālī haath nikal ghar se zād-e-safar hushyārī rakh 
sher sunā aur bhūkā mar is ḳhidmat ko jaarī rakh 
nazar mein har dushwari rakh KHwabon mein bedari rakh 
duniya se jhuk kar mat mil rishton mein hamwari rakh 
soch samajh kar baaten kar lafzon mein tahdari rakh 
fuTpathon par chain se so ghar mein shab-bedari rakh 
tu bhi sab jaisa ban ja bich mein duniya-dari rakh 
ek KHabar hai tere liye dil par patthar bhaari rakh 
KHali hath nikal ghar se zad-e-safar hushyari rakh 
sher suna aur bhuka mar is KHidmat ko jari rakh

simaTne kī havas kyā thī bikharnā kis liye hai vo jiinā kis kī ḳhātir thā ye marnā kis liye hai 
mohabbat bhī hai aur apnā taqāzā bhī nahīñ kuchh ham us se saaf kah deñge mukarnā kis liye hai 
jhijhaknā hai to us ke sāmne honā hī kaisā jo Darnā hai to dariyā meñ utarnā kis liye hai 
masāfat ḳhvāb hai to ḳhvāb meñ ab jāgnā kyā agar chal hī paḌe haiñ to Thaharnā kis liye hai 
na karne se bhī hotā ho jahāñ sab kā guzāra vahāñ āḳhir kisī ne kaam karnā kis liye hai 
agar ruknā nahīñ us ne hamāre paas to phir hamāre rāste par se guzarnā kis liye hai 
vo kah degā to uTh jā.eñge us kī bazm se ham munāsib hī nahīñ lagtā pasarnā kis liye hai 
'zafar' us par asar to koī hotā hai na hogā to phir ye roz kā banñā sañvarnā kis liye hai 
simaTne ki hawas kya thi bikharna kis liye hai wo jina kis ki KHatir tha ye marna kis liye hai 
mohabbat bhi hai aur apna taqaza bhi nahin kuchh hum us se saf kah denge mukarna kis liye hai 
jhijhakna hai to us ke samne hona hi kaisa jo Darna hai to dariya mein utarna kis liye hai 
masafat KHwab hai to KHwab mein ab jagna kya agar chal hi paDe hain to Thaharna kis liye hai 
na karne se bhi hota ho jahan sab ka guzara wahan aaKHir kisi ne kaam karna kis liye hai 
agar rukna nahin us ne hamare pas to phir hamare raste par se guzarna kis liye hai 
wo kah dega to uTh jaenge us ki bazm se hum munasib hi nahin lagta pasarna kis liye hai 
'zafar' us par asar to koi hota hai na hoga to phir ye roz ka banna sanwarna kis liye hai

jo kahtā hai ki dariyā dekh aayā ġhalat mausam meñ sahrā dekh aayā 
Dagar aur manzileñ to ek sī thiiñ vo phir mujh se judā kyā dekh aayā 
har ik manzar ke pas-manzar the itne bahut kuchh be-irāda dekh aayā 
kisī ko ḳhaak de kar aa rahā huuñ zamīñ kā asl chehra dekh aayā 
rukā mahfil meñ itnī der tak maiñ ujāloñ kā buḌhāpā dekh aayā 
tasallī ab huī kuchh dil ko mere tirī galiyoñ ko suunā dekh aayā 
tamāshā.ī meñ jaañ aTkī huī thī palaT kar phir kināra dekh aayā 
bahut gadlā thā paanī is nadī kā magar maiñ apnā chehra dekh aayā 
maiñ is hairat meñ shāmil huuñ to kaise na jaane vo kahāñ kyā dekh aayā 
vo manzar dā.imī itnā hasīñ thā ki maiñ hī kuchh ziyāda dekh aayā 
jo kahta hai ki dariya dekh aaya ghalat mausam mein sahra dekh aaya 
Dagar aur manzilen to ek si thin wo phir mujh se juda kya dekh aaya 
har ek manzar ke pas-manzar the itne bahut kuchh be-irada dekh aaya 
kisi ko KHak de kar aa raha hun zamin ka asl chehra dekh aaya 
ruka mahfil mein itni der tak main ujalon ka buDhapa dekh aaya 
tasalli ab hui kuchh dil ko mere teri galiyon ko suna dekh aaya 
tamashai mein jaan aTki hui thi palaT kar phir kinara dekh aaya 
bahut gadla tha pani is nadi ka magar main apna chehra dekh aaya 
main is hairat mein shamil hun to kaise na jaane wo kahan kya dekh aaya 
wo manzar daimi itna hasin tha ki main hi kuchh ziyaada dekh aaya

tamām umr azāboñ kā silsila to rahā ye kam nahīñ hameñ jiine kā hausla to rahā 
guzar hī aa.e kisī tarah tere dīvāne qadam qadam pe koī saḳht marhala to rahā 
chalo na ishq hī jiitā na aql haar sakī tamām vaqt maze kā muqābla to rahā 
maiñ terī zaat meñ gum ho sakā na tū mujh meñ bahut qarīb the ham phir bhī fāsla to rahā 
ye aur baat ki har chheḌ lā-ubālī thī tirī nazar kā diloñ se mo.āmla to rahā 
tamam umr azabon ka silsila to raha ye kam nahin hamein jine ka hausla to raha 
guzar hi aae kisi tarah tere diwane qadam qadam pe koi saKHt marhala to raha 
chalo na ishq hi jita na aql haar saki tamam waqt maze ka muqabla to raha 
main teri zat mein gum ho saka na tu mujh mein bahut qarib the hum phir bhi fasla to raha 
ye aur baat ki har chheD la-ubaali thi teri nazar ka dilon se moamla to raha

ḳhalā ke jaisā koī darmiyān bhī paḌtā phir is safar meñ kahīñ āsmān bhī paḌtā 
maiñ choT kar to rahā huuñ havā ke māthe par mazā to jab thā ki koī nishān bhī paḌtā 
ajiib ḳhvāhisheñ uThtī haiñ is ḳharābe meñ guzar rahe haiñ to apnā makān bhī paḌtā 
hamīñ jahān ke pīchhe paḌe raheñ kab tak hamāre pīchhe kabhī ye jahān bhī paḌtā 
ye ik kamī ki jo ab zindagī sī lagtī hai hamārī dhuup meñ vo sā.ebān bhī paḌtā 
har ek roz isī zindagī kī tayyārī so chāhte haiñ kabhī imtihān bhī paḌtā 
KHala ke jaisa koi darmiyan bhi paDta phir is safar mein kahin aasman bhi paDta 
main choT kar to raha hun hawa ke mathe par maza to jab tha ki koi nishan bhi paDta 
ajib KHwahishen uThti hain is KHarabe mein guzar rahe hain to apna makan bhi paDta 
hamin jahan ke pichhe paDe rahen kab tak hamare pichhe kabhi ye jahan bhi paDta 
ye ek kami ki jo ab zindagi si lagti hai hamari dhup mein wo saeban bhi paDta 
har ek roz isi zindagi ki tayyari so chahte hain kabhi imtihan bhi paDta

sabhī ko apnā samajhtā huuñ kyā huā hai mujhe bichhaḌ ke tujh se ajab rog lag gayā hai mujhe 
jo muḌ ke dekhā to ho jā.egā badan patthar kahāniyoñ meñ sunā thā so bhognā hai mujhe 
maiñ tujh ko bhuul na paayā yahī ġhanīmat hai yahāñ to is kā bhī imkān lag rahā hai mujhe 
maiñ sard jañg kī aadat na Daal pā.ūñgā koī mahāz pe vāpas bulā rahā hai mujhe 
saḌak pe chalte hue āñkheñ band rakhtā huuñ tire jamāl kā aisā maza paḌā hai mujhe 
abhī talak to koī vāpsī kī raah na thī kal ek rāhguzar kā pata lagā hai mujhe 
sabhi ko apna samajhta hun kya hua hai mujhe bichhaD ke tujh se ajab rog lag gaya hai mujhe 
jo muD ke dekha to ho jaega badan patthar kahaniyon mein suna tha so bhogna hai mujhe 
main tujh ko bhul na paya yahi ghanimat hai yahan to is ka bhi imkan lag raha hai mujhe 
main sard jang ki aadat na Dal paunga koi mahaz pe wapas bula raha hai mujhe 
saDak pe chalte hue aankhen band rakhta hun tere jamal ka aisa maza paDa hai mujhe 
abhi talak to koi wapsi ki rah na thi kal ek rahguzar ka pata laga hai mujhe

siskiyāñ letī huī ġhamgīñ havāo chup raho so rahe haiñ dard un ko mat jagāo chup raho 
raat kā patthar na pighlegā shuāoñ ke baġhair sub.h hone tak na bolo ham-navāo chup raho 
band haiñ sab mai-kade saaqī bane haiñ mohtasib ai garajtī gūñjtī kaalī ghatāo chup raho 
tum ko hai mālūm āḳhir kaun sā mausam hai ye fasl-e-gul aane talak ai ḳhush-navāo chup raho 
soch kī dīvār se lag kar haiñ ġham baiThe hue dil meñ bhī naġhma na koī gungunāo chup raho 
chhaT ga.e hālāt ke bādal to dekhā jā.egā vaqt se pahle añdhere meñ na jaao chup raho 
dekh lenā ghar se niklegā na ham-sāya koī ai mire yaaro mire dard-āshnāo chup raho 
kyuuñ sharīk-e-ġham banāte ho kisī ko ai 'qatīl' apnī suulī apne kāñdhe par uThāo chup raho 
siskiyan leti hui ghamgin hawao chup raho so rahe hain dard un ko mat jagao chup raho 
raat ka patthar na pighlega shuaon ke baghair subh hone tak na bolo ham-nawao chup raho 
band hain sab mai-kade saqi bane hain mohtasib ai garajti gunjti kali ghatao chup raho 
tum ko hai malum aaKHir kaun sa mausam hai ye fasl-e-gul aane talak ai KHush-nawao chup raho 
soch ki diwar se lag kar hain gham baiThe hue dil mein bhi naghma na koi gungunao chup raho 
chhaT gae haalat ke baadal to dekha jaega waqt se pahle andhere mein na jao chup raho 
dekh lena ghar se niklega na ham-saya koi ai mere yaro mere dard-ashnao chup raho 
kyun sharik-e-gham banate ho kisi ko ai 'qatil' apni suli apne kandhe par uThao chup raho

bahār aa.ī kisī kā sāmnā karne kā vaqt aayā sambhal ai dil ki iz.hār-e-vafā karne kā vaqt aayā 
unheñ āmāda-e-mehr-o-vafā karne kā vaqt aayā baḌī muddat meñ arz-e-mudda.ā karne kā vaqt aayā 
ravāñ haiñ apne markaz kī taraf āsūda ummīdeñ hujūm-e-yās ko dil se judā karne kā vaqt aayā 
phir ik gum-karda-rāh-e-zindagī ko mil ga.ī manzil sujūd-e-shukr-e-be-pāyāñ adā karne kā vaqt aayā 
kabhī duurī thī lekin ab ḳhayāl-e-ḳhauf-e-dūrī hai fuġhāñ kī sā.ateñ guzrīñ duā karne kā vaqt aayā 
kahāñ tak ḳhatm rahtā darmiyāñ par dil kā afsāna bil-āḳhir darmiyāñ se ibtidā karne kā vaqt aayā 
har ik jurm-e-mohabbat us nigāh-e-lutf ke sadqe naved-e-āfiyat le kar ḳhatā karne kā vaqt aayā 
nigāh o dil se ab tafsīr-o-sharh-e-āzrū hogī zabān o lab se tark-e-iltijā karne kā vaqt aayā 
vo aate haiñ 'shakīl' ab apne dil se haath dho baiTho nigāh-e-nāz kī qīmat adā karne kā vaqt aayā 
bahaar aai kisi ka samna karne ka waqt aaya sambhal ai dil ki izhaar-e-wafa karne ka waqt aaya 
unhen aamada-e-mehr-o-wafa karne ka waqt aaya baDi muddat mein arz-e-muddaa karne ka waqt aaya 
rawan hain apne markaz ki taraf aasuda ummiden hujum-e-yas ko dil se juda karne ka waqt aaya 
phir ek gum-karda-rah-e-zindagi ko mil gai manzil sujud-e-shukr-e-be-payan ada karne ka waqt aaya 
kabhi duri thi lekin ab KHayal-e-KHauf-e-duri hai fughan ki saaten guzrin dua karne ka waqt aaya 
kahan tak KHatm rahta darmiyan par dil ka afsana bil-aKHir darmiyan se ibtida karne ka waqt aaya 
har ek jurm-e-mohabbat us nigah-e-lutf ke sadqe nawed-e-afiyat le kar KHata karne ka waqt aaya 
nigah o dil se ab tafsir-o-sharh-e-azru hogi zaban o lab se tark-e-iltija karne ka waqt aaya 
wo aate hain 'shakil' ab apne dil se hath dho baiTho nigah-e-naz ki qimat ada karne ka waqt aaya

itnā kyuuñ sharmāte haiñ vaade āḳhir vaade haiñ 
likhā likhāyā dho Daalā saare varaq phir saade haiñ 
tujh ko bhī kyuuñ yaad rakhā soch ke ab pachhtāte haiñ 
ret mahal do chaar bache ye bhī girne vaale haiñ 
jaa.eñ kahīñ bhī tujh ko kyā shahr se tere jaate haiñ 
ghar ke andar jaane ke aur ka.ī darvāze haiñ 
uñglī pakaḌ ke saath chale dauḌ meñ ham se aage haiñ 
itna kyun sharmate hain wade aaKHir wade hain 
likha likhaya dho Dala sare waraq phir sade hain 
tujh ko bhi kyun yaad rakha soch ke ab pachhtate hain 
ret mahal do chaar bache ye bhi girne wale hain 
jaen kahin bhi tujh ko kya shahr se tere jate hain 
ghar ke andar jaane ke aur kai darwaze hain 
ungli pakaD ke sath chale dauD mein hum se aage hain

har ik darīcha kiran kiran hai jahāñ se guzre jidhar ga.e haiñ ham ik diyā aarzū kā le kar ba-tarz-e-shams-o-qamar ga.e haiñ 
jo merī palkoñ se tham na paa.e vo shabnamīñ mehrbāñ ujāle tumhārī āñkhoñ meñ aa ga.e to tamām raste nikhar ga.e haiñ 
vo duur kab thā harīm-e-jāñ se ki lafz o ma.anī ke naaz uThātī jo harf hoñToñ pe aa na paa.e vo ban ke ḳhushbū bikhar ga.e haiñ 
jo dard īsā-nafas na hotā to dil pe kyā e'tibār aatā kuchh aur paimāñ kuchh aur paikāñ ki zaḳhm jitne the bhar ga.e haiñ 
ḳhazīne jaañ ke luTāne vaale diloñ meñ basne kī aas le kar sunā hai kuchh log aise guzre jo ghar se aa.e na ghar ga.e haiñ 
jab ik nigah se ḳharāsh aa.ī zamāne bhar se gila huā hai jo dil dukhā hai to ranj saare na jaane kis kis ke sar ga.e haiñ 
shikast-e-dil tak na baat pahuñchī magar 'adā' kah sako to kahnā ki ab ke sāvan dhanak se āñchal ke rañg saare utar ga.e haiñ 
har ek daricha kiran kiran hai jahan se guzre jidhar gae hain hum ek diya aarzu ka le kar ba-tarz-e-shams-o-qamar gae hain 
jo meri palkon se tham na pae wo shabnamin mehrban ujale tumhaari aankhon mein aa gae to tamam raste nikhar gae hain 
wo dur kab tha harim-e-jaan se ki lafz o mani ke naz uThati jo harf honTon pe aa na pae wo ban ke KHushbu bikhar gae hain 
jo dard isa-nafas na hota to dil pe kya e'tibar aata kuchh aur paiman kuchh aur paikan ki zaKHm jitne the bhar gae hain 
KHazine jaan ke luTane wale dilon mein basne ki aas le kar suna hai kuchh log aise guzre jo ghar se aae na ghar gae hain 
jab ek nigah se KHarash aai zamane bhar se gila hua hai jo dil dukha hai to ranj sare na jaane kis kis ke sar gae hain 
shikast-e-dil tak na baat pahunchi magar 'ada' kah sako to kahna ki ab ke sawan dhanak se aanchal ke rang sare utar gae hain

na sahī gar unheñ ḳhayāl nahīñ ki hamārā bhī ab vo haal nahīñ 
yaad unheñ vāda-e-visāl nahīñ kab kiyā thā yahī ḳhayāl nahīñ 
aise bigḌe vo sun ke shauq kī baat aaj tak ham se bol-chāl nahīñ 
mujh ko ab ġham ye hai ki baad mire ḳhātir-e-yār be-malāl nahīñ 
afv-e-haq kā hai mai-kashoñ pe nuzūl rezish-e-abr-e-barshagāl nahīñ 
ham pe kyuuñ arz-e-hāl-e-dil pe itaab elchī ko kahīñ zavāl nahīñ 
sun ke mujh se vo ḳhvāhish-e-pā-bos hañs ke kahne lage majāl nahīñ 
dil ko hai yaad shauq kā vo hunar jis se baḌh kar koī kamāl nahīñ 
aap nādim na hoñ ki 'hasrat' se shikva-e-ġham kā ehtimāl nahīñ 
na sahi gar unhen KHayal nahin ki hamara bhi ab wo haal nahin 
yaad unhen wada-e-visal nahin kab kiya tha yahi KHayal nahin 
aise bigDe wo sun ke shauq ki baat aaj tak hum se bol-chaal nahin 
mujh ko ab gham ye hai ki baad mere KHatir-e-yar be-malal nahin 
afw-e-haq ka hai mai-kashon pe nuzul rezish-e-abr-e-barshagal nahin 
hum pe kyun arz-e-haal-e-dil pe itab elchi ko kahin zawal nahin 
sun ke mujh se wo KHwahish-e-pa-bos hans ke kahne lage majal nahin 
dil ko hai yaad shauq ka wo hunar jis se baDh kar koi kamal nahin 
aap nadim na hon ki 'hasrat' se shikwa-e-gham ka ehtimal nahin

abhī dil meñ gūñjtī āhaTeñ mire saath haiñ tū nahīñ hai aur tirī dhaḌkaneñ mire saath haiñ 
tū ne ek umr ke ba.ad pūchhā hai hāl-e-dil vahī dard-o-ġham vahī hasrateñ mire saath haiñ 
tire saath guzre hasīn lamhoñ kī shoḳhiyāñ vahī rañg-o-bū vahī raunaqeñ mire saath haiñ 
mire paañv meñ haiñ zamīn kī sabhī gardisheñ sabhī āsmān kī sāzisheñ mire saath haiñ 
mire zehn meñ haiñ mohabbatoñ ke vo raat din vo aziyyateñ vo navāzisheñ mire saath haiñ 
jo bichhaḌte lamhoñ 'shumār' tū ne kiye bahut vo tamām shikve-shikāyateñ mire saath haiñ 
abhi dil mein gunjti aahaTen mere sath hain tu nahin hai aur teri dhaDkanen mere sath hain 
tu ne ek umr ke baad puchha hai haal-e-dil wahi dard-o-gham wahi hasraten mere sath hain 
tere sath guzre hasin lamhon ki shoKHiyan wahi rang-o-bu wahi raunaqen mere sath hain 
mere panw mein hain zamin ki sabhi gardishen sabhi aasman ki sazishen mere sath hain 
mere zehn mein hain mohabbaton ke wo raat din wo aziyyaten wo nawazishen mere sath hain 
jo bichhaDte lamhon 'shumar' tu ne kiye bahut wo tamam shikwe-shikayaten mere sath hain

jis kī sauñdhī sauñdhī ḳhushbū āñgan āñgan paltī thī us miTTī kā bojh uThāte jism kī miTTī galtī thī 
jis ko taap ke garm lihāfoñ meñ bachche so jaate the dil ke chūlhe meñ har dam vo aag barābar jaltī thī 
garm do-pahroñ meñ jalte sehnoñ meñ jhāḌū dete the jin būḌhe hāthoñ se pak kar roTī phuul meñ Dhaltī thī 
kisī kahānī meñ vīrānī meñ jab dil ghabrātā thā kisī aziiz duā kī ḳhushbū saath hamāre chaltī thī 
gard uḌāte zard bagūle dar par dastak dete the aur ḳhasta-dīvāroñ kī pal bhar meñ shakl badaltī thī 
ḳhushk khajūr ke pattoñ se jab niind kā bistar sajtā thā ḳhvāb-nagar kī shahzādī galiyoñ meñ aan nikaltī thī 
din aatā thā aur siine meñ shaam kā ḳhāka bantā thā shaam aatī thī aur jismoñ meñ shaam bhī āḳhir Dhaltī thī 
jis ki saundhi saundhi KHushbu aangan aangan palti thi us miTTi ka bojh uThate jism ki miTTi galti thi 
jis ko tap ke garm lihafon mein bachche so jate the dil ke chulhe mein har dam wo aag barabar jalti thi 
garm do-pahron mein jalte sehnon mein jhaDu dete the jin buDhe hathon se pak kar roTi phul mein Dhalti thi 
kisi kahani mein virani mein jab dil ghabraata tha kisi aziz dua ki KHushbu sath hamare chalti thi 
gard uDate zard bagule dar par dastak dete the aur KHasta-diwaron ki pal bhar mein shakl badalti thi 
KHushk khajur ke patton se jab nind ka bistar sajta tha KHwab-nagar ki shahzadi galiyon mein aan nikalti thi 
din aata tha aur sine mein sham ka KHaka banta tha sham aati thi aur jismon mein sham bhi aaKHir Dhalti thi

maiñ aur bazm-e-mai se yuuñ tishna-kām aa.uuñ gar maiñ ne kī thī tauba saaqī ko kyā huā thā 
hai ek tiir jis meñ donoñ chhide paḌe haiñ vo din ga.e ki apnā dil se jigar judā thā 
darmāñdagī meñ 'ġhālib' kuchh ban paḌe to jānūñ jab rishta be-girah thā nāḳhun girah-kushā thā 
main aur bazm-e-mai se yun tishna-kaam aaun gar main ne ki thi tauba saqi ko kya hua tha 
hai ek tir jis mein donon chhide paDe hain wo din gae ki apna dil se jigar juda tha 
darmandagi mein 'ghaalib' kuchh ban paDe to jaanun jab rishta be-girah tha naKHun girah-kusha tha

fursat meñ rahā karte haiñ fursat se zyāda masrūf haiñ ham log zarūrat se zyāda 
miltā hai sukūñ mujh ko qanā.at se zyāda masrūr huuñ maiñ apnī masarrat se zyāda 
chaltā hī nahīñ dānish o hikmat se koī kaam bantī hai yahāñ baat himāqat se zyāda 
tanhā maiñ hirāsāñ nahīñ is kār-e-junūñ meñ sahrā hai pareshāñ mirī vahshat se zyāda 
ab koī bhī sachchā.ī mire saath nahīñ hai yaanī maiñ gunahgār huuñ tohmat se zyāda 
is reg-e-ravāñ ko maiñ sameTūñ bhī kahāñ tak bikhrā hai vo har-sū mirī vus.at se zyāda 
raushan hai bahut jhuuT mire ahd meñ 'aḳhtar' afsāna munavvar hai haqīqat se zyāda 
fursat mein raha karte hain fursat se zyaada masruf hain hum log zarurat se zyaada 
milta hai sukun mujh ko qanaat se zyaada masrur hun main apni masarrat se zyaada 
chalta hi nahin danish o hikmat se koi kaam banti hai yahan baat himaqat se zyaada 
tanha main hirasan nahin is kar-e-junun mein sahra hai pareshan meri wahshat se zyaada 
ab koi bhi sachchai mere sath nahin hai yani main gunahgar hun tohmat se zyaada 
is reg-e-rawan ko main sameTun bhi kahan tak bikhra hai wo har-su meri wusat se zyaada 
raushan hai bahut jhuT mere ahd mein 'aKHtar' afsana munawwar hai haqiqat se zyaada

kaheñ kis se hamārā kho gayā kyā kisī ko kyā ki ham ko ho gayā kyā 
khulī āñkhoñ nazar aatā nahīñ kuchh har ik se pūchhtā huuñ vo gayā kyā 
mujhe har baat par jhuTlā rahī hai ye tujh bin zindagī ko ho gayā kyā 
udāsī raah kī kuchh kah rahī hai musāfir rāste meñ kho gayā kyā 
ye bastī is qadar sunsān kab thī dil-e-shorīda thak kar so gayā kyā 
chaman-ārā.ī thī jis gul kā sheva mirī rāhoñ meñ kāñTe bo gayā kyā 
kahen kis se hamara kho gaya kya kisi ko kya ki hum ko ho gaya kya 
khuli aankhon nazar aata nahin kuchh har ek se puchhta hun wo gaya kya 
mujhe har baat par jhuTla rahi hai ye tujh bin zindagi ko ho gaya kya 
udasi rah ki kuchh kah rahi hai musafir raste mein kho gaya kya 
ye basti is qadar sunsan kab thi dil-e-shorida thak kar so gaya kya 
chaman-arai thi jis gul ka shewa meri rahon mein kanTe bo gaya kya

vo log hī har daur meñ mahbūb rahe haiñ jo ishq meñ tālib nahīñ matlūb rahe haiñ 
tūfān kī āvāz to aatī nahīñ lekin lagtā hai safīne se kahīñ Duub rahe haiñ 
un ko na pukāro ġham-e-daurāñ ke laqab se jo dard kisī naam se mansūb rahe haiñ 
ham bhī tirī sūrat ke parastār haiñ lekin kuchh aur bhī chehre hameñ marġhūb rahe haiñ 
alfāz meñ iz.hār-e-mohabbat ke tarīqe ḳhud ishq kī nazroñ meñ bhī māyūb rahe haiñ 
is ahd-e-basīrat meñ bhī naqqād hamāre har ek baḌe naam se mar.ūb rahe haiñ 
itnā bhī na ghabrāo na.ī tarz-e-adā se har daur meñ badle hue uslūb rahe haiñ 
wo log hi har daur mein mahbub rahe hain jo ishq mein talib nahin matlub rahe hain 
tufan ki aawaz to aati nahin lekin lagta hai safine se kahin Dub rahe hain 
un ko na pukaro gham-e-dauran ke laqab se jo dard kisi nam se mansub rahe hain 
hum bhi teri surat ke parastar hain lekin kuchh aur bhi chehre hamein marghub rahe hain 
alfaz mein izhaar-e-mohabbat ke tariqe KHud ishq ki nazron mein bhi mayub rahe hain 
is ahd-e-basirat mein bhi naqqad hamare har ek baDe nam se marub rahe hain 
itna bhi na ghabrao nai tarz-e-ada se har daur mein badle hue uslub rahe hain

soch kar bhī kyā jaanā jaan kar bhī kyā paayā jab bhī ā.īna dekhā ḳhud ko dūsrā paayā 
hoñT par diyā rakhnā dil-jaloñ kī shoḳhī hai varna is añdhere meñ kaun muskurā paayā 
bol the divānoñ ke jin se hosh vāloñ ne soch ke dhuñdlakoñ meñ apnā rāsta paayā 
ehtimām dastak kā apnī vaz' thī varna ham ne dar rasā.ī kā bār-hā khulā paayā 
falsafoñ ke dhāgoñ se khīñch kar sirā dil kā vahm se haqīqat tak ham ne silsila paayā 
'umr yā zamāne kā khel hai bahāne kā sab ne mājrā dekhā kis ne mudda'ā paayā 
shā.erī talab apnī shā.erī 'atā us kī hausle se kam māñgā zarf se sivā paayā 
'sāz' jab khulā ham par she'r koī 'ġhālib' kā ham ne goyā bātin kā ik surāġh sā paayā 
soch kar bhi kya jaana jaan kar bhi kya paya jab bhi aaina dekha KHud ko dusra paya 
honT par diya rakhna dil-jalon ki shoKHi hai warna is andhere mein kaun muskura paya 
bol the diwanon ke jin se hosh walon ne soch ke dhundlakon mein apna rasta paya 
ehtimam dastak ka apni waz' thi warna hum ne dar rasai ka bar-ha khula paya 
falsafon ke dhagon se khinch kar sira dil ka wahm se haqiqat tak hum ne silsila paya 
'umr ya zamane ka khel hai bahane ka sab ne majra dekha kis ne mudda'a paya 
shaeri talab apni shaeri 'ata us ki hausle se kam manga zarf se siwa paya 
'saz' jab khula hum par she'r koi 'ghaalib' ka hum ne goya baatin ka ek suragh sa paya

vo baat baat meñ itnā badaltā jaatā hai ki jis tarah koī lahja badaltā jaatā hai 
ye aarzū thī ki ham us ke saath saath chaleñ magar vo shaḳhs to rasta badaltā jaatā hai 
ruteñ visāl kī ab ḳhvāb hone vaalī haiñ ki us kī baat kā lahja badaltā jaatā hai 
rahā jo dhuup meñ sar par mire vahī āñchal havā chalī hai to kitnā badaltā jaatā hai 
vo baat kar jise duniyā bhī mo'tabar samjhe tujhe ḳhabar hai zamāna badaltā jaatā hai 
wo baat baat mein itna badalta jata hai ki jis tarah koi lahja badalta jata hai 
ye aarzu thi ki hum us ke sath sath chalen magar wo shaKHs to rasta badalta jata hai 
ruten visal ki ab KHwab hone wali hain ki us ki baat ka lahja badalta jata hai 
raha jo dhup mein sar par mere wahi aanchal hawa chali hai to kitna badalta jata hai 
wo baat kar jise duniya bhi mo'tabar samjhe tujhe KHabar hai zamana badalta jata hai

ik tabī.at thī so vo bhī lā-ubālī ho ga.ī haa.e ye tasvīr bhī rañgoñ se ḳhālī ho ga.ī 
paḌhte paḌhte thak ga.e sab log tahrīreñ mirī likhte likhte shahr kī dīvār kaalī ho ga.ī 
baaġh kā sab se baḌā jo peḌ thā vo jhuk gayā phal lage itne ki bojhal Daalī Daalī ho ga.ī 
ab tū darvāze se apne naam kī taḳhtī utaar lafz nañge ho ga.e shohrat bhī gaalī ho ga.ī 
khīñch Daalā aañkh ne sab āsmānoñ par hisār ban chuke jab dā.ere parkār ḳhālī ho ga.ī 
sub.h ko dekhā to 'sājid' dil ke andar kuchh na thā yaad kī bastī bhī rātoñ-rāt ḳhālī ho ga.ī 
ek tabiat thi so wo bhi la-ubaali ho gai hae ye taswir bhi rangon se KHali ho gai 
paDhte paDhte thak gae sab log tahriren meri likhte likhte shahr ki diwar kali ho gai 
bagh ka sab se baDa jo peD tha wo jhuk gaya phal lage itne ki bojhal Dali Dali ho gai 
ab tu darwaze se apne nam ki taKHti utar lafz nange ho gae shohrat bhi gali ho gai 
khinch Dala aankh ne sab aasmanon par hisar ban chuke jab daere parkar KHali ho gai 
subh ko dekha to 'sajid' dil ke andar kuchh na tha yaad ki basti bhi raaton-raat KHali ho gai

tez ehsās-e-ḳhudī darkār hai zindagī ko zindagī darkār hai 
jo chaḌhā jaa.e ḳhumistān-e-jahāñ haañ vahī lab-tishnagī darkār hai 
devtāoñ kā ḳhudā se hogā kaam aadmī ko aadmī darkār hai 
sau gulistāñ jis udāsī par nisār mujh ko vo afsurdagī darkār hai 
shā.erī hai sar-basar tahzīb-e-qalb us ko ġham shā.istagī darkār hai 
sho.ala meñ laatā hai jo soz-o-gudāz vo ḳhulūs-e-bātnī darkār hai 
ḳhūbī-e-lafz-o-bayāñ se kuchh sivā shā.erī ko sāhirī darkār hai 
qādir-e-mutlaq ko bhī insān kī sunte haiñ be-chārgī darkār hai 
aur hoñge tālib-e-mad.h-e-jahāñ mujh ko bas terī ḳhushī darkār hai 
aql meñ yuuñ to nahīñ koī kamī ik zarā dīvāngī darkār hai 
hosh vāloñ ko bhī merī raa.e meñ ek guuna be-ḳhudī darkār hai 
ḳhatrā-e-bisyār-dānī kī qasam ilm meñ bhī kuchh kamī darkār hai 
dosto kaafī nahīñ chashm-e-ḳhirad ishq ko bhī raushnī darkār hai 
merī ġhazloñ meñ haqā.eq haiñ faqat aap ko to shā.erī darkār hai 
tere paas aayā huuñ kahne ek baat mujh ko terī dostī darkār hai 
maiñ jafāoñ kā na kartā yuuñ gila aaj terī nā-ḳhushī darkār hai 
us kī zulf ārāsta-pairāsta ik zarā sī barhamī darkār hai 
zinda-dil thā tāza-dam thā hijr meñ aaj mujh ko be-dilī darkār hai 
halqa halqa gesū-e-shab rañg-e-yār mujh ko terī abtarī darkār hai 
aql ne kal mere kānoñ meñ kahā mujh ko terī zindagī darkār hai 
tez-rau tahzīb-e-ālam ko 'firāq' ik zarā āhistagī darkār hai 
tez ehsas-e-KHudi darkar hai zindagi ko zindagi darkar hai 
jo chaDha jae KHumistan-e-jahan han wahi lab-tishnagi darkar hai 
dewtaon ka KHuda se hoga kaam aadmi ko aadmi darkar hai 
sau gulistan jis udasi par nisar mujh ko wo afsurdagi darkar hai 
shaeri hai sar-basar tahzib-e-qalb us ko gham shaistagi darkar hai 
shoala mein lata hai jo soz-o-gudaz wo KHulus-e-baatni darkar hai 
KHubi-e-lafz-o-bayan se kuchh siwa shaeri ko sahiri darkar hai 
qadir-e-mutlaq ko bhi insan ki sunte hain be-chaargi darkar hai 
aur honge talib-e-madh-e-jahan mujh ko bas teri KHushi darkar hai 
aql mein yun to nahin koi kami ek zara diwangi darkar hai 
hosh walon ko bhi meri rae mein ek guna be-KHudi darkar hai 
KHatra-e-bisyar-dani ki qasam ilm mein bhi kuchh kami darkar hai 
dosto kafi nahin chashm-e-KHirad ishq ko bhi raushni darkar hai 
meri ghazlon mein haqaeq hain faqat aap ko to shaeri darkar hai 
tere pas aaya hun kahne ek baat mujh ko teri dosti darkar hai 
main jafaon ka na karta yun gila aaj teri na-KHushi darkar hai 
us ki zulf aarasta-pairasta ek zara si barhami darkar hai 
zinda-dil tha taza-dam tha hijr mein aaj mujh ko be-dili darkar hai 
halqa halqa gesu-e-shab rang-e-yar mujh ko teri abtari darkar hai 
aql ne kal mere kanon mein kaha mujh ko teri zindagi darkar hai 
tez-rau tahzib-e-alam ko 'firaq' ek zara aahistagi darkar hai

numāyāñ donoñ jānib shān-e-fitrat hotī jaatī hai unheñ mujh se mujhe un se mohabbat hotī jaatī hai 
mirī shām-e-alam sub.h-e-masarrat hotī jaatī hai ki har lahza tire milne kī sūrat hotī jaatī hai 
nigāheñ muztarib utrā huā chehra zabāñ sākit jo thī apnī vahī ab un kī hālat hotī jaatī hai 
na kyuuñ hoñ is adā par ishq kī ḳhuddāriyāñ sadqe unheñ rūdād-e-ġham sun sun ke hairat hotī jaatī hai 
kahīñ rāz-e-mohabbat āsmāñ par bhī na khul jaa.e mujhe āh-o-fuġhāñ karne kī aadat hotī jaatī hai 
mohabbat hī meñ milte haiñ shikāyat ke maze paiham mohabbat jitnī baḌhtī hai shikāyat hotī jaatī hai 
'shakīl' un kī judā.ī meñ hai lutf-e-zindagī zaa.il nazar be-kaif afsurda tabī.at hotī jaatī hai 
numayan donon jaanib shan-e-fitrat hoti jati hai unhen mujh se mujhe un se mohabbat hoti jati hai 
meri sham-e-alam subh-e-masarrat hoti jati hai ki har lahza tere milne ki surat hoti jati hai 
nigahen muztarib utra hua chehra zaban sakit jo thi apni wahi ab un ki haalat hoti jati hai 
na kyun hon is ada par ishq ki KHuddariyan sadqe unhen rudad-e-gham sun sun ke hairat hoti jati hai 
kahin raaz-e-mohabbat aasman par bhi na khul jae mujhe aah-o-fughan karne ki aadat hoti jati hai 
mohabbat hi mein milte hain shikayat ke maze paiham mohabbat jitni baDhti hai shikayat hoti jati hai 
'shakil' un ki judai mein hai lutf-e-zindagi zail nazar be-kaif afsurda tabiat hoti jati hai

dil meñ jo baat hai batāte nahīñ duur tak ham kahīñ bhī jaate nahīñ 
aks kuchh der tak nahīñ rukte bojh ye aa.ine uThāte nahīñ 
ye nasīhat bhī log karne lage is tarah muft dil gañvāte nahīñ 
duur bastī pe hai dhuāñ kab se kyā jalā hai jise bujhāte nahīñ 
chhoḌ dete haiñ ik sharar benām aag lag jaatī hai lagāte nahīñ 
bhuul jaanā bhī ab nahīñ āsāñ varna ye ḳhiffateñ uThāte nahīñ 
aap apne meñ jalte bujhte haiñ ye tamāshā kahīñ dikhāte nahīñ 
dil mein jo baat hai batate nahin dur tak hum kahin bhi jate nahin 
aks kuchh der tak nahin rukte bojh ye aaine uThate nahin 
ye nasihat bhi log karne lage is tarah muft dil ganwate nahin 
dur basti pe hai dhuan kab se kya jala hai jise bujhate nahin 
chhoD dete hain ek sharar benam aag lag jati hai lagate nahin 
bhul jaana bhi ab nahin aasan warna ye KHiffaten uThate nahin 
aap apne mein jalte bujhte hain ye tamasha kahin dikhate nahin

khaḌā thā kab se zamīñ piiTh par uThā.e hue aab aadmī hai qayāmat se lau lagā.e hue 
ye dasht se umaD aayā hai kis kā sail-e-junūñ ki husn-e-shahr khaḌā hai naqāb uThā.e hue 
ye bhed tere sivā ai ḳhudā kise mālūm azaab TuuT paḌe mujh pe kis ke laa.e hue 
ye sail-e-āb na thā zalzala thā paanī kā bikhar bikhar ga.e qarye mire basā.e hue 
ajab tazād meñ kaaTā hai zindagī kā safar laboñ pe pyaas thī bādal the sar pe chhā.e hue 
sahar huī to koī apne ghar meñ ruk na sakā kisī ko yaad na aa.e diye jalā.e hue 
ḳhudā kī shaan ki munkir haiñ ādamiyyat ke ḳhud apnī sukḌī huī zaat ke satā.e hue 
jo āstīn chaḌhā.eñ bhī muskurā.eñ bhī vo log haiñ mire barsoñ ke āzmā.e hue 
ye inqilāb to ta.amīr ke mizāj meñ hai girā.e jaate haiñ aivāñ bane-banā.e hue 
ye aur baat mire bas meñ thī na guuñj is kī mujhe to muddateñ guzrīñ ye giit gaa.e hue 
mirī hī god meñ kyuuñ kaT ke gir paḌe haiñ 'nadīm' abhī duā ke liye the jo haath uThā.e hue 
khaDa tha kab se zamin piTh par uThae hue aab aadmi hai qayamat se lau lagae hue 
ye dasht se umaD aaya hai kis ka sail-e-junun ki husn-e-shahr khaDa hai naqab uThae hue 
ye bhed tere siwa ai KHuda kise malum azab TuT paDe mujh pe kis ke lae hue 
ye sail-e-ab na tha zalzala tha pani ka bikhar bikhar gae qarye mere basae hue 
ajab tazad mein kaTa hai zindagi ka safar labon pe pyas thi baadal the sar pe chhae hue 
sahar hui to koi apne ghar mein ruk na saka kisi ko yaad na aae diye jalae hue 
KHuda ki shan ki munkir hain aadamiyyat ke KHud apni sukDi hui zat ke satae hue 
jo aastin chaDhaen bhi muskuraen bhi wo log hain mere barson ke aazmae hue 
ye inqilab to tamir ke mizaj mein hai girae jate hain aiwan bane-banae hue 
ye aur baat mere bas mein thi na gunj is ki mujhe to muddaten guzrin ye git gae hue 
meri hi god mein kyun kaT ke gir paDe hain 'nadim' abhi dua ke liye the jo hath uThae hue

bazm meñ zikr mirā lab pe vo laa.e to sahī vahīñ mālūm karūñ hoñT hilā.e to sahī 
sañg par sañg har ik kūche meñ khaa.e to sahī par balā se tire dīvāne khaa.e to sahī 
go janāze pe nahīñ qabr pe aa.e vo mirī shikva kyā kiije ġhanīmat hai ki aa.e to sahī 
kyūñki dīvār pe chaḌh jā.ūñ koī kahtā hai paañv kāTūñgā añgūThā vo jamā.e to sahī 
pāra-e-mus.haf-e-dil the tire kūche meñ paḌe aate paañv ke tale shukr ki paa.e to sahī 
saaf be-parda nahīñ hotā vo ġhurfa meñ na ho rauzan-e-dar se kabhī aañkh laḌā.e to sahī 
gah baḌhātā hai gahe mah ko ghaTātā hai falak par shab-e-hijr ko ham dekheñ ghaTā.e to sahī 
karūñ ik naale se maiñ hashr meñ barpā sau hashr shor-e-mahshar mujhe sote se jagā.e to sahī 
gir paḌe the ka.ī us kūche meñ dil ke TukḌe aate paañv ke tale shukr ki paa.e to sahī 
the tumhīñ nikle jo us dām-e-balā se ai 'zauq' varna the pech meñ us zulf ke aa.e to sahī 
bazm mein zikr mera lab pe wo lae to sahi wahin malum karun honT hilae to sahi 
sang par sang har ek kuche mein khae to sahi par bala se tere diwane khae to sahi 
go janaze pe nahin qabr pe aae wo meri shikwa kya kije ghanimat hai ki aae to sahi 
kyunki diwar pe chaDh jaun koi kahta hai panw kaTunga anguTha wo jamae to sahi 
para-e-mushaf-e-dil the tere kuche mein paDe aate panw ke tale shukr ki pae to sahi 
saf be-parda nahin hota wo ghurfa mein na ho rauzan-e-dar se kabhi aankh laDae to sahi 
gah baDhata hai gahe mah ko ghaTata hai falak par shab-e-hijr ko hum dekhen ghaTae to sahi 
karun ek nale se main hashr mein barpa sau hashr shor-e-mahshar mujhe sote se jagae to sahi 
gir paDe the kai us kuche mein dil ke TukDe aate panw ke tale shukr ki pae to sahi 
the tumhin nikle jo us dam-e-bala se ai 'zauq' warna the pech mein us zulf ke aae to sahi

partav-e-sāġhar-e-sahbā kyā thā raat ik hashr sā barpā kyā thā 
kyuuñ javānī kī mujhe yaad aa.ī maiñ ne ik ḳhvāb sā dekhā kyā thā 
husn kī aañkh bhī namnāk huī ishq ko aap ne samjhā kyā thā 
ishq ne aañkh jhukā lī varna husn aur husn kā pardā kyā thā 
kyuuñ 'majāz' aap ne sāġhar toḌā aaj ye shahr meñ charchā kyā thā 
partaw-e-saghar-e-sahba kya tha raat ek hashr sa barpa kya tha 
kyun jawani ki mujhe yaad aai main ne ek KHwab sa dekha kya tha 
husn ki aankh bhi namnak hui ishq ko aap ne samjha kya tha 
ishq ne aankh jhuka li warna husn aur husn ka parda kya tha 
kyun 'majaz' aap ne saghar toDa aaj ye shahr mein charcha kya tha

phaile hue haiñ shahr meñ saa.e niDhāl se jaa.eñ kahāñ nikal ke ḳhayāloñ ke jaal se 
mashriq se merā rāsta maġhrib kī samt thā us kā safar junūb kī jānib shumāl se 
kaisā bhī talḳh zikr ho kaisī bhī tursh baat un kī samajh meñ aa.egī gul kī misāl se 
chup-chāp baiThe rahte haiñ kuchh bolte nahīñ bachche bigaḌ ga.e haiñ bahut dekh-bhāl se 
rañgoñ ko bahte dekhiye kamre ke farsh par kirnoñ ke vaar rokiye shīshe kī Dhaal se 
āñkhoñ meñ āñsuoñ kā kahīñ naam tak nahīñ ab juute saaf kījiye un ke rumāl se 
chehra bujhā bujhā sā pareshān zulf zulf allāh dushmanoñ ko bachā.e vabāl se 
phir pāniyoñ meñ nuqra.ī saa.e utar ga.e phir raat jagmagā uThī chāñdī ke thaal se 
phaile hue hain shahr mein sae niDhaal se jaen kahan nikal ke KHayalon ke jal se 
mashriq se mera rasta maghrib ki samt tha us ka safar junub ki jaanib shumal se 
kaisa bhi talKH zikr ho kaisi bhi tursh baat un ki samajh mein aaegi gul ki misal se 
chup-chap baiThe rahte hain kuchh bolte nahin bachche bigaD gae hain bahut dekh-bhaal se 
rangon ko bahte dekhiye kamre ke farsh par kirnon ke war rokiye shishe ki Dhaal se 
aankhon mein aansuon ka kahin nam tak nahin ab jute saf kijiye un ke rumal se 
chehra bujha bujha sa pareshan zulf zulf allah dushmanon ko bachae wabaal se 
phir paniyon mein nuqrai sae utar gae phir raat jagmaga uThi chandi ke thaal se

fasīl-e-jism girā de makān-e-jāñ se nikal ye intishār-zada shahr hai yahāñ se nikal 
tirī talāsh meñ phirte haiñ āftāb ka.ī so ab ye farz hai tujh par ki sā.ebāñ se nikal 
tamām shahr pe ik ḳhāmushī musallat hai ab aisā kar ki kisī din mirī zabāñ se nikal 
maqām-e-vasl to arz-o-samā ke biich meñ hai maiñ is zamīn se niklūñ tū āsmāñ se nikal 
maiñ apnī zaat meñ tārīkiyāñ sameTe huuñ tū ik charāġh jalā aur ab yahāñ se nikal 
kahā thā mujh se bhī ik din havā-e-sahrā ne mirī panāh meñ aa jā ġhubār-e-jāñ se nikal 
fasil-e-jism gira de makan-e-jaan se nikal ye intishaar-zada shahr hai yahan se nikal 
teri talash mein phirte hain aaftab kai so ab ye farz hai tujh par ki saeban se nikal 
tamam shahr pe ek KHamushi musallat hai ab aisa kar ki kisi din meri zaban se nikal 
maqam-e-wasl to arz-o-sama ke bich mein hai main is zamin se niklun tu aasman se nikal 
main apni zat mein tarikiyan sameTe hun tu ek charagh jala aur ab yahan se nikal 
kaha tha mujh se bhi ek din hawa-e-sahra ne meri panah mein aa ja ghubar-e-jaan se nikal

haa.il thī biich meñ jo razā.ī tamām shab is ġham se ham ko niiñd na aa.ī tamām shab 
kī yaas se havas ne laḌā.ī tamām shab tum ne to ḳhuub raah dikhā.ī tamām shab 
phir bhī to ḳhatm ho na sakī aarzū kī baat har chand ham ne un ko sunā.ī tamām shab 
bebāk milte hī jo hue ham to sharm se aañkh us parī ne phir na milā.ī tamām shab 
dil ḳhuub jāntā hai ki tum kis ḳhayāl se karte rahe adū kī burā.ī tamām shab 
phir shaam hī se kyuuñ vo chale the chhuḌā ke haath dukhtī rahī jo un kī kalā.ī tamām shab 
'hasrat' se kuchh vo aate hī aise hue ḳhafā phir ho sakī na un se safā.ī tamām shab 
hail thi bich mein jo razai tamam shab is gham se hum ko nind na aai tamam shab 
ki yas se hawas ne laDai tamam shab tum ne to KHub rah dikhai tamam shab 
phir bhi to KHatm ho na saki aarzu ki baat har chand hum ne un ko sunai tamam shab 
bebak milte hi jo hue hum to sharm se aankh us pari ne phir na milai tamam shab 
dil KHub jaanta hai ki tum kis KHayal se karte rahe adu ki burai tamam shab 
phir sham hi se kyun wo chale the chhuDa ke hath dukhti rahi jo un ki kalai tamam shab 
'hasrat' se kuchh wo aate hi aise hue KHafa phir ho saki na un se safai tamam shab

koī paiġhām-e-mohabbat lab-e-ejāz to de maut kī aañkh bhī khul jā.egī āvāz to de 
maqsad-e-ishq ham-āhañgī-e-juzv-o-kul hai dard hī dard sahī dil bū-e-dam-sāz to de 
chashm-e-maḳhmūr ke unvān-e-nazar kuchh to khuleñ dil-e-ranjūr dhaḌakne kā kuchh andāz to de 
ik zarā ho nasha-e-husn meñ andāz-e-ḳhumār ik jhalak 'ishq ke anjām kī āġhāz to de 
jo chhupā.e na chhupe aur batā.e na bane dil-e-āshiq ko in āñkhoñ se koī raaz to de 
muntazir itnī kabhī thī na fazā-e-āfāq chheḌne hī ko huuñ pur-dard ġhazal saaz to de 
ham asīrān-e-qafas aag lagā sakte haiñ fursat-e-naġhma kabhī hasrat-e-parvāz to de 
'ishq ik baar mashiyyat ko badal saktā hai indiya apnā magar kuchh nigah-e-nāz to de 
qurb o dīdār to mā'lūm kisī kā phir bhī kuchh pata sā falak-e-tafraqa-pardāz to de 
manzileñ gard kī mānind uḌī jaatī haiñ ablaq-e-dahr kuchh andāz-e-tag-o-tāz to de 
kaan se ham to 'firāq' aañkh kā lete haiñ kaam aaj chhup kar koī āvāz par āvāz to de 
koi paigham-e-mohabbat lab-e-ejaz to de maut ki aankh bhi khul jaegi aawaz to de 
maqsad-e-ishq ham-ahangi-e-juzw-o-kul hai dard hi dard sahi dil bu-e-dam-saz to de 
chashm-e-maKHmur ke unwan-e-nazar kuchh to khulen dil-e-ranjur dhaDakne ka kuchh andaz to de 
ek zara ho nasha-e-husn mein andaz-e-KHumar ek jhalak 'ishq ke anjam ki aaghaz to de 
jo chhupae na chhupe aur batae na bane dil-e-ashiq ko in aankhon se koi raaz to de 
muntazir itni kabhi thi na faza-e-afaq chheDne hi ko hun pur-dard ghazal saz to de 
hum asiran-e-qafas aag laga sakte hain fursat-e-naghma kabhi hasrat-e-parwaz to de 
'ishq ek bar mashiyyat ko badal sakta hai indiya apna magar kuchh nigah-e-naz to de 
qurb o didar to ma'lum kisi ka phir bhi kuchh pata sa falak-e-tafraqa-pardaz to de 
manzilen gard ki manind uDi jati hain ablaq-e-dahr kuchh andaz-e-tag-o-taz to de 
kan se hum to 'firaq' aankh ka lete hain kaam aaj chhup kar koi aawaz par aawaz to de

ḳhatm rātoñ-rāt us gul kī kahānī ho ga.ī rang bosīda hue ḳhushbū purānī ho ga.ī 
jis se raushan thā muqaddar vo sitāra kho gayā zulmatoñ kī nazr āḳhir zindagānī ho ga.ī 
kal ujāloñ ke nagar meñ hādsa aisā huā chaḌhte sūraj par diye kī hukmrānī ho ga.ī 
rah ga.ī thī laal banñe meñ kamī ik aañch kī aañkh se gir kar lahū kī buuñd paanī ho ga.ī 
chilla-e-jāñ par chaḌhā kar āḳhirī sāñsoñ ke tiir maut kī sarhad meñ dāḳhil zindagānī ho ga.ī 
ḳhauf ab aatā nahīñ hai sīpiyāñ chunte hue dostī apnī samundar se purānī ho ga.ī 
kis jagah aayā hai tū āñkhoñ ke nīlam bhuul kar ġham kahāñ 'iqbāl-sājid' kī nishānī ho ga.ī 
KHatm raaton-raat us gul ki kahani ho gai rang bosida hue KHushbu purani ho gai 
jis se raushan tha muqaddar wo sitara kho gaya zulmaton ki nazr aaKHir zindagani ho gai 
kal ujalon ke nagar mein hadsa aisa hua chaDhte suraj par diye ki hukmrani ho gai 
rah gai thi lal banne mein kami ek aanch ki aankh se gir kar lahu ki bund pani ho gai 
chilla-e-jaan par chaDha kar aaKHiri sanson ke tir maut ki sarhad mein daKHil zindagani ho gai 
KHauf ab aata nahin hai sipiyan chunte hue dosti apni samundar se purani ho gai 
kis jagah aaya hai tu aankhon ke nilam bhul kar gham kahan 'iqbaal-sajid' ki nishani ho gai

phuul sūñghe jaane kyā yaad aa gayā dil ajab andāz se lahrā gayā 
us se pūchhe koī chāhat ke maze jis ne chāhā aur jo chāhā gayā 
ek lamha ban ke aish-e-jāvedāñ merī saarī zindagī par chhā gayā 
ġhuncha-e-dil haa.e kaisā ġhuncha thā jo khilā aur khilte hī murjhā gayā 
ro rahā huuñ mausam-e-gul dekh kar maiñ samajhtā thā mujhe sabr aa gayā 
ye havā ye barg-e-gul kā ehtizāz aaj maiñ rāz-e-musarrat pā gayā 
'aḳhtar' ab barsāt ruḳhsat ho ga.ī ab hamārā raat kā ronā gayā 
phul sunghe jaane kya yaad aa gaya dil ajab andaz se lahra gaya 
us se puchhe koi chahat ke maze jis ne chaha aur jo chaha gaya 
ek lamha ban ke aish-e-jawedan meri sari zindagi par chha gaya 
ghuncha-e-dil hae kaisa ghuncha tha jo khila aur khilte hi murjha gaya 
ro raha hun mausam-e-gul dekh kar main samajhta tha mujhe sabr aa gaya 
ye hawa ye barg-e-gul ka ehtizaz aaj main raaz-e-musarrat pa gaya 
'aKHtar' ab barsat ruKHsat ho gai ab hamara raat ka rona gaya

shaam ko sub.h-e-chaman yaad aa.ī kis kī ḳhushbu-e-badan yaad aa.ī 
jab ḳhayāloñ meñ koī moḌ aayā tere gesū kī shikan yaad aa.ī 
yaad aa.e tire paikar ke ḳhutūt apnī kotāhī-e-fan yaad aa.ī 
chāñd jab duur ufuq par Duubā tere lahje kī thakan yaad aa.ī 
din shuāoñ se ulajhte guzrā raat aa.ī to kiran yaad aa.ī 
sham ko subh-e-chaman yaad aai kis ki KHushbu-e-badan yaad aai 
jab KHayalon mein koi moD aaya tere gesu ki shikan yaad aai 
yaad aae tere paikar ke KHutut apni kotahi-e-fan yaad aai 
chand jab dur ufuq par Duba tere lahje ki thakan yaad aai 
din shuaon se ulajhte guzra raat aai to kiran yaad aai

kaash vo pahlī mohabbat ke zamāne aate chāñd se log mirā chāñd sajāne aate 
raqs kartī huī phir bād-e-bahārāñ aatī phuul le kar vo mujhe ḳhud hī bulāne aate 
un kī tahrīr meñ alfāz vahī sab hote yuuñ bhī hotā ki kabhī ḳhat bhī purāne aate 
un ke hāthoñ meñ kabhī pyaar kā parcham hotā mere rūThe hue jazbāt manāne aate 
bārishoñ meñ vo dhanak aisī nikaltī ab ke jis se mausam meñ vahī rañg suhāne aate 
vo bahāroñ kā samāñ aur vo gul-posh chaman aise māhaul meñ vo dil hī dukhāne aate 
har taraf dekh rahe haiñ mire ham-umr ḳhayāl raah taktī huī āñkhoñ ko sulāne aate 
kash wo pahli mohabbat ke zamane aate chand se log mera chand sajaane aate 
raqs karti hui phir baad-e-bahaaran aati phul le kar wo mujhe KHud hi bulane aate 
un ki tahrir mein alfaz wahi sab hote yun bhi hota ki kabhi KHat bhi purane aate 
un ke hathon mein kabhi pyar ka parcham hota mere ruThe hue jazbaat manane aate 
barishon mein wo dhanak aisi nikalti ab ke jis se mausam mein wahi rang suhane aate 
wo bahaaron ka saman aur wo gul-posh chaman aise mahaul mein wo dil hi dukhane aate 
har taraf dekh rahe hain mere ham-umr KHayal rah takti hui aankhon ko sulane aate

ḳhabar to duur amīn-e-ḳhabar nahīñ aa.e bahut dinoñ se vo lashkar idhar nahīñ aa.e 
ye baat yaad rakheñge talāshne vaale jo us safar pe ga.e lauT kar nahīñ aa.e 
tilism ūñghtī rātoñ kā toḌne vaale vo muḳhbirān-e-sahar phir nazar nahīñ aa.e 
zarūr tujh se bhī ik roz uub jā.eñge ḳhudā kare ki tirī rahguzar nahīñ aa.e 
savāl kartī ka.ī āñkheñ muntazir haiñ yahāñ javāb aaj bhī ham soch kar nahīñ aa.e 
udaas suunī sī chhat aur do bujhī āñkheñ ka.ī dinoñ se phir 'āshufta' ghar nahīñ aa.e 
KHabar to dur amin-e-KHabar nahin aae bahut dinon se wo lashkar idhar nahin aae 
ye baat yaad rakhenge talashne wale jo us safar pe gae lauT kar nahin aae 
tilism unghti raaton ka toDne wale wo muKHbiran-e-sahar phir nazar nahin aae 
zarur tujh se bhi ek roz ub jaenge KHuda kare ki teri rahguzar nahin aae 
sawal karti kai aankhen muntazir hain yahan jawab aaj bhi hum soch kar nahin aae 
udas suni si chhat aur do bujhi aankhen kai dinon se phir 'ashufta' ghar nahin aae

baḌā ajiib thā us kā vidā.a honā bhī na ho sakā mirā us se lipaT ke ronā bhī 
fasīleñ chhūne lagī haiñ ab āsmānoñ ko ajab hai ek darīche kā band honā bhī 
na koī ḳhvāb hai āñkhoñ meñ ab na bedārī tire sabab thā mirā jāgnā bhī sonā bhī 
tire faqīr ko itnī sī jā bhī kaafī hai jo tere dil meñ nikal aa.e ek konā bhī 
ye kam nahīñ jo mayassar hai zindagī se mujhe kabhī-kabhār kā hañsnā udaas honā bhī 
tirā guzārnā hamvār rāstoñ se hameñ hamāre paañv meñ kāñTe kabhī chubhonā bhī 
chalā gayā koī āñkhoñ meñ gard uḌātā huā na kaam aayā koī ToTkā na Tonā bhī 
'talab' baḌī hī aziyyat kā kaam hotā hai bikharte TūTte rishtoñ kā bojh Dhonā bhī 
baDa ajib tha us ka widaa hona bhi na ho saka mera us se lipaT ke rona bhi 
fasilen chhune lagi hain ab aasmanon ko ajab hai ek dariche ka band hona bhi 
na koi KHwab hai aankhon mein ab na bedari tere sabab tha mera jagna bhi sona bhi 
tere faqir ko itni si ja bhi kafi hai jo tere dil mein nikal aae ek kona bhi 
ye kam nahin jo mayassar hai zindagi se mujhe kabhi-kabhaar ka hansna udas hona bhi 
tera guzarna hamwar raston se hamein hamare panw mein kanTe kabhi chubhona bhi 
chala gaya koi aankhon mein gard uData hua na kaam aaya koi ToTka na Tona bhi 
'talab' baDi hi aziyyat ka kaam hota hai bikharte TuTte rishton ka bojh Dhona bhi

kal chaman thā aaj ik sahrā huā dekhte hī dekhte ye kyā huā 
mujh ko barbādī kā koī ġham nahīñ ġham hai barbādī kā kyuuñ charchā huā 
ek chhoTā sā thā merā āshiyāñ aaj tinke se alag tinkā huā 
sochtā huuñ apne ghar ko dekh kar ho na ho ye hai merā dekhā huā 
dekhne vāloñ ne dekhā hai dhuāñ kis ne dekhā dil mirā jaltā huā 
kal chaman tha aaj ek sahra hua dekhte hi dekhte ye kya hua 
mujh ko barbaadi ka koi gham nahin gham hai barbaadi ka kyun charcha hua 
ek chhoTa sa tha mera aashiyan aaj tinke se alag tinka hua 
sochta hun apne ghar ko dekh kar ho na ho ye hai mera dekha hua 
dekhne walon ne dekha hai dhuan kis ne dekha dil mera jalta hua

bekalī se mujhe rāhat hogī chheḌ deñ aap ināyat hogī 
vasl meñ un ke qadam chūmeñge vo bhī gar un kī ijāzat hogī 
be-qarārī ke maze lūTeñge aaj phir dard kī shiddat hogī 
ek din khol ke jī ro leñge zabt-e-ġham kī jo ijāzat hogī 
qissa-e-ġham na kahūñgā 'hasrat' jaur kī un ke shikāyat hogī 
bekali se mujhe rahat hogi chheD den aap inayat hogi 
wasl mein un ke qadam chumenge wo bhi gar un ki ijazat hogi 
be-qarari ke maze luTenge aaj phir dard ki shiddat hogi 
ek din khol ke ji ro lenge zabt-e-gham ki jo ijazat hogi 
qissa-e-gham na kahunga 'hasrat' jaur ki un ke shikayat hogi

kaun ḳhvāhish kare ki aur jiye ek bezār zindagī ke liye 
aur koī nahīñ hai us ke sivā sukh diye dukh diye usī ne diye 
aao hoñToñ pe lafz rakh leñ ham ek muddat huī hai baat kiye 
zaḳhm ko raas aa ga.ī hai havā ab masīhā ise siye na siye 
us ke piyāle meñ zahr hai ki sharāb kaise ma.alūm ho baġhair piye 
ab thakan dard bantī jaatī hai dil se kuchh kaam bhī to aise liye 
maiñ ne maañ kā libās jab pahnā mujh ko titlī ne apne rañg diye 
kaun KHwahish kare ki aur jiye ek bezar zindagi ke liye 
aur koi nahin hai us ke siwa sukh diye dukh diye usi ne diye 
aao honTon pe lafz rakh len hum ek muddat hui hai baat kiye 
zaKHm ko ras aa gai hai hawa ab masiha ise siye na siye 
us ke piyale mein zahr hai ki sharab kaise malum ho baghair piye 
ab thakan dard banti jati hai dil se kuchh kaam bhi to aise liye 
main ne man ka libas jab pahna mujh ko titli ne apne rang diye

lutf kī un se iltijā na kareñ ham ne aisā kabhī kiyā na kareñ 
mil rahegā jo un se milnā hai lab ko sharminda-e-duā na kareñ 
sabr mushkil hai aarzū bekār kyā kareñ āshiqī meñ kyā na kareñ 
maslak-e-ishq meñ hai fikr harām dil ko tadbīr-āshnā na kareñ 
bhuul hī jaa.eñ ham ko ye to na ho log mere liye duā na kareñ 
marzi-e-yār ke ḳhilāf na ho kaun kahtā hai vo jafā na kareñ 
shauq un kā so miT chukā 'hasrat' kyā kareñ ham agar vafā na kareñ 
lutf ki un se iltija na karen hum ne aisa kabhi kiya na karen 
mil rahega jo un se milna hai lab ko sharminda-e-dua na karen 
sabr mushkil hai aarzu bekar kya karen aashiqi mein kya na karen 
maslak-e-ishq mein hai fikr haram dil ko tadbir-ashna na karen 
bhul hi jaen hum ko ye to na ho log mere liye dua na karen 
marzi-e-yar ke KHilaf na ho kaun kahta hai wo jafa na karen 
shauq un ka so miT chuka 'hasrat' kya karen hum agar wafa na karen

kis ko dekhā hai ye huā kyā hai dil dhaḌaktā hai mājrā kyā hai 
ik mohabbat thī miT chukī yā rab terī duniyā meñ ab dharā kyā hai 
dil meñ letā hai chuTkiyāñ koī haa.e is dard kī davā kyā hai 
hūreñ nekoñ meñ baT chukī hoñgī bāġh-e-rizvāñ meñ ab rakhā kyā hai 
us ke ahd-e-shabāb meñ jiinā jiine vaalo tumheñ huā kyā hai 
ab davā kaisī hai duā kā vaqt tere bīmār meñ rahā kyā hai 
yaad aatā hai lucknow 'aḳhtar' ḳhuld ho aa.eñ to burā kyā hai 
kis ko dekha hai ye hua kya hai dil dhaDakta hai majra kya hai 
ek mohabbat thi miT chuki ya rab teri duniya mein ab dhara kya hai 
dil mein leta hai chuTkiyan koi hae is dard ki dawa kya hai 
huren nekon mein baT chuki hongi bagh-e-rizwan mein ab rakha kya hai 
us ke ahd-e-shabab mein jina jine walo tumhein hua kya hai 
ab dawa kaisi hai dua ka waqt tere bimar mein raha kya hai 
yaad aata hai lucknow 'aKHtar' KHuld ho aaen to bura kya hai

agar is khel meñ ab vo bhī shāmil hone vaalā hai to apnā kaam pahle se bhī mushkil hone vaalā hai 
havā shāḳhoñ meñ rukne aur ulajhne ko hai is lamhe guzarte bādaloñ meñ chāñd haa.il hone vaalā hai 
asar ab aur kyā honā thā us jān-e-taġhāful par jo pahle besh o kam thā vo bhī zaa.il hone vaalā hai 
ziyāda naaz ab kyā kījiye josh-e-javānī par ki ye tūfāñ bhī rafta rafta sāhil hone vaalā hai 
hamīñ se koī koshish ho na paa.ī kārgar varna har ik nāqis yahāñ kā pīr-e-kāmil hone vaalā hai 
haqīqat meñ bahut kuchh khone vaale haiñ ye sāda-dil jo ye samjhe hue haiñ un ko hāsil hone vaalā hai 
hamāre hāl-mastoñ ko ḳhabar hone se pahle hī yahāñ par aur hī kuchh rañg-e-mahfil hone vaalā hai 
chalo is marhale par hī koī tadbīr kar dekho vagarna shahr meñ paanī to dāḳhil hone vaalā hai 
'zafar' kuchh aur hī ab sho.abada dikhlā.iye varna ye dāvā-e-suḳhan-dānī to bātil hone vaalā hai 
agar is khel mein ab wo bhi shamil hone wala hai to apna kaam pahle se bhi mushkil hone wala hai 
hawa shaKHon mein rukne aur ulajhne ko hai is lamhe guzarte baadalon mein chand hail hone wala hai 
asar ab aur kya hona tha us jaan-e-taghaful par jo pahle besh o kam tha wo bhi zail hone wala hai 
ziyaada naz ab kya kijiye josh-e-jawani par ki ye tufan bhi rafta rafta sahil hone wala hai 
hamin se koi koshish ho na pai kargar warna har ek naqis yahan ka pir-e-kaamil hone wala hai 
haqiqat mein bahut kuchh khone wale hain ye sada-dil jo ye samjhe hue hain un ko hasil hone wala hai 
hamare haal-maston ko KHabar hone se pahle hi yahan par aur hi kuchh rang-e-mahfil hone wala hai 
chalo is marhale par hi koi tadbir kar dekho wagarna shahr mein pani to daKHil hone wala hai 
'zafar' kuchh aur hi ab shoabada dikhlaiye warna ye dawa-e-suKHan-dani to baatil hone wala hai

dil baham pahuñchā badan meñ tab se saarā tan jalā aa paḌī ye aisī chingārī ki pairāhan jalā 
sarkashī hī hai jo dikhlātī hai is majlis meñ daaġh ho sake to sham.a saañ diije rag-e-gardan jalā 
badr saañ ab āḳhir āḳhir chhā ga.ī mujh par ye aag varna pahle thā mirā juuñ maah nau dāman jalā 
kab talak dhūnī lagā.e jogiyoñ kī sī rahūñ baiThe baiThe dar pe tere to mirā aasan jalā 
garmī us ātish ke par kaale se rakhe chashm tab jab koī merī tarah se deve sab tan man jalā 
ho jo minnat se to kyā vo shab nashīnī baaġh kī kaaT apnī raat ko ḳhār-o-ḳhas-e-gulḳhan jalā 
sūkhte hī āñsuoñ ke nuur āñkhoñ kā gayā bujh hī jaate haiñ diye jis vaqt sab roġhan jalā 
sho.ala afshānī nahīñ ye kuchh na.ī is aah se duuñ lagī hai aisī aisī bhī ki saarā ban jalā 
aag sī ik dil meñ sulge hai kabhū bhaḌkī to 'mīr' degī merī haDDiyoñ kā Dher juuñ īñdhan jalā 
dil baham pahuncha badan mein tab se sara tan jala aa paDi ye aisi chingari ki pairahan jala 
sarkashi hi hai jo dikhlati hai is majlis mein dagh ho sake to shama san dije rag-e-gardan jala 
badr san ab aaKHir aaKHir chha gai mujh par ye aag warna pahle tha mera jun mah nau daman jala 
kab talak dhuni lagae jogiyon ki si rahun baiThe baiThe dar pe tere to mera aasan jala 
garmi us aatish ke par kale se rakhe chashm tab jab koi meri tarah se dewe sab tan man jala 
ho jo minnat se to kya wo shab nashini bagh ki kaT apni raat ko KHar-o-KHas-e-gulKHan jala 
sukhte hi aansuon ke nur aankhon ka gaya bujh hi jate hain diye jis waqt sab roghan jala 
shoala afshani nahin ye kuchh nai is aah se dun lagi hai aisi aisi bhi ki sara ban jala 
aag si ek dil mein sulge hai kabhu bhaDki to 'mir' degi meri haDDiyon ka Dher jun indhan jala

dast-bardār agar aap ġhazab se ho jaa.eñ har sitam bhuul ke ham aap ke ab se ho jaa.eñ 
chaudhvīñ shab hai to khiḌkī ke girā do parde kaun jaane ki vo nārāz hī shab se ho jaa.eñ 
ek ḳhushbū kī tarah phailte haiñ mahfil meñ aise alfāz adā jo tire lab se ho jaa.eñ 
na koī ishq hai baaqī na koī parcham hai log dīvāne bhalā kis ke sabab se ho jaa.eñ 
bāñdh lo haath ki phaileñ na kisī ke aage sī lo ye lab ki kahīñ vo na talab se ho jaa.eñ 
baat to chheḌ mire dil koī qissa to sunā kyā ajab un ke bhī jazbāt ajab se ho jaa.eñ 
dast-bardar agar aap ghazab se ho jaen har sitam bhul ke hum aap ke ab se ho jaen 
chaudhwin shab hai to khiDki ke gira do parde kaun jaane ki wo naraaz hi shab se ho jaen 
ek KHushbu ki tarah phailte hain mahfil mein aise alfaz ada jo tere lab se ho jaen 
na koi ishq hai baqi na koi parcham hai log diwane bhala kis ke sabab se ho jaen 
bandh lo hath ki phailen na kisi ke aage si lo ye lab ki kahin wo na talab se ho jaen 
baat to chheD mere dil koi qissa to suna kya ajab un ke bhi jazbaat ajab se ho jaen

shāyad kisī balā kā thā saaya daraḳht par chiḌiyoñ ne raat shor machāyā daraḳht par 
mausam tumhāre saath kā jaane kidhar gayā tum aa.e aur bor na aayā daraḳht par 
dekhā na jaa.e dhuup meñ jaltā huā koī merā jo bas chale karūñ saaya daraḳht par 
sab chhoḌe jā rahe the safar kī nishāniyāñ maiñ ne bhī ek naqsh banāyā daraḳht par 
ab ke bahār aa.ī hai shāyad ġhalat jagah jo zaḳhm dil pe aanā thā aayā daraḳht par 
ham donoñ apne apne gharoñ meñ muqīm haiñ paḌtā nahīñ daraḳht kā saaya daraḳht par 
shayad kisi bala ka tha saya daraKHt par chiDiyon ne raat shor machaya daraKHt par 
mausam tumhaare sath ka jaane kidhar gaya tum aae aur bor na aaya daraKHt par 
dekha na jae dhup mein jalta hua koi mera jo bas chale karun saya daraKHt par 
sab chhoDe ja rahe the safar ki nishaniyan main ne bhi ek naqsh banaya daraKHt par 
ab ke bahaar aai hai shayad ghalat jagah jo zaKHm dil pe aana tha aaya daraKHt par 
hum donon apne apne gharon mein muqim hain paDta nahin daraKHt ka saya daraKHt par

is vāste dāman chaak kiyā shāyad ye junūñ kaam aa jaa.e dīvāna samajh kar hī un ke hoñToñ pe mirā naam aa jaa.e 
maiñ ḳhush huuñ agar gulshan ke liye kuchh merā lahū kaam aa jaa.e lekin mujh ko Dar hai is kā gulchīñ pe na ilzām aa jaa.e 
ai kaash hamārī qismat meñ aisī bhī koī shaam aa jaa.e ik chāñd falak par niklā ho ik chāñd sar-e-bām aa jaa.e 
mai-ḳhāna salāmat rah jaa.e is kī to kisī ko fikr nahīñ mai-ḳhvār haiñ bas is ḳhvāhish meñ saaqī pe kuchh ilzām aa jaa.e 
piine kā salīqa kuchh bhī nahīñ is par hai ye ḳhvāhish rindoñ kī jis jaam pe haq hai saaqī kā hāthoñ meñ vahī jaam aa jaa.e 
is vāste ḳhāk-e-parvāna par sham.a bahātī hai aañsū mumkin hai vafā ke qisse meñ us kā bhī kahīñ naam aa jaa.e 
afsāna mukammal hai lekin afsāne kā unvāñ kuchh bhī nahīñ ai maut bas itnī mohlat de un kā koī paiġhām aa jaa.e 
is waste daman chaak kiya shayad ye junun kaam aa jae diwana samajh kar hi un ke honTon pe mera nam aa jae 
main KHush hun agar gulshan ke liye kuchh mera lahu kaam aa jae lekin mujh ko Dar hai is ka gulchin pe na ilzam aa jae 
ai kash hamari qismat mein aisi bhi koi sham aa jae ek chand falak par nikla ho ek chand sar-e-baam aa jae 
mai-KHana salamat rah jae is ki to kisi ko fikr nahin mai-KHwar hain bas is KHwahish mein saqi pe kuchh ilzam aa jae 
pine ka saliqa kuchh bhi nahin is par hai ye KHwahish rindon ki jis jam pe haq hai saqi ka hathon mein wahi jam aa jae 
is waste KHak-e-parwana par shama bahati hai aansu mumkin hai wafa ke qisse mein us ka bhi kahin nam aa jae 
afsana mukammal hai lekin afsane ka unwan kuchh bhi nahin ai maut bas itni mohlat de un ka koi paigham aa jae

dekho aisā ajab musāfir phir kab lauT ke aatā hai dariyā us ko rasta de kar aaj talak pachhtātā hai 
jangal jangal ghūmne vaalā apne dhyān kī dastak se kosoñ duur ik ghar meñ kisī ko saarī raat jagātā hai 
jaane kis kī aas lagī hai jaane kis ko aanā hai koī rail kī siiTī sun kar sote se uTh jaatā hai 
merī galī ke sāmne vaale ghar kī añdherī khiḌkī meñ us laḌkī se bāteñ kar ke koī mujhe dohrātā hai 
kaisā jhūTā sahārā hai ye dukh se aañkh churāne kā koī kisī kā haal sunā kar apnā-āp chhupātā hai 
kachchī muñDeroñ vaale ghar meñ shaam ke Dhalte hī har roz apne dupaTTe ke pallū se koī charāġh jalātā hai 
dekho aisa ajab musafir phir kab lauT ke aata hai dariya us ko rasta de kar aaj talak pachhtata hai 
jangal jangal ghumne wala apne dhyan ki dastak se koson dur ek ghar mein kisi ko sari raat jagata hai 
jaane kis ki aas lagi hai jaane kis ko aana hai koi rail ki siTi sun kar sote se uTh jata hai 
meri gali ke samne wale ghar ki andheri khiDki mein us laDki se baaten kar ke koi mujhe dohraata hai 
kaisa jhuTa sahaara hai ye dukh se aankh churane ka koi kisi ka haal suna kar apna-ap chhupata hai 
kachchi munDeron wale ghar mein sham ke Dhalte hi har roz apne dupaTTe ke pallu se koi charagh jalata hai

zaḳhm-e-dil ham dikhā nahīñ sakte dil kisī kā dukhā nahīñ sakte 
vo yahāñ tak jo aa nahīñ sakte kyā mujhe bhī bulā nahīñ sakte 
vaada bhī hai to hai qayāmat kā jis ko ham aazmā nahīñ sakte 
aap bhī bahr-e-ashk haiñ goyā aag dil kī bujhā nahīñ sakte 
un se ummīd-e-vasl ai tauba vo to sūrat dikhā nahīñ sakte 
un ko ghūñghaT uThāne meñ kyā uzr hosh meñ ham jo aa nahīñ sakte 
māñgte maut kī duā lekin haath dil se uThā nahīñ sakte 
un ko dāvā-e-yūsufī 'āsī' ḳhvāb meñ bhī jo aa nahīñ sakte 
zaKHm-e-dil hum dikha nahin sakte dil kisi ka dukha nahin sakte 
wo yahan tak jo aa nahin sakte kya mujhe bhi bula nahin sakte 
wada bhi hai to hai qayamat ka jis ko hum aazma nahin sakte 
aap bhi bahr-e-ashk hain goya aag dil ki bujha nahin sakte 
un se ummid-e-wasl ai tauba wo to surat dikha nahin sakte 
un ko ghunghaT uThane mein kya uzr hosh mein hum jo aa nahin sakte 
mangte maut ki dua lekin hath dil se uTha nahin sakte 
un ko dawa-e-yusufi 'asi' KHwab mein bhi jo aa nahin sakte

kuchh hijr ke mausam ne satāyā nahīñ itnā kuchh ham ne tirā sog manāyā nahīñ itnā 
kuchh terī judā.ī kī aziyyat bhī kaḌī thī kuchh dil ne bhī ġham terā manāyā nahīñ itnā 
kyuuñ sab kī tarah bhiig ga.ī haiñ tirī palkeñ ham ne to tujhe haal sunāyā nahīñ itnā 
kuchh roz se dil ne tirī rāheñ nahīñ dekhīñ kyā baat hai tū yaad bhī aayā nahīñ itnā 
kyā jāniye is be-sar-o-sāmāni-e-dil ne pahle to kabhī ham ko rulāyā nahīñ itnā 
kuchh hijr ke mausam ne sataya nahin itna kuchh hum ne tera sog manaya nahin itna 
kuchh teri judai ki aziyyat bhi kaDi thi kuchh dil ne bhi gham tera manaya nahin itna 
kyun sab ki tarah bhig gai hain teri palken hum ne to tujhe haal sunaya nahin itna 
kuchh roz se dil ne teri rahen nahin dekhin kya baat hai tu yaad bhi aaya nahin itna 
kya jaaniye is be-sar-o-samani-e-dil ne pahle to kabhi hum ko rulaya nahin itna

diida o dil meñ koī husn bikhartā hī rahā laakh pardoñ meñ chhupā koī sañvartā hī rahā 
raushnī kam na huī vaqt ke tūfānoñ meñ dil ke dariyā meñ koī chāñd utartā hī rahā 
rāste bhar koī aahaT thī ki aatī hī rahī koī saaya mire baazū se guzartā hī rahā 
miT gayā par tirī bāñhoñ ne sameTā na mujhe shahr dar shahr maiñ galiyoñ meñ bikhartā hī rahā 
lamha lamha rahe āñkhoñ meñ añdhere lekin koī sūraj mire siine meñ ubhartā hī rahā 
dida o dil mein koi husn bikharta hi raha lakh pardon mein chhupa koi sanwarta hi raha 
raushni kam na hui waqt ke tufanon mein dil ke dariya mein koi chand utarta hi raha 
raste bhar koi aahaT thi ki aati hi rahi koi saya mere bazu se guzarta hi raha 
miT gaya par teri banhon ne sameTa na mujhe shahr dar shahr main galiyon mein bikharta hi raha 
lamha lamha rahe aankhon mein andhere lekin koi suraj mere sine mein ubharta hi raha

dasht o sahrā agar basā.e haiñ ham gulistāñ meñ kab samā.e haiñ 
aap naġhmoñ ke muntazir hoñge ham to fariyād le ke aa.e haiñ 
ek apnā diyā jalāne ko tum ne lākhoñ diye bujhā.e haiñ 
kyā nazar aa.egā abhī ham ko yak-ba-yak raushnī meñ aa.e haiñ 
yuuñ to saarā chaman hamārā hai phuul jitne bhī haiñ parā.e haiñ 
dasht o sahra agar basae hain hum gulistan mein kab samae hain 
aap naghmon ke muntazir honge hum to fariyaad le ke aae hain 
ek apna diya jalane ko tum ne lakhon diye bujhae hain 
kya nazar aaega abhi hum ko yak-ba-yak raushni mein aae hain 
yun to sara chaman hamara hai phul jitne bhi hain parae hain

ye nahīñ pahle tirī yaad se nisbat kam thī mājrā ye thā ki ehsās meñ shiddat kam thī 
kis liye chhīn liyā to ne ġhazāloñ kā sukūn is ḳharābe ke liye kyā mirī vahshat kam thī 
vaise bhī us se koī rabt na rakkhā maiñ ne yuuñ bhī duniyā meñ kashish terī ba-nisbat kam thī 
tere kirdār ko itnā to sharaf hāsil hai tū nahīñ thā to kahānī meñ haqīqat kam thī 
ham to us vaqt bhī raushan the kisī goshe meñ jab zamāne ko charāġhoñ kī zarūrat kam thī 
ye nahin pahle teri yaad se nisbat kam thi majra ye tha ki ehsas mein shiddat kam thi 
kis liye chhin liya to ne ghazalon ka sukun is KHarabe ke liye kya meri wahshat kam thi 
waise bhi us se koi rabt na rakkha main ne yun bhi duniya mein kashish teri ba-nisbat kam thi 
tere kirdar ko itna to sharaf hasil hai tu nahin tha to kahani mein haqiqat kam thi 
hum to us waqt bhi raushan the kisi goshe mein jab zamane ko charaghon ki zarurat kam thi

haath aa.e to vahī dāman-e-jānāñ ho jaa.e chhūT jaa.e to vahī apnā garebāñ ho jaa.e 
ishq ab bhī hai vo mahram-e-be-gāna-numā husn yuuñ laakh chhupe laakh numāyāñ ho jaa.e 
hosh-o-ġhaflat se bahut duur hai kaifiyyat-e-ishq us kī har be-ḳhabarī manzil-e-irfāñ ho jaa.e 
yaad aatī hai jab apnī to taḌap jaatā huuñ merī hastī tirā bhūlā havā paimāñ ho jaa.e 
aañkh vo hai jo tirī jalva-gah-e-nāz bane dil vahī hai jo sarāpā tirā armāñ ho jaa.e 
pāk-bāzān-e-mohabbat meñ jo bebākī hai husn gar us ko samajh le to pashemāñ ho jaa.e 
sahl ho kar hui dushvār mohabbat terī use mushkil jo banā leñ to kuchh āsāñ ho jaa.e 
ishq phir ishq hai jis ruup meñ jis bhes meñ ho ishrat-e-vasl bane yā ġham-e-hijrāñ ho jaa.e 
kuchh mudāvā bhī ho majrūh diloñ kā ai dost marham-e-zaḳhm tirā jaur-pashemāñ ho jaa.e 
ye bhī sach hai koī ulfat meñ pareshāñ kyuuñ ho ye bhī sach hai koī kyūñkar na pareshāñ ho jaa.e 
ishq ko arz-e-tamannā meñ bhī lākhoñ pas-o-pesh husn ke vāste inkār bhī āsāñ ho jaa.e 
jhilmilātī hai sar-e-bazm-e-jahāñ sham-e-ḳhudī jo ye bujh jaa.e charāġh-e-rah-e-irfāñ ho jaa.e 
sar-e-shorīda diyā dasht-o-bayābāñ bhī diye ye mirī ḳhūbī-e-qismat ki vo zindāñ ho jaa.e 
uqda-e-ishq ajab uqda-e-mohmal hai 'firāq' kabhī lā-hal kabhī mushkil kabhī āsāñ ho jaa.e 
hath aae to wahi daman-e-jaanan ho jae chhuT jae to wahi apna gareban ho jae 
ishq ab bhi hai wo mahram-e-be-gana-numa husn yun lakh chhupe lakh numayan ho jae 
hosh-o-ghaflat se bahut dur hai kaifiyyat-e-ishq us ki har be-KHabari manzil-e-irfan ho jae 
yaad aati hai jab apni to taDap jata hun meri hasti tera bhula hawa paiman ho jae 
aankh wo hai jo teri jalwa-gah-e-naz bane dil wahi hai jo sarapa tera arman ho jae 
pak-bazan-e-mohabbat mein jo bebaki hai husn gar us ko samajh le to pasheman ho jae 
sahl ho kar hui dushwar mohabbat teri use mushkil jo bana len to kuchh aasan ho jae 
ishq phir ishq hai jis rup mein jis bhes mein ho ishrat-e-wasl bane ya gham-e-hijran ho jae 
kuchh mudawa bhi ho majruh dilon ka ai dost marham-e-zaKHm tera jaur-pasheman ho jae 
ye bhi sach hai koi ulfat mein pareshan kyun ho ye bhi sach hai koi kyunkar na pareshan ho jae 
ishq ko arz-e-tamanna mein bhi lakhon pas-o-pesh husn ke waste inkar bhi aasan ho jae 
jhilmilati hai sar-e-bazm-e-jahan sham-e-KHudi jo ye bujh jae charagh-e-rah-e-irfan ho jae 
sar-e-shorida diya dasht-o-bayaban bhi diye ye meri KHubi-e-qismat ki wo zindan ho jae 
uqda-e-ishq ajab uqda-e-mohmal hai 'firaq' kabhi la-hal kabhi mushkil kabhi aasan ho jae

dil hamārī taraf se saaf karo jo huā so huā muaaf karo 
mujh se kahtī hai us kī shān-e-karam tum gunāhoñ kā e'tirāf karo 
husn un ko ye raa.e detā hai kaam ummīd ke ḳhilāf karo 
hazrat-e-dil yahī hai dair o haram ḳhāna-e-yār kā tavāf karo 
tūr-e-sīnā kī samt jaa.eñ kalīm 'nūh' tum sair-e-koh-e-qāf karo 
dil hamari taraf se saf karo jo hua so hua muaf karo 
mujh se kahti hai us ki shan-e-karam tum gunahon ka e'tiraf karo 
husn un ko ye rae deta hai kaam ummid ke KHilaf karo 
hazrat-e-dil yahi hai dair o haram KHana-e-yar ka tawaf karo 
tur-e-sina ki samt jaen kalim 'nuh' tum sair-e-koh-e-qaf karo

aañkh meñ aañsū kā aur dil meñ lahū kā kaal hai hai tamannā kā vahī jo zindagī kā haal hai 
yuuñ dhuāñ dene lagā hai jism aur jaañ kā alaao jaise rag rag meñ ravāñ ik ātish-e-sayyāl hai 
phailte jaate haiñ dām-e-nārasī ke dā.ere tere mere darmiyāñ kin hādsoñ kā jaal hai 
ghir ga.ī hai do zamānoñ kī kashākash meñ hayāt ik taraf zanjīr-e-māzī ek jānib haal hai 
hijr kī rāhoñ se 'akbar' manzil-e-dīdār tak yuuñ hai jaise darmiyāñ ik raushnī kā saal hai 
aankh mein aansu ka aur dil mein lahu ka kal hai hai tamanna ka wahi jo zindagi ka haal hai 
yun dhuan dene laga hai jism aur jaan ka alao jaise rag rag mein rawan ek aatish-e-sayyal hai
