phailte jate hain dam-e-narasi ke daere tere mere darmiyan kin hadson ka jal hai 
ghir gai hai do zamanon ki kashakash mein hayat ek taraf zanjir-e-mazi ek jaanib haal hai 
hijr ki rahon se 'akbar' manzil-e-didar tak yun hai jaise darmiyan ek raushni ka sal hai

ek hī baar nahīñ hai vo dubāra kam hai maiñ vo dariyā huuñ jise apnā kināra kam hai 
vahī takrār hai aur ek vahī yaksānī is shab-o-roz meñ ab apnā guzāra kam hai 
mere din raat meñ karnā nahīñ ab is ko shumār hissa-e-umr koī maiñ ne guzārā kam hai 
maiñ ziyāda huuñ bahut us ke liye ab tak bhī aur mere liye vo saare kā saarā kam hai 
us kī apnī bhī tavajjoh nahīñ mujh par koī ḳhaas aur maiñ ne bhī abhī us ko pukārā kam hai 
aaj paanī jo uchhaltā nahīñ pahle kī tarah aisā lagtā hai ki is meñ koī dhārā kam hai 
haath pair aap hī maiñ maar rahā huuñ filhāl Dūbte ko abhī tinke kā sahārā kam hai 
maiñ to rakhtā huuñ bahut roz ke roz in kā hisāb āsmāñ par koī aaj ek sitāra kam hai 
pesh-raft aur abhī mumkin bhī nahīñ hai ki 'zafar' abhī us shoḳh pe kuchh zor hamārā kam hai 
ek hi bar nahin hai wo dubara kam hai main wo dariya hun jise apna kinara kam hai 
wahi takrar hai aur ek wahi yaksani is shab-o-roz mein ab apna guzara kam hai 
mere din raat mein karna nahin ab is ko shumar hissa-e-umr koi main ne guzara kam hai 
main ziyaada hun bahut us ke liye ab tak bhi aur mere liye wo sare ka sara kam hai 
us ki apni bhi tawajjoh nahin mujh par koi KHas aur main ne bhi abhi us ko pukara kam hai 
aaj pani jo uchhalta nahin pahle ki tarah aisa lagta hai ki is mein koi dhaara kam hai 
hath pair aap hi main mar raha hun filhaal Dubte ko abhi tinke ka sahaara kam hai 
main to rakhta hun bahut roz ke roz in ka hisab aasman par koi aaj ek sitara kam hai 
pesh-raft aur abhi mumkin bhi nahin hai ki 'zafar' abhi us shoKH pe kuchh zor hamara kam hai

tamāshā.ī bane rahiye tamāshā dekhte rahiye yahī duniyā hai to kab tak ye duniyā dekhte rahiye 
agar apne bikharne kā nazāra kar nahīñ sakte to ye kiije ki vo raushan sitāra dekhte rahiye 
ki yuuñ manzar badal jaane se hairānī nahīñ hotī agar gulshan meñ rahnā ho to sahrā dekhte rahiye 
miyāñ kyā ā.īñe ko khelne kī chiiz samjhe the ab apne-āp ko qistoñ meñ baTtā dekhte rahiye 
idhar tum pyaas kī hurmat kā qissa chheḌ baiThe ho udhar mausam ye kahtā hai ki dariyā dekhte rahiye 
tamashai bane rahiye tamasha dekhte rahiye yahi duniya hai to kab tak ye duniya dekhte rahiye 
agar apne bikharne ka nazara kar nahin sakte to ye kije ki wo raushan sitara dekhte rahiye 
ki yun manzar badal jaane se hairani nahin hoti agar gulshan mein rahna ho to sahra dekhte rahiye 
miyan kya aaine ko khelne ki chiz samjhe the ab apne-ap ko qiston mein baTta dekhte rahiye 
idhar tum pyas ki hurmat ka qissa chheD baiThe ho udhar mausam ye kahta hai ki dariya dekhte rahiye

ye shafaq chāñd sitāre nahīñ achchhe lagte tum nahīñ ho to nazāre nahīñ achchhe lagte 
gahre paanī meñ zarā aao utar kar dekheñ ham ko dariyā ke kināre nahīñ achchhe lagte 
roz aḳhbār kī jaltī huī surḳhī paḌh kar shahr ke log tumhāre nahīñ achchhe lagte 
dard meñ Duubī fazā aaj bahut hai shāyad ġham-zada raat hai taare nahīñ achchhe lagte 
merī tanhā.ī se kah do ki sahārā chhoḌe zindagī bhar ye sahāre nahīñ achchhe lagte 
ye shafaq chand sitare nahin achchhe lagte tum nahin ho to nazare nahin achchhe lagte 
gahre pani mein zara aao utar kar dekhen hum ko dariya ke kinare nahin achchhe lagte 
roz aKHbar ki jalti hui surKHi paDh kar shahr ke log tumhaare nahin achchhe lagte 
dard mein Dubi faza aaj bahut hai shayad gham-zada raat hai tare nahin achchhe lagte 
meri tanhai se kah do ki sahaara chhoDe zindagi bhar ye sahaare nahin achchhe lagte

apne ba.ad haqīqat yā afsāna chhoḌā thā phuul khile the maiñ ne jab vīrāna chhoḌā thā 
saañs ghuTī jaatī thī kaisā habs kā aalam thā yaad hai jis din sabze ne lahrānā chhoḌā thā 
aañsū gire to ḳhāk-e-badan se ḳhushbū phūTī thī meñh barsā to mausam ne garmānā chhoḌā thā 
mere alāva kis ko ḳhabar hai lekin maiñ chup huuñ sāhil se kyuuñ maujoñ ne Takrānā chhoḌā thā 
maiñ pahle be-bāk huā thā josh-e-mohabbat meñ merī tarah phir us ne bhī sharmānā chhoḌā thā 
apne baad haqiqat ya afsana chhoDa tha phul khile the main ne jab virana chhoDa tha 
sans ghuTi jati thi kaisa habs ka aalam tha yaad hai jis din sabze ne lahrana chhoDa tha 
aansu gire to KHak-e-badan se KHushbu phuTi thi meinh barsa to mausam ne garmana chhoDa tha 
mere alawa kis ko KHabar hai lekin main chup hun sahil se kyun maujon ne Takrana chhoDa tha 
main pahle be-bak hua tha josh-e-mohabbat mein meri tarah phir us ne bhi sharmana chhoDa tha

abhī to karnā paḌegā safar dobāra mujhe abhī kareñ nahīñ ārām kā ishāra mujhe 
lahū meñ aa.egā tūfān-e-tund rāt-ba-rāt karegī mauj-e-balā-ḳhez pāra-pāra mujhe 
bujhā nahīñ mire andar kā āftāb abhī jalā ke ḳhaak karegā yahī sharāra mujhe 
utaar pheñktā maiñ bhī ye tār-tār badan asīr-e-ḳhāk huuñ karnā paḌā guzāra mujhe 
uḌe vo gard ki maiñ chār-sū bikhar jā.ūñ ġhubār meñ nazar aa.e na koī chāra mujhe 
mire hudūd meñ hai mere ās-pās kī dhund rahā ye shahr to is kā nahīñ ijāra mujhe 
sahar huī to bahut der tak dikhā.ī diyā ġhurūb hotī huī raat kā kināra mujhe 
mirī fazā meñ hai tartīb-e-kā.enāt kuchh aur ajab nahīñ jo tirā chāñd hai sitāra mujhe 
na chhū sakūñ jise kyā us kā dekhnā bhī 'zafar' bhalā lagā na kabhī duur kā nazāra mujhe 
abhi to karna paDega safar dobara mujhe abhi karen nahin aaram ka ishaara mujhe 
lahu mein aaega tufan-e-tund raat-ba-raat karegi mauj-e-bala-KHez para-para mujhe 
bujha nahin mere andar ka aaftab abhi jala ke KHak karega yahi sharara mujhe 
utar phenkta main bhi ye tar-tar badan asir-e-KHak hun karna paDa guzara mujhe 
uDe wo gard ki main chaar-su bikhar jaun ghubar mein nazar aae na koi chaara mujhe 
mere hudud mein hai mere aas-pas ki dhund raha ye shahr to is ka nahin ijara mujhe 
sahar hui to bahut der tak dikhai diya ghurub hoti hui raat ka kinara mujhe 
meri faza mein hai tartib-e-kaenat kuchh aur ajab nahin jo tera chand hai sitara mujhe 
na chhu sakun jise kya us ka dekhna bhi 'zafar' bhala laga na kabhi dur ka nazara mujhe

hairat se taktā hai sahrā bārish ke nazrāne ko kitnī duur se aa.ī hai ye ret se haath milāne ko 
saat suroñ kī lahroñ pe halkore lete phuul se haiñ ik mad.hosh fazā suntī hai ik chiḌiyā ke gaane ko 
boltī ho to yuuñ hai jaise phuul pe titlī Doltī ho tum ne kaisā sabz kiyā hai aur kaise vīrāne ko 
lekin un se aur tarah kī raushniyāñ sī phuuT paḌīñ aañsū to mil kar nikle the aañkh ke rañg chhupāne ko 
jaise koī jism ke andar dīvāreñ sī toḌtā hai dekho is pāgal vahshī ko roko is dīvāne ko 
hairat se takta hai sahra barish ke nazrane ko kitni dur se aai hai ye ret se hath milane ko 
sat suron ki lahron pe halkore lete phul se hain ek madhosh faza sunti hai ek chiDiya ke gane ko 
bolti ho to yun hai jaise phul pe titli Dolti ho tum ne kaisa sabz kiya hai aur kaise virane ko 
lekin un se aur tarah ki raushniyan si phuT paDin aansu to mil kar nikle the aankh ke rang chhupane ko 
jaise koi jism ke andar diwaren si toDta hai dekho is pagal wahshi ko roko is diwane ko

dhund meñ Duubī saarī fazā thī us ke baal bhī giile the jis kī āñkheñ jhīloñ jaisī jis ke hoñT rasīle the 
jis ko kho kar ḳhaak hue ham aaj use bhī dekhā to hañstī āñkheñ afsurda thiiñ hoñT bhī niile niile the 
jin ko chhū kar kitne 'zaidī' apnī jaan gañvā baiThe mere ahd kī shahnāzoñ ke jism baḌe zahrīle the 
āḳhir āḳhir aisā huā ki terā naam bhī bhuul ga.e avval avval ishq meñ jānāñ ham kitne joshīle the 
āñkheñ bujhā ke ḳhud ko bhulā ke aaj 'shanās' maiñ aayā huuñ talḳh thiiñ lahjoñ kī barsāteñ rañg bhī kaḌve-kasīle the 
dhund mein Dubi sari faza thi us ke baal bhi gile the jis ki aankhen jhilon jaisi jis ke honT rasile the 
jis ko kho kar KHak hue hum aaj use bhi dekha to hansti aankhen afsurda thin honT bhi nile nile the 
jin ko chhu kar kitne 'zaidi' apni jaan ganwa baiThe mere ahd ki shahnazon ke jism baDe zahrile the 
aaKHir aaKHir aisa hua ki tera nam bhi bhul gae awwal awwal ishq mein jaanan hum kitne joshile the 
aankhen bujha ke KHud ko bhula ke aaj 'shanas' main aaya hun talKH thin lahjon ki barsaten rang bhi kaDwe-kasile the

chhoḌā na mujhe dil ne mirī jaan kahīñ kā dil hai ki nahīñ māntā nādān kahīñ kā 
jaa.eñ to kahāñ jaa.eñ isī soch meñ gum haiñ ḳhvāhish hai kahīñ kī to hai armān kahīñ kā 
ham hijr ke māroñ ko kahīñ chain kahāñ hai mausam nahīñ jachtā hameñ ik aan kahīñ kā 
is shoḳhī-e-guftār par aatā hai bahut pyaar jab pyaar se kahte haiñ vo shaitān kahīñ kā 
ye vasl kī rut hai ki judā.ī kā hai mausam ye gulshan-e-dil hai ki bayābān kahīñ kā 
kar de na ise ġharq koī naddī kahīñ kī ḳhud ko jo samajh baiThā hai bhagvān kahīñ kā 
ik harf bhī tahrīf-zada ho to dikhā.e le aa.e uThā kar koī qur.ān kahīñ kā 
mahbūb nagar ho ki ġhazal gaaño ho 'rāġhib' dastūr-e-mohabbat nahīñ āsān kahīñ kā 
chhoDa na mujhe dil ne meri jaan kahin ka dil hai ki nahin manta nadan kahin ka 
jaen to kahan jaen isi soch mein gum hain KHwahish hai kahin ki to hai arman kahin ka 
hum hijr ke maron ko kahin chain kahan hai mausam nahin jachta hamein ek aan kahin ka 
is shoKHi-e-guftar par aata hai bahut pyar jab pyar se kahte hain wo shaitan kahin ka 
ye wasl ki rut hai ki judai ka hai mausam ye gulshan-e-dil hai ki bayaban kahin ka 
kar de na ise gharq koi naddi kahin ki KHud ko jo samajh baiTha hai bhagwan kahin ka 
ek harf bhi tahrif-zada ho to dikhae le aae uTha kar koi quran kahin ka 
mahbub nagar ho ki ghazal gano ho 'raghib' dastur-e-mohabbat nahin aasan kahin ka

har ghar ke ās-pās samundar lagā mujhe kitnā muhīb shahr kā manzar lagā mujhe 
ḳhilqat bahut thī phir bhī koī boltā na thā sunsān rāstoñ se bahut Dar lagā mujhe 
qātil kā haath aaj ḳhudā ke hai rū-ba-rū dast-e-duā bhī ḳhuun kā sāġhar lagā mujhe 
yuuñ reza reza huuñ ki koī bhī huā na thā yuuñ to tirī nigāh kā kankar lagā mujhe 
baiThe-biThā.e kūcha-e-qātil meñ le gayā ma.asūm dil bhī kitnā sitamgar lagā mujhe 
kis kis ne chuTkiyoñ meñ uḌāyā hai merā dil chāhe to tū bhī āḳhirī Thokar lagā mujhe 
gulchīñ palaT ke sab tire kūche se aa.e haiñ phūloñ ke rāste meñ tirā ghar lagā mujhe 
vo jāgtā rahā to qayāmat bapā rahī vo so gayā to aur bhī kāfar lagā mujhe 
dekhā jab aañkh bhar ke use Dūbtā gayā aalam tamām ālam-e-dīgar lagā mujhe 
us kī ḳhamoshiyoñ meñ nihāñ kitnā shor thā mujh se sivā vo dard kā ḳhūgar lagā mujhe 
jis aa.ine meñ bhī tirā paikar samā gayā us aa.ine meñ apnā hī jauhar lagā mujhe 
yā mere dil se hasrat-e-parvāz chhīn le yā mere paas aa ke na.e par lagā mujhe 
sāhil pe jo khaḌā thā tamāshā banā huā vo gahre pāniyoñ kā shanāvar lagā mujhe 
sochā to chuur chuur the shīshe ke ghar tamām dekhā to haath haath meñ patthar lagā mujhe 
āñkhoñ se gard jhaaḌ ke dekhā to dosto kotāh qad bhī apne barābar lagā mujhe 
tārīkiyoñ meñ nuur kā haalā bhī thā kahīñ dasht-e-ḳhayāl apnā muqaddar lagā mujhe 
chheḌī kuchh is tarah se 'jamīl' us ne ye ġhazal har ek sher qand-e-mukarrar lagā mujhe 
har ghar ke aas-pas samundar laga mujhe kitna muhib shahr ka manzar laga mujhe 
KHilqat bahut thi phir bhi koi bolta na tha sunsan raston se bahut Dar laga mujhe 
qatil ka hath aaj KHuda ke hai ru-ba-ru dast-e-dua bhi KHun ka saghar laga mujhe 
yun reza reza hun ki koi bhi hua na tha yun to teri nigah ka kankar laga mujhe 
baiThe-biThae kucha-e-qatil mein le gaya masum dil bhi kitna sitamgar laga mujhe 
kis kis ne chuTkiyon mein uDaya hai mera dil chahe to tu bhi aaKHiri Thokar laga mujhe 
gulchin palaT ke sab tere kuche se aae hain phulon ke raste mein tera ghar laga mujhe 
wo jagta raha to qayamat bapa rahi wo so gaya to aur bhi kafar laga mujhe 
dekha jab aankh bhar ke use Dubta gaya aalam tamam aalam-e-digar laga mujhe 
us ki KHamoshiyon mein nihan kitna shor tha mujh se siwa wo dard ka KHugar laga mujhe 
jis aaine mein bhi tera paikar sama gaya us aaine mein apna hi jauhar laga mujhe 
ya mere dil se hasrat-e-parwaz chhin le ya mere pas aa ke nae par laga mujhe 
sahil pe jo khaDa tha tamasha bana hua wo gahre paniyon ka shanawar laga mujhe 
socha to chur chur the shishe ke ghar tamam dekha to hath hath mein patthar laga mujhe 
aankhon se gard jhaD ke dekha to dosto kotah qad bhi apne barabar laga mujhe 
tarikiyon mein nur ka haala bhi tha kahin dasht-e-KHayal apna muqaddar laga mujhe 
chheDi kuchh is tarah se 'jamil' us ne ye ghazal har ek sher qand-e-mukarrar laga mujhe

manziloñ ke nishāñ nahīñ milte tum agar nā-gahāñ nahīñ milte 
āshiyāne kā rañj kaun kare chaar tinke kahāñ nahīñ milte 
dāstāneñ hazār miltī haiñ sāhib-e-dāstāñ nahīñ milte 
yuuñ na milne ke sau bahāne haiñ milne vaale kahāñ nahīñ milte 
inqilāb-e-jahāñ are tauba ham jahāñ the vahāñ nahīñ milte 
dostoñ kī kamī nahīñ hamdam aise dushman kahāñ nahīñ milte 
jin ko manzil salām kartī thī aaj vo kārvāñ nahīñ milte 
shāḳh-e-gul par jo jhūmte the 'qamar' aaj vo āshiyāñ nahīñ milte 
manzilon ke nishan nahin milte tum agar na-gahan nahin milte 
aashiyane ka ranj kaun kare chaar tinke kahan nahin milte 
dastanen hazar milti hain sahib-e-dastan nahin milte 
yun na milne ke sau bahane hain milne wale kahan nahin milte 
inqilab-e-jahan are tauba hum jahan the wahan nahin milte 
doston ki kami nahin hamdam aise dushman kahan nahin milte 
jin ko manzil salam karti thi aaj wo karwan nahin milte 
shaKH-e-gul par jo jhumte the 'qamar' aaj wo aashiyan nahin milte

bahut din se tumheñ dekhā nahīñ thā badan itnā kabhī suunā nahīñ thā 
vo kaisī shab thī jo kaalī nahīñ thī vo kaisā din thā jo ujlā nahīñ thā 
ye vīrāna na thā vīrān itnā ye sahrā is qadar sahrā nahīñ thā 
vo sab kuchh sochnā ab paḌ rahā hai tire baare meñ jo sochā nahīñ thā 
kisī ik zaḳhm ke lab khul ga.e the maiñ itnī zor se chīḳhā nahīñ thā 
mujhe tum se koī shikva nahīñ hai bahut din ho ga.e royā nahīñ thā 
ka.ī atrāf khulte jā rahe haiñ vo dushman thā magar itnā nahīñ thā 
bahut din se tumhein dekha nahin tha badan itna kabhi suna nahin tha 
wo kaisi shab thi jo kali nahin thi wo kaisa din tha jo ujla nahin tha 
ye virana na tha viran itna ye sahra is qadar sahra nahin tha 
wo sab kuchh sochna ab paD raha hai tere bare mein jo socha nahin tha 
kisi ek zaKHm ke lab khul gae the main itni zor se chiKHa nahin tha 
mujhe tum se koi shikwa nahin hai bahut din ho gae roya nahin tha 
kai atraf khulte ja rahe hain wo dushman tha magar itna nahin tha

nit nit kā ye aanā jaanā mere bas kī baat nahīñ darbānoñ ke naaz uThānā mere bas kī baat nahīñ 
saaqī mai sāġhar paimāna mere bas kī baat nahīñ sirf inhī se dil bahlānā mere bas kī baat nahīñ 
ishq o mohabbat kyā hote haiñ kyā samjhā.ūñ vaa.iz ko bhaiñs ke aage biin bajānā mere bas kī baat nahīñ 
marnā to lāzim hai ik din jī bhar ke ab jī to luuñ marne se pahle mar jaanā mere bas kī baat nahīñ 
donoñ meñ hai nuur usī kā donoñ us ke maskan haiñ ik kaaba hai ik but-ḳhāna mere bas kī baat nahīñ 
nit nit ka ye aana jaana mere bas ki baat nahin darbanon ke naz uThana mere bas ki baat nahin 
saqi mai saghar paimana mere bas ki baat nahin sirf inhi se dil bahlana mere bas ki baat nahin 
ishq o mohabbat kya hote hain kya samjhaun waiz ko bhains ke aage bin bajaana mere bas ki baat nahin 
marna to lazim hai ek din ji bhar ke ab ji to lun marne se pahle mar jaana mere bas ki baat nahin 
donon mein hai nur usi ka donon us ke maskan hain ek kaba hai ek but-KHana mere bas ki baat nahin

rone se jo bhaḌās thī dil kī nikal ga.ī aañsū bahā.e chaar tabī.at sambhal ga.ī 
maiñ ne taras taras ke guzārī hai saarī umr merī na hogī jaan jo hasrat nikal ga.ī 
bechain huuñ maiñ jab se nahīñ dil-lagī kahīñ vo dard kyā gayā ki mire dil kī kal ga.ī 
kahtā hai chārāgar ki na pā.egā indimāl achchhā huā ki zaḳhm kī sūrat badal ga.ī 
ai sham.a ham se soz-e-mohabbat ke zabt siikh kam-baḳht ek raat meñ saarī pighal ga.ī 
shāḳh-e-nihāl-e-umr hamārī na phal sakī ye to hai vo kalī jo nikalte hī jal ga.ī 
dekhā jo us ne pyaar se aġhyār kī taraf 'shā.ir' qasam ḳhudā kī mirī jaan jal ga.ī 
rone se jo bhaDas thi dil ki nikal gai aansu bahae chaar tabiat sambhal gai 
main ne taras taras ke guzari hai sari umr meri na hogi jaan jo hasrat nikal gai 
bechain hun main jab se nahin dil-lagi kahin wo dard kya gaya ki mere dil ki kal gai 
kahta hai chaaragar ki na paega indimal achchha hua ki zaKHm ki surat badal gai 
ai shama hum se soz-e-mohabbat ke zabt sikh kam-baKHt ek raat mein sari pighal gai 
shaKH-e-nihaal-e-umr hamari na phal saki ye to hai wo kali jo nikalte hi jal gai 
dekha jo us ne pyar se aghyar ki taraf 'shair' qasam KHuda ki meri jaan jal gai

vaañ rasā.ī nahīñ to phir kyā hai ye judā.ī nahīñ to phir kyā hai 
ho mulāqāt to safā.ī se aur safā.ī nahīñ to phir kyā hai 
dilrubā ko hai dilrubā.ī shart dilrubā.ī nahīñ to phir kyā hai 
gila hotā hai āshnā.ī meñ āshnā.ī nahīñ to phir kyā hai 
allāh allāh re un butoñ kā ġhurūr ye ḳhudā.ī nahīñ to phir kyā hai 
maut aa.ī to Tal nahīñ saktī aur aa.ī nahīñ to phir kyā hai 
magas-e-qāb aġhniyā honā hai be-hayā.ī nahīñ to phir kyā hai 
bosa-e-lab dil-e-shikasta ko momyā.ī nahīñ to phir kyā hai 
nahīñ rone meñ gar 'zafar' tāsīr jag-hañsā.ī nahīñ to phir kyā hai 
wan rasai nahin to phir kya hai ye judai nahin to phir kya hai 
ho mulaqat to safai se aur safai nahin to phir kya hai 
dilruba ko hai dilrubai shart dilrubai nahin to phir kya hai 
gila hota hai aashnai mein aashnai nahin to phir kya hai 
allah allah re un buton ka ghurur ye KHudai nahin to phir kya hai 
maut aai to Tal nahin sakti aur aai nahin to phir kya hai 
magas-e-qab aghniya hona hai be-hayai nahin to phir kya hai 
bosa-e-lab dil-e-shikasta ko momyai nahin to phir kya hai 
nahin rone mein gar 'zafar' tasir jag-hansai nahin to phir kya hai

lage hai āsmāñ jaisā nahīñ hai nazar aatā hai jo hotā nahīñ hai 
tum apne aks meñ kyā dekhte ho tumhārā aks bhī tum sā nahīñ hai 
mile jab tum to ye ehsās jaagā ab aage kā safar tanhā nahīñ hai 
bahut sochā hai ham ne zindagī par magar lagtā hai kuchh sochā nahīñ hai 
yahī jaanā hai ham ne kuchh na jaanā yahī samjhā hai kuchh samjhā nahīñ hai 
yaqīñ kā dā.era dekhā hai kis ne gumāñ ke dā.ere meñ kyā nahīñ hai 
yahāñ to silsile hī silsile haiñ koī bhī vāqi.a tanhā nahīñ hai 
bañdhe haiñ kā.enātī bandhanoñ meñ koī bandhan magar dikhtā nahīñ hai 
ho kis nisbat se tum 'jāved' sāhab na honā to hai yaañ honā nahīñ hai 
lage hai aasman jaisa nahin hai nazar aata hai jo hota nahin hai 
tum apne aks mein kya dekhte ho tumhaara aks bhi tum sa nahin hai 
mile jab tum to ye ehsas jaga ab aage ka safar tanha nahin hai 
bahut socha hai hum ne zindagi par magar lagta hai kuchh socha nahin hai 
yahi jaana hai hum ne kuchh na jaana yahi samjha hai kuchh samjha nahin hai 
yaqin ka daera dekha hai kis ne guman ke daere mein kya nahin hai 
yahan to silsile hi silsile hain koi bhi waqia tanha nahin hai 
bandhe hain kaenati bandhanon mein koi bandhan magar dikhta nahin hai 
ho kis nisbat se tum 'jawed' sahab na hona to hai yan hona nahin hai

is tarah mohabbat meñ dil pe hukmarānī hai dil nahīñ mirā goyā un kī rājdhānī hai 
ghaas ke gharauñde se zor-āzmā.ī kyā āñdhiyāñ bhī paglī haiñ barq bhī divānī hai 
shāyad un ke dāman ne poñchh diiñ mirī āñkheñ aaj mere ashkoñ kā rañg zāfrānī hai 
pūchhte ho kyā baabā kyā huā dil-e-zinda vo mirā dil-e-zinda aaj āñ-jahānī hai 
'kaif' tujh ko duniyā ne kyā se kyā banā Daalā yaar ab tire muñh par rañg hai na paanī hai 
is tarah mohabbat mein dil pe hukmarani hai dil nahin mera goya un ki rajdhani hai 
ghas ke gharaunde se zor-azmai kya aandhiyan bhi pagli hain barq bhi diwani hai 
shayad un ke daman ne ponchh din meri aankhen aaj mere ashkon ka rang zafrani hai 
puchhte ho kya baba kya hua dil-e-zinda wo mera dil-e-zinda aaj aan-jahani hai 
'kaif' tujh ko duniya ne kya se kya bana Dala yar ab tere munh par rang hai na pani hai

ajiib ḳhvāhish hai shahr vāloñ se chhup chhupā kar kitāb likkhūñ tumhāre naam apnī zindagī kī kitāb kā intisāb likkhūñ 
vo lamha kitnā ajiib thā jab hamārī āñkheñ gale milī thiiñ maiñ kis tarah ab mohabbatoñ kī shikastagī ke azaab likkhūñ 
tumhī ne mere ujaaḌ rastoñ pe ḳhvāhishoñ ke diye jalā.e tumhī ne chāhā thā ḳhushk hoñToñ se chāhatoñ ke gulāb likkhūñ 
kabhī vo din the ki niiñd āñkhoñ kī sarhadoñ se pare pare thī magar maiñ ab jab bhī sonā chāhūñ tumhārī yādoñ ke ḳhvāb likkhūñ 
maiñ tanhā laḌkī dayār-e-shab meñ jalā.ūñ sach ke diye kahāñ tak siyāhkāroñ kī saltanat meñ maiñ kis tarah āftāb likkhūñ 
qayādatoñ ke junūñ meñ jin ke qadam lahū se rañge hue haiñ ye mere bas meñ nahīñ hai logo ki un ko izzat-ma.āb likkhūñ 
yahī bahut hai ki in laboñ ko sadā se mahrūm kar ke rakh duuñ magar ye kaisī musālahat hai samundaroñ ko sarāb likkhūñ 
ajib KHwahish hai shahr walon se chhup chhupa kar kitab likkhun tumhaare nam apni zindagi ki kitab ka intisab likkhun 
wo lamha kitna ajib tha jab hamari aankhen gale mili thin main kis tarah ab mohabbaton ki shikastagi ke azab likkhun 
tumhi ne mere ujaD raston pe KHwahishon ke diye jalae tumhi ne chaha tha KHushk honTon se chahaton ke gulab likkhun 
kabhi wo din the ki nind aankhon ki sarhadon se pare pare thi magar main ab jab bhi sona chahun tumhaari yaadon ke KHwab likkhun 
main tanha laDki dayar-e-shab mein jalaun sach ke diye kahan tak siyahkaron ki saltanat mein main kis tarah aaftab likkhun 
qayaadaton ke junun mein jin ke qadam lahu se range hue hain ye mere bas mein nahin hai logo ki un ko izzat-maab likkhun 
yahi bahut hai ki in labon ko sada se mahrum kar ke rakh dun magar ye kaisi musalahat hai samundaron ko sarab likkhun

takalluf chhoḌ kar mere barābar baiTh jā.egā tasavvur meñ abhī vo paas aa kar baiTh jā.egā 
dar-o-dīvār par itnā paḌā hai saare din paanī agar kal dhuup bhī niklegī to ghar baiTh jā.egā 
aḌegā ḳhud to lā.egā ḳhabar saat āsmānoñ kī uḌāyā to parinda chhat ke uupar baiTh jā.egā 
na manzil ko patā hogā na rastoñ ko ḳhabar hogī musāfir ek din ārām se ghar baiTh jā.egā 
ḳhayāl achchhā huā to sher ban kar aa.egā bāhar bahut achchhā huā to dil ke andar baiTh jā.egā 
takalluf chhoD kar mere barabar baiTh jaega tasawwur mein abhi wo pas aa kar baiTh jaega 
dar-o-diwar par itna paDa hai sare din pani agar kal dhup bhi niklegi to ghar baiTh jaega 
aDega KHud to laega KHabar sat aasmanon ki uDaya to parinda chhat ke upar baiTh jaega 
na manzil ko pata hoga na raston ko KHabar hogi musafir ek din aaram se ghar baiTh jaega 
KHayal achchha hua to sher ban kar aaega bahar bahut achchha hua to dil ke andar baiTh jaega

ham ne to be-shumār bahāne banā.e haiñ kahtā hai dil ki but bhī ḳhudā ne banā.e haiñ 
le le ke terā naam in āñkhoñ ne raat bhar tasbīh-e-intizār ke daane banā.e haiñ 
ham ne tumhāre ġham ko haqīqat banā diyā tum ne hamāre ġham ke fasāne banā.e haiñ 
vo log mutma.in haiñ ki patthar haiñ un ke paas ham ḳhush ki ham ne ā.īna-ḳhāne banā.e haiñ 
bhañvre unhī pe chal ke kareñge tavāf-e-gul jo dā.ere chaman meñ sabā ne banā.e haiñ 
ham to vahāñ pahuñch nahīñ sakte tamām umr āñkhoñ ne itnī duur Thikāne banā.e haiñ 
aaj us badan pe bhī nazar aa.e talab ke daaġh dīvār par bhī naqsh vafā ne banā.e haiñ 
hum ne to be-shumar bahane banae hain kahta hai dil ki but bhi KHuda ne banae hain 
le le ke tera nam in aankhon ne raat bhar tasbih-e-intizar ke dane banae hain 
hum ne tumhaare gham ko haqiqat bana diya tum ne hamare gham ke fasane banae hain 
wo log mutmain hain ki patthar hain un ke pas hum KHush ki hum ne aaina-KHane banae hain 
bhanwre unhi pe chal ke karenge tawaf-e-gul jo daere chaman mein saba ne banae hain 
hum to wahan pahunch nahin sakte tamam umr aankhon ne itni dur Thikane banae hain 
aaj us badan pe bhi nazar aae talab ke dagh diwar par bhi naqsh wafa ne banae hain

jab hameñ masjid jaanā paḌā hai raah meñ ik mai-ḳhāna paḌā hai 
jā.iye ab kyuuñ jānib-e-sahrā shahr to ḳhud vīrāna paḌā hai 
ham na piyeñge bhiik kī saaqī le ye tirā paimāna paḌā hai 
harj na ho to dekhte chaliye raah meñ ik dīvāna paḌā hai 
ḳhatm huī sab raat kī mahfil ek par-e-parvāna paḌā hai 
jab hamein masjid jaana paDa hai rah mein ek mai-KHana paDa hai 
jaiye ab kyun jaanib-e-sahra shahr to KHud virana paDa hai 
hum na piyenge bhik ki saqi le ye tera paimana paDa hai 
harj na ho to dekhte chaliye rah mein ek diwana paDa hai 
KHatm hui sab raat ki mahfil ek par-e-parwana paDa hai

chehre pe thoḌī rakkhī hai dil meñ betābī rakkhī hai 
ik do din se jiine vaalo ham ne kaafī jī rakkhī hai 
dil ke shajar ne kis mehnat se ik ik shāḳh harī rakkhī hai 
vasl huā par dil meñ tamannā jaisī thī vaisī rakkhī hai 
ġhair kī kyā rakkhegā ye darbāñ zālim ne kis kī rakkhī hai 
havas meñ kuchh bhī kar sakte ho ishq meñ pābandī rakkhī hai 
rind khaḌe haiñ mimbar mimbar aur vaa.iz ne pī rakkhī hai 
raakh qalandar kī le jaao aag kahāñ baaqī rakkhī hai 
ik to bātūnī hai 'ḳhāvar' uupar se pī bhī rakkhī hai 
chehre pe thoDi rakkhi hai dil mein betabi rakkhi hai 
ek do din se jine walo hum ne kafi ji rakkhi hai 
dil ke shajar ne kis mehnat se ek ek shaKH hari rakkhi hai 
wasl hua par dil mein tamanna jaisi thi waisi rakkhi hai 
ghair ki kya rakkhega ye darban zalim ne kis ki rakkhi hai 
hawas mein kuchh bhi kar sakte ho ishq mein pabandi rakkhi hai 
rind khaDe hain mimbar mimbar aur waiz ne pi rakkhi hai 
rakh qalandar ki le jao aag kahan baqi rakkhi hai 
ek to baatuni hai 'KHawar' upar se pi bhi rakkhi hai

jaane vaale mujhe kuchh apnī nishānī de jā ruuh pyāsī na rahe aañkh meñ paanī de jā 
vaqt ke saath ḳhad-o-ḳhāl badal jaate haiñ jo na badle vahī tasvīr purānī de jā 
tire māthe pe mirā naam chamaktā thā kabhī un dinoñ kī koī pahchān purānī de jā 
jis kī āġhosh meñ kaT jaa.eñ hazāroñ rāteñ merī tanhā.ī ko chhū kar vo kahānī de jā 
rakh na mahrūm ḳhud apnī hī rifāqat se mujhe aa.ina mujh ko dikhā de mirā saanī de jā 
jaane wale mujhe kuchh apni nishani de ja ruh pyasi na rahe aankh mein pani de ja 
waqt ke sath KHad-o-KHal badal jate hain jo na badle wahi taswir purani de ja 
tere mathe pe mera nam chamakta tha kabhi un dinon ki koi pahchan purani de ja 
jis ki aaghosh mein kaT jaen hazaron raaten meri tanhai ko chhu kar wo kahani de ja 
rakh na mahrum KHud apni hi rifaqat se mujhe aaina mujh ko dikha de mera sani de ja

aur kyā rah gayā hai hone ko ek aañsū nahīñ hai rone ko 
ḳhvāb achchhe raheñge an-dekhe ḳhaak achchhī rahegī sone ko 
tū kahīñ baiTh aur hukm chalā ham jo haiñ terā bojh Dhone ko 
chashm-e-nam chaar ashk aur idhar daaġh ik rah gayā hai dhone ko 
baiThne ko jagah nahīñ miltī kyā kareñ oḌhne-bichhaune ko 
ye mah o saal chand baaqī haiñ aur kuchh bhī nahīñ hai khone ko 
nā-rasā.ī kā rañj laa.e haiñ tere dil meñ kahīñ samone ko 
aaj kī raat jaag lo yaaro vaqt phir hashr tak hai sone ko 
yaad bhī terī miT ga.ī dil se aur kyā rah gayā hai hone ko 
aur kya rah gaya hai hone ko ek aansu nahin hai rone ko 
KHwab achchhe rahenge an-dekhe KHak achchhi rahegi sone ko 
tu kahin baiTh aur hukm chala hum jo hain tera bojh Dhone ko 
chashm-e-nam chaar ashk aur idhar dagh ek rah gaya hai dhone ko 
baiThne ko jagah nahin milti kya karen oDhne-bichhaune ko 
ye mah o sal chand baqi hain aur kuchh bhi nahin hai khone ko 
na-rasai ka ranj lae hain tere dil mein kahin samone ko 
aaj ki raat jag lo yaro waqt phir hashr tak hai sone ko 
yaad bhi teri miT gai dil se aur kya rah gaya hai hone ko

husn ke sehr o karāmāt se jī Dartā hai ishq kī zinda rivāyāt se jī Dartā hai 
maiñ ne maanā ki mujhe un se mohabbat na rahī ham-nashīñ phir bhī mulāqāt se jī Dartā hai 
sach to ye ki abhī dil ko sukūñ hai lekin apne āvāra ḳhayālāt se jī Dartā hai 
itnā royā huuñ ġham-e-dost zarā sā hañs kar muskurāte hue lamhāt se jī Dartā hai 
jo bhī kahnā hai kaho saaf shikāyat hī sahī in ishārāt-o-kināyāt se jī Dartā hai 
hijr kā dard na.ī baat nahīñ hai lekin din vo guzrā hai ki ab raat se jī Dartā hai 
kaun bhūlā hai 'na.īm' un kī mohabbat kā fareb phir bhī in taaza ināyāt se jī Dartā hai 
husn ke sehr o karamat se ji Darta hai ishq ki zinda riwayat se ji Darta hai 
main ne mana ki mujhe un se mohabbat na rahi ham-nashin phir bhi mulaqat se ji Darta hai 
sach to ye ki abhi dil ko sukun hai lekin apne aawara KHayalat se ji Darta hai 
itna roya hun gham-e-dost zara sa hans kar muskuraate hue lamhat se ji Darta hai 
jo bhi kahna hai kaho saf shikayat hi sahi in ishaaraat-o-kinayat se ji Darta hai 
hijr ka dard nai baat nahin hai lekin din wo guzra hai ki ab raat se ji Darta hai 
kaun bhula hai 'naim' un ki mohabbat ka fareb phir bhi in taza inayat se ji Darta hai

ai ārzu-e-qatl zarā dil ko thāmnā mushkil paḌā mirā mire qātil ko thāmnā 
tāsīr-e-be-qarāri-e-nākām āfrīñ hai kaam un se shoḳh-e-shamā.il ko thāmnā 
dekhe hai chāndnī vo zamīñ par na gir paḌe ai charḳh apne tū mah-e-kāmil ko thāmnā 
muztar huuñ kis kā tarz-e-suḳhan se samajh gayā ab zikr kyā hai sāma-e-āqil ko thāmnā 
ho sarsar-e-fuġhāñ se na kyūñkar vo muztarib mushkil huā hai parda-e-mahmil ko thāmnā 
sīkhe haiñ mujh se nālā-e-nai āsmāñ-shikan sayyād ab qafas meñ anādil ko thāmnā 
ye zulf ḳham-ba-ḳham na ho kyā tāb-e-ġhair hai tere junūñ-zade kī salāsil ko thāmnā 
ai hamdam aah talḳhi-e-hijrāñ se dam nahīñ girtā hai dekh jām-e-halāhil ko thāmnā 
sīmāb-vār mar ga.e zabt-e-qalaq se ham kyā qahr hai tabī.at-e-mā.il ko thāmnā 
āġhosh-e-gor ho ga.ī āḳhir lahūluhān āsāñ nahīñ hai aap ke bismil ko thāmnā 
siine pe haath dharte hī kuchh dam pe ban ga.ī lo jaan kā azaab huā dil ko thāmnā 
baaqī hai shauq-e-chāk-e-garebāñ abhī mujhe bas ai rafūgar apnī anāmil ko thāmnā 
mat māñgiyo amaan butoñ se ki hai harām 'momin' zabān-e-behūda saa.il ko thāmnā 
ai aarzu-e-qatl zara dil ko thamna mushkil paDa mera mere qatil ko thamna 
tasir-e-be-qarari-e-nakaam aafrin hai kaam un se shoKH-e-shamail ko thamna 
dekhe hai chandni wo zamin par na gir paDe ai charKH apne tu mah-e-kaamil ko thamna 
muztar hun kis ka tarz-e-suKHan se samajh gaya ab zikr kya hai sama-e-aqil ko thamna 
ho sarsar-e-fughan se na kyunkar wo muztarib mushkil hua hai parda-e-mahmil ko thamna 
sikhe hain mujh se nala-e-nai aasman-shikan sayyaad ab qafas mein anadil ko thamna 
ye zulf KHam-ba-KHam na ho kya tab-e-ghair hai tere junun-zade ki salasil ko thamna 
ai hamdam aah talKHi-e-hijran se dam nahin girta hai dekh jam-e-halahil ko thamna 
simab-war mar gae zabt-e-qalaq se hum kya qahr hai tabiat-e-mail ko thamna 
aaghosh-e-gor ho gai aaKHir lahuluhan aasan nahin hai aap ke bismil ko thamna 
sine pe hath dharte hi kuchh dam pe ban gai lo jaan ka azab hua dil ko thamna 
baqi hai shauq-e-chaak-e-gareban abhi mujhe bas ai rafugar apni anamil ko thamna 
mat mangiyo aman buton se ki hai haram 'momin' zaban-e-behuda sail ko thamna

hijr-o-visāl-e-yār kā parda uThā diyā ḳhud baḌh ke ishq ne mujhe merā patā diyā 
gard-o-ġhubār-e-hastī-e-fānī uḌā diyā ai kīmiyā-e-ishq mujhe kyā banā diyā 
vo sāmne hai aur nazar se chhupā diyā ai ishq-e-be-hijāb mujhe kyā dikhā diyā 
vo shān-e-ḳhāmushī ki bahāreñ haiñ muntazir vo rañg-e-guftugū ki gulistāñ banā diyā 
dam le rahī thiiñ husn kī jab sehr-kāriyāñ in vaqfa-hā-e-kufr ko īmāñ banā diyā 
ma.alūm kuchh mujhī ko haiñ un kī ravāniyāñ jin qatra-hā-e-ashk ko dariyā banā dayā 
ik barq-e-be-qarār thī tamkīn-e-husn bhī jis vaqt ishq ko ġham-e-sabr-āzmā diyā 
saaqī mujhe bhī yaad haiñ vo tishna-kāmiyāñ jin ko harīf-e-sāġhar-o-mīnā banā diyā 
ma.alūm hai haqīqat-e-ġham-hā-e-rozgār duniyā ko tere dard ne duniyā banā diyā 
ai shoḳhi-e-nigāh-e-karam muddatoñ ke ba.ad ḳhvāb-e-girān-e-ġham se mujhe kyuuñ jagā diyā 
kuchh shorisheñ taġhāful-e-pinhāñ meñ thiiñ jinheñ hañgāma-zār-e-hashr-e-tamannā banā diyā 
baḌhtā hī jā rahā hai jamāl-e-nazar-fareb husn-e-nazar ko husn-e-ḳhud-ārā banā diyā 
phir dekhnā nigāh laḌī kis se ishq kī gar husn ne hijāb-e-taġhāful uThā diyā 
jab ḳhuun ho chukā dil-e-hastī-e-etibār kuchh dard bach rahe jinheñ insāñ banā diyā 
gum-karda-e-vafūr-e-ġham-e-intizār huuñ tū kyā chhupā ki mujh ko mujhī se chhupā diyā 
raat ab harīf-e-sub.h-e-qayāmat hī kyuuñ na ho jo kuchh bhī ho us aañkh ko ab to jagā diyā 
ab maiñ huuñ aur lutf-o-karam ke takallufāt ye kyuuñ hijāb-e-ranjish-e-be-jā banā diyā 
thī yuuñ to shām-e-hijr magar pichhlī raat ko vo dard uThā 'firāq' ki maiñ muskurā diyā 
hijr-o-visal-e-yar ka parda uTha diya KHud baDh ke ishq ne mujhe mera pata diya 
gard-o-ghubar-e-hasti-e-fani uDa diya ai kimiya-e-ishq mujhe kya bana diya 
wo samne hai aur nazar se chhupa diya ai ishq-e-be-hijab mujhe kya dikha diya 
wo shan-e-KHamushi ki bahaaren hain muntazir wo rang-e-guftugu ki gulistan bana diya 
dam le rahi thin husn ki jab sehr-kariyan in waqfa-ha-e-kufr ko iman bana diya 
malum kuchh mujhi ko hain un ki rawaniyan jin qatra-ha-e-ashk ko dariya bana daya 
ek barq-e-be-qarar thi tamkin-e-husn bhi jis waqt ishq ko gham-e-sabr-azma diya 
saqi mujhe bhi yaad hain wo tishna-kaamiyan jin ko harif-e-saghar-o-mina bana diya 
malum hai haqiqat-e-gham-ha-e-rozgar duniya ko tere dard ne duniya bana diya 
ai shoKHi-e-nigah-e-karam muddaton ke baad KHwab-e-giran-e-gham se mujhe kyun jaga diya 
kuchh shorishen taghaful-e-pinhan mein thin jinhen hangama-zar-e-hashr-e-tamanna bana diya 
baDhta hi ja raha hai jamal-e-nazar-fareb husn-e-nazar ko husn-e-KHud-ara bana diya 
phir dekhna nigah laDi kis se ishq ki gar husn ne hijab-e-taghaful uTha diya 
jab KHun ho chuka dil-e-hasti-e-etibar kuchh dard bach rahe jinhen insan bana diya 
gum-karda-e-wafur-e-gham-e-intizar hun tu kya chhupa ki mujh ko mujhi se chhupa diya 
raat ab harif-e-subh-e-qayamat hi kyun na ho jo kuchh bhi ho us aankh ko ab to jaga diya 
ab main hun aur lutf-o-karam ke takallufat ye kyun hijab-e-ranjish-e-be-ja bana diya 
thi yun to sham-e-hijr magar pichhli raat ko wo dard uTha 'firaq' ki main muskura diya

tāsīr-e-barq-e-husn jo un ke suḳhan meñ thī ik larzish-e-ḳhafī mire saare badan meñ thī 
vaañ se nikal ke phir na farāġhat huī nasīb āsūdgī kī jaan tirī anjuman meñ thī 
ik rañg-e-iltifāt bhī us be-ruḳhī meñ thā ik sādgī bhī us nigah-e-sahar fan meñ thī 
mohtāj-e-bū-e-itr na thā jism-e-ḳhūb-e-yār ḳhushbu-e-dilbarī thī jo us pairahan meñ thī 
kuchh dil hī bujh gayā hai mirā varna aaj kal kaifiyat-e-bahār kī shiddat chaman meñ thī 
mālūm ho ga.ī mire dil ko rāh-e-shauq vo baat pyaar kī jo hunūz us dahan meñ thī 
ġhurbat kī sub.h meñ bhī nahīñ hai vo raushnī jo raushnī ki shām-e-savād-e-vatan meñ thī 
aish gudāz-e-dil bhī ġham-e-āshiqī meñ thā ik rāhat-e-latīf bhī zimn-e-mehan meñ thī 
achchhā huā ki ḳhātir-e-'hasrat' se haT ga.ī haibat sī ik jo ḳhatra-e-dār-o-rasan meñ thī 
tasir-e-barq-e-husn jo un ke suKHan mein thi ek larzish-e-KHafi mere sare badan mein thi 
wan se nikal ke phir na faraghat hui nasib aasudgi ki jaan teri anjuman mein thi 
ek rang-e-iltifat bhi us be-ruKHi mein tha ek sadgi bhi us nigah-e-sahar fan mein thi 
mohtaj-e-bu-e-itr na tha jism-e-KHub-e-yar KHushbu-e-dilbari thi jo us pairahan mein thi 
kuchh dil hi bujh gaya hai mera warna aaj kal kaifiyat-e-bahaar ki shiddat chaman mein thi 
malum ho gai mere dil ko rah-e-shauq wo baat pyar ki jo hunuz us dahan mein thi 
ghurbat ki subh mein bhi nahin hai wo raushni jo raushni ki sham-e-sawad-e-watan mein thi 
aish gudaz-e-dil bhi gham-e-ashiqi mein tha ek rahat-e-latif bhi zimn-e-mehan mein thi 
achchha hua ki KHatir-e-'hasrat' se haT gai haibat si ek jo KHatra-e-dar-o-rasan mein thi

jiine kā lutf kuchh to uThāo nashe meñ aao hañste haiñ kaise ġham meñ dikhāo nashe meñ aao 
nashsha pilā ke ḳhuub mirā hāl-e-dil sunā kuchh tum bhī dil kī baat batāo nashe meñ aao 
tum hosh meñ jab aa.e to aafat hī ban ke aa.e ab mere paas jab bhī tum aao nashe meñ aao 
dil meñ ġhubār rakhnā hai tauhīn-e-mai-kashī bas ḳhatm uTh ke haath milāo nashe meñ aao 
ye zindagī kī raat hai tārīk kis qadar donoñ siroñ pe sham.a jalāo nashe meñ aao 
'vāmiq' ye dil kī pyaas bhalā yuuñ bujhegī kyā ab aag hī se aag bujhāo nashe meñ aao 
jine ka lutf kuchh to uThao nashe mein aao hanste hain kaise gham mein dikhao nashe mein aao 
nashsha pila ke KHub mera haal-e-dil suna kuchh tum bhi dil ki baat batao nashe mein aao 
tum hosh mein jab aae to aafat hi ban ke aae ab mere pas jab bhi tum aao nashe mein aao 
dil mein ghubar rakhna hai tauhin-e-mai-kashi bas KHatm uTh ke hath milao nashe mein aao 
ye zindagi ki raat hai tarik kis qadar donon siron pe shama jalao nashe mein aao 
'wamiq' ye dil ki pyas bhala yun bujhegi kya ab aag hi se aag bujhao nashe mein aao

tujh ko is tarah kahāñ chhoḌ ke jaanā thā hameñ vo to ik ahd thā aur ahd nibhānā thā hameñ 
tum to us paar khaḌe the tumheñ ma.alūm kahāñ kaise dariyā ke bhañvar kaaT ke aanā thā hameñ 
un ko le aayā thā manzil pe zamāna lekin ham chale hī the ki dar-pesh zamāna thā hameñ 
vo jo ik baar uThā laa.e the ham ujlat meñ phir vahī baar har ik baar uThānā thā hameñ 
vo to aisā hai ki mohlat na milī thī varna apnī barbādī pe ḳhud jashn manānā thā hameñ 
tujh ko is tarah kahan chhoD ke jaana tha hamein wo to ek ahd tha aur ahd nibhana tha hamein 
tum to us par khaDe the tumhein malum kahan kaise dariya ke bhanwar kaT ke aana tha hamein 
un ko le aaya tha manzil pe zamana lekin hum chale hi the ki dar-pesh zamana tha hamein 
wo jo ek bar uTha lae the hum ujlat mein phir wahi bar har ek bar uThana tha hamein 
wo to aisa hai ki mohlat na mili thi warna apni barbaadi pe KHud jashn manana tha hamein

haiñ ab is fikr meñ Duube hue ham use kaise lage rote hue ham 
koī dekhe na dekhe sālhā-sāl hifāzat se magar rakkhe hue ham 
na jaane kaun sī duniyā meñ gum haiñ kisī bīmār kī sunte hue ham 
rahe jis kī masīhā.ī meñ ab tak usī ke chārāgar hote hue ham 
girāñ thī saa.e kī maujūdgī bhī ab apne aap se sahme hue ham 
kahāñ haiñ ḳhvāb meñ dekhe jazīre nikal aa.e kidhar bahte hue ham 
baḌhīñ nazdīkiyāñ is darja ḳhud se ki ab us kā badal hote hue ham 
rakheñ kyūñkar hisāb ek ek pal kā balā se roz kam hote hue ham 
bahut himmat kā hai ye kaam 'shāriq' ki sharmāte nahīñ Darte hue ham 
hain ab is fikr mein Dube hue hum use kaise lage rote hue hum 
koi dekhe na dekhe salha-sal hifazat se magar rakkhe hue hum 
na jaane kaun si duniya mein gum hain kisi bimar ki sunte hue hum 
rahe jis ki masihai mein ab tak usi ke chaaragar hote hue hum 
giran thi sae ki maujudgi bhi ab apne aap se sahme hue hum 
kahan hain KHwab mein dekhe jazire nikal aae kidhar bahte hue hum 
baDhin nazdikiyan is darja KHud se ki ab us ka badal hote hue hum 
rakhen kyunkar hisab ek ek pal ka bala se roz kam hote hue hum 
bahut himmat ka hai ye kaam 'shaariq' ki sharmate nahin Darte hue hum

ġham se bikhrā na pā.emāl huā maiñ to ġham se hī be-misāl huā 
vaqt guzrā to mauja-e-gul thā vaqt Thahrā to māh-o-sāl huā 
ham ga.e jis shajar ke saa.e meñ us ke girne kā ehtimāl huā 
bas ki vahshat thī kār-e-duniyā se kuchh bhī hāsil na hasb-e-hāl huā 
sun ke īrān ke na.e qisse kuchh ajab sūfiyoñ kā haal huā 
jaane zindāñ meñ kyā kahā us ne jis kā kal raat intiqāl huā 
kis liye zulm hai ravā is dam jis ne pūchhā vo pā.emāl huā 
jis ta.alluq pe faḳhr thā mujh ko vo ta.alluq bhī ik vabāl huā 
ai 'hasan' neza-e-rafīqāñ se sar bachānā bhī ik kamāl huā 
gham se bikhra na paemal hua main to gham se hi be-misal hua 
waqt guzra to mauja-e-gul tha waqt Thahra to mah-o-sal hua 
hum gae jis shajar ke sae mein us ke girne ka ehtimal hua 
bas ki wahshat thi kar-e-duniya se kuchh bhi hasil na hasb-e-haal hua 
sun ke iran ke nae qisse kuchh ajab sufiyon ka haal hua 
jaane zindan mein kya kaha us ne jis ka kal raat intiqal hua 
kis liye zulm hai rawa is dam jis ne puchha wo paemal hua 
jis talluq pe faKHr tha mujh ko wo talluq bhi ek wabaal hua 
ai 'hasan' neza-e-rafiqan se sar bachana bhi ek kamal hua

bahut dinoñ se mire bām-o-dar kā hissa hai mirī tarah ye udāsī bhī ghar kā hissa hai 
phir is ke ba.ad havā aur us kā rahm o karam abhī talak to ye pattā shajar kā hissa hai 
zarūr dil se koī rābta hai āñkhoñ kā isī liye to lahū chashm-e-tar kā hissa hai 
ye terā taaj nahīñ hai hamārī pagḌī hai ye sar ke saath hī utregī sar kā hissa hai 
na jaane 'shād' tirī kab samajh meñ aa.egā ki ab zamīr-faroshī hunar kā hissa hai 
bahut dinon se mere baam-o-dar ka hissa hai meri tarah ye udasi bhi ghar ka hissa hai 
phir is ke baad hawa aur us ka rahm o karam abhi talak to ye patta shajar ka hissa hai 
zarur dil se koi rabta hai aankhon ka isi liye to lahu chashm-e-tar ka hissa hai 
ye tera taj nahin hai hamari pagDi hai ye sar ke sath hi utregi sar ka hissa hai 
na jaane 'shad' teri kab samajh mein aaega ki ab zamir-faroshi hunar ka hissa hai

itne āsūda kināre nahīñ achchhe lagte ek hī jaise nazāre nahīñ achchhe lagte 
itnī be-rabt kahānī nahīñ achchhī lagtī aur vāzeh bhī ishāre nahīñ achchhe lagte 
zarā dhīmī ho to ḳhushbū bhī bhalī lagtī hai aañkh ko rañg bhī saare nahīñ achchhe lagte 
paas aa jaa.eñ to be-nūrī muqaddar Thahre duur bhī itne sitāre nahīñ achchhe lagte 
apnī gumnāmī ke sahrāoñ meñ ḳhush rahtī huuñ ab mujhe shahr tumhāre nahīñ achchhe lagte 
itne aasuda kinare nahin achchhe lagte ek hi jaise nazare nahin achchhe lagte 
itni be-rabt kahani nahin achchhi lagti aur wazeh bhi ishaare nahin achchhe lagte 
zara dhimi ho to KHushbu bhi bhali lagti hai aankh ko rang bhi sare nahin achchhe lagte 
pas aa jaen to be-nuri muqaddar Thahre dur bhi itne sitare nahin achchhe lagte 
apni gumnami ke sahraon mein KHush rahti hun ab mujhe shahr tumhaare nahin achchhe lagte

shāyad āġhāz huā phir kisī afsāne kā hukm aadam ko hai jannat se nikal jaane kā 
un se kuchh kah to rahā huuñ magar allāh kare vo bhī mafhūm na samjheñ mire afsāne kā 
dekhnā dekhnā ye hazrat-e-vā.iz hī na hoñ rāsta pūchh rahā hai koī mai-ḳhāne kā 
be-ta.alluq tire aage se guzar jaatā hai ye bhī ik husn-e-talab hai tire dīvāne kā 
hashr tak garmi-e-hañgāma-e-hastī hai 'shakīl' silsila ḳhatm na hogā mire afsāne kā 
shayad aaghaz hua phir kisi afsane ka hukm aadam ko hai jannat se nikal jaane ka 
un se kuchh kah to raha hun magar allah kare wo bhi mafhum na samjhen mere afsane ka 
dekhna dekhna ye hazrat-e-waiz hi na hon rasta puchh raha hai koi mai-KHane ka 
be-talluq tere aage se guzar jata hai ye bhi ek husn-e-talab hai tere diwane ka 
hashr tak garmi-e-hangama-e-hasti hai 'shakil' silsila KHatm na hoga mere afsane ka

yuuñ to kahne ko tirī raah kā patthar niklā tū ne Thokar jo lagā dī to mirā sar niklā 
log to jā ke samundar ko jalā aa.e haiñ maiñ jise phūñk kar aayā vo mirā ghar niklā 
ek vo shaḳhs jo phūloñ se bhare thā dāman har kaf-e-gul meñ chhupā.e hue ḳhanjar niklā 
yuuñ to ilzām hai tūfāñ pe Dubo dene kā tah meñ dariyā kī magar naav kā lañgar niklā 
ghar ke ghar ḳhaak hue jal ke nadī suukh ga.ī phir bhī un āñkhoñ meñ jhāñkā to samundar niklā 
farsh tā arsh koī nām-o-nishāñ mil na sakā maiñ jise DhūñDh rahā thā mire andar niklā 
yun to kahne ko teri rah ka patthar nikla tu ne Thokar jo laga di to mera sar nikla 
log to ja ke samundar ko jala aae hain main jise phunk kar aaya wo mera ghar nikla 
ek wo shaKHs jo phulon se bhare tha daman har kaf-e-gul mein chhupae hue KHanjar nikla 
yun to ilzam hai tufan pe Dubo dene ka tah mein dariya ki magar naw ka langar nikla 
ghar ke ghar KHak hue jal ke nadi sukh gai phir bhi un aankhon mein jhanka to samundar nikla 
farsh ta arsh koi nam-o-nishan mil na saka main jise DhunDh raha tha mere andar nikla

bayābāñ ko pashemānī bahut hai ki shahroñ meñ bayābānī bahut hai 
mire hañsne pe duniyā chauñk uTThī mujhe bhī ḳhud pe hairānī bahut hai 
chalo sahrā ko bhī ab āzmā.eñ sunā thā ghar meñ āsānī bahut hai 
ḳhudā mahfūz rakkhe fasl-e-dil ko kahīñ sūkhā kahīñ paanī bahut hai 
kahīñ bādal kahīñ peḌoñ ke saa.e ujāloñ par nigahbānī bahut hai 
bahaknā merī fitrat meñ nahīñ par sambhalne meñ pareshānī bahut hai 
bayaban ko pashemani bahut hai ki shahron mein bayabani bahut hai 
mere hansne pe duniya chaunk uTThi mujhe bhi KHud pe hairani bahut hai 
chalo sahra ko bhi ab aazmaen suna tha ghar mein aasani bahut hai 
KHuda mahfuz rakkhe fasl-e-dil ko kahin sukha kahin pani bahut hai 
kahin baadal kahin peDon ke sae ujalon par nigahbani bahut hai 
bahakna meri fitrat mein nahin par sambhalne mein pareshani bahut hai

pukāre jā rahe ho ajnabī se chāhte kyā ho ḳhud apne shor meñ gum aadmī se chāhte kyā ho 
ye āñkhoñ meñ jo kuchh hairat hai kyā vo bhī tumheñ de deñ banā kar but hameñ ab ḳhāmushī se chāhte kyā ho 
na itminān se baiTho na gahrī niind so paao miyāñ is muḳhtasar sī zindagī se chāhte kyā ho 
use Thahrā sako itnī bhī to vus.at nahīñ ghar meñ ye sab kuchh jaan kar āvārgī se chāhte kyā ho 
kināroñ par tumhāre vāste motī bahā laa.e gharauñde bhī nahīñ toḌe nadī se chāhte kyā ho 
charāġh-e-shām-e-tanhā.ī bhī raushan rakh nahīñ paa.e ab aur aage havā kī dostī se chāhte kyā ho 
pukare ja rahe ho ajnabi se chahte kya ho KHud apne shor mein gum aadmi se chahte kya ho 
ye aankhon mein jo kuchh hairat hai kya wo bhi tumhein de den bana kar but hamein ab KHamushi se chahte kya ho 
na itminan se baiTho na gahri nind so pao miyan is muKHtasar si zindagi se chahte kya ho 
use Thahra sako itni bhi to wusat nahin ghar mein ye sab kuchh jaan kar aawargi se chahte kya ho 
kinaron par tumhaare waste moti baha lae gharaunde bhi nahin toDe nadi se chahte kya ho 
charagh-e-sham-e-tanhai bhi raushan rakh nahin pae ab aur aage hawa ki dosti se chahte kya ho

mushkil ye aa paḌī hai ki gardish meñ jaam hai ai hosh varna mujh ko tirā ehtirām hai 
fursat kā vaqt DhūñDh ke milnā kabhī ajal tujh ko bhī kaam hai abhī mujh ko bhī kaam hai 
aatī bahut qarīb se ḳhushbū hai yaar kī jaarī idhar udhar hī kahīñ daur-e-jām hai 
kuchh zahr ko taraste haiñ kuchh mai meñ ġharq haiñ saaqī ye terī bazm kā kyā intizām hai 
mai aur harām? hazrat-e-zāhid ḳhudā kā ḳhauf vo to kahā gayā thā ki mastī harām hai 
ai zulf-e-ambarīñ zarā lahrā ke phailnā ik raat is chaman meñ mirā bhī qayām hai 
ai zindagī tū aap hī chupke se dekh le jām-e-adam pe likkhā huā kis kā naam hai 
mushkil ye aa paDi hai ki gardish mein jam hai ai hosh warna mujh ko tera ehtiram hai 
fursat ka waqt DhunDh ke milna kabhi ajal tujh ko bhi kaam hai abhi mujh ko bhi kaam hai 
aati bahut qarib se KHushbu hai yar ki jari idhar udhar hi kahin daur-e-jam hai 
kuchh zahr ko taraste hain kuchh mai mein gharq hain saqi ye teri bazm ka kya intizam hai 
mai aur haram? hazrat-e-zahid KHuda ka KHauf wo to kaha gaya tha ki masti haram hai 
ai zulf-e-ambarin zara lahra ke phailna ek raat is chaman mein mera bhi qayam hai 
ai zindagi tu aap hi chupke se dekh le jam-e-adam pe likkha hua kis ka nam hai

khiḌkiyāñ kis tarah kī haiñ aur dar kaisā hai vo sochtā huuñ jis meñ vo rahtā hai ghar kaisā hai vo 
kaisī vo āb-o-havā hai jis meñ vo letā hai saañs aatā jaatā hai vo jis par rahguzar kaisā hai vo 
kaun sī rañgat ke haiñ us ke zamīn-o-āsmāñ chhāñv hai jis kī yahāñ tak bhī shajar kaisā hai vo 
ik nazar meñ hī nazar aa jā.egā vo sar-ba-sar phir bhī us ko dekhnā bār-e-digar kaisā hai vo 
maiñ to us ke ek ik lamhe kā rakhtā huuñ shumār aur mere hāl-e-dil se be-ḳhabar kaisā hai vo 
us kā honā hī bahut hai vo kahīñ hai to sahī kyā sarokār is se hai mujh ko 'zafar' kaisā hai vo 
khiDkiyan kis tarah ki hain aur dar kaisa hai wo sochta hun jis mein wo rahta hai ghar kaisa hai wo 
kaisi wo aab-o-hawa hai jis mein wo leta hai sans aata jata hai wo jis par rahguzar kaisa hai wo 
kaun si rangat ke hain us ke zamin-o-asman chhanw hai jis ki yahan tak bhi shajar kaisa hai wo 
ek nazar mein hi nazar aa jaega wo sar-ba-sar phir bhi us ko dekhna bar-e-digar kaisa hai wo 
main to us ke ek ek lamhe ka rakhta hun shumar aur mere haal-e-dil se be-KHabar kaisa hai wo 
us ka hona hi bahut hai wo kahin hai to sahi kya sarokar is se hai mujh ko 'zafar' kaisa hai wo

un kā yā apnā tamāshā dekho jo dikhātā hai zamāna dekho 
vaqt ke paas haiñ kuchh tasvīreñ koī Duubā hai ki ubhrā dekho 
rañg sāhil kā nikhar aa.egā do ghaḌī jānib-e-dariyā dekho 
tilmilā uTThā ghanā sannāTā phir koī niiñd se chauñkā dekho 
ham-safar ġhair hue jaate haiñ fāsla rah gayā kitnā dekho 
barf ho jaatā hai sadiyoñ kā lahū ek Thahrā huā lamha dekho 
rañg uḌte haiñ tabassum kī tarah ā.ina-ḳhānoñ kā daavā dekho 
dil kī bigḌī huī sūrat hai yahāñ ab koī aur ḳharāba dekho 
yā kisī parde meñ gum ho jaao yā uThā kar koī pardā dekho 
dostī ḳhūn-e-jigar chāhtī hai kaam mushkil hai to rasta dekho 
saada kāġhaz kī tarah dil chup hai hāsil-e-rañg-e-tamannā dekho 
yahī taskīn kī sūrat hai to phir chaar din ġham ko bhī apnā dekho 
ġham-gusāroñ kā sahārā kab tak ḳhud pe bhī kar ke bharosā dekho 
apnī nīyat pe na jaao 'bāqī' ruḳh zamāne kī havā kā dekho 
un ka ya apna tamasha dekho jo dikhata hai zamana dekho 
waqt ke pas hain kuchh taswiren koi Duba hai ki ubhra dekho 
rang sahil ka nikhar aaega do ghaDi jaanib-e-dariya dekho 
tilmila uTTha ghana sannaTa phir koi nind se chaunka dekho 
ham-safar ghair hue jate hain fasla rah gaya kitna dekho 
barf ho jata hai sadiyon ka lahu ek Thahra hua lamha dekho 
rang uDte hain tabassum ki tarah aaina-KHanon ka dawa dekho 
dil ki bigDi hui surat hai yahan ab koi aur KHaraba dekho 
ya kisi parde mein gum ho jao ya uTha kar koi parda dekho 
dosti KHun-e-jigar chahti hai kaam mushkil hai to rasta dekho 
sada kaghaz ki tarah dil chup hai hasil-e-rang-e-tamanna dekho 
yahi taskin ki surat hai to phir chaar din gham ko bhi apna dekho 
gham-gusaron ka sahaara kab tak KHud pe bhi kar ke bharosa dekho 
apni niyat pe na jao 'baqi' ruKH zamane ki hawa ka dekho

lahr kī tarah kināre se uchhal jaanā hai dekhte dekhte hāthoñ se nikal jaanā hai 
dopahar vo hai ki hotī nazar aatī hī nahīñ din hamārā to bahut pahle hī Dhal jaanā hai 
jī hamārā bhī yahāñ ab nahīñ lagtā itnā aaj agar rok liye jaa.eñ to kal jaanā hai 
dil meñ khiltā huā ik āḳhirī ḳhvāhish kā ye phuul jaate jaate ise ḳhud maiñ ne masal jaanā hai 
jo yahāñ ḳhud hī lagā rakkhī hai chāroñ jānib ek din ham ne isī aag meñ jal jaanā hai 
chaltī ruktī huī ye husn bhī hai ek havā mausam-e-ishq bhī ik roz badal jaanā hai 
jaise ghuTTī meñ koī ḳhauf paḌā ho is kī bāt-be-bāt hī is dil ne dahal jaanā hai 
aur to honī hai kyā apnī vasūlī us se muñh pe kālak ye mulāqāt kī mal jaanā hai 
maiñ bhī kuchh der se baiThā huuñ nishāne pe 'zafar' aur vo kheñchā huā tiir bhī chal jaanā hai 
lahr ki tarah kinare se uchhal jaana hai dekhte dekhte hathon se nikal jaana hai 
dopahar wo hai ki hoti nazar aati hi nahin din hamara to bahut pahle hi Dhal jaana hai 
ji hamara bhi yahan ab nahin lagta itna aaj agar rok liye jaen to kal jaana hai 
dil mein khilta hua ek aaKHiri KHwahish ka ye phul jate jate ise KHud main ne masal jaana hai 
jo yahan KHud hi laga rakkhi hai chaaron jaanib ek din hum ne isi aag mein jal jaana hai 
chalti rukti hui ye husn bhi hai ek hawa mausam-e-ishq bhi ek roz badal jaana hai 
jaise ghuTTi mein koi KHauf paDa ho is ki baat-be-baat hi is dil ne dahal jaana hai 
aur to honi hai kya apni wasuli us se munh pe kalak ye mulaqat ki mal jaana hai 
main bhi kuchh der se baiTha hun nishane pe 'zafar' aur wo khencha hua tir bhi chal jaana hai

mauj-e-gul mauj-e-sabā mauj-e-sahar lagtī hai sar se pā tak vo samāñ hai ki nazar lagtī hai 
ham ne har gaam pe sajdoñ ke jalā.e haiñ charāġh ab hameñ terī galī rāhguzar lagtī hai 
lamhe lamhe meñ basī hai tirī yādoñ kī mahak aaj kī raat to ḳhushbū kā safar lagtī hai 
jal gayā apnā nasheman to koī baat nahīñ dekhnā ye hai ki ab aag kidhar lagtī hai 
saarī duniyā meñ ġharīboñ kā lahū bahtā hai har zamīñ mujh ko mire ḳhuun se tar lagtī hai 
koī āsūda nahīñ ahl-e-siyāsat ke sivā ye sadī dushman-e-arbāb-e-hunar lagtī hai 
vāqi.a shahr meñ kal to koī aisā na huā ye to aḳhbār ke daftar kī ḳhabar lagtī hai 
lucknow kyā tirī galiyoñ kā muqaddar thā yahī har galī aaj tirī ḳhāk-basar lagtī hai 
mauj-e-gul mauj-e-saba mauj-e-sahar lagti hai sar se pa tak wo saman hai ki nazar lagti hai 
hum ne har gam pe sajdon ke jalae hain charagh ab hamein teri gali rahguzar lagti hai 
lamhe lamhe mein basi hai teri yaadon ki mahak aaj ki raat to KHushbu ka safar lagti hai 
jal gaya apna nasheman to koi baat nahin dekhna ye hai ki ab aag kidhar lagti hai 
sari duniya mein gharibon ka lahu bahta hai har zamin mujh ko mere KHun se tar lagti hai 
koi aasuda nahin ahl-e-siyasat ke siwa ye sadi dushman-e-arbab-e-hunar lagti hai 
waqia shahr mein kal to koi aisa na hua ye to aKHbar ke daftar ki KHabar lagti hai 
lucknow kya teri galiyon ka muqaddar tha yahi har gali aaj teri KHak-basar lagti hai

nahīñ maiñ hausla to kar rahā thā zarā tere sukūñ se Dar rahā thā 
achānak jheñp kar hañsne lagā maiñ bahut rone kī koshish kar rahā thā 
bhañvar meñ phir hameñ kuchh mashġhale the vo bechāra to sāhil par rahā thā 
larazte kāñpte hāthoñ se būḌhā chilam meñ phir koī dukh bhar rahā thā 
achānak lau uThī aur jal gayā maiñ bujhī kirnoñ ko yakjā kar rahā thā 
gila kyā thā agar sab saath hote vo bas tanhā safar se Dar rahā thā 
ġhalat thā roknā ashkoñ ko yuuñ bhī ki buniyādoñ meñ paanī mar rahā thā 
nahin main hausla to kar raha tha zara tere sukun se Dar raha tha 
achanak jhenp kar hansne laga main bahut rone ki koshish kar raha tha 
bhanwar mein phir hamein kuchh mashghale the wo bechaara to sahil par raha tha 
larazte kanpte hathon se buDha chilam mein phir koi dukh bhar raha tha 
achanak lau uThi aur jal gaya main bujhi kirnon ko yakja kar raha tha 
gila kya tha agar sab sath hote wo bas tanha safar se Dar raha tha 
ghalat tha rokna ashkon ko yun bhi ki buniyaadon mein pani mar raha tha

dhaḌkan dhaḌkan yādoñ kī bārāt akelā kamra maiñ aur mere zaḳhmī ehsāsāt akelā kamra 
ga.e dinoñ kī tasvīroñ ke bujhte hue nuqūsh taaza tark-e-ta.alluq ke sadmāt akelā kamra 
dosh-e-havā par uḌne vaale ḳhizāñ ke āḳhirī patte apnī akelī jaan ġham-e-hālāt akelā kamra 
āḳhirī shab ke chāñd se karnā bālkanī meñ bāteñ us ke shahr meñ hotel kī ye raat akelā kamra 
merī sisaktī āvāzoñ se gūñjtī haiñ dīvāreñ suntā hai din raat mare naġhmāt akelā kamra 
sab sāmān baham haiñ 'sājid' likhne likhāne ke ḳhūn-e-jigar aur aañsū dil kī davāt akelā kamra 
dhaDkan dhaDkan yaadon ki baraat akela kamra main aur mere zaKHmi ehsasat akela kamra 
gae dinon ki taswiron ke bujhte hue nuqush taza tark-e-talluq ke sadmat akela kamra 
dosh-e-hawa par uDne wale KHizan ke aaKHiri patte apni akeli jaan gham-e-haalat akela kamra 
aaKHiri shab ke chand se karna baalkani mein baaten us ke shahr mein hotel ki ye raat akela kamra 
meri sisakti aawazon se gunjti hain diwaren sunta hai din raat mare naghmat akela kamra 
sab saman baham hain 'sajid' likhne likhane ke KHun-e-jigar aur aansu dil ki dawat akela kamra

ghar kī dahlīz se bāzār meñ mat aa jaanā tum kisī chashm-e-ḳharīdār meñ mat aa jaanā 
ḳhaak uḌānā inhīñ galiyoñ meñ bhalā lagtā hai chalte phirte kisī darbār meñ mat aa jaanā 
yūñhī ḳhushbū kī tarah phailte rahnā har sū tum kisī dām-e-talabgār meñ mat aa jaanā 
duur sāhil pe khaḌe rah ke tamāshā karnā kisī ummīd ke mañjdhār meñ mat aa jaanā 
achchhe lagte ho ki ḳhud-sar nahīñ ḳhuddār ho tum haañ simaT ke but-e-pindār meñ mat aa jaanā 
chāñd kahtā huuñ to matlab na ġhalat lenā tum raat ko rauzan-e-dīvār meñ mat aa jaanā 
ghar ki dahliz se bazar mein mat aa jaana tum kisi chashm-e-KHaridar mein mat aa jaana 
KHak uDana inhin galiyon mein bhala lagta hai chalte phirte kisi darbar mein mat aa jaana 
yunhi KHushbu ki tarah phailte rahna har su tum kisi dam-e-talabgar mein mat aa jaana 
dur sahil pe khaDe rah ke tamasha karna kisi ummid ke manjdhaar mein mat aa jaana 
achchhe lagte ho ki KHud-sar nahin KHuddar ho tum han simaT ke but-e-pindar mein mat aa jaana 
chand kahta hun to matlab na ghalat lena tum raat ko rauzan-e-diwar mein mat aa jaana

laakh ġham siine se lipTe rahe nāgan kī tarah pyaar sachchā thā mahaktā rahā chandan kī tarah 
tujh ko pahchān liyā hai tujhe pā bhī lūñgā ik janam aur mile gar isī jīvan kī tarah 
ab koī kaise pahuñch pā.egā tere ġham tak muskurāhaT kī ridā Daal dī chilman kī tarah 
koī tahrīr nahīñ hai jise paḌh le koī zindagī ho ga.ī be-nām sī uljhan kī tarah 
jaise dhartī kī kisī shai se ta.alluq hī nahīñ ho gayā pyaar tirā bhī tire dāman kī tarah 
shaam jab raat kī mahfil meñ qadam rakhtī hai bhartī hai maañg meñ sindūr suhāgan kī tarah 
muskurāte ho magar soch lo itnā ai 'nūr' suud letī masarrat bhī mahājan kī tarah 
lakh gham sine se lipTe rahe nagan ki tarah pyar sachcha tha mahakta raha chandan ki tarah 
tujh ko pahchan liya hai tujhe pa bhi lunga ek janam aur mile gar isi jiwan ki tarah 
ab koi kaise pahunch paega tere gham tak muskurahaT ki rida Dal di chilman ki tarah 
koi tahrir nahin hai jise paDh le koi zindagi ho gai be-nam si uljhan ki tarah 
jaise dharti ki kisi shai se talluq hi nahin ho gaya pyar tera bhi tere daman ki tarah 
sham jab raat ki mahfil mein qadam rakhti hai bharti hai mang mein sindur suhagan ki tarah 
muskuraate ho magar soch lo itna ai 'nur' sud leti masarrat bhi mahajan ki tarah

jafā.eñ duur tak jaatī haiñ kam ābād shahroñ meñ vafā.eñ duur tak jaatī haiñ kam ābād shahroñ meñ 
bahāreñ der tak rahtī haiñ kam ābād qariyoñ meñ ḳhizā.eñ duur tak jaatī haiñ kam ābād shahroñ meñ 
sadā hañsne kī ho afsos kī yā aah bharne kī sadā.eñ duur tak jaatī haiñ kam ābād shahroñ meñ 
añdherā jab ghanā ho to charāġh-e-rāh-e-vīrāñ kī shuā.eñ duur tak jaatī haiñ kam ābād shahroñ meñ 
'munīr' ābād shahroñ ke makīnoñ kī havā le kar havā.eñ duur tak jaatī haiñ kam ābād shahroñ meñ 
jafaen dur tak jati hain kam aabaad shahron mein wafaen dur tak jati hain kam aabaad shahron mein 
bahaaren der tak rahti hain kam aabaad qariyon mein KHizaen dur tak jati hain kam aabaad shahron mein 
sada hansne ki ho afsos ki ya aah bharne ki sadaen dur tak jati hain kam aabaad shahron mein 
andhera jab ghana ho to charagh-e-rah-e-viran ki shuaen dur tak jati hain kam aabaad shahron mein 
'munir' aabaad shahron ke makinon ki hawa le kar hawaen dur tak jati hain kam aabaad shahron mein

kabhī taqsīr jis ne kī hī nahīñ ham se pūchho to aadmī hī nahīñ 
mar chuke jīte-jī ḳhushā qismat is se achchhī to zindagī hī nahīñ 
dostī aur kisī ġharaz ke liye vo tijārat hai dostī hī nahīñ 
yā vafā hī na thī zamāne meñ yā magar dostoñ ne kī hī nahīñ 
kuchh mirī baat kīmiyā to na thī aisī bigḌī ki phir banī hī nahīñ 
jis ḳhushī ko na ho qayām-o-davām ġham se bad-tar hai vo ḳhushī hī nahīñ 
bandagī kā shu.ūr hai jab tak banda-parvar vo bandagī hī nahīñ 
ek do ghūñT jām-e-vahdat ke jo na pī le vo muttaqī hī nahīñ 
kī hai zāhid ne aap duniyā tark yā muqaddar meñ us ke thī hī nahīñ 
kabhi taqsir jis ne ki hi nahin hum se puchho to aadmi hi nahin 
mar chuke jite-ji KHusha qismat is se achchhi to zindagi hi nahin 
dosti aur kisi gharaz ke liye wo tijarat hai dosti hi nahin 
ya wafa hi na thi zamane mein ya magar doston ne ki hi nahin 
kuchh meri baat kimiya to na thi aisi bigDi ki phir bani hi nahin 
jis KHushi ko na ho qayam-o-dawam gham se bad-tar hai wo KHushi hi nahin 
bandagi ka shuur hai jab tak banda-parwar wo bandagi hi nahin 
ek do ghunT jam-e-wahdat ke jo na pi le wo muttaqi hi nahin 
ki hai zahid ne aap duniya tark ya muqaddar mein us ke thi hi nahin

raushnī phailī to sab kā rañg kaalā ho gayā kuchh diye aise jale har-sū añdherā ho gayā 
jis ne merā saath chhoḌā aur kisī kā ho gayā sach to ye hai mujh se bhī baḌh kar vo tanhā ho gayā 
vaqt kā ye moḌ kaisā hai ki tujh se mil ke bhī tujh ko kho dene kā ġham kuchh aur gahrā ho gayā 
ham ne tanhā.ī kī chādar taan lī aur so ga.e log jab kahne lage uTTho saverā ho gayā 
Dūbtā sūraj huuñ maiñ vo merā saayā dekh kar sochtā ye hai qad us kā mujh se lambā ho gayā 
chand lamhe the jo barsoñ ba.ad tak biite nahīñ kuchh baras vo bhī the jin kā ek lamha ho gayā 
jab zabāñ kholī to sab ko niiñd sī aane lagī chup hue to yuuñ lagā har shaḳhs bahrā ho gayā 
saath us kā chhoḌ kar aa.e to ye aalam rahā ham ne jis chehre ko dekhā us kā chehra ho gayā 
is ta.alluq ko bhalā 'āzād' maiñ kyā naam duuñ vo kisī kā ho ke bhī kuchh aur merā ho gayā 
raushni phaili to sab ka rang kala ho gaya kuchh diye aise jale har-su andhera ho gaya 
jis ne mera sath chhoDa aur kisi ka ho gaya sach to ye hai mujh se bhi baDh kar wo tanha ho gaya 
waqt ka ye moD kaisa hai ki tujh se mil ke bhi tujh ko kho dene ka gham kuchh aur gahra ho gaya 
hum ne tanhai ki chadar tan li aur so gae log jab kahne lage uTTho sawera ho gaya 
Dubta suraj hun main wo mera saya dekh kar sochta ye hai qad us ka mujh se lamba ho gaya 
chand lamhe the jo barson baad tak bite nahin kuchh baras wo bhi the jin ka ek lamha ho gaya 
jab zaban kholi to sab ko nind si aane lagi chup hue to yun laga har shaKHs bahra ho gaya 
sath us ka chhoD kar aae to ye aalam raha hum ne jis chehre ko dekha us ka chehra ho gaya 
is talluq ko bhala 'azad' main kya nam dun wo kisi ka ho ke bhi kuchh aur mera ho gaya

bhiiḌ hai bar-sar-e-bāzār kahīñ aur chaleñ aa mire dil mire ġham-ḳhvār kahīñ aur chaleñ 
koī khiḌkī nahīñ khultī kisī bāġhīche meñ saañs lenā bhī hai dushvār kahīñ aur chaleñ 
tū bhī maġhmūm hai maiñ bhī huuñ bahut afsurda donoñ is dukh se haiñ do-chār kahīñ aur chaleñ 
DhūñDte haiñ koī sarsabz kushāda sī fazā vaqt kī dhund ke us paar kahīñ aur chaleñ 
ye jo phūloñ se bharā shahr huā kartā thā us ke manzar haiñ dil-āzār kahīñ aur chaleñ 
aise hañgāmā-e-mahshar meñ to dam ghuTtā hai bāteñ kuchh karnī haiñ is baar kahīñ aur chaleñ 
bhiD hai bar-sar-e-bazar kahin aur chalen aa mere dil mere gham-KHwar kahin aur chalen 
koi khiDki nahin khulti kisi baghiche mein sans lena bhi hai dushwar kahin aur chalen 
tu bhi maghmum hai main bhi hun bahut afsurda donon is dukh se hain do-chaar kahin aur chalen 
DhunDte hain koi sarsabz kushada si faza waqt ki dhund ke us par kahin aur chalen 
ye jo phulon se bhara shahr hua karta tha us ke manzar hain dil-azar kahin aur chalen 
aise hangama-e-mahshar mein to dam ghuTta hai baaten kuchh karni hain is bar kahin aur chalen

dostī kā fareb hī khā.eñ aao kāġhaz kī naav tairā.eñ 
ham agar rah-ravī kā azm kareñ manzileñ khiñch ke ḳhud chalī aa.eñ 
ham ko āmāda-e-safar na karo rāste pur-ḳhatar na ho jaa.eñ 
ham-safar rah ga.e bahut pīchhe aao kuchh der ko Thahar jaa.eñ 
mutriba aisā giit chheḌ ki ham zindagī ke qarīb ho jaa.eñ 
in bahāroñ kī aabrū rakh lo muskurāo ki phuul khil jaa.eñ 
gesū-e-zīst ke ye uljhāo aao mil kar 'shakeb' suljhā.eñ 
dosti ka fareb hi khaen aao kaghaz ki naw tairaen 
hum agar rah-rawi ka azm karen manzilen khinch ke KHud chali aaen 
hum ko aamada-e-safar na karo raste pur-KHatar na ho jaen 
ham-safar rah gae bahut pichhe aao kuchh der ko Thahar jaen 
mutriba aisa git chheD ki hum zindagi ke qarib ho jaen 
in bahaaron ki aabru rakh lo muskurao ki phul khil jaen 
gesu-e-zist ke ye uljhao aao mil kar 'shakeb' suljhaen

aisī tez havā aur aisī raat nahīñ dekhī lekin ham ne maulā jaisī zaat nahīñ dekhī 
us kī shān-e-ajīb kā manzar dekhne vaalā hai ik aisā ḳhurshīd ki jis ne raat nahīñ dekhī 
bistar par maujūd rahe aur sair-e-haft-aflāk aisī kisī par rahmat kī barsāt nahīñ dekhī 
us kī aal vahī jo us ke naqsh-e-qadam par sirf zaat kī ham ne āl-e-sādāt nahīñ dekhī 
ek shajar hai jis kī shāḳheñ phailtī jaatī haiñ kisī shajar meñ ham ne aisī baat nahīñ dekhī 
ik dariyā-e-rahmat hai jo bahtā jaatā hai ye shān-e-barkāt kisī ke saath nahīñ dekhī 
shāhoñ kī tārīḳh bhī ham ne dekhī hai lekin us ke dar ke gadāoñ vaalī baat nahīñ dekhī 
us ke naam pe māreñ khānā ab e.azāz hamārā aur kisī kī ye izzat auqāt nahīñ dekhī 
sadiyoñ kī is dhuup chhāñv meñ koī hameñ batlā.e puurī huī kaun sī us kī baat nahīñ dekhī 
ahl-e-zamīñ ne kaun sā ham par zulm nahīñ Dhāyā kaun sī nusrat ham ne us ke haath nahīñ dekhī 
aisi tez hawa aur aisi raat nahin dekhi lekin hum ne maula jaisi zat nahin dekhi 
us ki shan-e-ajib ka manzar dekhne wala hai ek aisa KHurshid ki jis ne raat nahin dekhi 
bistar par maujud rahe aur sair-e-haft-aflak aisi kisi par rahmat ki barsat nahin dekhi 
us ki aal wahi jo us ke naqsh-e-qadam par sirf zat ki hum ne aal-e-sadat nahin dekhi 
ek shajar hai jis ki shaKHen phailti jati hain kisi shajar mein hum ne aisi baat nahin dekhi 
ek dariya-e-rahmat hai jo bahta jata hai ye shan-e-barkat kisi ke sath nahin dekhi 
shahon ki tariKH bhi hum ne dekhi hai lekin us ke dar ke gadaon wali baat nahin dekhi 
us ke nam pe maren khana ab eazaz hamara aur kisi ki ye izzat auqat nahin dekhi 
sadiyon ki is dhup chhanw mein koi hamein batlae puri hui kaun si us ki baat nahin dekhi 
ahl-e-zamin ne kaun sa hum par zulm nahin Dhaya kaun si nusrat hum ne us ke hath nahin dekhi

Thahre hue na bahte hue pāniyoñ meñ huuñ ye maiñ kahāñ huuñ kaisī pareshāniyoñ meñ huuñ 
ik pal ko bhī sukūn se jiinā muhāl hai kin dushmanān-e-jāñ kī nigahbāniyoñ meñ huuñ 
yuuñ jal ke raakh ḳhvāb ke paikar hue ki bas ik ā.īna banā huā hairāniyoñ meñ huuñ 
jab raah sahl thī to baḌī mushkiloñ meñ thā ab raah hai kaThin to kuchh āsāniyoñ meñ huuñ 
āsāñ nahīñ hai itnā ki bik jā.ūñ us ke haath arzāñ nahīñ huuñ ḳhvāh farāvāniyoñ meñ huuñ 
mujh ko bhī ilm ḳhuub hai sab madd-o-jazr kā maiñ bhī to sab ke saath inhīñ pāniyoñ meñ huuñ 
'mohsin' tamām-tar sar-o-sāmāñ ke bāvajūd pūchho na kitnī be-sar-o-sāmāniyoñ meñ huuñ 
Thahre hue na bahte hue paniyon mein hun ye main kahan hun kaisi pareshaniyon mein hun 
ek pal ko bhi sukun se jina muhaal hai kin dushmanan-e-jaan ki nigahbaniyon mein hun 
yun jal ke rakh KHwab ke paikar hue ki bas ek aaina bana hua hairaniyon mein hun 
jab rah sahl thi to baDi mushkilon mein tha ab rah hai kaThin to kuchh aasaniyon mein hun 
aasan nahin hai itna ki bik jaun us ke hath arzan nahin hun KHwah farawaniyon mein hun 
mujh ko bhi ilm KHub hai sab madd-o-jazr ka main bhi to sab ke sath inhin paniyon mein hun 
'mohsin' tamam-tar sar-o-saman ke bawajud puchho na kitni be-sar-o-samaniyon mein hun

chalo itnī to āsānī rahegī mileñge aur pareshānī rahegī 
isī se raunaq-e-dariyā-e-dil hai yahī ik lahar tūfānī rahegī 
kabhī ye shauq nā-mānūs hogā kabhī vo shakl anjānī rahegī 
nikal jā.egī sūrat aa.ine se hamāre ghar meñ hairānī rahegī 
subuk-sar ho ke jiinā hai koī din abhī kuchh din girāñ-jānī rahegī 
sunoge lafz meñ bhī phaḌphaḌāhaT lahū meñ bhī par-afshānī rahegī 
hamārī garm-guftārī ke bā-vasf havā itnī hī barfānī rahegī 
abhī dil kī siyāhī zor par hai abhī chehre pe tābānī rahegī 
'zafar' maiñ shahr meñ aa to gayā huuñ mirī ḳhaslat bayābānī rahegī 
chalo itni to aasani rahegi milenge aur pareshani rahegi 
isi se raunaq-e-dariya-e-dil hai yahi ek lahar tufani rahegi 
kabhi ye shauq na-manus hoga kabhi wo shakl anjaani rahegi 
nikal jaegi surat aaine se hamare ghar mein hairani rahegi 
subuk-sar ho ke jina hai koi din abhi kuchh din giran-jaani rahegi 
sunoge lafz mein bhi phaDphaDahaT lahu mein bhi par-afshani rahegi 
hamari garm-guftari ke ba-wasf hawa itni hi barfani rahegi 
abhi dil ki siyahi zor par hai abhi chehre pe tabani rahegi 
'zafar' main shahr mein aa to gaya hun meri KHaslat bayabani rahegi

ghar kā rasta jo bhuul jaatā huuñ kyā batā.ūñ kahāñ se aatā huuñ 
zehn meñ ḳhvāb ke mahal kī tarah ḳhud hī bantā huuñ TuuT jaatā huuñ 
aaj bhī shām-e-ġham! udaas na ho maañg kar maiñ charāġh laatā huuñ 
maiñ to ai shahr ke hasīñ rasto ghar se hī qatl ho ke aatā huuñ 
roz aatī hai ek shaḳhs kī yaad roz ik phuul toḌ laatā huuñ 
haa.e gahrā.iyāñ un āñkhoñ kī baat kartā huuñ Duub jaatā huuñ 
ghar ka rasta jo bhul jata hun kya bataun kahan se aata hun 
zehn mein KHwab ke mahal ki tarah KHud hi banta hun TuT jata hun 
aaj bhi sham-e-gham! udas na ho mang kar main charagh lata hun 
main to ai shahr ke hasin rasto ghar se hi qatl ho ke aata hun 
roz aati hai ek shaKHs ki yaad roz ek phul toD lata hun 
hae gahraiyan un aankhon ki baat karta hun Dub jata hun

ḳhūb-rūyoñ se yāriyāñ na ga.iiñ dil kī be-iḳhtiyāriyāñ na ga.iiñ 
aql-e-sabr-āshnā se kuchh na huā shauq kī be-qarāriyāñ na ga.iiñ 
din kī sahrā-navardiyāñ na chhuTīñ shab kī aḳhtar-shumāriyāñ na ga.iiñ 
hosh yaañ sadd-e-rāh-e-ilm rahā aql kī harzā-kāriyāñ na ga.iiñ 
the jo ham-rañg-e-nāz un ke sitam dil kī ummīdvāriyāñ na ga.iiñ 
husn jab tak rahā nazāra-farosh sabr kī sharmsāriyāñ na ga.iiñ 
tarz-e-'momin' meñ marhabā 'hasrat' terī rangīñ-nigāriyāñ na ga.iiñ 
KHub-ruyon se yariyan na gain dil ki be-iKHtiyariyan na gain 
aql-e-sabr-ashna se kuchh na hua shauq ki be-qarariyan na gain 
din ki sahra-nawardiyan na chhuTin shab ki aKHtar-shumariyan na gain 
hosh yan sadd-e-rah-e-ilm raha aql ki harza-kariyan na gain 
the jo ham-rang-e-naz un ke sitam dil ki ummidwariyan na gain 
husn jab tak raha nazara-farosh sabr ki sharmsariyan na gain 
tarz-e-'momin' mein marhaba 'hasrat' teri rangin-nigariyan na gain

ġhazal ke parde meñ be-parda ḳhvāhisheñ likhnā na aayā ham ko barahna guzārisheñ likhnā 
tire jahāñ meñ huuñ be-sāya abr kī sūrat mire nasīb meñ be-abr bārisheñ likhnā 
hisāb-e-dard to yuuñ sab mirī nigāh meñ hai jo mujh pe ho na sakīñ vo navāzisheñ likhnā 
ḳharāsheñ chehre kī siine ke zaḳhm suukh chale kahāñ haiñ nāḳhun-e-yārāñ kī kāvisheñ likhnā 
ham ek chaak haiñ jo kūza-gar ke haath meñ hai hamārā kaam zamāne kī gardisheñ likhnā 
ba-rāh-e-rāst koī farz adā nahīñ hotā vahī sifārisheñ sunñā sifārisheñ likhnā 
huā na ye bhī salīqe se zindagī karte har ek saañs ko nākām koshisheñ likhnā 
kahāñ vo log jo the har taraf se nastālīq purānī baat huī chust bandisheñ likhnā 
hunar-varo zarā kuchh din ye turfagī bhī sahī hamāre lafzoñ ko mā'nī kī laġhzisheñ likhnā 
kabhī jo ḳhat use likhnā 'fazā' to rakhnā yaad mirī taraf se bhī kuchh nek ḳhvāhisheñ likhnā 
ghazal ke parde mein be-parda KHwahishen likhna na aaya hum ko barahna guzarishen likhna 
tere jahan mein hun be-saya abr ki surat mere nasib mein be-abr barishen likhna 
hisab-e-dard to yun sab meri nigah mein hai jo mujh pe ho na sakin wo nawazishen likhna 
KHarashen chehre ki sine ke zaKHm sukh chale kahan hain naKHun-e-yaran ki kawishen likhna 
hum ek chaak hain jo kuza-gar ke hath mein hai hamara kaam zamane ki gardishen likhna 
ba-rah-e-rast koi farz ada nahin hota wahi sifarishen sunna sifarishen likhna 
hua na ye bhi saliqe se zindagi karte har ek sans ko nakaam koshishen likhna 
kahan wo log jo the har taraf se nastaliq purani baat hui chust bandishen likhna 
hunar-waro zara kuchh din ye turfagi bhi sahi hamare lafzon ko ma'ni ki laghzishen likhna 
kabhi jo KHat use likhna 'faza' to rakhna yaad meri taraf se bhi kuchh nek KHwahishen likhna

kahāñ kī guuñj dil-e-nā-tavāñ meñ rahtī hai ki thartharī sī ajab jism-o-jāñ meñ rahtī hai 
qadam qadam pe vahī chashm o lab vahī gesū tamām umr nazar imtihāñ meñ rahtī hai 
maza to ye hai ki vo ḳhud to hai na.e ghar meñ aur us kī yaad purāne makāñ meñ rahtī hai 
pata to fasl-e-gul-o-lāla kā nahīñ mālūm sunā hai qurb-o-javār-e-ḳhizāñ meñ rahtī hai 
maiñ kitnā vahm karūñ lekin ik shuā-e-yaqīñ kahīñ navāh-e-dil-e-bad-gumāñ meñ rahtī hai 
hazār jaan khapātā rahūñ magar phir bhī kamī sī kuchh mire tarz-e-bayāñ meñ rahtī hai 
kahan ki gunj dil-e-na-tawan mein rahti hai ki tharthari si ajab jism-o-jaan mein rahti hai 
qadam qadam pe wahi chashm o lab wahi gesu tamam umr nazar imtihan mein rahti hai 
maza to ye hai ki wo KHud to hai nae ghar mein aur us ki yaad purane makan mein rahti hai 
pata to fasl-e-gul-o-lala ka nahin malum suna hai qurb-o-jawar-e-KHizan mein rahti hai 
main kitna wahm karun lekin ek shua-e-yaqin kahin nawah-e-dil-e-bad-guman mein rahti hai 
hazar jaan khapata rahun magar phir bhi kami si kuchh mere tarz-e-bayan mein rahti hai

inkār hī kar dījiye iqrār nahīñ to uljhan hī meñ mar jā.egā bīmār nahīñ to 
lagtā hai ki piñjre meñ huuñ duniyā meñ nahīñ huuñ do roz se dekhā koī aḳhbār nahīñ to 
duniyā hameñ nābūd hī kar Dālegī ik din ham hoñge agar ab bhī ḳhabar-dār nahīñ to 
kuchh to rahe aslāf kī tahzīb kī ḳhushbū Topī hī lagā lījiye dastār nahīñ to 
ham barsar-e-paikār sitamgar se hamesha rakhte haiñ qalam haath meñ talvār nahīñ to 
bhaa.ī ko hai bhaa.ī pe bharosa to bhalā hai āñgan meñ bhī uTh jā.egī dīvār nahīñ to 
be-sūd har ik qaul har ik she’r hai 'rāġhib' gar us ke muāfiq tirā kirdār nahīñ to 
inkar hi kar dijiye iqrar nahin to uljhan hi mein mar jaega bimar nahin to 
lagta hai ki pinjre mein hun duniya mein nahin hun do roz se dekha koi aKHbar nahin to 
duniya hamein nabud hi kar Dalegi ek din hum honge agar ab bhi KHabar-dar nahin to 
kuchh to rahe aslaf ki tahzib ki KHushbu Topi hi laga lijiye dastar nahin to 
hum barsar-e-paikar sitamgar se hamesha rakhte hain qalam hath mein talwar nahin to 
bhai ko hai bhai pe bharosa to bhala hai aangan mein bhi uTh jaegi diwar nahin to 
be-sud har ek qaul har ek she’r hai 'raghib' gar us ke muafiq tera kirdar nahin to

chhupā huā jo numūdār se nikal aayā ye farq bhī tire inkār se nikal aayā 
palaT paḌā jo maiñ sar phoḌ kar mohabbat meñ to rāsta isī dīvār se nikal aayā 
mujhe ḳharīdnā kuchh bhī na thā isī ḳhātir maiñ ḳhud ko bech ke bāzār se nikal aayā 
abhī to apne khañDar hī kī sair thī baaqī ye tū kahāñ mire āsār se nikal aayā 
bahut se aur tilismāt muntazir haiñ mire agar kabhī tire asrār se nikal aayā 
mujhe bhī de rahe the ḳhil.at-e-vafā lekin nazar bachā ke maiñ darbār se nikal aayā 
sire se jo kahīñ maujūd hī na thā āḳhir vo naqs bhī mire kirdār se nikal aayā 
na.ī fazā na.e āfāq haiñ usī ke liye jo aaj uḌtī huī Daar se nikal aayā 
usī ko ek ġhanīmat qarār dūñgā 'zafar' jo ek sher bhī tūmār se nikal aayā 
chhupa hua jo numudar se nikal aaya ye farq bhi tere inkar se nikal aaya 
palaT paDa jo main sar phoD kar mohabbat mein to rasta isi diwar se nikal aaya 
mujhe KHaridna kuchh bhi na tha isi KHatir main KHud ko bech ke bazar se nikal aaya 
abhi to apne khanDar hi ki sair thi baqi ye tu kahan mere aasar se nikal aaya 
bahut se aur tilismat muntazir hain mere agar kabhi tere asrar se nikal aaya 
mujhe bhi de rahe the KHilat-e-wafa lekin nazar bacha ke main darbar se nikal aaya 
sire se jo kahin maujud hi na tha aaKHir wo naqs bhi mere kirdar se nikal aaya 
nai faza nae aafaq hain usi ke liye jo aaj uDti hui Dar se nikal aaya 
usi ko ek ghanimat qarar dunga 'zafar' jo ek sher bhi tumar se nikal aaya

ḳhudā ko āzmānā chāhiye thā kisī kā dil dukhānā chāhiye thā 
dukāneñ shahr meñ saarī na.ī thiiñ hameñ sab kuchh purānā chāhiye thā 
nazariye falsafe apnī jagah haiñ hameñ shādī meñ jaanā chāhiye thā 
takalluf roz-roz achchhā nahīñ hai galī meñ bhī nahānā chāhiye thā 
vo dil meñ thī ki ghar meñ aag to thī paḌosī ko batānā chāhiye thā 
KHuda ko aazmana chahiye tha kisi ka dil dukhana chahiye tha 
dukanen shahr mein sari nai thin hamein sab kuchh purana chahiye tha 
nazariye falsafe apni jagah hain hamein shadi mein jaana chahiye tha 
takalluf roz-roz achchha nahin hai gali mein bhi nahana chahiye tha 
wo dil mein thi ki ghar mein aag to thi paDosi ko batana chahiye tha

mere andar vo mere sivā kaun thā maiñ to thā hī magar dūsrā kaun thā 
log bhī kuchh ta.āruf karāte rahe mujh ko pahle hī mālūm thā kaun thā 
log andāze hī sab lagāte rahe vo jabīñ kis kī thī naqsh-e-pā kaun thā 
mujh se mil kar hī andāza hogā koī vo alag kaun thā vo judā kaun thā 
koī jis par na thā mausamoñ kā asar baad sāvan ke bhī vo harā kaun thā 
jis ko ahvāl saarā thā mālūm vo be-ḳhabar rāste meñ paḌā kaun thā 
muntazir jis kī duniyā rahī der tak duur se koī aatā huā kaun thā 
aa.ī jis kī mahak us se pahle kahīñ vo savār-e-kamand-e-havā kaun thā 
reza reza hī pahchān meñ thā 'zafar' jānte the sabhī jā-ba-jā kaun thā 
mere andar wo mere siwa kaun tha main to tha hi magar dusra kaun tha 
log bhi kuchh taaruf karaate rahe mujh ko pahle hi malum tha kaun tha 
log andaze hi sab lagate rahe wo jabin kis ki thi naqsh-e-pa kaun tha 
mujh se mil kar hi andaza hoga koi wo alag kaun tha wo juda kaun tha 
koi jis par na tha mausamon ka asar baad sawan ke bhi wo hara kaun tha 
jis ko ahwal sara tha malum wo be-KHabar raste mein paDa kaun tha 
muntazir jis ki duniya rahi der tak dur se koi aata hua kaun tha 
aai jis ki mahak us se pahle kahin wo sawar-e-kamand-e-hawa kaun tha 
reza reza hi pahchan mein tha 'zafar' jaante the sabhi ja-ba-ja kaun tha

ghar se jaatā huuñ roz shaam se maiñ raat bhar ke programme se maiñ 
ai merī jān-e-intishār-pasand tañg huuñ tere intizām se maiñ 
ye jo laḌtā-jhagaḌtā huuñ sab se bach rahā huuñ qubūl-e-ām se maiñ 
maiñ utārā gayā thā arsh se aur farsh par gir paḌā dhaḌām se maiñ 
shakl kā lāhiqa nahīñ ham-rāh jaanā jaatā huuñ sirf naam se maiñ 
kyā kahūñ uubne lagā huuñ 'jamāl' ek hī jaise sub.h o shaam se maiñ 
ghar se jata hun roz sham se main raat bhar ke programme se main 
ai meri jaan-e-intishaar-pasand tang hun tere intizam se main 
ye jo laDta-jhagaDta hun sab se bach raha hun qubul-e-am se main 
main utara gaya tha arsh se aur farsh par gir paDa dhaDam se main 
shakl ka lahiqa nahin ham-rah jaana jata hun sirf nam se main 
kya kahun ubne laga hun 'jamal' ek hi jaise subh o sham se main

ek hī āvāz par vāpas palaT ā.eñge log tujh ko phir apne gharoñ meñ DhūñDne jā.eñge log 
Dūbte sūraj kī sūrat merā chehra dekh lo phir kahāñ bāb-e-ma.ānī DhūñDne jā.eñge log 
mat kaho qismat hai apnī be-dilī nāguftanī phir sahar hogī daraḳhshāñ phir bhale ā.eñge log 
pal jhapakne tak hai ye hangāma-e-vāraftagī jab nazar se duur hoge bhūlte jā.eñge log 
phir na.ī ḳhvāhish ke zarroñ se banā.eñge nagar phir na.ī rasm-e-talab rasm-e-vafā lā.eñge log 
munhasir rañgoñ kī ātish par nahīñ hai dilkashī maile kapḌoñ meñ bhī tujh ko dekhne ā.eñge log 
ek hi aawaz par wapas palaT aaenge log tujh ko phir apne gharon mein DhunDne jaenge log 
Dubte suraj ki surat mera chehra dekh lo phir kahan bab-e-maani DhunDne jaenge log 
mat kaho qismat hai apni be-dili naguftani phir sahar hogi daraKHshan phir bhale aaenge log 
pal jhapakne tak hai ye hangama-e-waraftagi jab nazar se dur hoge bhulte jaenge log 
phir nai KHwahish ke zarron se banaenge nagar phir nai rasm-e-talab rasm-e-wafa laenge log 
munhasir rangon ki aatish par nahin hai dilkashi maile kapDon mein bhi tujh ko dekhne aaenge log

ye hādsa bhī tire shahr meñ huā hogā tamām shahr mujhe DhūñDhtā phirā hogā 
maiñ is ḳhayāl se aksar udaas rahtā huuñ koī judā.ī kī sadiyāñ guzārtā hogā 
chalo ki shahr kī saḌkeñ kahīñ na so jaa.eñ ab is ujaaḌ havelī meñ kyā rakhā hogā 
tumhārī bazm se nikle to ham ne ye sochā zamīñ se chāñd talak kitnā fāsla hogā 
zarā sī der ko sone se fā.eda 'āzar' tumheñ to roz isī tarah jāgnā hogā 
ye hadsa bhi tere shahr mein hua hoga tamam shahr mujhe DhunDhta phira hoga 
main is KHayal se aksar udas rahta hun koi judai ki sadiyan guzarta hoga 
chalo ki shahr ki saDken kahin na so jaen ab is ujaD haweli mein kya rakha hoga 
tumhaari bazm se nikle to hum ne ye socha zamin se chand talak kitna fasla hoga 
zara si der ko sone se faeda 'azar' tumhein to roz isi tarah jagna hoga

vo ek shaḳhs mire paas jo rahā bhī nahīñ vo ḳhud ko duur kabhī mujh se kar sakā bhī nahīñ 
nigāh jis kī mirī samt aaj tak na uThī mire sivā vo kisī shai ko dekhtā bhī nahīñ 
mire ḳhutūt to jhallā ke phaaḌ detā hai ajiib baat hai purzoñ ko pheñktā bhī nahīñ 
tamām vaqt hai vo mahv-e-guftugū mujh se ye kaan jis kī sadāoñ se āshnā bhī nahīñ 
hamāre siine meñ chhup jaa.e Dar ke duniyā se vo jis ke lams ne ab tak hameñ chhuā bhī nahīñ 
jidhar bhī dekhūñ vahī vo dikhā.ī detā hai maze kī baat to ye hai ki vo ḳhudā bhī nahīñ 
wo ek shaKHs mere pas jo raha bhi nahin wo KHud ko dur kabhi mujh se kar saka bhi nahin 
nigah jis ki meri samt aaj tak na uThi mere siwa wo kisi shai ko dekhta bhi nahin 
mere KHutut to jhalla ke phaD deta hai ajib baat hai purzon ko phenkta bhi nahin 
tamam waqt hai wo mahw-e-guftugu mujh se ye kan jis ki sadaon se aashna bhi nahin 
hamare sine mein chhup jae Dar ke duniya se wo jis ke lams ne ab tak hamein chhua bhi nahin 
jidhar bhi dekhun wahi wo dikhai deta hai maze ki baat to ye hai ki wo KHuda bhi nahin

havā ke saath ye kaisā mo.āmla huā hai bujhā chukī thī jise vo diyā jalā huā hai 
huzūr aap koī faisla kareñ to sahī haiñ sar jhuke hue darbār bhī lagā huā hai 
khaḌe haiñ sāmne kab se magar nahīñ paḌhte vo ek lafz jo dīvār par likhā huā hai 
hai kis kā aks jo dekhā hai ā.īne se alag ye kaisā naqsh hai jo ruuh par banā huā hai 
ye kis kā ḳhvāb hai tābīr ke ta.āqub meñ ye kaisā ashk hai jo ḳhaak meñ milā huā hai 
ye kis kī yaad kī bārish meñ bhīgtā hai badan ye kaisā phuul sar-e-shāḳh-e-jāñ khilā huā hai 
sitāra TūTte dekhā to Dar ga.ī 'rāhat' ḳhabar na thī yahī taqdīr meñ likhā huā hai 
hawa ke sath ye kaisa moamla hua hai bujha chuki thi jise wo diya jala hua hai 
huzur aap koi faisla karen to sahi hain sar jhuke hue darbar bhi laga hua hai 
khaDe hain samne kab se magar nahin paDhte wo ek lafz jo diwar par likha hua hai 
hai kis ka aks jo dekha hai aaine se alag ye kaisa naqsh hai jo ruh par bana hua hai 
ye kis ka KHwab hai tabir ke taaqub mein ye kaisa ashk hai jo KHak mein mila hua hai

is vus.at-e-kalām se jī tañg aa gayā nāseh tū merī jaan na le dil gayā gayā 
zid se vo phir raqīb ke ghar meñ chalā gayā ai rashk merī jaan ga.ī terā kyā gayā 
ye zof hai to dam se bhī kab tak chalā gayā ḳhud-raftagī ke sadme se mujh ko ġhash aa gayā 
kyā pūchhtā hai talḳhi-e-ulfat meñ pand ko aisī to lazzateñ haiñ ki tū jaan khā gayā 
kuchh aañkh band hote hī āñkheñ sī khul ga.iiñ jī ik balā-e-jān thā achchhā huā gayā 
āñkheñ jo DhūñDtī thiiñ nigah-hā-e-iltifāt gum honā dil kā vo mirī nazroñ se pā gayā 
bū-e-saman se shaad the aġhyār-e-be-tamīz us gul ko e'tibār-e-nasīm-o-sabā gayā
