aatī nahīñ balā-e-shab-e-ġham nigāh meñ kis mehr-vash kā jalva nazar meñ samā gayā 
ai jazb-e-dil na tham ki na Thahrā vo shola-rū aayā to garm garm va-lekin jalā gayā 
mujh ḳhānumāñ-ḳharāb kā likkhā ki jaan kar vo naama ġhair kā mire ghar meñ girā gayā 
mehñdī malegā paañv se dushman to aan kar kyuuñ mere tafta siine ko Thokar lagā gayā 
bosa sanam kī aañkh kā lete hī jaan dī 'momin' ko yaad kyā hajrul-asvad aa gayā

ufuq agarche pighaltā dikhā.ī paḌtā hai mujhe to duur saverā dikhā.ī paḌtā hai 
hamāre shahr meñ be-chehra log baste haiñ kabhī kabhī koī chehra dikhā.ī paḌtā hai 
chalo ki apnī mohabbat sabhī ko baañT aa.eñ har ek pyaar kā bhūkā dikhā.ī paḌtā hai 
jo apnī zaat se ik anjuman kahā jaa.e vo shaḳhs tak mujhe tanhā dikhā.ī paḌtā hai 
na koī ḳhvāb na koī ḳhalish na koī ḳhumār ye aadmī to adhūrā dikhā.ī paḌtā hai 
lachak rahī haiñ shuāoñ kī sīḌhiyāñ paiham falak se koī utartā dikhā.ī paḌtā hai 
chamaktī ret pe ye ġhusl-e-āftāb tirā badan tamām sunahrā dikhā.ī paḌtā hai 
ufuq agarche pighalta dikhai paDta hai mujhe to dur sawera dikhai paDta hai 
hamare shahr mein be-chehra log baste hain kabhi kabhi koi chehra dikhai paDta hai 
chalo ki apni mohabbat sabhi ko banT aaen har ek pyar ka bhuka dikhai paDta hai 
jo apni zat se ek anjuman kaha jae wo shaKHs tak mujhe tanha dikhai paDta hai 
na koi KHwab na koi KHalish na koi KHumar ye aadmi to adhura dikhai paDta hai 
lachak rahi hain shuaon ki siDhiyan paiham falak se koi utarta dikhai paDta hai 
chamakti ret pe ye ghusl-e-aftab tera badan tamam sunahra dikhai paDta hai

ik aas to hai koī sahārā nahīñ to kyā raste meñ kuchh shajar to haiñ saaya nahīñ to kyā 
rahtā hai koī shaḳhs mire dil ke aas paas maiñ ne use qarīb se dekhā nahīñ to kyā 
tū hī batā ki chāheñ tujhe aur kis tarah ye terī justujū ye tamannā nahīñ to kyā 
ham duur duur rah ke bhī chalte rahe haiñ saath ham ne qadam qadam se milāyā nahīñ to kyā 
reg-e-ravāñ kī tarah haiñ saare ta.alluqāt tum ne kisī kā saath nibhāyā nahīñ to kyā 
vaise hameñ to pyaas meñ dariyā kī thī talāsh ab ye sarāb hī sahī dariyā nahīñ to kyā 
sochā bhī tum ne dasht chaman kaise ban gayā mehnat kā ye araq ye pasīnā nahīñ to kyā 
'mohsin' mirī nigāh ko achchhā lagā vahī duniyā kī vo nazar meñ jo achchhā nahīñ to kyā 
ek aas to hai koi sahaara nahin to kya raste mein kuchh shajar to hain saya nahin to kya

hum dur dur rah ke bhi chalte rahe hain sath hum ne qadam qadam se milaya nahin to kya 
reg-e-rawan ki tarah hain sare talluqat tum ne kisi ka sath nibhaya nahin to kya 
waise hamein to pyas mein dariya ki thi talash ab ye sarab hi sahi dariya nahin to kya 
socha bhi tum ne dasht chaman kaise ban gaya mehnat ka ye araq ye pasina nahin to kya

pahlū meñ dard-e-ishq kī duniyā liye hue baiThā huuñ zindagī kā sahārā liye hue 
dil hai tajallī-e-ruḳh-e-zebā liye hue āġhosh meñ hai chāñd ko dariyā liye hue 
pahuñche to dil meñ josh-e-tamannā liye hue lauTe magar luTī huī duniyā liye hue 
maiñ jī rahā huuñ ġham-kada-e-rozgār meñ terī mohabbatoñ kā sahārā liye hue 
uThtā huuñ bazm-e-husn se laġhzish-ba-pā 'shakīl' bahkī sī ik nazar kā sahārā liye hue 
pahlu mein dard-e-ishq ki duniya liye hue baiTha hun zindagi ka sahaara liye hue 
dil hai tajalli-e-ruKH-e-zeba liye hue aaghosh mein hai chand ko dariya liye hue 
pahunche to dil mein josh-e-tamanna liye hue lauTe magar luTi hui duniya liye hue 
main ji raha hun gham-kada-e-rozgar mein teri mohabbaton ka sahaara liye hue

har ehtimām hai do din kī zindagī ke liye sukūn-e-qalb nahīñ phir bhī aadmī ke liye 
tamām umr ḳhushī kī talāsh meñ guzrī tamām umr taraste rahe ḳhushī ke liye 
na khā fareb vafā kā ye bevafā duniyā kabhī kisī ke liye hai kabhī kisī ke liye 
ye daur-e-shams-o-qamar ye faroġh-e-ilm-o-hunar zamīn phir bhī tarastī hai raushnī ke liye 
kabhī uThe the jo ḳhurshīd-e-zindagī ban kar taras rahe haiñ vo tāroñ kī raushnī ke liye 
sitam-tarāzi-e-daur-e-ḳhirad ḳhudā kī panāh ki aadmī hī musībat hai aadmī ke liye 
rah-e-hayāt kī tārīkiyoñ meñ ai 'zāhid' charāġh-e-dil hai mire paas raushnī ke liye 
har ehtimam hai do din ki zindagi ke liye sukun-e-qalb nahin phir bhi aadmi ke liye 
tamam umr KHushi ki talash mein guzri tamam umr taraste rahe KHushi ke liye 
na kha fareb wafa ka ye bewafa duniya kabhi kisi ke liye hai kabhi kisi ke liye 
ye daur-e-shams-o-qamar ye farogh-e-ilm-o-hunar zamin phir bhi tarasti hai raushni ke liye 
kabhi uThe the jo KHurshid-e-zindagi ban kar taras rahe hain wo taron ki raushni ke liye 
sitam-taraazi-e-daur-e-KHirad KHuda ki panah ki aadmi hi musibat hai aadmi ke liye 
rah-e-hayat ki tarikiyon mein ai 'zahid' charagh-e-dil hai mere pas raushni ke liye

sitam bhī kartā hai us kā sila bhī detā hai ki mere haal pe vo muskurā bhī detā hai 
shanāvaroñ ko usī ne Dubo diyā shāyad jo Dūbtoñ ko kināre lagā bhī detā hai 
yahī sukūt yahī dasht-e-jāñ kā sannāTā jo sunñā chāhe koī to sadā bhī detā hai 
ajiib kūcha-e-qātil kī rasm hai ki yahāñ jo qatl kartā hai vo ḳhūñ-bahā bhī detā hai 
vo kaun hai ki jalātā hai dil meñ sham-e-umīd phir apne haath se us ko bujhā bhī detā hai 
vo kaun hai ki banātā hai naqsh paanī par to pattharoñ kī lakīreñ miTā bhī detā hai 
vo kaun hai ki jo bantā hai raah meñ dīvār aur us ke ba.ad na.ī rah dikhā bhī detā hai 
vo kaun hai ki dikhātā hai rañg rañg ke ḳhvāb añdherī rātoñ meñ lekin jagā bhī detā hai 
vo kaun hai ki ġhamoñ se navāztā hai mujhe ġhamoñ ko sahne kā phir hausla bhī detā hai 
mujhī se koī chhupātā hai rāz-e-ġham sar-e-shām mujhī ko āḳhir-e-shab phir batā bhī detā hai 
sitam bhi karta hai us ka sila bhi deta hai ki mere haal pe wo muskura bhi deta hai 
shanawaron ko usi ne Dubo diya shayad jo Dubton ko kinare laga bhi deta hai 
yahi sukut yahi dasht-e-jaan ka sannaTa jo sunna chahe koi to sada bhi deta hai 
ajib kucha-e-qatil ki rasm hai ki yahan jo qatl karta hai wo KHun-baha bhi deta hai 
wo kaun hai ki jalata hai dil mein sham-e-umid phir apne hath se us ko bujha bhi deta hai 
wo kaun hai ki banata hai naqsh pani par to pattharon ki lakiren miTa bhi deta hai 
wo kaun hai ki jo banta hai rah mein diwar aur us ke baad nai rah dikha bhi deta hai 
wo kaun hai ki dikhata hai rang rang ke KHwab andheri raaton mein lekin jaga bhi deta hai 
wo kaun hai ki ghamon se nawazta hai mujhe ghamon ko sahne ka phir hausla bhi deta hai 
mujhi se koi chhupata hai raaz-e-gham sar-e-sham mujhi ko aaKHir-e-shab phir bata bhi deta hai

zindagī ḳhaak meñ bhī thī tire dīvāne se ab na uTThegā bagūlā koī vīrāne se 
is qadar ho ga.ī kasrat tire dīvānoñ kī qais ghabrā ke chalā shahr ko vīrāne se 
jal-marā aag mohabbat kī ise kahte haiñ jalnā dekhā na gayā sham.a kā parvāne se 
kis kī begāna-vashī se ye tahayyur aayā ki ab apne bhī nazar aate haiñ begāne se 
shaiḳh sāhab bhī hue motaqid-e-pīr-e-muġhāñ aaj ye taaza ḳhabar aa.ī hai mai-ḳhāne se 
itnī tauhīn na kar merī balā-noshī kī sāqiyā mujh ko na de maap ke paimāne se

zindagi KHak mein bhi thi tere diwane se ab na uTThega bagula koi virane se 
is qadar ho gai kasrat tere diwanon ki qais ghabra ke chala shahr ko virane se 
jal-mara aag mohabbat ki ise kahte hain jalna dekha na gaya shama ka parwane se 
kis ki begana-washi se ye tahayyur aaya ki ab apne bhi nazar aate hain begane se 
shaiKH sahab bhi hue motaqid-e-pir-e-mughan aaj ye taza KHabar aai hai mai-KHane se 
itni tauhin na kar meri bala-noshi ki saqiya mujh ko na de map ke paimane se 
ai 'wafa' apne bhi jab aankh chura lete hain be-ruKHi ka ho gila kya kisi begane se

jab kūcha-e-qātil meñ ham laa.e ga.e hoñge parde bhī darīchoñ ke sarkā.e ga.e hoñge 
mai-ḳhāne meñ jab zāhid pahuñchā.e ga.e hoñge ḳhātir ke salīqe sab apnā.e ga.e hoñge 
jab satvat-e-shāhī ko kuchh Thes lagī hogī suulī pe ka.ī sarmad laTkā.e ga.e hoñge 
chāñdī ke gharoñdoñ kī jab baat chalī hogī miTTī ke khilaunoñ se bahlā.e ga.e hoñge 
jab shīsh-mahal koī ta.amīr huā hogā dīvāroñ meñ dīvāne chunvā.e ga.e hoñge 
vo kuchh bhī kaheñ lekin tanhā.ī ke aalam meñ kuchh giit tire 'bekal' dohrā.e ga.e hoñge 
jab kucha-e-qatil mein hum lae gae honge parde bhi darichon ke sarkae gae honge 
mai-KHane mein jab zahid pahunchae gae honge KHatir ke saliqe sab apnae gae honge 
jab satwat-e-shahi ko kuchh Thes lagi hogi suli pe kai sarmad laTkae gae honge 
chandi ke gharondon ki jab baat chali hogi miTTi ke khilaunon se bahlae gae honge 
jab shish-mahal koi tamir hua hoga diwaron mein diwane chunwae gae honge 
wo kuchh bhi kahen lekin tanhai ke aalam mein kuchh git tere 'bekal' dohrae gae honge

is baar un se mil ke judā ham jo ho ga.e un kī saheliyoñ ke bhī āñchal bhigo ga.e 
chaurāhoñ kā to husn baḌhā shahr ke magar jo log nāmvar the vo patthar ke ho ga.e 
sab dekh kar guzar ga.e ik pal meñ aur ham dīvār par bane hue manzar meñ kho ga.e 
mujh ko bhī jāgne kī aziyyat se de najāt ai raat ab to ghar ke dar-o-bām so ga.e 
kis kis se aur jaane mohabbat jatāte ham achchhā huā ki baal ye chāñdī ke ho ga.e 
itnī lahūluhān to pahle fazā na thī shāyad hamārī āñkhoñ meñ ab zaḳhm ho ga.e 
iḳhlās kā muzāhira karne jo aa.e the 'az.har' tamām zehn meñ kāñTe chubho ga.e 
is bar un se mil ke juda hum jo ho gae un ki saheliyon ke bhi aanchal bhigo gae 
chaurahon ka to husn baDha shahr ke magar jo log namwar the wo patthar ke ho gae 
sab dekh kar guzar gae ek pal mein aur hum diwar par bane hue manzar mein kho gae 
mujh ko bhi jagne ki aziyyat se de najat ai raat ab to ghar ke dar-o-baam so gae 
kis kis se aur jaane mohabbat jatate hum achchha hua ki baal ye chandi ke ho gae 
itni lahuluhan to pahle faza na thi shayad hamari aankhon mein ab zaKHm ho gae 
iKHlas ka muzahira karne jo aae the 'azhar' tamam zehn mein kanTe chubho gae

munqalib sūrat-e-hālāt bhī ho jaatī hai din bhale hoñ to karāmāt bhī ho jaatī hai 
husn ko aatā hai jab apnī zarūrat kā ḳhayāl ishq par lutf kī barsāt bhī ho jaatī hai 
dair o ka.aba hī is kā na ta.alluq samjho zindagī hai ye ḳharābāt bhī ho jaatī hai 
jabr se tā.at-e-yazdāñ bhī hai bār-e-ḳhātir pyaar se ādat-e-ḳhidmāt bhī ho jaatī hai 
dāvar-e-hashr mujhe apnā musāhib na samajh ba.az auqāt kharī baat bhī ho jaatī hai 
hashr meñ le ke chalo mutrib o ma.ashūq o subū ġhair ke ghar meñ kabhī raat bhī ho jaatī hai 
ba.az auqāt kisī aur ke milne se 'adam' apnī hastī se mulāqāt bhī ho jaatī hai 
munqalib surat-e-haalat bhi ho jati hai din bhale hon to karamat bhi ho jati hai 
husn ko aata hai jab apni zarurat ka KHayal ishq par lutf ki barsat bhi ho jati hai 
dair o kaba hi is ka na talluq samjho zindagi hai ye KHarabaat bhi ho jati hai 
jabr se taat-e-yazdan bhi hai bar-e-KHatir pyar se aadat-e-KHidmat bhi ho jati hai 
dawar-e-hashr mujhe apna musahib na samajh baz auqat khari baat bhi ho jati hai 
hashr mein le ke chalo mutrib o mashuq o subu ghair ke ghar mein kabhi raat bhi ho jati hai 
baz auqat kisi aur ke milne se 'adam' apni hasti se mulaqat bhi ho jati hai

nahīñ ki dil meñ hamesha ḳhushī bahut aa.ī kabhī taraste rahe aur kabhī bahut aa.ī 
mire falak se vo tūfāñ nahīñ uThā phir se mirī zamīn meñ vo thartharī bahut aa.ī 
jidhar se khol ke baiThe the dar añdhere kā usī taraf se hameñ raushnī bahut aa.ī 
vahāñ maqām to rone kā thā magar ai dost tire firāq meñ ham ko hañsī bahut aa.ī 
ravāñ rahe safar-e-marg par yūñhī varna hamārī raah meñ ye zindagī bahut aa.ī 
yahāñ kuchh apnī havāoñ meñ bhī uḌe haiñ bahut hamāre ḳhvāb meñ kuchh vo parī bahut aa.ī 
na thā ziyāda kuchh ehsās jis ke hone kā chalā gayā hai to us kī kamī bahut aa.ī 
na jaane kyuuñ mirī niyyat badal ga.ī yak-dam vagarna us pe tabī.at mirī bahut aa.ī 
'zafar' shu.ūr to aayā nahīñ zarā bhī hameñ bajā.e is ke magar shā.irī bahut aa.ī 
nahin ki dil mein hamesha KHushi bahut aai kabhi taraste rahe aur kabhi bahut aai 
mere falak se wo tufan nahin uTha phir se meri zamin mein wo tharthari bahut aai 
jidhar se khol ke baiThe the dar andhere ka usi taraf se hamein raushni bahut aai 
wahan maqam to rone ka tha magar ai dost tere firaq mein hum ko hansi bahut aai 
rawan rahe safar-e-marg par yunhi warna hamari rah mein ye zindagi bahut aai 
yahan kuchh apni hawaon mein bhi uDe hain bahut hamare KHwab mein kuchh wo pari bahut aai 
na tha ziyaada kuchh ehsas jis ke hone ka chala gaya hai to us ki kami bahut aai 
na jaane kyun meri niyyat badal gai yak-dam wagarna us pe tabiat meri bahut aai 
'zafar' shuur to aaya nahin zara bhi hamein bajae is ke magar shairi bahut aai

tujh se vābastagī rahegī abhī dil ko ye bekalī rahegī abhī 
sar ko dīvār hī nahīñ miltī so ye dīvāngī rahegī abhī 
koī din fursat-e-tamannā hai koī din sar ḳhushī rahegī abhī 
kāsa-e-umr bhar chukā phir bhī kahīñ koī kamī rahegī abhī 
shab vahī hai jamāl-e-ḳhvāb vahī aañkh apnī lagī rahegī abhī 
jis qayāmat kī aamad aamad hai vo qayāmat Talī rahegī abhī 
ham yaqīnan yahāñ nahīñ hoñge ġhāliban zindagī rahegī abhī 
kuchh abhī ranj-e-ārzū hai hameñ aañkh meñ kuchh namī rahegī abhī 
tū abhī mubtalā-e-duniyā nahīñ tujh meñ ye sādgī rahegī abhī 
lā-ta.alluq huuñ us ta.alluq se aur ye dostī rahegī abhī 
jī uchaTtā nahīñ hai lagtā nahīñ so ye begānagī rahegī abhī 
kahīñ koī charāġh jaltā hai kuchh na kuchh raushnī rahegī abhī 
tujh se wabastagi rahegi abhi dil ko ye bekali rahegi abhi 
sar ko diwar hi nahin milti so ye diwangi rahegi abhi 
koi din fursat-e-tamanna hai koi din sar KHushi rahegi abhi 
kasa-e-umr bhar chuka phir bhi kahin koi kami rahegi abhi 
shab wahi hai jamal-e-KHwab wahi aankh apni lagi rahegi abhi 
jis qayamat ki aamad aamad hai wo qayamat Tali rahegi abhi 
hum yaqinan yahan nahin honge ghaaliban zindagi rahegi abhi 
kuchh abhi ranj-e-arzu hai hamein aankh mein kuchh nami rahegi abhi 
tu abhi mubtala-e-duniya nahin tujh mein ye sadgi rahegi abhi 
la-talluq hun us talluq se aur ye dosti rahegi abhi 
ji uchaTta nahin hai lagta nahin so ye beganagi rahegi abhi 
kahin koi charagh jalta hai kuchh na kuchh raushni rahegi abhi

kisī bhī rā.egānī se baḌā hai ye dukh to zindagānī se baḌā hai 
na ham se ishq kā mafhūm pūchho ye lafz apne ma.ānī se baḌā hai 
hamārī aañkh kā ye ek aañsū tumhārī rājdhānī se baḌā hai 
guzar jā.egī saarī raat is meñ mirā qissa kahānī se baḌā hai 
tirā ḳhāmosh sā iz.hār 'rāhat' kisī kī lan-tarānī se baḌā hai 
kisi bhi raegani se baDa hai ye dukh to zindagani se baDa hai 
na hum se ishq ka mafhum puchho ye lafz apne maani se baDa hai 
hamari aankh ka ye ek aansu tumhaari rajdhani se baDa hai 
guzar jaegi sari raat is mein mera qissa kahani se baDa hai 
tera KHamosh sa izhaar 'rahat' kisi ki lan-tarani se baDa hai

jaane kyā kuchh hai aaj hone ko jī mirā chāhtā hai rone ko 
ek umr aur haath kyā aayā zindagī kyā milī thī khone ko 
ābloñ se paTe paḌe haiñ ham koī nishtar bhī de chubhone ko 
dīda-e-tar bhī aaj kho aa.e us ke aage ga.e the rone ko 
ret muTThī meñ bhar ke baiThe haiñ haath meñ kuchh rahe to khone ko 
apnī hastī kā haal kyā kahiye ham hue aah kuchh na hone ko 
kitne saada haiñ ham ki baiThe haiñ dāġh-e-dil āñsuoñ se dhone ko 
jaane kya kuchh hai aaj hone ko ji mera chahta hai rone ko 
ek umr aur hath kya aaya zindagi kya mili thi khone ko 
aablon se paTe paDe hain hum koi nishtar bhi de chubhone ko 
dida-e-tar bhi aaj kho aae us ke aage gae the rone ko 
ret muTThi mein bhar ke baiThe hain hath mein kuchh rahe to khone ko 
apni hasti ka haal kya kahiye hum hue aah kuchh na hone ko 
kitne sada hain hum ki baiThe hain dagh-e-dil aansuon se dhone ko

mujh meñ ḳhushbū basī usī kī hai jaise ye zindagī usī kī hai 
vo kahīñ ās-pās hai maujūd hū-ba-hū ye hañsī usī kī hai 
ḳhud maiñ apnā dukhā rahā huuñ dil is meñ lekin ḳhushī usī kī hai 
ya.anī koī kamī nahīñ mujh meñ ya.anī mujh meñ kamī usī kī hai 
kyā mire ḳhvāb bhī nahīñ mere kyā mirī niiñd bhī usī kī hai 
mujh mein KHushbu basi usi ki hai jaise ye zindagi usi ki hai 
wo kahin aas-pas hai maujud hu-ba-hu ye hansi usi ki hai 
KHud main apna dukha raha hun dil is mein lekin KHushi usi ki hai 
yani koi kami nahin mujh mein yani mujh mein kami usi ki hai 
kya mere KHwab bhi nahin mere kya meri nind bhi usi ki hai

ek majzūb udāsī mere andar gum hai is samundar meñ koī aur samundar gum hai 
bebasī kaisā parinda hai tumheñ kyā mālūm use mālūm hai jo mere barābar gum hai 
charḳh-e-sau rañg ko fursat ho to DhūñDe us ko nīl-gūñ soch meñ jo mast qalandar gum hai 
dhuup chhāñv kā koī khel hai bīnā.ī bhī aañkh ko DhūñD ke laayā huuñ to manzar gum hai 
sañg-rezoñ meñ mahaktā hai koī surḳh gulāb vo jo māthe pe lagā thā vahī patthar gum hai 
ek madfūn dafīna inhīñ atrāf meñ thā ḳhaak uḌtī hai yahāñ aur vo gauhar gum hai 
ek majzub udasi mere andar gum hai is samundar mein koi aur samundar gum hai 
bebasi kaisa parinda hai tumhein kya malum use malum hai jo mere barabar gum hai 
charKH-e-sau rang ko fursat ho to DhunDe us ko nil-gun soch mein jo mast qalandar gum hai 
dhup chhanw ka koi khel hai binai bhi aankh ko DhunD ke laya hun to manzar gum hai 
sang-rezon mein mahakta hai koi surKH gulab wo jo mathe pe laga tha wahi patthar gum hai 
ek madfun dafina inhin atraf mein tha KHak uDti hai yahan aur wo gauhar gum hai

ye chehra hai gul hai ye gulshan hai kyā hai saverā hai shabnam hai darpan hai kyā hai 
chalī hai ye ḳhushbū tire gesuoñ se tirī yaad hai terā dāman hai kyā hai 
kiran husn kī chhan ke aane lagī hai ye parda hai āñchal hai chilman hai kyā hai 
nazar jhuk rahī hai ḳhamoshī hai lab par hayā hai adā hai ki an-ban hai kyā hai 
ye sharm aur tabassum ye āñkhoñ meñ kājal adā hai kalī hai ki bachpan hai kyā hai 
akele meñ ye phūTtī naġhmagī sī ye aahaT hai koyal hai dhaḌkan hai kyā hai 
namī hai fazāoñ meñ 'kausar' jī kahiye ye gesū hai bādal hai sāvan hai kyā hai 
ye chehra hai gul hai ye gulshan hai kya hai sawera hai shabnam hai darpan hai kya hai 
chali hai ye KHushbu tere gesuon se teri yaad hai tera daman hai kya hai 
kiran husn ki chhan ke aane lagi hai ye parda hai aanchal hai chilman hai kya hai 
nazar jhuk rahi hai KHamoshi hai lab par haya hai ada hai ki an-ban hai kya hai 
ye sharm aur tabassum ye aankhon mein kajal ada hai kali hai ki bachpan hai kya hai 
akele mein ye phuTti naghmagi si ye aahaT hai koyal hai dhaDkan hai kya hai 
nami hai fazaon mein 'kausar' ji kahiye ye gesu hai baadal hai sawan hai kya hai

vāda-e-shām-e-fardā pe ai dil mujhe gar yaqīñ hī na aa.e to maiñ kyā karūñ un kī jhūTī tasallī ke tūfān meñ nabz-e-dil Duub jaa.e to maiñ kyā karūñ 
maiñ ne māñgī thī ye masjidoñ meñ duā maiñ jise chāhtā huuñ vo mujh ko mile jo mirā farz thā maiñ ne puurā kiyā ab ḳhudā bhuul jaa.e to maiñ kyā karūñ 
saare jhagḌe agar mere jiine ke haiñ to galā ghoñT do maiñ bhī be-zār huuñ maut ab tak to dāman bachātī rahī tū bhī dāman bachā.e to maiñ kyā karūñ 
tū na samjhegā hargiz mire nāsehā merī mai-noshiyāñ merī badmastiyāñ mujh pe tohmat na rakh maiñ sharābī nahīñ vo nazar se pilā.e to maiñ kyā karūñ 
tum mujhe bevafā.ī ke taane na do mere mahbūb maiñ bevafā to nahīñ tum bhī maġhrūr ho maiñ bhī ḳhuddār huuñ aañkh ḳhud hī bhar aa.e to maiñ kyā karūñ 
wada-e-sham-e-farda pe ai dil mujhe gar yaqin hi na aae to main kya karun un ki jhuTi tasalli ke tufan mein nabz-e-dil Dub jae to main kya karun 
main ne mangi thi ye masjidon mein dua main jise chahta hun wo mujh ko mile jo mera farz tha main ne pura kiya ab KHuda bhul jae to main kya karun 
sare jhagDe agar mere jine ke hain to gala ghonT do main bhi be-zar hun maut ab tak to daman bachati rahi tu bhi daman bachae to main kya karun 
tu na samjhega hargiz mere naseha meri mai-noshiyan meri badmastiyan mujh pe tohmat na rakh main sharabi nahin wo nazar se pilae to main kya karun 
tum mujhe bewafai ke tane na do mere mahbub main bewafa to nahin tum bhi maghrur ho main bhi KHuddar hun aankh KHud hi bhar aae to main kya karun

sozish-e-ġham ke sivā kāhish-e-furqat ke sivā ishq meñ kuchh bhī nahīñ dard kī lazzat ke sivā 
dil meñ ab kuchh bhī nahīñ un kī mohabbat ke sivā sab fasāne haiñ haqīqat meñ haqīqat ke sivā 
kaun kah saktā hai ye ahl-e-tarīqat ke sivā saare jhagḌe haiñ jahāñ meñ tirī nisbat ke sivā 
kitne chehroñ ne mujhe dāvat-e-jalva baḳhshī koī sūrat na milī aap kī sūrat ke sivā 
ġham-e-uqbā ġham-e-daurāñ ġham-e-hastī kī qasam aur bhī ġham haiñ zamāne meñ mohabbat ke sivā 
bazm-e-jānāñ meñ are zauq-e-farāvāñ ab tak kuchh bhī hāsil na huā dīda-e-hairat ke sivā 
vo shab-e-hijr vo tārīk fazā vo vahshat koī ġham-ḳhvār na thā dard kī shiddat ke sivā 
mohtasib aao chaleñ aaj to mai-ḳhāne meñ ek jannat hai vahāñ aap kī jannat ke sivā 
jo tahī-dast bhī hai aur tahī-dāman bhī vo kahāñ jā.egā tere dar-e-daulat ke sivā 
jis ne qudrat ke har iqdām se Takkar lī hai vo pashīmāñ na huā jabr-e-mashiyyat ke sivā 
mujh se ye pūchh rahe haiñ mire ahbāb 'azīz' kyā milā shahr-e-suḳhan meñ tumheñ shohrat ke sivā 
sozish-e-gham ke siwa kahish-e-furqat ke siwa ishq mein kuchh bhi nahin dard ki lazzat ke siwa 
dil mein ab kuchh bhi nahin un ki mohabbat ke siwa sab fasane hain haqiqat mein haqiqat ke siwa 
kaun kah sakta hai ye ahl-e-tariqat ke siwa sare jhagDe hain jahan mein teri nisbat ke siwa 
kitne chehron ne mujhe dawat-e-jalwa baKHshi koi surat na mili aap ki surat ke siwa 
gham-e-uqba gham-e-dauran gham-e-hasti ki qasam aur bhi gham hain zamane mein mohabbat ke siwa 
bazm-e-jaanan mein are zauq-e-farawan ab tak kuchh bhi hasil na hua dida-e-hairat ke siwa 
wo shab-e-hijr wo tarik faza wo wahshat koi gham-KHwar na tha dard ki shiddat ke siwa 
mohtasib aao chalen aaj to mai-KHane mein ek jannat hai wahan aap ki jannat ke siwa 
jo tahi-dast bhi hai aur tahi-daman bhi wo kahan jaega tere dar-e-daulat ke siwa 
jis ne qudrat ke har iqdam se Takkar li hai wo pashiman na hua jabr-e-mashiyyat ke siwa 
mujh se ye puchh rahe hain mere ahbab 'aziz' kya mila shahr-e-suKHan mein tumhein shohrat ke siwa

ek ḳhudā par takiya kar ke baiTh ga.e haiñ dekho ham bhī kyā kyā kar ke baiTh ga.e haiñ 
pūchh rahe haiñ log are vo shaḳhs kahāñ hai jaane kaun tamāshā kar ke baiTh ga.e haiñ 
utre the maidān meñ sab kuchh Thiik kareñge sab kuchh ulTā sīdhā kar ke baiTh ga.e haiñ 
saare shajar shādābī sameTe apnī apnī dhuup meñ gahrā saaya kar ke baiTh ga.e haiñ 
lauT ga.e sab soch ke ghar meñ koī nahīñ hai aur ye ham ki añdherā kar ke baiTh ga.e haiñ 
ek KHuda par takiya kar ke baiTh gae hain dekho hum bhi kya kya kar ke baiTh gae hain 
puchh rahe hain log are wo shaKHs kahan hai jaane kaun tamasha kar ke baiTh gae hain 
utre the maidan mein sab kuchh Thik karenge sab kuchh ulTa sidha kar ke baiTh gae hain 
sare shajar shadabi sameTe apni apni dhup mein gahra saya kar ke baiTh gae hain 
lauT gae sab soch ke ghar mein koi nahin hai aur ye hum ki andhera kar ke baiTh gae hain

dil hī dil meñ sulag ke bujhe ham aur sahe ġham duur hī duur tum se kaun sī aas bañdhī thī tum se rahe ham duur hī duur 
tum ne ham ko jab bhī dekhā shukr-ba-lab the yā ḳhāmosh yuuñ to aksar ro.e lekin chhup chhup kam kam duur hī duur 
jal jal bujh ga.ī koñpal koñpal kyā kyā armāñ ḳhaak hue āñkheñ to bhar laa.e pa bādal barse chham-chham duur hī duur 
ek vo aan ki un kī zarā sī baat gavārā kar na sake ek ye haal ki yaad meñ un kī ro.e paiham duur hī duur 
tark-e-talab par ḳhush the ki āḳhir kaam liyā dānā.ī se kis ko ḳhabar hai jalte rahe tum jalte rahe ham duur hī duur 
dil hi dil mein sulag ke bujhe hum aur sahe gham dur hi dur tum se kaun si aas bandhi thi tum se rahe hum dur hi dur 
tum ne hum ko jab bhi dekha shukr-ba-lab the ya KHamosh yun to aksar roe lekin chhup chhup kam kam dur hi dur 
jal jal bujh gai konpal konpal kya kya arman KHak hue aankhen to bhar lae pa baadal barse chham-chham dur hi dur 
ek wo aan ki un ki zara si baat gawara kar na sake ek ye haal ki yaad mein un ki roe paiham dur hi dur 
tark-e-talab par KHush the ki aaKHir kaam liya danai se kis ko KHabar hai jalte rahe tum jalte rahe hum dur hi dur

na gumāñ rahne diyā hai na yaqīñ rahne diyā rāsta koī khulā ham ne nahīñ rahne diyā 
us ne TukḌoñ meñ bikherā huā thā mujh ko jahāñ jā uThāyā hai kahīñ se to kahīñ rahne diyā 
saj rahe the ye shab o roz kuchh aise tujh se ham ko duniyā hī pasand aa ga.ī diiñ rahne diyā 
ḳhud to bāġhī hue ham tujh se magar saath hī saath dil-e-rusvā ko tire zer-e-nagīñ rahne diyā 
jā-ba-jā is meñ bhī tere hī nishāñ the shāmil ham ne ik naqsh agar apne ta.iiñ rahne diyā 
ik ḳhabar thī jise zāhir na kiyā ham ne kabhī ik ḳhazāna thā jise zer-e-zamīñ rahne diyā 
ḳhud to bāhar hue ham ḳhāna-e-dil se lekin vo kisī ḳhvāb meñ thā us ko yahīñ rahne diyā 
āsmāñ se kabhī ham ne bhī utārā na use aur us ne bhī hameñ ḳhāk-nashīñ rahne diyā 
ham ne chheḌā nahīñ ashyā-e-mohabbat ko 'zafar' jo jahāñ par thī paḌī us ko vahīñ rahne diyā 
na guman rahne diya hai na yaqin rahne diya rasta koi khula hum ne nahin rahne diya 
us ne TukDon mein bikhera hua tha mujh ko jahan ja uThaya hai kahin se to kahin rahne diya 
saj rahe the ye shab o roz kuchh aise tujh se hum ko duniya hi pasand aa gai din rahne diya 
KHud to baghi hue hum tujh se magar sath hi sath dil-e-ruswa ko tere zer-e-nagin rahne diya 
ja-ba-ja is mein bhi tere hi nishan the shamil hum ne ek naqsh agar apne tain rahne diya 
ek KHabar thi jise zahir na kiya hum ne kabhi ek KHazana tha jise zer-e-zamin rahne diya 
KHud to bahar hue hum KHana-e-dil se lekin wo kisi KHwab mein tha us ko yahin rahne diya 
aasman se kabhi hum ne bhi utara na use aur us ne bhi hamein KHak-nashin rahne diya 
hum ne chheDa nahin ashya-e-mohabbat ko 'zafar' jo jahan par thi paDi us ko wahin rahne diya

kabhī dekho to maujoñ kā taḌapnā kaisā lagtā hai ye dariyā itnā paanī pī ke pyāsā kaisā lagtā hai 
ham us se thoḌī duurī par hamesha ruk se jaate haiñ na jaane us se milne kā irāda kaisā lagtā hai 
maiñ dhīre dhīre un kā dushman-e-jāñ bantā jaatā huuñ vo āñkheñ kitnī qātil haiñ vo chehra kaisā lagtā hai 
zavāl-e-jism ko dekho to kuchh ehsās ho is kā bikhartā zarra zarra koī sahrā kaisā lagtā hai 
falak par uḌte jaate bādaloñ ko dekhtā huuñ maiñ havā kahtī hai mujh se ye tamāshā kaisā lagtā hai 
kabhi dekho to maujon ka taDapna kaisa lagta hai ye dariya itna pani pi ke pyasa kaisa lagta hai 
hum us se thoDi duri par hamesha ruk se jate hain na jaane us se milne ka irada kaisa lagta hai 
main dhire dhire un ka dushman-e-jaan banta jata hun wo aankhen kitni qatil hain wo chehra kaisa lagta hai 
zawal-e-jism ko dekho to kuchh ehsas ho is ka bikharta zarra zarra koi sahra kaisa lagta hai 
falak par uDte jate baadalon ko dekhta hun main hawa kahti hai mujh se ye tamasha kaisa lagta hai

barpā tire visāl kā tūfān ho chukā dil meñ jo baaġh thā vo bayābān ho chukā 
paidā vajūd meñ har ik imkān ho chukā aur maiñ bhī soch soch ke hairān ho chukā 
pahle ḳhayāl sab kā thā ab apnī fikr hai dāman kahāñ rahā jo garebān ho chukā 
tum hī ne to ye dard diyā hai janāb-e-man tum se hamāre dard kā darmān ho chukā 
jo jashn-vashn hai vo hisār-e-havas meñ hai ye aarzū kā shahr to vīrān ho chukā 
auroñ se pūchhiye to haqīqat pata chale tanhā.ī meñ to zaat kā irfān ho chukā 
ik shahryār shahr-e-havas ko bhī chāhiye aur maiñ bhī āshiqī se pareshān ho chukā 
kitne maze kī baat hai aatī nahīñ hai iid hālāñki ḳhatm arsa-e-ramazān ho chukā 
mausam ḳhizāñ kā raas kab aayā hameñ 'shujā.a' jab āmad-e-bahār kā elaan ho chukā 
barpa tere visal ka tufan ho chuka dil mein jo bagh tha wo bayaban ho chuka 
paida wajud mein har ek imkan ho chuka aur main bhi soch soch ke hairan ho chuka 
pahle KHayal sab ka tha ab apni fikr hai daman kahan raha jo gareban ho chuka 
tum hi ne to ye dard diya hai janab-e-man tum se hamare dard ka darman ho chuka 
jo jashn-washn hai wo hisar-e-hawas mein hai ye aarzu ka shahr to viran ho chuka 
auron se puchhiye to haqiqat pata chale tanhai mein to zat ka irfan ho chuka 
ek shahryar shahr-e-hawas ko bhi chahiye aur main bhi aashiqi se pareshan ho chuka 
kitne maze ki baat hai aati nahin hai id haalanki KHatm arsa-e-ramazan ho chuka 
mausam KHizan ka ras kab aaya hamein 'shujaa' jab aamad-e-bahaar ka elan ho chuka

aise bhī kuchh ġham hote haiñ jo ummīd se kam hote haiñ 
aage aage chaltā hai rasta pīchhe pīchhe ham hote haiñ 
raag kā vaqt nikal jaatā hai jab tak sur qaa.em hote haiñ 
bāhar kī ḳhushkī pe na jaao patthar andar nam hote haiñ 
milne koī nahīñ aatā jab apne aap meñ ham hote haiñ 
chehroñ kī to bhiiḌ hai lekin sahī salāmat kam hote haiñ 
nazmeñ ġhazleñ ḳhat afsāne us ke naam raqam hote haiñ 
dil ke shelf meñ 'shāhid' kitnī yādoñ ke album hote haiñ 
aise bhi kuchh gham hote hain jo ummid se kam hote hain 
aage aage chalta hai rasta pichhe pichhe hum hote hain 
rag ka waqt nikal jata hai jab tak sur qaem hote hain 
bahar ki KHushki pe na jao patthar andar nam hote hain 
milne koi nahin aata jab apne aap mein hum hote hain 
chehron ki to bhiD hai lekin sahi salamat kam hote hain 
nazmen ghazlen KHat afsane us ke nam raqam hote hain 
dil ke shelf mein 'shahid' kitni yaadon ke album hote hain

kuchh apnī fikr na apnā ḳhayāl kartā huuñ to kyā ye kam hai tirī dekh-bhāl kartā huuñ 
mirī jagah pe koī aur ho to chīḳh uTThe maiñ apne aap se itne savāl kartā huuñ 
agar malāl kisī ko nahīñ mirā na sahī maiñ ḳhud bhī kaun sā apnā malāl kartā huuñ 
ye chāñd aur sitāre rafīq haiñ mere maiñ roz in se bayāñ apnā haal kartā huuñ 
tumhārī yaad bhī aatī hai ab mujhe kam kam tumhārā zikr bhī ab ḳhāl-ḳhāl kartā huuñ 
kuchh apni fikr na apna KHayal karta hun to kya ye kam hai teri dekh-bhaal karta hun 
meri jagah pe koi aur ho to chiKH uTThe main apne aap se itne sawal karta hun 
agar malal kisi ko nahin mera na sahi main KHud bhi kaun sa apna malal karta hun 
ye chand aur sitare rafiq hain mere main roz in se bayan apna haal karta hun 
tumhaari yaad bhi aati hai ab mujhe kam kam tumhaara zikr bhi ab KHal-KHal karta hun

na.e zamāne meñ ab ye kamāl hone lagā ki qatl kar ke bhī qātil nihāl hone lagā 
mirī tabāhī kā baa.is jo hai zamāne se usī ko ab mirā kaahe ḳhayāl hone lagā 
havā-e-ishq ne bhī gul khilā.e haiñ kyā kyā jo merā haal thā vo terā haal hone lagā 
shab-e-firāq vo kaisā thā jashn yādoñ kā ki jis kā zikr bhī bād-e-visāl hone lagā 
jo ranj-o-ġham meñ mire saath saath thā ab tak use bhī merī ḳhushī se malāl hone lagā 
jahāñ pe manzar-e-jalva thā sirf vahm o gumāñ vahīñ pe jalsa-e-zohra-jamāl hone lagā 
tumhāre qadr se agar baḌh rahī ho parchhā.īñ samajh lo dhuup kā vaqt-e-zavāl hone lagā 
na ḳhud ko bechā na koī ḳhushāmadeñ kī haiñ to kaise tum pe ye 'bekal' savāl hone lagā 
nae zamane mein ab ye kamal hone laga ki qatl kar ke bhi qatil nihaal hone laga 
meri tabahi ka bais jo hai zamane se usi ko ab mera kahe KHayal hone laga 
hawa-e-ishq ne bhi gul khilae hain kya kya jo mera haal tha wo tera haal hone laga 
shab-e-firaq wo kaisa tha jashn yaadon ka ki jis ka zikr bhi baad-e-visal hone laga 
jo ranj-o-gham mein mere sath sath tha ab tak use bhi meri KHushi se malal hone laga 
jahan pe manzar-e-jalwa tha sirf wahm o guman wahin pe jalsa-e-zohra-jamal hone laga 
tumhaare qadr se agar baDh rahi ho parchhain samajh lo dhup ka waqt-e-zawal hone laga 
na KHud ko becha na koi KHushamaden ki hain to kaise tum pe ye 'bekal' sawal hone laga

kuchh sabab hī na bane baat baḌhā dene kā khel khelā huā ye us ko bhulā dene kā 
apne hī sāmne dīvār banā baiThā huuñ hai ye anjām use raste se haTā dene kā 
yūñhī chup chaap guzar jā.iye in galiyoñ se yahāñ kuchh aur hī matlab hai sadā dene kā 
rāsta roknā maqsad nahīñ kuchh aur hai ye darmiyāñ meñ koī dīvār uThā dene kā 
aane vāloñ ko tarīqa mujhe aatā hai bahut jaane vāloñ ke ta.āqub meñ lagā dene kā 
ek maqsad to huā DhūñDnā us ko har-sū lutf hī aur hai paane se gañvā dene kā 
ik hunar paas thā apne so nahīñ ab vo bhī jo dikhā.ī nahīñ detā hai dikhā dene kā 
sab ko mālūm hai aur hausla rakhtā huuñ abhī apne likkhe hue ko ḳhud hī miTā dene kā 
TuuT paḌtī hai qayāmat koī pahle hī 'zafar' qasd kartā huuñ jo fitne ko jagā dene kā 
kuchh sabab hi na bane baat baDha dene ka khel khela hua ye us ko bhula dene ka 
apne hi samne diwar bana baiTha hun hai ye anjam use raste se haTa dene ka 
yunhi chup chap guzar jaiye in galiyon se yahan kuchh aur hi matlab hai sada dene ka 
rasta rokna maqsad nahin kuchh aur hai ye darmiyan mein koi diwar uTha dene ka 
aane walon ko tariqa mujhe aata hai bahut jaane walon ke taaqub mein laga dene ka 
ek maqsad to hua DhunDna us ko har-su lutf hi aur hai pane se ganwa dene ka 
ek hunar pas tha apne so nahin ab wo bhi jo dikhai nahin deta hai dikha dene ka 
sab ko malum hai aur hausla rakhta hun abhi apne likkhe hue ko KHud hi miTa dene ka 
TuT paDti hai qayamat koi pahle hi 'zafar' qasd karta hun jo fitne ko jaga dene ka

sāñsoñ meñ base ho tum āñkhoñ meñ chhupā lūñgā jab chāhūñ tumheñ dekhūñ ā.īna banā lūñgā 
yādoñ se kaho merī bālīñ se chalī jaa.eñ ab ai shab-e-tanhā.ī ārām zarā lūñgā 
ranjish se judā.ī tak kyā sāneha guzrā hai kyā kyā mujhe da.avā thā jab chāhūñ manā lūñgā 
tasvīr ḳhayālī hai har aañkh savālī hai duniyā mujhe kyā degī duniyā se meñ kyā lūñgā 
kab lauT ke aaoge isrār nahīñ kartā itnā mire bas meñ hai maiñ umr ghaTā lūñgā 
kyā tohmateñ duniyā ne ai 'shāz' uThā.ī haiñ ik tohmat-e-hastī thī sochā thā uThā lūñgā 
sanson mein base ho tum aankhon mein chhupa lunga jab chahun tumhein dekhun aaina bana lunga 
yaadon se kaho meri baalin se chali jaen ab ai shab-e-tanhai aaram zara lunga 
ranjish se judai tak kya saneha guzra hai kya kya mujhe dawa tha jab chahun mana lunga 
taswir KHayali hai har aankh sawali hai duniya mujhe kya degi duniya se mein kya lunga 
kab lauT ke aaoge israr nahin karta itna mere bas mein hai main umr ghaTa lunga 
kya tohmaten duniya ne ai 'shaz' uThai hain ek tohmat-e-hasti thi socha tha uTha lunga

ye uzr-e-imtihān-e-jazb-e-dil kaisā nikal aayā maiñ ilzām us ko detā thā qusūr apnā nikal aayā 
na shādī-marg huuñ kyūñkar hai muzhda qatl-e-dushman kā ki ghar meñ se liye shamshīr vo rotā nikal aayā 
sitam ai garmi-e-zabt-e-fuġhān-o-āh chhātī par kabhū bas paḌ gayā chhālā kabhū phoḌā nikal aayā 
kiyā zanjīr mujh ko chāra-gar ne kin dinoñ meñ jab adū kī qaid se vo shoḳh-e-be-parvā nikal aayā 
nikal aayā agar aañsū to zālim mat nikāl āñkheñ sunā ma.azūr hai muztar nikal aayā nikal aayā 
hamāre ḳhūñ-bahā kā ġhair se da.avā hai qātil ko ye bād-e-infisāl ab aur hī jhagḌā nikal aayā 
huī bulbul sanā-ḳhvān-e-dahān-e-tañg kis gul kī ki farvardī meñ ġhunche kā muñh itnā sā nikal aayā 
koī tiir us kā dil meñ rah gayā thā kyā ki āñkhoñ se abhī rone meñ ik paikān kā TukḌā nikal aayā 
dam-e-bismil ye kis ke ḳhauf se ham pī ga.e aañsū ki har zaḳhm-e-badan se ḳhuun kā dariyā nikal aayā 
ḳhadañg-e-yār ke hamrāh niklī jaan siine se yahī armān ik muddat se jī meñ thā nikal aayā 
bahut nāzāñ hai tū ai qais par vahshat dikhā.ūñgā kitāboñ meñ kabhū qissa jo 'momin' kā nikal aayā 
ye uzr-e-imtihan-e-jazb-e-dil kaisa nikal aaya main ilzam us ko deta tha qusur apna nikal aaya 
na shadi-marg hun kyunkar hai muzhda qatl-e-dushman ka ki ghar mein se liye shamshir wo rota nikal aaya 
sitam ai garmi-e-zabt-e-fughan-o-ah chhati par kabhu bas paD gaya chhaala kabhu phoDa nikal aaya 
kiya zanjir mujh ko chaara-gar ne kin dinon mein jab adu ki qaid se wo shoKH-e-be-parwa nikal aaya 
nikal aaya agar aansu to zalim mat nikal aankhen suna mazur hai muztar nikal aaya nikal aaya 
hamare KHun-baha ka ghair se dawa hai qatil ko ye baad-e-infisal ab aur hi jhagDa nikal aaya 
hui bulbul sana-KHwan-e-dahan-e-tang kis gul ki ki farwardi mein ghunche ka munh itna sa nikal aaya 
koi tir us ka dil mein rah gaya tha kya ki aankhon se abhi rone mein ek paikan ka TukDa nikal aaya 
dam-e-bismil ye kis ke KHauf se hum pi gae aansu ki har zaKHm-e-badan se KHun ka dariya nikal aaya 
KHadang-e-yar ke hamrah nikli jaan sine se yahi arman ek muddat se ji mein tha nikal aaya 
bahut nazan hai tu ai qais par wahshat dikhaunga kitabon mein kabhu qissa jo 'momin' ka nikal aaya

hameñ bhī matlab-o-ma.anī kī justujū hai bahut harīf-e-harf magar ab ke dū-ba-dū hai bahut 
vaqār ghar kī tavāzo hī par nahīñ mauqūf ba-faiz-e-shā.irī bāhar bhī aabrū hai bahut 
phaTe purāne diloñ kī ḳhabar nahīñ letā agarche jāntā hai hājat-e-rafū hai bahut 
badan kā saarā lahū khiñch ke aa gayā ruḳh par vo ek bosa hameñ de ke surḳh-rū hai bahut 
idhar udhar yuuñ hī muñh mārte bhī haiñ lekin ye mānte bhī haiñ dil se ki ham ko tū hai bahut 
ab us kī diid mohabbat nahīñ zarūrat hai ki us se mil ke bichhaḌne kī aarzū hai bahut 
yahī hai be-sar-o-pā baat kahne kā mauqa.a patā chalegā kise shor chār-sū hai bahut 
ye haal hai to badan ko bachā.iye kab tak sadā meñ dhuup bahut hai lahū meñ lū hai bahut 
yahī hai fikr kahīñ maan hī na jaa.eñ 'zafar' hamāre mojaza-e-fan pe guftugū hai bahut 
hamein bhi matlab-o-mani ki justuju hai bahut harif-e-harf magar ab ke du-ba-du hai bahut 
waqar ghar ki tawazo hi par nahin mauquf ba-faiz-e-shairi bahar bhi aabru hai bahut 
phaTe purane dilon ki KHabar nahin leta agarche jaanta hai hajat-e-rafu hai bahut 
badan ka sara lahu khinch ke aa gaya ruKH par wo ek bosa hamein de ke surKH-ru hai bahut 
idhar udhar yun hi munh marte bhi hain lekin ye mante bhi hain dil se ki hum ko tu hai bahut 
ab us ki did mohabbat nahin zarurat hai ki us se mil ke bichhaDne ki aarzu hai bahut 
yahi hai be-sar-o-pa baat kahne ka mauqa pata chalega kise shor chaar-su hai bahut 
ye haal hai to badan ko bachaiye kab tak sada mein dhup bahut hai lahu mein lu hai bahut 
yahi hai fikr kahin man hi na jaen 'zafar' hamare mojaza-e-fan pe guftugu hai bahut

phuul allāh ne banā.e haiñ mahakne ke liye aur bulbul ko banāyā hai chahakne ke liye 
ātish-e-ġham se banāyā hai mire siine meñ dil ko añgāre kī mānind dahakne ke liye 
bache kam-baḳht vo dil kyūñki bhalā jis dil ke musta.id ho nigah-e-shoḳh uchakne ke liye 
rind kahte haiñ ki ḳhāliq ne kiyā hai paidā raat din nāseh-e-behūda ko bakne ke liye 
rahm ai chashm banāyā hai kahīñ kyā dil ko qatra-e-ashk ho mizhgāñ se Tapakne ke liye 
shaiḳh ko rindoñ se kah do ki nazar meñ rakkheñ kyūñki ab DhūñDe hai qaabū vo khisakne ke liye 
'aish' batlā to banā hai dil-e-hairāñ terā misl-e-ā.īna ye kis shakl ke takne ke liye 
phul allah ne banae hain mahakne ke liye aur bulbul ko banaya hai chahakne ke liye 
aatish-e-gham se banaya hai mere sine mein dil ko angare ki manind dahakne ke liye 
bache kam-baKHt wo dil kyunki bhala jis dil ke mustaid ho nigah-e-shoKH uchakne ke liye 
rind kahte hain ki KHaliq ne kiya hai paida raat din naseh-e-behuda ko bakne ke liye 
rahm ai chashm banaya hai kahin kya dil ko qatra-e-ashk ho mizhgan se Tapakne ke liye 
shaiKH ko rindon se kah do ki nazar mein rakkhen kyunki ab DhunDe hai qabu wo khisakne ke liye 
'aish' batla to bana hai dil-e-hairan tera misl-e-aina ye kis shakl ke takne ke liye

na gumān maut kā hai na ḳhayāl zindagī kā so ye haal in dinoñ hai mire dil kī be-kasī kā 
maiñ shikasta baam o dar meñ jise jā ke DhūñDtā thā koī yaad thī kisī kī koī naam thā kisī kā 
maiñ havāoñ se hirāsāñ vo ghuTan se dil-girafta maiñ charāġh tīrgī kā vo gulāb raushnī kā 
abhī rail ke safar meñ haiñ bahut nihāl donoñ kahīñ rog ban na jaa.e yahī saath do ghaḌī kā 
koī shahr aa rahā hai to ye ḳhauf aa rahā hai koī jaane kab utar le ki bharosa kyā kisī kā 
koī muḳhtalif nahīñ hai ye dhuāñ ye rā.egānī ki jo haal shahr kā hai vahī apnī shā.irī kā 
na guman maut ka hai na KHayal zindagi ka so ye haal in dinon hai mere dil ki be-kasi ka 
main shikasta baam o dar mein jise ja ke DhunDta tha koi yaad thi kisi ki koi nam tha kisi ka 
main hawaon se hirasan wo ghuTan se dil-girafta main charagh tirgi ka wo gulab raushni ka 
abhi rail ke safar mein hain bahut nihaal donon kahin rog ban na jae yahi sath do ghaDi ka 
koi shahr aa raha hai to ye KHauf aa raha hai koi jaane kab utar le ki bharosa kya kisi ka 
koi muKHtalif nahin hai ye dhuan ye raegani ki jo haal shahr ka hai wahi apni shairi ka

shaam kaThin hai raat kaḌī hai aao ki ye aane kī ghaḌī hai 
vo hai apne husn meñ yaktā dekh kahāñ taqdīr laḌī hai 
maiñ tum ko hī soch rahā thā aao tumhārī umr baḌī hai 
kaash kushāda dil bhī rakhtā jis ghar kī dahlīz baḌī hai 
phir bichhḌe do chāhne vaale phir Dholak par thaap paḌī hai 
vo pahuñchā imdādī ban kar jab jab ham par biphar paḌī hai 
shahr meñ hai ik aisī hastī jis ko mirī taklīf baḌī hai 
hañs le 'rahbar' vo aa.e haiñ rone ko to umr paḌī hai 
sham kaThin hai raat kaDi hai aao ki ye aane ki ghaDi hai 
wo hai apne husn mein yakta dekh kahan taqdir laDi hai 
main tum ko hi soch raha tha aao tumhaari umr baDi hai 
kash kushada dil bhi rakhta jis ghar ki dahliz baDi hai 
phir bichhDe do chahne wale phir Dholak par thap paDi hai 
wo pahuncha imdadi ban kar jab jab hum par biphar paDi hai 
shahr mein hai ek aisi hasti jis ko meri taklif baDi hai 
hans le 'rahbar' wo aae hain rone ko to umr paDi hai

maiñ to samjhā thā jis vaqt mujh ko vo mileñge to jannat milegī kyā ḳhabar thī rah-e-āshiqī meñ saath un ke qayāmat milegī 
maiñ nahīñ jāntā thā ki mujh ko ye mohabbat kī qīmat milegī āñsuoñ kā ḳhazāna milegā chaak dāman kī daulat milegī 
phuul samjhe na the zindagānī is qadar ḳhūb-sūrat milegī ashk ban kar tabassum milegā dard ban kar masarrat milegī 
merī rusvā.iyoñ pe na ḳhush ho merī dīvāngī ko duā do tum ko jitnī bhī shohrat milegī sirf merī badaulat milegī 
dil hamārā na toḌo ḳhudā-rā varna kho doge apnā sahārā zarre zarre meñ is aa.ine ke tum ko apnī hī sūrat milegī 
un ke ruḳh se naqāb aaj uThegī ab nazāroñ kī merāj hogī ek muddat se aaj ahl-e-ġham ko muskurāne kī mohlat milegī 
kaise sābit-qadam vo rahegā us kī tauba kā kyā haal hogā jis ko sunte haiñ shaiḳh-e-haram se mai-kashī kī ijāzat milegī 
main to samjha tha jis waqt mujh ko wo milenge to jannat milegi kya KHabar thi rah-e-ashiqi mein sath un ke qayamat milegi 
main nahin jaanta tha ki mujh ko ye mohabbat ki qimat milegi aansuon ka KHazana milega chaak daman ki daulat milegi 
phul samjhe na the zindagani is qadar KHub-surat milegi ashk ban kar tabassum milega dard ban kar masarrat milegi 
meri ruswaiyon pe na KHush ho meri diwangi ko dua do tum ko jitni bhi shohrat milegi sirf meri badaulat milegi 
dil hamara na toDo KHuda-ra warna kho doge apna sahaara zarre zarre mein is aaine ke tum ko apni hi surat milegi 
un ke ruKH se naqab aaj uThegi ab nazaron ki meraj hogi ek muddat se aaj ahl-e-gham ko muskurane ki mohlat milegi 
kaise sabit-qadam wo rahega us ki tauba ka kya haal hoga jis ko sunte hain shaiKH-e-haram se mai-kashi ki ijazat milegi

ashk-bārī na miTī sīna-figārī na ga.ī lāla-kārī kisī sūrat bhī hamārī na ga.ī 
kūcha-e-husn chhuTā to hue rusvā-e-sharāb apnī qismat meñ jo likkhī thī vo ḳhvārī na ga.ī 
un kī mastāna nigāhoñ kā nahīñ koī qusūr nāseho zindagī ḳhud ham se sañvārī na ga.ī 
chashm-e-mahzūñ pe na lahrā.ī vo zulf-e-shādāb ye parī ham se bhī shīshe meñ utārī na ga.ī 
muddateñ ho ga.iiñ bichhḌe hue tum se lekin aaj tak dil se mire yaad tumhārī na ga.ī 
shaad o ḳhandāñ rahe ham yuuñ to jahāñ meñ lekin apnī fitrat se kabhī dard-shi.ārī na ga.ī 
saikḌoñ baar mire sāmne kī tauba magar tauba 'aḳhtar' ki tirī bāda-gusārī na ga.ī 
ashk-bari na miTi sina-figari na gai lala-kari kisi surat bhi hamari na gai 
kucha-e-husn chhuTa to hue ruswa-e-sharab apni qismat mein jo likkhi thi wo KHwari na gai 
un ki mastana nigahon ka nahin koi qusur naseho zindagi KHud hum se sanwari na gai 
chashm-e-mahzun pe na lahrai wo zulf-e-shadab ye pari hum se bhi shishe mein utari na gai 
muddaten ho gain bichhDe hue tum se lekin aaj tak dil se mere yaad tumhaari na gai 
shad o KHandan rahe hum yun to jahan mein lekin apni fitrat se kabhi dard-shiari na gai 
saikDon bar mere samne ki tauba magar tauba 'aKHtar' ki teri baada-gusari na gai

na intizār meñ yaañ aañkh ek aan lagī na haa.e haa.e meñ taalū se shab zabān lagī 
jalā jigar tap-e-ġham se phaḌakne jaan lagī ilāhī ḳhair ki ab aag paas aan lagī 
galī meñ us kī na phir aate ham to kyā karte tabī.at apnī na jannat ke darmiyān lagī 
jafā-e-ġhair kā shikva thā terā thā kyā zikr abas ye baat burī tujh ko bad-gumān lagī 
hañso na tum to mire haal par maiñ huuñ vo zalīl ki jis kī zillat-o-ḳhvārī se tum ko shaan lagī 
kahāñ vo āh-o-fuġhāñ dam bhī le nahīñ sakte hameñ ye terī duā-e-bad āsmān lagī 
maiñ aur us ko bulā.ūñgā roz-e-vasl meñ lo ajal bhī karne mohabbat kā imtihān lagī 
ba-rañg-e-sūrat-e-bulbul nahīñ navā-sanjī ye kyā huā ki chup ai gulsitāñ bayān lagī 
sadā tumhārī taraf jī lagā hī rahtā hai tumhāre vāste hai dil ko mehrbān lagī 
vo kīna-tūz thā 'momin' to dil lagāyā kyuuñ kaho to kyā tumheñ aisī bhalī vo aan lagī 
na intizar mein yan aankh ek aan lagi na hae hae mein talu se shab zaban lagi 
jala jigar tap-e-gham se phaDakne jaan lagi ilahi KHair ki ab aag pas aan lagi 
gali mein us ki na phir aate hum to kya karte tabiat apni na jannat ke darmiyan lagi 
jafa-e-ghair ka shikwa tha tera tha kya zikr abas ye baat buri tujh ko bad-guman lagi 
hanso na tum to mere haal par main hun wo zalil ki jis ki zillat-o-KHwari se tum ko shan lagi 
kahan wo aah-o-fughan dam bhi le nahin sakte hamein ye teri dua-e-bad aasman lagi 
main aur us ko bulaunga roz-e-wasl mein lo ajal bhi karne mohabbat ka imtihan lagi 
ba-rang-e-surat-e-bulbul nahin nawa-sanji ye kya hua ki chup ai gulsitan bayan lagi 
sada tumhaari taraf ji laga hi rahta hai tumhaare waste hai dil ko mehrban lagi 
wo kina-tuz tha 'momin' to dil lagaya kyun kaho to kya tumhein aisi bhali wo aan lagi

ham ne rakkhā thā jise apnī kahānī meñ kahīñ ab vo tahrīr hai aurāq-e-ḳhizānī meñ kahīñ 
bas ye ik sā.at-e-hijrāñ hai ki jaatī hī nahīñ koī Thahrā bhī hai is ālam-e-fānī meñ kahīñ 
jitnā sāmāñ bhī ikaTThā kiyā is ghar ke liye bhuul jā.eñge use naql-e-makānī meñ kahīñ 
ḳhair auroñ kā to kyā zikr ki ab lagtā hai tū bhī shāmil hai mire ranj-e-zamānī meñ kahīñ 
chashm-e-namnāk ko is darja haqārat se na dekh tujh ko mil jaanā hai ik din isī paanī meñ kahīñ 
markaz-e-jāñ to vahī tū hai magar tere sivā log haiñ aur bhī is yaad purānī meñ kahīñ 
jashn-e-mātam bhī hai raunaq sī tamāshā.ī ko koī naġhma bhī hai is marsiya-ḳhvānī meñ kahīñ 
aaj ke din meñ kisī aur hī din kī hai jhalak shaam hai aur hī is shaam suhānī meñ kahīñ 
kyā samajh aa.e kisī ko mujhe mālūm bhī hai baat kar jaatā huuñ maiñ apnī ravānī meñ kahīñ 
hum ne rakkha tha jise apni kahani mein kahin ab wo tahrir hai auraq-e-KHizani mein kahin 
bas ye ek saat-e-hijran hai ki jati hi nahin koi Thahra bhi hai is aalam-e-fani mein kahin 
jitna saman bhi ikaTTha kiya is ghar ke liye bhul jaenge use naql-e-makani mein kahin 
KHair auron ka to kya zikr ki ab lagta hai tu bhi shamil hai mere ranj-e-zamani mein kahin 
chashm-e-namnak ko is darja haqarat se na dekh tujh ko mil jaana hai ek din isi pani mein kahin 
markaz-e-jaan to wahi tu hai magar tere siwa log hain aur bhi is yaad purani mein kahin 
jashn-e-matam bhi hai raunaq si tamashai ko koi naghma bhi hai is marsiya-KHwani mein kahin 
aaj ke din mein kisi aur hi din ki hai jhalak sham hai aur hi is sham suhani mein kahin 
kya samajh aae kisi ko mujhe malum bhi hai baat kar jata hun main apni rawani mein kahin

kaun yaad aayā ye mahkāreñ kahāñ se aa ga.iiñ dasht meñ ḳhushbū kī bauchhāreñ kahāñ se aa ga.iiñ 
kaisī shab hai ek ik karvaT pe kaT jaatā hai jism mere bistar meñ ye talvāreñ kahāñ se aa ga.iiñ 
ḳhvāb shāyad phir huā āñkhoñ meñ koī sañgsār zer-e-mizhgāñ ḳhuun kī dhāreñ kahāñ se aa ga.iiñ 
shāyad ab tak mujh meñ koī ghoñsla ābād hai ghar meñ ye chiḌiyoñ kī chahkāreñ kahāñ se aa ga.iiñ 
saath hai milnā agar chāhūñ to miltā bhī nahīñ ek ghar meñ itnī dīvāreñ kahāñ se aa ga.iiñ 
rakh diyā kis ne mire shāne pe apnā garm haath mujh shikasta-pā meñ raftāreñ kahāñ se aa ga.iiñ 
kaun yaad aaya ye mahkaren kahan se aa gain dasht mein KHushbu ki bauchhaaren kahan se aa gain 
kaisi shab hai ek ek karwaT pe kaT jata hai jism mere bistar mein ye talwaren kahan se aa gain 
KHwab shayad phir hua aankhon mein koi sangsar zer-e-mizhgan KHun ki dhaaren kahan se aa gain 
shayad ab tak mujh mein koi ghonsla aabaad hai ghar mein ye chiDiyon ki chahkaren kahan se aa gain 
sath hai milna agar chahun to milta bhi nahin ek ghar mein itni diwaren kahan se aa gain 
rakh diya kis ne mere shane pe apna garm hath mujh shikasta-pa mein raftaren kahan se aa gain

qurbatoñ meñ fāsle kuchh aur haiñ ḳhvāhishoñ ke zāviye kuchh aur haiñ 
sun rahe haiñ kaan jo kahte haiñ sab log lekin sochte kuchh aur haiñ 
rahbarī ab shart-e-manzil kab rahī aao DhūñDeñ rāste kuchh aur haiñ 
ye to ik bastī thake logoñ kī hai raah meñ jo luT ga.e kuchh aur haiñ 
mil rahe haiñ garche pahle kī tarah vo magar ab chāhte kuchh aur haiñ 
qurbaton mein fasle kuchh aur hain KHwahishon ke zawiye kuchh aur hain 
sun rahe hain kan jo kahte hain sab log lekin sochte kuchh aur hain 
rahbari ab shart-e-manzil kab rahi aao DhunDen raste kuchh aur hain 
ye to ek basti thake logon ki hai rah mein jo luT gae kuchh aur hain 
mil rahe hain garche pahle ki tarah wo magar ab chahte kuchh aur hain

hirs daulat kī na izz o jaah kī bas tamannā hai dil-e-āgāh kī 
dard-e-dil kitnā pasand aayā use maiñ ne jab kī aah us ne vaah kī 
khiñch ga.e kan.āñ se yūsuf misr ko pūchhiye hazrat se quvvat chaah kī 
bas sulūk us kā hai manzil us kī hai us ke dil tak jis ne apnī raah kī 
vā.izo kaisā butoñ kā ghūrnā kuchh ḳhabar hai summa-vaj.hul-lāh kī 
yaad aa.ī tāq-e-bait-ul-lāh meñ bait-e-abrū us but-e-dil-ḳhvāh kī 
rāh-e-haq kī hai agar 'āsī' talāsh ḳhāk-e-rah ho mard-e-haq-āgāh kī 
hirs daulat ki na izz o jah ki bas tamanna hai dil-e-agah ki 
dard-e-dil kitna pasand aaya use main ne jab ki aah us ne wah ki 
khinch gae kanan se yusuf misr ko puchhiye hazrat se quwwat chah ki 
bas suluk us ka hai manzil us ki hai us ke dil tak jis ne apni rah ki 
waizo kaisa buton ka ghurna kuchh KHabar hai summa-wajhul-lah ki 
yaad aai taq-e-bait-ul-lah mein bait-e-abru us but-e-dil-KHwah ki 
rah-e-haq ki hai agar 'asi' talash KHak-e-rah ho mard-e-haq-agah ki

ye nahīñ kahtā ki dobāra vahī āvāz de koī āsānī to paidā kar koī āvāz de 
maiñ use sun kar bhī aane kā nahīñ majbūr huuñ phir bhī apne ḳhvāb-ḳhāne se kabhī āvāz de 
ho sake donoñ zamānoñ meñ ham-āhañgī koī maiñ purānā huuñ to kyā mujh ko na.ī āvāz de 
maut ke sāhil par istāda huuñ to mujh ko kahīñ zindagī ke pāniyoñ meñ Dūbtī āvāz de 
Thiik hai tū ne pukārā hogā jis-tis ko magar mere hisse meñ koī aa.ī huī āvāz de 
bin bulāyā hī chalā ā.ūñgā maiñ shāyad kabhī lekin itne shor meñ to aap bhī āvāz de 
maiñ use pahchān hī pā.ūñ na pahlī baar to koī āvāzoñ ke jañgal meñ ghirī āvāz de 
muñh se kuchh kah to sahī is ḳhāmushī ke ār-pār mustaqil ko chhoḌ koī sarsarī āvāz de 
tū ne to har haal meñ sunñā hai ab tujh ko 'zafar' raushnī āvāz de yā tīrgī āvāz de 
ye nahin kahta ki dobara wahi aawaz de koi aasani to paida kar koi aawaz de 
main use sun kar bhi aane ka nahin majbur hun phir bhi apne KHwab-KHane se kabhi aawaz de 
ho sake donon zamanon mein ham-ahangi koi main purana hun to kya mujh ko nai aawaz de 
maut ke sahil par istada hun to mujh ko kahin zindagi ke paniyon mein Dubti aawaz de 
Thik hai tu ne pukara hoga jis-tis ko magar mere hisse mein koi aai hui aawaz de 
bin bulaya hi chala aaunga main shayad kabhi lekin itne shor mein to aap bhi aawaz de 
main use pahchan hi paun na pahli bar to koi aawazon ke jangal mein ghiri aawaz de 
munh se kuchh kah to sahi is KHamushi ke aar-par mustaqil ko chhoD koi sarsari aawaz de 
tu ne to har haal mein sunna hai ab tujh ko 'zafar' raushni aawaz de ya tirgi aawaz de

rafta rafta manzar-e-shab taab bhī aa jā.eñge niiñd to aa jaa.e pahle ḳhvāb bhī aa jā.eñge 
kyā pata thā ḳhuun ke aañsū rulā deñge mujhe is kahānī meñ kuchh aise baab bhī aa jā.eñge 
ḳhushk āñkhoñ ne to shāyad ye kabhī sochā na thā ek din sahrāoñ meñ sailāb bhī aa jā.eñge 
hausle yuuñ hī agar baḌhte ga.e to dekhnā sāhiloñ tak ek din girdāb bhī aa jā.eñge 
bas zarā milne to do merī tabāhī kī ḳhabar dil dukhāne ke liye ahbāb bhī aa jā.eñge 
aap kī bazm-e-mohazzab meñ nayā huuñ 'shād' maiñ aate aate bazm ke ādāb bhī aa jā.eñge 
rafta rafta manzar-e-shab tab bhi aa jaenge nind to aa jae pahle KHwab bhi aa jaenge 
kya pata tha KHun ke aansu rula denge mujhe is kahani mein kuchh aise bab bhi aa jaenge 
KHushk aankhon ne to shayad ye kabhi socha na tha ek din sahraon mein sailab bhi aa jaenge 
hausle yun hi agar baDhte gae to dekhna sahilon tak ek din girdab bhi aa jaenge 
bas zara milne to do meri tabahi ki KHabar dil dukhane ke liye ahbab bhi aa jaenge 
aap ki bazm-e-mohazzab mein naya hun 'shad' main aate aate bazm ke aadab bhi aa jaenge

balā.eñ āñkhoñ se un kī mudām lete haiñ ham apne hāthoñ kā mizhgāñ se kaam lete haiñ 
ham un kī zulf se saudā jo vaam lete haiñ to asl o suud vo sab daam daam lete haiñ 
shab-e-visāl ke roz-e-firāq meñ kyā kyā nasīb mujh se mire intiqām lete haiñ 
qamar hī dāġh-e-ġhulāmī faqat nahīñ rakhtā vo mol aise hazāroñ ġhulām lete haiñ 
ham un ke zor ke qaa.il haiñ haiñ vahī shah-zor jo ishq meñ dil-e-muztar ko thaam lete haiñ 
qatīl-e-nāz batāte nahīñ tujhe qātil jab un se pūchho ajal hī kā naam lete haiñ 
tire asiir jo sayyād karte haiñ fariyād to phir vo dam hī nahīñ zer-e-dām lete haiñ 
jhukā.e hai sar-e-taslīm māh-e-nau par vo ġhurūr-e-husn se kis kā salām lete haiñ 
tire ḳhirām ke pairū haiñ jitne fitne haiñ qadam sab aan ke vaqt-e-ḳhirām lete haiñ 
hamāre haath se ai 'zauq' vaqt-e-mai-noshī hazār naaz se vo ek jaam lete haiñ 
balaen aankhon se un ki mudam lete hain hum apne hathon ka mizhgan se kaam lete hain 
hum un ki zulf se sauda jo wam lete hain to asl o sud wo sab dam dam lete hain 
shab-e-visal ke roz-e-firaq mein kya kya nasib mujh se mere intiqam lete hain 
qamar hi dagh-e-ghulami faqat nahin rakhta wo mol aise hazaron ghulam lete hain 
hum un ke zor ke qail hain hain wahi shah-zor jo ishq mein dil-e-muztar ko tham lete hain 
qatil-e-naz batate nahin tujhe qatil jab un se puchho ajal hi ka nam lete hain 
tere asir jo sayyaad karte hain fariyaad to phir wo dam hi nahin zer-e-dam lete hain 
jhukae hai sar-e-taslim mah-e-nau par wo ghurur-e-husn se kis ka salam lete hain 
tere KHiram ke pairu hain jitne fitne hain qadam sab aan ke waqt-e-KHiram lete hain 
hamare hath se ai 'zauq' waqt-e-mai-noshi hazar naz se wo ek jam lete hain

paañv rukte hī nahīñ zehn Thahartā hī nahīñ koī nashsha hai thakan kā ki utartā hī nahīñ 
din guzarte haiñ guzarte hī chale jaate haiñ ek lamha jo kisī tarah guzartā hī nahīñ 
bhārī darvāza-e-āhan ki nahīñ khul paatā mere siine meñ ye sannāTā utartā hī nahīñ 
dast-e-jāñ se maiñ uThā luuñ use pī luuñ lekin dil vo zahrāb pyāla hai ki bhartā hī nahīñ 
kyā liye phirtā huuñ maiñ aab sarāb āñkhoñ meñ Dūbtā hī nahīñ koī ki ubhartā hī nahīñ 
ye pighaltī hī nahīñ sham.a ki jaltī hī nahīñ ye bikhartā hī nahīñ dasht ki martā hī nahīñ 
kuchh na kahiye to bhalā yuuñ hī samajhte rahiye pūchh liije to vo aiboñ se mukartā hī nahīñ 
panw rukte hi nahin zehn Thaharta hi nahin koi nashsha hai thakan ka ki utarta hi nahin 
din guzarte hain guzarte hi chale jate hain ek lamha jo kisi tarah guzarta hi nahin 
bhaari darwaza-e-ahan ki nahin khul pata mere sine mein ye sannaTa utarta hi nahin 
dast-e-jaan se main uTha lun use pi lun lekin dil wo zahrab pyala hai ki bharta hi nahin 
kya liye phirta hun main aab sarab aankhon mein Dubta hi nahin koi ki ubharta hi nahin 
ye pighalti hi nahin shama ki jalti hi nahin ye bikharta hi nahin dasht ki marta hi nahin 
kuchh na kahiye to bhala yun hi samajhte rahiye puchh lije to wo aibon se mukarta hi nahin

tujhe bhī chain na aa.e qarār ko tarse chaman meñ rah ke chaman kī bahār ko tarse 
ilāhī barq vo TuuTe jamāl par tere kalī kī tarah se tū bhī nikhār ko tarse 
tamām umr rahe merā muntazir tū bhī tamām umr mire intizār ko tarse 
na ho nasīb mohabbat kī zindagī tujh ko sukūn-e-zīst ko DhūñDe qarār ko tarse 
duā hai 'qaisar'-e-mahjūr kī yahī paiham ki tū bhī jalva-e-ruḳhsār-e-yār ko tarse 
tujhe bhi chain na aae qarar ko tarse chaman mein rah ke chaman ki bahaar ko tarse 
ilahi barq wo TuTe jamal par tere kali ki tarah se tu bhi nikhaar ko tarse 
tamam umr rahe mera muntazir tu bhi tamam umr mere intizar ko tarse 
na ho nasib mohabbat ki zindagi tujh ko sukun-e-zist ko DhunDe qarar ko tarse 
dua hai 'qaisar'-e-mahjur ki yahi paiham ki tu bhi jalwa-e-ruKHsar-e-yar ko tarse

aane vaale hādsoñ ke ḳhauf se sahme hue log phirte haiñ ki jaise ḳhvāb hoñ TuuTe hue 
sub.h dekhā to na thā kuchh paas uljhan ke sivā raat ham baiThe rahe kis soch meñ Duube hue 
apne dukh meñ Duub kar vus.at milī kaisī hamīñ haiñ zamīñ se āsmāñ tak ham hī ham phaile hue 
aaj ā.īne meñ ḳhud ko dekh kar yaad aa gayā ek muddat ho ga.ī jis shaḳhs ko dekhe hue 
jism kī dīvār gir jaa.e to kuchh ehsās ho apne andar ham paḌe haiñ kis qadar simTe hue 
kis se pūchheñ rāt-bhar apne bhaTakne kā sabab sab yahāñ milte haiñ jaise niiñd meñ jaage hue 
is nagar ke jagmagāte rāstoñ par ghuum kar ham chale aa.e ġhamoñ kī dhuul meñ lipTe hue 
jin ko ai 'āzād' baḳhshī thī mahak ham ne kabhī ab vahī raste hamāre vāste kāñTe hue 
aane wale hadson ke KHauf se sahme hue log phirte hain ki jaise KHwab hon TuTe hue 
subh dekha to na tha kuchh pas uljhan ke siwa raat hum baiThe rahe kis soch mein Dube hue 
apne dukh mein Dub kar wusat mili kaisi hamin hain zamin se aasman tak hum hi hum phaile hue 
aaj aaine mein KHud ko dekh kar yaad aa gaya ek muddat ho gai jis shaKHs ko dekhe hue 
jism ki diwar gir jae to kuchh ehsas ho apne andar hum paDe hain kis qadar simTe hue 
kis se puchhen raat-bhar apne bhaTakne ka sabab sab yahan milte hain jaise nind mein jage hue 
is nagar ke jagmagate raston par ghum kar hum chale aae ghamon ki dhul mein lipTe hue 
jin ko ai 'azad' baKHshi thi mahak hum ne kabhi ab wahi raste hamare waste kanTe hue

āsmāñ sā mujhe ghar de denā ḳhaak ho jā.ūñ to parde denā 
sāmnā aaj anā se hogā baat rakhnī hai to sar de denā 
jaane kab se hai dhuñdlakoñ kā shikār nuqte ko shams o qamar de denā 
tālib-e-vaqt nahīñ huuñ lekin maut tak chār-pahar de denā 
jo pata pūchheñ mirā tum un ko muTThī bhar gard-e-safar de denā 
kal kā din be-ḳhabarī kā hogā saare parchoñ meñ ḳhabar de denā 
de diyā hai jo qalam hāthoñ meñ ab suḳhan meñ bhī asar de denā 
phir 'razā' jalva-numā hotā hai man ke andhoñ ko nazar de denā 
aasman sa mujhe ghar de dena KHak ho jaun to parde dena 
samna aaj ana se hoga baat rakhni hai to sar de dena 
jaane kab se hai dhundlakon ka shikar nuqte ko shams o qamar de dena 
talib-e-waqt nahin hun lekin maut tak chaar-pahar de dena 
jo pata puchhen mera tum un ko muTThi bhar gard-e-safar de dena 
kal ka din be-KHabari ka hoga sare parchon mein KHabar de dena 
de diya hai jo qalam hathon mein ab suKHan mein bhi asar de dena 
phir 'raza' jalwa-numa hota hai man ke andhon ko nazar de dena

jaane kis chaah ke kis pyaar ke gun gaate ho raat din kaun se dildār ke gun gaate ho 
ye to dekho ki tumheñ luuT liyā hai us ne ik tabassum pe ḳharīdār ke gun gaate ho 
apnī tanhā.ī pe nāzāñ ho mire sāda-mizāj apne suune dar o dīvār ke gun gaate ho 
apne hī zehn kī taḳhlīq pe itne sarshār apne afsānvī kirdār ke gun gaate ho 
aur logoñ ke bhī ghar hote haiñ ghar vaale bhī sirf apne dar o dīvār ke gun gaate ho 
jaane kis chah ke kis pyar ke gun gate ho raat din kaun se dildar ke gun gate ho 
ye to dekho ki tumhein luT liya hai us ne ek tabassum pe KHaridar ke gun gate ho 
apni tanhai pe nazan ho mere sada-mizaj apne sune dar o diwar ke gun gate ho 
apne hi zehn ki taKHliq pe itne sarshaar apne afsanwi kirdar ke gun gate ho 
aur logon ke bhi ghar hote hain ghar wale bhi sirf apne dar o diwar ke gun gate ho

pyaar jaadū hai kisī dil meñ utar jā.egā husn ik ḳhvāb hai aur ḳhvāb bikhar jā.egā 
apnī āñkhoñ ko zarā hadd-e-adab meñ rakhnā varna dhoke meñ koī jaañ se guzar jā.egā 
ab kisī aur kā tum zikr na karnā mujh se varna ik ḳhvāb jo āñkhoñ meñ hai mar jā.egā 
ā.īna TuuTe hue dil kā dikhā duuñ maiñ agar bevafā ḳhud tirā chehra bhī utar jā.egā 
dil dukhāyā na kisī shaḳhs kā dil toḌā hai mere hamrāh yahī zād-e-safar jā.egā 
pyar jadu hai kisi dil mein utar jaega husn ek KHwab hai aur KHwab bikhar jaega 
apni aankhon ko zara hadd-e-adab mein rakhna warna dhoke mein koi jaan se guzar jaega 
ab kisi aur ka tum zikr na karna mujh se warna ek KHwab jo aankhon mein hai mar jaega 
aaina TuTe hue dil ka dikha dun main agar bewafa KHud tera chehra bhi utar jaega 
dil dukhaya na kisi shaKHs ka dil toDa hai mere hamrah yahi zad-e-safar jaega

āñkhoñ se kisī ḳhvāb ko bāhar nahīñ dekhā phir ishq ne aisā koī manzar nahīñ dekhā 
ye shahr-e-sadāqat hai qadam soch ke rakhnā shāne pe kisī ke bhī yahāñ sar nahīñ dekhā 
ham umr basar karte rahe 'mīr' kī mānind khiḌkī ko kabhī khol ke bāhar nahīñ dekhā 
vo ishq ko kis tarah samajh pā.egā jis ne sahrā se gale milte samundar nahīñ dekhā 
ham apnī ġhazal ko hī sajāte rahe 'rāhat' ā.īna kabhī ham ne sañvar kar nahīñ dekhā 
aankhon se kisi KHwab ko bahar nahin dekha phir ishq ne aisa koi manzar nahin dekha 
ye shahr-e-sadaqat hai qadam soch ke rakhna shane pe kisi ke bhi yahan sar nahin dekha 
hum umr basar karte rahe 'mir' ki manind khiDki ko kabhi khol ke bahar nahin dekha 
wo ishq ko kis tarah samajh paega jis ne sahra se gale milte samundar nahin dekha 
hum apni ghazal ko hi sajate rahe 'rahat' aaina kabhi hum ne sanwar kar nahin dekha

duāoñ kī zarūrat hai davā meñ kuchh nahīñ rakkhā chachī meñ jaan baaqī hai chachā meñ kuchh nahīñ rakkhā 
garebāñ ke baTan sar kā dupaTTa aañkh kā parda tumhārī artificial hayā meñ kuchh nahīñ rakkhā 
rabar ke dastaḳhat patthar ke afsar mom ke kāġhaz jab andar se TaTolā nādirā meñ kuchh nahīñ rakkhā 
jo tum parfum meñ Dupkī lagā kar roz aatī ho fazā tum se mo.attar hai havā meñ kuchh nahīñ rakkhā 
mohalle meñ unheñ kahte haiñ sab sharrunnisā-begam to ye sābit huā ḳhairunnisā meñ kuchh nahīñ rakkhā 
mrs. iqbāl paanī maañg ke piitī haiñ shauhar se phir is ke ba.ad kahtī haiñ piyā meñ kuchh nahīñ rakkhā 
mohabbat se jo ḳhālī ho vo dil be-kār hotā hai ḳhalā meñ jā.iye bait-ul-ḳhalā meñ kuchh nahīñ rakkhā 
vo make-up ke sahāre ban ga.ī filmoñ kī heroine na ho nāz-o-adā to nāziya meñ kuchh nahīñ rakkhā 
hamārī nasl ke ḳhālī kanastar ye batāte haiñ talo meñ kuchh nahīñ hai DālDā meñ kuchh nahīñ rakkhā 
to ye noToñ kī ḳhushbū kaun sī pocket se aa.ī hai maiñ kaise maan luuñ band-e-qabā meñ kuchh nahīñ rakkhā 
duaon ki zarurat hai dawa mein kuchh nahin rakkha chachi mein jaan baqi hai chacha mein kuchh nahin rakkha 
gareban ke baTan sar ka dupaTTa aankh ka parda tumhaari artificial haya mein kuchh nahin rakkha 
rabar ke dastaKHat patthar ke afsar mom ke kaghaz jab andar se TaTola nadira mein kuchh nahin rakkha 
jo tum parfum mein Dupki laga kar roz aati ho faza tum se moattar hai hawa mein kuchh nahin rakkha 
mohalle mein unhen kahte hain sab sharrunnisa-begam to ye sabit hua KHairunnisa mein kuchh nahin rakkha 
mrs iqbaal pani mang ke piti hain shauhar se phir is ke baad kahti hain piya mein kuchh nahin rakkha 
mohabbat se jo KHali ho wo dil be-kar hota hai KHala mein jaiye bait-ul-KHala mein kuchh nahin rakkha 
wo make-up ke sahaare ban gai filmon ki heroine na ho naz-o-ada to naziya mein kuchh nahin rakkha 
hamari nasl ke KHali kanastar ye batate hain talo mein kuchh nahin hai DalDa mein kuchh nahin rakkha 
to ye noTon ki KHushbu kaun si pocket se aai hai main kaise man lun band-e-qaba mein kuchh nahin rakkha

munavvar jism-o-jāñ hone lage haiñ ki ham ḳhud par ayaañ hone lage haiñ 
ba-zāhir to dikhā.ī de rahe haiñ ba-bātin ham dhuāñ hone lage haiñ 
jinheñ tārīḳh bhī likhte Daregī vo hañgāme yahāñ hone lage haiñ 
bahut se log kyuuñ jaane achānak tabī.at par girāñ hone lage haiñ 
fazā meñ murta.ish bhī be-asar bhī ham āvāz-e-azāñ hone lage haiñ 
siyāsī log ab chole badal kar ḳhudā ke tarjumāñ hone lage haiñ 
jo ham ko jaañ se baḌh kar chāhte the nasīb-e-dushmanāñ hone lage haiñ 
vo chiñgārī jo ain-e-mudda.ā hai to ham shola-ba-jāñ hone lage haiñ 
kabhī the nafā apnā aap ham bhī magar ab to ziyāñ hone lage haiñ 
azīyat-koshiyoñ kā faiz dekho masā.il dāstāñ hone lage haiñ 
bayāñ ham ko karegā vo kahāñ se ki ham to ḳhud bayāñ hone lage haiñ 
zarā aape meñ rakkho ḳhud ko 'akmal' ki bachche ab javāñ hone lage haiñ 
munawwar jism-o-jaan hone lage hain ki hum KHud par ayan hone lage hain 
ba-zahir to dikhai de rahe hain ba-baatin hum dhuan hone lage hain 
jinhen tariKH bhi likhte Daregi wo hangame yahan hone lage hain 
bahut se log kyun jaane achanak tabiat par giran hone lage hain 
faza mein murtaish bhi be-asar bhi hum aawaz-e-azan hone lage hain 
siyasi log ab chole badal kar KHuda ke tarjuman hone lage hain 
jo hum ko jaan se baDh kar chahte the nasib-e-dushmanan hone lage hain 
wo chingari jo ain-e-muddaa hai to hum shola-ba-jaan hone lage hain 
kabhi the nafa apna aap hum bhi magar ab to ziyan hone lage hain 
aziyat-koshiyon ka faiz dekho masail dastan hone lage hain 
bayan hum ko karega wo kahan se ki hum to KHud bayan hone lage hain 
zara aape mein rakkho KHud ko 'akmal' ki bachche ab jawan hone lage hain

kabhī sahrā meñ rahte haiñ kabhī paanī meñ rahte haiñ na jaane kaun hai jis kī nigahbānī meñ rahte haiñ 
zamīñ se āsmāñ tak apne hone kā tamāshā hai ye saare silsile ik lamha-e-fānī meñ rahte haiñ 
saverā hote hote roz aa jaate haiñ sāhil par safīne raat bhar dariyā kī tuġhyānī meñ rahte haiñ 
patā āñkheñ ko miltā hai yahīñ sab jaane vāloñ kā sabhī is ā.īna-ḳhāne kī hairānī meñ rahte haiñ 
idhar ham haiñ ki har kār-e-jahāñ dushvār hai ham ko udhar kuchh log har mushkil kī āsānī meñ rahte haiñ 
kise ye niilī piilī titliyāñ achchhī nahīñ lagtīñ 'ajab kyā hai jo ham bachchoñ kī nādānī meñ rahte haiñ 
yahī be-chehra o be-nām ghar apnā Thikāna hai ham ik bhūle hue manzar kī vīrānī meñ rahte haiñ 
kabhi sahra mein rahte hain kabhi pani mein rahte hain na jaane kaun hai jis ki nigahbani mein rahte hain 
zamin se aasman tak apne hone ka tamasha hai ye sare silsile ek lamha-e-fani mein rahte hain 
sawera hote hote roz aa jate hain sahil par safine raat bhar dariya ki tughyani mein rahte hain 
pata aankhen ko milta hai yahin sab jaane walon ka sabhi is aaina-KHane ki hairani mein rahte hain 
idhar hum hain ki har kar-e-jahan dushwar hai hum ko udhar kuchh log har mushkil ki aasani mein rahte hain 
kise ye nili pili titliyan achchhi nahin lagtin 'ajab kya hai jo hum bachchon ki nadani mein rahte hain 
yahi be-chehra o be-nam ghar apna Thikana hai hum ek bhule hue manzar ki virani mein rahte hain

tū mirī ibtidā tū mirī intihā maiñ samundar huuñ tū sāhiloñ kī havā terī manzil bane merā har rāstā maiñ samundar huuñ tū sāhiloñ kī havā 
roz-o-shab mauj-dar-mauj huuñ dar-ba-dar roz-o-shab sāhiloñ par paTaktā huuñ sar haath aatā nahīñ phir bhī dāman tirā maiñ samundar huuñ tū sāhiloñ kī havā 
merī shorīdgī ke ye tūfān sab merī ḳhāmoshiyoñ ke ye armān sab kuchh nahīñ ik tirī aarzū ke sivā maiñ samundar huuñ tū sāhiloñ kī havā 
tū hī manzil mirī tū hī had hai mirī tujh se vābastagī nām-zad hai mirī tū na ho gar to maiñ ḳhud meñ kho jā.ūñgā maiñ samundar huuñ tū sāhiloñ kī havā 
ḳhushbuoñ se tirī ye mahaktā safar yuuñ hī jaarī rahegā mire auj par tū masāfat mirī maiñ tirā rāstā maiñ samundar huuñ tū sāhiloñ kī havā 
tu meri ibtida tu meri intiha main samundar hun tu sahilon ki hawa teri manzil bane mera har rasta main samundar hun tu sahilon ki hawa 
roz-o-shab mauj-dar-mauj hun dar-ba-dar roz-o-shab sahilon par paTakta hun sar hath aata nahin phir bhi daman tera main samundar hun tu sahilon ki hawa 
meri shoridgi ke ye tufan sab meri KHamoshiyon ke ye arman sab kuchh nahin ek teri aarzu ke siwa main samundar hun tu sahilon ki hawa 
tu hi manzil meri tu hi had hai meri tujh se wabastagi nam-zad hai meri tu na ho gar to main KHud mein kho jaunga main samundar hun tu sahilon ki hawa 
KHushbuon se teri ye mahakta safar yun hi jari rahega mere auj par tu masafat meri main tera rasta main samundar hun tu sahilon ki hawa

hameñ to ḳhair koī dūsrā achchhā nahīñ lagtā unheñ ḳhud bhī koī apne sivā achchhā nahīñ lagtā 
nahīñ gar naġhma-e-shādī nafīr-e-ġham sahī koī ki sāz-e-zindagānī be-sadā achchhā nahīñ lagtā 
hameñ ye band kamroñ kā makāñ kuchh bhā gayā itnā ki ham ko ab koī āñgan khulā achchhā nahīñ lagtā 
kuchh itnī talḳh us din ho ga.ī thī guftugū un se ka.ī din se zabāñ kā zā.iqa achchhā nahīñ lagtā 
kabhī nazdīk aa kar rū-ba-rū bhī hoñ mulāqāteñ ki ham-sāyoñ meñ itnā fāsla achchhā nahīñ lagtā 
kaThin rastoñ pe chalnā apnī uftād-e-tabī.at hai hameñ āsān koī rāstā achchhā nahīñ lagtā 
ise ham marsiya-goyoñ pe 'mohsin' chhoḌ dete haiñ likheñ ham aap apnā marsiya achchhā nahīñ lagtā 
hamein to KHair koi dusra achchha nahin lagta unhen KHud bhi koi apne siwa achchha nahin lagta 
nahin gar naghma-e-shadi nafir-e-gham sahi koi ki saz-e-zindagani be-sada achchha nahin lagta 
hamein ye band kamron ka makan kuchh bha gaya itna ki hum ko ab koi aangan khula achchha nahin lagta 
kuchh itni talKH us din ho gai thi guftugu un se kai din se zaban ka zaiqa achchha nahin lagta 
kabhi nazdik aa kar ru-ba-ru bhi hon mulaqaten ki ham-sayon mein itna fasla achchha nahin lagta 
kaThin raston pe chalna apni uftad-e-tabiat hai hamein aasan koi rasta achchha nahin lagta 
ise hum marsiya-goyon pe 'mohsin' chhoD dete hain likhen hum aap apna marsiya achchha nahin lagta

kahnā hī mirā kyā hai ki maiñ kuchh nahīñ kahtā ye bhī tumheñ dhokā hai ki maiñ kuchh nahīñ kahtā 
ye baat ki kahnā hai mujhe tum se bahut kuchh is baat se paidā hai ki maiñ kuchh nahīñ kahtā 
apnī hī kahe jaatā hai ai nāseh-e-nā-faham tū kuchh nahīñ suntā hai ki maiñ kuchh nahīñ kahtā 
rahtā hai vo but shikva-e-aġhyār pe ḳhāmosh kahtā hai to kahtā hai ki maiñ kuchh nahīñ kahtā 
kahlāo na kuchh ġhair kī tārīf meñ mujh se samjho to ye thoḌā hai ki maiñ kuchh nahīñ kahtā 
kahne kā to apne hai 'vafā' aap bhī qaa.el kahne ko ye kahtā hai ki maiñ kuchh nahīñ kahtā 
kahna hi mera kya hai ki main kuchh nahin kahta ye bhi tumhein dhoka hai ki main kuchh nahin kahta 
ye baat ki kahna hai mujhe tum se bahut kuchh is baat se paida hai ki main kuchh nahin kahta 
apni hi kahe jata hai ai naseh-e-na-faham tu kuchh nahin sunta hai ki main kuchh nahin kahta 
rahta hai wo but shikwa-e-aghyar pe KHamosh kahta hai to kahta hai ki main kuchh nahin kahta 
kahlao na kuchh ghair ki tarif mein mujh se samjho to ye thoDa hai ki main kuchh nahin kahta 
kahne ka to apne hai 'wafa' aap bhi qael kahne ko ye kahta hai ki main kuchh nahin kahta

jī rahe haiñ āfiyat meñ to hunar ḳhvāboñ kā hai ab bhī lagtā hai ki ye saarā safar ḳhvāboñ kā hai 
jī lagā rakkhā hai yuuñ ta.abīr ke auhām se zindagī kyā hai miyāñ bas ek ghar ḳhvāboñ kā hai 
raat chaltī rahtī hai aur jaltā rahtā hai charāġh ek bujhtā hai to phir naqsh-e-digar ḳhvāboñ kā hai 
rañg bāzār-e-ḳhirad kā aur ye merā junūñ ik sitāra gumbad-e-aflāk par ḳhvāboñ kā hai 
raat kā dariyā aur us meñ ek tūfān-e-muhīb jāgnā hai der tak ye bhī asar ḳhvāboñ kā hai 
varna kaT jaate haiñ roz o shab zamāne kī tarah jo bhī thoḌā yā bahut samjho to Dar ḳhvāboñ kā hai 
ji rahe hain aafiyat mein to hunar KHwabon ka hai ab bhi lagta hai ki ye sara safar KHwabon ka hai 
ji laga rakkha hai yun tabir ke auham se zindagi kya hai miyan bas ek ghar KHwabon ka hai 
raat chalti rahti hai aur jalta rahta hai charagh ek bujhta hai to phir naqsh-e-digar KHwabon ka hai 
rang bazar-e-KHirad ka aur ye mera junun ek sitara gumbad-e-aflak par KHwabon ka hai 
raat ka dariya aur us mein ek tufan-e-muhib jagna hai der tak ye bhi asar KHwabon ka hai 
warna kaT jate hain roz o shab zamane ki tarah jo bhi thoDa ya bahut samjho to Dar KHwabon ka hai

tujh ko paane ke liye ḳhāk-e-tamannā ho jā.ūñ tere qadmoñ meñ bikhar kar tirā rasta ho jā.ūñ 
aur kab tak maiñ karūñ mad.h-sarā.ī apnī mujh ko taufīq de yā-rab ki maiñ terā ho jā.ūñ 
tujh ko koī bhī kabhī mere sivā dekh na paa.e aañkh meñ bhar luuñ tujhe aur maiñ andhā ho jā.ūñ 
chand lamhoñ ke liye ḳhud ko mukammal dekhūñ be-irāda hī sahī maiñ kabhī yakjā ho jā.ūñ 
fikr-e-uqbā na karūñ tujh meñ giraftār rahūñ shā.erī tere liye maiñ sag-e-duniyā ho jā.ūñ 
ye karishma bhī kisī roz to raushan ho jaa.e tū mirī aarzū meñ terī tamannā ho jā.ūñ 
maiñ ki amboh-e-azīzāñ meñ kisī kā bhī nahīñ zindagī mujh se lipaT jā ki maiñ terā ho jā.ūñ 
ye ajab shart hai taslīm-o-razā kī 'aḳhtar' ḳhud ko pahchānñā chāhūñ to maiñ andhā ho jā.ūñ 
tujh ko pane ke liye KHak-e-tamanna ho jaun tere qadmon mein bikhar kar tera rasta ho jaun 
aur kab tak main karun madh-sarai apni mujh ko taufiq de ya-rab ki main tera ho jaun 
tujh ko koi bhi kabhi mere siwa dekh na pae aankh mein bhar lun tujhe aur main andha ho jaun 
chand lamhon ke liye KHud ko mukammal dekhun be-irada hi sahi main kabhi yakja ho jaun 
fikr-e-uqba na karun tujh mein giraftar rahun shaeri tere liye main sag-e-duniya ho jaun 
ye karishma bhi kisi roz to raushan ho jae tu meri aarzu mein teri tamanna ho jaun 
main ki amboh-e-azizan mein kisi ka bhi nahin zindagi mujh se lipaT ja ki main tera ho jaun 
ye ajab shart hai taslim-o-raza ki 'aKHtar' KHud ko pahchanna chahun to main andha ho jaun

logoñ ne ham ko shahr kā qaazī banā diyā is hādse ne ham ko namāzī banā diyā 
tum ko kahā jo chāñd to tum duur ho ga.e tashbīh ko bhī tum ne majāzī banā diyā 
ek aur din kī shaam kisī tarh ho ga.ī kuchh de-dilā ke haal ko maazī banā diyā 
buġhz-e-muāviya meñ sabhī ek ho ga.e is ittihād ne mujhe naazī banā diyā 
ḳhālī alāmatoñ se ma.ānī nikāl kar tanqīd ko bhī sho.abda-bāzī banā diyā 
logon ne hum ko shahr ka qazi bana diya is hadse ne hum ko namazi bana diya 
tum ko kaha jo chand to tum dur ho gae tashbih ko bhi tum ne majazi bana diya 
ek aur din ki sham kisi tarh ho gai kuchh de-dila ke haal ko mazi bana diya 
bughz-e-muawiya mein sabhi ek ho gae is ittihad ne mujhe nazi bana diya 
KHali alamaton se maani nikal kar tanqid ko bhi shoabda-bazi bana diya

ġhurūb-e-shām hī se ḳhud ko yuuñ mahsūs kartā huuñ ki jaise ik diyā huuñ aur havā kī zad pe rakkhā huuñ 
chamaktī dhuup tum apne hī dāman meñ na bhar lenā maiñ saarī raat peḌoñ kī tarah bārish meñ bhīgā huuñ 
ye kis āvāz kā bosa mire hoñToñ pe kāñpā hai maiñ pichhlī sab sadāoñ kī halāvat bhuul baiThā huuñ 
bichhaḌ ke tum se maiñ ne bhī koī sāthī nahīñ DhūñDā hujūm-e-rahguzar meñ duur tak dekho akelā huuñ 
koī TuuTā huā rishta na dāman se ulajh jaa.e tumhāre saath pahlī baar bāzāroñ meñ niklā huuñ 
maiñ gir ke TuuT jā.ūñ yā koī mehrāb mil jaa.e na jaane kab se hāthoñ meñ khilaunā ban ke jiitā huuñ 
ghurub-e-sham hi se KHud ko yun mahsus karta hun ki jaise ek diya hun aur hawa ki zad pe rakkha hun 
chamakti dhup tum apne hi daman mein na bhar lena main sari raat peDon ki tarah barish mein bhiga hun 
ye kis aawaz ka bosa mere honTon pe kanpa hai main pichhli sab sadaon ki halawat bhul baiTha hun 
bichhaD ke tum se main ne bhi koi sathi nahin DhunDa hujum-e-rahguzar mein dur tak dekho akela hun 
koi TuTa hua rishta na daman se ulajh jae tumhaare sath pahli bar bazaron mein nikla hun 
main gir ke TuT jaun ya koi mehrab mil jae na jaane kab se hathon mein khilauna ban ke jita hun

chale haa.e dam bhar ko mehmān ho kar mujhe maar Daalā mirī jaan ho kar 
ye sūrat huī hai ki ā.īna pahroñ mire muñh ko taktā hai hairān ho kar 
javāñ hote hī le uḌā husn tum ko parī ho ga.e tum to insān ho kar 
bigaḌne meñ zulf-e-rasā kī ban aa.ī liye ruḳh ke bose pareshān ho kar 
karam meñ maza hai sitam meñ adā hai maiñ raazī huuñ jo tujh ko āsān ho kar 
judā sar huā par hue ham na halke rahī teġh gardan par ehsān ho kar 
na āḳhir bachā parda-e-rāz-e-dushman huā chaak merā garebān ho kar 
havās aate jaate rahe roz-e-vāda tirī yaad ho kar mirī jaan ho kar 
butoñ ko jagah dil meñ dete ho tauba 'jalīl' aisī bāteñ musalmān ho kar 
chale hae dam bhar ko mehman ho kar mujhe mar Dala meri jaan ho kar 
ye surat hui hai ki aaina pahron mere munh ko takta hai hairan ho kar 
jawan hote hi le uDa husn tum ko pari ho gae tum to insan ho kar 
bigaDne mein zulf-e-rasa ki ban aai liye ruKH ke bose pareshan ho kar 
karam mein maza hai sitam mein ada hai main raazi hun jo tujh ko aasan ho kar 
juda sar hua par hue hum na halke rahi tegh gardan par ehsan ho kar 
na aaKHir bacha parda-e-raaz-e-dushman hua chaak mera gareban ho kar 
hawas aate jate rahe roz-e-wada teri yaad ho kar meri jaan ho kar 
buton ko jagah dil mein dete ho tauba 'jalil' aisi baaten musalman ho kar

yaaro kū-e-yār kī bāteñ kareñ phir gul o gulzār kī bāteñ kareñ 
chāndnī meñ ai dil ik ik phuul se apne gul-ruḳhsār kī bāteñ kareñ 
āñkhoñ āñkhoñ meñ luTā.e mai-kade dīda-e-sarshār kī bāteñ kareñ 
ab to miliye bas laḌā.ī ho chukī ab to chaliye pyaar kī bāteñ kareñ 
phir mahak uTThe fazā-e-zindagī phir gul o ruḳhsār kī bāteñ kareñ 
mahshar-e-anvār kar deñ bazm ko jalva-e-dīdār kī bāteñ kareñ 
apnī āñkhoñ se bahā.eñ sail-e-ashk abr-e-gauhar-bār kī bāteñ kareñ 
un ko ulfat hī sahī aġhyār se ham se kyuuñ aġhyār kī bāteñ kareñ 
'aḳhtar' us rañgīñ adā se raat bhar tāla-e-bedār kī bāteñ kareñ 
yaro ku-e-yar ki baaten karen phir gul o gulzar ki baaten karen 
chandni mein ai dil ek ek phul se apne gul-ruKHsar ki baaten karen 
aankhon aankhon mein luTae mai-kade dida-e-sarshaar ki baaten karen 
ab to miliye bas laDai ho chuki ab to chaliye pyar ki baaten karen 
phir mahak uTThe faza-e-zindagi phir gul o ruKHsar ki baaten karen 
mahshar-e-anwar kar den bazm ko jalwa-e-didar ki baaten karen 
apni aankhon se bahaen sail-e-ashk abr-e-gauhar-bar ki baaten karen 
un ko ulfat hi sahi aghyar se hum se kyun aghyar ki baaten karen 
'aKHtar' us rangin ada se raat bhar tala-e-bedar ki baaten karen

ashk Dhalte nahīñ dekhe jaate dil pighalte nahīñ dekhe jaate 
phuul dushman ke hoñ yā apne hoñ phuul jalte nahīñ dekhe jaate 
titliyāñ haath bhī lag jaa.eñ to par masalte nahīñ dekhe jaate 
jabr kī dhuup se taptī saḌkeñ log chalte nahīñ dekhe jaate 
ḳhvāb-dushman haiñ zamāne vaale ḳhvāb palte nahīñ dekhe jaate 
dekh sakte haiñ badaltā sab kuchh dil badalte nahīñ dekhe jaate 
karbalā meñ ruḳh-e-asġhar kī taraf tiir chalte nahīñ dekhe jaate 
ashk Dhalte nahin dekhe jate dil pighalte nahin dekhe jate 
phul dushman ke hon ya apne hon phul jalte nahin dekhe jate 
titliyan hath bhi lag jaen to par masalte nahin dekhe jate 
jabr ki dhup se tapti saDken log chalte nahin dekhe jate 
KHwab-dushman hain zamane wale KHwab palte nahin dekhe jate 
dekh sakte hain badalta sab kuchh dil badalte nahin dekhe jate 
karbala mein ruKH-e-asghar ki taraf tir chalte nahin dekhe jate

itnā to jānte haiñ ki āshiq fanā huā aur us se aage baḌh ke ḳhudā jaane kyā huā 
shān-e-karam thī ye bhī agar vo judā huā kyā mehnat-e-talab meñ na hāsil mazā huā 
maiñ aur kū-e-ishq mire aur ye nasīb zauq-e-fanā ḳhizar kī tarah rahnumā huā 
pahchāntā vo ab nahīñ dushman ko dost se kis qaid se asīr-e-mohabbat rihā huā 
shāyān-e-darguzar hai agar iztirār meñ jurm-e-darāz-dasti-e-zauq-e-duā huā 
kyā kyā na us ne puure kiye mudda.ā-e-dil lekin pasand use dil-e-be-mudda.ā huā 
us kā pata kisī se na pūchho baḌhe chalo fitna kisī galī meñ to hogā uThā huā 
gul-rūyoñ ke ḳhayāl ne gulshan banā diyā siina kabhī madīna kabhī karbalā huā 
pechīda thī jo sar meñ havā-e-razā-e-dost 'āsī' murīd-e-silsila-e-murtazā huā 
itna to jaante hain ki aashiq fana hua aur us se aage baDh ke KHuda jaane kya hua 
shan-e-karam thi ye bhi agar wo juda hua kya mehnat-e-talab mein na hasil maza hua 
main aur ku-e-ishq mere aur ye nasib zauq-e-fana KHizar ki tarah rahnuma hua 
pahchanta wo ab nahin dushman ko dost se kis qaid se asir-e-mohabbat riha hua 
shayan-e-darguzar hai agar iztirar mein jurm-e-daraaz-dasti-e-zauq-e-dua hua 
kya kya na us ne pure kiye muddaa-e-dil lekin pasand use dil-e-be-muddaa hua 
us ka pata kisi se na puchho baDhe chalo fitna kisi gali mein to hoga uTha hua 
gul-ruyon ke KHayal ne gulshan bana diya sina kabhi madina kabhi karbala hua 
pechida thi jo sar mein hawa-e-raza-e-dost 'asi' murid-e-silsila-e-murtaza hua

to pahle merā hī hāl-e-tabāh likh liije phir apne aap ko aalam panāh likh liije 
kitāb-e-sahrā meñ zikr aa.e jab samundar kā mirī hayāt kisī kī nigāh likh liije 
diyoñ ke qatl pe sūraj kī har kiran chup hai is ehtiyāt ko jashn-e-siyāh likh liije 
laboñ pe amn ke naġhme diloñ meñ jang kī aag shikast-e-azm ba-nām-e-sipāh likh liije 
vo mere qatl kā mulzim hai log kahte haiñ vo chhuT sake to mujhe bhī gavāh likh liije 
maiñ apne ghar kī tabāhī sambhāl lūñgā magar zamāne bhar kā mujhe sarbarāh likh liije 
ḳhatā.eñ itnī haiñ 'bekal' mujhe nahīñ ma.alūm yahī sazā hai mirā har gunāh likh liije 
to pahle mera hi haal-e-tabah likh lije phir apne aap ko aalam panah likh lije 
kitab-e-sahra mein zikr aae jab samundar ka meri hayat kisi ki nigah likh lije 
diyon ke qatl pe suraj ki har kiran chup hai is ehtiyat ko jashn-e-siyah likh lije 
labon pe amn ke naghme dilon mein jang ki aag shikast-e-azm ba-nam-e-sipah likh lije 
wo mere qatl ka mulzim hai log kahte hain wo chhuT sake to mujhe bhi gawah likh lije 
main apne ghar ki tabahi sambhaal lunga magar zamane bhar ka mujhe sarbarah likh lije 
KHataen itni hain 'bekal' mujhe nahin malum yahi saza hai mera har gunah likh lije

koī hairat hai na is baat kā ronā hai hameñ ḳhaak se uTThe haiñ so ḳhaak hī honā hai hameñ 
phir ta.alluq ke bikharne kī shikāyat kaisī jab use kāñch ke dhāgoñ meñ pironā hai hameñ 
uñgliyoñ kī sabhī poroñ se lahū ristā hai apne dāman ke ye kis daaġh ko dhonā hai hameñ
