phir utar aa.e haiñ palkoñ pe sisakte aañsū phir kisī shaam ke āñchal ko bhigonā hai hameñ 
ye jo aflāk kī vus.at meñ liye phirtī hai is anā ne hī kisī roz Dubonā hai hameñ 
koi hairat hai na is baat ka rona hai hamein KHak se uTThe hain so KHak hi hona hai hamein 
phir talluq ke bikharne ki shikayat kaisi jab use kanch ke dhagon mein pirona hai hamein 
ungliyon ki sabhi poron se lahu rista hai apne daman ke ye kis dagh ko dhona hai hamein 
phir utar aae hain palkon pe sisakte aansu phir kisi sham ke aanchal ko bhigona hai hamein 
ye jo aflak ki wusat mein liye phirti hai is ana ne hi kisi roz Dubona hai hamein

irāda thā ki ab ke rañg-e-duniyā dekhnā hai ḳhabar kyā thī ki apnā hī tamāshā dekhnā hai 
Dasegā bebasī kā naag jaane aur kab tak na jaane aur kitne din ye naqsha dekhnā hai 
duā kā shāmiyāna bhī nahīñ hai ab to sar par so ḳhud ko hiddat-e-ġham meñ jhulastā dekhnā hai 
nahīñ ab sochnā kyā ho chukā kyā hogā aage bas ab to haath kī rekhā kā likkhā dekhnā hai 
bahut dekhā hai ḳhud ko rañj par taqsīm hote aur ab taqsīm-dar-taqsīm hotā dekhnā hai 
maiñ phir ik ḳhat tire āñgan girānā chāhtā huuñ mujhe phir se tirā rañg-e-burīda dekhnā hai 
tū sar-tā-pā zabānī yaad ho jā.egī mujh ko ki ab maiñ ne tujhe itnā ziyāda dekhnā hai 
'hasan' maiñ ek lambī saañs lenā chāhtā huuñ maiñ jaisā thā kisī din ḳhud ko vaisā dekhnā hai 
irada tha ki ab ke rang-e-duniya dekhna hai KHabar kya thi ki apna hi tamasha dekhna hai 
Dasega bebasi ka nag jaane aur kab tak na jaane aur kitne din ye naqsha dekhna hai 
dua ka shamiyana bhi nahin hai ab to sar par so KHud ko hiddat-e-gham mein jhulasta dekhna hai 
nahin ab sochna kya ho chuka kya hoga aage bas ab to hath ki rekha ka likkha dekhna hai 
bahut dekha hai KHud ko ranj par taqsim hote aur ab taqsim-dar-taqsim hota dekhna hai 
main phir ek KHat tere aangan girana chahta hun mujhe phir se tera rang-e-burida dekhna hai 
tu sar-ta-pa zabani yaad ho jaegi mujh ko ki ab main ne tujhe itna ziyaada dekhna hai 
'hasan' main ek lambi sans lena chahta hun main jaisa tha kisi din KHud ko waisa dekhna hai

tīrgī chāñd ko ina.am-e-vafā detī hai rāt-bhar Dūbte sūraj ko sadā detī hai 
maiñ ne chāhā thā ki lafzoñ meñ chhupā luuñ ḳhud ko ḳhāmushī lafz kī dīvār girā detī hai 
koī saaya to milā dhuup ke zindānī ko merī vahshat tirī chāhat ko duā detī hai 
kitnī sadiyoñ ke darīche meñ hai bas ek vajūd zindagī saañs ko talvār banā detī hai 
qafas-e-rañg meñ din raat vahī pyaas kā dard āgahī bhī mujhe jiine kī sazā detī hai 
tirgi chand ko inam-e-wafa deti hai raat-bhar Dubte suraj ko sada deti hai 
main ne chaha tha ki lafzon mein chhupa lun KHud ko KHamushi lafz ki diwar gira deti hai 
koi saya to mila dhup ke zindani ko meri wahshat teri chahat ko dua deti hai 
kitni sadiyon ke dariche mein hai bas ek wajud zindagi sans ko talwar bana deti hai 
qafas-e-rang mein din raat wahi pyas ka dard aagahi bhi mujhe jine ki saza deti hai

ajiib dard kā rishta thā sab ke sab ro.e shajar girā to parinde tamām shab ro.e 
kisī kā bhī na charāġhoñ kī samt dhyān gayā shab-e-nashāt vo kab kab bujhe the kab ro.e 
hazār girya ke pahlū nikalne vaale haiñ use kaho ki vo yūñhī na be-sabab ro.e 
hamāre zād-e-safar meñ bhī dard rakkhā gayā so ham bhī TuuT ke ro.e safar meñ jab ro.e 
kisī kī aañkh hī bhīgī na sail-e-dard gayā tumhārī yaad meñ ab ke baras ajab ro.e 
tire ḳhayāl kī lau hī safar meñ kaam aa.ī mire charāġh to lagtā thā ro.e ab ro.e 
kuchh apnā dard hī 'tāriq'-na.īm aisā thā baġhair mausam-e-girya bhī ham ġhazab ro.e 
ajib dard ka rishta tha sab ke sab roe shajar gira to parinde tamam shab roe 
kisi ka bhi na charaghon ki samt dhyan gaya shab-e-nashat wo kab kab bujhe the kab roe 
hazar girya ke pahlu nikalne wale hain use kaho ki wo yunhi na be-sabab roe 
hamare zad-e-safar mein bhi dard rakkha gaya so hum bhi TuT ke roe safar mein jab roe 
kisi ki aankh hi bhigi na sail-e-dard gaya tumhaari yaad mein ab ke baras ajab roe 
tere KHayal ki lau hi safar mein kaam aai mere charagh to lagta tha roe ab roe 
kuchh apna dard hi 'tariq'-naim aisa tha baghair mausam-e-girya bhi hum ghazab roe

qadam uThe to ajab dil-gudāz manzar thā maiñ āp-apne liye rāste kā patthar thā 
dil ek aur hazār āzmā.isheñ ġham kī diyā jalā to thā lekin havā kī zad par thā 
har ā.īna mirī āñkhoñ se pūchh letā hai vo aks kyā hue ābād jin se ye ghar thā 
har ik azaab ko maiñ sah gayā magar na milā vo ek ġham jo mire hausle se baḌh kar thā 
ye vahm thā ki mujhe vo bhulā chukā hogā magar milā to vo merī hī tarah muztar thā 
hazār baar ḳhud apne makāñ pe dastak dī ik ehtimāl meñ jaise ki maiñ hī andar thā 
tamām umr kī tanhā.iyāñ sameTī haiñ yahī mire dar-o-dīvār kā muqaddar thā 
udaas rastoñ meñ paiham sulagtī sub.hoñ meñ jo ġham-gusār thā koī to dīda-e-tar thā 
qadam uThe to ajab dil-gudaz manzar tha main aap-apne liye raste ka patthar tha 
dil ek aur hazar aazmaishen gham ki diya jala to tha lekin hawa ki zad par tha 
har aaina meri aankhon se puchh leta hai wo aks kya hue aabaad jin se ye ghar tha 
har ek azab ko main sah gaya magar na mila wo ek gham jo mere hausle se baDh kar tha 
ye wahm tha ki mujhe wo bhula chuka hoga magar mila to wo meri hi tarah muztar tha 
hazar bar KHud apne makan pe dastak di ek ehtimal mein jaise ki main hi andar tha 
tamam umr ki tanhaiyan sameTi hain yahi mere dar-o-diwar ka muqaddar tha 
udas raston mein paiham sulagti subhon mein jo gham-gusar tha koi to dida-e-tar tha

aaj bhī dasht-e-balā meñ nahr par pahrā rahā kitnī sadiyoñ baad maiñ aayā magar pyāsā rahā 
kyā fazā-e-sub.h-e-ḳhandāñ kyā savād-e-shām-e-ġham jis taraf dekhā kiyā maiñ der tak hañstā rahā 
ik sulagtā āshiyāñ aur bijliyoñ kī anjuman pūchhtā kis se ki mere ghar meñ kyā thā kyā rahā 
zindagī kyā ek sannāTā thā pichhlī raat kā sham.eñ gul hotī rahīñ dil se dhuāñ uThtā rahā 
qāfile phūloñ ke guzre is taraf se bhī magar dil kā ik gosha jo suunā thā bahut suunā rahā 
terī in hañstī huī āñkhoñ se nisbat thī jise merī palkoñ par vo aañsū umr bhar Thahrā rahā 
ab lahū ban kar mirī āñkhoñ se bah jaane ko hai haañ vahī dil jo harīf-e-joshish-e-dariyā rahā 
kis ko fursat thī ki 'aḳhtar' dekhtā merī taraf maiñ jahāñ jis bazm meñ jab tak rahā tanhā rahā 
aaj bhi dasht-e-bala mein nahr par pahra raha kitni sadiyon baad main aaya magar pyasa raha 
kya faza-e-subh-e-KHandan kya sawad-e-sham-e-gham jis taraf dekha kiya main der tak hansta raha 
ek sulagta aashiyan aur bijliyon ki anjuman puchhta kis se ki mere ghar mein kya tha kya raha 
zindagi kya ek sannaTa tha pichhli raat ka shamen gul hoti rahin dil se dhuan uThta raha 
qafile phulon ke guzre is taraf se bhi magar dil ka ek gosha jo suna tha bahut suna raha 
teri in hansti hui aankhon se nisbat thi jise meri palkon par wo aansu umr bhar Thahra raha 
ab lahu ban kar meri aankhon se bah jaane ko hai han wahi dil jo harif-e-joshish-e-dariya raha 
kis ko fursat thi ki 'aKHtar' dekhta meri taraf main jahan jis bazm mein jab tak raha tanha raha

is khurdurī ġhazal ko na yuuñ muñh banā ke dekh kis haal meñ likhī hai mire paas aa ke dekh 
vo din havā hue ki bichhāte the jaan o dil ab ek baar aur hameñ muskurā ke dekh 
parda paḌā huā hai tabassum ke raaz par phūloñ se os aañkh se aañsū girā ke dekh 
ye dopahar bhī aa.ī hai parchhā.iyoñ ke saath vaise nazar na aa.eñ to mash.al jalā ke dekh 
gulchīñ ne jab tamām shagūfoñ ko chun liyā kāñTe pukār uThe ki hameñ aazmā ke dekh 
tū merā ham-safar hai to phir mere saath chal hai rāhzan to naqsh-e-qadam rahnumā ke dekh 
apnī nazar se dekh barahna hayāt ko ā.ankhoñ se ye kitāb kī ainak haTā ke dekh 
az-rāh-e-ehtiyāt safar ko na ḳhatm kar ye phuul haiñ ki aag qadam to jamā ke dekh 
Thappa lagā huā hai 'muzaffar' ke naam kā us kā koī bhī sher kahīñ se uThā ke dekh 
is khurduri ghazal ko na yun munh bana ke dekh kis haal mein likhi hai mere pas aa ke dekh 
wo din hawa hue ki bichhate the jaan o dil ab ek bar aur hamein muskura ke dekh 
parda paDa hua hai tabassum ke raaz par phulon se os aankh se aansu gira ke dekh 
ye dopahar bhi aai hai parchhaiyon ke sath waise nazar na aaen to mashal jala ke dekh 
gulchin ne jab tamam shagufon ko chun liya kanTe pukar uThe ki hamein aazma ke dekh 
tu mera ham-safar hai to phir mere sath chal hai rahzan to naqsh-e-qadam rahnuma ke dekh 
apni nazar se dekh barahna hayat ko aaankhon se ye kitab ki ainak haTa ke dekh 
az-rah-e-ehtiyat safar ko na KHatm kar ye phul hain ki aag qadam to jama ke dekh 
Thappa laga hua hai 'muzaffar' ke nam ka us ka koi bhi sher kahin se uTha ke dekh

ishq sāmān bhī hai be-sar-o-sāmānī bhī usī darvesh ke qadmoñ meñ hai sultānī bhī 
ham bhī vaise na rahe dasht bhī vaisā na rahā umr ke saath hī Dhalne lagī vīrānī bhī 
vo jo barbād hue the tire hāthoñ vahī log dam-ba-ḳhud dekh rahe haiñ tirī hairānī bhī 
āḳhir ik roz utarnī hai libādoñ kī tarah tan-e-malbūs! ye pahnī huī uryānī bhī 
ye jo maiñ itnī sahūlat se tujhe chāhtā huuñ dost ik umr meñ miltī hai ye āsānī bhī 
ishq saman bhi hai be-sar-o-samani bhi usi darwesh ke qadmon mein hai sultani bhi 
hum bhi waise na rahe dasht bhi waisa na raha umr ke sath hi Dhalne lagi virani bhi 
wo jo barbaad hue the tere hathon wahi log dam-ba-KHud dekh rahe hain teri hairani bhi 
aaKHir ek roz utarni hai libaadon ki tarah tan-e-malbus! ye pahni hui uryani bhi 
ye jo main itni sahulat se tujhe chahta hun dost ek umr mein milti hai ye aasani bhi

kitne hī faisle kiye par kahāñ ruk sakā huuñ maiñ aaj bhī apne vaqt par ghar se nikal paḌā huuñ maiñ 
abr se aur dhuup se rishta hai ek sā mirā aa.ine aur charāġh ke biich kā fāsla huuñ maiñ 
tujh ko chhuā to der tak ḳhud ko hī DhūñDtā rahā itnī sī der meñ bhalā tujh se kahāñ milā huuñ maiñ 
ḳhushbū tire vajūd kī ghere hue hai aaj bhī tere laboñ kā zā.iqa bhuul nahīñ sakā huuñ maiñ 
āyatoñ jaise nā-gahāñ jāvedāñ lams kī qasam tere achhūte jism kā pahlā mukālima huuñ maiñ 
vaise to merā dā.era puurā nahīñ huā abhī aisī hī koī qaus thī jis se juḌā huā huuñ maiñ 
jitnī bhī tez dhuup ho shāḳheñ haiñ mehrbāñ tirī chhāñv parā.ī hī sahī saañs to le rahā huuñ maiñ 
kitne hi faisle kiye par kahan ruk saka hun main aaj bhi apne waqt par ghar se nikal paDa hun main 
abr se aur dhup se rishta hai ek sa mera aaine aur charagh ke bich ka fasla hun main 
tujh ko chhua to der tak KHud ko hi DhunDta raha itni si der mein bhala tujh se kahan mila hun main 
KHushbu tere wajud ki ghere hue hai aaj bhi tere labon ka zaiqa bhul nahin saka hun main 
aayaton jaise na-gahan jawedan lams ki qasam tere achhute jism ka pahla mukalima hun main 
waise to mera daera pura nahin hua abhi aisi hi koi qaus thi jis se juDa hua hun main 
jitni bhi tez dhup ho shaKHen hain mehrban teri chhanw parai hi sahi sans to le raha hun main

ḳhvāb meñ yā ḳhayāl meñ mujhe mil tū kabhī ḳhadd-o-ḳhāl meñ mujhe mil 
mere dil kī dhamāl meñ mujhe dekh mere sur merī taal meñ mujhe mil 
merī miTTī ko aañkh dī hai to phir kisī mauj-e-visāl meñ mujhe mil 
mujhe kyuuñ arsa-e-hayāt diyā ab inheñ māh-o-sāl meñ mujhe mil 
kisī sub.h-e-firāq meñ mujhe chhoḌ kisī shām-e-malāl meñ mujhe mil 
tū ḳhud apnī misāl hai vo to hai isī apnī misāl meñ mujhe mil 
tere shāyān-e-shāñ hai vasf yahī kisī vaqt-e-muhāl meñ mujhe mil 
mere kal kā pata nahīñ merī jaañ tū abhī mere haal meñ mujhe mil 
mujhe mil ke 'urūj de yā na de mere vaqt-e-zavāl meñ mujhe mil 
KHwab mein ya KHayal mein mujhe mil tu kabhi KHadd-o-KHal mein mujhe mil 
mere dil ki dhamal mein mujhe dekh mere sur meri tal mein mujhe mil 
meri miTTi ko aankh di hai to phir kisi mauj-e-visal mein mujhe mil 
mujhe kyun arsa-e-hayat diya ab inhen mah-o-sal mein mujhe mil 
kisi subh-e-firaq mein mujhe chhoD kisi sham-e-malal mein mujhe mil 
tu KHud apni misal hai wo to hai isi apni misal mein mujhe mil 
tere shayan-e-shan hai wasf yahi kisi waqt-e-muhaal mein mujhe mil 
mere kal ka pata nahin meri jaan tu abhi mere haal mein mujhe mil 
mujhe mil ke 'uruj de ya na de mere waqt-e-zawal mein mujhe mil

bhītar basne vaalā ḳhud bāhar kī sair kare maulā ḳhair kare ik mūrat ko chāhe phir ka.abe ko dair kare maulā ḳhair kare 
ishq-vishiq ye chāhat-vāhat man kā bhulāvā phir man bhī apnā kyā yaar ye kaisā rishta jo apnoñ ko ġhair kare maulā ḳhair kare 
ret kā tuudā āñdhī kī faujoñ par tiir chalā.e Tahnī peḌ chabā.e chhoTī machhlī dariyā meñ ghaḌiyāl se bair kare maulā ḳhair kare 
soch ki kāfir har mūrat pe jaan chhiḌaktā hai bin paañv thiraktā hai man kā musalmāñ ab qible kī jānib pair kare maulā ḳhair kare 
fikr kī chaak pe maaTī kī tū shakl badaltā hai yā ḳhud hī Dhaltā hai 'bekal' be-par lafzoñ kī taḳh.īl ko tair kare maulā ḳhair kare 
bhitar basne wala KHud bahar ki sair kare maula KHair kare ek murat ko chahe phir kabe ko dair kare maula KHair kare 
ishq-wishiq ye chahat-wahat man ka bhulawa phir man bhi apna kya yar ye kaisa rishta jo apnon ko ghair kare maula KHair kare 
ret ka tuda aandhi ki faujon par tir chalae Tahni peD chabae chhoTi machhli dariya mein ghaDiyal se bair kare maula KHair kare 
soch ki kafir har murat pe jaan chhiDakta hai bin panw thirakta hai man ka musalman ab qible ki jaanib pair kare maula KHair kare 
fikr ki chaak pe maTi ki tu shakl badalta hai ya KHud hi Dhalta hai 'bekal' be-par lafzon ki taKHil ko tair kare maula KHair kare

nashāt-e-ġham bhī milā ranj-e-shād-mānī bhī magar vo lamhe bahut muḳhtasar the faanī bhī 
khulī hai aañkh kahāñ kaun moḌ hai yaaro dayār-e-ḳhvāb kī baaqī nahīñ nishānī bhī 
ragoñ meñ ret kī ik aur tah jamī dekho ki pahle jaisī nahīñ ḳhuun meñ ravānī bhī 
bhaTak rahe haiñ ta'āqub meñ ab sarāboñ ke milā na jin ko samundar se buuñd paanī bhī 
zamīñ bhī ham se bahut duur hotī jaatī hai Darā rahī hai ḳhalāoñ kī be-karānī bhī 
tavīl hone lagī haiñ isī liye rāteñ ki log sunte sunāte nahīñ kahānī bhī 
nashat-e-gham bhi mila ranj-e-shad-mani bhi magar wo lamhe bahut muKHtasar the fani bhi 
khuli hai aankh kahan kaun moD hai yaro dayar-e-KHwab ki baqi nahin nishani bhi 
ragon mein ret ki ek aur tah jami dekho ki pahle jaisi nahin KHun mein rawani bhi 
bhaTak rahe hain ta'aqub mein ab sarabon ke mila na jin ko samundar se bund pani bhi 
zamin bhi hum se bahut dur hoti jati hai Dara rahi hai KHalaon ki be-karani bhi 
tawil hone lagi hain isi liye raaten ki log sunte sunate nahin kahani bhi

panāheñ DhūñDh ke kitnī hī roz laatā hai magar vo lauT ke zulfoñ kī samt aatā hai 
sulagtī ret hai aur ThanDe pāniyoñ kā safar vo kaun hai jo hameñ rāsta dikhātā hai 
hai intizār mujhe jañg ḳhatm hone kā lahū kī qaid se bāhar koī bulātā hai 
jo mushkiloñ ke liye hal talāsh laayā thā khilaune baañT ke bachchoñ meñ muskurātā hai 
tamām rāste ab ek jaise lagte haiñ gumān raah meñ shakleñ badal ke aatā hai 
shikār dhund kā sahrā-navard karte haiñ fareb khānā kahāñ dūsroñ ko aatā hai 
panahen DhunDh ke kitni hi roz lata hai magar wo lauT ke zulfon ki samt aata hai 
sulagti ret hai aur ThanDe paniyon ka safar wo kaun hai jo hamein rasta dikhata hai 
hai intizar mujhe jang KHatm hone ka lahu ki qaid se bahar koi bulata hai 
jo mushkilon ke liye hal talash laya tha khilaune banT ke bachchon mein muskuraata hai 
tamam raste ab ek jaise lagte hain guman rah mein shaklen badal ke aata hai 
shikar dhund ka sahra-naward karte hain fareb khana kahan dusron ko aata hai

juuñ nik.hat-e-gul jumbish hai jī kā nikal jaanā ai bād-e-sabā merī karvaT to badal jaanā 
pā-laġhz-e-mohabbat se mushkil hai sañbhal jaanā us ruḳh kī safā.ī par is dil kā phisal jaanā 
siine meñ jo dil taḌpā dhar hī to diyā dekhā phir bhuul gayā kaisā maiñ haath kā phal jaanā 
itnā to na ghabrāo rāhat yahīñ farmāo ghar meñ mire rah jaao aaj aur bhī kal jaanā 
ai dil vo jo yaañ aayā kyā kyā hameñ tarsāyā tū ne kahīñ sikhlāyā qaabū se nikal jaanā 
kyā aise se da.avā ho mahshar meñ ki maiñ ne to nazzāra-e-qātil ko ehsān-e-ajal jaanā 
hai zulm karam jitnā thā farq paḌā kitnā mushkil hai mizāj itnā ik baar badal jaanā 
hūroñ kī sanā-ḳhvānī vaa.iz yuuñ hī kab maanī le aa ki hai nādānī bātoñ meñ bahal jaanā 
ishq un kī balā jaane āshiq hoñ to pahchāne lo mujh ko atibbā ne saude kā ḳhalal jaanā 
kyā bāteñ banātā hai vo jaan jalātā hai paanī meñ dikhātā hai kāfūr kā jal jaanā 
matlab hai ki vaslat meñ hai bul-havas aafat meñ is garmi-e-sohbat meñ ai dil na pighal jaanā 
dam lene kī tāqat hai bīmār-e-mohabbat hai itnā bhī ġhanīmat hai 'momin' kā sambhal jaanā 
jun nikhat-e-gul jumbish hai ji ka nikal jaana ai baad-e-saba meri karwaT to badal jaana 
pa-laghz-e-mohabbat se mushkil hai sanbhal jaana us ruKH ki safai par is dil ka phisal jaana 
sine mein jo dil taDpa dhar hi to diya dekha phir bhul gaya kaisa main hath ka phal jaana 
itna to na ghabrao rahat yahin farmao ghar mein mere rah jao aaj aur bhi kal jaana 
ai dil wo jo yan aaya kya kya hamein tarsaya tu ne kahin sikhlaya qabu se nikal jaana 
kya aise se dawa ho mahshar mein ki main ne to nazzara-e-qatil ko ehsan-e-ajal jaana 
hai zulm karam jitna tha farq paDa kitna mushkil hai mizaj itna ek bar badal jaana 
huron ki sana-KHwani waiz yun hi kab mani le aa ki hai nadani baaton mein bahal jaana 
ishq un ki bala jaane aashiq hon to pahchane lo mujh ko atibba ne saude ka KHalal jaana 
kya baaten banata hai wo jaan jalata hai pani mein dikhata hai kafur ka jal jaana 
matlab hai ki waslat mein hai bul-hawas aafat mein is garmi-e-sohbat mein ai dil na pighal jaana 
dam lene ki taqat hai bimar-e-mohabbat hai itna bhi ghanimat hai 'momin' ka sambhal jaana

'ishq ab merī jaan hai goyā jaan ab mehmān hai goyā 
jis ko dekho vahī hai garm-e-talāsh kahīñ us kā nishān hai goyā 
hai qayāmat uThān zālim kī vo abhī se javān hai goyā 
māñge jā.eñge tujh ko ham tujh se muñh meñ jab tak zabān hai goyā 
jī bahalne ko log sunte haiñ dard-e-dil dāstān hai goyā 
dil meñ kaise vo be-takalluf haiñ un kā apnā makān hai goyā 
haa.e us ālam-āshnā kī nazar har nazar meñ jahān hai goyā 
achchhe-achchhoñ ko phāñs rakkhā hai zāl-e-duniyā javān hai goyā 
is suḳhan kā 'jalīl' kyā kahnā 'mus.hafī' kī zabān hai goyā 
'ishq ab meri jaan hai goya jaan ab mehman hai goya 
jis ko dekho wahi hai garm-e-talash kahin us ka nishan hai goya 
hai qayamat uThan zalim ki wo abhi se jawan hai goya 
mange jaenge tujh ko hum tujh se munh mein jab tak zaban hai goya 
ji bahalne ko log sunte hain dard-e-dil dastan hai goya 
dil mein kaise wo be-takalluf hain un ka apna makan hai goya 
hae us aalam-ashna ki nazar har nazar mein jahan hai goya 
achchhe-achchhon ko phans rakkha hai zal-e-duniya jawan hai goya 
is suKHan ka 'jalil' kya kahna 'mushafi' ki zaban hai goya

aañkh ne dhoka khāyā thā yā saayā thā vo khiḌkī meñ aayā thā yā saayā thā 
darvāze ke pīchhe ik parchhā.īñ thī us ne haath hilāyā thā yā saayā thā 
ek lakīr dhueñ kī thī yā ḳhushbū kī rañg koī lahrāyā thā yā saayā thā 
abhī jo mere paas thā shāyad apnā thā shāyad koī parāyā thā yā saayā thā 
niind se jaagā huuñ to baiThā sochtā huuñ ḳhvāb meñ us ko paayā thā yā saayā thā 
aankh ne dhoka khaya tha ya saya tha wo khiDki mein aaya tha ya saya tha 
darwaze ke pichhe ek parchhain thi us ne hath hilaya tha ya saya tha 
ek lakir dhuen ki thi ya KHushbu ki rang koi lahraya tha ya saya tha 
abhi jo mere pas tha shayad apna tha shayad koi paraya tha ya saya tha 
nind se jaga hun to baiTha sochta hun KHwab mein us ko paya tha ya saya tha

ġhair kī ḳhātir se tum yāroñ ko dhamkāne lage aa ke mere rū-ba-rū talvār chamkāne lage 
jī meñ kyā guzrā thā kal jo aap rakh qabze pe haath ḳhuub sā ghūre mujhe aur tan ke bal khāne lage 
dil talab mujh se kiyā maiñ ne kahā hāzir nahīñ ye ġhazab dekho machal kar paañv phailāne lage 
qatl kar kar ye nahīñ ma.alūm kyā guzrā ḳhayāl dekh vo bismil mujhe kuchh haif sā khāne lage 
yaar mujh ko dekh zā ronā to un sā hijr meñ mushfiqāna kuchh nasīhat jabki farmāne lage 
jal ke 'rañgīñ' maiñ ne ye misra.a 'tajallī' kā paḌhā ''dil ko samjhāo mujhe kyā aa ke samjhāne lage'' 
ghair ki KHatir se tum yaron ko dhamkane lage aa ke mere ru-ba-ru talwar chamkane lage 
ji mein kya guzra tha kal jo aap rakh qabze pe hath KHub sa ghure mujhe aur tan ke bal khane lage 
dil talab mujh se kiya main ne kaha hazir nahin ye ghazab dekho machal kar panw phailane lage 
qatl kar kar ye nahin malum kya guzra KHayal dekh wo bismil mujhe kuchh haif sa khane lage 
yar mujh ko dekh za rona to un sa hijr mein mushfiqana kuchh nasihat jabki farmane lage 
jal ke 'rangin' main ne ye misra 'tajalli' ka paDha dil ko samjhao mujhe kya aa ke samjhane lage

sabā dekh ik din idhar aan kar ke ye dil bhī paḌā hai gulistān kar ke 
yahī dil jo ik buuñd hai bahr-e-ġham kī Dubo degā sab shahr tūfān kar ke 
miyāñ dil ko is ā.ina-rū ke aage jo rakhnā to yak-laḳht hairān kar ke 
ḳhudā jaane kyā asliyat ġhair kī hai dikhe hai banī-nau-e-insān kar ke 
use ab raqīboñ meñ paate haiñ aksar rakhā jis ko ḳhud se bhī anjān kar ke 
dikhā deñge achchhā isī fasl-e-gul meñ garebān ko ham garebān kar ke 
hamāre to ik ghar bhī hai bhaa.ī majnūñ paḌe haiñ usī ko bayābān kar ke 
saba dekh ek din idhar aan kar ke ye dil bhi paDa hai gulistan kar ke 
yahi dil jo ek bund hai bahr-e-gham ki Dubo dega sab shahr tufan kar ke 
miyan dil ko is aaina-ru ke aage jo rakhna to yak-laKHt hairan kar ke 
KHuda jaane kya asliyat ghair ki hai dikhe hai bani-nau-e-insan kar ke 
use ab raqibon mein pate hain aksar rakha jis ko KHud se bhi anjaan kar ke 
dikha denge achchha isi fasl-e-gul mein gareban ko hum gareban kar ke 
hamare to ek ghar bhi hai bhai majnun paDe hain usi ko bayaban kar ke

ḳhema-e-ḳhvāb kī tanābeñ khol qāfila jā chukā hai āñkheñ khol 
ai zamīñ merā ḳhair-maqdam kar terā beTā huuñ apnī bāñheñ khol 
Duub jaa.eñ na phuul kī nabzeñ ai ḳhudā mausamoñ kī sāñseñ khol 
faash kar bhed do-jahāñoñ ke mujh pe sar-basta kā.enāteñ khol 
paḌ na jaa.e nagar meñ rasm-e-sukūt qufl-e-lab toḌ de zabāneñ khol 
KHema-e-KHwab ki tanaben khol qafila ja chuka hai aankhen khol 
ai zamin mera KHair-maqdam kar tera beTa hun apni banhen khol 
Dub jaen na phul ki nabzen ai KHuda mausamon ki sansen khol 
fash kar bhed do-jahanon ke mujh pe sar-basta kaenaten khol 
paD na jae nagar mein rasm-e-sukut qufl-e-lab toD de zabanen khol

tere qadmoñ kī aahaT ko tarsā huuñ maiñ bhī terā bhūlā huā ik rastā huuñ 
biite lamhoñ ke jhoñke jab aate haiñ pal do pal ko maiñ phir se khil uThtā huuñ 
mujh se muzhda na.ī rutoñ kā pāoge yaaro maiñ is peḌ kā antim pattā huuñ 
shāyad tum bhī ab na mujhe pahchān sako ab maiñ ḳhud ko apne jaisā lagtā huuñ 
aaj ke kaale saa.e kal tak phaileñge mere bachcho maiñ is baat se Dartā huuñ 
tum bhī kaise DhūñD sakoge ab mujh ko maiñ ḳhud apne-āp se ojhal rahtā huuñ 
sāyoñ kī ḳhvāhish ne mujhe jalāyā hai ab maiñ in ke naam se tapne lagtā huuñ 
mujh se mil kar kis ko yaqīn ab aa.egā maiñ bhī terā TuuTā huā ik rishta huuñ 
tere qadmon ki aahaT ko tarsa hun main bhi tera bhula hua ek rasta hun 
bite lamhon ke jhonke jab aate hain pal do pal ko main phir se khil uThta hun 
mujh se muzhda nai ruton ka paoge yaro main is peD ka antim patta hun 
shayad tum bhi ab na mujhe pahchan sako ab main KHud ko apne jaisa lagta hun 
aaj ke kale sae kal tak phailenge mere bachcho main is baat se Darta hun 
tum bhi kaise DhunD sakoge ab mujh ko main KHud apne-ap se ojhal rahta hun 
sayon ki KHwahish ne mujhe jalaya hai ab main in ke nam se tapne lagta hun 
mujh se mil kar kis ko yaqin ab aaega main bhi tera TuTa hua ek rishta hun

jo nāravā thā us ko ravā karne aayā huuñ maiñ qarz dūsroñ kā adā karne aayā huuñ 
ik tāza-tar futūr mire sar meñ aur hai jo kar chukā huuñ us se sivā karne aayā huuñ 
ḳhud ik savāl hai mirā aanā hī is taraf ab kyā batāiye ki maiñ kyā karne aayā huuñ 
kahnī hai dūsroñ se alag maiñ ne koī baat maiñ kaam koī sab se judā karne aayā huuñ 
ik daaġh hai ki jis kā lagānā hai ab surāġh ik zaḳhm hai ki jis ko harā karne aayā huuñ 
anjām-e-kār dil kā ye darvāza toḌ kar maiñ saare qaidiyoñ ko rihā karne aayā huuñ 
rakhtā huuñ apnā aap bahut khīñch-tān kar chhoTā huuñ aur ḳhud ko baḌā karne aayā huuñ 
jo kar rahe haiñ aise hī karte raheñge sab maiñ to fuzūl chūn-o-charā karne aayā huuñ 
ḳhairāt kā mujhe koī lālach nahīñ 'zafar' maiñ is galī meñ sirf sadā karne aayā huuñ 
jo narawa tha us ko rawa karne aaya hun main qarz dusron ka ada karne aaya hun 
ek taza-tar futur mere sar mein aur hai jo kar chuka hun us se siwa karne aaya hun 
KHud ek sawal hai mera aana hi is taraf ab kya bataiye ki main kya karne aaya hun 
kahni hai dusron se alag main ne koi baat main kaam koi sab se juda karne aaya hun 
ek dagh hai ki jis ka lagana hai ab suragh ek zaKHm hai ki jis ko hara karne aaya hun 
anjam-e-kar dil ka ye darwaza toD kar main sare qaidiyon ko riha karne aaya hun 
rakhta hun apna aap bahut khinch-tan kar chhoTa hun aur KHud ko baDa karne aaya hun 
jo kar rahe hain aise hi karte rahenge sab main to fuzul chun-o-chara karne aaya hun 
KHairaat ka mujhe koi lalach nahin 'zafar' main is gali mein sirf sada karne aaya hun

aur koī jo sune ḳhuun ke aañsū ro.e achchhī lagtī haiñ magar ham ko tumhārī bāteñ 
ham mileñ yā na mileñ phir bhī kabhī ḳhvāboñ meñ muskurātī huī ā.eñgī hamārī bāteñ 
haa.e ab jin pe masarrat kā gumāñ hotā hai ashk ban jā.eñgī ik roz ye pyārī bāteñ 
yaad jab koī dilā.egā sar-e-shām tumheñ jagmagā uTTheñgī tāroñ meñ hamārī bāteñ 
un ko maġhrūr banāyā hai baḌī mushkil se ā.īna ban ke raheñ kaash hamārī bāteñ 
milte milte yūñhī begāne se ho jā.eñge dekhte dekhte kho jā.eñgī saarī bāteñ 
vo bahut socheñ taḌap uTThīñ magar ai 'bāqir' yaad aa.iiñ to na aa.iiñ ye tumhārī bāteñ 
aur koi jo sune KHun ke aansu roe achchhi lagti hain magar hum ko tumhaari baaten 
hum milen ya na milen phir bhi kabhi KHwabon mein muskuraati hui aaengi hamari baaten 
hae ab jin pe masarrat ka guman hota hai ashk ban jaengi ek roz ye pyari baaten 
yaad jab koi dilaega sar-e-sham tumhein jagmaga uTThengi taron mein hamari baaten 
un ko maghrur banaya hai baDi mushkil se aaina ban ke rahen kash hamari baaten 
milte milte yunhi begane se ho jaenge dekhte dekhte kho jaengi sari baaten 
wo bahut sochen taDap uTThin magar ai 'baqir' yaad aain to na aain ye tumhaari baaten

be-tarah aap kī yādoñ ne satāyā hai mujhe chāndnī rātoñ ne aa aa ke rulāyā hai mujhe 
aap se koī shikāyat na zamāne se gila mere hālāt ne majbūr banāyā hai mujhe 
aaj phir auj pe hai apnā muqaddar shāyad aaj phir aap ne nazroñ se girāyā hai mujhe 
apne begāne hue aur zamāna dushman be-dimāġhī ne mirī din ye dikhāyā hai mujhe 
kaun se dasht meñ le aayā mujhe merā junūñ muḌ ke dekhā hai to kuchh ḳhauf sā aayā hai mujhe 
phir hue aaj baham jām-e-gul o naġhma-e-shab phir mire maazī ne 'mumtāz' bulāyā hai mujhe 
be-tarah aap ki yaadon ne sataya hai mujhe chandni raaton ne aa aa ke rulaya hai mujhe 
aap se koi shikayat na zamane se gila mere haalat ne majbur banaya hai mujhe 
aaj phir auj pe hai apna muqaddar shayad aaj phir aap ne nazron se giraya hai mujhe 
apne begane hue aur zamana dushman be-dimaghi ne meri din ye dikhaya hai mujhe 
kaun se dasht mein le aaya mujhe mera junun muD ke dekha hai to kuchh KHauf sa aaya hai mujhe 
phir hue aaj baham jam-e-gul o naghma-e-shab phir mere mazi ne 'mumtaz' bulaya hai mujhe

us ko takte bhī nahīñ the pahle ham bhī ḳhuddār the kitne pahle 
us ko dekhā to ye mahsūs huā ham bahut duur the ḳhud se pahle 
dil nazar aate haiñ ab āñkhoñ meñ kitne gahre the ye chashme pahle 
kho.e rahte haiñ ab us kī dhun meñ jis ko takte na the pahle pahle 
ham ko pahchān liyā karte the ye tire shahr ke raste pahle 
ab ujāloñ meñ bhaTak jaate haiñ vo samjhāte the añdhere pahle 
ab na alfāz na ehsās na yaad itne muflis na hue the pahle 
rañg ke jaal meñ aate na kabhī paas se dekh jo lete pahle 
garm hañgāma-e-kāġhaz hai yahāñ be-mahak phuul kahāñ the pahle 
us ko takte bhi nahin the pahle hum bhi KHuddar the kitne pahle 
us ko dekha to ye mahsus hua hum bahut dur the KHud se pahle 
dil nazar aate hain ab aankhon mein kitne gahre the ye chashme pahle 
khoe rahte hain ab us ki dhun mein jis ko takte na the pahle pahle 
hum ko pahchan liya karte the ye tere shahr ke raste pahle 
ab ujalon mein bhaTak jate hain wo samjhate the andhere pahle 
ab na alfaz na ehsas na yaad itne muflis na hue the pahle 
rang ke jal mein aate na kabhi pas se dekh jo lete pahle 
garm hangama-e-kaghaz hai yahan be-mahak phul kahan the pahle

baat ye hai ki koī baat purānī bhī nahīñ aur is ḳhaak meñ ab koī nishānī bhī nahīñ 
ye to zāhir meñ tamavvuj thā balā kā lekin ye badan merā jahāñ koī ravānī bhī nahīñ 
yā to ik mauj-e-balā-ḳhez hai merī ḳhātir yā ki mashkīza-e-jāñ meñ kahīñ paanī bhī nahīñ 
baat ye hai ki sabhī bhaa.ī mire dushman haiñ mas.ala ye hai ki maiñ yūsuf-e-sānī bhī nahīñ 
sach to ye hai ki mire paas hī dirham kam haiñ varna is shahr meñ is darja girānī bhī nahīñ 
saare kirdār haiñ añgusht-ba-dandāñ mujh meñ ab to kahne ko mire paas kahānī bhī nahīñ 
ek benām-o-nasab sach mirā iz.hār huā varna alfāz meñ vo sail-e-ma.ānī bhī nahīñ 
baat ye hai ki koi baat purani bhi nahin aur is KHak mein ab koi nishani bhi nahin 
ye to zahir mein tamawwuj tha bala ka lekin ye badan mera jahan koi rawani bhi nahin 
ya to ek mauj-e-bala-KHez hai meri KHatir ya ki mashkiza-e-jaan mein kahin pani bhi nahin 
baat ye hai ki sabhi bhai mere dushman hain masala ye hai ki main yusuf-e-sani bhi nahin 
sach to ye hai ki mere pas hi dirham kam hain warna is shahr mein is darja girani bhi nahin 
sare kirdar hain angusht-ba-dandan mujh mein ab to kahne ko mere pas kahani bhi nahin 
ek benam-o-nasab sach mera izhaar hua warna alfaz mein wo sail-e-maani bhi nahin

kaun bhañvar meñ mallāhoñ se ab takrār karegā ab to qismat se hī koī dariyā paar karegā 
saarā shahr hī tārīkī par yuuñ ḳhāmosh rahā to kaun charāġh jalāne ke paidā āsār karegā 
jab us kā kirdār tumhāre sach kī zad meñ aayā likhne vaalā shahr kī kaalī har dīvār karegā 
jaane kaun sī dhun meñ tere shahr meñ aa nikle haiñ dil tujh se milne kī ḳhvāhish ab sau baar karegā 
dil meñ terā qayām thā lekin ab ye kise ḳhabar thī dukh bhī apne hone par itnā isrār karegā 
kaun bhanwar mein mallahon se ab takrar karega ab to qismat se hi koi dariya par karega 
sara shahr hi tariki par yun KHamosh raha to kaun charagh jalane ke paida aasar karega 
jab us ka kirdar tumhaare sach ki zad mein aaya likhne wala shahr ki kali har diwar karega 
jaane kaun si dhun mein tere shahr mein aa nikle hain dil tujh se milne ki KHwahish ab sau bar karega 
dil mein tera qayam tha lekin ab ye kise KHabar thi dukh bhi apne hone par itna israr karega

behtar kī gunjā.ish baaqī rah jaatī hai kamī kahīñ poshīda koī rah jaatī hai 
man-chāhī tasvīr banāne meñ mujh se hunar-varī meñ kuchh kotāhī rah jaatī hai 
sailāb aa jaane par us bastī kī saarī puḳhta-kārī kachchī rah jaatī hai 
banñe vaalī baat vahī hotī hai vo jo bante bante yaksar bantī rah jaatī hai 
rah jaatī hai aate aate aatī saa.at honī hote hote hotī rah jaatī hai 
vaqt guzar jaatā hai lekin dil kī ranjish dil meñ baiThī kī baiThī hī rah jaatī hai 
chalte rah jaate haiñ roz o shab ke dhande gañgā ulTī sīdhī bahtī rah jaatī hai 
phāñk liye jaane ko ḳhaak masāfat kī rāhoñ par hī chhānī-phaTkī rah jaatī hai 
aa jaatī hai birhā aur dulhniyāñ chhat par apne giile baal sukhātī rah jaatī hai 
behtar ki gunjaish baqi rah jati hai kami kahin poshida koi rah jati hai 
man-chahi taswir banane mein mujh se hunar-wari mein kuchh kotahi rah jati hai 
sailab aa jaane par us basti ki sari puKHta-kari kachchi rah jati hai 
banne wali baat wahi hoti hai wo jo bante bante yaksar banti rah jati hai 
rah jati hai aate aate aati saat honi hote hote hoti rah jati hai 
waqt guzar jata hai lekin dil ki ranjish dil mein baiThi ki baiThi hi rah jati hai 
chalte rah jate hain roz o shab ke dhande ganga ulTi sidhi bahti rah jati hai 
phank liye jaane ko KHak masafat ki rahon par hi chhani-phaTki rah jati hai 
aa jati hai birha aur dulhniyan chhat par apne gile baal sukhati rah jati hai

koī rishta na ho phir bhī rishte bahut aap apne nahīñ aap apne bahut 
raaz rakhte na ham is ta.alluq ko gar log rote bahut log hañste bahut 
dil kī tanhā.iyoñ kā mudāvā nahīñ ghuum kar ham ne dekhe haiñ mele bahut 
is hī buniyād par kyuuñ na mil jaa.eñ ham aap tanhā bahut ham akele bahut 
jab thī manzil nazar meñ to rasta thā ek gum huī hai jo manzil to raste bahut 
ḳhvāb tābīr ke moḌ par kho ga.e yuuñ ki tābīr-dāñ paḌ ke so.e bahut 
peḌ ko kāTne vaale dekheñ zarā peḌ par haiñ bane āshiyāne bahut 
Dūbne vaale shāyad ye batlā sakeñ Dūbne ko sahāre ke tinke bahut 
koi rishta na ho phir bhi rishte bahut aap apne nahin aap apne bahut 
raaz rakhte na hum is talluq ko gar log rote bahut log hanste bahut 
dil ki tanhaiyon ka mudawa nahin ghum kar hum ne dekhe hain mele bahut 
is hi buniyaad par kyun na mil jaen hum aap tanha bahut hum akele bahut 
jab thi manzil nazar mein to rasta tha ek gum hui hai jo manzil to raste bahut 
KHwab tabir ke moD par kho gae yun ki tabir-dan paD ke soe bahut 
peD ko kaTne wale dekhen zara peD par hain bane aashiyane bahut 
Dubne wale shayad ye batla saken Dubne ko sahaare ke tinke bahut

ik aag dekhtā thā aur jal rahā thā maiñ vo shaam aa.ī magar haath mal rahā thā maiñ 
ye umr kaise guzārī bas itnā yaad hai ab udaas raat ke sahrā pe chal rahā thā maiñ 
bas ek zid thī so ḳhud ko tabāh kartā rahā nasīb us ke ki phir bhī sambhal rahā thā maiñ 
bharī thī us ne rag-o-pai meñ barf kī ThanDak so ek barf kī sūrat pighal rahā thā maiñ 
ḳhudā-sifat thā vo lamha ki jis meñ gum ho kar zamīñ se āsmāñ ke dukh badal rahā thā maiñ 
maiñ ek ahd thā ik ahd kī alāmat thā hazār chehroñ meñ din raat Dhal rahā thā maiñ 
bas ek abr ke saa.e ne aa liyā mujh ko azaab oḌh ke ghar se nikal rahā thā maiñ 
ek aag dekhta tha aur jal raha tha main wo sham aai magar hath mal raha tha main 
ye umr kaise guzari bas itna yaad hai ab udas raat ke sahra pe chal raha tha main 
bas ek zid thi so KHud ko tabah karta raha nasib us ke ki phir bhi sambhal raha tha main 
bhari thi us ne rag-o-pai mein barf ki ThanDak so ek barf ki surat pighal raha tha main 
KHuda-sifat tha wo lamha ki jis mein gum ho kar zamin se aasman ke dukh badal raha tha main 
main ek ahd tha ek ahd ki alamat tha hazar chehron mein din raat Dhal raha tha main 
bas ek abr ke sae ne aa liya mujh ko azab oDh ke ghar se nikal raha tha main

koī soche na hameñ koī pukārā na kare ham kahīñ haiñ ki nahīñ haiñ koī charchā na kare 
raat afsūñ hai kahīñ kā nahīñ rahne detī din ko so.e na koī raat ko jaagā na kare 
ham nikal aa.e haiñ ab dhuup meñ jalne ke liye koī bādal nahīñ bheje koī saaya na kare 
an-ginat āñkhoñ meñ ham jalte rahe bujhte rahe ab bhale ḳhvāb hamārā koī dekhā na kare 
ham ne ik shahr basā rakkhā hai dīvāroñ meñ kaam jo dil ne kiyā chashm-e-tamāshā na kare 
koī ab jā ke zarā dekhe to us miTTī ko aise sairāb kiyā hai koī dariyā na kare 
go farāmoshī kī takmīl huā chāhtī hai phir bhī kah do ki hameñ yaad vo aayā na kare 
ham use ranj-e-tamannā se to bhar sakte haiñ aur ye dil hai ki ab koī taqāzā na kare 
vaar karnā hai agar ham pe to vo khul kar aa.e aur bhūle se bhī ye kaam vo tanhā na kare 
koi soche na hamein koi pukara na kare hum kahin hain ki nahin hain koi charcha na kare 
raat afsun hai kahin ka nahin rahne deti din ko soe na koi raat ko jaga na kare 
hum nikal aae hain ab dhup mein jalne ke liye koi baadal nahin bheje koi saya na kare 
an-ginat aankhon mein hum jalte rahe bujhte rahe ab bhale KHwab hamara koi dekha na kare 
hum ne ek shahr basa rakkha hai diwaron mein kaam jo dil ne kiya chashm-e-tamasha na kare 
koi ab ja ke zara dekhe to us miTTi ko aise sairab kiya hai koi dariya na kare 
go faramoshi ki takmil hua chahti hai phir bhi kah do ki hamein yaad wo aaya na kare 
hum use ranj-e-tamanna se to bhar sakte hain aur ye dil hai ki ab koi taqaza na kare 
war karna hai agar hum pe to wo khul kar aae aur bhule se bhi ye kaam wo tanha na kare

ghar lauTte haiñ jab bhī koī yaar gañvā kar ro lete haiñ ham-zād ko siine se lagā kar 
kis ko thī ḳhabar is meñ taḌaḳh jā.egā dil bhī ham ḳhush the bahut sehn meñ dīvār uThā kar 
kuchh aur bhī baḌh jaatī haiñ hairāniyāñ dil kī sau baar kahā hai ki na ā.īna takā kar 
sāvan meñ to ḳhud-sozī bhī ho jaatī hai nākām relā sā guzar jaatā hai sab azm bujhā kar 
maiñ tark-e-ta.alluq pe bhī āmāda huuñ lekin tū bhī to mirā qarz-e-ġham-e-hijr adā kar 
ye tai hai ki ab ham ne nahīñ milnā dobāra ye baat magar aur kisī se na kahā kar 
is kār-e-mohabbat meñ to hotā hai ḳhasāra ai sāhab-e-zar tū ye tijārat na kyā kar 
ik shahad sā ghultā chalā jaatā hai dahan meñ letā huuñ maiñ jab saañs tirī saañs milā kar 
ghar lauTte hain jab bhi koi yar ganwa kar ro lete hain ham-zad ko sine se laga kar 
kis ko thi KHabar is mein taDaKH jaega dil bhi hum KHush the bahut sehn mein diwar uTha kar 
kuchh aur bhi baDh jati hain hairaniyan dil ki sau bar kaha hai ki na aaina taka kar 
sawan mein to KHud-sozi bhi ho jati hai nakaam rela sa guzar jata hai sab azm bujha kar 
main tark-e-talluq pe bhi aamada hun lekin tu bhi to mera qarz-e-gham-e-hijr ada kar 
ye tai hai ki ab hum ne nahin milna dobara ye baat magar aur kisi se na kaha kar 
is kar-e-mohabbat mein to hota hai KHasara ai sahab-e-zar tu ye tijarat na kya kar 
ek shahad sa ghulta chala jata hai dahan mein leta hun main jab sans teri sans mila kar

itne nazdīk se ā.īne ko dekhā na karo ruḳh-e-zebā kī latāfat ko baḌhāyā na karo 
dard o āzār kā tum mere mudāvā na karo rahne do apnī masīhā.ī kā daavā na karo 
husn ke sāmne iz.hār-e-tamannā na karo ishq ik raaz hai is raaz ko ifshā na karo 
apnī mahfil meñ mujhe ġhaur se dekhā na karo maiñ tamāshā huuñ magar tum to tamāshā na karo 
saarī duniyā tumheñ kah degī tumhīñ ho qātil dekho mujh ko ġhalat andāz se dekhā na karo 
kaise mumkin hai ki ham donoñ bichhaḌ jā.eñge itnī gahrā.ī se har baat ko sochā na karo 
tum pe ilzām na aa jaa.e safar meñ koī rāsta kitnā hī dushvār ho Thahrā na karo 
vo koī shāḳh ho mizrāb ho yā dil ho 'azīz' TūTne vaalī kisī shai kā bharosā na karo 
itne nazdik se aaine ko dekha na karo ruKH-e-zeba ki latafat ko baDhaya na karo 
dard o aazar ka tum mere mudawa na karo rahne do apni masihai ka dawa na karo 
husn ke samne izhaar-e-tamanna na karo ishq ek raaz hai is raaz ko ifsha na karo 
apni mahfil mein mujhe ghaur se dekha na karo main tamasha hun magar tum to tamasha na karo 
sari duniya tumhein kah degi tumhin ho qatil dekho mujh ko ghalat andaz se dekha na karo 
kaise mumkin hai ki hum donon bichhaD jaenge itni gahrai se har baat ko socha na karo 
tum pe ilzam na aa jae safar mein koi rasta kitna hi dushwar ho Thahra na karo 
wo koi shaKH ho mizrab ho ya dil ho 'aziz' TuTne wali kisi shai ka bharosa na karo

kyā sune koī zabānī merī aur phir vo bhī kahānī merī 
shahr sahrā kī tarah lagtā hai rā.egāñ naql-e-makānī merī 
ek chehra mire chehre se alag ek tasvīr purānī merī 
maiñ ki dariyā thā jo ab sākit huuñ kho ga.ī mujh meñ ravānī merī 
raat shabnam meñ bahut bhīgā thā dekh ab sho.ala-fishānī merī 
kya sune koi zabani meri aur phir wo bhi kahani meri 
shahr sahra ki tarah lagta hai raegan naql-e-makani meri 
ek chehra mere chehre se alag ek taswir purani meri 
main ki dariya tha jo ab sakit hun kho gai mujh mein rawani meri 
raat shabnam mein bahut bhiga tha dekh ab shoala-fishani meri

yahāñ rahne meñ dushvārī bahut hai yahī miTTī magar pyārī bahut hai 
havas se milte-julte ishq meñ ab junūñ kam hai adākārī bahut hai 
chalo ab ishq kā hī khel kheleñ idhar kuchh din se bekārī bahut hai 
maiñ saa.e ko uThānā chāhtā huuñ uThā letā magar bhārī bahut hai 
idhar bhī ḳhāmushī kā shor barpā udhar sunte haiñ tayyārī bahut hai 
zabāñ se sach nikal jaatā hai aksar abhī ham meñ ye bīmārī bahut hai 
yahan rahne mein dushwari bahut hai yahi miTTi magar pyari bahut hai 
hawas se milte-julte ishq mein ab junun kam hai adakari bahut hai 
chalo ab ishq ka hi khel khelen idhar kuchh din se bekari bahut hai 
main sae ko uThana chahta hun uTha leta magar bhaari bahut hai 
idhar bhi KHamushi ka shor barpa udhar sunte hain tayyari bahut hai 
zaban se sach nikal jata hai aksar abhi hum mein ye bimari bahut hai

lazzat-e-dard-e-jigar yaad aa.ī phir tirī pahlī nazar yaad aa.ī 
dard ne jab koī karvaT badlī zindagī bār-e-digar yaad aa.ī 
paḌ ga.ī jab tire dāman pe nazar azmat-e-dīda-e-tar yaad aa.ī 
apnā khoyā huā dil yaad aayā un kī maḳhmūr nazar yaad aa.ī 
dair o kaaba se jo ho kar guzre dost kī rāhguzar yaad aa.ī 
dekh kar us ruḳh-e-zebā pe naqāb apnī gustāḳh nazar yaad aa.ī 
jab bhī tāmīr-e-nasheman kī 'qamar' yūrish-e-barq-o-sharar yaad aa.ī 
lazzat-e-dard-e-jigar yaad aai phir teri pahli nazar yaad aai 
dard ne jab koi karwaT badli zindagi bar-e-digar yaad aai 
paD gai jab tere daman pe nazar azmat-e-dida-e-tar yaad aai 
apna khoya hua dil yaad aaya un ki maKHmur nazar yaad aai 
dair o kaba se jo ho kar guzre dost ki rahguzar yaad aai 
dekh kar us ruKH-e-zeba pe naqab apni gustaKH nazar yaad aai 
jab bhi tamir-e-nasheman ki 'qamar' yurish-e-barq-o-sharar yaad aai

munāf.a mushtarak hai aur ḳhasāre ek jaise haiñ ki ham donoñ kī qismat ke sitāre ek jaise haiñ 
maiñ ik chhoTā sā afsar huuñ vo ik moTā sā ''mil-owner'' magar donoñ ke income goshvāre ek jaise haiñ 
ise zo.af-e-basīrat use zo.af-e-basārat hai hamāre dīda-var saare ke saare ek jaise haiñ 
mutton aur daal kī qīmat barābar ho ga.ī jab se yaqīñ aayā ki donoñ meñ ''harāre'' ek jaise haiñ 
jahāñ bhar ke siyāsī dañgloñ meñ ham ne dekhā hai ''anūkī'' ik se ik ūñchā hai ''jhāre'' ek jaise haiñ 
vo thāna ho shifā-ḳhāna ho yā phir Dāk-ḳhāna ho rifāh-e-ām ke saare idāre ek jaise haiñ 
surūr-e-jāñ-fazā detī hai āġhosh-e-vatan sab ko ki jaise bhī hoñ bachche maañ ko pyāre ek jaise haiñ 
balā kā farq hai london kī gorī aur kaalī meñ magar donoñ kī āñkhoñ meñ ishāre ek jaise haiñ 
har ik begam agarche munfarid hai apnī saj-dhaj meñ magar jitne bhī shauhar haiñ bichāre ek jaise haiñ 
koī ḳhush-zauq hī 'shāhid' ye nukta jaan saktā hai ki mere sher aur naḳhre tumhāre ek jaise haiñ 
gumāñ hotā hai 'shāhid' radio par sun ke mausīqī ki pakke raag aur namkīñ ġharāre ek jaise haiñ 
munafa mushtarak hai aur KHasare ek jaise hain ki hum donon ki qismat ke sitare ek jaise hain 
main ek chhoTa sa afsar hun wo ek moTa sa mil-owner magar donon ke income goshware ek jaise hain 
ise zoaf-e-basirat use zoaf-e-basarat hai hamare dida-war sare ke sare ek jaise hain 
mutton aur dal ki qimat barabar ho gai jab se yaqin aaya ki donon mein harare ek jaise hain 
jahan bhar ke siyasi danglon mein hum ne dekha hai anuki ek se ek uncha hai jhaare ek jaise hain 
wo thana ho shifa-KHana ho ya phir Dak-KHana ho rifah-e-am ke sare idare ek jaise hain 
surur-e-jaan-faza deti hai aaghosh-e-watan sab ko ki jaise bhi hon bachche man ko pyare ek jaise hain 
bala ka farq hai london ki gori aur kali mein magar donon ki aankhon mein ishaare ek jaise hain 
har ek begam agarche munfarid hai apni saj-dhaj mein magar jitne bhi shauhar hain bichaare ek jaise hain 
koi KHush-zauq hi 'shahid' ye nukta jaan sakta hai ki mere sher aur naKHre tumhaare ek jaise hain 
guman hota hai 'shahid' radio par sun ke mausiqi ki pakke rag aur namkin gharare ek jaise hain

dūd-e-dil se hai ye tārīkī mire ġham-ḳhāna meñ sham.a hai ik sozan-e-gum-gashta is kāshāna meñ 
maiñ huuñ vo ḳhisht-e-kuhan muddat se is vīrāne meñ barsoñ masjid meñ rahā barsoñ rahā mai-ḳhāna meñ 
maiñ vo kaifī huuñ ki paanī ho to ban jaa.e sharāb josh-e-kaifiyyat se merī ḳhaak ke paimāna meñ 
barq-e-ḳhirman-soz dānā.ī hai nā-fahmī tirī varna kyā kyā lahlahāte khet haiñ har daana meñ 
kis nazākat se hai dekho ittihād-e-husn-o-ishq zulf vaañ shāne ne khīñchī dard hai yaañ shāna meñ 
vahshat o nā-āshnā.ī mastī o begānagī yā tirī āñkhoñ meñ dekhī yā tire dīvāna meñ 
ishq ko nashv-o-numā manzūr hai kab varna sabz tuḳhm-e-ashk-e-sham.a ho ḳhākistar-e-parvāna meñ 
hosh kā da.avā hai behoshoñ ko zer-e-āsmāñ ḳhum-nashīñ misl-e-falātūñ sab haiñ is ḳhum-ḳhāna meñ 
pattharoñ meñ Thokareñ khātā hai nāhaq sail-e-āb pūchho kyā le jā.egā aa kar mire ġham-ḳhāna meñ 
ek patthar pūjne ko shaiḳh-jī ka.abe ga.e 'zauq' har but qābil-e-bosa hai is but-ḳhāna meñ 
dud-e-dil se hai ye tariki mere gham-KHana mein shama hai ek sozan-e-gum-gashta is kashana mein 
main hun wo KHisht-e-kuhan muddat se is virane mein barson masjid mein raha barson raha mai-KHana mein 
main wo kaifi hun ki pani ho to ban jae sharab josh-e-kaifiyyat se meri KHak ke paimana mein 
barq-e-KHirman-soz danai hai na-fahmi teri warna kya kya lahlahate khet hain har dana mein 
kis nazakat se hai dekho ittihad-e-husn-o-ishq zulf wan shane ne khinchi dard hai yan shana mein 
wahshat o na-ashnai masti o beganagi ya teri aankhon mein dekhi ya tere diwana mein 
ishq ko nashw-o-numa manzur hai kab warna sabz tuKHm-e-ashk-e-shama ho KHakistar-e-parwana mein 
hosh ka dawa hai behoshon ko zer-e-asman KHum-nashin misl-e-falatun sab hain is KHum-KHana mein 
pattharon mein Thokaren khata hai nahaq sail-e-ab puchho kya le jaega aa kar mere gham-KHana mein 
ek patthar pujne ko shaiKH-ji kabe gae 'zauq' har but qabil-e-bosa hai is but-KHana mein

zamīñ pe eḌī ragaḌ ke paanī nikāltā huuñ maiñ tishnagī ke na.e ma.ānī nikāltā huuñ 
vahī barāmad karūñgā jo chiiz kaam kī hai zabāñ ke bātin se be-zabānī nikāltā huuñ 
falak pe likhtā huuñ ḳhāk-e-ḳhvābīda ke manāzir zamīn se rañg-e-āsmānī nikāltā huuñ 
kabhī kabūtar kī tarah lagtā hai abr mujh ko kabhī havā se koī kahānī nikāltā huuñ 
bahut zarūrī hai merā apnī hadoñ meñ rahnā so bahr se ḳhud hī be-karānī nikāltā huuñ 
kabhī mulāqāt ho mayassar to is se pahle dimāġh se saarī ḳhush-gumānī nikāltā huuñ 
jo chheḌtā huuñ nayā koī naġhma-e-mohabbat to sāz-e-dil se dhuneñ purānī nikāltā huuñ 
koī Thahar kar bhī dekhnā chāhtā huuñ manzar isī liye tab.a se ravānī nikāltā huuñ 
'zafar' mire sāmne Thahartā nahīñ hai koī to apne paikar se apnā saanī nikāltā huuñ 
zamin pe eDi ragaD ke pani nikalta hun main tishnagi ke nae maani nikalta hun 
wahi baramad karunga jo chiz kaam ki hai zaban ke baatin se be-zabani nikalta hun 
falak pe likhta hun KHak-e-KHwabida ke manazir zamin se rang-e-asmani nikalta hun 
kabhi kabutar ki tarah lagta hai abr mujh ko kabhi hawa se koi kahani nikalta hun 
bahut zaruri hai mera apni hadon mein rahna so bahr se KHud hi be-karani nikalta hun 
kabhi mulaqat ho mayassar to is se pahle dimagh se sari KHush-gumani nikalta hun 
jo chheDta hun naya koi naghma-e-mohabbat to saz-e-dil se dhunen purani nikalta hun 
koi Thahar kar bhi dekhna chahta hun manzar isi liye taba se rawani nikalta hun 
'zafar' mere samne Thaharta nahin hai koi to apne paikar se apna sani nikalta hun

maut se aage soch ke aanā phir jī lenā chhoTī chhoTī bātoñ meñ dilchaspī lenā 
narm nazar se chhūnā manzar kī saḳhtī ko tund havā se chehre kī shādābī lenā 
jazboñ ke do ghūñT aqīdoñ ke do luqme aage soch kā sahrā hai kuchh khā pī lenā 
mahñge saste daam hazāroñ naam ye jīvan soch samajh kar chiiz koī achchhī sī lenā 
āvāzoñ ke shahr se baabā kyā milnā hai apne apne hisse kī ḳhāmoshī lenā 
dil par sau rāheñ kholīñ inkār ne jis ke 'sāz' ab us kā naam tashakkur se hī lenā 
maut se aage soch ke aana phir ji lena chhoTi chhoTi baaton mein dilchaspi lena 
narm nazar se chhuna manzar ki saKHti ko tund hawa se chehre ki shadabi lena 
jazbon ke do ghunT aqidon ke do luqme aage soch ka sahra hai kuchh kha pi lena 
mahnge saste dam hazaron nam ye jiwan soch samajh kar chiz koi achchhi si lena 
aawazon ke shahr se baba kya milna hai apne apne hisse ki KHamoshi lena 
dil par sau rahen kholin inkar ne jis ke 'saz' ab us ka nam tashakkur se hi lena

ek kitāb sirhāne rakh dī ek charāġh sitārā kiyā mālik is tanhā.ī meñ tū ne kitnā ḳhayāl hamārā kiyā 
ye to bas ik koshish sī thī pahle pyaar meñ rahne kī sach pūchho to ham logoñ meñ kis ne ishq dobāra kiyā 
chand adhūre kāmoñ ne kuchh vaqt girafta logoñ ne din purze purze kar Daalā raat ko paara paara kiyā 
dil ko ik sūrat bhaa.ī thī is amboh meñ par ham ne jaane is afrā-tafrī meñ kis kī samt ishāra kiyā 
sar par taaj kī sūrat dhar dī us ne īñdhan kī gaThrī ishq ne kaise ḳhush-qismat ko shaah se lakaḌhārā kiyā 
sardī kī aamad thī lekin sāvan kī rut lauT aa.ī bujhte bujhte ik vahshat meñ aañkh ne rañj dobāra kiyā 
ek kitab sirhane rakh di ek charagh sitara kiya malik is tanhai mein tu ne kitna KHayal hamara kiya 
ye to bas ek koshish si thi pahle pyar mein rahne ki sach puchho to hum logon mein kis ne ishq dobara kiya 
chand adhure kaamon ne kuchh waqt girafta logon ne din purze purze kar Dala raat ko para para kiya 
dil ko ek surat bhai thi is amboh mein par hum ne jaane is afra-tafri mein kis ki samt ishaara kiya 
sar par taj ki surat dhar di us ne indhan ki gaThri ishq ne kaise KHush-qismat ko shah se lakaDhaara kiya 
sardi ki aamad thi lekin sawan ki rut lauT aai bujhte bujhte ek wahshat mein aankh ne ranj dobara kiya

vo jaane kitnā sar-e-bazm sharmsār huā sunā ke apnī ġhazal maiñ qusūr-vār huā 
hazār baar vo guzrā hai be-niyāzāna na jaane kyuuñ mujhe ab ke hī nā-gavār huā 
hazāroñ haath mirī samt ek saath uThe magar maiñ ek hī patthar meñ sañgsār huā 
maiñ terī yaad meñ gum thā ki khā gayā Thokar ye hādsa mirī rāhoñ meñ baar baar huā 
wo jaane kitna sar-e-bazm sharmsar hua suna ke apni ghazal main qusur-war hua 
hazar bar wo guzra hai be-niyazana na jaane kyun mujhe ab ke hi na-gawar hua 
hazaron hath meri samt ek sath uThe magar main ek hi patthar mein sangsar hua 
main teri yaad mein gum tha ki kha gaya Thokar ye hadsa meri rahon mein bar bar hua

un ke gesū sañvarte jaate haiñ hādse haiñ guzarte jaate haiñ 
vaqt suntā hai jin kī āvāzeñ haa.e vo log marte jaate haiñ 
Dūbne vaale mauj-e-tūfāñ se jaane kyā baat karte jaate haiñ 
yuuñ guzarte haiñ hijr ke lamhe jaise vo baat karte jaate haiñ 
hosh meñ aa rahe haiñ dīvāne kis ke jalve bikharte jaate haiñ 
kyā ḳhabar aaj kis kī yādoñ ke 'naqsh' dil par ubharte jaate haiñ 
un ke gesu sanwarte jate hain hadse hain guzarte jate hain 
waqt sunta hai jin ki aawazen hae wo log marte jate hain 
Dubne wale mauj-e-tufan se jaane kya baat karte jate hain 
yun guzarte hain hijr ke lamhe jaise wo baat karte jate hain 
hosh mein aa rahe hain diwane kis ke jalwe bikharte jate hain 
kya KHabar aaj kis ki yaadon ke 'naqsh' dil par ubharte jate hain

savāb kī duāoñ ne gunāh kar diyā mujhe baḌī adā se vaqt ne tabāh kar diyā mujhe 
munāfiqat ke shahr meñ sazā.eñ harf ko milīñ qalam kī raushnā.ī ne siyāh kar diyā mujhe 
mire liye har ik nazar malāmatoñ meñ Dhal ga.ī na kuchh kiyā to hairat-e-nigāh kar diyā mujhe 
ḳhushī jo ġham se mil ga.ī to phuul aag ho ga.e junūn-e-bandagī ne ḳhud-nigāh kar diyā mujhe 
tamām aks toḌ ke mirā savāl baañT ke ik aa.ine ke shahr kī sipāh kar diyā mujhe 
baḌā karam huzūr kā sunā gayā na haal bhī samā.atoñ meñ dafn ek aah kar diyā mujhe 
sawab ki duaon ne gunah kar diya mujhe baDi ada se waqt ne tabah kar diya mujhe 
munafiqat ke shahr mein sazaen harf ko milin qalam ki raushnai ne siyah kar diya mujhe 
mere liye har ek nazar malamaton mein Dhal gai na kuchh kiya to hairat-e-nigah kar diya mujhe 
KHushi jo gham se mil gai to phul aag ho gae junun-e-bandagi ne KHud-nigah kar diya mujhe 
tamam aks toD ke mera sawal banT ke ek aaine ke shahr ki sipah kar diya mujhe 
baDa karam huzur ka suna gaya na haal bhi samaaton mein dafn ek aah kar diya mujhe

agar qadam tire mai-kash kā laḌkhaḌā jaa.e to sham-e-mai-kada kī lau bhī thartharā jaa.e 
ab is maqām pe laa.ī hai zindagī mujh ko ki chāhtā huuñ tujhe bhī bhulā diyā jaa.e 
mujhe bhī yuuñ to baḌī aarzū hai jiine kī magar savāl ye hai kis tarah jiyā jaa.e 
ġham-e-hayāt se itnī bhī hai kahāñ fursat ki terī yaad meñ jī bhar ke ro liyā jaa.e 
unheñ bhī bhuul chukā huuñ maiñ ai ġham-e-daurāñ ab is ke ba.ad batā aur kyā kiyā jaa.e 
na jaane ab ye mujhe kyuuñ ḳhayāl aatā hai ki apne haal pe be-sāḳhta hañsā jaa.e 
gurez ishq se lāzim sahī magar 'rif.at' jo dil hī baat na maane to kyā kiyā jaa.e 
agar qadam tere mai-kash ka laDkhaDa jae to sham-e-mai-kada ki lau bhi tharthara jae 
ab is maqam pe lai hai zindagi mujh ko ki chahta hun tujhe bhi bhula diya jae 
mujhe bhi yun to baDi aarzu hai jine ki magar sawal ye hai kis tarah jiya jae 
gham-e-hayat se itni bhi hai kahan fursat ki teri yaad mein ji bhar ke ro liya jae 
unhen bhi bhul chuka hun main ai gham-e-dauran ab is ke baad bata aur kya kiya jae 
na jaane ab ye mujhe kyun KHayal aata hai ki apne haal pe be-saKHta hansa jae 
gurez ishq se lazim sahi magar 'rifat' jo dil hi baat na mane to kya kiya jae

zamīn bār-hā badlī zamāñ nahīñ badlā isī liye to ye merā jahāñ nahīñ badlā 
na aarzū koī badlī na merī mahrūmī badal gayā hai ravayya samāñ nahīñ badlā 
udāsī aaj bhī vaisī hai jaise pahle thī makīñ badalte rahe haiñ makāñ nahīñ badlā 
kabhī charāġh kabhī dil jalā ke dekh liyā zarā sā rañg to badlā dhuāñ nahīñ badlā 
parinde ab bhī chahakte haiñ gul mahakte haiñ sunā hai kuchh bhī abhī tak vahāñ nahīñ badlā 
diloñ kā dard kisī taur kam nahīñ hogā agar tasavvur-e-sūd-o-ziyāñ nahīñ badlā 
zamin bar-ha badli zaman nahin badla isi liye to ye mera jahan nahin badla 
na aarzu koi badli na meri mahrumi badal gaya hai rawayya saman nahin badla 
udasi aaj bhi waisi hai jaise pahle thi makin badalte rahe hain makan nahin badla 
kabhi charagh kabhi dil jala ke dekh liya zara sa rang to badla dhuan nahin badla 
parinde ab bhi chahakte hain gul mahakte hain suna hai kuchh bhi abhi tak wahan nahin badla 
dilon ka dard kisi taur kam nahin hoga agar tasawwur-e-sud-o-ziyan nahin badla

palaT kar ashk sū-e-chashm-e-tar aatā nahīñ hai ye vo bhaTkā musāfir hai jo ghar aatā nahīñ hai 
qafas ab āshiyāñ hai ḳhaak par likkhī hai rozī kabhī dil meñ ḳhayāl-e-bāl-o-par aatā nahīñ hai 
pahāḌoñ kī siyāhī se fuzūñ dil kī siyāhī vo husn ab apnī āñkhoñ ko nazar aatā nahīñ hai 
shajar barsoñ se naqsh-e-rā.egāñ ban kar khaḌe haiñ koī mausam ho shāḳhoñ meñ samar aatā nahīñ hai 
mire is avvalīñ ashk-e-mohabbat par nazar kar ye motī siip meñ phir umr-bhar aatā nahīñ hai 
koī qātil ravāñ hai merī shiryānoñ meñ 'ḳhurshīd' jo mujh ko qatl kartā hai nazar aatā nahīñ hai 
palaT kar ashk su-e-chashm-e-tar aata nahin hai ye wo bhaTka musafir hai jo ghar aata nahin hai 
qafas ab aashiyan hai KHak par likkhi hai rozi kabhi dil mein KHayal-e-baal-o-par aata nahin hai 
pahaDon ki siyahi se fuzun dil ki siyahi wo husn ab apni aankhon ko nazar aata nahin hai 
shajar barson se naqsh-e-raegan ban kar khaDe hain koi mausam ho shaKHon mein samar aata nahin hai 
mere is awwalin ashk-e-mohabbat par nazar kar ye moti sip mein phir umr-bhar aata nahin hai 
koi qatil rawan hai meri shiryanon mein 'KHurshid' jo mujh ko qatl karta hai nazar aata nahin hai

hameñ ḳhabar nahīñ kuchh kaun hai kahāñ koī hai hamesha shaad ho ābād ho jahāñ koī hai 
jagah na chhoḌe ki sail-e-balā hai tez bahut uḌā paḌā hī rahe ab jahāñ tahāñ koī hai 
fishār-e-girya kisī taur be-maqām nahīñ dayār-e-ġham hai kahīñ par pas-e-fuġhāñ koī hai 
vo koī ḳhadsha hai yā vahm-e-ḳhvāb hai ki ḳhayāl ki ho na ho mire dil apne darmiyāñ koī hai 
kabhī to aisā hai jaise kahīñ pe kuchh bhī nahīñ kabhī ye lagtā hai jaise yahāñ vahāñ koī hai 
kabhī kabhī to ye lagtā hai fard fard haiñ ham ye aur baat hamārā bhī kārvāñ koī hai 
kahīñ pahuñchnā nahīñ hai use magar phir bhī misāl-e-bād-e-bahārāñ ravāñ-davāñ koī hai 
huā hai apne safar se hazar se begāna vahīñ vahīñ pe nahīñ hai jahāñ jahāñ koī hai 
chhalak jo uThtī hai ye aañkh fart-e-vasl meñ bhī to sarḳhushī meñ abhī ranj-e-rā.egāñ koī hai 
shikast-e-dil hai to kyā rāh-e-ishq tark na kar ye dekh kyā kahīñ parvarda-e-ziyāñ koī hai 
ab us nigāh-e-fusūñ-kār kā qusūr hai kyā hameñ dikhāo agar zaḳhm kā nishāñ koī hai 
kahīñ pe aaj bhī vo ghar hai hañstā bastā huā ye vahm sā hai tire dil ko yā gumāñ koī hai 
javār-e-qarya-e-yārāñ meñ jā nikaltā huuñ ki jaise ab bhī vahīñ merā mehrbāñ koī hai 
hamein KHabar nahin kuchh kaun hai kahan koi hai hamesha shad ho aabaad ho jahan koi hai 
jagah na chhoDe ki sail-e-bala hai tez bahut uDa paDa hi rahe ab jahan tahan koi hai 
fishaar-e-girya kisi taur be-maqam nahin dayar-e-gham hai kahin par pas-e-fughan koi hai 
wo koi KHadsha hai ya wahm-e-KHwab hai ki KHayal ki ho na ho mere dil apne darmiyan koi hai 
kabhi to aisa hai jaise kahin pe kuchh bhi nahin kabhi ye lagta hai jaise yahan wahan koi hai 
kabhi kabhi to ye lagta hai fard fard hain hum ye aur baat hamara bhi karwan koi hai 
kahin pahunchna nahin hai use magar phir bhi misal-e-baad-e-bahaaran rawan-dawan koi hai 
hua hai apne safar se hazar se begana wahin wahin pe nahin hai jahan jahan koi hai 
chhalak jo uThti hai ye aankh fart-e-wasl mein bhi to sarKHushi mein abhi ranj-e-raegan koi hai 
shikast-e-dil hai to kya rah-e-ishq tark na kar ye dekh kya kahin parwarda-e-ziyan koi hai 
ab us nigah-e-fusun-kar ka qusur hai kya hamein dikhao agar zaKHm ka nishan koi hai 
kahin pe aaj bhi wo ghar hai hansta basta hua ye wahm sa hai tere dil ko ya guman koi hai 
jawar-e-qarya-e-yaran mein ja nikalta hun ki jaise ab bhi wahin mera mehrban koi hai

ham bichhaḌ ke tum se bādal kī tarah rote rahe thak ga.e to ḳhvāb kī dahlīz par sote rahe 
zindagī ne haath se ḳhanjar na rakhā ek pal ham qatīl-e-ġhamza-o-nāz-e-butāñ hote rahe 
lok lahje kā suhānā-pan suḳhan kī naġhmagī shahr kī ābādiyoñ ke shor meñ khote rahe 
kyuuñ matā-e-dil ke luT jaane kā koī ġham kare shahr-e-dillī meñ to aise vāqiye hote rahe 
surḳhiyāñ aḳhbār kī galiyoñ meñ ġhul kartī rahīñ log apne band kamroñ meñ paḌe sote rahe 
mahfiloñ meñ ham rafīq-o-rāz-dāñ samjhe ga.e ghar ke āñgan meñ magar tanhā.iyāñ bote rahe 
hum bichhaD ke tum se baadal ki tarah rote rahe thak gae to KHwab ki dahliz par sote rahe 
zindagi ne hath se KHanjar na rakha ek pal hum qatil-e-ghamza-o-naz-e-butan hote rahe 
lok lahje ka suhana-pan suKHan ki naghmagi shahr ki aabaadiyon ke shor mein khote rahe 
kyun mata-e-dil ke luT jaane ka koi gham kare shahr-e-dilli mein to aise waqiye hote rahe 
surKHiyan aKHbar ki galiyon mein ghul karti rahin log apne band kamron mein paDe sote rahe 
mahfilon mein hum rafiq-o-raaz-dan samjhe gae ghar ke aangan mein magar tanhaiyan bote rahe

kuchh nayā karne kī ḳhvāhish meñ purāne ho ga.e baal chāñdī ho ga.e bachche siyāne ho ga.e 
zindagī hañsne lagī parchhā.iyoñ ke shahr meñ chāñd kyā ubhrā ki sab manzar suhāne ho ga.e 
ret par to TuuT kar barse magar bastī pe kam is na.ī rut meñ to bādal bhī divāne ho ga.e 
bādaloñ ko dekh kar vo yaad kartā hai mujhe is kahānī ko sune kitne zamāne ho ga.e 
joḌtā rahtā huuñ aksar ek qisse ke varaq jis ke sab kirdār logo be-Thikāne ho ga.e 
'mīr' kā dīvān āñkheñ jism 'qā.em' kī ġhazal jaane kis ke naam mere sab ḳhazāne ho ga.e 
ret par ik nā-mukammal naqsh thā qurbat kā ḳhvāb fāsla baḌhne ke 'akmal' sau bahāne ho ga.e 
kuchh naya karne ki KHwahish mein purane ho gae baal chandi ho gae bachche siyane ho gae 
zindagi hansne lagi parchhaiyon ke shahr mein chand kya ubhra ki sab manzar suhane ho gae 
ret par to TuT kar barse magar basti pe kam is nai rut mein to baadal bhi diwane ho gae 
baadalon ko dekh kar wo yaad karta hai mujhe is kahani ko sune kitne zamane ho gae 
joDta rahta hun aksar ek qisse ke waraq jis ke sab kirdar logo be-Thikane ho gae 
'mir' ka diwan aankhen jism 'qaem' ki ghazal jaane kis ke nam mere sab KHazane ho gae 
ret par ek na-mukammal naqsh tha qurbat ka KHwab fasla baDhne ke 'akmal' sau bahane ho gae

vaada us māh-rū ke aane kā ye nasība siyāh-ḳhāne kā 
kah rahī hai nigāh-e-duz-dīda ruḳh badalne ko hai zamāne kā 
zarre zarre meñ be-hijāb haiñ vo jin ko daavā hai muñh chhupāne kā 
hāsil-e-umr hai shabāb magar ik yahī vaqt hai gañvāne kā 
chāndnī ḳhāmushī aur āḳhir shab aa ki hai vaqt dil lagāne kā 
hai qayāmat tire shabāb kā rañg rañg badlegā phir zamāne kā 
terī āñkhoñ kī ho na ho taqsīr naam rusvā sharāb-ḳhāne kā 
rah ga.e ban ke ham sarāpā ġham ye natīja hai dil lagāne kā 
jis kā har lafz hai sarāpā ġham maiñ huuñ unvān us fasāne kā 
us kī badlī huī nazar tauba yuuñ badaltā hai ruḳh zamāne kā 
dekhte haiñ hameñ vo chhup chhup kar parda rah jaa.e muñh chhupāne kā 
kar diyā ḳhūgar-e-sitam 'aḳhtar' ham pe ehsān hai zamāne kā 
wada us mah-ru ke aane ka ye nasiba siyah-KHane ka 
kah rahi hai nigah-e-duz-dida ruKH badalne ko hai zamane ka 
zarre zarre mein be-hijab hain wo jin ko dawa hai munh chhupane ka 
hasil-e-umr hai shabab magar ek yahi waqt hai ganwane ka 
chandni KHamushi aur aaKHir shab aa ki hai waqt dil lagane ka 
hai qayamat tere shabab ka rang rang badlega phir zamane ka 
teri aankhon ki ho na ho taqsir nam ruswa sharab-KHane ka 
rah gae ban ke hum sarapa gham ye natija hai dil lagane ka 
jis ka har lafz hai sarapa gham main hun unwan us fasane ka 
us ki badli hui nazar tauba yun badalta hai ruKH zamane ka 
dekhte hain hamein wo chhup chhup kar parda rah jae munh chhupane ka 
kar diya KHugar-e-sitam 'aKHtar' hum pe ehsan hai zamane ka

tuġhyānī se Dar jaatā huuñ jism ke paar utar jaatā huuñ 
āvāzoñ meñ bahte bahte ḳhāmoshī se mar jaatā huuñ 
band hī miltā hai darvāza raat ga.e jab ghar jaatā huuñ 
niind adhūrī rah jaatī hai sote sote Dar jaatā huuñ 
chāhe baad meñ maan bhī jā.ūñ pahlī baar mukar jaatā huuñ 
thoḌī sī bārish hotī hai kitnī jaldī bhar jaatā huuñ 
kitne dinoñ kī dahlīzoñ se raat ke saath guzar jaatā huuñ 
tughyani se Dar jata hun jism ke par utar jata hun 
aawazon mein bahte bahte KHamoshi se mar jata hun 
band hi milta hai darwaza raat gae jab ghar jata hun 
nind adhuri rah jati hai sote sote Dar jata hun 
chahe baad mein man bhi jaun pahli bar mukar jata hun 
thoDi si barish hoti hai kitni jaldi bhar jata hun 
kitne dinon ki dahlizon se raat ke sath guzar jata hun

rafta rafta ḳhatm qissa ho gayā honā hī thā vo bhī āḳhir mere jaisā ho gayā honā hī thā 
dasht-e-imkāñ meñ ye merā mashġhala bhī ḳhuub hai rauzan-e-dīvār chehrā ho gayā honā hī thā 
Dūbtā sūraj tumhārī yaad vāpas kar gayā shaam aa.ī zaḳhm taaza ho gayā honā hī thā 
ahd-e-zabt-e-ġham pe qaa.im thā dam-e-ruḳhsat magar vo sukūt-e-jāñ bhī dariyā ho gayā honā hī thā 
ab tū hī ye fāsla tai kar sake to kar bhī le maiñ to ḳhud apnā hī ziina ho gayā honā hī thā 
maiñ ne bhī parchhā.iyoñ ke shahr kī phir raah lī aur vo bhī apne ghar kā ho gayā honā hī thā 
rafta rafta KHatm qissa ho gaya hona hi tha wo bhi aaKHir mere jaisa ho gaya hona hi tha 
dasht-e-imkan mein ye mera mashghala bhi KHub hai rauzan-e-diwar chehra ho gaya hona hi tha 
Dubta suraj tumhaari yaad wapas kar gaya sham aai zaKHm taza ho gaya hona hi tha 
ahd-e-zabt-e-gham pe qaim tha dam-e-ruKHsat magar wo sukut-e-jaan bhi dariya ho gaya hona hi tha 
ab tu hi ye fasla tai kar sake to kar bhi le main to KHud apna hi zina ho gaya hona hi tha 
main ne bhi parchhaiyon ke shahr ki phir rah li aur wo bhi apne ghar ka ho gaya hona hi tha

maiñ jab bhī koī achhūtā kalām likhtā huuñ to pahle ek ġhazal tere naam likhtā huuñ 
badan kī aañch se sañvlā ga.e haiñ pairāhan maiñ phir bhī sub.h ke chehre pe shaam likhtā huuñ 
chale to TūTeñ chaTTāneñ ruke to aag lage shamīm-e-gul ko to nāzuk-ḳhirām likhtā huuñ 
ghaTā.eñ jhuum ke barsīñ jhulas ga.ī khetī ye hādsa hai ba-sad-e-ehtirām likhtā huuñ 
zamīn pyāsī hai būḌhā gagan bhī bhūkā hai maiñ apne ahd ke qisse tamām likhtā huuñ 
chaman ko auroñ ne likkhā hai mai-kada bar dosh maiñ phuul phuul ko ātish-ba-jām likhtā huuñ 
na rābta na koī rabt hī rahā 'bekal' us ajnabī ko magar maiñ salām likhtā huuñ 
main jab bhi koi achhuta kalam likhta hun to pahle ek ghazal tere nam likhta hun 
badan ki aanch se sanwla gae hain pairahan main phir bhi subh ke chehre pe sham likhta hun 
chale to TuTen chaTTanen ruke to aag lage shamim-e-gul ko to nazuk-KHiram likhta hun 
ghaTaen jhum ke barsin jhulas gai kheti ye hadsa hai ba-sad-e-ehtiram likhta hun 
zamin pyasi hai buDha gagan bhi bhuka hai main apne ahd ke qisse tamam likhta hun 
chaman ko auron ne likkha hai mai-kada bar dosh main phul phul ko aatish-ba-jam likhta hun 
na rabta na koi rabt hi raha 'bekal' us ajnabi ko magar main salam likhta hun

kuchh shafaq Dūbte sūraj kī bachā lī jaa.e rañg-e-imkāñ se koī shakl banā lī jaa.e 
harf mohmal sā koī haath pe us ke rakh do qaht kaisā hai ki har saañs savālī jaa.e 
shahr-e-malbūs meñ kyuuñ itnā barahna rahiye koī chhat yā koī dīvār-e-ḳhayālī jaa.e 
saath ho letā hai har shaam vahī sannāTā ghar ko jaane kī na.ī raah nikālī jaa.e 
pheñk āñkhoñ ko kisī jhiil kī gahrā.ī meñ but koī soch ki āvāra ḳhayālī jaa.e 
tishna-e-zaḳhm na rahne de badan ko 'ahmad' aisī talvār sar-e-shahr uchhālī jaa.e 
kuchh shafaq Dubte suraj ki bacha li jae rang-e-imkan se koi shakl bana li jae 
harf mohmal sa koi hath pe us ke rakh do qaht kaisa hai ki har sans sawali jae 
shahr-e-malbus mein kyun itna barahna rahiye koi chhat ya koi diwar-e-KHayali jae 
sath ho leta hai har sham wahi sannaTa ghar ko jaane ki nai rah nikali jae 
phenk aankhon ko kisi jhil ki gahrai mein but koi soch ki aawara KHayali jae 
tishna-e-zaKHm na rahne de badan ko 'ahmad' aisi talwar sar-e-shahr uchhaali jae

ye umr bhar kā safar hai isī sahāre par ki vo khaḌā hai abhī dūsre kināre par 
añdherā hijr kī vahshat kā raqs kartā hai tamām raat mirī aañkh ke sitāre par 
havā-e-shām tire saath ham bhī jhūmte haiñ kisī ḳhayāl kisī rañg ke ishāre par 
kisī kī yaad satā.e to jā ke rakh aanā mahakte phuul kisī aabjū ke dhāre par 
ufuq ke paar azal se ik aag raushan hai ye saarā khel hai us aag ke sharāre par 
ye umr bhar ka safar hai isi sahaare par ki wo khaDa hai abhi dusre kinare par 
andhera hijr ki wahshat ka raqs karta hai tamam raat meri aankh ke sitare par 
hawa-e-sham tere sath hum bhi jhumte hain kisi KHayal kisi rang ke ishaare par 
kisi ki yaad satae to ja ke rakh aana mahakte phul kisi aabju ke dhaare par 
ufuq ke par azal se ek aag raushan hai ye sara khel hai us aag ke sharare par

kyā ḳhabar thī ik balā-e-nā-gahānī aa.egī nā-murādī kī nishānī ye javānī aa.egī 
sab kaheñge kaun kartā hai hamāre raaz faash jab mire lab par mohabbat kī kahānī aa.egī 
nā-murādī se kaho muñh pher le apnā zarā merī duniyā meñ urūs-e-kāmrānī aa.egī 
jab ḳhizāñ kī nazr ho jā.egī duniyā se shabāb yaad 'aḳhtar' ye sitam-ārā javānī aa.egī 
kya KHabar thi ek bala-e-na-gahani aaegi na-muradi ki nishani ye jawani aaegi 
sab kahenge kaun karta hai hamare raaz fash jab mere lab par mohabbat ki kahani aaegi 
na-muradi se kaho munh pher le apna zara meri duniya mein urus-e-kaamrani aaegi 
jab KHizan ki nazr ho jaegi duniya se shabab yaad 'aKHtar' ye sitam-ara jawani aaegi

der se so kar uThne vaalo taḌpo lekin shor na ho tum ko haq hai ā.īnoñ ko toḌo lekin shor na ho 
ham-sā.e kā sukh to us ke ḳhvāb kā puurā honā hai tum par riqqat taarī ho to ro lo lekin shor na ho 
shaam Dhale parvāz simaT kar shāḳhoñ par aa jaatī hai apnī āñkheñ rāhguzar meñ rakkho lekin shor na ho 
dīvāne bhī ahl-e-samā.at kī ḳhidmat kar sakte haiñ dil hoñToñ par aa jaa.e to bolo lekin shor na ho 
'mohsin' kis ko fursat hai jo tesha le kar aa.e yahāñ apne but ko apne haath se toḌo lekin shor na ho 
der se so kar uThne walo taDpo lekin shor na ho tum ko haq hai aainon ko toDo lekin shor na ho 
ham-sae ka sukh to us ke KHwab ka pura hona hai tum par riqqat tari ho to ro lo lekin shor na ho 
sham Dhale parwaz simaT kar shaKHon par aa jati hai apni aankhen rahguzar mein rakkho lekin shor na ho 
diwane bhi ahl-e-samaat ki KHidmat kar sakte hain dil honTon par aa jae to bolo lekin shor na ho 
'mohsin' kis ko fursat hai jo tesha le kar aae yahan apne but ko apne hath se toDo lekin shor na ho

kisī kā qahr kisī kī duā mile to sahī sahī vo dushman-e-jāñ-āshnā mile to sahī 
abhī to laal harī battiyoñ ko dekhte haiñ mile kisī kī ḳhabar silsila mile to sahī 
ye qaid hai to rihā.ī bhī ab zarūrī hai kisī bhī samt koī rāsta mile to sahī 
ye shām-e-sard meñ har sū alaav jalte haiñ siyah ḳhamoshī meñ koī sadā mile to sahī 
qabā-e-jism ki hai taar taar nazr kareñ kabhī kahīñ vahī pāgal havā mile to sahī 
kisi ka qahr kisi ki dua mile to sahi sahi wo dushman-e-jaan-ashna mile to sahi 
abhi to lal hari battiyon ko dekhte hain mile kisi ki KHabar silsila mile to sahi 
ye qaid hai to rihai bhi ab zaruri hai kisi bhi samt koi rasta mile to sahi 
ye sham-e-sard mein har su alaw jalte hain siyah KHamoshi mein koi sada mile to sahi 
qaba-e-jism ki hai tar tar nazr karen kabhi kahin wahi pagal hawa mile to sahi

na pūchh hijr meñ jo haal ab hamārā hai umīd-e-vasl hī par in dinoñ guzārā hai 
na dekhūñ tujh ko to aatā nahīñ kuchh aah nazar tū merī putlī kā āñkhoñ kī yaar taarā hai 
mujhe jo baam pe shab ko bulā.e hai vo maah magar uruuj pe kyā in dinoñ sitārā hai 
yaqīn jaan tū vaa.iz ki diin o duniyā meñ bas us kī sirf mujhe zaat kā sahārā hai 
ajab tarah se nazar paḌ gayā mire hamdam qayāmat aah vo mukhḌā bhī pyārā pyārā hai 
mujhe jo dostī hai us ko dushmanī mujh se na iḳhtiyār hai us kā na merā chārā hai 
kahā jo maiñ ne pilāte ho bazm meñ sab ko magar hameñ hī nahīñ kyā gunah hamārā hai 
to bole vo ki jise chāheñ ham pilā.eñ sharāb ḳhushī hamārī tirā is meñ kyā ijārā hai 
gayā vo parda-nashīñ jab se apne ghar 'ġhamgīñ' tamām ḳhalq se dil ko mire kinārā hai 
na puchh hijr mein jo haal ab hamara hai umid-e-wasl hi par in dinon guzara hai 
na dekhun tujh ko to aata nahin kuchh aah nazar tu meri putli ka aankhon ki yar tara hai 
mujhe jo baam pe shab ko bulae hai wo mah magar uruj pe kya in dinon sitara hai 
yaqin jaan tu waiz ki din o duniya mein bas us ki sirf mujhe zat ka sahaara hai 
ajab tarah se nazar paD gaya mere hamdam qayamat aah wo mukhDa bhi pyara pyara hai 
mujhe jo dosti hai us ko dushmani mujh se na iKHtiyar hai us ka na mera chaara hai 
kaha jo main ne pilate ho bazm mein sab ko magar hamein hi nahin kya gunah hamara hai 
to bole wo ki jise chahen hum pilaen sharab KHushi hamari tera is mein kya ijara hai 
gaya wo parda-nashin jab se apne ghar 'ghamgin' tamam KHalq se dil ko mere kinara hai

rifāqat kī ye ḳhvāhish kah rahī hai ka.ī din se vo mujh meñ rah rahī hai 
pukārā hai kuchh aise naam merā ragoñ meñ raushnī sī bah rahī hai 
ta.ajjub hai ki merī uñgliyoñ meñ tirī hāthoñ kī ḳhushbū rah rahī hai 
samajh paayā nahīñ par sun rahā huuñ vo sargoshī meñ kyā kyā kah rahī hai 
tirī ḳhvāhish kisī imkāñ kī sūrat hamesha mujh meñ tah-dar-tah rahī hai 
maiñ us kī chhāñv meñ huuñ 'turk' lekin vo merī dhuup kaise sah rahī hai 
rifaqat ki ye KHwahish kah rahi hai kai din se wo mujh mein rah rahi hai 
pukara hai kuchh aise nam mera ragon mein raushni si bah rahi hai 
tajjub hai ki meri ungliyon mein teri hathon ki KHushbu rah rahi hai 
samajh paya nahin par sun raha hun wo sargoshi mein kya kya kah rahi hai 
teri KHwahish kisi imkan ki surat hamesha mujh mein tah-dar-tah rahi hai 
main us ki chhanw mein hun 'turk' lekin wo meri dhup kaise sah rahi hai

kisī kā qahr kisī kī duā mile to sahī sahī vo dushman-e-jāñ-āshnā mile to sahī 
abhī to laal harī battiyoñ ko dekhte haiñ mile kisī kī ḳhabar silsila mile to sahī 
ye qaid hai to rihā.ī bhī ab zarūrī hai kisī bhī samt koī rāsta mile to sahī 
ye shām-e-sard meñ har sū alaav jalte haiñ siyah ḳhamoshī meñ koī sadā mile to sahī 
qabā-e-jism ki hai taar taar nazr kareñ kabhī kahīñ vahī pāgal havā mile to sahī 
kisi ka qahr kisi ki dua mile to sahi sahi wo dushman-e-jaan-ashna mile to sahi 
abhi to lal hari battiyon ko dekhte hain mile kisi ki KHabar silsila mile to sahi 
ye qaid hai to rihai bhi ab zaruri hai kisi bhi samt koi rasta mile to sahi 
ye sham-e-sard mein har su alaw jalte hain siyah KHamoshi mein koi sada mile to sahi 
qaba-e-jism ki hai tar tar nazr karen kabhi kahin wahi pagal hawa mile to sahi

vo jhūTā ishq hai jis meñ fuġhāñ ho vo kachchī aag hai jis meñ dhuāñ ho 
adū tum se tum un se bad-gumāñ ho tumhāre vo tum un ke pāsbāñ ho 
bhalā tum aur mujh par mehrbāñ ho ināyat ye nasīb-e-dushmanāñ ho 
mirā haal aur phir merā bayāñ ho ajab kyā gar adū bhī ham-zabāñ ho 
kaheñ kis se ḳhudī meñ tum kahāñ ho gila jab ho ki qaabū meñ zabāñ ho 
tumhārī be-ruḳhī shikve hamāre qayāmat tak na puurī dāstāñ ho 
zabāñ bahkī huī hairāñ nigāheñ ḳhayāl-e-dil kahāñ hai tum kahāñ ho 
maza jab aa.e un se guftugū kā payāmī kā dahan merī zabāñ ho 
kashīda kyuuñ na ho bāzār-e-yūsuf ki jab tum sā matā-e-kārvāñ ho 
kahūñ kyā rāz-e-dil kyuuñ kar ho bāvar ki tum sā hī tumhārā rāz-dāñ ho 
abhī se kis liye dil chhoḌ baiTheñ jahāñ tak ho sake āh-o-fuġhāñ ho 
wo jhuTa ishq hai jis mein fughan ho wo kachchi aag hai jis mein dhuan ho 
adu tum se tum un se bad-guman ho tumhaare wo tum un ke pasban ho 
bhala tum aur mujh par mehrban ho inayat ye nasib-e-dushmanan ho 
mera haal aur phir mera bayan ho ajab kya gar adu bhi ham-zaban ho 
kahen kis se KHudi mein tum kahan ho gila jab ho ki qabu mein zaban ho 
tumhaari be-ruKHi shikwe hamare qayamat tak na puri dastan ho 
zaban bahki hui hairan nigahen KHayal-e-dil kahan hai tum kahan ho 
maza jab aae un se guftugu ka payami ka dahan meri zaban ho 
kashida kyun na ho bazar-e-yusuf ki jab tum sa mata-e-karwan ho 
kahun kya raaz-e-dil kyun kar ho bawar ki tum sa hi tumhaara raaz-dan ho 
abhi se kis liye dil chhoD baiThen jahan tak ho sake aah-o-fughan ho

phuul khilte haiñ tālāb meñ taarā hotā koī manzar to mirī aañkh meñ pyārā hotā 
ham palaT aa.e masāfat ko mukammal kar ke aur bhī chalte agar saath tumhārā hotā 
ham mohabbat ko samundar kī tarah jānte haiñ kuud hī jaate agar koī kināra hotā 
ek nākām mohabbat hī hameñ kaafī hai ham dobāra bhī agar karte ḳhasāra hotā 
kitnī lahreñ hameñ siine se lagāne ātīñ koī kankar hī agar jhiil meñ maarā hotā 
phul khilte hain talab mein tara hota koi manzar to meri aankh mein pyara hota 
hum palaT aae masafat ko mukammal kar ke aur bhi chalte agar sath tumhaara hota 
hum mohabbat ko samundar ki tarah jaante hain kud hi jate agar koi kinara hota 
ek nakaam mohabbat hi hamein kafi hai hum dobara bhi agar karte KHasara hota 
kitni lahren hamein sine se lagane aatin koi kankar hi agar jhil mein mara hota

ye jo sūraj hai ye sūraj bhī kahāñ thā pahle barf se uThtā huā ek dhuāñ thā pahle 
mujh se ābād huī hai tirī duniyā varna is ḳharābe meñ koī aur kahāñ thā pahle 
ek hī dā.ere meñ qaid haiñ ham log yahāñ ab jahāñ tum ho koī aur vahāñ thā pahle 
us ko ham jaise ka.ī mil ga.e majnūñ varna ishq logoñ ke liye kār-e-ziyāñ thā pahle 
ye jo ab ret nazar aatā hai afzal 'gauhar' isī dariyā meñ kabhī āb-e-ravāñ thā pahle 
ye jo suraj hai ye suraj bhi kahan tha pahle barf se uThta hua ek dhuan tha pahle 
mujh se aabaad hui hai teri duniya warna is KHarabe mein koi aur kahan tha pahle 
ek hi daere mein qaid hain hum log yahan ab jahan tum ho koi aur wahan tha pahle 
us ko hum jaise kai mil gae majnun warna ishq logon ke liye kar-e-ziyan tha pahle 
ye jo ab ret nazar aata hai afzal 'gauhar' isi dariya mein kabhi aab-e-rawan tha pahle

zamīñ kā bojh aur us par ye āsmān kā bojh utaar pheñk duuñ kāñdhoñ se do-jahān kā bojh 
paḌā huā huuñ maiñ sajde meñ kah nahīñ paatā vo baat jis se ki halkā ho kuchh zabān kā bojh 
phir is ke baad uThā.ūñgā apne aap ko maiñ uThā rahā huuñ abhī apne ḳhāndān kā bojh 
dabī thī aañkh kabhī jis makān-e-hairat se ab us makāñ se ziyāda hai lā-makān kā bojh 
agar dimāġh sitāra hai TuuT jā.egā chamak chamak ke uThātā hai āsmān kā bojh 
to jhurriyoñ ne likhā aur kyā uThāoge uThāyā jaatā nahīñ tum se jism o jaan kā bojh 
palaT ke aa.ī jo ġhaflat ke us kurre se nigah to silvaToñ meñ paḌā thā mirī thakān kā bojh 
jo umr biit ga.ī us ko bhuul jā.ūñ 'razā' pur-ḳhayāl se jhaTkūñ ga.ī uḌaan kā bojh 
zamin ka bojh aur us par ye aasman ka bojh utar phenk dun kandhon se do-jahan ka bojh 
paDa hua hun main sajde mein kah nahin pata wo baat jis se ki halka ho kuchh zaban ka bojh 
phir is ke baad uThaunga apne aap ko main uTha raha hun abhi apne KHandan ka bojh 
dabi thi aankh kabhi jis makan-e-hairat se ab us makan se ziyaada hai la-makan ka bojh 
agar dimagh sitara hai TuT jaega chamak chamak ke uThata hai aasman ka bojh 
to jhurriyon ne likha aur kya uThaoge uThaya jata nahin tum se jism o jaan ka bojh 
palaT ke aai jo ghaflat ke us kurre se nigah to silwaTon mein paDa tha meri thakan ka bojh 
jo umr bit gai us ko bhul jaun 'raza' pur-KHayal se jhaTkun gai uDan ka bojh

rafta rafta lag chuke the ham bhī dīvāroñ ke saath hashr apnā bhī yahī thā ham bhī the sāroñ ke saath 
ek halchal sī machī rahtī hai dil meñ har ghaḌī saath haiñ pyāre hamāre ham nahīñ pyāroñ ke saath 
lag ga.ī thī maut kī apnī bhī chhoTī sī ḳhabar āḳhir apnā bhī ta.alluq thā in aḳhbāroñ ke saath 
aa rahī hai un kī ḳhū bū apne andar bhī kahīñ haiñ re.āyā hī magar rahte haiñ sardāroñ ke saath 
farz kuchh pagḌī bachānā bhī hai lekin ek din dekhnā sar bhī chale ā.eñge dastāroñ ke saath 
duur se to farq hī koī nazar aatā nahīñ is tarah rul mil ga.e haiñ phuul añgāroñ ke saath 
ho ga.ī hai shakl hī tabdīl darbāroñ kī ab varna ham bhī kam nahīñ vābasta darbāroñ ke saath 
paḌ ga.e the rā.egāñ pahchān ke chakkar meñ ham apnī marzī se jo ham uḌte nahīñ Dāroñ ke saath 
be-ta.alluq bhī hai vo ham ne bhī hai ab tak 'zafar' rābta joḌā huā TuuTe hue tāroñ ke saath 
rafta rafta lag chuke the hum bhi diwaron ke sath hashr apna bhi yahi tha hum bhi the saron ke sath 
ek halchal si machi rahti hai dil mein har ghaDi sath hain pyare hamare hum nahin pyaron ke sath 
lag gai thi maut ki apni bhi chhoTi si KHabar aaKHir apna bhi talluq tha in aKHbaron ke sath 
aa rahi hai un ki KHu bu apne andar bhi kahin hain reaya hi magar rahte hain sardaron ke sath 
farz kuchh pagDi bachana bhi hai lekin ek din dekhna sar bhi chale aaenge dastaron ke sath 
dur se to farq hi koi nazar aata nahin is tarah rul mil gae hain phul angaron ke sath 
ho gai hai shakl hi tabdil darbaron ki ab warna hum bhi kam nahin wabasta darbaron ke sath 
paD gae the raegan pahchan ke chakkar mein hum apni marzi se jo hum uDte nahin Daron ke sath 
be-talluq bhi hai wo hum ne bhi hai ab tak 'zafar' rabta joDa hua TuTe hue taron ke sath

jiye jā rahā huuñ tujhe yaad kar ke tasavvur kī duniyā ko ābād kar ke 
pashemāñ haiñ ham arz-e-rūdād kar ke karam hī kiyā tum ne be-dād kar ke 
mujhe is kī mutlaq shikāyat nahīñ hai sitam par sitam laao ījād kar ke 
kahāñ rahiye apnoñ se kar ke kinārā milā kyā hai ġhairoñ se fariyād kar ke 
hameñ vāsta aise sayyād se hai ki jo said rakhtā hai āzād kar ke 
burā kar rahe haiñ tirā naam le kar ḳhatā kar rahe haiñ tujhe yaad kar ke 
mohabbat sī shai us ne mujh ko atā kī ki ḳhush ḳhush chalūñ umr barbād kar ke 
jo chāho shumār apnā ahl-e-suḳhan meñ paḌho sher 'rahbar' ko ustād kar ke 
jiye ja raha hun tujhe yaad kar ke tasawwur ki duniya ko aabaad kar ke 
pasheman hain hum arz-e-rudad kar ke karam hi kiya tum ne be-dad kar ke 
mujhe is ki mutlaq shikayat nahin hai sitam par sitam lao ijad kar ke 
kahan rahiye apnon se kar ke kinara mila kya hai ghairon se fariyaad kar ke 
hamein wasta aise sayyaad se hai ki jo said rakhta hai aazad kar ke 
bura kar rahe hain tera nam le kar KHata kar rahe hain tujhe yaad kar ke 
mohabbat si shai us ne mujh ko ata ki ki KHush KHush chalun umr barbaad kar ke 
jo chaho shumar apna ahl-e-suKHan mein paDho sher 'rahbar' ko ustad kar ke

us kā ḳhayāl dil meñ ghaḌī do ghaḌī rahe phir is ke ba.ad mez pe chaa.e paḌī rahe 
aisā nahīñ ki ham kareñ bāteñ na be-hisāb lekin ye kyā ki kiil sī dil meñ gaḌī rahe 
phir ghar meñ ek āhanī piñjra dikhā.ī de khiḌkī meñ kaafī der jo laḌkī khaḌī rahe 
bikhrī ho jaise chāñdnī barg-e-gulāb par muskān us ke hoñToñ pe aaise paḌī rahe 
dil meñ ḳhushī ke phūTte yūñhī raheñ anaar terī hañsī kī yūñhī sadā phuljaḌī rahe 
khiḌkī to 'shāz' band maiñ kartā huuñ baar baar lekin havā-e-shauq ki zid par aḌī rahe 
us ka KHayal dil mein ghaDi do ghaDi rahe phir is ke baad mez pe chae paDi rahe 
aisa nahin ki hum karen baaten na be-hisab lekin ye kya ki kil si dil mein gaDi rahe 
phir ghar mein ek aahani pinjra dikhai de khiDki mein kafi der jo laDki khaDi rahe 
bikhri ho jaise chandni barg-e-gulab par muskan us ke honTon pe aaise paDi rahe 
dil mein KHushi ke phuTte yunhi rahen anar teri hansi ki yunhi sada phuljaDi rahe 
khiDki to 'shaz' band main karta hun bar bar lekin hawa-e-shauq ki zid par aDi rahe

munharif mujh se ik zamāna hai bad-nasībī kā kyā Thikāna hai 
bahkī jaatī hai chashm-e-zāhid bhī har adā terī vālehāna hai 
kyuuñ jabīñ ab hai mā.il-e-sajda kyā yahīñ un kā āstāna hai 
zarf-e-mai-kash ko taaḌ letī hai chashm-e-sāqī kā kyā Thikānā hai 
vāliyān-e-chaman nahīñ vāqif barq-āsā har āshiyāna hai 
ab to rusvā.iyāñ yaqīnī haiñ un ke lab par mirā fasāna hai 
sū-e-kāba chale to ho 'qaisar' raah meñ ik sharāb-ḳhāna hai 
munharif mujh se ek zamana hai bad-nasibi ka kya Thikana hai 
bahki jati hai chashm-e-zahid bhi har ada teri walehana hai 
kyun jabin ab hai mail-e-sajda kya yahin un ka aastana hai 
zarf-e-mai-kash ko taD leti hai chashm-e-saqi ka kya Thikana hai 
waliyan-e-chaman nahin waqif barq-asa har aashiyana hai 
ab to ruswaiyan yaqini hain un ke lab par mera fasana hai 
su-e-kaba chale to ho 'qaisar' rah mein ek sharab-KHana hai

kisī taḳhlīq ke paikar meñ aanā chāhtā huuñ tasavvur huuñ kahīñ apnā Thikāna chāhtā huuñ 
mujhe tahsīn kī jab koī ḳhvāhish hī nahīñ hai to apne sher kyuuñ tujh ko sunānā chāhtā huuñ 
mujhe tujh se shikāyat bhī hai lekin ye bhī sach hai tujhe ai zindagī maiñ vālihāna chāhtā huuñ
