isī ḳhātir to ye sinf-e-suḳhan maiñ ne chunī hai ki jo mahsūs kartā huuñ batānā chāhtā huuñ 
mire in ḳhushk hoñToñ ko zarā namnāk kar de maiñ apnī pyaas kī shiddat chhupānā chāhtā huuñ 
tabhī to 'shād' palkoñ par sajā rakkhā hai un ko maiñ apne ḳhvāb duniyā ko dikhānā chāhtā huuñ 
kisi taKHliq ke paikar mein aana chahta hun tasawwur hun kahin apna Thikana chahta hun 
mujhe tahsin ki jab koi KHwahish hi nahin hai to apne sher kyun tujh ko sunana chahta hun 
mujhe tujh se shikayat bhi hai lekin ye bhi sach hai tujhe ai zindagi main walihana chahta hun 
isi KHatir to ye sinf-e-suKHan main ne chuni hai ki jo mahsus karta hun batana chahta hun 
mere in KHushk honTon ko zara namnak kar de main apni pyas ki shiddat chhupana chahta hun 
tabhi to 'shad' palkon par saja rakkha hai un ko main apne KHwab duniya ko dikhana chahta hun

kaun sī duniyā meñ huuñ kis kī nigahbānī meñ huuñ zindagī hai saḳht mushkil phir bhī āsānī meñ huuñ 
chāñd hai paanī meñ yā bhūle hue chehre kā aks sāhil-e-dariyā pe dekho maiñ bhī hairānī meñ huuñ 
qatra-e-shabnam ke bhī ehsān yaad aane lage hoñT sūkhe jā rahe haiñ jab se maiñ paanī meñ huuñ 
bhūlī-bisrī yaad ik aa.ī hai mere dil ke paas maiñ bhī goyā aaj kal is dil kī darbānī meñ huuñ 
ai ḳhizāñ kuchh der ko ye fasl-e-gul jiine to de āj-kal masrūf maiñ bhī chāk-dāmānī meñ huuñ 
kaun si duniya mein hun kis ki nigahbani mein hun zindagi hai saKHt mushkil phir bhi aasani mein hun 
chand hai pani mein ya bhule hue chehre ka aks sahil-e-dariya pe dekho main bhi hairani mein hun 
qatra-e-shabnam ke bhi ehsan yaad aane lage honT sukhe ja rahe hain jab se main pani mein hun 
bhuli-bisri yaad ek aai hai mere dil ke pas main bhi goya aaj kal is dil ki darbani mein hun 
ai KHizan kuchh der ko ye fasl-e-gul jine to de aaj-kal masruf main bhi chaak-damani mein hun

jhuum kar badlī uThī aur chhā ga.ī saarī duniyā par javānī aa ga.ī 
aah vo us kī nigāh-e-mai-farosh jab bhī uTThī mastiyāñ barsā ga.ī 
gesu-e-mushkīñ meñ vo rū-e-hasīñ abr meñ bijlī sī ik lahrā ga.ī 
ālam-e-mastī kī tauba al-amāñ pārsā.ī nashsha ban kar chhā ga.ī 
aah us kī be-niyāzī kī nazar aarzū kyā phuul sī kumhlā ga.ī 
sāz-e-dil ko gudgudāyā ishq ne maut ko le kar javānī aa ga.ī 
pārsā.ī kī javāñ-margī na pūchh tauba karnī thī ki badlī chhā ga.ī 
'aḳhtar' us jān-e-tamannā kī adā jab kabhī yaad aa ga.ī taḌpā ga.ī 
jhum kar badli uThi aur chha gai sari duniya par jawani aa gai 
aah wo us ki nigah-e-mai-farosh jab bhi uTThi mastiyan barsa gai 
gesu-e-mushkin mein wo ru-e-hasin abr mein bijli si ek lahra gai 
aalam-e-masti ki tauba al-aman parsai nashsha ban kar chha gai 
aah us ki be-niyazi ki nazar aarzu kya phul si kumhla gai 
saz-e-dil ko gudgudaya ishq ne maut ko le kar jawani aa gai 
parsai ki jawan-margi na puchh tauba karni thi ki badli chha gai 
'aKHtar' us jaan-e-tamanna ki ada jab kabhi yaad aa gai taDpa gai

galī se apnī uThātā hai vo bahāne se maiñ be-ḳhabar rahūñ duniyā ke aane jaane se 
kabhī kabhī to ġhanīmat hai yaad rafta kī biThā na roz lagā ke use sirhāne se 
ajiib shaḳhs thā maiñ bhī bhulā nahīñ paayā kiyā na us ne bhī inkār yaad aane se 
uThā rakhī hai kisī ne kamān sūraj kī girā rahā hai mire raat din nishāne se 
koī sabab to hai aisā ki ek umr se haiñ zamāna mujh se ḳhafā aur maiñ zamāne se 
gali se apni uThata hai wo bahane se main be-KHabar rahun duniya ke aane jaane se 
kabhi kabhi to ghanimat hai yaad rafta ki biTha na roz laga ke use sirhane se 
ajib shaKHs tha main bhi bhula nahin paya kiya na us ne bhi inkar yaad aane se 
uTha rakhi hai kisi ne kaman suraj ki gira raha hai mere raat din nishane se 
koi sabab to hai aisa ki ek umr se hain zamana mujh se KHafa aur main zamane se

kisī pe koī bharosa kare to kaise kare ki āñ.suoñ ke sivā aur koī kyā degā 
bahut huā to tabassum ke chand phūloñ ko nigāh-e-shoḳh ke hāthoñ se bevafā degā 
chale to jaate ho rūThe hue magar sun lo har ek moḌ pe koī tumheñ sadā degā 
ajiib manzil-e-hairat meñ hai jahān-e-ḳharāb ki jaise ham se divānoñ ko bhī sazā degā 
hamāre sher meñ pinhāñ hai raushnī ġham kī zarā suno to sar-e-shām ye ziyā degā 
kisi pe koi bharosa kare to kaise kare ki aansuon ke siwa aur koi kya dega 
bahut hua to tabassum ke chand phulon ko nigah-e-shoKH ke hathon se bewafa dega 
chale to jate ho ruThe hue magar sun lo har ek moD pe koi tumhein sada dega 
ajib manzil-e-hairat mein hai jahan-e-KHarab ki jaise hum se diwanon ko bhi saza dega 
hamare sher mein pinhan hai raushni gham ki zara suno to sar-e-sham ye ziya dega

zamīñ se aage bhalā jaanā thā kahāñ maiñ ne uThā.e rakkhā yūñhī sar pe āsmāñ maiñ ne 
kisī ke hijr meñ shab se kalām karte hue diye kī lau ko banāyā thā ham-zabāñ maiñ ne 
shajar ko aag kisī aur ne lagā.ī thī na jaane saañs meñ kyuuñ bhar liyā dhuāñ maiñ ne 
kabhī to ā.eñge us samt se gulāb o charāġh ye nahr yuuñ hī nikālī nahīñ yahāñ maiñ ne 
mirī to aañkh mirā ḳhvāb TūTne se khulī na jaane paañv dharā niiñd meñ kahāñ maiñ ne 
zamin se aage bhala jaana tha kahan main ne uThae rakkha yunhi sar pe aasman main ne 
kisi ke hijr mein shab se kalam karte hue diye ki lau ko banaya tha ham-zaban main ne 
shajar ko aag kisi aur ne lagai thi na jaane sans mein kyun bhar liya dhuan main ne 
kabhi to aaenge us samt se gulab o charagh ye nahr yun hi nikali nahin yahan main ne 
meri to aankh mera KHwab TuTne se khuli na jaane panw dhara nind mein kahan main ne

chiir kar siine ko rakh de gar na paa.e ġham-gusār dil kī bāteñ dil hī se koī bayāñ kab tak kare 
mubtalā-e-dard hone kī ye lazzat dekhiye qissa-e-ġham ho kisī kā dil mirā dhak dhak kare 
sab kī qismat ik na ik din jāgtī hai haañ bajā zindagī kyuuñ kar guzāre vo jo is meñ shak kare 
chir kar sine ko rakh de gar na pae gham-gusar dil ki baaten dil hi se koi bayan kab tak kare 
mubtala-e-dard hone ki ye lazzat dekhiye qissa-e-gham ho kisi ka dil mera dhak dhak kare 
sab ki qismat ek na ek din jagti hai han baja zindagi kyun kar guzare wo jo is mein shak kare

terī ināyatoñ kā ajab rañg Dhañg thā tere huzūr pā-e-qanā.at meñ lañg thā 
sahrā ko rauñdne kī havas pā-ba-gil hai ab yuuñ thā kabhī ki dāman-e-āfāq tañg thā 
dāman ko tere thaam ke rāhat baḌī milī ab tak maiñ apne aap se masrūf-e-jañg thā 
hañgām-e-yād dil meñ na aahaT na dastakeñ shorish-kade meñ raat ḳhamoshī kā rañg thā 
tū aayā lauT aayā hai guzre dinoñ kā nuur chehroñ pe apne varna to barsoñ kā zañg thā 
raqs-e-junūñ meñ bhī thā tarīq-e-hunar kā Dhab sūfi-e-bā-safā thā koī yā malañg thā 
kyā āsmāñ uThāte mohabbat meñ jab ki dil tār-e-nigah meñ uljhī huī ik patañg thā 
teri inayaton ka ajab rang Dhang tha tere huzur pa-e-qanaat mein lang tha 
sahra ko raundne ki hawas pa-ba-gil hai ab yun tha kabhi ki daman-e-afaq tang tha 
daman ko tere tham ke rahat baDi mili ab tak main apne aap se masruf-e-jang tha 
hangam-e-yaad dil mein na aahaT na dastaken shorish-kade mein raat KHamoshi ka rang tha 
tu aaya lauT aaya hai guzre dinon ka nur chehron pe apne warna to barson ka zang tha 
raqs-e-junun mein bhi tha tariq-e-hunar ka Dhab sufi-e-ba-safa tha koi ya malang tha 
kya aasman uThate mohabbat mein jab ki dil tar-e-nigah mein uljhi hui ek patang tha

jis samay terā asar thā mujh meñ baat karne kā hunar thā mujh meñ 
sub.h hote hī sabhī ne dekhā koī tā hadd-e-nazar thā mujh meñ 
maañ batātī hai ki bachpan ke samay kisī aaseb kā Dar thā mujh meñ 
jo bhī aayā kabhī vāpas na gayā aisī chāhat kā bhañvar thā mujh meñ 
maiñ thā sadiyoñ ke safar meñ 'ahmad' aur sadiyoñ kā safar thā mujh meñ 
jis samay tera asar tha mujh mein baat karne ka hunar tha mujh mein 
subh hote hi sabhi ne dekha koi ta hadd-e-nazar tha mujh mein 
man batati hai ki bachpan ke samay kisi aaseb ka Dar tha mujh mein 
jo bhi aaya kabhi wapas na gaya aisi chahat ka bhanwar tha mujh mein 
main tha sadiyon ke safar mein 'ahmad' aur sadiyon ka safar tha mujh mein

ḳhālī ḳhālī rastoñ pe be-karāñ udāsī hai jism ke tamāshe meñ ruuh pyāsī pyāsī hai 
ḳhvāb aur tamannā kā kyā hisāb rakhnā hai ḳhvāhisheñ haiñ sadiyoñ kī umr to zarā sī hai 
rāh-o-rasm rakhne ke ba.ad ham ne jaanā hai vo jo āshnā.ī thī vo to nā-shanāsī hai 
ham kisī na.e din kā intizār karte haiñ din purāne sūraj kā shaam baasī baasī hai 
dekh kar tumheñ koī kis tarah sambhal paa.e sab havās jaage haiñ aisī bad-havāsī hai 
zaḳhm ke chhupāne ko ham libās laa.e the shahr bhar kā kahnā hai ye to ḳhūñ-libāsī hai 
KHali KHali raston pe be-karan udasi hai jism ke tamashe mein ruh pyasi pyasi hai 
KHwab aur tamanna ka kya hisab rakhna hai KHwahishen hain sadiyon ki umr to zara si hai 
rah-o-rasm rakhne ke baad hum ne jaana hai wo jo aashnai thi wo to na-shanasi hai 
hum kisi nae din ka intizar karte hain din purane suraj ka sham basi basi hai 
dekh kar tumhein koi kis tarah sambhal pae sab hawas jage hain aisi bad-hawasi hai 
zaKHm ke chhupane ko hum libas lae the shahr bhar ka kahna hai ye to KHun-libasi hai

koī pūchhe mire mahtāb se mere sitāroñ se chhalaktā kyuuñ nahīñ sailāb meñ paanī kināroñ se 
mukammal ho to sachchā.ī kahāñ taqsīm hotī hai ye kahnā hai mohabbat ke vafā ke hissa-dāroñ se 
Thahar jaa.e dar o dīvār par jab tīsrā mausam nahīñ kuchh farq paḌtā phir ḳhizāoñ se bahāroñ se 
bagūle aag ke raqsāñ rahe tā der sāhil par samundar kā samundar chhup gayā uḌte sharāroñ se 
mirī har baat pas-manzar se kyuuñ mansūb hotī hai mujhe āvāz sī aatī hai kyuuñ ujḌe dayāroñ se 
jahāñ tā-hadd-e-bīnā.ī musāfir hī musāfir hoñ nishāñ qadmoñ ke miT jaate haiñ aisī rahguzāroñ se 
koi puchhe mere mahtab se mere sitaron se chhalakta kyun nahin sailab mein pani kinaron se 
mukammal ho to sachchai kahan taqsim hoti hai ye kahna hai mohabbat ke wafa ke hissa-daron se 
Thahar jae dar o diwar par jab tisra mausam nahin kuchh farq paDta phir KHizaon se bahaaron se 
bagule aag ke raqsan rahe ta der sahil par samundar ka samundar chhup gaya uDte shararon se 
meri har baat pas-manzar se kyun mansub hoti hai mujhe aawaz si aati hai kyun ujDe dayaron se 
jahan ta-hadd-e-binai musafir hi musafir hon nishan qadmon ke miT jate hain aisi rahguzaron se

ret par ik nishān hai shāyad ye hamārā makān hai shāyad 
shor ke biich so rahī hai zamīñ muddatoñ kī thakān hai shāyad 
dard kā ishtihār chaspāñ hai zindagī kī dukān hai shāyad 
tanhā tanhā nikal paḌe panchhī ahd-e-nau kī uḌaan hai shāyad 
aql kahtī hai mar chukā rishta shauq kahtā hai jaan hai shāyad 
vo jahāñ par pighal rahī hai dhuup haañ vahīñ sā.ebān hai shāyad 
aaj vo muskurā ke milte haiñ aaj phir imtihān hai shāyad 
ret par ek nishan hai shayad ye hamara makan hai shayad 
shor ke bich so rahi hai zamin muddaton ki thakan hai shayad 
dard ka ishtihaar chaspan hai zindagi ki dukan hai shayad 
tanha tanha nikal paDe panchhi ahd-e-nau ki uDan hai shayad 
aql kahti hai mar chuka rishta shauq kahta hai jaan hai shayad 
wo jahan par pighal rahi hai dhup han wahin saeban hai shayad 
aaj wo muskura ke milte hain aaj phir imtihan hai shayad

ḳhvāb tumhāre aate haiñ niiñd uḌā le jaate haiñ 
aaj likheñge haal apnā sochte haiñ Dar jaate haiñ 
ishq bahut sachchā hai ham taare toḌ ke laate haiñ 
rusvā.ī kā ḳhauf nahīñ shohrat se ghabrāte haiñ 
naam tumhārā aatā hai yādoñ meñ kho jaate haiñ 
dil meñ dard sā uThtā hai dard meñ Duube jaate haiñ 
us kā dhyān jab aatā hai ek sukūn sā paate haiñ 
bāġhoñ meñ vo jaatā hai phuul bahut sharmāte haiñ 
apne ghar vo chain se hai ham bhī hañste gaate haiñ 
marg-e-musalsal hai lekin ham zinda kahlāte haiñ 
KHwab tumhaare aate hain nind uDa le jate hain 
aaj likhenge haal apna sochte hain Dar jate hain 
ishq bahut sachcha hai hum tare toD ke late hain 
ruswai ka KHauf nahin shohrat se ghabraate hain 
nam tumhaara aata hai yaadon mein kho jate hain 
dil mein dard sa uThta hai dard mein Dube jate hain 
us ka dhyan jab aata hai ek sukun sa pate hain 
baghon mein wo jata hai phul bahut sharmate hain 
apne ghar wo chain se hai hum bhi hanste gate hain 
marg-e-musalsal hai lekin hum zinda kahlate hain

zikr ham se be-talab kā kyā talabgārī ke din tum hameñ sochoge ik din ḳhud se be-zārī ke din 
munhamik masrūf ek ik kaam nimTāte hue saaf se raushan se ye chalne kī tayyārī ke din 
roz ik bujhtī huī sīlan bhare kamre kī shaam khiḌkiyoñ meñ roz murjhāte ye bīmārī ke din 
nam nashīlī sā.atoñ kī sard zahrīlī sī raat ḳhvāb hote jā rahe hoñ jaise bedārī ke din 
hāfize kī sust-rau lahroñ meñ halchal kyā huī jaag uTThe dhaḌkanoñ kī tez-raftārī ke din 
zehan ke sahrā meñ uThtā ik bagūla sā kabhī gaahe gaahe kār-āmad se ye bekārī ke din 
dam-ba-dam tahlīl sā hotā huā manzar kā bojh sahl se hote hue palkoñ pe dushvārī ke din 
umr ke bāzār kī had par navādir kī dukāñ kuchh parakhte dekhte chunte ḳharīdārī ke din 
rah ga.ī kāġhaz pe khiñch kar lafz se aarī lakīr 'sāz' shāyad bhar ga.e haiñ ab mire qaarī ke din 
zikr hum se be-talab ka kya talabgari ke din tum hamein sochoge ek din KHud se be-zari ke din 
munhamik masruf ek ek kaam nimTate hue saf se raushan se ye chalne ki tayyari ke din 
roz ek bujhti hui silan bhare kamre ki sham khiDkiyon mein roz murjhate ye bimari ke din 
nam nashili saaton ki sard zahrili si raat KHwab hote ja rahe hon jaise bedari ke din 
hafize ki sust-rau lahron mein halchal kya hui jag uTThe dhaDkanon ki tez-raftari ke din 
zehan ke sahra mein uThta ek bagula sa kabhi gahe gahe kar-amad se ye bekari ke din 
dam-ba-dam tahlil sa hota hua manzar ka bojh sahl se hote hue palkon pe dushwari ke din 
umr ke bazar ki had par nawadir ki dukan kuchh parakhte dekhte chunte KHaridari ke din 
rah gai kaghaz pe khinch kar lafz se aari lakir 'saz' shayad bhar gae hain ab mere qari ke din

jā chukā tūfān lekin kapkapī hai vaqt kī dīvār ab tak hil rahī hai 
ham ne pahchānā bahut logoñ ko lekin ek ik sūrat abhī tak ajnabī hai 
ab kirā.e ke makāñ meñ ghuT rahā huuñ baap daadā kī havelī bik chukī hai 
roz kahte ho magar kahte nahīñ ho vo kahānī jo abhī tak an-kahī hai 
kaise guzrā paḌh ke andāza lagā lo vaqt kī tafsīr chehre par likhī hai 
andar andar maiñ bikhartā jā rahā huuñ koī shai rah rah ke mujh meñ TūTtī hai 
ghaas ug aa.ī dar-o-dīvār-e-dil par ḳhāna-vīrānī kā manzar dīdanī hai 
ja chuka tufan lekin kapkapi hai waqt ki diwar ab tak hil rahi hai 
hum ne pahchana bahut logon ko lekin ek ek surat abhi tak ajnabi hai 
ab kirae ke makan mein ghuT raha hun bap dada ki haweli bik chuki hai 
roz kahte ho magar kahte nahin ho wo kahani jo abhi tak an-kahi hai 
kaise guzra paDh ke andaza laga lo waqt ki tafsir chehre par likhi hai 
andar andar main bikharta ja raha hun koi shai rah rah ke mujh mein TuTti hai 
ghas ug aai dar-o-diwar-e-dil par KHana-virani ka manzar didani hai

us ne sochā bhī nahīñ thā kabhī aisā hogā dil hī isrār karegā ki bichhaḌnā hogā 
kashtiyāñ ret pe baiThī haiñ umīdeñ bāñdhe aisā lagtā hai ye sahrā kabhī dariyā hogā 
ik udāsī mirī dahlīz pe baiThī hogī ek jugnū mire kamre meñ bhaTaktā hogā 
tum ne vo zaḳhm diyā hai mirī tanhā.ī ko jo na āsūda-e-ġham hogā na achchhā hogā 
chāñd jis raat na niklā to gumāñ guzrā hai vo yaqīnan tire āñgan meñ chamaktā hogā 
apnā sar kaaT ke neze pe uThā.e rakkhā sirf ye zid ki mirā sar hai to ūñchā hogā 
us ne socha bhi nahin tha kabhi aisa hoga dil hi israr karega ki bichhaDna hoga 
kashtiyan ret pe baiThi hain umiden bandhe aisa lagta hai ye sahra kabhi dariya hoga 
ek udasi meri dahliz pe baiThi hogi ek jugnu mere kamre mein bhaTakta hoga 
tum ne wo zaKHm diya hai meri tanhai ko jo na aasuda-e-gham hoga na achchha hoga 
chand jis raat na nikla to guman guzra hai wo yaqinan tere aangan mein chamakta hoga 
apna sar kaT ke neze pe uThae rakkha sirf ye zid ki mera sar hai to uncha hoga

ishq kī gum-shuda manziloñ meñ ga.ī zindagī lauT kar daldaloñ meñ ga.ī 
yās-o-hasrat bharī be-amāñ zindagī aas ke reshmī āñchaloñ meñ ga.ī 
vo sadā jo fuġhāñ ban ke uTThī magar ḳhāmushī ke ghane jañgaloñ meñ ga.ī 
tum se ho kar judā yak-nafas dosto zindagī marghaToñ daldaloñ meñ ga.ī 
kaun jaane ki uḌtī huī dhuup bhī kis taraf kaun sī manziloñ meñ ga.ī 
sub.h-dam rañg nikhrā har ik shāḳh kā raushnī shabnamī koñpaloñ meñ ga.ī 
ishq ki gum-shuda manzilon mein gai zindagi lauT kar daldalon mein gai 
yas-o-hasrat bhari be-aman zindagi aas ke reshmi aanchalon mein gai 
wo sada jo fughan ban ke uTThi magar KHamushi ke ghane jangalon mein gai 
tum se ho kar juda yak-nafas dosto zindagi marghaTon daldalon mein gai 
kaun jaane ki uDti hui dhup bhi kis taraf kaun si manzilon mein gai 
subh-dam rang nikhra har ek shaKH ka raushni shabnami konpalon mein gai

maanā ki zalzala thā yahāñ kam bahut hī kam bastī meñ bach ga.e the makāñ kam bahut hī kam 
mere lahū kā zā.iqa chakhtā rahā thā dard tanhā.iyāñ thiiñ raat jahāñ kam bahut hī kam 
kāñToñ ko sīñchtī rahī parchhā.iyoñ kī fasl jab dhuup kā thā nām-o-nishāñ kam bahut hī kam 
āñgan meñ dhuup dhuup ko oḌhe udāsiyāñ ghar meñ the zindagī ke nishāñ kam bahut hī kam 
maflūj raat karb ke bistar pe leT kar kartī hai ab to āh-o-fuġhāñ kam bahut hī kam 
kyuuñ dostoñ kī bhiiḌ se ghabrā na jaa.e dil dushman to rah ga.e haiñ yahāñ kam bahut hī kam 
ham jab se pattharoñ kī tijārat meñ lag ga.e hai dosti-e-shīsha-garāñ kam bahut hī kam 
itnī azīyatoñ se guzarne ke ba.ad 'rind' ḳhud par hai zindagī kā gumāñ kam bahut hī kam 
mana ki zalzala tha yahan kam bahut hi kam basti mein bach gae the makan kam bahut hi kam 
mere lahu ka zaiqa chakhta raha tha dard tanhaiyan thin raat jahan kam bahut hi kam 
kanTon ko sinchti rahi parchhaiyon ki fasl jab dhup ka tha nam-o-nishan kam bahut hi kam 
aangan mein dhup dhup ko oDhe udasiyan ghar mein the zindagi ke nishan kam bahut hi kam 
mafluj raat karb ke bistar pe leT kar karti hai ab to aah-o-fughan kam bahut hi kam 
kyun doston ki bhiD se ghabra na jae dil dushman to rah gae hain yahan kam bahut hi kam 
hum jab se pattharon ki tijarat mein lag gae hai dosti-e-shisha-garan kam bahut hi kam 
itni aziyaton se guzarne ke baad 'rind' KHud par hai zindagi ka guman kam bahut hi kam

tire qarīb bhī dil kuchh bujhā sā rahtā hai ġham-e-firāq kā khaTkā lagā sā rahtā hai 
na jaane kab nigah-e-bāġhbāñ badal jaa.e har aan phūloñ ko dhaḌkā lagā sā rahtā hai 
hazāroñ chāñd sitāre nikal ke Duub ga.e nagar meñ dil ke sadā jhuTpuTā sā rahtā hai 
tumhāre dam se haiñ tanhā.iyāñ bhī bazm-e-nashāt tumhārī yādoñ kā ik jamghaTā sā rahtā hai 
vo ik nigāh ki mafhūm jis ke lākhoñ haiñ usī nigāh kā ik aasrā sā rahtā hai 
tumhāre ishq ne 'mumtāz' kar diyā dil ko ye sab se mil ke bhī sab se judā sā rahtā hai 
tere qarib bhi dil kuchh bujha sa rahta hai gham-e-firaq ka khaTka laga sa rahta hai 
na jaane kab nigah-e-baghban badal jae har aan phulon ko dhaDka laga sa rahta hai 
hazaron chand sitare nikal ke Dub gae nagar mein dil ke sada jhuTpuTa sa rahta hai 
tumhaare dam se hain tanhaiyan bhi bazm-e-nashat tumhaari yaadon ka ek jamghaTa sa rahta hai 
wo ek nigah ki mafhum jis ke lakhon hain usi nigah ka ek aasra sa rahta hai 
tumhaare ishq ne 'mumtaz' kar diya dil ko ye sab se mil ke bhi sab se juda sa rahta hai

ye to achchhā hai ki dukh-dard sunāne lag jaao har kisī ko na magar zaḳhm dikhāne lag jaao 
niil ke pāniyo raste meñ na haa.il honā kyā pata zarb-e-kalīmī se Thikāne lag jaao 
kitnī mushkil se to aa.e ho zarā Thahro bhī sahl andāz meñ is tarah na jaane lag jaao 
sāmne aao to jaise ki gul-e-tar koī aur tanhā.ī meñ phir ashk bahāne lag jaao 
mausam-e-dil jo kabhī zard sā hone lag jaa.e apnā dil ḳhuun karo phuul ugāne lag jaao 
aql samjhā.e to kuchh laaj rakho us kī bhī jab junūñ tez ho to ḳhaak uḌāne lag jaao 
kabhī tanhā.ī meñ baiTho to faqat rote raho phir achānak hī kabhī hañsne-hañsāne lag jaao 
bojh dil par hai nadāmat kā to aisā kar lo mere siine se kisī aur bahāne lag jaao 
ye to achchha hai ki dukh-dard sunane lag jao har kisi ko na magar zaKHm dikhane lag jao 
nil ke paniyo raste mein na hail hona kya pata zarb-e-kalimi se Thikane lag jao 
kitni mushkil se to aae ho zara Thahro bhi sahl andaz mein is tarah na jaane lag jao 
samne aao to jaise ki gul-e-tar koi aur tanhai mein phir ashk bahane lag jao 
mausam-e-dil jo kabhi zard sa hone lag jae apna dil KHun karo phul ugane lag jao 
aql samjhae to kuchh laj rakho us ki bhi jab junun tez ho to KHak uDane lag jao 
kabhi tanhai mein baiTho to faqat rote raho phir achanak hi kabhi hansne-hansane lag jao 
bojh dil par hai nadamat ka to aisa kar lo mere sine se kisi aur bahane lag jao

dukh na sahne kī sazāoñ meñ ghirā rahtā hai shahr kā shahr duāoñ meñ ghirā rahtā hai 
na bulāo to bulātā hī nahīñ hai koī jis ko dekho vo anāoñ meñ ghirā rahtā hai 
koī manzil hai ki duurī meñ chhupī hai kab se koī rasta hai ki paañv meñ ghirā rahtā hai 
dil ko fursat nahīñ miltī kabhī ummīdoñ se ye sukhī 'shāz' gadāoñ meñ ghirā rahtā hai 
dukh na sahne ki sazaon mein ghira rahta hai shahr ka shahr duaon mein ghira rahta hai 
na bulao to bulata hi nahin hai koi jis ko dekho wo anaon mein ghira rahta hai 
koi manzil hai ki duri mein chhupi hai kab se koi rasta hai ki panw mein ghira rahta hai 
dil ko fursat nahin milti kabhi ummidon se ye sukhi 'shaz' gadaon mein ghira rahta hai

sarsabz mausamoñ kā asar le gayā koī thoḌī sī chhāñv de ke shajar le gayā koī 
merā difā.a merā hunar le gayā koī dastār jab bachā.ī to sar le gayā koī 
kyā kyā na shauq-e-dīd the āñkhoñ meñ ḳhema-zan vo rū-ba-rū hue to nazar le gayā koī 
yuuñ bhī huā hai jashn-e-bahārāñ ke naam par shāḳheñ tarāsh Dālīñ shajar le gayā koī 
āñkhoñ ke ār-pār jahālat kī dhuup hai sar se ridā-e-ilm-o-hunar le gayā koī 
lahroñ meñ iztirāb na maujoñ meñ pech-o-tāb dariyā-e-dil se mere bhañvar le gayā koī 
'aḳhtar' nigār-ḳhāna-e-dil dīdanī hai ab dīvāreñ toḌ dī ga.iiñ dar le gayā koī 
sarsabz mausamon ka asar le gaya koi thoDi si chhanw de ke shajar le gaya koi 
mera difaa mera hunar le gaya koi dastar jab bachai to sar le gaya koi 
kya kya na shauq-e-did the aankhon mein KHema-zan wo ru-ba-ru hue to nazar le gaya koi 
yun bhi hua hai jashn-e-bahaaran ke nam par shaKHen tarash Dalin shajar le gaya koi 
aankhon ke aar-par jahaalat ki dhup hai sar se rida-e-ilm-o-hunar le gaya koi 
lahron mein iztirab na maujon mein pech-o-tab dariya-e-dil se mere bhanwar le gaya koi 
'aKHtar' nigar-KHana-e-dil didani hai ab diwaren toD di gain dar le gaya koi

ḳhāksārī thī ki bin dekhe hī ham ḳhaak hue aur kabhī mārka-e-fat.h-o-zafar dekh na paa.e 
us ne dekhā hai to phir dekhnā kyā ho jaa.e dekhte rahnā hai zālim ko idhar dekh na paa.e 
be-hunar dekh na sakte the magar dekhne aa.e dekh sakte the magar ahl-e-hunar dekh na paa.e 
ho ga.e ḳhvāhish-e-nazzāra se be-ḳhud itne dekhnā chāhte the us ko magar dekh na paa.e 
kab use lauT ke dekheñge ye dekhā jaa.e ham ne duniyā to bahut dekh lī ghar dekh na paa.e 
log jab dekhne par aa.e to itnā dekhā aañkh pathrā ga.ī aur had-e-nazar dekh na paa.e 
vo bhī kyā dekhnā thā dekhne vaale bole jalva har-chand rahā pesh-e-nazar dekh na paa.e 
diip jalte rahe tāqoñ meñ ujālā na huā aañkh pāband-e-tahayyur thī udhar dekh na paa.e 
ye tayaqqun nahīñ hotā thā kidhar dekh sake ye ta'ayyun nahīñ hotā thā kidhar dekh na paa.e 
vo taġhāful thā ki us ne hameñ dekhā hī nahīñ vo tasāhul thā ki ham us kī nazar dekh na paa.e 
is qadar tez chalī ab ke havā-e-nā-būd chaah kar shahr-e-tamannā kā khañDar dekh na paa.e 
yuuñ huā dil-zadagāñ lauT ga.e āḳhir-e-shab raat to jaag ke kaaTī thī sahar dekh na paa.e 
kis ne dekhī hai ujāloñ se sulagtī huī raat aur jo dekh sake ḳhvāb-e-sahar dekh na paa.e 
KHaksari thi ki bin dekhe hi hum KHak hue aur kabhi marka-e-fath-o-zafar dekh na pae 
us ne dekha hai to phir dekhna kya ho jae dekhte rahna hai zalim ko idhar dekh na pae 
be-hunar dekh na sakte the magar dekhne aae dekh sakte the magar ahl-e-hunar dekh na pae 
ho gae KHwahish-e-nazzara se be-KHud itne dekhna chahte the us ko magar dekh na pae 
kab use lauT ke dekhenge ye dekha jae hum ne duniya to bahut dekh li ghar dekh na pae 
log jab dekhne par aae to itna dekha aankh pathra gai aur had-e-nazar dekh na pae 
wo bhi kya dekhna tha dekhne wale bole jalwa har-chand raha pesh-e-nazar dekh na pae 
dip jalte rahe taqon mein ujala na hua aankh paband-e-tahayyur thi udhar dekh na pae 
ye tayaqqun nahin hota tha kidhar dekh sake ye ta'ayyun nahin hota tha kidhar dekh na pae 
wo taghaful tha ki us ne hamein dekha hi nahin wo tasahul tha ki hum us ki nazar dekh na pae 
is qadar tez chali ab ke hawa-e-na-bud chah kar shahr-e-tamanna ka khanDar dekh na pae 
yun hua dil-zadagan lauT gae aaKHir-e-shab raat to jag ke kaTi thi sahar dekh na pae 
kis ne dekhi hai ujalon se sulagti hui raat aur jo dekh sake KHwab-e-sahar dekh na pae

kah rahī hai saarī duniyā terā dīvāna mujhe terī nazroñ ne banā Daalā hai afsāna mujhe 
ishq meñ ab mil ga.ī hai mujh ko merāj-e-junūñ ab to vo bhī kah rahe haiñ apnā dīvāna mujhe 
dars-e-ibrat hai tumhāre vāste merā ma.aal ġhuncha o gul ko sunānā hai ye afsāna mujhe 
ik nigāh-e-nāz ne saaqī kī ye kyā kar diyā rafta rafta kah uThe sab pīr-e-mai-ḳhāna mujhe 
tū sarāpā nuur hai maiñ terā aks-e-ḳhās huuñ kah rahe haiñ yuuñ tirā sab ā.īna-ḳhāna mujhe 
sun rahī thī shauq se duniyā jise ai ham-nafas yaad hai haañ yaad hai vo merā afsāna mujhe 
nuur se bhar puur ho jaatī hai bazm-e-ārzū jab kabhī vo dekhte haiñ be-hijābāna mujhe 
al-madad ai zohd baḌh kar rok le mere qadam tishnagī phir le chalī hai sū-e-mai-ḳhāna mujhe 
ham-nafas merī to fitrat hī sanā-e-husn hai ishq ke bande kahā karte haiñ dīvāna mujhe 
mujh ko 'qaisar' mai-kade se nikle ik muddat huī yaad karte haiñ abhī tak jaam o paimāna mujhe 
kah rahi hai sari duniya tera diwana mujhe teri nazron ne bana Dala hai afsana mujhe 
ishq mein ab mil gai hai mujh ko meraj-e-junun ab to wo bhi kah rahe hain apna diwana mujhe 
dars-e-ibrat hai tumhaare waste mera maal ghuncha o gul ko sunana hai ye afsana mujhe 
ek nigah-e-naz ne saqi ki ye kya kar diya rafta rafta kah uThe sab pir-e-mai-KHana mujhe 
tu sarapa nur hai main tera aks-e-KHas hun kah rahe hain yun tera sab aaina-KHana mujhe 
sun rahi thi shauq se duniya jise ai ham-nafas yaad hai han yaad hai wo mera afsana mujhe 
nur se bhar pur ho jati hai bazm-e-arzu jab kabhi wo dekhte hain be-hijabana mujhe 
al-madad ai zohd baDh kar rok le mere qadam tishnagi phir le chali hai su-e-mai-KHana mujhe 
ham-nafas meri to fitrat hi sana-e-husn hai ishq ke bande kaha karte hain diwana mujhe 
mujh ko 'qaisar' mai-kade se nikle ek muddat hui yaad karte hain abhi tak jam o paimana mujhe

kuchh roz maiñ is ḳhaak ke parde meñ rahūñgā phir duur kisī nuur ke haale meñ rahūñgā 
rakkhūñgā kabhī dhuup kī choTī pe rihā.ish paanī kī tarah abr ke TukḌe meñ rahūñgā 
ye shab bhī guzar jā.egī tāroñ se bichhaḌ kar ye shab bhī maiñ kohsār ke darre meñ rahūñgā 
sūraj kī tarah maut mire sar pe rahegī maiñ shaam talak jaan ke ḳhatre meñ rahūñgā 
ubhregī mire zehn ke ḳhaliyoñ se na.ī shakl kab tak maiñ kisī barf ke malbe meñ rahūñgā 
kuchh roz main is KHak ke parde mein rahunga phir dur kisi nur ke haale mein rahunga 
rakkhunga kabhi dhup ki choTi pe rihaish pani ki tarah abr ke TukDe mein rahunga 
ye shab bhi guzar jaegi taron se bichhaD kar ye shab bhi main kohsar ke darre mein rahunga 
suraj ki tarah maut mere sar pe rahegi main sham talak jaan ke KHatre mein rahunga 
ubhregi mere zehn ke KHaliyon se nai shakl kab tak main kisi barf ke malbe mein rahunga

kisī ke ḳhvāb ko ehsās se bāñdhā huā hai bahut puḳhta bahut hī paas se bāñdhā huā hai 
hamāre taḳht ko mashrūt kar rakkhā hai us ne hamāre taaj ko ban-bās se bāñdhā huā hai 
siyāhī umr bhar mere ta.āqub meñ rahegī ki maiñ ne jism ko qirtās se bāñdhā huā hai 
mire isbāt kī chābī ko apne paas rakh kar mire inkār ko ehsās se bāñdhā huā hai 
hamāre ba.ad in ābādiyoñ kī ḳhair kiijo samundar ham ne apnī pyaas se bāñdhā huā hai 
sajā rakkhī hai us ne apnī ḳhātir ek masnad mire āfāq ko anfās se bāñdhā huā hai 
ajab pahre mire afkār par rakkhe haiñ 'ḳhālid' ajab khaTkā mire ehsās se bāñdhā huā hai 
kisi ke KHwab ko ehsas se bandha hua hai bahut puKHta bahut hi pas se bandha hua hai 
hamare taKHt ko mashrut kar rakkha hai us ne hamare taj ko ban-bas se bandha hua hai 
siyahi umr bhar mere taaqub mein rahegi ki main ne jism ko qirtas se bandha hua hai 
mere isbaat ki chabi ko apne pas rakh kar mere inkar ko ehsas se bandha hua hai 
hamare baad in aabaadiyon ki KHair kijo samundar hum ne apni pyas se bandha hua hai 
saja rakkhi hai us ne apni KHatir ek masnad mere aafaq ko anfas se bandha hua hai 
ajab pahre mere afkar par rakkhe hain 'KHalid' ajab khaTka mere ehsas se bandha hua hai

jism ke gharauñde meñ aag shor kartī hai dil meñ jab mohabbat kī chāñdnī utartī hai 
shaam ke dhuñdlakoñ meñ Dūbtā hai yuuñ sūraj jaise aarzū koī mere dil meñ martī hai 
din meñ ek miltī hai aur dūsrī shab meñ dhuup jab bichhaḌtī hai chāñdnī sañvartī hai 
bāġhbāñ ne rokā yā le gayā use bādal baat kyā huī ḳhushbū itnī der kartī hai 
ġham kī band muTThī meñ ret sā mirā jīvan jab zarā kasī muTThī zindagī bikhartī hai 
gaañv ke parind tum ko kyā patā bidesoñ meñ raat ham akeloñ kī kis tarah guzartī hai 
duur mujh se rahte haiñ saare ġham zamāne ke terī yaad kī ḳhushbū dil meñ jab Thahartī hai 
jism ke gharaunde mein aag shor karti hai dil mein jab mohabbat ki chandni utarti hai 
sham ke dhundlakon mein Dubta hai yun suraj jaise aarzu koi mere dil mein marti hai 
din mein ek milti hai aur dusri shab mein dhup jab bichhaDti hai chandni sanwarti hai 
baghban ne roka ya le gaya use baadal baat kya hui KHushbu itni der karti hai 
gham ki band muTThi mein ret sa mera jiwan jab zara kasi muTThi zindagi bikharti hai 
ganw ke parind tum ko kya pata bideson mein raat hum akelon ki kis tarah guzarti hai 
dur mujh se rahte hain sare gham zamane ke teri yaad ki KHushbu dil mein jab Thaharti hai

phir aas de ke aaj ko kal kar diyā gayā hoñToñ ke biich baat ko shal kar diyā gayā 
sadiyoñ kā phok jism sambhāle to kis tarah jab umr ko nichoḌ ke pal kar diyā gayā 
ab to sañvārne ke liye hijr bhī nahīñ saarā vabāl le ke ġhazal kar diyā gayā 
mujh ko mirī majāl se ziyāda junūñ diyā dhaḌkan kī lai ko sāz-e-ajal kar diyā gayā 
kaise bujhā.eñ kaun bujhā.e bujhe bhī kyuuñ is aag ko to ḳhuun meñ hal kar diyā gayā 
phir aas de ke aaj ko kal kar diya gaya honTon ke bich baat ko shal kar diya gaya 
sadiyon ka phok jism sambhaale to kis tarah jab umr ko nichoD ke pal kar diya gaya 
ab to sanwarne ke liye hijr bhi nahin sara wabaal le ke ghazal kar diya gaya 
mujh ko meri majal se ziyaada junun diya dhaDkan ki lai ko saz-e-ajal kar diya gaya 
kaise bujhaen kaun bujhae bujhe bhi kyun is aag ko to KHun mein hal kar diya gaya

niiñd aa.ī na khulā raat kā bistar mujh se guftugū kartā rahā chāñd barābar mujh se 
apnā saaya use ḳhairāt meñ de aayā huuñ dhuup ke Dar se jo lipTā rahā din bhar mujh se 
kaun sī aisī kamī mere ḳhad-o-ḳhāl meñ hai aa.ina ḳhush nahīñ hotā kabhī mil kar mujh se 
kyā musībat hai ki har din kī mashaqqat ke evaz bāñdh jaatā hai koī raat kā patthar mujh se 
dasht kī samt nikal aayā hai merā dariyā bas isī par haiñ ḳhafā saare samundar mujh se 
apne hāthoñ ko jo kashkol banāyā 'gauhar' gir paḌā jaane kahāñ merā muqaddar mujh se 
nind aai na khula raat ka bistar mujh se guftugu karta raha chand barabar mujh se 
apna saya use KHairaat mein de aaya hun dhup ke Dar se jo lipTa raha din bhar mujh se 
kaun si aisi kami mere KHad-o-KHal mein hai aaina KHush nahin hota kabhi mil kar mujh se 
kya musibat hai ki har din ki mashaqqat ke ewaz bandh jata hai koi raat ka patthar mujh se 
dasht ki samt nikal aaya hai mera dariya bas isi par hain KHafa sare samundar mujh se 
apne hathon ko jo kashkol banaya 'gauhar' gir paDa jaane kahan mera muqaddar mujh se

pariyoñ aisā ruup hai jis kā laḌkoñ aisā naañv saare dhande chhoḌ-chhāḌ ke chaliye us ke gaañv 
pakkī saḌkoñ vaale shahr meñ kis se milne jaa.eñ haule se bhī paañv paḌe to baj uThtī haiñ khaḌāñv 
aate haiñ khultā darvāza dekh ke ruk jaate haiñ dil par naqsh biThā jaate haiñ yahī ThiTakte paañv 
pyāsā kavvā jañgal ke chashme meñ Duub marā dīvāna kar detī hai peḌoñ kī mahaktī chhāñv 
abhī na.ī baazī hogī phir se pattā Dāleñge koī baat nahīñ jo haar ga.e haiñ pahlā daañv 
pariyon aisa rup hai jis ka laDkon aisa nanw sare dhande chhoD-chhaD ke chaliye us ke ganw 
pakki saDkon wale shahr mein kis se milne jaen haule se bhi panw paDe to baj uThti hain khaDanw 
aate hain khulta darwaza dekh ke ruk jate hain dil par naqsh biTha jate hain yahi ThiTakte panw 
pyasa kawwa jangal ke chashme mein Dub mara diwana kar deti hai peDon ki mahakti chhanw 
abhi nai bazi hogi phir se patta Dalenge koi baat nahin jo haar gae hain pahla danw

tum mil ga.e to koī gila ab nahīñ rahā maiñ apnī zindagī se ḳhafā ab nahīñ rahā 
pahle mirī nigāh meñ duniyā haqīr thī maiñ apne sāthiyoñ se judā ab nahīñ rahā 
ab bhī usī daraḳht ke nīche mileñge ham saaya agarche us kā ghanā ab nahīñ rahā 
tere qadam ne jaan kahānī meñ Daal dī qissa hamārā be-sar-o-pā ab nahīñ rahā 
ab merī apne āḳhirī dushman se jañg hai maidāñ meñ koī mere sivā ab nahīñ rahā 
ham ko usī dayār kī miTTī huī aziiz naqshe meñ jis kā nām-pata ab nahīñ rahā 
tum mil gae to koi gila ab nahin raha main apni zindagi se KHafa ab nahin raha 
pahle meri nigah mein duniya haqir thi main apne sathiyon se juda ab nahin raha 
ab bhi usi daraKHt ke niche milenge hum saya agarche us ka ghana ab nahin raha 
tere qadam ne jaan kahani mein Dal di qissa hamara be-sar-o-pa ab nahin raha 
ab meri apne aaKHiri dushman se jang hai maidan mein koi mere siwa ab nahin raha 
hum ko usi dayar ki miTTi hui aziz naqshe mein jis ka nam-pata ab nahin raha

kaise dukh kitnī chaah se dekhā tujhe kis kis nigāh se dekhā 
shiddat-e-lā-zavāl se chāhā hasrat-e-be-panāh se dekhā 
itnā sochā tujhe ki duniyā ko ham ne terī nigāh se dekhā 
shauq kyā ġhair-mo'tabar Thahrā tū ne jab ishtibāh se dekhā 
apnī tārīk zindagī meñ tujhe ḳhūb-tar mahr o maah se dekhā 
ahl-e-dil par tirī kashish kā asar apne hāl-e-tabāh se dekhā 
dushmanoñ se jo ġham na dekhā thā koshish-e-ḳhair-ḳhvāh se dekhā 
ġham girāñ-tar hai koh se jaanā ham subuk-tar haiñ kaah se dekhā 
dā.imī dūriyoñ kā sadma 'ziyā' sarsarī rasm-o-rāh se dekhā 
kaise dukh kitni chah se dekha tujhe kis kis nigah se dekha 
shiddat-e-la-zawal se chaha hasrat-e-be-panah se dekha 
itna socha tujhe ki duniya ko hum ne teri nigah se dekha 
shauq kya ghair-mo'tabar Thahra tu ne jab ishtibah se dekha 
apni tarik zindagi mein tujhe KHub-tar mahr o mah se dekha 
ahl-e-dil par teri kashish ka asar apne haal-e-tabah se dekha 
dushmanon se jo gham na dekha tha koshish-e-KHair-KHwah se dekha 
gham giran-tar hai koh se jaana hum subuk-tar hain kah se dekha 
daimi duriyon ka sadma 'ziya' sarsari rasm-o-rah se dekha

na ab vo ḳhush-nazarī hai na ḳhush-ḳhisālī hai ye kyā huā mujhe ye vaz.a kyuuñ banā lī hai 
ye haal hai mire dīvār-o-dar kī vahshat kā ki mere hote hue bhī makān ḳhālī hai 
dam-e-nazāra merī hairatoñ pe ġhaur na kar ki merī aañkh azal yūñhī savālī hai 
mire vajūd ko jis ne jalā ke raakh kiyā vo aag ab tire dāman tak aane vaalī hai 
guzartī shab kā har ik lamha kah gayā mujh se sahar ke ba.ad bhī ik raat aane vaalī hai 
musāfirān-e-rah-e-shauq thak ga.e bhī to kyā jahāñ ruke vahīñ bastī na.ī basā lī hai 
na ab wo KHush-nazari hai na KHush-KHisali hai ye kya hua mujhe ye waza kyun bana li hai 
ye haal hai mere diwar-o-dar ki wahshat ka ki mere hote hue bhi makan KHali hai 
dam-e-nazara meri hairaton pe ghaur na kar ki meri aankh azal yunhi sawali hai 
mere wajud ko jis ne jala ke rakh kiya wo aag ab tere daman tak aane wali hai 
guzarti shab ka har ek lamha kah gaya mujh se sahar ke baad bhi ek raat aane wali hai 
musafiran-e-rah-e-shauq thak gae bhi to kya jahan ruke wahin basti nai basa li hai

kisī ke vāste jiitā hai ab na martā hai har aadmī yahāñ apnā tavāf kartā hai 
sab apnī apnī nigāheñ sameT lete haiñ vo ḳhush-libās sar-e-shām jab bikhartā hai 
maiñ jis kī raah meñ har shab diye jalātā huuñ vo māhtāb zamīñ par kahāñ utartā hai 
hamārā dil bhī hai vīrāñ haveliyoñ kī tarah tamām raat yahāñ koī aah bhartā hai 
maiñ us ke naqsh-e-kaf-e-pā bhī chhū nahīñ saktā vo tez-gām havāoñ ke par katartā hai 
na bām-e-ārzū raushan na sā.ebān-e-talab sarā-e-dil meñ kahāñ koī ab Thahartā hai 
sab apne aap se ḳhā.if haiñ in dinoñ 'aḳhtar' har ek shaḳhs yahāñ aa.ine se Dartā hai 
kisi ke waste jita hai ab na marta hai har aadmi yahan apna tawaf karta hai 
sab apni apni nigahen sameT lete hain wo KHush-libas sar-e-sham jab bikharta hai 
main jis ki rah mein har shab diye jalata hun wo mahtab zamin par kahan utarta hai 
hamara dil bhi hai viran haweliyon ki tarah tamam raat yahan koi aah bharta hai 
main us ke naqsh-e-kaf-e-pa bhi chhu nahin sakta wo tez-gam hawaon ke par katarta hai 
na baam-e-arzu raushan na saeban-e-talab sara-e-dil mein kahan koi ab Thaharta hai 
sab apne aap se KHaif hain in dinon 'aKHtar' har ek shaKHs yahan aaine se Darta hai

maiñ aa rahā thā sitāroñ pe paañv dharte hue badan utaar diyā ḳhaak se guzarte hue 
jamāl mujh pe ye ik din meñ to nahīñ aayā hazār aa.ine TuuTe mire sañvarte hue 
'ajab nazar se charāġhoñ kī samt dekhā hai havā ne zīna-e-pindār se utarte hue 
ik-ādh jaam to pī hī liyā thā ham ne bhī ḳhumār-e-ḳhāna-e-duniyā kī sair karte hue 
na jaane kyā dil-e-sayyād meñ ḳhayāl aayā vo ro diyā thā mire bāl-o-par katarte hue 
ab āsmān bhī kam paḌ rahe haiñ us ke liye qadam zamīn pe rakkhā thā jis ne Darte hue 
vahī sitāra sitāroñ kā hukmarāñ Thahrā laraz rahā thā jo pahlī zaqand bharte hue 
vo aa.ina thā maiñ tāriq-'na.īm' TuuT ke bhī hazār aks banātā gayā bikharte hue 
main aa raha tha sitaron pe panw dharte hue badan utar diya KHak se guzarte hue 
jamal mujh pe ye ek din mein to nahin aaya hazar aaine TuTe mere sanwarte hue 
'ajab nazar se charaghon ki samt dekha hai hawa ne zina-e-pindar se utarte hue 
ik-adh jam to pi hi liya tha hum ne bhi KHumar-e-KHana-e-duniya ki sair karte hue 
na jaane kya dil-e-sayyaad mein KHayal aaya wo ro diya tha mere baal-o-par katarte hue 
ab aasman bhi kam paD rahe hain us ke liye qadam zamin pe rakkha tha jis ne Darte hue 
wahi sitara sitaron ka hukmaran Thahra laraz raha tha jo pahli zaqand bharte hue 
wo aaina tha main tariq-'naim' TuT ke bhi hazar aks banata gaya bikharte hue

dil-e-tabāh ko ab tak nahīñ yaqīñ aayā ki shaam biit ga.ī aur tū nahīñ aayā 
jahāñ se maiñ ne kiyā thā kabhī safar āġhāz maiñ ḳhaak dhuul huā lauT kar vahīñ aayā 
vo jis ke haath se taqrīb-e-dil-numā.ī thī abhī vo lamha-e-maujūd meñ nahīñ aayā 
bas ek baar mirī niiñd chhū gayā koī phir is ke ba.ad har ik ḳhvāb-e-dil-nashīñ aayā 
bichhaḌ ke tujh se tirī yaad bhī nahīñ aa.ī makāñ kī samt palaT kar makīñ nahīñ aayā 
dil-e-tabah ko ab tak nahin yaqin aaya ki sham bit gai aur tu nahin aaya 
jahan se main ne kiya tha kabhi safar aaghaz main KHak dhul hua lauT kar wahin aaya 
wo jis ke hath se taqrib-e-dil-numai thi abhi wo lamha-e-maujud mein nahin aaya 
bas ek bar meri nind chhu gaya koi phir is ke baad har ek KHwab-e-dil-nashin aaya 
bichhaD ke tujh se teri yaad bhi nahin aai makan ki samt palaT kar makin nahin aaya

ye zard phuul ye kāġhaz pe harf giile se tumhārī yaad bhī aa.ī hazār hiile se 
badan kā lams havā ko banā gayā ḳhushbū nazar ke sehr se manzar hue nashīle se 
ye zindagī bhī faqat ret kā samundar hai kabhī nigāh jo Daalo fanā ke Tiile se 
ye shā.irī mujhe 'shahbāz' yuuñ bhī pyārī hai ki merā ḳhud se ta.alluq hai is vasīle se 
ye zard phul ye kaghaz pe harf gile se tumhaari yaad bhi aai hazar hile se 
badan ka lams hawa ko bana gaya KHushbu nazar ke sehr se manzar hue nashile se 
ye zindagi bhi faqat ret ka samundar hai kabhi nigah jo Dalo fana ke Tile se 
ye shairi mujhe 'shahbaz' yun bhi pyari hai ki mera KHud se talluq hai is wasile se

duur tak sabza kahīñ hai aur na koī sā.ebāñ zer-e-pā taptī zamīñ hai sar pe jaltā āsmāñ 
jaise do mulkoñ ko ik sarhad alag kartī huī vaqt ne ḳhat aisā khīñchā mere us ke darmiyāñ 
ab ke sailāb-e-balā sab kuchh bahā kar le gayā ab na ḳhvāboñ ke jazīre haiñ na dil kī kashtiyāñ 
lutf un kā ab huā to hai magar kuchh is tarah jaise sahrā se guzar jaa.e koī abr-e-ravāñ 
munhasir hai aisī ik buniyād par us kā yaqīñ jis tarah dosh-e-havā par koī tinkoñ kā makāñ 
be-zabānoñ se ḳhamoshī kā gila kaisā ki jab so ga.e lafzoñ kī chādar taan kar ahl-e-zabāñ 
ye safar kaisā hai 'mohsin' jitnā baḌhte jā.iye baḌhtī jaa.eñ utnī hī manzil-ba-manzil dūriyāñ 
dur tak sabza kahin hai aur na koi saeban zer-e-pa tapti zamin hai sar pe jalta aasman 
jaise do mulkon ko ek sarhad alag karti hui waqt ne KHat aisa khincha mere us ke darmiyan 
ab ke sailab-e-bala sab kuchh baha kar le gaya ab na KHwabon ke jazire hain na dil ki kashtiyan 
lutf un ka ab hua to hai magar kuchh is tarah jaise sahra se guzar jae koi abr-e-rawan 
munhasir hai aisi ek buniyaad par us ka yaqin jis tarah dosh-e-hawa par koi tinkon ka makan 
be-zabanon se KHamoshi ka gila kaisa ki jab so gae lafzon ki chadar tan kar ahl-e-zaban 
ye safar kaisa hai 'mohsin' jitna baDhte jaiye baDhti jaen utni hi manzil-ba-manzil duriyan

ham apne zaḳhm kuredte haiñ vo zaḳhm parā.e dhote the jo ham se ziyāda jānte the vo ham se ziyāda rote the 
achchhoñ ko jahāñ se uTThe hue ab kitnī dahā.iyāñ biit chukīñ āḳhir meñ udhar jo guzre haiñ shāyad un ke par-pote the 
in peḌoñ aur pahāḌoñ se in jhīloñ in maidānoñ se kis moḌ pe jaane chhūT ga.e kaise yārāne hote the 
jo shabd uḌāneñ bharte the āzād fazā-e-ma.anī meñ yuuñ sher kī bandish meñ simTe goyā pinjroñ ke tote the 
vo bhīge lamhe soch bhare vo jazboñ ke chaqmāq kahāñ jo misra-e-tar de jaate the lafzoñ meñ aag pirote the 
ye ḳhushk qalam banjar kāġhaz dikhlā.eñ kise samjhā.eñ kyā ham fasl nirālī kāTte the ham biij anokhe bote the 
ab 'sāz' nasheboñ meñ dil ke bas kīchaḌ kaalī daldal hai yaañ shauq ke Dhalte jharne the yaañ ġham ke ubalte sote the 
hum apne zaKHm kuredte hain wo zaKHm parae dhote the jo hum se ziyaada jaante the wo hum se ziyaada rote the 
achchhon ko jahan se uTThe hue ab kitni dahaiyan bit chukin aaKHir mein udhar jo guzre hain shayad un ke par-pote the 
in peDon aur pahaDon se in jhilon in maidanon se kis moD pe jaane chhuT gae kaise yarane hote the 
jo shabd uDanen bharte the aazad faza-e-mani mein yun sher ki bandish mein simTe goya pinjron ke tote the 
wo bhige lamhe soch bhare wo jazbon ke chaqmaq kahan jo misra-e-tar de jate the lafzon mein aag pirote the 
ye KHushk qalam banjar kaghaz dikhlaen kise samjhaen kya hum fasl nirali kaTte the hum bij anokhe bote the 
ab 'saz' nashebon mein dil ke bas kichaD kali daldal hai yan shauq ke Dhalte jharne the yan gham ke ubalte sote the

na aa.e sāmne mere agar nahīñ aatā mujhe to us ke sivā kuchh nazar nahīñ aatā 
balā use bhī to kahte haiñ log aalam meñ ajab hai kis liye vo mere ghar nahīñ aatā 
vo mere sāmne tuubā ko qad se maap chuke unhoñ ke nām-e-ḳhudā tā-kamar nahīñ aatā 
na be-ḳhatar raho mujh se ki dard-mandoñ ke laboñ pe naala koī be-ḳhatar nahīñ aatā 
Darā diyā hai kisī ne use magar 'ārif' mire ḳharābe kī jānib ḳhizar nahīñ aatā 
na aae samne mere agar nahin aata mujhe to us ke siwa kuchh nazar nahin aata 
bala use bhi to kahte hain log aalam mein ajab hai kis liye wo mere ghar nahin aata 
wo mere samne tuba ko qad se map chuke unhon ke nam-e-KHuda ta-kamar nahin aata 
na be-KHatar raho mujh se ki dard-mandon ke labon pe nala koi be-KHatar nahin aata 
Dara diya hai kisi ne use magar 'arif' mere KHarabe ki jaanib KHizar nahin aata

chāndnī kā raqs dariyā par nahīñ dekhā gayā aap yaad aa.e to ye manzar nahīñ dekhā gayā 
aap ke jaate hī ham ko lag ga.ī āvārgī aap ke jaate hī ham se ghar nahīñ dekhā gayā 
apnī saarī kaj-kulāhī dāstāñ ho kar rahī ishq jab maz.hab kiyā to sar nahīñ dekhā gayā 
phuul ko miTTī meñ miltā dekh kar miTTī hue ham se koī phuul miTTī par nahīñ dekhā gayā 
jism ke andar safar meñ ruuh tak pahuñche magar ruuh ke bāhar rahe andar nahīñ dekhā gayā 
jis gadā ne aap ke dar par sadā dī ek baar us gadā ko phir kisī dar par nahīñ dekhā gayā 
aap ko patthar lage 'jāved' jī dekhā hai ye aap ke hāthoñ meñ go patthar nahīñ dekhā gayā 
chandni ka raqs dariya par nahin dekha gaya aap yaad aae to ye manzar nahin dekha gaya 
aap ke jate hi hum ko lag gai aawargi aap ke jate hi hum se ghar nahin dekha gaya 
apni sari kaj-kulahi dastan ho kar rahi ishq jab mazhab kiya to sar nahin dekha gaya 
phul ko miTTi mein milta dekh kar miTTi hue hum se koi phul miTTi par nahin dekha gaya 
jism ke andar safar mein ruh tak pahunche magar ruh ke bahar rahe andar nahin dekha gaya 
jis gada ne aap ke dar par sada di ek bar us gada ko phir kisi dar par nahin dekha gaya 
aap ko patthar lage 'jawed' ji dekha hai ye aap ke hathon mein go patthar nahin dekha gaya

zehn meñ lagtā hai jab ḳhush-rang lafzoñ kā hujūm dhuñdlā dhuñdlā sā nazar aatā hai logoñ kā hujūm 
'umr bhar ke ai thake haare musāfir hoshiyār manziloñ se pesh-tar hai ik daraḳhtoñ kā hujūm 
us kī yādoñ kā samāñ bhī kis qadar pur-kaif hai jaise gulshan meñ utar aa.e parindoñ kā hujūm 
mehrbāñ jab se hue jangal pe sūraj devtā zard sā lagne lagā sarsabz peḌoñ kā hujūm 
sahm jaatā huuñ akelā pā ke apne aap ko nasb ho dīvār-o-dar meñ jaise āñkhoñ kā hujūm 
'ahd-e-māzī kī taraf chāhā hai dil ne lauTnā dekh kar schōl ke mā'sūm bachchoñ kā hujūm 
zehn mein lagta hai jab KHush-rang lafzon ka hujum dhundla dhundla sa nazar aata hai logon ka hujum 
'umr bhar ke ai thake haare musafir hoshiyar manzilon se pesh-tar hai ek daraKHton ka hujum 
us ki yaadon ka saman bhi kis qadar pur-kaif hai jaise gulshan mein utar aae parindon ka hujum 
mehrban jab se hue jangal pe suraj dewta zard sa lagne laga sarsabz peDon ka hujum 
sahm jata hun akela pa ke apne aap ko nasb ho diwar-o-dar mein jaise aankhon ka hujum 
'ahd-e-mazi ki taraf chaha hai dil ne lauTna dekh kar school ke ma'sum bachchon ka hujum

ajiib Dhañg se maiñ ne yahāñ guzārā kiyā ki dil ko barf kiyā zehn ko sharāra kiyā 
mizāj-e-dard ko sab lafz bhī qubūl na the kisī kisī ko tire ġham kā isti.āra kiyā 
phir us ke ashk bhī us ko adā na kar paa.e vo dukh jo us ke tabassum ne āshkārā kiyā 
ki jaise aañkh ke lagte hī khul ga.iiñ āñkheñ nigāh-e-jāñ ne bahut duur tak nazāra kiyā 
hameñ bhī dekh ki tajsīm-e-nau se guzre haiñ badan ko shīsha kiyā dil ko sañg-pāra kiyā 
ajab mizāj thā tanhā.ī-āshnā ki 'sa.ūd' ḳhud apnā saath bhī mushkil se hī gavārā kiyā 
ajib Dhang se main ne yahan guzara kiya ki dil ko barf kiya zehn ko sharara kiya 
mizaj-e-dard ko sab lafz bhi qubul na the kisi kisi ko tere gham ka istiara kiya 
phir us ke ashk bhi us ko ada na kar pae wo dukh jo us ke tabassum ne aashkara kiya 
ki jaise aankh ke lagte hi khul gain aankhen nigah-e-jaan ne bahut dur tak nazara kiya 
hamein bhi dekh ki tajsim-e-nau se guzre hain badan ko shisha kiya dil ko sang-para kiya 
ajab mizaj tha tanhai-ashna ki 'saud' KHud apna sath bhi mushkil se hi gawara kiya

dil par kisī patthar kā nishāñ yuuñ hī rahegā tā-umr ye shīshe kā makāñ yuuñ hī rahegā 
ham Thahre raheñge kisī tābīr ko thāme āñkhoñ meñ koī ḳhvāb ravāñ yuuñ hī rahegā 
hai dhund meñ Duubā huā is shahr kā manzar kyā jāniye kab tak ye samāñ yuuñ hī rahegā 
kuchh der rahegī abhī bāzār kī raunaq kuchh der ye hone kā gumāñ yuuñ hī rahegā 
bujh jā.egā ik roz tirī yaad kā shola lekin mire siine meñ dhuāñ yuuñ hī rahegā 
lau de to rahā hai mire ḳhvāboñ ke ufuq par lekin ye sitāra bhī kahāñ yuuñ hī rahegā 
dil par kisi patthar ka nishan yun hi rahega ta-umr ye shishe ka makan yun hi rahega 
hum Thahre rahenge kisi tabir ko thame aankhon mein koi KHwab rawan yun hi rahega 
hai dhund mein Duba hua is shahr ka manzar kya jaaniye kab tak ye saman yun hi rahega 
kuchh der rahegi abhi bazar ki raunaq kuchh der ye hone ka guman yun hi rahega 
bujh jaega ek roz teri yaad ka shola lekin mere sine mein dhuan yun hi rahega 
lau de to raha hai mere KHwabon ke ufuq par lekin ye sitara bhi kahan yun hi rahega

hijr-zada ā.ankhoñ se jab aañsū nikle ḳhāmoshī se kisī ne samjhā raat samay do diip jale ḳhāmoshī se 
maiñ bhī aag lagā saktā huuñ is barsāt ke mausam meñ thoḌī duur talak vo mere saath chale ḳhāmoshī se 
shaam kī dhīmī aañch meñ jab ḳhurshīd nahā kar so jaa.e manzar aapas meñ milte haiñ ḳhuub gale ḳhāmoshī se 
barf kī parteñ jab bhī dekhūñ maiñ ūñchī dīvāroñ par jism sulagne lagtā hai aur dil pighle ḳhāmoshī se 
chāhat ke phir phuul khileñge aap kī ye ḳhush-fahmī hai kapḌe mere sāmne mausam ne badle ḳhāmoshī se 
din ke ujāloñ meñ shāyad maiñ ḳhud se bichhḌā rahtā huuñ raat kī tārīkī meñ ik ḳhvāhish machle ḳhāmoshī se 
jab bhī nādīda sapnoñ ne man āñgan meñ raqs kiyā terī yaad ke jugnū chamke raat Dhale ḳhāmoshī se 
mulk-e-suḳhan ke shahzādoñ kī saf meñ khaḌā ho jā.egā gar tire lahje kī dhaḌkan ḳhushbū ugle ḳhāmoshī se 
hijr-zada aaankhon se jab aansu nikle KHamoshi se kisi ne samjha raat samay do dip jale KHamoshi se 
main bhi aag laga sakta hun is barsat ke mausam mein thoDi dur talak wo mere sath chale KHamoshi se 
sham ki dhimi aanch mein jab KHurshid naha kar so jae manzar aapas mein milte hain KHub gale KHamoshi se 
barf ki parten jab bhi dekhun main unchi diwaron par jism sulagne lagta hai aur dil pighle KHamoshi se 
chahat ke phir phul khilenge aap ki ye KHush-fahmi hai kapDe mere samne mausam ne badle KHamoshi se 
din ke ujalon mein shayad main KHud se bichhDa rahta hun raat ki tariki mein ek KHwahish machle KHamoshi se 
jab bhi nadida sapnon ne man aangan mein raqs kiya teri yaad ke jugnu chamke raat Dhale KHamoshi se 
mulk-e-suKHan ke shahzadon ki saf mein khaDa ho jaega gar tere lahje ki dhaDkan KHushbu ugle KHamoshi se

dil ke ghaao jab ā.ankhoñ meñ aate haiñ kitne hī zaḳhmoñ ke shahr basāte haiñ 
karb kī hā-hā-kār liye jismoñ meñ ham jañgal jañgal sahrā sahrā jaate haiñ 
do dariyā bhī jab aapas meñ milte haiñ donoñ apnī apnī pyaas bujhāte haiñ 
sochoñ ko lafzoñ kī sazā dene vaale sapnoñ ke sachche hone se ghabrāte haiñ 
dard kā zinda rahnā pyaas kā mo.ajaza hai dīvāne hī ye ban-bās kamāte haiñ 
tārīḳhoñ meñ guzre maazī kī sūrat ahl-e-junūñ ke naqsh-e-pā mil jaate haiñ 
dukh sukh bhī kartā hai sar bhī phoḌtā hai dīvāroñ se fāriġh ke sau naate haiñ 
dil ke ghao jab aaankhon mein aate hain kitne hi zaKHmon ke shahr basate hain 
karb ki ha-ha-kar liye jismon mein hum jangal jangal sahra sahra jate hain 
do dariya bhi jab aapas mein milte hain donon apni apni pyas bujhate hain 
sochon ko lafzon ki saza dene wale sapnon ke sachche hone se ghabraate hain 
dard ka zinda rahna pyas ka moajaza hai diwane hi ye ban-bas kamate hain 
tariKHon mein guzre mazi ki surat ahl-e-junun ke naqsh-e-pa mil jate hain 
dukh sukh bhi karta hai sar bhi phoDta hai diwaron se farigh ke sau nate hain

jab ziist ke mushkil lamhoñ meñ apne bhī kinārā karte us vaqt bhī ham ai ahl-e-jahāñ hañs hañs ke guzārā karte haiñ 
sayyād ne tere asīroñ ko āḳhir ye kah kar chhoḌ diyā ye log qafas meñ rah kar bhī gulshan kā nazārā karte haiñ 
jazbāt meñ aa kar marnā to mushkil sī koī mushkil hī nahīñ ai jān-e-jahāñ ham tere liye jiinā bhī gavārā karte haiñ 
mañjdhār meñ naav Duub ga.ī to maujoñ se āvāz aa.ī dariyā-e-mohabbat se 'kausar' yuuñ paar utārā karte haiñ 
jab zist ke mushkil lamhon mein apne bhi kinara karte us waqt bhi hum ai ahl-e-jahan hans hans ke guzara karte hain 
sayyaad ne tere asiron ko aaKHir ye kah kar chhoD diya ye log qafas mein rah kar bhi gulshan ka nazara karte hain 
jazbaat mein aa kar marna to mushkil si koi mushkil hi nahin ai jaan-e-jahan hum tere liye jina bhi gawara karte hain 
manjdhaar mein naw Dub gai to maujon se aawaz aai dariya-e-mohabbat se 'kausar' yun par utara karte hain

chāhā bahut ki ishq kī phir ibtidā na ho rusvā.iyoñ kī apnī kahīñ intihā na ho 
josh-e-vafā kā naam junūñ rakh diyā gayā ai dard aaj zabt-e-fuġhāñ se sivā na ho 
ye ġham nahīñ ki terā karam ham pe kyuuñ nahīñ ye to sitam hai terā kahīñ sāmnā na ho 
kahte haiñ ek shaḳhs kī ḳhātir jiye to kyā achchhā yūñhī sahī to koī aasrā na ho 
ye ishq hadd-e-ġham se guzar kar bhī raaz hai is kashmakash meñ ham sā koī mubtilā na ho 
is shahr meñ hai kaun hamārā tire sivā ye kyā ki tū bhī apnā kabhī ham-navā na ho 
chaha bahut ki ishq ki phir ibtida na ho ruswaiyon ki apni kahin intiha na ho 
josh-e-wafa ka nam junun rakh diya gaya ai dard aaj zabt-e-fughan se siwa na ho 
ye gham nahin ki tera karam hum pe kyun nahin ye to sitam hai tera kahin samna na ho 
kahte hain ek shaKHs ki KHatir jiye to kya achchha yunhi sahi to koi aasra na ho 
ye ishq hadd-e-gham se guzar kar bhi raaz hai is kashmakash mein hum sa koi mubtila na ho 
is shahr mein hai kaun hamara tere siwa ye kya ki tu bhi apna kabhi ham-nawa na ho

ajiib dhund hai ā.ankhoñ ko sūjhtā bhī nahīñ abhī to din kā varaq Thiik se jalā bhī nahīñ 
ye kis hisār meñ sāñsoñ ne kas diyā hai mujhe ye kaisā ghar hai nikalne kā rāsta bhī nahīñ 
ye kaisā dukh hai jo rotā hai siskiyāñ le kar khañDar meñ kaun hai rū-posh boltā bhī nahīñ 
ajiib dard kā rishta hai ik azaab hai ye jise bhulā diyā maiñ ne vo bhūltā bhī nahīñ 
mujhe bhī dekh mire hausle bhī dekh zarā mirā to koī nahīñ tū nahīñ ḳhudā bhī nahīñ 
har ek shab koī palkoñ ko aa ke siitā hai vo merā kaun hai pūchhūñ to boltā bhī nahīñ 
ajib dhund hai aaankhon ko sujhta bhi nahin abhi to din ka waraq Thik se jala bhi nahin 
ye kis hisar mein sanson ne kas diya hai mujhe ye kaisa ghar hai nikalne ka rasta bhi nahin 
ye kaisa dukh hai jo rota hai siskiyan le kar khanDar mein kaun hai ru-posh bolta bhi nahin 
ajib dard ka rishta hai ek azab hai ye jise bhula diya main ne wo bhulta bhi nahin 
mujhe bhi dekh mere hausle bhi dekh zara mera to koi nahin tu nahin KHuda bhi nahin 
har ek shab koi palkon ko aa ke sita hai wo mera kaun hai puchhun to bolta bhi nahin

na saath aa mire maiñ girte fāsloñ meñ huuñ ġhubār-e-dasht huuñ aur tez āñdhiyoñ meñ huuñ 
na jaane qasd kahāñ kā hai kyuuñ nikāle qadam zamāna biit gayā kaisī hijratoñ meñ huuñ 
ḳhud apne shaam o sahar meñ ulajh gayā aisā maiñ āsmāñ huuñ magar apnī gardishoñ meñ huuñ 
bahut kushāda falak hai baḌī basīt zamīñ magar ye sab maiñ sameTe hue paroñ meñ huuñ 
uThā.e phirte haiñ sar merā ek neze par buland huuñ maiñ yahāñ bhī jo dushmanoñ meñ huuñ 
koī bhī hādsa-e-jāñ ho us kā manzar meñ uThā ke dekh lo aḳhbār surḳhiyoñ meñ huuñ 
koī sadā koī halchal nahīñ hai bāhar kī maiñ apnī guuñj meñ huuñ apnī āhaToñ meñ huuñ 
koī bhī aks nahīñ jis meñ merā chehra ho maiñ ā.īna huuñ magar kitnī hairatoñ meñ huuñ 
nasha hai niiñd kā āñkhoñ meñ TūTtā hai badan ki jaise maiñ bhī lagātār ratjagoñ meñ huuñ 
ki jaise mujh ko Duboyā gayā hai paanī meñ ki jaise maiñ koī shātir shanāvaroñ meñ huuñ 
ki jaise mujh ko chaḌhāyā gayā hai suulī par ki jaise maiñ bhī baḌe ūñche sar-phiroñ meñ huuñ 
ki jaise mujh pe hai chhāyā shikār kā aaseb ki jaise maiñ bhī ḳhatarnāk jañgaloñ meñ huuñ 
ki jaise log mujhe dekhne ko aa.e haiñ ki jaise maiñ luTe-hāre musāfiroñ meñ huuñ 
rahūñ maiñ ḳhud ko sameTe hue sambhāle hue ye 'ramz' merī sazā hai ki dostoñ meñ huuñ 
na sath aa mere main girte faslon mein hun ghubar-e-dasht hun aur tez aandhiyon mein hun 
na jaane qasd kahan ka hai kyun nikale qadam zamana bit gaya kaisi hijraton mein hun 
KHud apne sham o sahar mein ulajh gaya aisa main aasman hun magar apni gardishon mein hun 
bahut kushada falak hai baDi basit zamin magar ye sab main sameTe hue paron mein hun 
uThae phirte hain sar mera ek neze par buland hun main yahan bhi jo dushmanon mein hun 
koi bhi hadsa-e-jaan ho us ka manzar mein uTha ke dekh lo aKHbar surKHiyon mein hun 
koi sada koi halchal nahin hai bahar ki main apni gunj mein hun apni aahaTon mein hun 
koi bhi aks nahin jis mein mera chehra ho main aaina hun magar kitni hairaton mein hun 
nasha hai nind ka aankhon mein TuTta hai badan ki jaise main bhi lagatar ratjagon mein hun 
ki jaise mujh ko Duboya gaya hai pani mein ki jaise main koi shatir shanawaron mein hun 
ki jaise mujh ko chaDhaya gaya hai suli par ki jaise main bhi baDe unche sar-phiron mein hun 
ki jaise mujh pe hai chhaya shikar ka aaseb ki jaise main bhi KHatarnak jangalon mein hun 
ki jaise log mujhe dekhne ko aae hain ki jaise main luTe-haare musafiron mein hun 
rahun main KHud ko sameTe hue sambhaale hue ye 'ramz' meri saza hai ki doston mein hun

jab muñDeroñ pe parindoñ kī kumak jaarī thī lafz the lafzoñ meñ ehsās kī sardārī thī 
ab jo lauTā huuñ to pahchān nahīñ hotī hai kahāñ dīvār thī dīvār meñ almārī thī 
vo havelī bhī sahelī thī pahelī jaisī jis kī īñToñ meñ mire ḳhvāb the ḳhuddārī thī 
āḳhirī baar maiñ kab us se milā yaad nahīñ bas yahī yaad hai ik shaam bahut bhārī thī 
pūchhtā phirtā huuñ galiyoñ meñ koī hai koī hai ye vo galiyāñ haiñ jahāñ log the sarshārī thī 
peḌ the chand makānoñ meñ zamānoñ jaise jin kī chhāñv meñ mirī ruuh kī lū jaarī thī 
kyā bhale din the hameñ khel thā hañsnā ronā saañs lenā bhī hameñ jaise adākārī thī 
bas koī ḳhvāb thā aur ḳhvāb ke pas-manzar meñ baaġh thā phuul the ḳhushbū kī numūdārī thī 
ham ne dekhā thā use ujle dinoñ meñ 'hammād' jin dinoñ niind thī aur niind meñ bedārī thī 
jab munDeron pe parindon ki kumak jari thi lafz the lafzon mein ehsas ki sardari thi 
ab jo lauTa hun to pahchan nahin hoti hai kahan diwar thi diwar mein almari thi 
wo haweli bhi saheli thi paheli jaisi jis ki inTon mein mere KHwab the KHuddari thi 
aaKHiri bar main kab us se mila yaad nahin bas yahi yaad hai ek sham bahut bhaari thi 
puchhta phirta hun galiyon mein koi hai koi hai ye wo galiyan hain jahan log the sarshaari thi 
peD the chand makanon mein zamanon jaise jin ki chhanw mein meri ruh ki lu jari thi 
kya bhale din the hamein khel tha hansna rona sans lena bhi hamein jaise adakari thi 
bas koi KHwab tha aur KHwab ke pas-manzar mein bagh tha phul the KHushbu ki numudari thi 
hum ne dekha tha use ujle dinon mein 'hammad' jin dinon nind thi aur nind mein bedari thi

har lamha sairābī kī arzānī hai miTTī ke kuuze meñ ThanDā paanī hai 
chupke chupke rotā hai tanhā.ī meñ vo jo shahr ke har mele kā baanī hai 
nadī kināre shahr panāheñ bāloñ kī sāvan kī bauchhāreñ haiñ tuġhyānī hai 
bāhar dhuup samundar surḳh bagūle bhī andar har ḳhuliye meñ rut barfānī hai 
us ne har zarre ko tilism-ābād kiyā haath hamāre lagī faqat hairānī hai 
mere dasht ko shāyad us ne dekh liyā dhuup shabnamī har-sū manzar dhānī hai 
jaane kyā barsā thā raat charāġhoñ se bhor samay sūraj bhī paanī paanī hai 
us ne har lamha ḳhud ko yuuñ raam kiyā har paikar meñ us kī rām-kahānī hai 
kachchā ghar aatā hai yaad bahut 'amabar' kahne ko shahroñ meñ har āsānī hai 
har lamha sairabi ki arzani hai miTTi ke kuze mein ThanDa pani hai 
chupke chupke rota hai tanhai mein wo jo shahr ke har mele ka bani hai 
nadi kinare shahr panahen baalon ki sawan ki bauchhaaren hain tughyani hai 
bahar dhup samundar surKH bagule bhi andar har KHuliye mein rut barfani hai 
us ne har zarre ko tilism-abaad kiya hath hamare lagi faqat hairani hai 
mere dasht ko shayad us ne dekh liya dhup shabnami har-su manzar dhani hai 
jaane kya barsa tha raat charaghon se bhor samay suraj bhi pani pani hai 
us ne har lamha KHud ko yun ram kiya har paikar mein us ki ram-kahani hai 
kachcha ghar aata hai yaad bahut 'amabar' kahne ko shahron mein har aasani hai

mohabbat ek aisā rāsta hai chalo jitnā ye itnā rāsta hai 
havā hai dhund hai aur tez bārish pahāḌī hai zarā sā rāsta hai 
kabhī uktā gayā maiñ ḳhud hī ḳhud se kabhī apnā hī dekhā rāsta hai 
zamāne ho ga.e haiñ chalte chalte kahāñ jaatā ye dil kā rāsta hai 
kahīñ sāñseñ chaḌhā detā hai merī kahīñ āhista chaltā rāsta hai 
vahī oḌhī huī hai dhuul ab tak vahī pairoñ se lipTā rāsta hai 
ye kaise moḌ par maiñ aa gayā huuñ ki chaltā huuñ to chaltā rāsta hai 
mohabbat hausla hai apnā apnā kahīñ manzil kisī kā rāsta hai 
sabhī kī apnī apnī manzileñ 'shāz' sabhī kā apnā apnā rāsta hai 
mohabbat ek aisa rasta hai chalo jitna ye itna rasta hai 
hawa hai dhund hai aur tez barish pahaDi hai zara sa rasta hai 
kabhi ukta gaya main KHud hi KHud se kabhi apna hi dekha rasta hai 
zamane ho gae hain chalte chalte kahan jata ye dil ka rasta hai 
kahin sansen chaDha deta hai meri kahin aahista chalta rasta hai 
wahi oDhi hui hai dhul ab tak wahi pairon se lipTa rasta hai 
ye kaise moD par main aa gaya hun ki chalta hun to chalta rasta hai 
mohabbat hausla hai apna apna kahin manzil kisi ka rasta hai 
sabhi ki apni apni manzilen 'shaz' sabhi ka apna apna rasta hai

surḳhi-e-shām ne yuuñ phuul bikhere dil meñ jaise chupke se utar aa.e savere dil meñ 
ham to sadiyoñ se yuuñ hī gosh bar-āvāz rahe jaane vo kaun hai kyā raaz haiñ tere dil meñ 
paas shab bhar koī ḳhurshīd-sifat rahtā hai din to taare se utar aate haiñ mere dil meñ 
pyaar kī lū se munavvar hai shabistān-e-visāl aaj to aan mile shaam savere dil meñ 
ham musāfir haiñ mohabbat kī kaThin rāhoñ ke thak bhī jaate haiñ to karte haiñ basere dil meñ 
kyuuñ bhaTaktā hai idhar aa ke zarā sustā le is taraf dhuup hai bādal hai ghanere dil meñ 
apnā sarmāya-e-fan phir bhī salāmat hī rahā kitnī hī baar 'jamīl' aa.e luTere dil meñ 
surKHi-e-sham ne yun phul bikhere dil mein jaise chupke se utar aae sawere dil mein 
hum to sadiyon se yun hi gosh bar-awaz rahe jaane wo kaun hai kya raaz hain tere dil mein 
pas shab bhar koi KHurshid-sifat rahta hai din to tare se utar aate hain mere dil mein 
pyar ki lu se munawwar hai shabistan-e-visal aaj to aan mile sham sawere dil mein 
hum musafir hain mohabbat ki kaThin rahon ke thak bhi jate hain to karte hain basere dil mein 
kyun bhaTakta hai idhar aa ke zara susta le is taraf dhup hai baadal hai ghanere dil mein 
apna sarmaya-e-fan phir bhi salamat hi raha kitni hi bar 'jamil' aae luTere dil mein

chalte chalte rāhoñ se kaT jaanā paḌtā hai hote hote manzar se haT jaanā paḌtā hai 
dekhnā paḌ jaatā hai ḳhud ko kar ke ek tamāshā.ī apnī dhuul uḌā kar ḳhud aT jaanā paḌtā hai 
ḳhattātī se duur bhaTakne vaale soch ke dāman ko kore kāġhaz ke hāthoñ phaT jaanā paḌtā hai 
sāzīna jab qadam baḌhātā hai us kī pāzeboñ kā kānoñ ko jhankār kī aahaT jaanā paḌtā hai 
ḳhvāhish mar jaa.e to us kī chitā ko aag dikhāne meñ dhaḌkan dhaḌkan dil ke marghaT jaanā paḌtā hai 
taab nahīñ ho jis meñ kāñch ko reza reza karne kī us patthar ko TukḌoñ meñ baT jaanā paḌtā hai 
ḳhud ke mutlāshī ko ek na ik din āḳhir-kār apne bhūle-bisre hue kī chaukhaT jaanā paḌtā hai 
sachchā.ī vo jang hai jis meñ ba.az auqāt sipāhī ko aap muqābil apne hī DaT jaanā paḌtā hai 
ik chingārī aag lagā jaatī hai ban meñ aur kabhī ek kiran se zulmat ko chhaT jaanā paḌtā hai 
baat riyā-kārī ke bin ban paatī nahīñ hai 'ḳhāvar' is dozaḳh meñ karvaT karvaT jaanā paḌtā hai 
chalte chalte rahon se kaT jaana paDta hai hote hote manzar se haT jaana paDta hai 
dekhna paD jata hai KHud ko kar ke ek tamashai apni dhul uDa kar KHud aT jaana paDta hai 
KHattati se dur bhaTakne wale soch ke daman ko kore kaghaz ke hathon phaT jaana paDta hai 
sazina jab qadam baDhata hai us ki pazebon ka kanon ko jhankar ki aahaT jaana paDta hai 
KHwahish mar jae to us ki chita ko aag dikhane mein dhaDkan dhaDkan dil ke marghaT jaana paDta hai 
tab nahin ho jis mein kanch ko reza reza karne ki us patthar ko TukDon mein baT jaana paDta hai 
KHud ke mutlashi ko ek na ek din aaKHir-kar apne bhule-bisre hue ki chaukhaT jaana paDta hai 
sachchai wo jang hai jis mein baz auqat sipahi ko aap muqabil apne hi DaT jaana paDta hai 
ek chingari aag laga jati hai ban mein aur kabhi ek kiran se zulmat ko chhaT jaana paDta hai 
baat riya-kari ke bin ban pati nahin hai 'KHawar' is dozaKH mein karwaT karwaT jaana paDta hai

duniyā se duniyā meñ rah kar kaise kināra kar rakkhā hai dekh to aa kar kis sūrat se ham ne guzāra kar rakkhā hai 
pahle to ham duniyā samjhe lekin ab ehsās huā hai josh-e-junūñ meñ ham ne ḳhud ko paara paara kar rakkhā hai 
itnā nuur kahāñ se lā.ūñ tārīkī ke is jañgal meñ do jugnū hī paas the apne jin ko sitāra kar rakkhā hai 
dekh sako to dekh lo aa kar merā kamāl-e-āḳhir bhī tum shab ke rañg se miltī lau ko kaise sharāra kar rakkhā hai 
itne shoḳh kahāñ hote the mujh ko to yuuñ lagtā hai rañgoñ ko chupke se us ne koī ishāra kar rakkhā hai 
duniya se duniya mein rah kar kaise kinara kar rakkha hai dekh to aa kar kis surat se hum ne guzara kar rakkha hai 
pahle to hum duniya samjhe lekin ab ehsas hua hai josh-e-junun mein hum ne KHud ko para para kar rakkha hai 
itna nur kahan se laun tariki ke is jangal mein do jugnu hi pas the apne jin ko sitara kar rakkha hai 
dekh sako to dekh lo aa kar mera kamal-e-aKHir bhi tum shab ke rang se milti lau ko kaise sharara kar rakkha hai 
itne shoKH kahan hote the mujh ko to yun lagta hai rangon ko chupke se us ne koi ishaara kar rakkha hai

tire sāmne to samajh rahā thā ki phuul thā tujhe kyā ḳhabar ki ye aa.inā thā ki phuul thā 
tirā paañv shaam pe aa gayā thā ki chāñd thā tirā hijr sub.h ko jal uThā thā ki phuul thā 
tirā husn-e-sehr thā mumkināt kī had na thī kaf-e-dast par tire ḳhaar ugā thā ki phuul thā 
vo kamāl ruḳh thā kiran thī us pe kalī bhī thī jo gale milā sar-e-shab diyā thā ki phuul thā 
ye chaman bahisht ke the ki maañ kā vajūd thā ye duā kā haath mahak uThā thā ki phuul thā 
tere samne to samajh raha tha ki phul tha tujhe kya KHabar ki ye aaina tha ki phul tha 
tera panw sham pe aa gaya tha ki chand tha tera hijr subh ko jal uTha tha ki phul tha 
tera husn-e-sehr tha mumkinat ki had na thi kaf-e-dast par tere KHar uga tha ki phul tha 
wo kamal ruKH tha kiran thi us pe kali bhi thi jo gale mila sar-e-shab diya tha ki phul tha 
ye chaman bahisht ke the ki man ka wajud tha ye dua ka hath mahak uTha tha ki phul tha

fikr kam bayān kam rah ga.ī zabān kam 
dhuup meñ Dhalān kam raushnī meñ jaan kam 
bārishoñ kī intihā chhat pe āsmān kam 
zalzaloñ ne kar diye shahr ke makān kam 
ḳhāmushī hī ḳhāmushī murġh kī azaan kam 
dhuup sho.ala-bār hai chhāñv kā gumān kam 
jism meñ tanāo hai haDDiyoñ meñ jaan kam 
'riñd' ab sukūñ kahāñ hai azaab jaan kam 
fikr kam bayan kam rah gai zaban kam 
dhup mein Dhalan kam raushni mein jaan kam 
barishon ki intiha chhat pe aasman kam 
zalzalon ne kar diye shahr ke makan kam 
KHamushi hi KHamushi murgh ki azan kam 
dhup shoala-bar hai chhanw ka guman kam 
jism mein tanao hai haDDiyon mein jaan kam 
'rind' ab sukun kahan hai azab jaan kam

jaane kis liye rūThī aise zindagī ham se naam tak nahīñ pūchhā baat bhī na kī ham se 
dekho vaqt kī aahaT tez hotī jaatī hai jo savāl baaqī haiñ pūchh lo abhī ham se 
koī ġham idhar aa.e us ko ghūrtī kyuuñ hai aur chāhtī kyā hai ab tirī ḳhushī ham se 
ek bhūlī-bisrī yaad aaj yaad kyuuñ aa.ī kyuuñ kisī ke milne kī aarzū milī ham se 
us kī ek uñglī par ghūmtī rahī duniyā chāñd kī tarah har shai duur ho ga.ī ham se 
jaane kis liye ruThi aise zindagi hum se nam tak nahin puchha baat bhi na ki hum se 
dekho waqt ki aahaT tez hoti jati hai jo sawal baqi hain puchh lo abhi hum se 
koi gham idhar aae us ko ghurti kyun hai aur chahti kya hai ab teri KHushi hum se 
ek bhuli-bisri yaad aaj yaad kyun aai kyun kisi ke milne ki aarzu mili hum se 
us ki ek ungli par ghumti rahi duniya chand ki tarah har shai dur ho gai hum se

dasht-o-sahrā kī kahāñ ab zindagānī chāhiye aur agar aisā hai to hoñToñ ko paanī chāhiye 
sochtā huuñ mere dil tak kis tarah pahuñche koī be-nishāñ ghar ke liye kuchh to nishānī chāhiye 
putliyoñ par raqs karnā hī kalām-e-fan nahīñ dard ke aañsū ko to paiham ravānī chāhiye 
ik sunahrā ḳhvāb merī niiñd ko darkār hai ḳhvāb ko bhī niiñd hī kī pāsbānī chāhiye 
raat guzrī hai hisār-e-karb meñ ai 'maz.harī' shaam ab dil ke liye koī suhānī chāhiye 
dasht-o-sahra ki kahan ab zindagani chahiye aur agar aisa hai to honTon ko pani chahiye 
sochta hun mere dil tak kis tarah pahunche koi be-nishan ghar ke liye kuchh to nishani chahiye 
putliyon par raqs karna hi kalam-e-fan nahin dard ke aansu ko to paiham rawani chahiye 
ek sunahra KHwab meri nind ko darkar hai KHwab ko bhi nind hi ki pasbani chahiye 
raat guzri hai hisar-e-karb mein ai 'mazhari' sham ab dil ke liye koi suhani chahiye

ḳhaak dekhī hai shafaq-zār falak dekhā hai zarf bhar terī tamannā meñ bhaTak dekhā hai 
aisā lagtā hai koī dekh rahā hai mujh ko laakh is vahm ko sochoñ se jhaTak dekhā hai 
qudrat-e-zabt bhī logoñ ko dikhā.ī ham ne sūrat-e-ashk bhī āñkhoñ se chhalak dekhā hai 
jaane tum kaun se manzar meñ chhupe baiThe ho merī āñkhoñ ne bahut duur talak dekhā hai 
raat kā ḳhauf nahīñ ghaTtā añdherā to kujā sab tarah-dār sitāroñ ne chamak dekhā hai 
ek muddat se use dekh rahā huuñ 'ahmad' aur lagtā hai abhī ek jhalak dekhā hai 
KHak dekhi hai shafaq-zar falak dekha hai zarf bhar teri tamanna mein bhaTak dekha hai 
aisa lagta hai koi dekh raha hai mujh ko lakh is wahm ko sochon se jhaTak dekha hai 
qudrat-e-zabt bhi logon ko dikhai hum ne surat-e-ashk bhi aankhon se chhalak dekha hai 
jaane tum kaun se manzar mein chhupe baiThe ho meri aankhon ne bahut dur talak dekha hai 
raat ka KHauf nahin ghaTta andhera to kuja sab tarah-dar sitaron ne chamak dekha hai 
ek muddat se use dekh raha hun 'ahmad' aur lagta hai abhi ek jhalak dekha hai

ishq se bach ke kidhar jā.eñge ham hai ye maujūd jidhar jā.eñge ham 
tan ke bas rakhiye qabza par haath dekhiye muft meñ Dar jā.eñge ham 
terī dahlīz par apne sar ko ek din kaaT ke dhar jā.eñge ham 
vo ye kahte haiñ na de dil ham ko dekh lete hī mukar jā.eñge ham 
man.a karte ho abas yaaro aaj us ke ghar jā.eñge par jā.eñge ham 
dil kī lenī hai ḳhabar ham ko zarūr aaj to phir bhī udhar jā.eñge ham 
dam kahīñ leñge na phir tā-ba-adam tere kūcha se agar jā.eñge ham 
tū na guzregā jafā se zālim jaan se apnī guzar jā.eñge ham 
ziist baaqī hai to apnā 'rañgīñ' naam is ishq meñ kar jā.eñge ham 
ishq se bach ke kidhar jaenge hum hai ye maujud jidhar jaenge hum 
tan ke bas rakhiye qabza par hath dekhiye muft mein Dar jaenge hum 
teri dahliz par apne sar ko ek din kaT ke dhar jaenge hum 
wo ye kahte hain na de dil hum ko dekh lete hi mukar jaenge hum 
mana karte ho abas yaro aaj us ke ghar jaenge par jaenge hum 
dil ki leni hai KHabar hum ko zarur aaj to phir bhi udhar jaenge hum 
dam kahin lenge na phir ta-ba-adam tere kucha se agar jaenge hum 
tu na guzrega jafa se zalim jaan se apni guzar jaenge hum 
zist baqi hai to apna 'rangin' nam is ishq mein kar jaenge hum

sadā-e-dil na kahīñ dhaḌkanoñ meñ gum ho jaa.e ye qāfila na kahīñ rāstoñ meñ gum ho jaa.e 
ye dil kā dard jo āñkhoñ meñ aa gayā hai mirī maiñ chāhtā thā mire qahqahoñ meñ gum ho jaa.e 
tujhe ḳhabar bhī hai ye be-hisoñ kī bastī hai tirī sadā na kahīñ pattharoñ meñ gum ho jaa.e 
maiñ ḳhud ko DhūñDhne niklā to kho gayā jaise nikal ke ghar se koī rāstoñ meñ gum ho jaa.e 
na jaane aaj hai tāroñ ko kyuuñ ye andesha ye raat bhī na kahīñ jugnuoñ meñ gum ho jaa.e 
maiñ bār-hā tirī yādoñ meñ is tarah khoyā ki jaise koī nadī jañgaloñ meñ gum ho jaa.e 
chaman se kyuuñ na shikāyat ho 'shād' rañgoñ ko har ek phuul agar ḳhushbuoñ meñ gum ho jaa.e 
sada-e-dil na kahin dhaDkanon mein gum ho jae ye qafila na kahin raston mein gum ho jae 
ye dil ka dard jo aankhon mein aa gaya hai meri main chahta tha mere qahqahon mein gum ho jae 
tujhe KHabar bhi hai ye be-hison ki basti hai teri sada na kahin pattharon mein gum ho jae 
main KHud ko DhunDhne nikla to kho gaya jaise nikal ke ghar se koi raston mein gum ho jae 
na jaane aaj hai taron ko kyun ye andesha ye raat bhi na kahin jugnuon mein gum ho jae 
main bar-ha teri yaadon mein is tarah khoya ki jaise koi nadi jangalon mein gum ho jae 
chaman se kyun na shikayat ho 'shad' rangon ko har ek phul agar KHushbuon mein gum ho jae

shīsha lab se judā nahīñ hotā nashsha phir bhī sivā nahīñ hotā 
dard-e-dil jab sivā nahīñ hotā ishq meñ kuchh mazā nahīñ hotā 
har nazar surmagīñ to hotī hai har hasīñ dilrubā nahīñ hotā 
haañ ye duniyā burā banātī hai varna insāñ burā nahīñ hotā 
asr-e-hāzir hai jab qayāmat-ḳhez hashr phir kyuuñ bapā nahīñ hotā 
pārsā rind ho to saktā hai rind kyuuñ pārsā nahīñ hotā 
sher ke fan meñ aur bayāñ meñ 'azīz' 'momin' ab dūsrā nahīñ hotā 
shisha lab se juda nahin hota nashsha phir bhi siwa nahin hota 
dard-e-dil jab siwa nahin hota ishq mein kuchh maza nahin hota 
har nazar surmagin to hoti hai har hasin dilruba nahin hota 
han ye duniya bura banati hai warna insan bura nahin hota 
asr-e-hazir hai jab qayamat-KHez hashr phir kyun bapa nahin hota 
parsa rind ho to sakta hai rind kyun parsa nahin hota 
sher ke fan mein aur bayan mein 'aziz' 'momin' ab dusra nahin hota

tahlīl mausamoñ meñ kar ke ajab nasha sā phailā huā hai har-sū kuchh din se rat-jagā sā 
milte haiñ roz un se hasrat kī sarhadoñ par rahtā hai phir bhī haa.il kyuuñ jaane fāsla sā 
barsoñ ke sab marāsim toḌe haiñ us ne aise pal bhar meñ TuuT jaa.e jis tarah aa.inā sā 
taaza rafāqatoñ ke pur-kaif silsiloñ meñ rahtā hai dil na jaane ab kyuuñ Darā Darā sā 
merī balā se chāhat kī laakh bārisheñ hoñ maiñ pahle bhī thā pyāsā maiñ aaj bhī huuñ pyāsā 
donoñ meñ aaj tak vo pahlī sī tishnagī hai phir vasl meñ nahīñ kyuuñ vo lutf ibtidā sā 
tanhā.iyoñ kī zad meñ rahtī hai ruuh merī is vāste huuñ yaaro maiñ aaj kal bujhā sā 
Takrā ga.e jo un se ham raah meñ achānak ik dāstāñ huī phir vo hadisā zarā sā 
jis par nigāh Thahrī jān-e-'ḳhayāl' apnī vo ajnabī hai lekin lagtā hai āshnā sā 
tahlil mausamon mein kar ke ajab nasha sa phaila hua hai har-su kuchh din se rat-jaga sa 
milte hain roz un se hasrat ki sarhadon par rahta hai phir bhi hail kyun jaane fasla sa 
barson ke sab marasim toDe hain us ne aise pal bhar mein TuT jae jis tarah aaina sa 
taza rafaqaton ke pur-kaif silsilon mein rahta hai dil na jaane ab kyun Dara Dara sa 
meri bala se chahat ki lakh barishen hon main pahle bhi tha pyasa main aaj bhi hun pyasa 
donon mein aaj tak wo pahli si tishnagi hai phir wasl mein nahin kyun wo lutf ibtida sa 
tanhaiyon ki zad mein rahti hai ruh meri is waste hun yaro main aaj kal bujha sa 
Takra gae jo un se hum rah mein achanak ek dastan hui phir wo hadisa zara sa 
jis par nigah Thahri jaan-e-'KHayal' apni wo ajnabi hai lekin lagta hai aashna sa

shikast-e-āsmāñ ho jā.ūñgā maiñ zamīñ ko oḌh kar so jā.ūñgā maiñ 
ḳhalāoñ meñ mujhe DhūñDā karoge nazar se duur jab ho jā.ūñgā maiñ 
taḌap jis kī banā detī hai pāgal vo yād-e-ham-safar ho jā.ūñgā maiñ 
tumhārī aañkh ho jā.egī zaḳhmī jahāñ kī gard meñ kho jā.ūñgā maiñ 
mire sajde kabhī rusvā na hoñge tumhārā sañg-e-dar ho jā.ūñgā maiñ 
tirī sahrā-navardī par hañseñge vo jañgalī phuul jo bo jā.ūñgā maiñ 
guzar kar dasht se 'sālim' junūñ ke safar kī aabrū ho jā.ūñgā maiñ 
shikast-e-asman ho jaunga main zamin ko oDh kar so jaunga main 
KHalaon mein mujhe DhunDa karoge nazar se dur jab ho jaunga main 
taDap jis ki bana deti hai pagal wo yaad-e-ham-safar ho jaunga main 
tumhaari aankh ho jaegi zaKHmi jahan ki gard mein kho jaunga main 
mere sajde kabhi ruswa na honge tumhaara sang-e-dar ho jaunga main 
teri sahra-nawardi par hansenge wo jangali phul jo bo jaunga main 
guzar kar dasht se 'salim' junun ke safar ki aabru ho jaunga main

ġhauġhā khaTpaT chīḳham dhaaḌ uf āvāzoñ ke jhankāḌ 
raat ghanā jañgal aur maiñ ek chanā kyā phoḌe bhaaḌ 
majnūñ kā anjām to soch yaar mire mat kapḌe phaaḌ 
zulmat māregī shab-ḳhūn raushniyoñ kī le kar aaḌ 
apnā ganjā chāñd sambhāl mere sar par dhuul na jhaaḌ 
āḳhir tujh ko māneñge naqqādoñ ko ḳhuub latāḌ 
dekho kab tak baaqī haiñ dariyā jañgal aur pahāḌ 
hamdam-e-derīna hañs-bol yādoñ ke murde na ukhāḌ 
phir sūraj se Takrānā dhartī meñ to panje gaaḌ 
ghaugha khaTpaT chiKHam dhaD uf aawazon ke jhankaD 
raat ghana jangal aur main ek chana kya phoDe bhaD 
majnun ka anjam to soch yar mere mat kapDe phaD 
zulmat maregi shab-KHun raushniyon ki le kar aaD 
apna ganja chand sambhaal mere sar par dhul na jhaD 
aaKHir tujh ko manenge naqqadon ko KHub lataD 
dekho kab tak baqi hain dariya jangal aur pahaD 
hamdam-e-derina hans-bol yaadon ke murde na ukhaD 
phir suraj se Takrana dharti mein to panje gaD

maiñ fat.h-e-zāt manzar tak na pahuñchā mirā tesha mire sar tak na pahuñchā 
use memār likkhā bastiyoñ ne ki jo pahle hī patthar tak na pahuñchā 
tijārat dil kī dhaḌkan gin rahī hai ta.alluq lutf-e-manzar tak na pahuñchā 
shagufta gaal tīkhe ḳhat kā mausam dobāra naḳhl-e-paikar tak na pahuñchā 
bahut chhoTā safar thā zindagī kā maiñ apne ghar ke andar tak na pahuñchā 
ye kaisā pyaas kā mausam hai 'ahmad' samundar dīda-e-tar tak na pahuñchā 
main fath-e-zat manzar tak na pahuncha mera tesha mere sar tak na pahuncha 
use memar likkha bastiyon ne ki jo pahle hi patthar tak na pahuncha 
tijarat dil ki dhaDkan gin rahi hai talluq lutf-e-manzar tak na pahuncha 
shagufta gal tikhe KHat ka mausam dobara naKHl-e-paikar tak na pahuncha 
bahut chhoTa safar tha zindagi ka main apne ghar ke andar tak na pahuncha 
ye kaisa pyas ka mausam hai 'ahmad' samundar dida-e-tar tak na pahuncha

sab ko batā rahā huuñ yahī saaf saaf maiñ jalte diye se kaise karūñ inhirāf meñ 
maiñ ne to āsmān ke rañgoñ kī baat kī kahne lagī zamīn badal duuñ ġhilāf meñ 
gumrāh kab kiyā hai kisī raah ne mujhe chalne lagā huuñ aap hī apne ḳhilāf meñ 
miltā nahīñ hai phir bhī sirā āsmān kā kar kar ke thak chukā huuñ zamīñ kā tavāf meñ 
ab tū bhī aa.ine kī tarah bolne lagā patthar se bhar na duuñ tire muñh kā shigāf meñ 
sab ko bata raha hun yahi saf saf main jalte diye se kaise karun inhiraf mein 
main ne to aasman ke rangon ki baat ki kahne lagi zamin badal dun ghilaf mein 
gumrah kab kiya hai kisi rah ne mujhe chalne laga hun aap hi apne KHilaf mein 
milta nahin hai phir bhi sira aasman ka kar kar ke thak chuka hun zamin ka tawaf mein 
ab tu bhi aaine ki tarah bolne laga patthar se bhar na dun tere munh ka shigaf mein

saa.e phail ga.e khetoñ par kaisā mausam hone lagā dil meñ jo Thahrāo thā ik dam darham-barham hone lagā 
pardesī kā vāpas aanā jhūTī ḳhabar hī niklī nā būḌhī maañ kī aañkh kā taara phir se maddham hone lagā 
bachpan yaad ke rañg-mahal meñ kaise kaise phuul khile Dhol baje aur aañsū Tapke kahīñ moharram hone lagā 
Dhor Dañgar aur pañkh pakherū hazrat-e-insāñ kaaTh kabāḌ ik sailāb meñ bahte bahte sab kā sañgam hone lagā 
sab se yaqīn uThāyā ham ne dost paḌosī din tārīḳh īd-milan ko ghar se nikle shor-e-mātam hone lagā 
sae phail gae kheton par kaisa mausam hone laga dil mein jo Thahrao tha ek dam darham-barham hone laga 
pardesi ka wapas aana jhuTi KHabar hi nikli na buDhi man ki aankh ka tara phir se maddham hone laga 
bachpan yaad ke rang-mahal mein kaise kaise phul khile Dhol baje aur aansu Tapke kahin moharram hone laga 
Dhor Dangar aur pankh pakheru hazrat-e-insan kaTh kabaD ek sailab mein bahte bahte sab ka sangam hone laga 
sab se yaqin uThaya hum ne dost paDosi din tariKH id-milan ko ghar se nikle shor-e-matam hone laga

aa.ine ke āḳhirī iz.hār meñ maiñ bhī huuñ shām-e-abad-āsār meñ 
dekhte hī dekhte gum ho ga.ī raushnī baḌhtī huī raftār meñ 
qatra qatra chhat se hī risne lagī dhuup kā rasta na thā dīvār meñ 
apnī āñkheñ hī maiñ bhuul aayā kahīñ raat itnī bhiiḌ thī bāzār meñ 
baar baar aatā rahā hai terā naam aa.ina hotī huī guftār meñ 
duur tak bichhtī chalī jaatī thī niind ḳhvāb aatā hī na thā iz.hār meñ 
aaine ke aaKHiri izhaar mein main bhi hun sham-e-abad-asar mein 
dekhte hi dekhte gum ho gai raushni baDhti hui raftar mein 
qatra qatra chhat se hi risne lagi dhup ka rasta na tha diwar mein 
apni aankhen hi main bhul aaya kahin raat itni bhiD thi bazar mein 
bar bar aata raha hai tera nam aaina hoti hui guftar mein 
dur tak bichhti chali jati thi nind KHwab aata hi na tha izhaar mein

parda-e-zehn se saaya sā guzar jaatā hai jaise pal bhar ko mirā dil bhī Thahar jaatā hai 
terī yādoñ ke diye jab bhī jalātā hai ye dil husn kuchh aur shab-e-ġham kā nikhar jaatā hai 
hasrateñ dil kī mujassam nahīñ hone pātīñ ḳhvāb banñe nahīñ paatā ki bikhar jaatā hai 
raat bhīge to ik anjān sā benām sā dard chāndnī ban ke fazāoñ meñ bikhar jaatā hai 
raat kaaTe nahīñ kaTtī hai kisī sūrat se din to duniyā ke bakheḌoñ meñ guzar jaatā hai 
us ko bhī kahte haiñ 'mumtāz' vafā kā naġhma dil-e-betāb meñ ghuT ghuT ke jo mar jaatā hai 
parda-e-zehn se saya sa guzar jata hai jaise pal bhar ko mera dil bhi Thahar jata hai 
teri yaadon ke diye jab bhi jalata hai ye dil husn kuchh aur shab-e-gham ka nikhar jata hai 
hasraten dil ki mujassam nahin hone patin KHwab banne nahin pata ki bikhar jata hai 
raat bhige to ek anjaan sa benam sa dard chandni ban ke fazaon mein bikhar jata hai 
raat kaTe nahin kaTti hai kisi surat se din to duniya ke bakheDon mein guzar jata hai 
us ko bhi kahte hain 'mumtaz' wafa ka naghma dil-e-betab mein ghuT ghuT ke jo mar jata hai

aisī taqsīm kī sūrat nikal aa.ī ghar meñ dhuup ne hijr kī dīvār uThā.ī ghar meñ 
sail aisā thā ki sab shahr-e-badan Duub gayā raat bārish ne ajab bazm sajā.ī ghar meñ 
muntazir kitne rahe band darīche saare terī āvāz na phir lauT ke aa.ī ghar meñ 
dar-o-dīvār mahakne lage andāzoñ se maiñ ne tasvīr tirī juuñ hī lagā.ī ghar meñ 
yuuñ hī ik raat use dil se nikālā kyā thā phir mujhe raas koī raat na aa.ī ghar meñ 
aisi taqsim ki surat nikal aai ghar mein dhup ne hijr ki diwar uThai ghar mein 
sail aisa tha ki sab shahr-e-badan Dub gaya raat barish ne ajab bazm sajai ghar mein 
muntazir kitne rahe band dariche sare teri aawaz na phir lauT ke aai ghar mein 
dar-o-diwar mahakne lage andazon se main ne taswir teri jun hi lagai ghar mein 
yun hi ek raat use dil se nikala kya tha phir mujhe ras koi raat na aai ghar mein
