fanā ke dasht meñ kab kā utar gayā thā maiñ tumhārā saath na hotā to mar gayā thā maiñ 
kisī ke dast-e-hunar ne mujhe sameT liyā vagarna paat kī sūrat bikhar gayā thā maiñ 
vo ḳhush-jamāl chaman se guzar ke aayā to mahak uThe the gulāb aur nikhar gayā thā maiñ 
koī to dasht samundar meñ Dhal gayā āḳhir kisī ke hijr meñ ro ro ke bhar gayā thā maiñ 
fana ke dasht mein kab ka utar gaya tha main tumhaara sath na hota to mar gaya tha main 
kisi ke dast-e-hunar ne mujhe sameT liya wagarna pat ki surat bikhar gaya tha main 
wo KHush-jamal chaman se guzar ke aaya to mahak uThe the gulab aur nikhar gaya tha main 
koi to dasht samundar mein Dhal gaya aaKHir kisi ke hijr mein ro ro ke bhar gaya tha main

khulī jab aañkh to dekhā ki duniyā sar pe rakkhī hai ḳhumār-e-hosh meñ samjhe the ham Thokar pe rakkhī hai 
ta.āruf ke tale pahchān ġhā.eb ho ga.ī apnī ajab jaadū kī Topī ham ne apne sar pe rakkhī hai 
mire hone kā ye tasdīq-nāma kis ne likkhā hai gavāhī kis kī merī zaat ke mahzar pe rakkhī hai 
achānak gar vo be-āmad hī kamre meñ barāmad ho tavajjoh ham ne to markūz bām-o-dar pe rakkhī hai 
ajab collage hai qismat kā mahrūmī kā mehnat kā sitāre chhat pe rakkhe haiñ thakan bistar pe rakkhī hai 
matā-e-haq-aqīda ek sajde meñ churā laayā ḳhirad juuyā thī kis dahlīz par kis dar pe rakkhī hai 
nahīñ qaul-o-qarār-e-jān-o-dil kaafī na the us ko qasam us shoḳh ne āḳhir hamāre sar pe rakkhī hai 
hisāb-e-nek-o-bad jo bhī ho ham itnā samajhte haiñ binā-e-hashr dard-e-dil pe chashm-e-tar pe rakkhī hai 
khuli jab aankh to dekha ki duniya sar pe rakkhi hai KHumar-e-hosh mein samjhe the hum Thokar pe rakkhi hai 
taaruf ke tale pahchan ghaeb ho gai apni ajab jadu ki Topi hum ne apne sar pe rakkhi hai 
mere hone ka ye tasdiq-nama kis ne likkha hai gawahi kis ki meri zat ke mahzar pe rakkhi hai 
achanak gar wo be-amad hi kamre mein baramad ho tawajjoh hum ne to markuz baam-o-dar pe rakkhi hai 
ajab collage hai qismat ka mahrumi ka mehnat ka sitare chhat pe rakkhe hain thakan bistar pe rakkhi hai 
mata-e-haq-aqida ek sajde mein chura laya KHirad juya thi kis dahliz par kis dar pe rakkhi hai 
nahin qaul-o-qarar-e-jaan-o-dil kafi na the us ko qasam us shoKH ne aaKHir hamare sar pe rakkhi hai 
hisab-e-nek-o-bad jo bhi ho hum itna samajhte hain bina-e-hashr dard-e-dil pe chashm-e-tar pe rakkhi hai

shajar jalte haiñ shāḳheñ jal rahī haiñ havā.eñ haiñ ki paiham chal rahī haiñ 
talab radd-e-talab donoñ qayāmat ye āñkheñ umr-bhar jal-thal rahī haiñ 
chamaktā chāñd-chehra sāmne thā umañgeñ bahr thiiñ bekal rahī haiñ 
dabe-pāñv mirī tanhā.iyoñ meñ havā.eñ ḳhvāb ban kar chal rahī haiñ 
sahar-dam sohbat-e-rafta kī yādeñ mire pahlū meñ āñkheñ mal rahī haiñ 
tirī yaad aur be-ḳhvābī kī rāteñ ye palkeñ aañkh par bojhal rahī haiñ 
bahut pechīda haiñ chāhat ke andāz ki ab dil-dāriyāñ bhī khal rahī haiñ 
tarāzū haiñ ḳhirad-mandoñ ke dil meñ vahī bāteñ jo be-aTkal rahī haiñ 
'ziyā' un sā.atoñ meñ umr guzrī khulī āñkhoñ se jo ojhal rahī haiñ 
shajar jalte hain shaKHen jal rahi hain hawaen hain ki paiham chal rahi hain 
talab radd-e-talab donon qayamat ye aankhen umr-bhar jal-thal rahi hain 
chamakta chand-chehra samne tha umangen bahr thin bekal rahi hain 
dabe-panw meri tanhaiyon mein hawaen KHwab ban kar chal rahi hain 
sahar-dam sohbat-e-rafta ki yaaden mere pahlu mein aankhen mal rahi hain 
teri yaad aur be-KHwabi ki raaten ye palken aankh par bojhal rahi hain 
bahut pechida hain chahat ke andaz ki ab dil-dariyan bhi khal rahi hain 
taraazu hain KHirad-mandon ke dil mein wahi baaten jo be-aTkal rahi hain 
'ziya' un saaton mein umr guzri khuli aankhon se jo ojhal rahi hain

ik tirī yaad ke sahāre par zindagī kaT ga.ī kināre par 
kaun raste badal rahā hai vahāñ kaun rahtā hai is sitāre par 
raushnī kī agar alāmat hai raakh uḌtī hai kyuuñ sharāre par 
imtihāñ kī ḳhabar nahīñ lekin ro rahā huuñ abhī ḳhasāre par 
jab nazar ko nazar nahīñ aayā zindagī ruk ga.ī nazāre par 
mere isrār par nahīñ aayā jis ko isrār thā ishāre par 
ḳhud-numā.ī kā jaal thā 'sāhil' maiñ ne bhī fikr ke sañvāre par 
ek teri yaad ke sahaare par zindagi kaT gai kinare par 
kaun raste badal raha hai wahan kaun rahta hai is sitare par 
raushni ki agar alamat hai rakh uDti hai kyun sharare par 
imtihan ki KHabar nahin lekin ro raha hun abhi KHasare par 
jab nazar ko nazar nahin aaya zindagi ruk gai nazare par 
mere israr par nahin aaya jis ko israr tha ishaare par 
KHud-numai ka jal tha 'sahil' main ne bhi fikr ke sanware par

tajdīd-e-rivāyāt-e-kuhan karte raheñge sar mārka-e-dār-o-rasan karte raheñge 
vo daur-e-ḳhizāñ ho ki bahāroñ kā zamāna ham yaad tujhe jān-e-chaman karte raheñge 
rangīn tire zikr se ham she'r o suḳhan ko ai jān-e-suḳhan markaz-e-fan karte raheñge 
is ābla-pā.ī pe bhī ham terī talab meñ tai jāda-e-ālām-o-mehan karte raheñge 
duniyā hameñ dīvāna samajhtī hai to samjhe ham 'aam ġham-e-dil kā chalan karte raheñge 
jalte haiñ jise sun ke añdhere ke parastār ham 'aam vahī tarz-e-suḳhan karte raheñge 
gulshan meñ na ham hoñge to phir sog hamārā gul-pairahan o ġhuncha-dahan karte raheñge 
'zāhid' be-tāqāzā-e-vafā tarah-e-yaqīn par ham koshish-e-tāmīr-e-vatan karte raheñge 
tajdid-e-riwayat-e-kuhan karte rahenge sar marka-e-dar-o-rasan karte rahenge 
wo daur-e-KHizan ho ki bahaaron ka zamana hum yaad tujhe jaan-e-chaman karte rahenge 
rangin tere zikr se hum she'r o suKHan ko ai jaan-e-suKHan markaz-e-fan karte rahenge 
is aabla-pai pe bhi hum teri talab mein tai jada-e-alam-o-mehan karte rahenge 
duniya hamein diwana samajhti hai to samjhe hum 'am gham-e-dil ka chalan karte rahenge 
jalte hain jise sun ke andhere ke parastar hum 'am wahi tarz-e-suKHan karte rahenge 
gulshan mein na hum honge to phir sog hamara gul-pairahan o ghuncha-dahan karte rahenge 
'zahid' be-taqaza-e-wafa tarah-e-yaqin par hum koshish-e-tamir-e-watan karte rahenge

ab vo moḌ aayā ki har pal mo'atabar hone ko hai dekhnā manzar nayā dīvār dar hone ko hai 
ab lahū kā rañg gahrā hai mirī tasvīr meñ aisā lagtā hai ki qissa muḳhtasar hone ko hai 
uḌ chalī hai har taraf dāman meñ bhar lene kī baat qatra qatra us ke dariyā kā guhar hone ko hai 
maiñ bhī dekhūñ mujh ko manzar se haTā dene ke ba.ad ab tamāshā kaun sā bār-e-digar hone ko hai 
phir tarāshī jaane vaalī haiñ charāġhoñ kī laveñ shaam hote hote garm aisī ḳhabar hone ko hai 
muḌ ke dekhūñ to aqab meñ kuchh nazar aatā nahīñ sāmne bhī gum nishān-e-rah-guzar hone ko hai 
ab na.ī rāheñ khuleñgī mujh par imkānāt kī 'ramz' mere tan pe zāhir merā sar hone ko hai 
ab wo moD aaya ki har pal mo'atabar hone ko hai dekhna manzar naya diwar dar hone ko hai 
ab lahu ka rang gahra hai meri taswir mein aisa lagta hai ki qissa muKHtasar hone ko hai 
uD chali hai har taraf daman mein bhar lene ki baat qatra qatra us ke dariya ka guhar hone ko hai 
main bhi dekhun mujh ko manzar se haTa dene ke baad ab tamasha kaun sa bar-e-digar hone ko hai 
phir tarashi jaane wali hain charaghon ki lawen sham hote hote garm aisi KHabar hone ko hai 
muD ke dekhun to aqab mein kuchh nazar aata nahin samne bhi gum nishan-e-rah-guzar hone ko hai 
ab nai rahen khulengi mujh par imkanat ki 'ramz' mere tan pe zahir mera sar hone ko hai

maiñ ḳhud ko is liye manzar pe laane vaalā nahīñ ki aa.ina mirī sūrat dikhāne vaalā nahīñ 
tire falak kā agar chāñd bujh gayā hai to kyā diyā zamīñ pe bhī koī jalāne vaalā nahīñ 
samundaroñ kī taraf jā rahā huuñ jaltā huā ki merī aag ko bādal bujhāne vaalā nahīñ 
ye kaun niind meñ aakar sirhāne baiTh gayā maiñ apnā ḳhvāb kisī ko batāne vaalā nahīñ 
ab is qadar bhī takalluf se mil rahe ho kyuuñ tumhāre saath to rishta zamāne vaalā nahīñ 
kamar kamān huī jā rahī yuuñ 'gauhar' maiñ jaise ḳhud ko dobāra uThāne vaalā nahīñ 
main KHud ko is liye manzar pe lane wala nahin ki aaina meri surat dikhane wala nahin 
tere falak ka agar chand bujh gaya hai to kya diya zamin pe bhi koi jalane wala nahin 
samundaron ki taraf ja raha hun jalta hua ki meri aag ko baadal bujhane wala nahin 
ye kaun nind mein aakar sirhane baiTh gaya main apna KHwab kisi ko batane wala nahin 
ab is qadar bhi takalluf se mil rahe ho kyun tumhaare sath to rishta zamane wala nahin 
kamar kaman hui ja rahi yun 'gauhar' main jaise KHud ko dobara uThane wala nahin

is safar meñ nīm-jāñ maiñ bhī nahīñ tū bhī nahīñ aur zer-e-sā.ebāñ maiñ bhī nahīñ tū bhī nahīñ 
zahr meñ Duubī huī parchhā.iyoñ kā raqs hai ḳhud se vābasta yahāñ maiñ bhī nahīñ tū bhī nahīñ 
nā-tamāmī ke sharar meñ roz o shab jalte rahe sach to ye hai be-zabāñ maiñ bhī nahīñ tū bhī nahīñ 
zard lafzoñ ke dhundalke shaam kī āñkhoñ meñ haiñ garche zeb-e-dāstāñ maiñ bhī nahīñ tū bhī nahīñ 
nā-tavāñ jismoñ pe kyuuñ hai gardishoñ kā mor-nāch shab-gazīda āsmāñ maiñ bhī nahīñ tū bhī nahīñ 
be-asar ho jaa.e jis se dil kā zaḳhm-e-ātishīñ marham-e-vahm-o-gumāñ maiñ bhī nahīñ tū bhī nahīñ 
shab kī gahrī ḳhāmushī bhī gosh-bar-āvāz hai āhaToñ kā kārvāñ maiñ bhī nahīñ tū bhī nahīñ 
ehtiyātoñ kī guzargāheñ to pīchhe rah ga.iiñ ab sadā-e-mehrbāñ maiñ bhī nahīñ tū bhī nahīñ 
is safar mein nim-jaan main bhi nahin tu bhi nahin aur zer-e-saeban main bhi nahin tu bhi nahin 
zahr mein Dubi hui parchhaiyon ka raqs hai KHud se wabasta yahan main bhi nahin tu bhi nahin 
na-tamami ke sharar mein roz o shab jalte rahe sach to ye hai be-zaban main bhi nahin tu bhi nahin 
zard lafzon ke dhundalke sham ki aankhon mein hain garche zeb-e-dastan main bhi nahin tu bhi nahin 
na-tawan jismon pe kyun hai gardishon ka mor-nach shab-gazida aasman main bhi nahin tu bhi nahin 
be-asar ho jae jis se dil ka zaKHm-e-atishin marham-e-wahm-o-guman main bhi nahin tu bhi nahin 
shab ki gahri KHamushi bhi gosh-bar-awaz hai aahaTon ka karwan main bhi nahin tu bhi nahin 
ehtiyaton ki guzargahen to pichhe rah gain ab sada-e-mehrban main bhi nahin tu bhi nahin

ik iimā ik ishāra mar rahā hai ufuq par dil ke taarā mar rahā hai 
jo mere ba.ad sab paidā huā thā vo mujh se pahle saarā mar rahā hai 
jise thā phuul kar phaTaknā hī lāzim sikuḌ kar vo ġhubāra mar rahā hai 
ka.ī maujoñ ne dam toḌā thā jis par sunā hai vo kinārā mar rahā hai 
ḳhirad tahlīl sahrā kar rahī hai junūñ kā isti.āra mar rahā hai 
nazar kī maut ik taaza alamiya aur itne meñ nazāra mar rahā hai 
zamāñ-paimā yahī miqyās-e-dil thā magar ab us kā paara mar rahā hai 
mujhe zinda thī jis kī nā-gavārī vo ab mujh ko gavārā mar rahā hai 
kahāñ māñgī huī sāñseñ kahāñ dil jilāyā thaa, dobāra mar rahā hai 
ek ima ek ishaara mar raha hai ufuq par dil ke tara mar raha hai 
jo mere baad sab paida hua tha wo mujh se pahle sara mar raha hai 
jise tha phul kar phaTakna hi lazim sikuD kar wo ghubara mar raha hai 
kai maujon ne dam toDa tha jis par suna hai wo kinara mar raha hai 
KHirad tahlil sahra kar rahi hai junun ka istiara mar raha hai 
nazar ki maut ek taza alamiya aur itne mein nazara mar raha hai 
zaman-paima yahi miqyas-e-dil tha magar ab us ka para mar raha hai 
mujhe zinda thi jis ki na-gawari wo ab mujh ko gawara mar raha hai 
kahan mangi hui sansen kahan dil jilaya tha, dobara mar raha hai

kyā nazāra thā merī āñkhoñ meñ jab vo saarā thā merī āñkhoñ meñ 
ek tūfān thā kahīñ barpā aur dhārā thā merī āñkhoñ meñ 
haal kaisā ye tū ne kar Daalā kitnā pyārā thā merī āñkhoñ meñ 
kuchh bhī dekhā nahīñ thā maiñ ne jab har nazāra thā merī āñkhoñ meñ 
chāñd jab tak nazar na aayā thā taarā taarā thā merī āñkhoñ meñ 
jab kiyā ishq kā safar āġhāz kab kināra thā merī āñkhoñ meñ 
kitnī āñkhoñ se 'shāz' bachte hue koī haarā thā merī āñkhoñ meñ 
kya nazara tha meri aankhon mein jab wo sara tha meri aankhon mein 
ek tufan tha kahin barpa aur dhaara tha meri aankhon mein 
haal kaisa ye tu ne kar Dala kitna pyara tha meri aankhon mein 
kuchh bhi dekha nahin tha main ne jab har nazara tha meri aankhon mein 
chand jab tak nazar na aaya tha tara tara tha meri aankhon mein 
jab kiya ishq ka safar aaghaz kab kinara tha meri aankhon mein 
kitni aankhon se 'shaz' bachte hue koi haara tha meri aankhon mein

dekh kar us hasīn paikar ko nashsha sā aa gayā samundar ko 
Doltī Dagmagātī sī naav pī ga.ī aa ke saare sāgar ko 
ḳhushk peḌoñ meñ jaan paḌne lagī dekh kar ruup ke samundar ko 
bahr pyāse kī justujū meñ hai hai sadaf kī talāsh gauhar ko 
koī to nīm-vā darīchoñ se dekhe is rat-jage ke manzar ko 
ek devī hai muntazir 'fāriġh' vā kiye paT sajā.e mandar ko 
dekh kar us hasin paikar ko nashsha sa aa gaya samundar ko 
Dolti Dagmagati si naw pi gai aa ke sare sagar ko 
KHushk peDon mein jaan paDne lagi dekh kar rup ke samundar ko 
bahr pyase ki justuju mein hai hai sadaf ki talash gauhar ko 
koi to nim-wa darichon se dekhe is rat-jage ke manzar ko 
ek dewi hai muntazir 'farigh' wa kiye paT sajae mandar ko

uns apne meñ kahīñ paayā na begāne meñ thā kyā nasha hai saarā aalam ek paimāne meñ thā 
aah itnī kāvisheñ ye shor-o-shar ye iztirāb ek chuTkī ḳhaak kī do par ye parvāne meñ thā 
aap hī us ne anal-haq kah diyā ilzām kyā hosh kis ne le liyā thā hosh dīvāne meñ thā 
allāh allāh ḳhaak meñ milte hī ye pā-e-samar lo ḳhudā kī shaan phal bhī phuul bhī daane meñ thā 
shaiḳh ko jo pārsā kahtā hai us ko kyā kahūñ maiñ ne apnī aañkh se dekhā vo mai-ḳhāne meñ thā 
'shā.ir'-e-nāzuk-tabī.at huuñ mirā dil kaT gayā sāqiyā lenā ki shāyad baal paimāne meñ thā 
uns apne mein kahin paya na begane mein tha kya nasha hai sara aalam ek paimane mein tha 
aah itni kawishen ye shor-o-shar ye iztirab ek chuTki KHak ki do par ye parwane mein tha 
aap hi us ne anal-haq kah diya ilzam kya hosh kis ne le liya tha hosh diwane mein tha 
allah allah KHak mein milte hi ye pa-e-samar lo KHuda ki shan phal bhi phul bhi dane mein tha 
shaiKH ko jo parsa kahta hai us ko kya kahun main ne apni aankh se dekha wo mai-KHane mein tha 
'shair'-e-nazuk-tabiat hun mera dil kaT gaya saqiya lena ki shayad baal paimane mein tha

tirī nazar ke ishāroñ ko dil-kashī baḳhshī nazar-navāz nazāroñ ko tāzgī baḳhshī 
ḳhizāñ kī zad meñ hī ab tak tirā gulistāñ thā hamīñ ne aa ke bahāroñ ko zindagī baḳhshī 
chaman ko ham ne hī apne lahū se sīñchā hai kalī ko ham ne hī ik tarz-e-dil-kashī baḳhshī 
tirī adā bhī adā hai vo ik qayāmat kī ye aur baat hai tāroñ ko dil-kashī baḳhshī 
hai zo.am chāk-e-girebāñ ko apnī qismat par ki tum ne kyuuñ na majāl-e-rafū-garī baḳhshī 
sunā do ahl-e-vafā ko ye falsafa 'qaisar' junūñ ne hosh kī duniyā ko āgahī baḳhshī 
teri nazar ke ishaaron ko dil-kashi baKHshi nazar-nawaz nazaron ko tazgi baKHshi 
KHizan ki zad mein hi ab tak tera gulistan tha hamin ne aa ke bahaaron ko zindagi baKHshi 
chaman ko hum ne hi apne lahu se sincha hai kali ko hum ne hi ek tarz-e-dil-kashi baKHshi 
teri ada bhi ada hai wo ek qayamat ki ye aur baat hai taron ko dil-kashi baKHshi 
hai zoam chaak-e-gireban ko apni qismat par ki tum ne kyun na majal-e-rafu-gari baKHshi 
suna do ahl-e-wafa ko ye falsafa 'qaisar' junun ne hosh ki duniya ko aagahi baKHshi

tamām ḳhaliyoñ meñ aksar sunā.ī detā hai har ik jahān meñ mahshar sunā.ī detā hai 
jo chhū ke dekhūñ to gardish kī tah meñ gardish hai dharūñ jo kaan to mahvar sunā.ī detā hai 
hazār mīloñ bichhī irtiqā kī miTTī par badan meñ ab bhī samundar sunā.ī detā hai 
lachaktī raat meñ sayyārgāñ kī chaap suno jo mujh meñ jazb hai bāhar sunā.ī detā hai 
zamīn phail ga.ī hai hamārī ruuh talak jahāñ kā shor ab andar sunā.ī detā hai 
zabāñ ke ġhaar se pahuñche sukūt tak to ab ajiib lahjoñ meñ manzar sunā.ī detā hai 
tamaddunoñ ke har āhañg kā tazād 'riyāz' jo duur jā.ūñ to behtar sunā.ī detā hai 
tamam KHaliyon mein aksar sunai deta hai har ek jahan mein mahshar sunai deta hai 
jo chhu ke dekhun to gardish ki tah mein gardish hai dharun jo kan to mahwar sunai deta hai 
hazar milon bichhi irtiqa ki miTTi par badan mein ab bhi samundar sunai deta hai 
lachakti raat mein sayyargan ki chap suno jo mujh mein jazb hai bahar sunai deta hai 
zamin phail gai hai hamari ruh talak jahan ka shor ab andar sunai deta hai 
zaban ke ghaar se pahunche sukut tak to ab ajib lahjon mein manzar sunai deta hai 
tamaddunon ke har aahang ka tazad 'riyaz' jo dur jaun to behtar sunai deta hai

is dar pe mujhe yaar machalne nahīñ dete armān mire jī ke nikalne nahīñ dete 
dam dam meñ ḳhabar pahuñche hai jo aane kī apnī hai jaan laboñ par vo nikalne nahīñ dete 
āshob-e-qayāmat se zi-bas ḳhauf hai sab ko do chaar qadam bhī unheñ chalne nahīñ dete 
jaatā hai safā-e-ruḳh-e-dildār pe jab dil maqdūr tak apne to phisalne nahīñ dete 
aadat meñ karo farq na tum apnī nigah se kyuuñ zahr use aaj ugalne nahīñ dete 
vo parda-nashīnī kī ri.āyat hai tumhārī ham baat bhī ḳhalvat se nikalne nahīñ dete 
ye dast-basar rahne kā 'ārif' vo mahal hai us jā kaf-e-afsos bhī malne nahīñ dete 
is dar pe mujhe yar machalne nahin dete arman mere ji ke nikalne nahin dete 
dam dam mein KHabar pahunche hai jo aane ki apni hai jaan labon par wo nikalne nahin dete 
aashob-e-qayamat se zi-bas KHauf hai sab ko do chaar qadam bhi unhen chalne nahin dete 
jata hai safa-e-ruKH-e-dildar pe jab dil maqdur tak apne to phisalne nahin dete 
aadat mein karo farq na tum apni nigah se kyun zahr use aaj ugalne nahin dete 
wo parda-nashini ki riayat hai tumhaari hum baat bhi KHalwat se nikalne nahin dete 
ye dast-basar rahne ka 'arif' wo mahal hai us ja kaf-e-afsos bhi malne nahin dete

saa.e ke liye hai na Thikāne ke liye hai dīvār to āñgan meñ uThāne ke liye hai 
dekho to har ik shaḳhs ke hāthoñ meñ haiñ patthar pūchho to kahīñ shahr banāne ke liye hai 
rakh dete haiñ patthar mirī tahrīr ke uupar kahte haiñ ye kāġhaz ko dabāne ke liye hai 
dar dil kā 'suhail' aaj zarā band na karnā ik shaḳhs abhī lauT ke aane ke liye hai 
sae ke liye hai na Thikane ke liye hai diwar to aangan mein uThane ke liye hai 
dekho to har ek shaKHs ke hathon mein hain patthar puchho to kahin shahr banane ke liye hai 
rakh dete hain patthar meri tahrir ke upar kahte hain ye kaghaz ko dabane ke liye hai 
dar dil ka 'suhail' aaj zara band na karna ek shaKHs abhi lauT ke aane ke liye hai

ek aalam hai ye hairānī kā jiinā kaisā kuchh nahīñ hone ko hai apnā ye honā kaisā 
ḳhuun jamtā sā rag-o-pai meñ hue shal ehsās dekhe jaatī hai nazar haul tamāshā kaisā 
regzāroñ meñ sarāboñ ke sivā kyā miltā ye to mālūm thā hai ab ye achambhā kaisā 
aable paañv ke sab phuuT bahe be-nishtar raas aayā hameñ in ḳhāroñ pe chalnā kaisā 
phir kabhī socheñge sach kyā hai abhī to sun leñ log kis kis ke liye kahte haiñ kaisā kaisā 
suuī āñkhoñ kī bhī maiñ ne hī nikālī thī magar dekh ke bhī mujhe us ne nahīñ dekhā kaisā 
kitnī saada thī hathelī mirī rañgīn huī merī uñglī meñ utar aayā hai kāñTā kaisā 
ā.īna dekhiye 'bilqīs' yahī haiñ kyā aap aap ne apnā banā rakkhā hai huliya kaisā 
ek aalam hai ye hairani ka jina kaisa kuchh nahin hone ko hai apna ye hona kaisa 
KHun jamta sa rag-o-pai mein hue shal ehsas dekhe jati hai nazar haul tamasha kaisa 
regzaron mein sarabon ke siwa kya milta ye to malum tha hai ab ye achambha kaisa 
aable panw ke sab phuT bahe be-nishtar ras aaya hamein in KHaron pe chalna kaisa 
phir kabhi sochenge sach kya hai abhi to sun len log kis kis ke liye kahte hain kaisa kaisa 
sui aankhon ki bhi main ne hi nikali thi magar dekh ke bhi mujhe us ne nahin dekha kaisa 
kitni sada thi hatheli meri rangin hui meri ungli mein utar aaya hai kanTa kaisa 
aaina dekhiye 'bilqis' yahi hain kya aap aap ne apna bana rakkha hai huliya kaisa

ḳhushī meñ ġham milā lete haiñ thoḌā ye sarmāya baḌhā lete haiñ thoḌā 
nazar aate haiñ jab atrāf chhoTe ham apnā qad ghaTā lete haiñ thoḌā 
hai andar raushnī bāhar añdherā so donoñ ko milā lete haiñ thoḌā 
bahut be-rabt hai andar kī duniyā chalo parda uThā lete haiñ thoḌā 
bahut sā ḳharch ho jaatā hai īmāñ magar phir bhī bachā lete haiñ thoḌā 
ye chehre dil ke bāshinde haiñ sāhab ye nazrāna judā lete haiñ thoḌā 
suno duniyā ke naqshe se kisī din samundar ko haTā lete haiñ thoḌā 
do aalam aag ban jaate haiñ jab bhī ham ashkoñ se bujhā lete haiñ thoḌā 
KHushi mein gham mila lete hain thoDa ye sarmaya baDha lete hain thoDa 
nazar aate hain jab atraf chhoTe hum apna qad ghaTa lete hain thoDa 
hai andar raushni bahar andhera so donon ko mila lete hain thoDa 
bahut be-rabt hai andar ki duniya chalo parda uTha lete hain thoDa 
bahut sa KHarch ho jata hai iman magar phir bhi bacha lete hain thoDa 
ye chehre dil ke bashinde hain sahab ye nazrana juda lete hain thoDa 
suno duniya ke naqshe se kisi din samundar ko haTa lete hain thoDa 
do aalam aag ban jate hain jab bhi hum ashkon se bujha lete hain thoDa

jo guzartā hai guzar jaa.e jī aaj vo kar leñ ki bhar jaa.e jī 
aaj kī shab yahīñ jiinā marnā jis ko jaanā ho vo ghar jaa.e jī 
is galī se nahīñ jaanā ham ko aan ruḳhsat ho ki sar jaa.e jī 
vaqt ne kar diyā jo karnā thā koī martā hai to mar jaa.e jī 
shāḳh-e-gul mauj-e-havā raqsāñ haiñ phuul bikhre to bikhar jaa.e jī 
manzaroñ ke bhī pare haiñ manzar aañkh jo ho to nazar jaa.e jī 
samt kyā raah kyā manzil kaisī chal paḌo aap jidhar jaa.e jī 
apnī hī soch pe chalnā chāhe apnī hī soch se Dar jaa.e jī 
ye ajab baat hai aksar 'jāved' jis se rokeñ vahī kar jaa.e jī 
jo guzarta hai guzar jae ji aaj wo kar len ki bhar jae ji 
aaj ki shab yahin jina marna jis ko jaana ho wo ghar jae ji 
is gali se nahin jaana hum ko aan ruKHsat ho ki sar jae ji 
waqt ne kar diya jo karna tha koi marta hai to mar jae ji 
shaKH-e-gul mauj-e-hawa raqsan hain phul bikhre to bikhar jae ji 
manzaron ke bhi pare hain manzar aankh jo ho to nazar jae ji 
samt kya rah kya manzil kaisi chal paDo aap jidhar jae ji 
apni hi soch pe chalna chahe apni hi soch se Dar jae ji 
ye ajab baat hai aksar 'jawed' jis se roken wahi kar jae ji

yaad yuuñ hosh gañvā baiThī hai jism se jaan judā baiThī hai 
raah taknā hai abas so jaao dhuup dīvār pe aa baiThī hai 
āshiyāne kā ḳhudā hī hāfiz ghaat meñ tez havā baiThī hai 
dast-e-gul-chīñ se muravvat kaisī shāḳh phūloñ ko gañvā baiThī hai 
kaise aa.e kisī gulshan meñ bahār dasht meñ ābla-pā baiThī hai 
shahr āseb-zada lagtā hai kūche kūche meñ balā baiThī hai 
chaar kamroñ ke makāñ meñ apne ik pachhal-pā.ī bhī aa baiThī hai 
shā.irī peT kī ḳhātir 'jāved' biich bāzār ke aa baiThī hai 
yaad yun hosh ganwa baiThi hai jism se jaan juda baiThi hai 
rah takna hai abas so jao dhup diwar pe aa baiThi hai 
aashiyane ka KHuda hi hafiz ghat mein tez hawa baiThi hai 
dast-e-gul-chin se murawwat kaisi shaKH phulon ko ganwa baiThi hai 
kaise aae kisi gulshan mein bahaar dasht mein aabla-pa baiThi hai 
shahr aaseb-zada lagta hai kuche kuche mein bala baiThi hai 
chaar kamron ke makan mein apne ek pachhal-pai bhi aa baiThi hai 
shairi peT ki KHatir 'jawed' bich bazar ke aa baiThi hai

aaj vīrāniyoñ meñ mirā dil nayā silsila chāhtā hai shaam Dhalne ko hai zindagī kī ḳhudā aur kyā chāhtā hai 
dhuup kī niyyatoñ meñ bhaḌakne lage nafratoñ ke alaav ai ghaTā is liye tujh ko merā badan oḌhnā chāhtā hai 
niiñd kī rāhatoñ se nahīñ mutma.in silsila dhaḌkanoñ kā phir dil-e-zār ra.anā.iyoñ meñ guñdhā ratjagā chāhtā hai 
terī nazdīkiyoñ ko pahan ke maiñ shahzāda lagne lagā huuñ chhū ke rañgīniyāñ ab ke dekhūñ tirī jii, baḌā chāhtā hai 
parvarish hausloñ kī tamām umr mere lahū ne ḳhamoshī se kī ab junūñ aks ko dekhne ke liye ā.īna chāhtā hai 
jo hathelī kī saarī purānī lakīroñ ko tabdīl kar de aisā ḳhush-rañg har aadmī ab yahāñ sāneha chāhtā hai 
tum samundar ke sahme hue josh ko merā paiġhām denā mausam-e-habs meñ phir koī aaj taaza havā chāhtā hai 
umr bhar āñsuoñ se jo dhotā rahā chehra mahrūmiyoñ kā vo tirī rahmatoñ se mire maulā ab ke jazā chāhtā hai 
naaz thā jis ko merī rifāqat ke har lamha-e-muḳhtasar par aaj mahsūs aisā huā hai ki vo fāsla chāhtā hai 
aaj viraniyon mein mera dil naya silsila chahta hai sham Dhalne ko hai zindagi ki KHuda aur kya chahta hai 
dhup ki niyyaton mein bhaDakne lage nafraton ke alaw ai ghaTa is liye tujh ko mera badan oDhna chahta hai 
nind ki rahaton se nahin mutmain silsila dhaDkanon ka phir dil-e-zar ranaiyon mein gundha ratjaga chahta hai 
teri nazdikiyon ko pahan ke main shahzada lagne laga hun chhu ke ranginiyan ab ke dekhun teri ji, baDa chahta hai 
parwarish hauslon ki tamam umr mere lahu ne KHamoshi se ki ab junun aks ko dekhne ke liye aaina chahta hai 
jo hatheli ki sari purani lakiron ko tabdil kar de aisa KHush-rang har aadmi ab yahan saneha chahta hai 
tum samundar ke sahme hue josh ko mera paigham dena mausam-e-habs mein phir koi aaj taza hawa chahta hai 
umr bhar aansuon se jo dhota raha chehra mahrumiyon ka wo teri rahmaton se mere maula ab ke jaza chahta hai 
naz tha jis ko meri rifaqat ke har lamha-e-muKHtasar par aaj mahsus aisa hua hai ki wo fasla chahta hai

apnī hī āvārgī se Dar ga.e bas meñ baiThe aur apne ghar ga.e 
saarī bastī raat bhar soī nahīñ āsmāñ kī samt kuchh patthar ga.e 
sab tamāshā saarī duniyā dekh lī us galī se ho ke apne ghar ga.e 
biich meñ jab aa ga.ī dīvār-e-jism apne saa.e se bhī ham bach kar ga.e 
aur kyā loge hamārā imtihāñ zindagī dī thī sau vo bhī kar ga.e 
aap ne rakkhā mirī palkoñ pe haath merā siina motiyoñ se bhar ga.e 
kuchh ḳharīdā ham ne dekho kuchh nahīñ ham bhī is bāzār se ho kar ga.e 
'mus.haf' us ko bevafā kahte ho tum aur jo ilzām us ke sar ga.e 
apni hi aawargi se Dar gae bas mein baiThe aur apne ghar gae 
sari basti raat bhar soi nahin aasman ki samt kuchh patthar gae 
sab tamasha sari duniya dekh li us gali se ho ke apne ghar gae 
bich mein jab aa gai diwar-e-jism apne sae se bhi hum bach kar gae 
aur kya loge hamara imtihan zindagi di thi sau wo bhi kar gae 
aap ne rakkha meri palkon pe hath mera sina motiyon se bhar gae 
kuchh KHarida hum ne dekho kuchh nahin hum bhi is bazar se ho kar gae 
'mushaf' us ko bewafa kahte ho tum aur jo ilzam us ke sar gae

kūcha-e-yār meñ gadā.ī kī ik yahī kaam kī kamā.ī kī 
haa.e vo intizār ke lamhe aah ye sā.ateñ judā.ī kī 
ham ne husn-e-adā kahā is ko jab kabhī tū ne kaj-adā.ī kī 
dosto dekh bhaal kar chalnā saḳht manzil hai āshnā.ī kī 
shaiḳh-sāhab ḳhudā hī ban baiThe hai burī chaaT pārsā.ī kī 
rañg-e-'hasrat' meñ aaj ai 'kausar' ḳhuub tū ne ġhazal-sarā.ī kī 
kucha-e-yar mein gadai ki ek yahi kaam ki kamai ki 
hae wo intizar ke lamhe aah ye saaten judai ki 
hum ne husn-e-ada kaha is ko jab kabhi tu ne kaj-adai ki 
dosto dekh bhaal kar chalna saKHt manzil hai aashnai ki 
shaiKH-sahab KHuda hi ban baiThe hai buri chaT parsai ki 
rang-e-'hasrat' mein aaj ai 'kausar' KHub tu ne ghazal-sarai ki

us ke partav se huā hai zāfrānī rañg kā ā.īna to aaj bhī hai kahkashānī rañg kā 
hijr ke bādal chhaTe to vasl kī taqvīm meñ dil huvaidā ho rahā hai gulsitānī rañg kā 
pairahan us kā hai aisā yā jhalaktā hai badan ik parī-vash raqs meñ hai urġhuvānī rañg kā 
aaj kī shab ḳhaas hogī jab sunā.ūñgā use ek qissa apnā zaatī dāstānī rañg kā 
dostoñ kī mehrbānī se huā ye kaam bhī maiñ ne dekhā hī nahīñ thā ḳhuun paanī rañg kā 
gar diloñ se yuuñ dhuāñ uThtā rahegā raat din āsmāñ kaise bachegā āsmānī rañg kā 
haañ usī ne phuul Tāñke hoñge in ashjār par jis ne miTTī ko diyā hai jubba dhānī rañg kā 
us ke partaw se hua hai zafrani rang ka aaina to aaj bhi hai kahkashani rang ka 
hijr ke baadal chhaTe to wasl ki taqwim mein dil huwaida ho raha hai gulsitani rang ka 
pairahan us ka hai aisa ya jhalakta hai badan ek pari-wash raqs mein hai urghuwani rang ka 
aaj ki shab KHas hogi jab sunaunga use ek qissa apna zati dastani rang ka 
doston ki mehrbani se hua ye kaam bhi main ne dekha hi nahin tha KHun pani rang ka 
gar dilon se yun dhuan uThta rahega raat din aasman kaise bachega aasmani rang ka 
han usi ne phul Tanke honge in ashjar par jis ne miTTi ko diya hai jubba dhani rang ka

shahr sahrā hai ghar bayābāñ hai dil kisī anjuman kā ḳhvāhāñ hai 
mujh se kahtī haiñ vo udaas āñhkeñ zindagī bhar kī sab thakan yaañ hai 
ḳhvāb TuuTe paḌe haiñ sab mere maiñ huuñ aur hairatoñ kā sāmāñ hai 
har masarrat guñdhī huī dukh meñ arz-e-azdād dasht-e-imkāñ hai 
tū samundar kī be-kanārī dekh us meñ me.ār-e-zarf pinhāñ hai 
haiñ ravā saare nā-ravā us ko ye na.e mausamoñ kā insāñ hai 
mar ke pahuñchā to huuñ lab-e-dariyā ḳhālī ab tishnagī kā dāmāñ hai 
sab ne 'shāhid' chune pasand ke phuul gul-kada phir bhī gul-ba-dāmāñ hai 
shahr sahra hai ghar bayaban hai dil kisi anjuman ka KHwahan hai 
mujh se kahti hain wo udas aanhken zindagi bhar ki sab thakan yan hai 
KHwab TuTe paDe hain sab mere main hun aur hairaton ka saman hai 
har masarrat gundhi hui dukh mein arz-e-azdad dasht-e-imkan hai 
tu samundar ki be-kanari dekh us mein mear-e-zarf pinhan hai 
hain rawa sare na-rawa us ko ye nae mausamon ka insan hai 
mar ke pahuncha to hun lab-e-dariya KHali ab tishnagi ka daman hai 
sab ne 'shahid' chune pasand ke phul gul-kada phir bhi gul-ba-daman hai

har aa.ine meñ tirā hī dhuāñ dikhā.ī diyā mirā vajūd hī mujh ko kahāñ dikhā.ī diyā 
ye kaisī dhuup ke mausam meñ ghar se niklā huuñ ki har parinda mujhe sā.ebāñ dikhā.ī diyā 
maiñ apnī lahr meñ lipTā huā samundar huuñ maiñ kyā karūñ jo tirā bādbāñ dikhā.ī diyā 
kahā hī thā ki salām ai imām-e-ālī-maqām hamārī pyaas ko āb-e-ravāñ dikhā.ī diyā 
mirī nazar to ḳhalāoñ ne bāñdh rakkhī thī mujhe zamīñ se kahāñ āsmāñ dikhā.ī diyā 
har aaine mein tera hi dhuan dikhai diya mera wajud hi mujh ko kahan dikhai diya 
ye kaisi dhup ke mausam mein ghar se nikla hun ki har parinda mujhe saeban dikhai diya 
main apni lahr mein lipTa hua samundar hun main kya karun jo tera baadban dikhai diya 
kaha hi tha ki salam ai imam-e-ali-maqam hamari pyas ko aab-e-rawan dikhai diya 
meri nazar to KHalaon ne bandh rakkhi thi mujhe zamin se kahan aasman dikhai diya

mere bhī kuchh gile the magar raat ho ga.ī kuchh tum bhī ki rahe the magar raat ho ga.ī 
duniyā se duur apne barābar khaḌe rahe ḳhvāboñ meñ jāgte the magar raat ho ga.ī 
ā'sāb sun rahe the thakāvaT kī guftugū uljhan thī mas.ale the magar raat ho ga.ī 
āñkhoñ kī raushnī meñ añdhere bikhar ga.e ḳheme se kuchh jale the magar raat ho ga.ī 
ai dil ai mere dil ye sunā hai ki shaam ko ghar se vo chal paḌe the magar raat ho ga.ī 
aisī bhī kyā vafā kī kahānī thī ro paḌe kuchh silsile chale the magar raat ho ga.ī 
kuchh ziine iḳhtiyār ke chaḌhne lagā thā maiñ kuchh vo utar rahe the magar raat ho ga.ī 
dushman kī dostī ne masāfat sameT lī qadmoñ meñ rāste the magar raat ho ga.ī 
'sāhil' fareb-e-fikr hai duniyā kī dāstāñ kuchh raaz khul chale the magar raat ho ga.ī 
mere bhi kuchh gile the magar raat ho gai kuchh tum bhi ki rahe the magar raat ho gai 
duniya se dur apne barabar khaDe rahe KHwabon mein jagte the magar raat ho gai 
aa'sab sun rahe the thakawaT ki guftugu uljhan thi masale the magar raat ho gai 
aankhon ki raushni mein andhere bikhar gae KHeme se kuchh jale the magar raat ho gai 
ai dil ai mere dil ye suna hai ki sham ko ghar se wo chal paDe the magar raat ho gai 
aisi bhi kya wafa ki kahani thi ro paDe kuchh silsile chale the magar raat ho gai 
kuchh zine iKHtiyar ke chaDhne laga tha main kuchh wo utar rahe the magar raat ho gai 
dushman ki dosti ne masafat sameT li qadmon mein raste the magar raat ho gai 
'sahil' fareb-e-fikr hai duniya ki dastan kuchh raaz khul chale the magar raat ho gai

kuchh dil kā ta.alluq to nibhāo ki chalā maiñ yā TuuT ke āvāz lagāo ki chalā maiñ 
darpesh masāfat hai kisī ḳhvāb-nagar kī ik diip mire paas jalāo ki chalā maiñ 
is shahr ke logoñ pe bharosā nahīñ karnā zanjīr koī dar pe lagāo ki chalā maiñ 
tā-dil meñ tumhāre bhī na ehsās-e-vafā ho jī bhar ke mujhe aaj satāo ki chalā maiñ 
mushtāq nigāhoñ se ye sehr TuuT rahā hai chehre pe koī rañg sajāo ki chalā maiñ 
is shahr-e-marāsim meñ to sañgsār huā huuñ patthar hī sar-e-rāh sajāo ki chalā maiñ 
is tishna-labī par mujhe ezaaz to baḳhsho ai bāda-kasho jaam uThāo ki chalā maiñ 
is darja taġhāful kī nahīñ taab jigar ko tum aur bahāne na banāo ki chalā maiñ 
ik ḳhvāb hai vo ḳhvāb to puurā karo 'sāhil' ik sher mirā mujh ko sunāo ki chalā maiñ 
kuchh dil ka talluq to nibhao ki chala main ya TuT ke aawaz lagao ki chala main 
darpesh masafat hai kisi KHwab-nagar ki ek dip mere pas jalao ki chala main 
is shahr ke logon pe bharosa nahin karna zanjir koi dar pe lagao ki chala main 
ta-dil mein tumhaare bhi na ehsas-e-wafa ho ji bhar ke mujhe aaj satao ki chala main 
mushtaq nigahon se ye sehr TuT raha hai chehre pe koi rang sajao ki chala main 
is shahr-e-marasim mein to sangsar hua hun patthar hi sar-e-rah sajao ki chala main 
is tishna-labi par mujhe ezaz to baKHsho ai baada-kasho jam uThao ki chala main 
is darja taghaful ki nahin tab jigar ko tum aur bahane na banao ki chala main 
ek KHwab hai wo KHwab to pura karo 'sahil' ek sher mera mujh ko sunao ki chala main

jur.at-e-iz.hār se rokegī kyā maslahat merā qalam chhīnegī kyā 
maiñ musāfir din kī jaltī dhuup kā raat merā dard pahchānegī kyā 
be-karāñ huuñ maiñ samundar kī tarah mauj-e-shabnam qad mirā nāpegī kyā 
chal paḌā huuñ sar pe le kar āsmāñ paañv ke nīche zamīñ Thahregī kyā 
shahr-e-gul kī rahne vaalī āgahī mire zaḳhmoñ kī zabāñ samjhegī kyā 
chehrā chehrā ālm-e-be-chehragī dekh kar bhī zindagī dekhegī kyā 
maiñ to logo sah luuñ har patthar kā jabr vaqt kī shīshagarī sochegī kyā 
hasratoñ kī aañch meñ is ko tapā yuuñ badan kī tīrgī pighlegī kyā 
nutq se lab tak hai sadiyoñ kā safar ḳhāmushī ye dukh bhalā jhelegī kyā 
kyā tavaqqo kor-zehnoñ se 'fazā' ko.eloñ se raushnī phūTegī kyā 
jurat-e-izhaar se rokegi kya maslahat mera qalam chhinegi kya 
main musafir din ki jalti dhup ka raat mera dard pahchanegi kya 
be-karan hun main samundar ki tarah mauj-e-shabnam qad mera napegi kya 
chal paDa hun sar pe le kar aasman panw ke niche zamin Thahregi kya 
shahr-e-gul ki rahne wali aagahi mere zaKHmon ki zaban samjhegi kya 
chehra chehra aalm-e-be-chehragi dekh kar bhi zindagi dekhegi kya 
main to logo sah lun har patthar ka jabr waqt ki shishagari sochegi kya 
hasraton ki aanch mein is ko tapa yun badan ki tirgi pighlegi kya 
nutq se lab tak hai sadiyon ka safar KHamushi ye dukh bhala jhelegi kya 
kya tawaqqo kor-zehnon se 'faza' koelon se raushni phuTegi kya

giilī miTTī haath meñ le kar baiThā huuñ zehn meñ ik dhuñdle paikar se uljhā huuñ 
piis rahā hai dil ko ik vaznī patthar duub ko bāñhoñ meñ bhar kar maiñ hañstā huuñ 
tere hāthoñ ne mujh meñ sab rañg bhare lekin har pal ye ehsās adhūrā huuñ 
dhuup kabhī chamkegī is ummīd pe maiñ barf ke dariyā meñ sadiyoñ se leTā huuñ 
is jānib kab uude bādal ne dekhā phir bhī maiñ tanhā sarsabz jazīra huuñ 
merā karb mirī tanhā.ī kī zīnat maiñ chehroñ ke jañgal kā sannāTā huuñ 
ik dhundlī tasvīr abhī ā.ankhoñ meñ hai is vaadī se duur bhalā kab rahtā huuñ 
raat ufuq par kuchh saaye lahrā.e the 'amabar' ab tak aas lagā.e baiThā huuñ 
gili miTTi hath mein le kar baiTha hun zehn mein ek dhundle paikar se uljha hun 
pis raha hai dil ko ek wazni patthar dub ko banhon mein bhar kar main hansta hun 
tere hathon ne mujh mein sab rang bhare lekin har pal ye ehsas adhura hun 
dhup kabhi chamkegi is ummid pe main barf ke dariya mein sadiyon se leTa hun 
is jaanib kab ude baadal ne dekha phir bhi main tanha sarsabz jazira hun 
mera karb meri tanhai ki zinat main chehron ke jangal ka sannaTa hun 
ek dhundli taswir abhi aaankhon mein hai is wadi se dur bhala kab rahta hun 
raat ufuq par kuchh saye lahrae the 'amabar' ab tak aas lagae baiTha hun

dil kī bastī pe kisī dard kā saaya bhī nahīñ aisā vīrānī kā mausam kabhī aayā bhī nahīñ 
ham kisī aur hī aalam meñ rahā karte haiñ ahl-e-duniyā ne jahāñ aake satāyā bhī nahīñ 
ham pe is ālam-e-tāza meñ guzartī kyā hai tum ne pūchhā bhī nahīñ ham ne batāyā bhī nahīñ 
kab se huuñ ġharq kisī jhiil kī gahrā.ī meñ rāz-e-ayyām magar aql ne paayā bhī nahīñ 
be-zamīnī kā ye dukh aur zamīñ bhī apnī bebasī aisī ki nukta ye uThāyā bhī nahīñ 
be-jihat uThte hue Thokareñ khāte ye qadam rāhbar merā mujhe raah pe laayā bhī nahīñ 
us ne hamdardī ke paimāñ to bahut bāñdhe the aa paḌī hai to mirā haath baTāyā bhī nahīñ 
dil kī dīvāroñ se lipTī hai kisī shaam kī yaad jaane vaalā to kabhī lauT ke aayā bhī nahīñ 
sard-mehrī ki jigar chhalnī kiye detī hai us ne yuuñ dekhne meñ haath chhuḌāyā bhī nahīñ 
us se ummīd-e-vafā bāñdh rakhī hai 'shāhid' jis ne ye baar mohabbat kā uThāyā bhī nahīñ 
dil ki basti pe kisi dard ka saya bhi nahin aisa virani ka mausam kabhi aaya bhi nahin 
hum kisi aur hi aalam mein raha karte hain ahl-e-duniya ne jahan aake sataya bhi nahin 
hum pe is aalam-e-taza mein guzarti kya hai tum ne puchha bhi nahin hum ne bataya bhi nahin 
kab se hun gharq kisi jhil ki gahrai mein raaz-e-ayyam magar aql ne paya bhi nahin 
be-zamini ka ye dukh aur zamin bhi apni bebasi aisi ki nukta ye uThaya bhi nahin 
be-jihat uThte hue Thokaren khate ye qadam rahbar mera mujhe rah pe laya bhi nahin 
us ne hamdardi ke paiman to bahut bandhe the aa paDi hai to mera hath baTaya bhi nahin 
dil ki diwaron se lipTi hai kisi sham ki yaad jaane wala to kabhi lauT ke aaya bhi nahin 
sard-mehri ki jigar chhalni kiye deti hai us ne yun dekhne mein hath chhuDaya bhi nahin 
us se ummid-e-wafa bandh rakhi hai 'shahid' jis ne ye bar mohabbat ka uThaya bhi nahin

havā meñ aa.e to lau bhī na saath lī ham ne phir ek umr añdheroñ meñ kaaT dī ham ne 
diye meñ zor bahut thā magar na jaane kyuuñ bas ek had se na baḌhne dī raushnī ham ne 
uThā uThā ke tire naaz ai ġham-e-duniyā ḳhud aap hī tirī aadat ḳharāb kī ham ne 
vafā meñ jhuuT milāyā diloñ meñ khoT rakhā kuchh is tarah se nibhā.ī hai dostī ham ne 
duā karo vo kisī dil-jale kī aah na ho ufuq ke paas jo dekhī hai aag sī ham ne 
ajiib sehr thā dil ke qimār-ḳhāne meñ tab uTh ke aa.e ki hastī bhī haar dī ham ne 
qafas-misāl thī 'tāriq'-na.īm duniyā bhī asiir ho ke gizārī hai zindagī ham ne 
hawa mein aae to lau bhi na sath li hum ne phir ek umr andheron mein kaT di hum ne 
diye mein zor bahut tha magar na jaane kyun bas ek had se na baDhne di raushni hum ne 
uTha uTha ke tere naz ai gham-e-duniya KHud aap hi teri aadat KHarab ki hum ne 
wafa mein jhuT milaya dilon mein khoT rakha kuchh is tarah se nibhai hai dosti hum ne 
dua karo wo kisi dil-jale ki aah na ho ufuq ke pas jo dekhi hai aag si hum ne 
ajib sehr tha dil ke qimar-KHane mein tab uTh ke aae ki hasti bhi haar di hum ne 
qafas-misal thi 'tariq'-naim duniya bhi asir ho ke gizari hai zindagi hum ne

tujh ko aatī hai dilāse kī nahīñ baat koī kis tarah tujh se rakkhe jaan mulāqāt koī 
lag chale tujh se vo khānī ho jise laat koī haath kis tarah lagā de tujhe haihāt koī 
Dar se maiñ chup huuñ tire varna bharī majlis meñ baat kartā hai koī tujh se ishārāt koī 
mil ga.e raah meñ kal vo to kahā 'rañgīñ' ne kis tarah tum se kare ab basar-auqāt koī 
kuchh to insāf bhalā kījiye dil meñ apne tum ne maanī bhī kabhī merī ajī baat koī 
tujh ko aati hai dilase ki nahin baat koi kis tarah tujh se rakkhe jaan mulaqat koi 
lag chale tujh se wo khani ho jise lat koi hath kis tarah laga de tujhe haihat koi 
Dar se main chup hun tere warna bhari majlis mein baat karta hai koi tujh se ishaaraat koi 
mil gae rah mein kal wo to kaha 'rangin' ne kis tarah tum se kare ab basar-auqat koi 
kuchh to insaf bhala kijiye dil mein apne tum ne mani bhi kabhi meri aji baat koi

diyā rashk āshufta-hāloñ ne maarā tire husn par marne vāloñ ne maarā 
kabhī dil kā mātam kabhī aarzū kā mujhe nit-na.e marne vāloñ ne maarā 
huā ḳhuun siine meñ dil hasratoñ se tamannā.eñ ban kar ḳhayāloñ ne maarā 
tirā hī ḳhayāl un ko āThoñ pahar hai mujhe mere hī ham-ḳhayāloñ ne maarā 
vahī hai agar ai vafā nazm-e-hastī to kyā mārka marne vāloñ ne maarā 
diya rashk aashufta-haalon ne mara tere husn par marne walon ne mara 
kabhi dil ka matam kabhi aarzu ka mujhe nit-nae marne walon ne mara 
hua KHun sine mein dil hasraton se tamannaen ban kar KHayalon ne mara 
tera hi KHayal un ko aaThon pahar hai mujhe mere hi ham-KHayalon ne mara 
wahi hai agar ai wafa nazm-e-hasti to kya marka marne walon ne mara

is tarah aah kal ham us anjuman se nikle fasl-e-bahār meñ juuñ bulbul chaman se nikle 
aatī lapaT hai jaisī us zulf-e-ambarīñ se kyā taab hai jo vo bū mushk-e-ḳhutan se nikle 
tum ko na ek par bhī raham aah shab ko aayā kyā kyā hī aah o naale apne dahan se nikle 
ab hai duā ye apnī har shaam har sahar ko yā vo badan se lipTe yā jaan tan se nikle 
to jāniyo muqarrar us ko 'surūr' āshiq kuchh dard kī sī hālat jis ke suḳhan se nikle 
is tarah aah kal hum us anjuman se nikle fasl-e-bahaar mein jun bulbul chaman se nikle 
aati lapaT hai jaisi us zulf-e-ambarin se kya tab hai jo wo bu mushk-e-KHutan se nikle 
tum ko na ek par bhi raham aah shab ko aaya kya kya hi aah o nale apne dahan se nikle 
ab hai dua ye apni har sham har sahar ko ya wo badan se lipTe ya jaan tan se nikle 
to jaaniyo muqarrar us ko 'surur' aashiq kuchh dard ki si haalat jis ke suKHan se nikle

tamannā dil meñ ghar kartī bahut hai havā is dasht meñ chaltī bahut hai 
jamānā rañg is duniyā se sīkhe ki hai to kuchh nahīñ bantī bahut hai 
use ik pal kabhī rahne na denā phaphūñdī qalb par jamtī bahut hai 
ki saarī umr añgāre chune haiñ hathelī haath kī jaltī bahut hai 
'suhail-ahmad' samajh kar sarf karnā zarā sī zindagī lagtī bahut hai 
tamanna dil mein ghar karti bahut hai hawa is dasht mein chalti bahut hai 
jamana rang is duniya se sikhe ki hai to kuchh nahin banti bahut hai 
use ek pal kabhi rahne na dena phaphundi qalb par jamti bahut hai 
ki sari umr angare chune hain hatheli hath ki jalti bahut hai 
'suhail-ahmad' samajh kar sarf karna zara si zindagi lagti bahut hai

zinda haiñ mire ḳhvāb ye kab yaad hai mujh ko haañ tark-e-mohabbat kā sabab yaad hai mujh ko 
tafsīl-e-ināyāt to ab yaad nahīñ hai par pahlī mulāqāt kī shab yaad hai mujh ko 
ḳhushbū kī rifāqat kā nasha TuuT rahā hai lekin vo safar dād-talab yaad hai mujh ko 
ab shaam ke hāthoñ jo giraftār hai sūraj dopahar meñ thā qahr-o-ġhazab yaad hai mujh ko 
aivān mirī ruuh ke raushan kiye jis ne vo shoḳhi-e-yak-jumbish-e-lab yaad hai mujh ko 
kuchh din se muqayyad huuñ maiñ vīrāna-e-jāñ meñ hālāñki koī shahr-e-tarab yaad hai mujh ko 
kyuuñ yaad dilāte ho mujhe chāñdnī rāteñ paimān-e-vafā tum se hai sab yaad hai mujh ko 
vo shaḳhs 'ḳhayāl' aaj jo rū-posh hai mujh meñ the us meñ kamālāt ajab yaad hai mujh ko 
zinda hain mere KHwab ye kab yaad hai mujh ko han tark-e-mohabbat ka sabab yaad hai mujh ko 
tafsil-e-inayat to ab yaad nahin hai par pahli mulaqat ki shab yaad hai mujh ko 
KHushbu ki rifaqat ka nasha TuT raha hai lekin wo safar dad-talab yaad hai mujh ko 
ab sham ke hathon jo giraftar hai suraj dopahar mein tha qahr-o-ghazab yaad hai mujh ko 
aiwan meri ruh ke raushan kiye jis ne wo shoKHi-e-yak-jumbish-e-lab yaad hai mujh ko 
kuchh din se muqayyad hun main virana-e-jaan mein haalanki koi shahr-e-tarab yaad hai mujh ko 
kyun yaad dilate ho mujhe chandni raaten paiman-e-wafa tum se hai sab yaad hai mujh ko 
wo shaKHs 'KHayal' aaj jo ru-posh hai mujh mein the us mein kamalat ajab yaad hai mujh ko

kuchh aur bhī ziyāda sañvar ke dikhā.ūñgā ai zindagī tire liye mar ke dikhā.ūñgā 
tuġhyāniyāñ to raḳht-e-safar haiñ mire liye sāhil pe ek roz utar ke dikhā.ūñgā 
kab tak sameT rakkhūñ sharār-e-junūñ ko maiñ jañgal kī aag huuñ to bikhar ke dikhā.ūñgā 
ḳhvāhish se kab ye haath falak tak pahuñchtā hai jo kah rahā huuñ maiñ use kar ke dikhā.ūñgā 
saarā safar faqat nahīñ saa.e ke vāste shāḳh-o-gul-o-samar bhī shajar ke dikhā.ūñgā 
kuchh aur bhi ziyaada sanwar ke dikhaunga ai zindagi tere liye mar ke dikhaunga 
tughyaniyan to raKHt-e-safar hain mere liye sahil pe ek roz utar ke dikhaunga 
kab tak sameT rakkhun sharar-e-junun ko main jangal ki aag hun to bikhar ke dikhaunga 
KHwahish se kab ye hath falak tak pahunchta hai jo kah raha hun main use kar ke dikhaunga 
sara safar faqat nahin sae ke waste shaKH-o-gul-o-samar bhi shajar ke dikhaunga

aisī tan-āsānī se baaz aa jā nādānī se 
jiinā mushkil hotā hai itnī nukta-dānī se 
sahrā bhī sharmātā hai is dil kī vīrānī se 
laaj kahāñ tak aa.egī ḳhvāboñ kī uryānī se 
pyaas nahīñ bujh paatī hai dariyā kī darbānī se 
pīchhā kaun chhuḌā paayā is duniyā-dīvānī se 
aisi tan-asani se baz aa ja nadani se 
jina mushkil hota hai itni nukta-dani se 
sahra bhi sharmata hai is dil ki virani se 
laj kahan tak aaegi KHwabon ki uryani se 
pyas nahin bujh pati hai dariya ki darbani se 
pichha kaun chhuDa paya is duniya-diwani se

ḳhudā bhī kaisā huā ḳhush mire qarīne par mujhe shahīd kā darja milā hai jiine par 
khañDar ke gumbad o mehrāb jaag uTTheñge use kaho ki vo dhīre se aa.e ziine par 
lakīr hai na koī rañg hai na kalma hai ye kaisā naqsh banāyā hai mere siine par 
abhī umiid na.ī vus.atoñ kī qaa.em hai abhī vo lauT ke aayā nahīñ safīne par 
chhateñ bhī baT chukīñ āñgan bhī baT chuke lekin chhiḌī hai jañg ki haq kis kā hai dafīne par 
KHuda bhi kaisa hua KHush mere qarine par mujhe shahid ka darja mila hai jine par 
khanDar ke gumbad o mehrab jag uTThenge use kaho ki wo dhire se aae zine par 
lakir hai na koi rang hai na kalma hai ye kaisa naqsh banaya hai mere sine par 
abhi umid nai wusaton ki qaem hai abhi wo lauT ke aaya nahin safine par 
chhaten bhi baT chukin aangan bhi baT chuke lekin chhiDi hai jang ki haq kis ka hai dafine par

ham the kisī kā dhyān thā vo bhī nahīñ rahā ik rabt-e-jism-o-jān thā vo bhī nahīñ rahā 
jhagḌā thā merā jis se vo duniyā kidhar ga.ī ik shaḳhs darmiyān thā vo bhī nahīñ rahā 
misl-e-charāġh tīrgi-e-jism-o-jāñ meñ dil ik shahr-e-be-nishān thā vo bhī nahīñ rahā 
īñTeñ bichhī thiiñ jis meñ vo ik tañg sī galī us meñ mirā makān thā vo bhī nahīñ rahā 
duniyā mirī nahīñ na sahī tum to saath ho kyā kyā hameñ gumān thā vo bhī nahīñ rahā 
nuqta banī nigāh se ojhal huī zamīñ sar par ik āsmān thā vo bhī nahīñ rahā 
'mus.haf' tumhārā naam yahīñ thā aur us pe haañ ik surḳh sā nishān thā vo bhī nahīñ rahā 
hum the kisi ka dhyan tha wo bhi nahin raha ek rabt-e-jism-o-jaan tha wo bhi nahin raha 
jhagDa tha mera jis se wo duniya kidhar gai ek shaKHs darmiyan tha wo bhi nahin raha 
misl-e-charagh tirgi-e-jism-o-jaan mein dil ek shahr-e-be-nishan tha wo bhi nahin raha 
inTen bichhi thin jis mein wo ek tang si gali us mein mera makan tha wo bhi nahin raha 
duniya meri nahin na sahi tum to sath ho kya kya hamein guman tha wo bhi nahin raha 
nuqta bani nigah se ojhal hui zamin sar par ek aasman tha wo bhi nahin raha 
'mushaf' tumhaara nam yahin tha aur us pe han ek surKH sa nishan tha wo bhi nahin raha

ḳhāk-zāda huuñ magar tā-ba falak jaatā hai merā idrāk bahut duur talak jaatā hai 
terī nisbat ko chhupātā to bahut huuñ lekin terā chehra mirī āñkhoñ se jhalak jaatā hai 
ik haqīqat se ubhar aatā hai har shai kā vajūd ek jugnū se añdherā bhī chamak jaatā hai 
yuuñ to mumkin nahīñ dushman mire sar par pahuñche pahre-dāroñ meñ koī aañkh jhapak jaatā hai 
maiñ faqat ḳhaak pe rakhtā huuñ jabīñ ko 'shahbāz' āsmāñ ḳhud hī mirī samt sarak jaatā hai 
KHak-zada hun magar ta-ba falak jata hai mera idrak bahut dur talak jata hai 
teri nisbat ko chhupata to bahut hun lekin tera chehra meri aankhon se jhalak jata hai 
ek haqiqat se ubhar aata hai har shai ka wajud ek jugnu se andhera bhi chamak jata hai 
yun to mumkin nahin dushman mere sar par pahunche pahre-daron mein koi aankh jhapak jata hai 
main faqat KHak pe rakhta hun jabin ko 'shahbaz' aasman KHud hi meri samt sarak jata hai

nau-giraftār-e-qafas huuñ mujhe kuchh yaad nahīñ lab pe shevan nahīñ naala nahīñ fariyād nahīñ 
nāznīñ koī na.ī baat to paidā ho kabhī zulm meñ lutf hī kyā hai agar ījād nahīñ 
maiñ bashar huuñ mire milne meñ burā.ī kyā hai aap kuchh huur nahīñ aap parī-zād nahīñ 
vaa.e taqdīr ki jab ḳhūgar-e-āzār hue vo ye farmāte haiñ ham mā.il-e-bedād nahīñ 
nau-giraftar-e-qafas hun mujhe kuchh yaad nahin lab pe shewan nahin nala nahin fariyaad nahin 
naznin koi nai baat to paida ho kabhi zulm mein lutf hi kya hai agar ijad nahin 
main bashar hun mere milne mein burai kya hai aap kuchh hur nahin aap pari-zad nahin 
wae taqdir ki jab KHugar-e-azar hue wo ye farmate hain hum mail-e-bedad nahin

ye kār-e-be-samrāñ mujh se hone vaalā nahīñ maiñ zindagī ko bahut der Dhone vaalā nahīñ 
maiñ sat.h-e-āb pe ik tairtā huā lāsha mujhe koī bhī samundar Dubone vaalā nahīñ 
baḌe jatan se milā hai ye apnā aap mujhe maiñ ab kisī ke liye ḳhud ko khone vaalā nahīñ 
fasīl-e-shahr tirā āḳhirī muhāfiz huuñ ye shahr jaage na jaage maiñ sone vaalā nahīñ 
vo ek tū ki tire ġham meñ ik jahāñ ro.e vo ek maiñ ki mirā koī rone vaalā nahīñ 
kisī ko phuul na de pā.ūñ maiñ agar 'shahbāz' kisī kī ruuh meñ kāñTe chubhone vaalā nahīñ 
ye kar-e-be-samran mujh se hone wala nahin main zindagi ko bahut der Dhone wala nahin 
main sath-e-ab pe ek tairta hua lasha mujhe koi bhi samundar Dubone wala nahin 
baDe jatan se mila hai ye apna aap mujhe main ab kisi ke liye KHud ko khone wala nahin 
fasil-e-shahr tera aaKHiri muhafiz hun ye shahr jage na jage main sone wala nahin 
wo ek tu ki tere gham mein ek jahan roe wo ek main ki mera koi rone wala nahin 
kisi ko phul na de paun main agar 'shahbaz' kisi ki ruh mein kanTe chubhone wala nahin

kisī nādīda shai kī chaah meñ aksar badalte haiñ kabhī āñkheñ kabhī chehra kabhī manzar badalte haiñ 
kisī mahfūz goshe kī talab majbūr kartī hai makīñ badle nahīñ jaate haiñ so ham ghar badalte haiñ 
miyāñ bāzār ko sharminda karnā kyā zarūrī hai kahīñ is daur meñ tahzīb ke zevar badalte haiñ 
ye an-jāne parinde kaun se jangal se aa.e haiñ jo har parvāz se pahle na.e shahpar badalte haiñ 
isī se sūrat-e-hālāt kī tasvīr bantī hai usī ke Dar se ham log apnā apnā dar badalte haiñ 
sitārā sā mirī āġhosh meñ kuchh to chamaktā hai jhalak paane kī jis ko aa.ine mehvar badalte haiñ 
kisi nadida shai ki chah mein aksar badalte hain kabhi aankhen kabhi chehra kabhi manzar badalte hain 
kisi mahfuz goshe ki talab majbur karti hai makin badle nahin jate hain so hum ghar badalte hain 
miyan bazar ko sharminda karna kya zaruri hai kahin is daur mein tahzib ke zewar badalte hain 
ye an-jaane parinde kaun se jangal se aae hain jo har parwaz se pahle nae shahpar badalte hain 
isi se surat-e-haalat ki taswir banti hai usi ke Dar se hum log apna apna dar badalte hain 
sitara sa meri aaghosh mein kuchh to chamakta hai jhalak pane ki jis ko aaine mehwar badalte hain

nashāt-e-dard ke mausam meñ gar namī kam hai fazā ke barg-e-shafaq par bhī tāzgī kam hai 
sarāb ban ke ḳhalāoñ meñ gum nazāra-e-samt mujhe lagā ki ḳhalāoñ meñ raushnī kam hai 
ajiib log haiñ kāñToñ pe phuul rakhte haiñ ye jānte hue in meñ muqaddarī kam hai 
na koī ḳhvāb na yādoñ kā be-karāñ sā hujūm udaas raat ke ḳheme meñ dilkashī kam hai 
maiñ apne-āp meñ bikhrā huā huuñ muddat se agar maiñ ḳhud ko sameTūñ to zindagī kam hai 
khulī chhatoñ pe dupaTTe havā meñ uḌte nahīñ tumhāre shahr meñ kyā āsmān bhī kam hai 
purānī soch ko samjheñ to koī baat bane jadīd fikr meñ ehsās-e-naġhmagī kam hai 
kahāñ se lāoge ai 'rind' mo'tabar mazmūn ġhazal meñ jabki rivāyat kī chāshnī kam hai 
nashat-e-dard ke mausam mein gar nami kam hai faza ke barg-e-shafaq par bhi tazgi kam hai 
sarab ban ke KHalaon mein gum nazara-e-samt mujhe laga ki KHalaon mein raushni kam hai 
ajib log hain kanTon pe phul rakhte hain ye jaante hue in mein muqaddari kam hai 
na koi KHwab na yaadon ka be-karan sa hujum udas raat ke KHeme mein dilkashi kam hai 
main apne-ap mein bikhra hua hun muddat se agar main KHud ko sameTun to zindagi kam hai 
khuli chhaton pe dupaTTe hawa mein uDte nahin tumhaare shahr mein kya aasman bhi kam hai 
purani soch ko samjhen to koi baat bane jadid fikr mein ehsas-e-naghmagi kam hai 
kahan se laoge ai 'rind' mo'tabar mazmun ghazal mein jabki riwayat ki chashni kam hai

ham ko us shoḳh ne kal dar talak aane na diyā dar-o-dīvār ko bhī haal sunāne na diyā 
parda-e-chashm meñ har dam to chhupā.e aañsū be-qarārī ne mujhe raaz chhupāne na diyā 
mujh ko ālūda rakhā is mirī gumrāhī ne araq-e-sharm-e-gunah bhī to bahāne na diyā 
tere kahne se maiñ ab lā.ūñ kahāñ se nāseh sabr jab is dil-e-muztar ko ḳhudā ne na diyā 
man.a hai bas ki ḳhur-o-ḳhvāb hameñ ġham meñ tere mar ke sone na diyā zahr bhī khāne na diyā 
huuñ sitamgar maiñ jafāoñ se tirī sharminda nā-tavānī ne mujhe sar bhī uThāne na diyā 
dam kā aanā to baḌī baat hai lab par 'ārif' zo.af ne harf-e-shikāyat kabhī aane na diyā 
hum ko us shoKH ne kal dar talak aane na diya dar-o-diwar ko bhi haal sunane na diya 
parda-e-chashm mein har dam to chhupae aansu be-qarari ne mujhe raaz chhupane na diya 
mujh ko aaluda rakha is meri gumrahi ne araq-e-sharm-e-gunah bhi to bahane na diya 
tere kahne se main ab laun kahan se naseh sabr jab is dil-e-muztar ko KHuda ne na diya 
mana hai bas ki KHur-o-KHwab hamein gham mein tere mar ke sone na diya zahr bhi khane na diya 
hun sitamgar main jafaon se teri sharminda na-tawani ne mujhe sar bhi uThane na diya 
dam ka aana to baDi baat hai lab par 'arif' zoaf ne harf-e-shikayat kabhi aane na diya

jaal ragoñ kā guuñj lahū kī saañs ke tevar bhuul ga.e kitnī fanā.eñ kitnī baqā.eñ apne andar bhuul ga.e 
janam janam tak qaid rahā ik be-ma.anī añgḌā.ī meñ maiñ huuñ vo mehrāb jise mere hī patthar bhuul ga.e 
jaane kyā kyā giit sunā.e gardish kī sargoshī ne be-chehra sayyāre mujh meñ apnā mehvar bhuul ga.e 
biitī huī sadiyoñ kā tamāshā aane vaale kal kā bhañvar aate jaate lamhe mujh meñ apnā paikar bhuul ga.e 
ab bhī chāroñ samt hamāre duniyā.eñ harakat meñ haiñ ham bhī be-dhyānī meñ kyā kyā jism ke bāhar bhuul ga.e 
duur kināroñ kī retoñ par khoj rahe haiñ aaj 'riyāz' kis kī suunī āñkhoñ meñ ham apne samundar bhuul ga.e 
jal ragon ka gunj lahu ki sans ke tewar bhul gae kitni fanaen kitni baqaen apne andar bhul gae 
janam janam tak qaid raha ek be-mani angDai mein main hun wo mehrab jise mere hi patthar bhul gae 
jaane kya kya git sunae gardish ki sargoshi ne be-chehra sayyare mujh mein apna mehwar bhul gae 
biti hui sadiyon ka tamasha aane wale kal ka bhanwar aate jate lamhe mujh mein apna paikar bhul gae 
ab bhi chaaron samt hamare duniyaen harakat mein hain hum bhi be-dhyani mein kya kya jism ke bahar bhul gae 
dur kinaron ki reton par khoj rahe hain aaj 'riyaz' kis ki suni aankhon mein hum apne samundar bhul gae

chalte chalte chale aa.e haiñ pareshānī meñ ḳhvāb to dab chuke is kūche kī vīrānī meñ 
toḌ kar paañv paḌe haiñ ki vo himmat na rahī uḌte bādal the kabhī chāk-girebānī meñ 
hijr kī raah meñ chalte rahe girte-paḌte saath kuchh bhī na liyā be-sar-o-sāmānī meñ 
us shahanshāh ko maiñ kaise shahanshāh kahūñ sarhadeñ TūTtī hoñ jis kī jahāñbānī meñ 
pahuñche manzil pe to hāsil thā faqat yās-o-hirās umr ik biit ga.ī silsila jumbanī meñ 
us ke jaane pe ye ehsās huā hai 'shāhid' vo jazīra thā mirā dukh se bhare paanī meñ 
chalte chalte chale aae hain pareshani mein KHwab to dab chuke is kuche ki virani mein 
toD kar panw paDe hain ki wo himmat na rahi uDte baadal the kabhi chaak-girebani mein 
hijr ki rah mein chalte rahe girte-paDte sath kuchh bhi na liya be-sar-o-samani mein 
us shahanshah ko main kaise shahanshah kahun sarhaden TuTti hon jis ki jahanbani mein 
pahunche manzil pe to hasil tha faqat yas-o-hiras umr ek bit gai silsila jumbani mein 
us ke jaane pe ye ehsas hua hai 'shahid' wo jazira tha mera dukh se bhare pani mein

firāq o vasl se haT kar koī rishta hamārā ho baġhair us ke bhī shāyad zindagī ham ko gavārā ho 
nikal aa.e jo ham ghar se to sau raste nikal aa.e abas thā sochnā ghar meñ koī ġhaibī ishāra ho 
na is Dhab kī bhī zulmat ho ki sab mil kar duā māñgeñ koī jugnū hī aa nikle na gar koī sitāra ho 
ziyāñ kī zad pe duniyā meñ ka.ī log aur bhī hoñge to phir ai nā-murādī tū mire ġham kā sahārā ho 
taqābul kasrat o qillat kā kuchh ma.anī nahīñ rakhtā añdherā chiir kar nikle agarche ik sharāra ho 
purāne ġham tire to juzv-e-jāñ ham ne banā Daale bisāt-e-dil kī ḳhvāhish hai na.e ġham kā utārā ho 
fasīl-e-shahr pe raushan agar hoñ husn kī sham.eñ to ik ik lafz 'shāhid' raushnī kā isti.āra ho 
firaq o wasl se haT kar koi rishta hamara ho baghair us ke bhi shayad zindagi hum ko gawara ho 
nikal aae jo hum ghar se to sau raste nikal aae abas tha sochna ghar mein koi ghaibi ishaara ho 
na is Dhab ki bhi zulmat ho ki sab mil kar dua mangen koi jugnu hi aa nikle na gar koi sitara ho 
ziyan ki zad pe duniya mein kai log aur bhi honge to phir ai na-muradi tu mere gham ka sahaara ho 
taqabul kasrat o qillat ka kuchh mani nahin rakhta andhera chir kar nikle agarche ek sharara ho 
purane gham tere to juzw-e-jaan hum ne bana Dale bisat-e-dil ki KHwahish hai nae gham ka utara ho 
fasil-e-shahr pe raushan agar hon husn ki shamen to ek ek lafz 'shahid' raushni ka istiara ho

ham pariyoñ ke chāhne vaale ḳhvāb meñ dekheñ pariyāñ duur se ruup kā sadqa bāñTeñ haath na aa.eñ pariyāñ 
raah meñ haa.il qaaf pahāḌ aur haath charāġh se ḳhālī kyūñkar jinnoñ ke changul se ham chhuḌvā.eñ pariyāñ 
āshāoñ kī sohnī sajrī sej sajā.e rakkhūñ jaane kaun ghaḌī mere ghar meñ aan barājeñ pariyāñ 
saare shahr ko chāñdnī kī ḳhairāt us roz maiñ bāñTūñ jis din ḳhvāhish ke āñgan meñ chham se utreñ pariyāñ 
kachche gharoñ se ās-havelī jaane kī ḳhvāhish meñ pahroñ ā.īne ke sāmne baiTh ke sañvareñ pariyāñ 
pariyoñ kī tausīf meñ aise sher 'razā' maiñ likkhūñ jin ko sun kar uḌtī aa.eñ jhūmeñ nācheñ pariyāñ 
hum pariyon ke chahne wale KHwab mein dekhen pariyan dur se rup ka sadqa banTen hath na aaen pariyan 
rah mein hail qaf pahaD aur hath charagh se KHali kyunkar jinnon ke changul se hum chhuDwaen pariyan 
aashaon ki sohni sajri sej sajae rakkhun jaane kaun ghaDi mere ghar mein aan barajen pariyan 
sare shahr ko chandni ki KHairaat us roz main banTun jis din KHwahish ke aangan mein chham se utren pariyan 
kachche gharon se aas-haweli jaane ki KHwahish mein pahron aaine ke samne baiTh ke sanwaren pariyan 
pariyon ki tausif mein aise sher 'raza' main likkhun jin ko sun kar uDti aaen jhumen nachen pariyan

maiñ bhī āvāra huuñ tere saat āvāra havā lā tū mere haath meñ de haat āvāra havā 
jañgalī phūloñ kī ḳhushbū raqs sarshārī shabāb nazr kar mujh ko bhī kuchh sauġhāt āvāra huā 
ek sarshārī hai jism o ruuh par chhā.ī huī reza reza āsmāñ barsāt āvāra havā 
us ḳharābe meñ bhī ik jannat banā lī hai jahāñ ek maiñ huuñ ik ḳhudā kī zaat āvāra havā 
yaad aatā hai kapāsī bādaloñ kā sā.ebāñ jagmagāte manzaroñ kī raat āvāra havā 
be-panāhī zehn kī qindīl-e-dānish bhī siyāh rū-ba-rū hadd-e-nazar zulmāt āvāra havā 
dil ke darvāze se lag kar chup khaḌā rahtā hai ġham kis se kahiye apne jī kī baat āvāra havā 
sar-kashī zinda rahe lekin 'mujībī' soch le ek musht-e-ḳhāk kī auqāt āvāra havā 
main bhi aawara hun tere sat aawara hawa la tu mere hath mein de hat aawara hawa 
jangali phulon ki KHushbu raqs sarshaari shabab nazr kar mujh ko bhi kuchh saughat aawara hua 
ek sarshaari hai jism o ruh par chhai hui reza reza aasman barsat aawara hawa 
us KHarabe mein bhi ek jannat bana li hai jahan ek main hun ek KHuda ki zat aawara hawa 
yaad aata hai kapasi baadalon ka saeban jagmagate manzaron ki raat aawara hawa 
be-panahi zehn ki qindil-e-danish bhi siyah ru-ba-ru hadd-e-nazar zulmat aawara hawa 
dil ke darwaze se lag kar chup khaDa rahta hai gham kis se kahiye apne ji ki baat aawara hawa 
sar-kashi zinda rahe lekin 'mujibi' soch le ek musht-e-KHak ki auqat aawara hawa

us taraf vo jo nazar paḌtā hai rāste meñ mirā ghar paḌtā hai 
iḳhtiyārāt se majbūr hai vo chāroñ jānib se asar paḌtā hai 
aap to mashq kiyā karte haiñ aur har tiir idhar paḌtā hai 
sar jhukāne kī jab aadat na rahī aaj har gaam pe dar paḌtā hai 
rahnumā aaḌ na kar le to hameñ rāhzan saaf nazar paḌtā hai 
kyuuñ na kāñToñ pe lahū Tapkā.eñ phuul chhūte hī bikhar paḌtā hai 
mohtaram zaḳhm luTāte chaliye raah meñ dil kā nagar paḌtā hai 
us taraf wo jo nazar paDta hai raste mein mera ghar paDta hai 
iKHtiyaraat se majbur hai wo chaaron jaanib se asar paDta hai 
aap to mashq kiya karte hain aur har tir idhar paDta hai 
sar jhukane ki jab aadat na rahi aaj har gam pe dar paDta hai 
rahnuma aaD na kar le to hamein rahzan saf nazar paDta hai 
kyun na kanTon pe lahu Tapkaen phul chhute hi bikhar paDta hai 
mohtaram zaKHm luTate chaliye rah mein dil ka nagar paDta hai

kis mashaqqat se mujhe jism uThānā paḌā hai shaam hote hī tire shahr se jaanā paḌā hai 
maiñ tujhe hañstā huā dekh ke ye bhuul gayā ki mire chāroñ taraf rotā zamāna paḌā hai 
jamma pūñjī hai mire jism meñ kuchh āñsuoñ kī ye mirā dil to nahīñ ek ḳhazāna paḌā hai 
der tak baaġh ke kone meñ koī aayā nahīñ baat karne ke liye ḳhud ko bulānā paḌā hai 
din ne dastak dī to koī bhī nahīñ jaagā thā aaj sūraj se mujhe haath milānā paḌā hai 
ḳhālī jag.hoñ kī taraf kar ke ishāra 'qāsim' kyā batāte ho yahāñ merā nishāna paḌā hai 
kis mashaqqat se mujhe jism uThana paDa hai sham hote hi tere shahr se jaana paDa hai 
main tujhe hansta hua dekh ke ye bhul gaya ki mere chaaron taraf rota zamana paDa hai 
jamma punji hai mere jism mein kuchh aansuon ki ye mera dil to nahin ek KHazana paDa hai 
der tak bagh ke kone mein koi aaya nahin baat karne ke liye KHud ko bulana paDa hai 
din ne dastak di to koi bhi nahin jaga tha aaj suraj se mujhe hath milana paDa hai 
KHali jaghon ki taraf kar ke ishaara 'qasim' kya batate ho yahan mera nishana paDa hai

ik ḳhvāb thī zindagī hamārī phir aañkh nahīñ khulī hamārī 
duniyā se bhī phir nahīñ mile ham vo bhī to kabhī na thī hamārī 
din Dhal gayā ḳhvāb dekhne meñ kaT jā.egī raat bhī hamārī 
palkoñ pe ye phuul āñsuoñ ke sahrā kī ye ret bhī hamārī 
ik dhyān kī lahr ne Duboyā ik yaad na ho sakī hamārī 
Tāpoñ kī sadā sī us ke ġham kī be-teġh sipāh thī hamārī 
kab ho ga.ī mere qad se ūñchī dīvār ye biich kī hamārī 
dekhā to har aa.ine meñ ham the ḳhud se huī baat bhī hamārī 
aa.e ho to ye ġhazal bhī sun lo be-vaqt kī rāgnī hamārī 
ek KHwab thi zindagi hamari phir aankh nahin khuli hamari 
duniya se bhi phir nahin mile hum wo bhi to kabhi na thi hamari 
din Dhal gaya KHwab dekhne mein kaT jaegi raat bhi hamari 
palkon pe ye phul aansuon ke sahra ki ye ret bhi hamari 
ek dhyan ki lahr ne Duboya ek yaad na ho saki hamari 
Tapon ki sada si us ke gham ki be-tegh sipah thi hamari 
kab ho gai mere qad se unchi diwar ye bich ki hamari 
dekha to har aaine mein hum the KHud se hui baat bhi hamari 
aae ho to ye ghazal bhi sun lo be-waqt ki ragni hamari

yuuñ bhī dil ahbāb ke ham ne gaahe gaahe rakkhe the apne zaḳhm-e-nazar par ḳhush-fahmī ke phāhe rakkhe the 
ham ne tazād-e-dahr ko samjhā do-rāhe tartīb diye aur baratne nikle to dekhā sah-rāhe rakkhe the 
raqs-kada ho bazm-e-suḳhan ho koī kārgah-e-fan ho zardozoñ ne apnī mā-tahtī meñ julāhe rakkhe the 
mohtasiboñ kī ḳhātir bhī apne iz.hār meñ kuchh pahlū rakh to liye the ham ne ab chāhe an-chāhe rakkhe the 
jo vaj.h-e-rāhat bhī na the aur TuuT ga.e to ġham na huā aah vo rishte kyuuñ ham ne ik umr nibāhe rakkhe the 
kāhkashāñ-bandī meñ suḳhan kī rah ga.ī 'sāz' kasar kaisī lafz to ham ne chun ke najūme mohre maahe rakkhe the 
yun bhi dil ahbab ke hum ne gahe gahe rakkhe the apne zaKHm-e-nazar par KHush-fahmi ke phahe rakkhe the 
hum ne tazad-e-dahr ko samjha do-rahe tartib diye aur baratne nikle to dekha sah-rahe rakkhe the 
raqs-kada ho bazm-e-suKHan ho koi kargah-e-fan ho zardozon ne apni ma-tahti mein julahe rakkhe the 
mohtasibon ki KHatir bhi apne izhaar mein kuchh pahlu rakh to liye the hum ne ab chahe an-chahe rakkhe the 
jo wajh-e-rahat bhi na the aur TuT gae to gham na hua aah wo rishte kyun hum ne ek umr nibahe rakkhe the 
kahkashan-bandi mein suKHan ki rah gai 'saz' kasar kaisi lafz to hum ne chun ke najume mohre mahe rakkhe the

use shauq-e-ġhota-zanī na thā vo kahāñ gayā mire najm-e-āb mujhe batā vo kahāñ gayā 
jo lakīr paanī pe naqsh thī vo kahāñ ga.ī jo banā thā ḳhaak pe zā.icha vo kahāñ gayā 
kahāñ TuuTe merī tanāb-e-jism ke hausle jo lagā thā ḳhema vajūd kā vo kahāñ gayā 
jo zamīn paañv tale bichhī thī kidhar ga.ī vo jo āsmān saroñ pe thā vo kahāñ gayā 
ga.e kis jihat ko tikon ḳhvāb ke zāviye jo rukā thā aañkh meñ dā.era vo kahāñ gayā 
abhī aks us kā ubhar rahā thā ki daf.atan mire aa.ine se bichhaḌ gayā vo kahāñ gayā 
kahāñ gum huiiñ vo zabān o kaam kī lazzateñ jo phaloñ meñ hotā thā zā.iqa vo kahāñ gayā 
use shauq-e-ghota-zani na tha wo kahan gaya mere najm-e-ab mujhe bata wo kahan gaya 
jo lakir pani pe naqsh thi wo kahan gai jo bana tha KHak pe zaicha wo kahan gaya 
kahan TuTe meri tanab-e-jism ke hausle jo laga tha KHema wajud ka wo kahan gaya 
jo zamin panw tale bichhi thi kidhar gai wo jo aasman saron pe tha wo kahan gaya 
gae kis jihat ko tikon KHwab ke zawiye jo ruka tha aankh mein daera wo kahan gaya 
abhi aks us ka ubhar raha tha ki dafatan mere aaine se bichhaD gaya wo kahan gaya 
kahan gum huin wo zaban o kaam ki lazzaten jo phalon mein hota tha zaiqa wo kahan gaya

kuchh bhī nahīñ jo yād-e-butān-e-hasīñ nahīñ jab vo nahīñ to dil bhī hamārā kahīñ nahīñ 
kis vaqt ḳhūñ-fishāñ nahīñ āñkheñ firāq meñ kis roz tar lahū se yahāñ āstīñ nahīñ 
aisā na paayā koī bhī us but kā naqsh-e-pā jis par ki āshiqoñ ke nishān-e-jabīñ nahīñ 
har parda-dār vaqt par aatā nahīñ hai kaam ek āstīñ hai āñkhoñ par ik āstīñ nahīñ 
donoñ jahāñ se kaam nahīñ ham ko ishq meñ achchhā to hai jo apnā Thikānā kahīñ nahīñ 
kyā har taraf hai naza.a meñ apnī nigāh-e-yās zaanū par us ke sar jo dam-e-vāpsīñ nahīñ 
donoñ meñ sau tarah ke bakheḌe haiñ umr bhar ai ishq mujh ko hausla-e-kufr-o-dīñ nahīñ 
vo mehr-vash jo aayā thā kal aur auj thā aaj āsmāñ pe mere makāñ kī zamīñ nahīñ 
kyā aañkh uThā ke naza.a meñ dekhūñ kisī ko maiñ bālīñ par aap hī jo dam-e-vāpsīñ nahīñ 
paidā huī zarūr koī nā-ḳhushī kī baat be-vaj.h ye huzūr kī chīn-e-jabīñ nahīñ 
ḳhair aa ke fātiha kabhī iḳhlās se paḌhe us bevafā kī zaat se ye bhī yaqīñ nahīñ 
ḳhil.at milī junūñ se ajab qat.a kī mujhe dāman haiñ chaak jeb qabā āstīñ nahīñ 
'afsar' jo is jahān meñ kal tak the hukmarāñ aaj un kā bahar-e-nām bhī tāj-o-nagīñ nahīñ 
kuchh bhi nahin jo yaad-e-butan-e-hasin nahin jab wo nahin to dil bhi hamara kahin nahin 
kis waqt KHun-fishan nahin aankhen firaq mein kis roz tar lahu se yahan aastin nahin 
aisa na paya koi bhi us but ka naqsh-e-pa jis par ki aashiqon ke nishan-e-jabin nahin 
har parda-dar waqt par aata nahin hai kaam ek aastin hai aankhon par ek aastin nahin 
donon jahan se kaam nahin hum ko ishq mein achchha to hai jo apna Thikana kahin nahin 
kya har taraf hai naza mein apni nigah-e-yas zanu par us ke sar jo dam-e-wapsin nahin 
donon mein sau tarah ke bakheDe hain umr bhar ai ishq mujh ko hausla-e-kufr-o-din nahin 
wo mehr-wash jo aaya tha kal aur auj tha aaj aasman pe mere makan ki zamin nahin 
kya aankh uTha ke naza mein dekhun kisi ko main baalin par aap hi jo dam-e-wapsin nahin 
paida hui zarur koi na-KHushi ki baat be-wajh ye huzur ki chin-e-jabin nahin 
KHair aa ke fatiha kabhi iKHlas se paDhe us bewafa ki zat se ye bhi yaqin nahin 
KHilat mili junun se ajab qata ki mujhe daman hain chaak jeb qaba aastin nahin 
'afsar' jo is jahan mein kal tak the hukmaran aaj un ka bahar-e-nam bhi taj-o-nagin nahin

shikasta ghar meñ koī chiiz bhī nahīñ puurī kahīñ havā to kahīñ raushnī nahīñ puurī 
maiñ tujh ko dekh to saktā huuñ chhū nahīñ saktā tū hai magar tirī maujūdgī nahīñ puurī 
anā sambhālte dil kho diyā hai maiñ ne vahīñ tumhāre sāmne se vāpsī nahīñ puurī 
maiñ sochtā huuñ ki ab kūza-gar badal hī luuñ jo mil rahī hai mujhe behtarī nahīñ puurī 
maiñ ro rahā huuñ magar sāneha batātā hai ki us kī aañkh se vābastagī nahīñ puurī 
kahīñ to ho jahāñ bachche hī sirf rahte hoñ kisī ilāqe meñ bhī zindagī nahīñ puurī 
shikasta ghar mein koi chiz bhi nahin puri kahin hawa to kahin raushni nahin puri 
main tujh ko dekh to sakta hun chhu nahin sakta tu hai magar teri maujudgi nahin puri 
ana sambhaalte dil kho diya hai main ne wahin tumhaare samne se wapsi nahin puri 
main sochta hun ki ab kuza-gar badal hi lun jo mil rahi hai mujhe behtari nahin puri 
main ro raha hun magar saneha batata hai ki us ki aankh se wabastagi nahin puri 
kahin to ho jahan bachche hi sirf rahte hon kisi ilaqe mein bhi zindagi nahin puri

tishnagī apnī bujhāne ke liye jab ga.e haiñ dasht bechāre samundar ke tale dab ga.e haiñ 
kuuch karne kī ghaḌī hai magar ai ham-safro ham udhar jā nahīñ sakte jidhar sab ga.e haiñ 
ġhair shāista-e-ādāb-e-mohabbat na sahī ham tire hijr ke āzār meñ mar kab ga.e haiñ 
ab koī aks hai sālim na kisī kā chehra ā.īna-ḳhāne meñ kyā dekhne sāhab ga.e haiñ 
koī rasta na milā ghar se nikal kar ham ko ham usī ku-e-malāmat ko ga.e jab ga.e haiñ 
terī auqāt hī kyā 'mid.hat-ul-aḳhtar' sun le shahr ke shahr zamīnoñ ke tale dab ga.e haiñ 
tishnagi apni bujhane ke liye jab gae hain dasht bechaare samundar ke tale dab gae hain 
kuch karne ki ghaDi hai magar ai ham-safro hum udhar ja nahin sakte jidhar sab gae hain 
ghair shaista-e-adab-e-mohabbat na sahi hum tere hijr ke aazar mein mar kab gae hain 
ab koi aks hai salim na kisi ka chehra aaina-KHane mein kya dekhne sahab gae hain 
koi rasta na mila ghar se nikal kar hum ko hum usi ku-e-malamat ko gae jab gae hain 
teri auqat hi kya 'midhat-ul-aKHtar' sun le shahr ke shahr zaminon ke tale dab gae hain

lafzoñ kā nairañg hai mere fan ke jaadū se ik ik rañg alag kar saktā huuñ maiñ ḳhushbū se 
donoñ pareshāñ donoñ bojhal donoñ hī ghanghor gahrā rishta hai bādal kā tere gesū se 
merī peshānī par jhalkī mere lahū kī aag rāt-Dhale kuchh chāñd sā ugnā us ke pahlū se 
achchhī sūrat koī achānak sāmne jab aa jaa.e apnī hī uñglī kaT jaatī hai apne chāqū se 
haath ko haath ghanī zulmat meñ jab na samjhā.ī diyā samt milī hai ik āvāra tanhā jugnū se 
raat ga.e jab so jaatā hai paanī gahrī niiñd naġhmoñ kī lahreñ uThtī haiñ chalte chappū se 
'ramz' uThe haiñ ham bhī sambhāle apnā tiir kamān ham ko bhī vahshat karnī hai aaj ik aahū se 
lafzon ka nairang hai mere fan ke jadu se ek ek rang alag kar sakta hun main KHushbu se 
donon pareshan donon bojhal donon hi ghanghor gahra rishta hai baadal ka tere gesu se 
meri peshani par jhalki mere lahu ki aag raat-Dhale kuchh chand sa ugna us ke pahlu se 
achchhi surat koi achanak samne jab aa jae apni hi ungli kaT jati hai apne chaqu se 
hath ko hath ghani zulmat mein jab na samjhai diya samt mili hai ek aawara tanha jugnu se 
raat gae jab so jata hai pani gahri nind naghmon ki lahren uThti hain chalte chappu se 
'ramz' uThe hain hum bhi sambhaale apna tir kaman hum ko bhi wahshat karni hai aaj ek aahu se

chorī chorī aañkh laḌte meñ dikhā duuñ to sahī khāñs kar khañkhār kar us ko jatā duuñ to sahī 
mil to dekhe ġhair se kis tarah miltā hai vo shoḳh vo jo naqsha us ne bāñdhā hai miTā duuñ to sahī 
jal-bujhe siine meñ dil lekin na nikle muñh se aah dar muqaffal kar ke maiñ ghar ko jalā duuñ to sahī 
ishq kahtā hai ki sar-rishta dil kā mere haath juuñ patañg ik din kaTā kar maiñ luTā duuñ to sahī 
saath le kar yaar ġhairoñ ko idhar aatā to hai ai 'nisār' us se ye rastā maiñ chhuḌā duuñ to sahī 
chori chori aankh laDte mein dikha dun to sahi khans kar khankhaar kar us ko jata dun to sahi 
mil to dekhe ghair se kis tarah milta hai wo shoKH wo jo naqsha us ne bandha hai miTa dun to sahi 
jal-bujhe sine mein dil lekin na nikle munh se aah dar muqaffal kar ke main ghar ko jala dun to sahi 
ishq kahta hai ki sar-rishta dil ka mere hath jun patang ek din kaTa kar main luTa dun to sahi 
sath le kar yar ghairon ko idhar aata to hai ai 'nisar' us se ye rasta main chhuDa dun to sahi

ham tah-e-dariyā tilismī bastiyāñ ginte rahe aur sāhil par machhere machhliyāñ ginte rahe 
nā-tavāñ shānoñ pe aisī ḳhāmushī kā bojh thā apne us ke darmiyāñ bhī sīḌhiyāñ ginte rahe 
bazm-e-jāñ se chupke chupke ḳhvāb sab ruḳhsat hue ham bhalā karte bhī kyā bas gintiyāñ ginte rahe 
baañs ke jañgal se ho ke jab kabhī guzrī havā ik sadā-e-gumshuda kī dhajjiyāñ ginte rahe 
kis havā ne Das liyā hai rañg o roġhan uḌ ga.e sehn-e-dil se is makāñ kī khiḌkiyāñ ginte rahe 
pahlu-e-shab kal isī chehre se raushan thā magar jaane kitne mausamoñ kī talḳhiyāñ ginte rahe 
hum tah-e-dariya tilismi bastiyan ginte rahe aur sahil par machhere machhliyan ginte rahe 
na-tawan shanon pe aisi KHamushi ka bojh tha apne us ke darmiyan bhi siDhiyan ginte rahe 
bazm-e-jaan se chupke chupke KHwab sab ruKHsat hue hum bhala karte bhi kya bas gintiyan ginte rahe 
bans ke jangal se ho ke jab kabhi guzri hawa ek sada-e-gumshuda ki dhajjiyan ginte rahe 
kis hawa ne Das liya hai rang o roghan uD gae sehn-e-dil se is makan ki khiDkiyan ginte rahe 
pahlu-e-shab kal isi chehre se raushan tha magar jaane kitne mausamon ki talKHiyan ginte rahe

khīñch kar le jā.egā anjān mahvar kī taraf hai badan kā rāsta bāhar se andar kī taraf 
vo bhī apne saañs ke sailāb meñ hai lāpata jo mujhe phailā gayā mere hī manzar kī taraf 
ab ḳhalāoñ ko sameTe har taraf hoñ gāmzan aaj hai merā safar apne hī paikar kī taraf 
koī to paanī kī vīrānī ko samjhegā kabhī dekhtā rahtā huuñ ab maiñ bhī samundar kī taraf 
zehn kī qabroñ meñ phir se suur gūñjā hai 'riyāz' tañgi-e-iz.hār chal ik aur mahshar kī taraf 
khinch kar le jaega anjaan mahwar ki taraf hai badan ka rasta bahar se andar ki taraf 
wo bhi apne sans ke sailab mein hai lapata jo mujhe phaila gaya mere hi manzar ki taraf 
ab KHalaon ko sameTe har taraf hon gamzan aaj hai mera safar apne hi paikar ki taraf 
koi to pani ki virani ko samjhega kabhi dekhta rahta hun ab main bhi samundar ki taraf 
zehn ki qabron mein phir se sur gunja hai 'riyaz' tangi-e-izhaar chal ek aur mahshar ki taraf

kis kāfir-e-be-mehar se dil apnā lagā hai jis meñ ki mohabbat na muravvat na vafā hai 
be-kār kabhū raat ko bhī maiñ nahīñ rahtā juuñ sham.a mujhe tā-ba-sahar mashq-e-fanā hai 
kyā vaz.a bayāñ kījiye us shoḳh kī apne laḌne ko qayāmat hai jhagaḌne ko balā hai 
kyā qahr hai ham dekh ke ḳhush hote haiñ jis ko so us kī ye sūrat hai ki sūrat se ḳhafā hai 
juuñ juuñ nahīñ dekhe hai 'nisār' apne sanam ko tuuñ tuuñ yahī kahtā hai ḳhudā jāniye kyā hai 
kis kafir-e-be-mehar se dil apna laga hai jis mein ki mohabbat na murawwat na wafa hai 
be-kar kabhu raat ko bhi main nahin rahta jun shama mujhe ta-ba-sahar mashq-e-fana hai 
kya waza bayan kijiye us shoKH ki apne laDne ko qayamat hai jhagaDne ko bala hai 
kya qahr hai hum dekh ke KHush hote hain jis ko so us ki ye surat hai ki surat se KHafa hai 
jun jun nahin dekhe hai 'nisar' apne sanam ko tun tun yahi kahta hai KHuda jaaniye kya hai

koī zaarī sunī nahīñ jaatī koī jurm muaaf nahīñ hotā is dhartī par is chhat ke tale koī tere ḳhilāf nahīñ hotā 
kabhī damkeñ sone ke zarre kabhī jhalke murġhābī kā lahū ka.ī pyāse kab se khaḌe haiñ magar paanī shaffāf nahīñ hotā 
koī zulf aḌe to bikhar jaanā koī lab dahkeñ to ThiThur jaanā kyā tazkiyā karte ho dil kā ye ā.īna saaf nahīñ hotā 
ka.ī mausam mujh par guzar ga.e ehrām ke in do kapḌoñ meñ kabhī patthar chuum nahīñ saktā kabhī izn-e-tavāf nahīñ hotā 
yahāñ taaj us ke sar par hogā jo taḌke shahr meñ dāḳhil ho yahāñ saaya humā kā nahīñ paḌtā yahāñ koh-qāf nahīñ hotā 
koi zari suni nahin jati koi jurm muaf nahin hota is dharti par is chhat ke tale koi tere KHilaf nahin hota 
kabhi damken sone ke zarre kabhi jhalke murghabi ka lahu kai pyase kab se khaDe hain magar pani shaffaf nahin hota 
koi zulf aDe to bikhar jaana koi lab dahken to ThiThur jaana kya tazkiya karte ho dil ka ye aaina saf nahin hota 
kai mausam mujh par guzar gae ehram ke in do kapDon mein kabhi patthar chum nahin sakta kabhi izn-e-tawaf nahin hota 
yahan taj us ke sar par hoga jo taDke shahr mein daKHil ho yahan saya huma ka nahin paDta yahan koh-qaf nahin hota

raat ke gumbad meñ yādoñ kā baserā ho gayā hai chāñd kī qindīl jalte hī ujālā ho gayā hai 
ḳhāmushī kī āñdhiyāñ bāġhī nazar aatī haiñ mujh ko raat kaalī hai to sannāTā bhī kaalā ho gayā hai 
ab mohabbat hai muravvat hai na ab inkisārī aaj ke is daur meñ har shaḳhs nañgā ho gayā hai 
qissa-e-reg-e-ravāñ jab āñdhiyoñ kī zad pe aayā dhund kā hairat-zada aaseb tanhā ho gayā hai 
raat ke gumbad mein yaadon ka basera ho gaya hai chand ki qindil jalte hi ujala ho gaya hai 
KHamushi ki aandhiyan baghi nazar aati hain mujh ko raat kali hai to sannaTa bhi kala ho gaya hai 
ab mohabbat hai murawwat hai na ab inkisari aaj ke is daur mein har shaKHs nanga ho gaya hai 
qissa-e-reg-e-rawan jab aandhiyon ki zad pe aaya dhund ka hairat-zada aaseb tanha ho gaya hai
Poetry Text

be-qarārī sī be-qarārī hai vasl hai aur firāq taarī hai 
jo guzārī na jā sakī ham se ham ne vo zindagī guzārī hai 
nighare kyā hue ki logoñ par apnā saaya bhī ab to bhārī hai 
bin tumhāre kabhī nahīñ aa.ī kyā mirī niiñd bhī tumhārī hai 
aap meñ kaise aa.uuñ maiñ tujh bin saañs jo chal rahī hai aarī hai 
us se kahiyo ki dil kī galiyoñ meñ raat din terī intizārī hai 
hijr ho yā visāl ho kuchh ho ham haiñ aur us kī yādgārī hai 
ik mahak samt-e-dil se aa.ī thī maiñ ye samjhā tirī savārī hai 
hādsoñ kā hisāb hai apnā varna har aan sab kī baarī hai 
ḳhush rahe tū ki zindagī apnī umr bhar kī umīd-vārī hai 
be-qarari si be-qarari hai wasl hai aur firaq tari hai 
jo guzari na ja saki hum se hum ne wo zindagi guzari hai 
nighare kya hue ki logon par apna saya bhi ab to bhaari hai 
bin tumhaare kabhi nahin aai kya meri nind bhi tumhaari hai 
aap mein kaise aaun main tujh bin sans jo chal rahi hai aari hai 
us se kahiyo ki dil ki galiyon mein raat din teri intizari hai 
hijr ho ya visal ho kuchh ho hum hain aur us ki yaadgari hai 
ek mahak samt-e-dil se aai thi main ye samjha teri sawari hai 
hadson ka hisab hai apna warna har aan sab ki bari hai 
KHush rahe tu ki zindagi apni umr bhar ki umid-wari hai

ajab apnā haal hotā jo visāl-e-yār hotā kabhī jaan sadqe hotī kabhī dil nisār hotā 
koī fitna tā-qayāmat na phir āshkār hotā tire dil pe kaash zālim mujhe iḳhtiyār hotā 
jo tumhārī tarah tum se koī jhūTe va.ade kartā tumhīñ munsifī se kah do tumheñ e'tibār hotā 
ġham-e-ishq meñ mazā thā jo use samajh ke khāte ye vo zahr hai ki āḳhir mai-e-ḳhush-gavār hotā 
ye maza thā dil-lagī kā ki barābar aag lagtī na tujhe qarār hotā na mujhe qarār hotā 
na mazā hai dushmanī meñ na hai lutf dostī meñ koī ġhair ġhair hotā koī yaar yaar hotā 
tire va.ade par sitamgar abhī aur sabr karte agar apnī zindagī kā hameñ e'tibār hotā 
ye vo dard-e-dil nahīñ hai ki ho chārasāz koī agar ek baar miTtā to hazār baar hotā 
ga.e hosh tere zāhid jo vo chashm-e-mast dekhī mujhe kyā ulaT na dete jo na bāda-ḳhvār hotā 
mujhe mānte sab aisā ki adū bhī sajde karte dar-e-yār ka.aba bantā jo mirā mazār hotā 
tumheñ naaz ho na kyūñkar ki liyā hai 'dāġh' kā dil ye raqam na haath lagtī na ye iftiḳhār hotā 
ajab apna haal hota jo visal-e-yar hota kabhi jaan sadqe hoti kabhi dil nisar hota 
koi fitna ta-qayamat na phir aashkar hota tere dil pe kash zalim mujhe iKHtiyar hota 
jo tumhaari tarah tum se koi jhuTe wade karta tumhin munsifi se kah do tumhein e'tibar hota 
gham-e-ishq mein maza tha jo use samajh ke khate ye wo zahr hai ki aaKHir mai-e-KHush-gawar hota 
ye maza tha dil-lagi ka ki barabar aag lagti na tujhe qarar hota na mujhe qarar hota 
na maza hai dushmani mein na hai lutf dosti mein koi ghair ghair hota koi yar yar hota 
tere wade par sitamgar abhi aur sabr karte agar apni zindagi ka hamein e'tibar hota 
ye wo dard-e-dil nahin hai ki ho chaarasaz koi agar ek bar miTta to hazar bar hota 
gae hosh tere zahid jo wo chashm-e-mast dekhi mujhe kya ulaT na dete jo na baada-KHwar hota 
mujhe mante sab aisa ki adu bhi sajde karte dar-e-yar kaba banta jo mera mazar hota 
tumhein naz ho na kyunkar ki liya hai 'dagh' ka dil ye raqam na hath lagti na ye iftiKHar hota

mujhe naql par bhī itnā agar iḳhtiyār hotā kabhī fail imtihāñ meñ na maiñ baar baar hotā 
jo maiñ fail ho gayā to sabhī de rahe haiñ ta.ane koī dil-navāz hotā koī ġham-gusār hotā 
mujhe aaj itnī nafrat se na dekhtī ye duniyā jo paḌhā.ī se zarā bhī mire dil ko pyaar hotā 
mire master na hote jo ulūm-o-fan meñ daanā kabhī maulā-baḳhsh-sāhab kā na maiñ shikār hotā 
vo paḌhāte vaqt darje meñ hazār baar barse jo mujhe bhī chhī.k aatī unheñ nāgavār hotā 
na maiñ tandurust hotā na kabhī schōl jaatā kabhī sar meñ dard rahtā to kabhī buḳhār hotā 
kabhī madrase meñ aatā koī aisā chaaT vaalā ki jo muft meñ khilātā na kabhī udhār hotā 
ye gadhā jo apnī ġhaflat se hai bevaqūf itnā jo ye ḳhud ko jaan jaatā baḌā hoshiyār hotā 
tire ghar meñ 'kaif' terā koī qadr-dāñ nahīñ hai jo vatan se duur hotā to baḌā vaqār hotā 
mujhe naql par bhi itna agar iKHtiyar hota kabhi fail imtihan mein na main bar bar hota 
jo main fail ho gaya to sabhi de rahe hain tane koi dil-nawaz hota koi gham-gusar hota 
mujhe aaj itni nafrat se na dekhti ye duniya jo paDhai se zara bhi mere dil ko pyar hota 
mere master na hote jo ulum-o-fan mein dana kabhi maula-baKHsh-sahab ka na main shikar hota 
wo paDhate waqt darje mein hazar bar barse jo mujhe bhi chhik aati unhen nagawar hota 
na main tandurust hota na kabhi school jata kabhi sar mein dard rahta to kabhi buKHar hota 
kabhi madrase mein aata koi aisa chaT wala ki jo muft mein khilata na kabhi udhaar hota 
ye gadha jo apni ghaflat se hai bewaquf itna jo ye KHud ko jaan jata baDa hoshiyar hota 
tere ghar mein 'kaif' tera koi qadr-dan nahin hai jo watan se dur hota to baDa waqar hota

maanā ki musht-e-ḳhāk se baḌh kar nahīñ huuñ maiñ lekin havā ke rahm-o-karam par nahīñ huuñ maiñ 
insān huuñ dhaḌakte hue dil pe haath rakh yuuñ Duub kar na dekh samundar nahīñ huuñ maiñ 
chehre pe mal rahā huuñ siyāhī nasīb kī ā.īna haath meñ hai sikandar nahīñ huuñ maiñ 
vo lahar huuñ jo pyaas bujhā.e zamīn kī chamke jo āsmāñ pe vo patthar nahīñ huuñ maiñ
