ham ne yahī māñgā thā us ne yahī baḳhshā hai banda ho to aisā ho daatā ho to aisā ho 
dil ishq mein be-payan sauda ho to aisa ho dariya ho to aisa ho sahra ho to aisa ho 
ek KHal-e-suwaida mein pahnai-e-do-alam phaila ho to aisa ho simTa ho to aisa ho 
ai qais-e-junun-pesha 'insha' ko kabhi dekha wahshi ho to aisa ho ruswa ho to aisa ho 
dariya ba-hubab-andar tufan ba-sahab-andar mahshar ba-hijab-andar hona ho to aisa ho 
hum se nahin rishta bhi hum se nahin milta bhi hai pas wo baiTha bhi dhoka ho to aisa ho 
wo bhi raha begana hum ne bhi na pahchana han ai dil-e-diwana apna ho to aisa ho 
is dard mein kya kya hai ruswai bhi lazzat bhi kanTa ho to aisa ho chubhta ho to aisa ho 
hum ne yahi manga tha us ne yahi baKHsha hai banda ho to aisa ho data ho to aisa ho

ham ko yaañ dar dar phirāyā yaar ne lā-makāñ meñ ghar banāyā yaar ne 
aap apne dekhne ke vāste ham ko ā.īna banāyā yaar ne 
apne ik adnā tamāshe ke liye ham ko suulī par chaḌhāyā yaar ne 
aap chhup ke ham ko kar ke rū-ba-rū ḳhuub hī rusvā karāyā yaar ne 
aap to but ban ke kī jalva-garī aur hameñ kāfir banāyā yaar ne 
hum ko yan dar dar phiraya yar ne la-makan mein ghar banaya yar ne 
aap apne dekhne ke waste hum ko aaina banaya yar ne 
apne ek adna tamashe ke liye hum ko suli par chaDhaya yar ne 
aap chhup ke hum ko kar ke ru-ba-ru KHub hi ruswa karaya yar ne 
aap to but ban ke ki jalwa-gari aur hamein kafir banaya yar ne

dard-e-dil bhī ġham-e-daurāñ ke barābar se uThā aag sahrā meñ lagī aur dhuāñ ghar se uThā 
tābish-e-husn bhī thī ātish-e-duniyā bhī magar sho.ala jis ne mujhe phūñkā mire andar se uThā 
kisī mausam kī faqīroñ ko zarūrat na rahī aag bhī abr bhī tūfān bhī sāġhar se uThā 
be-sadaf kitne hī dariyāoñ se kuchh bhī na huā bojh qatre kā thā aisā ki samundar se uThā 
chāñd se shikva-ba-lab huuñ ki sulāyā kyuuñ thā maiñ ki ḳhurshīd-e-jahāñ-tāb kī Thokar se uThā 
dard-e-dil bhi gham-e-dauran ke barabar se uTha aag sahra mein lagi aur dhuan ghar se uTha 
tabish-e-husn bhi thi aatish-e-duniya bhi magar shoala jis ne mujhe phunka mere andar se uTha 
kisi mausam ki faqiron ko zarurat na rahi aag bhi abr bhi tufan bhi saghar se uTha 
be-sadaf kitne hi dariyaon se kuchh bhi na hua bojh qatre ka tha aisa ki samundar se uTha 
chand se shikwa-ba-lab hun ki sulaya kyun tha main ki KHurshid-e-jahan-tab ki Thokar se uTha
Poetry Text

taskīn-e-dil-e-mahzūñ na huī vo sa.i-e-karam farmā bhī ga.e is sa.i-e-karam ko kyā kahiye bahlā bhī ga.e taḌpā bhī ga.e 
ham arz-e-vafā bhī kar na sake kuchh kah na sake kuchh sun na sake yaañ ham ne zabāñ hī kholī thī vaañ aañkh jhukī sharmā bhī ga.e 
āshuftagī-e-vahshat kī qasam hairat kī qasam hasrat kī qasam ab aap kaheñ kuchh yā na kaheñ ham rāz-e-tabassum pā bhī ga.e 
rūdād-e-ġham-e-ulfat un se ham kyā kahte kyūñkar kahte ik harf na niklā hoñToñ se aur aañkh meñ aañsū aa bhī ga.e 
arbāb-e-junūñ par furqat meñ ab kyā kahiye kyā kyā guzrī aa.e the savād-e-ulfat meñ kuchh kho bhī ga.e kuchh pā bhī ga.e 
ye rañg-e-bahār-e-ālam hai kyuuñ fikr hai tujh ko ai saaqī mahfil to tirī suunī na huī kuchh uTh bhī ga.e kuchh aa bhī ga.e 
us mahfil-e-kaif-o-mastī meñ us anjuman-e-irfānī meñ sab jām-ba-kaf baiThe hī rahe ham pī bhī ga.e chhalkā bhī ga.e 
taskin-e-dil-e-mahzun na hui wo sai-e-karam farma bhi gae is sai-e-karam ko kya kahiye bahla bhi gae taDpa bhi gae 
hum arz-e-wafa bhi kar na sake kuchh kah na sake kuchh sun na sake yan hum ne zaban hi kholi thi wan aankh jhuki sharma bhi gae 
aashuftagi-e-wahshat ki qasam hairat ki qasam hasrat ki qasam ab aap kahen kuchh ya na kahen hum raaz-e-tabassum pa bhi gae 
rudad-e-gham-e-ulfat un se hum kya kahte kyunkar kahte ek harf na nikla honTon se aur aankh mein aansu aa bhi gae 
arbab-e-junun par furqat mein ab kya kahiye kya kya guzri aae the sawad-e-ulfat mein kuchh kho bhi gae kuchh pa bhi gae 
ye rang-e-bahaar-e-alam hai kyun fikr hai tujh ko ai saqi mahfil to teri suni na hui kuchh uTh bhi gae kuchh aa bhi gae 
us mahfil-e-kaif-o-masti mein us anjuman-e-irfani mein sab jam-ba-kaf baiThe hi rahe hum pi bhi gae chhalka bhi gae

barbād-e-mohabbat kī duā saath liye jā TuuTā huā iqrār-e-vafā saath liye jā 
ik dil thā jo pahle hī tujhe sauñp diyā thā ye jaan bhī ai jān-e-adā saath liye jā 
taptī huī rāhoñ se tujhe aañch na pahuñche dīvānoñ ke ashkoñ kī ghaTā saath liye jā 
shāmil hai mirā ḳhūn-e-jigar terī hinā meñ ye kam ho to ab ḳhūn-e-vafā saath liye jā 
ham jurm-e-mohabbat kī sazā pā.eñge tanhā jo tujh se huī ho vo ḳhatā saath liye jā 
barbaad-e-mohabbat ki dua sath liye ja TuTa hua iqrar-e-wafa sath liye ja 
ek dil tha jo pahle hi tujhe saunp diya tha ye jaan bhi ai jaan-e-ada sath liye ja 
tapti hui rahon se tujhe aanch na pahunche diwanon ke ashkon ki ghaTa sath liye ja 
shamil hai mera KHun-e-jigar teri hina mein ye kam ho to ab KHun-e-wafa sath liye ja 
hum jurm-e-mohabbat ki saza paenge tanha jo tujh se hui ho wo KHata sath liye ja

ham haiñ mata-e-kūcha-o-bāzār kī tarah uThtī hai har nigāh ḳharīdār kī tarah 
is kū-e-tishnagī meñ bahut hai ki ek jaam haath aa gayā hai daulat-e-bedār kī tarah 
vo to kahīñ hai aur magar dil ke ās-pās phirtī hai koī shai nigah-e-yār kī tarah 
sīdhī hai rāh-e-shauq pe yūñhī kahīñ kahīñ ḳham ho ga.ī hai gesū-e-dildār kī tarah 
be-tesha-e-nazar na chalo rāh-e-raftagāñ har naqsh-e-pā buland hai dīvār kī tarah 
ab jā ke kuchh khulā hunar-e-nāḳhun-e-junūñ zaḳhm-e-jigar hue lab-o-ruḳhsār kī tarah 
'majrūh' likh rahe haiñ vo ahl-e-vafā kā naam ham bhī khaḌe hue haiñ gunahgār kī tarah 
hum hain mata-e-kucha-o-bazar ki tarah uThti hai har nigah KHaridar ki tarah 
is ku-e-tishnagi mein bahut hai ki ek jam hath aa gaya hai daulat-e-bedar ki tarah 
wo to kahin hai aur magar dil ke aas-pas phirti hai koi shai nigah-e-yar ki tarah 
sidhi hai rah-e-shauq pe yunhi kahin kahin KHam ho gai hai gesu-e-dildar ki tarah 
be-tesha-e-nazar na chalo rah-e-raftagan har naqsh-e-pa buland hai diwar ki tarah 
ab ja ke kuchh khula hunar-e-naKHun-e-junun zaKHm-e-jigar hue lab-o-ruKHsar ki tarah 
'majruh' likh rahe hain wo ahl-e-wafa ka nam hum bhi khaDe hue hain gunahgar ki tarah

āh-e-jāñ-soz kī mahrūmi-e-tāsīr na dekh ho hī jā.egī koī jiine kī tadbīr na dekh 
hādse aur bhī guzre tirī ulfat ke sivā haañ mujhe dekh mujhe ab merī tasvīr na dekh 
ye zarā duur pe manzil ye ujālā ye sukūñ ḳhvāb ko dekh abhī ḳhvāb kī tābīr na dekh 
dekh zindāñ se pare rañg-e-chaman josh-e-bahār raqs karnā hai to phir paañv kī zanjīr na dekh 
kuchh bhī huuñ phir bhī dukhe dil kī sadā huuñ nādāñ merī bātoñ ko samajh talḳhi-e-taqrīr na dekh 
vahī 'majrūh' vahī shā.ir-e-āvāra-mizāj koī uTThā hai tirī bazm se dil-gīr na dekh 
aah-e-jaan-soz ki mahrumi-e-tasir na dekh ho hi jaegi koi jine ki tadbir na dekh 
hadse aur bhi guzre teri ulfat ke siwa han mujhe dekh mujhe ab meri taswir na dekh 
ye zara dur pe manzil ye ujala ye sukun KHwab ko dekh abhi KHwab ki tabir na dekh 
dekh zindan se pare rang-e-chaman josh-e-bahaar raqs karna hai to phir panw ki zanjir na dekh 
kuchh bhi hun phir bhi dukhe dil ki sada hun nadan meri baaton ko samajh talKHi-e-taqrir na dekh 
wahi 'majruh' wahi shair-e-awara-mizaj koi uTTha hai teri bazm se dil-gir na dekh

parbatoñ ke peḌoñ par shaam kā baserā hai surma.ī ujālā hai champa.ī añdherā hai 
donoñ vaqt milte haiñ do diloñ kī sūrat se āsmāñ ne ḳhush ho kar rang sā bikherā hai 
Thahre Thahre paanī meñ giit sarsarāte haiñ bhīge bhīge jhoñkoñ meñ ḳhushbuoñ kā Derā hai 
kyuuñ na jazb ho jaa.eñ is hasīñ nazāre meñ raushnī kā jhurmuT hai mastiyoñ kā gherā hai 
parbaton ke peDon par sham ka basera hai surmai ujala hai champai andhera hai 
donon waqt milte hain do dilon ki surat se aasman ne KHush ho kar rang sa bikhera hai 
Thahre Thahre pani mein git sarsaraate hain bhige bhige jhonkon mein KHushbuon ka Dera hai 
kyun na jazb ho jaen is hasin nazare mein raushni ka jhurmuT hai mastiyon ka ghera hai

āñkhoñ ke charāġhoñ meñ ujāle na raheñge aa jaao ki phir dekhne vaale na raheñge 
jā shauq se lekin palaT aane ke liye jā ham der talak ḳhud ko sambhāle na raheñge 
ai zauq-e-safar ḳhair ho nazdīk hai manzil sab kahte haiñ ab paañv meñ chhāle na raheñge 
jin nāloñ kī ho jā.egī tā-dost rasā.ī vo sānehe ban jā.eñge naale na raheñge 
maiñ tauba to kar luuñ magar ik baat hai vaa.iz kyā aaj se gardish meñ piyāle na raheñge 
kyoñ zulmat-e-ġham se ho 'ḳhumār' itne pareshān bādal ye hamesha hī to kaale na raheñge 
aankhon ke charaghon mein ujale na rahenge aa jao ki phir dekhne wale na rahenge 
ja shauq se lekin palaT aane ke liye ja hum der talak KHud ko sambhaale na rahenge 
ai zauq-e-safar KHair ho nazdik hai manzil sab kahte hain ab panw mein chhaale na rahenge 
jin nalon ki ho jaegi ta-dost rasai wo sanehe ban jaenge nale na rahenge 
main tauba to kar lun magar ek baat hai waiz kya aaj se gardish mein piyale na rahenge 
kyon zulmat-e-gham se ho 'KHumar' itne pareshan baadal ye hamesha hi to kale na rahenge

baat jab dostoñ kī aatī hai dostī kaañp kaañp jaatī hai 
mujh se ai dost phir ḳhafā ho jā ishq ko niiñd aa.ī jaatī hai 
ab qayāmat se kyā Dare koī ab qayāmat to roz aatī hai 
bhāgtā huuñ maiñ zindagī se 'ḳhumār' aur ye nāgin Dase hī jaatī hai 
baat jab doston ki aati hai dosti kanp kanp jati hai 
mujh se ai dost phir KHafa ho ja ishq ko nind aai jati hai 
ab qayamat se kya Dare koi ab qayamat to roz aati hai 
bhagta hun main zindagi se 'KHumar' aur ye nagin Dase hi jati hai

aaj muddat meñ vo yaad aa.e haiñ dar o dīvār pe kuchh saa.e haiñ 
ābgīnoñ se na Takrā paa.e kohsāroñ se to Takrā.e haiñ 
zindagī tere havādis ham ko kuchh na kuchh raah pe le aa.e haiñ 
sañg-rezoñ se ḳhazaf-pāroñ se kitne hiire kabhī chun laa.e haiñ 
itne māyūs to hālāt nahīñ log kis vāste ghabrā.e haiñ 
un kī jānib na kisī ne dekhā jo hameñ dekh ke sharmā.e haiñ 
aaj muddat mein wo yaad aae hain dar o diwar pe kuchh sae hain 
aabginon se na Takra pae kohsaron se to Takrae hain 
zindagi tere hawadis hum ko kuchh na kuchh rah pe le aae hain 
sang-rezon se KHazaf-paron se kitne hire kabhi chun lae hain 
itne mayus to haalat nahin log kis waste ghabrae hain 
un ki jaanib na kisi ne dekha jo hamein dekh ke sharmae hain

ajab surūr milā hai mujhe duā kar ke ki muskurāyā ḳhudā bhī sitāra vā kar ke 
gadā-gadī bhī ik uslūb-e-fan hai jab maiñ ne usī ko maañg liyā us se iltijā kar ke 
shab-e-firāq ke har jabr ko shikast huī ki maiñ ne sub.h to kar lī ḳhudā ḳhudā kar ke 
ye soch kar ki kabhī to javāb aa.egā maiñ us ke dar pe khaḌā rah gayā sadā kar ke 
ye chāra-gar haiñ ki ik ijtimā-e-bad-zauqāñ vo mujh ko dekheñ tirī zaat se judā kar ke 
ḳhudā bhī un ko na baḳhshe to lutf aa jaa.e jo apne-āp se sharminda huuñ ḳhatā kar ke 
ḳhud apnī zaat pe to e'timād puḳhta huā 'nadīm' yuuñ to mujhe kyā milā vafā kar ke 
ajab surur mila hai mujhe dua kar ke ki muskuraya KHuda bhi sitara wa kar ke 
gada-gadi bhi ek uslub-e-fan hai jab main ne usi ko mang liya us se iltija kar ke 
shab-e-firaq ke har jabr ko shikast hui ki main ne subh to kar li KHuda KHuda kar ke 
ye soch kar ki kabhi to jawab aaega main us ke dar pe khaDa rah gaya sada kar ke 
ye chaara-gar hain ki ek ijtima-e-bad-zauqan wo mujh ko dekhen teri zat se juda kar ke 
KHuda bhi un ko na baKHshe to lutf aa jae jo apne-ap se sharminda hun KHata kar ke 
KHud apni zat pe to e'timad puKHta hua 'nadim' yun to mujhe kya mila wafa kar ke

apne māhaul se the qais ke rishte kyā kyā dasht meñ aaj bhī uThte haiñ bagūle kyā kyā 
ishq me.ār-e-vafā ko nahīñ kartā nīlām varna idrāk ne dikhlā.e the raste kyā kyā 
ye alag baat ki barse nahīñ garje to bahut varna bādal mire sahrāoñ pe umDe kyā kyā 
aag bhaḌkī to dar-o-bām hue raakh ke Dher aur dete rahe ahbāb dilāse kyā kyā 
log ashiyā kī tarah bik ga.e ashiyā ke liye sar-e-bāzār tamāshe nazar aa.e kyā kyā 
lafz kis shaan se taḳhlīq huā thā lekin us kā mafhūm badalte rahe nuqte kyā kyā 
ik kiran tak bhī na pahuñchī mire bātin meñ 'nadīm' sar-e-aflāk damakte rahe taare kyā kyā 
apne mahaul se the qais ke rishte kya kya dasht mein aaj bhi uThte hain bagule kya kya 
ishq mear-e-wafa ko nahin karta nilam warna idrak ne dikhlae the raste kya kya 
ye alag baat ki barse nahin garje to bahut warna baadal mere sahraon pe umDe kya kya 
aag bhaDki to dar-o-baam hue rakh ke Dher aur dete rahe ahbab dilase kya kya 
log ashiya ki tarah bik gae ashiya ke liye sar-e-bazar tamashe nazar aae kya kya 
lafz kis shan se taKHliq hua tha lekin us ka mafhum badalte rahe nuqte kya kya 
ek kiran tak bhi na pahunchi mere baatin mein 'nadim' sar-e-aflak damakte rahe tare kya kya

aaj se pahle tire mastoñ kī ye ḳhvārī na thī mai baḌī ifrāt se thī phir bhī sarshārī na thī 
ek ham qadroñ kī pāmālī se rahte the malūl shukr hai yāroñ ko aisī koī bīmārī na thī 
zehn kī parvāz ho yā shauq kī rāmish-garī koī āzādī na thī jis meñ giraftārī na thī 
josh thā hangāma thā mahfil meñ terī kyā na thā ik faqat ādāb-e-mahfil kī nigah-dārī na thī 
un kī mahfil meñ nazar aa.e sabhī sho.ala-ba-kaf apne dāman meñ magar koī bhī chingārī na thī 
kal isī bastī meñ kuchh ahl-e-vafā hote to the is qadar ahl-e-havas kī garm-bāzārī na thī 
husn kāfir thā adā qātil thī bāteñ sehr thiiñ aur to sab kuchh thā lekin rasm-e-dildārī na thī 
aaj se pahle tere maston ki ye KHwari na thi mai baDi ifraat se thi phir bhi sarshaari na thi 
ek hum qadron ki pamali se rahte the malul shukr hai yaron ko aisi koi bimari na thi 
zehn ki parwaz ho ya shauq ki ramish-gari koi aazadi na thi jis mein giraftari na thi 
josh tha hangama tha mahfil mein teri kya na tha ek faqat aadab-e-mahfil ki nigah-dari na thi 
un ki mahfil mein nazar aae sabhi shoala-ba-kaf apne daman mein magar koi bhi chingari na thi 
kal isi basti mein kuchh ahl-e-wafa hote to the is qadar ahl-e-hawas ki garm-bazari na thi 
husn kafir tha ada qatil thi baaten sehr thin aur to sab kuchh tha lekin rasm-e-dildari na thi

ḳhudā ke vāste ab be-ruḳhī se kaam na le taḌap ke phir koī dāman ko tere thaam na le 
bas ek sajda-e-shukrāna pā-e-sāqī par ye mai-kada hai yahāñ par ḳhudā kā naam na le 
vafā to kaisī jafā bhī nahīñ hai ab ham par ab itnā saḳht mohabbat se intiqām na le 
zamāne bhar meñ haiñ charche mirī tabāhī ke maiñ Dar rahā huuñ kahīñ koī terā naam na le 
miTā do shauq se mujh ko magar kahīñ tum se zamāna merī tabāhī kā intiqām na le 
maiñ jānūñ jab ki bujhā de tū tishnagī dil kī vagarna aaj se dariyā dilī kā naam na le 
nahīñ vo husn jo āshiq ko shād-kām kare nahīñ vo ishq jo nākāmiyoñ se kaam na le 
rakhūñ umīd-e-karam us se ab maiñ kyā 'sāhir' ki jab nazar se bhī zālim mirā salām na le 
KHuda ke waste ab be-ruKHi se kaam na le taDap ke phir koi daman ko tere tham na le 
bas ek sajda-e-shukrana pa-e-saqi par ye mai-kada hai yahan par KHuda ka nam na le 
wafa to kaisi jafa bhi nahin hai ab hum par ab itna saKHt mohabbat se intiqam na le 
zamane bhar mein hain charche meri tabahi ke main Dar raha hun kahin koi tera nam na le 
miTa do shauq se mujh ko magar kahin tum se zamana meri tabahi ka intiqam na le 
main jaanun jab ki bujha de tu tishnagi dil ki wagarna aaj se dariya dili ka nam na le 
nahin wo husn jo aashiq ko shad-kaam kare nahin wo ishq jo nakaamiyon se kaam na le 
rakhun umid-e-karam us se ab main kya 'sahir' ki jab nazar se bhi zalim mera salam na le

āñdhiyāñ chaltī raheñ aflāk tharrāte rahe apnā parcham ham bhī tūfānoñ meñ lahrāte rahe 
kaaT kar rātoñ ke parbat asr-e-nau ke tesha-zan jū-e-shīr-o-chashma-e-nūr-e-sahar laate rahe 
kārvān-e-himmat-e-jamhūr baḌhtā hī gayā shahr-yār-o-hukmarāñ aate rahe jaate rahe 
rahbaroñ kī bhuul thī yā rahbarī kā mudda.ā qāfiloñ ko manziloñ ke paas bhaTkāte rahe 
jis qadar baḌhtā gayā zālim havāoñ kā ḳharosh us ke kākul aur bhī aariz pe lahrāte rahe 
phāñsiyāñ ugtī rahīñ zindāñ ubharte hī rahe chand dīvāne junūñ ke zamzame gaate rahe 
aandhiyan chalti rahen aflak tharraate rahe apna parcham hum bhi tufanon mein lahraate rahe 
kaT kar raaton ke parbat asr-e-nau ke tesha-zan ju-e-shir-o-chashma-e-nur-e-sahar late rahe 
karwan-e-himmat-e-jamhur baDhta hi gaya shahr-yar-o-hukmaran aate rahe jate rahe 
rahbaron ki bhul thi ya rahbari ka muddaa qafilon ko manzilon ke pas bhaTkate rahe 
jis qadar baDhta gaya zalim hawaon ka KHarosh us ke kakul aur bhi aariz pe lahraate rahe 
phansiyan ugti rahin zindan ubharte hi rahe chand diwane junun ke zamzame gate rahe

chauñk chauñk uThtī hai mahloñ kī fazā raat ga.e kaun detā hai ye galiyoñ meñ sadā raat ga.e 
ye haqā.eq kī chaTānoñ se tarāshī duniyā oḌh letī hai tilismoñ kī ridā raat ga.e 
chubh ke rah jaatī hai siine meñ badan kī ḳhushbū khol detā hai koī band-e-qabā raat ga.e 
aao ham jism kī sham.oñ se ujālā kar leñ chāñd niklā bhī to niklegā zarā raat ga.e 
tū na ab aa.e to kyā aaj talak aatī hai sīḌhiyoñ se tire qadmoñ kī sadā raat ga.e 
chaunk chaunk uThti hai mahlon ki faza raat gae kaun deta hai ye galiyon mein sada raat gae 
ye haqaeq ki chaTanon se tarashi duniya oDh leti hai tilismon ki rida raat gae 
chubh ke rah jati hai sine mein badan ki KHushbu khol deta hai koi band-e-qaba raat gae 
aao hum jism ki shamon se ujala kar len chand nikla bhi to niklega zara raat gae 
tu na ab aae to kya aaj talak aati hai siDhiyon se tere qadmon ki sada raat gae

na ham-āhañg-e-masīhā na harīf-e-jibrīl terā shā.ir ki hai zindānī-e-gesū-e-jamīl 
kis kī āñkhoñ meñ ye ġhaltāñ hai javānī kī sharāb khol dī aah ye kis ne mai-e-gul-gūñ kī sabīl 
kis taraf jaa.e kahāñ jaa.e batā do koī zulf-e-pur-ḳham kā giraftār nigāhoñ kā qatīl 
ālam-e-yās meñ kyā chiiz hai ik sāġhar-e-mai dasht-e-zulmāt meñ jis tarah ḳhizr kī qindīl 
kitnī dushvār hai pīrān-e-haram kī manzil is taraf fitna-e-iblīs udhar rabb-e-jalīl 
uf ye tūfān-e-nashāt aur mirī tab'-e-hazīñ aah ye yūrish-e-nāz aur maiñ majrūh o aliil 
aah vo hosh kā aalam vo ġhamoñ kā tūfāñ uf ye mastī ki hai phir hosh meñ aane kī dalīl 
na ham-ahang-e-masiha na harif-e-jibril tera shair ki hai zindani-e-gesu-e-jamil 
kis ki aankhon mein ye ghaltan hai jawani ki sharab khol di aah ye kis ne mai-e-gul-gun ki sabil 
kis taraf jae kahan jae bata do koi zulf-e-pur-KHam ka giraftar nigahon ka qatil 
aalam-e-yas mein kya chiz hai ek saghar-e-mai dasht-e-zulmat mein jis tarah KHizr ki qindil 
kitni dushwar hai piran-e-haram ki manzil is taraf fitna-e-iblis udhar rabb-e-jalil 
uf ye tufan-e-nashat aur meri tab'-e-hazin aah ye yurish-e-naz aur main majruh o alil 
aah wo hosh ka aalam wo ghamon ka tufan uf ye masti ki hai phir hosh mein aane ki dalil

baiThe haiñ jahāñ saaqī paimāna-e-zar le kar us bazm se uTh aa.e ham dīda-e-tar le kar 
yādoñ se tirī raushan mehrāb-e-shab-e-hijrāñ DhūñDheñge tujhe kab tak qindīl-e-qamar le kar 
kyā husn hai duniyā meñ kyā lutf hai jiine meñ dekhe to koī merā andāz-e-nazar le kar 
hotī hai zamāne meñ kis tarah pazīrā.ī niklo to zarā ghar se ik zauq-e-safar le kar 
rāheñ chamak uTTheñgī ḳhurshīd kī mash.al se hamrāh sabā hogī ḳhushbū-e-sahar le kar 
maḳhmal sī bichhā deñge qadmoñ ke tale sāhil dariyā ubal ā.eñge sad-mauj-e-guhar le kar 
pahnā.eñge taaj apnā peḌoñ ke ghane saa.e nikleñge shajar apne ḳhush-rañg samar le kar 
lapkeñge gale milne sarv aur sanobar sab uTheñge gulistāñ bhī shāḳh-e-gul-e-tar le kar 
hañste hue shahroñ kī āvāz bulā.egī lab jaam ke chamkeñge sau sho.ala-e-tar le kar 
aflāk bajā.eñge saaz apne sitāroñ kā gā.eñge bahut lamhe anfās-e-sharar le kar 
ye ālam-e-ḳhākī ik sayyāra-e-raushan hai aflāk se Takrā do taqdīr-e-bashar le kar 
baiThe hain jahan saqi paimana-e-zar le kar us bazm se uTh aae hum dida-e-tar le kar 
yaadon se teri raushan mehrab-e-shab-e-hijran DhunDhenge tujhe kab tak qindil-e-qamar le kar 
kya husn hai duniya mein kya lutf hai jine mein dekhe to koi mera andaz-e-nazar le kar 
hoti hai zamane mein kis tarah pazirai niklo to zara ghar se ek zauq-e-safar le kar 
rahen chamak uTThengi KHurshid ki mashal se hamrah saba hogi KHushbu-e-sahar le kar 
maKHmal si bichha denge qadmon ke tale sahil dariya ubal aaenge sad-mauj-e-guhar le kar 
pahnaenge taj apna peDon ke ghane sae niklenge shajar apne KHush-rang samar le kar 
lapkenge gale milne sarw aur sanobar sab uThenge gulistan bhi shaKH-e-gul-e-tar le kar 
hanste hue shahron ki aawaz bulaegi lab jam ke chamkenge sau shoala-e-tar le kar 
aflak bajaenge saz apne sitaron ka gaenge bahut lamhe anfas-e-sharar le kar 
ye aalam-e-KHaki ek sayyara-e-raushan hai aflak se Takra do taqdir-e-bashar le kar

faroġh-e-dīda-o-dil lāla-e-sahar kī tarah ujālā bin ke raho sham-e-rahguzar kī tarah 
payambaroñ kī tarah se jiyo zamāne meñ payām-e-shauq bano daulat-e-hunar kī tarah 
ye zindagī bhī koī zindagī hai ham-nafaso sitāra ban ke jale bujh ga.e sharar kī tarah 
Darā sakī na mujhe tīrgī zamāne kī añdherī raat se guzrā huuñ maiñ qamar kī tarah 
samundaroñ ke talātum ne mujh ko paalā hai chamak rahā huuñ isī vāste guhar kī tarah 
tamām koh o tal o bahr o bar haiñ zer-e-nagīñ khulā huā huuñ maiñ shāhīñ ke bāl-o-par kī tarah 
tamām daulat-e-kaunain hai ḳhirāj us kā ye dil nahīñ kisī luuTe hue nagar kī tarah 
guzar ke ḳhaar se ġhunche se gul se shabnam se maiñ shāḳh-e-vaqt meñ aayā huuñ ik samar kī tarah 
maiñ dil meñ talḳhī-e-zahrāb-e-ġham bhī rakhtā huuñ na misl-e-shahd huuñ shīrīñ na maiñ shakar kī tarah 
ḳhizāñ ke dast-e-sitam ne mujhe chhuā hai magar tamām sho.ala o shabnam huuñ kāshmar kī tarah 
mirī navā meñ hai lutf-o-surūr-e-sub.h-e-nashāt har ek sher hai rindoñ kī shām-e-tar kī tarah 
ye fātehāna ġhazal asr-e-nau kā hai āhañg buland o past ko dekhā hai dīda-var kī tarah 
farogh-e-dida-o-dil lala-e-sahar ki tarah ujala bin ke raho sham-e-rahguzar ki tarah 
payambaron ki tarah se jiyo zamane mein payam-e-shauq bano daulat-e-hunar ki tarah 
ye zindagi bhi koi zindagi hai ham-nafaso sitara ban ke jale bujh gae sharar ki tarah 
Dara saki na mujhe tirgi zamane ki andheri raat se guzra hun main qamar ki tarah 
samundaron ke talatum ne mujh ko pala hai chamak raha hun isi waste guhar ki tarah 
tamam koh o tal o bahr o bar hain zer-e-nagin khula hua hun main shahin ke baal-o-par ki tarah 
tamam daulat-e-kaunain hai KHiraj us ka ye dil nahin kisi luTe hue nagar ki tarah 
guzar ke KHar se ghunche se gul se shabnam se main shaKH-e-waqt mein aaya hun ek samar ki tarah 
main dil mein talKHi-e-zahrab-e-gham bhi rakhta hun na misl-e-shahd hun shirin na main shakar ki tarah 
KHizan ke dast-e-sitam ne mujhe chhua hai magar tamam shoala o shabnam hun kashmar ki tarah 
meri nawa mein hai lutf-o-surur-e-subh-e-nashat har ek sher hai rindon ki sham-e-tar ki tarah 
ye fatehana ghazal asr-e-nau ka hai aahang buland o past ko dekha hai dida-war ki tarah

fazā-e-shab meñ sitāre hazār guzre haiñ ye āsmāñ se diloñ ke ġhubār guzre haiñ 
mahak uThe haiñ dar-o-bām o kūcha o bāzār jahāñ jahāñ se tire bāda-ḳhvār guzre haiñ 
mizāj pūchhte phirte haiñ zarre zarre kā diloñ kī raah se kuchh ḳhāksār guzre haiñ 
kalī ne baḌh ke pukārā guloñ ne pyaar kiyā kabhī chaman se jo sīna-figār guzre haiñ 
mujhe dikhāo na ḳhūn-e-jamāl-e-lāla-o-gul mirī nazar se ye naqsh o nigār guzre haiñ 
bahā sakā na unheñ vaqt kā bhī sail-e-ravāñ vo chand lamhe jo is dil pe baar guzre haiñ 
hamārī raah meñ 'jazbī' pahāḌ aa.e pe ham misāl-e-abr sair-e-kohsār guzre haiñ 
faza-e-shab mein sitare hazar guzre hain ye aasman se dilon ke ghubar guzre hain 
mahak uThe hain dar-o-baam o kucha o bazar jahan jahan se tere baada-KHwar guzre hain 
mizaj puchhte phirte hain zarre zarre ka dilon ki rah se kuchh KHaksar guzre hain 
kali ne baDh ke pukara gulon ne pyar kiya kabhi chaman se jo sina-figar guzre hain 
mujhe dikhao na KHun-e-jamal-e-lala-o-gul meri nazar se ye naqsh o nigar guzre hain 
baha saka na unhen waqt ka bhi sail-e-rawan wo chand lamhe jo is dil pe bar guzre hain 
hamari rah mein 'jazbi' pahaD aae pe hum misal-e-abr sair-e-kohsar guzre hain

chaman meñ the jo chaman hī kī dāstān sunte koī navā koī naġhma koī fuġhāñ sunte 
qadam na chhoḌte rāhoñ ko tā-ba-manzil-e-shauq hamārī baat jo ye ahl-e-kārvāñ sunte 
tire qalam se to gulzār-e-be-navā kā qafas tirī zabāñ se bhī kuchh hāl-e-be-zabāñ sunte 
hamāre dard kā tūfāñ kahāñ kahāñ na uThā ye shor aap jahāñ chāhte vahāñ sunte 
ik umr apnī bhī guzrī hai ai chaman vaalo guloñ ke kunj meñ andesha-e-ḳhizāñ sunte 
kisī kā rañj kisī kā alam kisī kā malāl ab aur kyā thā jo ham zer-e-āsmāñ sunte 
guloñ se bach ke chale bulbuloñ se katrā.e vo merā qissa-e-ḳhūnīñ kahāñ kahāñ sunte 
kuchh is meñ apnā bhī soz-e-bayāñ thā ai 'jazbī' vagarna log kab afsāna-e-jahāñ sunte 
chaman mein the jo chaman hi ki dastan sunte koi nawa koi naghma koi fughan sunte 
qadam na chhoDte rahon ko ta-ba-manzil-e-shauq hamari baat jo ye ahl-e-karwan sunte 
tere qalam se to gulzar-e-be-nawa ka qafas teri zaban se bhi kuchh haal-e-be-zaban sunte 
hamare dard ka tufan kahan kahan na uTha ye shor aap jahan chahte wahan sunte 
ek umr apni bhi guzri hai ai chaman walo gulon ke kunj mein andesha-e-KHizan sunte 
kisi ka ranj kisi ka alam kisi ka malal ab aur kya tha jo hum zer-e-asman sunte 
gulon se bach ke chale bulbulon se katrae wo mera qissa-e-KHunin kahan kahan sunte 
kuchh is mein apna bhi soz-e-bayan tha ai 'jazbi' wagarna log kab afsana-e-jahan sunte

dil-dādgān-e-lazzat-e-ījād kyā kareñ sailāb-e-ashk-o-āh pe buniyād kyā kareñ 
karnā hai ban ko taaza nihāloñ kī dekh bhaal biitī huī bahār ko vo yaad kyā kareñ 
haañ jaan kar umiid kī maddham rakhī hai lau ab aur pās-e-ḳhātir-e-nāshād kyā kareñ 
sañgīñ haqīqatoñ se kahāñ tak malūl hoñ rānā.i-e-ḳhayāl ko barbād kyā kareñ 
dekho jise liye hai vo zaḳhmoñ kī kā.enāt ham ek apne zaḳhm pe fariyād kyā kareñ 
rindoñ kī aarzū kā talātum kahāñ se laa.eñ āsūdgān-e-masnad-e-irshād kyā kareñ 
kis ko nahīñ sukūn kī ḳhvāhish jahān meñ uftādgān-e-rahguzar-e-bād kyā kareñ 
jo har nazar meñ taaza kareñ mai-kade hazār sach hai 'surūr'-e-rafta ko vo yaad kyā kareñ 
dil-dadgan-e-lazzat-e-ijad kya karen sailab-e-ashk-o-ah pe buniyaad kya karen 
karna hai ban ko taza nihaalon ki dekh bhaal biti hui bahaar ko wo yaad kya karen 
han jaan kar umid ki maddham rakhi hai lau ab aur pas-e-KHatir-e-nashad kya karen 
sangin haqiqaton se kahan tak malul hon ranai-e-KHayal ko barbaad kya karen 
dekho jise liye hai wo zaKHmon ki kaenat hum ek apne zaKHm pe fariyaad kya karen 
rindon ki aarzu ka talatum kahan se laen aasudgan-e-masnad-e-irshad kya karen 
kis ko nahin sukun ki KHwahish jahan mein uftadgan-e-rahguzar-e-baad kya karen 
jo har nazar mein taza karen mai-kade hazar sach hai 'surur'-e-rafta ko wo yaad kya karen
Poetry Text

ye aarzū thī tujhe gul ke rū-ba-rū karte ham aur bulbul-e-betāb guftugū karte 
payāmbar na mayassar huā to ḳhuub huā zabān-e-ġhair se kyā sharh-e-ārzū karte 
mirī tarah se mah-o-mehr bhī haiñ āvāra kisī habīb kī ye bhī haiñ justujū karte 
hamesha rañg-e-zamāna badaltā rahtā hai safed rañg haiñ āḳhir siyāh mū karte 
luTāte daulat-e-duniyā ko mai-kade meñ ham tilā.ī sāġhar-e-mai nuqra.ī subū karte 
hamesha maiñ ne garebāñ ko chaak chaak kiyā tamām umr rafūgar rahe rafū karte 
jo dekhte tirī zanjīr-e-zulf kā aalam asiir hone kī āzād aarzū karte 
bayāz-e-gardan-e-jānāñ ko sub.h kahte jo ham sitāra-e-saharī takma-e-gulū karte 
ye ka.abe se nahīñ be-vaj.h nisbat-e-ruḳh-e-yār ye be-sabab nahīñ murde ko qibla-rū karte 
sikhāte nāla-e-shab-gīr ko dar-andāzī ġham-e-firāq kā us charḳh ko adū karte 
vo jān-e-jāñ nahīñ aatā to maut hī aatī dil-o-jigar ko kahāñ tak bhalā lahū karte 
na pūchh ālam-e-bargashta-tāla.ī 'ātish' barastī aag jo bārāñ kī aarzū karte 
ye aarzu thi tujhe gul ke ru-ba-ru karte hum aur bulbul-e-betab guftugu karte 
payambar na mayassar hua to KHub hua zaban-e-ghair se kya sharh-e-arzu karte 
meri tarah se mah-o-mehr bhi hain aawara kisi habib ki ye bhi hain justuju karte 
hamesha rang-e-zamana badalta rahta hai safed rang hain aaKHir siyah mu karte 
luTate daulat-e-duniya ko mai-kade mein hum tilai saghar-e-mai nuqrai subu karte 
hamesha main ne gareban ko chaak chaak kiya tamam umr rafugar rahe rafu karte 
jo dekhte teri zanjir-e-zulf ka aalam asir hone ki aazad aarzu karte 
bayaz-e-gardan-e-jaanan ko subh kahte jo hum sitara-e-sahari takma-e-gulu karte 
ye kabe se nahin be-wajh nisbat-e-ruKH-e-yar ye be-sabab nahin murde ko qibla-ru karte 
sikhate nala-e-shab-gir ko dar-andazi gham-e-firaq ka us charKH ko adu karte 
wo jaan-e-jaan nahin aata to maut hi aati dil-o-jigar ko kahan tak bhala lahu karte 
na puchh aalam-e-bargashta-talai 'atish' barasti aag jo baran ki aarzu karte

āñdhī chalī to naqsh-e-kaf-e-pā nahīñ milā dil jis se mil gayā vo dobārā nahīñ milā 
ham anjuman meñ sab kī taraf dekhte rahe apnī tarah se koī akelā nahīñ milā 
āvāz ko to kaun samajhtā ki duur duur ḳhāmoshiyoñ kā dard-shanāsā nahīñ milā 
qadmoñ ko shauq-e-ābla-pā.e to mil gayā lekin ba-zarf-e-vus.at-e-sahrā nahīñ milā 
kan.āñ meñ bhī nasīb huī ḳhud-darīdgī chāk-e-qabā ko dast-e-zuleḳhā nahīñ milā 
mehr o vafā ke dasht-navardo javāb do tum ko bhī vo ġhazāl milā yā nahīñ milā 
kachche ghaḌe ne jiit lī naddī chaḌhī huī mazbūt kashtiyoñ ko kinārā nahīñ milā 
aandhi chali to naqsh-e-kaf-e-pa nahin mila dil jis se mil gaya wo dobara nahin mila 
hum anjuman mein sab ki taraf dekhte rahe apni tarah se koi akela nahin mila 
aawaz ko to kaun samajhta ki dur dur KHamoshiyon ka dard-shanasa nahin mila 
qadmon ko shauq-e-abla-pae to mil gaya lekin ba-zarf-e-wusat-e-sahra nahin mila 
kanan mein bhi nasib hui KHud-daridgi chaak-e-qaba ko dast-e-zuleKHa nahin mila 
mehr o wafa ke dasht-nawardo jawab do tum ko bhi wo ghazal mila ya nahin mila 
kachche ghaDe ne jit li naddi chaDhi hui mazbut kashtiyon ko kinara nahin mila

apne hamrāh jo aate ho idhar se pahle dasht paḌtā hai miyāñ ishq meñ ghar se pahle 
chal diye uTh ke sū-e-shahr-e-vafā kū-e-habīb pūchh lenā thā kisī ḳhāk-basar se pahle 
ishq pahle bhī kiyā hijr kā ġham bhī dekhā itne taḌpe haiñ na ghabrā.e na tarse pahle 
jī bahaltā hī nahīñ ab koī saa.at koī pal raat Dhaltī hī nahīñ chaar pahar se pahle 
ham kisī dar pe na ThiTke na kahīñ dastak dī saikḌoñ dar the mirī jaañ tire dar se pahle 
chāñd se aañkh milī jī kā ujālā jaagā ham ko sau baar huī sub.h sahar se pahle 
apne hamrah jo aate ho idhar se pahle dasht paDta hai miyan ishq mein ghar se pahle 
chal diye uTh ke su-e-shahr-e-wafa ku-e-habib puchh lena tha kisi KHak-basar se pahle 
ishq pahle bhi kiya hijr ka gham bhi dekha itne taDpe hain na ghabrae na tarse pahle 
ji bahalta hi nahin ab koi saat koi pal raat Dhalti hi nahin chaar pahar se pahle 
hum kisi dar pe na ThiTke na kahin dastak di saikDon dar the meri jaan tere dar se pahle 
chand se aankh mili ji ka ujala jaga hum ko sau bar hui subh sahar se pahle

ai dil vaalo ghar se niklo detā dāvat-e-ām hai chāñd shahroñ shahroñ qariyoñ qariyoñ vahshat kā paiġhām hai chāñd 
tū bhī hare darīche vaalī aa jā bar-sar-e-bām hai chāñd har koī jag meñ ḳhud sā DhūñDe tujh bin base ārām hai chāñd 
sakhiyoñ se kab sakhiyāñ apne jī ke bhed chhupātī haiñ ham se nahīñ to us se kah de kartā kahāñ kalām hai chāñd 
jis jis se use rabt rahā hai aur bhī log hazāroñ haiñ ek tujhī ko be-mehrī kā detā kyuuñ ilzām hai chāñd 
vo jo terā daaġh ġhulāmī māthe par liye phirtā hai us kā naam to 'inshā' Thahrā nāhaq ko badnām hai chāñd 
ham se bhī do bāteñ kar le kaisī bhīgī shaam hai chāñd sab kuchh sun le aap na bole terā ḳhuub nizām hai chāñd 
ham is lambe-chauḌe ghar meñ shab ko tanhā hote haiñ dekh kisī din aa mil ham se ham ko tujh se kaam hai chāñd 
apne dil ke mashriq-o-maġhrib us ke ruḳh se munavvar haiñ be-shak terā ruup bhī kāmil be-shak tū bhī tamām hai chāñd 
tujh ko to har shaam falak par ghaTtā-baḌhtā dekhte haiñ us ko dekh ke iid kareñge apnā aur islām hai chāñd 
ai dil walo ghar se niklo deta dawat-e-am hai chand shahron shahron qariyon qariyon wahshat ka paigham hai chand 
tu bhi hare dariche wali aa ja bar-sar-e-baam hai chand har koi jag mein KHud sa DhunDe tujh bin base aaram hai chand 
sakhiyon se kab sakhiyan apne ji ke bhed chhupati hain hum se nahin to us se kah de karta kahan kalam hai chand 
jis jis se use rabt raha hai aur bhi log hazaron hain ek tujhi ko be-mehri ka deta kyun ilzam hai chand 
wo jo tera dagh ghulami mathe par liye phirta hai us ka nam to 'insha' Thahra nahaq ko badnam hai chand 
hum se bhi do baaten kar le kaisi bhigi sham hai chand sab kuchh sun le aap na bole tera KHub nizam hai chand 
hum is lambe-chauDe ghar mein shab ko tanha hote hain dekh kisi din aa mil hum se hum ko tujh se kaam hai chand 
apne dil ke mashriq-o-maghrib us ke ruKH se munawwar hain be-shak tera rup bhi kaamil be-shak tu bhi tamam hai chand 
tujh ko to har sham falak par ghaTta-baDhta dekhte hain us ko dekh ke id karenge apna aur islam hai chand

''zabān-e-ġhair se kyā sharh-e-ārzū karte'' vo ḳhud agar kahīñ miltā to guftugū karte 
vo zaḳhm jis ko kiyā nok-e-āftāb se chaak usī ko sozan-e-mahtāb se rafū karte 
savād-e-dil meñ lahū kā surāġh bhī na milā kise imaam banāte kahāñ vazū karte 
vo ik tilism thā qurbat meñ us ke umr kaTī gale lagā ke use us kī aarzū karte 
halaf uThā.e haiñ majbūriyoñ ne jis ke liye use bhī log kisī roz qibla-rū karte 
junūñ ke saath bhī rasmeñ ḳhirad ke saath bhī qaid kise rafīq banāte kise adū karte 
hijāb uThā diye ḳhud hī nigār-ḳhānoñ ne hameñ dimāġh kahāñ thā ki aarzū karte 
zaban-e-ghair se kya sharh-e-arzu karte wo KHud agar kahin milta to guftugu karte 
wo zaKHm jis ko kiya nok-e-aftab se chaak usi ko sozan-e-mahtab se rafu karte 
sawad-e-dil mein lahu ka suragh bhi na mila kise imam banate kahan wazu karte 
wo ek tilism tha qurbat mein us ke umr kaTi gale laga ke use us ki aarzu karte 
halaf uThae hain majburiyon ne jis ke liye use bhi log kisi roz qibla-ru karte 
junun ke sath bhi rasmen KHirad ke sath bhi qaid kise rafiq banate kise adu karte 
hijab uTha diye KHud hi nigar-KHanon ne hamein dimagh kahan tha ki aarzu karte

qadam qadam pe tamannā-e-iltifāt to dekh zavāl-e-ishq meñ saudāgaroñ kā haat to dekh 
bas ek ham the jo thoḌā sā sar uThā ke chale isī ravish pe raqīboñ ke vāqi.āt to dekh 
ġham-e-hayāt meñ hāzir huuñ lekin ek zarā nigār-e-shahr se mere ta.alluqāt to dekh 
ḳhud apnī aañch meñ jaltā hai chāñdnī kā badan kisī ke narm ḳhunuk gesuoñ kī raat to dekh 
atā kyā dil-e-muztar to sī diye mere hoñT ḳhudā-e-kaun-o-makāñ ke tavahhumāt to dekh 
gunāh meñ bhī baḌe ma.arifat ke mauqe haiñ kabhī kabhī use be-ḳhadsha-e-najāt to dekh 
qadam qadam pe tamanna-e-iltifat to dekh zawal-e-ishq mein saudagaron ka hat to dekh 
bas ek hum the jo thoDa sa sar uTha ke chale isi rawish pe raqibon ke waqiat to dekh 
gham-e-hayat mein hazir hun lekin ek zara nigar-e-shahr se mere talluqat to dekh 
KHud apni aanch mein jalta hai chandni ka badan kisi ke narm KHunuk gesuon ki raat to dekh 
ata kya dil-e-muztar to si diye mere honT KHuda-e-kaun-o-makan ke tawahhumat to dekh 
gunah mein bhi baDe marifat ke mauqe hain kabhi kabhi use be-KHadsha-e-najat to dekh

dekhnā jab mujhe kar shaan ye gaalī denā kis se tum sīkhe ho har aan ye gaalī denā 
iḳhtilāt aap se aur mujh se kahāñ kā aisā vaah jī jaan na pahchān ye gaalī denā 
ab to nādāñ ho sunā chāho so pyāre kah lo par tumheñ hovegā nuqsān ye gaalī denā 
āḳhirash hogī jo un par to kise bhāvegā chand roz aur hī mehmān ye gaalī denā 
tohmat-e-bosa abas detī ho manzūr jo ho kar ke be-fā.eda bohtān ye gaalī denā 
dījiye dījiye hai ain sa.ādat apnī āshiqoñ par to hai ehsān ye gaalī denā 
tere ġhussa se jo 'inshā' ho ḳhafā nāhaq hai haañ tujhe chāhiye nādān ye gaalī denā 
dekhna jab mujhe kar shan ye gali dena kis se tum sikhe ho har aan ye gali dena 
iKHtilat aap se aur mujh se kahan ka aisa wah ji jaan na pahchan ye gali dena 
ab to nadan ho suna chaho so pyare kah lo par tumhein howega nuqsan ye gali dena 
aaKHirash hogi jo un par to kise bhawega chand roz aur hi mehman ye gali dena 
tohmat-e-bosa abas deti ho manzur jo ho kar ke be-faeda bohtan ye gali dena 
dijiye dijiye hai ain saadat apni aashiqon par to hai ehsan ye gali dena 
tere ghussa se jo 'insha' ho KHafa nahaq hai han tujhe chahiye nadan ye gali dena

jahāñ ki hai jurm ek nigāh karnā vahīñ hai gunah pe DaT ke gunāh karnā 
butoñ se baḌhā ke mel nibāh karnā jahāñ ke safed ko he siyāh karnā 
sikhāyā hai mujh ko is mirī be-kasī ne usī ko sitam kā us ke gavāh karnā 
lubhāne se dil ke thā to ye mudda.ā thā ġharīb kī zindagī ko tabāh karnā 
yahī to hai haañ yahī vo adā-e-ma.asūm alag huī jo sikhā ke gunāh karnā 
jafā se bhī leñ maza na vafā kā kyūñkar hameñ to har ik tarah hai nibāh karnā 
ye kahtā hai chashm-e-hosh-rubā kā jaadū tujhe tire haath se hai tabāh karnā 
tirī nazar se sīkhā hai āh-e-dil ne jigar meñ shigāf Daal ke raah karnā 
nazar meñ nazar gaḌā.e hai yuuñ vo zālim ki 'ārzū' ab kaThin hai ik aah karnā 
jahan ki hai jurm ek nigah karna wahin hai gunah pe DaT ke gunah karna 
buton se baDha ke mel nibah karna jahan ke safed ko he siyah karna 
sikhaya hai mujh ko is meri be-kasi ne usi ko sitam ka us ke gawah karna 
lubhane se dil ke tha to ye muddaa tha gharib ki zindagi ko tabah karna 
yahi to hai han yahi wo ada-e-masum alag hui jo sikha ke gunah karna 
jafa se bhi len maza na wafa ka kyunkar hamein to har ek tarah hai nibah karna 
ye kahta hai chashm-e-hosh-ruba ka jadu tujhe tere hath se hai tabah karna 
teri nazar se sikha hai aah-e-dil ne jigar mein shigaf Dal ke rah karna 
nazar mein nazar gaDae hai yun wo zalim ki 'arzu' ab kaThin hai ek aah karna

ayaañ hai be-ruḳhī chitvan se aur ġhussa nigāhoñ se payām-e-ḳhāmushī aur vo bhī do do nashr-gāhoñ se 
vabāl-e-jāñ hai aisī zindagī jis meñ talātum ho miTā luuñ hausle phir tauba kar lūñgā gunāhoñ se 
fazā mahdūd kab hai ai dil-e-vahshī falak kaisā nilāhaT hai nazar kī dekhte haiñ jo nigāhoñ se 
haqīqat meñ nigāhoñ se koī manzil nahīñ bachtī guzarte dekhe haiñ gosha-nashīñ tak shāh-rāhoñ se 
tahī-dastān-e-qismat ko na lenā thā na denā thā hisāb-e-zindagī kyā hai ye pūchho bādshāhoñ se 
hameñ to jalte dil kī raushnī meñ aage baḌhnā hai haTā do qumqume bijlī ke nā-hamvār rāhoñ se 
mire nāloñ ke sab shākī koī un ko nahīñ kahtā khurachte rahte haiñ jo zaḳhm-e-dil ḳhūnī nigāhoñ se 
pilā do zahr-e-ġham dil ko na chhoḌe gar havas-kārī gunah vo ek achchhā jo bachā le sau gunāhoñ se 
hamīñ kuchh 'ārzū' pher un kī bātoñ kā samajhte haiñ jo haq-poshī meñ sach ko jhuuT karte haiñ gavāhoñ se 
ayan hai be-ruKHi chitwan se aur ghussa nigahon se payam-e-KHamushi aur wo bhi do do nashr-gahon se 
wabaal-e-jaan hai aisi zindagi jis mein talatum ho miTa lun hausle phir tauba kar lunga gunahon se 
faza mahdud kab hai ai dil-e-wahshi falak kaisa nilahaT hai nazar ki dekhte hain jo nigahon se 
haqiqat mein nigahon se koi manzil nahin bachti guzarte dekhe hain gosha-nashin tak shah-rahon se 
tahi-dastan-e-qismat ko na lena tha na dena tha hisab-e-zindagi kya hai ye puchho baadshahon se 
hamein to jalte dil ki raushni mein aage baDhna hai haTa do qumqume bijli ke na-hamwar rahon se 
mere nalon ke sab shaki koi un ko nahin kahta khurachte rahte hain jo zaKHm-e-dil KHuni nigahon se 
pila do zahr-e-gham dil ko na chhoDe gar hawas-kari gunah wo ek achchha jo bacha le sau gunahon se 
hamin kuchh 'arzu' pher un ki baaton ka samajhte hain jo haq-poshi mein sach ko jhuT karte hain gawahon se

bañk kī jalva-garī par ġhash huuñ ya.anī us sabz parī par ġhash huuñ 
garche duniyā ke hunar haiñ lekin apne maiñ be-hunarī par ġhash huuñ 
barq kī tarah na taḌpūñ kyūñkar terī poshāk-e-zarī par ġhash huuñ 
us kī pishvāz kī se laa.ī baas us kī maiñ god-bharī par ġhash huuñ 
ġhash nasīm-e-saharī hai mujh par maiñ nasīm-e-saharī par ġhash huuñ 
use kuchh ho na sakā 'inshā' maiñ aah kī be-asarī par ġhash huuñ 
bank ki jalwa-gari par ghash hun yani us sabz pari par ghash hun 
garche duniya ke hunar hain lekin apne main be-hunari par ghash hun 
barq ki tarah na taDpun kyunkar teri poshak-e-zari par ghash hun 
us ki pishwaz ki se lai bas us ki main god-bhari par ghash hun 
ghash nasim-e-sahari hai mujh par main nasim-e-sahari par ghash hun 
use kuchh ho na saka 'insha' main aah ki be-asari par ghash hun
Poetry Text

donoñ jahān terī mohabbat meñ haar ke vo jā rahā hai koī shab-e-ġham guzār ke 
vīrāñ hai mai-kada ḳhum-o-sāġhar udaas haiñ tum kyā ga.e ki ruuTh ga.e din bahār ke 
ik fursat-e-gunāh milī vo bhī chaar din dekhe haiñ ham ne hausle parvardigār ke 
duniyā ne terī yaad se begāna kar diyā tujh se bhī dil-fareb haiñ ġham rozgār ke 
bhūle se muskurā to diye the vo aaj 'faiz' mat pūchh valvale dil-e-nā-kardā-kār ke 
donon jahan teri mohabbat mein haar ke wo ja raha hai koi shab-e-gham guzar ke 
viran hai mai-kada KHum-o-saghar udas hain tum kya gae ki ruTh gae din bahaar ke 
ek fursat-e-gunah mili wo bhi chaar din dekhe hain hum ne hausle parwardigar ke 
duniya ne teri yaad se begana kar diya tujh se bhi dil-fareb hain gham rozgar ke 
bhule se muskura to diye the wo aaj 'faiz' mat puchh walwale dil-e-na-karda-kar ke

chupke chupke raat din aañsū bahānā yaad hai ham ko ab tak āshiqī kā vo zamānā yaad hai 
bā-hazārāñ iztirāb o sad-hazārāñ ishtiyāq tujh se vo pahle-pahal dil kā lagānā yaad hai 
baar baar uThnā usī jānib nigāh-e-shauq kā aur tirā ġhurfe se vo āñkheñ laḌānā yaad hai 
tujh se kuchh milte hī vo bebāk ho jaanā mirā aur tirā dāñtoñ meñ vo uñglī dabānā yaad hai 
khīñch lenā vo mirā parde kā konā daf.atan aur dupaTTe se tirā vo muñh chhupānā yaad hai 
jaan kar sotā tujhe vo qasd-e-pā-bosī mirā aur tirā Thukrā ke sar vo muskurānā yaad hai 
tujh ko jab tanhā kabhī paanā to az-rāh-e-lihāz hāl-e-dil bātoñ hī bātoñ meñ jatānā yaad hai 
jab sivā mere tumhārā koī dīvāna na thā sach kaho kuchh tum ko bhī vo kār-ḳhānā yaad hai 
ġhair kī nazroñ se bach kar sab kī marzī ke ḳhilāf vo tirā chorī-chhupe rātoñ ko aanā yaad hai 
aa gayā gar vasl kī shab bhī kahīñ zikr-e-firāq vo tirā ro ro ke mujh ko bhī rulānā yaad hai 
dopahar kī dhuup meñ mere bulāne ke liye vo tirā koThe pe nañge paañv aanā yaad hai 
aaj tak nazroñ meñ hai vo sohbat-e-rāz-o-niyāz apnā jaanā yaad hai terā bulānā yaad hai 
mīThī mīThī chheḌ kar bāteñ nirālī pyaar kī zikr dushman kā vo bātoñ meñ uḌānā yaad hai 
dekhnā mujh ko jo bargashta to sau sau naaz se jab manā lenā to phir ḳhud ruuTh jaanā yaad hai 
chorī chorī ham se tum aa kar mile the jis jagah muddateñ guzrīñ par ab tak vo Thikānā yaad hai 
shauq meñ mehñdī ke vo be-dast-o-pā honā tirā aur mirā vo chheḌnā vo gudgudānā yaad hai 
bāvajūd-e-iddi.ā-e-ittiqā 'hasrat' mujhe aaj tak ahd-e-havas kā vo fasānā yaad hai 
chupke chupke raat din aansu bahana yaad hai hum ko ab tak aashiqi ka wo zamana yaad hai 
ba-hazaran iztirab o sad-hazaran ishtiyaq tujh se wo pahle-pahal dil ka lagana yaad hai 
bar bar uThna usi jaanib nigah-e-shauq ka aur tera ghurfe se wo aankhen laDana yaad hai 
tujh se kuchh milte hi wo bebak ho jaana mera aur tera danton mein wo ungli dabana yaad hai 
khinch lena wo mera parde ka kona dafatan aur dupaTTe se tera wo munh chhupana yaad hai 
jaan kar sota tujhe wo qasd-e-pa-bosi mera aur tera Thukra ke sar wo muskurana yaad hai 
tujh ko jab tanha kabhi pana to az-rah-e-lihaz haal-e-dil baaton hi baaton mein jatana yaad hai 
jab siwa mere tumhaara koi diwana na tha sach kaho kuchh tum ko bhi wo kar-KHana yaad hai 
ghair ki nazron se bach kar sab ki marzi ke KHilaf wo tera chori-chhupe raaton ko aana yaad hai 
aa gaya gar wasl ki shab bhi kahin zikr-e-firaq wo tera ro ro ke mujh ko bhi rulana yaad hai 
dopahar ki dhup mein mere bulane ke liye wo tera koThe pe nange panw aana yaad hai 
aaj tak nazron mein hai wo sohbat-e-raaz-o-niyaz apna jaana yaad hai tera bulana yaad hai 
miThi miThi chheD kar baaten nirali pyar ki zikr dushman ka wo baaton mein uDana yaad hai 
dekhna mujh ko jo bargashta to sau sau naz se jab mana lena to phir KHud ruTh jaana yaad hai 
chori chori hum se tum aa kar mile the jis jagah muddaten guzrin par ab tak wo Thikana yaad hai 
shauq mein mehndi ke wo be-dast-o-pa hona tera aur mera wo chheDna wo gudgudana yaad hai 
bawajud-e-iddia-e-ittiqa 'hasrat' mujhe aaj tak ahd-e-hawas ka wo fasana yaad hai

aa.e kuchh abr kuchh sharāb aa.e is ke ba.ad aa.e jo azaab aa.e 
bām-e-mīnā se māhtāb utre dast-e-sāqī meñ āftāb aa.e 
har rag-e-ḳhūñ meñ phir charāġhāñ ho sāmne phir vo be-naqāb aa.e 
umr ke har varaq pe dil kī nazar terī mehr-o-vafā ke baab aa.e 
kar rahā thā ġham-e-jahāñ kā hisāb aaj tum yaad be-hisāb aa.e 
na ga.ī tere ġham kī sardārī dil meñ yuuñ roz inqalāb aa.e 
jal uThe bazm-e-ġhair ke dar-o-bām jab bhī ham ḳhānumāñ-ḳharāb aa.e 
is tarah apnī ḳhāmushī gūñjī goyā har samt se javāb aa.e 
'faiz' thī raah sar-ba-sar manzil ham jahāñ pahuñche kāmyāb aa.e 
aae kuchh abr kuchh sharab aae is ke baad aae jo azab aae 
baam-e-mina se mahtab utre dast-e-saqi mein aaftab aae 
har rag-e-KHun mein phir charaghan ho samne phir wo be-naqab aae 
umr ke har waraq pe dil ki nazar teri mehr-o-wafa ke bab aae 
kar raha tha gham-e-jahan ka hisab aaj tum yaad be-hisab aae 
na gai tere gham ki sardari dil mein yun roz inqalab aae 
jal uThe bazm-e-ghair ke dar-o-baam jab bhi hum KHanuman-KHarab aae 
is tarah apni KHamushi gunji goya har samt se jawab aae 
'faiz' thi rah sar-ba-sar manzil hum jahan pahunche kaamyab aae

dekhnā bhī to unheñ duur se dekhā karnā sheva-e-ishq nahīñ husn ko rusvā karnā 
ik nazar bhī tirī kaafī thī pa-e-rāhat-e-jāñ kuchh bhī dushvār na thā mujh ko shakebā karnā 
un ko yaañ vaade pe aa lene de ai abr-e-bahār jis qadar chāhnā phir baad meñ barsā karnā 
shaam ho yā ki sahar yaad unhīñ kī rakhnī din ho yā raat hameñ zikr unhīñ kā karnā 
saum zāhid ko mubārak rahe aabid ko salāt āsiyoñ ko tirī rahmat pe bharosā karnā 
āshiqo husn-e-jafākār kā shikva hai gunāh tum ḳhabardār ḳhabardār na aisā karnā 
kuchh samajh meñ nahīñ aatā ki ye kyā hai 'hasrat' un se mil kar bhī na iz.hār-e-tamannā karnā 
dekhna bhi to unhen dur se dekha karna shewa-e-ishq nahin husn ko ruswa karna 
ek nazar bhi teri kafi thi pa-e-rahat-e-jaan kuchh bhi dushwar na tha mujh ko shakeba karna 
un ko yan wade pe aa lene de ai abr-e-bahaar jis qadar chahna phir baad mein barsa karna 
sham ho ya ki sahar yaad unhin ki rakhni din ho ya raat hamein zikr unhin ka karna 
saum zahid ko mubarak rahe aabid ko salat aasiyon ko teri rahmat pe bharosa karna 
aashiqo husn-e-jafakar ka shikwa hai gunah tum KHabardar KHabardar na aisa karna 
kuchh samajh mein nahin aata ki ye kya hai 'hasrat' un se mil kar bhi na izhaar-e-tamanna karna

apnoñ ne vo ranj diye haiñ begāne yaad aate haiñ dekh ke us bastī kī hālat vīrāne yaad aate haiñ 
us nagrī meñ qadam qadam pe sar ko jhukānā paḌtā hai us nagrī meñ qadam qadam par but-ḳhāne yaad aate haiñ 
āñkheñ pur-nam ho jaatī haiñ ġhurbat ke sahrāoñ meñ jab us rim-jhim kī vaadī ke afsāne yaad aate haiñ 
aise aise dard mile haiñ na.e dayāroñ meñ ham ko bichhḌe hue kuchh log purāne yārāne yaad aate haiñ 
jin ke kāran aaj hamāre haal pe duniyā hañstī hai kitne zālim chehre jaane pahchāne yaad aate haiñ 
yuuñ na luTī thī galiyoñ daulat apne ashkoñ kī rote haiñ to ham ko apne ġham-ḳhāne yaad aate haiñ 
koī to parcham le kar nikle apne garebāñ kā 'jālib' chāroñ jānib sannāTā hai dīvāne yaad aate haiñ 
apnon ne wo ranj diye hain begane yaad aate hain dekh ke us basti ki haalat virane yaad aate hain 
us nagri mein qadam qadam pe sar ko jhukana paDta hai us nagri mein qadam qadam par but-KHane yaad aate hain 
aankhen pur-nam ho jati hain ghurbat ke sahraon mein jab us rim-jhim ki wadi ke afsane yaad aate hain 
aise aise dard mile hain nae dayaron mein hum ko bichhDe hue kuchh log purane yarane yaad aate hain 
jin ke karan aaj hamare haal pe duniya hansti hai kitne zalim chehre jaane pahchane yaad aate hain 
yun na luTi thi galiyon daulat apne ashkon ki rote hain to hum ko apne gham-KHane yaad aate hain 
koi to parcham le kar nikle apne gareban ka 'jalib' chaaron jaanib sannaTa hai diwane yaad aate hain

dil par jo zaḳhm haiñ vo dikhā.eñ kisī ko kyā apnā sharīk-e-dard banā.eñ kisī ko kyā 
har shaḳhs apne apne ġhamoñ meñ hai mubtalā zindāñ meñ apne saath rulā.eñ kisī ko kyā 
bichhḌe hue vo yaar vo chhoḌe hue dayār rah rah ke ham ko yaad jo aa.eñ kisī ko kyā 
rone ko apne haal pe tanhā.ī hai bahut us anjuman meñ ḳhud pe hañsā.eñ kisī ko kyā 
vo baat chheḌ jis meñ jhalaktā ho sab kā ġham yādeñ kisī kī tujh ko satā.eñ kisī ko kyā 
so.e hue haiñ log to hoñge sukūn se ham jāgne kā rog lagā.eñ kisī ko kyā 
'jālib' na aa.egā koī ahvāl pūchhne deñ shahr-e-be-hisāñ meñ sadā.eñ kisī ko kyā 
dil par jo zaKHm hain wo dikhaen kisi ko kya apna sharik-e-dard banaen kisi ko kya 
har shaKHs apne apne ghamon mein hai mubtala zindan mein apne sath rulaen kisi ko kya 
bichhDe hue wo yar wo chhoDe hue dayar rah rah ke hum ko yaad jo aaen kisi ko kya 
rone ko apne haal pe tanhai hai bahut us anjuman mein KHud pe hansaen kisi ko kya 
wo baat chheD jis mein jhalakta ho sab ka gham yaaden kisi ki tujh ko sataen kisi ko kya 
soe hue hain log to honge sukun se hum jagne ka rog lagaen kisi ko kya 
'jalib' na aaega koi ahwal puchhne den shahr-e-be-hisan mein sadaen kisi ko kya

ḳhizāñ jab tak chalī jaatī nahīñ hai chaman vāloñ ko niiñd aatī nahīñ hai 
jafā jab tak ki chauñkātī nahīñ hai mohabbat hosh meñ aatī nahīñ hai 
jo rotā huuñ to hañstā hai zamāna jo sotā huuñ to niiñd aatī nahīñ hai 
tumhārī yaad ko allāh rakkhe jab aatī hai to phir jaatī nahīñ hai 
kalī bulbul se shoḳhī kar rahī hai zarā phūloñ se sharmātī nahīñ hai 
jahāñ mai-kash bhī jaa.eñ Darte Darte vahāñ vaa.iz ko sharm aatī nahīñ hai 
nahīñ miltī to hañgāme haiñ kyā kyā jo miltī hai to pī jaatī nahīñ hai 
javānī kī kahānī dāvar-e-hashr sar-e-mahfil kahī jaatī nahīñ hai 
kahāñ tak shaiḳh ko samjhā.iyegā burī aadat kabhī jaatī nahīñ hai 
ghaḌī bhar ko jo bahlā.e mirā dil koī aisī ghaḌī aatī nahīñ hai 
hañsī 'bismil' kī hālat par kisī ko kabhī aatī thī ab aatī nahīñ hai 
KHizan jab tak chali jati nahin hai chaman walon ko nind aati nahin hai 
jafa jab tak ki chaunkati nahin hai mohabbat hosh mein aati nahin hai 
jo rota hun to hansta hai zamana jo sota hun to nind aati nahin hai 
tumhaari yaad ko allah rakkhe jab aati hai to phir jati nahin hai 
kali bulbul se shoKHi kar rahi hai zara phulon se sharmati nahin hai 
jahan mai-kash bhi jaen Darte Darte wahan waiz ko sharm aati nahin hai 
nahin milti to hangame hain kya kya jo milti hai to pi jati nahin hai 
jawani ki kahani dawar-e-hashr sar-e-mahfil kahi jati nahin hai 
kahan tak shaiKH ko samjhaiyega buri aadat kabhi jati nahin hai 
ghaDi bhar ko jo bahlae mera dil koi aisi ghaDi aati nahin hai 
hansi 'bismil' ki haalat par kisi ko kabhi aati thi ab aati nahin hai

nigāh-e-qahr hogī yā mohabbat kī nazar hogī maza de jā.egī dil se agar ai sīm-bar hogī 
tumheñ jaldī hai kyā jaanā abhī to raat baaqī hai na ghabrāo zarā Thahro koī dam meñ sahar hogī 
abhī se saare aalam meñ to ik andher barpā hai na jaane kyā ġhazab Dhā.egī jab ye tā-kamar hogī 
na lā.egī to kyā bechain bhī un ko na kar degī hamārī aah kyā kam-baḳht itnī be-asar hogī 
ham us ko dekh leñge aur vo ham ko na dekhegī nigāh-e-yār kyā mahfil meñ itnī be-ḳhabar hogī 
chalā jaatā to huuñ maiñ bahrūp ban kar un kī mahfil meñ kahūñgā kyā rasā.ī gar kahīñ muñh dekh kar hogī 
nigāh-e-lutf se dekhegā mujh ko ik jahāñ to kyā agar tum dekh loge merī qismat arsh par hogī 
asīrī meñ bhī yād-e-gul karegī is tarah bulbul qafas ke dar pe sar hogā, su-e-gulshan nazar hogī 
jo be-jurmī pe bhī 'bismil' ko tum ne kar diyā bismil batāoge bhalā kyā hashr meñ pursish agar hogī 
nigah-e-qahr hogi ya mohabbat ki nazar hogi maza de jaegi dil se agar ai sim-bar hogi 
tumhein jaldi hai kya jaana abhi to raat baqi hai na ghabrao zara Thahro koi dam mein sahar hogi 
abhi se sare aalam mein to ek andher barpa hai na jaane kya ghazab Dhaegi jab ye ta-kamar hogi 
na laegi to kya bechain bhi un ko na kar degi hamari aah kya kam-baKHt itni be-asar hogi 
hum us ko dekh lenge aur wo hum ko na dekhegi nigah-e-yar kya mahfil mein itni be-KHabar hogi 
chala jata to hun main bahrup ban kar un ki mahfil mein kahunga kya rasai gar kahin munh dekh kar hogi 
nigah-e-lutf se dekhega mujh ko ek jahan to kya agar tum dekh loge meri qismat arsh par hogi 
asiri mein bhi yaad-e-gul karegi is tarah bulbul qafas ke dar pe sar hoga, su-e-gulshan nazar hogi 
jo be-jurmi pe bhi 'bismil' ko tum ne kar diya bismil bataoge bhala kya hashr mein pursish agar hogi

aish kī jānib jo maa.il kuchh tabī.at ho ga.ī dil pe ġhussa aa gayā apne se nafrat ho ga.ī 
mujh ko ḳhud apnī tabāhī par taras aatā nahīñ ḳhūgar-e-ġham is qadar ab to tabī.at ho ga.ī 
aa.ī jab stage par duniyā to dil ḳhush ho gayā jab uThā anjām kā parda to nafrat ho ga.ī 
aa ga.iiñ jumbish meñ taslīm-o-razā kī quvvateñ lab mile hī the pa.e shikva ki aafat ho ga.ī 
istilāh-e-bandagī meñ ruuh haiñ tāroñ kī 'josh' chand zarre jin se peshānī kī zīnat ho ga.ī 
aish ki jaanib jo mail kuchh tabiat ho gai dil pe ghussa aa gaya apne se nafrat ho gai 
mujh ko KHud apni tabahi par taras aata nahin KHugar-e-gham is qadar ab to tabiat ho gai 
aai jab stage par duniya to dil KHush ho gaya jab uTha anjam ka parda to nafrat ho gai 
aa gain jumbish mein taslim-o-raza ki quwwaten lab mile hi the pae shikwa ki aafat ho gai 
istilah-e-bandagi mein ruh hain taron ki 'josh' chand zarre jin se peshani ki zinat ho gai

dil-e-āzāda-rau meñ vo tamannā thī bayābāñ kī qadam rakhte hī shaq hone lagī dīvār zindāñ kī 
ḳhudā kī rahmateñ ai mutrib-e-rañgīñ-navā tujh par ki har kāñTe meñ tū ne ruuh dauḌā dī gulistāñ kī 
ye sābit kar diyā tujh ko banā kar dast-e-qudrat ne ki ho saktī haiñ itnī ḳhūbiyāñ sūrat meñ insāñ kī 
nasīm-e-sub.h ThanDī saañs bhartī hai mazāroñ par udāsī muñh-añdhere dekhiye gor-e-ġharībāñ kī 
ye aalam kyā hai ik majmūa hai nāchīz zarroñ kā ye duniyā kyā hai ik tarkīb ajzā-e-pareshāñ kī 
havāoñ ke vo jhoñke vo khule maidān kī sardī vo lahreñ chāñd se ruḳhsār par zulf-e-pareshāñ kī 
hamārī zindagī kyā silsila ik dil dhaḌakne kā hamārī maut kyā jumbish hai ik jazbāt-e-pinhāñ kī 
banā deñgī yaqīñ hai 'josh' mard-e-bā-ḳhudā ik din tapish-andoziyāñ siine meñ barq-e-soz-e-pinhāñ kī 
dil-e-azada-rau mein wo tamanna thi bayaban ki qadam rakhte hi shaq hone lagi diwar zindan ki 
KHuda ki rahmaten ai mutrib-e-rangin-nawa tujh par ki har kanTe mein tu ne ruh dauDa di gulistan ki 
ye sabit kar diya tujh ko bana kar dast-e-qudrat ne ki ho sakti hain itni KHubiyan surat mein insan ki 
nasim-e-subh ThanDi sans bharti hai mazaron par udasi munh-andhere dekhiye gor-e-ghariban ki 
ye aalam kya hai ek majmua hai nachiz zarron ka ye duniya kya hai ek tarkib ajza-e-pareshan ki 
hawaon ke wo jhonke wo khule maidan ki sardi wo lahren chand se ruKHsar par zulf-e-pareshan ki 
hamari zindagi kya silsila ek dil dhaDakne ka hamari maut kya jumbish hai ek jazbaat-e-pinhan ki 
bana dengi yaqin hai 'josh' mard-e-ba-KHuda ek din tapish-andoziyan sine mein barq-e-soz-e-pinhan ki
Poetry Text

rog aise bhī ġham-e-yār se lag jaate haiñ dar se uThte haiñ to dīvār se lag jaate haiñ 
ishq āġhāz meñ halkī sī ḳhalish rakhtā hai baad meñ saikḌoñ āzār se lag jaate haiñ 
pahle pahle havas ik-ādh dukāñ kholtī hai phir to bāzār ke bāzār se lag jaate haiñ 
bebasī bhī kabhī qurbat kā sabab bantī hai ro na paa.eñ to gale yaar se lag jaate haiñ 
katraneñ ġham kī jo galiyoñ meñ uḌī phirtī haiñ ghar meñ le aao to ambār se lag jaate haiñ 
daaġh dāman ke hoñ dil ke hoñ ki chehre ke 'farāz' kuchh nishāñ umr kī raftār se lag jaate haiñ 
rog aise bhi gham-e-yar se lag jate hain dar se uThte hain to diwar se lag jate hain 
ishq aaghaz mein halki si KHalish rakhta hai baad mein saikDon aazar se lag jate hain 
pahle pahle hawas ik-adh dukan kholti hai phir to bazar ke bazar se lag jate hain 
bebasi bhi kabhi qurbat ka sabab banti hai ro na paen to gale yar se lag jate hain 
katranen gham ki jo galiyon mein uDi phirti hain ghar mein le aao to ambar se lag jate hain 
dagh daman ke hon dil ke hon ki chehre ke 'faraaz' kuchh nishan umr ki raftar se lag jate hain

gahrī raat hai aur tūfān kā shor bahut ghar ke dar-o-dīvār bhī haiñ kamzor bahut 
tere sāmne aate hue ghabrātā huuñ lab pe tirā iqrār hai dil meñ chor bahut 
naqsh koī baaqī rah jaa.e mushkil hai aaj lahū kī ravānī meñ hai zor bahut 
dil ke kisī kone meñ paḌe hoñge ab bhī ek khulā ākāsh patañgeñ Dor bahut 
mujh se bichhaḌ kar hogā samundar bhī bechain raat Dhale to kartā hogā shor bahut 
aa ke kabhī vīrānī-e-dil kā tamāshā kar is jangal meñ naach rahe haiñ mor bahut 
apne basere panchhī lauT na paayā 'zeb' shaam ghaTā bhī uTThī thī ghanghor bahut 
gahri raat hai aur tufan ka shor bahut ghar ke dar-o-diwar bhi hain kamzor bahut 
tere samne aate hue ghabraata hun lab pe tera iqrar hai dil mein chor bahut 
naqsh koi baqi rah jae mushkil hai aaj lahu ki rawani mein hai zor bahut 
dil ke kisi kone mein paDe honge ab bhi ek khula aakash patangen Dor bahut 
mujh se bichhaD kar hoga samundar bhi bechain raat Dhale to karta hoga shor bahut 
aa ke kabhi virani-e-dil ka tamasha kar is jangal mein nach rahe hain mor bahut 
apne basere panchhi lauT na paya 'zeb' sham ghaTa bhi uTThi thi ghanghor bahut

dhaḌaktā jaatā hai dil muskurāne vāloñ kā uThā nahīñ hai abhī e'tibār nāloñ kā 
ye muḳhtasar sī hai rūdād-e-sub.h-e-mai-ḳhana zamīñ pe Dher thā TuuTe hue piyāloñ kā 
ye ḳhauf hai ki sabā laḌkhaḌā ke gir na paḌe payām le ke chalī hai shikasta-hāloñ kā 
na aa.eñ ahl-e-ḳhirad vādī-e-junūñ kī taraf yahāñ guzar nahīñ dāman bachāne vāloñ kā 
lipaT lipaT ke gale mil rahe the ḳhanjar se baḌe ġhazab kā kaleja thā marne vāloñ kā 
dhaDakta jata hai dil muskurane walon ka uTha nahin hai abhi e'tibar nalon ka 
ye muKHtasar si hai rudad-e-subh-e-mai-KHana zamin pe Dher tha TuTe hue piyalon ka 
ye KHauf hai ki saba laDkhaDa ke gir na paDe payam le ke chali hai shikasta-haalon ka 
na aaen ahl-e-KHirad wadi-e-junun ki taraf yahan guzar nahin daman bachane walon ka 
lipaT lipaT ke gale mil rahe the KHanjar se baDe ghazab ka kaleja tha marne walon ka

dhuup meñ ham haiñ kabhī ham chhāñv meñ rāste uljhe hue haiñ paañv meñ 
bastiyoñ meñ ham bhī rahte haiñ magar jaise āvāra havā sahrāoñ meñ 
ham ne apnāyā daraḳhtoñ kā chalan ḳhud kabhī baiThe na apnī chhāñv meñ 
kis qadar nādān haiñ ahl-e-jahāñ ham gine jaane lage dānāoñ meñ 
sāmne kuchh der lahrāte rahe phir vo sāhil bah ga.e dariyāoñ meñ 
ik yahī duniyā badaltī hai 'faroġh' kaisī kaisī ajnabī duniyāoñ meñ 
dhup mein hum hain kabhi hum chhanw mein raste uljhe hue hain panw mein 
bastiyon mein hum bhi rahte hain magar jaise aawara hawa sahraon mein 
hum ne apnaya daraKHton ka chalan KHud kabhi baiThe na apni chhanw mein 
kis qadar nadan hain ahl-e-jahan hum gine jaane lage danaon mein 
samne kuchh der lahraate rahe phir wo sahil bah gae dariyaon mein 
ek yahi duniya badalti hai 'farogh' kaisi kaisi ajnabi duniyaon mein

be-karāñ dasht-e-be-sadā mere aa khule bāzuoñ meñ aa mere 
sāf-shaffāf sabz farsh tirā gard-ālūda dast o pā mere 
sarkash o sar-buland baam tirā sar-nigūñ shahpar-e-havā mere 
be-sutūñ ḳhema-e-sabāt tirā mahv-e-sahrā nuqūsh-e-pā mere 
shab-e-hijrāñ ki lā-zavāl tirī ġham ki āmāda-e-fanā mere 
dasht o dariyā sabhī ḳhamosh hue zamzama-sanj o ham-navā mere 
maiñ payambar tirā nahīñ lekin mujh se bhī baat kar ḳhudā mere 
ek ik taarā jāntā hai mujhe haiñ sabhī 'zeb' āshnā mere 
be-karan dasht-e-be-sada mere aa khule bazuon mein aa mere 
saf-shaffaf sabz farsh tera gard-aluda dast o pa mere 
sarkash o sar-buland baam tera sar-nigun shahpar-e-hawa mere 
be-sutun KHema-e-sabaat tera mahw-e-sahra nuqush-e-pa mere 
shab-e-hijran ki la-zawal teri gham ki aamada-e-fana mere 
dasht o dariya sabhi KHamosh hue zamzama-sanj o ham-nawa mere 
main payambar tera nahin lekin mujh se bhi baat kar KHuda mere 
ek ek tara jaanta hai mujhe hain sabhi 'zeb' aashna mere

chalī Dagar par kabhī na chalne vaalā maiñ na.e anokhe moḌ badalne vaalā maiñ 
tum kyā samjho ajab ajab in bātoñ ko aag kahīñ ho yahāñ huuñ jalne vaalā maiñ 
bahut zarā sī os bhigone ko mere bahut zarā sī āñch, pighalne vaalā maiñ 
bahut zarā sī Thes taḌapne ko mere bahut zarā sī mauj, uchhalne vaalā maiñ 
bahut zarā sā safar bhaTakne ko mere bahut zarā sā hāth, sambhalne vaalā maiñ 
bahut zarā sī sub.h bikasne ko mere bahut zarā sā chāñd, machalne vaalā maiñ 
bahut zarā sī raah nikalne ko mere bahut zarā sī aas, bahalne vaalā maiñ 
chali Dagar par kabhi na chalne wala main nae anokhe moD badalne wala main 
tum kya samjho ajab ajab in baaton ko aag kahin ho yahan hun jalne wala main 
bahut zara si os bhigone ko mere bahut zara si aanch, pighalne wala main 
bahut zara si Thes taDapne ko mere bahut zara si mauj, uchhalne wala main 
bahut zara sa safar bhaTakne ko mere bahut zara sa hath, sambhalne wala main 
bahut zara si subh bikasne ko mere bahut zara sa chand, machalne wala main 
bahut zara si rah nikalne ko mere bahut zara si aas, bahalne wala main

ajiib ronā sisaknā navāh-e-jāñ meñ hai ye aur kaun mire saath imtihāñ meñ hai 
ye raat guzre to dekhūñ taraf taraf kyā hai abhī to mere liye sab kuchh āsmāñ meñ hai 
kaTegā sar bhī isī kā ki ye ajab kirdār kabhī alag bhī hai shāmil bhī dāstāñ meñ hai 
tamām shahr ko mismār kar rahī hai huā maiñ dekhtā huuñ vo mahfūz kis makāñ meñ hai 
na jaane kis se tirī guftugū rahī 'bānī' ye ek zahr ki ab tak tirī zabāñ meñ hai 
ajib rona sisakna nawah-e-jaan mein hai ye aur kaun mere sath imtihan mein hai 
ye raat guzre to dekhun taraf taraf kya hai abhi to mere liye sab kuchh aasman mein hai 
kaTega sar bhi isi ka ki ye ajab kirdar kabhi alag bhi hai shamil bhi dastan mein hai 
tamam shahr ko mismar kar rahi hai hua main dekhta hun wo mahfuz kis makan mein hai 
na jaane kis se teri guftugu rahi 'bani' ye ek zahr ki ab tak teri zaban mein hai

galiyoñ meñ āzār bahut haiñ ghar meñ jī ghabrātā hai hañgāme se sannāTe tak apnā haal tamāshā hai 
bojhal āñkheñ kab tak āḳhir niiñd ke vaar bachā.eñgī phir vahī sab kuchh dekhnā hogā sub.h se jo kuchh dekhā hai 
dhuup musāfir chhāñv musāfir aa.e koī koī jaa.e ghar meñ baiThā soch rahā huuñ āñgan hai yā rasta hai 
aadhī umr ke pas-manzar meñ shāna-ba-shāna gām-ba-gām tū hai ki terī parchhā.īñ hai maiñ huuñ ki merā saaya hai 
ham sāhil kī sard havā meñ ḳhvāboñ se uljhe haiñ 'faroġh' aur hamāre naam kā dariyā sahrā sahrā bahtā hai 
galiyon mein aazar bahut hain ghar mein ji ghabraata hai hangame se sannaTe tak apna haal tamasha hai 
bojhal aankhen kab tak aaKHir nind ke war bachaengi phir wahi sab kuchh dekhna hoga subh se jo kuchh dekha hai 
dhup musafir chhanw musafir aae koi koi jae ghar mein baiTha soch raha hun aangan hai ya rasta hai 
aadhi umr ke pas-manzar mein shana-ba-shana gam-ba-gam tu hai ki teri parchhain hai main hun ki mera saya hai 
hum sahil ki sard hawa mein KHwabon se uljhe hain 'farogh' aur hamare nam ka dariya sahra sahra bahta hai

dosto kyā hai takalluf mujhe sar dene meñ sab se aage huuñ maiñ kuchh apnī ḳhabar dene meñ 
pheñk detā hai udhar phuul vo gaahe gaahe jaane kyā der hai dāman mirā bhar dene meñ 
saikaḌoñ gum-shuda duniyā.eñ dikhā diiñ us ne aa gayā lutf use luqma-e-tar dene meñ 
shā.erī kyā hai ki ik umr gañvā.ī ham ne chand alfāz ko imkān o asar dene meñ 
baat ik aa.ī hai dil meñ na batā.ūñ us ko aib kyā hai magar iz.hār hī kar dene meñ 
use ma.alūm thā ik mauj mire sar meñ hai vo jhijhaktā thā mujhe hukm-e-safar dene meñ 
maiñ nadī paar karūñ soch rahā huuñ 'bānī' mauj masrūf hai paanī ko bhañvar dene meñ 
dosto kya hai takalluf mujhe sar dene mein sab se aage hun main kuchh apni KHabar dene mein 
phenk deta hai udhar phul wo gahe gahe jaane kya der hai daman mera bhar dene mein 
saikaDon gum-shuda duniyaen dikha din us ne aa gaya lutf use luqma-e-tar dene mein 
shaeri kya hai ki ek umr ganwai hum ne chand alfaz ko imkan o asar dene mein 
baat ek aai hai dil mein na bataun us ko aib kya hai magar izhaar hi kar dene mein 
use malum tha ek mauj mere sar mein hai wo jhijhakta tha mujhe hukm-e-safar dene mein 
main nadi par karun soch raha hun 'bani' mauj masruf hai pani ko bhanwar dene mein

dil meñ jab sho.ala-e-ehsās machal jaatā hai mom kī tarah se patthar bhī pighal jaatā hai 
kaise kah duuñ ki ye sūraj hai ujāloñ kā amiiñ shaam hote hī añdheroñ meñ jo Dhal jaatā hai 
chand qatroñ kī mire dost haqīqat kyā hai zarf vaalā to samundar bhī nigal jaatā hai 
kyā zarūrī hai ki sho.aloñ ko havā dī jaa.e jis ko jalnā hai vo phūloñ se bhī jal jaatā hai 
ye siyāsat kā hai bāzār yahāñ par yaaro khoTā sikka bhī khare dāmoñ meñ chal jaatā hai 
vaqt ke saath badal jaate haiñ chehre 'gulshan' log kahte haiñ ki ā.īna badal jaatā hai 
dil mein jab shoala-e-ehsas machal jata hai mom ki tarah se patthar bhi pighal jata hai 
kaise kah dun ki ye suraj hai ujalon ka amin sham hote hi andheron mein jo Dhal jata hai 
chand qatron ki mere dost haqiqat kya hai zarf wala to samundar bhi nigal jata hai 
kya zaruri hai ki shoalon ko hawa di jae jis ko jalna hai wo phulon se bhi jal jata hai 
ye siyasat ka hai bazar yahan par yaro khoTa sikka bhi khare damon mein chal jata hai 
waqt ke sath badal jate hain chehre 'gulshan' log kahte hain ki aaina badal jata hai
Poetry Text

ḳhudā ham ko aisī ḳhudā.ī na de ki apne sivā kuchh dikhā.ī na de 
ḳhatā-vār samjhegī duniyā tujhe ab itnī ziyāda safā.ī na de 
hañso aaj itnā ki is shor meñ sadā siskiyoñ kī sunā.ī na de 
ġhulāmī ko barkat samajhne lageñ asīroñ ko aisī rihā.ī na de 
ḳhudā aise ehsās kā naam hai rahe sāmne aur dikhā.ī na de 
KHuda hum ko aisi KHudai na de ki apne siwa kuchh dikhai na de 
KHata-war samjhegi duniya tujhe ab itni ziyaada safai na de 
hanso aaj itna ki is shor mein sada siskiyon ki sunai na de 
ghulami ko barkat samajhne lagen asiron ko aisi rihai na de 
KHuda aise ehsas ka nam hai rahe samne aur dikhai na de

aa gayā dil jo kahīñ aur hī sūrat hogī log dekheñge tamāshā jo mohabbat hogī 
dil-lagī tark-e-mohabbat nahīñ taqsīr muaaf hote hote mire qaabū meñ tabī.at hogī 
un ke aane kī ḳhabar sun ke to ye haal huā jab vo ā.eñge to phir kyā mirī hālat hogī 
TukḌe kar Daale koī us ke to maiñ bhī ḳhush huuñ dil na hogā na mirī jaan mohabbat hogī 
vo chhupāyā kareñ is baat se kyā hotā hai aap sar chaḌh ke pukāregī jo ulfat hogī 
ye na farmāo shab-e-hijr kaTegī kyūñkar tum ko kyā kaam jo hogī mirī hālat hogī 
maar Daalā mujhe be-maut baḌā kaam kiyā ḳhuub tārīf tirī ai shab-e-furqat hogī 
ai dil-e-zār maza dekh liyā ulfat kā ham na kahte the ki is kaam meñ zillat hogī 
ye bhī kuchh baat hai phir vasl na ho ai 'jauhar' rañj rāhat se huā rañj se rāhat hogī 
aa gaya dil jo kahin aur hi surat hogi log dekhenge tamasha jo mohabbat hogi 
dil-lagi tark-e-mohabbat nahin taqsir muaf hote hote mere qabu mein tabiat hogi 
un ke aane ki KHabar sun ke to ye haal hua jab wo aaenge to phir kya meri haalat hogi 
TukDe kar Dale koi us ke to main bhi KHush hun dil na hoga na meri jaan mohabbat hogi 
wo chhupaya karen is baat se kya hota hai aap sar chaDh ke pukaregi jo ulfat hogi 
ye na farmao shab-e-hijr kaTegi kyunkar tum ko kya kaam jo hogi meri haalat hogi 
mar Dala mujhe be-maut baDa kaam kiya KHub tarif teri ai shab-e-furqat hogi 
ai dil-e-zar maza dekh liya ulfat ka hum na kahte the ki is kaam mein zillat hogi 
ye bhi kuchh baat hai phir wasl na ho ai 'jauhar' ranj rahat se hua ranj se rahat hogi

hañsī ma.asūm sī bachchoñ kī copy meñ ibārat sī hiran kī piiTh par baiThe parinde kī sharārat sī 
vo jaise sardiyoñ meñ garm kapḌe de faqīroñ ko laboñ pe muskurāhaT thī magar kaisī hiqārat sī 
udāsī pat-jhaḌoñ kī shaam oḌhe rāsta taktī pahāḌī par hazāroñ saal kī koī imārat sī 
sajā.e bāzuoñ par baazū vo maidāñ meñ tanhā thā chamaktī thī ye bastī dhuup meñ tārāj o ġhārat sī 
merī āñkhoñ mere hoñToñ pe ye kaisī tamāzat hai kabūtar ke paroñ kī reshmī ujlī harārat sī 
khilā de phuul mere baaġh meñ paiġhambaroñ jaisā raqam ho jis kī peshānī pe ik aayat bashārat sī 
hansi masum si bachchon ki copy mein ibarat si hiran ki piTh par baiThe parinde ki shararat si 
wo jaise sardiyon mein garm kapDe de faqiron ko labon pe muskurahaT thi magar kaisi hiqarat si 
udasi pat-jhaDon ki sham oDhe rasta takti pahaDi par hazaron sal ki koi imarat si 
sajae bazuon par bazu wo maidan mein tanha tha chamakti thi ye basti dhup mein taraj o ghaarat si 
meri aankhon mere honTon pe ye kaisi tamazat hai kabutar ke paron ki reshmi ujli hararat si 
khila de phul mere bagh mein paighambaron jaisa raqam ho jis ki peshani pe ek aayat bashaarat si

aañkh se dil meñ aane vaalā dil se nahīñ ab jaane vaalā 
ghar ko phūñk ke jaane vaalā phir ke nahīñ hai aane vaalā 
dost to hai nādān hai lekin be-samjhe samjhāne vaalā 
aañsū poñchh ke hañs detā hai aag meñ aag lagāne vaalā 
hai jo koī to dhyān usī kā aane vaalā jaane vaalā 
husn kī bastī meñ hai yaaro koī taras bhī khāne vaalā 
Daal rahā hai kaam meñ mushkil mushkil meñ kaam aane vaalā 
dī thī tasallī ye kis dil se chup na huā chillāne vaalā 
ḳhvāb ke parde meñ aatā hai sotā pā ke jagāne vaalā 
ik din parda ḳhud ulTegā chhup-chhup ke tarsāne vaalā 
'ārzū' in ke aage hai chup kyuuñ tum sā bāteñ banāne vaalā 
aankh se dil mein aane wala dil se nahin ab jaane wala 
ghar ko phunk ke jaane wala phir ke nahin hai aane wala 
dost to hai nadan hai lekin be-samjhe samjhane wala 
aansu ponchh ke hans deta hai aag mein aag lagane wala 
hai jo koi to dhyan usi ka aane wala jaane wala 
husn ki basti mein hai yaro koi taras bhi khane wala 
Dal raha hai kaam mein mushkil mushkil mein kaam aane wala 
di thi tasalli ye kis dil se chup na hua chillane wala 
KHwab ke parde mein aata hai sota pa ke jagane wala 
ek din parda KHud ulTega chhup-chhup ke tarsane wala 
'arzu' in ke aage hai chup kyun tum sa baaten banane wala

aaj be-āp ho ga.e ham bhī aap ko pā ke kho ga.e ham bhī 
daane kam the dukhoñ kī simran meñ thoḌe motī piro ga.e ham bhī 
der se the vo jis ke ghere meñ usī jhurmuT meñ kho ga.e ham bhī 
jā kai DhūñDā kahāñ kahāñ na tumheñ jab na paayā to kho ga.e ham bhī 
naam jiine kā jāgnā rakh kar aaj be niiñd so ga.e ham bhī 
ro.eñge gar to jag-hañsā.ī ho karte kyā chup se ho ga.e ham bhī 
haa.e re 'ārzū' kī be-āsī aap be-bas the ro ga.e ham bhī 
aaj be-ap ho gae hum bhi aap ko pa ke kho gae hum bhi 
dane kam the dukhon ki simran mein thoDe moti piro gae hum bhi 
der se the wo jis ke ghere mein usi jhurmuT mein kho gae hum bhi 
ja kai DhunDa kahan kahan na tumhein jab na paya to kho gae hum bhi 
nam jine ka jagna rakh kar aaj be nind so gae hum bhi 
roenge gar to jag-hansai ho karte kya chup se ho gae hum bhi 
hae re 'arzu' ki be-asi aap be-bas the ro gae hum bhi

avval-e-shab vo bazm kī raunaq sham.a bhī thī parvāna bhī raat ke āḳhir hote hote ḳhatm thā ye afsāna bhī 
qaid ko toḌ ke niklā jab maiñ uTh ke bagūle saath hue dasht-e-adam tak jañgal jañgal bhaag chalā vīrāna bhī 
haath se kis ne sāġhar paTkā mausam kī be-kaifī par itnā barsā TuuT ke bādal Duub chalā mai-ḳhāna bhī 
ek lagī ke do haiñ asar aur donoñ hasb-e-marātib haiñ lau jo lagā.e sham.a khaḌī hai raqs meñ hai parvāna bhī 
donoñ jaulāñ-gāh-e-junūñ haiñ bastī kyā vīrāna hai uTh ke chalā jab koī bagūlā dauḌ paḌā vīrāna bhī 
ġhunche chup haiñ gul haiñ havā par kis se kahiye jī kā haal ḳhāk-nashīñ ik sabza hai so apnā bhī begāna bhī 
husn o ishq kī laag meñ aksar chheḌ udhar se hotī hai sham.a kā sho.ala jab lahrāyā uḌ ke chalā parvāna bhī 
ḳhuun hī kī shirkat vo na kyuuñ ho shirkat chiiz hai jhagḌe kī apnoñ se vo dekh rahā huuñ jo na kare begānā bhī 
daur-e-masarrat 'ārzū' apnā kaisā zalzala-āgīñ thā haath se muñh tak aate aate chhūT paḌā paimāna bhī 
awwal-e-shab wo bazm ki raunaq shama bhi thi parwana bhi raat ke aaKHir hote hote KHatm tha ye afsana bhi 
qaid ko toD ke nikla jab main uTh ke bagule sath hue dasht-e-adam tak jangal jangal bhag chala virana bhi 
hath se kis ne saghar paTka mausam ki be-kaifi par itna barsa TuT ke baadal Dub chala mai-KHana bhi 
ek lagi ke do hain asar aur donon hasb-e-maraatib hain lau jo lagae shama khaDi hai raqs mein hai parwana bhi 
donon jaulan-gah-e-junun hain basti kya virana hai uTh ke chala jab koi bagula dauD paDa virana bhi 
ghunche chup hain gul hain hawa par kis se kahiye ji ka haal KHak-nashin ek sabza hai so apna bhi begana bhi 
husn o ishq ki lag mein aksar chheD udhar se hoti hai shama ka shoala jab lahraya uD ke chala parwana bhi 
KHun hi ki shirkat wo na kyun ho shirkat chiz hai jhagDe ki apnon se wo dekh raha hun jo na kare begana bhi 
daur-e-masarrat 'arzu' apna kaisa zalzala-agin tha hath se munh tak aate aate chhuT paDa paimana bhi

ashkoñ ne samundar meñ ik aag lagā.ī hai paanī pe sitam-gar kī tasvīr banā.ī hai 
is dil ne rulāyā hai ik baar mujhe phir se is dil ne mujhe phir se vo yaad dilā.ī hai 
ye kaisī judā.ī hai jo ḳhatm nahīñ hotī ye kaisī udāsī hai is dil pe jo chhā.ī hai 
maiñ ne hī mohabbat kā iz.hār kiyā pahle maiñ ne hī use jā kar ye baat batā.ī hai 
mushkil se guzārā hai is dil ne bahut mujh ko is dil ko agar terī kuchh yaad bhī aa.ī hai 
ik kaam kā ham ne bhī ye kaam kiyā hai bas ik naam kī shohrat hī bas ham ne kamā.ī hai 
bas maiñ ne 'vaqās' us ko is dil meñ basāyā hai bas maiñ ne 'vaqās' us se ye baat chhupā.ī hai 
ashkon ne samundar mein ek aag lagai hai pani pe sitam-gar ki taswir banai hai 
is dil ne rulaya hai ek bar mujhe phir se is dil ne mujhe phir se wo yaad dilai hai 
ye kaisi judai hai jo KHatm nahin hoti ye kaisi udasi hai is dil pe jo chhai hai 
main ne hi mohabbat ka izhaar kiya pahle main ne hi use ja kar ye baat batai hai 
mushkil se guzara hai is dil ne bahut mujh ko is dil ko agar teri kuchh yaad bhi aai hai 
ek kaam ka hum ne bhi ye kaam kiya hai bas ek nam ki shohrat hi bas hum ne kamai hai 
bas main ne 'waqas' us ko is dil mein basaya hai bas main ne 'waqas' us se ye baat chhupai hai

ārzūoñ ko apnī kam na karo jiinā chāho to koī ġham na karo 
haath aa.e ḳhushī to ḳhush holo dil ho ġhamgīñ to aañkh nam na karo 
jaisī mil jaa.e jis qadar mil jaa.e pī bhī lo fikr-e-besh-o-kam na karo 
jaisī guzre guzārte jaao sāz-o-sāmāñ koī baham na karo 
log kahte phireñ tumheñ kyā kyā aap apne pe ye sitam na karo 
jī meñ jo aa.e vo likho sāhab jo zamāna kahe raqam na karo 
aarzuon ko apni kam na karo jina chaho to koi gham na karo 
hath aae KHushi to KHush holo dil ho ghamgin to aankh nam na karo 
jaisi mil jae jis qadar mil jae pi bhi lo fikr-e-besh-o-kam na karo 
jaisi guzre guzarte jao saz-o-saman koi baham na karo 
log kahte phiren tumhein kya kya aap apne pe ye sitam na karo 
ji mein jo aae wo likho sahab jo zamana kahe raqam na karo

aadmī apnī zaat meñ tanhā ālam-e-shash-jihāt meñ tanhā 
ai ḳhudā tū hī be-misāl nahīñ maiñ bhī huuñ kā.enāt meñ tanhā 
mujh ko har ek baat kā ġham hai maiñ huuñ har ek baat meñ tanhā 
maut ke dasht-e-be-kanār meñ gum shahr ke hādsāt meñ tanhā 
mujh ko kis jurm meñ utaar diyā kār-zār-e-hayāt meñ tanhā 
be-amāñ dushmanoñ kī zad meñ huuñ dahr ke somnāt meñ tanhā 
āp-apnī talāsh hai mujh ko huuñ ajab mushkilāt meñ tanhā 
aadmi apni zat mein tanha aalam-e-shash-jihat mein tanha 
ai KHuda tu hi be-misal nahin main bhi hun kaenat mein tanha 
mujh ko har ek baat ka gham hai main hun har ek baat mein tanha 
maut ke dasht-e-be-kanar mein gum shahr ke hadsat mein tanha 
mujh ko kis jurm mein utar diya kar-zar-e-hayat mein tanha 
be-aman dushmanon ki zad mein hun dahr ke somnat mein tanha 
aap-apni talash hai mujh ko hun ajab mushkilat mein tanha

aañkh be-qābū hai duniyā kī tarah dil hai pahlū meñ tamannā kī tarah 
koī āvāz koī guuñj nahīñ vaqt chup-chāp hai sahrā kī tarah 
tū hai ik phailtī baḌhtī ḳhushbū maiñ huuñ ik sho.ala-e-tanhā kī tarah 
tū mirī raah meñ kyuuñ haa.il hai ek umDe hue dariyā kī tarah 
mujh ko ma.alūm nahīñ thā ai dost tū bhī begāna hai duniyā kī tarah 
duur ufuq-pār hai shab pichhle-pahar koī ubhrā ruḳh-e-zebā kī tarah 
shahr meñ chāñdnī ban kar utrā chhā gayā nashsha-e-sahbā kī tarah 
bas tire rañg-e-hayā kī mānind hū-ba-hū tere sarāpā kī tarah 
ab kahāñ pā.ūñgā maiñ naqsh-e-'jamīl' DhūñDhtā phirtā huuñ dariyā kī tarah 
aankh be-qabu hai duniya ki tarah dil hai pahlu mein tamanna ki tarah 
koi aawaz koi gunj nahin waqt chup-chap hai sahra ki tarah 
tu hai ek phailti baDhti KHushbu main hun ek shoala-e-tanha ki tarah 
tu meri rah mein kyun hail hai ek umDe hue dariya ki tarah 
mujh ko malum nahin tha ai dost tu bhi begana hai duniya ki tarah 
dur ufuq-par hai shab pichhle-pahar koi ubhra ruKH-e-zeba ki tarah 
shahr mein chandni ban kar utra chha gaya nashsha-e-sahba ki tarah 
bas tere rang-e-haya ki manind hu-ba-hu tere sarapa ki tarah 
ab kahan paunga main naqsh-e-'jamil' DhunDhta phirta hun dariya ki tarah
Poetry Text

vo ham-safar thā magar us se ham-navā.ī na thī ki dhuup chhāñv kā aalam rahā judā.ī na thī 
na apnā rañj na auroñ kā dukh na terā malāl shab-e-firāq kabhī ham ne yuuñ gañvā.ī na thī 
mohabbatoñ kā safar is tarah bhī guzrā thā shikasta-dil the musāfir shikasta-pā.ī na thī 
adāvateñ thīñ, taġhāful thaa, ranjisheñ thiiñ bahut bichhaḌne vaale meñ sab kuchh thaa, bevafā.ī na thī 
bichhaḌte vaqt un āñkhoñ meñ thī hamārī ġhazal ġhazal bhī vo jo kisī ko abhī sunā.ī na thī 
kise pukār rahā thā vo Dūbtā huā din sadā to aa.ī thī lekin koī duhā.ī na thī 
kabhī ye haal ki donoñ meñ yak-dilī thī bahut kabhī ye marhala jaise ki āshnā.ī na thī 
ajiib hotī hai rāh-e-suḳhan bhī dekh 'nasīr' vahāñ bhī aa ga.e āḳhir, jahāñ rasā.ī na thī 
wo ham-safar tha magar us se ham-nawai na thi ki dhup chhanw ka aalam raha judai na thi 
na apna ranj na auron ka dukh na tera malal shab-e-firaq kabhi hum ne yun ganwai na thi 
mohabbaton ka safar is tarah bhi guzra tha shikasta-dil the musafir shikasta-pai na thi 
adawaten thin, taghaful tha, ranjishen thin bahut bichhaDne wale mein sab kuchh tha, bewafai na thi 
bichhaDte waqt un aankhon mein thi hamari ghazal ghazal bhi wo jo kisi ko abhi sunai na thi 
kise pukar raha tha wo Dubta hua din sada to aai thi lekin koi duhai na thi 
kabhi ye haal ki donon mein yak-dili thi bahut kabhi ye marhala jaise ki aashnai na thi 
ajib hoti hai rah-e-suKHan bhi dekh 'nasir' wahan bhi aa gae aaKHir, jahan rasai na thi

aap apnā ġhubār the ham to yaad the yādgār the ham to 
pardagī ham se kyuuñ rakhā parda tere hī parda-dār the ham to 
vaqt kī dhuup meñ tumhāre liye shajar-e-sāya-dār the ham to 
uḌe jaate haiñ dhuul ke mānind āñdhiyoñ par savār the ham to 
ham ne kyuuñ ḳhud pe e.atibār kiyā saḳht be-e'tibār the ham to 
sharm hai apnī baar baarī kī be-sabab baar baar the ham to 
kyuuñ hameñ kar diyā gayā majbūr ḳhud hī be-iḳhtiyār the ham to 
tum ne kaise bhulā diyā ham ko tum se hī musta.ār the ham to 
ḳhush na aayā hameñ jiye jaanā lamhe lamhe pe baar the ham to 
sah bhī lete hamāre ta.anoñ ko jān-e-man jāñ-nisār the ham to 
ḳhud ko daurān-e-hāl meñ apne be-tarah nāgavār the ham to 
tum ne ham ko bhī kar diyā barbād nādir-e-rozgār the ham to 
ham ko yāroñ ne yaad bhī na rakhā 'jaun' yāroñ ke yaar the ham to 
aap apna ghubar the hum to yaad the yaadgar the hum to 
pardagi hum se kyun rakha parda tere hi parda-dar the hum to 
waqt ki dhup mein tumhaare liye shajar-e-saya-dar the hum to 
uDe jate hain dhul ke manind aandhiyon par sawar the hum to 
hum ne kyun KHud pe eatibar kiya saKHt be-e'tibar the hum to 
sharm hai apni bar bari ki be-sabab bar bar the hum to 
kyun hamein kar diya gaya majbur KHud hi be-iKHtiyar the hum to 
tum ne kaise bhula diya hum ko tum se hi mustaar the hum to 
KHush na aaya hamein jiye jaana lamhe lamhe pe bar the hum to 
sah bhi lete hamare tanon ko jaan-e-man jaan-nisar the hum to 
KHud ko dauran-e-haal mein apne be-tarah nagawar the hum to 
tum ne hum ko bhi kar diya barbaad nadir-e-rozgar the hum to 
hum ko yaron ne yaad bhi na rakha 'jaun' yaron ke yar the hum to

tire aane kā dhokā sā rahā hai diyā sā raat bhar jaltā rahā hai 
ajab hai raat se āñkhoñ kā aalam ye dariyā raat bhar chaḌhtā rahā hai 
sunā hai raat bhar barsā hai bādal magar vo shahr jo pyāsā rahā hai 
vo koī dost thā achchhe dinoñ kā jo pichhlī raat se yaad aa rahā hai 
kise DhūñDoge in galiyoñ meñ 'nāsir' chalo ab ghar chaleñ din jā rahā hai 
tere aane ka dhoka sa raha hai diya sa raat bhar jalta raha hai 
ajab hai raat se aankhon ka aalam ye dariya raat bhar chaDhta raha hai 
suna hai raat bhar barsa hai baadal magar wo shahr jo pyasa raha hai 
wo koi dost tha achchhe dinon ka jo pichhli raat se yaad aa raha hai 
kise DhunDoge in galiyon mein 'nasir' chalo ab ghar chalen din ja raha hai

dayār-e-dil kī raat meñ charāġh sā jalā gayā milā nahīñ to kyā huā vo shakl to dikhā gayā 
vo dostī to ḳhair ab nasīb-e-dushmanāñ huī vo chhoTī chhoTī ranjishoñ kā lutf bhī chalā gayā 
judā.iyoñ ke zaḳhm dard-e-zindagī ne bhar diye tujhe bhī niiñd aa ga.ī mujhe bhī sabr aa gayā 
pukārtī haiñ fursateñ kahāñ ga.iiñ vo sohbateñ zamīñ nigal ga.ī unheñ ki āsmān khā gayā 
ye sub.h kī safediyāñ ye dopahar kī zardiyāñ ab aa.ine meñ dekhtā huuñ maiñ kahāñ chalā gayā 
ye kis ḳhushī kī ret par ġhamoñ ko niiñd aa ga.ī vo lahr kis taraf ga.ī ye maiñ kahāñ samā gayā 
ga.e dinoñ kī laash par paḌe rahoge kab talak alam-kasho uTho ki āftāb sar pe aa gayā 
dayar-e-dil ki raat mein charagh sa jala gaya mila nahin to kya hua wo shakl to dikha gaya 
wo dosti to KHair ab nasib-e-dushmanan hui wo chhoTi chhoTi ranjishon ka lutf bhi chala gaya 
judaiyon ke zaKHm dard-e-zindagi ne bhar diye tujhe bhi nind aa gai mujhe bhi sabr aa gaya
