karne ga.e the us se taġhāful kā ham gila kī ek hī nigāh ki bas ḳhaak ho ga.e 
is rañg se uThā.ī kal us ne 'asad' kī na.ash dushman bhī jis ko dekh ke ġhamnāk ho ga.e 
rone se aur ishq mein bebak ho gae dhoe gae hum itne ki bas pak ho gae 
sarf-e-baha-e-mai hue aalat-e-mai-kashi the ye hi do hisab so yun pak ho gae 
ruswa-e-dahr go hue aawargi se tum bare tabiaton ke to chaalak ho gae 
kahta hai kaun nala-e-bulbul ko be-asar parde mein gul ke lakh jigar chaak ho gae 
puchhe hai kya wajud o adam ahl-e-shauq ka aap apni aag ke KHas-o-KHashak ho gae 
karne gae the us se taghaful ka hum gila ki ek hi nigah ki bas KHak ho gae 
is rang se uThai kal us ne 'asad' ki nash dushman bhi jis ko dekh ke ghamnak ho gae

juz tire koī bhī din raat na jaane mere tū kahāñ hai magar ai dost purāne mere 
tū bhī ḳhushbū hai magar merā tajassus bekār barg-e-āvāra kī mānind Thikāne mere 
sham.a kī lau thī ki vo tū thā magar hijr kī raat der tak rotā rahā koī sirhāne mere 
ḳhalq kī be-ḳhabarī hai ki mirī rusvā.ī log mujh ko hī sunāte haiñ fasāne mere 
luT ke bhī ḳhush huuñ ki ashkoñ se bharā hai dāman dekh ġhārat-gar-e-dil ye bhī ḳhazāne mere 
aaj ik aur baras biit gayā us ke baġhair jis ke hote hue hote the zamāne mere 
kaash tū bhī merī āvāz kahīñ suntā ho phir pukārā hai tujhe dil kī sadā ne mere 
kaash tū bhī kabhī aa jaa.e masīhā.ī ko log aate haiñ bahut dil ko dukhāne mere 
kaash auroñ kī tarah maiñ bhī kabhī kah saktā baat sun lī hai mirī aaj ḳhudā ne mere 
tū hai kis haal meñ ai zūd-farāmosh mire mujh ko to chhīn liyā ahd-e-vafā ne mere 
chārā-gar yuuñ to bahut haiñ magar ai jān-e-'farāz' juz tire aur koī zaḳhm na jaane mere 
juz tere koi bhi din raat na jaane mere tu kahan hai magar ai dost purane mere 
tu bhi KHushbu hai magar mera tajassus bekar barg-e-awara ki manind Thikane mere 
shama ki lau thi ki wo tu tha magar hijr ki raat der tak rota raha koi sirhane mere 
KHalq ki be-KHabari hai ki meri ruswai log mujh ko hi sunate hain fasane mere 
luT ke bhi KHush hun ki ashkon se bhara hai daman dekh ghaarat-gar-e-dil ye bhi KHazane mere 
aaj ek aur baras bit gaya us ke baghair jis ke hote hue hote the zamane mere 
kash tu bhi meri aawaz kahin sunta ho phir pukara hai tujhe dil ki sada ne mere 
kash tu bhi kabhi aa jae masihai ko log aate hain bahut dil ko dukhane mere 
kash auron ki tarah main bhi kabhi kah sakta baat sun li hai meri aaj KHuda ne mere 
tu hai kis haal mein ai zud-faramosh mere mujh ko to chhin liya ahd-e-wafa ne mere 
chaara-gar yun to bahut hain magar ai jaan-e-'faraaz' juz tere aur koi zaKHm na jaane mere

raushan jamāl-e-yār se hai anjuman tamām dahkā huā hai ātish-e-gul se chaman tamām 
hairat ġhurūr-e-husn se shoḳhī se iztirāb dil ne bhī tere siikh liye haiñ chalan tamām 
allāh-rī jism-e-yār kī ḳhūbī ki ḳhud-ba-ḳhud rangīniyoñ meñ Duub gayā pairahan tamām 
dil ḳhuun ho chukā hai jigar ho chukā hai ḳhaak baaqī huuñ maiñ mujhe bhī kar ai teġh-zan tamām 
dekho to chashm-e-yār kī jādū-nigāhiyāñ behosh ik nazar meñ huī anjuman tamām 
hai nāz-e-husn se jo farozāñ jabīn-e-yār labrez āb-e-nūr hai chāh-e-zaqan tamām 
nashv-o-numā-e-sabza-o-gul se bahār meñ shādābiyoñ ne gher liyā hai chaman tamām 
us nāznīñ ne jab se kiyā hai vahāñ qayām gulzār ban ga.ī hai zamīn-e-dakan tamām 
achchhā hai ahl-e-jaur kiye jaa.eñ saḳhtiyāñ phailegī yuuñ hī shorish-e-hubb-e-vatan tamām 
samjhe haiñ ahl-e-sharq ko shāyad qarīb-e-marg maġhrib ke yuuñ haiñ jam.a ye zaaġh o zaġhan tamām 
shīrīni-e-nasīm hai soz-o-gudāz-e-'mīr' 'hasrat' tire suḳhan pe hai lutf-e-suḳhan tamām 
raushan jamal-e-yar se hai anjuman tamam dahka hua hai aatish-e-gul se chaman tamam 
hairat ghurur-e-husn se shoKHi se iztirab dil ne bhi tere sikh liye hain chalan tamam 
allah-ri jism-e-yar ki KHubi ki KHud-ba-KHud ranginiyon mein Dub gaya pairahan tamam 
dil KHun ho chuka hai jigar ho chuka hai KHak baqi hun main mujhe bhi kar ai tegh-zan tamam 
dekho to chashm-e-yar ki jadu-nigahiyan behosh ek nazar mein hui anjuman tamam 
hai naz-e-husn se jo farozan jabin-e-yar labrez aab-e-nur hai chah-e-zaqan tamam 
nashw-o-numa-e-sabza-o-gul se bahaar mein shadabiyon ne gher liya hai chaman tamam 
us naznin ne jab se kiya hai wahan qayam gulzar ban gai hai zamin-e-dakan tamam 
achchha hai ahl-e-jaur kiye jaen saKHtiyan phailegi yun hi shorish-e-hubb-e-watan tamam 
samjhe hain ahl-e-sharq ko shayad qarib-e-marg maghrib ke yun hain jama ye zagh o zaghan tamam 
shirini-e-nasim hai soz-o-gudaz-e-'mir' 'hasrat' tere suKHan pe hai lutf-e-suKHan tamam

vahī taaj hai vahī taḳht hai vahī zahr hai vahī jaam hai ye vahī ḳhudā kī zamīn hai ye vahī butoñ kā nizām hai 
baḌe shauq se mirā ghar jalā koī aañch tujh pe na aa.egī ye zabāñ kisī ne ḳharīd lī ye qalam kisī kā ġhulām hai 
yahāñ ek bachche ke ḳhuun se jo likhā huā hai use paḌheñ tirā kīrtan abhī paap hai abhī merā sajda harām hai 
maiñ ye māntā huuñ mire diye tirī āñdhiyoñ ne bujhā diye magar ek jugnū havāoñ meñ abhī raushnī kā imaam hai 
mire fikr-o-fan tirī anjuman na uruuj thā na zavāl hai mire lab pe terā hī naam thā mire lab pe terā hī naam hai 
wahi taj hai wahi taKHt hai wahi zahr hai wahi jam hai ye wahi KHuda ki zamin hai ye wahi buton ka nizam hai 
baDe shauq se mera ghar jala koi aanch tujh pe na aaegi ye zaban kisi ne KHarid li ye qalam kisi ka ghulam hai 
yahan ek bachche ke KHun se jo likha hua hai use paDhen tera kirtan abhi pap hai abhi mera sajda haram hai 
main ye manta hun mere diye teri aandhiyon ne bujha diye magar ek jugnu hawaon mein abhi raushni ka imam hai 
mere fikr-o-fan teri anjuman na uruj tha na zawal hai mere lab pe tera hi nam tha mere lab pe tera hi nam hai

kisī kā yuuñ to huā kaun umr bhar phir bhī ye husn o ishq to dhokā hai sab magar phir bhī 
hazār baar zamāna idhar se guzrā hai na.ī na.ī sī hai kuchh terī rahguzar phir bhī 
kahūñ ye kaise idhar dekh yā na dekh udhar ki dard dard hai phir bhī nazar nazar phir bhī 
ḳhushā ishāra-e-paiham zahe sukūt-e-nazar darāz ho ke fasāna hai muḳhtasar phir bhī 
jhapak rahī haiñ zamān o makāñ kī bhī āñkheñ magar hai qāfila āmāda-e-safar phir bhī 
shab-e-firāq se aage hai aaj merī nazar ki kaT hī jā.egī ye shām-e-be-sahar phir bhī 
kahīñ yahī to nahīñ kāshif-e-hayāt-o-mamāt ye husn o ishq ba-zāhir haiñ be-ḳhabar phir bhī 
palaT rahe haiñ ġharīb-ul-vatan palaTnā thā vo kūcha rū-kash-e-jannat ho ghar hai ghar phir bhī 
luTā huā chaman-e-ishq hai nigāhoñ ko dikhā gayā vahī kyā kyā gul o samar phir bhī 
ḳharāb ho ke bhī sochā kiye tire mahjūr yahī ki terī nazar hai tirī nazar phir bhī 
ho be-niyāz-e-asar bhī kabhī tirī miTTī vo kīmiyā hī sahī rah ga.ī kasar phir bhī 
lipaT gayā tirā dīvāna garche manzil se uḌī uḌī sī hai ye ḳhāk-e-rahguzar phir bhī 
tirī nigāh se bachne meñ umr guzrī hai utar gayā rag-e-jāñ meñ ye neshtar phir bhī 
ġham-e-firāq ke kushtoñ kā hashr kyā hogā ye shām-e-hijr to ho jā.egī sahar phir bhī 
fanā bhī ho ke girāñ-bārī-e-hayāt na pūchh uThā.e uTh nahīñ saktā ye dard-e-sar phir bhī 
sitam ke rañg haiñ har iltifāt-e-pinhāñ meñ karam-numā haiñ tire jaur sar-ba-sar phir bhī 
ḳhatā-muāf tirā afv bhī hai misl-e-sazā tirī sazā meñ hai ik shān-e-dar-guzar phir bhī 
agarche be-ḳhudī-e-ishq ko zamāna huā 'firāq' kartī rahī kaam vo nazar phir bhī 
kisi ka yun to hua kaun umr bhar phir bhi ye husn o ishq to dhoka hai sab magar phir bhi 
hazar bar zamana idhar se guzra hai nai nai si hai kuchh teri rahguzar phir bhi 
kahun ye kaise idhar dekh ya na dekh udhar ki dard dard hai phir bhi nazar nazar phir bhi 
KHusha ishaara-e-paiham zahe sukut-e-nazar daraaz ho ke fasana hai muKHtasar phir bhi 
jhapak rahi hain zaman o makan ki bhi aankhen magar hai qafila aamada-e-safar phir bhi 
shab-e-firaq se aage hai aaj meri nazar ki kaT hi jaegi ye sham-e-be-sahar phir bhi 
kahin yahi to nahin kashif-e-hayat-o-mamat ye husn o ishq ba-zahir hain be-KHabar phir bhi 
palaT rahe hain gharib-ul-watan palaTna tha wo kucha ru-kash-e-jannat ho ghar hai ghar phir bhi 
luTa hua chaman-e-ishq hai nigahon ko dikha gaya wahi kya kya gul o samar phir bhi 
KHarab ho ke bhi socha kiye tere mahjur yahi ki teri nazar hai teri nazar phir bhi 
ho be-niyaz-e-asar bhi kabhi teri miTTi wo kimiya hi sahi rah gai kasar phir bhi 
lipaT gaya tera diwana garche manzil se uDi uDi si hai ye KHak-e-rahguzar phir bhi 
teri nigah se bachne mein umr guzri hai utar gaya rag-e-jaan mein ye neshtar phir bhi 
gham-e-firaq ke kushton ka hashr kya hoga ye sham-e-hijr to ho jaegi sahar phir bhi 
fana bhi ho ke giran-bari-e-hayat na puchh uThae uTh nahin sakta ye dard-e-sar phir bhi 
sitam ke rang hain har iltifat-e-pinhan mein karam-numa hain tere jaur sar-ba-sar phir bhi 
KHata-muaf tera afw bhi hai misl-e-saza teri saza mein hai ek shan-e-dar-guzar phir bhi 
agarche be-KHudi-e-ishq ko zamana hua 'firaq' karti rahi kaam wo nazar phir bhi

aflāk se aatā hai nāloñ kā javāb āḳhir karte haiñ ḳhitāb āḳhir uThte haiñ hijāb āḳhir 
ahvāl-e-mohabbat meñ kuchh farq nahīñ aisā soz o tab-o-tāb avval soz o tab-o-tāb āḳhir 
maiñ tujh ko batātā huuñ taqdīr-e-umam kyā hai shamshīr-o-sināñ avval tā.ūs-o-rubāb āḳhir 
mai-ḳhāna-e-europe ke dastūr nirāle haiñ laate haiñ surūr avval dete haiñ sharāb āḳhir 
kyā dabdaba-e-nādir kyā shaukat-e-taimūrī ho jaate haiñ sab daftar ġharq-e-mai-e-nāb āḳhir 
ḳhalvat kī ghaḌī guzrī jalvat kī ghaḌī aa.ī chhuTne ko hai bijlī se āġhosh-e-sahāb āḳhir 
thā zabt bahut mushkil is sail-e-ma.ānī kā kah Daale qalandar ne asrār-e-kitāb āḳhir 
aflak se aata hai nalon ka jawab aaKHir karte hain KHitab aaKHir uThte hain hijab aaKHir 
ahwal-e-mohabbat mein kuchh farq nahin aisa soz o tab-o-tab awwal soz o tab-o-tab aaKHir 
main tujh ko batata hun taqdir-e-umam kya hai shamshir-o-sinan awwal taus-o-rubab aaKHir 
mai-KHana-e-europe ke dastur nirale hain late hain surur awwal dete hain sharab aaKHir 
kya dabdaba-e-nadir kya shaukat-e-taimuri ho jate hain sab daftar gharq-e-mai-e-nab aaKHir 
KHalwat ki ghaDi guzri jalwat ki ghaDi aai chhuTne ko hai bijli se aaghosh-e-sahab aaKHir 
tha zabt bahut mushkil is sail-e-maani ka kah Dale qalandar ne asrar-e-kitab aaKHir

arz-e-niyāz-e-ishq ke qābil nahīñ rahā jis dil pe naaz thā mujhe vo dil nahīñ rahā 
jaatā huuñ dāġh-e-hasrat-e-hastī liye hue huuñ sham-e-kushta dar-ḳhur-e-mahfil nahīñ rahā 
marne kī ai dil aur hī tadbīr kar ki maiñ shāyān-e-dast-o-bāzū-e-qātil nahīñ rahā 
bar-rū-e-shash-jahat dar-e-ā.īna baaz hai yaañ imtiyāz-e-nāqis-o-kāmil nahīñ rahā 
vā kar diye haiñ shauq ne band-e-naqāb-e-husn ġhair-az-nigāh ab koī haa.il nahīñ rahā 
go maiñ rahā rahīn-e-sitam-hā-e-rozgār lekin tire ḳhayāl se ġhāfil nahīñ rahā 
dil se havā-e-kisht-e-vafā miT ga.ī ki vaañ hāsil sivā.e hasrat-e-hāsil nahīñ rahā 
bedād-e-ishq se nahīñ Dartā magar 'asad' jis dil pe naaz thā mujhe vo dil nahīñ rahā 
har-chand maiñ huuñ tūti-e-shīrīñ-suḳhan vale ā.īna aah mere muqābil nahīñ rahā 
jāñ-dād-gāñ kā hausla fursat-gudāz hai yaañ arsa-e-tapīdan-e-bismil nahīñ rahā 
huuñ qatra-zan ba-vādī-e-hasrat shabāna roz juz tār-e-ashk jāda-e-manzil nahīñ rahā 
ai aah merī ḳhātir-e-vābasta ke sivā duniyā meñ koī uqda-e-mushkil nahīñ rahā 
andāz-e-nāla yaad haiñ sab mujh ko par 'asad' jis dil pe naaz thā mujhe vo dil nahīñ rahā 
arz-e-niyaz-e-ishq ke qabil nahin raha jis dil pe naz tha mujhe wo dil nahin raha 
jata hun dagh-e-hasrat-e-hasti liye hue hun sham-e-kushta dar-KHur-e-mahfil nahin raha 
marne ki ai dil aur hi tadbir kar ki main shayan-e-dast-o-bazu-e-qatil nahin raha 
bar-ru-e-shash-jahat dar-e-aina baz hai yan imtiyaz-e-naqis-o-kaamil nahin raha 
wa kar diye hain shauq ne band-e-naqab-e-husn ghair-az-nigah ab koi hail nahin raha 
go main raha rahin-e-sitam-ha-e-rozgar lekin tere KHayal se ghafil nahin raha 
dil se hawa-e-kisht-e-wafa miT gai ki wan hasil siwae hasrat-e-hasil nahin raha 
bedad-e-ishq se nahin Darta magar 'asad' jis dil pe naz tha mujhe wo dil nahin raha 
har-chand main hun tuti-e-shirin-suKHan wale aaina aah mere muqabil nahin raha 
jaan-dad-gan ka hausla fursat-gudaz hai yan arsa-e-tapidan-e-bismil nahin raha 
hun qatra-zan ba-wadi-e-hasrat shabana roz juz tar-e-ashk jada-e-manzil nahin raha 
ai aah meri KHatir-e-wabasta ke siwa duniya mein koi uqda-e-mushkil nahin raha 
andaz-e-nala yaad hain sab mujh ko par 'asad' jis dil pe naz tha mujhe wo dil nahin raha

marne kī duā.eñ kyuuñ māñgūñ jiine kī tamannā kaun kare ye duniyā ho yā vo duniyā ab ḳhvāhish-e-duniyā kaun kare 
jab kashtī sābit-o-sālim thī sāhil kī tamannā kis ko thī ab aisī shikasta kashtī par sāhil kī tamannā kaun kare 
jo aag lagā.ī thī tum ne us ko to bujhāyā ashkoñ ne jo ashkoñ ne bhaḌkā.ī hai us aag ko ThanDā kaun kare 
duniyā ne hameñ chhoḌā 'jazbī' ham chhoḌ na deñ kyuuñ duniyā ko duniyā ko samajh kar baiThe haiñ ab duniyā duniyā kaun kare 
marne ki duaen kyun mangun jine ki tamanna kaun kare ye duniya ho ya wo duniya ab KHwahish-e-duniya kaun kare 
jab kashti sabit-o-salim thi sahil ki tamanna kis ko thi ab aisi shikasta kashti par sahil ki tamanna kaun kare 
jo aag lagai thi tum ne us ko to bujhaya ashkon ne jo ashkon ne bhaDkai hai us aag ko ThanDa kaun kare 
duniya ne hamein chhoDa 'jazbi' hum chhoD na den kyun duniya ko duniya ko samajh kar baiThe hain ab duniya duniya kaun kare

baġhair us ke ab ārām bhī nahīñ aatā vo shaḳhs jis kā mujhe naam bhī nahīñ aatā 
usī kī shakl mujhe chāñd meñ nazar aa.e vo māh-ruḳh jo lab-e-bām bhī nahīñ aatā 
karūñgā kyā jo mohabbat meñ ho gayā nākām mujhe to aur koī kaam bhī nahīñ aatā 
biThā diyā mujhe dariyā ke us kināre par jidhar hubāb tahī-jām bhī nahīñ aatā 
churā ke ḳhvāb vo āñkhoñ ko rehn rakhtā hai aur us ke sar koī ilzām bhī nahīñ aatā 
baghair us ke ab aaram bhi nahin aata wo shaKHs jis ka mujhe nam bhi nahin aata 
usi ki shakl mujhe chand mein nazar aae wo mah-ruKH jo lab-e-baam bhi nahin aata 
karunga kya jo mohabbat mein ho gaya nakaam mujhe to aur koi kaam bhi nahin aata 
biTha diya mujhe dariya ke us kinare par jidhar hubab tahi-jam bhi nahin aata 
chura ke KHwab wo aankhon ko rehn rakhta hai aur us ke sar koi ilzam bhi nahin aata

āñkhoñ se hayā Tapke hai andāz to dekho hai bul-havasoñ par bhī sitam naaz to dekho 
us but ke liye maiñ havas-e-hūr se guzrā is ishq-e-ḳhush-anjām kā āġhāz to dekho 
chashmak mirī vahshat pe hai kyā hazrat-e-nāseh tarz-e-nigah-e-chashm-e-fusūñ-sāz to dekho 
arbāb-e-havas haar ke bhī jaan pe khele kam-tāla.i-e-āshiq-e-jāñ-bāz to dekho 
majlis meñ mire zikr ke aate hī uThe vo badnāmi-e-ushshāq kā e.azāz to dekho 
mahfil meñ tum aġhyār ko duz-dīda nazar se manzūr hai pinhāñ na rahe raaz to dekho 
us ġhairat-e-nāhīd kī har taan hai dīpak sho.ala sā lapak jaa.e hai āvāz to dekho 
deñ pāki-e-dāman kī gavāhī mire aañsū us yūsuf-e-bedard kā e.ajāz to dekho 
jannat meñ bhī 'momin' na milā haa.e butoñ se jaur-e-ajal-e-tafraqa-pardāz to dekho 
aankhon se haya Tapke hai andaz to dekho hai bul-hawason par bhi sitam naz to dekho 
us but ke liye main hawas-e-hur se guzra is ishq-e-KHush-anjam ka aaghaz to dekho 
chashmak meri wahshat pe hai kya hazrat-e-naseh tarz-e-nigah-e-chashm-e-fusun-saz to dekho 
arbab-e-hawas haar ke bhi jaan pe khele kam-talai-e-ashiq-e-jaan-baz to dekho 
majlis mein mere zikr ke aate hi uThe wo badnami-e-ushshaq ka eazaz to dekho 
mahfil mein tum aghyar ko duz-dida nazar se manzur hai pinhan na rahe raaz to dekho 
us ghairat-e-nahid ki har tan hai dipak shoala sa lapak jae hai aawaz to dekho 
den paki-e-daman ki gawahi mere aansu us yusuf-e-bedard ka eajaz to dekho 
jannat mein bhi 'momin' na mila hae buton se jaur-e-ajal-e-tafraqa-pardaz to dekho

ḳhātir se yā lihāz se maiñ maan to gayā jhūTī qasam se aap kā īmān to gayā 
dil le ke muft kahte haiñ kuchh kaam kā nahīñ ulTī shikāyateñ huiiñ ehsān to gayā 
Dartā huuñ dekh kar dil-e-be-ārzū ko maiñ sunsān ghar ye kyuuñ na ho mehmān to gayā 
kyā aa.e rāhat aa.ī jo kunj-e-mazār meñ vo valvala vo shauq vo armān to gayā 
dekhā hai but-kade meñ jo ai shaiḳh kuchh na pūchh īmān kī to ye hai ki īmān to gayā 
ifshā-e-rāz-e-ishq meñ go zillateñ huiiñ lekin use jatā to diyā jaan to gayā 
go nāma-bar se ḳhush na huā par hazār shukr mujh ko vo mere naam se pahchān to gayā 
bazm-e-adū meñ sūrat-e-parvāna dil mirā go rashk se jalā tire qurbān to gayā 
hosh o havās o taab o tavāñ 'dāġh' jā chuke ab ham bhī jaane vaale haiñ sāmān to gayā 
KHatir se ya lihaz se main man to gaya jhuTi qasam se aap ka iman to gaya 
dil le ke muft kahte hain kuchh kaam ka nahin ulTi shikayaten huin ehsan to gaya 
Darta hun dekh kar dil-e-be-arzu ko main sunsan ghar ye kyun na ho mehman to gaya 
kya aae rahat aai jo kunj-e-mazar mein wo walwala wo shauq wo arman to gaya 
dekha hai but-kade mein jo ai shaiKH kuchh na puchh iman ki to ye hai ki iman to gaya 
ifsha-e-raaz-e-ishq mein go zillaten huin lekin use jata to diya jaan to gaya 
go nama-bar se KHush na hua par hazar shukr mujh ko wo mere nam se pahchan to gaya 
bazm-e-adu mein surat-e-parwana dil mera go rashk se jala tere qurban to gaya 
hosh o hawas o tab o tawan 'dagh' ja chuke ab hum bhi jaane wale hain saman to gaya

sab log jidhar vo haiñ udhar dekh rahe haiñ ham dekhne vāloñ kī nazar dekh rahe haiñ 
tevar tire ai rashk-e-qamar dekh rahe haiñ ham shaam se āsār-e-sahar dekh rahe haiñ 
merā dil-e-gum-gashta jo DhūñDā nahīñ miltā vo apnā dahan apnī kamar dekh rahe haiñ 
koī to nikal aa.egā sarbāz-e-mohabbat dil dekh rahe haiñ vo jigar dekh rahe haiñ 
hai majma-e-aġhyār ki hañgāma-e-mahshar kyā sair mire dīda-e-tar dekh rahe haiñ 
ab ai nigah-e-shauq na rah jaa.e tamannā is vaqt udhar se vo idhar dekh rahe haiñ 
har-chand ki har roz kī ranjish hai qayāmat ham koī din us ko bhī magar dekh rahe haiñ 
aamad hai kisī kī ki gayā koī idhar se kyuuñ sab taraf-e-rāhguzar dekh rahe haiñ 
takrār tajallī ne tire jalve meñ kyuuñ kī hairat-zada sab ahl-e-nazar dekh rahe haiñ 
nairañg hai ek ek tirā diid ke qābil ham ai falak-e-shobada-gar dekh rahe haiñ 
kab tak hai tumhārā suḳhan-e-talḳh gavārā is zahr meñ kitnā hai asar dekh rahe haiñ 
kuchh dekh rahe haiñ dil-e-bismil kā taḌapnā kuchh ġhaur se qātil kā hunar dekh rahe haiñ 
ab tak to jo qismat ne dikhāyā vahī dekhā ā.inda ho kyā nafā o zarar dekh rahe haiñ 
pahle to sunā karte the āshiq kī musībat ab aañkh se vo aaTh pahar dekh rahe haiñ 
kyuuñ kufr hai dīdār-e-sanam hazrat-e-vā.iz allāh dikhātā hai bashar dekh rahe haiñ 
ḳhat ġhair kā paḌhte the jo Tokā to vo bole aḳhbār kā parcha hai ḳhabar dekh rahe haiñ 
paḌh paḌh ke vo dam karte haiñ kuchh haath par apne hañs hañs ke mire zaḳhm-e-jigar dekh rahe haiñ 
maiñ 'dāġh' huuñ martā huuñ idhar dekhiye mujh ko muñh pher ke ye aap kidhar dekh rahe haiñ 
sab log jidhar wo hain udhar dekh rahe hain hum dekhne walon ki nazar dekh rahe hain 
tewar tere ai rashk-e-qamar dekh rahe hain hum sham se aasar-e-sahar dekh rahe hain 
mera dil-e-gum-gashta jo DhunDa nahin milta wo apna dahan apni kamar dekh rahe hain 
koi to nikal aaega sarbaz-e-mohabbat dil dekh rahe hain wo jigar dekh rahe hain 
hai majma-e-aghyar ki hangama-e-mahshar kya sair mere dida-e-tar dekh rahe hain 
ab ai nigah-e-shauq na rah jae tamanna is waqt udhar se wo idhar dekh rahe hain 
har-chand ki har roz ki ranjish hai qayamat hum koi din us ko bhi magar dekh rahe hain 
aamad hai kisi ki ki gaya koi idhar se kyun sab taraf-e-rahguzar dekh rahe hain 
takrar tajalli ne tere jalwe mein kyun ki hairat-zada sab ahl-e-nazar dekh rahe hain 
nairang hai ek ek tera did ke qabil hum ai falak-e-shobada-gar dekh rahe hain 
kab tak hai tumhaara suKHan-e-talKH gawara is zahr mein kitna hai asar dekh rahe hain 
kuchh dekh rahe hain dil-e-bismil ka taDapna kuchh ghaur se qatil ka hunar dekh rahe hain 
ab tak to jo qismat ne dikhaya wahi dekha aainda ho kya nafa o zarar dekh rahe hain 
pahle to suna karte the aashiq ki musibat ab aankh se wo aaTh pahar dekh rahe hain 
kyun kufr hai didar-e-sanam hazrat-e-waiz allah dikhata hai bashar dekh rahe hain 
KHat ghair ka paDhte the jo Toka to wo bole aKHbar ka parcha hai KHabar dekh rahe hain 
paDh paDh ke wo dam karte hain kuchh hath par apne hans hans ke mere zaKHm-e-jigar dekh rahe hain 
main 'dagh' hun marta hun idhar dekhiye mujh ko munh pher ke ye aap kidhar dekh rahe hain

haa.e logoñ kī karam-farmā.iyāñ tohmateñ bad-nāmiyāñ rusvā.iyāñ 
zindagī shāyad isī kā naam hai dūriyāñ majbūriyāñ tanhā.iyāñ 
kyā zamāne meñ yuuñ hī kaTtī hai raat karvaTeñ betābiyāñ añgḌā.iyāñ 
kyā yahī hotī hai shām-e-intizār āhaTeñ ghabrāhaTeñ parchhā.iyāñ 
ek rind-e-mast kī Thokar meñ haiñ shāhiyāñ sultāniyāñ dārā.iyāñ 
ek paikar meñ simaT kar rah ga.iiñ ḳhūbiyāñ zebā.iyāñ rānā.iyāñ 
rah ga.iiñ ik tifl-e-maktab ke huzūr hikmateñ āgāhiyāñ dānā.iyāñ 
zaḳhm dil ke phir hare karne lagīñ badliyāñ barkhā ruteñ purvā.iyāñ 
dīda-o-dānista un ke sāmne laġhzisheñ nākāmiyāñ paspā.iyāñ 
mere dil kī dhaḌkanoñ meñ Dhal ga.iiñ chūḌiyāñ mausīqiyāñ shahnā.iyāñ 
un se mil kar aur bhī kuchh baḌh ga.iiñ uljhaneñ fikreñ qayās-ārā.iyāñ 
'kaif' paidā kar samundar kī tarah vus.ateñ ḳhāmoshiyāñ gahrā.iyāñ 
hae logon ki karam-farmaiyan tohmaten bad-namiyan ruswaiyan 
zindagi shayad isi ka nam hai duriyan majburiyan tanhaiyan 
kya zamane mein yun hi kaTti hai raat karwaTen betabiyan angDaiyan 
kya yahi hoti hai sham-e-intizar aahaTen ghabrahaTen parchhaiyan 
ek rind-e-mast ki Thokar mein hain shahiyan sultaniyan daraiyan 
ek paikar mein simaT kar rah gain KHubiyan zebaiyan ranaiyan 
rah gain ek tifl-e-maktab ke huzur hikmaten aagahiyan danaiyan 
zaKHm dil ke phir hare karne lagin badliyan barkha ruten purwaiyan 
dida-o-danista un ke samne laghzishen nakaamiyan paspaiyan 
mere dil ki dhaDkanon mein Dhal gain chuDiyan mausiqiyan shahnaiyan 
un se mil kar aur bhi kuchh baDh gain uljhanen fikren qayas-araiyan 
'kaif' paida kar samundar ki tarah wusaten KHamoshiyan gahraiyan

milāte ho usī ko ḳhaak meñ jo dil se miltā hai mirī jaañ chāhne vaalā baḌī mushkil se miltā hai 
kahīñ hai iid kī shādī kahīñ mātam hai maqtal meñ koī qātil se miltā hai koī bismil se miltā hai 
pas-e-parda bhī lailā haath rakh letī hai āñkhoñ par ġhubār-e-nā-tavān-e-qais jab mahmil se miltā hai 
bhare haiñ tujh meñ vo lākhoñ hunar ai majma-e-ḳhūbī mulāqātī tirā goyā bharī mahfil se miltā hai 
mujhe aatā hai kyā kyā rashk vaqt-e-zab.h us se bhī galā jis dam lipaT kar ḳhanjar-e-qātil se miltā hai 
ba-zāhir bā-adab yuuñ hazrat-e-nāseh se miltā huuñ murīd-e-ḳhās jaise murshid-e-kāmil se miltā hai 
misāl-e-ganj-e-qārūñ ahl-e-hājat se nahīñ chhuptā jo hotā hai saḳhī ḳhud DhūñD kar saa.il se miltā hai 
javāb is baat kā us shoḳh ko kyā de sake koī jo dil le kar kahe kam-baḳht tū kis dil se miltā hai 
chhupā.e se koī chhuptī hai apne dil kī betābī ki har tār-e-nafas apnā rag-e-bismil se miltā hai 
adam kī jo haqīqat hai vo pūchho ahl-e-hastī se musāfir ko to manzil kā patā manzil se miltā hai 
ġhazab hai 'dāġh' ke dil se tumhārā dil nahīñ miltā tumhārā chāñd sā chehra mah-e-kāmil se miltā hai 
milate ho usi ko KHak mein jo dil se milta hai meri jaan chahne wala baDi mushkil se milta hai 
kahin hai id ki shadi kahin matam hai maqtal mein koi qatil se milta hai koi bismil se milta hai 
pas-e-parda bhi laila hath rakh leti hai aankhon par ghubar-e-na-tawan-e-qais jab mahmil se milta hai 
bhare hain tujh mein wo lakhon hunar ai majma-e-KHubi mulaqati tera goya bhari mahfil se milta hai 
mujhe aata hai kya kya rashk waqt-e-zabh us se bhi gala jis dam lipaT kar KHanjar-e-qatil se milta hai 
ba-zahir ba-adab yun hazrat-e-naseh se milta hun murid-e-KHas jaise murshid-e-kaamil se milta hai 
misal-e-ganj-e-qarun ahl-e-hajat se nahin chhupta jo hota hai saKHi KHud DhunD kar sail se milta hai 
jawab is baat ka us shoKH ko kya de sake koi jo dil le kar kahe kam-baKHt tu kis dil se milta hai 
chhupae se koi chhupti hai apne dil ki betabi ki har tar-e-nafas apna rag-e-bismil se milta hai 
adam ki jo haqiqat hai wo puchho ahl-e-hasti se musafir ko to manzil ka pata manzil se milta hai 
ghazab hai 'dagh' ke dil se tumhaara dil nahin milta tumhaara chand sa chehra mah-e-kaamil se milta hai

uTho ye manzar-e-shab-tāb dekhne ke liye ki niiñd shart nahīñ ḳhvāb dekhne ke liye 
ajab harīf thā mere hī saath Duub gayā mire safīne ko ġharqāb dekhne ke liye 
vo marhala hai ki ab sail-e-ḳhūñ pe raazī haiñ ham is zamīn ko shādāb dekhne ke liye 
jo ho sake to zarā shah-savār lauT ke aa.eñ piyād-gāñ ko zafar-yāb dekhne ke liye 
kahāñ hai tū ki yahāñ jal rahe haiñ sadiyoñ se charāġh diida o mehrāb dekhne ke liye 
uTho ye manzar-e-shab-tab dekhne ke liye ki nind shart nahin KHwab dekhne ke liye 
ajab harif tha mere hi sath Dub gaya mere safine ko gharqab dekhne ke liye 
wo marhala hai ki ab sail-e-KHun pe raazi hain hum is zamin ko shadab dekhne ke liye 
jo ho sake to zara shah-sawar lauT ke aaen piyaad-gan ko zafar-yab dekhne ke liye 
kahan hai tu ki yahan jal rahe hain sadiyon se charagh dida o mehrab dekhne ke liye

ye kaisā nashsha hai maiñ kis ajab ḳhumār meñ huuñ tū aa ke jā bhī chukā hai maiñ intizār meñ huuñ 
makāñ hai qabr jise log ḳhud banāte haiñ maiñ apne ghar meñ huuñ yā maiñ kisī mazār meñ huuñ 
dar-e-fasīl khulā yā pahāḌ sar se haTā maiñ ab girī huī galiyoñ ke marg-zār meñ huuñ 
bas itnā hosh hai mujh ko ki ajnabī haiñ sab rukā huā huuñ safar meñ kisī dayār meñ huuñ 
maiñ huuñ bhī aur nahīñ bhī ajiib baat hai ye ye kaisā jabr hai maiñ jis ke iḳhtiyār meñ huuñ 
'munīr' dekh shajar chāñd aur dīvāreñ havā ḳhizāñ kī hai sar par shab-e-bahār meñ huuñ 
ye kaisa nashsha hai main kis ajab KHumar mein hun tu aa ke ja bhi chuka hai main intizar mein hun 
makan hai qabr jise log KHud banate hain main apne ghar mein hun ya main kisi mazar mein hun 
dar-e-fasil khula ya pahaD sar se haTa main ab giri hui galiyon ke marg-zar mein hun 
bas itna hosh hai mujh ko ki ajnabi hain sab ruka hua hun safar mein kisi dayar mein hun 
main hun bhi aur nahin bhi ajib baat hai ye ye kaisa jabr hai main jis ke iKHtiyar mein hun 
'munir' dekh shajar chand aur diwaren hawa KHizan ki hai sar par shab-e-bahaar mein hun

tere liye chale the ham tere liye Thahar ga.e tū ne kahā to jī uThe tū ne kahā to mar ga.e 
kaT hī ga.ī judā.ī bhī kab ye huā ki mar ga.e tere bhī din guzar ga.e mere bhī din guzar ga.e 
tū bhī kuchh aur aur hai ham bhī kuchh aur aur haiñ jaane vo tū kidhar gayā jaane vo ham kidhar ga.e 
rāhoñ meñ hī mile the ham rāheñ nasīb ban ga.iiñ vo bhī na apne ghar gayā ham bhī na apne ghar ga.e 
vaqt tirī judā.ī kā itnā tavīl ho gayā dil meñ tire visāl ke jitne the zaḳhm bhar ga.e 
hotā rahā muqābla paanī kā aur pyaas kā sahrā umaD umaD paḌe dariyā biphar biphar ga.e 
vo bhī ġhubār-e-ḳhvāb thā ham bhī ġhubār-e-ḳhvāb the vo bhī kahīñ bikhar gayā ham bhī kahīñ bikhar ga.e 
koī kanār-e-ābjū baiThā huā hai sar-nigūñ kashtī kidhar chalī ga.ī jaane kidhar bhañvar ga.e 
aaj bhī intizār kā vaqt hunūt ho gayā aisā lagā ki hashr tak saare hī pal Thahar ga.e 
bārish-e-vasl vo huī saarā ġhubār dhul gayā vo bhī nikhar nikhar gayā ham bhī nikhar nikhar ga.e 
āb-e-muhīt-e-ishq kā bahr 'ajīb bahr hai taire to ġharq ho ga.e Duube to paar kar ga.e 
itne qarīb ho ga.e apne raqīb ho ga.e vo bhī 'adīm' Dar gayā ham bhī 'adīm' Dar ga.e 
us ke sulūk par 'adīm' apnī hayāt o maut hai vo jo milā to jī uThe vo na milā to mar ga.e 
tere liye chale the hum tere liye Thahar gae tu ne kaha to ji uThe tu ne kaha to mar gae 
kaT hi gai judai bhi kab ye hua ki mar gae tere bhi din guzar gae mere bhi din guzar gae 
tu bhi kuchh aur aur hai hum bhi kuchh aur aur hain jaane wo tu kidhar gaya jaane wo hum kidhar gae 
rahon mein hi mile the hum rahen nasib ban gain wo bhi na apne ghar gaya hum bhi na apne ghar gae 
waqt teri judai ka itna tawil ho gaya dil mein tere visal ke jitne the zaKHm bhar gae 
hota raha muqabla pani ka aur pyas ka sahra umaD umaD paDe dariya biphar biphar gae 
wo bhi ghubar-e-KHwab tha hum bhi ghubar-e-KHwab the wo bhi kahin bikhar gaya hum bhi kahin bikhar gae 
koi kanar-e-abju baiTha hua hai sar-nigun kashti kidhar chali gai jaane kidhar bhanwar gae 
aaj bhi intizar ka waqt hunut ho gaya aisa laga ki hashr tak sare hi pal Thahar gae 
barish-e-wasl wo hui sara ghubar dhul gaya wo bhi nikhar nikhar gaya hum bhi nikhar nikhar gae 
aab-e-muhit-e-ishq ka bahr 'ajib bahr hai taire to gharq ho gae Dube to par kar gae 
itne qarib ho gae apne raqib ho gae wo bhi 'adim' Dar gaya hum bhi 'adim' Dar gae 
us ke suluk par 'adim' apni hayat o maut hai wo jo mila to ji uThe wo na mila to mar gae

achchhe iisā ho marīzoñ kā ḳhayāl achchhā hai ham mare jaate haiñ tum kahte ho haal achchhā hai 
tujh se māñgūñ maiñ tujhī ko ki sabhī kuchh mil jaa.e sau savāloñ se yahī ek savāl achchhā hai 
dekh le bulbul o parvāna kī betābī ko hijr achchhā na hasīnoñ kā visāl achchhā hai 
aa gayā us kā tasavvur to pukārā ye shauq dil meñ jam jaa.e ilāhī ye ḳhayāl achchhā hai 
āñkheñ dikhlāte ho joban to dikhāo sāhab vo alag bāñdh ke rakkhā hai jo maal achchhā hai 
barq agar garmi-e-raftār meñ achchhī hai 'amīr' garmi-e-husn meñ vo barq-jamāl achchhā hai 
achchhe isa ho marizon ka KHayal achchha hai hum mare jate hain tum kahte ho haal achchha hai 
tujh se mangun main tujhi ko ki sabhi kuchh mil jae sau sawalon se yahi ek sawal achchha hai 
dekh le bulbul o parwana ki betabi ko hijr achchha na hasinon ka visal achchha hai 
aa gaya us ka tasawwur to pukara ye shauq dil mein jam jae ilahi ye KHayal achchha hai 
aankhen dikhlate ho joban to dikhao sahab wo alag bandh ke rakkha hai jo mal achchha hai 
barq agar garmi-e-raftar mein achchhi hai 'amir' garmi-e-husn mein wo barq-jamal achchha hai

tirī umiid tirā intizār jab se hai na shab ko din se shikāyat na din ko shab se hai 
kisī kā dard ho karte haiñ tere naam raqam gila hai jo bhī kisī se tire sabab se hai 
huā hai jab se dil-e-nā-subūr be-qābū kalām tujh se nazar ko baḌe adab se hai 
agar sharar hai to bhaḌke jo phuul hai to khile tarah tarah kī talab tere rañg-e-lab se hai 
kahāñ ga.e shab-e-furqat ke jāgne vaale sitāra-e-saharī ham-kalām kab se hai 
teri umid tera intizar jab se hai na shab ko din se shikayat na din ko shab se hai 
kisi ka dard ho karte hain tere nam raqam gila hai jo bhi kisi se tere sabab se hai 
hua hai jab se dil-e-na-subur be-qabu kalam tujh se nazar ko baDe adab se hai 
agar sharar hai to bhaDke jo phul hai to khile tarah tarah ki talab tere rang-e-lab se hai 
kahan gae shab-e-furqat ke jagne wale sitara-e-sahari ham-kalam kab se hai

kyā jaane kis kī pyaas bujhāne kidhar ga.iiñ is sar pe jhuum ke jo ghaTā.eñ guzar ga.iiñ 
dīvāna pūchhtā hai ye lahroñ se baar baar kuchh bastiyāñ yahāñ thiiñ batāo kidhar ga.iiñ 
ab jis taraf se chāhe guzar jaa.e kārvāñ vīrāniyāñ to sab mire dil meñ utar ga.iiñ 
paimāna TūTne kā koī ġham nahīñ mujhe ġham hai to ye ki chāñdnī rāteñ bikhar ga.iiñ 
paayā bhī un ko kho bhī diyā chup bhī ho rahe ik muḳhtasar sī raat meñ sadiyāñ guzar ga.iiñ 
kya jaane kis ki pyas bujhane kidhar gain is sar pe jhum ke jo ghaTaen guzar gain 
diwana puchhta hai ye lahron se bar bar kuchh bastiyan yahan thin batao kidhar gain 
ab jis taraf se chahe guzar jae karwan viraniyan to sab mere dil mein utar gain 
paimana TuTne ka koi gham nahin mujhe gham hai to ye ki chandni raaten bikhar gain 
paya bhi un ko kho bhi diya chup bhi ho rahe ek muKHtasar si raat mein sadiyan guzar gain

hai justujū ki ḳhuub se hai ḳhūb-tar kahāñ ab Thahratī hai dekhiye jā kar nazar kahāñ 
haiñ daur-e-jām-e-avval-e-shab meñ ḳhudī se duur hotī hai aaj dekhiye ham ko sahar kahāñ 
yā rab is iḳhtilāt kā anjām ho ba-ḳhair thā us ko ham se rabt magar is qadar kahāñ 
ik umr chāhiye ki gavārā ho nīsh-e-ishq rakkhī hai aaj lazzat-e-zaḳhm-e-jigar kahāñ 
bas ho chukā bayāñ kasal-o-ranj-e-rāh kā ḳhat kā mire javāb hai ai nāma-bar kahāñ 
kaun o makāñ se hai dil-e-vahshī kanāra-gīr is ḳhānumāñ-ḳharāb ne DhūñDā hai ghar kahāñ 
ham jis pe mar rahe haiñ vo hai baat hī kuchh aur aalam meñ tujh se laakh sahī tū magar kahāñ 
hotī nahīñ qubūl duā tark-e-ishq kī dil chāhtā na ho to zabāñ meñ asar kahāñ 
'hālī' nashāt-e-naġhma-o-mai DhūñDhte ho ab aa.e ho vaqt-e-sub.h rahe raat bhar kahāñ 
hai justuju ki KHub se hai KHub-tar kahan ab Thahrati hai dekhiye ja kar nazar kahan 
hain daur-e-jam-e-awwal-e-shab mein KHudi se dur hoti hai aaj dekhiye hum ko sahar kahan 
ya rab is iKHtilat ka anjam ho ba-KHair tha us ko hum se rabt magar is qadar kahan 
ek umr chahiye ki gawara ho nish-e-ishq rakkhi hai aaj lazzat-e-zaKHm-e-jigar kahan 
bas ho chuka bayan kasal-o-ranj-e-rah ka KHat ka mere jawab hai ai nama-bar kahan 
kaun o makan se hai dil-e-wahshi kanara-gir is KHanuman-KHarab ne DhunDa hai ghar kahan 
hum jis pe mar rahe hain wo hai baat hi kuchh aur aalam mein tujh se lakh sahi tu magar kahan 
hoti nahin qubul dua tark-e-ishq ki dil chahta na ho to zaban mein asar kahan 
'haali' nashat-e-naghma-o-mai DhunDhte ho ab aae ho waqt-e-subh rahe raat bhar kahan

ḳhāmosh ho kyuuñ dād-e-jafā kyuuñ nahīñ dete bismil ho to qātil ko duā kyuuñ nahīñ dete 
vahshat kā sabab rauzan-e-zindāñ to nahīñ hai mehr o mah o anjum ko bujhā kyuuñ nahīñ dete 
ik ye bhī to andāz-e-ilāj-e-ġham-e-jāñ hai ai chāragaro dard baḌhā kyuuñ nahīñ dete 
munsif ho agar tum to kab insāf karoge mujrim haiñ agar ham to sazā kyuuñ nahīñ dete 
rahzan ho to hāzir hai matā-e-dil-o-jāñ bhī rahbar ho to manzil kā pata kyuuñ nahīñ dete 
kyā biit ga.ī ab ke 'farāz' ahl-e-chaman par yārān-e-qafas mujh ko sadā kyuuñ nahīñ dete 
KHamosh ho kyun dad-e-jafa kyun nahin dete bismil ho to qatil ko dua kyun nahin dete 
wahshat ka sabab rauzan-e-zindan to nahin hai mehr o mah o anjum ko bujha kyun nahin dete 
ek ye bhi to andaz-e-ilaj-e-gham-e-jaan hai ai chaaragaro dard baDha kyun nahin dete 
munsif ho agar tum to kab insaf karoge mujrim hain agar hum to saza kyun nahin dete 
rahzan ho to hazir hai mata-e-dil-o-jaan bhi rahbar ho to manzil ka pata kyun nahin dete 
kya bit gai ab ke 'faraaz' ahl-e-chaman par yaran-e-qafas mujh ko sada kyun nahin dete

jag meñ aa kar idhar udhar dekhā tū hī aayā nazar jidhar dekhā 
jaan se ho ga.e badan ḳhālī jis taraf tū ne aañkh bhar dekhā 
naala fariyād aah aur zaarī aap se ho sakā so kar dekhā 
un laboñ ne na kī masīhā.ī ham ne sau sau tarah se mar dekhā 
zor āshiq-mizāj hai koī 'dard' ko qissa muḳhtasar dekhā 
jag mein aa kar idhar udhar dekha tu hi aaya nazar jidhar dekha 
jaan se ho gae badan KHali jis taraf tu ne aankh bhar dekha 
nala fariyaad aah aur zari aap se ho saka so kar dekha 
un labon ne na ki masihai hum ne sau sau tarah se mar dekha 
zor aashiq-mizaj hai koi 'dard' ko qissa muKHtasar dekha

āñkheñ mujhe talvoñ se vo malne nahīñ dete armān mire dil ke nikalne nahīñ dete 
ḳhātir se tirī yaad ko Talne nahīñ dete sach hai ki hamīñ dil ko sambhalne nahīñ dete 
kis naaz se kahte haiñ vo jhuñjhlā ke shab-e-vasl tum to hameñ karvaT bhī badalne nahīñ dete 
parvānoñ ne fānūs ko dekhā to ye bole kyuuñ ham ko jalāte ho ki jalne nahīñ dete 
hairān huuñ kis tarah karūñ arz-e-tamannā dushman ko to pahlū se vo Talne nahīñ dete 
dil vo hai ki fariyād se labrez hai har vaqt ham vo haiñ ki kuchh muñh se nikalne nahīñ dete 
garmi-e-mohabbat meñ vo haiñ aah se māne.a pankhā nafas-e-sard kā jhalne nahīñ dete 
aankhen mujhe talwon se wo malne nahin dete arman mere dil ke nikalne nahin dete 
KHatir se teri yaad ko Talne nahin dete sach hai ki hamin dil ko sambhalne nahin dete 
kis naz se kahte hain wo jhunjhla ke shab-e-wasl tum to hamein karwaT bhi badalne nahin dete 
parwanon ne fanus ko dekha to ye bole kyun hum ko jalate ho ki jalne nahin dete 
hairan hun kis tarah karun arz-e-tamanna dushman ko to pahlu se wo Talne nahin dete 
dil wo hai ki fariyaad se labrez hai har waqt hum wo hain ki kuchh munh se nikalne nahin dete 
garmi-e-mohabbat mein wo hain aah se manea pankha nafas-e-sard ka jhalne nahin dete

muntazir kab se tahayyur hai tirī taqrīr kā baat kar tujh par gumāñ hone lagā tasvīr kā 
raat kyā so.e ki baaqī umr kī niiñd uḌ ga.ī ḳhvāb kyā dekhā ki dhaḌkā lag gayā tābīr kā 
kaise paayā thā tujhe phir kis tarah khoyā tujhe mujh sā munkir bhī to qaa.el ho gayā taqdīr kā 
jis tarah bādal kā saaya pyaas bhaḌkātā rahe maiñ ne ye aalam bhī dekhā hai tirī tasvīr kā 
jaane kis aalam meñ tū bichhḌā ki hai tere baġhair aaj tak har naqsh fariyādī mirī tahrīr kā 
ishq meñ sar phoḌnā bhī kyā ki ye be-mehr log jū-e-ḳhūñ ko naam de dete haiñ jū-e-shīr kā 
jis ko bhī chāhā use shiddat se chāhā hai 'farāz' silsila TuuTā nahīñ hai dard kī zanjīr kā 
muntazir kab se tahayyur hai teri taqrir ka baat kar tujh par guman hone laga taswir ka 
raat kya soe ki baqi umr ki nind uD gai KHwab kya dekha ki dhaDka lag gaya tabir ka 
kaise paya tha tujhe phir kis tarah khoya tujhe mujh sa munkir bhi to qael ho gaya taqdir ka 
jis tarah baadal ka saya pyas bhaDkata rahe main ne ye aalam bhi dekha hai teri taswir ka 
jaane kis aalam mein tu bichhDa ki hai tere baghair aaj tak har naqsh fariyaadi meri tahrir ka 
ishq mein sar phoDna bhi kya ki ye be-mehr log ju-e-KHun ko nam de dete hain ju-e-shir ka 
jis ko bhi chaha use shiddat se chaha hai 'faraaz' silsila TuTa nahin hai dard ki zanjir ka

vafā-e-vāda nahīñ vāda-e-digar bhī nahīñ vo mujh se rūThe to the lekin is qadar bhī nahīñ 
baras rahī hai harīm-e-havas meñ daulat-e-husn gadā-e-ishq ke kaase meñ ik nazar bhī nahīñ 
na jaane kis liye ummīd-vār baiThā huuñ ik aisī raah pe jo terī rahguzar bhī nahīñ 
nigāh-e-shauq sar-e-bazm be-hijāb na ho vo be-ḳhabar hī sahī itne be-ḳhabar bhī nahīñ 
ye ahd-e-tark-e-mohabbat hai kis liye āḳhir sukūn-e-qalb udhar bhī nahīñ idhar bhī nahīñ 
wafa-e-wada nahin wada-e-digar bhi nahin wo mujh se ruThe to the lekin is qadar bhi nahin 
baras rahi hai harim-e-hawas mein daulat-e-husn gada-e-ishq ke kase mein ek nazar bhi nahin 
na jaane kis liye ummid-war baiTha hun ek aisi rah pe jo teri rahguzar bhi nahin 
nigah-e-shauq sar-e-bazm be-hijab na ho wo be-KHabar hi sahi itne be-KHabar bhi nahin 
ye ahd-e-tark-e-mohabbat hai kis liye aaKHir sukun-e-qalb udhar bhi nahin idhar bhi nahin

dil hijr ke dard se bojhal hai ab aan milo to behtar ho is baat se ham ko kyā matlab ye kaise ho ye kyūñkar ho 
ik bhiik ke donoñ kaase haiñ ik pyaas ke dono pyāse haiñ ham khetī haiñ tum bādal ho ham nadiyāñ haiñ tum sāgar ho 
ye dil hai ki jalte siine meñ ik dard kā phoḌā allhaḌ sā nā gupt rahe nā phuuT bahe koī marham ho koī nishtar ho 
ham sāñjh samay kī chhāyā haiñ tum chaḌhtī raat ke chandramāñ ham jaate haiñ tum aate ho phir mel kī sūrat kyūñkar ho 
ab husn kā rutba 'aalī hai ab husn se sahrā ḳhālī hai chal bastī meñ banjāra ban chal nagrī meñ saudāgar ho 
jis chiiz se tujh ko nisbat hai jis chiiz kī tujh ko chāhat hai vo sonā hai vo hiirā hai vo maaTī ho yā kankar ho 
ab 'inshā'-jī ko bulānā kyā ab pyaar ke diip jalānā kyā jab dhuup aur chhāyā ek se hoñ jab din aur raat barābar ho 
vo rāteñ chāñd ke saath ga.iiñ vo bāteñ chāñd ke saath ga.iiñ ab sukh ke sapne kyā dekheñ jab dukh kā sūraj sar par ho 
dil hijr ke dard se bojhal hai ab aan milo to behtar ho is baat se hum ko kya matlab ye kaise ho ye kyunkar ho 
ek bhik ke donon kase hain ek pyas ke dono pyase hain hum kheti hain tum baadal ho hum nadiyan hain tum sagar ho 
ye dil hai ki jalte sine mein ek dard ka phoDa allhaD sa na gupt rahe na phuT bahe koi marham ho koi nishtar ho 
hum sanjh samay ki chhaya hain tum chaDhti raat ke chandraman hum jate hain tum aate ho phir mel ki surat kyunkar ho 
ab husn ka rutba 'ali hai ab husn se sahra KHali hai chal basti mein banjara ban chal nagri mein saudagar ho 
jis chiz se tujh ko nisbat hai jis chiz ki tujh ko chahat hai wo sona hai wo hira hai wo maTi ho ya kankar ho 
ab 'insha'-ji ko bulana kya ab pyar ke dip jalana kya jab dhup aur chhaya ek se hon jab din aur raat barabar ho 
wo raaten chand ke sath gain wo baaten chand ke sath gain ab sukh ke sapne kya dekhen jab dukh ka suraj sar par ho

ghuTan sī hone lagī us ke paas jaate hue maiñ ḳhud se ruuTh gayā huuñ use manāte hue 
ye zaḳhm zaḳhm manāzir lahū lahū chehre kahāñ chale ga.e vo log hañste gaate hue 
na jaane ḳhatm huī kab hamārī āzādī ta.alluqāt kī pābandiyāñ nibhāte hue 
hai ab bhī bistar-e-jāñ par tire badan kī shikan maiñ ḳhud hī miTne lagā huuñ use miTāte hue 
tumhāre aane kī ummīd bar nahīñ aatī maiñ raakh hone lagā huuñ diye jalāte hue 
ghuTan si hone lagi us ke pas jate hue main KHud se ruTh gaya hun use manate hue 
ye zaKHm zaKHm manazir lahu lahu chehre kahan chale gae wo log hanste gate hue 
na jaane KHatm hui kab hamari aazadi talluqat ki pabandiyan nibhate hue 
hai ab bhi bistar-e-jaan par tere badan ki shikan main KHud hi miTne laga hun use miTate hue 
tumhaare aane ki ummid bar nahin aati main rakh hone laga hun diye jalate hue

qurbateñ hote hue bhī fāsloñ meñ qaid haiñ kitnī āzādī se ham apnī hadoñ meñ qaid haiñ 
kaun sī āñkhoñ meñ mere ḳhvāb raushan haiñ abhī kis kī nīñdeñ haiñ jo mere ratjagoñ meñ qaid haiñ 
shahr ābādī se ḳhālī ho ga.e ḳhushbū se phuul aur kitnī ḳhvāhisheñ haiñ jo diloñ meñ qaid haiñ 
paañv meñ rishtoñ kī zanjīreñ haiñ dil meñ ḳhauf kī aisā lagtā hai ki ham apne gharoñ meñ qaid haiñ 
ye zamīñ yūñhī sikuḌtī jā.egī aur ek din phail jā.eñge jo tūfāñ sāhiloñ meñ qaid haiñ 
is jazīre par azal se ḳhaak uḌtī hai havā manziloñ ke bhed phir bhī rāstoñ meñ qaid haiñ 
kaun ye pātāl se ubhrā kināre par 'salīm' sar-phirī maujeñ abhī tak dā.eroñ meñ qaid haiñ 
qurbaten hote hue bhi faslon mein qaid hain kitni aazadi se hum apni hadon mein qaid hain 
kaun si aankhon mein mere KHwab raushan hain abhi kis ki ninden hain jo mere ratjagon mein qaid hain 
shahr aabaadi se KHali ho gae KHushbu se phul aur kitni KHwahishen hain jo dilon mein qaid hain 
panw mein rishton ki zanjiren hain dil mein KHauf ki aisa lagta hai ki hum apne gharon mein qaid hain 
ye zamin yunhi sikuDti jaegi aur ek din phail jaenge jo tufan sahilon mein qaid hain 
is jazire par azal se KHak uDti hai hawa manzilon ke bhed phir bhi raston mein qaid hain 
kaun ye patal se ubhra kinare par 'salim' sar-phiri maujen abhi tak daeron mein qaid hain

achānak dilrubā mausam kā dil-āzār ho jaanā duā āsāñ nahīñ rahnā suḳhan dushvār ho jaanā 
tumheñ dekheñ nigāheñ aur tum ko hī nahīñ dekheñ mohabbat ke sabhī rishtoñ kā yuuñ nādār ho jaanā 
abhī to be-niyāzī meñ taḳhātub kī sī ḳhushbū thī hameñ achchhā lagā thā dard kā dildār ho jaanā 
agar sach itnā zālim hai to ham se jhuuT hī bolo hameñ aatā hai patjhaḌ ke dinoñ gul-bār ho jaanā 
abhī kuchh an-kahe alfāz bhī haiñ kunj-e-mizhgāñ meñ agar tum is taraf aao sabā-raftār ho jaanā 
havā to ham-safar Thahrī samajh meñ kis tarah aa.e havāoñ kā hamārī raah meñ dīvār ho jaanā 
abhī to silsila apnā zamīñ se āsmāñ tak thā abhī dekhā thā rātoñ kā sahar-āsār ho jaanā 
hamāre shahr ke logoñ kā ab ahvāl itnā hai kabhī aḳhbār paḌh lenā kabhī aḳhbār ho jaanā 
achanak dilruba mausam ka dil-azar ho jaana dua aasan nahin rahna suKHan dushwar ho jaana 
tumhein dekhen nigahen aur tum ko hi nahin dekhen mohabbat ke sabhi rishton ka yun nadar ho jaana 
abhi to be-niyazi mein taKHatub ki si KHushbu thi hamein achchha laga tha dard ka dildar ho jaana 
agar sach itna zalim hai to hum se jhuT hi bolo hamein aata hai patjhaD ke dinon gul-bar ho jaana 
abhi kuchh an-kahe alfaz bhi hain kunj-e-mizhgan mein agar tum is taraf aao saba-raftar ho jaana 
hawa to ham-safar Thahri samajh mein kis tarah aae hawaon ka hamari rah mein diwar ho jaana 
abhi to silsila apna zamin se aasman tak tha abhi dekha tha raaton ka sahar-asar ho jaana 
hamare shahr ke logon ka ab ahwal itna hai kabhi aKHbar paDh lena kabhi aKHbar ho jaana

ye tanhā raat ye gahrī fazā.eñ use DhūñDeñ ki us ko bhuul jaa.eñ 
ḳhayāloñ kī ghanī ḳhāmoshiyoñ meñ ghulī jaatī haiñ lafzoñ kī sadā.eñ 
ye raste rahravoñ se bhāgte haiñ yahāñ chhup chhup ke chaltī haiñ havā.eñ 
ye paanī ḳhāmushī se bah rahā hai ise dekheñ ki is meñ Duub jaa.eñ 
jo ġham jalte haiñ sheroñ kī chitā meñ unheñ phir apne siine se lagā.eñ 
chalo aisā makāñ ābād kar leñ jahāñ logoñ kī āvāzeñ na aa.eñ 
ye tanha raat ye gahri fazaen use DhunDen ki us ko bhul jaen 
KHayalon ki ghani KHamoshiyon mein ghuli jati hain lafzon ki sadaen 
ye raste rahrawon se bhagte hain yahan chhup chhup ke chalti hain hawaen 
ye pani KHamushi se bah raha hai ise dekhen ki is mein Dub jaen 
jo gham jalte hain sheron ki chita mein unhen phir apne sine se lagaen 
chalo aisa makan aabaad kar len jahan logon ki aawazen na aaen

ḳhalq kahtī hai jise dil tire dīvāne kā ek gosha hai ye duniyā isī vīrāne kā 
ik muamma hai samajhne kā na samjhāne kā zindagī kaahe ko hai ḳhvāb hai dīvāne kā 
husn hai zaat mirī ishq sifat hai merī huuñ to maiñ sham.a magar bhes hai parvāne kā 
ka.abe ko dil kī ziyārat ke liye jaatā huuñ āstāna hai haram mere sanam-ḳhāne kā 
muḳhtasar qissa-e-ġham ye hai ki dil rakhtā huuñ rāz-e-kaunain ḳhulāsa hai is afsāne kā 
zindagī bhī to pashemāñ hai yahāñ lā ke mujhe DhūñDtī hai koī hiila mire mar jaane kā 
tum ne dekhā hai kabhī ghar ko badalte hue rañg aao dekho na tamāshā mire ġham-ḳhāne kā 
ab ise daar pe le jā ke sulā de saaqī yuuñ bahaknā nahīñ achchhā tire mastāne kā 
dil se pahuñchī to haiñ āñkhoñ meñ lahū kī būñdeñ silsila shīshe se miltā to hai paimāne kā 
haDDiyāñ haiñ ka.ī lipTī huī zanjīroñ meñ liye jaate haiñ janāza tire dīvāne kā 
vahdat-e-husn ke jalvoñ kī ye kasrat ai ishq dil ke har zarre meñ aalam hai parī-ḳhāne kā 
chashm-e-sāqī asar-e-mai se nahīñ hai gul-rañg dil mire ḳhuun se labrez hai paimāne kā 
lauh dil ko ġham-e-ulfat ko qalam kahte haiñ kun hai andāz-e-raqam husn ke afsāne kā 
ham ne chhānī haiñ bahut dair o haram kī galiyāñ kahīñ paayā na Thikānā tire dīvāne kā 
kis kī āñkheñ dam-e-āḳhir mujhe yaad aa.ī haiñ dil muraqqa.a hai chhalakte hue paimāne kā 
kahte haiñ kyā hī maze kā hai fasāna 'fānī' aap kī jaan se duur aap ke mar jaane kā 
har nafas umr-e-guzishta kī hai mayyat 'fānī' zindagī naam hai mar mar ke jiye jaane kā 
KHalq kahti hai jise dil tere diwane ka ek gosha hai ye duniya isi virane ka 
ek muamma hai samajhne ka na samjhane ka zindagi kahe ko hai KHwab hai diwane ka 
husn hai zat meri ishq sifat hai meri hun to main shama magar bhes hai parwane ka 
kabe ko dil ki ziyarat ke liye jata hun aastana hai haram mere sanam-KHane ka 
muKHtasar qissa-e-gham ye hai ki dil rakhta hun raaz-e-kaunain KHulasa hai is afsane ka 
zindagi bhi to pasheman hai yahan la ke mujhe DhunDti hai koi hila mere mar jaane ka 
tum ne dekha hai kabhi ghar ko badalte hue rang aao dekho na tamasha mere gham-KHane ka 
ab ise dar pe le ja ke sula de saqi yun bahakna nahin achchha tere mastane ka 
dil se pahunchi to hain aankhon mein lahu ki bunden silsila shishe se milta to hai paimane ka 
haDDiyan hain kai lipTi hui zanjiron mein liye jate hain janaza tere diwane ka 
wahdat-e-husn ke jalwon ki ye kasrat ai ishq dil ke har zarre mein aalam hai pari-KHane ka 
chashm-e-saqi asar-e-mai se nahin hai gul-rang dil mere KHun se labrez hai paimane ka 
lauh dil ko gham-e-ulfat ko qalam kahte hain kun hai andaz-e-raqam husn ke afsane ka 
hum ne chhani hain bahut dair o haram ki galiyan kahin paya na Thikana tere diwane ka 
kis ki aankhen dam-e-aKHir mujhe yaad aai hain dil muraqqa hai chhalakte hue paimane ka 
kahte hain kya hi maze ka hai fasana 'fani' aap ki jaan se dur aap ke mar jaane ka 
har nafas umr-e-guzishta ki hai mayyat 'fani' zindagi nam hai mar mar ke jiye jaane ka

narm fazā kī karvaTeñ dil ko dukhā ke rah ga.iiñ ThanDī havā.eñ bhī tirī yaad dilā ke rah ga.iiñ 
shaam bhī thī dhuāñ dhuāñ husn bhī thā udaas udaas dil ko ka.ī kahāniyāñ yaad sī aa ke rah ga.iiñ 
mujh ko ḳharāb kar ga.iiñ nīm-nigāhiyāñ tirī mujh se hayāt o maut bhī āñkheñ churā ke rah ga.iiñ 
husn-e-nazar-fareb meñ kis ko kalām thā magar terī adā.eñ aaj to dil meñ samā ke rah ga.iiñ 
tab kahīñ kuchh pata chalā sidq-o-ḳhulūs-e-husn kā jab vo nigāheñ ishq se bāteñ banā ke rah ga.iiñ 
tere ḳhirām-e-nāz se aaj vahāñ chaman khile fasleñ bahār kī jahāñ ḳhaak uḌā ke rah ga.iiñ 
pūchh na un nigāhoñ kī turfa karishma-sāziyāñ fitne sulā ke rah ga.iiñ fitne jagā ke rah ga.iiñ 
tāroñ kī aañkh bhī bhar aa.ī merī sadā-e-dard par un kī nigāheñ bhī tirā naam batā ke rah ga.iiñ 
uf ye zamīñ kī gardisheñ aah ye ġham kī Thokareñ ye bhī to baḳht-e-ḳhufta ke shāne hilā ke rah ga.iiñ 
aur to ahl-e-dard kaun sambhāltā bhalā haañ terī shādmāniyāñ un ko rulā ke rah ga.iiñ 
yaad kuchh aa.iiñ is tarah bhūlī huī kahāniyāñ kho.e hue diloñ meñ aaj dard uThā ke rah ga.iiñ 
sāz-e-nashāt-e-zindagī aaj laraz laraz uThā kis kī nigāheñ ishq kā dard sunā ke rah ga.iiñ 
tum nahīñ aa.e aur raat rah ga.ī raah dekhtī tāroñ kī mahfileñ bhī aaj āñkheñ bichhā ke rah ga.iiñ 
jhuum ke phir chalīñ havā.eñ vajd meñ aa.iiñ phir fazā.eñ phir tirī yaad kī ghaTā.eñ sīnoñ pe chhā ke rah ga.iiñ 
qalb o nigāh kī ye iid uf ye ma.āl-e-qurb-o-dīd charḳh kī gardisheñ tujhe mujh se chhupā ke rah ga.iiñ 
phir haiñ vahī udāsiyāñ phir vahī suunī kā.enāt ahl-e-tarab kī mahfileñ rañg jamā ke rah ga.iiñ 
kaun sukūn de sakā ġham-zadagān-e-ishq ko bhīgtī rāteñ bhī 'firāq' aag lagā ke rah ga.iiñ 
narm faza ki karwaTen dil ko dukha ke rah gain ThanDi hawaen bhi teri yaad dila ke rah gain 
sham bhi thi dhuan dhuan husn bhi tha udas udas dil ko kai kahaniyan yaad si aa ke rah gain 
mujh ko KHarab kar gain nim-nigahiyan teri mujh se hayat o maut bhi aankhen chura ke rah gain 
husn-e-nazar-fareb mein kis ko kalam tha magar teri adaen aaj to dil mein sama ke rah gain 
tab kahin kuchh pata chala sidq-o-KHulus-e-husn ka jab wo nigahen ishq se baaten bana ke rah gain 
tere KHiram-e-naz se aaj wahan chaman khile faslen bahaar ki jahan KHak uDa ke rah gain 
puchh na un nigahon ki turfa karishma-saziyan fitne sula ke rah gain fitne jaga ke rah gain 
taron ki aankh bhi bhar aai meri sada-e-dard par un ki nigahen bhi tera nam bata ke rah gain 
uf ye zamin ki gardishen aah ye gham ki Thokaren ye bhi to baKHt-e-KHufta ke shane hila ke rah gain 
aur to ahl-e-dard kaun sambhaalta bhala han teri shadmaniyan un ko rula ke rah gain 
yaad kuchh aain is tarah bhuli hui kahaniyan khoe hue dilon mein aaj dard uTha ke rah gain 
saz-e-nashat-e-zindagi aaj laraz laraz uTha kis ki nigahen ishq ka dard suna ke rah gain 
tum nahin aae aur raat rah gai rah dekhti taron ki mahfilen bhi aaj aankhen bichha ke rah gain 
jhum ke phir chalin hawaen wajd mein aain phir fazaen phir teri yaad ki ghaTaen sinon pe chha ke rah gain 
qalb o nigah ki ye id uf ye maal-e-qurb-o-did charKH ki gardishen tujhe mujh se chhupa ke rah gain 
phir hain wahi udasiyan phir wahi suni kaenat ahl-e-tarab ki mahfilen rang jama ke rah gain 
kaun sukun de saka gham-zadagan-e-ishq ko bhigti raaten bhi 'firaq' aag laga ke rah gain

maiñ kab tanhā huā thā yaad hogā tumhārā faisla thā yaad hogā 
bahut se ujle ujle phuul le kar koī tum se milā thā yaad hogā 
bichhī thiiñ har taraf āñkheñ hī āñkheñ koī aañsū girā thā yaad hogā 
udāsī aur baḌhtī jā rahī thī vo chehra bujh rahā thā yaad hogā 
vo ḳhat pāgal havā ke āñchaloñ par kise tum ne likhā thā yaad hogā 
main kab tanha hua tha yaad hoga tumhaara faisla tha yaad hoga 
bahut se ujle ujle phul le kar koi tum se mila tha yaad hoga 
bichhi thin har taraf aankhen hi aankhen koi aansu gira tha yaad hoga 
udasi aur baDhti ja rahi thi wo chehra bujh raha tha yaad hoga 
wo KHat pagal hawa ke aanchalon par kise tum ne likha tha yaad hoga

tum aa.e ho tumheñ bhī aazmā kar dekh letā huuñ tumhāre saath bhī kuchh duur jā kar dekh letā huuñ 
havā.eñ jin kī andhī khiḌkiyoñ par sar paTaktī haiñ maiñ un kamroñ meñ phir sham.eñ jalā kar dekh letā huuñ 
ajab kyā is qarīne se koī sūrat nikal aa.e tirī bātoñ ko ḳhvāboñ se milā kar dekh letā huuñ 
sahar-dam kirchiyāñ TuuTe hue ḳhvāboñ kī miltī haiñ to bistar jhaaḌ kar chādar haTā kar dekh letā huuñ 
bahut dil ko dukhātā hai kabhī jab dard-e-mahjūrī tirī yādoñ kī jānib muskurā kar dekh letā huuñ 
uḌā kar rañg kuchh hoñToñ se kuchh āñkhoñ se kuchh dil se ga.e lamhoñ ko tasvīreñ banā kar dekh letā huuñ 
nahīñ ho tum bhī vo ab mujh se yaaro kyā chhupāoge havā kī samt ko miTTī uḌā kar dekh letā huuñ 
sunā hai be-niyāzī hī ilāj-e-nā-umīdī hai ye nusḳha bhī koī din aazmā kar dekh letā huuñ 
mohabbat mar ga.ī 'mushtāq' lekin tum na mānoge maiñ ye afvāh bhī tum ko sunā kar dekh letā huuñ 
tum aae ho tumhein bhi aazma kar dekh leta hun tumhaare sath bhi kuchh dur ja kar dekh leta hun 
hawaen jin ki andhi khiDkiyon par sar paTakti hain main un kamron mein phir shamen jala kar dekh leta hun 
ajab kya is qarine se koi surat nikal aae teri baaton ko KHwabon se mila kar dekh leta hun 
sahar-dam kirchiyan TuTe hue KHwabon ki milti hain to bistar jhaD kar chadar haTa kar dekh leta hun 
bahut dil ko dukhata hai kabhi jab dard-e-mahjuri teri yaadon ki jaanib muskura kar dekh leta hun 
uDa kar rang kuchh honTon se kuchh aankhon se kuchh dil se gae lamhon ko taswiren bana kar dekh leta hun 
nahin ho tum bhi wo ab mujh se yaro kya chhupaoge hawa ki samt ko miTTi uDa kar dekh leta hun 
suna hai be-niyazi hi ilaj-e-na-umidi hai ye nusKHa bhi koi din aazma kar dekh leta hun 
mohabbat mar gai 'mushtaq' lekin tum na manoge main ye afwah bhi tum ko suna kar dekh leta hun

ham tujh se kis havas kī falak justujū kareñ dil hī nahīñ rahā hai ki kuchh aarzū kareñ 
miT jaa.eñ ek aan meñ kasrat-numā.iyāñ ham aa.ine ke sāmne jab aa ke hū kareñ 
tar-dāmanī pe shaiḳh hamārī na jā.iyo dāman nichoḌ deñ to farishte vuzū kareñ 
sar-tā-qadam zabān haiñ juuñ sham.a go ki ham par ye kahāñ majāl jo kuchh guftugū kareñ 
har-chand aa.ina huuñ par itnā huuñ nā-qubūl muñh pher le vo jis ke mujhe rū-ba-rū kareñ 
ne gul ko hai sabāt na ham ko hai e'tibār kis baat par chaman havas-e-rañg-o-bū kareñ 
hai apnī ye salāh ki sab zāhidān-e-shahr ai 'dard' aa ke bai.at-e-dast-e-subū kareñ 
hum tujh se kis hawas ki falak justuju karen dil hi nahin raha hai ki kuchh aarzu karen 
miT jaen ek aan mein kasrat-numaiyan hum aaine ke samne jab aa ke hu karen 
tar-damani pe shaiKH hamari na jaiyo daman nichoD den to farishte wuzu karen 
sar-ta-qadam zaban hain jun shama go ki hum par ye kahan majal jo kuchh guftugu karen 
har-chand aaina hun par itna hun na-qubul munh pher le wo jis ke mujhe ru-ba-ru karen 
ne gul ko hai sabaat na hum ko hai e'tibar kis baat par chaman hawas-e-rang-o-bu karen 
hai apni ye salah ki sab zahidan-e-shahr ai 'dard' aa ke baiat-e-dast-e-subu karen

aa ke patthar to mire sahn meñ do chaar gire jitne us peḌ ke phal the pas-e-dīvār gire 
aisī dahshat thī fazāoñ meñ khule paanī kī aañkh jhapkī bhī nahīñ haath se patvār gire 
mujhe girnā hai to maiñ apne hī qadmoñ meñ girūñ jis tarah sāya-e-dīvār pe dīvār gire 
tīrgī chhoḌ ga.e dil meñ ujāle ke ḳhutūt ye sitāre mire ghar TuuT ke bekār gire 
kyā havā haath meñ talvār liye phirtī thī kyuuñ mujhe Dhaal banāne ko ye chhitnār gire 
dekh kar apne dar-o-bām laraz jaatā huuñ mire ham-sā.e meñ jab bhī koī dīvār gire 
vaqt kī Dor ḳhudā jaane kahāñ se TuuTe kis ghaḌī sar pe ye laTkī huī talvār gire 
ham se Takrā ga.ī ḳhud baḌh ke añdhere kī chaTān ham sambhal kar jo bahut chalte the nā-chār gire 
kyā kahūñ dīda-e-tar ye to mirā chehra hai sañg kaT jaate haiñ bārish kī jahāñ dhaar gire 
haath aayā nahīñ kuchh raat kī daldal ke sivā haa.e kis moḌ pe ḳhvāboñ ke parastār gire 
vo tajallī kī shuā.eñ thiiñ ki jalte hue par aa.ine TuuT ga.e ā.ina-bardār gire 
dekhte kyuuñ ho 'shakeb' itnī bulandī kī taraf na uThāyā karo sar ko ki ye dastār gire 
aa ke patthar to mere sahn mein do chaar gire jitne us peD ke phal the pas-e-diwar gire 
aisi dahshat thi fazaon mein khule pani ki aankh jhapki bhi nahin hath se patwar gire 
mujhe girna hai to main apne hi qadmon mein girun jis tarah saya-e-diwar pe diwar gire 
tirgi chhoD gae dil mein ujale ke KHutut ye sitare mere ghar TuT ke bekar gire 
kya hawa hath mein talwar liye phirti thi kyun mujhe Dhaal banane ko ye chhitnar gire 
dekh kar apne dar-o-baam laraz jata hun mere ham-sae mein jab bhi koi diwar gire 
waqt ki Dor KHuda jaane kahan se TuTe kis ghaDi sar pe ye laTki hui talwar gire 
hum se Takra gai KHud baDh ke andhere ki chaTan hum sambhal kar jo bahut chalte the na-chaar gire 
kya kahun dida-e-tar ye to mera chehra hai sang kaT jate hain barish ki jahan dhaar gire 
hath aaya nahin kuchh raat ki daldal ke siwa hae kis moD pe KHwabon ke parastar gire 
wo tajalli ki shuaen thin ki jalte hue par aaine TuT gae aaina-bardar gire 
dekhte kyun ho 'shakeb' itni bulandi ki taraf na uThaya karo sar ko ki ye dastar gire

kamāl-e-ishq hai dīvāna ho gayā huuñ maiñ ye kis ke haath se dāman chhuḌā rahā huuñ maiñ 
tumhīñ to ho jise kahtī hai nāḳhudā duniyā bachā sako to bachā lo ki Dūbtā huuñ maiñ 
ye mere ishq kī majbūriyāñ ma.āz-allāh tumhārā raaz tumhīñ se chhupā rahā huuñ maiñ 
is ik hijāb pe sau be-hijābiyāñ sadqe jahāñ se chāhtā huuñ tum ko dekhtā huuñ maiñ 
batāne vaale vahīñ par batāte haiñ manzil hazār baar jahāñ se guzar chukā huuñ maiñ 
kabhī ye zom ki tū mujh se chhup nahīñ saktā kabhī ye vahm ki ḳhud bhī chhupā huā huuñ maiñ 
mujhe sune na koī mast-e-bāada-e-ishrat 'majāz' TuuTe hue dil kī ik sadā huuñ maiñ 
kamal-e-ishq hai diwana ho gaya hun main ye kis ke hath se daman chhuDa raha hun main 
tumhin to ho jise kahti hai naKHuda duniya bacha sako to bacha lo ki Dubta hun main 
ye mere ishq ki majburiyan maaz-allah tumhaara raaz tumhin se chhupa raha hun main 
is ek hijab pe sau be-hijabiyan sadqe jahan se chahta hun tum ko dekhta hun main 
batane wale wahin par batate hain manzil hazar bar jahan se guzar chuka hun main 
kabhi ye zom ki tu mujh se chhup nahin sakta kabhi ye wahm ki KHud bhi chhupa hua hun main 
mujhe sune na koi mast-e-baada-e-ishrat 'majaz' TuTe hue dil ki ek sada hun main

kab merā nasheman ahl-e-chaman gulshan meñ gavārā karte haiñ ġhunche apnī āvāzoñ meñ bijlī ko pukārā karte haiñ 
ab naza.a kā aalam hai mujh par tum apnī mohabbat vāpas lo jab kashtī Dūbne lagtī hai to bojh utārā karte haiñ 
jaatī huī mayyat dekh ke bhī vallāh tum uTh ke aa na sake do chaar qadam to dushman bhī taklīf gavārā karte haiñ 
be-vajah na jaane kyuuñ zid hai un ko shab-e-furqat vāloñ se vo raat baḌhā dene ke liye gesū ko sañvārā karte haiñ 
poñchho na araq ruḳhsāroñ se rañgīnī-e-husn ko baḌhne do sunte haiñ ki shabnam ke qatre phūloñ ko nikhārā karte haiñ 
kuchh husn o ishq meñ farq nahīñ hai bhī to faqat rusvā.ī kā tum ho ki gavārā kar na sake ham haiñ ki gavārā karte haiñ 
tāroñ kī bahāroñ meñ bhī 'qamar' tum afsurda se rahte ho phūloñ ko to dekho kāñToñ meñ hañs hañs ke guzārā karte haiñ 
kab mera nasheman ahl-e-chaman gulshan mein gawara karte hain ghunche apni aawazon mein bijli ko pukara karte hain 
ab naza ka aalam hai mujh par tum apni mohabbat wapas lo jab kashti Dubne lagti hai to bojh utara karte hain 
jati hui mayyat dekh ke bhi wallah tum uTh ke aa na sake do chaar qadam to dushman bhi taklif gawara karte hain 
be-wajah na jaane kyun zid hai un ko shab-e-furqat walon se wo raat baDha dene ke liye gesu ko sanwara karte hain 
ponchho na araq ruKHsaron se rangini-e-husn ko baDhne do sunte hain ki shabnam ke qatre phulon ko nikhaara karte hain 
kuchh husn o ishq mein farq nahin hai bhi to faqat ruswai ka tum ho ki gawara kar na sake hum hain ki gawara karte hain 
taron ki bahaaron mein bhi 'qamar' tum afsurda se rahte ho phulon ko to dekho kanTon mein hans hans ke guzara karte hain

ab shauq se ki jaañ se guzar jaanā chāhiye bol ai havā-e-shahr kidhar jaanā chāhiye 
kab tak isī ko āḳhirī manzil kaheñge ham kū-e-murād se bhī udhar jaanā chāhiye 
vo vaqt aa gayā hai ki sāhil ko chhoḌ kar gahre samundaroñ meñ utar jaanā chāhiye 
ab raftagāñ kī baat nahīñ kārvāñ kī hai jis samt bhī ho gard-e-safar jaanā chāhiye 
kuchh to subūt-e-ḳhūn-e-tamannā kahīñ mile hai dil tahī to aañkh ko bhar jaanā chāhiye 
yā apnī ḳhvāhishoñ ko muqaddas na jānte yā ḳhvāhishoñ ke saath hī mar jaanā chāhiye 
ab shauq se ki jaan se guzar jaana chahiye bol ai hawa-e-shahr kidhar jaana chahiye 
kab tak isi ko aaKHiri manzil kahenge hum ku-e-murad se bhi udhar jaana chahiye 
wo waqt aa gaya hai ki sahil ko chhoD kar gahre samundaron mein utar jaana chahiye 
ab raftagan ki baat nahin karwan ki hai jis samt bhi ho gard-e-safar jaana chahiye 
kuchh to subut-e-KHun-e-tamanna kahin mile hai dil tahi to aankh ko bhar jaana chahiye 
ya apni KHwahishon ko muqaddas na jaante ya KHwahishon ke sath hi mar jaana chahiye

ittifāq apnī jagah ḳhush-qismatī apnī jagah ḳhud banātā hai jahāñ meñ aadmī apnī jagah 
kah to saktā huuñ magar majbūr kar saktā nahīñ iḳhtiyār apnī jagah hai bebasī apnī jagah 
kuchh na kuchh sachchā.ī hotī hai nihāñ har baat meñ kahne vaale Thiik kahte haiñ sabhī apnī jagah 
sirf us ke hoñT kāġhaz par banā detā huuñ maiñ ḳhud banā letī hai hoñToñ par hañsī apnī jagah 
dost kahtā huuñ tumheñ shā.er nahīñ kahtā 'shu.ūr' dostī apnī jagah hai shā.erī apnī jagah 
ittifaq apni jagah KHush-qismati apni jagah KHud banata hai jahan mein aadmi apni jagah 
kah to sakta hun magar majbur kar sakta nahin iKHtiyar apni jagah hai bebasi apni jagah 
kuchh na kuchh sachchai hoti hai nihan har baat mein kahne wale Thik kahte hain sabhi apni jagah 
sirf us ke honT kaghaz par bana deta hun main KHud bana leti hai honTon par hansi apni jagah 
dost kahta hun tumhein shaer nahin kahta 'shuur' dosti apni jagah hai shaeri apni jagah

patā ab tak nahīñ badlā hamārā vahī ghar hai vahī qissa hamārā 
vahī TuuTī huī kashtī hai apnī vahī Thahrā huā dariyā hamārā 
ye maqtal bhī hai aur kunj-e-amāñ bhī ye dil ye be-nishāñ kamra hamārā 
kisī jānib nahīñ khulte darīche kahīñ jaatā nahīñ rasta hamārā 
ham apnī dhuup meñ baiThe haiñ 'mushtāq' hamāre saath hai saayā hamārā 
pata ab tak nahin badla hamara wahi ghar hai wahi qissa hamara 
wahi TuTi hui kashti hai apni wahi Thahra hua dariya hamara 
ye maqtal bhi hai aur kunj-e-aman bhi ye dil ye be-nishan kamra hamara 
kisi jaanib nahin khulte dariche kahin jata nahin rasta hamara 
hum apni dhup mein baiThe hain 'mushtaq' hamare sath hai saya hamara

āshiq the shahr meñ jo purāne sharāb ke haiñ un ke dil meñ vasvase ab ehtisāb ke 
vo jo tumhāre haath se aa kar nikal gayā ham bhī qatīl haiñ usī ḳhāna-ḳharāb ke 
phūloñ kī sej par zarā ārām kyā kiyā us gul-badan pe naqsh uTh aa.e gulāb ke 
so.e to dil meñ ek jahāñ jāgne lagā jaage to apnī aañkh meñ jaale the ḳhvāb ke 
bas tishnagī kī aañkh se dekhā karo unheñ dariyā ravāñ-davāñ haiñ chamakte sarāb ke 
okāḌa itnī duur na hotā to ek din bhar laate saañs saañs meñ gul āftāb ke 
kis tarah jam.a kījiye ab apne aap ko kāġhaz bikhar rahe haiñ purānī kitāb ke 
aashiq the shahr mein jo purane sharab ke hain un ke dil mein waswase ab ehtisab ke 
wo jo tumhaare hath se aa kar nikal gaya hum bhi qatil hain usi KHana-KHarab ke 
phulon ki sej par zara aaram kya kiya us gul-badan pe naqsh uTh aae gulab ke 
soe to dil mein ek jahan jagne laga jage to apni aankh mein jale the KHwab ke 
bas tishnagi ki aankh se dekha karo unhen dariya rawan-dawan hain chamakte sarab ke 
okaDa itni dur na hota to ek din bhar late sans sans mein gul aaftab ke 
kis tarah jama kijiye ab apne aap ko kaghaz bikhar rahe hain purani kitab ke

mire ḳhudā mujhe itnā to mo'atabar kar de maiñ jis makān meñ rahtā huuñ us ko ghar kar de 
ye raushnī ke ta.āqub meñ bhāgtā huā din jo thak gayā hai to ab is ko muḳhtasar kar de 
maiñ zindagī kī duā māñgne lagā huuñ bahut jo ho sake to duāoñ ko be-asar kar de 
sitāra-e-saharī Dūbne ko aayā hai zarā koī mire sūraj ko bā-ḳhabar kar de 
qabīla-vār kamāneñ kaḌakne vaalī haiñ mire lahū kī gavāhī mujhe niDar kar de 
maiñ apne ḳhvāb se kaT kar jiyūñ to merā ḳhudā ujaaḌ de mirī miTTī ko dar-ba-dar kar de 
mirī zamīn mirā āḳhirī havāla hai so maiñ rahūñ na rahūñ is ko bārvar kar de 
mere KHuda mujhe itna to mo'atabar kar de main jis makan mein rahta hun us ko ghar kar de 
ye raushni ke taaqub mein bhagta hua din jo thak gaya hai to ab is ko muKHtasar kar de 
main zindagi ki dua mangne laga hun bahut jo ho sake to duaon ko be-asar kar de 
sitara-e-sahari Dubne ko aaya hai zara koi mere suraj ko ba-KHabar kar de 
qabila-war kamanen kaDakne wali hain mere lahu ki gawahi mujhe niDar kar de 
main apne KHwab se kaT kar jiyun to mera KHuda ujaD de meri miTTi ko dar-ba-dar kar de 
meri zamin mera aaKHiri hawala hai so main rahun na rahun is ko barwar kar de

ġham rahā jab tak ki dam meñ dam rahā dil ke jaane kā nihāyat ġham rahā 
husn thā terā bahut ālam-fareb ḳhat ke aane par bhī ik aalam rahā 
dil na pahuñchā gosha-e-dāmāñ talak qatra-e-ḳhūñ thā mizha par jam rahā 
sunte haiñ lailā ke ḳheme ko siyāh us meñ majnūñ kā magar mātam rahā 
jāma-e-ehrām-e-zāhid par na jā thā haram meñ lek nā-mahram rahā 
zulfeñ kholīñ to tū Tuk aayā nazar umr bhar yaañ kām-e-dil barham rahā 
us ke lab se talḳh ham sunte rahe apne haq meñ āb-e-haivāñ sam rahā 
mere rone kī haqīqat jis meñ thī ek muddat tak vo kāġhaz nam rahā 
sub.h-e-pīrī shaam hone aa.ī 'mīr' tū na chetā yaañ bahut din kam rahā 
gham raha jab tak ki dam mein dam raha dil ke jaane ka nihayat gham raha 
husn tha tera bahut aalam-fareb KHat ke aane par bhi ek aalam raha 
dil na pahuncha gosha-e-daman talak qatra-e-KHun tha mizha par jam raha 
sunte hain laila ke KHeme ko siyah us mein majnun ka magar matam raha 
jama-e-ehram-e-zahid par na ja tha haram mein lek na-mahram raha 
zulfen kholin to tu Tuk aaya nazar umr bhar yan kaam-e-dil barham raha 
us ke lab se talKH hum sunte rahe apne haq mein aab-e-haiwan sam raha 
mere rone ki haqiqat jis mein thi ek muddat tak wo kaghaz nam raha 
subh-e-piri sham hone aai 'mir' tu na cheta yan bahut din kam raha

vahshateñ baḌhtī ga.iiñ hijr ke āzār ke saath ab to ham baat bhī karte nahīñ ġham-ḳhvār ke saath 
ham ne ik umr basar kī hai ġham-e-yār ke saath 'mīr' do din na jiye hijr ke āzār ke saath 
ab to ham ghar se nikalte haiñ to rakh dete haiñ taaq par izzat-e-sādāt bhī dastār ke saath 
is qadar ḳhauf hai ab shahr kī galiyoñ meñ ki log chaap sunte haiñ to lag jaate haiñ dīvār ke saath 
ek to ḳhvāb liye phirte ho galiyoñ galiyoñ us pe takrār bhī karte ho ḳharīdār ke saath 
shahr kā shahr hī nāseh ho to kyā kījiyegā varna ham rind to bhiḌ jaate haiñ do-chār ke saath 
ham ko us shahr meñ ta.amīr kā saudā hai jahāñ log me.amār ko chun dete haiñ dīvār ke saath 
jo sharaf ham ko milā kūcha-e-jānāñ se 'farāz' sū-e-maqtal bhī ga.e haiñ usī pindār ke saath 
wahshaten baDhti gain hijr ke aazar ke sath ab to hum baat bhi karte nahin gham-KHwar ke sath 
hum ne ek umr basar ki hai gham-e-yar ke sath 'mir' do din na jiye hijr ke aazar ke sath 
ab to hum ghar se nikalte hain to rakh dete hain taq par izzat-e-sadat bhi dastar ke sath 
is qadar KHauf hai ab shahr ki galiyon mein ki log chap sunte hain to lag jate hain diwar ke sath 
ek to KHwab liye phirte ho galiyon galiyon us pe takrar bhi karte ho KHaridar ke sath 
shahr ka shahr hi naseh ho to kya kijiyega warna hum rind to bhiD jate hain do-chaar ke sath 
hum ko us shahr mein tamir ka sauda hai jahan log meamar ko chun dete hain diwar ke sath 
jo sharaf hum ko mila kucha-e-jaanan se 'faraaz' su-e-maqtal bhi gae hain usi pindar ke sath

charḳh se kuchh umiid thī hī nahīñ aarzū maiñ ne koī kī hī nahīñ 
maz.habī bahas maiñ ne kī hī nahīñ fāltū aql mujh meñ thī hī nahīñ 
chāhtā thā bahut sī bātoñ ko magar afsos ab vo jī hī nahīñ 
jur.at-e-arz-e-hāl kyā hotī nazar-e-lutf us ne kī hī nahīñ 
is musībat meñ dil se kyā kahtā koī aisī misāl thī hī nahīñ 
aap kyā jāneñ qadr-e-yā-allāh jab musībat koī paḌī hī nahīñ 
shirk chhoḌā to sab ne chhoḌ diyā merī koī society hī nahīñ 
pūchhā 'akbar' hai aadmī kaisā hañs ke bole vo aadmī hī nahīñ 
charKH se kuchh umid thi hi nahin aarzu main ne koi ki hi nahin 
mazhabi bahas main ne ki hi nahin faltu aql mujh mein thi hi nahin 
chahta tha bahut si baaton ko magar afsos ab wo ji hi nahin 
jurat-e-arz-e-haal kya hoti nazar-e-lutf us ne ki hi nahin 
is musibat mein dil se kya kahta koi aisi misal thi hi nahin 
aap kya jaanen qadr-e-ya-allah jab musibat koi paDi hi nahin 
shirk chhoDa to sab ne chhoD diya meri koi society hi nahin 
puchha 'akbar' hai aadmi kaisa hans ke bole wo aadmi hi nahin

tark-e-ta.alluqāt pe royā na tū na maiñ lekin ye kyā ki chain se soyā na tū na maiñ 
hālāt ke tilism ne pathrā diyā magar biite samoñ kī yaad meñ khoyā na tū na maiñ 
har chand iḳhtilāf ke pahlū hazār the vā kar sakā magar lab-e-goyā na tū na maiñ 
nauhe fasīl-e-zabt se ūñche na ho sake khul kar dayār-e-sañg meñ royā na tū na maiñ 
jab bhī nazar uThī to falak kī taraf uThī bar-gashta āsmān se goyā na tū na maiñ 
tark-e-talluqat pe roya na tu na main lekin ye kya ki chain se soya na tu na main 
haalat ke tilism ne pathra diya magar bite samon ki yaad mein khoya na tu na main 
har chand iKHtilaf ke pahlu hazar the wa kar saka magar lab-e-goya na tu na main 
nauhe fasil-e-zabt se unche na ho sake khul kar dayar-e-sang mein roya na tu na main 
jab bhi nazar uThi to falak ki taraf uThi bar-gashta aasman se goya na tu na main

badan meñ jaise lahū tāziyāna ho gayā hai use gale se lagā.e zamāna ho gayā hai 
chamak rahā hai ufuq tak ġhubār-e-tīra-shbī koī charāġh safar par ravāna ho gayā hai 
hameñ to ḳhair bikharnā hī thā kabhī na kabhī havā-e-tāza kā jhoñkā bahāna ho gayā hai 
ġharaz ki pūchhte kyā ho ma.āl-e-soḳhtagāñ tamām jalnā jalānā fasāna ho gayā hai 
fazā-e-shauq meñ us kī bisāt hī kyā thī parind apne paroñ kā nishāna ho gayā hai 
kisī ne dekhe haiñ patjhaḌ meñ phuul khilte hue dil apnī ḳhush-nazarī meñ divāna ho gayā hai 
badan mein jaise lahu taziyana ho gaya hai use gale se lagae zamana ho gaya hai 
chamak raha hai ufuq tak ghubar-e-tira-shbi koi charagh safar par rawana ho gaya hai 
hamein to KHair bikharna hi tha kabhi na kabhi hawa-e-taza ka jhonka bahana ho gaya hai 
gharaz ki puchhte kya ho maal-e-soKHtagan tamam jalna jalana fasana ho gaya hai 
faza-e-shauq mein us ki bisat hi kya thi parind apne paron ka nishana ho gaya hai 
kisi ne dekhe hain patjhaD mein phul khilte hue dil apni KHush-nazari mein diwana ho gaya hai

tamāshā-e-dair-o-haram dekhte haiñ tujhe har bahāne se ham dekhte haiñ 
hamārī taraf ab vo kam dekhte haiñ vo nazreñ nahīñ jin ko ham dekhte haiñ 
zamāne ke kyā kyā sitam dekhte haiñ hamīñ jānte haiñ jo ham dekhte haiñ 
phire but-kade se to ai ahl-e-ka.aba phir aa kar tumhāre qadam dekhte haiñ 
hameñ chashm-e-bīnā dikhātī hai sab kuchh vo andhe haiñ jo jām-e-jam dekhte haiñ 
na īmā-e-ḳhvāhish na iz.hār-e-matlab mire muñh ko ahl-e-karam dekhte haiñ 
kabhī toḌte haiñ vo ḳhanjar ko apne kabhī nabz-e-bismil meñ dam dekhte haiñ 
ġhanīmat hai chashm-e-taġhāful bhī un kī bahut dekhte haiñ jo kam dekhte haiñ 
ġharaz kyā ki samjheñ mire ḳhat kā mazmūñ vo unvān o tarz-e-raqam dekhte haiñ 
salāmat rahe dil burā hai ki achchhā hazāroñ meñ ye ek dam dekhte haiñ 
rahā kaun mahfil meñ ab aane vaalā vo chāroñ taraf dam-ba-dam dekhte haiñ 
udhar sharm haa.il idhar ḳhauf maane na vo dekhte haiñ na ham dekhte haiñ 
unheñ kyuuñ na ho dilrubā.ī se nafrat ki har dil meñ vo ġham alam dekhte haiñ 
nigahbāñ se bhī kyā huī bad-gumānī ab us ko tire saath kam dekhte haiñ 
hameñ 'dāġh' kyā kam hai ye sarfarāzī ki shāh-e-dakan ke qadam dekhte haiñ 
tamasha-e-dair-o-haram dekhte hain tujhe har bahane se hum dekhte hain 
hamari taraf ab wo kam dekhte hain wo nazren nahin jin ko hum dekhte hain 
zamane ke kya kya sitam dekhte hain hamin jaante hain jo hum dekhte hain 
phire but-kade se to ai ahl-e-kaba phir aa kar tumhaare qadam dekhte hain 
hamein chashm-e-bina dikhati hai sab kuchh wo andhe hain jo jam-e-jam dekhte hain 
na ima-e-KHwahish na izhaar-e-matlab mere munh ko ahl-e-karam dekhte hain 
kabhi toDte hain wo KHanjar ko apne kabhi nabz-e-bismil mein dam dekhte hain 
ghanimat hai chashm-e-taghaful bhi un ki bahut dekhte hain jo kam dekhte hain 
gharaz kya ki samjhen mere KHat ka mazmun wo unwan o tarz-e-raqam dekhte hain 
salamat rahe dil bura hai ki achchha hazaron mein ye ek dam dekhte hain 
raha kaun mahfil mein ab aane wala wo chaaron taraf dam-ba-dam dekhte hain 
udhar sharm hail idhar KHauf mane na wo dekhte hain na hum dekhte hain 
unhen kyun na ho dilrubai se nafrat ki har dil mein wo gham alam dekhte hain 
nigahban se bhi kya hui bad-gumani ab us ko tere sath kam dekhte hain 
hamein 'dagh' kya kam hai ye sarfaraazi ki shah-e-dakan ke qadam dekhte hain

aaj yuuñ mauj-dar-mauj ġham tham gayā is tarah ġham-zadoñ ko qarār aa gayā jaise ḳhush-bū-e-zulf-e-bahār aa ga.ī jaise paiġhām-e-dīdār-e-yār aa gayā 
jis kī dīd-o-talab vahm samjhe the ham rū-ba-rū phir sar-e-rahguzār aa gayā sub.h-e-fardā ko phir dil tarasne lagā umr-e-rafta tirā e'tibār aa gayā 
rut badalne lagī rañg-e-dil dekhnā rañg-e-gulshan se ab haal khultā nahīñ zaḳhm chhalkā koī yā koī gul khilā ashk umDe ki abr-e-bahār aa gayā 
ḳhūn-e-ushshāq se jaam bharne lage dil sulagne lage daaġh jalne lage mahfil-e-dard phir rañg par aa ga.ī phir shab-e-ārzū par nikhār aa gayā 
sarfaroshī ke andāz badle ga.e dāvat-e-qatl par maqtal-e-shahr meñ Daal kar koī gardan meñ tauq aa gayā laad kar koī kāñdhe pe daar aa gayā 
'faiz' kyā jāniye yaar kis aas par muntazir haiñ ki lā.egā koī ḳhabar mai-kashoñ par huā mohtasib mehrbāñ dil-figāroñ pe qātil ko pyaar aa gayā 
aaj yun mauj-dar-mauj gham tham gaya is tarah gham-zadon ko qarar aa gaya jaise KHush-bu-e-zulf-e-bahaar aa gai jaise paigham-e-didar-e-yar aa gaya 
jis ki did-o-talab wahm samjhe the hum ru-ba-ru phir sar-e-rahguzar aa gaya subh-e-farda ko phir dil tarasne laga umr-e-rafta tera e'tibar aa gaya 
rut badalne lagi rang-e-dil dekhna rang-e-gulshan se ab haal khulta nahin zaKHm chhalka koi ya koi gul khila ashk umDe ki abr-e-bahaar aa gaya 
KHun-e-ushshaq se jam bharne lage dil sulagne lage dagh jalne lage mahfil-e-dard phir rang par aa gai phir shab-e-arzu par nikhaar aa gaya 
sarfaroshi ke andaz badle gae dawat-e-qatl par maqtal-e-shahr mein Dal kar koi gardan mein tauq aa gaya lad kar koi kandhe pe dar aa gaya 
'faiz' kya jaaniye yar kis aas par muntazir hain ki laega koi KHabar mai-kashon par hua mohtasib mehrban dil-figaron pe qatil ko pyar aa gaya

ḳhair auroñ ne bhī chāhā to hai tujh sā honā ye alag baat ki mumkin nahīñ aisā honā 
dekhtā aur na Thahartā to koī baat bhī thī jis ne dekhā hī nahīñ us se ḳhafā kyā honā 
tujh se duurī meñ bhī ḳhush rahtā huuñ pahle kī tarah bas kisī vaqt burā lagtā hai tanhā honā 
yuuñ merī yaad meñ mahfūz haiñ tere ḳhad-o-ḳhāl jis tarah dil meñ kisī shai kī tamannā honā 
zindagī marka-e-rūh-o-badan hai 'mushtāq' ishq ke saath zarūrī hai havas kā honā 
KHair auron ne bhi chaha to hai tujh sa hona ye alag baat ki mumkin nahin aisa hona 
dekhta aur na Thaharta to koi baat bhi thi jis ne dekha hi nahin us se KHafa kya hona 
tujh se duri mein bhi KHush rahta hun pahle ki tarah bas kisi waqt bura lagta hai tanha hona 
yun meri yaad mein mahfuz hain tere KHad-o-KHal jis tarah dil mein kisi shai ki tamanna hona 
zindagi marka-e-ruh-o-badan hai 'mushtaq' ishq ke sath zaruri hai hawas ka hona

ghar kā rasta bhī milā thā shāyad raah meñ sañg-e-vafā thā shāyad 
is qadar tez havā ke jhoñke shāḳh par phuul khilā thā shāyad 
jis kī bātoñ ke fasāne likkhe us ne to kuchh na kahā thā shāyad 
log be-mehr na hote hoñge vahm sā dil ko huā thā shāyad 
tujh ko bhūle to duā tak bhūle aur vahī vaqt-e-duā thā shāyad 
ḳhūn-e-dil meñ to Duboyā thā qalam aur phir kuchh na likhā thā shāyad 
dil kā jo rañg hai ye rañg 'adā' pahle āñkhoñ meñ rachā thā shāyad 
ghar ka rasta bhi mila tha shayad rah mein sang-e-wafa tha shayad 
is qadar tez hawa ke jhonke shaKH par phul khila tha shayad 
jis ki baaton ke fasane likkhe us ne to kuchh na kaha tha shayad 
log be-mehr na hote honge wahm sa dil ko hua tha shayad 
tujh ko bhule to dua tak bhule aur wahi waqt-e-dua tha shayad 
KHun-e-dil mein to Duboya tha qalam aur phir kuchh na likha tha shayad 
dil ka jo rang hai ye rang 'ada' pahle aankhon mein racha tha shayad

hañs ke farmāte haiñ vo dekh ke hālat merī kyuuñ tum āsān samajhte the mohabbat merī 
ba.ad marne ke bhī chhoḌī na rifāqat merī merī turbat se lagī baiThī hai hasrat merī 
maiñ ne āġhosh-e-tasavvur meñ bhī kheñchā to kahā pis ga.ī pis ga.ī bedard nazākat merī 
ā.īna sub.h-e-shab-e-vasl jo dekhā to kahā dekh zālim ye thī shaam ko sūrat merī 
yaar pahlū meñ hai tanhā.ī hai kah do nikle aaj kyuuñ dil meñ chhupī baiThī hai hasrat merī 
husn aur ishq ham-āġhosh nazar aa jaate terī tasvīr meñ khiñch jaatī jo hairat merī 
kis DhiTā.ī se vo dil chhīn ke kahte haiñ 'amīr' vo mirā ghar hai rahe jis meñ mohabbat merī 
hans ke farmate hain wo dekh ke haalat meri kyun tum aasan samajhte the mohabbat meri 
baad marne ke bhi chhoDi na rifaqat meri meri turbat se lagi baiThi hai hasrat meri 
main ne aaghosh-e-tasawwur mein bhi khencha to kaha pis gai pis gai bedard nazakat meri 
aaina subh-e-shab-e-wasl jo dekha to kaha dekh zalim ye thi sham ko surat meri 
yar pahlu mein hai tanhai hai kah do nikle aaj kyun dil mein chhupi baiThi hai hasrat meri 
husn aur ishq ham-aghosh nazar aa jate teri taswir mein khinch jati jo hairat meri 
kis DhiTai se wo dil chhin ke kahte hain 'amir' wo mera ghar hai rahe jis mein mohabbat meri

ajab junūn-e-masāfat meñ ghar se niklā thā ḳhabar nahīñ hai ki sūraj kidhar se niklā thā 
ye kaun phir se unhīñ rāstoñ meñ chhoḌ gayā abhī abhī to azāb-e-safar se niklā thā 
ye tiir dil meñ magar be-sabab nahīñ utrā koī to harf lab-e-chāragar se niklā thā 
ye ab jo aag banā shahr shahr phailā hai yahī dhuāñ mire dīvār-o-dar se niklā thā 
maiñ raat TuuT ke royā to chain se soyā ki dil kā zahr mirī chashm-e-tar se niklā thā 
ye ab jo sar haiñ ḳhamīda kulāh kī ḳhātir ye aib bhī to ham ahl-e-hunar se niklā thā 
vo qais ab jise majnūñ pukārte haiñ 'farāz' tirī tarah koī dīvāna ghar se niklā thā 
ajab junun-e-masafat mein ghar se nikla tha KHabar nahin hai ki suraj kidhar se nikla tha 
ye kaun phir se unhin raston mein chhoD gaya abhi abhi to azab-e-safar se nikla tha 
ye tir dil mein magar be-sabab nahin utra koi to harf lab-e-chaaragar se nikla tha 
ye ab jo aag bana shahr shahr phaila hai yahi dhuan mere diwar-o-dar se nikla tha 
main raat TuT ke roya to chain se soya ki dil ka zahr meri chashm-e-tar se nikla tha 
ye ab jo sar hain KHamida kulah ki KHatir ye aib bhi to hum ahl-e-hunar se nikla tha 
wo qais ab jise majnun pukarte hain 'faraaz' teri tarah koi diwana ghar se nikla tha

jab se bulbul tū ne do tinke liye TūTtī haiñ bijliyāñ in ke liye 
hai javānī ḳhud javānī kā siñgār sādgī gahna hai is sin ke liye 
kaun vīrāne meñ dekhegā bahār phuul jañgal meñ khile kin ke liye 
saarī duniyā ke haiñ vo mere sivā maiñ ne duniyā chhoḌ dī jin ke liye 
bāġhbāñ kaliyāñ hoñ halke rañg kī bhejnī hai ek kam-sin ke liye 
sab hasīñ haiñ zāhidoñ ko nā-pasand ab koī huur aa.egī in ke liye 
vasl kā din aur itnā muḳhtasar din gine jaate the is din ke liye 
sub.h kā sonā jo haath aatā 'amīr' bhejte tohfa mo.azzin ke liye 
jab se bulbul tu ne do tinke liye TuTti hain bijliyan in ke liye 
hai jawani KHud jawani ka singar sadgi gahna hai is sin ke liye 
kaun virane mein dekhega bahaar phul jangal mein khile kin ke liye 
sari duniya ke hain wo mere siwa main ne duniya chhoD di jin ke liye 
baghban kaliyan hon halke rang ki bhejni hai ek kam-sin ke liye 
sab hasin hain zahidon ko na-pasand ab koi hur aaegi in ke liye 
wasl ka din aur itna muKHtasar din gine jate the is din ke liye 
subh ka sona jo hath aata 'amir' bhejte tohfa moazzin ke liye

kisī kī yaad meñ palkeñ zarā bhigo lete udaas raat kī tanhā.iyoñ meñ ro lete 
dukhoñ kā bojh akele nahīñ sañbhaltā hai kahīñ vo miltā to us se lipaT ke ro lete 
agar safar meñ hamārā bhī ham-safar hotā baḌī ḳhushī se unhī pattharoñ pe so lete 
tumhārī raah meñ shāḳhoñ pe phuul suukh ga.e kabhī havā kī tarah is taraf bhī ho lete 
ye kyā ki roz vahī chāñdnī kā bistar ho kabhī to dhuup kī chādar bichhā ke so lete 
kisi ki yaad mein palken zara bhigo lete udas raat ki tanhaiyon mein ro lete 
dukhon ka bojh akele nahin sanbhalta hai kahin wo milta to us se lipaT ke ro lete 
agar safar mein hamara bhi ham-safar hota baDi KHushi se unhi pattharon pe so lete 
tumhaari rah mein shaKHon pe phul sukh gae kabhi hawa ki tarah is taraf bhi ho lete 
ye kya ki roz wahi chandni ka bistar ho kabhi to dhup ki chadar bichha ke so lete

ai vasl kuchh yahāñ na huā kuchh nahīñ huā us jism kī maiñ jaañ na huā kuchh nahīñ huā 
tū aaj mere ghar meñ jo mehmāñ hai iid hai tū ghar kā mezbāñ na huā kuchh nahīñ huā 
kholī to hai zabān magar is kī kyā bisāt maiñ zahr kī dukāñ na huā kuchh nahīñ huā 
kyā ek kārobār thā vo rabt-e-jism-o-jāñ koī bhī rā.egāñ na huā kuchh nahīñ huā 
kitnā jalā huā huuñ bas ab kyā batā.ūñ maiñ aalam dhuāñ dhuāñ na huā kuchh nahīñ huā 
dekhā thā jab ki pahle-pahal us ne ā.īna us vaqt maiñ vahāñ na huā kuchh nahīñ huā 
vo ik jamāl jalvā-fishāñ hai zamīñ zamīñ maiñ tā-ba-āsmāñ na huā kuchh nahīñ huā 
maiñ ne bas ik nigāh meñ tai kar liyā tujhe tū rañg-e-bekarāñ na huā kuchh nahīñ huā 
gum ho ke jaan tū mirī āġhosh-e-zāt meñ be-nām-o-be-nishāñ na huā kuchh nahīñ huā 
har koī darmiyān hai ai mājrā-farosh maiñ apne darmiyāñ na huā kuchh nahīñ huā 
ai wasl kuchh yahan na hua kuchh nahin hua us jism ki main jaan na hua kuchh nahin hua
