tu aaj mere ghar mein jo mehman hai id hai tu ghar ka mezban na hua kuchh nahin hua 
kholi to hai zaban magar is ki kya bisat main zahr ki dukan na hua kuchh nahin hua 
kya ek karobar tha wo rabt-e-jism-o-jaan koi bhi raegan na hua kuchh nahin hua 
kitna jala hua hun bas ab kya bataun main aalam dhuan dhuan na hua kuchh nahin hua 
dekha tha jab ki pahle-pahal us ne aaina us waqt main wahan na hua kuchh nahin hua 
wo ek jamal jalwa-fishan hai zamin zamin main ta-ba-asman na hua kuchh nahin hua 
main ne bas ek nigah mein tai kar liya tujhe tu rang-e-bekaran na hua kuchh nahin hua 
gum ho ke jaan tu meri aaghosh-e-zat mein be-nam-o-be-nishan na hua kuchh nahin hua 
har koi darmiyan hai ai majra-farosh main apne darmiyan na hua kuchh nahin hua

agar kaj-rau haiñ anjum āsmāñ terā hai yā merā mujhe fikr-e-jahāñ kyuuñ ho jahāñ terā hai yā merā 
agar hañgāma-hā-e-shauq se hai lā-makāñ ḳhālī ḳhatā kis kī hai yā rab lā-makāñ terā hai yā merā 
use sub.h-e-azal inkār kī jur.at huī kyūñkar mujhe mālūm kyā vo rāz-dāñ terā hai yā merā 
mohammad bhī tirā jibrīl bhī qur.ān bhī terā magar ye harf-e-shīrīñ tarjumāñ terā hai yā merā 
isī kaukab kī tābānī se hai terā jahāñ raushan zavāl-e-ādam-e-ḳhākī ziyāñ terā hai yā merā 
agar kaj-rau hain anjum aasman tera hai ya mera mujhe fikr-e-jahan kyun ho jahan tera hai ya mera 
agar hangama-ha-e-shauq se hai la-makan KHali KHata kis ki hai ya rab la-makan tera hai ya mera 
use subh-e-azal inkar ki jurat hui kyunkar mujhe malum kya wo raaz-dan tera hai ya mera 
mohammad bhi tera jibril bhi quran bhi tera magar ye harf-e-shirin tarjuman tera hai ya mera 
isi kaukab ki tabani se hai tera jahan raushan zawal-e-adam-e-KHaki ziyan tera hai ya mera

bas ek baar kisī ne gale lagāyā thā phir us ke ba.ad na maiñ thā na merā saayā thā 
galī meñ log bhī the mere us ke dushman log vo sab pe hañstā huā mere dil meñ aayā thā 
us ek dasht meñ sau shahr ho ga.e ābād jahāñ kisī ne kabhī kārvāñ luTāyā thā 
vo mujh se apnā patā pūchhne ko aa nikle ki jin se maiñ ne ḳhud apnā surāġh paayā thā 
mire vajūd se gulzār ho ke niklī hai vo aag jis ne tirā pairahan jalāyā thā 
mujhī ko tāna-e-ġhārat-garī na de pyāre ye naqsh maiñ ne tire haath se miTāyā thā 
usī ne ruup badal kar jagā diyā āḳhir jo zahr mujh pe kabhī niiñd ban ke chhāyā thā 
'zafar' kī ḳhaak meñ hai kis kī hasrat-e-tāmīr ḳhayāl-o-ḳhvāb meñ kis ne ye ghar banāyā thā 
bas ek bar kisi ne gale lagaya tha phir us ke baad na main tha na mera saya tha 
gali mein log bhi the mere us ke dushman log wo sab pe hansta hua mere dil mein aaya tha 
us ek dasht mein sau shahr ho gae aabaad jahan kisi ne kabhi karwan luTaya tha 
wo mujh se apna pata puchhne ko aa nikle ki jin se main ne KHud apna suragh paya tha 
mere wajud se gulzar ho ke nikli hai wo aag jis ne tera pairahan jalaya tha 
mujhi ko tana-e-ghaarat-gari na de pyare ye naqsh main ne tere hath se miTaya tha 
usi ne rup badal kar jaga diya aaKHir jo zahr mujh pe kabhi nind ban ke chhaya tha 
'zafar' ki KHak mein hai kis ki hasrat-e-tamir KHayal-o-KHwab mein kis ne ye ghar banaya tha

nigāh-e-yār jise āshnā-e-rāz kare vo apnī ḳhūbi-e-qismat pe kyuuñ na naaz kare 
diloñ ko fikr-e-do-ālam se kar diyā āzād tire junūñ kā ḳhudā silsila darāz kare 
ḳhirad kā naam junūñ paḌ gayā junūñ kā ḳhirad jo chāhe aap kā husn-e-karishma-sāz kare 
tire sitam se maiñ ḳhush huuñ ki ġhāliban yuuñ bhī mujhe vo shāmil-e-arbāb-e-imtiyāz kare 
ġham-e-jahāñ se jise ho farāġh kī ḳhvāhish vo un ke dard-e-mohabbat se sāz-bāz kare 
ummīd-vār haiñ har samt āshiqoñ ke giroh tirī nigāh ko allāh dil-navāz kare 
tire karam kā sazā-vār to nahīñ 'hasrat' ab aage terī ḳhushī hai jo sarfarāz kare 
nigah-e-yar jise aashna-e-raaz kare wo apni KHubi-e-qismat pe kyun na naz kare 
dilon ko fikr-e-do-alam se kar diya aazad tere junun ka KHuda silsila daraaz kare 
KHirad ka nam junun paD gaya junun ka KHirad jo chahe aap ka husn-e-karishma-saz kare 
tere sitam se main KHush hun ki ghaaliban yun bhi mujhe wo shamil-e-arbab-e-imtiyaz kare 
gham-e-jahan se jise ho faragh ki KHwahish wo un ke dard-e-mohabbat se saz-baz kare 
ummid-war hain har samt aashiqon ke giroh teri nigah ko allah dil-nawaz kare 
tere karam ka saza-war to nahin 'hasrat' ab aage teri KHushi hai jo sarfaraaz kare

ḳhirad ke paas ḳhabar ke sivā kuchh aur nahīñ tirā ilaaj nazar ke sivā kuchh aur nahīñ 
har ik maqām se aage maqām hai terā hayāt zauq-e-safar ke sivā kuchh aur nahīñ 
girāñ-bahā hai to hifz-e-ḳhudī se hai varna guhar meñ āb-e-guhar ke sivā kuchh aur nahīñ 
ragoñ meñ gardish-e-ḳhūñ hai agar to kyā hāsil hayāt soz-e-jigar ke sivā kuchh aur nahīñ 
urūs-e-lāla munāsib nahīñ hai mujh se hijāb ki maiñ nasīm-e-sahar ke sivā kuchh aur nahīñ 
jise kasād samajhte haiñ tājirān-e-farañg vo shai mata-e-hunar ke sivā kuchh aur nahīñ 
baḌā karīm hai 'iqbāl'-e-be-navā lekin atā-e-shola sharar ke sivā kuchh aur nahīñ 
KHirad ke pas KHabar ke siwa kuchh aur nahin tera ilaj nazar ke siwa kuchh aur nahin 
har ek maqam se aage maqam hai tera hayat zauq-e-safar ke siwa kuchh aur nahin 
giran-baha hai to hifz-e-KHudi se hai warna guhar mein aab-e-guhar ke siwa kuchh aur nahin 
ragon mein gardish-e-KHun hai agar to kya hasil hayat soz-e-jigar ke siwa kuchh aur nahin 
urus-e-lala munasib nahin hai mujh se hijab ki main nasim-e-sahar ke siwa kuchh aur nahin 
jise kasad samajhte hain tajiran-e-farang wo shai mata-e-hunar ke siwa kuchh aur nahin 
baDa karim hai 'iqbaal'-e-be-nawa lekin ata-e-shola sharar ke siwa kuchh aur nahin

havā.eñ tez thiiñ ye to faqat bahāne the safīne yuuñ bhī kināre pe kab lagāne the 
ḳhayāl aatā hai rah rah ke lauT jaane kā safar se pahle hameñ apne ghar jalāne the 
gumān thā ki samajh leñge mausamoñ kā mizāj khulī jo aañkh to zad pe sabhī Thikāne the 
hameñ bhī aaj hī karnā thā intizār us kā use bhī aaj hī sab vaade bhuul jaane the 
talāsh jin ko hamesha buzurg karte rahe na jaane kaun sī duniyā meñ vo ḳhazāne the 
chalan thā sab ke ġhamoñ meñ sharīk rahne kā ajiib din the ajab sar-phire zamāne the 
hawaen tez thin ye to faqat bahane the safine yun bhi kinare pe kab lagane the 
KHayal aata hai rah rah ke lauT jaane ka safar se pahle hamein apne ghar jalane the 
guman tha ki samajh lenge mausamon ka mizaj khuli jo aankh to zad pe sabhi Thikane the 
hamein bhi aaj hi karna tha intizar us ka use bhi aaj hi sab wade bhul jaane the 
talash jin ko hamesha buzurg karte rahe na jaane kaun si duniya mein wo KHazane the 
chalan tha sab ke ghamon mein sharik rahne ka ajib din the ajab sar-phire zamane the

koī had nahīñ hai kamāl kī koī had nahīñ hai jamāl kī 
vahī qurb o duur kī manzileñ vahī shaam ḳhvāb-o-ḳhayāl kī 
na mujhe hī us kā pata koī na use ḳhabar mire haal kī 
ye javāb merī sadā kā hai ki sadā hai us ke savāl kī 
ye namāz-e-asr kā vaqt hai ye ghaḌī hai din ke zavāl kī 
vo qayāmateñ jo guzar ga.iiñ thiiñ amānateñ ka.ī saal kī 
hai 'munīr' terī nigāh meñ koī baat gahre malāl kī 
koi had nahin hai kamal ki koi had nahin hai jamal ki 
wahi qurb o dur ki manzilen wahi sham KHwab-o-KHayal ki 
na mujhe hi us ka pata koi na use KHabar mere haal ki 
ye jawab meri sada ka hai ki sada hai us ke sawal ki 
ye namaz-e-asr ka waqt hai ye ghaDi hai din ke zawal ki 
wo qayamaten jo guzar gain thin amanaten kai sal ki 
hai 'munir' teri nigah mein koi baat gahre malal ki

badan par na.ī fasl aane lagī havā dil meñ ḳhvāhish jagāne lagī 
koī ḳhud-kushī kī taraf chal diyā udāsī kī mehnat Thikāne lagī 
jo chup-chāp rahtī thī dīvār par vo tasvīr bāteñ banāne lagī 
ḳhayāloñ ke tārīk khañDarāt meñ ḳhamoshī ġhazal gungunāne lagī 
zarā der baiThe the tanhā.ī meñ tirī yaad āñkheñ dukhāne lagī 
badan par nai fasl aane lagi hawa dil mein KHwahish jagane lagi 
koi KHud-kushi ki taraf chal diya udasi ki mehnat Thikane lagi 
jo chup-chap rahti thi diwar par wo taswir baaten banane lagi 
KHayalon ke tarik khanDaraat mein KHamoshi ghazal gungunane lagi 
zara der baiThe the tanhai mein teri yaad aankhen dukhane lagi

azaab ye bhī kisī aur par nahīñ aayā ki ek umr chale aur ghar nahīñ aayā 
us ek ḳhvāb kī hasrat meñ jal bujhīñ āñkheñ vo ek ḳhvāb ki ab tak nazar nahīñ aayā 
kareñ to kis se kareñ nā-rasā.iyoñ kā gila safar tamām huā ham-safar nahīñ aayā 
diloñ kī baat badan kī zabāñ se kah dete ye chāhte the magar dil idhar nahīñ aayā 
ajiib hī thā mire daur-e-gumrahī kā rafīq bichhaḌ gayā to kabhī lauT kar nahīñ aayā 
harīm-e-lafz-o-ma.ānī se nisbateñ bhī rahīñ magar salīqa-e-arz-e-hunar nahīñ aayā 
azab ye bhi kisi aur par nahin aaya ki ek umr chale aur ghar nahin aaya 
us ek KHwab ki hasrat mein jal bujhin aankhen wo ek KHwab ki ab tak nazar nahin aaya 
karen to kis se karen na-rasaiyon ka gila safar tamam hua ham-safar nahin aaya 
dilon ki baat badan ki zaban se kah dete ye chahte the magar dil idhar nahin aaya 
ajib hi tha mere daur-e-gumrahi ka rafiq bichhaD gaya to kabhi lauT kar nahin aaya 
harim-e-lafz-o-maani se nisbaten bhi rahin magar saliqa-e-arz-e-hunar nahin aaya

sun to sahī jahāñ meñ hai terā fasāna kyā kahtī hai tujh ko ḳhalq-e-ḳhudā ġhā.ebāna kyā 
kyā kyā ulajhtā hai tirī zulfoñ ke taar se baḳhiya-talab hai sīna-e-sad-chāk shāna kyā 
zer-e-zamīñ se aatā hai jo gul so zar-ba-kaf qārūñ ne rāste meñ luTāyā ḳhazāna kyā 
uḌtā hai shauq-e-rāhat-e-manzil se asp-e-umr mahmez kahte haiñge kise tāziyāna kyā 
ziina sabā kā DhūñDtī hai apnī musht-e-ḳhāk bām-e-buland yaar kā hai āstāna kyā 
chāroñ taraf se sūrat-e-jānāñ ho jalva-gar dil saaf ho tirā to hai ā.īna-ḳhāna kyā 
sayyād asīr-e-dām-e-rag-e-gul hai andalīb dikhlā rahā hai chhup ke use dām-o-dāna kyā 
tabl-o-alam hī paas hai apne na mulk o maal ham se ḳhilāf ho ke karegā zamāna kyā 
aatī hai kis tarah se mire qabz-e-rūh ko dekhūñ to maut DhūñD rahī hai bahāna kyā 
hotā hai zard sun ke jo nāmard mudda.ī rustam kī dāstāñ hai hamārā fasāna kyā 
tirchhī nigah se tā.ir-e-dil ho chukā shikār jab tiir kaj paḌe to uḌegā nishāna kyā

vahī shahr hai vahī rāste vahī ghar hai aur vahī lawn bhī magar is darīche se pūchhnā vo daraḳht anaar kā kyā huā 
mire saath jugnū hai ham-safar magar is sharar kī bisāt kyā ye charāġh koī charāġh hai na jalā huā na bujhā huā

wahi shahr hai wahi raste wahi ghar hai aur wahi lawn bhi magar is dariche se puchhna wo daraKHt anar ka kya hua 
mere sath jugnu hai ham-safar magar is sharar ki bisat kya ye charagh koi charagh hai na jala hua na bujha hua

kaam ab koī na aa.egā bas ik dil ke sivā rāste band haiñ sab kūcha-e-qātil ke sivā 
bā.is-e-rashk hai tanhā-ravī-e-rah-rav-e-shauq ham-safar koī nahīñ dūrī-e-manzil ke sivā

jaane kahāñ gayā hai vo vo jo abhī yahāñ thā vo jo abhī yahāñ thā vo kaun thā kahāñ thā 
tā-lamha-e-guzishtā ye jism aur saa.e zinda the rā.egāñ meñ jo kuchh thā rā.egāñ thā 
ab jis kī diid kā hai saudā hamāre sar meñ vo apnī hī nazar meñ apnā hī ik samāñ thā 
kyā kyā na ḳhuun thūkā maiñ us galī meñ yaaro sach jānñā vahāñ to jo fan thā rā.egāñ thā 
ye vaar kar gayā hai pahlū se kaun mujh par thā maiñ hī daa.eñ baa.eñ aur maiñ hī darmiyāñ thā 
us shahr kī hifāzat karnī thī ham ko jis meñ āñdhī kī thiiñ fasīleñ aur gard kā makāñ thā 
thī ik ajab fazā sī imkān-e-ḳhāl-o-ḳhad kī thā ik ajab musavvir aur vo mirā gumāñ thā 
umreñ guzar ga.ī thiiñ ham ko yaqīñ se bichhḌe aur lamha ik gumāñ kā sadiyoñ meñ be-amāñ thā 
jab Dūbtā chalā maiñ tārīkiyoñ kī tah meñ tah meñ thā ik darīcha aur us meñ āsmāñ thā 
jaane kahan gaya hai wo wo jo abhi yahan tha wo jo abhi yahan tha wo kaun tha kahan tha 
ta-lamha-e-guzishta ye jism aur sae zinda the raegan mein jo kuchh tha raegan tha 
ab jis ki did ka hai sauda hamare sar mein wo apni hi nazar mein apna hi ek saman tha 
kya kya na KHun thuka main us gali mein yaro sach jaanna wahan to jo fan tha raegan tha 
ye war kar gaya hai pahlu se kaun mujh par tha main hi daen baen aur main hi darmiyan tha 
us shahr ki hifazat karni thi hum ko jis mein aandhi ki thin fasilen aur gard ka makan tha 
thi ek ajab faza si imkan-e-KHal-o-KHad ki tha ek ajab musawwir aur wo mera guman tha 
umren guzar gai thin hum ko yaqin se bichhDe aur lamha ek guman ka sadiyon mein be-aman tha 
jab Dubta chala main tarikiyon ki tah mein tah mein tha ek daricha aur us mein aasman tha

andāz hū-ba-hū tirī āvāz-e-pā kā thā dekhā nikal ke ghar se to jhoñkā havā kā thā 
is husn-e-ittifāq pe luT kar bhī shaad huuñ terī razā jo thī vo taqāzā vafā kā thā 
dil raakh ho chukā to chamak aur baḌh ga.ī ye terī yaad thī ki amal kīmiyā kā thā 
is rishta-e-latīf ke asrār kyā khuleñ tū sāmne thā aur tasavvur ḳhudā kā thā 
chhup chhup ke ro.uuñ aur sar-e-anjuman hañsūñ mujh ko ye mashvara mire dard-āshnā kā thā 
uTThā ajab tazād se insān kā ḳhamīr aadī fanā kā thā to pujārī baqā kā thā 
TuuTā to kitne ā.ina-ḳhānoñ pe zad paḌī aTkā huā gale meñ jo patthar sadā kā thā 
hairān huuñ ki vaar se kaise bachā 'nadīm' vo shaḳhs to ġharīb o ġhayūr intihā kā thā 
andaz hu-ba-hu teri aawaz-e-pa ka tha dekha nikal ke ghar se to jhonka hawa ka tha 
is husn-e-ittifaq pe luT kar bhi shad hun teri raza jo thi wo taqaza wafa ka tha 
dil rakh ho chuka to chamak aur baDh gai ye teri yaad thi ki amal kimiya ka tha 
is rishta-e-latif ke asrar kya khulen tu samne tha aur tasawwur KHuda ka tha 
chhup chhup ke roun aur sar-e-anjuman hansun mujh ko ye mashwara mere dard-ashna ka tha 
uTTha ajab tazad se insan ka KHamir aadi fana ka tha to pujari baqa ka tha 
TuTa to kitne aaina-KHanon pe zad paDi aTka hua gale mein jo patthar sada ka tha 
hairan hun ki war se kaise bacha 'nadim' wo shaKHs to gharib o ghayur intiha ka tha

band bāhar se mirī zaat kā dar hai mujh meñ maiñ nahīñ ḳhud meñ ye ik aam ḳhabar hai mujh meñ 
ik ajab āmad-o-shud hai ki na maazī hai na haal 'jaun' barpā ka.ī nasloñ kā safar hai mujh meñ 
hai mirī umr jo hairān tamāshā.ī hai aur ik lamha hai jo zer-o-zabar hai mujh meñ 
kyā tarastā huuñ ki bāhar ke kisī kaam aa.e vo ik amboh ki bas ḳhāk-basar hai mujh meñ 
Dūbne vāloñ ke dariyā mujhe pāyāb mile us meñ ab Duub rahā huuñ jo bhañvar hai mujh meñ 
dar-o-dīvār to bāhar ke haiñ Dhāne vaale chāhe rahtā nahīñ maiñ par mirā ghar hai mujh meñ 
maiñ jo paikār meñ andar kī huuñ be-teġh-o-zirah āḳhirash kaun hai jo sīna-sipar hai mujh meñ 
ma.arka garm hai be-taur sā koī har-dam na koī teġh salāmat na sipar hai mujh meñ 
zaḳhm-hā-zaḳhm huuñ aur koī nahīñ ḳhuuñ kā nishāñ kaun hai vo jo mire ḳhuun meñ tar hai mujh meñ 
band bahar se meri zat ka dar hai mujh mein main nahin KHud mein ye ek aam KHabar hai mujh mein 
ek ajab aamad-o-shud hai ki na mazi hai na haal 'jaun' barpa kai naslon ka safar hai mujh mein 
hai meri umr jo hairan tamashai hai aur ek lamha hai jo zer-o-zabar hai mujh mein 
kya tarasta hun ki bahar ke kisi kaam aae wo ek amboh ki bas KHak-basar hai mujh mein 
Dubne walon ke dariya mujhe payab mile us mein ab Dub raha hun jo bhanwar hai mujh mein 
dar-o-diwar to bahar ke hain Dhane wale chahe rahta nahin main par mera ghar hai mujh mein 
main jo paikar mein andar ki hun be-tegh-o-zirah aaKHirash kaun hai jo sina-sipar hai mujh mein 
marka garm hai be-taur sa koi har-dam na koi tegh salamat na sipar hai mujh mein 
zaKHm-ha-zaKHm hun aur koi nahin KHun ka nishan kaun hai wo jo mere KHun mein tar hai mujh mein

nahīñ ki tere ishāre nahīñ samajhtā huuñ samajh to letā huuñ saare nahīñ samajhtā huuñ 
tirā chaḌhā huā dariyā samajh meñ aatā hai tire ḳhamosh kināre nahīñ samajhtā huuñ 
kidhar se niklā hai ye chāñd kuchh nahīñ ma.alūm kahāñ ke haiñ ye sitāre nahīñ samajhtā huuñ 
kahīñ kahīñ mujhe apnī ḳhabar nahīñ miltī kahīñ kahīñ tire baare nahīñ samajhtā huuñ 
jo daa.eñ baa.eñ bhī haiñ aur aage pīchhe bhī unheñ maiñ ab bhī tumhāre nahīñ samajhtā huuñ 
ḳhud apne dil se yahī iḳhtilāf hai merā ki maiñ ġhamoñ ko ġhubāre nahīñ samajhtā huuñ 
kabhī to hotā hai merī samajh se bāhar hī kabhī maiñ sharm ke maare nahīñ samajhtā huuñ 
kahīñ to haiñ jo mire ḳhvāb dekhte haiñ 'zafar' koī to haiñ jinheñ pyāre nahīñ samajhtā huuñ 
nahin ki tere ishaare nahin samajhta hun samajh to leta hun sare nahin samajhta hun 
tera chaDha hua dariya samajh mein aata hai tere KHamosh kinare nahin samajhta hun 
kidhar se nikla hai ye chand kuchh nahin malum kahan ke hain ye sitare nahin samajhta hun 
kahin kahin mujhe apni KHabar nahin milti kahin kahin tere bare nahin samajhta hun 
jo daen baen bhi hain aur aage pichhe bhi unhen main ab bhi tumhaare nahin samajhta hun 
KHud apne dil se yahi iKHtilaf hai mera ki main ghamon ko ghubare nahin samajhta hun 
kabhi to hota hai meri samajh se bahar hi kabhi main sharm ke mare nahin samajhta hun 
kahin to hain jo mere KHwab dekhte hain 'zafar' koi to hain jinhen pyare nahin samajhta hun

ābādī bhī dekhī hai vīrāne bhī dekhe haiñ jo ujḌe aur phir na base dil vo nirālī bastī hai 
ḳhud jo na hone kā ho adam kyā use honā kahte haiñ niist na ho to hast nahīñ ye hastī kyā hastī hai 
ijz-e-gunāh ke dam tak haiñ ismat-e-kāmil ke jalve pastī hai to bulandī hai rāz-e-bulandī pastī hai 
jaan sī shai bik jaatī hai ek nazar ke badle meñ aage marzī gāhak kī in dāmoñ to sastī hai 
vahshat-e-dil se phirnā hai apne ḳhudā se phir jaanā dīvāne ye hosh nahīñ ye to hosh-parastī hai 
jag suunā hai tere baġhair āñkhoñ kā kyā haal huā jab bhī duniyā bastī thī ab bhī duniyā bastī hai 
aañsū the so ḳhushk hue jī hai ki umDā aatā hai dil pe ghaTā sī chhā.ī hai khultī hai na barastī hai 
dil kā ujaḌnā sahl sahī basnā sahl nahīñ zālim bastī basnā khel nahīñ baste baste bastī hai 
'fānī' jis meñ aañsū kyā dil ke lahū kā kaal na thā haa.e vo aañkh ab paanī kī do būñdoñ ko tarastī hai 
duniya meri bala jaane mahngi hai ya sasti hai maut mile to muft na lun hasti ki kya hasti hai 
aabaadi bhi dekhi hai virane bhi dekhe hain jo ujDe aur phir na base dil wo nirali basti hai 
KHud jo na hone ka ho adam kya use hona kahte hain nist na ho to hast nahin ye hasti kya hasti hai 
ijz-e-gunah ke dam tak hain ismat-e-kaamil ke jalwe pasti hai to bulandi hai raaz-e-bulandi pasti hai 
jaan si shai bik jati hai ek nazar ke badle mein aage marzi gahak ki in damon to sasti hai 
wahshat-e-dil se phirna hai apne KHuda se phir jaana diwane ye hosh nahin ye to hosh-parasti hai 
jag suna hai tere baghair aankhon ka kya haal hua jab bhi duniya basti thi ab bhi duniya basti hai 
aansu the so KHushk hue ji hai ki umDa aata hai dil pe ghaTa si chhai hai khulti hai na barasti hai 
dil ka ujaDna sahl sahi basna sahl nahin zalim basti basna khel nahin baste baste basti hai 
'fani' jis mein aansu kya dil ke lahu ka kal na tha hae wo aankh ab pani ki do bundon ko tarasti hai

sau ḳhulūs bātoñ meñ sab karam ḳhayāloñ meñ bas zarā vafā kam hai tere shahr vāloñ meñ 
pahlī baar nazroñ ne chāñd bolte dekhā ham javāb kyā dete kho ga.e savāloñ meñ 
raat terī yādoñ ne dil ko is tarah chheḌā jaise koī chuTkī le narm narm gāloñ meñ 
yuuñ kisī kī āñkhoñ meñ sub.h tak abhī the ham jis tarah rahe shabnam phuul ke piyāloñ meñ 
merī aañkh ke taare ab na dekh pāoge raat ke musāfir the kho ga.e ujāloñ meñ 
jaise aadhī shab ke baa'd chāñd niiñd meñ chauñke vo gulāb kī jumbish un siyāh bāloñ meñ 
sau KHulus baaton mein sab karam KHayalon mein bas zara wafa kam hai tere shahr walon mein 
pahli bar nazron ne chand bolte dekha hum jawab kya dete kho gae sawalon mein 
raat teri yaadon ne dil ko is tarah chheDa jaise koi chuTki le narm narm galon mein 
yun kisi ki aankhon mein subh tak abhi the hum jis tarah rahe shabnam phul ke piyalon mein 
meri aankh ke tare ab na dekh paoge raat ke musafir the kho gae ujalon mein 
jaise aadhi shab ke ba'd chand nind mein chaunke wo gulab ki jumbish un siyah baalon mein

chāñd nikle kisī jānib tirī zebā.ī kā rañg badle kisī sūrat shab-e-tanhā.ī kā 
daulat-e-lab se phir ai ḳhusrav-e-shīrīñ-dahanāñ aaj arzāñ ho koī harf shanāsā.ī kā 
garmi-e-rashk se har anjuman-e-gul-badanāñ tazkira chheḌe tirī pairahan-ārā.ī kā 
sehn-e-gulshan meñ kabhī ai shah-e-shamshād-qadāñ phir nazar aa.e salīqa tirī ra.anā.ī kā 
ek baar aur masīhā-e-dil-e-dil-zadagāñ koī va.ada koī iqrār masīhā.ī kā 
diida o dil ko sambhālo ki sar-e-shām-e-firāq sāz-o-sāmān baham pahuñchā hai rusvā.ī kā 
chand nikle kisi jaanib teri zebai ka rang badle kisi surat shab-e-tanhai ka 
daulat-e-lab se phir ai KHusraw-e-shirin-dahanan aaj arzan ho koi harf shanasai ka 
garmi-e-rashk se har anjuman-e-gul-badanan tazkira chheDe teri pairahan-arai ka 
sehn-e-gulshan mein kabhi ai shah-e-shamshad-qadan phir nazar aae saliqa teri ranai ka 
ek bar aur masiha-e-dil-e-dil-zadagan koi wada koi iqrar masihai ka 
dida o dil ko sambhaalo ki sar-e-sham-e-firaq saz-o-saman baham pahuncha hai ruswai ka

tujh meñ paḌā huā huuñ harakat nahīñ hai mujh meñ hālat na pūchhiyo tū hālat nahīñ hai mujh meñ 
ab to nazar meñ aa jā bāñhoñ ke ghar meñ aa jā ai jaan terī koī sūrat nahīñ hai mujh meñ 
ai rañg rañg meñ aa āġhosh-e-tañg meñ aa bāteñ hī rañg kī haiñ rañgat nahīñ hai mujh meñ 
apne meñ hī kisī kī ho rū-ba-rūī mujh ko huuñ ḳhud se rū-ba-rū huuñ himmat nahīñ hai mujh meñ 
ab to simaT ke aa jā aur ruuh meñ samā jā vaise kisī kī pyāre vus.at nahīñ hai mujh meñ 
shīshe ke is taraf se maiñ sab ko tak rahā huuñ marne kī bhī kisī ko fursat nahīñ hai mujh meñ 
tum mujh ko apne ram meñ le jaao saath apne apne se ai ġhazālo vahshat nahīñ hai mujh meñ 
tujh mein paDa hua hun harakat nahin hai mujh mein haalat na puchhiyo tu haalat nahin hai mujh mein 
ab to nazar mein aa ja banhon ke ghar mein aa ja ai jaan teri koi surat nahin hai mujh mein 
ai rang rang mein aa aaghosh-e-tang mein aa baaten hi rang ki hain rangat nahin hai mujh mein 
apne mein hi kisi ki ho ru-ba-rui mujh ko hun KHud se ru-ba-ru hun himmat nahin hai mujh mein 
ab to simaT ke aa ja aur ruh mein sama ja waise kisi ki pyare wusat nahin hai mujh mein 
shishe ke is taraf se main sab ko tak raha hun marne ki bhi kisi ko fursat nahin hai mujh mein 
tum mujh ko apne ram mein le jao sath apne apne se ai ghazalo wahshat nahin hai mujh mein

kyuuñ jal gayā na tāb-e-ruḳh-e-yār dekh kar jaltā huuñ apnī tāqat-e-dīdār dekh kar 
ātish-parast kahte haiñ ahl-e-jahāñ mujhe sargarm-e-nāla-hā-e-sharar-bār dekh kar 
kyā ābrū-e-ishq jahāñ aam ho jafā ruktā huuñ tum ko be-sabab āzār dekh kar 
aatā hai mere qatl ko par josh-e-rashk se martā huuñ us ke haath meñ talvār dekh kar 
sābit huā hai gardan-e-mīnā pe ḳhūn-e-ḳhalq larze hai mauj-e-mai tirī raftār dekh kar 
vā-hasratā ki yaar ne khīñchā sitam se haath ham ko harīs-e-lazzat-e-āzār dekh kar 
bik jaate haiñ ham aap matā-e-suḳhan ke saath lekin ayār-e-taba.a-e-ḳharīdār dekh kar 
zunnār bāñdh sub.ha-e-sad-dāna toḌ Daal rah-rau chale hai raah ko hamvār dekh kar 
in ābloñ se paañv ke ghabrā gayā thā maiñ jī ḳhush huā hai raah ko pur-ḳhār dekh kar 
kyā bad-gumāñ hai mujh se ki ā.īne meñ mire tuutī kā aks samjhe hai zañgār dekh kar 
girnī thī ham pe barq-e-tajallī na tuur par dete haiñ baada zarf-e-qadah-ḳhvār dekh kar 
sar phoḌnā vo 'ġhālib'-e-shorīda haal kā yaad aa gayā mujhe tirī dīvār dekh kar 
kyun jal gaya na tab-e-ruKH-e-yar dekh kar jalta hun apni taqat-e-didar dekh kar 
aatish-parast kahte hain ahl-e-jahan mujhe sargarm-e-nala-ha-e-sharar-bar dekh kar 
kya aabru-e-ishq jahan aam ho jafa rukta hun tum ko be-sabab aazar dekh kar 
aata hai mere qatl ko par josh-e-rashk se marta hun us ke hath mein talwar dekh kar 
sabit hua hai gardan-e-mina pe KHun-e-KHalq larze hai mauj-e-mai teri raftar dekh kar 
wa-hasrata ki yar ne khincha sitam se hath hum ko haris-e-lazzat-e-azar dekh kar 
bik jate hain hum aap mata-e-suKHan ke sath lekin ayar-e-taba-e-KHaridar dekh kar 
zunnar bandh subha-e-sad-dana toD Dal rah-rau chale hai rah ko hamwar dekh kar 
in aablon se panw ke ghabra gaya tha main ji KHush hua hai rah ko pur-KHar dekh kar 
kya bad-guman hai mujh se ki aaine mein mere tuti ka aks samjhe hai zangar dekh kar 
girni thi hum pe barq-e-tajalli na tur par dete hain baada zarf-e-qadah-KHwar dekh kar 
sar phoDna wo 'ghaalib'-e-shorida haal ka yaad aa gaya mujhe teri diwar dekh kar

ab vahī harf-e-junūñ sab kī zabāñ Thahrī hai jo bhī chal niklī hai vo baat kahāñ Thahrī hai 
aaj tak shaiḳh ke ikrām meñ jo shai thī harām ab vahī dushman-e-dīñ rāhat-e-jāñ Thahrī hai 
hai ḳhabar garm ki phirtā hai gurezāñ nāseh guftugū aaj sar-e-kū-e-butāñ Thahrī hai 
hai vahī āriz-e-lailā vahī shīrīñ kā dahan nigah-e-shauq ghaḌī bhar ko jahāñ Thahrī hai 
vasl kī shab thī to kis darja subuk guzrī thī hijr kī shab hai to kyā saḳht girāñ Thahrī hai 
bikhrī ik baar to haath aa.ī hai kab mauj-e-shamīm dil se niklī hai to kab lab pe fuġhāñ Thahrī hai 
dast-e-sayyād bhī aajiz hai kaf-e-gul-chīñ bhī bū-e-gul Thahrī na bulbul kī zabāñ Thahrī hai 
aate aate yūñhī dam bhar ko rukī hogī bahār jaate jaate yūñhī pal bhar ko ḳhizāñ Thahrī hai 
ham ne jo tarz-e-fuġhāñ kī hai qafas meñ ījād 'faiz' gulshan meñ vahī tarz-e-bayāñ Thahrī hai 
ab wahi harf-e-junun sab ki zaban Thahri hai jo bhi chal nikli hai wo baat kahan Thahri hai 
aaj tak shaiKH ke ikram mein jo shai thi haram ab wahi dushman-e-din rahat-e-jaan Thahri hai 
hai KHabar garm ki phirta hai gurezan naseh guftugu aaj sar-e-ku-e-butan Thahri hai 
hai wahi aariz-e-laila wahi shirin ka dahan nigah-e-shauq ghaDi bhar ko jahan Thahri hai 
wasl ki shab thi to kis darja subuk guzri thi hijr ki shab hai to kya saKHt giran Thahri hai 
bikhri ek bar to hath aai hai kab mauj-e-shamim dil se nikli hai to kab lab pe fughan Thahri hai 
dast-e-sayyaad bhi aajiz hai kaf-e-gul-chin bhi bu-e-gul Thahri na bulbul ki zaban Thahri hai 
aate aate yunhi dam bhar ko ruki hogi bahaar jate jate yunhi pal bhar ko KHizan Thahri hai 
hum ne jo tarz-e-fughan ki hai qafas mein ijad 'faiz' gulshan mein wahi tarz-e-bayan Thahri hai

galī galī mirī yaad bichhī hai pyāre rasta dekh ke chal mujh se itnī vahshat hai to merī hadoñ se duur nikal 
ek samay tirā phuul sā nāzuk haath thā mere shānoñ par ek ye vaqt ki maiñ tanhā aur dukh ke kāñToñ kā jañgal 
yaad hai ab tak tujh se bichhaḌne kī vo añdherī shaam mujhe tū ḳhāmosh khaḌā thā lekin bāteñ kartā thā kājal 
maiñ to ek na.ī duniyā kī dhun meñ bhaTaktā phirtā huuñ merī tujh se kaise nibhegī ek haiñ tere fikr o amal 
merā muñh kyā dekh rahā hai dekh is kaalī raat ko dekh maiñ vahī terā hamrāhī huuñ saath mire chalnā ho to chal 
gali gali meri yaad bichhi hai pyare rasta dekh ke chal mujh se itni wahshat hai to meri hadon se dur nikal 
ek samay tera phul sa nazuk hath tha mere shanon par ek ye waqt ki main tanha aur dukh ke kanTon ka jangal 
yaad hai ab tak tujh se bichhaDne ki wo andheri sham mujhe tu KHamosh khaDa tha lekin baaten karta tha kajal 
main to ek nai duniya ki dhun mein bhaTakta phirta hun meri tujh se kaise nibhegi ek hain tere fikr o amal 
mera munh kya dekh raha hai dekh is kali raat ko dekh main wahi tera hamrahi hun sath mere chalna ho to chal

dil gayā tum ne liyā ham kyā kareñ jaane vaalī chiiz kā ġham kyā kareñ 
ham ne mar kar hijr meñ paa.ī shifā aise achchhoñ kā vo mātam kyā kareñ 
apne hī ġham se nahīñ miltī najāt is binā par fikr-e-ālam kyā kareñ 
ek sāġhar par hai apnī zindagī rafta rafta is se bhī kam kyā kareñ 
kar chuke sab apnī apnī hikmateñ dam nikaltā ho to hamdam kyā kareñ 
dil ne sīkhā sheva-e-begānagī aise nā-mahram ko mahram kyā kareñ 
ma.arka hai aaj husn o ishq kā dekhiye vo kyā kareñ ham kyā kareñ 
ā.īna hai aur vo haiñ dekhiye faisla donoñ ye bāham kyā kareñ 
aadmī honā bahut dushvār hai phir farishte hirs-e-ādam kyā kareñ 
tund-ḳhū hai kab sune vo dil kī baat aur bhī barham ko barham kyā kareñ 
Hyderabad aur lañgar yaad hai ab ke dillī meñ moharram kyā kareñ 
kahte haiñ ahl-e-sifārish mujh se 'dāġh' terī qismat hai burī ham kyā kareñ 
dil gaya tum ne liya hum kya karen jaane wali chiz ka gham kya karen 
hum ne mar kar hijr mein pai shifa aise achchhon ka wo matam kya karen 
apne hi gham se nahin milti najat is bina par fikr-e-alam kya karen 
ek saghar par hai apni zindagi rafta rafta is se bhi kam kya karen 
kar chuke sab apni apni hikmaten dam nikalta ho to hamdam kya karen 
dil ne sikha shewa-e-beganagi aise na-mahram ko mahram kya karen 
marka hai aaj husn o ishq ka dekhiye wo kya karen hum kya karen 
aaina hai aur wo hain dekhiye faisla donon ye baham kya karen 
aadmi hona bahut dushwar hai phir farishte hirs-e-adam kya karen 
tund-KHu hai kab sune wo dil ki baat aur bhi barham ko barham kya karen 
Hyderabad aur langar yaad hai ab ke dilli mein moharram kya karen 
kahte hain ahl-e-sifarish mujh se 'dagh' teri qismat hai buri hum kya karen

Thānī thī dil meñ ab na mileñge kisī se ham par kyā kareñ ki ho ga.e nā-chār jī se ham 
hañste jo dekhte haiñ kisī ko kisī se ham muñh dekh dekh rote haiñ kis be-kasī se ham 
ham se na bolo tum ise kyā kahte haiñ bhalā insāf kiije pūchhte haiñ aap hī se ham 
be-zār jaan se jo na hote to māñgte shāhid shikāyatoñ pe tirī mudda.ī se ham 
us kū meñ jā mareñge madad ai hujūm-e-shauq aaj aur zor karte haiñ be-tāqatī se ham 
sāhab ne is ġhulām ko āzād kar diyā lo bandagī ki chhūT ga.e bandagī se ham 
be-ro.e misl-e-abr na niklā ġhubār-e-dil kahte the un ko barq-e-tabassum hañsī se ham 
in nā-tavāniyoñ pe bhī the ḳhār-e-rāh-e-ġhair kyuuñ kar nikāle jaate na us kī galī se ham 
kyā gul khilegā dekhiye hai fasl-e-gul to duur aur sū-e-dasht bhāgte haiñ kuchh abhī se ham 
muñh dekhne se pahle bhī kis din vo saaf thā be-vaj.h kyuuñ ġhubār rakheñ aarsī se ham 
hai chheḌ iḳhtilāt bhī ġhairoñ ke sāmne hañsne ke badle ro.eñ na kyuuñ gudgudī se ham 
vahshat hai ishq-e-parda-nashīñ meñ dam-e-bukā muñh Dhāñkte haiñ parda-e-chashm-e-parī se ham 
kyā dil ko le gayā koī begāna-āshnā kyuuñ apne jī ko lagte haiñ kuchh ajnabī se ham 
le naam aarzū kā to dil ko nikāl leñ 'momin' na hoñ jo rabt rakheñ bid.atī se ham 
Thani thi dil mein ab na milenge kisi se hum par kya karen ki ho gae na-chaar ji se hum 
hanste jo dekhte hain kisi ko kisi se hum munh dekh dekh rote hain kis be-kasi se hum 
hum se na bolo tum ise kya kahte hain bhala insaf kije puchhte hain aap hi se hum 
be-zar jaan se jo na hote to mangte shahid shikayaton pe teri muddai se hum 
us ku mein ja marenge madad ai hujum-e-shauq aaj aur zor karte hain be-taqati se hum 
sahab ne is ghulam ko aazad kar diya lo bandagi ki chhuT gae bandagi se hum 
be-roe misl-e-abr na nikla ghubar-e-dil kahte the un ko barq-e-tabassum hansi se hum 
in na-tawaniyon pe bhi the KHar-e-rah-e-ghair kyun kar nikale jate na us ki gali se hum 
kya gul khilega dekhiye hai fasl-e-gul to dur aur su-e-dasht bhagte hain kuchh abhi se hum 
munh dekhne se pahle bhi kis din wo saf tha be-wajh kyun ghubar rakhen aarsi se hum 
hai chheD iKHtilat bhi ghairon ke samne hansne ke badle roen na kyun gudgudi se hum 
wahshat hai ishq-e-parda-nashin mein dam-e-buka munh Dhankte hain parda-e-chashm-e-pari se hum 
kya dil ko le gaya koi begana-ashna kyun apne ji ko lagte hain kuchh ajnabi se hum 
le nam aarzu ka to dil ko nikal len 'momin' na hon jo rabt rakhen bidati se hum

ishq meñ ḳhud se mohabbat nahīñ kī jā saktī par kisī ko ye nasīhat nahīñ kī jā saktī 
kunjiyāñ ḳhāna-e-ham-sāya kī rakhte kyuuñ ho apne jab ghar kī hifāzat nahīñ kī jā saktī 
kuchh to mushkil hai bahut kār-e-mohabbat aur kuchh yaar logoñ se mashaqqat nahīñ kī jā saktī 
tā.ir-e-yād ko kam thā shajar-e-dil varna be-sabab tark-e-sukūnat nahīñ kī jā saktī 
ik safar meñ koī do baar nahīñ luT saktā ab dobāra tirī chāhat nahīñ kī jā saktī 
koī ho bhī to zarā chāhne vaalā terā raah chaltoñ se raqābat nahīñ kī jā saktī 
āsmāñ par bhī jahāñ log jhagaḌte hoñ 'jamāl' us zamīñ ke liye hijrat nahīñ kī jā saktī 
ishq mein KHud se mohabbat nahin ki ja sakti par kisi ko ye nasihat nahin ki ja sakti 
kunjiyan KHana-e-ham-saya ki rakhte kyun ho apne jab ghar ki hifazat nahin ki ja sakti 
kuchh to mushkil hai bahut kar-e-mohabbat aur kuchh yar logon se mashaqqat nahin ki ja sakti 
tair-e-yaad ko kam tha shajar-e-dil warna be-sabab tark-e-sukunat nahin ki ja sakti 
ek safar mein koi do bar nahin luT sakta ab dobara teri chahat nahin ki ja sakti 
koi ho bhi to zara chahne wala tera rah chalton se raqabat nahin ki ja sakti 
aasman par bhi jahan log jhagaDte hon 'jamal' us zamin ke liye hijrat nahin ki ja sakti

rāhat-e-jāñ se to ye dil kā vabāl achchhā hai us ne pūchhā to hai itnā tirā haal achchhā hai 
maah achchhā hai bahut hī na ye saal achchhā hai phir bhī har ek se kahtā huuñ ki haal achchhā hai 
tire aane se koī hosh rahe yā na rahe ab talak to tire bīmār kā haal achchhā hai 
ye bhī mumkin hai tirī baat hī ban jaa.e koī use de de koī achchhī sī misāl achchhā hai 
daa.eñ ruḳhsār pe ātish kī chamak vaj.h-e-jamāl baa.eñ ruḳhsār kī āġhosh meñ ḳhaal achchhā hai 
aao phir dil ke samundar kī taraf lauT chaleñ vahī paanī vahī machhlī vahī jaal achchhā hai 
koī dīnār na dirham na riyāl achchhā hai jo zarūrat meñ ho maujūd vo maal achchhā hai 
kyuuñ parakhte ho savāloñ se javāboñ ko 'adīm' hoñT achchhe hoñ to samjho ki savāl achchhā hai 
rahat-e-jaan se to ye dil ka wabaal achchha hai us ne puchha to hai itna tera haal achchha hai 
mah achchha hai bahut hi na ye sal achchha hai phir bhi har ek se kahta hun ki haal achchha hai 
tere aane se koi hosh rahe ya na rahe ab talak to tere bimar ka haal achchha hai 
ye bhi mumkin hai teri baat hi ban jae koi use de de koi achchhi si misal achchha hai 
daen ruKHsar pe aatish ki chamak wajh-e-jamal baen ruKHsar ki aaghosh mein KHal achchha hai 
aao phir dil ke samundar ki taraf lauT chalen wahi pani wahi machhli wahi jal achchha hai 
koi dinar na dirham na riyal achchha hai jo zarurat mein ho maujud wo mal achchha hai 
kyun parakhte ho sawalon se jawabon ko 'adim' honT achchhe hon to samjho ki sawal achchha hai

taḳhayyul ko barī karne lagā huuñ maiñ zehnī ḳhud-kushī karne lagā huuñ 
mujhe zinda jalāyā jā rahā hai to kyā maiñ raushnī karne lagā huuñ 
maiñ ā.īnoñ ko dekhe jā rahā thā ab in se baat bhī karne lagā huuñ 
tumhārī bas tumhārī dushmanī meñ maiñ sab se dostī karne lagā huuñ 
mujhe gumrāh karnā ġhair-mumkin maiñ apnī pairvī karne lagā huuñ 
taKHayyul ko bari karne laga hun main zehni KHud-kushi karne laga hun 
mujhe zinda jalaya ja raha hai to kya main raushni karne laga hun 
main aainon ko dekhe ja raha tha ab in se baat bhi karne laga hun 
tumhaari bas tumhaari dushmani mein main sab se dosti karne laga hun 
mujhe gumrah karna ghair-mumkin main apni pairwi karne laga hun

garmī-e-shauq-e-nazārā kā asar to dekho gul khile jaate haiñ vo sāya-e-tar to dekho 
aise nādāñ bhī na the jaañ se guzarne vaale nāseho pand-garo rāhguzar to dekho 
vo to vo hai tumheñ ho jā.egī ulfat mujh se ik nazar tum mirā mahbūb-e-nazar to dekho 
vo jo ab chaak garebāñ bhī nahīñ karte haiñ dekhne vaalo kabhī un kā jigar to dekho 
dāman-e-dard ko gulzār banā rakkhā hai aao ik din dil-e-pur-ḳhūñ kā hunar to dekho 
sub.h kī tarah jhamaktā hai shab-e-ġham kā ufuq 'faiz' tābindagī-e-dīda-e-tar to dekho 
garmi-e-shauq-e-nazara ka asar to dekho gul khile jate hain wo saya-e-tar to dekho 
aise nadan bhi na the jaan se guzarne wale naseho pand-garo rahguzar to dekho 
wo to wo hai tumhein ho jaegi ulfat mujh se ek nazar tum mera mahbub-e-nazar to dekho 
wo jo ab chaak gareban bhi nahin karte hain dekhne walo kabhi un ka jigar to dekho 
daman-e-dard ko gulzar bana rakkha hai aao ek din dil-e-pur-KHun ka hunar to dekho 
subh ki tarah jhamakta hai shab-e-gham ka ufuq 'faiz' tabindagi-e-dida-e-tar to dekho

ḳhudī vo bahr hai jis kā koī kināra nahīñ tū aabjū ise samjhā agar to chāra nahīñ 
tilism-e-gumbad-e-gardūñ ko toḌ sakte haiñ zujāj kī ye imārat hai sañg-e-ḳhāra nahīñ 
ḳhudī meñ Dūbte haiñ phir ubhar bhī aate haiñ magar ye hausla-e-mard-e-hech-kāra nahīñ 
tire maqām ko anjum-shanās kyā jaane ki ḳhāk-e-zinda hai tū tāba-e-sitāra nahīñ 
yahīñ bahisht bhī hai huur o jibra.īl bhī hai tirī nigah meñ abhī shoḳhi-e-nazāra nahīñ 
mire junūñ ne zamāne ko ḳhuub pahchānā vo pairahan mujhe baḳhshā ki paara paara nahīñ 
ġhazab hai ain-e-karam meñ baḳhīl hai fitrat ki lāl-e-nāb meñ ātish to hai sharāra nahīñ 
KHudi wo bahr hai jis ka koi kinara nahin tu aabju ise samjha agar to chaara nahin 
tilism-e-gumbad-e-gardun ko toD sakte hain zujaj ki ye imarat hai sang-e-KHara nahin 
KHudi mein Dubte hain phir ubhar bhi aate hain magar ye hausla-e-mard-e-hech-kara nahin 
tere maqam ko anjum-shanas kya jaane ki KHak-e-zinda hai tu taba-e-sitara nahin 
yahin bahisht bhi hai hur o jibrail bhi hai teri nigah mein abhi shoKHi-e-nazara nahin 
mere junun ne zamane ko KHub pahchana wo pairahan mujhe baKHsha ki para para nahin 
ghazab hai ain-e-karam mein baKHil hai fitrat ki lal-e-nab mein aatish to hai sharara nahin

matlab muāmalāt kā kuchh pā gayā huuñ maiñ hañs kar fareb-e-chashm-e-karam khā gayā huuñ maiñ 
bas intihā hai chhoḌiye bas rahne dījiye ḳhud apne e'timād se sharmā gayā huuñ maiñ 
saaqī zarā nigāh milā kar to dekhnā kambaḳht hosh meñ to nahīñ aa gayā huuñ maiñ 
shāyad mujhe nikāl ke pachhtā rahe hoñ aap mahfil meñ is ḳhayāl se phir aa gayā huuñ maiñ 
kyā ab hisāb bhī tū mirā legā hashr meñ kyā ye itaab kam hai yahāñ aa gayā huuñ maiñ 
maiñ ishq huuñ mirā bhalā kyā kaam daar se vo shar.a thī jise vahāñ laTkā gayā huuñ maiñ 
niklā thā mai-kade se ki ab ghar chalūñ 'adam' ghabrā ke sū-e-mai-kada phir aa gayā huuñ maiñ 
matlab muamalat ka kuchh pa gaya hun main hans kar fareb-e-chashm-e-karam kha gaya hun main 
bas intiha hai chhoDiye bas rahne dijiye KHud apne e'timad se sharma gaya hun main 
saqi zara nigah mila kar to dekhna kambaKHt hosh mein to nahin aa gaya hun main 
shayad mujhe nikal ke pachhta rahe hon aap mahfil mein is KHayal se phir aa gaya hun main 
kya ab hisab bhi tu mera lega hashr mein kya ye itab kam hai yahan aa gaya hun main 
main ishq hun mera bhala kya kaam dar se wo shara thi jise wahan laTka gaya hun main 
nikla tha mai-kade se ki ab ghar chalun 'adam' ghabra ke su-e-mai-kada phir aa gaya hun main

us shaam vo ruḳhsat kā samāñ yaad rahegā vo shahr vo kūcha vo makāñ yaad rahegā 
vo Tiis ki ubhrī thī idhar yaad rahegī vo dard ki uTThā thā yahāñ yaad rahegā 
ham shauq ke shole kī lapak bhuul bhī jaa.eñ vo sham-e-fasurda kā dhuāñ yaad rahegā 
haañ bazm-e-shabāna meñ hama-shauq jo us din ham the tirī jānib nigarāñ yaad rahegā 
kuchh 'mīr' ke abyāt the kuchh 'faiz' ke misre ik dard kā thā jin meñ bayāñ yaad rahegā 
āñkhoñ meñ sulagtī huī vahshat ke jilau meñ vo hairat o hasrat kā jahāñ yaad rahegā 
jāñ-baḳhsh sī us barg-e-gul-e-tar kī tarāvat vo lams-e-azīz-e-do-jahāñ yaad rahegā 
ham bhuul sake haiñ na tujhe bhuul sakeñge tū yaad rahegā hameñ haañ yaad rahegā 
us sham wo ruKHsat ka saman yaad rahega wo shahr wo kucha wo makan yaad rahega 
wo Tis ki ubhri thi idhar yaad rahegi wo dard ki uTTha tha yahan yaad rahega 
hum shauq ke shole ki lapak bhul bhi jaen wo sham-e-fasurda ka dhuan yaad rahega 
han bazm-e-shabana mein hama-shauq jo us din hum the teri jaanib nigaran yaad rahega 
kuchh 'mir' ke abyat the kuchh 'faiz' ke misre ek dard ka tha jin mein bayan yaad rahega 
aankhon mein sulagti hui wahshat ke jilau mein wo hairat o hasrat ka jahan yaad rahega 
jaan-baKHsh si us barg-e-gul-e-tar ki tarawat wo lams-e-aziz-e-do-jahan yaad rahega 
hum bhul sake hain na tujhe bhul sakenge tu yaad rahega hamein han yaad rahega

baat saaqī kī na Taalī jā.egī kar ke tauba toḌ Daalī jā.egī 
vo sañvarte haiñ mujhe is kī hai fikr aarzū kis kī nikālī jā.egī 
dil liyā pahlī nazar meñ aap ne ab adā koī na ḳhālī jā.egī 
aate aate aa.egā un ko ḳhayāl jaate jaate be-ḳhayālī jā.egī 
kyā kahūñ dil toḌte haiñ kis liye aarzū shāyad nikālī jā.egī 
garmi-e-nazzāra-bāzī kā hai shauq baaġh se nargis nikālī jā.egī 
dekhte haiñ ġhaur se merī shabīh shāyad us meñ jaan Daalī jā.egī 
ai tamannā tujh ko ro luuñ shām-e-vasl aaj tū dil se nikālī jā.egī 
fasl-e-gul aa.ī junūñ uchhlā 'jalīl' ab tabī.at kuchh sambhālī jā.egī 
baat saqi ki na Tali jaegi kar ke tauba toD Dali jaegi 
wo sanwarte hain mujhe is ki hai fikr aarzu kis ki nikali jaegi 
dil liya pahli nazar mein aap ne ab ada koi na KHali jaegi 
aate aate aaega un ko KHayal jate jate be-KHayali jaegi 
kya kahun dil toDte hain kis liye aarzu shayad nikali jaegi 
garmi-e-nazzara-bazi ka hai shauq bagh se nargis nikali jaegi 
dekhte hain ghaur se meri shabih shayad us mein jaan Dali jaegi 
ai tamanna tujh ko ro lun sham-e-wasl aaj tu dil se nikali jaegi 
fasl-e-gul aai junun uchhla 'jalil' ab tabiat kuchh sambhaali jaegi

ranj kī jab guftugū hone lagī aap se tum tum se tū hone lagī 
chāhiye paiġhām-bar donoñ taraf lutf kyā jab dū-ba-dū hone lagī 
merī rusvā.ī kī naubat aa ga.ī un kī shohrat kū-ba-kū hone lagī 
hai tirī tasvīr kitnī be-hijāb har kisī ke rū-ba-rū hone lagī 
ġhair ke hote bhalā ai shām-e-vasl kyuuñ hamāre rū-ba-rū hone lagī 
nā-ummīdī baḌh ga.ī hai is qadar aarzū kī aarzū hone lagī 
ab ke mil kar dekhiye kyā rañg ho phir hamārī justujū hone lagī 
'dāġh' itrā.e hue phirte haiñ aaj shāyad un kī aabrū hone lagī 
ranj ki jab guftugu hone lagi aap se tum tum se tu hone lagi 
chahiye paigham-bar donon taraf lutf kya jab du-ba-du hone lagi 
meri ruswai ki naubat aa gai un ki shohrat ku-ba-ku hone lagi 
hai teri taswir kitni be-hijab har kisi ke ru-ba-ru hone lagi 
ghair ke hote bhala ai sham-e-wasl kyun hamare ru-ba-ru hone lagi 
na-ummidi baDh gai hai is qadar aarzu ki aarzu hone lagi 
ab ke mil kar dekhiye kya rang ho phir hamari justuju hone lagi 
'dagh' itrae hue phirte hain aaj shayad un ki aabru hone lagi

jaan se ishq aur jahāñ se gurez dostoñ ne kiyā kahāñ se gurez 
ibtidā kī tere qasīde se ab ye mushkil karūñ kahāñ se gurez 
maiñ vahāñ huuñ jahāñ jahāñ tum ho tum karoge kahāñ kahāñ se gurez 
kar gayā mere tere qisse meñ dāstāñ-go yahāñ vahāñ se gurez 
jañg haarī na thī abhī ki 'farāz' kar ga.e dost darmiyāñ se gurez 
jaan se ishq aur jahan se gurez doston ne kiya kahan se gurez 
ibtida ki tere qaside se ab ye mushkil karun kahan se gurez 
main wahan hun jahan jahan tum ho tum karoge kahan kahan se gurez 
kar gaya mere tere qisse mein dastan-go yahan wahan se gurez 
jang haari na thi abhi ki 'faraaz' kar gae dost darmiyan se gurez

ye kahnā to nahīñ kaafī ki bas pyāre lage ham ko unheñ kaise batā.eñ ham ki vo kaise lage ham ko 
makīñ the yā kisī khoī huī jannat kī tasvīreñ makāñ is shahr ke bhūle hue sapne lage ham ko 
ham un ko soch meñ gum dekh kar vāpas chale aa.e vo apne dhyān meñ baiThe hue achchhe lage ham ko 
bahut shaffāf the jab tak ki masrūf-e-tamannā the magar is kār-e-duniyā meñ baḌe dhabbe lage ham ko 
jahāñ tanhā hue dil meñ bhañvar se paḌne lagte haiñ agarche muddateñ guzrīñ kināre se lage ham ko 
ye kahna to nahin kafi ki bas pyare lage hum ko unhen kaise bataen hum ki wo kaise lage hum ko 
makin the ya kisi khoi hui jannat ki taswiren makan is shahr ke bhule hue sapne lage hum ko 
hum un ko soch mein gum dekh kar wapas chale aae wo apne dhyan mein baiThe hue achchhe lage hum ko 
bahut shaffaf the jab tak ki masruf-e-tamanna the magar is kar-e-duniya mein baDe dhabbe lage hum ko 
jahan tanha hue dil mein bhanwar se paDne lagte hain agarche muddaten guzrin kinare se lage hum ko

gumāñ yahī hai ki dil ḳhud udhar ko jaatā hai so shak kā fā.eda us kī nazar ko jaatā hai 
hadeñ vafā kī bhī āḳhir havas se miltī haiñ ye rāsta bhī idhar se udhar ko jaatā hai 
ye dil kā dard to umroñ kā rog hai pyāre so jaa.e bhī to pahar do pahar ko jaatā hai 
ye haal hai ki ka.ī rāste haiñ pesh-e-nazar magar ḳhayāl tirī rah-guzar ko jaatā hai 
tū 'anvarī' hai na 'ġhālib' to phir ye kyuuñ hai 'farāz' har ek sail-e-balā tere ghar ko jaatā hai 
guman yahi hai ki dil KHud udhar ko jata hai so shak ka faeda us ki nazar ko jata hai 
haden wafa ki bhi aaKHir hawas se milti hain ye rasta bhi idhar se udhar ko jata hai 
ye dil ka dard to umron ka rog hai pyare so jae bhi to pahar do pahar ko jata hai 
ye haal hai ki kai raste hain pesh-e-nazar magar KHayal teri rah-guzar ko jata hai 
tu 'anwari' hai na 'ghaalib' to phir ye kyun hai 'faraaz' har ek sail-e-bala tere ghar ko jata hai

aa.ina ab judā nahīñ kartā qaid meñ huuñ rihā nahīñ kartā 
mustaqil sabr meñ hai koh-e-girāñ naqsh-e-ibrat sadā nahīñ kartā 
rañg-e-mahfil badaltā rahtā hai rañg koī vafā nahīñ kartā 
aish-e-duniyā kī justujū mat kar ye dafīna milā nahīñ kartā 
jī meñ aa.e jo kar guzartā hai tū kisī kā kahā nahīñ kartā 
ek vāris hamesha hotā hai taḳht ḳhālī rahā nahīñ kartā 
ahd-e-insāf aa rahā hai 'munīr' zulm daa.em huā nahīñ kartā 
aaina ab juda nahin karta qaid mein hun riha nahin karta 
mustaqil sabr mein hai koh-e-giran naqsh-e-ibrat sada nahin karta 
rang-e-mahfil badalta rahta hai rang koi wafa nahin karta 
aish-e-duniya ki justuju mat kar ye dafina mila nahin karta 
ji mein aae jo kar guzarta hai tu kisi ka kaha nahin karta 
ek waris hamesha hota hai taKHt KHali raha nahin karta 
ahd-e-insaf aa raha hai 'munir' zulm daem hua nahin karta

jo charāġh saare bujhā chuke unheñ intizār kahāñ rahā ye sukūñ kā daur-e-shadīd hai koī be-qarār kahāñ rahā 
jo duā ko haath uThā.e bhī to murād yaad na aa sakī kisī kārvāñ kā jo zikr thā vo pas-e-ġhubār kahāñ rahā 
ye tulū-e-roz-e-malāl hai so gila bhī kis se kareñge ham koī dilrubā koī dil-shikan koī dil-figār kahāñ rahā 
koī baat ḳhvāb-o-ḳhayāl kī jo karo to vaqt kaTegā ab hameñ mausamoñ ke mizāj par koī e'tibār kahāñ rahā 
hameñ kū-ba-kū jo liye phirī kisī naqsh-e-pā kī talāsh thī koī āftāb thā zau-fagan sar-e-rahguzār kahāñ rahā 
magar ek dhun to lagī rahī na ye dil dukhā na gila huā ki nigah ko rañg-e-bahār par koī iḳhtiyār kahāñ rahā 
sar-e-dasht hī rahā tishna-lab jise zindagī kī talāsh thī jise zindagī kī talāsh thī lab-e-jūebār kahāñ rahā 
jo charagh sare bujha chuke unhen intizar kahan raha ye sukun ka daur-e-shadid hai koi be-qarar kahan raha 
jo dua ko hath uThae bhi to murad yaad na aa saki kisi karwan ka jo zikr tha wo pas-e-ghubar kahan raha 
ye tulu-e-roz-e-malal hai so gila bhi kis se karenge hum koi dilruba koi dil-shikan koi dil-figar kahan raha 
koi baat KHwab-o-KHayal ki jo karo to waqt kaTega ab hamein mausamon ke mizaj par koi e'tibar kahan raha 
hamein ku-ba-ku jo liye phiri kisi naqsh-e-pa ki talash thi koi aaftab tha zau-fagan sar-e-rahguzar kahan raha 
magar ek dhun to lagi rahi na ye dil dukha na gila hua ki nigah ko rang-e-bahaar par koi iKHtiyar kahan raha 
sar-e-dasht hi raha tishna-lab jise zindagi ki talash thi jise zindagi ki talash thi lab-e-juebar kahan raha

mujhe pasand nahīñ aise kārobār meñ huuñ ye jabr hai ki maiñ ḳhud apne iḳhtiyār meñ huuñ 
hudūd-e-vaqt se bāhar ajab hisār meñ huuñ maiñ ek lamha huuñ sadiyoñ ke intizār meñ huuñ 
abhī na kar mirī tashkīl mujh ko naam na de tire vajūd se bāhar meñ kis shumār meñ huuñ 
maiñ ek zarra mirī haisiyat hī kyā hai magar havā ke saath huuñ uḌte hue ġhubār meñ huuñ 
bas ās-pās ye sūraj hai aur kuchh bhī nahīñ mahak rahā to huuñ lekin maiñ regzār meñ huuñ 
mujhe pasand nahin aise karobar mein hun ye jabr hai ki main KHud apne iKHtiyar mein hun 
hudud-e-waqt se bahar ajab hisar mein hun main ek lamha hun sadiyon ke intizar mein hun 
abhi na kar meri tashkil mujh ko nam na de tere wajud se bahar mein kis shumar mein hun 
main ek zarra meri haisiyat hi kya hai magar hawa ke sath hun uDte hue ghubar mein hun 
bas aas-pas ye suraj hai aur kuchh bhi nahin mahak raha to hun lekin main regzar mein hun

havā ke zor se pindār-e-bām-o-dar bhī gayā charāġh ko jo bachāte the un kā ghar bhī gayā 
pukārte rahe mahfūz kashtiyoñ vaale maiñ Dūbtā huā dariyā ke paar utar bhī gayā 
ab ehtiyāt kī dīvār kyā uThāte ho jo chor dil meñ chhupā thā vo kaam kar bhī gayā 
maiñ chup rahā ki isī meñ thī āfiyat jaañ kī koī to merī tarah thā jo daar par bhī gayā 
sulagte sochte vīrān mausamoñ kī tarah kaḌā thā ahd-e-javānī magar guzar bhī gayā 
jise bhulā na sakā us ko yaad kyā rakhtā jo naam lab pe rahā zehn se utar bhī gayā 
phaTī phaTī huī āñkhoñ se yuuñ na dekh mujhe tujhe talāsh hai jis shaḳhs kī vo mar bhī gayā 
magar falak ko adāvat usī ke ghar se thī jahāñ 'farāz' na thā sail-e-ġham udhar bhī gayā 
hawa ke zor se pindar-e-baam-o-dar bhi gaya charagh ko jo bachate the un ka ghar bhi gaya 
pukarte rahe mahfuz kashtiyon wale main Dubta hua dariya ke par utar bhi gaya 
ab ehtiyat ki diwar kya uThate ho jo chor dil mein chhupa tha wo kaam kar bhi gaya 
main chup raha ki isi mein thi aafiyat jaan ki koi to meri tarah tha jo dar par bhi gaya 
sulagte sochte viran mausamon ki tarah kaDa tha ahd-e-jawani magar guzar bhi gaya 
jise bhula na saka us ko yaad kya rakhta jo nam lab pe raha zehn se utar bhi gaya 
phaTi phaTi hui aankhon se yun na dekh mujhe tujhe talash hai jis shaKHs ki wo mar bhi gaya 
magar falak ko adawat usi ke ghar se thi jahan 'faraaz' na tha sail-e-gham udhar bhi gaya

aur bāzār se kyā le jā.ūñ pahlī bārish kā mazā le jā.ūñ 
kuchh to sauġhāt duuñ ghar vāloñ ko raat āñkhoñ meñ sajā le jā.ūñ 
ghar meñ sāmāñ to ho dilchaspī kā hādisa koī uThā le jā.ūñ 
ik diyā der se jaltā hogā saath thoḌī sī havā le jā.ūñ 
kyuuñ bhaTaktā huuñ ġhalat rāhoñ meñ ḳhvāb meñ us kā pata le jā.ūñ 
roz kahtā hai havā kā jhoñkā aa tujhe duur uḌā le jā.ūñ 
aaj phir mujh se kahā dariyā ne kyā irāda hai bahā le jā.ūñ 
ghar se jaatā huuñ to kaam ā.eñge ek do ashk bachā le jā.ūñ 
jeb meñ kuchh to rahegā 'alvī' laao tum sab kī duā le jā.ūñ 
aur bazar se kya le jaun pahli barish ka maza le jaun 
kuchh to saughat dun ghar walon ko raat aankhon mein saja le jaun 
ghar mein saman to ho dilchaspi ka hadisa koi uTha le jaun 
ek diya der se jalta hoga sath thoDi si hawa le jaun 
kyun bhaTakta hun ghalat rahon mein KHwab mein us ka pata le jaun 
roz kahta hai hawa ka jhonka aa tujhe dur uDa le jaun 
aaj phir mujh se kaha dariya ne kya irada hai baha le jaun 
ghar se jata hun to kaam aaenge ek do ashk bacha le jaun 
jeb mein kuchh to rahega 'alwi' lao tum sab ki dua le jaun

mere hone meñ kisī taur se shāmil ho jaao tum masīhā nahīñ hote ho to qātil ho jaao 
dasht se duur bhī kyā rang dikhātā hai junūñ dekhnā hai to kisī shahr meñ dāḳhil ho jaao 
jis pe hotā hī nahīñ ḳhūn-e-do-ālam sābit baḌh ke ik din usī gardan meñ hamā.il ho jaao 
vo sitamgar tumheñ tasḳhīr kiyā chāhtā hai ḳhaak ban jaao aur us shaḳhs ko hāsil ho jaao 
ishq kyā kār-e-havas bhī koī āsān nahīñ ḳhair se pahle isī kaam ke qābil ho jaao 
abhī paikar hī jalā hai to ye aalam hai miyāñ aag ye ruuh meñ lag jaa.e to kāmil ho jaao 
maiñ huuñ yā mauj-e-fanā aur yahāñ koī nahīñ tum agar ho to zarā raah meñ haa.il ho jaao 
mere hone mein kisi taur se shamil ho jao tum masiha nahin hote ho to qatil ho jao 
dasht se dur bhi kya rang dikhata hai junun dekhna hai to kisi shahr mein daKHil ho jao 
jis pe hota hi nahin KHun-e-do-alam sabit baDh ke ek din usi gardan mein hamail ho jao 
wo sitamgar tumhein tasKHir kiya chahta hai KHak ban jao aur us shaKHs ko hasil ho jao 
ishq kya kar-e-hawas bhi koi aasan nahin KHair se pahle isi kaam ke qabil ho jao 
abhi paikar hi jala hai to ye aalam hai miyan aag ye ruh mein lag jae to kaamil ho jao 
main hun ya mauj-e-fana aur yahan koi nahin tum agar ho to zara rah mein hail ho jao

dil munāfiq thā shab-e-hijr meñ soyā kaisā aur jab tujh se milā TuuT ke royā kaisā 
zindagī meñ bhī ġhazal hī kā qarīna rakkhā ḳhvāb-dar-ḳhvāb tire ġham ko piroyā kaisā 
ab to chehroñ pe bhī katboñ kā gumāñ hotā hai āñkheñ pathrā.ī huī haiñ lab-e-goyā kaisā 
dekh ab qurb kā mausam bhī na sarsabz lage hijr hī hijr marāsim meñ samoyā kaisā 
ek aañsū thā ki dariyā-e-nadāmat thā 'farāz' dil se bebāk shanāvar ko Duboyā kaisā 
dil munafiq tha shab-e-hijr mein soya kaisa aur jab tujh se mila TuT ke roya kaisa 
zindagi mein bhi ghazal hi ka qarina rakkha KHwab-dar-KHwab tere gham ko piroya kaisa 
ab to chehron pe bhi katbon ka guman hota hai aankhen pathrai hui hain lab-e-goya kaisa 
dekh ab qurb ka mausam bhi na sarsabz lage hijr hi hijr marasim mein samoya kaisa 
ek aansu tha ki dariya-e-nadamat tha 'faraaz' dil se bebak shanawar ko Duboya kaisa

haamī bhī na the munkir-e-'ġhālib' bhī nahīñ the ham ahl-e-tazabzub kisī jānib bhī nahīñ the 
is baar bhī duniyā ne hadaf ham ko banāyā is baar to ham shah ke musāhib bhī nahīñ the 
bech aa.e sar-e-qarya-e-zar jauhar-e-pindār jo daam mile aise munāsib bhī nahīñ the 
miTTī kī mohabbat meñ ham āshufta-saroñ ne vo qarz utāre haiñ ki vājib bhī nahīñ the 
lau detī huī raat suḳhan kartā huā din sab us ke liye jis se muḳhātib bhī nahīñ the 
hami bhi na the munkir-e-'ghaalib' bhi nahin the hum ahl-e-tazabzub kisi jaanib bhi nahin the 
is bar bhi duniya ne hadaf hum ko banaya is bar to hum shah ke musahib bhi nahin the 
bech aae sar-e-qarya-e-zar jauhar-e-pindar jo dam mile aise munasib bhi nahin the 
miTTi ki mohabbat mein hum aashufta-saron ne wo qarz utare hain ki wajib bhi nahin the 
lau deti hui raat suKHan karta hua din sab us ke liye jis se muKHatib bhi nahin the

kis shai pe yahāñ vaqt kā saaya nahīñ hotā ik ḳhvāb-e-mohabbat hai ki būḌhā nahīñ hotā 
vo vaqt bhī aatā hai jab āñkhoñ meñ hamārī phirtī haiñ vo shakleñ jinheñ dekhā nahīñ hotā 
bārish vo barastī hai ki bhar jaate haiñ jal-thal dekho to kahīñ abr kā TukḌā nahīñ hotā 
ghir jaatā hai dil dard kī har band galī meñ chāho ki nikal jaa.eñ to rasta nahīñ hotā 
yādoñ pe bhī jam jaatī hai jab gard-e-zamāna miltā hai vo paiġhām ki pahuñchā nahīñ hotā 
tanhā.ī meñ karnī to hai ik baat kisī se lekin vo kisī vaqt akelā nahīñ hotā 
kyā us se gila kījiye barbādī-e-dil kā ham se bhī to iz.hār-e-tamannā nahīñ hotā 
kis shai pe yahan waqt ka saya nahin hota ek KHwab-e-mohabbat hai ki buDha nahin hota 
wo waqt bhi aata hai jab aankhon mein hamari phirti hain wo shaklen jinhen dekha nahin hota 
barish wo barasti hai ki bhar jate hain jal-thal dekho to kahin abr ka TukDa nahin hota 
ghir jata hai dil dard ki har band gali mein chaho ki nikal jaen to rasta nahin hota 
yaadon pe bhi jam jati hai jab gard-e-zamana milta hai wo paigham ki pahuncha nahin hota 
tanhai mein karni to hai ek baat kisi se lekin wo kisi waqt akela nahin hota 
kya us se gila kijiye barbaadi-e-dil ka hum se bhi to izhaar-e-tamanna nahin hota

ġhair ko muñh lagā ke dekh liyā jhuuT sach aazmā ke dekh liyā 
un ke ghar 'dāġh' jā ke dekh liyā dil ke kahne meñ aa ke dekh liyā 
kitnī farhat-fazā thī bū-e-vafā us ne dil ko jalā ke dekh liyā 
kabhī ġhash meñ rahā shab-e-va.ada kabhī gardan uThā ke dekh liyā 
jins-e-dil hai ye vo nahīñ saudā har jagah se mañgā ke dekh liyā 
log kahte haiñ chup lagī hai tujhe hāl-e-dil bhī sunā ke dekh liyā 
jaao bhī kyā karoge mehr-o-vafā bār-hā aazmā ke dekh liyā 
zaḳhm-e-dil meñ nahīñ hai qatra-e-ḳhūñ ḳhuub ham ne dikhā ke dekh liyā 
idhar ā.īna hai udhar dil hai jis ko chāhā uThā ke dekh liyā 
un ko ḳhalvat-sarā meñ be-parda saaf maidān pā ke dekh liyā 
us ne sub.h-e-shab-e-visāl mujhe jaate jaate bhī aa ke dekh liyā 
tum ko hai vasl-e-ġhair se inkār aur jo ham ne aa ke dekh liyā 
'dāġh' ne ḳhuub āshiqī kā mazā jal ke dekhā jalā ke dekh liyā 
ghair ko munh laga ke dekh liya jhuT sach aazma ke dekh liya 
un ke ghar 'dagh' ja ke dekh liya dil ke kahne mein aa ke dekh liya 
kitni farhat-faza thi bu-e-wafa us ne dil ko jala ke dekh liya 
kabhi ghash mein raha shab-e-wada kabhi gardan uTha ke dekh liya 
jins-e-dil hai ye wo nahin sauda har jagah se manga ke dekh liya 
log kahte hain chup lagi hai tujhe haal-e-dil bhi suna ke dekh liya 
jao bhi kya karoge mehr-o-wafa bar-ha aazma ke dekh liya 
zaKHm-e-dil mein nahin hai qatra-e-KHun KHub hum ne dikha ke dekh liya 
idhar aaina hai udhar dil hai jis ko chaha uTha ke dekh liya 
un ko KHalwat-sara mein be-parda saf maidan pa ke dekh liya 
us ne subh-e-shab-e-visal mujhe jate jate bhi aa ke dekh liya 
tum ko hai wasl-e-ghair se inkar aur jo hum ne aa ke dekh liya 
'dagh' ne KHub aashiqi ka maza jal ke dekha jala ke dekh liya

digar-gūñ hai jahāñ tāroñ kī gardish tez hai saaqī dil-e-har-zarra meñ ġhauġhā-e-rustā-ḳhez hai saaqī 
matā-e-dīn-o-dānish luT ga.ī allāh-vāloñ kī ye kis kāfir-adā kā ġhamza-e-ḳhūñ-rez hai saaqī 
vahī derīna bīmārī vahī nā-mohkamī dil kī ilaaj is kā vahī āb-e-nashāt-añgez hai saaqī 
haram ke dil meñ soz-e-ārzū paidā nahīñ hotā ki paidā.ī tirī ab tak hijāb-āmez hai saaqī 
na uTThā phir koī 'rūmī' ajam ke lāla-zāroñ se vahī āb-o-gil-e-īrāñ vahī tabrez hai saaqī 
nahīñ hai nā-umīd 'iqbāl' apnī kisht-e-vīrāñ se zarā nam ho to ye miTTī bahut zarḳhez hai saaqī 
faqīr-e-rāh ko baḳhshe ga.e asrār-e-sultānī bahā merī navā kī daulat-e-parvez hai saaqī 
digar-gun hai jahan taron ki gardish tez hai saqi dil-e-har-zarra mein ghaugha-e-rusta-KHez hai saqi 
mata-e-din-o-danish luT gai allah-walon ki ye kis kafir-ada ka ghamza-e-KHun-rez hai saqi 
wahi derina bimari wahi na-mohkami dil ki ilaj is ka wahi aab-e-nashat-angez hai saqi 
haram ke dil mein soz-e-arzu paida nahin hota ki paidai teri ab tak hijab-amez hai saqi 
na uTTha phir koi 'rumi' ajam ke lala-zaron se wahi aab-o-gil-e-iran wahi tabrez hai saqi 
nahin hai na-umid 'iqbaal' apni kisht-e-viran se zara nam ho to ye miTTi bahut zarKHez hai saqi 
faqir-e-rah ko baKHshe gae asrar-e-sultani baha meri nawa ki daulat-e-parwez hai saqi

kamar bāñdhe hue chalne ko yaañ sab yaar baiThe haiñ bahut aage ga.e baaqī jo haiñ tayyār baiThe haiñ 
na chheḌ ai nik.hat-e-bād-e-bahārī raah lag apnī tujhe aTkheliyāñ sūjhī haiñ ham be-zār baiThe haiñ 
ḳhayāl un kā pare hai arsh-e-āzam se kahīñ saaqī ġharaz kuchh aur dhun meñ is ghaḌī mai-ḳhvār baiThe haiñ 
basān-e-naqsh-e-pā-e-rah-ravāñ kū-e-tamannā meñ nahīñ uThne kī tāqat kyā kareñ lāchār baiThe haiñ 
ye apnī chaal hai uftādgī se in dinoñ pahroñ nazar aayā jahāñ par sāya-e-dīvār baiThe haiñ 
kaheñ haiñ sabr kis ko aah nañg o naam hai kyā shai ġharaz ro piiT kar un sab ko ham yak baar baiThe haiñ 
kahīñ bose kī mat jur.at dilā kar baiThiyo un se abhī is had ko vo kaifī nahīñ hushyār baiThe haiñ 
najīboñ kā ajab kuchh haal hai is daur meñ yaaro jise pūchho yahī kahte haiñ ham bekār baiThe haiñ 
na.ī ye vaz.a sharmāne kī sīkhī aaj hai tum ne hamāre paas sāhab varna yuuñ sau baar baiThe haiñ 
kahāñ gardish falak kī chain detī hai sunā 'inshā' ġhanīmat hai ki ham sūrat yahāñ do-chār baiThe haiñ 
kamar bandhe hue chalne ko yan sab yar baiThe hain bahut aage gae baqi jo hain tayyar baiThe hain 
na chheD ai nikhat-e-baad-e-bahaari rah lag apni tujhe aTkheliyan sujhi hain hum be-zar baiThe hain 
KHayal un ka pare hai arsh-e-azam se kahin saqi gharaz kuchh aur dhun mein is ghaDi mai-KHwar baiThe hain 
basan-e-naqsh-e-pa-e-rah-rawan ku-e-tamanna mein nahin uThne ki taqat kya karen lachaar baiThe hain 
ye apni chaal hai uftadgi se in dinon pahron nazar aaya jahan par saya-e-diwar baiThe hain 
kahen hain sabr kis ko aah nang o nam hai kya shai gharaz ro piT kar un sab ko hum yak bar baiThe hain 
kahin bose ki mat jurat dila kar baiThiyo un se abhi is had ko wo kaifi nahin hushyar baiThe hain 
najibon ka ajab kuchh haal hai is daur mein yaro jise puchho yahi kahte hain hum bekar baiThe hain 
nai ye waza sharmane ki sikhi aaj hai tum ne hamare pas sahab warna yun sau bar baiThe hain 
kahan gardish falak ki chain deti hai suna 'insha' ghanimat hai ki hum surat yahan do-chaar baiThe hain

tujhī ko jo yaañ jalva-farmā na dekhā barābar hai duniyā ko dekhā na dekhā 
mirā ġhuncha-e-dil hai vo dil girafta ki jis ko kisū ne kabhū vā na dekhā 
yagāna hai tū aah begānagī meñ koī dūsrā aur aisā na dekhā 
aziyyat musībat malāmat balā.eñ tire ishq meñ ham ne kyā kyā na dekhā 
kiyā muj ko dāġhoñ ne sarv-e-charāġhāñ kabhū tū ne aa kar tamāshā na dekhā 
taġhāful ne tere ye kuchh din dikhā.e idhar tū ne lekin na dekhā na dekhā 
hijāb-e-ruḳh-e-yār the aap hī ham khulī aañkh jab koī pardā na dekhā 
shab o roz ai 'dard' dar pe huuñ us ke kisū ne jise yaañ na samjhā na dekhā 
tujhi ko jo yan jalwa-farma na dekha barabar hai duniya ko dekha na dekha 
mera ghuncha-e-dil hai wo dil girafta ki jis ko kisu ne kabhu wa na dekha 
yagana hai tu aah beganagi mein koi dusra aur aisa na dekha 
aziyyat musibat malamat balaen tere ishq mein hum ne kya kya na dekha 
kiya muj ko daghon ne sarw-e-charaghan kabhu tu ne aa kar tamasha na dekha 
taghaful ne tere ye kuchh din dikhae idhar tu ne lekin na dekha na dekha 
hijab-e-ruKH-e-yar the aap hi hum khuli aankh jab koi parda na dekha 
shab o roz ai 'dard' dar pe hun us ke kisu ne jise yan na samjha na dekha

kab vo zāhir hogā aur hairān kar degā mujhe jitnī bhī mushkil meñ huuñ āsān kar degā mujhe 
rū-ba-rū kar ke kabhī apne mahakte surḳh hoñT ek do pal ke liye gul-dān kar degā mujhe 
ruuh phūñkegā mohabbat kī mire paikar meñ vo phir vo apne sāmne be-jān kar degā mujhe 
ḳhvāhishoñ kā ḳhuuñ bahā.egā sar-e-bāzār-e-shauq aur mukammal be-sar-o-sāmān kar degā mujhe 
munhadim kar degā aa kar saarī tāmīrāt-e-dil dekhte hī dekhte vīrān kar degā mujhe 
ek nā-maujūdgī rah jā.egī chāroñ taraf rafta rafta is qadar sunsān kar degā mujhe 
yā to mujh se vo chhuḌā degā ġhazal-goī 'zafar' yā kisī din sāhib-e-dīvān kar degā mujhe 
kab wo zahir hoga aur hairan kar dega mujhe jitni bhi mushkil mein hun aasan kar dega mujhe 
ru-ba-ru kar ke kabhi apne mahakte surKH honT ek do pal ke liye gul-dan kar dega mujhe 
ruh phunkega mohabbat ki mere paikar mein wo phir wo apne samne be-jaan kar dega mujhe 
KHwahishon ka KHun bahaega sar-e-bazar-e-shauq aur mukammal be-sar-o-saman kar dega mujhe 
munhadim kar dega aa kar sari tamiraat-e-dil dekhte hi dekhte viran kar dega mujhe 
ek na-maujudgi rah jaegi chaaron taraf rafta rafta is qadar sunsan kar dega mujhe 
ya to mujh se wo chhuDa dega ghazal-goi 'zafar' ya kisi din sahib-e-diwan kar dega mujhe

murjhā ke kaalī jhiil meñ girte hue bhī dekh sūraj huuñ merā rang magar din-Dhale bhī dekh 
kāġhaz kī katranoñ ko bhī kahte haiñ log phuul rangoñ kā e'tibār hī kyā sūñgh ke bhī dekh 
har chand raakh ho ke bikharnā hai raah meñ jalte hue paroñ se uḌā huuñ mujhe bhī dekh 
dushman hai raat phir bhī hai din se milī huī sub.hoñ ke darmiyān haiñ jo fāsle bhī dekh 
'ālam meñ jis kī dhuum thī us shāhkār par dīmak ne jo likhe kabhī vo tabsire bhī dekh 
tū ne kahā na thā ki maiñ kashtī pe bojh huuñ āñkhoñ ko ab na Dhāñp mujhe Dūbte bhī dekh 
us kī shikast ho na kahīñ terī bhī shikast ye aa.ina jo TuuT gayā hai ise bhī dekh 
tū hī barahna-pā nahīñ is jaltī ret par talvoñ meñ jo havā ke haiñ vo aable bhī dekh 
bichhtī thiiñ jis kī raah meñ phūloñ kī chādareñ ab us kī ḳhaak ghaas ke pairoñ-tale bhī dekh 
kyā shāḳh-e-bā-samar hai jo taktā hai farsh ko nazreñ uThā 'shakeb' kabhī sāmne bhī dekh 
murjha ke kali jhil mein girte hue bhi dekh suraj hun mera rang magar din-Dhale bhi dekh 
kaghaz ki katranon ko bhi kahte hain log phul rangon ka e'tibar hi kya sungh ke bhi dekh 
har chand rakh ho ke bikharna hai rah mein jalte hue paron se uDa hun mujhe bhi dekh 
dushman hai raat phir bhi hai din se mili hui subhon ke darmiyan hain jo fasle bhi dekh 
'alam mein jis ki dhum thi us shahkar par dimak ne jo likhe kabhi wo tabsire bhi dekh 
tu ne kaha na tha ki main kashti pe bojh hun aankhon ko ab na Dhanp mujhe Dubte bhi dekh 
us ki shikast ho na kahin teri bhi shikast ye aaina jo TuT gaya hai ise bhi dekh 
tu hi barahna-pa nahin is jalti ret par talwon mein jo hawa ke hain wo aable bhi dekh 
bichhti thin jis ki rah mein phulon ki chadaren ab us ki KHak ghas ke pairon-tale bhi dekh 
kya shaKH-e-ba-samar hai jo takta hai farsh ko nazren uTha 'shakeb' kabhi samne bhi dekh

ek qatra ashk kā chhalkā to dariyā kar diyā ek musht-e-ḳhāk jo bikhrī to sahrā kar diyā 
mere TuuTe hausle ke par nikalte dekh kar us ne dīvāroñ ko apnī aur ūñchā kar diyā 
vārdāt-e-qalb likkhī ham ne farzī naam se aur hāthoñ-hāth us ko ḳhud hī le jā kar diyā 
us kī nārāzī kā sūraj jab savā neze pe thā apne harf-e-ijz hī ne sar pe saaya kar diyā 
duniyā bhar kī ḳhaak koī chhāntā phirtā hai ab aap ne dar se uThā kar kaisā rusvā kar diyā 
ab na koī ḳhauf dil meñ aur na āñkhoñ meñ umiid tū ne marg-e-nā-gahāñ bīmār achchhā kar diyā 
bhuul jā ye kal tire naqsh-e-qadam the chāñd par dekh un hāthoñ ko kis ne aaj kaasa kar diyā 
ham to kahne jā rahe the hamza-e-ye vassalām biich meñ us ne achānak nūn-ġhunna kar diyā 
ham ko gaalī ke liye bhī lab hilā sakte nahīñ ġhair ko bosa diyā to muñh se dikhlā kar diyā 
tīrgī kī bhī koī had hotī hai āḳhir miyāñ surḳh parcham ko jalā kar hī ujālā kar diyā 
bazm meñ ahl-e-suḳhan taqtī.a farmāte rahe aur ham ne apne dil kā bojh halkā kar diyā 
jaane kis ke muntazir baiThe haiñ jhāḌū pher kar dil se har ḳhvāhish ko 'ādil' ham ne chaltā kar diyā 
ek qatra ashk ka chhalka to dariya kar diya ek musht-e-KHak jo bikhri to sahra kar diya 
mere TuTe hausle ke par nikalte dekh kar us ne diwaron ko apni aur uncha kar diya 
wardat-e-qalb likkhi hum ne farzi nam se aur hathon-hath us ko KHud hi le ja kar diya 
us ki naraazi ka suraj jab sawa neze pe tha apne harf-e-ijz hi ne sar pe saya kar diya 
duniya bhar ki KHak koi chhanta phirta hai ab aap ne dar se uTha kar kaisa ruswa kar diya 
ab na koi KHauf dil mein aur na aankhon mein umid tu ne marg-e-na-gahan bimar achchha kar diya 
bhul ja ye kal tere naqsh-e-qadam the chand par dekh un hathon ko kis ne aaj kasa kar diya 
hum to kahne ja rahe the hamza-e-ye wassalam bich mein us ne achanak nun-ghunna kar diya 
hum ko gali ke liye bhi lab hila sakte nahin ghair ko bosa diya to munh se dikhla kar diya 
tirgi ki bhi koi had hoti hai aaKHir miyan surKH parcham ko jala kar hi ujala kar diya 
bazm mein ahl-e-suKHan taqtia farmate rahe aur hum ne apne dil ka bojh halka kar diya 
jaane kis ke muntazir baiThe hain jhaDu pher kar dil se har KHwahish ko 'adil' hum ne chalta kar diya

kaabe kī hai havas kabhī kū-e-butāñ kī hai mujh ko ḳhabar nahīñ mirī miTTī kahāñ kī hai 
sun ke mirā fasāna unheñ lutf aa gayā suntā huuñ ab ki roz talab qissa-ḳhvāñ kī hai 
paiġhām-bar kī baat par aapas meñ ranj kyā merī zabāñ kī hai na tumhārī zabāñ kī hai 
kuchh tāzgī ho lazzat-e-āzār ke liye har dam mujhe talāsh na.e āsmāñ kī hai 
jāñ-bar bhī ho ga.e haiñ bahut mujh se nīm-jāñ kyā ġham hai ai tabīb jo puurī vahāñ kī hai 
hasrat baras rahī hai hamāre mazār par kahte haiñ sab ye qabr kisī naujavāñ kī hai 
vaqt-e-ḳhirām-e-nāz dikhā do judā judā ye chaal hashr kī ye ravish āsmāñ kī hai 
fursat kahāñ ki ham se kisī vaqt tū mile din ġhair kā hai raat tire pāsbāñ kī hai 
qāsid kī guftugū se tasallī ho kis tarah chhuptī nahīñ vo baat jo terī zabāñ kī hai 
jaur-e-raqīb o zulm-e-falak kā nahīñ ḳhayāl tashvīsh ek ḳhātir-e-nā-mehrbāñ kī hai 
sun kar mirā fasāna-e-ġham us ne ye kahā ho jaa.e jhuuT sach yahī ḳhūbī bayāñ kī hai 
dāman sambhāl bāñdh kamar āstīñ chaḌhā ḳhanjar nikāl dil meñ agar imtihāñ kī hai 
har har nafas meñ dil se nikalne lagā ġhubār kyā jaane gard-e-rāh ye kis kārvāñ kī hai 
kyūñki na aate ḳhuld se aadam zamīn par mauzūñ vahīñ vo ḳhuub hai jo sunte jahāñ kī hai 
taqdīr se ye pūchh rahā huuñ ki ishq meñ tadbīr koī bhī sitam-e-nā-gahāñ kī hai 
urdu hai jis kā naam hamīñ jānte haiñ 'dāġh' hindostāñ meñ dhuum hamārī zabāñ kī hai 
kabe ki hai hawas kabhi ku-e-butan ki hai mujh ko KHabar nahin meri miTTi kahan ki hai 
sun ke mera fasana unhen lutf aa gaya sunta hun ab ki roz talab qissa-KHwan ki hai 
paigham-bar ki baat par aapas mein ranj kya meri zaban ki hai na tumhaari zaban ki hai 
kuchh tazgi ho lazzat-e-azar ke liye har dam mujhe talash nae aasman ki hai 
jaan-bar bhi ho gae hain bahut mujh se nim-jaan kya gham hai ai tabib jo puri wahan ki hai 
hasrat baras rahi hai hamare mazar par kahte hain sab ye qabr kisi naujawan ki hai 
waqt-e-KHiram-e-naz dikha do juda juda ye chaal hashr ki ye rawish aasman ki hai 
fursat kahan ki hum se kisi waqt tu mile din ghair ka hai raat tere pasban ki hai 
qasid ki guftugu se tasalli ho kis tarah chhupti nahin wo baat jo teri zaban ki hai 
jaur-e-raqib o zulm-e-falak ka nahin KHayal tashwish ek KHatir-e-na-mehrban ki hai 
sun kar mera fasana-e-gham us ne ye kaha ho jae jhuT sach yahi KHubi bayan ki hai 
daman sambhaal bandh kamar aastin chaDha KHanjar nikal dil mein agar imtihan ki hai 
har har nafas mein dil se nikalne laga ghubar kya jaane gard-e-rah ye kis karwan ki hai 
kyunki na aate KHuld se aadam zamin par mauzun wahin wo KHub hai jo sunte jahan ki hai 
taqdir se ye puchh raha hun ki ishq mein tadbir koi bhi sitam-e-na-gahan ki hai 
urdu hai jis ka nam hamin jaante hain 'dagh' hindostan mein dhum hamari zaban ki hai

kaun aayā rāste ā.īna-ḳhāne ho ga.e raat raushan ho ga.ī din bhī suhāne ho ga.e 
kyuuñ havelī ke ujaḌne kā mujhe afsos ho saikḌoñ be-ghar parindoñ ke Thikāne ho ga.e 
jaao un kamroñ ke ā.īne uThā kar pheñk do be-adab ye kah rahe haiñ ham purāne ho ga.e 
ye bhī mumkin hai ki maiñ ne us ko pahchānā na ho ab use dekhe hue kitne zamāne ho ga.e 
palkoñ par ye aañsū pyaar kī tauhīn the āñkhoñ se gire motī ke daane ho ga.e 
kaun aaya raste aaina-KHane ho gae raat raushan ho gai din bhi suhane ho gae 
kyun haweli ke ujaDne ka mujhe afsos ho saikDon be-ghar parindon ke Thikane ho gae 
jao un kamron ke aaine uTha kar phenk do be-adab ye kah rahe hain hum purane ho gae 
ye bhi mumkin hai ki main ne us ko pahchana na ho ab use dekhe hue kitne zamane ho gae 
palkon par ye aansu pyar ki tauhin the aankhon se gire moti ke dane ho gae

jab tujhe yaad kareñ kār-e-jahāñ kheñchtā hai aur phir ishq vahī koh-e-girāñ kheñchtā hai 
kisī dushman kā koī tiir na pahuñchā mujh tak dekhnā ab ke mirā dost kamāñ kheñchtā hai 
ahd-e-fursat meñ kisī yār-e-guzishta kā ḳhayāl jab bhī aatā hai to jaise rag-e-jāñ kheñchtā hai 
dil ke TukḌoñ ko kahāñ joḌ sakā hai koī phir bhī āvāza-e-ā.īna-girāñ kheñchtā hai 
intihā ishq kī koī na havas kī koī dekhnā ye hai ki had kaun kahāñ kheñchtā hai 
khiñchte jaate haiñ rasan-basta ġhulāmoñ kī tarah jis taraf qāfila-e-umr-e-ravāñ kheñchtā hai 
ham to rahvār-e-zabūñ haiñ vo muqaddar kā savār ḳhud hī mahmez kare ḳhud hī inaañ kheñchtā hai 
rishta-e-teġh-o-gulū ab bhī salāmat hai 'farāz' ab bhī maqtal kī taraf dil sā javāñ kheñchtā hai 
jab tujhe yaad karen kar-e-jahan khenchta hai aur phir ishq wahi koh-e-giran khenchta hai 
kisi dushman ka koi tir na pahuncha mujh tak dekhna ab ke mera dost kaman khenchta hai 
ahd-e-fursat mein kisi yar-e-guzishta ka KHayal jab bhi aata hai to jaise rag-e-jaan khenchta hai 
dil ke TukDon ko kahan joD saka hai koi phir bhi aawaza-e-aina-giran khenchta hai 
intiha ishq ki koi na hawas ki koi dekhna ye hai ki had kaun kahan khenchta hai 
khinchte jate hain rasan-basta ghulamon ki tarah jis taraf qafila-e-umr-e-rawan khenchta hai 
hum to rahwar-e-zabun hain wo muqaddar ka sawar KHud hi mahmez kare KHud hi inan khenchta hai 
rishta-e-tegh-o-gulu ab bhi salamat hai 'faraaz' ab bhi maqtal ki taraf dil sa jawan khenchta hai

ab dil kī taraf dard kī yalġhār bahut hai duniyā mire zaḳhmoñ kī talabgār bahut hai 
ab TuuT rahā hai mirī hastī kā tasavvur is vaqt mujhe tujh se sarokār bahut hai 
miTTī kī ye dīvār kahīñ TuuT na jaa.e roko ki mire ḳhuun kī raftār bahut hai 
har saañs ukhaḌ jaane kī koshish meñ pareshāñ siine meñ koī hai jo giraftār bahut hai 
paanī se ulajhte hue insān kā ye shor us paar bhī hogā magar is paar bahut hai 
ab dil ki taraf dard ki yalghaar bahut hai duniya mere zaKHmon ki talabgar bahut hai 
ab TuT raha hai meri hasti ka tasawwur is waqt mujhe tujh se sarokar bahut hai 
miTTi ki ye diwar kahin TuT na jae roko ki mere KHun ki raftar bahut hai 
har sans ukhaD jaane ki koshish mein pareshan sine mein koi hai jo giraftar bahut hai 
pani se ulajhte hue insan ka ye shor us par bhi hoga magar is par bahut hai

de mohabbat to mohabbat meñ asar paidā kar jo idhar dil meñ hai yā rab vo udhar paidā kar 
dūd-e-dil ishq meñ itnā to asar paidā kar sar kaTe sham.a kī mānind to sar paidā kar 
phir hamārā dil-e-gum-gashta bhī mil jā.egā pahle tū apnā dahan apnī kamar paidā kar 
kaam lene haiñ mohabbat meñ bahut se yā rab aur dil de hameñ ik aur jigar paidā kar 
tham zarā ai adam-ābād ke jaane vaale rah ke duniyā meñ abhī zād-e-safar paidā kar 
jhuuT jab bolte haiñ vo to duā hotī hai yā ilāhī mirī bātoñ meñ asar paidā kar 
ā.īna dekhnā is husn pe āsān nahīñ pesh-tar aañkh mirī merī nazar paidā kar 
sub.h-e-furqat to qayāmat kī sahar hai yā rab apne bandoñ ke liye aur sahar paidā kar 
mujh ko rotā huā dekheñ to jhulas jaa.eñ raqīb aag paanī meñ bhī ai soz-e-jigar paidā kar 
miT ke bhī dūri-e-gulshan nahīñ bhātī yā rab apnī qudrat se mirī ḳhaak meñ par paidā kar 
shikva-e-dard-e-judā.ī pe vo farmāte haiñ ranj sahne ko hamārā sā jigar paidā kar 
din nikalne ko hai rāhat se guzar jaane de ruuTh kar tū na qayāmat kī sahar paidā kar 
ham ne dekhā hai ki mil jaate haiñ laḌne vaale sulh kī ḳhū bhī to ai bāni-e-shar paidā kar 
mujh se ghar aane ke vaade par bigaḌ kar bole kah diyā ġhair ke dil meñ abhī ghar paidā kar 
mujh se kahtī hai kaḌak kar ye kamāñ qātil kī tiir ban jaa.e nishāna vo jigar paidā kar 
kyā qayāmat meñ bhī parda na uThegā ruḳh se ab to merī shab-e-yaldā kī sahar paidā kar 
dekhnā khel nahīñ jalva-e-dīdār tirā pahle muusā sā koī ahl-e-nazar paidā kar 
dil meñ bhī miltā hai vo kaaba bhī us kā hai maqām raah nazdīk kī ai azm-e-safar paidā kar 
zof kā hukm ye hai hoñT na hilne paa.eñ dil ye kahtā hai ki naale meñ asar paidā kar 
naale 'beḳhud' ke qayāmat haiñ tujhe yaad rahe zulm karnā hai to patthar kā jigar paidā kar 
de mohabbat to mohabbat mein asar paida kar jo idhar dil mein hai ya rab wo udhar paida kar 
dud-e-dil ishq mein itna to asar paida kar sar kaTe shama ki manind to sar paida kar 
phir hamara dil-e-gum-gashta bhi mil jaega pahle tu apna dahan apni kamar paida kar 
kaam lene hain mohabbat mein bahut se ya rab aur dil de hamein ek aur jigar paida kar 
tham zara ai adam-abaad ke jaane wale rah ke duniya mein abhi zad-e-safar paida kar 
jhuT jab bolte hain wo to dua hoti hai ya ilahi meri baaton mein asar paida kar 
aaina dekhna is husn pe aasan nahin pesh-tar aankh meri meri nazar paida kar 
subh-e-furqat to qayamat ki sahar hai ya rab apne bandon ke liye aur sahar paida kar 
mujh ko rota hua dekhen to jhulas jaen raqib aag pani mein bhi ai soz-e-jigar paida kar 
miT ke bhi duri-e-gulshan nahin bhati ya rab apni qudrat se meri KHak mein par paida kar 
shikwa-e-dard-e-judai pe wo farmate hain ranj sahne ko hamara sa jigar paida kar 
din nikalne ko hai rahat se guzar jaane de ruTh kar tu na qayamat ki sahar paida kar 
hum ne dekha hai ki mil jate hain laDne wale sulh ki KHu bhi to ai bani-e-shar paida kar 
mujh se ghar aane ke wade par bigaD kar bole kah diya ghair ke dil mein abhi ghar paida kar 
mujh se kahti hai kaDak kar ye kaman qatil ki tir ban jae nishana wo jigar paida kar 
kya qayamat mein bhi parda na uThega ruKH se ab to meri shab-e-yalda ki sahar paida kar 
dekhna khel nahin jalwa-e-didar tera pahle musa sa koi ahl-e-nazar paida kar 
dil mein bhi milta hai wo kaba bhi us ka hai maqam rah nazdik ki ai azm-e-safar paida kar 
zof ka hukm ye hai honT na hilne paen dil ye kahta hai ki nale mein asar paida kar 
nale 'beKHud' ke qayamat hain tujhe yaad rahe zulm karna hai to patthar ka jigar paida kar

zamāñ makāñ the mire sāmne bikharte hue maiñ Dher ho gayā tūl-e-safar se Darte hue 
dikhā ke lamha-e-ḳhālī kā aks-e-lā-tafsīr ye mujh meñ kaun hai mujh se farār karte hue 
bas ek zaḳhm thā dil meñ jagah banātā huā hazār ġham the magar bhūlte-bisarte hue 
vo TūTte hue rishtoñ kā husn-e-āḳhir thā ki chup sī lag ga.ī donoñ ko baat karte hue 
ajab nazārā thā bastī kā us kināre par sabhī bichhaḌ ga.e dariyā se paar utarte hue 
maiñ ek hādsa ban kar khaḌā thā raste meñ ajab zamāne mire sar se the guzarte hue 
vahī huā ki takalluf kā husn biich meñ thā badan the qurb-e-tahī-lams se bikharte hue 
zaman makan the mere samne bikharte hue main Dher ho gaya tul-e-safar se Darte hue 
dikha ke lamha-e-KHali ka aks-e-la-tafsir ye mujh mein kaun hai mujh se farar karte hue 
bas ek zaKHm tha dil mein jagah banata hua hazar gham the magar bhulte-bisarte hue 
wo TuTte hue rishton ka husn-e-aKHir tha ki chup si lag gai donon ko baat karte hue 
ajab nazara tha basti ka us kinare par sabhi bichhaD gae dariya se par utarte hue 
main ek hadsa ban kar khaDa tha raste mein ajab zamane mere sar se the guzarte hue 
wahi hua ki takalluf ka husn bich mein tha badan the qurb-e-tahi-lams se bikharte hue

fitrat ko ḳhirad ke rū-ba-rū kar tasḳhīr-e-maqām-e-rañg-o-bū kar 
tū apnī ḳhudī ko kho chukā hai khoī huī shai kī justujū kar 
tāroñ kī fazā hai be-karāna tū bhī ye maqām-e-ārzū kar 
uryāñ haiñ tire chaman kī hūreñ chāk-e-gul-o-lāla ko rafū kar 
be-zauq nahīñ agarche fitrat jo us se na ho sakā vo tū kar 
fitrat ko KHirad ke ru-ba-ru kar tasKHir-e-maqam-e-rang-o-bu kar 
tu apni KHudi ko kho chuka hai khoi hui shai ki justuju kar 
taron ki faza hai be-karana tu bhi ye maqam-e-arzu kar 
uryan hain tere chaman ki huren chaak-e-gul-o-lala ko rafu kar 
be-zauq nahin agarche fitrat jo us se na ho saka wo tu kar

sab qarīne usī dildār ke rakh dete haiñ ham ġhazal meñ bhī hunar yaar ke rakh dete haiñ 
shāyad aa jaa.eñ kabhī chashm-e-ḳharīdār meñ ham jaan o dil biich meñ bāzār ke rakh dete haiñ 
taaki ta.ana na mile ham ko tunuk-zarfī kā ham qadah sāmne aġhyār ke rakh dete haiñ 
ab kise ranj-e-asīrī ki qafas meñ sayyād saare manzar gul-o-gulzār ke rakh dete haiñ 
zikr-e-jānāñ meñ ye duniyā ko kahāñ le aa.e log kyuuñ mas.ale bekār ke rakh dete haiñ 
vaqt vo rañg dikhātā hai ki ahl-e-dil bhī tāq-e-nisyāñ pe suḳhan yaar ke rakh dete haiñ 
zindagī terī amānat hai magar kyā kiije log ye bojh bhī thak-hār ke rakh dete haiñ 
ham to chāhat meñ bhī 'ġhālib' ke muqallid haiñ 'farāz' jis pe marte haiñ use maar ke rakh dete haiñ 
sab qarine usi dildar ke rakh dete hain hum ghazal mein bhi hunar yar ke rakh dete hain 
shayad aa jaen kabhi chashm-e-KHaridar mein hum jaan o dil bich mein bazar ke rakh dete hain 
taki tana na mile hum ko tunuk-zarfi ka hum qadah samne aghyar ke rakh dete hain 
ab kise ranj-e-asiri ki qafas mein sayyaad sare manzar gul-o-gulzar ke rakh dete hain 
zikr-e-jaanan mein ye duniya ko kahan le aae log kyun masale bekar ke rakh dete hain 
waqt wo rang dikhata hai ki ahl-e-dil bhi taq-e-nisyan pe suKHan yar ke rakh dete hain 
zindagi teri amanat hai magar kya kije log ye bojh bhi thak-haar ke rakh dete hain 
hum to chahat mein bhi 'ghaalib' ke muqallid hain 'faraaz' jis pe marte hain use mar ke rakh dete hain

ab to shahroñ se ḳhabar aatī hai dīvānoñ kī koī pahchān hī baaqī nahīñ vīrānoñ kī 
apnī poshāk se hushyār ki ḳhuddām-e-qadīm dhajjiyāñ māñgte haiñ apne garebānoñ kī 
san.ateñ phailtī jaatī haiñ magar is ke saath sarhadeñ TūTtī jaatī haiñ gulistānoñ kī 
dil meñ vo zaḳhm khile haiñ ki chaman kyā shai hai ghar meñ bārāt sī utrī huī gul-dānoñ kī 
un ko kyā fikr ki maiñ paar lagā yā Duubā bahs karte rahe sāhil pe jo tūfānoñ kī 
terī rahmat to musallam hai magar ye to batā kaun bijlī ko ḳhabar detā hai kāshānoñ kī 
maqbare bante haiñ zindoñ ke makānoñ se buland kis qadar auj pe takrīm hai insānoñ kī 
ek ik yaad ke hāthoñ pe charāġhoñ bhare tasht ka.aba-e-dil kī fazā hai ki sanam-ḳhānoñ kī 
ab to shahron se KHabar aati hai diwanon ki koi pahchan hi baqi nahin viranon ki 
apni poshak se hushyar ki KHuddam-e-qadim dhajjiyan mangte hain apne garebanon ki 
sanaten phailti jati hain magar is ke sath sarhaden TuTti jati hain gulistanon ki 
dil mein wo zaKHm khile hain ki chaman kya shai hai ghar mein baraat si utri hui gul-danon ki 
un ko kya fikr ki main par laga ya Duba bahs karte rahe sahil pe jo tufanon ki 
teri rahmat to musallam hai magar ye to bata kaun bijli ko KHabar deta hai kashanon ki 
maqbare bante hain zindon ke makanon se buland kis qadar auj pe takrim hai insanon ki 
ek ek yaad ke hathon pe charaghon bhare tasht kaba-e-dil ki faza hai ki sanam-KHanon ki

haq vafā ke jo ham jatāne lage aap kuchh kah ke muskurāne lage 
thā yahāñ dil meñ tān-e-vasl-e-adū uzr un kī zabāñ pe aane lage 
ham ko jiinā paḌegā furqat meñ vo agar himmat āzmāne lage 
Dar hai merī zabāñ na khul jaa.e ab vo bāteñ bahut banāne lage 
jaan bachtī nazar nahīñ aatī ġhair ulfat bahut jatāne lage 
tum ko karnā paḌegā uzr-e-jafā ham agar dard-e-dil sunāne lage 
saḳht mushkil hai sheva-e-taslīm ham bhī āḳhir ko jī churāne lage 
jī meñ hai luuñ razā-e-pīr-e-muġhāñ qāfile phir haram ko jaane lage 
sirr-e-bātin ko faash kar yā rab ahl-e-zāhir bahut satāne lage 
vaqt-e-ruḳhsat thā saḳht 'hālī' par ham bhī baiThe the jab vo jaane lage 
haq wafa ke jo hum jatane lage aap kuchh kah ke muskurane lage 
tha yahan dil mein tan-e-wasl-e-adu uzr un ki zaban pe aane lage 
hum ko jina paDega furqat mein wo agar himmat aazmane lage 
Dar hai meri zaban na khul jae ab wo baaten bahut banane lage 
jaan bachti nazar nahin aati ghair ulfat bahut jatane lage 
tum ko karna paDega uzr-e-jafa hum agar dard-e-dil sunane lage 
saKHt mushkil hai shewa-e-taslim hum bhi aaKHir ko ji churane lage 
ji mein hai lun raza-e-pir-e-mughan qafile phir haram ko jaane lage 
sirr-e-baatin ko fash kar ya rab ahl-e-zahir bahut satane lage 
waqt-e-ruKHsat tha saKHt 'haali' par hum bhi baiThe the jab wo jaane lage

hijr kī shab nāla-e-dil vo sadā dene lage sunñe vaale raat kaTne kī duā dene lage 
aa.iye hāl-e-dil-e-majrūh suniye dekhiye kyā kahā zaḳhmoñ ne kyuuñ Tāñke sadā dene lage 
kis nazar se aap ne dekhā dil-e-majrūh ko zaḳhm jo kuchh bhar chale the phir havā dene lage
