sunñe vaale ro diye sun kar marīz-e-ġham kā haal dekhne vaale taras khā kar duā dene lage 
juz zamīn-e-kū-e-jānāñ kuchh nahīñ pesh-e-nigāh jis kā darvāza nazar aayā sadā dene lage 
bāġhbāñ ne aag dī jab āshiyāne ko mire jin pe takiya thā vahī patte havā dene lage 
muTThiyoñ meñ ḳhaak le kar dost aa.e vaqt-e-dafn zindagī bhar kī mohabbat kā silā dene lage 
aa.ina ho jaa.e merā ishq un ke husn kā kyā maza ho dard agar ḳhud hī davā dene lage 
sīna-e-sozāñ meñ 'sāqib' ghuT rahā hai vo dhuāñ uf karūñ to aag duniyā kī havā dene lage 
hijr ki shab nala-e-dil wo sada dene lage sunne wale raat kaTne ki dua dene lage 
aaiye haal-e-dil-e-majruh suniye dekhiye kya kaha zaKHmon ne kyun Tanke sada dene lage 
kis nazar se aap ne dekha dil-e-majruh ko zaKHm jo kuchh bhar chale the phir hawa dene lage 
sunne wale ro diye sun kar mariz-e-gham ka haal dekhne wale taras kha kar dua dene lage 
juz zamin-e-ku-e-jaanan kuchh nahin pesh-e-nigah jis ka darwaza nazar aaya sada dene lage 
baghban ne aag di jab aashiyane ko mere jin pe takiya tha wahi patte hawa dene lage 
muTThiyon mein KHak le kar dost aae waqt-e-dafn zindagi bhar ki mohabbat ka sila dene lage 
aaina ho jae mera ishq un ke husn ka kya maza ho dard agar KHud hi dawa dene lage 
sina-e-sozan mein 'saqib' ghuT raha hai wo dhuan uf karun to aag duniya ki hawa dene lage

sab hamāre liye zanjīr liye phirte haiñ ham sar-e-zulf-e-girah-gīr liye phirte haiñ 
kaun thā said-e-vafādār ki ab tak sayyād bāl-o-par us ke tire tiir liye phirte haiñ 
tū jo aa.e to shab-e-tār nahīñ yaañ har sū mish.aleñ nāla-e-shab-gīr liye phirte haiñ 
terī sūrat se kisī kī nahīñ miltī sūrat ham jahāñ meñ tirī tasvīr liye phirte haiñ 
mo.atakif garche ba-zāhir huuñ tasavvur meñ magar kū-ba-kū saath ye be-pīr liye phirte haiñ 
rañg-e-ḳhūbān-e-jahāñ dekhte hī zard kiyā aap zor āñkhoñ meñ iksīr liye phirte haiñ 
jo hai martā hai bhalā kis ko adāvat hogī aap kyuuñ haath meñ shamshīr liye phirte haiñ 
sar-kashī sham.a kī lagtī nahīñ gar un ko burī log kyuuñ bazm meñ gul-gīr liye phirte haiñ 
tā gunahgārī meñ ham ko koī mat.ūñ na kare haath meñ nāma-e-taqdīr liye phirte haiñ 
qasr-e-tan ko yuuñ hī banvā ye bagūle 'nāsiḳh' ḳhuub hī naqsha-e-tāmīr liye phirte haiñ 
sab hamare liye zanjir liye phirte hain hum sar-e-zulf-e-girah-gir liye phirte hain 
kaun tha said-e-wafadar ki ab tak sayyaad baal-o-par us ke tere tir liye phirte hain 
tu jo aae to shab-e-tar nahin yan har su mishalen nala-e-shab-gir liye phirte hain 
teri surat se kisi ki nahin milti surat hum jahan mein teri taswir liye phirte hain 
moatakif garche ba-zahir hun tasawwur mein magar ku-ba-ku sath ye be-pir liye phirte hain 
rang-e-KHuban-e-jahan dekhte hi zard kiya aap zor aankhon mein iksir liye phirte hain 
jo hai marta hai bhala kis ko adawat hogi aap kyun hath mein shamshir liye phirte hain 
sar-kashi shama ki lagti nahin gar un ko buri log kyun bazm mein gul-gir liye phirte hain 
ta gunahgari mein hum ko koi matun na kare hath mein nama-e-taqdir liye phirte hain 
qasr-e-tan ko yun hi banwa ye bagule 'nasiKH' KHub hi naqsha-e-tamir liye phirte hain

jhuuT par us ke bharosā kar liyā dhuup itnī thī ki saayā kar liyā 
ab hamārī mushkileñ kuchh kam huiiñ dushmanoñ ne ek chehrā kar liyā 
haath kyā aayā sajā kar mahfileñ aur bhī ḳhud ko akelā kar liyā 
hārne kā hausla to thā nahīñ jiit meñ dushman kī hissa kar liyā 
manziloñ par ham mileñ ye tai huā vāpsī meñ saath pakkā kar liyā 
saarī duniyā se laḌe jis ke liye ek din us se bhī jhagḌā kar liyā 
qurb kā us ke uThā kar fā.eda hijr kā sāmāñ ikaTThā kar liyā 
guftugū se hal to kuchh niklā nahīñ ranjishoñ ko aur taaza kar liyā 
mol thā har chiiz kā bāzār meñ ham ne tanhā.ī kā saudā kar liyā 
jhuT par us ke bharosa kar liya dhup itni thi ki saya kar liya 
ab hamari mushkilen kuchh kam huin dushmanon ne ek chehra kar liya 
hath kya aaya saja kar mahfilen aur bhi KHud ko akela kar liya 
haarne ka hausla to tha nahin jit mein dushman ki hissa kar liya 
manzilon par hum milen ye tai hua wapsi mein sath pakka kar liya 
sari duniya se laDe jis ke liye ek din us se bhi jhagDa kar liya 
qurb ka us ke uTha kar faeda hijr ka saman ikaTTha kar liya 
guftugu se hal to kuchh nikla nahin ranjishon ko aur taza kar liya 
mol tha har chiz ka bazar mein hum ne tanhai ka sauda kar liya

pur-kaif bahāroñ ne bhī dil toḌ diyā hai haañ un ke nazāroñ ne bhī dil toḌ diyā hai 
tūfān kā sheva to hai kashtī ko Dubonā ḳhāmosh kināroñ ne bhī dil toḌ diyā hai 
is Dūbte sūraj se to ummīd hī kyā thī hañs hañs ke sitāroñ ne bhī dil toḌ diyā hai 
kis tarah kareñ tujh se gila tere sitam kā mad.hosh ishāroñ ne bhī dil toḌ diyā hai 
maanā ki thī ġhamgīn kalī ḳhauf-e-ḳhizāñ se chup rah ke bahāroñ ne bhī dil toḌ diyā hai 
aġhyār kā shikva nahīñ is ahd-e-havas meñ ik umr ke yāroñ ne bhī dil toḌ diyā hai 
ye daur-e-mohabbat bhī ajab daur hai is meñ ai 'naqsh' sahāroñ ne bhī dil toḌ diyā hai 
pur-kaif bahaaron ne bhi dil toD diya hai han un ke nazaron ne bhi dil toD diya hai 
tufan ka shewa to hai kashti ko Dubona KHamosh kinaron ne bhi dil toD diya hai 
is Dubte suraj se to ummid hi kya thi hans hans ke sitaron ne bhi dil toD diya hai 
kis tarah karen tujh se gila tere sitam ka madhosh ishaaron ne bhi dil toD diya hai 
mana ki thi ghamgin kali KHauf-e-KHizan se chup rah ke bahaaron ne bhi dil toD diya hai 
aghyar ka shikwa nahin is ahd-e-hawas mein ek umr ke yaron ne bhi dil toD diya hai 
ye daur-e-mohabbat bhi ajab daur hai is mein ai 'naqsh' sahaaron ne bhi dil toD diya hai

jis se ye tabī.at baḌī mushkil se lagī thī dekhā to vo tasvīr har ik dil se lagī thī 
tanhā.ī meñ rote haiñ ki yuuñ dil ko sukūñ ho ye choT kisī sāhab-e-mahfil se lagī thī 
ai dil tire āshob ne phir hashr jagāyā bedard abhī aañkh bhī mushkil se lagī thī 
ḳhilqat kā ajab haal thā us kū-e-sitam meñ saa.e kī tarah dāman-e-qātil se lagī thī 
utrā bhī to kab dard kā chaḌhtā huā dariyā jab kashtī-e-jāñ maut ke sāhil se lagī thī 
jis se ye tabiat baDi mushkil se lagi thi dekha to wo taswir har ek dil se lagi thi 
tanhai mein rote hain ki yun dil ko sukun ho ye choT kisi sahab-e-mahfil se lagi thi 
ai dil tere aashob ne phir hashr jagaya bedard abhi aankh bhi mushkil se lagi thi 
KHilqat ka ajab haal tha us ku-e-sitam mein sae ki tarah daman-e-qatil se lagi thi 
utra bhi to kab dard ka chaDhta hua dariya jab kashti-e-jaan maut ke sahil se lagi thi

zindagī maut ke pahlū meñ bhalī lagtī hai ghaas is qabr pe kuchh aur harī lagtī hai 
roz kāġhaz pe banātā huuñ maiñ qadmoñ ke nuqūsh koī chaltā nahīñ aur ham-safarī lagtī hai 
aañkh mānūs-e-tamāshā nahīñ hone paatī kaisī sūrat hai ki har roz na.ī lagtī hai 
ghaas meñ jazb hue hoñge zamīñ ke aañsū paañv rakhtā huuñ to halkī sī namī lagtī hai 
sach to kah duuñ magar is daur ke insānoñ ko baat jo dil se nikaltī hai burī lagtī hai 
mere shīshe meñ utar aa.ī hai jo shām-e-firāq vo kisī shahr-e-nigārāñ kī parī lagtī hai 
buuñd bhar ashk bhī Tapkā na kisī ke ġham meñ aaj har aañkh koī abr-e-tahī lagtī hai 
shor-e-tiflāñ bhī nahīñ hai na raqīboñ kā hujūm lauT aao ye koī aur galī lagtī hai 
ghar meñ kuchh kam hai ye ehsās bhī hotā hai 'salīm' ye bhī khultā nahīñ kis shai kī kamī lagtī hai 
zindagi maut ke pahlu mein bhali lagti hai ghas is qabr pe kuchh aur hari lagti hai 
roz kaghaz pe banata hun main qadmon ke nuqush koi chalta nahin aur ham-safari lagti hai 
aankh manus-e-tamasha nahin hone pati kaisi surat hai ki har roz nai lagti hai 
ghas mein jazb hue honge zamin ke aansu panw rakhta hun to halki si nami lagti hai 
sach to kah dun magar is daur ke insanon ko baat jo dil se nikalti hai buri lagti hai 
mere shishe mein utar aai hai jo sham-e-firaq wo kisi shahr-e-nigaran ki pari lagti hai 
bund bhar ashk bhi Tapka na kisi ke gham mein aaj har aankh koi abr-e-tahi lagti hai 
shor-e-tiflan bhi nahin hai na raqibon ka hujum lauT aao ye koi aur gali lagti hai 
ghar mein kuchh kam hai ye ehsas bhi hota hai 'salim' ye bhi khulta nahin kis shai ki kami lagti hai

dil ko duniyā kā hai safar darpesh aur chāroñ taraf hai ghar darpesh 
hai ye 'ālam 'ajīb aur yahāñ mājrā hai 'ajīb-tar darpesh 
do jahāñ se guzar gayā phir bhī maiñ rahā ḳhud ko 'umr bhar darpesh 
ab maiñ kū-e-abas shitāb chalūñ ka.ī ik kaam haiñ udhar darpesh 
us ke dīdār kī umiid kahāñ jab ki hai diid ko nazar darpesh 
ab mirī jaan bach ga.ī yā'nī ek qātil kī hai sipar darpesh 
kis tarah kuuch par kamar bāñdhūñ ek rahzan kī hai kamar darpesh 
ḳhalvat-e-nāz aur ā.īna ḳhud-nigar ko hai ḳhud-nigar darpesh 
dil ko duniya ka hai safar darpesh aur chaaron taraf hai ghar darpesh 
hai ye 'alam 'ajib aur yahan majra hai 'ajib-tar darpesh 
do jahan se guzar gaya phir bhi main raha KHud ko 'umr bhar darpesh 
ab main ku-e-abas shitab chalun kai ek kaam hain udhar darpesh 
us ke didar ki umid kahan jab ki hai did ko nazar darpesh 
ab meri jaan bach gai ya'ni ek qatil ki hai sipar darpesh 
kis tarah kuch par kamar bandhun ek rahzan ki hai kamar darpesh 
KHalwat-e-naz aur aaina KHud-nigar ko hai KHud-nigar darpesh

qadam insāñ kā rāh-e-dahr meñ tharrā hī jaatā hai chale kitnā hī koī bach ke Thokar khā hī jaatā hai 
nazar ho ḳhvāh kitnī hī haqā.iq-āshnā phir bhī hujūm-e-kashmakash meñ aadmī ghabrā hī jaatā hai 
ḳhilāf-e-maslahat maiñ bhī samajhtā huuñ magar nāseh vo aate haiñ to chehre par taġhayyur aa hī jaatā hai 
havā.eñ zor kitnā hī lagā.eñ āñdhiyāñ ban kar magar jo ghir ke aatā hai vo bādal chhā hī jaatā hai 
shikāyat kyuuñ ise kahte ho ye fitrat hai insāñ kī musībat meñ ḳhayāl-e-aish-e-rafta aa hī jaatā hai 
shagūfoñ par bhī aatī haiñ balā.eñ yuuñ to kahne ko magar jo phuul ban jaatā hai vo kumhlā hī jaatā hai 
samajhtī haiñ ma.āl-e-gul magar kyā zor-e-fitrat hai sahar hote hī kaliyoñ ko tabassum aa hī jaatā hai 
qadam insan ka rah-e-dahr mein tharra hi jata hai chale kitna hi koi bach ke Thokar kha hi jata hai 
nazar ho KHwah kitni hi haqaiq-ashna phir bhi hujum-e-kashmakash mein aadmi ghabra hi jata hai 
KHilaf-e-maslahat main bhi samajhta hun magar naseh wo aate hain to chehre par taghayyur aa hi jata hai 
hawaen zor kitna hi lagaen aandhiyan ban kar magar jo ghir ke aata hai wo baadal chha hi jata hai 
shikayat kyun ise kahte ho ye fitrat hai insan ki musibat mein KHayal-e-aish-e-rafta aa hi jata hai 
shagufon par bhi aati hain balaen yun to kahne ko magar jo phul ban jata hai wo kumhla hi jata hai 
samajhti hain maal-e-gul magar kya zor-e-fitrat hai sahar hote hi kaliyon ko tabassum aa hi jata hai

izn-e-ḳhirām lete hue āsmāñ se ham haT kar chale haiñ rahguzar-e-kārvāñ se ham 
kyā pūchhte ho jhūmte aa.e kahāñ se ham pī kar uThe haiñ ḳhum-kada-e-āsmāñ se ham 
kyūñkar huā hai faash zamāne pe kyā kaheñ vo rāz-e-dil jo kah na sake rāz-dāñ se ham 
hamdam yahī hai rahguzar-e-yār-e-ḳhush-ḳhirām guzre haiñ laakh baar isī kahkashāñ se ham 
kyā kyā huā hai ham se junūñ meñ na pūchhiye uljhe kabhī zamīñ se kabhī āsmāñ se ham 
har nargis-e-jamīl ne maḳhmūr kar diyā pī kar uThe sharāb har ik bostāñ se ham 
Thukrā diye haiñ aql o ḳhirad ke sanam-kade ghabrā chuke the kashmakash-e-imtihāñ se ham 
dekheñge ham bhī kaun hai sajda tarāz-e-shauq le sar uThā rahe haiñ tire āstāñ se ham 
baḳhshī haiñ ham ko ishq ne vo jur.ateñ 'majāz' Darte nahīñ siyāsat-e-ahl-e-jahāñ se ham 
izn-e-KHiram lete hue aasman se hum haT kar chale hain rahguzar-e-karwan se hum 
kya puchhte ho jhumte aae kahan se hum pi kar uThe hain KHum-kada-e-asman se hum 
kyunkar hua hai fash zamane pe kya kahen wo raaz-e-dil jo kah na sake raaz-dan se hum 
hamdam yahi hai rahguzar-e-yar-e-KHush-KHiram guzre hain lakh bar isi kahkashan se hum 
kya kya hua hai hum se junun mein na puchhiye uljhe kabhi zamin se kabhi aasman se hum 
har nargis-e-jamil ne maKHmur kar diya pi kar uThe sharab har ek bostan se hum 
Thukra diye hain aql o KHirad ke sanam-kade ghabra chuke the kashmakash-e-imtihan se hum 
dekhenge hum bhi kaun hai sajda taraaz-e-shauq le sar uTha rahe hain tere aastan se hum 
baKHshi hain hum ko ishq ne wo juraten 'majaz' Darte nahin siyasat-e-ahl-e-jahan se hum

charāġh dene lagegā dhuāñ na chhū lenā tū merā jism kahīñ merī jaañ na chhū lenā 
zamīñ chhuTī to bhaTak jāoge ḳhalāoñ meñ tum uḌte uḌte kahīñ āsmāñ na chhū lenā 
nahīñ to barf sā paanī tumheñ jalā degā gilās lete hue uñgliyāñ na chhū lenā 
hamāre lahje kī shā.istagī ke dhoke meñ hamārī bātoñ kī gahrā.iyāñ na chhū lenā 
uḌe to phir na mileñge rafāqatoñ ke parind shikāyatoñ se bharī Tahniyāñ na chhū lenā 
muravvatoñ ko mohabbat na jānñā 'irfān' tum apne siine se nok-e-sināñ na chhū lenā 
charagh dene lagega dhuan na chhu lena tu mera jism kahin meri jaan na chhu lena 
zamin chhuTi to bhaTak jaoge KHalaon mein tum uDte uDte kahin aasman na chhu lena 
nahin to barf sa pani tumhein jala dega gilas lete hue ungliyan na chhu lena 
hamare lahje ki shaistagi ke dhoke mein hamari baaton ki gahraiyan na chhu lena 
uDe to phir na milenge rafaqaton ke parind shikayaton se bhari Tahniyan na chhu lena 
murawwaton ko mohabbat na jaanna 'irfan' tum apne sine se nok-e-sinan na chhu lena

dil ko kyā ho gayā ḳhudā jaane kyuuñ hai aisā udaas kyā jaane 
apne ġham meñ bhī us ko sarfa hai na khilā jaane vo na khā jaane 
is tajāhul kā kyā Thikānā hai jaan kar jo na mudda.ā jaane 
kah diyā maiñ ne rāz-e-dil apnā us ko tum jaano yā ḳhudā jaane 
kyā ġharaz kyuuñ idhar tavajjoh ho hāl-e-dil aap kī balā jaane 
jānte jānte hī jānegā mujh meñ kyā hai abhī vo kyā jaane 
kyā ham us bad-gumāñ se baat kareñ jo satā.ish ko bhī gila jaane 
tum na pāoge sāda-dil mujh sā jo taġhāful ko bhī hayā jaane 
hai abas jurm-e-ishq par ilzām jab ḳhatā-vār bhī ḳhatā jaane 
nahīñ kotāh dāman-e-ummīd aage ab dast-e-nā-rasā jaane 
jo ho achchhā hazār achchhoñ kā vaa.iz us but ko tū burā jaane 
kī mirī qadr misl-e-shāh-e-dakan kisī navvāb ne na raajā ne 
us se uTThegī kyā musībat-e-ishq ibtidā ko jo intihā jaane 
'dāġh' se kah do ab na ghabrāo kaam apnā batā huā jaane 
dil ko kya ho gaya KHuda jaane kyun hai aisa udas kya jaane 
apne gham mein bhi us ko sarfa hai na khila jaane wo na kha jaane 
is tajahul ka kya Thikana hai jaan kar jo na muddaa jaane 
kah diya main ne raaz-e-dil apna us ko tum jaano ya KHuda jaane 
kya gharaz kyun idhar tawajjoh ho haal-e-dil aap ki bala jaane 
jaante jaante hi jaanega mujh mein kya hai abhi wo kya jaane 
kya hum us bad-guman se baat karen jo sataish ko bhi gila jaane 
tum na paoge sada-dil mujh sa jo taghaful ko bhi haya jaane 
hai abas jurm-e-ishq par ilzam jab KHata-war bhi KHata jaane 
nahin kotah daman-e-ummid aage ab dast-e-na-rasa jaane 
jo ho achchha hazar achchhon ka waiz us but ko tu bura jaane 
ki meri qadr misl-e-shah-e-dakan kisi nawwab ne na raja ne 
us se uTThegi kya musibat-e-ishq ibtida ko jo intiha jaane 
'dagh' se kah do ab na ghabrao kaam apna bata hua jaane

faqīh-e-shahr kī majlis se kuchh bhalā na huā ki us se mil ke mizāj aur kāfirāna huā 
abhī abhī vo milā thā hazār bāteñ kiiñ abhī abhī vo gayā hai magar zamāna huā 
vo raat bhuul chuko vo suḳhan na doharāo vo raat ḳhvāb huī vo suḳhan fasāna huā 
kuchh ab ke aise kaḌe the firāq ke mausam tirī hī baat nahīñ maiñ bhī kyā se kyā na huā 
hujūm aisā ki rāheñ nazar nahīñ ātīñ nasīb aisā ki ab tak to qāfila na huā 
shahīd-e-shab faqat ahmad-'farāz' hī to nahīñ ki jo charāġh-ba-kaf thā vahī nishāna huā 
faqih-e-shahr ki majlis se kuchh bhala na hua ki us se mil ke mizaj aur kafirana hua 
abhi abhi wo mila tha hazar baaten kin abhi abhi wo gaya hai magar zamana hua 
wo raat bhul chuko wo suKHan na doharao wo raat KHwab hui wo suKHan fasana hua 
kuchh ab ke aise kaDe the firaq ke mausam teri hi baat nahin main bhi kya se kya na hua 
hujum aisa ki rahen nazar nahin aatin nasib aisa ki ab tak to qafila na hua 
shahid-e-shab faqat ahmad-'faraaz' hi to nahin ki jo charagh-ba-kaf tha wahi nishana hua

jaane kahāñ the aur chale the kahāñ se ham bedār ho ga.e kisī ḳhvāb-e-girāñ se ham 
ai nau-bahār-e-nāz tirī nik.hatoñ kī ḳhair dāman jhaTak ke nikle tire gulsitāñ se ham 
pindār-e-āshiqī kī amānat hai āh-e-sard ye tiir aaj chhoḌ rahe haiñ kamāñ se ham 
aao ġhubār-e-rāh meñ DhūñDeñ shamīm-e-nāz aao ḳhabar bahār kī pūchheñ ḳhizāñ se ham 
āḳhir duā kareñ bhī to kis mudda.ā ke saath kaise zamīñ kī baat kaheñ āsmāñ se ham 
jaane kahan the aur chale the kahan se hum bedar ho gae kisi KHwab-e-giran se hum 
ai nau-bahaar-e-naz teri nikhaton ki KHair daman jhaTak ke nikle tere gulsitan se hum 
pindar-e-ashiqi ki amanat hai aah-e-sard ye tir aaj chhoD rahe hain kaman se hum 
aao ghubar-e-rah mein DhunDen shamim-e-naz aao KHabar bahaar ki puchhen KHizan se hum 
aaKHir dua karen bhi to kis muddaa ke sath kaise zamin ki baat kahen aasman se hum

jaane tū kyā DhūñDh rahā hai bastī meñ vīrāne meñ lailā to ai qais milegī dil ke daulat-ḳhāne meñ 
janam janam ke sātoñ dukh haiñ us ke māthe par tahrīr apnā aap miTānā hogā ye tahrīr miTāne meñ 
mahfil meñ us shaḳhs ke hote kaif kahāñ se aatā hai paimāne se āñkhoñ meñ yā āñkhoñ se paimāne meñ 
kis kā kis kā haal sunāyā tū ne ai afsāna-go ham ne ek tujhī ko DhūñDā is saare afsāne meñ 
is bastī meñ itne ghar the itne chehre itne log aur kisī ke dar pe na pahuñchā aisā hosh divāne meñ 
jaane tu kya DhunDh raha hai basti mein virane mein laila to ai qais milegi dil ke daulat-KHane mein 
janam janam ke saton dukh hain us ke mathe par tahrir apna aap miTana hoga ye tahrir miTane mein 
mahfil mein us shaKHs ke hote kaif kahan se aata hai paimane se aankhon mein ya aankhon se paimane mein 
kis ka kis ka haal sunaya tu ne ai afsana-go hum ne ek tujhi ko DhunDa is sare afsane mein 
is basti mein itne ghar the itne chehre itne log aur kisi ke dar pe na pahuncha aisa hosh diwane mein

bahut ruk ruk ke chaltī hai havā ḳhālī makānoñ meñ bujhe TukḌe paḌe haiñ sigreToñ ke rākh-dānoñ meñ 
dhueñ se āsmāñ kā rañg mailā hotā jaatā hai hare jañgal badalte jā rahe haiñ kār-ḳhānoñ meñ 
bhalī lagtī hai āñkhoñ ko na.e phūloñ kī rañgat bhī purāne zamzame bhī gūñjte rahte haiñ kānoñ meñ 
vahī gulshan hai lekin vaqt kī parvāz to dekho koī taa.ir nahīñ pichhle baras ke āshiyānoñ meñ 
zabānoñ par ulajhte dostoñ ko kaun samjhā.e mohabbat kī zabāñ mumtāz hai saarī zabānoñ meñ 
bahut ruk ruk ke chalti hai hawa KHali makanon mein bujhe TukDe paDe hain sigreTon ke rakh-danon mein 
dhuen se aasman ka rang maila hota jata hai hare jangal badalte ja rahe hain kar-KHanon mein 
bhali lagti hai aankhon ko nae phulon ki rangat bhi purane zamzame bhi gunjte rahte hain kanon mein 
wahi gulshan hai lekin waqt ki parwaz to dekho koi tair nahin pichhle baras ke aashiyanon mein 
zabanon par ulajhte doston ko kaun samjhae mohabbat ki zaban mumtaz hai sari zabanon mein

thake logoñ ko majbūrī meñ chalte dekh letā huuñ maiñ bas kī khiḌkiyoñ se ye tamāshe dekh letā huuñ 
kabhī dil meñ udāsī ho to un meñ jā nikaltā huuñ purāne dostoñ ko chup se baiThe dekh letā huuñ 
chhupāte haiñ bahut vo garmī-e-dil ko magar maiñ bhī gul-e-ruḳh par uḌī rañgat ke chhīñTe dekh letā huuñ 
khaḌā huuñ yuuñ kisī ḳhālī qile ke sehn-e-vīrāñ meñ ki jaise maiñ zamīnoñ meñ dafīne dekh letā huuñ 
'munīr' andāza-e-qār-e-fanā karnā ho jab mujh ko kisī ūñchī jagah se jhuk ke nīche dekh letā huuñ 
thake logon ko majburi mein chalte dekh leta hun main bas ki khiDkiyon se ye tamashe dekh leta hun 
kabhi dil mein udasi ho to un mein ja nikalta hun purane doston ko chup se baiThe dekh leta hun 
chhupate hain bahut wo garmi-e-dil ko magar main bhi gul-e-ruKH par uDi rangat ke chhinTe dekh leta hun 
khaDa hun yun kisi KHali qile ke sehn-e-viran mein ki jaise main zaminon mein dafine dekh leta hun 
'munir' andaza-e-qar-e-fana karna ho jab mujh ko kisi unchi jagah se jhuk ke niche dekh leta hun

dil badan kā sharīk-e-hāl kahāñ hijr phir hijr hai visāl kahāñ 
ishq hai naam intihāoñ kā is samundar meñ e'tidāl kahāñ 
aisā nashsha to zahr meñ bhī na thā ai ġham-e-dil tirī misāl kahāñ 
ham ko bhī apnī pā.emālī kā hai magar is qadar malāl kahāñ 
maiñ na.ī dostī ke moḌ pe thā aa gayā hai tirā ḳhayāl kahāñ 
dil ki ḳhush-fahm thā so hai varna tere milne kā ehtimāl kahāñ 
vasl o hijrāñ haiñ aur duniyā.eñ in zamānoñ meñ māh-o-sāl kahāñ 
tujh ko dekhā to log hairāñ haiñ aa gayā shahr meñ ġhazāl kahāñ 
tujh pe likkhī to saj ga.ī hai ġhazal aa milā ḳhvāb se ḳhayāl kahāñ 
ab to shah maat ho rahī hai 'farāz' ab bachāv kī koī chaal kahāñ 
dil badan ka sharik-e-haal kahan hijr phir hijr hai visal kahan 
ishq hai nam intihaon ka is samundar mein e'tidal kahan 
aisa nashsha to zahr mein bhi na tha ai gham-e-dil teri misal kahan 
hum ko bhi apni paemali ka hai magar is qadar malal kahan 
main nai dosti ke moD pe tha aa gaya hai tera KHayal kahan 
dil ki KHush-fahm tha so hai warna tere milne ka ehtimal kahan 
wasl o hijran hain aur duniyaen in zamanon mein mah-o-sal kahan 
tujh ko dekha to log hairan hain aa gaya shahr mein ghazal kahan 
tujh pe likkhi to saj gai hai ghazal aa mila KHwab se KHayal kahan 
ab to shah mat ho rahi hai 'faraaz' ab bachaw ki koi chaal kahan

shām-e-ġham kuchh us nigāh-e-nāz kī bāteñ karo be-ḳhudī baḌhtī chalī hai raaz kī bāteñ karo 
ye sukūt-e-nāz ye dil kī ragoñ kā TūTnā ḳhāmushī meñ kuchh shikast-e-sāz kī bāteñ karo 
nik.hat-e-zulf-e-pareshāñ dāstān-e-shām-e-ġham sub.h hone tak isī andāz kī bāteñ karo 
har rag-e-dil vajd meñ aatī rahe dukhtī rahe yūñhī us ke jā-o-bejā naaz kī bāteñ karo 
jau adam kī jaan hai jo hai payām-e-zindagī us sukūt-e-rāz us āvāz kī bāteñ karo 
ishq rusvā ho chalā be-kaif sā bezār sā aaj us kī nargas-e-ġhammaz kī bāteñ karo 
naam bhī lenā hai jis kā ik jahān-e-rañg-o-bū dosto us nau-bahār-e-nāz kī bāteñ karo 
kis liye uzr-e-taġhāful kis liye ilzām-e-ishq aaj charḳh-e-tafraqa-parvāz kī bāteñ karo 
kuchh qafas kī tīliyoñ se chhan rahā hai nuur sā kuchh fazā kuchh hasrat-e-parvāz kī bāteñ karo 
jo hayāt-e-jāvidāñ hai jo hai marg-e-nā-gahāñ aaj kuchh us naaz us andāz kī bāteñ karo 
ishq-e-be-parvā bhī ab kuchh nā-shakebā ho chalā shoḳhī-e-husn-e-karishma-sāz kī bāteñ karo 
jis kī furqat ne palaT dī ishq kī kaayā 'firāq' aaj us īsā-nafas dam-sāz kī bāteñ karo 
sham-e-gham kuchh us nigah-e-naz ki baaten karo be-KHudi baDhti chali hai raaz ki baaten karo 
ye sukut-e-naz ye dil ki ragon ka TuTna KHamushi mein kuchh shikast-e-saz ki baaten karo 
nikhat-e-zulf-e-pareshan dastan-e-sham-e-gham subh hone tak isi andaz ki baaten karo 
har rag-e-dil wajd mein aati rahe dukhti rahe yunhi us ke ja-o-beja naz ki baaten karo 
jau adam ki jaan hai jo hai payam-e-zindagi us sukut-e-raaz us aawaz ki baaten karo 
ishq ruswa ho chala be-kaif sa bezar sa aaj us ki nargas-e-ghammaz ki baaten karo 
nam bhi lena hai jis ka ek jahan-e-rang-o-bu dosto us nau-bahaar-e-naz ki baaten karo 
kis liye uzr-e-taghaful kis liye ilzam-e-ishq aaj charKH-e-tafraqa-parwaz ki baaten karo 
kuchh qafas ki tiliyon se chhan raha hai nur sa kuchh faza kuchh hasrat-e-parwaz ki baaten karo 
jo hayat-e-jawidan hai jo hai marg-e-na-gahan aaj kuchh us naz us andaz ki baaten karo 
ishq-e-be-parwa bhi ab kuchh na-shakeba ho chala shoKHi-e-husn-e-karishma-saz ki baaten karo 
jis ki furqat ne palaT di ishq ki kaya 'firaq' aaj us isa-nafas dam-saz ki baaten karo

āgahī meñ ik ḳhalā maujūd hai is kā matlab hai ḳhudā maujūd hai 
hai yaqīnan kuchh magar vāzeh nahīñ aap kī āñkhoñ meñ kyā maujūd hai 
bāñkpan meñ aur koī shai nahīñ sādgī kī intihā maujūd hai 
hai mukammal bādshāhī kī dalīl ghar meñ gar ik boriyā maujūd hai 
shauqiya koī nahīñ hotā ġhalat is meñ kuchh terī razā maujūd hai 
is liye tanhā huuñ maiñ garm-e-safar qāfile meñ rahnumā maujūd hai 
har mohabbat kī binā hai chāshnī har lagan meñ mudda.ā maujūd hai 
har jagah har shahr har iqlīm meñ dhuum hai us kī jo nā-maujūd hai 
jis se chhupnā chāhtā huuñ maiñ 'adam' vo sitamgar jā-ba-jā maujūd hai 
aagahi mein ek KHala maujud hai is ka matlab hai KHuda maujud hai 
hai yaqinan kuchh magar wazeh nahin aap ki aankhon mein kya maujud hai 
bankpan mein aur koi shai nahin sadgi ki intiha maujud hai 
hai mukammal baadshahi ki dalil ghar mein gar ek boriya maujud hai 
shauqiya koi nahin hota ghalat is mein kuchh teri raza maujud hai 
is liye tanha hun main garm-e-safar qafile mein rahnuma maujud hai 
har mohabbat ki bina hai chashni har lagan mein muddaa maujud hai 
har jagah har shahr har iqlim mein dhum hai us ki jo na-maujud hai 
jis se chhupna chahta hun main 'adam' wo sitamgar ja-ba-ja maujud hai

har lamha agar gurez-pā hai tū kyuuñ mire dil meñ bas gayā hai 
chilman meñ gulāb sambhal rahā hai ye tū hai ki shoḳhi-e-sabā hai 
jhuktī nazreñ batā rahī haiñ mere liye tū bhī sochtā hai 
maiñ tere kahe se chup huuñ lekin chup bhī tū bayān-e-mudda.ā hai 
har des kī apnī apnī bolī sahrā kā sukūt bhī sadā hai 
ik umr ke baa'd muskurā kar tū ne to mujhe rulā diyā hai 
us vaqt kā hisāb kyā duuñ jo tere baġhair kaT gayā hai 
maazī kī sunā.ūñ kyā kahānī lamha lamha guzar gayā hai 
mat maañg duā.eñ jab mohabbat terā merā muāmla hai 
ab tujh se jo rabt hai to itnā terā hī ḳhudā mirā ḳhudā hai 
rone ko ab ashk bhī nahīñ haiñ yā ishq ko sabr aa gayā hai 
ab kis kī talāsh meñ haiñ jhoñke maiñ ne to diyā bujhā diyā hai 
kuchh khel nahīñ hai ishq karnā ye zindagī bhar kā rat-jagā hai 
har lamha agar gurez-pa hai tu kyun mere dil mein bas gaya hai 
chilman mein gulab sambhal raha hai ye tu hai ki shoKHi-e-saba hai 
jhukti nazren bata rahi hain mere liye tu bhi sochta hai 
main tere kahe se chup hun lekin chup bhi tu bayan-e-muddaa hai 
har des ki apni apni boli sahra ka sukut bhi sada hai 
ek umr ke ba'd muskura kar tu ne to mujhe rula diya hai 
us waqt ka hisab kya dun jo tere baghair kaT gaya hai 
mazi ki sunaun kya kahani lamha lamha guzar gaya hai 
mat mang duaen jab mohabbat tera mera muamla hai 
ab tujh se jo rabt hai to itna tera hi KHuda mera KHuda hai 
rone ko ab ashk bhi nahin hain ya ishq ko sabr aa gaya hai 
ab kis ki talash mein hain jhonke main ne to diya bujha diya hai 
kuchh khel nahin hai ishq karna ye zindagi bhar ka rat-jaga hai

tū apnī āvāz meñ gum hai maiñ apnī āvāz meñ chup donoñ biich khaḌī hai duniyā ā.īna-e-alfāz meñ chup 
avval avval bol rahe the ḳhvāb-bharī hairānī meñ phir ham donoñ chale ga.e pātāl se gahre raaz meñ chup 
ḳhvāb-sarā-e-zāt meñ zinda ek to sūrat aisī hai jaise koī devī baiThī ho hujra-e-rāz-o-niyāz meñ chup 
ab koī chhū ke kyuuñ nahīñ aatā udhar sire kā jīvan-añg jānte haiñ par kyā batlā.eñ lag ga.ī kyuuñ parvāz meñ chup 
phir ye khel-tamāshā saarā kis ke liye aur kyuuñ sāhab jab is ke anjām meñ chup hai jab is ke āġhāz meñ chup 
nīñd-bharī āñkhoñ se chūmā diye ne sūraj ko aur phir jaise shaam ko ab nahīñ jalnā khīñch lī is andāz meñ chup 
ġhaib-samay ke gyaan meñ pāgal kitnī taan lagā.egā jitne sur haiñ saaz se bāhar us se ziyāda saaz meñ chup 
tu apni aawaz mein gum hai main apni aawaz mein chup donon bich khaDi hai duniya aaina-e-alfaz mein chup 
awwal awwal bol rahe the KHwab-bhari hairani mein phir hum donon chale gae patal se gahre raaz mein chup 
KHwab-sara-e-zat mein zinda ek to surat aisi hai jaise koi dewi baiThi ho hujra-e-raaz-o-niyaz mein chup 
ab koi chhu ke kyun nahin aata udhar sire ka jiwan-ang jaante hain par kya batlaen lag gai kyun parwaz mein chup 
phir ye khel-tamasha sara kis ke liye aur kyun sahab jab is ke anjam mein chup hai jab is ke aaghaz mein chup 
nind-bhari aankhon se chuma diye ne suraj ko aur phir jaise sham ko ab nahin jalna khinch li is andaz mein chup 
ghaib-samay ke gyan mein pagal kitni tan lagaega jitne sur hain saz se bahar us se ziyaada saz mein chup

ḳhanjar chamkā raat kā siina chaak huā jañgal jangal sannāTā saffāk huā 
zaḳhm lagā kar us kā bhī kuchh haath khulā maiñ bhī dhokā khā kar kuchh chālāk huā 
merī hī parchhā.īñ dar o dīvār pa hai sub.h huī nairañg tamāshā ḳhaak huā 
kaisā dil kā charāġh kahāñ kā dil kā charāġh tez havāoñ meñ sho.ala ḳhāshāk huā 
phuul kī pattī pattī ḳhaak pe bikhrī hai rañg uḌā uḌte uḌte aflāk huā 
har dam dil kī shāḳh laraztī rahtī thī zard havā lahrā.ī qissa paak huā 
ab us kī talvār mirī gardan hogī kab kā ḳhālī 'zeb' mirā fitrāk huā 
KHanjar chamka raat ka sina chaak hua jangal jangal sannaTa saffak hua 
zaKHm laga kar us ka bhi kuchh hath khula main bhi dhoka kha kar kuchh chaalak hua 
meri hi parchhain dar o diwar pa hai subh hui nairang tamasha KHak hua 
kaisa dil ka charagh kahan ka dil ka charagh tez hawaon mein shoala KHashak hua 
phul ki patti patti KHak pe bikhri hai rang uDa uDte uDte aflak hua 
har dam dil ki shaKH larazti rahti thi zard hawa lahrai qissa pak hua 
ab us ki talwar meri gardan hogi kab ka KHali 'zeb' mera fitrak hua

ab bhī tauhīn-e-itā.at nahīñ hogī ham se dil nahīñ hogā to bai.at nahīñ hogī ham se 
roz ik taaza qasīda na.ī tashbīb ke saath rizq bar-haq hai ye ḳhidmat nahīñ hogī ham se 
dil ke ma.abūd jabīnoñ ke ḳhudā.ī se alag aise aalam meñ ibādat nahīñ hogī ham se 
ujrat-e-ishq vafā hai to ham aise mazdūr kuchh bhī kar leñge ye mehnat nahīñ hogī ham se 
har na.ī nasl ko ik taaza madīne kī talāsh sāhibo ab koī hijrat nahīñ hogī ham se 
suḳhan-ārā.ī kī sūrat to nikal saktī hai par ye chakkī kī mashaqqat nahīñ hogī ham se 
ab bhi tauhin-e-itaat nahin hogi hum se dil nahin hoga to baiat nahin hogi hum se 
roz ek taza qasida nai tashbib ke sath rizq bar-haq hai ye KHidmat nahin hogi hum se 
dil ke mabud jabinon ke KHudai se alag aise aalam mein ibaadat nahin hogi hum se 
ujrat-e-ishq wafa hai to hum aise mazdur kuchh bhi kar lenge ye mehnat nahin hogi hum se 
har nai nasl ko ek taza madine ki talash sahibo ab koi hijrat nahin hogi hum se 
suKHan-arai ki surat to nikal sakti hai par ye chakki ki mashaqqat nahin hogi hum se

badan churāte hue ruuh meñ samāyā kar maiñ apnī dhuup meñ soyā huā huuñ saayā kar 
ye aur baat ki dil meñ ghanā añdherā hai magar zabān se to chāñdnī luTāyā kar 
chhupā huā hai tirī ājizī ke tarkash meñ anā ke tiir isī zahr meñ bujhāyā kar 
koī sabīl ki pyāse panāh māñgte haiñ safar kī raah meñ parchhā.iyāñ bichhāyā kar 
ḳhudā ke vāste mauqa.a na de shikāyat kā ki dostī kī tarah dushmanī nibhāyā kar 
ajab huā ki girah paḌ ga.ī mohabbat meñ jo ho sake to judā.ī meñ raas aayā kar 
na.e charāġh jalā yaad ke ḳharābe meñ vatan meñ raat sahī raushnī manāyā kar 
badan churaate hue ruh mein samaya kar main apni dhup mein soya hua hun saya kar 
ye aur baat ki dil mein ghana andhera hai magar zaban se to chandni luTaya kar 
chhupa hua hai teri aajizi ke tarkash mein ana ke tir isi zahr mein bujhaya kar 
koi sabil ki pyase panah mangte hain safar ki rah mein parchhaiyan bichhaya kar 
KHuda ke waste mauqa na de shikayat ka ki dosti ki tarah dushmani nibhaya kar 
ajab hua ki girah paD gai mohabbat mein jo ho sake to judai mein ras aaya kar 
nae charagh jala yaad ke KHarabe mein watan mein raat sahi raushni manaya kar

dil mirā jis se bahaltā koī aisā na milā but ke bande mile allāh kā bandā na milā 
bazm-e-yārāñ se phirī bād-e-bahārī māyūs ek sar bhī use āmāda-e-saudā na milā 
gul ke ḳhvāhāñ to nazar aa.e bahut itr-farosh tālib-e-zamzama-e-bulbul-e-shaidā na milā 
vaah kyā raah dikhā.ī hai hameñ murshid ne kar diyā kaabe ko gum aur kalīsā na milā 
rañg chehre kā to collage ne bhī rakkhā qaa.im rañg-e-bātin meñ magar baap se beTā na milā 
sayyad uTThe jo gazette le ke to lākhoñ laa.e shaiḳh qur.ān dikhāte phire paisā na milā 
hoshyāroñ meñ to ik ik se sivā haiñ 'akbar' mujh ko dīvānoñ meñ lekin koī tujh sā na milā 
dil mera jis se bahalta koi aisa na mila but ke bande mile allah ka banda na mila 
bazm-e-yaran se phiri baad-e-bahaari mayus ek sar bhi use aamada-e-sauda na mila 
gul ke KHwahan to nazar aae bahut itr-farosh talib-e-zamzama-e-bulbul-e-shaida na mila 
wah kya rah dikhai hai hamein murshid ne kar diya kabe ko gum aur kalisa na mila 
rang chehre ka to collage ne bhi rakkha qaim rang-e-baatin mein magar bap se beTa na mila 
sayyad uTThe jo gazette le ke to lakhon lae shaiKH quran dikhate phire paisa na mila 
hoshyaron mein to ek ek se siwa hain 'akbar' mujh ko diwanon mein lekin koi tujh sa na mila

raat parde se zarā muñh jo kisū kā niklā sho.ala samjhā thā use maiñ pa bhabhūkā niklā 
mahr o mah us kī phaban dekh ke hairān rahe jab varaq yaar kī tasvīr-e-do-rū kā niklā 
ye adā dekh ke kitnoñ kā huā kaam tamām nīmcha kal jo Tuk us arbada-jū kā niklā 
mar ga.ī sarv pe jab ho ke tasadduq qumrī us se us dam bhī na tauq apne gulū kā niklā 
'mus.hafī' ham to ye samjhe the ki hogā koī zaḳhm tere dil meñ to bahut kaam rafū kā niklā 
raat parde se zara munh jo kisu ka nikla shoala samjha tha use main pa bhabhuka nikla 
mahr o mah us ki phaban dekh ke hairan rahe jab waraq yar ki taswir-e-do-ru ka nikla 
ye ada dekh ke kitnon ka hua kaam tamam nimcha kal jo Tuk us arbada-ju ka nikla 
mar gai sarw pe jab ho ke tasadduq qumri us se us dam bhi na tauq apne gulu ka nikla 
'mushafi' hum to ye samjhe the ki hoga koi zaKHm tere dil mein to bahut kaam rafu ka nikla

shikasta-hāl sā be-āsrā sā lagtā hai ye shahr dil se ziyāda dukhā sā lagtā hai 
har ik ke saath koī vāqi.a sā lagtā hai jise bhī dekho vo khoyā huā sā lagtā hai 
zamīn hai so vo apnī gardishoñ meñ kahīñ jo chāñd hai so vo TuuTā huā sā lagtā hai 
mere vatan pe utarte hue añdheroñ ko jo tum kaho mujhe qahr-e-ḳhudā sā lagtā hai 
jo shaam aa.ī to phir shaam kā lagā darbār jo din huā to vo din karbalā sā lagtā hai 
ye raat khā ga.ī ik ek kar ke saare charāġh jo rah gayā hai vo bujhtā huā sā lagtā hai 
duā karo ki maiñ us ke liye duā ho jā.ūñ vo ek shaḳhs jo dil ko duā sā lagtā hai 
to dil meñ bujhne sī lagtī hai kā.enāt tamām kabhī kabhī jo mujhe tū bujhā sā lagtā hai 
jo aa rahī hai sadā ġhaur se suno us ko ki is sadā meñ ḳhudā boltā sā lagtā hai 
abhī ḳharīd leñ duniyā kahāñ kī mahñgī hai magar zamīr kā saudā burā sā lagtā hai 
ye maut hai yā koī āḳhirī visāl ke ba.ad ajab sukūn meñ soyā huā sā lagtā hai 
havā-e-rañg-e-do-ālam meñ jāgtī huī lai 'alīm' hī kahīñ naġhma-sarā sā lagtā hai 
shikasta-haal sa be-asra sa lagta hai ye shahr dil se ziyaada dukha sa lagta hai 
har ek ke sath koi waqia sa lagta hai jise bhi dekho wo khoya hua sa lagta hai 
zamin hai so wo apni gardishon mein kahin jo chand hai so wo TuTa hua sa lagta hai 
mere watan pe utarte hue andheron ko jo tum kaho mujhe qahr-e-KHuda sa lagta hai 
jo sham aai to phir sham ka laga darbar jo din hua to wo din karbala sa lagta hai 
ye raat kha gai ek ek kar ke sare charagh jo rah gaya hai wo bujhta hua sa lagta hai 
dua karo ki main us ke liye dua ho jaun wo ek shaKHs jo dil ko dua sa lagta hai 
to dil mein bujhne si lagti hai kaenat tamam kabhi kabhi jo mujhe tu bujha sa lagta hai 
jo aa rahi hai sada ghaur se suno us ko ki is sada mein KHuda bolta sa lagta hai 
abhi KHarid len duniya kahan ki mahngi hai magar zamir ka sauda bura sa lagta hai 
ye maut hai ya koi aaKHiri visal ke baad ajab sukun mein soya hua sa lagta hai 
hawa-e-rang-e-do-alam mein jagti hui lai 'alim' hi kahin naghma-sara sa lagta hai

vahī pyaas hai vahī dasht hai vahī gharānā hai mashkīze se tiir kā rishta bahut purānā hai 
sub.h savere ran paḌnā hai aur ghamsān kā ran rātoñ raat chalā jaa.e jis jis ko jaanā hai 
ek charāġh aur ek kitāb aur ek umīd-e-asāsa us ke ba.ad to jo kuchh hai vo sab afsāna hai 
dariyā par qabza thā jis kā us kī pyaas azaab jis kī Dhāleñ chamak rahī thiiñ vahī nishāna hai 
kāsa-e-shām meñ sūraj kā sar aur āvāz-e-azāñ aur āvāz-e-azāñ kahtī hai farz nibhānā hai 
sab kahte haiñ aur koī din ye hañgāma-e-dahr dil kahtā hai ek musāfir aur bhī aanā hai 
ek jazīra us ke aage pīchhe saat samundar saat samundar paar sunā hai ek ḳhazāna hai 
wahi pyas hai wahi dasht hai wahi gharana hai mashkize se tir ka rishta bahut purana hai 
subh sawere ran paDna hai aur ghamsan ka ran raaton raat chala jae jis jis ko jaana hai 
ek charagh aur ek kitab aur ek umid-e-asasa us ke baad to jo kuchh hai wo sab afsana hai 
dariya par qabza tha jis ka us ki pyas azab jis ki Dhaalen chamak rahi thin wahi nishana hai 
kasa-e-sham mein suraj ka sar aur aawaz-e-azan aur aawaz-e-azan kahti hai farz nibhana hai 
sab kahte hain aur koi din ye hangama-e-dahr dil kahta hai ek musafir aur bhi aana hai 
ek jazira us ke aage pichhe sat samundar sat samundar par suna hai ek KHazana hai

bhed paa.eñ to rah-e-yār meñ gum ho jaa.eñ varna kis vāste be-kār meñ gum ho jaa.eñ 
kyā kareñ arz-e-tamannā ki tujhe dekhte hī lafz pairāya-e-iz.hār meñ gum ho jaa.eñ 
ye na ho tum bhī kisī bhiiḌ meñ kho jaao kahīñ ye na ho ham kisī bāzār meñ gum ho jaa.eñ 
kis tarah tujh se kaheñ kitnā bhalā lagtā hai tujh ko dekheñ tire dīdār meñ gum ho jaa.eñ 
ham tire shauq meñ yuuñ ḳhud ko gañvā baiThe haiñ jaise bachche kisī tyauhār meñ gum ho jaa.eñ 
pech itne bhī na do kirmak-e-resham kī tarah dekhnā sar hī na dastār meñ gum ho jaa.eñ 
aisā āshob-e-zamāna hai ki Dar lagtā hai dil ke mazmūñ hī na ash.ār meñ gum ho jaa.eñ 
shahryāroñ ke bulāve bahut aate haiñ 'farāz' ye na ho aap bhī darbār meñ gum ho jaa.eñ 
bhed paen to rah-e-yar mein gum ho jaen warna kis waste be-kar mein gum ho jaen 
kya karen arz-e-tamanna ki tujhe dekhte hi lafz pairaya-e-izhaar mein gum ho jaen 
ye na ho tum bhi kisi bhiD mein kho jao kahin ye na ho hum kisi bazar mein gum ho jaen 
kis tarah tujh se kahen kitna bhala lagta hai tujh ko dekhen tere didar mein gum ho jaen 
hum tere shauq mein yun KHud ko ganwa baiThe hain jaise bachche kisi tyauhaar mein gum ho jaen 
pech itne bhi na do kirmak-e-resham ki tarah dekhna sar hi na dastar mein gum ho jaen 
aisa aashob-e-zamana hai ki Dar lagta hai dil ke mazmun hi na ashaar mein gum ho jaen 
shahryaron ke bulawe bahut aate hain 'faraaz' ye na ho aap bhi darbar mein gum ho jaen

ishq nashsha hai na jaadū jo utar bhī jaa.e ye to ik sail-e-balā hai so guzar bhī jaa.e 
talḳhī-e-kām-o-dahan kab se azāb-e-jāñ hai ab to ye zahr rag o pai meñ utar bhī jaa.e 
ab ke jis dasht-e-tamannā meñ qadam rakkhā hai dil to kyā chiiz hai imkāñ hai ki sar bhī jaa.e 
ham bagūloñ kī tarah ḳhāk-basar phirte haiñ paañv shal hoñ to ye āshob-e-safar bhī jaa.e 
luT chuke ishq meñ ik baar to phir ishq karo kis ko mālūm ki taqdīr sañvar bhī jaa.e 
shahr-e-jānāñ se pare bhī ka.ī duniyā.eñ haiñ hai koī aisā musāfir jo udhar bhī jaa.e 
is qadar qurb ke baad aise judā ho jaanā koī kam-hausla insāñ ho to mar bhī jaa.e 
ek muddat se muqaddar hai ġharīb-ul-vatanī koī pardes meñ nā-ḳhush ho to ghar bhī jaa.e 
ishq nashsha hai na jadu jo utar bhi jae ye to ek sail-e-bala hai so guzar bhi jae 
talKHi-e-kaam-o-dahan kab se azab-e-jaan hai ab to ye zahr rag o pai mein utar bhi jae 
ab ke jis dasht-e-tamanna mein qadam rakkha hai dil to kya chiz hai imkan hai ki sar bhi jae 
hum bagulon ki tarah KHak-basar phirte hain panw shal hon to ye aashob-e-safar bhi jae

sadā hai fikr-e-taraqqī buland-bīnoñ ko ham āsmān se laa.e haiñ in zamīnoñ ko 
paḌheñ durūd na kyuuñ dekh kar hasīnoñ ko ḳhayāl-e-san.at-e-sāne hai pāk-bīnoñ ko 
kamāl-e-faqr bhī shāyāñ hai pāk-bīnoñ ko ye ḳhaak taḳht hai ham boriyā-nashīnoñ ko 
lahad meñ so.e haiñ chhoḌā hai shah-nashīnoñ ko qazā kahāñ se kahāñ le ga.ī makīnoñ ko 
ye jhurriyāñ nahīñ hāthoñ pe zo.af-e-pīrī ne chunā hai jāma-e-aslī kī āstīnoñ ko 
lagā rahā huuñ mazāmīn-e-nau ke phir ambār ḳhabar karo mire ḳhirman ke ḳhosha-chīnoñ ko 
bhalā taraddud-e-bejā se un meñ kyā hāsil uThā chuke haiñ zamīñdār jin zamīnoñ ko 
unhīñ ko aaj nahīñ baiThne kī jā miltī muaaf karte the jo log kal zamīnoñ ko 
ye zā.iroñ ko milīñ sarfarāziyāñ varna kahāñ nasīb ki chūmeñ malak jabīnoñ ko 
sajāyā ham ne mazāmīñ ke taaza phūloñ se basā diyā hai in ujḌī huī zamīnoñ ko 
lahad bhī dekhiye in meñ nasīb ho ki na ho ki ḳhaak chhān ke paayā hai jin zamīnoñ ko 
zavāl-e-tāqat o mū-e-sapīd o zof-e-basar inhīñ se paa.e bashar maut ke qarīnoñ ko 
nahīñ ḳhabar unheñ miTTī meñ apne milne kī zamīñ meñ gaaḌ ke baiThe haiñ jo dafīnoñ ko 
ḳhabar nahīñ unheñ kyā badobast-e-puḳhta kī jo ġhasb karne lage ġhair kī zamīnoñ ko 
jahāñ se uTh ga.e jo log phir nahīñ milte kahāñ se DhūñD ke ab laa.eñ ham-nashīnoñ ko 
nazar meñ phirtī hai vo tīrgī o tanhā.ī lahad kī ḳhaak hai surma ma.āl-baīnoñ ko 
ḳhayāl-e-ḳhātir-e-ahbāb chāhiye har dam 'anīs' Thes na lag jaa.e ābgīnoñ ko 
sada hai fikr-e-taraqqi buland-binon ko hum aasman se lae hain in zaminon ko 
paDhen durud na kyun dekh kar hasinon ko KHayal-e-sanat-e-sane hai pak-binon ko 
kamal-e-faqr bhi shayan hai pak-binon ko ye KHak taKHt hai hum boriya-nashinon ko 
lahad mein soe hain chhoDa hai shah-nashinon ko qaza kahan se kahan le gai makinon ko 
ye jhurriyan nahin hathon pe zoaf-e-piri ne chuna hai jama-e-asli ki aastinon ko 
laga raha hun mazamin-e-nau ke phir ambar KHabar karo mere KHirman ke KHosha-chinon ko 
bhala taraddud-e-beja se un mein kya hasil uTha chuke hain zamindar jin zaminon ko 
unhin ko aaj nahin baiThne ki ja milti muaf karte the jo log kal zaminon ko 
ye zairon ko milin sarfaraaziyan warna kahan nasib ki chumen malak jabinon ko 
sajaya hum ne mazamin ke taza phulon se basa diya hai in ujDi hui zaminon ko 
lahad bhi dekhiye in mein nasib ho ki na ho ki KHak chhan ke paya hai jin zaminon ko 
zawal-e-taqat o mu-e-sapid o zof-e-basar inhin se pae bashar maut ke qarinon ko 
nahin KHabar unhen miTTi mein apne milne ki zamin mein gaD ke baiThe hain jo dafinon ko 
KHabar nahin unhen kya badobast-e-puKHta ki jo ghasb karne lage ghair ki zaminon ko 
jahan se uTh gae jo log phir nahin milte kahan se DhunD ke ab laen ham-nashinon ko 
nazar mein phirti hai wo tirgi o tanhai lahad ki KHak hai surma maal-bainon ko 
KHayal-e-KHatir-e-ahbab chahiye har dam 'anis' Thes na lag jae aabginon ko

kaun sā tā.ir-e-gum-gashta use yaad aayā dekhtā bhāltā har shāḳh ko sayyād aayā 
mere qaabū meñ na pahroñ dil-e-nāshād aayā vo mirā bhūlne vaalā jo mujhe yaad aayā 
koī bhūlā huā andāz-e-sitam yaad aayā ki tabassum tujhe zālim dam-e-be-dād aayā 
laa.e haiñ log janāze kī tarah mahshar meñ kis musībat se tirā kushta-e-bedād aayā 
jazb-e-vahshat tire qurbān tirā kyā kahnā khiñch ke rag rag meñ mire nashtar-e-fassād aayā 
us ke jalve ko ġharaz kaun-o-makāñ se kyā thā daad lene ke liye husn-e-ḳhudā-dād aayā 
bastiyoñ se yahī āvāz chalī aatī hai jo kiyā tū ne vo aage tire farhād aayā 
dil-e-vīrāñ se raqīboñ ne murādeñ pā.īñ kaam kis kis ke mirā ḳhirman-e-barbād aayā 
ishq ke aate hī muñh par mire phūlī hai basant ho gayā zard ye shāgird jab ustād aayā 
ho gayā farz mujhe shauq kā daftar likhnā jab mire haath koī ḳhāma-e-faulād aayā 
iid hai qatl mirā ahl-e-tamāshā ke liye sab gale milne lage jab ki vo jallād aayā 
chain karte haiñ vahāñ ranj uThāne vaale kaam uqbā meñ hamārā dil-e-nāshād aayā 
dī shab-e-vasl mo.azzin ne azaañ pichhlī raat haa.e kam-baḳht ko kis vaqt ḳhudā yaad aayā 
mere naale ne sunā.ī hai kharī kis kis ko muñh farishtoñ pe ye gustāḳh ye āzād aayā 
ġham-e-jāved ne dī mujh ko mubārakbādī jab sunā ye ki unheñ sheva-e-bedād aayā 
maiñ tamannā-e-shahādat kā mazā bhuul gayā aaj is shauq se armān se jallād aayā 
shādiyāna jo diyā naala o shevan ne diyā jab mulāqāt ko nāshād kī nāshād aayā 
lījiye suniye ab afsāna-e-furqat mujh se aap ne yaad dilāyā to mujhe yaad aayā 
aap kī bazm meñ sab kuchh hai magar 'dāġh' nahīñ ham ko vo ḳhāna-ḳharāb aaj bahut yaad aayā 
kaun sa tair-e-gum-gashta use yaad aaya dekhta bhaalta har shaKH ko sayyaad aaya 
mere qabu mein na pahron dil-e-nashad aaya wo mera bhulne wala jo mujhe yaad aaya 
koi bhula hua andaz-e-sitam yaad aaya ki tabassum tujhe zalim dam-e-be-dad aaya 
lae hain log janaze ki tarah mahshar mein kis musibat se tera kushta-e-bedad aaya 
jazb-e-wahshat tere qurban tera kya kahna khinch ke rag rag mein mere nashtar-e-fassad aaya 
us ke jalwe ko gharaz kaun-o-makan se kya tha dad lene ke liye husn-e-KHuda-dad aaya 
bastiyon se yahi aawaz chali aati hai jo kiya tu ne wo aage tere farhad aaya 
dil-e-viran se raqibon ne muraden pain kaam kis kis ke mera KHirman-e-barbaad aaya 
ishq ke aate hi munh par mere phuli hai basant ho gaya zard ye shagird jab ustad aaya 
ho gaya farz mujhe shauq ka daftar likhna jab mere hath koi KHama-e-faulad aaya 
id hai qatl mera ahl-e-tamasha ke liye sab gale milne lage jab ki wo jallad aaya 
chain karte hain wahan ranj uThane wale kaam uqba mein hamara dil-e-nashad aaya 
di shab-e-wasl moazzin ne azan pichhli raat hae kam-baKHt ko kis waqt KHuda yaad aaya 
mere nale ne sunai hai khari kis kis ko munh farishton pe ye gustaKH ye aazad aaya 
gham-e-jawed ne di mujh ko mubarakbaadi jab suna ye ki unhen shewa-e-bedad aaya 
main tamanna-e-shahadat ka maza bhul gaya aaj is shauq se arman se jallad aaya 
shadiyana jo diya nala o shewan ne diya jab mulaqat ko nashad ki nashad aaya 
lijiye suniye ab afsana-e-furqat mujh se aap ne yaad dilaya to mujhe yaad aaya 
aap ki bazm mein sab kuchh hai magar 'dagh' nahin hum ko wo KHana-KHarab aaj bahut yaad aaya

tujh se va.ada azīz-tar rakkhā vahshatoñ ko bhī apne ghar rakkhā 
apnī be-chehragī chhupāne ko aa.ine ko idhar udhar rakkhā 
ik tirā ġham hī apnī daulat thī dil meñ poshīda be-ḳhatar rakkhā 
aarzū ne kamāl pahchānā aur ta'alluq ko taaq par rakkhā 
is qadar thā udaas mausam-e-gul ham ne āb-e-ravāñ pe sar rakkhā 
apnī vāraftagī chhupāne ko shauq ne ham ko dar-ba-dar rakkhā 
kalma-e-shukr ki mohabbat ne ham ko tamhīd-e-ḳhvāb par rakkhā 
un ko samjhāne apnā harf-e-suḳhan āñsuoñ ko payām par rakkhā 
tujh se wada aziz-tar rakkha wahshaton ko bhi apne ghar rakkha 
apni be-chehragi chhupane ko aaine ko idhar udhar rakkha 
ek tera gham hi apni daulat thi dil mein poshida be-KHatar rakkha 
aarzu ne kamal pahchana aur ta'alluq ko taq par rakkha 
is qadar tha udas mausam-e-gul hum ne aab-e-rawan pe sar rakkha 
apni waraftagi chhupane ko shauq ne hum ko dar-ba-dar rakkha 
kalma-e-shukr ki mohabbat ne hum ko tamhid-e-KHwab par rakkha 
un ko samjhane apna harf-e-suKHan aansuon ko payam par rakkha

maiñ jahāñ tum ko bulātā huuñ vahāñ tak aao merī nazroñ se guzar kar dil-o-jāñ tak aao 
phir ye dekho ki zamāne kī havā hai kaisī saath mere mire firdaus-e-javāñ tak aao 
hausla ho to uḌo mere tasavvur kī tarah merī taḳh.īl ke gulzār-e-jināñ tak aao 
teġh kī tarah chalo chhoḌ ke āġhosh-e-niyām tiir kī tarah se āġhosh-e-kamāñ tak aao 
phuul ke gird phiro baaġh meñ mānind-e-nasīm misl-e-parvāna kisī sham-e-tapāñ tak aao 
lo vo sadiyoñ ke jahannam kī hadeñ ḳhatm huiiñ ab hai firdaus hī firdaus jahāñ tak aao 
chhoḌ kar vahm-o-gumāñ husn-e-yaqīñ tak pahuñcho par yaqīñ se bhī kabhī vahm-o-gumāñ tak aao 
isī duniyā meñ dikhā deñ tumheñ jannat kī bahār shaiḳh-jī tum bhī zarā kū-e-butāñ tak aao 
main jahan tum ko bulata hun wahan tak aao meri nazron se guzar kar dil-o-jaan tak aao 
phir ye dekho ki zamane ki hawa hai kaisi sath mere mere firdaus-e-jawan tak aao 
hausla ho to uDo mere tasawwur ki tarah meri taKHil ke gulzar-e-jinan tak aao 
tegh ki tarah chalo chhoD ke aaghosh-e-niyam tir ki tarah se aaghosh-e-kaman tak aao 
phul ke gird phiro bagh mein manind-e-nasim misl-e-parwana kisi sham-e-tapan tak aao 
lo wo sadiyon ke jahannam ki haden KHatm huin ab hai firdaus hi firdaus jahan tak aao 
chhoD kar wahm-o-guman husn-e-yaqin tak pahuncho par yaqin se bhi kabhi wahm-o-guman tak aao 
isi duniya mein dikha den tumhein jannat ki bahaar shaiKH-ji tum bhi zara ku-e-butan tak aao

terī sūrat ko dekhtā huuñ maiñ us kī qudrat ko dekhtā huuñ maiñ 
jab huī sub.h aa ga.e nāseh unhīñ hazrat ko dekhtā huuñ maiñ 
vo musībat sunī nahīñ jaatī jis musībat ko dekhtā huuñ maiñ 
dekhne aa.e haiñ jo merī nabz un kī sūrat ko dekhtā huuñ maiñ 
maut mujh ko dikhā.ī detī hai jab tabī.at ko dekhtā huuñ maiñ 
shab-e-furqat uThā uThā kar sar sub.h-e-ishrat ko dekhtā huuñ maiñ 
duur baiThā huā sar-e-mahfil rañg-e-sohbat ko dekhtā huuñ maiñ 
har musībat hai be-mazā shab-e-ġham aafat aafat ko dekhtā huuñ maiñ 
na mohabbat ko jānte ho tum na muravvat ko dekhtā huuñ maiñ 
koī dushman ko yuuñ na dekhegā jaise qismat ko dekhtā huuñ maiñ 
hashr meñ 'dāġh' koī dost nahīñ saarī ḳhilqat ko dekhtā huuñ maiñ 
teri surat ko dekhta hun main us ki qudrat ko dekhta hun main 
jab hui subh aa gae naseh unhin hazrat ko dekhta hun main 
wo musibat suni nahin jati jis musibat ko dekhta hun main 
dekhne aae hain jo meri nabz un ki surat ko dekhta hun main 
maut mujh ko dikhai deti hai jab tabiat ko dekhta hun main 
shab-e-furqat uTha uTha kar sar subh-e-ishrat ko dekhta hun main 
dur baiTha hua sar-e-mahfil rang-e-sohbat ko dekhta hun main 
har musibat hai be-maza shab-e-gham aafat aafat ko dekhta hun main 
na mohabbat ko jaante ho tum na murawwat ko dekhta hun main 
koi dushman ko yun na dekhega jaise qismat ko dekhta hun main 
hashr mein 'dagh' koi dost nahin sari KHilqat ko dekhta hun main

sab log liye sañg-e-malāmat nikal aa.e kis shahr meñ ham ahl-e-mohabbat nikal aa.e 
ab dil kī tamannā hai to ai kaash yahī ho aañsū kī jagah aañkh se hasrat nikal aa.e 
har ghar kā diyā gul na karo tum ki na jaane kis baam se ḳhurshīd-e-qayāmat nikal aa.e 
jo darpai-e-pindār haiñ un qatl-gahoñ se jaañ de ke bhī samjho ki salāmat nikal aa.e 
ai ham-nafaso kuchh to kaho ahd-e-sitam kī ik harf se mumkin hai hikāyat nikal aa.e 
yaaro mujhe maslūb karo tum ki mire baad shāyad ki tumhārā qad-o-qāmat nikal aa.e 
sab log liye sang-e-malamat nikal aae kis shahr mein hum ahl-e-mohabbat nikal aae 
ab dil ki tamanna hai to ai kash yahi ho aansu ki jagah aankh se hasrat nikal aae 
har ghar ka diya gul na karo tum ki na jaane kis baam se KHurshid-e-qayamat nikal aae 
jo darpai-e-pindar hain un qatl-gahon se jaan de ke bhi samjho ki salamat nikal aae 
ai ham-nafaso kuchh to kaho ahd-e-sitam ki ek harf se mumkin hai hikayat nikal aae 
yaro mujhe maslub karo tum ki mere baad shayad ki tumhaara qad-o-qamat nikal aae

bin māñge mil rahā ho to ḳhvāhish fuzūl hai sūraj se raushnī kī guzārish fuzūl hai 
kis ne kahā thā TuuTī huī naav meñ chalo dariyā ke saath aap kī ranjish fuzūl hai 
nābūd ke surāġh kī sūrat nikāliye maujūd kī numūd o numā.ish fuzūl hai 
maiñ aap apnī maut kī taiyāriyoñ meñ huuñ mere ḳhilāf aap kī sāzish fuzūl hai 
ai āsmān terī ināyat bajā magar fasleñ pakī huī hoñ to bārish fuzūl hai 
jī chāhtā hai kah duuñ zamīn o zamāñ se maiñ manzil agar nahīñ hai to gardish fuzūl hai 
in.ām-e-nañg-o-nām mire kaam ke nahīñ majzūb huuñ so merī satā.ish fuzūl hai 
bin mange mil raha ho to KHwahish fuzul hai suraj se raushni ki guzarish fuzul hai 
kis ne kaha tha TuTi hui naw mein chalo dariya ke sath aap ki ranjish fuzul hai 
nabud ke suragh ki surat nikaliye maujud ki numud o numaish fuzul hai 
main aap apni maut ki taiyariyon mein hun mere KHilaf aap ki sazish fuzul hai 
ai aasman teri inayat baja magar faslen paki hui hon to barish fuzul hai 
ji chahta hai kah dun zamin o zaman se main manzil agar nahin hai to gardish fuzul hai 
inam-e-nang-o-nam mere kaam ke nahin majzub hun so meri sataish fuzul hai

safar ke ba.ad bhī zauq-e-safar na rah jaa.e ḳhayāl-o-ḳhvāb meñ ab ke bhī ghar na rah jaa.e 
maiñ sochtā huuñ bahut zindagī ke baare meñ ye zindagī bhī mujhe soch kar na rah jaa.e 
bas ek ḳhauf meñ hotī hai har sahar merī nishān-e-ḳhvāb kahīñ aañkh par na rah jaa.e 
ye be-hisī to mirī zid thī mere ajzā se ki mujh meñ apne ta.āqub kā Dar na rah jaa.e 
havā-e-shām tirā raqs nā-guzīr sahī ye merī ḳhaak tire jism par na rah jaa.e 
usī kī shakl liyā chāhtī hai ḳhaak mirī so shahr-e-jāñ meñ koī kūza-gar na rah jaa.e 
guzar gayā ho agar qāfila to dekh aao pas-e-ġhubār kisī kī nazar na rah jaa.e 
maiñ ek or khaḌā huuñ hisār-e-duniyā ke vo jis kī zid meñ khaḌā huuñ udhar na rah jaa.e 
safar ke baad bhi zauq-e-safar na rah jae KHayal-o-KHwab mein ab ke bhi ghar na rah jae 
main sochta hun bahut zindagi ke bare mein ye zindagi bhi mujhe soch kar na rah jae 
bas ek KHauf mein hoti hai har sahar meri nishan-e-KHwab kahin aankh par na rah jae 
ye be-hisi to meri zid thi mere ajza se ki mujh mein apne taaqub ka Dar na rah jae 
hawa-e-sham tera raqs na-guzir sahi ye meri KHak tere jism par na rah jae 
usi ki shakl liya chahti hai KHak meri so shahr-e-jaan mein koi kuza-gar na rah jae 
guzar gaya ho agar qafila to dekh aao pas-e-ghubar kisi ki nazar na rah jae 
main ek or khaDa hun hisar-e-duniya ke wo jis ki zid mein khaDa hun udhar na rah jae

aur haiñ kitnī manzileñ baaqī jaan kitnī hai jism meñ baaqī 
zinda logoñ kī būd-o-bāsh meñ haiñ murda logoñ kī ādateñ baaqī 
us se milnā vo ḳhvāb-e-hastī meñ ḳhvāb mādūm hasrateñ baaqī 
bah ga.e rañg-o-nūr ke chashme rah ga.iiñ un kī rañgateñ baaqī 
jin ke hone se ham bhī haiñ ai dil shahr meñ haiñ vo sūrateñ baaqī 
vo to aa ke 'munīr' jā bhī chukā ik mahak sī hai baaġh meñ baaqī 
aur hain kitni manzilen baqi jaan kitni hai jism mein baqi 
zinda logon ki bud-o-bash mein hain murda logon ki aadaten baqi 
us se milna wo KHwab-e-hasti mein KHwab madum hasraten baqi 
bah gae rang-o-nur ke chashme rah gain un ki rangaten baqi 
jin ke hone se hum bhi hain ai dil shahr mein hain wo suraten baqi 
wo to aa ke 'munir' ja bhi chuka ek mahak si hai bagh mein baqi

ye baat baat meñ kyā nāzukī nikaltī hai dabī dabī tire lab se hañsī nikaltī hai

Thahar Thahar ke jala dil ko ek bar na phunk ki is mein bu-e-mohabbat abhi nikalti hai
