ada se teri magar khinch rahin hain talwaren nigah nigah se chhuri par chhuri nikalti hai 
muhit-e-ishq mein hai kya umid o bim mujhe ki Dub Dub ke kashti meri nikalti hai 
jhalak rahi hai sar-e-shaKH-e-mizha KHun ki bund shajar mein pahle samar se kali nikalti hai 
shab-e-firaq jo khole hain hum ne zaKHm-e-jigar ye intizar hai kab chandni nikalti hai 
samajh to lijiye kahne to dijiye matlab bayan se pahle hi mujh par chhuri nikalti hai 
ye dil ki aag hai ya dil ke nur ka hai zuhur nafas nafas mein mere raushni nikalti hai 
kaha jo main ne ki mar jaunga to kahte hain hamare zaiche mein zindagi nikalti hai 
samajhne wale samajhte hain pech ki taqrir ki kuchh na kuchh teri baaton mein fi nikalti hai 
dam-e-aKHir tasawwur hai kis pari-wash ka ki meri ruh bhi ban kar pari nikalti hai 
sanam-kade mein bhi hai husn ek KHudai ka ki jo nikalti hai surat pari nikalti hai 
mere nikale na niklegi aarzu meri jo tum nikalna chaho abhi nikalti hai 
gham-e-firaq mein ho 'dagh' is qadar betab zara se ranj mein jaan aap ki nikalti hai

ālam-e-āb-o-ḳhāk-o-bād sirr-e-ayāñ hai tū ki maiñ vo jo nazar se hai nihāñ us kā jahāñ hai tū ki maiñ 
vo shab-e-dard-o-soz-o-ġham kahte haiñ zindagī jise us kī sahar hai tū ki maiñ us kī azaañ hai tū ki maiñ 
kis kī numūd ke liye shaam o sahar haiñ garm-e-sair shāna-e-rozgār par bār-e-girāñ hai tū ki maiñ 
tū kaf-e-ḳhāk o be-basar maiñ kaf-e-ḳhāk o ḳhud-nigar kisht-e-vajūd ke liye āb-e-ravāñ hai tū ki maiñ 
aalam-e-ab-o-KHak-o-baad sirr-e-ayan hai tu ki main wo jo nazar se hai nihan us ka jahan hai tu ki main 
wo shab-e-dard-o-soz-o-gham kahte hain zindagi jise us ki sahar hai tu ki main us ki azan hai tu ki main 
kis ki numud ke liye sham o sahar hain garm-e-sair shana-e-rozgar par bar-e-giran hai tu ki main 
tu kaf-e-KHak o be-basar main kaf-e-KHak o KHud-nigar kisht-e-wajud ke liye aab-e-rawan hai tu ki main

ik zaḳhm bhī yārān-e-bismil nahīñ aane kā maqtal meñ paḌe rahiye qātil nahīñ aane kā 
ab kuuch karo yaaro sahrā se ki sunte haiñ sahrā meñ ab ā.inda mahmil nahīñ aane kā 
vaa.iz ko ḳharābe meñ ik dāvat-e-haq dī thī maiñ jaan rahā thā vo jāhil nahīñ aane kā 
buniyād-e-jahāñ pahle jo thī vahī ab bhī hai yuuñ hashr to yārān-e-yak-dil nahīñ aane kā 
but hai ki ḳhudā hai vo maanā hai na mānūñgā us shoḳh se jab tak maiñ ḳhud mil nahīñ aane kā 
gar dil kī ye mahfil hai ḳharcha bhī ho phir dil kā bāhar se to sāmān-e-mahfil nahīñ aane kā 
vo naaf pyāle se sarmast kare varna ho ke maiñ kabhī us kā qaa.il nahīñ aane kā 
ek zaKHm bhi yaran-e-bismil nahin aane ka maqtal mein paDe rahiye qatil nahin aane ka 
ab kuch karo yaro sahra se ki sunte hain sahra mein ab aainda mahmil nahin aane ka 
waiz ko KHarabe mein ek dawat-e-haq di thi main jaan raha tha wo jahil nahin aane ka 
buniyaad-e-jahan pahle jo thi wahi ab bhi hai yun hashr to yaran-e-yak-dil nahin aane ka 
but hai ki KHuda hai wo mana hai na manunga us shoKH se jab tak main KHud mil nahin aane ka 
gar dil ki ye mahfil hai KHarcha bhi ho phir dil ka bahar se to saman-e-mahfil nahin aane ka 
wo naf pyale se sarmast kare warna ho ke main kabhi us ka qail nahin aane ka

ghar se niklā to mulāqāt huī paanī se kahāñ miltī hai ḳhushī itnī farāvānī se 
ḳhush-libāsī hai baḌī chiiz magar kyā kījiye kaam is pal hai tire jism kī uryānī se 
sāmne aur hī dīvār o shajar paatā huuñ jaag uThtā huuñ agar ḳhvāb-e-jahāñbānī se 
umr kā koh-e-girāñ aur shab-o-roz mire ye vo patthar hai jo kaTtā nahīñ āsānī se 
shaam thī aur shafaq phuuT rahī thī 'sarvat' ek raqqāsa kī jaltī huī peshānī se 
ghar se nikla to mulaqat hui pani se kahan milti hai KHushi itni farawani se 
KHush-libasi hai baDi chiz magar kya kijiye kaam is pal hai tere jism ki uryani se 
samne aur hi diwar o shajar pata hun jag uThta hun agar KHwab-e-jahanbani se 
umr ka koh-e-giran aur shab-o-roz mere ye wo patthar hai jo kaTta nahin aasani se 
sham thi aur shafaq phuT rahi thi 'sarwat' ek raqqasa ki jalti hui peshani se

vo zamāna nazar nahīñ aatā kuchh Thikānā nazar nahīñ aatā 
jaan jaatī dikhā.ī detī hai un kā aanā nazar nahīñ aatā 
ishq dar-parda phūñktā hai aag ye jalānā nazar nahīñ aatā 
ik zamāna mirī nazar meñ rahā ik zamāna nazar nahīñ aatā 
dil ne is bazm meñ biThā to diyā uTh ke jaanā nazar nahīñ aatā 
rahiye mushtāq-e-jalva-e-dīdār ham ne maanā nazar nahīñ aatā 
le chalo mujh ko rāh-ravān-e-adam yaañ Thikānā nazar nahīñ aatā 
dil pe baiThā kahāñ se tīr-e-nigāh ye nishāna nazar nahīñ aatā 
tum milāoge ḳhaak meñ ham ko dil milānā nazar nahīñ aatā 
aap hī dekhte haiñ ham ko to dil kā aanā nazar nahīñ aatā 
dil-e-pur-ārzū luTā ai 'dāġh' vo ḳhazāna nazar nahīñ aatā 
wo zamana nazar nahin aata kuchh Thikana nazar nahin aata 
jaan jati dikhai deti hai un ka aana nazar nahin aata 
ishq dar-parda phunkta hai aag ye jalana nazar nahin aata 
ek zamana meri nazar mein raha ek zamana nazar nahin aata 
dil ne is bazm mein biTha to diya uTh ke jaana nazar nahin aata 
rahiye mushtaq-e-jalwa-e-didar hum ne mana nazar nahin aata 
le chalo mujh ko rah-rawan-e-adam yan Thikana nazar nahin aata 
dil pe baiTha kahan se tir-e-nigah ye nishana nazar nahin aata 
tum milaoge KHak mein hum ko dil milana nazar nahin aata 
aap hi dekhte hain hum ko to dil ka aana nazar nahin aata 
dil-e-pur-arzu luTa ai 'dagh' wo KHazana nazar nahin aata

haTāo aa.ina ummīd-vār ham bhī haiñ tumhāre dekhne vāloñ meñ yaar ham bhī haiñ 
taḌap ke ruuh ye kahtī hai hijr-e-jānāñ meñ ki tere saath dil-e-be-qarār ham bhī haiñ 
rahe dimāġh agar āsmāñ pe duur nahīñ ki tere kūche meñ mast-e-ġhubār ham bhī haiñ 
kaho ki naḳhl-e-chaman ham se sar-kashī na kareñ unhīñ kī tarah se bāġh-o-bahār ham bhī haiñ 
hamāre aage zarā ho samajh ke zamzama-sanj ki ek naġhma-sarā ai hazār ham bhī haiñ 
kahāñ tak aa.ine meñ dekh-bhāl idhar dekho ki ik nigāh ke ummīd-vār ham bhī haiñ 
sharāb muñh se lagāte nahīñ haiñ ai zāhid firāq-e-yār meñ parhez-gār ham bhī haiñ 
hamārā naam bhī likh lo jo hai qalam jaarī qadīm aap ke ḳhidmat-guzār ham bhī haiñ 
humā haiñ gird mirī haDDiyoñ ke aaTh pahr sag aa ke kahte haiñ ummīd-vār ham bhī haiñ 
jo laḌkhaḌā ke gire tū qadam pe saaqī ke 'amīr' mast nahīñ hoshyār ham bhī haiñ 
haTao aaina ummid-war hum bhi hain tumhaare dekhne walon mein yar hum bhi hain 
taDap ke ruh ye kahti hai hijr-e-jaanan mein ki tere sath dil-e-be-qarar hum bhi hain 
rahe dimagh agar aasman pe dur nahin ki tere kuche mein mast-e-ghubar hum bhi hain 
kaho ki naKHl-e-chaman hum se sar-kashi na karen unhin ki tarah se bagh-o-bahaar hum bhi hain 
hamare aage zara ho samajh ke zamzama-sanj ki ek naghma-sara ai hazar hum bhi hain 
kahan tak aaine mein dekh-bhaal idhar dekho ki ek nigah ke ummid-war hum bhi hain 
sharab munh se lagate nahin hain ai zahid firaq-e-yar mein parhez-gar hum bhi hain 
hamara nam bhi likh lo jo hai qalam jari qadim aap ke KHidmat-guzar hum bhi hain 
huma hain gird meri haDDiyon ke aaTh pahr sag aa ke kahte hain ummid-war hum bhi hain 
jo laDkhaDa ke gire tu qadam pe saqi ke 'amir' mast nahin hoshyar hum bhi hain

āmad-e-ḳhat se huā hai sard jo bāzār-e-dost dūd-e-sham'-e-kushta thā shāyad ḳhat-e-ruḳhsār-e-dost 
ai dil-e-nā-āqibat-andesh zabt-e-shauq kar kaun lā saktā hai tāb-e-jalva-e-dīdār-e-dost 
ḳhāna-vīrāñ-sāzī-e-hairat tamāshā kījiye sūrat-e-naqsh-e-qadam huuñ rafta-e-raftār-e-dost 
ishq meñ bedād-e-rashk-e-ġhair ne maarā mujhe kushta-e-dushman huuñ āḳhir garche thā bīmār-e-dost 
chashm-e-mā raushan ki us bedard kā dil shaad hai dīda-e-pur-ḳhūñ hamārā sāġhar-e-sarshār-e-dost 
ġhair yuuñ kartā hai merī pursish us ke hijr meñ be-takalluf dost ho jaise koī ġham-ḳhvār-e-dost 
taaki maiñ jānūñ ki hai us kī rasā.ī vaañ talak mujh ko detā hai payām-e-vāda-e-dīdār-e-dost 
jab ki maiñ kartā huuñ apnā shikva-e-zof-e-dimāġh sar kare hai vo hadīs-e-zulf-e-ambar-bār-e-dost 
chupke chupke mujh ko rote dekh paatā hai agar hañs ke kartā hai bayān-e-shoḳhī-e-guftār-e-dost 
mehrbānī-hā-e-dushman kī shikāyat kījiye tā bayāñ kiije sipās-e-lazzat-e-āzār-e-dost 
ye ġhazal apnī mujhe jī se pasand aatī hai aap hai radīf-e-sher meñ 'ġhālib' zi-bas takrār-e-dost 
chashm-e-band-e-ḳhalq juz timsāl-e-ḳhud-bīnī nahīñ aa.ina hai qālib-e-ḳhisht-e-dar-o-dīvār-e-dost 
barq-e-ḳhirman-zār gauhar hai nigāh-e-tez yaañ ashk ho jaate haiñ ḳhushk az-garmī-e-raftār-e-dost 
hai savā neze pe us ke qāmat-e-nau-ḳhez se āftāb-e-sub.h-e-mahshar hai gul-e-dastār-e-dost 
ai adū-e-maslahat chand ba-zabt afsurda rah kardanī hai jam.a tāb-e-shoḳhī-e-dīdār-e-dost 
laġhzish-e-mastāna o josh-e-tamāshā hai 'asad' ātish-e-mai se bahār-e-garmī-e-bāzār-e-dost 
aamad-e-KHat se hua hai sard jo bazar-e-dost dud-e-sham'-e-kushta tha shayad KHat-e-ruKHsar-e-dost 
ai dil-e-na-aqibat-andesh zabt-e-shauq kar kaun la sakta hai tab-e-jalwa-e-didar-e-dost 
KHana-viran-sazi-e-hairat tamasha kijiye surat-e-naqsh-e-qadam hun rafta-e-raftar-e-dost 
ishq mein bedad-e-rashk-e-ghair ne mara mujhe kushta-e-dushman hun aaKHir garche tha bimar-e-dost 
chashm-e-ma raushan ki us bedard ka dil shad hai dida-e-pur-KHun hamara saghar-e-sarshaar-e-dost 
ghair yun karta hai meri pursish us ke hijr mein be-takalluf dost ho jaise koi gham-KHwar-e-dost 
taki main jaanun ki hai us ki rasai wan talak mujh ko deta hai payam-e-wada-e-didar-e-dost 
jab ki main karta hun apna shikwa-e-zof-e-dimagh sar kare hai wo hadis-e-zulf-e-ambar-bar-e-dost 
chupke chupke mujh ko rote dekh pata hai agar hans ke karta hai bayan-e-shoKHi-e-guftar-e-dost 
mehrbani-ha-e-dushman ki shikayat kijiye ta bayan kije sipas-e-lazzat-e-azar-e-dost 
ye ghazal apni mujhe ji se pasand aati hai aap hai radif-e-sher mein 'ghaalib' zi-bas takrar-e-dost 
chashm-e-band-e-KHalq juz timsal-e-KHud-bini nahin aaina hai qalib-e-KHisht-e-dar-o-diwar-e-dost 
barq-e-KHirman-zar gauhar hai nigah-e-tez yan ashk ho jate hain KHushk az-garmi-e-raftar-e-dost 
hai sawa neze pe us ke qamat-e-nau-KHez se aaftab-e-subh-e-mahshar hai gul-e-dastar-e-dost 
ai adu-e-maslahat chand ba-zabt afsurda rah kardani hai jama tab-e-shoKHi-e-didar-e-dost 
laghzish-e-mastana o josh-e-tamasha hai 'asad' aatish-e-mai se bahaar-e-garmi-e-bazar-e-dost

ik dānish-e-nūrānī ik dānish-e-burhānī hai dānish-e-burhānī hairat kī farāvānī 
is paikar-e-ḳhākī meñ ik shai hai so vo terī mere liye mushkil hai is shai kī nigahbānī 
ab kyā jo fuġhāñ merī pahuñchī hai sitāroñ tak tū ne hī sikhā.ī thī mujh ko ye ġhazal-ḳhvānī 
ho naqsh agar bātil takrār se kyā hāsil kyā tujh ko ḳhush aatī hai aadam kī ye arzānī 
mujh ko to sikhā dī hai afrañg ne zindīqī is daur ke mullā haiñ kyuuñ nañg-e-musalmānī 
taqdīr shikan quvvat baaqī hai abhī is meñ nādāñ jise kahte haiñ taqdīr kā zindānī 
tere bhī sanam-ḳhāne mere bhī sanam-ḳhāne donoñ ke sanam ḳhākī donoñ ke sanam faanī 
ek danish-e-nurani ek danish-e-burhani hai danish-e-burhani hairat ki farawani 
is paikar-e-KHaki mein ek shai hai so wo teri mere liye mushkil hai is shai ki nigahbani 
ab kya jo fughan meri pahunchi hai sitaron tak tu ne hi sikhai thi mujh ko ye ghazal-KHwani 
ho naqsh agar baatil takrar se kya hasil kya tujh ko KHush aati hai aadam ki ye arzani 
mujh ko to sikha di hai afrang ne zindiqi is daur ke mulla hain kyun nang-e-musalmani 
taqdir shikan quwwat baqi hai abhi is mein nadan jise kahte hain taqdir ka zindani 
tere bhi sanam-KHane mere bhi sanam-KHane donon ke sanam KHaki donon ke sanam fani

kisī kalī ne bhī dekhā na aañkh bhar ke mujhe guzar ga.ī jaras-e-gul udaas kar ke mujhe 
maiñ so rahā thā kisī yaad ke shabistāñ meñ jagā ke chhoḌ ga.e qāfile sahar ke mujhe 
maiñ ro rahā thā muqaddar kī saḳht rāhoñ meñ uḌā ke le ga.e jaadū tirī nazar ke mujhe 
maiñ tere dard kī tuġhyāniyoñ meñ Duub gayā pukārte rahe taare ubhar ubhar ke mujhe 
tire firāq kī rāteñ kabhī na bhūleñgī maze mile unhīñ rātoñ meñ umr bhar ke mujhe 
zarā sī der Thaharne de ai ġham-e-duniyā bulā rahā hai koī baam se utar ke mujhe 
phir aaj aa.ī thī ik mauja-e-havā-e-tarab sunā ga.ī hai fasāne idhar udhar ke mujhe 
kisi kali ne bhi dekha na aankh bhar ke mujhe guzar gai jaras-e-gul udas kar ke mujhe 
main so raha tha kisi yaad ke shabistan mein jaga ke chhoD gae qafile sahar ke mujhe 
main ro raha tha muqaddar ki saKHt rahon mein uDa ke le gae jadu teri nazar ke mujhe 
main tere dard ki tughyaniyon mein Dub gaya pukarte rahe tare ubhar ubhar ke mujhe 
tere firaq ki raaten kabhi na bhulengi maze mile unhin raaton mein umr bhar ke mujhe 
zara si der Thaharne de ai gham-e-duniya bula raha hai koi baam se utar ke mujhe 
phir aaj aai thi ek mauja-e-hawa-e-tarab suna gai hai fasane idhar udhar ke mujhe

koī to phuul khilā.e duā ke lahje meñ ajab tarah kī ghuTan hai havā ke lahje meñ 
ye vaqt kis kī ra.ūnat pe ḳhaak Daal gayā ye kaun bol rahā thā ḳhudā ke lahje meñ 
na jaane ḳhalq-e-ḳhudā kaun se azaab meñ hai havā.eñ chīḳh paḌīñ iltijā ke lahje meñ 
khulā fareb-e-mohabbat dikhā.ī detā hai ajab kamāl hai us bevafā ke lahje meñ 
yahī hai maslahat-e-jabr-e-ehtiyāt to phir ham apnā haal kaheñge chhupā ke lahje meñ 
koi to phul khilae dua ke lahje mein ajab tarah ki ghuTan hai hawa ke lahje mein 
ye waqt kis ki raunat pe KHak Dal gaya ye kaun bol raha tha KHuda ke lahje mein 
na jaane KHalq-e-KHuda kaun se azab mein hai hawaen chiKH paDin iltija ke lahje mein 
khula fareb-e-mohabbat dikhai deta hai ajab kamal hai us bewafa ke lahje mein 
yahi hai maslahat-e-jabr-e-ehtiyat to phir hum apna haal kahenge chhupa ke lahje mein

jī chāhtā hai falak pe jā.ūñ sūraj ko ġhurūb se bachā.ūñ 
bas merā chale jo gardishoñ par din ko bhī na chāñd ko bujhā.ūñ 
maiñ chhoḌ ke sīdhe rāstoñ ko bhaTkī huī nekiyāñ kamā.ūñ 
imkān pe is qadar yaqīñ hai sahrāoñ meñ biij Daal aa.uuñ 
maiñ shab ke musāfiroñ kī ḳhātir mish.al na mile to ghar jalā.ūñ 
ash.ār haiñ mere isti.āre aao tumheñ aa.ine dikhā.ūñ 
yuuñ baT ke bikhar ke rah gayā huuñ har shaḳhs meñ apnā aks pā.ūñ 
āvāz jo duuñ kisī ke dar par andar se bhī ḳhud nikal ke aa.uuñ 
ai chāragarān-e-asr-e-hāzir faulād kā dil kahāñ se lā.ūñ 
har raat duā karūñ sahar kī har sub.h nayā fareb khā.ūñ 
har jabr pe sabr kar rahā huuñ is tarah kahīñ ujaḌ na jā.ūñ 
ronā bhī to tarz-e-guftugū hai āñkheñ jo rukeñ to lab hilā.ūñ 
ḳhud ko to 'nadīm' āzmāyā ab mar ke ḳhudā ko āzmā.ūñ 
ji chahta hai falak pe jaun suraj ko ghurub se bachaun 
bas mera chale jo gardishon par din ko bhi na chand ko bujhaun 
main chhoD ke sidhe raston ko bhaTki hui nekiyan kamaun 
imkan pe is qadar yaqin hai sahraon mein bij Dal aaun 
main shab ke musafiron ki KHatir mishal na mile to ghar jalaun 
ashaar hain mere istiare aao tumhein aaine dikhaun 
yun baT ke bikhar ke rah gaya hun har shaKHs mein apna aks paun 
aawaz jo dun kisi ke dar par andar se bhi KHud nikal ke aaun 
ai chaaragaran-e-asr-e-hazir faulad ka dil kahan se laun 
har raat dua karun sahar ki har subh naya fareb khaun 
har jabr pe sabr kar raha hun is tarah kahin ujaD na jaun 
rona bhi to tarz-e-guftugu hai aankhen jo ruken to lab hilaun 
KHud ko to 'nadim' aazmaya ab mar ke KHuda ko aazmaun

jamegī kaise bisāt-e-yārāñ ki shīsha o jaam bujh ga.e haiñ sajegī kaise shab-e-nigārāñ ki dil sar-e-shām bujh ga.e haiñ 
vo tīrgī hai rah-e-butāñ meñ charāġh-e-ruḳh hai na sham-e-vāda kiran koī aarzū kī laao ki sab dar-o-bām bujh ga.e haiñ 
bahut sambhālā vafā kā paimāñ magar vo barsī hai ab ke barkhā har ek iqrār miT gayā hai tamām paiġhām bujh ga.e haiñ 
qarīb aa ai mah-e-shab-e-ġham nazar pe khultā nahīñ kuchh is dam ki dil pe kis kis kā naqsh baaqī hai kaun se naam bujh ga.e haiñ 
bahār ab aa ke kyā karegī ki jin se thā jashn-e-rañg-o-naġhma vo gul sar-e-shāḳh jal ga.e haiñ vo dil tah-e-dām bujh ga.e haiñ 
jamegi kaise bisat-e-yaran ki shisha o jam bujh gae hain sajegi kaise shab-e-nigaran ki dil sar-e-sham bujh gae hain 
wo tirgi hai rah-e-butan mein charagh-e-ruKH hai na sham-e-wada kiran koi aarzu ki lao ki sab dar-o-baam bujh gae hain 
bahut sambhaala wafa ka paiman magar wo barsi hai ab ke barkha har ek iqrar miT gaya hai tamam paigham bujh gae hain 
qarib aa ai mah-e-shab-e-gham nazar pe khulta nahin kuchh is dam ki dil pe kis kis ka naqsh baqi hai kaun se nam bujh gae hain 
bahaar ab aa ke kya karegi ki jin se tha jashn-e-rang-o-naghma wo gul sar-e-shaKH jal gae hain wo dil tah-e-dam bujh gae hain

kaise unheñ bhulā.ūñ mohabbat jinhoñ ne kī mujh ko to vo bhī yaad haiñ nafrat jinhoñ ne kī 
duniyā meñ ehtirām ke qābil vo log haiñ ai zillat-e-vafā tirī izzat jinhoñ ne kī 
tazīn-e-kā.enāt kā baa.is vahī bane duniyā se iḳhtilāf kī jur.at jinhoñ ne kī 
āsūdgān-e-manzil-e-lailā udaas haiñ achchhe rahe, na tai ye masāfat jinhoñ ne kī 
ahl-e-havas to ḳhair havas meñ hue zalīl vo bhī hue ḳharāb, mohabbat jinhoñ ne kī 
kaise unhen bhulaun mohabbat jinhon ne ki mujh ko to wo bhi yaad hain nafrat jinhon ne ki 
duniya mein ehtiram ke qabil wo log hain ai zillat-e-wafa teri izzat jinhon ne ki 
tazin-e-kaenat ka bais wahi bane duniya se iKHtilaf ki jurat jinhon ne ki 
aasudgan-e-manzil-e-laila udas hain achchhe rahe, na tai ye masafat jinhon ne ki 
ahl-e-hawas to KHair hawas mein hue zalil wo bhi hue KHarab, mohabbat jinhon ne ki

ik sub.h hai jo huī nahīñ hai ik raat hai jo kaTī nahīñ hai 
maqtūloñ kā qaht paḌ na jaa.e qātil kī kahīñ kamī nahīñ hai 
vīrānoñ se aa rahī hai āvāz taḳhlīq-e-junūñ rukī nahīñ hai 
hai aur hī kārobār-e-mastī jī lenā to zindagī nahīñ hai 
saaqī se jo jaam le na baḌh kar vo tishnagī tishnagī nahīñ hai 
āshiq-kushī o fareb-kārī ye sheva-e-dilbarī nahīñ hai 
bhūkoñ kī nigāh meñ hai bijlī ye barq abhī girī nahīñ hai 
dil meñ jo jalā.ī thī kisī ne vo sham-e-tarab bujhī nahīñ hai 
ik dhuup sī hai jo zer-e-mizhgāñ vo aañkh abhī uThī nahīñ hai 
haiñ kaam bahut abhī ki duniyā shā.ista-e-ādmī nahīñ hai 
har rañg ke aa chuke haiñ fir.aun lekin ye jabīñ jhukī nahīñ hai 
ek subh hai jo hui nahin hai ek raat hai jo kaTi nahin hai 
maqtulon ka qaht paD na jae qatil ki kahin kami nahin hai 
viranon se aa rahi hai aawaz taKHliq-e-junun ruki nahin hai 
hai aur hi karobar-e-masti ji lena to zindagi nahin hai 
saqi se jo jam le na baDh kar wo tishnagi tishnagi nahin hai 
aashiq-kushi o fareb-kari ye shewa-e-dilbari nahin hai 
bhukon ki nigah mein hai bijli ye barq abhi giri nahin hai 
dil mein jo jalai thi kisi ne wo sham-e-tarab bujhi nahin hai 
ek dhup si hai jo zer-e-mizhgan wo aankh abhi uThi nahin hai 
hain kaam bahut abhi ki duniya shaista-e-admi nahin hai 
har rang ke aa chuke hain firaun lekin ye jabin jhuki nahin hai

bikhar gayā hai jo motī pirone vaalā thā vo ho rahā hai yahāñ jo na hone vaalā thā 
aur ab ye chāhtā huuñ koī ġham baTā.e mirā maiñ apnī miTTī kabhī aap Dhone vaalā thā 
tire na aane se dil bhī nahīñ dukhā shāyad vagarna kyā maiñ sar-e-shām sone vaalā thā 
milā na thā pa bichhaḌne kā ġham na thā mujh ko jalā nahīñ thā magar raakh hone vaalā thā 
hazār tarah ke the rañj pichhle mausam meñ par itnā thā ki koī saath rone vaalā thā 
bikhar gaya hai jo moti pirone wala tha wo ho raha hai yahan jo na hone wala tha 
aur ab ye chahta hun koi gham baTae mera main apni miTTi kabhi aap Dhone wala tha 
tere na aane se dil bhi nahin dukha shayad wagarna kya main sar-e-sham sone wala tha 
mila na tha pa bichhaDne ka gham na tha mujh ko jala nahin tha magar rakh hone wala tha 
hazar tarah ke the ranj pichhle mausam mein par itna tha ki koi sath rone wala tha

kuchh mohtasiboñ kī ḳhalvat meñ kuchh vaa.iz ke ghar jaatī hai ham bāda-kashoñ ke hisse kī ab jaam meñ kam-tar jaatī hai 
yuuñ arz-o-talab se kam ai dil patthar dil paanī hote haiñ tum laakh razā kī ḳhū Daalo kab ḳhū-e-sitamgar jaatī hai 
bedād-garoñ kī bastī hai yaañ daad kahāñ ḳhairāt kahāñ sar phoḌtī phirtī hai nādāñ fariyād jo dar dar jaatī hai 
haañ jaañ ke ziyāñ kī ham ko bhī tashvīsh hai lekin kyā kiije har rah jo udhar ko jaatī hai maqtal se guzar kar jaatī hai 
ab kūcha-e-dil-bar kā rah-rau rahzan bhī bane to baat bane pahre se adū Talte hī nahīñ aur raat barābar jaatī hai 
ham ahl-e-qafas tanhā bhī nahīñ har roz nasīm-e-sub.h-e-vatan yādoñ se mo.attar aatī hai ashkoñ se munavvar jaatī hai 
kuchh mohtasibon ki KHalwat mein kuchh waiz ke ghar jati hai hum baada-kashon ke hisse ki ab jam mein kam-tar jati hai 
yun arz-o-talab se kam ai dil patthar dil pani hote hain tum lakh raza ki KHu Dalo kab KHu-e-sitamgar jati hai 
bedad-garon ki basti hai yan dad kahan KHairaat kahan sar phoDti phirti hai nadan fariyaad jo dar dar jati hai 
han jaan ke ziyan ki hum ko bhi tashwish hai lekin kya kije har rah jo udhar ko jati hai maqtal se guzar kar jati hai 
ab kucha-e-dil-bar ka rah-rau rahzan bhi bane to baat bane pahre se adu Talte hi nahin aur raat barabar jati hai 
hum ahl-e-qafas tanha bhi nahin har roz nasim-e-subh-e-watan yaadon se moattar aati hai ashkon se munawwar jati hai

zaḳhm dabe to phir nayā tiir chalā diyā karo dosto apnā lutf-e-ḳhās yaad dilā diyā karo 
ek ilāj-e-dā.imī hai to barā-e-tishnagī pahle hī ghūñT meñ agar zahr milā diyā karo 
shahr talab kare agar tum se ilāj-e-tīragī sāhab-e-iḳhtiyār ho aag lagā diyā karo 
maqtal-e-ġham kī raunaqeñ ḳhatm na hone pā.eñgī koī to aa hī jā.egā roz sadā diyā karo 
jazba-e-ḳhāk-parvarī aur sukūn pā.egā ḳhaak karo hameñ to phir ḳhaak uḌā diyā karo 
zaKHm dabe to phir naya tir chala diya karo dosto apna lutf-e-KHas yaad dila diya karo 
ek ilaj-e-daimi hai to bara-e-tishnagi pahle hi ghunT mein agar zahr mila diya karo 
shahr talab kare agar tum se ilaj-e-tiragi sahab-e-iKHtiyar ho aag laga diya karo 
maqtal-e-gham ki raunaqen KHatm na hone paengi koi to aa hi jaega roz sada diya karo 
jazba-e-KHak-parwari aur sukun paega KHak karo hamein to phir KHak uDa diya karo

ġham se kahīñ najāt mile chain paa.eñ ham dil ḳhuun meñ nahā.e to gañgā nahā.eñ ham 
jannat meñ jaa.eñ ham ki jahannam meñ jaa.eñ ham mil jaa.e to kahīñ na kahīñ tujh ko paa.eñ ham 
jauf-e-falak meñ ḳhaak bhī lazzat nahīñ rahī jī chāhtā hai terī jafā.eñ uThā.eñ ham 
Dar hai na bhuul jaa.e vo saffāk roz-e-hashr duniyā meñ likhte jaate haiñ apnī ḳhatā.eñ ham 
mumkin hai ye ki va.ade par apne vo aa bhī jaa.e mushkil ye hai ki aap meñ us vaqt aa.eñ ham 
nārāz ho ḳhudā to kareñ bandagī se ḳhush māshūq ruuTh jaa.e to kyūñkar manā.eñ ham 
sar dostoñ kā kaaT ke rakhte haiñ sāmne ġhairoñ se pūchhte haiñ qasam kis kī khā.eñ ham 
kitnā tirā mizāj ḳhushāmad-pasand hai kab tak kareñ ḳhudā ke liye iltijā.eñ ham 
lālach abas hai dil kā tumheñ vaqt-e-vāpsīñ ye maal vo nahīñ ki jise chhoḌ jaa.eñ ham 
sauñpā tumheñ ḳhudā ko chale ham to nā-murād kuchh paḌh ke baḳhshnā jo kabhī yaad aa.eñ ham 
soz-e-darūñ se apne sharar ban ga.e haiñ ashk kyuuñ āh-e-sard ko na patiñge lagā.eñ ham 
ye jaan tum na loge agar aap jā.egī us bevafā kī ḳhair kahāñ tak manā.eñ ham 
ham-sā.e jāgte rahe nāloñ se raat bhar so.e hue nasīb ko kyūñkar jagā.eñ ham 
jalva dikhā rahā hai vo ā.īna-e-jamāl aatī hai ham ko sharm ki kyā muñh dikhā.eñ ham 
maano kahā jafā na karo tum vafā ke ba.ad aisā na ho ki pher leñ ulTī duā.eñ ham 
dushman se milte julte haiñ ḳhātir se dostī kyā fā.eda jo dost ko dushman banā.eñ ham 
tū bhūlne kī chiiz nahīñ ḳhuub yaad rakh ai 'dāġh' kis tarah tujhe dil se bhulā.eñ ham 
gham se kahin najat mile chain paen hum dil KHun mein nahae to ganga nahaen hum 
jannat mein jaen hum ki jahannam mein jaen hum mil jae to kahin na kahin tujh ko paen hum 
jauf-e-falak mein KHak bhi lazzat nahin rahi ji chahta hai teri jafaen uThaen hum 
Dar hai na bhul jae wo saffak roz-e-hashr duniya mein likhte jate hain apni KHataen hum 
mumkin hai ye ki wade par apne wo aa bhi jae mushkil ye hai ki aap mein us waqt aaen hum 
naraaz ho KHuda to karen bandagi se KHush mashuq ruTh jae to kyunkar manaen hum 
sar doston ka kaT ke rakhte hain samne ghairon se puchhte hain qasam kis ki khaen hum 
kitna tera mizaj KHushamad-pasand hai kab tak karen KHuda ke liye iltijaen hum 
lalach abas hai dil ka tumhein waqt-e-wapsin ye mal wo nahin ki jise chhoD jaen hum 
saunpa tumhein KHuda ko chale hum to na-murad kuchh paDh ke baKHshna jo kabhi yaad aaen hum 
soz-e-darun se apne sharar ban gae hain ashk kyun aah-e-sard ko na patinge lagaen hum 
ye jaan tum na loge agar aap jaegi us bewafa ki KHair kahan tak manaen hum 
ham-sae jagte rahe nalon se raat bhar soe hue nasib ko kyunkar jagaen hum 
jalwa dikha raha hai wo aaina-e-jamal aati hai hum ko sharm ki kya munh dikhaen hum 
mano kaha jafa na karo tum wafa ke baad aisa na ho ki pher len ulTi duaen hum 
dushman se milte julte hain KHatir se dosti kya faeda jo dost ko dushman banaen hum 
tu bhulne ki chiz nahin KHub yaad rakh ai 'dagh' kis tarah tujhe dil se bhulaen hum

bārūd ke badle hāthoñ meñ aa jaa.e kitāb to achchhā ho ai kaash hamārī āñkhoñ kā ikkīsvāñ ḳhvāb to achchhā ho 
har pattā nā-āsūda hai māhaul-e-chaman ālūda hai rah jaa.eñ laraztī shāḳhoñ par do chaar gulāb to achchhā ho 
yuuñ shor kā dariyā biphrā hai chiḌiyoñ ne chahaknā chhoḌ diyā ḳhatre ke nishān se nīche ab utre sailāb to achchhā ho 
har saal kī āḳhirī shāmoñ meñ do chaar varaq uḌ jaate haiñ ab aur na bikhre rishtoñ kī bosīda kitāb to achchhā ho 
har bachcha āñkheñ kholte hī kartā hai savāl mohabbat kā duniyā ke kisī goshe se use mil jaa.e javāb to achchhā ho 
barud ke badle hathon mein aa jae kitab to achchha ho ai kash hamari aankhon ka ikkiswan KHwab to achchha ho 
har patta na-asuda hai mahaul-e-chaman aaluda hai rah jaen larazti shaKHon par do chaar gulab to achchha ho 
yun shor ka dariya biphra hai chiDiyon ne chahakna chhoD diya KHatre ke nishan se niche ab utre sailab to achchha ho 
har sal ki aaKHiri shamon mein do chaar waraq uD jate hain ab aur na bikhre rishton ki bosida kitab to achchha ho 
har bachcha aankhen kholte hi karta hai sawal mohabbat ka duniya ke kisi goshe se use mil jae jawab to achchha ho

ḳhvāb kī hālatoñ ke saath terī hikāyatoñ meñ haiñ ham bhī dayār-e-ahl-e-dil terī rivāyatoñ meñ haiñ 
vo jo the rishtā-hā-e-jāñ TuuT sake bhalā kahāñ jaan vo rishtā-hā-e-jāñ ab bhī shikāyatoñ meñ haiñ 
ek ġhubār hai ki hai dā.era-vār pur-fishāñ qāfilā-hā-e-kahkashāñ tañg haiñ vahshatoñ meñ haiñ 
vaqt kī darmiyāniyāñ kar ga.iiñ jāñ-kanī ko jaañ vo jo adāvateñ ki thiiñ aaj mohabbatoñ meñ haiñ 
partav-e-rañg hai ki hai diid meñ jāñ-nashīn-e-rañg rañg kahāñ haiñ rūnumā rañg to nik.hatoñ meñ haiñ 
hai ye vajūd kī numūd apnī nafas nafas gurez vaqt kī saarī bastiyāñ apnī hazīmatoñ meñ haiñ 
gard kā saarā ḳhānumāñ hai sar-e-dasht-e-be-amāñ shahr haiñ vo jo har tarah gard kī ḳhidmatoñ meñ haiñ 
vo dil o jaan sūrateñ jaise kabhī na thiiñ kahīñ ham unhīñ sūratoñ ke haiñ ham unhīñ sūratoñ meñ haiñ 
maiñ na sunūñgā mājrā ma.arka-hā-e-shauq kā ḳhuun ga.e haiñ rā.egāñ rañg nadāmatoñ meñ haiñ 
KHwab ki haalaton ke sath teri hikayaton mein hain hum bhi dayar-e-ahl-e-dil teri riwayaton mein hain 
wo jo the rishta-ha-e-jaan TuT sake bhala kahan jaan wo rishta-ha-e-jaan ab bhi shikayaton mein hain 
ek ghubar hai ki hai daera-war pur-fishan qafila-ha-e-kahkashan tang hain wahshaton mein hain 
waqt ki darmiyaniyan kar gain jaan-kani ko jaan wo jo adawaten ki thin aaj mohabbaton mein hain 
partaw-e-rang hai ki hai did mein jaan-nashin-e-rang rang kahan hain runuma rang to nikhaton mein hain 
hai ye wajud ki numud apni nafas nafas gurez waqt ki sari bastiyan apni hazimaton mein hain 
gard ka sara KHanuman hai sar-e-dasht-e-be-aman shahr hain wo jo har tarah gard ki KHidmaton mein hain 
wo dil o jaan suraten jaise kabhi na thin kahin hum unhin suraton ke hain hum unhin suraton mein hain 
main na sununga majra marka-ha-e-shauq ka KHun gae hain raegan rang nadamaton mein hain

chāk-pairāhanī-e-gul ko sabā jāntī hai mastī-e-shauq kahāñ band-e-qabā jāntī hai 
ham to badnām-e-mohabbat the so rusvā Thahre nāsehoñ ko bhī magar ḳhalq-e-ḳhudā jāntī hai 
kaun tāqoñ pe rahā kaun sar-e-rāhguzar shahr ke saare charāġhoñ ko havā jāntī hai 
havas in.aam samajhtī hai karam ko tere aur mohabbat hai ki ehsāñ ko sazā jāntī hai 
chaak-pairahani-e-gul ko saba jaanti hai masti-e-shauq kahan band-e-qaba jaanti hai 
hum to badnam-e-mohabbat the so ruswa Thahre nasehon ko bhi magar KHalq-e-KHuda jaanti hai 
kaun taqon pe raha kaun sar-e-rahguzar shahr ke sare charaghon ko hawa jaanti hai 
hawas inam samajhti hai karam ko tere aur mohabbat hai ki ehsan ko saza jaanti hai

ab iḳhtiyār meñ maujeñ na ye ravānī hai maiñ bah rahā huuñ ki merā vajūd paanī hai 
maiñ aur merī tarah tū bhī ik haqīqat hai phir is ke ba.ad jo bachtā hai vo kahānī hai 
tire vajūd meñ kuchh hai jo is zamīñ kā nahīñ tire ḳhayāl kī rañgat bhī āsmānī hai 
zarā bhī daḳhl nahīñ is meñ in havāoñ kā hameñ to maslahatan apnī ḳhaak uḌānī hai 
ye ḳhvāb-gāh ye āñkheñ ye merā ishq-e-qadīm har ek chiiz mirī zaat meñ purānī hai 
vo ek din jo tujhe sochne meñ guzrā thā tamām umr usī din kī tarjumānī hai 
navāh-e-jāñ meñ bhaTaktī haiñ ḳhushbueñ jis kī vo ek phuul ki lagtā hai rāt-rānī hai 
irādatan to kahīñ kuchh nahīñ huā lekin maiñ jī rahā huuñ ye sāñsoñ kī ḳhush-gumānī hai 
ab iKHtiyar mein maujen na ye rawani hai main bah raha hun ki mera wajud pani hai 
main aur meri tarah tu bhi ek haqiqat hai phir is ke baad jo bachta hai wo kahani hai 
tere wajud mein kuchh hai jo is zamin ka nahin tere KHayal ki rangat bhi aasmani hai 
zara bhi daKHl nahin is mein in hawaon ka hamein to maslahatan apni KHak uDani hai 
ye KHwab-gah ye aankhen ye mera ishq-e-qadim har ek chiz meri zat mein purani hai 
wo ek din jo tujhe sochne mein guzra tha tamam umr usi din ki tarjumani hai 
nawah-e-jaan mein bhaTakti hain KHushbuen jis ki wo ek phul ki lagta hai raat-rani hai 
iradatan to kahin kuchh nahin hua lekin main ji raha hun ye sanson ki KHush-gumani hai

yuuñ bhī hotā hai ki yak dam koī achchhā lag jaa.e baat kuchh bhī na ho aur dil meñ tamāshā lag jaa.e 
ham savālāt kā hal soch rahe hoñ abhī tak aur māthe pe mohabbat kā natīja lag jaa.e 
abhī dīvār uThā.ī bhī na ho dil kī taraf lekin is meñ koī dar koī darīcha lag jaa.e 
kyā sitam hai ki vahī duur rahā ho tum se aur usī shaḳhs pe ilzām tumhārā lag jaa.e 
puurī āvāz se ik roz pukārūñ tujh ko aur phir merī zabāñ par tirā taalā lag jaa.e 
aur to is ke savā kuchh nahīñ imkān ki ab mere dariyā meñ kahīñ terā kināra lag jaa.e 
maiñ ne aur dil ne isī baab meñ sochā hai ki ham kaam kuchh bhī na kareñ koī vazīfa lag jaa.e 
kyā tamāshā hai ki baaqī ho samundar kā safar aur sāhil se kisī roz safīna lag jaa.e 
ye bhī mumkin hai ki is kār-gah-e-dil meñ 'zafar' kaam koī kare aur naam kisī kā lag jaa.e 
yun bhi hota hai ki yak dam koi achchha lag jae baat kuchh bhi na ho aur dil mein tamasha lag jae 
hum sawalat ka hal soch rahe hon abhi tak aur mathe pe mohabbat ka natija lag jae 
abhi diwar uThai bhi na ho dil ki taraf lekin is mein koi dar koi daricha lag jae 
kya sitam hai ki wahi dur raha ho tum se aur usi shaKHs pe ilzam tumhaara lag jae 
puri aawaz se ek roz pukarun tujh ko aur phir meri zaban par tera tala lag jae 
aur to is ke sawa kuchh nahin imkan ki ab mere dariya mein kahin tera kinara lag jae 
main ne aur dil ne isi bab mein socha hai ki hum kaam kuchh bhi na karen koi wazifa lag jae 
kya tamasha hai ki baqi ho samundar ka safar aur sahil se kisi roz safina lag jae 
ye bhi mumkin hai ki is kar-gah-e-dil mein 'zafar' kaam koi kare aur nam kisi ka lag jae

jab tak nigār-e-dasht kā siina dukhā na thā sahrā meñ koī lāla-e-sahrā khilā na thā 
do jhīleñ us kī āñkhoñ meñ lahrā ke so ga.iiñ us vaqt merī 'umr kā dariyā chaḌhā na thā 
jaagī na thiiñ nasoñ meñ tamannā kī nāgineñ us gandumī sharāb ko jab tak chakhā na thā 
DhūñDā karo jahān-e-tahayyur meñ 'umr bhar vo chaltī phirtī chhāñv hai maiñ ne kahā na thā 
ik bevafā ke sāmne aañsū bahāte ham itnā hamārī aañkh kā paanī marā na thā 
vo kaale hoñT jaam samajh kar chaḌhā ga.e vo aab jis se maiñ ne vuzū tak kiyā na thā 
sab log apne apne ḳhudāoñ ko laa.e the ik ham hī aise the ki hamārā ḳhudā na thā 
vo kaalī āñkheñ shahr meñ mash.hūr thiiñ bahut tab un pe moTe shīshoñ kā chashma chaḌhā na thā 
maiñ sāhib-e-ġhazal thā hasīnoñ kī bazm meñ sar par ghanere baal the māthā khulā na thā 
jab tak nigar-e-dasht ka sina dukha na tha sahra mein koi lala-e-sahra khila na tha 
do jhilen us ki aankhon mein lahra ke so gain us waqt meri 'umr ka dariya chaDha na tha 
jagi na thin nason mein tamanna ki naginen us gandumi sharab ko jab tak chakha na tha 
DhunDa karo jahan-e-tahayyur mein 'umr bhar wo chalti phirti chhanw hai main ne kaha na tha 
ek bewafa ke samne aansu bahate hum itna hamari aankh ka pani mara na tha 
wo kale honT jam samajh kar chaDha gae wo aab jis se main ne wuzu tak kiya na tha 
sab log apne apne KHudaon ko lae the ek hum hi aise the ki hamara KHuda na tha 
wo kali aankhen shahr mein mashhur thin bahut tab un pe moTe shishon ka chashma chaDha na tha 
main sahib-e-ghazal tha hasinon ki bazm mein sar par ghanere baal the matha khula na tha

burā bure ke alāva bhalā bhī hotā hai har aadmī meñ koī dūsrā bhī hotā hai 
tum apne des kī sauġhāt ho hamāre liye ki husn tohfa-e-āb-o-havā bhī hotā hai 
muqāble pe kamar-basta ham nahīñ hote agar shikast kā ḳhatra zarā bhī hotā hai 
tumhāre shahr meñ hai jī lagā huā varna musāfiroñ ke liye rāsta bhī hotā hai 
vo chehra ek tasavvur bhī hai haqīqat bhī darīcha band bhī hotā hai vā bhī hotā hai 
ham ai 'shu.ūr' akele kabhī nahīñ hote hamāre saath hamārā ḳhudā bhī hotā hai 
bura bure ke alawa bhala bhi hota hai har aadmi mein koi dusra bhi hota hai 
tum apne des ki saughat ho hamare liye ki husn tohfa-e-ab-o-hawa bhi hota hai 
muqable pe kamar-basta hum nahin hote agar shikast ka KHatra zara bhi hota hai 
tumhaare shahr mein hai ji laga hua warna musafiron ke liye rasta bhi hota hai 
wo chehra ek tasawwur bhi hai haqiqat bhi daricha band bhi hota hai wa bhi hota hai 
hum ai 'shuur' akele kabhi nahin hote hamare sath hamara KHuda bhi hota hai

ujālā de charāġh-e-rahguzar āsāñ nahīñ hotā hamesha ho sitārā ham-safar āsāñ nahīñ hotā 
jo āñkhoñ oT hai chehra usī ko dekh kar jiinā ye sochā thā ki āsāñ hai magar āsāñ nahīñ hotā 
baḌe tābāñ baḌe raushan sitāre TuuT jaate haiñ sahar kī raah taknā tā-sahar āsāñ nahīñ hotā 
añdherī kāsnī rāteñ yahīñ se ho ke guzreñgī jalā rakhnā koī dāġh-e-jigar āsāñ nahīñ hotā 
kisī dard-āshnā lamhe ke naqsh-e-pā sajā lenā akele ghar ko kahnā apnā ghar āsāñ nahīñ hotā 
jo Tapke kāsa-e-dil meñ to aalam hī badal jaa.e vo ik aañsū magar ai chashm-e-tar āsāñ nahīñ hotā 
gumāñ to kyā yaqīñ bhī vasvasoñ kī zad meñ hotā hai samajhnā sañg-e-dar ko sañg-e-dar āsāñ nahīñ hotā 
na bahlāvā na samjhautā judā.ī sī judā.ī hai 'adā' socho to ḳhushbū kā safar āsāñ nahīñ hotā 
ujala de charagh-e-rahguzar aasan nahin hota hamesha ho sitara ham-safar aasan nahin hota 
jo aankhon oT hai chehra usi ko dekh kar jina ye socha tha ki aasan hai magar aasan nahin hota 
baDe taban baDe raushan sitare TuT jate hain sahar ki rah takna ta-sahar aasan nahin hota 
andheri kasni raaten yahin se ho ke guzrengi jala rakhna koi dagh-e-jigar aasan nahin hota 
kisi dard-ashna lamhe ke naqsh-e-pa saja lena akele ghar ko kahna apna ghar aasan nahin hota 
jo Tapke kasa-e-dil mein to aalam hi badal jae wo ek aansu magar ai chashm-e-tar aasan nahin hota 
guman to kya yaqin bhi waswason ki zad mein hota hai samajhna sang-e-dar ko sang-e-dar aasan nahin hota 
na bahlawa na samjhauta judai si judai hai 'ada' socho to KHushbu ka safar aasan nahin hota

mai-kada thā chāñdnī thī maiñ na thā ik mujassam be-ḳhudī thī maiñ na thā 
ishq jab dam toḌtā thā tum na the maut jab sar dhun rahī thī maiñ na thā 
tuur par chheḌā thā jis ne aap ko vo mirī dīvāngī thī maiñ na thā 
vo hasīñ baiThā thā jab mere qarīb lazzat-e-ham-sā.egī thī maiñ na thā 
mai-kade ke moḌ par ruktī huī muddatoñ kī tishnagī thī maiñ na thā 
thī haqīqat kuchh mirī to is qadar us hasīñ kī dil-lagī thī maiñ na thā 
maiñ aur us ġhuncha-dahan kī aarzū aarzū kī sādgī thī maiñ na thā 
jis ne mah-pāroñ ke dil pighlā diye vo to merī shā.erī thī maiñ na thā 
gesuoñ ke saa.e meñ ārām-kash sar-barahna zindagī thī maiñ na thā 
dair o ka.aba meñ 'adam' hairat-farosh do-jahāñ kī bad-zanī thī maiñ na thā 
mai-kada tha chandni thi main na tha ek mujassam be-KHudi thi main na tha 
ishq jab dam toDta tha tum na the maut jab sar dhun rahi thi main na tha 
tur par chheDa tha jis ne aap ko wo meri diwangi thi main na tha 
wo hasin baiTha tha jab mere qarib lazzat-e-ham-saegi thi main na tha 
mai-kade ke moD par rukti hui muddaton ki tishnagi thi main na tha 
thi haqiqat kuchh meri to is qadar us hasin ki dil-lagi thi main na tha 
main aur us ghuncha-dahan ki aarzu aarzu ki sadgi thi main na tha 
jis ne mah-paron ke dil pighla diye wo to meri shaeri thi main na tha 
gesuon ke sae mein aaram-kash sar-barahna zindagi thi main na tha 
dair o kaba mein 'adam' hairat-farosh do-jahan ki bad-zani thi main na tha

jab yaar ne raḳht-e-safar bāñdhā kab zabt kā paarā us din thā har dard ne dil ko sahlāyā kyā haal hamārā us din thā 
jab ḳhvāb huiiñ us kī āñkheñ jab dhund huā us kā chehra har ashk sitāra us shab thā har zaḳhm añgāra us din thā 
sab yāroñ ke hote sote ham kis se gale mil kar rote kab galiyāñ apnī galiyāñ thiiñ kab shahr hamārā us din thā 
jab tujh se zarā ġhāfil Thahre har yaad ne dil par dastak dī jab lab pe tumhārā naam na thā har dukh ne pukārā us din thā 
ik tum hī 'farāz' na the tanhā ab ke to balā vājib aa.ī ik bhiiḌ lagī thī maqtal meñ har dard kā maarā us din thā 
jab yar ne raKHt-e-safar bandha kab zabt ka para us din tha har dard ne dil ko sahlaya kya haal hamara us din tha 
jab KHwab huin us ki aankhen jab dhund hua us ka chehra har ashk sitara us shab tha har zaKHm angara us din tha 
sab yaron ke hote sote hum kis se gale mil kar rote kab galiyan apni galiyan thin kab shahr hamara us din tha 
jab tujh se zara ghafil Thahre har yaad ne dil par dastak di jab lab pe tumhaara nam na tha har dukh ne pukara us din tha 
ek tum hi 'faraaz' na the tanha ab ke to bala wajib aai ek bhiD lagi thi maqtal mein har dard ka mara us din tha

kamī na kī tire vahshī ne ḳhaak uḌāne meñ junūñ kā naam uchhaltā rahā zamāne meñ 
'firāq' dauḌ ga.ī ruuh sī zamāne meñ kahāñ kā dard bharā thā mire fasāne meñ 
junūñ se bhuul huī dil pe choT khāne meñ 'firāq' der abhī thī bahār aane meñ 
vo koī rang hai jo uḌ na jaa.e ai gul-e-tar vo koī bū hai jo rusvā na ho zamāne meñ 
vo āstīñ hai koī jo lahū na de nikle vo koī husn hai jhijhke jo rang laane meñ 
ye gul khile haiñ ki choTeñ jigar kī ubhrī haiñ nihāñ bahār thī bulbul tire tarāne meñ 
bayān-e-sham.a hai hāsil yahī hai jalne kā fanā kī kaifiyateñ dekh jhilmilāne meñ 
kisī kī hālat-e-dil sun ke uTh ga.iiñ āñkheñ ki jaan paḌ ga.ī hasrat bhare fasāne meñ 
usī kī sharh hai ye uThte dard kā aalam jo dāstāñ thī nihāñ tere aañkh uThāne meñ 
ġharaz ki kaaT diye zindagī ke din ai dost vo terī yaad meñ hoñ yā tujhe bhulāne meñ 
hamīñ haiñ gul hamīñ bulbul hamīñ havā-e-chaman 'firāq' ḳhvāb ye dekhā hai qaid-ḳhāne meñ 
kami na ki tere wahshi ne KHak uDane mein junun ka nam uchhalta raha zamane mein 
'firaq' dauD gai ruh si zamane mein kahan ka dard bhara tha mere fasane mein 
junun se bhul hui dil pe choT khane mein 'firaq' der abhi thi bahaar aane mein 
wo koi rang hai jo uD na jae ai gul-e-tar wo koi bu hai jo ruswa na ho zamane mein 
wo aastin hai koi jo lahu na de nikle wo koi husn hai jhijhke jo rang lane mein 
ye gul khile hain ki choTen jigar ki ubhri hain nihan bahaar thi bulbul tere tarane mein 
bayan-e-shama hai hasil yahi hai jalne ka fana ki kaifiyaten dekh jhilmilane mein 
kisi ki haalat-e-dil sun ke uTh gain aankhen ki jaan paD gai hasrat bhare fasane mein 
usi ki sharh hai ye uThte dard ka aalam jo dastan thi nihan tere aankh uThane mein 
gharaz ki kaT diye zindagi ke din ai dost wo teri yaad mein hon ya tujhe bhulane mein 
hamin hain gul hamin bulbul hamin hawa-e-chaman 'firaq' KHwab ye dekha hai qaid-KHane mein

saañs lete hue bhī Dartā huuñ ye na samjheñ ki aah kartā huuñ 
bahr-e-hastī meñ huuñ misāl-e-habāb miT hī jaatā huuñ jab ubhartā huuñ 
itnī āzādī bhī ġhanīmat hai saañs letā huuñ baat kartā huuñ 
shaiḳh sāhab ḳhudā se Darte hoñ maiñ to añgrezoñ hī se Dartā huuñ 
aap kyā pūchhte haiñ merā mizāj shukr allāh kā hai martā huuñ 
ye baḌā aib mujh meñ hai 'akbar' dil meñ jo aa.e kah guzartā huuñ 
sans lete hue bhi Darta hun ye na samjhen ki aah karta hun 
bahr-e-hasti mein hun misal-e-habab miT hi jata hun jab ubharta hun 
itni aazadi bhi ghanimat hai sans leta hun baat karta hun 
shaiKH sahab KHuda se Darte hon main to angrezon hi se Darta hun 
aap kya puchhte hain mera mizaj shukr allah ka hai marta hun 
ye baDa aib mujh mein hai 'akbar' dil mein jo aae kah guzarta hun

bāhar kā dhan aatā jaatā asl ḳhazāna ghar meñ hai har dhuup meñ jo mujhe saayā de vo sachchā saayā ghar meñ hai 
pātāl ke dukh vo kyā jāneñ jo sat.h pe haiñ milne vaale haiñ ek havāla dost mire aur ek havāla ghar meñ hai 
mirī umr ke ik ik lamhe ko maiñ ne qaid kiyā hai lafzoñ meñ jo haarā huuñ yā jiitā huuñ vo sab sarmāya ghar meñ hai 
tū nanhā-munnā ek diyā maiñ ek samundar añdhiyārā tū jalte jalte bujhne lagā aur phir bhī añdherā ghar meñ hai 
kyā svāñg bhare roTī ke liye izzat ke liye shohrat ke liye suno shaam huī ab ghar ko chalo koī shaḳhs akelā ghar meñ hai 
ik hijr-zada bābul-pyārī tire jāgte bachchoñ se haarī ai shā'ir kis duniyā meñ hai tū tirī tanhā duniyā ghar meñ hai 
duniyā meñ khapā.e saal ka.ī āḳhir meñ khulā ahvāl yahī vo ghar kā ho yā bāhar kā har dukh kā mudāvā ghar meñ hai 
bahar ka dhan aata jata asl KHazana ghar mein hai har dhup mein jo mujhe saya de wo sachcha saya ghar mein hai 
patal ke dukh wo kya jaanen jo sath pe hain milne wale hain ek hawala dost mere aur ek hawala ghar mein hai 
meri umr ke ek ek lamhe ko main ne qaid kiya hai lafzon mein jo haara hun ya jita hun wo sab sarmaya ghar mein hai 
tu nanha-munna ek diya main ek samundar andhiyara tu jalte jalte bujhne laga aur phir bhi andhera ghar mein hai 
kya swang bhare roTi ke liye izzat ke liye shohrat ke liye suno sham hui ab ghar ko chalo koi shaKHs akela ghar mein hai 
ek hijr-zada babul-pyari tere jagte bachchon se haari ai sha'ir kis duniya mein hai tu teri tanha duniya ghar mein hai 
duniya mein khapae sal kai aaKHir mein khula ahwal yahi wo ghar ka ho ya bahar ka har dukh ka mudawa ghar mein hai

tum ā.īna hī na har baar dekhte jaao mirī taraf bhī to sarkār dekhte jaao 
na jaao hāl-e-dil-e-zār dekhte jaao ki jī na chāhe to nā-chār dekhte jaao 
bahār-e-umr meñ bāġh-e-jahāñ kī sair karo khilā huā hai ye gulzār dekhte jaao 
yahī to chashm-e-haqīqat nigar kā surma hai nizā-e-kāfir-o-dīñ-dār dekhte jaao 
uThāo aañkh na sharmāo ye to mahfil hai ġhazab se jānib-e-aġhyār dekhte jaao 
nahīñ hai jins-e-vafā kī tumheñ jo qadr na ho baneñge kitne ḳharīdār dekhte jaao 
tumheñ ġharaz jo karo rahm pā.emāloñ par tum apnī shoḳhī-e-raftār dekhte jaao 
qasam bhī khaa.ī thī qur.ān bhī uThāyā thā phir aaj hai vahī inkār dekhte jaao 
ye shāmat aa.ī ki us kī galī meñ dil ne kahā khulā hai rauzan-e-dīvār dekhte jaao 
huā hai kyā abhī hangāma aur kuchh hogā fuġhāñ meñ hashr ke āsār dekhte jaao 
shab-e-visāl adū kī yahī nishānī hai nishān-e-bosa-e-ruḳhsār dekhte jaao 
tumhārī aañkh mire dil se le sabab be-vaj.h huī hai laḌne ko tayyār dekhte jaao 
idhar ko aa hī ga.e ab to hazrat-e-zāhid yahīñ hai ḳhāna-e-ḳhummār dekhte jaao 
raqīb barsar-e-parḳhāsh ham se hotā hai baḌhegī muft meñ takrār dekhte jaao 
nahīñ haiñ jurm-e-mohabbat meñ sab ke sab mulzim ḳhatā muaaf ḳhatā-vār dekhte jaao 
dikhā rahī hai tamāshā falak kī nairañgī nayā hai sho.abada har baar dekhte jaao 
banā diyā mirī chāhat ne ġhairat-e-yūsuf tum apnī garmī-e-bāzār dekhte jaao 
na jaao band kiye aañkh rah-ravān-e-adam idhar udhar bhī ḳhabar-dār dekhte jaao 
sunī-sunā.ī pe hargiz kabhī amal na karo hamāre haal ke aḳhbār dekhte jaao 
koī na koī har ik sher meñ hai baat zarūr janāb-e-'dāġh' ke ash.ār dekhte jaao 
tum aaina hi na har bar dekhte jao meri taraf bhi to sarkar dekhte jao 
na jao haal-e-dil-e-zar dekhte jao ki ji na chahe to na-chaar dekhte jao 
bahaar-e-umr mein bagh-e-jahan ki sair karo khila hua hai ye gulzar dekhte jao 
yahi to chashm-e-haqiqat nigar ka surma hai niza-e-kafir-o-din-dar dekhte jao 
uThao aankh na sharmao ye to mahfil hai ghazab se jaanib-e-aghyar dekhte jao 
nahin hai jins-e-wafa ki tumhein jo qadr na ho banenge kitne KHaridar dekhte jao 
tumhein gharaz jo karo rahm paemalon par tum apni shoKHi-e-raftar dekhte jao 
qasam bhi khai thi quran bhi uThaya tha phir aaj hai wahi inkar dekhte jao 
ye shamat aai ki us ki gali mein dil ne kaha khula hai rauzan-e-diwar dekhte jao 
hua hai kya abhi hangama aur kuchh hoga fughan mein hashr ke aasar dekhte jao 
shab-e-visal adu ki yahi nishani hai nishan-e-bosa-e-ruKHsar dekhte jao 
tumhaari aankh mere dil se le sabab be-wajh hui hai laDne ko tayyar dekhte jao 
idhar ko aa hi gae ab to hazrat-e-zahid yahin hai KHana-e-KHummar dekhte jao 
raqib barsar-e-parKHash hum se hota hai baDhegi muft mein takrar dekhte jao 
nahin hain jurm-e-mohabbat mein sab ke sab mulzim KHata muaf KHata-war dekhte jao 
dikha rahi hai tamasha falak ki nairangi naya hai shoabada har bar dekhte jao 
bana diya meri chahat ne ghairat-e-yusuf tum apni garmi-e-bazar dekhte jao 
na jao band kiye aankh rah-rawan-e-adam idhar udhar bhi KHabar-dar dekhte jao 
suni-sunai pe hargiz kabhi amal na karo hamare haal ke aKHbar dekhte jao 
koi na koi har ek sher mein hai baat zarur janab-e-'dagh' ke ashaar dekhte jao

ijāzat kam thī jiine kī magar mohlat ziyāda thī hamāre paas marne ke liye fursat ziyāda thī 
ta.ajjub meñ to paḌtā hī rahā hai aa.ina aksar magar is baar us kī āñkhoñ meñ hairat ziyāda thī 
bulandī ke liye bas apnī hī nazroñ se girnā thā hamārī kam-nasībī ham meñ kuchh ġhairat ziyāda thī 
javāñ hone se pahle hī buḌhāpā aa gayā ham par hamārī muflisī par umr kī ujlat ziyāda thī 
zamāne se alag rah kar bhī maiñ shāmil rahā is meñ mire inkār meñ iqrār kī niyyat ziyāda thī 
mayassar muft meñ the āsmāñ ke chāñd taare tak zamīñ ke har khilaune kī magar qīmat ziyāda thī 
vo dil se kam zabāñ hī se ziyāda baat kartā thā jabhī us ke yahāñ gahrā.ī kam vus.at ziyāda thī 
ijazat kam thi jine ki magar mohlat ziyaada thi hamare pas marne ke liye fursat ziyaada thi 
tajjub mein to paDta hi raha hai aaina aksar magar is bar us ki aankhon mein hairat ziyaada thi 
bulandi ke liye bas apni hi nazron se girna tha hamari kam-nasibi hum mein kuchh ghairat ziyaada thi 
jawan hone se pahle hi buDhapa aa gaya hum par hamari muflisi par umr ki ujlat ziyaada thi 
zamane se alag rah kar bhi main shamil raha is mein mere inkar mein iqrar ki niyyat ziyaada thi 
mayassar muft mein the aasman ke chand tare tak zamin ke har khilaune ki magar qimat ziyaada thi 
wo dil se kam zaban hi se ziyaada baat karta tha jabhi us ke yahan gahrai kam wusat ziyaada thi

un se tanhā.ī meñ baat hotī rahī ġhā.ebāna mulāqāt hotī rahī 
ham bulāte vo tashrīf laate rahe ḳhvāb meñ ye karāmāt hotī rahī 
kāsa-e-chashm labrez hotī rahī us darīche se ḳhairāt hotī rahī 
dil bhī zor-āzmā.ī se haarā nahīñ garche har martaba maat hotī rahī 
sar bachā.e rahā sabr kā sā.ebāñ āsmāñ se to barsāt hotī rahī 
go mohabbat se ham jī churāte rahe zindagī bhar ye bad-zāt hotī rahī 
shahr bhar meñ phirāyā gayā qais ko kūche kūche mudārāt hotī rahī 
jāgte aur sote rahe ham 'shu.ūr' din nikaltā rahā raat hotī rahī 
un se tanhai mein baat hoti rahi ghaebana mulaqat hoti rahi 
hum bulate wo tashrif late rahe KHwab mein ye karamat hoti rahi 
kasa-e-chashm labrez hoti rahi us dariche se KHairaat hoti rahi 
dil bhi zor-azmai se haara nahin garche har martaba mat hoti rahi 
sar bachae raha sabr ka saeban aasman se to barsat hoti rahi 
go mohabbat se hum ji churaate rahe zindagi bhar ye bad-zat hoti rahi 
shahr bhar mein phiraya gaya qais ko kuche kuche mudaraat hoti rahi 
jagte aur sote rahe hum 'shuur' din nikalta raha raat hoti rahi

apnī jaulāñ-gāh zer-e-āsmāñ samjhā thā maiñ aab o gil ke khel ko apnā jahāñ samjhā thā maiñ 
be-hijābī se tirī TuuTā nigāhoñ kā tilism ik ridā-e-nīl-gūñ ko āsmāñ samjhā thā maiñ 
kārvāñ thak kar fazā ke pech-o-ḳham meñ rah gayā mehr o maah o mushtarī ko ham-ināñ samjhā thā maiñ 
ishq kī ik jast ne tai kar diyā qissa tamām is zamīn o āsmāñ ko be-karāñ samjhā thā maiñ 
kah ga.iiñ rāz-e-mohabbat parda-dārī-hā-e-shauq thī fuġhāñ vo bhī jise zabt-e-fuġhāñ samjhā thā maiñ 
thī kisī darmāñda rah-rau kī sadā-e-dardnāk jis ko āvāz-e-rahīl-e-kārvāñ samjhā thā maiñ 
apni jaulan-gah zer-e-asman samjha tha main aab o gil ke khel ko apna jahan samjha tha main 
be-hijabi se teri TuTa nigahon ka tilism ek rida-e-nil-gun ko aasman samjha tha main 
karwan thak kar faza ke pech-o-KHam mein rah gaya mehr o mah o mushtari ko ham-inan samjha tha main 
ishq ki ek jast ne tai kar diya qissa tamam is zamin o aasman ko be-karan samjha tha main 
kah gain raaz-e-mohabbat parda-dari-ha-e-shauq thi fughan wo bhi jise zabt-e-fughan samjha tha main 
thi kisi darmanda rah-rau ki sada-e-dardnak jis ko aawaz-e-rahil-e-karwan samjha tha main

maiñ ne ai dil tujhe siine se lagāyā huā hai aur tū hai ki mirī jaan ko aayā huā hai 
bas isī bojh se dohrī huī jaatī hai kamar zindagī kā jo ye ehsān uThāyā huā hai 
kyā huā gar nahīñ bādal ye barasne vaalā ye bhī kuchh kam to nahīñ hai jo ye aayā huā hai 
raah chaltī huī is rāhguzar par 'ajmal' ham samajhte haiñ qadam ham ne jamāyā huā hai 
ham ye samjhe the ki ham bhuul ga.e haiñ us ko aaj be-tarah hameñ yaad jo aayā huā hai 
vo kisī roz havāoñ kī tarah aa.egā raah meñ jis kī diyā ham ne jalāyā huā hai 
kaun batlā.e use apnā yaqīñ hai ki nahīñ vo jise ham ne ḳhudā apnā banāyā huā hai 
yūñhī dīvāna banā phirtā hai varna 'ajmal' dil meñ baiThā huā hai zehn pe chhāyā huā hai 
main ne ai dil tujhe sine se lagaya hua hai aur tu hai ki meri jaan ko aaya hua hai 
bas isi bojh se dohri hui jati hai kamar zindagi ka jo ye ehsan uThaya hua hai 
kya hua gar nahin baadal ye barasne wala ye bhi kuchh kam to nahin hai jo ye aaya hua hai 
rah chalti hui is rahguzar par 'ajmal' hum samajhte hain qadam hum ne jamaya hua hai 
hum ye samjhe the ki hum bhul gae hain us ko aaj be-tarah hamein yaad jo aaya hua hai 
wo kisi roz hawaon ki tarah aaega rah mein jis ki diya hum ne jalaya hua hai 
kaun batlae use apna yaqin hai ki nahin wo jise hum ne KHuda apna banaya hua hai 
yunhi diwana bana phirta hai warna 'ajmal' dil mein baiTha hua hai zehn pe chhaya hua hai

āshiq samajh rahe haiñ mujhe dil lagī se aap vāqif nahīñ abhī mire dil kī lagī se aap 
dil bhī kabhī milā ke mile haiñ kisī se aap milne ko roz milte haiñ yuuñ to sabhī se aap 
sab ko javāb degī nazar hasb-e-mudda.ā sun liije sab kī baat na kiije kisī se aap 
marnā mirā ilaaj to be-shak hai soch luuñ ye dostī se kahte haiñ yā dushmanī se aap 
hogā judā ye haath na gardan se vasl meñ Dartā huuñ uḌ na jaa.eñ kahīñ nāzukī se aap 
zāhid ḳhudā gavāh hai hote falak par aaj lete ḳhudā kā naam agar āshiqī se aap 
ab ghūrne se fā.eda bazm-e-raqīb meñ dil par chhurī to pher chuke be-ruḳhī se aap 
dushman kā zikr kyā hai javāb us kā dījiye raste meñ kal mile the kisī aadmī se aap 
shohrat hai mujh se husn kī is kā mujhe hai rashk hote haiñ mustafīz mirī zindagī se aap

sunte haiñ phir chhup chhup un ke ghar meñ aate jaate ho 'inshā' sāhab nāhaq jī ko vahshat meñ uljhāte ho 
dil kī baat chhupānī mushkil lekin ḳhuub chhupāte ho ban meñ daanā shahr ke andar dīvāne kahlāte ho 
bekal bekal rahte ho par mahfil ke ādāb ke saath aañkh churā kar dekh bhī lete bhole bhī ban jaate ho 
piit meñ aise laakh jatan haiñ lekin ik din sab nākām aap jahāñ meñ rusvā hoge vaaz hameñ farmāte ho 
ham se naam junūñ kā qaa.im ham se dasht kī ābādī ham se dard kā shikva karte ham ko zaḳhm dikhāte ho 
sunte hain phir chhup chhup un ke ghar mein aate jate ho 'insha' sahab nahaq ji ko wahshat mein uljhate ho

hum se nam junun ka qaim hum se dasht ki aabaadi hum se dard ka shikwa karte hum ko zaKHm dikhate ho

jiite jī maut ke tum muñh meñ na jaanā hargiz dosto dil na lagānā na lagānā hargiz 
ishq bhī taak meñ baiThā hai nazar-bāzoñ kī dekhnā sher se āñkheñ na laḌānā hargiz 
haath malne na hoñ piirī meñ agar hasrat se to javānī meñ na ye rog basānā hargiz 
jitne raste the tire ho ga.e vīrāñ ai ishq aa ke vīrānoñ meñ ab ghar na basānā hargiz 
kuuch sab kar ga.e dillī se tire qadr-shanās qadr yaañ rah ke ab apnī na gañvānā hargiz 
tazkira dehli-e-marhūm kā ai dost na chheḌ na sunā jā.egā ham se ye fasāna hargiz 
DhūñDtā hai dil-e-shorīda bahāne mutrib dard-añgez ġhazal koī na gaanā hargiz 
sohbateñ aglī musavvir hameñ yaad ā.eñgī koī dilchasp muraqqā na dikhānā hargiz 
le ke daaġh aa.egā siine pe bahut ai sayyāh dekh is shahr ke khañDaroñ meñ na jaanā hargiz 
chappe chappe pe haiñ yaañ gauhar-e-yaktā tah-e-ḳhāk dafn hogā kahīñ itnā na ḳhazāna hargiz 
miT ga.e tere miTāne ke nishāñ bhī ab to ai falak is se ziyāda na miTānā hargiz 
vo to bhūle the hameñ ham bhī unheñ bhuul ga.e aisā badlā hai na badlegā zamāna hargiz 
ham ko gar tū ne rulāyā to rulāyā ai charḳh ham pe ġhairoñ ko to zālim na hañsānā hargiz 
āḳhirī daur meñ bhī tujh ko qasam hai saaqī bhar ke ik jaam na pyāsoñ ko pilānā hargiz 
baḳht so.e haiñ bahut jaag ke ai daur-e-zamāñ na abhī niind ke mātoñ ko jagānā hargiz 
kabhī ai ilm o hunar ghar thā tumhārā dillī ham ko bhūle ho to ghar bhuul na jaanā hargiz 
shā.irī mar chukī ab zinda na hogī yaaro yaad kar kar ke use jī na kuḌhānā hargiz 
'ġhālib' o 'shefta' o 'nayyar' o 'āzurda' o 'zauq' ab dikhā.egā ye shakleñ na zamānā hargiz 
'momin' o 'alvī' o 'sahbā.ī' o 'mamnūñ' ke baad sher kā naam na legā koī daanā hargiz 
kar diyā mar ke yagānoñ ne yagāna ham ko varna yaañ koī na thā ham meñ yagāna hargiz 
'dāġh' o 'majrūh' ko sun lo ki phir is gulshan meñ na sunegā koī bulbul kā tarāna hargiz 
raat āḳhir huī aur bazm huī zer-o-zabar ab na dekhoge kabhī lutf-e-shabāna hargiz 
bazm-e-mātam to nahīñ bazm-e-suḳhan hai 'hālī' yaañ munāsib nahīñ ro ro ke rulānā hargiz 
jite ji maut ke tum munh mein na jaana hargiz dosto dil na lagana na lagana hargiz 
ishq bhi tak mein baiTha hai nazar-bazon ki dekhna sher se aankhen na laDana hargiz 
hath malne na hon piri mein agar hasrat se to jawani mein na ye rog basana hargiz 
jitne raste the tere ho gae viran ai ishq aa ke viranon mein ab ghar na basana hargiz 
kuch sab kar gae dilli se tere qadr-shanas qadr yan rah ke ab apni na ganwana hargiz 
tazkira dehli-e-marhum ka ai dost na chheD na suna jaega hum se ye fasana hargiz 
DhunDta hai dil-e-shorida bahane mutrib dard-angez ghazal koi na gana hargiz 
sohbaten agli musawwir hamein yaad aaengi koi dilchasp muraqqa na dikhana hargiz 
le ke dagh aaega sine pe bahut ai sayyah dekh is shahr ke khanDaron mein na jaana hargiz 
chappe chappe pe hain yan gauhar-e-yakta tah-e-KHak dafn hoga kahin itna na KHazana hargiz 
miT gae tere miTane ke nishan bhi ab to ai falak is se ziyaada na miTana hargiz 
wo to bhule the hamein hum bhi unhen bhul gae aisa badla hai na badlega zamana hargiz 
hum ko gar tu ne rulaya to rulaya ai charKH hum pe ghairon ko to zalim na hansana hargiz

kabhi ai ilm o hunar ghar tha tumhaara dilli hum ko bhule ho to ghar bhul na jaana hargiz

saare sapere vīrānoñ meñ ghuum rahe haiñ biin liye ābādī meñ rahne vaale saañp baḌe zahrīle the 
tum yuuñ hī nārāz hue ho varna mai-ḳhāne kā patā ham ne har us shaḳhs se pūchhā jis ke nain nashīle the 
kaun ġhulām mohammad 'qāsir' bechāre se kartā baat ye chālākoñ kī bastī thī aur hazrat sharmīle the 
shauq barahna-pa chalta tha aur raste pathrile the ghiste ghiste ghis gae aaKHir kankar jo nokile the

sard hawaon se to the sahil ke ret ke yarane lu ke thapeDe sahne wale sahraon ke Tile the

bismil ke taḌapne kī adāoñ meñ nasha thā maiñ haath meñ talvār liye jhuum rahā thā 
ghūñghaT meñ mire ḳhvāb kī tābīr chhupī thī mehñdī se hathelī meñ mirā naam likhā thā 
lab the ki kisī pyālī ke hoñToñ pe jhuke the aur haath kahīñ gardan-e-mīnā meñ paḌā thā 
hammām ke ā.īne meñ shab Duub rahī thī cigarette se na.e din kā dhuāñ phail rahā thā 
dariyā ke kināre pe mirī laash paḌī thī aur paanī kī tah meñ vo mujhe DhūñDh rahā thā 
mālūm nahīñ phir vo kahāñ chhup gayā 'ādil' saaya sā koī lams kī sarhad pe milā thā

dariya ke kinare pe meri lash paDi thi aur pani ki tah mein wo mujhe DhunDh raha tha
