dil-e-nākām ke haiñ kaam ḳharāb kar liyā āshiqī meñ naam ḳharāb 
is ḳharābāt kā yahī hai maza ki rahe aadmī mudām ḳharāb 
dekh kar jins-e-dil vo kahte haiñ kyuuñ kare koī apne daam ḳharāb 
abr-e-tar se sabā hī achchhī thī merī miTTī huī tamām ḳharāb 
vo bhī saaqī mujhe nahīñ detā vo jo TuuTā paḌā hai jaam ḳharāb 
kyā milā ham ko zindagī ke sivā vo bhī dushvār nā-tamām ḳharāb 
vaah kyā muñh se phuul jhaḌte haiñ ḳhūb-rū ho ke ye kalām ḳharāb 
chaal kī rahnumā-e-ishq ne bhī vo dikhāyā jo thā maqām ḳharāb 
'dāġh' hai bad-chalan to hone do sau meñ hotā hai ik ġhulām ḳharāb 
dil-e-nakaam ke hain kaam KHarab kar liya aashiqi mein nam KHarab 
is KHarabaat ka yahi hai maza ki rahe aadmi mudam KHarab 
dekh kar jins-e-dil wo kahte hain kyun kare koi apne dam KHarab 
abr-e-tar se saba hi achchhi thi meri miTTi hui tamam KHarab 
wo bhi saqi mujhe nahin deta wo jo TuTa paDa hai jam KHarab 
kya mila hum ko zindagi ke siwa wo bhi dushwar na-tamam KHarab 
wah kya munh se phul jhaDte hain KHub-ru ho ke ye kalam KHarab 
chaal ki rahnuma-e-ishq ne bhi wo dikhaya jo tha maqam KHarab 
'dagh' hai bad-chalan to hone do sau mein hota hai ek ghulam KHarab

phuul barse kahīñ shabnam kahīñ gauhar barse aur is dil kī taraf barse to patthar barse 
koī bādal ho to tham jaa.e magar ashk mire ek raftār se din raat barābar barse 
barf ke phūloñ se raushan huī tārīk zamīñ raat kī shāḳh se jaise mah o aḳhtar barse 
pyaar kā giit añdheroñ pe ujāloñ kī phuvār aur nafrat kī sadā shīshe pe patthar barse 
bārisheñ chhat pe khulī jag.hoñ pe hotī haiñ magar ġham vo sāvan hai jo un kamroñ ke andar barse 
phul barse kahin shabnam kahin gauhar barse aur is dil ki taraf barse to patthar barse 
koi baadal ho to tham jae magar ashk mere ek raftar se din raat barabar barse 
barf ke phulon se raushan hui tarik zamin raat ki shaKH se jaise mah o aKHtar barse 
pyar ka git andheron pe ujalon ki phuwar aur nafrat ki sada shishe pe patthar barse 
barishen chhat pe khuli jaghon pe hoti hain magar gham wo sawan hai jo un kamron ke andar barse

ye be-dilī hai to kashtī se yaar kyā utreñ udhar bhī kaun hai dariyā ke paar kyā utreñ 
tamām daulat-e-jāñ haar dī mohabbat meñ jo zindagī se liye the udhār kyā utreñ 
hazār jaam se Takrā ke jaam ḳhālī hoñ jo aa ga.e haiñ diloñ meñ ġhubār kyā utreñ 
basān-e-ḳhāk sar-e-kū-e-yār baiThe haiñ ab is maqām se ham ḳhāksār kyā utreñ 
na itr o uud na jaam o subū na saaz o surūr faqīr-e-shahr ke ghar shahryār kyā utreñ 
hameñ majāl nahīñ hai ki baam tak pahuñcheñ unheñ ye aar sar-e-rahguzār kyā utreñ 
jo zaḳhm daaġh bane haiñ vo bhar ga.e the 'farāz' jo daaġh zaḳhm bane haiñ vo yaar kyā utreñ 
ye be-dili hai to kashti se yar kya utren udhar bhi kaun hai dariya ke par kya utren 
tamam daulat-e-jaan haar di mohabbat mein jo zindagi se liye the udhaar kya utren 
hazar jam se Takra ke jam KHali hon jo aa gae hain dilon mein ghubar kya utren 
basan-e-KHak sar-e-ku-e-yar baiThe hain ab is maqam se hum KHaksar kya utren 
na itr o ud na jam o subu na saz o surur faqir-e-shahr ke ghar shahryar kya utren 
hamein majal nahin hai ki baam tak pahunchen unhen ye aar sar-e-rahguzar kya utren 
jo zaKHm dagh bane hain wo bhar gae the 'faraaz' jo dagh zaKHm bane hain wo yar kya utren

ġhanīm se bhī adāvat meñ had nahīñ māñgī ki haar maan lī lekin madad nahīñ māñgī 
hazār shukr ki ham ahl-e-harf-e-zindā ne mujāvirān-e-adab se sanad nahīñ māñgī 
bahut hai lamha-e-maujūd kā sharaf bhī mujhe so apne fan se baqā-e-abad nahīñ māñgī 
qubūl vo jise kartā vo iltijā nahīñ kī duā jo vo na kare mustarad nahīñ māñgī 
maiñ apne jāma-e-sad-chāk se bahut ḳhush huuñ kabhī abā-o-qabā-e-ḳhirad nahīñ māñgī 
shahīd jism salāmat uThā.e jaate haiñ jabhī to gor-kanoñ se lahad nahīñ māñgī 
maiñ sar-barahna rahā phir bhī sar-kashīda rahā kabhī kulāh se tauqīr-e-qad nahīñ māñgī 
atā-e-dard meñ vo bhī nahīñ thā dil kā ġharīb 'farāz' maiñ ne bhī baḳhshish meñ had nahīñ māñgī 
ghanim se bhi adawat mein had nahin mangi ki haar man li lekin madad nahin mangi 
hazar shukr ki hum ahl-e-harf-e-zinda ne mujaviran-e-adab se sanad nahin mangi 
bahut hai lamha-e-maujud ka sharaf bhi mujhe so apne fan se baqa-e-abad nahin mangi 
qubul wo jise karta wo iltija nahin ki dua jo wo na kare mustarad nahin mangi 
main apne jama-e-sad-chaak se bahut KHush hun kabhi aba-o-qaba-e-KHirad nahin mangi 
shahid jism salamat uThae jate hain jabhi to gor-kanon se lahad nahin mangi 
main sar-barahna raha phir bhi sar-kashida raha kabhi kulah se tauqir-e-qad nahin mangi 
ata-e-dard mein wo bhi nahin tha dil ka gharib 'faraaz' main ne bhi baKHshish mein had nahin mangi

ham aap hī ko apnā maqsūd jānte haiñ apne sivā.e kis ko maujūd jānte haiñ 
ijz-o-niyāz apnā apnī taraf hai saarā is musht-e-ḳhāk ko ham masjūd jānte haiñ 
sūrat-pazīr ham bin hargiz nahīñ ve maane ahl-e-nazar hamīñ ko ma.abūd jānte haiñ 
ishq un kī aql ko hai jo mā-sivā hamāre nāchīz jānte haiñ nā-būd jānte haiñ 
apnī hī sair karne ham jalva-gar hue the is ramz ko va-lekin mādūd jānte haiñ 
yārab kase hai naaqa har ġhuncha is chaman kā rāh-e-vafā ko ham to masdūd jānte haiñ 
ye zulm-e-be-nihāyat dushvār-tar ki ḳhūbāñ bad-vaz.iyoñ ko apnī mahmūd jānte haiñ 
kyā jaane daab sohbat az ḳhvesh raftagāñ kā majlis meñ shaiḳh-sāhib kuchh kuud jānte haiñ 
mar kar bhī haath aave to 'mīr' muft hai vo jī ke ziyān ko bhī ham suud jānte haiñ 
hum aap hi ko apna maqsud jaante hain apne siwae kis ko maujud jaante hain 
ijz-o-niyaz apna apni taraf hai sara is musht-e-KHak ko hum masjud jaante hain 
surat-pazir hum bin hargiz nahin we mane ahl-e-nazar hamin ko mabud jaante hain 
ishq un ki aql ko hai jo ma-siwa hamare nachiz jaante hain na-bud jaante hain 
apni hi sair karne hum jalwa-gar hue the is ramz ko wa-lekin madud jaante hain 
yarab kase hai naqa har ghuncha is chaman ka rah-e-wafa ko hum to masdud jaante hain 
ye zulm-e-be-nihayat dushwar-tar ki KHuban bad-waziyon ko apni mahmud jaante hain 
kya jaane dab sohbat az KHwesh raftagan ka majlis mein shaiKH-sahib kuchh kud jaante hain 
mar kar bhi hath aawe to 'mir' muft hai wo ji ke ziyan ko bhi hum sud jaante hain

qalam dil meñ Duboyā jā rahā hai nayā manshūr likkhā jā rahā hai 
maiñ kashtī meñ akelā to nahīñ huuñ mire hamrāh dariyā jā rahā hai 
salāmī ko jhuke jaate haiñ ashjār havā kā ek jhoñkā jā rahā hai 
musāfir hī musāfir har taraf haiñ magar har shaḳhs tanhā jā rahā hai 
maiñ ik insāñ huuñ yā saarā jahāñ huuñ bagūla hai ki sahrā jā rahā hai 
'nadīm' ab aamad aamad hai sahar kī sitāroñ ko bujhāyā jā rahā hai 
qalam dil mein Duboya ja raha hai naya manshur likkha ja raha hai 
main kashti mein akela to nahin hun mere hamrah dariya ja raha hai 
salami ko jhuke jate hain ashjar hawa ka ek jhonka ja raha hai 
musafir hi musafir har taraf hain magar har shaKHs tanha ja raha hai 
main ek insan hun ya sara jahan hun bagula hai ki sahra ja raha hai 
'nadim' ab aamad aamad hai sahar ki sitaron ko bujhaya ja raha hai

har lamha zulmatoñ kī ḳhudā.ī kā vaqt hai shāyad kisī kī chehra-numā.ī kā vaqt hai 
kahtī hai sāhiloñ se ye jaate samay kī dhuup hushyār naddiyoñ kī chaḌhā.ī kā vaqt hai 
hotī hai shaam aañkh se aañsū ravāñ hue ye vaqt qaidiyoñ kī rihā.ī kā vaqt hai 
koī bhī vaqt ho kabhī hotā nahīñ judā kitnā aziiz us kī judā.ī kā vaqt hai 
dil ne kahā ki shām-e-shab-e-vasl se na bhaag ab pak chukī hai fasl kaTā.ī kā vaqt hai 
maiñ ne kahā ki dekh ye maiñ ye havā ye raat us ne kahā ki merī paḌhā.ī kā vaqt hai 
har lamha zulmaton ki KHudai ka waqt hai shayad kisi ki chehra-numai ka waqt hai 
kahti hai sahilon se ye jate samay ki dhup hushyar naddiyon ki chaDhai ka waqt hai 
hoti hai sham aankh se aansu rawan hue ye waqt qaidiyon ki rihai ka waqt hai 
koi bhi waqt ho kabhi hota nahin juda kitna aziz us ki judai ka waqt hai 
dil ne kaha ki sham-e-shab-e-wasl se na bhag ab pak chuki hai fasl kaTai ka waqt hai 
main ne kaha ki dekh ye main ye hawa ye raat us ne kaha ki meri paDhai ka waqt hai

saaz ye kīna-sāz kyā jāneñ naaz vaale niyāz kyā jāneñ 
sham.a-rū aap go hue lekin lutf-e-soz-o-gudāz kyā jāneñ 
kab kisī dar kī jab.ha-sā.ī kī shaiḳh sāhab namāz kyā jāneñ 
jo rah-e-ishq meñ qadam rakkheñ vo nasheb-o-farāz kyā jāneñ 
pūchhiye mai-kashoñ se lutf-e-sharāb ye mazā pāk-bāz kyā jāneñ 
bale chitvan tirī ġhazab rī nigāh kyā kareñge ye naaz kyā jāneñ 
jin ko apnī ḳhabar nahīñ ab tak vo mire dil kā raaz kyā jāneñ 
hazrat-e-ḳhizr jab shahīd na hoñ lutf-e-umr-e-darāz kyā jāneñ 
jo guzarte haiñ 'dāġh' par sadme aap banda-navāz kyā jāneñ 
saz ye kina-saz kya jaanen naz wale niyaz kya jaanen 
shama-ru aap go hue lekin lutf-e-soz-o-gudaz kya jaanen 
kab kisi dar ki jabha-sai ki shaiKH sahab namaz kya jaanen 
jo rah-e-ishq mein qadam rakkhen wo nasheb-o-faraaz kya jaanen 
puchhiye mai-kashon se lutf-e-sharab ye maza pak-baz kya jaanen 
bale chitwan teri ghazab ri nigah kya karenge ye naz kya jaanen 
jin ko apni KHabar nahin ab tak wo mere dil ka raaz kya jaanen 
hazrat-e-KHizr jab shahid na hon lutf-e-umr-e-daraaz kya jaanen 
jo guzarte hain 'dagh' par sadme aap banda-nawaz kya jaanen

bahut rahā hai kabhī lutf-e-yār ham par bhī guzar chukī hai ye fasl-e-bahār ham par bhī 
urūs-e-dahr ko aayā thā pyaar ham par bhī ye besvā thī kisī shab nisār ham par bhī 
biThā chukā hai zamāna hameñ bhī masnad par huā kiye haiñ javāhir nisār ham par bhī 
adū ko bhī jo banāyā hai tum ne mahram-e-rāz to faḳhr kyā jo huā e'tibār ham par bhī 
ḳhatā kisī kī ho lekin khulī jo un kī zabāñ to ho hī jaate haiñ do ek vaar ham par bhī 
ham aise rind magar ye zamāna hai vo ġhazab ki Daal hī diyā duniyā kā baar ham par bhī 
hameñ bhī ātish-e-ulfat jalā chukī 'akbar' harām ho ga.ī dozaḳh kī naar ham par bhī 
bahut raha hai kabhi lutf-e-yar hum par bhi guzar chuki hai ye fasl-e-bahaar hum par bhi 
urus-e-dahr ko aaya tha pyar hum par bhi ye beswa thi kisi shab nisar hum par bhi 
biTha chuka hai zamana hamein bhi masnad par hua kiye hain jawahir nisar hum par bhi 
adu ko bhi jo banaya hai tum ne mahram-e-raaz to faKHr kya jo hua e'tibar hum par bhi 
KHata kisi ki ho lekin khuli jo un ki zaban to ho hi jate hain do ek war hum par bhi 
hum aise rind magar ye zamana hai wo ghazab ki Dal hi diya duniya ka bar hum par bhi 
hamein bhi aatish-e-ulfat jala chuki 'akbar' haram ho gai dozaKH ki nar hum par bhi

aaj bhī qāfila-e-ishq ravāñ hai ki jo thā vahī miil aur vahī sañg-e-nishāñ hai ki jo thā 
phir tirā ġham vahī rusvā-e-jahāñ hai ki jo thā phir fasāna ba-hadīs-e-digarāñ hai ki jo thā 
manzileñ gard ke mānind uḌī jaatī haiñ vahī andāz-e-jahān-e-guzarāñ hai ki jo thā 
zulmat o nuur meñ kuchh bhī na mohabbat ko milā aaj tak ek dhuñdalke kā samāñ hai ki jo thā 
yuuñ to is daur meñ be-kaif sī hai bazm-e-hayāt ek hangāma sar-e-ritl-e-girāñ hai ki jo thā 
laakh kar jaur-o-sitam laakh kar ehsān-o-karam tujh pe ai dost vahī vahm-o-gumāñ hai ki jo thā 
aaj phir ishq do-ālam se judā hotā hai āstīnoñ meñ liye kaun-o-makāñ hai ki jo thā 
ishq afsurda nahīñ aaj bhī afsurda bahut vahī kam kam asr-e-soz-e-nihāñ hai ki jo thā 
nazar aa jaate haiñ tum ko to bahut nāzuk baal dil mirā kyā vahī ai shīsha-girāñ hai ki jo thā 
jaan de baiThe the ik baar havas vaale bhī phir vahī marhala-e-sūd-o-ziyāñ hai ki jo thā 
aaj bhī said-gah-e-ishq meñ husan-e-saffāk liye abrū kī lachaktī sī kamāñ hai ki jo thā 
phir tirī chashm-e-suḳhan-sanj ne chheḌī koī baat vahī jaadū hai vahī husn-e-bayāñ hai ki jo thā 
raat bhar husn par aa.e bhī ga.e sau sau rañg shaam se ishq abhī tak nigarāñ hai ki jo thā 
jo bhī kar jaur-o-sitam jo bhī kar ehsān-o-karam tujh pe ai dost vahī vahm-o-gumāñ hai ki jo thā 
aañkh jhapkī ki idhar ḳhatm huā roz-e-visāl phir bhī is din pe qayāmat kā gumāñ hai ki jo thā 
qurb hī kam hai na duurī hī ziyāda lekin aaj vo rabt kā ehsās kahāñ hai ki jo thā 
tīra-baḳhtī nahīñ jaatī dil-e-sozāñ kī 'firāq' sham.a ke sar pe vahī aaj dhuāñ hai ki jo thā 
aaj bhi qafila-e-ishq rawan hai ki jo tha wahi mil aur wahi sang-e-nishan hai ki jo tha 
phir tera gham wahi ruswa-e-jahan hai ki jo tha phir fasana ba-hadis-e-digaran hai ki jo tha 
manzilen gard ke manind uDi jati hain wahi andaz-e-jahan-e-guzaran hai ki jo tha 
zulmat o nur mein kuchh bhi na mohabbat ko mila aaj tak ek dhundalke ka saman hai ki jo tha 
yun to is daur mein be-kaif si hai bazm-e-hayat ek hangama sar-e-ritl-e-giran hai ki jo tha 
lakh kar jaur-o-sitam lakh kar ehsan-o-karam tujh pe ai dost wahi wahm-o-guman hai ki jo tha 
aaj phir ishq do-alam se juda hota hai aastinon mein liye kaun-o-makan hai ki jo tha 
ishq afsurda nahin aaj bhi afsurda bahut wahi kam kam asr-e-soz-e-nihan hai ki jo tha 
nazar aa jate hain tum ko to bahut nazuk baal dil mera kya wahi ai shisha-giran hai ki jo tha 
jaan de baiThe the ek bar hawas wale bhi phir wahi marhala-e-sud-o-ziyan hai ki jo tha 
aaj bhi said-gah-e-ishq mein husan-e-saffak liye abru ki lachakti si kaman hai ki jo tha 
phir teri chashm-e-suKHan-sanj ne chheDi koi baat wahi jadu hai wahi husn-e-bayan hai ki jo tha 
raat bhar husn par aae bhi gae sau sau rang sham se ishq abhi tak nigaran hai ki jo tha 
jo bhi kar jaur-o-sitam jo bhi kar ehsan-o-karam tujh pe ai dost wahi wahm-o-guman hai ki jo tha 
aankh jhapki ki idhar KHatm hua roz-e-visal phir bhi is din pe qayamat ka guman hai ki jo tha 
qurb hi kam hai na duri hi ziyaada lekin aaj wo rabt ka ehsas kahan hai ki jo tha 
tira-baKHti nahin jati dil-e-sozan ki 'firaq' shama ke sar pe wahi aaj dhuan hai ki jo tha

ġhairat-e-ishq salāmat thī anā zinda thī vo bhī din the ki rah-o-rasm-e-vafā zinda thī 
qais ko dosh na do rakhiyo na farhād ko naam inhī logoñ se mohabbat kī adā zinda thī 
shahr-e-bīmār ke har kūcha o baam o dar par ham bhī marte the ki jab ḳhalq-e-ḳhudā zinda thī 
bujh ga.iiñ sham.eñ to dam toḌ ga.e jhoñke bhī jis tarah zahr-e-raqābat se havā zinda thī 
yād-e-ayyām ki sahrā-e-mohabbat meñ 'farāz' jaras-e-qāfila-e-dil kī sadā zinda thī 
ghairat-e-ishq salamat thi ana zinda thi wo bhi din the ki rah-o-rasm-e-wafa zinda thi 
qais ko dosh na do rakhiyo na farhad ko nam inhi logon se mohabbat ki ada zinda thi 
shahr-e-bimar ke har kucha o baam o dar par hum bhi marte the ki jab KHalq-e-KHuda zinda thi 
bujh gain shamen to dam toD gae jhonke bhi jis tarah zahr-e-raqabat se hawa zinda thi 
yaad-e-ayyam ki sahra-e-mohabbat mein 'faraaz' jaras-e-qafila-e-dil ki sada zinda thi

aks hai ā.ina-e-dahr meñ sūrat merī kuchh haqīqat nahīñ itnī hai haqīqat merī 
dekhtā maiñ use kyūñkar ki naqāb uThte hī ban ke dīvār khaḌī ho ga.ī hairat merī 
roz vo ḳhvāb meñ aate haiñ gale milne ko maiñ jo sotā huuñ to jaag uThtī hai qismat merī 
sach hai ehsān kā bhī bojh bahut hotā hai chaar phūloñ se dabī jaatī hai turbat merī 
aa.ine se unheñ kuchh uns nahīñ baat ye hai chāhte haiñ koī dekhā kare sūrat merī 
maiñ ye samjhūñ koī ma.ashūq mire haath aayā mere qaabū meñ jo aa jaa.e tabī.at merī 
bū-e-gesū ne shagūfa ye nayā chhoḌā hai nik.hat-e-gul se ulajhtī hai tabī.at merī 
un se iz.hār-e-mohabbat jo koī kartā hai duur se us ko dikhā dete haiñ turbat merī 
jaate jaate vo yahī kar ga.e tākīd 'jalīl' dil meñ rakhiyegā hifāzat se mohabbat merī 
aks hai aaina-e-dahr mein surat meri kuchh haqiqat nahin itni hai haqiqat meri 
dekhta main use kyunkar ki naqab uThte hi ban ke diwar khaDi ho gai hairat meri 
roz wo KHwab mein aate hain gale milne ko main jo sota hun to jag uThti hai qismat meri 
sach hai ehsan ka bhi bojh bahut hota hai chaar phulon se dabi jati hai turbat meri 
aaine se unhen kuchh uns nahin baat ye hai chahte hain koi dekha kare surat meri 
main ye samjhun koi mashuq mere hath aaya mere qabu mein jo aa jae tabiat meri 
bu-e-gesu ne shagufa ye naya chhoDa hai nikhat-e-gul se ulajhti hai tabiat meri 
un se izhaar-e-mohabbat jo koi karta hai dur se us ko dikha dete hain turbat meri 
jate jate wo yahi kar gae takid 'jalil' dil mein rakhiyega hifazat se mohabbat meri

koī milā to kisī aur kī kamī huī hai so dil ne be-talabī iḳhtiyār kī huī hai 
jahāñ se dil kī taraf zindagī utartī thī nigāh ab bhī usī baam par jamī huī hai 
hai intizār use bhī tumhārī ḳhush-bū kā havā galī meñ bahut der se rukī huī hai 
tum aa ga.e ho to ab ā.īna bhī dekheñge abhī abhī to nigāhoñ meñ raushnī huī hai 
hamārā ilm to marhūn-e-lauh-e-dil hai miyāñ kitāb-e-aql to bas taaq par dharī huī hai 
banāo saa.e harārat badan meñ jazb karo ki dhuup sahn meñ kab se yūñhī paḌī huī hai 
nahīñ nahīñ maiñ bahut ḳhush rahā huuñ tere baġhair yaqīn kar ki ye hālat abhī abhī huī hai 
vo guftugū jo mirī sirf apne-āp se thī tirī nigāh ko pahuñchī to shā.irī huī hai 
koi mila to kisi aur ki kami hui hai so dil ne be-talabi iKHtiyar ki hui hai 
jahan se dil ki taraf zindagi utarti thi nigah ab bhi usi baam par jami hui hai 
hai intizar use bhi tumhaari KHush-bu ka hawa gali mein bahut der se ruki hui hai 
tum aa gae ho to ab aaina bhi dekhenge abhi abhi to nigahon mein raushni hui hai 
hamara ilm to marhun-e-lauh-e-dil hai miyan kitab-e-aql to bas taq par dhari hui hai 
banao sae hararat badan mein jazb karo ki dhup sahn mein kab se yunhi paDi hui hai 
nahin nahin main bahut KHush raha hun tere baghair yaqin kar ki ye haalat abhi abhi hui hai 
wo guftugu jo meri sirf apne-ap se thi teri nigah ko pahunchi to shairi hui hai

chaa.e kī pyālī meñ niilī tablet gholī sahme sahme hāthoñ ne ik kitāb phir kholī 
dā.ere añdheroñ ke raushnī ke poroñ ne coat ke button khole tie kī girah kholī 
shīshe kī silā.ī meñ kaale bhuut kā chaḌhnā baam kaaTh kā ghoḌā niim kāñch kī golī 
barf meñ dabā makkhan maut rail aur rickshaw zindagī ḳhushī rickshaw rail motareñ Dolī 
ik kitāb chāñd aur peḌ sab ke kaale collar par zehn tape kī gardish muñh meñ totoñ kī bolī 
vo nahīñ milī ham ko hook button saraktī jiin zip ke daañt khulte hī aañkh se girī cholī 
chae ki pyali mein nili tablet gholi sahme sahme hathon ne ek kitab phir kholi 
daere andheron ke raushni ke poron ne coat ke button khole tie ki girah kholi 
shishe ki silai mein kale bhut ka chaDhna baam kaTh ka ghoDa nim kanch ki goli 
barf mein daba makkhan maut rail aur rickshaw zindagi KHushi rickshaw rail motaren Doli 
ek kitab chand aur peD sab ke kale collar par zehn tape ki gardish munh mein toton ki boli 
wo nahin mili hum ko hook button sarakti jin zip ke dant khulte hi aankh se giri choli

zabt apnā shi.ār thā na rahā dil pe kuchh iḳhtiyār thā na rahā 
dil-e-marhūm ko ḳhudā baḳhshe ek hī ġham-gusār thā na rahā 
aa ki vaqt-e-sukūn-e-marg aayā naala nā-ḳhush-gavār thā na rahā 
un kī be-mehriyoñ ko kyā mālūm koī ummīd-vār thā na rahā 
aah kā e'tibār bhī kab tak aah kā e'tibār thā na rahā 
kuchh zamāne ko sāzgār sahī jo hameñ sāzgār thā na rahā 
ab garebāñ kahīñ se chaak nahīñ shuġhl-e-fasl-e-bahār thā na rahā 
maut kā intizār baaqī hai aap kā intizār thā na rahā 
mehrbāñ ye mazār-e-'fānī' hai aap kā jāñ-nisār thā na rahā 
zabt apna shiar tha na raha dil pe kuchh iKHtiyar tha na raha 
dil-e-marhum ko KHuda baKHshe ek hi gham-gusar tha na raha 
aa ki waqt-e-sukun-e-marg aaya nala na-KHush-gawar tha na raha 
un ki be-mehriyon ko kya malum koi ummid-war tha na raha 
aah ka e'tibar bhi kab tak aah ka e'tibar tha na raha 
kuchh zamane ko sazgar sahi jo hamein sazgar tha na raha 
ab gareban kahin se chaak nahin shughl-e-fasl-e-bahaar tha na raha 
maut ka intizar baqi hai aap ka intizar tha na raha 
mehrban ye mazar-e-'fani' hai aap ka jaan-nisar tha na raha

tham gayā dard ujālā huā tanhā.ī meñ barq chamkī hai kahīñ raat kī gahrā.ī meñ 
baaġh kā baaġh lahū rañg huā jaatā hai vaqt masrūf hai kaisī chaman-ārā.ī meñ 
shahr vīrān hue bahr bayābān hue ḳhaak uḌtī hai dar o dasht kī pahnā.ī meñ 
ek lamhe meñ bikhar jaatā hai tānā-bānā aur phir umr guzar jaatī hai yakjā.ī meñ 
us tamāshe meñ nahīñ dekhne vaalā koī is tamāshe ko jo barpā hai tamāshā.ī meñ 
tham gaya dard ujala hua tanhai mein barq chamki hai kahin raat ki gahrai mein 
bagh ka bagh lahu rang hua jata hai waqt masruf hai kaisi chaman-arai mein 
shahr viran hue bahr bayaban hue KHak uDti hai dar o dasht ki pahnai mein 
ek lamhe mein bikhar jata hai tana-bana aur phir umr guzar jati hai yakjai mein 
us tamashe mein nahin dekhne wala koi is tamashe ko jo barpa hai tamashai mein

vaqt-e-ġhurūb aaj karāmāt ho ga.ī zulfoñ ko us ne khol diyā raat ho ga.ī 
kal tak to us meñ aisī karāmat na thī koī vo aañkh aaj qibla-e-hājāt ho ga.ī 
ai soz-e-ishq tū ne mujhe kyā banā diyā merī har ek saañs munājāt ho ga.ī 
ochhī nigāh Daal ke ik samt rakh diyā dil kyā diyā ġharīb kī sauġhāt ho ga.ī 
kuchh yaad aa ga.ī thī vo zulf-e-shikan-shikan hastī tamām chashma-e-zulmāt ho ga.ī 
ahl-e-vatan se duur judā.ī meñ yaar kī sabr aa gayā 'firāq' karāmāt ho ga.ī 
waqt-e-ghurub aaj karamat ho gai zulfon ko us ne khol diya raat ho gai 
kal tak to us mein aisi karamat na thi koi wo aankh aaj qibla-e-hajat ho gai 
ai soz-e-ishq tu ne mujhe kya bana diya meri har ek sans munajat ho gai 
ochhi nigah Dal ke ek samt rakh diya dil kya diya gharib ki saughat ho gai 
kuchh yaad aa gai thi wo zulf-e-shikan-shikan hasti tamam chashma-e-zulmat ho gai 
ahl-e-watan se dur judai mein yar ki sabr aa gaya 'firaq' karamat ho gai

zarā sī baat pe dil se bigāḌ aayā huuñ banā banāyā huā ghar ujaaḌ aayā huuñ 
vo intiqām kī ātish thī mere siine meñ milā na koī to ḳhud ko pachhāḌ aayā huuñ 
maiñ is jahān kī qismat badalne niklā thā aur apne haath kā likkhā hī phaaḌ aayā huuñ 
ab apne dūsre phere ke intizār meñ huuñ jahāñ jahāñ mire dushman haiñ taaḌ aayā huuñ 
maiñ us galī meñ gayā aur dil o nigāh samet 'jamāl' jeb meñ jo kuchh thā jhaaḌ aayā huuñ 
zara si baat pe dil se bigaD aaya hun bana banaya hua ghar ujaD aaya hun 
wo intiqam ki aatish thi mere sine mein mila na koi to KHud ko pachhaD aaya hun 
main is jahan ki qismat badalne nikla tha aur apne hath ka likkha hi phaD aaya hun 
ab apne dusre phere ke intizar mein hun jahan jahan mere dushman hain taD aaya hun 
main us gali mein gaya aur dil o nigah samet 'jamal' jeb mein jo kuchh tha jhaD aaya hun

kabhī shāḳh o sabza o barg par kabhī ġhuncha o gul o ḳhaar par maiñ chaman meñ chāhe jahāñ rahūñ mirā haq hai fasl-e-bahār par 
mujhe deñ na ġhaiz meñ dhamkiyāñ gireñ laakh baar ye bijliyāñ mirī saltanat ye hī āshiyāñ mirī milkiyat ye hī chaar par 
jinheñ kahiye ishq kī vus.ateñ jo haiñ ḳhaas husn kī azmateñ ye usī ke qalb se pūchhiye jise faḳhr ho ġham-e-yār par 
mire ashk-e-ḳhūñ kī bahār hai ki muraqqa-e-ġham-e-yār hai mirī shā.irī bhī nisār hai mirī chashm-e-sehr-nigār par 
ajab inqilāb-e-zamāna hai mirā muḳhtasar sā fasāna hai yahī ab jo baar hai dosh par yahī sar thā zānu-e-yār par 
ye kamāl-e-ishq kī sāzisheñ ye jamāl-e-husn kī nāzisheñ ye ināyateñ ye navāzisheñ mirī ek musht-e-ġhubār par 
mirī samt se use ai sabā ye payām-e-āḳhir-e-ġham sunā abhī dekhnā ho to dekh jā ki ḳhizāñ hai apnī bahār par 
ye fareb-e-jalva hai sar-ba-sar mujhe Dar ye hai dil-e-be-ḳhabar kahīñ jam na jaa.e tirī nazar inhīñ chand naqsh o nigār par 
maiñ rahīn-e-dard sahī magar mujhe aur chāhiye kyā 'jigar' ġham-e-yār hai mirā shefta maiñ farefta ġham-e-yār par 
kabhi shaKH o sabza o barg par kabhi ghuncha o gul o KHar par main chaman mein chahe jahan rahun mera haq hai fasl-e-bahaar par 
mujhe den na ghaiz mein dhamkiyan giren lakh bar ye bijliyan meri saltanat ye hi aashiyan meri milkiyat ye hi chaar par 
jinhen kahiye ishq ki wusaten jo hain KHas husn ki azmaten ye usi ke qalb se puchhiye jise faKHr ho gham-e-yar par 
mere ashk-e-KHun ki bahaar hai ki muraqqa-e-gham-e-yar hai meri shairi bhi nisar hai meri chashm-e-sehr-nigar par 
ajab inqilab-e-zamana hai mera muKHtasar sa fasana hai yahi ab jo bar hai dosh par yahi sar tha zanu-e-yar par 
ye kamal-e-ishq ki sazishen ye jamal-e-husn ki nazishen ye inayaten ye nawazishen meri ek musht-e-ghubar par 
meri samt se use ai saba ye payam-e-aKHir-e-gham suna abhi dekhna ho to dekh ja ki KHizan hai apni bahaar par 
ye fareb-e-jalwa hai sar-ba-sar mujhe Dar ye hai dil-e-be-KHabar kahin jam na jae teri nazar inhin chand naqsh o nigar par 
main rahin-e-dard sahi magar mujhe aur chahiye kya 'jigar' gham-e-yar hai mera shefta main farefta gham-e-yar par

jaan pyārī thī magar jaan se be-zārī thī jaan kā kaam faqat jān-faroshī niklā 
ḳhaak maiñ us kī judā.ī meñ pareshān phirūñ jab ki ye milnā bichhaḌnā mirī marzī niklā 
sirf ronā hai ki jiinā paḌā halkā ban ke vo to ehsās kī mīzān pe bhārī niklā 
ik na.e naam se phir apne sitāre uljhe ye nayā khel na.e ḳhvāb kā baanī niklā 
vo mirī ruuh kī uljhan kā sabab jāntā hai jism kī pyaas bujhāne pe bhī raazī niklā 
merī bujhtī huī āñkhoñ se kiran chuntā hai merī āñkhoñ kā khañDar shahr-e-ma.ānī niklā 
merī ayyār nigāhoñ se vafā māñgtā hai vo bhī mohtāj milā vo bhī savālī niklā 
maiñ use DhūñDh rahā thā ki talāsh apnī thī ik chamaktā huā jazba thā ki ja.alī niklā 
maiñ ne chāhā thā ki ashkoñ kā tamāshā dekhūñ aur āñkhoñ kā ḳhazāna thā ki ḳhālī niklā 
ik na.ī dhuup meñ phir apnā safar jaarī hai vo ghanā saaya faqat tifl-e-tasallī niklā 
maiñ bahut tez chalā apnī tabāhī kī taraf us ke chhuTne kā sabab narm-ḳhirāmī niklā 
ruuh kā dasht vahī jism kā vīrāna hai har nayā raaz purānā lagā baasī niklā 
sirf hashmat kī talab jaah kī ḳhvāhish paa.ī dil ko be-dāġh samajhtā thā jazāmī niklā 
ik balā aatī hai aur log chale jaate haiñ ik sadā kahtī hai har aadmī faanī niklā 
maiñ vo murda huuñ ki āñkheñ mirī zindoñ jaisī bain kartā huuñ ki maiñ apnā hī saanī niklā 
jaan pyari thi magar jaan se be-zari thi jaan ka kaam faqat jaan-faroshi nikla 
KHak main us ki judai mein pareshan phirun jab ki ye milna bichhaDna meri marzi nikla 
sirf rona hai ki jina paDa halka ban ke wo to ehsas ki mizan pe bhaari nikla 
ek nae nam se phir apne sitare uljhe ye naya khel nae KHwab ka bani nikla 
wo meri ruh ki uljhan ka sabab jaanta hai jism ki pyas bujhane pe bhi raazi nikla 
meri bujhti hui aankhon se kiran chunta hai meri aankhon ka khanDar shahr-e-maani nikla 
meri ayyar nigahon se wafa mangta hai wo bhi mohtaj mila wo bhi sawali nikla 
main use DhunDh raha tha ki talash apni thi ek chamakta hua jazba tha ki jali nikla 
main ne chaha tha ki ashkon ka tamasha dekhun aur aankhon ka KHazana tha ki KHali nikla 
ek nai dhup mein phir apna safar jari hai wo ghana saya faqat tifl-e-tasalli nikla 
main bahut tez chala apni tabahi ki taraf us ke chhuTne ka sabab narm-KHirami nikla 
ruh ka dasht wahi jism ka virana hai har naya raaz purana laga basi nikla 
sirf hashmat ki talab jah ki KHwahish pai dil ko be-dagh samajhta tha jazami nikla 
ek bala aati hai aur log chale jate hain ek sada kahti hai har aadmi fani nikla 
main wo murda hun ki aankhen meri zindon jaisi bain karta hun ki main apna hi sani nikla

vo havā na rahī vo chaman na rahā vo galī na rahī vo hasīñ na rahe vo falak na rahā vo samāñ na rahā vo makāñ na rahe vo makīñ na rahe 
vo guloñ meñ guloñ kī sī bū na rahī vo azīzoñ meñ lutf kī ḳhū na rahī vo hasīnoñ meñ rañg-e-vafā na rahā kaheñ aur kī kyā vo hamīñ na rahe 
na vo aan rahī na umañg rahī na vo rindī o zohd kī jañg rahī sū-e-qibla nigāhoñ ke ruḳh na rahe aur dar pe naqsh-e-jabīñ na rahe 
na vo jaam rahe na vo mast rahe na fidā.i-e-ahd-e-alast rahe vo tarīqa-e-kār-e-jahāñ na rahā vo mashāġhil-e-raunaq-e-dīñ na rahe 
hameñ laakh zamāna lubhā.e to kyā na.e rañg jo charḳh dikhā.e to kyā ye muhāl hai ahl-e-vafā ke liye ġham-e-millat o ulfat-e-dīñ na rahe 
tire kūcha-e-zulf meñ dil hai mirā ab use maiñ samajhtā huuñ dām-e-balā ye ajiib sitam hai ajiib jafā ki yahāñ na rahe to kahīñ na rahe 
ye tumhāre hī dam se hai bazm-e-tarab abhī jaao na tum na karo ye ġhazab koī baiTh ke lutf uThā.egā kyā ki jo raunaq-e-bazm tumhīñ na rahe 
jo thiiñ chashm-e-falak kī bhī nūr-e-nazar vahī jin pe nisār the shams o qamar so ab aisī miTī haiñ vo anjuman.en ki nishān bhī un ke kahīñ na rahe 
vahī sūrateñ rah ga.iiñ pesh-e-nazar jo zamāne ko phereñ idhar se udhar magar aise jamāl-e-jahāñ-ārā jo the raunaq-e-rū-e-zamīñ na rahe 
ġham o rañj meñ 'akbar' agar hai ghirā to samajh le ki rañj ko bhī hai fanā kisī shai ko nahīñ hai jahāñ meñ baqā vo ziyāda malūl o hazīñ na rahe 
wo hawa na rahi wo chaman na raha wo gali na rahi wo hasin na rahe wo falak na raha wo saman na raha wo makan na rahe wo makin na rahe 
wo gulon mein gulon ki si bu na rahi wo azizon mein lutf ki KHu na rahi wo hasinon mein rang-e-wafa na raha kahen aur ki kya wo hamin na rahe 
na wo aan rahi na umang rahi na wo rindi o zohd ki jang rahi su-e-qibla nigahon ke ruKH na rahe aur dar pe naqsh-e-jabin na rahe 
na wo jam rahe na wo mast rahe na fidai-e-ahd-e-alast rahe wo tariqa-e-kar-e-jahan na raha wo mashaghil-e-raunaq-e-din na rahe 
hamein lakh zamana lubhae to kya nae rang jo charKH dikhae to kya ye muhaal hai ahl-e-wafa ke liye gham-e-millat o ulfat-e-din na rahe 
tere kucha-e-zulf mein dil hai mera ab use main samajhta hun dam-e-bala ye ajib sitam hai ajib jafa ki yahan na rahe to kahin na rahe 
ye tumhaare hi dam se hai bazm-e-tarab abhi jao na tum na karo ye ghazab koi baiTh ke lutf uThaega kya ki jo raunaq-e-bazm tumhin na rahe 
jo thin chashm-e-falak ki bhi nur-e-nazar wahi jin pe nisar the shams o qamar so ab aisi miTi hain wo anjumanen ki nishan bhi un ke kahin na rahe 
wahi suraten rah gain pesh-e-nazar jo zamane ko pheren idhar se udhar magar aise jamal-e-jahan-ara jo the raunaq-e-ru-e-zamin na rahe 
gham o ranj mein 'akbar' agar hai ghira to samajh le ki ranj ko bhi hai fana kisi shai ko nahin hai jahan mein baqa wo ziyaada malul o hazin na rahe

qatl-e-āshiq kisī ma.ashūq se kuchh duur na thā par tire ahd se aage to ye dastūr na thā 
raat majlis meñ tire husn ke sho.ale ke huzūr sham.a ke muñh pe jo dekhā to kahīñ nuur na thā 
zikr merā hī vo kartā thā sarīhan lekin maiñ ne pūchhā to kahā ḳhair ye mazkūr na thā 
bāvajūde ki par-o-bāl na the aadam ke vahāñ pahuñchā ki farishte kā bhī maqdūr na thā 
parvarish ġham kī tire yaañ ta.iiñ to kī dekhā koī bhī daaġh thā siine meñ ki nāsūr na thā 
mohtasib aaj to mai-ḳhāne meñ tere hāthoñ dil na thā koī ki shīshe kī tarah chuur na thā 
'dard' ke milne se ai yaar burā kyuuñ maanā us ko kuchh aur sivā diid ke manzūr na thā 
qatl-e-ashiq kisi mashuq se kuchh dur na tha par tere ahd se aage to ye dastur na tha 
raat majlis mein tere husn ke shoale ke huzur shama ke munh pe jo dekha to kahin nur na tha 
zikr mera hi wo karta tha sarihan lekin main ne puchha to kaha KHair ye mazkur na tha 
bawajude ki par-o-baal na the aadam ke wahan pahuncha ki farishte ka bhi maqdur na tha 
parwarish gham ki tere yan tain to ki dekha koi bhi dagh tha sine mein ki nasur na tha 
mohtasib aaj to mai-KHane mein tere hathon dil na tha koi ki shishe ki tarah chur na tha 
'dard' ke milne se ai yar bura kyun mana us ko kuchh aur siwa did ke manzur na tha

girānī-e-shab-e-hijrāñ do-chand kyā karte ilāj-e-dard tire dardmand kyā karte 
vahīñ lagī hai jo nāzuk maqām the dil ke ye farq dast-e-adū ke gazand kyā karte 
jagah jagah pe the nāseh to kū-ba-kū dilbar inheñ pasand unheñ nā-pasand kyā karte 
hamīñ ne rok liyā panja-e-junūñ varna hameñ asiir ye kotah-kamand kyā karte 
jinheñ ḳhabar thī ki shart-e-navā-garī kyā hai vo ḳhush-navā gila-e-qaid-o-band kyā karte 
gulū-e-ishq ko dār-o-rasan pahuñch na sake to lauT aa.e tire sar-buland kyā karte 
girani-e-shab-e-hijran do-chand kya karte ilaj-e-dard tere dardmand kya karte 
wahin lagi hai jo nazuk maqam the dil ke ye farq dast-e-adu ke gazand kya karte 
jagah jagah pe the naseh to ku-ba-ku dilbar inhen pasand unhen na-pasand kya karte 
hamin ne rok liya panja-e-junun warna hamein asir ye kotah-kamand kya karte 
jinhen KHabar thi ki shart-e-nawa-gari kya hai wo KHush-nawa gila-e-qaid-o-band kya karte 
gulu-e-ishq ko dar-o-rasan pahunch na sake to lauT aae tere sar-buland kya karte

kuchh usūloñ kā nasha thā kuchh muqaddas ḳhvāb the har zamāne meñ shahādat ke yahī asbāb the 
koh se nīche utar kar kankarī chunte haiñ ab ishq meñ jo aabjū the jang meñ sailāb the 
sāz-o-sāmāñ the zafar ke par vo shab meñ luT ga.e ḳhāk-o-ḳhūñ ke darmiyāñ kuchh ḳhvāb kuchh kam-ḳhvāb the 
kyā dam-e-ruḳhsat nazar aate ḳhutūt-e-dilbarī naqsh the us chāñd ke lekin ba-shakl-e-āb the 
maiñ adū kī justujū meñ thā ki ik patthar lagā muḌ ke dekhā to sināñ taane hue ahbāb the 
the bahut nāyāb vo nūr-e-qalam zor-e-bayāñ sho.ala uTThā jab junūñ kā phir vahī nāyāb the 
kyā 'firāq'-o-'faiz' se lenā thā mujh ko ai 'na.īm' mere aage fikr-o-fan ke kuchh na.e ādāb the 
kuchh usulon ka nasha tha kuchh muqaddas KHwab the har zamane mein shahadat ke yahi asbab the 
koh se niche utar kar kankari chunte hain ab ishq mein jo aabju the jang mein sailab the 
saz-o-saman the zafar ke par wo shab mein luT gae KHak-o-KHun ke darmiyan kuchh KHwab kuchh kam-KHwab the 
kya dam-e-ruKHsat nazar aate KHutut-e-dilbari naqsh the us chand ke lekin ba-shakl-e-ab the 
main adu ki justuju mein tha ki ek patthar laga muD ke dekha to sinan tane hue ahbab the 
the bahut nayab wo nur-e-qalam zor-e-bayan shoala uTTha jab junun ka phir wahi nayab the 
kya 'firaq'-o-'faiz' se lena tha mujh ko ai 'naim' mere aage fikr-o-fan ke kuchh nae aadab the

zāhid na kah burī ki ye mastāne aadmī haiñ tujh ko lipaT paḌeñge dīvāne aadmī haiñ 
ġhairoñ kī dostī par kyuuñ e'tibār kiije ye dushmanī kareñge begāne aadmī haiñ 
jo aadmī pe guzrī vo ik sivā tumhāre kyā jī lagā ke sunte afsāne aadmī haiñ 
kyā jur.ateñ jo ham ko darbāñ tumhārā Toke kah do ki ye to jāne-pahchāne aadmī haiñ 
mai buuñd bhar pilā kar kyā hañs rahā hai saaqī bhar bhar ke piite āḳhir paimāne aadmī haiñ 
tum ne hamāre dil meñ ghar kar liyā to kyā hai ābād karte āḳhir vīrāne aadmī haiñ 
nāseh se koī kah de kiije kalām aisā hazrat ko tā ki koī ye jaane aadmī haiñ 
jab dāvar-e-qayāmat pūchhegā tum pe rakh kar kah deñge saaf ham to begāne aadmī haiñ 
maiñ vo bashar ki mujh se har aadmī ko nafrat tum sham.a vo ki tum par parvāne aadmī haiñ 
mahfil bharī huī hai saudā.iyoñ se us kī us ġhairat-e-parī par dīvāne aadmī haiñ 
shābāsh 'dāġh' tujh ko kyā teġh-e-ishq khaa.ī jī karte haiñ vahī jo mardāne aadmī haiñ 
zahid na kah buri ki ye mastane aadmi hain tujh ko lipaT paDenge diwane aadmi hain 
ghairon ki dosti par kyun e'tibar kije ye dushmani karenge begane aadmi hain 
jo aadmi pe guzri wo ek siwa tumhaare kya ji laga ke sunte afsane aadmi hain 
kya juraten jo hum ko darban tumhaara Toke kah do ki ye to jaane-pahchane aadmi hain 
mai bund bhar pila kar kya hans raha hai saqi bhar bhar ke pite aaKHir paimane aadmi hain 
tum ne hamare dil mein ghar kar liya to kya hai aabaad karte aaKHir virane aadmi hain 
naseh se koi kah de kije kalam aisa hazrat ko ta ki koi ye jaane aadmi hain 
jab dawar-e-qayamat puchhega tum pe rakh kar kah denge saf hum to begane aadmi hain 
main wo bashar ki mujh se har aadmi ko nafrat tum shama wo ki tum par parwane aadmi hain 
mahfil bhari hui hai saudaiyon se us ki us ghairat-e-pari par diwane aadmi hain 
shabash 'dagh' tujh ko kya tegh-e-ishq khai ji karte hain wahi jo mardane aadmi hain

ye kah ga.e haiñ musāfir luTe gharoñ vaale Dareñ havā se parinde khule paroñ vaale 
ye mere dil kī havas dasht-e-be-karāñ jaisī vo terī aañkh ke tevar samundaroñ vaale 
havā ke haath meñ kaase haiñ zard pattoñ ke kahāñ ga.e vo saḳhī sabz chādaroñ vaale 
kahāñ mileñge vo agle dinoñ ke shahzāde pahan ke tan pe libāde gadāgaroñ vaale 
pahāḌiyoñ meñ ghire ye bujhe bujhe raste kabhī idhar se guzarte the lashkaroñ vaale 
unhī pe ho kabhī nāzil azaab aag ajal vahī nagar kabhī Thahreñ payambaroñ vaale 
tire supurd karūñ aa.ine muqaddar ke idhar to aa mire ḳhush-rang pattharoñ vaale 
kisī ko dekh ke chup chup se kyuuñ hue 'mohsin' kahāñ ga.e vo irāde suḳhan-varoñ vaale 
ye kah gae hain musafir luTe gharon wale Daren hawa se parinde khule paron wale 
ye mere dil ki hawas dasht-e-be-karan jaisi wo teri aankh ke tewar samundaron wale 
hawa ke hath mein kase hain zard patton ke kahan gae wo saKHi sabz chadaron wale 
kahan milenge wo agle dinon ke shahzade pahan ke tan pe libaade gadagaron wale 
pahaDiyon mein ghire ye bujhe bujhe raste kabhi idhar se guzarte the lashkaron wale 
unhi pe ho kabhi nazil azab aag ajal wahi nagar kabhi Thahren payambaron wale 
tere supurd karun aaine muqaddar ke idhar to aa mere KHush-rang pattharon wale 
kisi ko dekh ke chup chup se kyun hue 'mohsin' kahan gae wo irade suKHan-waron wale

havā-e-tez tirā ek kaam āḳhirī hai ki naḳhl-e-ḳhushk pe māh-e-tamām āḳhirī hai 
maiñ jis sukūn se baiThā huuñ is kināre par sukūñ se lagtā hai merā qayām āḳhirī hai 
phir is ke baa'd ye bāzār-e-dil nahīñ lagnā ḳharīd lījiye sāhib ġhulām āḳhirī hai 
guzar chalā huuñ kisī ko yaqīñ dilātā huā ki lauh-e-dil pe raqam hai jo naam āḳhirī hai 
tabhī to peḌ kī āñkhoñ meñ chāñd bhar aayā kisī ne kah diyā hogā ki shaam āḳhirī hai 
ye lag rahā hai mohabbat ke pahle ziine par ki jis maqām pe huuñ ye maqām āḳhirī hai 
kisī ne phir se khaḌe kar diye dar-o-dīvār ḳhayāl thā ki mirā inhidām āḳhirī hai 
hamāre jaise vahāñ kis shumār meñ hoñge ki jis qatār meñ majnūñ kā naam āḳhirī hai 
shurū-e-ishq meñ aisī udāsiyāñ 'tābish' har ek shaam ye lagtā hai shaam āḳhirī hai 
hawa-e-tez tera ek kaam aaKHiri hai ki naKHl-e-KHushk pe mah-e-tamam aaKHiri hai 
main jis sukun se baiTha hun is kinare par sukun se lagta hai mera qayam aaKHiri hai 
phir is ke ba'd ye bazar-e-dil nahin lagna KHarid lijiye sahib ghulam aaKHiri hai 
guzar chala hun kisi ko yaqin dilata hua ki lauh-e-dil pe raqam hai jo nam aaKHiri hai 
tabhi to peD ki aankhon mein chand bhar aaya kisi ne kah diya hoga ki sham aaKHiri hai 
ye lag raha hai mohabbat ke pahle zine par ki jis maqam pe hun ye maqam aaKHiri hai 
kisi ne phir se khaDe kar diye dar-o-diwar KHayal tha ki mera inhidam aaKHiri hai 
hamare jaise wahan kis shumar mein honge ki jis qatar mein majnun ka nam aaKHiri hai 
shuru-e-ishq mein aisi udasiyan 'tabish' har ek sham ye lagta hai sham aaKHiri hai

'firāq' ik na.ī sūrat nikal to saktī hai ba-qaul us aañkh ke duniyā badal to saktī hai 
tire ḳhayāl ko kuchh chup sī lag ga.ī varna kahāniyoñ se shab-e-ġham bahal to saktī hai 
urūs-e-dahr chale khā ke Thokareñ lekin qadam qadam pe javānī ubal to saktī hai 
palaT paḌe na kahīñ us nigāh kā jaadū ki Duub kar ye chhurī kuchh uchhal to saktī hai 
bujhe hue nahīñ itne bujhe hue dil bhī fasurdagī meñ tabī.at machal to saktī hai 
agar tū chāhe to ġham vaale shādmāñ ho jaa.eñ nigāh-e-yār ye hasrat nikal to saktī hai 
ab itnī band nahīñ ġham-kadoñ kī bhī rāheñ havā-e-kūcha-e-mahbūb chal to saktī hai 
kaḌe haiñ kos bahut manzil-e-mohabbat ke mile na chhāñv magar dhuup Dhal to saktī hai 
hayāt lau tah-e-dāmān-e-marg de uTThī havā kī raah meñ ye sham.a jal to saktī hai 
kuchh aur maslahat-e-jazb-e-ishq hai varna kisī se chhuT ke tabī.at sambhal to saktī hai 
azal se soī hai taqdīr-e-ishq maut kī niiñd agar jagā.iye karvaT badal to saktī hai 
ġham-e-zamāna-o-soz-e-nihāñ kī aañch to de agar na TuuTe ye zanjīr gal to saktī hai 
sharīk-e-sharm-o-hayā kuchh hai bad-gumānī-e-husn nazar uThā ye jhijak sī nikal to saktī hai 
kabhī vo mil na sakegī maiñ ye nahīñ kahtā vo aañkh aañkh meñ paḌ kar badal to saktī hai 
badaltā jaa.e ġham-e-rozgār kā markaz ye chaal gardish-e-ayyām chal to saktī hai 
vo be-niyāz sahī dil matā-e-hech sahī magar kisī kī javānī machal to saktī hai 
tirī nigāh sahārā na de to baat hai aur ki girte girte bhī duniyā sambhal to saktī hai 
ye zor-o-shor salāmat tirī javānī bhī ba-qaul ishq ke sāñche meñ Dhal to saktī hai 
sunā hai barf ke TukḌe haiñ dil hasīnoñ ke kuchh aañch pā ke ye chāñdī pighal to saktī hai 
hañsī hañsī meñ lahū thūkte haiñ dil vaale ye sar-zamīn magar la.al ugal to saktī hai 
jo tū ne tark-e-mohabbat ko ahl-e-dil se kahā hazār narm ho ye baat khal to saktī hai 
are vo maut ho yā zindagī mohabbat par na kuchh sahī kaf-e-afsos mal to saktī hai 
haiñ jis ke bal pe khaḌe sarkashoñ ko vo dhartī agar kuchal nahīñ saktī nigal to saktī hai 
huī hai garm lahu pī ke ishq kī talvār yuuñ hī jilā.e jā ye shāḳh phal to saktī hai 
guzar rahī hai dabe paañv ishq kī devī subuk-ravī se jahāñ ko masal to saktī hai 
hayāt se nigah-e-vāpsīñ hai kuchh mānūs mire ḳhayāl se āñkhoñ meñ pal to saktī hai 
na bhūlnā ye hai tāḳhīr husn kī tāḳhīr 'firāq' aa.ī huī maut Tal to saktī hai 
'firaq' ek nai surat nikal to sakti hai ba-qaul us aankh ke duniya badal to sakti hai 
tere KHayal ko kuchh chup si lag gai warna kahaniyon se shab-e-gham bahal to sakti hai 
urus-e-dahr chale kha ke Thokaren lekin qadam qadam pe jawani ubal to sakti hai 
palaT paDe na kahin us nigah ka jadu ki Dub kar ye chhuri kuchh uchhal to sakti hai 
bujhe hue nahin itne bujhe hue dil bhi fasurdagi mein tabiat machal to sakti hai 
agar tu chahe to gham wale shadman ho jaen nigah-e-yar ye hasrat nikal to sakti hai 
ab itni band nahin gham-kadon ki bhi rahen hawa-e-kucha-e-mahbub chal to sakti hai 
kaDe hain kos bahut manzil-e-mohabbat ke mile na chhanw magar dhup Dhal to sakti hai 
hayat lau tah-e-daman-e-marg de uTThi hawa ki rah mein ye shama jal to sakti hai 
kuchh aur maslahat-e-jazb-e-ishq hai warna kisi se chhuT ke tabiat sambhal to sakti hai 
azal se soi hai taqdir-e-ishq maut ki nind agar jagaiye karwaT badal to sakti hai 
gham-e-zamana-o-soz-e-nihan ki aanch to de agar na TuTe ye zanjir gal to sakti hai 
sharik-e-sharm-o-haya kuchh hai bad-gumani-e-husn nazar uTha ye jhijak si nikal to sakti hai 
kabhi wo mil na sakegi main ye nahin kahta wo aankh aankh mein paD kar badal to sakti hai 
badalta jae gham-e-rozgar ka markaz ye chaal gardish-e-ayyam chal to sakti hai 
wo be-niyaz sahi dil mata-e-hech sahi magar kisi ki jawani machal to sakti hai 
teri nigah sahaara na de to baat hai aur ki girte girte bhi duniya sambhal to sakti hai 
ye zor-o-shor salamat teri jawani bhi ba-qaul ishq ke sanche mein Dhal to sakti hai 
suna hai barf ke TukDe hain dil hasinon ke kuchh aanch pa ke ye chandi pighal to sakti hai 
hansi hansi mein lahu thukte hain dil wale ye sar-zamin magar lal ugal to sakti hai 
jo tu ne tark-e-mohabbat ko ahl-e-dil se kaha hazar narm ho ye baat khal to sakti hai 
are wo maut ho ya zindagi mohabbat par na kuchh sahi kaf-e-afsos mal to sakti hai 
hain jis ke bal pe khaDe sarkashon ko wo dharti agar kuchal nahin sakti nigal to sakti hai 
hui hai garm lahu pi ke ishq ki talwar yun hi jilae ja ye shaKH phal to sakti hai 
guzar rahi hai dabe panw ishq ki dewi subuk-rawi se jahan ko masal to sakti hai 
hayat se nigah-e-wapsin hai kuchh manus mere KHayal se aankhon mein pal to sakti hai 
na bhulna ye hai taKHir husn ki taKHir 'firaq' aai hui maut Tal to sakti hai

hone ko yuuñ to shahr meñ apnā makān thā nafrat kā regzār magar darmiyān thā 
lamhe ke TūTne kī sadā sun rahā thā maiñ jhapkī jo aañkh sar pe nayā āsmān thā 
kahne ko haath bāñdhe khaḌe the namāz meñ pūchho to dūsrī hī taraf apnā dhyān thā 
allāh jaane kis pe akaḌtā thā raat din kuchh bhī nahīñ thā phir bhī baḌā bad-zabān thā 
shole ugalte tiir baraste the charḳh se saaya thā paas meñ na koī sā.ebān thā 
sab se kiyā hai vasl kā vaada alag alag kal raat vo sabhī pe bahut mehrbān thā 
muñh-phaT thā be-lagām thā rusvā thā DhiiT thā jaisā bhī thā vo dosto mahfil kī jaan thā 
hone ko yun to shahr mein apna makan tha nafrat ka regzar magar darmiyan tha 
lamhe ke TuTne ki sada sun raha tha main jhapki jo aankh sar pe naya aasman tha 
kahne ko hath bandhe khaDe the namaz mein puchho to dusri hi taraf apna dhyan tha 
allah jaane kis pe akaDta tha raat din kuchh bhi nahin tha phir bhi baDa bad-zaban tha 
shole ugalte tir baraste the charKH se saya tha pas mein na koi saeban tha 
sab se kiya hai wasl ka wada alag alag kal raat wo sabhi pe bahut mehrban tha 
munh-phaT tha be-lagam tha ruswa tha DhiT tha jaisa bhi tha wo dosto mahfil ki jaan tha

tiir par tiir lagāo tumheñ Dar kis kā hai siina kis kā hai mirī jaan jigar kis kā hai 
ḳhauf-e-mīzān-e-qayāmat nahīñ mujh ko ai dost tū agar hai mire palle meñ to Dar kis kā hai 
koī aatā hai adam se to koī jaatā hai saḳht donoñ meñ ḳhudā jaane safar kis kā hai 
chhup rahā hai qafas-e-tan meñ jo har tā.ir-e-dil aañkh khole hue shāhīn-e-nazar kis kā hai 
nām-e-shā.ir na sahī sher kā mazmūn ho ḳhuub phal se matlab hameñ kyā kaam shajar kis kā hai 
said karne se jo hai tā.ir-e-dil ke munkir ai kamāñ-dār tire tiir meñ par kis kā hai 
merī hairat kā shab-e-vasl ye baa.is hai 'amīr' sar ba-zānū huuñ ki zaanū pe ye sar kis kā hai 
tir par tir lagao tumhein Dar kis ka hai sina kis ka hai meri jaan jigar kis ka hai 
KHauf-e-mizan-e-qayamat nahin mujh ko ai dost tu agar hai mere palle mein to Dar kis ka hai 
koi aata hai adam se to koi jata hai saKHt donon mein KHuda jaane safar kis ka hai 
chhup raha hai qafas-e-tan mein jo har tair-e-dil aankh khole hue shahin-e-nazar kis ka hai 
nam-e-shair na sahi sher ka mazmun ho KHub phal se matlab hamein kya kaam shajar kis ka hai 
said karne se jo hai tair-e-dil ke munkir ai kaman-dar tere tir mein par kis ka hai 
meri hairat ka shab-e-wasl ye bais hai 'amir' sar ba-zanu hun ki zanu pe ye sar kis ka hai

ishq se paidā navā-e-zindagī meñ zer-o-bam ishq se miTTī kī tasvīroñ meñ soz-e-dam-ba-dam 
aadmī ke reshe reshe meñ samā jaatā hai ishq shāḳh-e-gul meñ jis tarah bād-e-sahar-gāhī kā nam 
apne rāziq ko na pahchāne to muhtāj-e-mulūk aur pahchāne to haiñ tere gadā daarā o jam 
dil kī āzādī shahanshāhī shikam sāmān-e-maut faisla terā tire hāthoñ meñ hai dil yā shikam 
ai musalmāñ apne dil se pūchh mullā se na pūchh ho gayā allāh ke bandoñ se kyuuñ ḳhālī haram 
ishq se paida nawa-e-zindagi mein zer-o-bam ishq se miTTi ki taswiron mein soz-e-dam-ba-dam 
aadmi ke reshe reshe mein sama jata hai ishq shaKH-e-gul mein jis tarah baad-e-sahar-gahi ka nam 
apne raaziq ko na pahchane to muhtaj-e-muluk aur pahchane to hain tere gada dara o jam 
dil ki aazadi shahanshahi shikam saman-e-maut faisla tera tere hathon mein hai dil ya shikam 
ai musalman apne dil se puchh mulla se na puchh ho gaya allah ke bandon se kyun KHali haram

jo ho saktā hai us se vo kisī se ho nahīñ saktā magar dekho to phir kuchh aadmī se ho nahīñ saktā 
mohabbat meñ kare kyā kuchh kisī se ho nahīñ saktā mirā marnā bhī to merī ḳhushī se ho nahīñ saktā 
alag karnā raqīboñ kā ilāhī tujh ko āsāñ hai mujhe mushkil ki merī bekasī se ho nahīñ saktā 
kiyā hai vā'da-e-fardā unhoñ ne dekhiye kyā ho yahāñ sabr o tahammul aaj hī se ho nahīñ saktā 
ye mushtāq-e-shahādat kis jagah jaa.eñ kise DhūñDeñ ki terā kaam qātil jab tujhī se ho nahīñ saktā 
lagā kar teġh qissa paak kiije dād-ḳhvāhoñ kā kisī kā faisla gar munsifī se ho nahīñ saktā 
mirā dushman ba-zāhir chaar din ko dost hai terā kisī kā ho rahe ye har kisī se ho nahīñ saktā 
dam-e-pursish kahoge kyā vahāñ jab yaañ ye sūrat hai adā ik harf-e-vāda nāzukī se ho nahīñ saktā 
na kahiye go ki hāl-e-dil magar rañg-āshnā haiñ ham ye zāhir aap kī kyā ḳhāmushī se ho nahīñ saktā 
kiyā jo ham ne zālim kyā karegā ġhair muñh kyā hai kare to sabr aisā aadmī se ho nahīñ saktā 
chaman meñ naaz bulbul ne kiyā jo apnī naale par chaTak kar ġhuncha bolā kyā kisī se ho nahīñ saktā 
nahīñ gar tujh pe qaabū dil hī par kuchh zor ho apnā karūñ kyā ye bhī to nā-tāqatī se ho nahīñ saktā 
na ronā hai tarīqe kā na hañsnā hai salīqe kā pareshānī meñ koī kaam jī se ho nahīñ saktā 
huā huuñ is qadar mahjūb 'arz-e-mudda'ā kar ke ki ab to 'uzr bhī sharmindagī se ho nahīñ saktā 
ġhazab meñ jaan hai kyā kiije badla ranj-e-furqat kā badī se kar nahīñ sakte ḳhushī se ho nahīñ saktā 
mazā jo iztirāb-e-shauq se 'āshiq ko hai hāsil vo taslīm o razā o bandagī se ho nahīñ saktā 
ḳhudā jab dost hai ai 'dāġh' kyā dushman se andesha hamārā kuchh kisī kī dushmanī se ho nahīñ saktā 
jo ho sakta hai us se wo kisi se ho nahin sakta magar dekho to phir kuchh aadmi se ho nahin sakta 
mohabbat mein kare kya kuchh kisi se ho nahin sakta mera marna bhi to meri KHushi se ho nahin sakta 
alag karna raqibon ka ilahi tujh ko aasan hai mujhe mushkil ki meri bekasi se ho nahin sakta 
kiya hai wa'da-e-farda unhon ne dekhiye kya ho yahan sabr o tahammul aaj hi se ho nahin sakta 
ye mushtaq-e-shahadat kis jagah jaen kise DhunDen ki tera kaam qatil jab tujhi se ho nahin sakta 
laga kar tegh qissa pak kije dad-KHwahon ka kisi ka faisla gar munsifi se ho nahin sakta 
mera dushman ba-zahir chaar din ko dost hai tera kisi ka ho rahe ye har kisi se ho nahin sakta 
dam-e-pursish kahoge kya wahan jab yan ye surat hai ada ek harf-e-wada nazuki se ho nahin sakta 
na kahiye go ki haal-e-dil magar rang-ashna hain hum ye zahir aap ki kya KHamushi se ho nahin sakta 
kiya jo hum ne zalim kya karega ghair munh kya hai kare to sabr aisa aadmi se ho nahin sakta 
chaman mein naz bulbul ne kiya jo apni nale par chaTak kar ghuncha bola kya kisi se ho nahin sakta 
nahin gar tujh pe qabu dil hi par kuchh zor ho apna karun kya ye bhi to na-taqati se ho nahin sakta 
na rona hai tariqe ka na hansna hai saliqe ka pareshani mein koi kaam ji se ho nahin sakta 
hua hun is qadar mahjub 'arz-e-mudda'a kar ke ki ab to 'uzr bhi sharmindagi se ho nahin sakta 
ghazab mein jaan hai kya kije badla ranj-e-furqat ka badi se kar nahin sakte KHushi se ho nahin sakta 
maza jo iztirab-e-shauq se 'ashiq ko hai hasil wo taslim o raza o bandagi se ho nahin sakta 
KHuda jab dost hai ai 'dagh' kya dushman se andesha hamara kuchh kisi ki dushmani se ho nahin sakta

uzr un kī zabān se niklā tiir goyā kamān se niklā 
vo chhalāvā is aan se niklā al-amāñ har zabān se niklā 
ḳhār-e-hasrat bayān se niklā dil kā kāñTā zabān se niklā 
fitna-gar kyā makān se niklā āsmāñ āsmān se niklā 
aa gayā ġhash nigāh dekhte hī mudda.ā kab zabān se niklā

dil meñ rahne na duuñ tirā shikva dil meñ aayā zabān se niklā

rāh-rav-e-rāh-e-ishq the lākhoñ aage maiñ kārvān se niklā

tere dīvānoñ kā bhī lashkar aaj kis tajammul se shaan se niklā 
muḌ ke dekhā to maiñ ne kab dekhā duur jab pāsbān se niklā 
vo hile lab tumhāre vaade par vo tumhārī zabān se niklā 
us kī bāñkī adā ne jab maarā dam mirā aan taan se niklā 
mere aañsū kī us ne kī tārīf ḳhuub motī ye kaan se niklā 
ham khaḌe tum se bāteñ karte the ġhair kyuuñ darmiyān se niklā 
zikr ahl-e-vafā kā jab aayā 'dāġh' un kī zabān se niklā 
uzr un ki zaban se nikla tir goya kaman se nikla 
wo chhalawa is aan se nikla al-aman har zaban se nikla 
KHar-e-hasrat bayan se nikla dil ka kanTa zaban se nikla 
fitna-gar kya makan se nikla aasman aasman se nikla 
aa gaya ghash nigah dekhte hi muddaa kab zaban se nikla 
kha gae the wafa ka dhoka hum jhuT sach imtihan se nikla 
dil mein rahne na dun tera shikwa dil mein aaya zaban se nikla 
wahm aate hain dekhiye kya ho wo akela makan se nikla 
tum baraste rahe sar-e-mahfil kuchh bhi meri zaban se nikla 
sach to ye hai moamla dil ka bahar apne guman se nikla 
us ko aayat hadis kya samjhen jo tumhaari zaban se nikla 
paD gaya jo zaban se teri harf phir na apne makan se nikla 
dekh kar ru-e-yar salle-ala be-tahasha zaban se nikla 
lo qayamat ab aai wo kafir ban-bana kar makan se nikla 
mar gae hum magar tera arman dil se nikla na jaan se nikla 
rah-raw-e-rah-e-ishq the lakhon aage main karwan se nikla 
samjho patthar ki tum lakir use jo hamari zaban se nikla 
bazm se tum ko le ke jaenge kaam kab phul-pan se nikla 
kya murawwat hai nawak-e-dil-doz pahle hargiz na jaan se nikla 
tere diwanon ka bhi lashkar aaj kis tajammul se shan se nikla 
muD ke dekha to main ne kab dekha dur jab pasban se nikla 
wo hile lab tumhaare wade par wo tumhaari zaban se nikla 
us ki banki ada ne jab mara dam mera aan tan se nikla 
mere aansu ki us ne ki tarif KHub moti ye kan se nikla 
hum khaDe tum se baaten karte the ghair kyun darmiyan se nikla

sitam hī karnā jafā hī karnā nigāh-e-ulfat kabhī na karnā tumheñ qasam hai hamāre sar kī hamāre haq meñ kamī na karnā 
hamārī mayyat pe tum jo aanā to chaar aañsū bahā ke jaanā zarā rahe pās-e-ābrū bhī kahīñ hamārī hañsī na karnā 
kahāñ kā aanā kahāñ kā jaanā vo jānte hī nahīñ ye rasmeñ vahāñ hai va.ade kī bhī ye sūrat kabhī to karnā kabhī na karnā 
liye to chalte haiñ hazrat-e-dil tumheñ bhī us anjuman meñ lekin hamāre pahlū meñ baiTh kar tum hamīñ se pahlū-tahī na karnā 
nahīñ hai kuchh qatl un kā āsāñ ye saḳht-jāñ haiñ bure balā ke qazā ko pahle sharīk karnā ye kaam apnī ḳhushī na karnā 
halāk andāz-e-vasl karnā ki parda rah jaa.e kuchh hamārā ġham-e-judā.ī meñ ḳhaak kar ke kahīñ adū kī ḳhushī na karnā 
mirī to hai baat zahr un ko vo un ke matlab hī kī na kyuuñ ho ki un se jo iltijā se kahnā ġhazab hai un ko vahī na karnā 
huā agar shauq aa.ine se to ruḳh rahe rāstī kī jānib misāl-e-āriz safā.ī rakhnā ba-rañg-e-kākul kajī na karnā 
vo hī hamārā tarīq-e-ulfat ki dushmanoñ se bhī mil ke chalnā ye ek sheva tirā sitamgar ki dost se dostī na karnā 
ham ek rasta galī kā us kī dikhā ke dil ko hue pashemāñ ye hazrat-e-ḳhizr ko jatā do kisī kī tum rahbarī na karnā 
bayān-e-dard-e-firāq kaisā ki hai vahāñ apnī ye haqīqat jo baat karnī to naala karnā nahīñ to vo bhī kabhī na karnā 
madār hai nāseho tumhīñ par tamām ab us kī munsifī kā zarā to kahnā ḳhudā-lagī bhī faqat suḳhan-parvarī na karnā 
burī hai ai 'dāġh' rāh-e-ulfat ḳhudā na le jaa.e aise raste jo apnī tum ḳhair chāhte ho to bhuul kar dil-lagī na karnā 
sitam hi karna jafa hi karna nigah-e-ulfat kabhi na karna tumhein qasam hai hamare sar ki hamare haq mein kami na karna 
hamari mayyat pe tum jo aana to chaar aansu baha ke jaana zara rahe pas-e-abru bhi kahin hamari hansi na karna 
kahan ka aana kahan ka jaana wo jaante hi nahin ye rasmen wahan hai wade ki bhi ye surat kabhi to karna kabhi na karna 
liye to chalte hain hazrat-e-dil tumhein bhi us anjuman mein lekin hamare pahlu mein baiTh kar tum hamin se pahlu-tahi na karna 
nahin hai kuchh qatl un ka aasan ye saKHt-jaan hain bure bala ke qaza ko pahle sharik karna ye kaam apni KHushi na karna 
halak andaz-e-wasl karna ki parda rah jae kuchh hamara gham-e-judai mein KHak kar ke kahin adu ki KHushi na karna 
meri to hai baat zahr un ko wo un ke matlab hi ki na kyun ho ki un se jo iltija se kahna ghazab hai un ko wahi na karna 
hua agar shauq aaine se to ruKH rahe rasti ki jaanib misal-e-ariz safai rakhna ba-rang-e-kakul kaji na karna 
wo hi hamara tariq-e-ulfat ki dushmanon se bhi mil ke chalna ye ek shewa tera sitamgar ki dost se dosti na karna 
hum ek rasta gali ka us ki dikha ke dil ko hue pasheman ye hazrat-e-KHizr ko jata do kisi ki tum rahbari na karna 
bayan-e-dard-e-firaq kaisa ki hai wahan apni ye haqiqat jo baat karni to nala karna nahin to wo bhi kabhi na karna 
madar hai naseho tumhin par tamam ab us ki munsifi ka zara to kahna KHuda-lagi bhi faqat suKHan-parwari na karna 
buri hai ai 'dagh' rah-e-ulfat KHuda na le jae aise raste jo apni tum KHair chahte ho to bhul kar dil-lagi na karna

manzil-e-shauq tai nahin hoti Thekiyan na-tawan lete hain 
kar guzarte hain ho buri ki bhali dil mein jo kuchh wo Than lete hain 
wo jhagaDte hain jab raqibon se bich mein mujh ko san lete hain 
zid har ek baat par nahin achchhi dost ki dost man lete hain 
mustaid ho ke ye kaho to sahi aaiye imtihan lete hain 
'dagh' bhi hai ajib sehr-bayan baat jis ki wo man lete hain

sharīfe ke daraḳhtoñ meñ chhupā ghar dekh letā huuñ maiñ āñkheñ band kar ke ghar ke andar dekh letā huuñ 
udhar us paar kyā hai ye kabhī sochā nahīñ maiñ ne magar maiñ roz khiḌkī se samundar dekh letā huuñ 
saḌak pe chalte phirte dauḌte logoñ se uktā kar kisī chhat par maze meñ baiThe bandar dekh letā huuñ 
ye sach hai apnī qismat koī kaise dekh saktā hai magar maiñ taash ke patte uThā kar dekh letā huuñ 
galī-kūchoñ meñ chaurāhoñ pe yā bas kī qatāroñ meñ maiñ us chup-chāp sī laḌkī ko aksar dekh letā huuñ 
chalā jā.ūñgā jaise ḳhud ko tanhā chhoḌ kar 'alvī' maiñ apne aap ko rātoñ meñ uTh kar dekh letā huuñ 
sharife ke daraKHton mein chhupa ghar dekh leta hun main aankhen band kar ke ghar ke andar dekh leta hun 
udhar us par kya hai ye kabhi socha nahin main ne magar main roz khiDki se samundar dekh leta hun 
saDak pe chalte phirte dauDte logon se ukta kar kisi chhat par maze mein baiThe bandar dekh leta hun 
ye sach hai apni qismat koi kaise dekh sakta hai magar main tash ke patte uTha kar dekh leta hun 
gali-kuchon mein chaurahon pe ya bas ki qataron mein main us chup-chap si laDki ko aksar dekh leta hun 
chala jaunga jaise KHud ko tanha chhoD kar 'alwi' main apne aap ko raaton mein uTh kar dekh leta hun

dīdār meñ ik turfa dīdār nazar aayā har baar chhupā koī har baar nazar aayā 
chhāloñ ko bayābāñ bhī gulzār nazar aayā jab chheḌ par āmāda har ḳhaar nazar aayā 
sub.h-e-shab-e-hijrāñ kī vo chāk-garebānī ik ālam-e-nairañgī har taar nazar aayā 
ho sabr ki betābī ummīd ki māyūsī nairañg-e-mohabbat bhī be-kār nazar aayā 
jab chashm-e-siyah terī thī chhā.ī huī dil par is mulk kā har ḳhitta tātār nazar aayā 
tū ne bhī to dekhī thī vo jaatī huī duniyā kyā āḳhrī lamhoñ meñ bīmār nazar aayā 
ġhash khā ke gire muusā allāh-rī māyūsī halkā sā vo parda bhī dīvār nazar aayā 
zarra ho ki qatra ho ḳhum-ḳhāna-e-hastī meñ maḳhmūr nazar aayā sarshār nazar aayā 
kyā kuchh na huā ġham se kyā kuchh na kiyā ġham ne aur yuuñ to huā jo kuchh be-kār nazar aayā 
ai ishq qasam tujh ko ma.amūra-e-ālam kī koī ġham-e-furqat meñ ġham-ḳhvār nazar aayā 
shab kaT ga.ī furqat kī dekhā na 'firāq' āḳhir tūl-e-ġham-e-hijrāñ bhī be-kār nazar aayā 
didar mein ek turfa didar nazar aaya har bar chhupa koi har bar nazar aaya 
chhaalon ko bayaban bhi gulzar nazar aaya jab chheD par aamada har KHar nazar aaya 
subh-e-shab-e-hijran ki wo chaak-garebani ek aalam-e-nairangi har tar nazar aaya 
ho sabr ki betabi ummid ki mayusi nairang-e-mohabbat bhi be-kar nazar aaya 
jab chashm-e-siyah teri thi chhai hui dil par is mulk ka har KHitta tatar nazar aaya 
tu ne bhi to dekhi thi wo jati hui duniya kya aaKHri lamhon mein bimar nazar aaya 
ghash kha ke gire musa allah-ri mayusi halka sa wo parda bhi diwar nazar aaya 
zarra ho ki qatra ho KHum-KHana-e-hasti mein maKHmur nazar aaya sarshaar nazar aaya 
kya kuchh na hua gham se kya kuchh na kiya gham ne aur yun to hua jo kuchh be-kar nazar aaya 
ai ishq qasam tujh ko mamura-e-alam ki koi gham-e-furqat mein gham-KHwar nazar aaya 
shab kaT gai furqat ki dekha na 'firaq' aaKHir tul-e-gham-e-hijran bhi be-kar nazar aaya

ham ne kis din tire kūche meñ guzārā na kiyā tū ne ai shoḳh magar kaam hamārā na kiyā 
ek hī baar huiiñ vaj.h-e-giraftārī-e-dil iltifāt un kī nigāhoñ ne dubārā na kiyā 
mahfil-e-yār kī rah jā.egī aadhī raunaq naaz ko us ne agar anjuman-ārā na kiyā 
tān-e-ahbāb sune sarzanish-e-ḳhalq sahī ham ne kyā kyā tirī ḳhātir se gavārā na kiyā 
jab diyā tum ne raqīboñ ko diyā jām-e-sharāb bhuul kar bhī mirī jānib ko ishārā na kiyā 
rū-ba-rū chashm-e-tasavvur ke vo har vaqt rahe na sahī aañkh ne gar un kā nazārā na kiyā 
gar yahī hai sitam-e-yār to ham ne 'hasrat' na kiyā kuchh bhī jo duniyā se kinārā na kiyā 
hum ne kis din tere kuche mein guzara na kiya tu ne ai shoKH magar kaam hamara na kiya 
ek hi bar huin wajh-e-giraftari-e-dil iltifat un ki nigahon ne dubara na kiya 
mahfil-e-yar ki rah jaegi aadhi raunaq naz ko us ne agar anjuman-ara na kiya 
tan-e-ahbab sune sarzanish-e-KHalq sahi hum ne kya kya teri KHatir se gawara na kiya 
jab diya tum ne raqibon ko diya jam-e-sharab bhul kar bhi meri jaanib ko ishaara na kiya 
ru-ba-ru chashm-e-tasawwur ke wo har waqt rahe na sahi aankh ne gar un ka nazara na kiya 
gar yahi hai sitam-e-yar to hum ne 'hasrat' na kiya kuchh bhi jo duniya se kinara na kiya

chāñd us ghar ke darīchoñ ke barābar aayā dil-e-mushtāq Thahar jā vahī manzar aayā 
maiñ bahut ḳhush thā kaḌī dhuup ke sannāTe meñ kyuuñ tirī yaad kā bādal mire sar par aayā 
bujh ga.ī raunaq-e-parvāna to mahfil chamkī so ga.e ahl-e-tamannā to sitamgar aayā 
yaar sab jam.a hue raat kī ḳhāmoshī meñ koī ro kar to koī baal banā kar aayā 
chand us ghar ke darichon ke barabar aaya dil-e-mushtaq Thahar ja wahi manzar aaya 
main bahut KHush tha kaDi dhup ke sannaTe mein kyun teri yaad ka baadal mere sar par aaya 
bujh gai raunaq-e-parwana to mahfil chamki so gae ahl-e-tamanna to sitamgar aaya 
yar sab jama hue raat ki KHamoshi mein koi ro kar to koi baal bana kar aaya

ġhairoñ pe khul na jaa.e kahīñ raaz dekhnā merī taraf bhī ġhamza-e-ġhammāz dekhnā 
uḌte hī rañg-e-ruḳh mirā nazroñ se thā nihāñ is murġh-e-par-shikasta kī parvāz dekhnā 
dushnām-e-yār tab-e-hazīñ par girāñ nahīñ ai ham-nafas nazākat-e-āvāz dekhnā 
dekh apnā hāl-e-zār munajjim huā raqīb thā sāzgār tāla-e-nā-sāz dekhnā 
bad-kām kā ma.aal burā hai jazā ke din hāl-e-sip.har-e-tafraqa-andāz dekhnā 
mat rakhiyo gard-e-tārik-e-ushshāq par qadam pāmāl ho na jaa.e sar-afrāz dekhnā 
merī nigāh-e-ḳhīra dikhāte haiñ ġhair ko be-tāqatī pe sarzanish-e-nāz dekhnā 
tark-e-sanam bhī kam nahīñ soz-e-jahīm se 'momin' ġham-e-ma.āl kā āġhāz dekhnā 
ghairon pe khul na jae kahin raaz dekhna meri taraf bhi ghamza-e-ghammaz dekhna 
uDte hi rang-e-ruKH mera nazron se tha nihan is murgh-e-par-shikasta ki parwaz dekhna 
dushnam-e-yar tab-e-hazin par giran nahin ai ham-nafas nazakat-e-awaz dekhna 
dekh apna haal-e-zar munajjim hua raqib tha sazgar tala-e-na-saz dekhna 
bad-kaam ka maal bura hai jaza ke din haal-e-siphar-e-tafraqa-andaz dekhna 
mat rakhiyo gard-e-tarik-e-ushshaq par qadam pamal ho na jae sar-afraaz dekhna 
meri nigah-e-KHira dikhate hain ghair ko be-taqati pe sarzanish-e-naz dekhna 
tark-e-sanam bhi kam nahin soz-e-jahim se 'momin' gham-e-maal ka aaghaz dekhna

kahāñ ke naam o nasab ilm kyā fazīlat kyā jahān-e-rizq meñ tauqīr-e-ahl-e-hājat kyā 
shikam kī aag liye phir rahī hai shahr-ba-shahr sag-e-zamāna haiñ ham kyā hamārī hijrat kyā 
dimashq-e-maslahat o kūfa-e-nifāq ke biich fuġhān-e-qāfila-e-be-navā kī qīmat kyā 
ma.āl-e-izzat-e-sādāt-e-ishq dekh ke ham badal ga.e to badalne pe itnī hairat kyā 
qimār-ḳhāna-e-hastī meñ ek baazī par tamām umr lagā dī to phir shikāyat kyā 
faroġh-e-san.at-e-qad-āvarī kā mausam hai subuk hue pe bhī niklā hai qadd-o-qāmat kyā 
kahan ke nam o nasab ilm kya fazilat kya jahan-e-rizq mein tauqir-e-ahl-e-hajat kya 
shikam ki aag liye phir rahi hai shahr-ba-shahr sag-e-zamana hain hum kya hamari hijrat kya 
dimashq-e-maslahat o kufa-e-nifaq ke bich fughan-e-qafila-e-be-nawa ki qimat kya 
maal-e-izzat-e-sadat-e-ishq dekh ke hum badal gae to badalne pe itni hairat kya 
qimar-KHana-e-hasti mein ek bazi par tamam umr laga di to phir shikayat kya 
farogh-e-sanat-e-qad-awari ka mausam hai subuk hue pe bhi nikla hai qadd-o-qamat kya

kisī jānib se bhī parcham na lahū kā niklā ab ke mausam meñ bhī aalam vahī hū kā niklā 
dast-e-qātil se kuchh ummīd-e-shafā thī lekin nok-e-ḳhanjar se bhī kāñTā na gulū kā niklā 
ishq ilzām lagātā thā havas par kyā kyā ye munāfiq bhī tire vasl kā bhūkā niklā 
jī nahīñ chāhtā mai-ḳhāne ko jaa.eñ jab se shaiḳh bhī bazm-nashīñ ahl-e-subū kā niklā 
dil ko ham chhoḌ ke duniyā kī taraf aa.e the ye shabistāñ bhī isī ġhāliya-mū kā niklā 
ham abas sozan-o-rishta liye galiyoñ meñ phire kisī dil meñ na koī kaam rafū kā niklā 
yār-e-be-faiz se kyuuñ ham ko tavaqqo thī 'farāz' jo na apnā na hamārā na adū kā niklā 
kisi jaanib se bhi parcham na lahu ka nikla ab ke mausam mein bhi aalam wahi hu ka nikla 
dast-e-qatil se kuchh ummid-e-shafa thi lekin nok-e-KHanjar se bhi kanTa na gulu ka nikla 
ishq ilzam lagata tha hawas par kya kya ye munafiq bhi tere wasl ka bhuka nikla 
ji nahin chahta mai-KHane ko jaen jab se shaiKH bhi bazm-nashin ahl-e-subu ka nikla 
dil ko hum chhoD ke duniya ki taraf aae the ye shabistan bhi isi ghaaliya-mu ka nikla 
hum abas sozan-o-rishta liye galiyon mein phire kisi dil mein na koi kaam rafu ka nikla 
yar-e-be-faiz se kyun hum ko tawaqqo thi 'faraaz' jo na apna na hamara na adu ka nikla

dil pareshān huā jaatā hai aur sāmān huā jaatā hai 
ḳhidmat-e-pīr-e-muġhāñ kar zāhid tū ab insān huā jaatā hai 
maut se pahle mujhe qatl karo us kā ehsān huā jaatā hai 
lazzat-e-ishq ilāhī miT jaa.e dard armān huā jaatā hai 
dam zarā lo ki mirā dam tum par abhī qurbān huā jaatā hai 
girya kyā zabt karūñ ai nāseh ashk paimān huā jaatā hai 
bevafā.ī se bhī rafta rafta vo mirī jaan huā jaatā hai 
arsa-e-hashr meñ vo aa pahuñche saaf maidān huā jaatā hai 
madad ai himmat-e-dushvār-pasañd kaam āsān huā jaatā hai 
chhā.ī jaatī hai ye vahshat kaisī ghar bayābān huā jaatā hai 
shikva sun aañkh milā kar zālim kyuuñ pashemān huā jaatā hai 
ātish-e-shauq bujhī jaatī hai ḳhaak armān huā jaatā hai 
uzr jaane meñ na kar ai qāsid tū bhī nādān huā jaatā hai 
muztarib kyuuñ na hoñ armāñ dil meñ qaid mehmān huā jaatā hai 
'dāġh' ḳhāmosh na lag jaa.e nazar sher dīvān huā jaatā hai 
dil pareshan hua jata hai aur saman hua jata hai 
KHidmat-e-pir-e-mughan kar zahid tu ab insan hua jata hai 
maut se pahle mujhe qatl karo us ka ehsan hua jata hai 
lazzat-e-ishq ilahi miT jae dard arman hua jata hai 
dam zara lo ki mera dam tum par abhi qurban hua jata hai 
girya kya zabt karun ai naseh ashk paiman hua jata hai 
bewafai se bhi rafta rafta wo meri jaan hua jata hai 
arsa-e-hashr mein wo aa pahunche saf maidan hua jata hai 
madad ai himmat-e-dushwar-pasand kaam aasan hua jata hai 
chhai jati hai ye wahshat kaisi ghar bayaban hua jata hai 
shikwa sun aankh mila kar zalim kyun pasheman hua jata hai 
aatish-e-shauq bujhi jati hai KHak arman hua jata hai 
uzr jaane mein na kar ai qasid tu bhi nadan hua jata hai 
muztarib kyun na hon arman dil mein qaid mehman hua jata hai 
'dagh' KHamosh na lag jae nazar sher diwan hua jata hai

umr meñ us se baḌī thī lekin pahle TuuT ke bikhrī maiñ sāhil sāhil jazbe the aur dariyā dariyā pahuñchī maiñ 
shahr meñ us ke naam ke jitne shaḳhs the sab hī achchhe the sub.h-e-safar to dhund bahut thī dhūpeñ ban kar niklī maiñ 
us kī hathelī ke dāman meñ saare mausam simTe the us ke haath meñ jaagī maiñ aur us ke haath se ujlī maiñ 
ik muTThī tārīkī meñ thā ik muTThī se baḌh kar pyaar lams ke jugnū pallū bāñdhe ziina ziina utrī maiñ 
us ke āñgan meñ khultā thā shahr-e-murād kā darvāza kueñ ke paas se ḳhālī gāgar haath meñ le kar palTī maiñ 
maiñ ne jo sochā thā yuuñ to us ne bhī vahī sochā thā din niklā to vo bhī nahīñ thā aur maujūd nahīñ thī maiñ 
lamha lamha jaañ pighlegī qatra qatra shab hogī apne haath larazte dekhe apne-āp hī sambhalī maiñ 
umr mein us se baDi thi lekin pahle TuT ke bikhri main sahil sahil jazbe the aur dariya dariya pahunchi main 
shahr mein us ke nam ke jitne shaKHs the sab hi achchhe the subh-e-safar to dhund bahut thi dhupen ban kar nikli main 
us ki hatheli ke daman mein sare mausam simTe the us ke hath mein jagi main aur us ke hath se ujli main 
ek muTThi tariki mein tha ek muTThi se baDh kar pyar lams ke jugnu pallu bandhe zina zina utri main 
us ke aangan mein khulta tha shahr-e-murad ka darwaza kuen ke pas se KHali gagar hath mein le kar palTi main 
main ne jo socha tha yun to us ne bhi wahi socha tha din nikla to wo bhi nahin tha aur maujud nahin thi main 
lamha lamha jaan pighlegi qatra qatra shab hogi apne hath larazte dekhe apne-ap hi sambhali main

haath se nāptā huuñ dard kī gahrā.ī ko ye nayā khel milā hai mirī tanhā.ī ko 
thā jo siine meñ charāġh-e-dil-e-pur-ḳhūñ na rahā chāTiye baiTh ke ab sabr-o-shakebā.ī ko 
dil-e-afsurda kisī tarah bahaltā hī nahīñ kyā kareñ aap kī is hausla-afzā.ī ko 
ḳhair badnām to pahle bhī bahut the lekin tujh se milnā thā ki par lag ga.e rusvā.ī ko 
nigah-e-nāz na milte hue ghabrā ham se ham mohabbat nahīñ kahne ke shanāsā.ī ko 
dil hai nairangī-e-ayyām pe hairāñ ab tak itnī sī baat bhī mā'lūm nahīñ bhaa.ī ko 
hath se napta hun dard ki gahrai ko ye naya khel mila hai meri tanhai ko 
tha jo sine mein charagh-e-dil-e-pur-KHun na raha chaTiye baiTh ke ab sabr-o-shakebai ko 
dil-e-afsurda kisi tarah bahalta hi nahin kya karen aap ki is hausla-afzai ko 
KHair badnam to pahle bhi bahut the lekin tujh se milna tha ki par lag gae ruswai ko 
nigah-e-naz na milte hue ghabra hum se hum mohabbat nahin kahne ke shanasai ko 
dil hai nairangi-e-ayyam pe hairan ab tak itni si baat bhi ma'lum nahin bhai ko

yād-e-ġhazāl-chashmāñ zikr-e-saman-azārāñ jab chāhā kar liyā hai kunj-e-qafas bahārāñ 
āñkhoñ meñ dard-mandī hoñToñ pe uzr-ḳhvāhī jānāna vaar aa.ī shām-e-firāqyāra 
nāmūs-e-jān-o-dil kī baazī lagī thī varna āsāñ na thī kuchh aisī rāh-e-vafā-shi.ārāñ 
mujrim ho ḳhvāh koī rahtā hai nāsehoñ kā rū-e-suḳhan hamesha sū-e-jigar-figārāñ 
hai ab bhī vaqt zāhid tarmīm-e-zuhd kar le sū-e-haram chalā hai amboh-e-bāda-ḳhvārāñ 
shāyad qarīb pahuñchī sub.h-e-visāl hamdam mauj-e-sabā liye hai ḳhush-bū-e-ḳhush-kinārāñ 
hai apnī kisht-e-vīrāñ sarsabz is yaqīñ se ā.eñge is taraf bhī ik roz abr-o-bārāñ 
aa.egī 'faiz' ik din bād-e-bahār le kar taslīm-e-mai-faroshāñ paiġhām-e-mai-gusārāñ 
yaad-e-ghazal-chashman zikr-e-saman-azaran jab chaha kar liya hai kunj-e-qafas bahaaran 
aankhon mein dard-mandi honTon pe uzr-KHwahi jaanana war aai sham-e-firaqyara 
namus-e-jaan-o-dil ki bazi lagi thi warna aasan na thi kuchh aisi rah-e-wafa-shiaran 
mujrim ho KHwah koi rahta hai nasehon ka ru-e-suKHan hamesha su-e-jigar-figaran 
hai ab bhi waqt zahid tarmim-e-zuhd kar le su-e-haram chala hai amboh-e-baada-KHwaran 
shayad qarib pahunchi subh-e-visal hamdam mauj-e-saba liye hai KHush-bu-e-KHush-kinaran 
hai apni kisht-e-viran sarsabz is yaqin se aaenge is taraf bhi ek roz abr-o-baran 
aaegi 'faiz' ek din baad-e-bahaar le kar taslim-e-mai-faroshan paigham-e-mai-gusaran

sunsān rāstoñ se savārī na aa.egī ab dhuul se aTī huī laarī na aa.egī 
chhappar ke chā.e-ḳhāne bhī ab ūñghne lage paidal chalo ki koī savārī na aa.egī 
tahrīr o guftugū meñ kise DhūñDte haiñ log tasvīr meñ bhī shakl hamārī na aa.egī 
sar par zamīn le ke havāoñ ke saath jā āhista chalne vaale kī baarī na aa.egī 
pahchān apnī ham ne miTā.ī hai is tarah bachchoñ meñ koī baat hamārī na aa.egī 
sunsan raston se sawari na aaegi ab dhul se aTi hui lari na aaegi 
chhappar ke chae-KHane bhi ab unghne lage paidal chalo ki koi sawari na aaegi 
tahrir o guftugu mein kise DhunDte hain log taswir mein bhi shakl hamari na aaegi 
sar par zamin le ke hawaon ke sath ja aahista chalne wale ki bari na aaegi 
pahchan apni hum ne miTai hai is tarah bachchon mein koi baat hamari na aaegi

us aa.ine meñ dekhnā hairat bhī aa.egī ik roz mujh pe us kī tabī.at bhī aa.egī 
qadġhan lagā na ashkoñ pe yādoñ ke shahr meñ hogā agar tamāshā to ḳhilqat bhī aa.egī 
maiñ aa.ina banūñgā tū patthar uThā.egā ik din khulī saḌak pe ye naubat bhī aa.egī 
mausam agar hai sard to phir aag taap le chamkegī aañkh ḳhuuñ meñ harārat bhī aa.egī 
kuchh der aur shāḳh pe rahne de sabr kar pakne de phal ko khāne meñ lazzat bhī aa.egī 
āñkheñ haiñ tere paas to phir sat.h-e-āb par gahrā.ī se ubhar ke ibārat bhī aa.egī 
nikleñ charāġh haath meñ le kar gharoñ se log sūraj kī rah meñ manzil-e-zulmat bhī aa.egī 
ye jāntā to kāTtā 'sājid' na saa.e ko talvār par lahū kī tamāzat bhī aa.egī 
us aaine mein dekhna hairat bhi aaegi ek roz mujh pe us ki tabiat bhi aaegi 
qadghan laga na ashkon pe yaadon ke shahr mein hoga agar tamasha to KHilqat bhi aaegi 
main aaina banunga tu patthar uThaega ek din khuli saDak pe ye naubat bhi aaegi 
mausam agar hai sard to phir aag tap le chamkegi aankh KHun mein hararat bhi aaegi 
kuchh der aur shaKH pe rahne de sabr kar pakne de phal ko khane mein lazzat bhi aaegi 
aankhen hain tere pas to phir sath-e-ab par gahrai se ubhar ke ibarat bhi aaegi 
niklen charagh hath mein le kar gharon se log suraj ki rah mein manzil-e-zulmat bhi aaegi 
ye jaanta to kaTta 'sajid' na sae ko talwar par lahu ki tamazat bhi aaegi

shab-e-vasl thī chāñdnī kā samāñ thā baġhal meñ sanam thā ḳhudā mehrbāñ thā 
mubārak shab-e-qadr se bhī vo shab thī sahar tak mah o mushtarī kā qirāñ thā 
vo shab thī ki thī raushnī jis meñ din kī zamīñ par se ik nuur tā āsmāñ thā 
nikāle the do chāñd us ne muqābil vo shab sub.h-e-jannat kā jis par gumāñ thā 
urūsī kī shab kī halāvat thī hāsil farah-nāk thī ruuh dil shādmāñ thā 
mushāhid jamāl-e-parī kī thī āñkheñ makān-e-visāl ik tilismī makāñ thā 
huzūrī nigāhoñ ko dīdār se thī khulā thā vo parda ki jo darmiyāñ thā 
kiyā thā use bosa-bāzī ne paidā kamar kī tarah se jo ġhā.eb dahāñ thā 
haqīqat dikhātā thā ishq-e-majāzī nihāñ jis ko samjhe hue the ayaañ thā 
bayāñ ḳhvāb kī tarah jo kar rahā hai ye qissa hai jab kā ki 'ātish' javāñ thā 
shab-e-wasl thi chandni ka saman tha baghal mein sanam tha KHuda mehrban tha 
mubarak shab-e-qadr se bhi wo shab thi sahar tak mah o mushtari ka qiran tha 
wo shab thi ki thi raushni jis mein din ki zamin par se ek nur ta aasman tha 
nikale the do chand us ne muqabil wo shab subh-e-jannat ka jis par guman tha 
urusi ki shab ki halawat thi hasil farah-nak thi ruh dil shadman tha 
mushahid jamal-e-pari ki thi aankhen makan-e-visal ek tilismi makan tha 
huzuri nigahon ko didar se thi khula tha wo parda ki jo darmiyan tha 
kiya tha use bosa-bazi ne paida kamar ki tarah se jo ghaeb dahan tha 
haqiqat dikhata tha ishq-e-majazi nihan jis ko samjhe hue the ayan tha 
bayan KHwab ki tarah jo kar raha hai ye qissa hai jab ka ki 'atish' jawan tha

bas ek baat kī us ko ḳhabar zarūrī hai ki vo hamāre liye kis qadar zarūrī hai 
diloñ meñ dard kī daulat bachā bachā ke rakho ye vo matā.a hai jo umr bhar zarūrī hai 
nahīñ zarūr ki maqdūr ho to saath rakheñ kabhī-kabhār magar nauhagar zarūrī hai 
kabhī to khel parinde bhī haar jaate haiñ havā kahīñ kī bhī ho mustaqar zarūrī hai 
ye kyā zarūr ki mast apne aap hī meñ raheñ idhar udhar kī bhī kuchh kuchh ḳhabar zarūrī hai 
mafar nahīñ ġham-e-duniyā se 'āftāb-husain' bahut kaThin hai ye manzil magar zarūrī hai 
bas ek baat ki us ko KHabar zaruri hai ki wo hamare liye kis qadar zaruri hai 
dilon mein dard ki daulat bacha bacha ke rakho ye wo mataa hai jo umr bhar zaruri hai 
nahin zarur ki maqdur ho to sath rakhen kabhi-kabhaar magar nauhagar zaruri hai 
kabhi to khel parinde bhi haar jate hain hawa kahin ki bhi ho mustaqar zaruri hai 
ye kya zarur ki mast apne aap hi mein rahen idhar udhar ki bhi kuchh kuchh KHabar zaruri hai 
mafar nahin gham-e-duniya se 'aftab-husain' bahut kaThin hai ye manzil magar zaruri hai

itnā āsāñ nahīñ masnad pe biThāyā gayā maiñ shahr-e-tohmat tirī galiyoñ meñ phirāyā gayā maiñ 
mere hone se yahāñ aa.ī hai paanī kī bahār shāḳh-e-girya thā sar-e-dasht lagāyā gayā maiñ 
ye to ab ishq meñ jī lagne lagā hai kuchh kuchh is taraf pahle-pahal gher ke laayā gayā maiñ 
ḳhuub itnā thā ki dīvār pakaḌ kar niklā us se milne ke liye sūrat-e-sāya gayā maiñ 
tujh se kuchh kahne kī himmat hī nahīñ thī varna ek muddat tirī dahlīz tak aayā gayā maiñ 
ḳhalvat-e-ḳhās meñ bulvāne se pahle 'tābish' aam logoñ meñ bahut der biThāyā gayā maiñ 
itna aasan nahin masnad pe biThaya gaya main shahr-e-tohmat teri galiyon mein phiraya gaya main 
mere hone se yahan aai hai pani ki bahaar shaKH-e-girya tha sar-e-dasht lagaya gaya main 
ye to ab ishq mein ji lagne laga hai kuchh kuchh is taraf pahle-pahal gher ke laya gaya main 
KHub itna tha ki diwar pakaD kar nikla us se milne ke liye surat-e-saya gaya main 
tujh se kuchh kahne ki himmat hi nahin thi warna ek muddat teri dahliz tak aaya gaya main 
KHalwat-e-KHas mein bulwane se pahle 'tabish' aam logon mein bahut der biThaya gaya main

maze ishq ke kuchh vahī jānte haiñ ki jo maut ko zindagī jānte haiñ 
shab-e-vasl liiñ un kī itnī balā.eñ ki hamdam mire haath hī jānte haiñ 
na ho dil to kyā lutf-e-āzār-o-rāhat barābar ḳhushī nā-ḳhushī jānte haiñ 
jo hai mere dil meñ unhīñ ko ḳhabar hai jo maiñ jāntā huuñ vahī jānte haiñ 
paḌā huuñ sar-e-bazm maiñ dam churā.e magar vo ise be-ḳhudī jānte haiñ 
kahāñ qadr-e-ham-jins ham-jins ko hai farishtoñ ko bhī aadmī jānte haiñ 
kahūñ hāl-e-dil to kaheñ us se hāsil sabhī ko ḳhabar hai sabhī jānte haiñ 
vo nādān anjān bhole haiñ aise ki sab sheva-e-dushmanī jānte haiñ 
nahīñ jānte is kā anjām kyā hai vo marnā merā dil-lagī jānte haiñ 
samajhtā hai tū 'dāġh' ko rind zāhid magar rind us ko valī jānte haiñ 
maze ishq ke kuchh wahi jaante hain ki jo maut ko zindagi jaante hain 
shab-e-wasl lin un ki itni balaen ki hamdam mere hath hi jaante hain 
na ho dil to kya lutf-e-azar-o-rahat barabar KHushi na-KHushi jaante hain 
jo hai mere dil mein unhin ko KHabar hai jo main jaanta hun wahi jaante hain 
paDa hun sar-e-bazm main dam churae magar wo ise be-KHudi jaante hain 
kahan qadr-e-ham-jins ham-jins ko hai farishton ko bhi aadmi jaante hain 
kahun haal-e-dil to kahen us se hasil sabhi ko KHabar hai sabhi jaante hain 
wo nadan anjaan bhole hain aise ki sab shewa-e-dushmani jaante hain 
nahin jaante is ka anjam kya hai wo marna mera dil-lagi jaante hain 
samajhta hai tu 'dagh' ko rind zahid magar rind us ko wali jaante hain

koī mahram nahīñ miltā jahāñ meñ mujhe kahnā hai kuchh apnī zabāñ meñ 
qafas meñ jī nahīñ lagtā kisī tarah lagā do aag koī āshiyāñ meñ 
koī din bul-havas bhī shaad ho leñ dharā kyā hai ishārāt-e-nihāñ meñ 
kahīñ anjām aa pahuñchā vafā kā ghulā jaatā huuñ ab ke imtihāñ meñ 
nayā hai lījiye jab naam us kā bahut vus'at hai merī dāstāñ meñ 
dil-e-pur-dard se kuchh kaam lūñgā agar fursat milī mujh ko jahāñ meñ 
bahut jī ḳhush huā 'hālī' se mil kar abhī kuchh log baaqī haiñ jahāñ meñ 
koi mahram nahin milta jahan mein mujhe kahna hai kuchh apni zaban mein 
qafas mein ji nahin lagta kisi tarah laga do aag koi aashiyan mein 
koi din bul-hawas bhi shad ho len dhara kya hai ishaaraat-e-nihan mein 
kahin anjam aa pahuncha wafa ka ghula jata hun ab ke imtihan mein 
naya hai lijiye jab nam us ka bahut wus'at hai meri dastan mein 
dil-e-pur-dard se kuchh kaam lunga agar fursat mili mujh ko jahan mein 
bahut ji KHush hua 'haali' se mil kar abhi kuchh log baqi hain jahan mein

kyā pūchhte ho mujh se ki maiñ kis nagar kā thā jaltā huā charāġh mirī rah-guzar kā thā 
ham jab safar pe nikle the tāroñ kī chhāñv thī phir apne ham-rikāb ujālā sahar kā thā 
sāhil kī giilī ret ne baḳhshā thā pairahan jaise samundaroñ kā safar chashm-e-tar kā thā 
chehre pe uḌtī gard thī bāloñ meñ raakh thī shāyad vo ham-safar mire ujḌe nagar kā thā 
kyā chīḳhtī havāoñ se ahvāl pūchhtā saaya hī yādgār mire ham-safar kā thā 
yaksāniyat thī kitnī hamāre vajūd meñ apnā jo haal thā vahī aalam bhañvar kā thā 
vo kaun thā jo le ke mujhe ghar se chal paḌā sūrat ḳhizar kī thī na vo chehra ḳhizar kā thā 
dahlīz paar kar na sake aur lauT aa.e shāyad musāfiroñ ko ḳhatar bām-o-dar kā thā 
kachche makān jitne the bārish meñ bah ga.e varna jo merā dukh thā vo dukh umr bhar kā thā 
maiñ us galī se kaise guzartā jhukā ke sar āḳhir ko ye muāmla bhī sañg-o-sar kā thā 
logoñ ne ḳhud hī kaaT diye rāstoñ ke peḌ 'aḳhtar' badaltī rut meñ ye hāsil nazar kā thā 
kya puchhte ho mujh se ki main kis nagar ka tha jalta hua charagh meri rah-guzar ka tha 
hum jab safar pe nikle the taron ki chhanw thi phir apne ham-rikab ujala sahar ka tha 
sahil ki gili ret ne baKHsha tha pairahan jaise samundaron ka safar chashm-e-tar ka tha 
chehre pe uDti gard thi baalon mein rakh thi shayad wo ham-safar mere ujDe nagar ka tha 
kya chiKHti hawaon se ahwal puchhta saya hi yaadgar mere ham-safar ka tha 
yaksaniyat thi kitni hamare wajud mein apna jo haal tha wahi aalam bhanwar ka tha 
wo kaun tha jo le ke mujhe ghar se chal paDa surat KHizar ki thi na wo chehra KHizar ka tha 
dahliz par kar na sake aur lauT aae shayad musafiron ko KHatar baam-o-dar ka tha 
kachche makan jitne the barish mein bah gae warna jo mera dukh tha wo dukh umr bhar ka tha 
main us gali se kaise guzarta jhuka ke sar aaKHir ko ye muamla bhi sang-o-sar ka tha 
logon ne KHud hi kaT diye raston ke peD 'aKHtar' badalti rut mein ye hasil nazar ka tha

yahāñ to qāfile bhar ko akelā chhoḌ dete haiñ sabhī chalte hoñ jis par ham vo rasta chhoḌ dete haiñ 
qalam meñ zor jitnā hai judā.ī kī badaulat hai milan ke ba.ad likhne vaale likhnā chhoḌ dete haiñ 
kabhī sairāb kar jaatā hai ham ko abr kā manzar kabhī sāvan baras kar bhī piyāsā chhoḌ dete haiñ 
zamīñ ke mas.aloñ kā hal agar yuuñ hī nikaltā hai to lo jī aaj se ham tum se milnā chhoḌ dete haiñ 
mohazzab dost āḳhir ham se barham kyuuñ nahīñ hoñge sag-e-iz.hār ko ham bhī to khullā chhoḌ dete haiñ 
jo zinda ho use to maar dete haiñ jahāñ vaale jo marnā chāhtā ho us ko zinda chhoḌ dete haiñ 
mukammal ḳhud to ho jaate haiñ sab kirdār āḳhir meñ magar kam-baḳht qaarī ko adhūrā chhoḌ dete haiñ 
vo nañg-e-ādmi.yat hī sahī par ye batā ai dil purāne dostoñ ko is tarah kyā chhoḌ dete haiñ 
ye duniyā-dārī aur irfān kā daavā 'shujā-ḳhāvar' miyāñ irfān ho jaa.e to duniyā chhoḌ dete haiñ 
yahan to qafile bhar ko akela chhoD dete hain sabhi chalte hon jis par hum wo rasta chhoD dete hain 
qalam mein zor jitna hai judai ki badaulat hai milan ke baad likhne wale likhna chhoD dete hain 
kabhi sairab kar jata hai hum ko abr ka manzar kabhi sawan baras kar bhi piyasa chhoD dete hain 
zamin ke masalon ka hal agar yun hi nikalta hai to lo ji aaj se hum tum se milna chhoD dete hain 
mohazzab dost aaKHir hum se barham kyun nahin honge sag-e-izhaar ko hum bhi to khulla chhoD dete hain 
jo zinda ho use to mar dete hain jahan wale jo marna chahta ho us ko zinda chhoD dete hain 
mukammal KHud to ho jate hain sab kirdar aaKHir mein magar kam-baKHt qari ko adhura chhoD dete hain 
wo nang-e-admiyat hi sahi par ye bata ai dil purane doston ko is tarah kya chhoD dete hain
