ye duniya-dari aur irfan ka dawa 'shuja-KHawar' miyan irfan ho jae to duniya chhoD dete hain

paa.e hue is vaqt ko khonā hī bahut hai niiñd aa.e to is haal meñ sonā hī bahut hai 
itnī bhī farāġhat hai yahāñ kis ko mayassar ye ek taraf baiTh ke ronā hī bahut hai 
tujh se koī filhāl talab hai na tamannā is shahr meñ jaise tirā honā hī bahut hai 
ham oḌh bhī lete haiñ ise vaqt-e-zarūrat ham ko ye mohabbat kā bichhaunā hī bahut hai 
ugtā hai ki miTTī hī meñ ho jaatā hai miTTī is biij kā is ḳhaak meñ bonā hī bahut hai 
ḳhush-hāl bhī ho saktā huuñ maiñ chashm-e-zadan meñ mere liye us jism kā sonā hī bahut hai 
apne liye in chāñd sitāroñ ko sar-e-shām is shāḳh-e-tamāshā meñ pironā hī bahut hai 
pahle hī bahut ḳhaak uḌaa.ī hai yahāñ par mere liye is dasht kā konā hī bahut hai 
dariyā kī ravānī ko 'zafar' chhoḌiye filhāl thoḌā sā ye hoñToñ ko bhigonā hī bahut hai 
pae hue is waqt ko khona hi bahut hai nind aae to is haal mein sona hi bahut hai 
itni bhi faraghat hai yahan kis ko mayassar ye ek taraf baiTh ke rona hi bahut hai 
tujh se koi filhaal talab hai na tamanna is shahr mein jaise tera hona hi bahut hai 
hum oDh bhi lete hain ise waqt-e-zarurat hum ko ye mohabbat ka bichhauna hi bahut hai 
ugta hai ki miTTi hi mein ho jata hai miTTi is bij ka is KHak mein bona hi bahut hai 
KHush-haal bhi ho sakta hun main chashm-e-zadan mein mere liye us jism ka sona hi bahut hai 
apne liye in chand sitaron ko sar-e-sham is shaKH-e-tamasha mein pirona hi bahut hai 
pahle hi bahut KHak uDai hai yahan par mere liye is dasht ka kona hi bahut hai 
dariya ki rawani ko 'zafar' chhoDiye filhaal thoDa sa ye honTon ko bhigona hi bahut hai

baiTh jaatā huuñ jahāñ chhāñv ghanī hotī hai haa.e kyā chiiz ġharīb-ul-vatanī hotī hai 
nahīñ marte haiñ to iizā nahīñ jhelī jaatī aur marte haiñ to paimāñ-shikanī hotī hai 
din ko ik nuur barastā hai mirī turbat par raat ko chādar-e-mahtāb tanī hotī hai 
tum bichhaḌte ho jo ab karb na ho vo kam hai dam nikaltā hai to a.azā-shikanī hotī hai 
zinda dar-gor ham aise jo haiñ marne vaale jīte-jī un ke gale meñ kafanī hotī hai 
rut badalte hī badal jaatī hai niyyat merī jab bahār aatī hai tauba-shikanī hotī hai 
ġhair ke bas meñ tumheñ sun ke ye kah uThtā huuñ aisī taqdīr bhī allāh ġhanī hotī hai 
na baḌhe baat agar khul ke kareñ vo bāteñ bā.is-e-tūl-e-suḳhan kam-suḳhanī hotī hai 
luT gayā vo tire kūche meñ dharā jis ne qadam is tarah kī bhī kahīñ rāhzanī hotī hai 
husn vāloñ ko zid aa jaa.e ḳhudā ye na kare kar guzarte haiñ jo kuchh jī meñ Thanī hotī hai 
hijr meñ zahr hai sāġhar kā lagānā muñh se mai kī jo buuñd hai hiire kī kanī hotī hai 
mai-kashoñ ko na kabhī fikr-e-kam-o-besh rahī aise logoñ kī tabī'at bhī ġhanī hotī hai 
huuk uThtī hai agar zabt-e-fuġhāñ kartā huuñ saañs ruktī hai to barchhī kī anī hotī hai 
aks kī un pe nazar aa.ine pe un kī nigāh do kamāñ-dāroñ meñ nāvak-faganī hotī hai 
pī lo do ghūñT ki saaqī kī rahe baat 'hafīz' saaf inkār se ḳhātir-shikanī hotī hai 
baiTh jata hun jahan chhanw ghani hoti hai hae kya chiz gharib-ul-watani hoti hai 
nahin marte hain to iza nahin jheli jati aur marte hain to paiman-shikani hoti hai 
din ko ek nur barasta hai meri turbat par raat ko chadar-e-mahtab tani hoti hai 
tum bichhaDte ho jo ab karb na ho wo kam hai dam nikalta hai to aaza-shikani hoti hai 
zinda dar-gor hum aise jo hain marne wale jite-ji un ke gale mein kafani hoti hai 
rut badalte hi badal jati hai niyyat meri jab bahaar aati hai tauba-shikani hoti hai 
ghair ke bas mein tumhein sun ke ye kah uThta hun aisi taqdir bhi allah ghani hoti hai 
na baDhe baat agar khul ke karen wo baaten bais-e-tul-e-suKHan kam-suKHani hoti hai 
luT gaya wo tere kuche mein dhara jis ne qadam is tarah ki bhi kahin rahzani hoti hai 
husn walon ko zid aa jae KHuda ye na kare kar guzarte hain jo kuchh ji mein Thani hoti hai 
hijr mein zahr hai saghar ka lagana munh se mai ki jo bund hai hire ki kani hoti hai 
mai-kashon ko na kabhi fikr-e-kam-o-besh rahi aise logon ki tabi'at bhi ghani hoti hai 
huk uThti hai agar zabt-e-fughan karta hun sans rukti hai to barchhi ki ani hoti hai 
aks ki un pe nazar aaine pe un ki nigah do kaman-daron mein nawak-fagani hoti hai 
pi lo do ghunT ki saqi ki rahe baat 'hafiz' saf inkar se KHatir-shikani hoti hai

sū-e-falak na jānib-e-mahtāb dekhnā is shahr-e-dil-navāz ke ādāb dekhnā 
tujh ko kahāñ chhupā.eñ ki dil par giraft ho āñkhoñ ko kyā kareñ ki vahī ḳhvāb dekhnā 
vo mauj-e-ḳhūñ uThī hai ki dīvār-o-dar kahāñ ab ke fasīl-e-shahr ko ġharqāb dekhnā 
in sūratoñ ko tarsegī chashm-e-jahāñ ki aaj kamyāb haiñ to kal hameñ nāyāb dekhnā 
phir ḳhūn-e-ḳhalq o gardan-e-mīnā bachā.iyo par chal paḌā hai zikr-e-mai-e-nāb dekhnā 
ābād kū-e-chāk-e-garebāñ jo phir huā dast-e-raqīb o dāman-e-ahbāb dekhnā 
ham le to aa.e haiñ tujhe ik be-dilī ke saath is anjuman meñ ai dil-e-betāb dekhnā 
had chāhiye 'farāz' vafā meñ bhī aur tumheñ ġham dekhnā na dil kī tab-o-tāb dekhnā 
su-e-falak na jaanib-e-mahtab dekhna is shahr-e-dil-nawaz ke aadab dekhna 
tujh ko kahan chhupaen ki dil par giraft ho aankhon ko kya karen ki wahi KHwab dekhna 
wo mauj-e-KHun uThi hai ki diwar-o-dar kahan ab ke fasil-e-shahr ko gharqab dekhna 
in suraton ko tarsegi chashm-e-jahan ki aaj kamyab hain to kal hamein nayab dekhna 
phir KHun-e-KHalq o gardan-e-mina bachaiyo par chal paDa hai zikr-e-mai-e-nab dekhna 
aabaad ku-e-chaak-e-gareban jo phir hua dast-e-raqib o daman-e-ahbab dekhna 
hum le to aae hain tujhe ek be-dili ke sath is anjuman mein ai dil-e-betab dekhna 
had chahiye 'faraaz' wafa mein bhi aur tumhein gham dekhna na dil ki tab-o-tab dekhna

dhuum thī apnī pārsā.ī kī kī bhī aur kis se āshnā.ī kī 
kyuuñ baḌhāte ho iḳhtilāt bahut ham ko tāqat nahīñ judā.ī kī 
muñh kahāñ tak chhupāoge ham se tum ko aadat hai ḳhud-numā.ī kī 
laag meñ haiñ lagāo kī bāteñ sulh meñ chheḌ hai laḌā.ī kī 
milte ġhairoñ se ho milo lekin ham se bāteñ karo safā.ī kī 
dil rahā pā-e-band-e-ulfat-e-dām thī abas aarzū rihā.ī kī 
dil bhī pahlū meñ ho to yaañ kis se rakhiye ummīd dilrubā.ī kī 
shahr o dariyā se baaġh o sahrā se bū nahīñ aatī āshnā.ī kī 
na milā koī ġhārat-e-īmāñ rah ga.ī sharm pārsā.ī kī 
baḳht-e-ham-dāstāni-e-shaidā tū ne āḳhir ko nā-rasā.ī kī 
sohbat-e-gāh-gāhi-e-rashkī tū ne bhī ham se bevafā.ī kī 
maut kī tarah jis se Darte the saa.at aa pahuñchī us judā.ī kī 
zinda phirne kī hai havas 'hālī' intihā hai ye be-hayā.ī kī 
dhum thi apni parsai ki ki bhi aur kis se aashnai ki 
kyun baDhate ho iKHtilat bahut hum ko taqat nahin judai ki 
munh kahan tak chhupaoge hum se tum ko aadat hai KHud-numai ki 
lag mein hain lagao ki baaten sulh mein chheD hai laDai ki 
milte ghairon se ho milo lekin hum se baaten karo safai ki 
dil raha pa-e-band-e-ulfat-e-dam thi abas aarzu rihai ki 
dil bhi pahlu mein ho to yan kis se rakhiye ummid dilrubai ki 
shahr o dariya se bagh o sahra se bu nahin aati aashnai ki 
na mila koi ghaarat-e-iman rah gai sharm parsai ki 
baKHt-e-ham-dastani-e-shaida tu ne aaKHir ko na-rasai ki 
sohbat-e-gah-gahi-e-rashki tu ne bhi hum se bewafai ki 
maut ki tarah jis se Darte the saat aa pahunchi us judai ki 
zinda phirne ki hai hawas 'haali' intiha hai ye be-hayai ki

suḳhan-e-haq ko fazīlat nahīñ milne vaalī sabr par dād-e-shujā.at nahīñ milne vaalī 
vaqt-e-mālūm kī dahshat se laraztā huā dil Duubā jaatā hai ki mohlat nahīñ milne vaalī 
zindagī nazr guzārī to milī chādar-e-ḳhāk is se kam par to ye ne.amat nahīñ milne vaalī 
raas aane lagī duniyā to kahā dil ne ki jā ab tujhe dard kī daulat nahīñ milne vaalī 
havas-e-luqma-e-tar khā ga.ī lahje kā jalāl ab kisī harf ko hurmat nahīñ milne vaalī 
ghar se nikle hue beToñ kā muqaddar ma.alūm maañ ke qadmoñ meñ bhī jannat nahīñ milne vaalī 
zindagī bhar kī kamā.ī yahī misre do-chār is kamā.ī pe to izzat nahīñ milne vaalī 
suKHan-e-haq ko fazilat nahin milne wali sabr par dad-e-shujaat nahin milne wali 
waqt-e-malum ki dahshat se larazta hua dil Duba jata hai ki mohlat nahin milne wali 
zindagi nazr guzari to mili chadar-e-KHak is se kam par to ye neamat nahin milne wali 
ras aane lagi duniya to kaha dil ne ki ja ab tujhe dard ki daulat nahin milne wali 
hawas-e-luqma-e-tar kha gai lahje ka jalal ab kisi harf ko hurmat nahin milne wali 
ghar se nikle hue beTon ka muqaddar malum man ke qadmon mein bhi jannat nahin milne wali 
zindagi bhar ki kamai yahi misre do-chaar is kamai pe to izzat nahin milne wali

hañs rahā thā maiñ bahut go vaqt vo rone kā thā saḳht kitnā marhala tujh se judā hone kā thā 
rat-jage taqsīm kartī phir rahī haiñ shahr meñ shauq jin āñkhoñ ko kal tak raat meñ sone kā thā 
is safar meñ bas mirī tanhā.ī mere saath thī har qadam kyuuñ ḳhauf mujh ko bhiiḌ meñ khone kā thā 
har bun-e-mū se darindoñ kī sadā aane lagī kaam hī aisā badan meñ ḳhvāhisheñ bone kā thā 
maiñ ne jab se ye sunā hai ḳhud se bhī nādim huuñ maiñ zikr tujh hoñToñ pe mere dar-ba-dar hone kā thā 
hans raha tha main bahut go waqt wo rone ka tha saKHt kitna marhala tujh se juda hone ka tha 
rat-jage taqsim karti phir rahi hain shahr mein shauq jin aankhon ko kal tak raat mein sone ka tha 
is safar mein bas meri tanhai mere sath thi har qadam kyun KHauf mujh ko bhiD mein khone ka tha 
har bun-e-mu se darindon ki sada aane lagi kaam hi aisa badan mein KHwahishen bone ka tha 
main ne jab se ye suna hai KHud se bhi nadim hun main zikr tujh honTon pe mere dar-ba-dar hone ka tha

achchhā hai vo bīmār jo achchhā nahīñ hotā jab tajribe hote haiñ to dhokā nahīñ hotā 
jis lafz ko maiñ toḌ ke ḳhud TuuT gayā huuñ kahtā bhī to vo us ko gavārā nahīñ hotā 
terī hī tarah aatā hai āñkhoñ meñ tirā ḳhvāb sachchā nahīñ hotā kabhī jhūTā nahīñ hotā 
takzīb-e-junūñ ke liye ik shak hī bahut hai bārish kā samay ho to sitārā nahīñ hotā 
kyā kyā dar-o-dīvār mirī ḳhaak meñ gum haiñ par us ko mirā jism gavārā nahīñ hotā 
yā dil nahīñ hotā mire hone ke sabab se yā dil ke sabab se mirā honā nahīñ hotā 
kis ruḳh se tayaqqun ko tabī.at meñ jagah deñ aisā nahīñ hotā kabhī vaisā nahīñ hotā 
ham log jo karte haiñ vo hotā hī nahīñ hai honā jo nazar aatā hai honā nahīñ hotā 
jis din ke guzarte hī yahāñ raat huī hai ai kaash vo din maiñ ne guzārā nahīñ hotā 
jab ham nahīñ hote yahāñ aate haiñ taġhayyur jab ham yahāñ hote haiñ zamānā nahīñ hotā 
ham un meñ haiñ jin kī koī hastī nahīñ hotī ham TuuT bhī jaa.eñ to tamāshā nahīñ hotā 
achchha hai wo bimar jo achchha nahin hota jab tajribe hote hain to dhoka nahin hota 
jis lafz ko main toD ke KHud TuT gaya hun kahta bhi to wo us ko gawara nahin hota 
teri hi tarah aata hai aankhon mein tera KHwab sachcha nahin hota kabhi jhuTa nahin hota 
takzib-e-junun ke liye ek shak hi bahut hai barish ka samay ho to sitara nahin hota 
kya kya dar-o-diwar meri KHak mein gum hain par us ko mera jism gawara nahin hota 
ya dil nahin hota mere hone ke sabab se ya dil ke sabab se mera hona nahin hota 
kis ruKH se tayaqqun ko tabiat mein jagah den aisa nahin hota kabhi waisa nahin hota 
hum log jo karte hain wo hota hi nahin hai hona jo nazar aata hai hona nahin hota 
jis din ke guzarte hi yahan raat hui hai ai kash wo din main ne guzara nahin hota 
jab hum nahin hote yahan aate hain taghayyur jab hum yahan hote hain zamana nahin hota 
hum un mein hain jin ki koi hasti nahin hoti hum TuT bhi jaen to tamasha nahin hota

dekh hamārī diid ke kāran kaisā qābil-e-dīd huā ek sitāra baiThe baiThe tābish meñ ḳhurshīd huā 
aaj to jaanī rasta takte shaam kā chāñd padīd huā tū ne to inkār kiyā thā dil kab nā-ummīd huā 
aan ke is bīmār ko dekhe tujh ko bhī taufīq huī lab par us ke naam thā terā jab bhī dard shadīd huā 
haañ us ne jhalkī dikhlā.ī ek hī pal ko darīche meñ jaano ik bijlī lahrā.ī aalam ek shahīd huā 
tū ne ham se kalām bhī chhoḌā arz-e-vafā ke sunte hī pahle kaun qarīb thā ham se ab to aur ba.iid huā 
duniyā ke sab kāraj chhoḌe naam pe tere 'inshā' ne aur use kyā thoḌe ġham the terā ishq mazīd huā 
dekh hamari did ke karan kaisa qabil-e-did hua ek sitara baiThe baiThe tabish mein KHurshid hua 
aaj to jaani rasta takte sham ka chand padid hua tu ne to inkar kiya tha dil kab na-ummid hua 
aan ke is bimar ko dekhe tujh ko bhi taufiq hui lab par us ke nam tha tera jab bhi dard shadid hua 
han us ne jhalki dikhlai ek hi pal ko dariche mein jaano ek bijli lahrai aalam ek shahid hua 
tu ne hum se kalam bhi chhoDa arz-e-wafa ke sunte hi pahle kaun qarib tha hum se ab to aur baid hua 
duniya ke sab karaj chhoDe nam pe tere 'insha' ne aur use kya thoDe gham the tera ishq mazid hua

kabhī saaya hai kabhī dhuup muqaddar merā hotā rahtā hai yuuñ hī qarz barābar merā 
TuuT jaate haiñ kabhī mere kināre mujh meñ Duub jaatā hai kabhī mujh meñ samundar merā 
kisī sahrā meñ bichhaḌ jā.eñge sab yaar mire kisī jañgal meñ bhaTak jaa.e. gā lashkar merā 
bā-vafā thā to mujhe pūchhne vaale bhī na the be-vafā huuñ to huā naam bhī ghar ghar merā 
kitne hañste hue mausam abhī aate lekin ek hī dhuup ne kumhlā diyā manzar merā 
āḳhirī jur.a-e-pur-kaif ho shāyad baaqī ab jo chhalkā to chhalak jaa.e gā sāġhar merā 
kabhi saya hai kabhi dhup muqaddar mera hota rahta hai yun hi qarz barabar mera 
TuT jate hain kabhi mere kinare mujh mein Dub jata hai kabhi mujh mein samundar mera 
kisi sahra mein bichhaD jaenge sab yar mere kisi jangal mein bhaTak jae ga lashkar mera 
ba-wafa tha to mujhe puchhne wale bhi na the be-wafa hun to hua nam bhi ghar ghar mera 
kitne hanste hue mausam abhi aate lekin ek hi dhup ne kumhla diya manzar mera 
aaKHiri jura-e-pur-kaif ho shayad baqi ab jo chhalka to chhalak jae ga saghar mera

āñgan meñ chhoḌ aa.e the jo ġhaar dekh leñ kis haal meñ hai in dinoñ ghar-bār dekh leñ 
jab aa ga.e haiñ shahr-e-tilismāt ke qarīb kyā chāhtī hai nargis-e-bīmār dekh leñ 
hañsnā-hañsānā chhūTe hue muddateñ huiiñ bas thoḌī duur rah ga.ī dīvār dekh leñ 
arse se is dayār kī koī ḳhabar nahīñ mohlat mile to aaj kā aḳhbār dekh leñ 
mushkil hai terā saath nibhānā tamām umr biknā hai nā-guzīr to bāzār dekh leñ 
āshuftagī hamārī yahāñ laa.ī baar baar hai kyā zarūr tujh ko bhī har baar dekh leñ 
aangan mein chhoD aae the jo ghaar dekh len kis haal mein hai in dinon ghar-bar dekh len 
jab aa gae hain shahr-e-tilismat ke qarib kya chahti hai nargis-e-bimar dekh len 
hansna-hansana chhuTe hue muddaten huin bas thoDi dur rah gai diwar dekh len 
arse se is dayar ki koi KHabar nahin mohlat mile to aaj ka aKHbar dekh len 
mushkil hai tera sath nibhana tamam umr bikna hai na-guzir to bazar dekh len 
aashuftagi hamari yahan lai bar bar hai kya zarur tujh ko bhi har bar dekh len

vahshat ke saath dasht mirī jaan chāhiye is aish ke liye sar-o-sāmān chāhiye 
kuchh ishq ke nisāb meñ kamzor ham bhī haiñ kuchh parcha-e-savāl bhī āsān chāhiye 
tujh ko supurdagī meñ simaTnā bhī hai zarūr sachchā hai kārobār to nuqsān chāhiye 
ab tak kis intizār meñ baiThe hue haiñ log ummīd ke liye koī imkān chāhiye 
hogā yahāñ na dast-o-garebāñ kā faisla is ke liye to hashr kā maidān chāhiye 
āḳhir hai e'tibār-e-tamāshā bhī koī chiiz insān thoḌī der ko hairān chāhiye 
jaarī haiñ pā-e-shauq kī īzā-rasānīyāñ ab kuchh nahīñ to sair-e-bayābān chāhiye 
sab shā.irāñ ḳharīda-e-darbār ho ga.e ye vāqi.a to dāḳhil-e-dīvān chāhiye 
mulk-e-suḳhan meñ yuuñ nahīñ aane kā inqalāb do-chār baar nuun kā elaan chāhiye 
apnā bhī muddatoñ se hai ruq.a lagā huā bilqīs-e-shā.irī ko sulaimān chāhiye 
wahshat ke sath dasht meri jaan chahiye is aish ke liye sar-o-saman chahiye 
kuchh ishq ke nisab mein kamzor hum bhi hain kuchh parcha-e-sawal bhi aasan chahiye 
tujh ko supurdagi mein simaTna bhi hai zarur sachcha hai karobar to nuqsan chahiye 
ab tak kis intizar mein baiThe hue hain log ummid ke liye koi imkan chahiye 
hoga yahan na dast-o-gareban ka faisla is ke liye to hashr ka maidan chahiye 
aaKHir hai e'tibar-e-tamasha bhi koi chiz insan thoDi der ko hairan chahiye 
jari hain pa-e-shauq ki iza-rasaniyan ab kuchh nahin to sair-e-bayaban chahiye 
sab shairan KHarida-e-darbar ho gae ye waqia to daKHil-e-diwan chahiye 
mulk-e-suKHan mein yun nahin aane ka inqalab do-chaar bar nun ka elan chahiye 
apna bhi muddaton se hai ruqa laga hua bilqis-e-shairi ko sulaiman chahiye

har koī turra-e-pechāk pahan kar niklā ek maiñ pairahan-e-ḳhāk pahan kar niklā 
aur phir sab ne ye dekhā ki isī maqtal se merā qātil mirī poshāk pahan kar niklā 
ek banda thā ki oḌhe thā ḳhudā.ī saarī ik sitāra thā ki aflāk pahan kar niklā 
aisī nafrat thī ki is shahr ko jab aag lagī har bagūla ḳhas-o-ḳhāshāk pahan kar niklā 
tarkash o daam abas le ke chalā hai sayyād jo bhī naḳhchīr hai fitrāk pahan kar niklā 
us ke qāmat se use jaan ga.e log 'farāz' jo labāda bhī vo chālāk pahan kar niklā 
har koi turra-e-pechaak pahan kar nikla ek main pairahan-e-KHak pahan kar nikla 
aur phir sab ne ye dekha ki isi maqtal se mera qatil meri poshak pahan kar nikla 
ek banda tha ki oDhe tha KHudai sari ek sitara tha ki aflak pahan kar nikla 
aisi nafrat thi ki is shahr ko jab aag lagi har bagula KHas-o-KHashak pahan kar nikla 
tarkash o dam abas le ke chala hai sayyaad jo bhi naKHchir hai fitrak pahan kar nikla 
us ke qamat se use jaan gae log 'faraaz' jo labaada bhi wo chaalak pahan kar nikla

dil meñ vo shor na āñkhoñ meñ vo nam rahtā hai ab tap-e-hijr tavaqqo se bhī kam rahtā hai 
kabhī sho.ale se lapakte the mire siine meñ ab kisī vaqt dhuāñ sā koī dam rahtā hai 
kyā ḳhudā jaane mire dil ko huā tere ba.ad na ḳhushī is meñ Thahartī hai na ġham rahtā hai 
rishta-e-tār-e-tamannā nahīñ TuuTā ab tak ab bhī āñkhoñ meñ tirī zulf kā ḳham rahtā hai 
chhoḌ jaatī hai har ik rut koī ḳhushbū koī rañg na sitam rahtā hai baaqī na karam rahtā hai 
dil mein wo shor na aankhon mein wo nam rahta hai ab tap-e-hijr tawaqqo se bhi kam rahta hai 
kabhi shoale se lapakte the mere sine mein ab kisi waqt dhuan sa koi dam rahta hai 
kya KHuda jaane mere dil ko hua tere baad na KHushi is mein Thaharti hai na gham rahta hai 
rishta-e-tar-e-tamanna nahin TuTa ab tak ab bhi aankhon mein teri zulf ka KHam rahta hai 
chhoD jati hai har ek rut koi KHushbu koi rang na sitam rahta hai baqi na karam rahta hai

guloñ sī guftugū kareñ qayāmatoñ ke darmiyāñ ham aise log ab mileñ hikāyatoñ ke darmiyāñ 
lahūluhān uñgliyāñ haiñ aur chup khaḌī huuñ maiñ gul o saman kī be-panāh chāhatoñ ke darmiyāñ 
hatheliyoñ kī oT hī charāġh le chalūñ abhī abhī sahar kā zikr hai rivāyatoñ ke darmiyāñ 
jo dil meñ thī nigāh sī nigāh meñ kiran sī thī vo dāstāñ ulajh ga.ī vazāhatoñ ke darmiyāñ 
sahīfa-e-hayāt meñ jahāñ jahāñ likhī ga.ī likhī ga.ī hadīs-e-jāñ jarāhatoñ ke darmiyāñ 
koī nagar koī galī shajar kī chhāñv hī sahī ye zindagī na kaT sake masāfatoñ ke darmiyāñ 
ab us ke ḳhāl-o-ḳhad kā rañg mujh se pūchhnā abas nigah jhapak jhapak ga.ī irādatoñ ke darmiyāñ 
sabā kā haath thaam kar 'adā' na chal sakogī tum tamām umr ḳhvāb ḳhvāb sā.atoñ ke darmiyāñ 
gulon si guftugu karen qayamaton ke darmiyan hum aise log ab milen hikayaton ke darmiyan 
lahuluhan ungliyan hain aur chup khaDi hun main gul o saman ki be-panah chahaton ke darmiyan 
hatheliyon ki oT hi charagh le chalun abhi abhi sahar ka zikr hai riwayaton ke darmiyan 
jo dil mein thi nigah si nigah mein kiran si thi wo dastan ulajh gai wazahaton ke darmiyan 
sahifa-e-hayat mein jahan jahan likhi gai likhi gai hadis-e-jaan jarahaton ke darmiyan 
koi nagar koi gali shajar ki chhanw hi sahi ye zindagi na kaT sake masafaton ke darmiyan 
ab us ke KHal-o-KHad ka rang mujh se puchhna abas nigah jhapak jhapak gai iradaton ke darmiyan 
saba ka hath tham kar 'ada' na chal sakogi tum tamam umr KHwab KHwab saaton ke darmiyan

ugā sabza dar-o-dīvār par āhista āhista huā ḳhālī sadāoñ se nagar āhista āhista 
ghirā bādal ḳhamoshī se ḳhizāñ-āsār bāġhoñ par hile ThanDī havāoñ meñ shajar āhista āhista 
bahut hī sust thā manzar lahū ke rang laane kā nishāñ āḳhir huā ye surḳh-tar āhista āhista 
chamak zar kī use āḳhir makān-e-ḳhāk meñ laa.ī banāyā saañp ne jismoñ meñ ghar āhista āhista 
mire bāhar fasīleñ thiiñ ġhubār-e-ḳhāk-o-bārāñ kī milī mujh ko tire ġham kī ḳhabar āhista āhista 
'munīr' is mulk par aaseb kā saaya hai yā kyā hai ki harkat tez-tar hai aur safar āhista āhista 
uga sabza dar-o-diwar par aahista aahista hua KHali sadaon se nagar aahista aahista 
ghira baadal KHamoshi se KHizan-asar baghon par hile ThanDi hawaon mein shajar aahista aahista 
bahut hi sust tha manzar lahu ke rang lane ka nishan aaKHir hua ye surKH-tar aahista aahista 
chamak zar ki use aaKHir makan-e-KHak mein lai banaya sanp ne jismon mein ghar aahista aahista 
mere bahar fasilen thin ghubar-e-KHak-o-baran ki mili mujh ko tere gham ki KHabar aahista aahista 
'munir' is mulk par aaseb ka saya hai ya kya hai ki harkat tez-tar hai aur safar aahista aahista

chāroñ taraf se maut ne gherā hai ziist ko aur us ke saath hukm ki ab zindagī karo 
bāhar galī meñ shor hai barsāt kā suno kunDī lagā ke aaj to ghar meñ paḌe raho 
chhoḌ aa.e kis kī chhat pe javāñ-sāl chāñd ko ḳhāmosh kis liye ho sitāro javāb do 
kyuuñ chalte chalte ruk ga.e vīrān rāsto tanhā huuñ aaj maiñ zarā ghar tak to saath do 
jis ne bhī muḌ ke dekhā vo patthar kā ho gayā nazreñ jhukā.e dosto chup chup chale chalo 
allāh rakkhe terī sahar jaisī kam-sinī dil kāñptā hai jab bhī tū aatī hai shaam ko 
vīrāñ chaman pe roī hai shabnam tamām raat aise meñ koī nannhī kalī muskurā.e to 
'ādil' havā.eñ kab se bhī detī haiñ dastakeñ jaldī se uTh ke kamre kā darvāza khol do 
chaaron taraf se maut ne ghera hai zist ko aur us ke sath hukm ki ab zindagi karo 
bahar gali mein shor hai barsat ka suno kunDi laga ke aaj to ghar mein paDe raho 
chhoD aae kis ki chhat pe jawan-sal chand ko KHamosh kis liye ho sitaro jawab do 
kyun chalte chalte ruk gae viran rasto tanha hun aaj main zara ghar tak to sath do 
jis ne bhi muD ke dekha wo patthar ka ho gaya nazren jhukae dosto chup chup chale chalo 
allah rakkhe teri sahar jaisi kam-sini dil kanpta hai jab bhi tu aati hai sham ko 
viran chaman pe roi hai shabnam tamam raat aise mein koi nannhi kali muskurae to 
'adil' hawaen kab se bhi deti hain dastaken jaldi se uTh ke kamre ka darwaza khol do

vo jo ik shart thī vahshat kī uThā dī ga.ī kyā merī bastī kisī sahrā meñ basā dī ga.ī kyā 
vahī lahja hai magar yaar tire lafzoñ meñ pahle ik aag sī jaltī thī bujhā dī ga.ī kyā 
jo baḌhī thī ki kahīñ mujh ko bahā kar le jaa.e maiñ yahīñ huuñ to vahī mauj bahā dī ga.ī kyā 
paañv meñ ḳhaak kī zanjīr bhalī lagne lagī phir mirī qaid kī mī.ād baḌhā dī ga.ī kyā 
der se pahuñche haiñ ham duur se aa.e hue log shahr ḳhāmosh hai sab ḳhaak uḌā dī ga.ī kyā 
wo jo ek shart thi wahshat ki uTha di gai kya meri basti kisi sahra mein basa di gai kya 
wahi lahja hai magar yar tere lafzon mein pahle ek aag si jalti thi bujha di gai kya 
jo baDhi thi ki kahin mujh ko baha kar le jae main yahin hun to wahi mauj baha di gai kya 
panw mein KHak ki zanjir bhali lagne lagi phir meri qaid ki miad baDha di gai kya 
der se pahunche hain hum dur se aae hue log shahr KHamosh hai sab KHak uDa di gai kya

har chiiz hai mahv-e-ḳhud-numā.ī har zarra shahīd-e-kibriyā.ī 
be-zauq-e-numūd zindagī maut tāmīr-e-ḳhudī meñ hai ḳhudā.ī 
raa.ī zor-e-ḳhudī se parbat parbat zof-e-ḳhudī se raa.ī 
taare āvāra-o-kam-āmez taqdīr-e-vajūd hai judā.ī 
ye pichhle pahar kā zard-rū chāñd be-rāz o niyāz-e-āshnā.ī 
terī qindīl hai tirā dil tū aap hai apnī raushnā.ī 
ik tū hai ki haq hai is jahāñ meñ baaqī hai numūd-e-sīmyā.ī 
haiñ uqda-kushā ye ḳhār-e-sahrā kam kar gila-e-barahna-pā.ī 
har chiz hai mahw-e-KHud-numai har zarra shahid-e-kibriyai 
be-zauq-e-numud zindagi maut tamir-e-KHudi mein hai KHudai 
rai zor-e-KHudi se parbat parbat zof-e-KHudi se rai 
tare aawara-o-kam-amez taqdir-e-wajud hai judai 
ye pichhle pahar ka zard-ru chand be-raaz o niyaz-e-ashnai 
teri qindil hai tera dil tu aap hai apni raushnai 
ek tu hai ki haq hai is jahan mein baqi hai numud-e-simyai 
hain uqda-kusha ye KHar-e-sahra kam kar gila-e-barahna-pai

apne ham-rāh jalā rakkhā hai tāq-e-dil par jo diyā rakkhā hai 
jumbish-e-lab na sahī tere ḳhilāf haath ko ham ne uThā rakkhā hai 
tū mujhe chhoḌ ke jā saktā nahīñ chhoḌ is baat meñ kyā rakkhā hai 
vo milā degā hameñ bhī jis ne aab aur gil ko milā rakkhā hai 
mujh ko mālūm hai merī ḳhātir kahīñ ik jaal bunā rakkhā hai 
jāntā huuñ mire qissa-go ne asl qisse ko chhupā rakkhā hai 
āsmānoñ ne gavāhī ke liye ik sitāre ko bachā rakkhā hai 
kaam kuchh itne haiñ karne ko 'jamāl' naam ko kal pe uThā rakkhā hai 
apne ham-rah jala rakkha hai taq-e-dil par jo diya rakkha hai 
jumbish-e-lab na sahi tere KHilaf hath ko hum ne uTha rakkha hai 
tu mujhe chhoD ke ja sakta nahin chhoD is baat mein kya rakkha hai 
wo mila dega hamein bhi jis ne aab aur gil ko mila rakkha hai 
mujh ko malum hai meri KHatir kahin ek jal buna rakkha hai 
jaanta hun mere qissa-go ne asl qisse ko chhupa rakkha hai 
aasmanon ne gawahi ke liye ek sitare ko bacha rakkha hai 
kaam kuchh itne hain karne ko 'jamal' nam ko kal pe uTha rakkha hai

apne māhaul se the qais ke rishte kyā kyā dasht meñ aaj bhī uThte haiñ bagūle kyā kyā 
ishq me.ār-e-vafā ko nahīñ kartā nīlām varna idrāk ne dikhlā.e the raste kyā kyā 
ye alag baat ki barse nahīñ garje to bahut varna bādal mire sahrāoñ pe umDe kyā kyā 
aag bhaḌkī to dar-o-bām hue raakh ke Dher aur dete rahe ahbāb dilāse kyā kyā 
log ashiyā kī tarah bik ga.e ashiyā ke liye sar-e-bāzār tamāshe nazar aa.e kyā kyā 
lafz kis shaan se taḳhlīq huā thā lekin us kā mafhūm badalte rahe nuqte kyā kyā 
ik kiran tak bhī na pahuñchī mire bātin meñ 'nadīm' sar-e-aflāk damakte rahe taare kyā kyā 
apne mahaul se the qais ke rishte kya kya dasht mein aaj bhi uThte hain bagule kya kya 
ishq mear-e-wafa ko nahin karta nilam warna idrak ne dikhlae the raste kya kya 
ye alag baat ki barse nahin garje to bahut warna baadal mere sahraon pe umDe kya kya 
aag bhaDki to dar-o-baam hue rakh ke Dher aur dete rahe ahbab dilase kya kya 
log ashiya ki tarah bik gae ashiya ke liye sar-e-bazar tamashe nazar aae kya kya 
lafz kis shan se taKHliq hua tha lekin us ka mafhum badalte rahe nuqte kya kya 
ek kiran tak bhi na pahunchi mere baatin mein 'nadim' sar-e-aflak damakte rahe tare kya kya

ye kaisī aag barastī hai āsmānoñ se parinde lauT ke aane lage uḌānoñ se 
koī to DhūñD ke mujh ko kahīñ se le aa.e ki ḳhud ko dekhā nahīñ hai bahut zamānoñ se 
palak jhapakte meñ mere uḌaan bharte hī hazāroñ tiir nikal ā.eñge kamānoñ se 
huī haiñ dair-o-haram meñ ye sāzisheñ kaisī dhuāñ sā uThne lagā shahr ke makānoñ se 
shikār karnā thā jin ko shikār kar ke ga.e shikāriyo utar aao tum ab machānoñ se 
rivāyatoñ ko kahāñ tak uThā.e ghūmoge ye bojh utaar do 'pāshī' tum apne shānoñ se 
ye kaisi aag barasti hai aasmanon se parinde lauT ke aane lage uDanon se 
koi to DhunD ke mujh ko kahin se le aae ki KHud ko dekha nahin hai bahut zamanon se 
palak jhapakte mein mere uDan bharte hi hazaron tir nikal aaenge kamanon se 
hui hain dair-o-haram mein ye sazishen kaisi dhuan sa uThne laga shahr ke makanon se 
shikar karna tha jin ko shikar kar ke gae shikariyo utar aao tum ab machanon se 
riwayaton ko kahan tak uThae ghumoge ye bojh utar do 'pashi' tum apne shanon se

vo is jahān se hairān jaayā karte haiñ jo apne aap ko pahchān jaayā karte haiñ 
jo sirf ek Thikāne se tere vāqif haiñ tirī galī meñ vo nādān jaayā karte haiñ 
kisī ke hone na hone ke baare meñ aksar akele-pan meñ baḌe dhyān jaayā karte haiñ 
maiñ ab kabhī na dikhūñgā kisī ke marne se ki shab guzār ke mehmān jaayā karte haiñ 
jo asl baat hai us ko chhupāne kī ḳhātir kabhī kabhī ġhalatī maan jaayā karte haiñ 
ye baat aate hue sochtā nahīñ koī ki sab yahāñ se pareshān jaayā karte haiñ 
'jamāl' ham to tujhe ye bhī ab nahīñ kahte kabhī kisī kā kahā maan jaayā karte haiñ 
wo is jahan se hairan jaya karte hain jo apne aap ko pahchan jaya karte hain 
jo sirf ek Thikane se tere waqif hain teri gali mein wo nadan jaya karte hain 
kisi ke hone na hone ke bare mein aksar akele-pan mein baDe dhyan jaya karte hain 
main ab kabhi na dikhunga kisi ke marne se ki shab guzar ke mehman jaya karte hain 
jo asl baat hai us ko chhupane ki KHatir kabhi kabhi ghalati man jaya karte hain 
ye baat aate hue sochta nahin koi ki sab yahan se pareshan jaya karte hain 
'jamal' hum to tujhe ye bhi ab nahin kahte kabhi kisi ka kaha man jaya karte hain

vo kaun haiñ phūloñ kī hifāzat nahīñ karte sunte haiñ jo ḳhushbū se mohabbat nahīñ karte 
tum ho ki abhī shahr meñ masrūf bahut ho ham haiñ ki abhī zikr-e-shahādat nahīñ karte 
qur.ān kā mafhūm unheñ kaun batā.e āñkhoñ se jo chehroñ kī tilāvat nahīñ karte 
sāhil se sunā karte haiñ lahroñ kī kahānī ye Thahre hue log baġhāvat nahīñ karte 
ham bhī tire beTe haiñ zarā dekh hameñ bhī ai ḳhāk-e-vatan tujh se shikāyat nahīñ karte 
is mausam-e-jam.hūr meñ vo gul bhī khile haiñ jo sāhib-e-ālam kī himāyat nahīñ karte 
ham banda-e-nāchīz gunahgār haiñ lekin vo bhī to zarā bārish-e-rahmat nahīñ karte 
chehre haiñ ki sau rañg meñ hote haiñ numāyāñ ā.īne magar koī siyāsat nahīñ karte 
shabnam ko bharosa hai bahut barg-e-amāñ par 'ḳhurshīd' bhī dānista qayāmat nahīñ karte 
wo kaun hain phulon ki hifazat nahin karte sunte hain jo KHushbu se mohabbat nahin karte 
tum ho ki abhi shahr mein masruf bahut ho hum hain ki abhi zikr-e-shahadat nahin karte 
quran ka mafhum unhen kaun batae aankhon se jo chehron ki tilawat nahin karte 
sahil se suna karte hain lahron ki kahani ye Thahre hue log baghawat nahin karte 
hum bhi tere beTe hain zara dekh hamein bhi ai KHak-e-watan tujh se shikayat nahin karte 
is mausam-e-jamhur mein wo gul bhi khile hain jo sahib-e-alam ki himayat nahin karte 
hum banda-e-nachiz gunahgar hain lekin wo bhi to zara barish-e-rahmat nahin karte 
chehre hain ki sau rang mein hote hain numayan aaine magar koi siyasat nahin karte 
shabnam ko bharosa hai bahut barg-e-aman par 'KHurshid' bhi danista qayamat nahin karte

aarzū ko ruuh meñ ġham ban ke rahnā aa gayā sahte sahte ham ko āḳhir ranj sahnā aa gayā 
dil kā ḳhuuñ āñkhoñ meñ khiñch aayā chalo achchhā huā merī āñkhoñ ko mirā ahvāl kahnā aa gayā 
sahl ho jā.egī mushkil zabt soz o saaz kī ḳhūn-e-dil ko aañkh se jis roz bahnā aa gayā 
maiñ kisī se apne dil kī baat kah saktā na thā ab suḳhan kī aaḌ meñ kyā kuchh na kahnā aa gayā 
jab se muñh ko lag ga.ī 'aḳhtar' mohabbat kī sharāb be-piye āThoñ pahar mad.hosh rahnā aa gayā 
aarzu ko ruh mein gham ban ke rahna aa gaya sahte sahte hum ko aaKHir ranj sahna aa gaya 
dil ka KHun aankhon mein khinch aaya chalo achchha hua meri aankhon ko mera ahwal kahna aa gaya 
sahl ho jaegi mushkil zabt soz o saz ki KHun-e-dil ko aankh se jis roz bahna aa gaya 
main kisi se apne dil ki baat kah sakta na tha ab suKHan ki aaD mein kya kuchh na kahna aa gaya 
jab se munh ko lag gai 'aKHtar' mohabbat ki sharab be-piye aaThon pahar madhosh rahna aa gaya

na ibtidā kī ḳhabar hai na intihā ma.alūm rahā ye vahm ki ham haiñ so vo bhī kyā ma.alūm 
duā to ḳhair duā se umīd-e-ḳhair bhī hai ye mudda.ā hai to anjām-e-mudda.ā ma.alūm 
huā na rāz-e-razā faash vo to ye kahiye mire nasīb meñ thī varna sa.ī-e-nā-ma.alūm 
mirī vafā ke sivā ġhāyat-e-jafā kyuuñ ho tirī jafā ke sivā hāsil-e-vafā ma.alūm 
kuchh un ke rahm pe thī yuuñ hī zindagī mauqūf ki un ko rāz-e-mohabbat bhī ho gayā ma.alūm 
tire ḳhayāl ke asrār be-ḳhudī meñ khule hamīñ chhupā na sake varna dil ko kyā ma.alūm 
fareb-e-amn meñ kuchh maslahat to hai varna sukūn-e-kashtī o taufīq-e-nā-ḳhudā ma.alūm 
vo iltifāt ki thā us kī intihā bhī hai ḳhudā kī maar ki dil ko yahī na thā ma.alūm 
ye zindagī kī hai rūdād-e-muḳhtasar 'fānī' vajūd-e-dard musallam ilaaj nā-mālūm 
na ibtida ki KHabar hai na intiha malum raha ye wahm ki hum hain so wo bhi kya malum 
dua to KHair dua se umid-e-KHair bhi hai ye muddaa hai to anjam-e-muddaa malum 
hua na raaz-e-raza fash wo to ye kahiye mere nasib mein thi warna sai-e-na-malum 
meri wafa ke siwa ghayat-e-jafa kyun ho teri jafa ke siwa hasil-e-wafa malum 
kuchh un ke rahm pe thi yun hi zindagi mauquf ki un ko raaz-e-mohabbat bhi ho gaya malum 
tere KHayal ke asrar be-KHudi mein khule hamin chhupa na sake warna dil ko kya malum 
fareb-e-amn mein kuchh maslahat to hai warna sukun-e-kashti o taufiq-e-na-KHuda malum 
wo iltifat ki tha us ki intiha bhi hai KHuda ki mar ki dil ko yahi na tha malum 
ye zindagi ki hai rudad-e-muKHtasar 'fani' wajud-e-dard musallam ilaj na-malum

bevafā kahne se kyā vo bevafā ho jā.egā tere hote is sifat kā dūsrā ho jā.egā 
shart kar lo phir mujhe barbād honā bhī qubūl ḳhaak meñ mil kar to hāsil mudda.ā ho jā.egā 
sar na hogā dosh par to kyā na hogī guftugū hichkiyoñ se shukr qātil kā adā ho jā.egā 
siina toḌā dil meñ chuTkī lī jigar zaḳhmī kiyā kyā ḳhabar thī tiir bhī terī adā ho jā.egā 
mere kahne meñ hai dil jab tak mire pahlū meñ hai aap le liije ise ye aap kā ho jā.egā 
saath un ke jaan bhī armān bhī jā.eñge aaj sub.h se pahle ravāna qāfila ho jā.egā 
maiñ malūñ talvoñ se āñkheñ vo kaheñ samjhūñgā maiñ yaad rakh phīkā agar rang-e-hinā ho jā.egā 
phir vahī jhagḌe kā jhagḌā hai agar qum kah diyā teġh kā mansūḳh saarā faislā ho jā.egā 
kis ḳhushī meñ haa.e kaisā ranj phailā kyā karūñ kyā ḳhabar thī hañste hañste vo ḳhafā ho jā.egā 
hashr tak kyuuñ baat jaa.e kyuuñ paḌe ġhairoñ ke muñh ghar meñ samjhautā hamārā aap kā ho jā.egā 
aañkh se hai vasl kā iqrār dil dugdā meñ hai tum zabāñ se apnī kah doge to kyā ho jā.egā 
zulm se gar zab.h bhī kar do mujhe parvā nahīñ lutf se Dartā huuñ ye merī qazā ho jā.egā 
us ne chheḌā thā mujhe tum jaan doge kab hameñ kah diyā maiñ ne bhī jab vaada vafā ho jā.egā 
yuuñ savāl-e-vasl par Taalā kiyā barsoñ koī sabr kar muztar na ho terā kahā ho jā.egā 
laakh duniyā meñ hasīñ hoñ laakh hūreñ ḳhuld meñ mujh ko jo tū hai vo koī dūsrā ho jā.egā 
tauba bhī kar lī thī ye bhī nashsha kī thī ik tarañg aap samjhe the ki 'beḳhud' pārsā ho jā.egā 
bewafa kahne se kya wo bewafa ho jaega tere hote is sifat ka dusra ho jaega 
shart kar lo phir mujhe barbaad hona bhi qubul KHak mein mil kar to hasil muddaa ho jaega 
sar na hoga dosh par to kya na hogi guftugu hichkiyon se shukr qatil ka ada ho jaega 
sina toDa dil mein chuTki li jigar zaKHmi kiya kya KHabar thi tir bhi teri ada ho jaega 
mere kahne mein hai dil jab tak mere pahlu mein hai aap le lije ise ye aap ka ho jaega 
sath un ke jaan bhi arman bhi jaenge aaj subh se pahle rawana qafila ho jaega 
main malun talwon se aankhen wo kahen samjhunga main yaad rakh phika agar rang-e-hina ho jaega 
phir wahi jhagDe ka jhagDa hai agar qum kah diya tegh ka mansuKH sara faisla ho jaega 
kis KHushi mein hae kaisa ranj phaila kya karun kya KHabar thi hanste hanste wo KHafa ho jaega 
hashr tak kyun baat jae kyun paDe ghairon ke munh ghar mein samjhauta hamara aap ka ho jaega 
aankh se hai wasl ka iqrar dil dugda mein hai tum zaban se apni kah doge to kya ho jaega 
zulm se gar zabh bhi kar do mujhe parwa nahin lutf se Darta hun ye meri qaza ho jaega 
us ne chheDa tha mujhe tum jaan doge kab hamein kah diya main ne bhi jab wada wafa ho jaega 
yun sawal-e-wasl par Tala kiya barson koi sabr kar muztar na ho tera kaha ho jaega 
lakh duniya mein hasin hon lakh huren KHuld mein mujh ko jo tu hai wo koi dusra ho jaega 
tauba bhi kar li thi ye bhi nashsha ki thi ek tarang aap samjhe the ki 'beKHud' parsa ho jaega

apne rahne kā Thikānā aur hai ye qafas ye āshiyānā aur hai 
maut kā aanā bhī dekhā bār-hā par kisī par dil kā aanā aur hai 
naaz uThāne ko uThāte haiñ sabhī apne dil kā naaz uThānā aur hai 
dard-e-dil sun kar tumheñ niiñd aa chukī banda-parvar ye fasānā aur hai 
raat bhar meñ sham-e-mahfil jal-bujhī āshiqoñ kā dil jalānā aur hai 
ham kahāñ phir bāġhbāñ gulshan kahāñ ek do din āb-o-dānā aur hai 
bholī bholī un kī bāteñ ho chukīñ ab ḳhudā rakkhe zamānā aur hai 
chhoḌ duuñ kyūñkar dar-e-pīr-e-muġhāñ koī aisā āstānā aur hai 
yār-e-sādiq DhūñDte ho tum 'jalīl' mushfiq-e-man ye zamānā aur hai 
apne rahne ka Thikana aur hai ye qafas ye aashiyana aur hai 
maut ka aana bhi dekha bar-ha par kisi par dil ka aana aur hai 
naz uThane ko uThate hain sabhi apne dil ka naz uThana aur hai 
dard-e-dil sun kar tumhein nind aa chuki banda-parwar ye fasana aur hai 
raat bhar mein sham-e-mahfil jal-bujhi aashiqon ka dil jalana aur hai 
hum kahan phir baghban gulshan kahan ek do din aab-o-dana aur hai 
bholi bholi un ki baaten ho chukin ab KHuda rakkhe zamana aur hai 
chhoD dun kyunkar dar-e-pir-e-mughan koi aisa aastana aur hai 
yar-e-sadiq DhunDte ho tum 'jalil' mushfiq-e-man ye zamana aur hai

dil mirā phir dukhā diyā kin ne so gayā thā jagā diyā kin ne 
maiñ kahāñ aur ḳhayāl-e-bosa kahāñ muñh se muñh yuuñ bhiḌā diyā kin ne 
vo mire chāhne ko kyā jaane ye sandesā sunā diyā kin ne 
ham bhī kuchh dekhte samajhte the sab yakāyak chhupā diyā kin ne 
vo bulā.e se bhāgtā thā aur 'dard' tujh tak bulā diyā kin ne 
dil mera phir dukha diya kin ne so gaya tha jaga diya kin ne 
main kahan aur KHayal-e-bosa kahan munh se munh yun bhiDa diya kin ne 
wo mere chahne ko kya jaane ye sandesa suna diya kin ne 
hum bhi kuchh dekhte samajhte the sab yakayak chhupa diya kin ne 
wo bulae se bhagta tha aur 'dard' tujh tak bula diya kin ne

vo din bhī the ki in āñkhoñ meñ itnī hairat thī tamām bāzīgaroñ ko mirī zarūrat thī 
vo baat soch ke maiñ jis ko muddatoñ jiitā bichhaḌte vaqt batāne kī kyā zarūrat thī 
patā nahīñ ye tamannā-e-qurb kab jaagī mujhe to sirf use sochne kī aadat thī 
ḳhamoshiyoñ ne pareshāñ kiyā to hogā magar pukārne kī yahī sirf ek sūrat thī 
ga.e bhī jaan se aur koī mutma.in na huā ki phir difā.a na karne kī ham pe tohmat thī 
kahīñ pe chuuk rahe haiñ ye aa.ine shāyad nahīñ to aks meñ ab tak mirī shabāhat thī 
wo din bhi the ki in aankhon mein itni hairat thi tamam bazigaron ko meri zarurat thi 
wo baat soch ke main jis ko muddaton jita bichhaDte waqt batane ki kya zarurat thi 
pata nahin ye tamanna-e-qurb kab jagi mujhe to sirf use sochne ki aadat thi 
KHamoshiyon ne pareshan kiya to hoga magar pukarne ki yahi sirf ek surat thi 
gae bhi jaan se aur koi mutmain na hua ki phir difaa na karne ki hum pe tohmat thi 
kahin pe chuk rahe hain ye aaine shayad nahin to aks mein ab tak meri shabahat thi

haath nikle apne donoñ kaam ke dil ko thāmā un kā dāman thaam ke 
ghūñT pī kar bāda-e-gulfām ke bose le letā huuñ ḳhālī jaam ke 
raat din phirtā hai kyuuñ ai charḳh-e-pīr tere din haiñ rāhat o ārām ke 
is nazākat kā burā ho bazm se uThte haiñ vo dast-e-dushman thaam ke 
chashm-e-mast-e-yār kī ik dhuum hai aaj kal haiñ daur daur-e-jām ke 
yā jigar meñ yā rahegā dil meñ tiir ye hī do goshe to haiñ ārām ke 
vo kareñ uzr-e-vafā achchhī kahī mujh pe radde rakhte haiñ ilzām ke 
jab qadam kaabe se rakkhā sū-e-dair taar uljhe jāma-e-ehrām ke 
ḳhush haiñ vo daur-e-falak se aaj kal din phire haiñ gardish-e-ayyām ke 
aa gayā hai bhuul kar ḳhat is taraf vo to āshiq haiñ mire hamnām ke 
haath se sayyād ke gir kar chhurī kaT ga.e halqe hamāre daam ke 
qāsidoñ ke muntazir rahne lage paḌ ga.e un ko maze paiġhām ke 
kyā kisī dargāh meñ jaanā hai aaj sub.h se sāmān haiñ hammām ke 
pūchhte haiñ hazrat-e-zāhid se rind daam kyā haiñ jāma-e-ehrām ke 
lab utar aa.e haiñ vo tārīf par ham jo aadī ho ga.e dushnām ke 
dāva-e-ishq-o-vafā par ye kahā sab bajā lekin mire kis kaam ke 
ban-sañvar kar kab bigaḌtā hai banāo sub.h tak rahte haiñ jalve shaam ke 
jaur se yā lutf se puurā kiyā aap pīchhe paḌ ga.e jis kaam ke 
hai gadā-e-mai-kada bhī kyā harīs bhar liye jholī meñ TukḌe jaam ke 
naala o fariyād kī tāqat kahāñ baat kartā huuñ kalejā thaam ke 
ḳhūgar-e-bedād ko rāhat hai maut bhāgtā huuñ naam se ārām ke 
'dāġh' ke sab harf likhte haiñ judā TukḌe kar Daale hamāre naam ke 
hath nikle apne donon kaam ke dil ko thama un ka daman tham ke 
ghunT pi kar baada-e-gulfam ke bose le leta hun KHali jam ke 
raat din phirta hai kyun ai charKH-e-pir tere din hain rahat o aaram ke 
is nazakat ka bura ho bazm se uThte hain wo dast-e-dushman tham ke 
chashm-e-mast-e-yar ki ek dhum hai aaj kal hain daur daur-e-jam ke 
ya jigar mein ya rahega dil mein tir ye hi do goshe to hain aaram ke 
wo karen uzr-e-wafa achchhi kahi mujh pe radde rakhte hain ilzam ke 
jab qadam kabe se rakkha su-e-dair tar uljhe jama-e-ehram ke 
KHush hain wo daur-e-falak se aaj kal din phire hain gardish-e-ayyam ke 
aa gaya hai bhul kar KHat is taraf wo to aashiq hain mere hamnam ke 
hath se sayyaad ke gir kar chhuri kaT gae halqe hamare dam ke 
qasidon ke muntazir rahne lage paD gae un ko maze paigham ke 
kya kisi dargah mein jaana hai aaj subh se saman hain hammam ke 
puchhte hain hazrat-e-zahid se rind dam kya hain jama-e-ehram ke 
lab utar aae hain wo tarif par hum jo aadi ho gae dushnam ke 
dawa-e-ishq-o-wafa par ye kaha sab baja lekin mere kis kaam ke 
ban-sanwar kar kab bigaDta hai banao subh tak rahte hain jalwe sham ke 
jaur se ya lutf se pura kiya aap pichhe paD gae jis kaam ke 
hai gada-e-mai-kada bhi kya haris bhar liye jholi mein TukDe jam ke 
nala o fariyaad ki taqat kahan baat karta hun kaleja tham ke 
KHugar-e-bedad ko rahat hai maut bhagta hun nam se aaram ke 
'dagh' ke sab harf likhte hain juda TukDe kar Dale hamare nam ke

diloñ kī or dhuāñ sā dikhā.ī detā hai ye shahr to mujhe jaltā dikhā.ī detā hai 
jahāñ ki daaġh hai yaañ aage dard rahtā thā magar ye daaġh bhī jaatā dikhā.ī detā hai 
pukārtī haiñ bhare shahr kī guzargāheñ vo roz shaam ko tanhā dikhā.ī detā hai 
ye log TuuTī huī kashtiyoñ meñ sote haiñ mire makān se dariyā dikhā.ī detā hai 
ḳhizāñ ke zard dinoñ kī siyāh rātoñ meñ kisī kā phuul sā chehra dikhā.ī detā hai 
kahīñ mile vo sar-e-rāh to lipaT jaa.eñ bas ab to ek hī rasta dikhā.ī detā hai 
dilon ki or dhuan sa dikhai deta hai ye shahr to mujhe jalta dikhai deta hai 
jahan ki dagh hai yan aage dard rahta tha magar ye dagh bhi jata dikhai deta hai 
pukarti hain bhare shahr ki guzargahen wo roz sham ko tanha dikhai deta hai 
ye log TuTi hui kashtiyon mein sote hain mere makan se dariya dikhai deta hai 
KHizan ke zard dinon ki siyah raaton mein kisi ka phul sa chehra dikhai deta hai 
kahin mile wo sar-e-rah to lipaT jaen bas ab to ek hi rasta dikhai deta hai

qindīl-e-mah-o-mehr kā aflāk pe honā kuchh is se ziyāda hai mirā ḳhaak pe honā 
har sub.h nikalnā kisī dīvār-e-tarab se har shaam kisī manzil-e-ġhamnāk pe honā 
yā ek sitāre kā guzarnā kisī dar se yā ek piyāle kā kisī chaak pe honā 
lau detī hai tasvīr nihāñ-ḳhāna-e-dil meñ lāzim nahīñ is phuul kā poshāk pe honā 
le aa.egā ik roz gul o barg bhī 'sarvat' bārāñ kā musalsal ḳhas-o-ḳhāshāk pe honā 
qindil-e-mah-o-mehr ka aflak pe hona kuchh is se ziyaada hai mera KHak pe hona 
har subh nikalna kisi diwar-e-tarab se har sham kisi manzil-e-ghamnak pe hona 
ya ek sitare ka guzarna kisi dar se ya ek piyale ka kisi chaak pe hona 
lau deti hai taswir nihan-KHana-e-dil mein lazim nahin is phul ka poshak pe hona 
le aaega ek roz gul o barg bhi 'sarwat' baran ka musalsal KHas-o-KHashak pe hona

shabnam ko ret phuul ko kāñTā banā diyā ham ne to apne baaġh ko sahrā banā diyā 
is uuñch niich par to Thaharte nahīñ the paañv kis dast-e-shauq ne ise duniyā banā diyā 
kin muTThiyoñ ne biij bikhere zamīn par kin bārishoñ ne is ko tamāshā banā diyā 
sairāb kar diyā tirī mauj-e-ḳhirām ne rakkhā jahāñ qadam vahāñ dariyā banā diyā 
ik raat chāñdnī mire bistar pe aa.ī thī maiñ ne tarāsh kar tirā chehra banā diyā 
pūchhe agar koī to use kyā batāoñ maiñ dil kyā thaa, tere ġham ne ise kyā banā diyā 
shabnam ko ret phul ko kanTa bana diya hum ne to apne bagh ko sahra bana diya 
is unch nich par to Thaharte nahin the panw kis dast-e-shauq ne ise duniya bana diya 
kin muTThiyon ne bij bikhere zamin par kin barishon ne is ko tamasha bana diya 
sairab kar diya teri mauj-e-KHiram ne rakkha jahan qadam wahan dariya bana diya 
ek raat chandni mere bistar pe aai thi main ne tarash kar tera chehra bana diya 
puchhe agar koi to use kya bataon main dil kya tha, tere gham ne ise kya bana diya

lubhātā hai agarche husn-e-dariyā Dar rahā huuñ maiñ sabab ye hai ki ik muddat kināre par rahā huuñ maiñ 
ye jhoñke jin se dil meñ tāzgī āñkhoñ meñ ThanDak hai inhī jhoñkoñ se murjhāyā huā shab bhar rahā huuñ maiñ 
tire aane kā din hai tere raste meñ bichhāne ko chamaktī dhuup meñ saa.e ikaTThe kar rahā huuñ maiñ 
koī kamra hai jis ke taaq meñ ik sham.a jaltī hai añdherī raat hai aur saañs lete Dar rahā huuñ maiñ 
mujhe ma.alūm hai ahl-e-vafā par kyā guzartī hai samajh kar soch kar tujh se mohabbat kar rahā huuñ maiñ 
lubhata hai agarche husn-e-dariya Dar raha hun main sabab ye hai ki ek muddat kinare par raha hun main 
ye jhonke jin se dil mein tazgi aankhon mein ThanDak hai inhi jhonkon se murjhaya hua shab bhar raha hun main 
tere aane ka din hai tere raste mein bichhane ko chamakti dhup mein sae ikaTThe kar raha hun main 
koi kamra hai jis ke taq mein ek shama jalti hai andheri raat hai aur sans lete Dar raha hun main 
mujhe malum hai ahl-e-wafa par kya guzarti hai samajh kar soch kar tujh se mohabbat kar raha hun main

in mausamoñ meñ nāchte gaate raheñge ham hañste raheñge shor machāte raheñge ham 
lab suukh kyuuñ na jaa.eñ galā baiTh kyuuñ na jaa.e dil meñ haiñ jo savāl uThāte raheñge ham 
apnī rah-e-sulūk meñ chup rahnā manā hai chup rah ga.e to jaan se jaate raheñge ham 
nikle to is tarah ki dikhā.ī nahīñ diye Duube to der tak nazar aate raheñge ham 
dukh ke safar pe dil ko ravāna to kar diyā ab saarī umr haath hilāte raheñge ham 
in mausamon mein nachte gate rahenge hum hanste rahenge shor machate rahenge hum 
lab sukh kyun na jaen gala baiTh kyun na jae dil mein hain jo sawal uThate rahenge hum 
apni rah-e-suluk mein chup rahna mana hai chup rah gae to jaan se jate rahenge hum 
nikle to is tarah ki dikhai nahin diye Dube to der tak nazar aate rahenge hum 
dukh ke safar pe dil ko rawana to kar diya ab sari umr hath hilate rahenge hum

mujh ko aatā hai tayammum na vazū aatā hai sajda kar letā huuñ jab sāmne tū aatā hai 
yuuñ to shikva bhī hameñ ā.īna-rū aatā hai hoñT sil jaate haiñ jab sāmne tū aatā hai 
haath dho.e hue huuñ nestī-o-hastī se shaiḳh kyā pūchhtā hai mujh se vazū aatā hai 
minnateñ kartī hai shoḳhī ki manā luuñ tujh ko jab mire sāmne rūThā huā tū aatā hai 
pūchhte kyā ho tamannāoñ kī hālat kyā hai saañs ke saath ab ashkoñ meñ lahū aatā hai 
yaar kā ghar koī kaaba to nahīñ hai 'shā.ir' haa.e kam-baḳht yahīñ marne ko tū aatā hai 
mujh ko aata hai tayammum na wazu aata hai sajda kar leta hun jab samne tu aata hai 
yun to shikwa bhi hamein aaina-ru aata hai honT sil jate hain jab samne tu aata hai 
hath dhoe hue hun nesti-o-hasti se shaiKH kya puchhta hai mujh se wazu aata hai 
minnaten karti hai shoKHi ki mana lun tujh ko jab mere samne ruTha hua tu aata hai 
puchhte kya ho tamannaon ki haalat kya hai sans ke sath ab ashkon mein lahu aata hai 
yar ka ghar koi kaba to nahin hai 'shair' hae kam-baKHt yahin marne ko tu aata hai

dhartī par sab dard ke maare kis ke haiñ āsmān par chāñd sitāre kis ke haiñ 
sunte haiñ vo shaḳhs to ghar hī badal gayā phir ye dil-āvez ishāre kis ke haiñ 
kis sahrā kī dhuul hai sab kī āñkhoñ meñ be-mauj o be-rūd kināre kis ke haiñ 
ab kyā sochnā aisī-vaisī bātoñ pe un hāthoñ ne baal sañvāre kis ke haiñ 
kaun hai is rim-jhim ke pīchhe chhupā huā ye aañsū saare ke saare kis ke haiñ 
kisī pahāḌ kī choTī par chaḌh kar dekho āñkhoñ se ojhal nazzāre kis ke haiñ 
dharti par sab dard ke mare kis ke hain aasman par chand sitare kis ke hain 
sunte hain wo shaKHs to ghar hi badal gaya phir ye dil-awez ishaare kis ke hain 
kis sahra ki dhul hai sab ki aankhon mein be-mauj o be-rud kinare kis ke hain 
ab kya sochna aisi-waisi baaton pe un hathon ne baal sanware kis ke hain 
kaun hai is rim-jhim ke pichhe chhupa hua ye aansu sare ke sare kis ke hain 
kisi pahaD ki choTi par chaDh kar dekho aankhon se ojhal nazzare kis ke hain

apnī dhuup meñ bhī kuchh jal har saaye ke saath na Dhal 
lafzoñ ke phūloñ pe na jā dekh saroñ par chalte hal 
duniyā barf kā tuudā hai jitnā jal saktā hai jal 
ġham kī nahīñ āvāz koī kāġhaz kaale kartā chal 
ban ke lakīreñ ubhre haiñ māthe par rāhoñ ke bal 
maiñ ne terā saath diyā mere muñh par kālak mal 
aas ke phuul khile 'bāqī' dil se guzrā phir bādal 
apni dhup mein bhi kuchh jal har saye ke sath na Dhal 
lafzon ke phulon pe na ja dekh saron par chalte hal 
duniya barf ka tuda hai jitna jal sakta hai jal 
gham ki nahin aawaz koi kaghaz kale karta chal 
ban ke lakiren ubhre hain mathe par rahon ke bal 
main ne tera sath diya mere munh par kalak mal 
aas ke phul khile 'baqi' dil se guzra phir baadal

zamāna hai ki guzrā jā rahā hai ye dariyā hai ki bahtā jā rahā hai 
vo uTThe dard uTThā hashr uTThā magar dil hai ki baiThā jā rahā hai 
lagī thī un ke qadmoñ se qayāmat maiñ samjhā saath saayā jā rahā hai 
zamāne par hañse koī ki ro.e jo honā hai vo hotā jā rahā hai 
mire dāġh-e-jigar ko phuul kah kar mujhe kāñToñ meñ khīñchā jā rahā hai 
bahār aa.ī ki din holī ke aa.e guloñ meñ rañg khelā jā rahā hai 
ravāñ hai umr aur insān ġhāfil musāfir hai ki sotā jā rahā hai 
sar-e-mayyat hai ye ibrat kā nauha mohabbat kā janāza jā rahā hai 
'jalīl' ab dil ko apnā dil na samjho koī kar ke ishārā jā rahā hai 
zamana hai ki guzra ja raha hai ye dariya hai ki bahta ja raha hai 
wo uTThe dard uTTha hashr uTTha magar dil hai ki baiTha ja raha hai 
lagi thi un ke qadmon se qayamat main samjha sath saya ja raha hai 
zamane par hanse koi ki roe jo hona hai wo hota ja raha hai 
mere dagh-e-jigar ko phul kah kar mujhe kanTon mein khincha ja raha hai 
bahaar aai ki din holi ke aae gulon mein rang khela ja raha hai 
rawan hai umr aur insan ghafil musafir hai ki sota ja raha hai 
sar-e-mayyat hai ye ibrat ka nauha mohabbat ka janaza ja raha hai 
'jalil' ab dil ko apna dil na samjho koi kar ke ishaara ja raha hai

lazzat se nahīñ ḳhālī jānoñ kā khapā jaanā kab ḳhizr o masīhā ne marne kā maza jaanā 
ham jāh-o-hasham yaañ kā kyā kahiye ki kyā jaanā ḳhātim ko sulaimāñ kī añgushtar-e-pā jaanā 
ye bhī hai adā koī ḳhurshīd namat pyāre muñh sub.h dikhā jaanā phir shaam chhupā jaanā 
kab bandagī merī sī banda karegā koī jaane hai ḳhudā us ko maiñ tujh ko ḳhudā jaanā 
thā naaz bahut ham ko dānist par apnī bhī āḳhir vo burā niklā ham jis ko bhalā jaanā 
gardan-kashī kyā hāsil mānind bagūle kī is dasht meñ sar gaaḌe juuñ sail chalā jaanā 
is girya-e-ḳhūnīñ kā ho zabt to behtar hai achchhā nahīñ chehre par lohū kā bahā jaanā 
ye naqsh diloñ par se jaane kā nahīñ us ko āshiq ke huqūq aa kar nāhaq bhī miTā jaanā 
Dhab dekhne kā īdhar aisā hī tumhārā thā jaate to ho par ham se Tuk aañkh milā jaanā 
us sham.a kī majlis meñ jaanā hameñ phir vaañ se ik zaḳhm-e-zabāñ taaza har roz uThā jaanā 
ai shor-e-qayāmat ham sote hī na rah jāveñ is raah se nikle to ham ko bhī jagā jaanā 
kyā paanī ke mol aa kar mālik ne guhar bechā hai saḳht girāñ sastā yūsuf kā bikā jaanā 
hai merī tirī nisbat ruuh aur jasad kī sī kab aap se maiñ tujh ko ai jaan judā jaanā 
jaatī hai guzar jī par us vaqt qayāmat sī yaad aave hai jab terā yak-bārgī aa jaanā 
barsoñ se mire us kī rahtī hai yahī sohbat teġh us ko uThānā to sar mujh ko jhukā jaanā 
kab 'mīr' basar aa.e tum vaise farebī se dil ko to lagā baiThe lekin na lagā jaanā 
lazzat se nahin KHali jaanon ka khapa jaana kab KHizr o masiha ne marne ka maza jaana 
hum jah-o-hasham yan ka kya kahiye ki kya jaana KHatim ko sulaiman ki angushtar-e-pa jaana 
ye bhi hai ada koi KHurshid namat pyare munh subh dikha jaana phir sham chhupa jaana 
kab bandagi meri si banda karega koi jaane hai KHuda us ko main tujh ko KHuda jaana 
tha naz bahut hum ko danist par apni bhi aaKHir wo bura nikla hum jis ko bhala jaana 
gardan-kashi kya hasil manind bagule ki is dasht mein sar gaDe jun sail chala jaana 
is girya-e-KHunin ka ho zabt to behtar hai achchha nahin chehre par lohu ka baha jaana 
ye naqsh dilon par se jaane ka nahin us ko aashiq ke huquq aa kar nahaq bhi miTa jaana 
Dhab dekhne ka idhar aisa hi tumhaara tha jate to ho par hum se Tuk aankh mila jaana 
us shama ki majlis mein jaana hamein phir wan se ek zaKHm-e-zaban taza har roz uTha jaana 
ai shor-e-qayamat hum sote hi na rah jawen is rah se nikle to hum ko bhi jaga jaana 
kya pani ke mol aa kar malik ne guhar becha hai saKHt giran sasta yusuf ka bika jaana 
hai meri teri nisbat ruh aur jasad ki si kab aap se main tujh ko ai jaan juda jaana 
jati hai guzar ji par us waqt qayamat si yaad aawe hai jab tera yak-bargi aa jaana 
barson se mere us ki rahti hai yahi sohbat tegh us ko uThana to sar mujh ko jhuka jaana 
kab 'mir' basar aae tum waise farebi se dil ko to laga baiThe lekin na laga jaana

jo tum se pahle aa.e the un kī kāristānī dekho gaañv se nikle ho to ab shahroñ kī vīrānī dekho 
sote meñ marne kā mauqa.a mil jaatā hai sab logoñ ko phir bhī zinda uTh jaate haiñ logoñ kī nādānī dekho 
rokoge to phaT jā.ūñgā yaaro tum bas itnā karnā kuchh mat kahnā mujh se jab merī āñkhoñ meñ paanī dekho 
sātoñ aalam sar karne ke ba.ad ik din kī chhuTTī le kar ghar meñ chiḌiyoñ ke gaane par bachchoñ kī hairānī dekho 
itne fir.aunoñ ko māroge to kyā tum bach jāoge mūsā-jī ye ġhussa chhoḌo aur apnī āsānī dekho 
jo tum se pahle aae the un ki karistani dekho ganw se nikle ho to ab shahron ki virani dekho 
sote mein marne ka mauqa mil jata hai sab logon ko phir bhi zinda uTh jate hain logon ki nadani dekho 
rokoge to phaT jaunga yaro tum bas itna karna kuchh mat kahna mujh se jab meri aankhon mein pani dekho 
saton aalam sar karne ke baad ek din ki chhuTTi le kar ghar mein chiDiyon ke gane par bachchon ki hairani dekho 
itne firaunon ko maroge to kya tum bach jaoge musa-ji ye ghussa chhoDo aur apni aasani dekho

vo har maqām se pahle vo har maqām ke baa'd sahar thī shaam se pahle sahar hai shaam ke baa'd 
har inqilāb mubārak har inqilāb azaab shikast-e-jām se pahle shikast-e-jām ke baa'd 
mujhī pe itnī tavajjoh mujhī se itnā gurez mire salām se pahle mire salām ke baa'd 
charāġh-e-bazm-e-sitam haiñ hamārā haal na pūchh jale the shaam se pahle bujhe haiñ shaam ke baa'd 
ye raat kuchh bhī nahīñ thī ye raat sab kuchh hai tulū-e-jām se pahle tulū-e-jām ke baa'd 
vahī zabāñ vahī bāteñ magar hai kitnā farq tumhāre naam se pahle tumhāre naam ke baa'd 
hayāt girya-e-shabnam hayāt raqs-e-sharar tire payām se pahle tire payām ke baa'd 
ye tarz-e-fikr ye rañg-e-suḳhan kahāñ 'qābil' tire kalām se pahle tire kalām ke baa'd 
wo har maqam se pahle wo har maqam ke ba'd sahar thi sham se pahle sahar hai sham ke ba'd 
har inqilab mubarak har inqilab azab shikast-e-jam se pahle shikast-e-jam ke ba'd 
mujhi pe itni tawajjoh mujhi se itna gurez mere salam se pahle mere salam ke ba'd 
charagh-e-bazm-e-sitam hain hamara haal na puchh jale the sham se pahle bujhe hain sham ke ba'd 
ye raat kuchh bhi nahin thi ye raat sab kuchh hai tulu-e-jam se pahle tulu-e-jam ke ba'd 
wahi zaban wahi baaten magar hai kitna farq tumhaare nam se pahle tumhaare nam ke ba'd 
hayat girya-e-shabnam hayat raqs-e-sharar tere payam se pahle tere payam ke ba'd 
ye tarz-e-fikr ye rang-e-suKHan kahan 'qabil' tere kalam se pahle tere kalam ke ba'd

ab daur-e-āsmāñ hai na daur-e-hayāt hai ai dard-e-hijr tū hī batā kitnī raat hai 
har kā.enāt se ye alag kā.enāt hai hairat-sarā-e-ishq meñ din hai na raat hai 
jiinā jo aa gayā to ajal bhī hayāt hai aur yuuñ to umr-e-ḳhizr bhī kyā be-sabāt hai 
kyuuñ intihā-e-hosh ko kahte haiñ be-ḳhudī ḳhurshīd hī kī āḳhirī manzil to raat hai 
hastī ko jis ne zalzala-sāmāñ banā diyā vo dil qarār paa.e muqaddar kī baat hai 
ye mushagāfiyāñ haiñ girāñ tab-e-ishq par kis ko dimāġh-e-kāvish-e-zāt-o-sifāt hai 
toḌā hai lā-makāñ kī hadoñ ko bhī ishq ne zindān-e-aql terī to kyā kā.enāt hai 
gardūñ sharār-e-barq-e-dil-e-be-qarār dekh jin se ye terī tāroñ bharī raat raat hai 
gum ho ke har jagah haiñ za-ḳhud raftagān-e-ishq un kī bhī ahl-e-kashf-o-karāmāt zaat hai 
hastī ba-juz fanā-e-musalsal ke kuchh nahīñ phir kis liye ye fikr-e-qarār-o-sabāt hai 
us jān-e-dostī kā ḳhulūs-e-nihāñ na pūchh jis kā sitam bhī ġhairat-e-sad-iltifāt hai 
yuuñ to hazār dard se rote haiñ bad-nasīb tum dil dukhāo vaqt-e-musībat to baat hai 
unvān ġhaflatoñ ke haiñ qurbat ho yā visāl bas fursat-e-hayāt 'firāq' ek raat hai 
ab daur-e-asman hai na daur-e-hayat hai ai dard-e-hijr tu hi bata kitni raat hai 
har kaenat se ye alag kaenat hai hairat-sara-e-ishq mein din hai na raat hai 
jina jo aa gaya to ajal bhi hayat hai aur yun to umr-e-KHizr bhi kya be-sabaat hai 
kyun intiha-e-hosh ko kahte hain be-KHudi KHurshid hi ki aaKHiri manzil to raat hai 
hasti ko jis ne zalzala-saman bana diya wo dil qarar pae muqaddar ki baat hai 
ye mushagafiyan hain giran tab-e-ishq par kis ko dimagh-e-kawish-e-zat-o-sifat hai 
toDa hai la-makan ki hadon ko bhi ishq ne zindan-e-aql teri to kya kaenat hai 
gardun sharar-e-barq-e-dil-e-be-qarar dekh jin se ye teri taron bhari raat raat hai 
gum ho ke har jagah hain za-KHud raftagan-e-ishq un ki bhi ahl-e-kashf-o-karamat zat hai 
hasti ba-juz fana-e-musalsal ke kuchh nahin phir kis liye ye fikr-e-qarar-o-sabaat hai 
us jaan-e-dosti ka KHulus-e-nihan na puchh jis ka sitam bhi ghairat-e-sad-iltifat hai 
yun to hazar dard se rote hain bad-nasib tum dil dukhao waqt-e-musibat to baat hai 
unwan ghaflaton ke hain qurbat ho ya visal bas fursat-e-hayat 'firaq' ek raat hai

kahūñ kis se raat kā mājrā na.e manzaroñ pe nigāh thī na kisī kā dāman-e-chāk thā na kisī kī tarf-e-kulāh thī 
ka.ī chāñd the sar-e-āsmāñ ki chamak chamak ke palaT ga.e na lahū mire hī jigar meñ thā na tumhārī zulf siyāh thī 
dil-e-kam-alam pe vo kaifiyat ki Thahar sake na guzar sake na hazar hī rāhat-e-rūh thā na safar meñ rāmish raah thī 
mire chār-dāñg thī jalvagar vahī lazzat-e-talab-e-sahar magar ik ummīd-e-shikasta-par ki misāl-e-dard siyāh thī 
vo jo raat mujh ko baḌe adab se salām kar ke chalā gayā use kyā ḳhabar mire dil meñ bhī kabhī ārzū-e-gunāh thī 
kahun kis se raat ka majra nae manzaron pe nigah thi na kisi ka daman-e-chaak tha na kisi ki tarf-e-kulah thi 
kai chand the sar-e-asman ki chamak chamak ke palaT gae na lahu mere hi jigar mein tha na tumhaari zulf siyah thi 
dil-e-kam-alam pe wo kaifiyat ki Thahar sake na guzar sake na hazar hi rahat-e-ruh tha na safar mein ramish rah thi 
mere chaar-dang thi jalwagar wahi lazzat-e-talab-e-sahar magar ek ummid-e-shikasta-par ki misal-e-dard siyah thi 
wo jo raat mujh ko baDe adab se salam kar ke chala gaya use kya KHabar mere dil mein bhi kabhi aarzu-e-gunah thi

achchhī guzar rahī hai dil-e-ḳhud-kafīl se lañgar se roTī lete haiñ paanī sabīl se 
duniyā kā koī daaġh mire dil ko kyā lage māñgā na ik diram bhī kabhī is baḳhīl se 
kyā boriyā-nashīñ ko havas taaj o taḳht kī kyā ḳhāk-āshnā ko ġharaz asp o fiil se 
dil kī taraf se ham kabhī ġhāfil nahīñ rahe karte haiñ pāsbānī-e-shahr us fasīl se 
gahvāra-e-safar meñ khulī hai hamārī aañkh ta.amīr apne ghar kī huī sañg-e-mīl se 
ik shaḳhs bādshāh to ik shaḳhs hai vazīr goyā nahīñ haiñ donoñ hamārī qabīl se 
duniyā mire paḌos meñ ābād hai magar merī duā-salām nahīñ us zalīl se 
'jāved' ek ġham ke sivā dil meñ hai bhī kyā ham ghar chalā rahe haiñ matā-e-qalīl se 
achchhi guzar rahi hai dil-e-KHud-kafil se langar se roTi lete hain pani sabil se 
duniya ka koi dagh mere dil ko kya lage manga na ek diram bhi kabhi is baKHil se 
kya boriya-nashin ko hawas taj o taKHt ki kya KHak-ashna ko gharaz asp o fil se 
dil ki taraf se hum kabhi ghafil nahin rahe karte hain pasbani-e-shahr us fasil se 
gahwara-e-safar mein khuli hai hamari aankh tamir apne ghar ki hui sang-e-mil se 
ek shaKHs baadshah to ek shaKHs hai wazir goya nahin hain donon hamari qabil se 
duniya mere paDos mein aabaad hai magar meri dua-salam nahin us zalil se 
'jawed' ek gham ke siwa dil mein hai bhi kya hum ghar chala rahe hain mata-e-qalil se

faqr ke haiñ mo.ajizāt taaj o sarīr o sipāh faqr hai mīroñ kā miir faqr hai shāhoñ kā shaah 
ilm kā maqsūd hai pāki-e-aql o ḳhirad faqr kā maqsūd hai iffat-e-qalb-o-nigāh 
ilm faqīh o hakīm faqr masīh o kalīm ilm hai jūyā-e-rāh faqr hai dānā-e-rāh 
faqr maqām-e-nazar ilm maqām-e-ḳhabar faqr mastī savāb ilm meñ mastī gunāh 
ilm kā maujūd aur faqr kā maujūd aur ash.hado an lā ilaah ash.hado an lā ilaah 
chaḌhtī hai jab faqr kī saan pe teġh-e-ḳhudī ek sipāhī kī zarb kartī hai kār-e-sipāh 
dil agar is ḳhaak meñ zinda o bedār ho terī nigah toḌ de ā.īna-e-mehr-o-māh 
faqr ke hain moajizat taj o sarir o sipah faqr hai miron ka mir faqr hai shahon ka shah 
ilm ka maqsud hai paki-e-aql o KHirad faqr ka maqsud hai iffat-e-qalb-o-nigah 
ilm faqih o hakim faqr masih o kalim ilm hai juya-e-rah faqr hai dana-e-rah 
faqr maqam-e-nazar ilm maqam-e-KHabar faqr masti sawab ilm mein masti gunah 
ilm ka maujud aur faqr ka maujud aur ashhado an la ilah ashhado an la ilah 
chaDhti hai jab faqr ki san pe tegh-e-KHudi ek sipahi ki zarb karti hai kar-e-sipah 
dil agar is KHak mein zinda o bedar ho teri nigah toD de aaina-e-mehr-o-mah

ḳhū samajh meñ nahīñ aatī tire dīvānoñ kī dāmanoñ kī na ḳhabar hai na girebānoñ kī 
jalva-e-sāġhar-o-mīnā hai jo ham-rañg-e-bahār raunaqeñ turfa taraqqī pe haiñ mai-ḳhānoñ kī 
har taraf be-ḳhudī o be-ḳhabarī kī hai numūd qābil-e-dīd hai duniyā tire hairānoñ kī 
sahl is se to yahī hai ki sambhāleñ dil ko minnateñ kaun kare aap ke darbānoñ kī 
aañkh vaale tirī sūrat pe miTe jaate haiñ sham-e-mahfil kī taraf bhiiḌ hai parvānoñ kī 
ai jafākār tire ahd se pahle to na thī kasrat is darja mohabbat ke pashīmānoñ kī 
rāz-e-ġham se hameñ āgāh kiyā ḳhuub kiyā kuchh nihāyat hī nahīñ aap ke ehsānoñ kī 
dushman-e-ahl-e-muravvat hai vo begāna-e-uns shakl pariyoñ kī hai ḳhū bhī nahīñ insānoñ kī 
hamrah-e-ġhair mubārak unheñ gul-gasht-e-chaman sair ham ko bhī mayassar hai bayābānoñ kī 
ik bakheḌā hai nazar meñ sar-o-sāmān-e-vajūd ab ye hālat hai tire soḳhta-sāmānoñ kī 
faiz-e-sāqī kī ajab dhuum hai mai-ḳhānoñ meñ har taraf mai kī talab maañg hai paimānoñ kī 
āshiqoñ hī kā jigar hai ki haiñ ḳhursañd-e-jafā kāfiroñ kī hai ye himmat na musalmānoñ kī 
yaad phir taaza huī haal se tere 'hasrat' qais o farhād ke guzre hue afsānoñ kī 
KHu samajh mein nahin aati tere diwanon ki damanon ki na KHabar hai na girebanon ki 
jalwa-e-saghar-o-mina hai jo ham-rang-e-bahaar raunaqen turfa taraqqi pe hain mai-KHanon ki 
har taraf be-KHudi o be-KHabari ki hai numud qabil-e-did hai duniya tere hairanon ki 
sahl is se to yahi hai ki sambhaalen dil ko minnaten kaun kare aap ke darbanon ki 
aankh wale teri surat pe miTe jate hain sham-e-mahfil ki taraf bhiD hai parwanon ki 
ai jafakar tere ahd se pahle to na thi kasrat is darja mohabbat ke pashimanon ki 
raaz-e-gham se hamein aagah kiya KHub kiya kuchh nihayat hi nahin aap ke ehsanon ki 
dushman-e-ahl-e-murawwat hai wo begana-e-uns shakl pariyon ki hai KHu bhi nahin insanon ki 
hamrah-e-ghair mubarak unhen gul-gasht-e-chaman sair hum ko bhi mayassar hai bayabanon ki 
ek bakheDa hai nazar mein sar-o-saman-e-wajud ab ye haalat hai tere soKHta-samanon ki 
faiz-e-saqi ki ajab dhum hai mai-KHanon mein har taraf mai ki talab mang hai paimanon ki 
aashiqon hi ka jigar hai ki hain KHursand-e-jafa kafiron ki hai ye himmat na musalmanon ki 
yaad phir taza hui haal se tere 'hasrat' qais o farhad ke guzre hue afsanon ki

saaf kahte ho magar kuchh nahīñ khultā kahnā baat kahnā bhī tumhārā hai muammā kahnā 
ro ke us shoḳh se qāsid mirā ronā kahnā hañs paḌe us pe to phir harf-e-tamannā kahnā 
misl-e-maktūb na kahne meñ hai kyā kyā kahnā na mirī tarz-e-ḳhamoshī na kisī kā kahnā 
aur thoḌī sī shab-e-vasl baḌhā de yā-rab sub.h nazdīk hameñ un se hai kyā kyā kahnā 
phaaḌ khātā hai jo ġhairoñ ko jhapaT kar sag-e-yār maiñ ye kahtā huuñ mire sher tirā kyā kahnā 
har bun-e-mū-e-mizha meñ haiñ yahāñ sau tūfāñ ain ġhaflat hai marī aañkh ko dariyā kahnā 
vasf-e-ruḳh meñ jo sune sher vo hañs kar bole sher haiñ nuur ke hai nuur kā terā kahnā 
lā sakoge na zarā jalva-e-dīdār kī taab arinī muñh se na ai hazrat-e-mūsā kahnā 
kar liyā ahd kabhī kuchh na kaheñge muñh se ab agar sach bhī kaheñ tum hameñ jhūTā kahnā 
ḳhaak meñ zid se milāo na mire aañsū ko sachche motī ko munāsib nahīñ jhūTā kahnā 
kaise nādāñ haiñ jo achchhoñ ko burā kahte haiñ ho burā bhī to use chāhiye achchhā kahnā 
dam-e-āḳhir tū buto yaad ḳhudā karne do zindagī bhar to kiyā maiñ ne tumhārā kahnā 
paḌhte haiñ dekh ke us but ko farishte bhī darūd marhabā salle-alā salle-alā kyā kahnā 
ai buto tum jo adā aa ke karo masjid meñ lab-e-mehrāb kahe nām-e-ḳhudā kyā kahnā 
in hasīnoñ kī jo tārīf karo chiḌhte haiñ sach to ye hai ki burā hai unheñ achchhā kahnā 
shauq ka.abe liye jaatā hai havas jānib-e-dair mere allāh bajā lā.ūñ meñ kis kā kahnā 
saarī mahfil ko ishāroñ meñ luTā do ai jaan siikh lo chashm-e-suḳhan-go se latīfa kahnā 
ghaTte ghaTte meñ rahā ishq-e-kamar meñ aadhā jāma-e-tan ko mire chāhiye niimā kahnā 
meñ to āñkhoñ se bajā laatā huuñ irshād-e-huzūr aap sunte nahīñ kānoñ se bhī merā kahnā 
chustī-e-tab.a se ustād kā hai qaul 'amīr' ho zamīñ sust magar chāhiye achchhā kahnā 
saf kahte ho magar kuchh nahin khulta kahna baat kahna bhi tumhaara hai muamma kahna 
ro ke us shoKH se qasid mera rona kahna hans paDe us pe to phir harf-e-tamanna kahna 
misl-e-maktub na kahne mein hai kya kya kahna na meri tarz-e-KHamoshi na kisi ka kahna 
aur thoDi si shab-e-wasl baDha de ya-rab subh nazdik hamein un se hai kya kya kahna 
phaD khata hai jo ghairon ko jhapaT kar sag-e-yar main ye kahta hun mere sher tera kya kahna 
har bun-e-mu-e-mizha mein hain yahan sau tufan ain ghaflat hai mari aankh ko dariya kahna 
wasf-e-ruKH mein jo sune sher wo hans kar bole sher hain nur ke hai nur ka tera kahna 
la sakoge na zara jalwa-e-didar ki tab arini munh se na ai hazrat-e-musa kahna 
kar liya ahd kabhi kuchh na kahenge munh se ab agar sach bhi kahen tum hamein jhuTa kahna 
KHak mein zid se milao na mere aansu ko sachche moti ko munasib nahin jhuTa kahna 
kaise nadan hain jo achchhon ko bura kahte hain ho bura bhi to use chahiye achchha kahna 
dam-e-aKHir tu buto yaad KHuda karne do zindagi bhar to kiya main ne tumhaara kahna 
paDhte hain dekh ke us but ko farishte bhi darud marhaba salle-ala salle-ala kya kahna 
ai buto tum jo ada aa ke karo masjid mein lab-e-mehrab kahe nam-e-KHuda kya kahna 
in hasinon ki jo tarif karo chiDhte hain sach to ye hai ki bura hai unhen achchha kahna 
shauq kabe liye jata hai hawas jaanib-e-dair mere allah baja laun mein kis ka kahna 
sari mahfil ko ishaaron mein luTa do ai jaan sikh lo chashm-e-suKHan-go se latifa kahna 
ghaTte ghaTte mein raha ishq-e-kamar mein aadha jama-e-tan ko mere chahiye nima kahna 
mein to aankhon se baja lata hun irshad-e-huzur aap sunte nahin kanon se bhi mera kahna 
chusti-e-taba se ustad ka hai qaul 'amir' ho zamin sust magar chahiye achchha kahna

din ko daftar meñ akelā shab bhare ghar meñ akelā maiñ ki aks-e-muntashir ek ek manzar meñ akelā 
uḌ chalā vo ik judā ḳhāka liye sar meñ akelā sub.h kā pahlā parinda āsmāñ bhar meñ akelā 
kaun de āvāz ḳhālī raat ke andhe kueñ meñ kaun utre ḳhvāb se mahrūm bistar meñ akelā 
us ko tanhā kar ga.ī karvaT koī pichhle pahar kī phir uḌā bhāgā vo saarā din nagar bhar meñ akelā 
ek maddham aañch sī āvāz sargam se alag kuchh rañg ik dabtā huā sā puure manzar meñ akelā 
boltī tasvīr meñ ik naqsh lekin kuchh haTā sā ek harf-e-mo'tabar lafzoñ ke lashkar meñ akelā 
jaao maujo merī manzil kā pata kyā pūchhtī ho ik jazīra duur uftāda samundar meñ akelā 
jaane kis ehsās ne aage nahīñ baḌhne diyā thā ab paḌā huuñ qaid maiñ raste ke patthar meñ akelā 
hū-ba-hū merī tarah chup-chāp mujh ko dekhtā hai ik laraztā ḳhūb-sūrat aks sāġhar meñ akelā 
din ko daftar mein akela shab bhare ghar mein akela main ki aks-e-muntashir ek ek manzar mein akela 
uD chala wo ek juda KHaka liye sar mein akela subh ka pahla parinda aasman bhar mein akela 
kaun de aawaz KHali raat ke andhe kuen mein kaun utre KHwab se mahrum bistar mein akela 
us ko tanha kar gai karwaT koi pichhle pahar ki phir uDa bhaga wo sara din nagar bhar mein akela 
ek maddham aanch si aawaz sargam se alag kuchh rang ek dabta hua sa pure manzar mein akela 
bolti taswir mein ek naqsh lekin kuchh haTa sa ek harf-e-mo'tabar lafzon ke lashkar mein akela 
jao maujo meri manzil ka pata kya puchhti ho ek jazira dur uftada samundar mein akela 
jaane kis ehsas ne aage nahin baDhne diya tha ab paDa hun qaid main raste ke patthar mein akela 
hu-ba-hu meri tarah chup-chap mujh ko dekhta hai ek larazta KHub-surat aks saghar mein akela

sau rañg hai kis rañg se tasvīr banā.ūñ mere to ka.ī ruup haiñ kis ruup meñ aa.uuñ 
kyuuñ aa ke har ik shaḳhs mire zaḳhm kurede kyuuñ maiñ bhī har ik shaḳhs ko haal apnā sunā.ūñ 
kyuuñ log musir haiñ ki suneñ merī kahānī ye haq mujhe hāsil hai sunā.ūñ ki chhupā.ūñ 
is bazm meñ apnā to shanāsā nahīñ koī kyā karb hai tanhā.ī kā maiñ kis ko batā.ūñ 
kuchh aur to hāsil na huā ḳhvāboñ se mujh ko bas ye hai ki yādoñ ke dar-o-bām sajā.ūñ 
be-qīmat-o-be-māya isī ḳhaak meñ yaaro vo ḳhaak bhī hogī jise āñkhoñ se lagā.ūñ 
kirnoñ kī rifāqat kabhī aa.e jo mayassar ham-rāh maiñ un ke tirī dahlīz pe aa.uuñ 
ḳhvāboñ ke ufuq par tirā chehra ho hamesha aur maiñ usī chehre se na.e ḳhvāb sajā.ūñ 
rah jaa.eñ kisī taur mere ḳhvāb salāmat is ek duā ke liye ab haath uThā.ūñ 
sau rang hai kis rang se taswir banaun mere to kai rup hain kis rup mein aaun 
kyun aa ke har ek shaKHs mere zaKHm kurede kyun main bhi har ek shaKHs ko haal apna sunaun 
kyun log musir hain ki sunen meri kahani ye haq mujhe hasil hai sunaun ki chhupaun 
is bazm mein apna to shanasa nahin koi kya karb hai tanhai ka main kis ko bataun 
kuchh aur to hasil na hua KHwabon se mujh ko bas ye hai ki yaadon ke dar-o-baam sajaun 
be-qimat-o-be-maya isi KHak mein yaro wo KHak bhi hogi jise aankhon se lagaun 
kirnon ki rifaqat kabhi aae jo mayassar ham-rah main un ke teri dahliz pe aaun 
KHwabon ke ufuq par tera chehra ho hamesha aur main usi chehre se nae KHwab sajaun 
rah jaen kisi taur mere KHwab salamat is ek dua ke liye ab hath uThaun

guloñ ko chhū ke shamīm-e-duā nahīñ aa.ī khulā huā thā darīcha sabā nahīñ aa.ī 
havā-e-dasht abhī to junūñ kā mausam thā kahāñ the ham tirī āvāz-e-pā nahīñ aa.ī 
abhī sahīfa-e-jāñ par raqam bhī kyā hogā abhī to yaad bhī be-sāḳhta nahīñ aa.ī 
ham itnī duur kahāñ the ki phir palaT na sakeñ savād-e-shahr se koī sadā nahīñ aa.ī 
sunā hai dil bhī nagar thā rasā basā bhī thā jalā to aañch bhī ahl-e-vafā nahīñ aa.ī 
na jaane qāfile guzre ki hai qayām abhī abhī charāġh bujhāne havā nahīñ aa.ī 
bas ek baar manāyā thā jashn-e-mahrūmī phir is ke ba.ad koī ibtilā nahīñ aa.ī 
hatheliyoñ ke gulāboñ se ḳhuun ristā rahā magar vo shoḳhī-e-rañg-e-hinā nahīñ aa.ī 
ġhayūr dil se na māñgī ga.ī murād 'adā' barasne aap hī kaalī ghaTā nahīñ aa.ī 
gulon ko chhu ke shamim-e-dua nahin aai khula hua tha daricha saba nahin aai 
hawa-e-dasht abhi to junun ka mausam tha kahan the hum teri aawaz-e-pa nahin aai 
abhi sahifa-e-jaan par raqam bhi kya hoga abhi to yaad bhi be-saKHta nahin aai 
hum itni dur kahan the ki phir palaT na saken sawad-e-shahr se koi sada nahin aai 
suna hai dil bhi nagar tha rasa basa bhi tha jala to aanch bhi ahl-e-wafa nahin aai 
na jaane qafile guzre ki hai qayam abhi abhi charagh bujhane hawa nahin aai 
bas ek bar manaya tha jashn-e-mahrumi phir is ke baad koi ibtila nahin aai 
hatheliyon ke gulabon se KHun rista raha magar wo shoKHi-e-rang-e-hina nahin aai 
ghayur dil se na mangi gai murad 'ada' barasne aap hi kali ghaTa nahin aai

ham sochte haiñ raat meñ tāroñ ko dekh kar sham.eñ zamīn kī haiñ jo daaġh āsmāñ ke haiñ 
jannat meñ ḳhaak bāda-parastoñ kā dil lage naqshe nazar meñ sohbat pīr-e-muġhāñ ke haiñ 
apnā maqām shāḳh-e-burīda hai baaġh meñ gul haiñ magar satā.e hue bāġhbāñ ke haiñ 
ik silsila havas kā hai insāñ kī zindagī is ek musht-e-ḳhāk ko ġham do-jahāñ ke haiñ 
hum sochte hain raat mein taron ko dekh kar shamen zamin ki hain jo dagh aasman ke hain 
jannat mein KHak baada-paraston ka dil lage naqshe nazar mein sohbat pir-e-mughan ke hain 
apna maqam shaKH-e-burida hai bagh mein gul hain magar satae hue baghban ke hain 
ek silsila hawas ka hai insan ki zindagi is ek musht-e-KHak ko gham do-jahan ke hain

sūraj ko nikalnā hai so niklegā dubāra ab dekhiye kab Dūbtā hai sub.h kā taara 
maġhrib meñ jo Duube use mashriq hī nikāle maiñ ḳhuub samajhtā huuñ mashiyyat kā ishāra 
paḌhtā huuñ jab us ko to sanā kartā huuñ rab kī insān kā chehra hai ki qur.ān kā paara 
jī haar ke tum paar na kar paao nadī bhī vaise to samundar kā bhī hotā hai kināra 
jannat milī jhūToñ ko agar jhuuT ke badle sachchoñ ko sazā meñ hai jahannam bhī gavārā 
ye kaun sā insāf hai ai arsh-nashīno bijlī jo tumhārī hai to ḳhirman hai hamārā 
mustaqbil-e-insān ne e'lān kiyā hai ā.inda se be-tāj rahegā sar-e-dārā 
suraj ko nikalna hai so niklega dubara ab dekhiye kab Dubta hai subh ka tara 
maghrib mein jo Dube use mashriq hi nikale main KHub samajhta hun mashiyyat ka ishaara 
paDhta hun jab us ko to sana karta hun rab ki insan ka chehra hai ki quran ka para 
ji haar ke tum par na kar pao nadi bhi waise to samundar ka bhi hota hai kinara 
jannat mili jhuTon ko agar jhuT ke badle sachchon ko saza mein hai jahannam bhi gawara 
ye kaun sa insaf hai ai arsh-nashino bijli jo tumhaari hai to KHirman hai hamara 
mustaqbil-e-insan ne e'lan kiya hai aainda se be-taj rahega sar-e-dara

'at.har' tum ne ishq kiyā kuchh tum bhī kaho kyā haal huā koī nayā ehsās milā yā sab jaisā ahvāl huā 
ek safar hai vādī-e-jāñ meñ tere dard-e-hijr ke saath terā dard-e-hijr jo baḌh kar lazzat-e-kaif-e-visāl huā 
rāh-e-vafā meñ jaañ denā hī pesh-ravoñ kā sheva thā ham ne jab se jiinā sīkhā jiinā kār-e-misāl huā 
ishq fasāna thā jab tak apne bhī bahut afsāne the ishq sadāqat hote hote kitnā kam-ahvāl huā 
rāh-e-vafā dushvār bahut thī tum kyuuñ mere saath aa.e phuul sā chehra kumhlāyā aur rañg-e-hinā pāmāl huā 
'athar' tum ne ishq kiya kuchh tum bhi kaho kya haal hua koi naya ehsas mila ya sab jaisa ahwal hua 
ek safar hai wadi-e-jaan mein tere dard-e-hijr ke sath tera dard-e-hijr jo baDh kar lazzat-e-kaif-e-visal hua 
rah-e-wafa mein jaan dena hi pesh-rawon ka shewa tha hum ne jab se jina sikha jina kar-e-misal hua 
ishq fasana tha jab tak apne bhi bahut afsane the ishq sadaqat hote hote kitna kam-ahwal hua 
rah-e-wafa dushwar bahut thi tum kyun mere sath aae phul sa chehra kumhlaya aur rang-e-hina pamal hua

lau ko chhūne kī havas meñ ek chehra jal gayā sham.a ke itne qarīb aayā ki saayā jal gayā 
pyaas kī shiddat thī sairābī meñ sahrā kī tarah vo badan paanī meñ kyā utrā ki dariyā jal gayā 
kyā ajab kār-e-tahayyur hai supurd-e-nār-e-ishq ghar meñ jo thā bach gayā aur jo nahīñ thā jal gayā 
garmi-e-dīdār aisī thī tamāshā-gāh meñ dekhne vāloñ kī āñkhoñ meñ tamāshā jal gayā 
ḳhud hī ḳhākistar kiyā us ne mujhe aur us ke baad mujh se ḳhud hī pūchhtā hai bol kyā kyā jal gayā 
sirf yād-e-yār baaqī rah ga.ī dil meñ 'salīm' ek ik kar ke sabhī asbāb-e-duniyā jal gayā 
lau ko chhune ki hawas mein ek chehra jal gaya shama ke itne qarib aaya ki saya jal gaya 
pyas ki shiddat thi sairabi mein sahra ki tarah wo badan pani mein kya utra ki dariya jal gaya 
kya ajab kar-e-tahayyur hai supurd-e-nar-e-ishq ghar mein jo tha bach gaya aur jo nahin tha jal gaya 
garmi-e-didar aisi thi tamasha-gah mein dekhne walon ki aankhon mein tamasha jal gaya 
KHud hi KHakistar kiya us ne mujhe aur us ke baad mujh se KHud hi puchhta hai bol kya kya jal gaya 
sirf yaad-e-yar baqi rah gai dil mein 'salim' ek ek kar ke sabhi asbab-e-duniya jal gaya

sar-e-taslīm hai ḳham izn-e-uqūbat ke baġhair ham to sarkār ke maddāh haiñ ḳhil.at ke baġhair 
sar-barahna huuñ to kyā ġham hai ki ab shahr meñ log barguzīda hue dastār-e-fazīlat ke baġhair 
dekh tanhā mirī āvāz kahāñ tak pahuñchī kyā safar tai nahīñ hote haiñ rifāqat ke baġhair 
ishq meñ 'mīr' ke ādāb na barto ki yahāñ kaam chaltā nahīñ ailān-e-mohabbat ke baġhair 
ret par thak ke girā huuñ to havā pūchhtī hai aap is dasht meñ kyuuñ aa.e the vahshat ke baġhair 
sar-e-taslim hai KHam izn-e-uqubat ke baghair hum to sarkar ke maddah hain KHilat ke baghair 
sar-barahna hun to kya gham hai ki ab shahr mein log barguzida hue dastar-e-fazilat ke baghair 
dekh tanha meri aawaz kahan tak pahunchi kya safar tai nahin hote hain rifaqat ke baghair 
ishq mein 'mir' ke aadab na barto ki yahan kaam chalta nahin ailan-e-mohabbat ke baghair 
ret par thak ke gira hun to hawa puchhti hai aap is dasht mein kyun aae the wahshat ke baghair

āġhāz-e-ishq umr kā anjām ho gayā nākāmiyoñ ke ġham meñ mirā kaam ho gayā 
tum roz-o-shab jo dast-ba-dast-e-adū phire maiñ pā.emāl-e-gardish-e-ayyām ho gayā 
merā nishāñ miTā to miTā par ye rashk hai vird-e-zabān-e-ḳhalq tirā naam ho gayā 
dil chaak chaak naġhma-e-nāqūs ne kiyā sab paara paara jāma-e-ehrām ho gayā 
ab aur DhūñDiye koī jaulāñ-gah-e-junūñ sahrā ba-qadr-e-vus.at-e-yak-gām ho gayā 
dil pech se na turra-e-pur-ḳham ke chhuT sakā bālā-ravī se murġh tah-e-dām ho gayā 
aur apne haq meñ ta.an-e-taġhāful ġhazab huā ġhairoñ se multafit but-e-ḳhud-kām ho gayā 
tāsīr-e-jazba kyā ho ki dil iztirāb meñ taskīñ-pazīr bosa-ba-paiġhām ho gayā 
kyā ab bhī mujh pe farz nahīñ dostī-e-kufr vo zid se merī dushman-e-islām ho gayā 
allāh-re bosa-e-lab-e-mai-gūñ kī aarzū maiñ ḳhaak ho ke durd-e-tah-e-jām ho gayā 
ab tak bhī hai nazar taraf-e-bām-e-māh-vash maiñ garche āftāb-e-lab-e-bām ho gayā 
ab harf-e-nā-sazā meñ bhī un ko dareġh hai kyuuñ mujh ko zauq-e-lazzat-e-dushnām ho gayā 
aaghaz-e-ishq umr ka anjam ho gaya nakaamiyon ke gham mein mera kaam ho gaya 
tum roz-o-shab jo dast-ba-dast-e-adu phire main paemal-e-gardish-e-ayyam ho gaya 
mera nishan miTa to miTa par ye rashk hai wird-e-zaban-e-KHalq tera nam ho gaya 
dil chaak chaak naghma-e-naqus ne kiya sab para para jama-e-ehram ho gaya 
ab aur DhunDiye koi jaulan-gah-e-junun sahra ba-qadr-e-wusat-e-yak-gam ho gaya 
dil pech se na turra-e-pur-KHam ke chhuT saka baala-rawi se murgh tah-e-dam ho gaya 
aur apne haq mein tan-e-taghaful ghazab hua ghairon se multafit but-e-KHud-kaam ho gaya 
tasir-e-jazba kya ho ki dil iztirab mein taskin-pazir bosa-ba-paigham ho gaya 
kya ab bhi mujh pe farz nahin dosti-e-kufr wo zid se meri dushman-e-islam ho gaya 
allah-re bosa-e-lab-e-mai-gun ki aarzu main KHak ho ke durd-e-tah-e-jam ho gaya 
ab tak bhi hai nazar taraf-e-baam-e-mah-wash main garche aaftab-e-lab-e-baam ho gaya 
ab harf-e-na-saza mein bhi un ko daregh hai kyun mujh ko zauq-e-lazzat-e-dushnam ho gaya

kahā jo maiñ ne ki yūsuf ko ye hijāb na thā to hañs ke bole vo muñh qābil-e-naqāb na thā 
shab-e-visāl bhī vo shoḳh be-hijāb na thā naqāb ulaT ke bhī dekhā to be-naqāb na thā 
lipaT ke chuum liyā muñh miTā diyā un kā nahīñ kā un ke sivā is ke kuchh javāb na thā 
mire janāze pe ab aate sharm aatī hai halāl karne ko baiThe the jab hijāb na thā 
nasīb jaag uThe so ga.e jo paañv mire tumhāre kūche se behtar maqām-e-ḳhvāb na thā 
ġhazab kiyā ki ise tū ne mohtasib toḌā are ye dil thā mirā shīsha-e-sharāb na thā 
zamāna vasl meñ letā hai karvaTeñ kyā kyā firāq-e-yār ke din ek inqalāb na thā 
tumhīñ ne qatl kiyā hai mujhe jo tante ho akele the malak-ul-maut ham-rikāb na thā 
duā-e-tauba bhī ham ne paḌhī to mai pī kar maza hī ham ko kisī shai kā be-sharāb na thā 
maiñ rū-e-yār kā mushtāq ho ke aaya thā tire jamāl kā shaidā to ai naqāb na thā 
bayān kī jo shab-e-ġham kī bekasī to kahā jigar meñ dard na thā dil meñ iztirāb na thā 
vo baiThe baiThe jo de baiThe qatl-e-ām kā hukm hañsī thī un kī kisī par koī itaab na thā 
jo laash bhejī thī qāsid kī bhejte ḳhat bhī rasīd vo to mire ḳhat kī thī javāb na thā 
surūr-e-qatl se thī haath paañv ko jumbish vo mujh pe vajd kā aalam thā iztirāb na thā 
sabāt bahr-e-jahāñ meñ nahīñ kisī ko 'amīr' idhar numūd huā aur udhar hubāb na thā 
kaha jo main ne ki yusuf ko ye hijab na tha to hans ke bole wo munh qabil-e-naqab na tha 
shab-e-visal bhi wo shoKH be-hijab na tha naqab ulaT ke bhi dekha to be-naqab na tha 
lipaT ke chum liya munh miTa diya un ka nahin ka un ke siwa is ke kuchh jawab na tha 
mere janaze pe ab aate sharm aati hai halal karne ko baiThe the jab hijab na tha 
nasib jag uThe so gae jo panw mere tumhaare kuche se behtar maqam-e-KHwab na tha 
ghazab kiya ki ise tu ne mohtasib toDa are ye dil tha mera shisha-e-sharab na tha 
zamana wasl mein leta hai karwaTen kya kya firaq-e-yar ke din ek inqalab na tha 
tumhin ne qatl kiya hai mujhe jo tante ho akele the malak-ul-maut ham-rikab na tha 
dua-e-tauba bhi hum ne paDhi to mai pi kar maza hi hum ko kisi shai ka be-sharab na tha 
main ru-e-yar ka mushtaq ho ke aaya tha tere jamal ka shaida to ai naqab na tha 
bayan ki jo shab-e-gham ki bekasi to kaha jigar mein dard na tha dil mein iztirab na tha 
wo baiThe baiThe jo de baiThe qatl-e-am ka hukm hansi thi un ki kisi par koi itab na tha 
jo lash bheji thi qasid ki bhejte KHat bhi rasid wo to mere KHat ki thi jawab na tha 
surur-e-qatl se thi hath panw ko jumbish wo mujh pe wajd ka aalam tha iztirab na tha 
sabaat bahr-e-jahan mein nahin kisi ko 'amir' idhar numud hua aur udhar hubab na tha

kyā ye bhī maiñ batlā duuñ tū kaun hai maiñ kyā huuñ tū jān-e-tamāshā hai maiñ mahv-e-tamāshā huuñ 
tū bā.is-e-hastī hai maiñ hāsil-e-hastī huuñ tū ḳhāliq-e-ulfat hai aur maiñ tirā banda huuñ
