jab tak na milā thā tū ai fitna-e-do-ālam jab dard se ġhāfil thā ab dard kī duniyā huuñ 
kuchh farq nahīñ tujh meñ aur mujh meñ koī lekin tū aur kisī kā hai bedard maiñ terā huuñ 
muddat huī kho baiThā sarmāya-e-taskīñ maiñ ab to tirī furqat meñ din raat taḌaptā huuñ 
armān nahīñ koī go dil meñ mire lekin allāh rī majbūrī majbūr-e-tamannā huuñ 
'bahzād'-e-hazīñ mujh par ik kaif sā taarī hai ab ye mirā aalam hai hañstā huuñ na rotā huuñ 
kya ye bhi main batla dun tu kaun hai main kya hun tu jaan-e-tamasha hai main mahw-e-tamasha hun 
tu bais-e-hasti hai main hasil-e-hasti hun tu KHaliq-e-ulfat hai aur main tera banda hun 
jab tak na mila tha tu ai fitna-e-do-alam jab dard se ghafil tha ab dard ki duniya hun 
kuchh farq nahin tujh mein aur mujh mein koi lekin tu aur kisi ka hai bedard main tera hun 
muddat hui kho baiTha sarmaya-e-taskin main ab to teri furqat mein din raat taDapta hun 
arman nahin koi go dil mein mere lekin allah ri majburi majbur-e-tamanna hun 
'bahzad'-e-hazin mujh par ek kaif sa tari hai ab ye mera aalam hai hansta hun na rota hun

likh likh ke āñsuoñ se dīvān kar liyā hai apne suḳhan ko apnī pahchān kar liyā hai 
āḳhir haTā diiñ ham ne bhī zehn se kitābeñ ham ne bhī apnā jiinā āsān kar liyā hai 
duniyā meñ āñkheñ kholī haiñ mūñdne kī ḳhātir aate hī lauTne kā sāmān kar liyā hai 
sab log is se pahle ki devtā samajhte ham ne zarā sā ḳhud ko insān kar liyā hai 
jin nekiyoñ pe chal kar ajdād kitne ḳhush the ham ne unhī pe chal kar nuqsān kar liyā hai 
har baar apne dil kī bāteñ zabāñ pe lā kar ham ne musībatoñ ko mehmān kar liyā hai 
aksar huā hai marne kī maañg kar duā.eñ phir ham ne zindagī kā armān kar liyā hai 
ik dil ke TūTne par rotā hai koī itnā jhoñke ko ḳhud hamīñ ne tūfān kar liyā hai 
sochā bhī hai ki daanā banñe kī koshishoñ meñ kyā haal apnā tū ne nādān kar liyā hai 
kuchh is tarah guzārā hai zindagī ko ham ne jaise ki ḳhud pe koī ehsān kar liyā hai 
likh likh ke aansuon se diwan kar liya hai apne suKHan ko apni pahchan kar liya hai 
aaKHir haTa din hum ne bhi zehn se kitaben hum ne bhi apna jina aasan kar liya hai 
duniya mein aankhen kholi hain mundne ki KHatir aate hi lauTne ka saman kar liya hai 
sab log is se pahle ki dewta samajhte hum ne zara sa KHud ko insan kar liya hai 
jin nekiyon pe chal kar ajdad kitne KHush the hum ne unhi pe chal kar nuqsan kar liya hai 
har bar apne dil ki baaten zaban pe la kar hum ne musibaton ko mehman kar liya hai 
aksar hua hai marne ki mang kar duaen phir hum ne zindagi ka arman kar liya hai 
ek dil ke TuTne par rota hai koi itna jhonke ko KHud hamin ne tufan kar liya hai 
socha bhi hai ki dana banne ki koshishon mein kya haal apna tu ne nadan kar liya hai 
kuchh is tarah guzara hai zindagi ko hum ne jaise ki KHud pe koi ehsan kar liya hai

biite hue lamhāt ko pahchān meñ rakhnā murjhā.e hue phuul bhī gul-dān meñ rakhnā 
kyā jāneñ safar ḳhair se guzre ki na guzre tum ghar kā pata bhī mire sāmān meñ rakhnā 
kyā din the mujhe shauq se mehmān bulānā aur ḳhud ko magar ḳhidmat-e-mehmān meñ rakhnā 
kyā vaqt thā kyā vaqt hai is soch se hāsil chhoḌo jo huā kyā use mīzān meñ rakhnā 
insān kī niyyat kā bharosa nahīñ koī milte ho to is baat ko imkān meñ rakhnā 
pursish hai bahut saḳht vahāñ fard-e-amal kī kuchh na.at ke ash.ār bhī dīvān meñ rakhnā 
muḳhlis ho raho Tokā hai kis ne tumheñ 'anjum' raftār-e-zamāna bhī magar dhyān meñ rakhnā 
bite hue lamhat ko pahchan mein rakhna murjhae hue phul bhi gul-dan mein rakhna 
kya jaanen safar KHair se guzre ki na guzre tum ghar ka pata bhi mere saman mein rakhna 
kya din the mujhe shauq se mehman bulana aur KHud ko magar KHidmat-e-mehman mein rakhna 
kya waqt tha kya waqt hai is soch se hasil chhoDo jo hua kya use mizan mein rakhna 
insan ki niyyat ka bharosa nahin koi milte ho to is baat ko imkan mein rakhna 
pursish hai bahut saKHt wahan fard-e-amal ki kuchh nat ke ashaar bhi diwan mein rakhna 
muKHlis ho raho Toka hai kis ne tumhein 'anjum' raftar-e-zamana bhi magar dhyan mein rakhna

sambhālne se tabī.at kahāñ sambhaltī hai vo be-kasī hai ki duniyā ragoñ meñ chaltī hai 
ye sard-mehr ujālā ye jītī-jāgtī raat tire ḳhayāl se tasvīr-e-māh jaltī hai 
vo chaal ho ki badan ho kamān jaisī kashish qadam se ghaat adā se adā nikaltī hai 
tumheñ ḳhayāl nahīñ kis tarah batā.eñ tumheñ ki saañs chaltī hai lekin udaas chaltī hai 
tumhāre shahr kā insāf hai ajab insāf idhar nigāh udhar zindagī badaltī hai 
bikhar ga.e mujhe sāñche meñ Dhālne vaale yahāñ to zaat bhī sāñche samet Dhaltī hai 
ḳhizāñ hai hāsil-e-hañgāma-e-bahār 'ḳhizāñ' bahār phūltī hai kā.enāt phaltī hai 
sambhaalne se tabiat kahan sambhalti hai wo be-kasi hai ki duniya ragon mein chalti hai 
ye sard-mehr ujala ye jiti-jagti raat tere KHayal se taswir-e-mah jalti hai 
wo chaal ho ki badan ho kaman jaisi kashish qadam se ghat ada se ada nikalti hai 
tumhein KHayal nahin kis tarah bataen tumhein ki sans chalti hai lekin udas chalti hai 
tumhaare shahr ka insaf hai ajab insaf idhar nigah udhar zindagi badalti hai 
bikhar gae mujhe sanche mein Dhaalne wale yahan to zat bhi sanche samet Dhalti hai 
KHizan hai hasil-e-hangama-e-bahaar 'KHizan' bahaar phulti hai kaenat phalti hai

jab dahr ke ġham se amaañ na milī ham logoñ ne ishq ījād kiyā kabhī shahr-e-butāñ meñ ḳharāb phire kabhī dasht-e-junūñ ābād kiyā 
kabhī bastiyāñ ban kabhī koh-o-daman rahā kitne dinoñ yahī jī kā chalan jahāñ husn milā vahāñ baiTh rahe jahāñ pyaar milā vahāñ saad kiyā 
shab-e-māh meñ jab bhī ye dard uThā kabhī bait kahe likhī chāñd-nagar kabhī koh se jā sar phoḌ mare kabhī qais ko jā ustād kiyā 
yahī ishq bil-āḳhir rog banā ki hai chaah ke saath ba-jog banā jise banñā thā aish vo sog banā baḌā man ke nagar meñ fasād kiyā 
ab qurbat-o-sohbat-e-yār kahāñ lab o aariz o zulf o kanār kahāñ ab apnā bhī 'mīr' sā aalam hai Tuk dekh liyā jī shaad kiyā 
jab dahr ke gham se aman na mili hum logon ne ishq ijad kiya kabhi shahr-e-butan mein KHarab phire kabhi dasht-e-junun aabaad kiya 
kabhi bastiyan ban kabhi koh-o-daman raha kitne dinon yahi ji ka chalan jahan husn mila wahan baiTh rahe jahan pyar mila wahan sad kiya 
shab-e-mah mein jab bhi ye dard uTha kabhi bait kahe likhi chand-nagar kabhi koh se ja sar phoD mare kabhi qais ko ja ustad kiya 
yahi ishq bil-aKHir rog bana ki hai chah ke sath ba-jog bana jise banna tha aish wo sog bana baDa man ke nagar mein fasad kiya 
ab qurbat-o-sohbat-e-yar kahan lab o aariz o zulf o kanar kahan ab apna bhi 'mir' sa aalam hai Tuk dekh liya ji shad kiya

dekho to kuchh ziyāñ nahīñ khone ke bāvajūd hotā hai ab bhī ishq na hone ke bāvajūd 
shāyad ye ḳhaak meñ hī samāne kī mashq ho sotā huuñ farsh par jo bichhaune ke bāvajūd 
kartā huuñ niind meñ hī safar saare shahr kā fāriġh to baiThtā nahīñ sone ke bāvajūd 
hotī nahīñ hai merī tasallī kisī tarah rone kā intizār hai rone ke bāvajūd 
paanī to ek umr se mujh par hai be-asar mailā huuñ jaise aur bhī dhone ke bāvajūd 
bojhal to maiñ kuchh aur bhī rahtā huuñ raat din sāmān-e-ḳhvāb raat ko Dhone ke bāvajūd 
thī pyaas to vahīñ kī vahīñ aur maiñ vahāñ ḳhush thā zarā sā hoñT bhigone ke bāvajūd 
ye kīmiyā-garī mirī apnī hai is liye maiñ raakh hī samajhtā huuñ sone ke bāvajūd 
Dartā huuñ phir kahīñ se nikāleñ na sar 'zafar' maiñ us ko apne saath Dubone ke bāvajūd 
dekho to kuchh ziyan nahin khone ke bawajud hota hai ab bhi ishq na hone ke bawajud 
shayad ye KHak mein hi samane ki mashq ho sota hun farsh par jo bichhaune ke bawajud 
karta hun nind mein hi safar sare shahr ka farigh to baiThta nahin sone ke bawajud 
hoti nahin hai meri tasalli kisi tarah rone ka intizar hai rone ke bawajud 
pani to ek umr se mujh par hai be-asar maila hun jaise aur bhi dhone ke bawajud 
bojhal to main kuchh aur bhi rahta hun raat din saman-e-KHwab raat ko Dhone ke bawajud 
thi pyas to wahin ki wahin aur main wahan KHush tha zara sa honT bhigone ke bawajud 
ye kimiya-gari meri apni hai is liye main rakh hi samajhta hun sone ke bawajud 
Darta hun phir kahin se nikalen na sar 'zafar' main us ko apne sath Dubone ke bawajud

saare manzar ek jaise saarī bāteñ ek sī saare din haiñ ek se aur saarī rāteñ ek sī 
be-natīja be-samar jañg-o-jadal suud o ziyāñ saarī jīteñ ek jaisī saarī māteñ ek sī 
sab mulāqātoñ kā maqsad kārobār-e-zar-garī sab kī dahshat ek jaisī sab kī ghāteñ ek sī 
ab kisī meñ agle vaqtoñ kī vafā baaqī nahīñ sab qabīle ek haiñ ab saarī zāteñ ek sī 
ek hī ruḳh kī asīrī ḳhvāb hai shahroñ kā ab un ke mātam ek se un kī barāteñ ek sī 
hoñ agar zer-e-zamīñ to fā.eda hone kā kyā sañg o gauhar ek haiñ phir saarī dhāteñ ek sī 
ai 'munīr' āzād ho is sehr-e-yak-rañgī se tū ho ga.e sab zahr yaksāñ sab nabāteñ ek sī 
sare manzar ek jaise sari baaten ek si sare din hain ek se aur sari raaten ek si 
be-natija be-samar jang-o-jadal sud o ziyan sari jiten ek jaisi sari maten ek si 
sab mulaqaton ka maqsad karobar-e-zar-gari sab ki dahshat ek jaisi sab ki ghaten ek si 
ab kisi mein agle waqton ki wafa baqi nahin sab qabile ek hain ab sari zaten ek si 
ek hi ruKH ki asiri KHwab hai shahron ka ab un ke matam ek se un ki baraaten ek si 
hon agar zer-e-zamin to faeda hone ka kya sang o gauhar ek hain phir sari dhaten ek si 
ai 'munir' aazad ho is sehr-e-yak-rangi se tu ho gae sab zahr yaksan sab nabaaten ek si

koī sañg-e-rah bhī chamak uThā to sitāra-e-saharī kahā mirī raat bhī tire naam thī use kis ne tīra-shabī kahā 
mire roz o shab bhī ajiib the na shumār thā na hisāb thā kabhī umr bhar kī ḳhabar na thī kabhī ek pal ko sadī kahā 
mujhe jāntā bhī koī na thā mire be-niyāz tire sivā na shikast-e-dil na shikast-e-jāñ ki tirī ḳhushī ko ḳhushī kahā 
koī yaad aa bhī ga.ī to kyā koī zaḳhm khil bhī uThā to kyā jo sabā qarīb se ho chalī use minnatoñ kī ghaḌī kahā 
bharī dopahar meñ jo paas thī vo tire ḳhayāl kī chhāñv thī kabhī shāḳh-e-gul se misāl dī kabhī us ko sarv-e-sahī kahā 
kahīñ sañg-e-rah kahīñ sang-e-dar ki maiñ pattharoñ ke nagar meñ huuñ ye nahīñ ki dil ko ḳhabar na thī ye batā ki muñh se kabhī kahā 
mire harf harf ke haath meñ sabhī ā.inoñ kī haiñ kirchiyāñ jo zabāñ se ho na sakā 'adā' ba-hudūd-e-be-suḳhanī kahā 
koi sang-e-rah bhi chamak uTha to sitara-e-sahari kaha meri raat bhi tere nam thi use kis ne tira-shabi kaha 
mere roz o shab bhi ajib the na shumar tha na hisab tha kabhi umr bhar ki KHabar na thi kabhi ek pal ko sadi kaha 
mujhe jaanta bhi koi na tha mere be-niyaz tere siwa na shikast-e-dil na shikast-e-jaan ki teri KHushi ko KHushi kaha 
koi yaad aa bhi gai to kya koi zaKHm khil bhi uTha to kya jo saba qarib se ho chali use minnaton ki ghaDi kaha 
bhari dopahar mein jo pas thi wo tere KHayal ki chhanw thi kabhi shaKH-e-gul se misal di kabhi us ko sarw-e-sahi kaha 
kahin sang-e-rah kahin sang-e-dar ki main pattharon ke nagar mein hun ye nahin ki dil ko KHabar na thi ye bata ki munh se kabhi kaha 
mere harf harf ke hath mein sabhi aainon ki hain kirchiyan jo zaban se ho na saka 'ada' ba-hudud-e-be-suKHani kaha

koi yaad aa bhi gai to kya koi zaKHm khil bhi uTha to kya jo saba qarib se ho chali use minnaton ki ghaDi kaha 
bhari dopahar mein jo pas thi wo tere KHayal ki chhanw thi kabhi shaKH-e-gul se misal di kabhi us ko sarw-e-sahi kaha 
kahin sang-e-rah kahin sang-e-dar ki main pattharon ke nagar mein hun ye nahin ki dil ko KHabar na thi ye bata ki munh se kabhi kaha 
mere harf harf ke hath mein sabhi aainon ki hain kirchiyan jo zaban se ho na saka 'ada' ba-hudud-e-be-suKHani kaha

jo ham-kalām ho ham se usī ke hote haiñ ham ek vaqt meñ ek aadmī ke hote haiñ 
koī jahāñ meñ ḳhushī se guzārnā chāhe to be-shumār bahāne ḳhushī ke hote haiñ 
jamāliyāt ke parche meñ aaTh nau number faqat shaguftagī-o-dil-kashī ke hote haiñ 
kisī ke saath bhī baiThe hue dikhā.ī deñ tasavvurāt meñ ham aap hī ke hote haiñ 
'shu.ūr' sirf irāde se kuchh nahīñ hotā amal hai shart irāde sabhī ke hote haiñ 
jo ham-kalam ho hum se usi ke hote hain hum ek waqt mein ek aadmi ke hote hain 
koi jahan mein KHushi se guzarna chahe to be-shumar bahane KHushi ke hote hain 
jamaliyat ke parche mein aaTh nau number faqat shaguftagi-o-dil-kashi ke hote hain 
kisi ke sath bhi baiThe hue dikhai den tasawwuraat mein hum aap hi ke hote hain 
'shuur' sirf irade se kuchh nahin hota amal hai shart irade sabhi ke hote hain

bas is qadar hai ḳhulāsa mirī kahānī kā ki ban ke TuuT gayā ik habāb paanī kā 
milā hai saaqī to raushan huā hai ye mujh par ki hazf thā koī TukḌā mirī kahānī kā 
mujhe bhī chehre pe raunaq dikhā.ī detī hai ye mo.ajiza hai tabīboñ kī ḳhush-bayānī kā 
hai dil meñ ek hī ḳhvāhish vo Duub jaane kī koī shabāb koī husn hai ravānī kā 
libās-e-hashr meñ kuchh ho to aur kyā hogā bujhā sā ek chhanākā tirī javānī kā 
karam ke rañg nihāyat ajiib hote haiñ sitam bhī ek tarīqa hai mehrbānī kā 
'adam' bahār ke mausam ne ḳhud-kushī kar lī khulā jo rañg kisī jism-e-arġhavānī kā 
bas is qadar hai KHulasa meri kahani ka ki ban ke TuT gaya ek habab pani ka 
mila hai saqi to raushan hua hai ye mujh par ki hazf tha koi TukDa meri kahani ka 
mujhe bhi chehre pe raunaq dikhai deti hai ye moajiza hai tabibon ki KHush-bayani ka 
hai dil mein ek hi KHwahish wo Dub jaane ki koi shabab koi husn hai rawani ka 
libas-e-hashr mein kuchh ho to aur kya hoga bujha sa ek chhanaka teri jawani ka 
karam ke rang nihayat ajib hote hain sitam bhi ek tariqa hai mehrbani ka 
'adam' bahaar ke mausam ne KHud-kushi kar li khula jo rang kisi jism-e-arghawani ka

jalve mirī nigāh meñ kaun-o-makāñ ke haiñ mujh se kahāñ chhupeñge vo aise kahāñ ke haiñ 
khulte nahīñ haiñ raaz jo soz-e-nihāñ ke haiñ kyā phūTne ke vāste chhāle zabāñ ke haiñ 
karte haiñ qatl vo talab-e-maġhfirat ke ba.ad jo the duā ke haath vahī imtihāñ ke haiñ 
jis roz kuchh sharīk huī merī musht-e-ḳhāk us roz se zamīñ pe sitam āsmāñ ke haiñ 
baazū dikhā.e tum ne lagā kar hazār haath puure paḌe to vo bhī bahut imtihāñ ke haiñ 
nāseh ke sāmne kabhī sach boltā nahīñ merī zabāñ meñ rañg tumhārī zabāñ ke haiñ 
kaisā javāb hazrat-e-dil dekhiye zarā paiġhām-bar ke haath meñ TukḌe zabāñ ke haiñ 
kyā iztirāb-e-shauq ne mujh ko ḳhajil kiyā vo pūchhte haiñ kahiye irāde kahāñ ke haiñ 
āshiq tire adam ko ga.e kis qadar tabāh pūchhā har ek ne ye musāfir kahāñ ke haiñ 
har-chand 'dāġh' ek hī ayyār hai magar dushman bhī to chhaTe hue saare jahāñ ke haiñ 
jalwe meri nigah mein kaun-o-makan ke hain mujh se kahan chhupenge wo aise kahan ke hain 
khulte nahin hain raaz jo soz-e-nihan ke hain kya phuTne ke waste chhaale zaban ke hain 
karte hain qatl wo talab-e-maghfirat ke baad jo the dua ke hath wahi imtihan ke hain 
jis roz kuchh sharik hui meri musht-e-KHak us roz se zamin pe sitam aasman ke hain 
bazu dikhae tum ne laga kar hazar hath pure paDe to wo bhi bahut imtihan ke hain 
naseh ke samne kabhi sach bolta nahin meri zaban mein rang tumhaari zaban ke hain 
kaisa jawab hazrat-e-dil dekhiye zara paigham-bar ke hath mein TukDe zaban ke hain 
kya iztirab-e-shauq ne mujh ko KHajil kiya wo puchhte hain kahiye irade kahan ke hain 
aashiq tere adam ko gae kis qadar tabah puchha har ek ne ye musafir kahan ke hain 
har-chand 'dagh' ek hi ayyar hai magar dushman bhi to chhaTe hue sare jahan ke hain

ḳhalā ke jaisā koī darmiyān bhī paḌtā phir is safar meñ kahīñ āsmān bhī paḌtā 
maiñ choT kar to rahā huuñ havā ke māthe par mazā to jab thā ki koī nishān bhī paḌtā 
ajiib ḳhvāhisheñ uThtī haiñ is ḳharābe meñ guzar rahe haiñ to apnā makān bhī paḌtā 
hamīñ jahān ke pīchhe paḌe raheñ kab tak hamāre pīchhe kabhī ye jahān bhī paḌtā 
ye ik kamī ki jo ab zindagī sī lagtī hai hamārī dhuup meñ vo sā.ebān bhī paḌtā 
har ek roz isī zindagī kī tayyārī so chāhte haiñ kabhī imtihān bhī paḌtā 
KHala ke jaisa koi darmiyan bhi paDta phir is safar mein kahin aasman bhi paDta 
main choT kar to raha hun hawa ke mathe par maza to jab tha ki koi nishan bhi paDta 
ajib KHwahishen uThti hain is KHarabe mein guzar rahe hain to apna makan bhi paDta 
hamin jahan ke pichhe paDe rahen kab tak hamare pichhe kabhi ye jahan bhi paDta 
ye ek kami ki jo ab zindagi si lagti hai hamari dhup mein wo saeban bhi paDta 
har ek roz isi zindagi ki tayyari so chahte hain kabhi imtihan bhi paDta

aisā banā diyā tujhe qudrat ḳhudā kī hai kis husn kā hai husn adā kis adā kī hai 
chashm-e-siyāh-e-yār se sāzish hayā kī hai lailā ke saath meñ ye sahelī balā kī hai 
tasvīr kyuuñ dikhā.eñ tumheñ naam kyuuñ batā.eñ laa.e haiñ ham kahīñ se kisī bevafā kī hai 
andāz mujh se aur haiñ dushman se aur Dhañg pahchān mujh ko apnī parā.ī qazā kī hai 
maġhrūr kyuuñ haiñ aap javānī par is qadar ye mere naam kī hai ye merī duā kī hai 
dushman ke ghar se chal ke dikhā do judā judā ye bāñkpan kī chaal ye nāz-o-adā kī hai 
rah rah ke le rahī hai mire dil meñ chuTkiyāñ phislī huī girah tire band-e-qabā kī hai 
gardan muḌī nigāh laḌī baat kuchh na kī shoḳhī to ḳhair aap kī tamkīñ balā kī hai 
hotī hai roz bāda-kashoñ kī duā qubūl ai mohtasib ye shān-e-karīmī ḳhudā kī hai 
jitne gile the un ke vo sab dil se dhul ga.e jhepī huī nigāh talāfī jafā kī hai 
chhuptā hai ḳhuun bhī kahīñ muTThī to kholiye rañgat yahī hinā kī yahī bū hinā kī hai 
kah do ki be-vazū na chhue us ko mohtasib botal meñ band ruuh kisī pārsā kī hai 
maiñ imtihān de ke unheñ kyuuñ na mar gayā ab ġhair se bhī un ko tamannā vafā kī hai 
dekho to jā ke hazrat-e-'beḳhud' na huuñ kahīñ dāvat sharāb-ḳhāne meñ ik pārsā kī hai 
aisa bana diya tujhe qudrat KHuda ki hai kis husn ka hai husn ada kis ada ki hai 
chashm-e-siyah-e-yar se sazish haya ki hai laila ke sath mein ye saheli bala ki hai 
taswir kyun dikhaen tumhein nam kyun bataen lae hain hum kahin se kisi bewafa ki hai 
andaz mujh se aur hain dushman se aur Dhang pahchan mujh ko apni parai qaza ki hai 
maghrur kyun hain aap jawani par is qadar ye mere nam ki hai ye meri dua ki hai 
dushman ke ghar se chal ke dikha do juda juda ye bankpan ki chaal ye naz-o-ada ki hai 
rah rah ke le rahi hai mere dil mein chuTkiyan phisli hui girah tere band-e-qaba ki hai 
gardan muDi nigah laDi baat kuchh na ki shoKHi to KHair aap ki tamkin bala ki hai 
hoti hai roz baada-kashon ki dua qubul ai mohtasib ye shan-e-karimi KHuda ki hai 
jitne gile the un ke wo sab dil se dhul gae jhepi hui nigah talafi jafa ki hai 
chhupta hai KHun bhi kahin muTThi to kholiye rangat yahi hina ki yahi bu hina ki hai 
kah do ki be-wazu na chhue us ko mohtasib botal mein band ruh kisi parsa ki hai 
main imtihan de ke unhen kyun na mar gaya ab ghair se bhi un ko tamanna wafa ki hai 
dekho to ja ke hazrat-e-'beKHud' na hun kahin dawat sharab-KHane mein ek parsa ki hai

ek nā-maqbūl qurbānī huuñ maiñ sar-phirī ulfat meñ lā-sānī huuñ maiñ 
maiñ chalā jaatā huuñ vaañ taklīf se vo samajhte haiñ ki lā-sānī huuñ maiñ 
kaan dharte hī nahīñ vo baat par kab se masrūf-e-sanā-ḳhvānī huuñ maiñ 
zindagī hai ik kirā.e kī ḳhushī sūkhte tālāb kā paanī huuñ maiñ 
mujh se baḌh kar kyā koī hogā amiir qīmtī virse kī arzānī huuñ maiñ 
chāñdnī rātoñ meñ yāroñ ke baġhair chāñdnī rātoñ kī vīrānī huuñ maiñ 
kahnā sunñā un se mujh ko kuchh nahīñ sirf ik tamhīd-e-tūlānī huuñ maiñ 
mujh ko pachhtānā nahīñ aatā 'adam' ek daulat-mand nādānī huuñ maiñ 
ek na-maqbul qurbani hun main sar-phiri ulfat mein la-sani hun main 
main chala jata hun wan taklif se wo samajhte hain ki la-sani hun main 
kan dharte hi nahin wo baat par kab se masruf-e-sana-KHwani hun main 
zindagi hai ek kirae ki KHushi sukhte talab ka pani hun main 
mujh se baDh kar kya koi hoga amir qimti wirse ki arzani hun main 
chandni raaton mein yaron ke baghair chandni raaton ki virani hun main 
kahna sunna un se mujh ko kuchh nahin sirf ek tamhid-e-tulani hun main 
mujh ko pachhtana nahin aata 'adam' ek daulat-mand nadani hun main

aalam meñ agar ishq kā bāzār na hotā koī kisī bande kā ḳharīdār na hotā 
hastī kī ḳharābī nazar aatī jo adam meñ us ḳhvāb se hargiz koī bedār na hotā 
kahtā hai tujhe ḳhaak na duuñ ġhair-e-azīyat ye dil meñ agar thī to mirā yaar na hotā 
mālūm kise thī ye tirī ḳhāna-ḳharābī maiñ jāntā aisā to giraftār na hotā 
aalam ko jalātī hai tirī garmi-e-majlis marte ham agar sāya-e-dīvār na hotā 
ai shaiḳh agar kufr se islām judā hai pas chāhiye tasbīh meñ zunnār na hotā 
zālim mire hāsid kī to shādī thī isī meñ yaanī mujhe dar tak bhī tire baar na hotā 
dete tirī majlis meñ agar raah 'fuġhāñ' ko us shaḳhs se hargiz koī be-zār na hotā 
aalam mein agar ishq ka bazar na hota koi kisi bande ka KHaridar na hota 
hasti ki KHarabi nazar aati jo adam mein us KHwab se hargiz koi bedar na hota 
kahta hai tujhe KHak na dun ghair-e-aziyat ye dil mein agar thi to mera yar na hota 
malum kise thi ye teri KHana-KHarabi main jaanta aisa to giraftar na hota 
aalam ko jalati hai teri garmi-e-majlis marte hum agar saya-e-diwar na hota 
ai shaiKH agar kufr se islam juda hai pas chahiye tasbih mein zunnar na hota 
zalim mere hasid ki to shadi thi isi mein yani mujhe dar tak bhi tere bar na hota 
dete teri majlis mein agar rah 'fughan' ko us shaKHs se hargiz koi be-zar na hota

har ik darīcha kiran kiran hai jahāñ se guzre jidhar ga.e haiñ ham ik diyā aarzū kā le kar ba-tarz-e-shams-o-qamar ga.e haiñ 
jo merī palkoñ se tham na paa.e vo shabnamīñ mehrbāñ ujāle tumhārī āñkhoñ meñ aa ga.e to tamām raste nikhar ga.e haiñ 
vo duur kab thā harīm-e-jāñ se ki lafz o ma.anī ke naaz uThātī jo harf hoñToñ pe aa na paa.e vo ban ke ḳhushbū bikhar ga.e haiñ 
jo dard īsā-nafas na hotā to dil pe kyā e'tibār aatā kuchh aur paimāñ kuchh aur paikāñ ki zaḳhm jitne the bhar ga.e haiñ 
ḳhazīne jaañ ke luTāne vaale diloñ meñ basne kī aas le kar sunā hai kuchh log aise guzre jo ghar se aa.e na ghar ga.e haiñ 
jab ik nigah se ḳharāsh aa.ī zamāne bhar se gila huā hai jo dil dukhā hai to ranj saare na jaane kis kis ke sar ga.e haiñ 
shikast-e-dil tak na baat pahuñchī magar 'adā' kah sako to kahnā ki ab ke sāvan dhanak se āñchal ke rañg saare utar ga.e haiñ 
har ek daricha kiran kiran hai jahan se guzre jidhar gae hain hum ek diya aarzu ka le kar ba-tarz-e-shams-o-qamar gae hain 
jo meri palkon se tham na pae wo shabnamin mehrban ujale tumhaari aankhon mein aa gae to tamam raste nikhar gae hain 
wo dur kab tha harim-e-jaan se ki lafz o mani ke naz uThati jo harf honTon pe aa na pae wo ban ke KHushbu bikhar gae hain 
jo dard isa-nafas na hota to dil pe kya e'tibar aata kuchh aur paiman kuchh aur paikan ki zaKHm jitne the bhar gae hain 
KHazine jaan ke luTane wale dilon mein basne ki aas le kar suna hai kuchh log aise guzre jo ghar se aae na ghar gae hain 
jab ek nigah se KHarash aai zamane bhar se gila hua hai jo dil dukha hai to ranj sare na jaane kis kis ke sar gae hain 
shikast-e-dil tak na baat pahunchi magar 'ada' kah sako to kahna ki ab ke sawan dhanak se aanchal ke rang sare utar gae hain

kuchh laag kuchh lagāv mohabbat meñ chāhiye donoñ tarah kā rañg tabī.at meñ chāhiye 
ye kyā ki but bane hue baiThe ho bazm meñ kuchh be-takallufī bhī to ḳhalvat meñ chāhiye 
vo ibtidā-e-ishq meñ hāsil huī mujhe jo baat intihā-e-mohabbat meñ chāhiye 
ā.eñge be-shumār farishte azaab ke maidān-e-hashr ġhair kī turbat meñ chāhiye 
kuchh to paḌe dabāo dil-e-be-qarār par paarā bharā huā mirī turbat meñ chāhiye 
māshūq ke kahe kā burā mānte ho 'dāġh' bardāsht aadmī kī tabī.at meñ chāhiye 
kuchh lag kuchh lagaw mohabbat mein chahiye donon tarah ka rang tabiat mein chahiye 
ye kya ki but bane hue baiThe ho bazm mein kuchh be-takallufi bhi to KHalwat mein chahiye 
wo ibtida-e-ishq mein hasil hui mujhe jo baat intiha-e-mohabbat mein chahiye 
aaenge be-shumar farishte azab ke maidan-e-hashr ghair ki turbat mein chahiye 
kuchh to paDe dabao dil-e-be-qarar par para bhara hua meri turbat mein chahiye 
mashuq ke kahe ka bura mante ho 'dagh' bardasht aadmi ki tabiat mein chahiye

kuchh na kuchh ishq kī tāsīr kā iqrār to hai us kā ilzām-e-taġhāful pe kuchh inkār to hai 
har fareb-e-ġham-e-duniyā se ḳhabar-dār to hai terā dīvāna kisī kaam meñ hushyār to hai 
dekh lete haiñ sabhī kuchh tire mushtāq-e-jamāl ḳhair dīdār na ho hasrat-e-dīdār to hai 
ma.arke sar hoñ usī barq-e-nazar se ai husn ye chamaktī huī chaltī hui talvār to hai 
sar paTakne ko paTaktā hai magar ruk ruk kar tere vahshī ko ḳhayāl-e-dar-o-dīvār to hai 
ishq kā shikva-e-bejā bhī na be-kār gayā na sahī jaur magar jaur kā iqrār to hai 
tujh se himmat to paḌī ishq ko kuchh kahne kī ḳhair shikva na sahī shukr kā iz.hār to hai 
is meñ bhī rābta-e-ḳhās kī miltī hai jhalak ḳhair iqrār-e-mohabbat na ho inkār to hai 
kyuuñ jhapak jaatī hai rah rah ke tirī barq-e-nigāh ye jhijak kis liye ik kushta-e-dīdār to hai 
ka.ī unvān haiñ mamnūn-e-karam karne ke ishq meñ kuchh na sahī zindagī be-kār to hai 
sahar-o-shām sar-e-anjuman-e-nāz na ho jalva-e-husn to hai ishq-e-siyahkār to hai 
chauñk uThte haiñ 'firāq' aate hī us shoḳh kā naam kuchh sarāsīmgī-e-ishq kā iqrār to hai 
kuchh na kuchh ishq ki tasir ka iqrar to hai us ka ilzam-e-taghaful pe kuchh inkar to hai 
har fareb-e-gham-e-duniya se KHabar-dar to hai tera diwana kisi kaam mein hushyar to hai 
dekh lete hain sabhi kuchh tere mushtaq-e-jamal KHair didar na ho hasrat-e-didar to hai 
marke sar hon usi barq-e-nazar se ai husn ye chamakti hui chalti hui talwar to hai 
sar paTakne ko paTakta hai magar ruk ruk kar tere wahshi ko KHayal-e-dar-o-diwar to hai 
ishq ka shikwa-e-beja bhi na be-kar gaya na sahi jaur magar jaur ka iqrar to hai 
tujh se himmat to paDi ishq ko kuchh kahne ki KHair shikwa na sahi shukr ka izhaar to hai 
is mein bhi rabta-e-KHas ki milti hai jhalak KHair iqrar-e-mohabbat na ho inkar to hai 
kyun jhapak jati hai rah rah ke teri barq-e-nigah ye jhijak kis liye ek kushta-e-didar to hai 
kai unwan hain mamnun-e-karam karne ke ishq mein kuchh na sahi zindagi be-kar to hai 
sahar-o-sham sar-e-anjuman-e-naz na ho jalwa-e-husn to hai ishq-e-siyahkar to hai 
chaunk uThte hain 'firaq' aate hi us shoKH ka nam kuchh sarasimgi-e-ishq ka iqrar to hai

ḳhvāhisheñ itnī baḌhīñ insān aadhā rah gayā ḳhvāb jo dekhā nahīñ vo bhī adhūrā rah gayā 
maiñ to us ke saath hī ghar se nikal kar aa gayā aur pīchhe ek dastak ek saayā rah gayā 
us ko to pairāhanoñ se koī dilchaspī na thī dukh to ye hai rafta rafta maiñ bhī nañgā rah gayā 
rang tasvīroñ kā utrā to kahīñ Thahrā nahīñ ab ke vo bārish huī har naqsh phīkā rah gayā 
'umr bhar manzar-nigārī ḳhuun meñ utrī rahī phir bhī āñkhoñ ke muqābil ek dariyā rah gayā 
raunaqeñ jitnī thiiñ dahlīzoñ se bāhar aa ga.iiñ shaam hī se ghar kā darvāza khulā kyā rah gayā 
ab ke shahr-e-zindagī meñ sāneha aisā huā maiñ sadā detā use vo mujh ko taktā rah gayā 
titliyoñ ke par kitāboñ meñ kahīñ gum ho ga.e muTThiyoñ ke aa.ine meñ ek chehra rah gayā 
rail kī gaaḌī chalī to ik musāfir ne kahā dekhnā vo koī station pe baiThā rah gayā 
maiñ na kahtā thā ki ujlat is qadar achchhī nahīñ ek paT khiḌkī kā aa kar dekh lo vā rah gayā 
log apnī kirchiyāñ chun chun ke aage baḌh ga.e maiñ magar sāmān ikaTThā kartā tanhā rah gayā 
aaj tak mauj-e-havā to lauT kar aa.ī nahīñ kyā kisī ujḌe nagar meñ diip jaltā rah gayā 
uñgliyoñ ke naqsh gul-dānoñ pe aate haiñ nazar aao dekheñ apne andar aur kyā kyā rah gayā 
dhuup kī garmī se īñTeñ pak ga.iiñ phal pak ga.e ik hamārā jism thā 'aḳhtar' jo kachchā rah gayā 
KHwahishen itni baDhin insan aadha rah gaya KHwab jo dekha nahin wo bhi adhura rah gaya 
main to us ke sath hi ghar se nikal kar aa gaya aur pichhe ek dastak ek saya rah gaya 
us ko to pairahanon se koi dilchaspi na thi dukh to ye hai rafta rafta main bhi nanga rah gaya 
rang taswiron ka utra to kahin Thahra nahin ab ke wo barish hui har naqsh phika rah gaya 
'umr bhar manzar-nigari KHun mein utri rahi phir bhi aankhon ke muqabil ek dariya rah gaya 
raunaqen jitni thin dahlizon se bahar aa gain sham hi se ghar ka darwaza khula kya rah gaya 
ab ke shahr-e-zindagi mein saneha aisa hua main sada deta use wo mujh ko takta rah gaya 
titliyon ke par kitabon mein kahin gum ho gae muTThiyon ke aaine mein ek chehra rah gaya 
rail ki gaDi chali to ek musafir ne kaha dekhna wo koi station pe baiTha rah gaya 
main na kahta tha ki ujlat is qadar achchhi nahin ek paT khiDki ka aa kar dekh lo wa rah gaya 
log apni kirchiyan chun chun ke aage baDh gae main magar saman ikaTTha karta tanha rah gaya 
aaj tak mauj-e-hawa to lauT kar aai nahin kya kisi ujDe nagar mein dip jalta rah gaya 
ungliyon ke naqsh gul-danon pe aate hain nazar aao dekhen apne andar aur kya kya rah gaya 
dhup ki garmi se inTen pak gain phal pak gae ek hamara jism tha 'aKHtar' jo kachcha rah gaya

na sahī gar unheñ ḳhayāl nahīñ ki hamārā bhī ab vo haal nahīñ 
yaad unheñ vāda-e-visāl nahīñ kab kiyā thā yahī ḳhayāl nahīñ 
aise bigḌe vo sun ke shauq kī baat aaj tak ham se bol-chāl nahīñ 
mujh ko ab ġham ye hai ki baad mire ḳhātir-e-yār be-malāl nahīñ 
afv-e-haq kā hai mai-kashoñ pe nuzūl rezish-e-abr-e-barshagāl nahīñ 
ham pe kyuuñ arz-e-hāl-e-dil pe itaab elchī ko kahīñ zavāl nahīñ 
sun ke mujh se vo ḳhvāhish-e-pā-bos hañs ke kahne lage majāl nahīñ 
dil ko hai yaad shauq kā vo hunar jis se baḌh kar koī kamāl nahīñ 
aap nādim na hoñ ki 'hasrat' se shikva-e-ġham kā ehtimāl nahīñ 
na sahi gar unhen KHayal nahin ki hamara bhi ab wo haal nahin 
yaad unhen wada-e-visal nahin kab kiya tha yahi KHayal nahin 
aise bigDe wo sun ke shauq ki baat aaj tak hum se bol-chaal nahin 
mujh ko ab gham ye hai ki baad mere KHatir-e-yar be-malal nahin 
afw-e-haq ka hai mai-kashon pe nuzul rezish-e-abr-e-barshagal nahin 
hum pe kyun arz-e-haal-e-dil pe itab elchi ko kahin zawal nahin 
sun ke mujh se wo KHwahish-e-pa-bos hans ke kahne lage majal nahin 
dil ko hai yaad shauq ka wo hunar jis se baDh kar koi kamal nahin 
aap nadim na hon ki 'hasrat' se shikwa-e-gham ka ehtimal nahin

biin havā ke hāthoñ meñ hai lahre jaadū vaale haiñ chandan se chikne shānoñ par machal uThe do kaale haiñ 
jañgal kī yā bāzāroñ kī dhuul uḌī hai svāgat ko ham ne ghar ke bāhar jab bhī apne paañv nikāle haiñ 
kaisā zamāna aayā hai ye ulTī riit hai ulTī baat phūloñ ko kāñTe Daste haiñ jo in ke rakhvāle haiñ 
ghar ke dukhḌe shahr ke ġham aur des bides kī chintā.eñ in meñ kuchh āvāra kutte haiñ kuchh ham ne paale haiñ 
ek usī ko dekh na paa.e varna shahr kī saḌkoñ par achchhī achchhī poshākeñ haiñ achchhī sūrat vaale haiñ 
raat meñ dil ko kyā sūjhī hai us ke gaañv ko chalne kī jañgal meñ chīte rahte haiñ raah meñ naddī naale haiñ 
donoñ kā milnā mushkil hai donoñ haiñ majbūr bahut us ke paañv meñ mehñdī lagī hai mere paañv meñ chhāle haiñ 
bin hawa ke hathon mein hai lahre jadu wale hain chandan se chikne shanon par machal uThe do kale hain 
jangal ki ya bazaron ki dhul uDi hai swagat ko hum ne ghar ke bahar jab bhi apne panw nikale hain 
kaisa zamana aaya hai ye ulTi rit hai ulTi baat phulon ko kanTe Daste hain jo in ke rakhwale hain 
ghar ke dukhDe shahr ke gham aur des bides ki chintaen in mein kuchh aawara kutte hain kuchh hum ne pale hain 
ek usi ko dekh na pae warna shahr ki saDkon par achchhi achchhi poshaken hain achchhi surat wale hain 
raat mein dil ko kya sujhi hai us ke ganw ko chalne ki jangal mein chite rahte hain rah mein naddi nale hain 
donon ka milna mushkil hai donon hain majbur bahut us ke panw mein mehndi lagi hai mere panw mein chhaale hain

jo log dushman-e-jāñ the vahī sahāre the munāfe the mohabbat meñ ne ḳhasāre the 
huzūr-e-shāh bas itnā hī arz karnā hai jo iḳhtiyār tumhāre the haq hamāre the 
ye aur baat bahāreñ gurez-pā niklīñ guloñ ke ham ne to sadqe bahut utāre the 
ḳhudā kare ki tirī umr meñ gine jaa.eñ vo din jo ham ne tire hijr meñ guzāre the 
ab izn ho to tirī zulf meñ piro deñ phuul ki āsmāñ ke sitāre to isti.āre the 
qarīb aa.e to har gul thā ḳhāna-e-zambūr 'nadīm' duur ke manzar to pyāre pyāre the 
jo log dushman-e-jaan the wahi sahaare the munafe the mohabbat mein ne KHasare the 
huzur-e-shah bas itna hi arz karna hai jo iKHtiyar tumhaare the haq hamare the 
ye aur baat bahaaren gurez-pa niklin gulon ke hum ne to sadqe bahut utare the 
KHuda kare ki teri umr mein gine jaen wo din jo hum ne tere hijr mein guzare the 
ab izn ho to teri zulf mein piro den phul ki aasman ke sitare to istiare the 
qarib aae to har gul tha KHana-e-zambur 'nadim' dur ke manzar to pyare pyare the

baiThā nahīñ huuñ sāya-e-dīvār dekh kar Thahrā huā huuñ vaqt kī raftār dekh kar 
ham-mashrabī kī sharm gavārā na ho sakī ḳhud chhoḌ dī hai shaiḳh ko mai-ḳhvār dekh kar 
kyā jaane bahr-e-ishq meñ kitne hue haiñ ġharq sāhil se sat.h-e-āb ko hamvār dekh kar 
haiñ aaj tak nigāh meñ hālāñki aaj tak dekhā na phir kabhī unheñ ik baar dekh kar 
'bismil' tum aaj rote ho anjām-e-ishq ko ham kal samajh ga.e the kuchh āsār dekh kar 
baiTha nahin hun saya-e-diwar dekh kar Thahra hua hun waqt ki raftar dekh kar 
ham-mashrabi ki sharm gawara na ho saki KHud chhoD di hai shaiKH ko mai-KHwar dekh kar 
kya jaane bahr-e-ishq mein kitne hue hain gharq sahil se sath-e-ab ko hamwar dekh kar 
hain aaj tak nigah mein haalanki aaj tak dekha na phir kabhi unhen ek bar dekh kar 
'bismil' tum aaj rote ho anjam-e-ishq ko hum kal samajh gae the kuchh aasar dekh kar

aag dekhūñ kabhī jaltā huā bistar dekhūñ raat aa.e to yahīñ ḳhvāb-e-mukarrar dekhūñ 
ek bechain samundar hai mire jism meñ qaid TuuT jaa.e jo ye dīvār to manzar dekhūñ 
raat gahrī hai bahut raaz na degī apnā maiñ to sūraj bhī nahīñ huuñ ki utar kar dekhūñ 
ḳhud pe kyā biit ga.ī itne dinoñ meñ tujh bin ye bhī himmat nahīñ ab jhāñk ke andar dekhūñ 
koī is daur meñ elān-e-nabūvat kartā aarzū thī ki ḳhudā-sāz payambar dekhūñ 
ek sannāTā huuñ patthar ke jigar meñ paivast maiñ koī but to nahīñ huuñ ki nikal kar dekhūñ 
yuuñ nashe se kabhī do chaar tirā ġham ho ki maiñ band āñkhoñ se khulī aañkh kā manzar dekhūñ 
oḌh kar ḳhaak 'mujībī' sunūñ dushnām-e-jahāñ ye tamāshā hī kisī roz miyāñ kar dekhūñ 
aag dekhun kabhi jalta hua bistar dekhun raat aae to yahin KHwab-e-mukarrar dekhun 
ek bechain samundar hai mere jism mein qaid TuT jae jo ye diwar to manzar dekhun 
raat gahri hai bahut raaz na degi apna main to suraj bhi nahin hun ki utar kar dekhun 
KHud pe kya bit gai itne dinon mein tujh bin ye bhi himmat nahin ab jhank ke andar dekhun 
koi is daur mein elan-e-nabuwat karta aarzu thi ki KHuda-saz payambar dekhun 
ek sannaTa hun patthar ke jigar mein paiwast main koi but to nahin hun ki nikal kar dekhun 
yun nashe se kabhi do chaar tera gham ho ki main band aankhon se khuli aankh ka manzar dekhun 
oDh kar KHak 'mujibi' sunun dushnam-e-jahan ye tamasha hi kisi roz miyan kar dekhun

terī mahfil bhī mudāvā nahīñ tanhā.ī kā kitnā charchā thā tirī anjuman-ārā.ī kā 
dāġh-e-dil naqsh hai ik lāla-e-sahrā.ī kā ye asāsa hai mirī bādiya-paimā.ī kā 
jab bhī dekhā hai tujhe ālam-e-nau dekhā hai marhala tai na huā terī shanāsā.ī kā 
vo tire jism kī qauseñ hoñ ki mehrāb-e-haram har haqīqat meñ milā ḳham tirī añgḌā.ī kā 
ufuq-e-zehn pe chamkā tirā paimān-e-visāl chāñd niklā hai mire ālam-e-tanhā.ī kā 
bharī duniyā meñ faqat mujh se nigāheñ na churā ishq par bas na chalegā tirī dānā.ī kā 
har na.ī bazm tirī yaad kā māhaul banī maiñ ne ye rañg bhī dekhā tirī yaktā.ī kā 
naala aatā hai jo lab par to ġhazal bantā hai mere fan par bhī hai partav tirī ra.anā.ī kā 
teri mahfil bhi mudawa nahin tanhai ka kitna charcha tha teri anjuman-arai ka 
dagh-e-dil naqsh hai ek lala-e-sahrai ka ye asasa hai meri baadiya-paimai ka 
jab bhi dekha hai tujhe aalam-e-nau dekha hai marhala tai na hua teri shanasai ka 
wo tere jism ki qausen hon ki mehrab-e-haram har haqiqat mein mila KHam teri angDai ka 
ufuq-e-zehn pe chamka tera paiman-e-visal chand nikla hai mere aalam-e-tanhai ka 
bhari duniya mein faqat mujh se nigahen na chura ishq par bas na chalega teri danai ka 
har nai bazm teri yaad ka mahaul bani main ne ye rang bhi dekha teri yaktai ka 
nala aata hai jo lab par to ghazal banta hai mere fan par bhi hai partaw teri ranai ka

ek faqīr chalā jaatā hai pakkī saḌak par gaañv kī aage raah kā sannāTā hai pīchhe guuñj khaḌā.ūñ kī 
āñkhoñ āñkhoñ hariyālī ke ḳhvāb dikhā.ī dene lage ham aise ka.ī jāgne vaale niiñd hue sahrāoñ kī 
apne 'aks ko chhūne kī ḳhvāhish meñ parinda Duub gayā phir kabhī lauT kar aa.ī nahīñ dariyā par ghaḌī du'āoñ kī 
Daar se bichhḌā huā kabūtar shāḳh se TuuTā huā gulāb aadhā dhuup kā sarmāya hai aadhī daulat chhāñv kī 
us raste par pīchhe se itnī āvāzeñ aa.iiñ 'jamāl' ek jagah to ghuum ke rah ga.ī eḌī sīdhe paañv kī 
ek faqir chala jata hai pakki saDak par ganw ki aage rah ka sannaTa hai pichhe gunj khaDaun ki 
aankhon aankhon hariyali ke KHwab dikhai dene lage hum aise kai jagne wale nind hue sahraon ki 
apne 'aks ko chhune ki KHwahish mein parinda Dub gaya phir kabhi lauT kar aai nahin dariya par ghaDi du'aon ki 
Dar se bichhDa hua kabutar shaKH se TuTa hua gulab aadha dhup ka sarmaya hai aadhi daulat chhanw ki 
us raste par pichhe se itni aawazen aain 'jamal' ek jagah to ghum ke rah gai eDi sidhe panw ki

duniyā meñ surāġh-e-rah-e-duniyā nahīñ miltā dariyā meñ utar jaa.eñ to dariyā nahīñ miltā 
baaqī to mukammal hai tamannā kī imārat ik guzre hue vaqt kā shīsha nahīñ miltā 
jaate hue har chiiz yahīñ chhoḌ gayā thā lauTā huuñ to ik dhuup kā TukḌā nahīñ miltā 
jo dil meñ samā.e the vo ab shāmil-e-dil haiñ is aa.ine meñ aks kisī kā nahīñ miltā 
tū ne hī to chāhā thā ki miltā rahūñ tujh se terī yahī marzī hai to achchhā nahīñ miltā 
dil meñ to dhaḌakne kī sadā bhī nahīñ 'mushtāq' raste meñ hai vo bhiiḌ ki rasta nahīñ miltā 
duniya mein suragh-e-rah-e-duniya nahin milta dariya mein utar jaen to dariya nahin milta 
baqi to mukammal hai tamanna ki imarat ek guzre hue waqt ka shisha nahin milta 
jate hue har chiz yahin chhoD gaya tha lauTa hun to ek dhup ka TukDa nahin milta 
jo dil mein samae the wo ab shamil-e-dil hain is aaine mein aks kisi ka nahin milta 
tu ne hi to chaha tha ki milta rahun tujh se teri yahi marzi hai to achchha nahin milta 
dil mein to dhaDakne ki sada bhi nahin 'mushtaq' raste mein hai wo bhiD ki rasta nahin milta

tumhārā kyā tumheñ āsāñ bahut raste badalnā hai hameñ har ek mausam qāfile ke saath chalnā hai 
bas ik Dhalvān hai jis par luḌhakte jā rahe haiñ ham hameñ jaane nasheboñ meñ kahāñ jā kar sambhalnā hai 
ham is Dar se koī sūraj chamakne hī nahīñ dete ki jaane shab ke añdhiyāroñ se kyā manzar nikalnā hai 
hamāre dil-jazīre par utartā hī nahīñ koī kaheñ kis se ki is miTTī ne kis sāñche meñ Dhalnā hai 
nigāheñ pūchhtī phirtī haiñ āvāra havāoñ se zamīnoñ ne zamānoñ kā ḳhazāna kab ugalnā hai 
kisī ma.asūm se jhoñke kī ik halkī sī dastak par inhī patthar pahāḌoñ se koī chashma ubalnā hai 
tumhaara kya tumhein aasan bahut raste badalna hai hamein har ek mausam qafile ke sath chalna hai 
bas ek Dhalwan hai jis par luDhakte ja rahe hain hum hamein jaane nashebon mein kahan ja kar sambhalna hai 
hum is Dar se koi suraj chamakne hi nahin dete ki jaane shab ke andhiyaron se kya manzar nikalna hai 
hamare dil-jazire par utarta hi nahin koi kahen kis se ki is miTTi ne kis sanche mein Dhalna hai 
nigahen puchhti phirti hain aawara hawaon se zaminon ne zamanon ka KHazana kab ugalna hai 
kisi masum se jhonke ki ek halki si dastak par inhi patthar pahaDon se koi chashma ubalna hai

soch kar bhī kyā jaanā jaan kar bhī kyā paayā jab bhī ā.īna dekhā ḳhud ko dūsrā paayā 
hoñT par diyā rakhnā dil-jaloñ kī shoḳhī hai varna is añdhere meñ kaun muskurā paayā 
bol the divānoñ ke jin se hosh vāloñ ne soch ke dhuñdlakoñ meñ apnā rāsta paayā 
ehtimām dastak kā apnī vaz' thī varna ham ne dar rasā.ī kā bār-hā khulā paayā 
falsafoñ ke dhāgoñ se khīñch kar sirā dil kā vahm se haqīqat tak ham ne silsila paayā 
'umr yā zamāne kā khel hai bahāne kā sab ne mājrā dekhā kis ne mudda'ā paayā 
shā.erī talab apnī shā.erī 'atā us kī hausle se kam māñgā zarf se sivā paayā 
'sāz' jab khulā ham par she'r koī 'ġhālib' kā ham ne goyā bātin kā ik surāġh sā paayā 
soch kar bhi kya jaana jaan kar bhi kya paya jab bhi aaina dekha KHud ko dusra paya 
honT par diya rakhna dil-jalon ki shoKHi hai warna is andhere mein kaun muskura paya 
bol the diwanon ke jin se hosh walon ne soch ke dhundlakon mein apna rasta paya 
ehtimam dastak ka apni waz' thi warna hum ne dar rasai ka bar-ha khula paya 
falsafon ke dhagon se khinch kar sira dil ka wahm se haqiqat tak hum ne silsila paya 
'umr ya zamane ka khel hai bahane ka sab ne majra dekha kis ne mudda'a paya 
shaeri talab apni shaeri 'ata us ki hausle se kam manga zarf se siwa paya 
'saz' jab khula hum par she'r koi 'ghaalib' ka hum ne goya baatin ka ek suragh sa paya

is qadar naaz hai kyuuñ aap ko yaktā.ī kā dūsrā naam hai vo bhī mirī tanhā.ī kā 
kyā chhupe raaz ilāhī dil-e-shaidā.ī kā arsa-e-hashr to bāzār hai rusvā.ī kā 
jaan le jā.egā aanā shab-e-tanhā.ī kā kaun ab rokne vaalā hai mirī aa.ī kā 
ḳhūgar-e-ranj-o-balā hashr ke din kyā ḳhush hoñ ki vo maal aaj huā hai shab-e-tanhā.ī kā 
zinda hai naam shahādat kā usī ke dam se tere kushte ne kiyā kaam masīhā.ī kā 
har galī kūche meñ pāmāl use ho jaanā dil hai yā naqsh-e-qadam hai kisī harjā.ī kā 
is adab se tah-e-shamshīr taḌapnā ai dil ki gumāñ terī tapish par ho shakebā.ī kā 
fitne bhī qā.ede se uThte haiñ jab uThte haiñ kyā salīqa hai tumheñ anjuman-ārā.ī kā 
vo ye kahte haiñ mirā sabr paḌegā tujh par ab mujhe ranj nahīñ apnī shakebā.ī kā 
kyā ġharaz hai mirī taqdīr ko mujh se pūchhe aabrū kā hai talabgār ki rusvā.ī kā 
vaañ shab-e-va.ada malī paañv meñ mehñdī us ne yaañ kalejā koī maltā hai tamannā.ī kā 
raat bhar sham.a rahī hijr meñ vo bhī ḳhāmosh multajī thā tirī tasvīr se goyā.ī kā 
sar mirā kaaT ke dahlīz par apnī rakh do shauq baaqī hai abhī nāsiya-farsā.ī kā 
yuuñ na maqbūl huā hogā kisī kā sajda but ko armān rahā merī jabīñ-sā.ī kā 
ho gayā partav-e-ruḳhsār se kuchh aur hī rañg maiñ ne muñh chuum liyā us ke tamāshā.ī kā 
tham ga.e jam ga.e āñkhoñ meñ lahū ke qatre ḳhuun zāhir hai mire sabr o shakebā.ī kā 
ban gayā dāġh-e-jigar mehr-e-qayāmat ai 'dāġh' par abhī rañg vahī hai shab-e-tanhā.ī kā 
is qadar naz hai kyun aap ko yaktai ka dusra nam hai wo bhi meri tanhai ka 
kya chhupe raaz ilahi dil-e-shaidai ka arsa-e-hashr to bazar hai ruswai ka 
jaan le jaega aana shab-e-tanhai ka kaun ab rokne wala hai meri aai ka 
KHugar-e-ranj-o-bala hashr ke din kya KHush hon ki wo mal aaj hua hai shab-e-tanhai ka 
zinda hai nam shahadat ka usi ke dam se tere kushte ne kiya kaam masihai ka 
har gali kuche mein pamal use ho jaana dil hai ya naqsh-e-qadam hai kisi harjai ka 
is adab se tah-e-shamshir taDapna ai dil ki guman teri tapish par ho shakebai ka 
fitne bhi qaede se uThte hain jab uThte hain kya saliqa hai tumhein anjuman-arai ka 
wo ye kahte hain mera sabr paDega tujh par ab mujhe ranj nahin apni shakebai ka 
kya gharaz hai meri taqdir ko mujh se puchhe aabru ka hai talabgar ki ruswai ka 
wan shab-e-wada mali panw mein mehndi us ne yan kaleja koi malta hai tamannai ka 
raat bhar shama rahi hijr mein wo bhi KHamosh multaji tha teri taswir se goyai ka 
sar mera kaT ke dahliz par apni rakh do shauq baqi hai abhi nasiya-farsai ka 
yun na maqbul hua hoga kisi ka sajda but ko arman raha meri jabin-sai ka 
ho gaya partaw-e-ruKHsar se kuchh aur hi rang main ne munh chum liya us ke tamashai ka 
tham gae jam gae aankhon mein lahu ke qatre KHun zahir hai mere sabr o shakebai ka 
ban gaya dagh-e-jigar mehr-e-qayamat ai 'dagh' par abhi rang wahi hai shab-e-tanhai ka

mujh ko na dil pasand na vo bevafā pasand donoñ haiñ ḳhud-ġharaz mujhe donoñ haiñ nā-pasand 
ye dil vahī to hai jo tumheñ ab hai nā-pasand mā'shūq kar chuke haiñ jise bār-hā pasand 
jins-e-vafā ko karte haiñ ahl-e-vafā pasand dushman ko kyā tamīz hai dushman kī kyā pasand 
jannat kī koī huur nazar par chaḌhī nahīñ duniyā meñ mujh ko ek parī-zād thā pasand 
roñdī kisī ne pā-e-hinā.ī se merī nā'sh thī zindagī meñ mujh ko jo bū-e-hinā pasand 
vo bad-nasīb hai jise aayā pasand tū qismat to us kī hai jise tū ne kiyā pasand 
chiḌte haiñ vo savāl se ye ham samajh ga.e hai is liye unheñ dil be-mudda.ā pasand 
sūrat bhī pesh-e-chashm hai sīrat bhī pesh-e-chashm dam bhar meñ to pasand hai dam bhar meñ nā-pasand 
tujh ko ġhurūr-e-zohd hai sharm-e-gunah mujhe zāhid kise ḳhabar ki ḳhudā ko ho kyā pasand 
choTeñ chaleñgī ḳhuub barābar kī joḌ hai tū hai adā-shanās to maiñ huuñ adā-pasand 
hir phir ke un kī aañkh 'adū se laḌe na kyuuñ fitna ko kartī hai nigah-e-fitna-zā pasand 
maiñ ḳhud sikhā rahā huuñ sitam kī adā unheñ duniyā meñ kab huā koī mujh sā jafā-pasand 
rakh deñge aa.ine ke barābar ham apnā dil yā to ye nā-pasand huā un ko yā pasand 
kis darja sāda-lauh haiñ āshiq-mizāj bhī jo Dhab pe chaḌh gayā vo unheñ aa gayā pasand 
merā hī kyā qusūr ye mujh par sitam hai kyuuñ āñkhoñ ne dekhā aap ko dil ne kiyā pasand 
inkār sun chuke haiñ talabgār kyuuñ baneñ miltā nahīñ koī to hai be-fā.eda pasand 
'beḳhud' to mar miTe jo kahā us ne naaz se ik sher aa gayā hai hameñ aap kā pasand 
mujh ko na dil pasand na wo bewafa pasand donon hain KHud-gharaz mujhe donon hain na-pasand 
ye dil wahi to hai jo tumhein ab hai na-pasand ma'shuq kar chuke hain jise bar-ha pasand 
jins-e-wafa ko karte hain ahl-e-wafa pasand dushman ko kya tamiz hai dushman ki kya pasand 
jannat ki koi hur nazar par chaDhi nahin duniya mein mujh ko ek pari-zad tha pasand 
rondi kisi ne pa-e-hinai se meri na'sh thi zindagi mein mujh ko jo bu-e-hina pasand 
wo bad-nasib hai jise aaya pasand tu qismat to us ki hai jise tu ne kiya pasand 
chiDte hain wo sawal se ye hum samajh gae hai is liye unhen dil be-muddaa pasand 
surat bhi pesh-e-chashm hai sirat bhi pesh-e-chashm dam bhar mein to pasand hai dam bhar mein na-pasand 
tujh ko ghurur-e-zohd hai sharm-e-gunah mujhe zahid kise KHabar ki KHuda ko ho kya pasand 
choTen chalengi KHub barabar ki joD hai tu hai ada-shanas to main hun ada-pasand 
hir phir ke un ki aankh 'adu se laDe na kyun fitna ko karti hai nigah-e-fitna-za pasand 
main KHud sikha raha hun sitam ki ada unhen duniya mein kab hua koi mujh sa jafa-pasand 
rakh denge aaine ke barabar hum apna dil ya to ye na-pasand hua un ko ya pasand 
kis darja sada-lauh hain aashiq-mizaj bhi jo Dhab pe chaDh gaya wo unhen aa gaya pasand 
mera hi kya qusur ye mujh par sitam hai kyun aankhon ne dekha aap ko dil ne kiya pasand 
inkar sun chuke hain talabgar kyun banen milta nahin koi to hai be-faeda pasand 
'beKHud' to mar miTe jo kaha us ne naz se ek sher aa gaya hai hamein aap ka pasand

dil meñ jo baat hai batāte nahīñ duur tak ham kahīñ bhī jaate nahīñ 
aks kuchh der tak nahīñ rukte bojh ye aa.ine uThāte nahīñ 
ye nasīhat bhī log karne lage is tarah muft dil gañvāte nahīñ 
duur bastī pe hai dhuāñ kab se kyā jalā hai jise bujhāte nahīñ 
chhoḌ dete haiñ ik sharar benām aag lag jaatī hai lagāte nahīñ 
bhuul jaanā bhī ab nahīñ āsāñ varna ye ḳhiffateñ uThāte nahīñ 
aap apne meñ jalte bujhte haiñ ye tamāshā kahīñ dikhāte nahīñ 
dil mein jo baat hai batate nahin dur tak hum kahin bhi jate nahin 
aks kuchh der tak nahin rukte bojh ye aaine uThate nahin 
ye nasihat bhi log karne lage is tarah muft dil ganwate nahin 
dur basti pe hai dhuan kab se kya jala hai jise bujhate nahin 
chhoD dete hain ek sharar benam aag lag jati hai lagate nahin 
bhul jaana bhi ab nahin aasan warna ye KHiffaten uThate nahin 
aap apne mein jalte bujhte hain ye tamasha kahin dikhate nahin

khaḌā thā kab se zamīñ piiTh par uThā.e hue aab aadmī hai qayāmat se lau lagā.e hue 
ye dasht se umaD aayā hai kis kā sail-e-junūñ ki husn-e-shahr khaḌā hai naqāb uThā.e hue 
ye bhed tere sivā ai ḳhudā kise mālūm azaab TuuT paḌe mujh pe kis ke laa.e hue 
ye sail-e-āb na thā zalzala thā paanī kā bikhar bikhar ga.e qarye mire basā.e hue 
ajab tazād meñ kaaTā hai zindagī kā safar laboñ pe pyaas thī bādal the sar pe chhā.e hue 
sahar huī to koī apne ghar meñ ruk na sakā kisī ko yaad na aa.e diye jalā.e hue 
ḳhudā kī shaan ki munkir haiñ ādamiyyat ke ḳhud apnī sukḌī huī zaat ke satā.e hue 
jo āstīn chaḌhā.eñ bhī muskurā.eñ bhī vo log haiñ mire barsoñ ke āzmā.e hue 
ye inqilāb to ta.amīr ke mizāj meñ hai girā.e jaate haiñ aivāñ bane-banā.e hue 
ye aur baat mire bas meñ thī na guuñj is kī mujhe to muddateñ guzrīñ ye giit gaa.e hue 
mirī hī god meñ kyuuñ kaT ke gir paḌe haiñ 'nadīm' abhī duā ke liye the jo haath uThā.e hue 
khaDa tha kab se zamin piTh par uThae hue aab aadmi hai qayamat se lau lagae hue 
ye dasht se umaD aaya hai kis ka sail-e-junun ki husn-e-shahr khaDa hai naqab uThae hue 
ye bhed tere siwa ai KHuda kise malum azab TuT paDe mujh pe kis ke lae hue 
ye sail-e-ab na tha zalzala tha pani ka bikhar bikhar gae qarye mere basae hue 
ajab tazad mein kaTa hai zindagi ka safar labon pe pyas thi baadal the sar pe chhae hue 
sahar hui to koi apne ghar mein ruk na saka kisi ko yaad na aae diye jalae hue 
KHuda ki shan ki munkir hain aadamiyyat ke KHud apni sukDi hui zat ke satae hue 
jo aastin chaDhaen bhi muskuraen bhi wo log hain mere barson ke aazmae hue 
ye inqilab to tamir ke mizaj mein hai girae jate hain aiwan bane-banae hue 
ye aur baat mere bas mein thi na gunj is ki mujhe to muddaten guzrin ye git gae hue 
meri hi god mein kyun kaT ke gir paDe hain 'nadim' abhi dua ke liye the jo hath uThae hue

na bevafā.ī kā Dar thā na ġham judā.ī kā mazā meñ kyā kahūñ āġhāz-e-āshnā.ī kā 
kahāñ nahīñ hai tamāshā tirī ḳhudā.ī kā magar jo dekhne de ro.ab kibriyā.ī kā 
vo nā-tavāñ huuñ agar nabz ko huī jumbish to saaf joḌ judā ho gayā kalā.ī kā 
shab-e-visāl bahut kam hai āsmāñ se kaho ki joḌ de koī TukḌā shab-e-judā.ī kā 
ye josh-e-husn se tañg aa.ī hai qabā in kī ki band band hai ḳhvāhāñ girah-kushā.ī kā 
kamān haath se rakh said-gāh-e-irfāñ meñ ki tiir said hai yaañ dām-e-nā-rasā.ī kā 
vo bad-nasīb huuñ yaar aa.e mere ghar to bane simaT ke vasl kī shab til ruḳh-e-judā.ī kā 
hazāroñ kāfir o momin paḌe haiñ sajde meñ butoñ ke ghar meñ bhī sāmān hai ḳhudā.ī kā 
tamām ho ga.e ham pahle hī nigāh meñ haif na raat vasl kī dekhī na din judā.ī kā 
nahīñ hai mohr lifāfa pe ḳhat ke ai qāsid ye daaġh hai mirī qismat kī nā-rasā.ī kā 
naqāb Daal ke ai āftāb-e-hashr nikal ḳhudā se Dar ye kahīñ din hai ḳhud-numā.ī kā 
nahīñ qarār ghaḌī bhar kisī ke pahlū meñ ye zauq hai tire nāvak ko dilrubā.ī kā 
marī taraf se koī jā ke kohkan se kahe nahīñ nahīñ ye mahal zor-āzmā.ī kā 
kahā jo maiñ ne ki maiñ ḳhāk-e-rāh huuñ terā to bole hai abhī pindār ḳhud-numā.ī kā 
junūñ jo merī taraf ho vo jast-o-ḳhez karūñ ki dil ho TuuT ke TukḌe shikasta-pā.ī kā 
'amīr' roiye apne nasīb ko aisā ki ho saped siyah abr nā-rasā.ī kā 
na bewafai ka Dar tha na gham judai ka maza mein kya kahun aaghaz-e-ashnai ka 
kahan nahin hai tamasha teri KHudai ka magar jo dekhne de roab kibriyai ka 
wo na-tawan hun agar nabz ko hui jumbish to saf joD juda ho gaya kalai ka 
shab-e-visal bahut kam hai aasman se kaho ki joD de koi TukDa shab-e-judai ka 
ye josh-e-husn se tang aai hai qaba in ki ki band band hai KHwahan girah-kushai ka 
kaman hath se rakh said-gah-e-irfan mein ki tir said hai yan dam-e-na-rasai ka 
wo bad-nasib hun yar aae mere ghar to bane simaT ke wasl ki shab til ruKH-e-judai ka 
hazaron kafir o momin paDe hain sajde mein buton ke ghar mein bhi saman hai KHudai ka 
tamam ho gae hum pahle hi nigah mein haif na raat wasl ki dekhi na din judai ka 
nahin hai mohr lifafa pe KHat ke ai qasid ye dagh hai meri qismat ki na-rasai ka 
naqab Dal ke ai aaftab-e-hashr nikal KHuda se Dar ye kahin din hai KHud-numai ka 
nahin qarar ghaDi bhar kisi ke pahlu mein ye zauq hai tere nawak ko dilrubai ka 
mari taraf se koi ja ke kohkan se kahe nahin nahin ye mahal zor-azmai ka 
kaha jo main ne ki main KHak-e-rah hun tera to bole hai abhi pindar KHud-numai ka 
junun jo meri taraf ho wo jast-o-KHez karun ki dil ho TuT ke TukDe shikasta-pai ka 
'amir' roiye apne nasib ko aisa ki ho saped siyah abr na-rasai ka

azāb-e-vahshat-e-jāñ kā sila na māñge koī na.e safar ke liye rāsta na māñge koī 
buland hāthoñ meñ zanjīr Daal dete haiñ ajiib rasm chalī hai duā na māñge koī 
tamām shahr mukarram bas ek mujrim maiñ so mere ba.ad mirā ḳhūñ-bahā na māñge koī 
koī to shahr-e-tazabzub ke sākinoñ se kahe na ho yaqīn to phir mo.ajiza na māñge koī 
azāb-e-gard-e-ḳhizāñ bhī na ho bahār bhī aa.e is ehtiyāt se ajr-e-vafā na māñge koī 
azab-e-wahshat-e-jaan ka sila na mange koi nae safar ke liye rasta na mange koi 
buland hathon mein zanjir Dal dete hain ajib rasm chali hai dua na mange koi 
tamam shahr mukarram bas ek mujrim main so mere baad mera KHun-baha na mange koi 
koi to shahr-e-tazabzub ke sakinon se kahe na ho yaqin to phir moajiza na mange koi 
azab-e-gard-e-KHizan bhi na ho bahaar bhi aae is ehtiyat se ajr-e-wafa na mange koi

fasīl-e-jism girā de makān-e-jāñ se nikal ye intishār-zada shahr hai yahāñ se nikal 
tirī talāsh meñ phirte haiñ āftāb ka.ī so ab ye farz hai tujh par ki sā.ebāñ se nikal 
tamām shahr pe ik ḳhāmushī musallat hai ab aisā kar ki kisī din mirī zabāñ se nikal 
maqām-e-vasl to arz-o-samā ke biich meñ hai maiñ is zamīn se niklūñ tū āsmāñ se nikal 
maiñ apnī zaat meñ tārīkiyāñ sameTe huuñ tū ik charāġh jalā aur ab yahāñ se nikal 
kahā thā mujh se bhī ik din havā-e-sahrā ne mirī panāh meñ aa jā ġhubār-e-jāñ se nikal 
fasil-e-jism gira de makan-e-jaan se nikal ye intishaar-zada shahr hai yahan se nikal 
teri talash mein phirte hain aaftab kai so ab ye farz hai tujh par ki saeban se nikal 
tamam shahr pe ek KHamushi musallat hai ab aisa kar ki kisi din meri zaban se nikal 
maqam-e-wasl to arz-o-sama ke bich mein hai main is zamin se niklun tu aasman se nikal 
main apni zat mein tarikiyan sameTe hun tu ek charagh jala aur ab yahan se nikal 
kaha tha mujh se bhi ek din hawa-e-sahra ne meri panah mein aa ja ghubar-e-jaan se nikal

phaile hue haiñ shahr meñ saa.e niDhāl se jaa.eñ kahāñ nikal ke ḳhayāloñ ke jaal se 
mashriq se merā rāsta maġhrib kī samt thā us kā safar junūb kī jānib shumāl se 
kaisā bhī talḳh zikr ho kaisī bhī tursh baat un kī samajh meñ aa.egī gul kī misāl se 
chup-chāp baiThe rahte haiñ kuchh bolte nahīñ bachche bigaḌ ga.e haiñ bahut dekh-bhāl se 
rañgoñ ko bahte dekhiye kamre ke farsh par kirnoñ ke vaar rokiye shīshe kī Dhaal se 
āñkhoñ meñ āñsuoñ kā kahīñ naam tak nahīñ ab juute saaf kījiye un ke rumāl se 
chehra bujhā bujhā sā pareshān zulf zulf allāh dushmanoñ ko bachā.e vabāl se 
phir pāniyoñ meñ nuqra.ī saa.e utar ga.e phir raat jagmagā uThī chāñdī ke thaal se 
phaile hue hain shahr mein sae niDhaal se jaen kahan nikal ke KHayalon ke jal se 
mashriq se mera rasta maghrib ki samt tha us ka safar junub ki jaanib shumal se 
kaisa bhi talKH zikr ho kaisi bhi tursh baat un ki samajh mein aaegi gul ki misal se 
chup-chap baiThe rahte hain kuchh bolte nahin bachche bigaD gae hain bahut dekh-bhaal se 
rangon ko bahte dekhiye kamre ke farsh par kirnon ke war rokiye shishe ki Dhaal se 
aankhon mein aansuon ka kahin nam tak nahin ab jute saf kijiye un ke rumal se 
chehra bujha bujha sa pareshan zulf zulf allah dushmanon ko bachae wabaal se 
phir paniyon mein nuqrai sae utar gae phir raat jagmaga uThi chandi ke thaal se

jag meñ koī na Tuk hañsā hogā ki na hañste meñ ro diyā hogā 
un ne qasdan bhī mere naale ko na sunā hogā gar sunā hogā 
dekhiye ab ke ġham se jī merā na bachegā bachegā kyā hogā 
dil zamāne ke haath se sālim koī hogā jo rah gayā hogā 
haal mujh ġham-zada kā jis tis ne jab sunā hogā ro diyā hogā 
dil ke phir zaḳhm taaza hote haiñ kahīñ ġhuncha koī khilā hogā 
yak-ba-yak naam le uThā merā jī meñ kyā us ke aa gayā hogā 
mere nāloñ pe koī duniyā meñ bin kiye aah kam rahā hogā 
lekin us ko asar ḳhudā jaane na huā hogā yā huā hogā 
qatl se mere vo jo baaz rahā kisī bad-ḳhvāh ne kahā hogā 
dil bhī ai 'dard' qatra-e-ḳhūñ thā āñsuoñ meñ kahīñ girā hogā 
jag mein koi na Tuk hansa hoga ki na hanste mein ro diya hoga 
un ne qasdan bhi mere nale ko na suna hoga gar suna hoga 
dekhiye ab ke gham se ji mera na bachega bachega kya hoga 
dil zamane ke hath se salim koi hoga jo rah gaya hoga 
haal mujh gham-zada ka jis tis ne jab suna hoga ro diya hoga 
dil ke phir zaKHm taza hote hain kahin ghuncha koi khila hoga 
yak-ba-yak nam le uTha mera ji mein kya us ke aa gaya hoga 
mere nalon pe koi duniya mein bin kiye aah kam raha hoga 
lekin us ko asar KHuda jaane na hua hoga ya hua hoga 
qatl se mere wo jo baz raha kisi bad-KHwah ne kaha hoga 
dil bhi ai 'dard' qatra-e-KHun tha aansuon mein kahin gira hoga

samajhtā huuñ maiñ sab kuchh sirf samjhānā nahīñ aatā taḌaptā huuñ magar auroñ ko taḌpānā nahīñ aatā 
ye jamunā kī hasīñ amvāj kyuuñ argan bajātī haiñ mujhe gaanā nahīñ aatā mujhe gaanā nahīñ aatā 
ye merī ziist ḳhud ik mustaqil tūfān hai 'aḳhtar' mujhe in ġham ke tūfānoñ se ghabrānā nahīñ aatā 
samajhta hun main sab kuchh sirf samjhana nahin aata taDapta hun magar auron ko taDpana nahin aata 
ye jamuna ki hasin amwaj kyun argan bajati hain mujhe gana nahin aata mujhe gana nahin aata 
ye meri zist KHud ek mustaqil tufan hai 'aKHtar' mujhe in gham ke tufanon se ghabrana nahin aata

tirī sadā kā hai sadiyoñ se intizār mujhe mire lahū ke samundar zarā pukār mujhe 
maiñ apne ghar ko bulandī pe chaḌh ke kyā dekhūñ urūj-e-fan mirī dahlīz par utaar mujhe 
ubalte dekhī hai sūraj se maiñ ne tārīkī na raas aa.egī ye sub.h-e-zar-nigār mujhe 
kahegā dil to maiñ patthar ke paañv chūmūñgā zamāna laakh kare aa ke sañgsār mujhe 
vo fāqa-mast huuñ jis raah se guzartā huuñ salām kartā hai āshob-e-rozgār mujhe 
teri sada ka hai sadiyon se intizar mujhe mere lahu ke samundar zara pukar mujhe 
main apne ghar ko bulandi pe chaDh ke kya dekhun uruj-e-fan meri dahliz par utar mujhe 
ubalte dekhi hai suraj se main ne tariki na ras aaegi ye subh-e-zar-nigar mujhe 
kahega dil to main patthar ke panw chumunga zamana lakh kare aa ke sangsar mujhe 
wo faqa-mast hun jis rah se guzarta hun salam karta hai aashob-e-rozgar mujhe

ik fasāna sun ga.e ik kah ga.e maiñ jo royā muskurā kar rah ga.e 
yā tire mohtāj haiñ ai ḳhūn-e-dil yā inhīñ āñkhoñ se dariyā bah ga.e 
maut un kā muñh hī taktī rah ga.ī jo tirī furqat ke sadme sah ga.e 
tū salāmat hai to ham ai dard-e-dil mar hī jā.eñge jo jiite rah ga.e 
phir kisī kī yaad ne taḌpā diyā phir kaleja thaam kar ham rah ga.e 
uTh ga.e duniyā se 'fānī' ahl-e-zauq ek ham marne ko zinda rah ga.e 
ek fasana sun gae ek kah gae main jo roya muskura kar rah gae 
ya tere mohtaj hain ai KHun-e-dil ya inhin aankhon se dariya bah gae 
maut un ka munh hi takti rah gai jo teri furqat ke sadme sah gae 
tu salamat hai to hum ai dard-e-dil mar hi jaenge jo jite rah gae 
phir kisi ki yaad ne taDpa diya phir kaleja tham kar hum rah gae 
uTh gae duniya se 'fani' ahl-e-zauq ek hum marne ko zinda rah gae

is bulandī pe kahāñ the pahle ab jo bādal haiñ dhuāñ the pahle 
naqsh miTte haiñ to aatā hai ḳhayāl ret par ham bhī kahāñ the pahle 
ab har ik shaḳhs hai ezaaz talab shahr meñ chand makāñ the pahle 
aaj shahroñ meñ haiñ jitne ḳhatre jañgaloñ meñ bhī kahāñ the pahle 
log yuuñ kahte haiñ apne qisse jaise vo shāh-jahāñ the pahle 
TuuT kar ham bhī milā karte the bevafā tum bhī kahāñ the pahle 
is bulandi pe kahan the pahle ab jo baadal hain dhuan the pahle 
naqsh miTte hain to aata hai KHayal ret par hum bhi kahan the pahle 
ab har ek shaKHs hai ezaz talab shahr mein chand makan the pahle 
aaj shahron mein hain jitne KHatre jangalon mein bhi kahan the pahle 
log yun kahte hain apne qisse jaise wo shah-jahan the pahle 
TuT kar hum bhi mila karte the bewafa tum bhi kahan the pahle

mudāvā habs kā hone lagā āhista āhista chalī aatī hai vo mauj-e-sabā āhista āhista 
zarā vaqfa se niklegā magar niklegā chāñd āḳhir ki sūraj bhī to maġhrib meñ chhupā āhista āhista 
koī suntā to ik kohrām barpā thā havāoñ meñ shajar se ek pattā jab girā āhista āhista 
abhī se harf-e-ruḳhsat kyuuñ jab aadhī raat baaqī hai gul o shabnam to hote haiñ judā āhista āhista 
mujhe manzūr gar tark-e-ta'alluq hai razā terī magar TūTegā rishta dard kā āhista āhista 
phir is ke baad shab hai jis kī had sub.h-e-abad tak hai muġhannī shaam kā naġhma sunā āhista āhista 
shab-e-furqat meñ jab najm-e-sahar bhī Duub jaate haiñ utartā hai mire dil meñ ḳhudā āhista āhista 
maiñ shahr-e-dil se niklā huuñ sab āvāzoñ ko dafnā kar 'nadīm' ab kaun detā hai sadā āhista āhista 
mudawa habs ka hone laga aahista aahista chali aati hai wo mauj-e-saba aahista aahista 
zara waqfa se niklega magar niklega chand aaKHir ki suraj bhi to maghrib mein chhupa aahista aahista 
koi sunta to ek kohram barpa tha hawaon mein shajar se ek patta jab gira aahista aahista 
abhi se harf-e-ruKHsat kyun jab aadhi raat baqi hai gul o shabnam to hote hain juda aahista aahista 
mujhe manzur gar tark-e-ta'alluq hai raza teri magar TuTega rishta dard ka aahista aahista 
phir is ke baad shab hai jis ki had subh-e-abad tak hai mughanni sham ka naghma suna aahista aahista 
shab-e-furqat mein jab najm-e-sahar bhi Dub jate hain utarta hai mere dil mein KHuda aahista aahista 
main shahr-e-dil se nikla hun sab aawazon ko dafna kar 'nadim' ab kaun deta hai sada aahista aahista

ḳhvāb ke phūloñ kī ta.abīreñ kahānī ho ga.iiñ ḳhuun ThanDā paḌ gayā āñkheñ purānī ho ga.iiñ 
jis kā chehra thā chamakte mausamoñ kī aarzū us kī tasvīreñ bhī aurāq-e-ḳhizānī ho ga.iiñ 
dil bhar aayā kāġhaz-e-ḳhālī kī sūrat dekh kar jin ko likhnā thā vo sab bāteñ zabānī ho ga.iiñ 
jo muqaddar thā use to roknā bas meñ na thā un kā kyā karte jo bāteñ nā-gahānī ho ga.iiñ 
rah gayā 'mushtāq' dil meñ rañg-e-yād-e-raftagāñ phuul mahñge ho ga.e qabreñ purānī ho ga.iiñ 
KHwab ke phulon ki tabiren kahani ho gain KHun ThanDa paD gaya aankhen purani ho gain 
jis ka chehra tha chamakte mausamon ki aarzu us ki taswiren bhi auraq-e-KHizani ho gain 
dil bhar aaya kaghaz-e-KHali ki surat dekh kar jin ko likhna tha wo sab baaten zabani ho gain 
jo muqaddar tha use to rokna bas mein na tha un ka kya karte jo baaten na-gahani ho gain 
rah gaya 'mushtaq' dil mein rang-e-yaad-e-raftagan phul mahnge ho gae qabren purani ho gain

terī galī meñ maiñ na chalūñ aur sabā chale yuuñ hī ḳhudā jo chāhe to bande kī kyā chale 
kis kī ye mauj-e-husn huī jalva-gar ki yuuñ dariyā meñ jo habāb the āñkheñ chhupā chale 
ham bhī jaras kī tarah to is qāfile ke saath naale jo kuchh bisāt meñ the so sunā chale 
kah baiThiyo na 'dard' ki ahl-e-vafā huuñ maiñ us bevafā ke aage jo zikr-e-vafā chale 
teri gali mein main na chalun aur saba chale yun hi KHuda jo chahe to bande ki kya chale 
kis ki ye mauj-e-husn hui jalwa-gar ki yun dariya mein jo habab the aankhen chhupa chale 
hum bhi jaras ki tarah to is qafile ke sath nale jo kuchh bisat mein the so suna chale 
kah baiThiyo na 'dard' ki ahl-e-wafa hun main us bewafa ke aage jo zikr-e-wafa chale

phuul sūñghe jaane kyā yaad aa gayā dil ajab andāz se lahrā gayā 
us se pūchhe koī chāhat ke maze jis ne chāhā aur jo chāhā gayā 
ek lamha ban ke aish-e-jāvedāñ merī saarī zindagī par chhā gayā 
ġhuncha-e-dil haa.e kaisā ġhuncha thā jo khilā aur khilte hī murjhā gayā 
ro rahā huuñ mausam-e-gul dekh kar maiñ samajhtā thā mujhe sabr aa gayā 
ye havā ye barg-e-gul kā ehtizāz aaj maiñ rāz-e-musarrat pā gayā 
'aḳhtar' ab barsāt ruḳhsat ho ga.ī ab hamārā raat kā ronā gayā 
phul sunghe jaane kya yaad aa gaya dil ajab andaz se lahra gaya 
us se puchhe koi chahat ke maze jis ne chaha aur jo chaha gaya 
ek lamha ban ke aish-e-jawedan meri sari zindagi par chha gaya 
ghuncha-e-dil hae kaisa ghuncha tha jo khila aur khilte hi murjha gaya 
ro raha hun mausam-e-gul dekh kar main samajhta tha mujhe sabr aa gaya 
ye hawa ye barg-e-gul ka ehtizaz aaj main raaz-e-musarrat pa gaya 
'aKHtar' ab barsat ruKHsat ho gai ab hamara raat ka rona gaya

aaj ik lahr bhī paanī meñ na thī koī tasvīr ravānī meñ na thī 
valvala misra-e-avval meñ na thā harakat misra-e-sānī meñ na thī 
koī āhañg na alfāz meñ thā kaifiyat koī ma.ānī meñ na thī 
ḳhuuñ kā nam sāda-navā.ī meñ na thā ḳhuuñ kī bū shoḳh-bayānī meñ na thī 
koī mafhūm tasavvur meñ na thā koī bhī baat kahānī meñ na thī 
rañg ab koī ḳhalāoñ meñ na thā koī pahchān nishānī meñ na thī 
ḳhush-yaqīnī meñ na thā ab koī nuur zau koī ḳhanda-gumānī meñ na thī 
jī sulagne kā dhuāñ ḳhat meñ na thā raushnī harf-e-zabānī meñ na thī 
rañj bhūle hue va.ade kā na thā lazzat ab yād-dahānī meñ na thī 
lo ki jāmid sī ġhazal bhī likh dī aaj kuchh zindagī 'bānī' meñ na thī 
aaj ek lahr bhi pani mein na thi koi taswir rawani mein na thi 
walwala misra-e-awwal mein na tha harakat misra-e-sani mein na thi 
koi aahang na alfaz mein tha kaifiyat koi maani mein na thi 
KHun ka nam sada-nawai mein na tha KHun ki bu shoKH-bayani mein na thi 
koi mafhum tasawwur mein na tha koi bhi baat kahani mein na thi 
rang ab koi KHalaon mein na tha koi pahchan nishani mein na thi 
KHush-yaqini mein na tha ab koi nur zau koi KHanda-gumani mein na thi 
ji sulagne ka dhuan KHat mein na tha raushni harf-e-zabani mein na thi 
ranj bhule hue wade ka na tha lazzat ab yaad-dahani mein na thi 
lo ki jamid si ghazal bhi likh di aaj kuchh zindagi 'bani' mein na thi

kahne ko sham-e-bazm-e-zamān-o-makāñ huuñ maiñ socho to sirf kushta-e-daur-e-jahāñ huuñ maiñ 
aatā huuñ maiñ zamāne kī āñkhoñ meñ raat din lekin ḳhud apnī nazroñ se ab tak nihāñ huuñ maiñ 
jaatā nahīñ kināroñ se aage kisī kā dhyān kab se pukārtā huuñ yahāñ huuñ yahāñ huuñ maiñ 
ik Dūbte vajūd kī maiñ hī pukār huuñ aur aap hī vajūd kā andhā kuaañ huuñ maiñ 
cigarette jise sulagtā huā koī chhoḌ de us kā dhuāñ huuñ aur pareshāñ dhuāñ huuñ maiñ 
kahne ko sham-e-bazm-e-zaman-o-makan hun main socho to sirf kushta-e-daur-e-jahan hun main 
aata hun main zamane ki aankhon mein raat din lekin KHud apni nazron se ab tak nihan hun main 
jata nahin kinaron se aage kisi ka dhyan kab se pukarta hun yahan hun yahan hun main 
ek Dubte wajud ki main hi pukar hun aur aap hi wajud ka andha kuan hun main 
cigarette jise sulagta hua koi chhoD de us ka dhuan hun aur pareshan dhuan hun main

shabāb aayā kisī but par fidā hone kā vaqt aayā mirī duniyā meñ bande ke ḳhudā hone kā vaqt aayā 
unheñ dekhā to zāhid ne kahā īmān kī ye hai ki ab insān ko sajda ravā hone kā vaqt aayā 
ḳhudā jaane ye hai auj-e-yaqīñ yā pasti-e-himmat ḳhudā se kah rahā huuñ nā-ḳhudā hone kā vaqt aayā 
hameñ bhī aa paḌā hai dostoñ se kaam kuchh ya.anī hamāre dostoñ ke be-vafā hone kā vaqt aayā 
naved-e-sar-bulandī dī munajjim ne to maiñ samjhā sagān-e-dahr ke aage ḳhudā hone kā vaqt aayā 
shabab aaya kisi but par fida hone ka waqt aaya meri duniya mein bande ke KHuda hone ka waqt aaya 
unhen dekha to zahid ne kaha iman ki ye hai ki ab insan ko sajda rawa hone ka waqt aaya 
KHuda jaane ye hai auj-e-yaqin ya pasti-e-himmat KHuda se kah raha hun na-KHuda hone ka waqt aaya 
hamein bhi aa paDa hai doston se kaam kuchh yani hamare doston ke be-wafa hone ka waqt aaya 
nawed-e-sar-bulandi di munajjim ne to main samjha sagan-e-dahr ke aage KHuda hone ka waqt aaya

sabab us kī pareshānī kā maiñ huuñ namak kī fasl vo paanī kā maiñ huuñ 
ye jangal mujh ko raas aanā nahīñ hai parinda dasht-e-imkānī kā maiñ huuñ 
mirī mushkil mirī mushkil nahīñ hai vasīla terī āsānī kā maiñ huuñ 
mujhe duniyā luTā degī koī din asāsa ālam-e-fānī kā maiñ huuñ 
abhī sāhil mirā rasta na dekhe abhī dariyā kī tuġhyānī kā maiñ huuñ 
vahīñ mujh ko supurd-e-ḳhāk karnā ki jis ḳhāk-e-bayābānī kā maiñ huuñ 
mire hone kā kuchh matlab to hogā to kyā bekār be-ma.anī kā maiñ huuñ 
faqīrāna tabī'at kā huuñ varna 'talab' haqdār sultānī kā maiñ huuñ 
sabab us ki pareshani ka main hun namak ki fasl wo pani ka main hun 
ye jangal mujh ko ras aana nahin hai parinda dasht-e-imkani ka main hun 
meri mushkil meri mushkil nahin hai wasila teri aasani ka main hun 
mujhe duniya luTa degi koi din asasa aalam-e-fani ka main hun 
abhi sahil mera rasta na dekhe abhi dariya ki tughyani ka main hun 
wahin mujh ko supurd-e-KHak karna ki jis KHak-e-bayabani ka main hun 
mere hone ka kuchh matlab to hoga to kya bekar be-mani ka main hun 
faqirana tabi'at ka hun warna 'talab' haqdar sultani ka main hun

baḌhī jo had se to saare tilism toḌ ga.ī vo ḳhush-dilī jo diloñ ko diloñ se joḌ ga.ī 
abad kī raah pe be-ḳhvāb dhaḌkanoñ kī dhamak jo so ga.e unheñ bujhte jagoñ meñ chhoḌ ga.ī 
ye zindagī kī lagan hai ki rat-jagoñ kī tarañg jo jāgte the unhī ko ye dhun jhiñjhoḌ ga.ī 
vo ek Tiis jise terā naam yaad rahā kabhī kabhī to mire dil kā saath chhoḌ ga.ī 
rukā rukā tire lab par ajab suḳhan thā koī tirī nigah bhī jise nā-tamām chhoḌ ga.ī 
farāz-e-dil se utartī huī nadī 'amjad' jahāñ jahāñ thā hasīñ vādiyoñ kā moḌ ga.ī 
baDhi jo had se to sare tilism toD gai wo KHush-dili jo dilon ko dilon se joD gai 
abad ki rah pe be-KHwab dhaDkanon ki dhamak jo so gae unhen bujhte jagon mein chhoD gai 
ye zindagi ki lagan hai ki rat-jagon ki tarang jo jagte the unhi ko ye dhun jhinjhoD gai 
wo ek Tis jise tera nam yaad raha kabhi kabhi to mere dil ka sath chhoD gai 
ruka ruka tere lab par ajab suKHan tha koi teri nigah bhi jise na-tamam chhoD gai 
faraaz-e-dil se utarti hui nadi 'amjad' jahan jahan tha hasin wadiyon ka moD gai

jalva-numā.ī be-parvā.ī haañ yahī riit jahāñ kī hai kab koī laḌkī man kā darīcha khol ke bāhar jhāñkī hai 
aaj magar ik naar ko dekhā jaane ye naar kahāñ kī hai misr kī mūrat chiin kī guḌiyā devī hindostāñ kī hai 
mukh par ruup se dhuup kā aalam baal añdherī shab kī misāl aañkh nashīlī baat rasīlī chaal balā kī bāñkī hai 
'inshā'-jī use rok ke pūchheñ tum ko to muft milā hai husn kis liye phir bāzār-e-vafā meñ tum ne ye jins girāñ kī hai 
ek zarā sā gosha de do apne paas jahāñ se duur is bastī meñ ham logoñ ko hājat ek makāñ kī hai 
ahl-e-ḳhirad tādīb kī ḳhātir pāthar le le aa pahuñche jab kabhī ham ne shahr-e-ġhazal meñ dil kī baat bayāñ kī hai 
mulkoñ mulkoñ shahroñ shahroñ jogī ban kar ghūmā kaun qarya-ba-qarya sahrā-ba-sahrā ḳhaak ye kis ne phāñkī hai 
ham se jis ke taur hoñ baabā dekhoge do ek hī aur kahne ko to shahr-e-karachi bastī dil-zadagāñ kī hai 
jalwa-numai be-parwai han yahi rit jahan ki hai kab koi laDki man ka daricha khol ke bahar jhanki hai 
aaj magar ek nar ko dekha jaane ye nar kahan ki hai misr ki murat chin ki guDiya dewi hindostan ki hai 
mukh par rup se dhup ka aalam baal andheri shab ki misal aankh nashili baat rasili chaal bala ki banki hai 
'insha'-ji use rok ke puchhen tum ko to muft mila hai husn kis liye phir bazar-e-wafa mein tum ne ye jins giran ki hai 
ek zara sa gosha de do apne pas jahan se dur is basti mein hum logon ko hajat ek makan ki hai 
ahl-e-KHirad tadib ki KHatir pathar le le aa pahunche jab kabhi hum ne shahr-e-ghazal mein dil ki baat bayan ki hai 
mulkon mulkon shahron shahron jogi ban kar ghuma kaun qarya-ba-qarya sahra-ba-sahra KHak ye kis ne phanki hai 
hum se jis ke taur hon baba dekhoge do ek hi aur kahne ko to shahr-e-karachi basti dil-zadagan ki hai

badan kajlā gayā to dil kī tābānī se niklūñgā maiñ sūraj ban ke ik din apnī peshānī se niklūñgā 
nazar aa jā.ūñgā maiñ āñsuoñ meñ jab bhī ro.o.ge mujhe miTTī kiyā tum ne to maiñ paanī se niklūñgā 
tum āñkhoñ se mujhe jaañ ke safar kī mat ijāzat do agar utrā lahū meñ phir na āsānī se niklūñgā 
maiñ aisā ḳhūb-sūrat rañg huuñ dīvār kā apnī agar niklā to ghar vāloñ kī nādānī se niklūñgā 
zamīr-e-vaqt meñ paivast huuñ maiñ phāñs kī sūrat zamāna kyā samajhtā hai ki āsānī se niklūñgā 
yahī ik shai hai jo tanhā kabhī hone nahīñ detī 'zafar' mar jā.ūñgā jis din pareshānī se niklūñgā 
badan kajla gaya to dil ki tabani se niklunga main suraj ban ke ek din apni peshani se niklunga 
nazar aa jaunga main aansuon mein jab bhi rooge mujhe miTTi kiya tum ne to main pani se niklunga 
tum aankhon se mujhe jaan ke safar ki mat ijazat do agar utra lahu mein phir na aasani se niklunga 
main aisa KHub-surat rang hun diwar ka apni agar nikla to ghar walon ki nadani se niklunga 
zamir-e-waqt mein paiwast hun main phans ki surat zamana kya samajhta hai ki aasani se niklunga 
yahi ek shai hai jo tanha kabhi hone nahin deti 'zafar' mar jaunga jis din pareshani se niklunga

vo pahlī jaisī vahshateñ vo haal hī nahīñ rahā ki ab to shauq rāhat-e-visāl hī nahīñ rahā 
tamām hasrateñ har ik savāl dafn kar chuke hamāre paas ab koī savāl hī nahīñ rahā 
talāsh-e-rizq meñ ye shaam is tarah guzar ga.ī koī hai apnā muntazir ḳhayāl hī nahīñ rahā 
in aate jaate roz-o-shab ki gardishoñ ko dekh kar kisī ke hijr kā koī malāl hī nahīñ rahā 
hamārā kyā banegā kuchh na kuchh to is pe sochte magar kabhī hameñ ġham-e-ma.āl hī nahīñ rahā 
tumhāre ḳhāl-o-ḳhad pe ik kitāb likh rahe the ham magar tumhārā husn be-misāl hī nahīñ rahā 
sañvārtā nikhārtā maiñ kaise apne aap ko tumhāre baad apnā kuchh ḳhayāl hī nahīñ rahā 
zarā sī baat se diloñ meñ itnā farq aa gayā ta.alluqāt kā to phir savāl hī nahīñ rahā 
wo pahli jaisi wahshaten wo haal hi nahin raha ki ab to shauq rahat-e-visal hi nahin raha 
tamam hasraten har ek sawal dafn kar chuke hamare pas ab koi sawal hi nahin raha 
talash-e-rizq mein ye sham is tarah guzar gai koi hai apna muntazir KHayal hi nahin raha 
in aate jate roz-o-shab ki gardishon ko dekh kar kisi ke hijr ka koi malal hi nahin raha 
hamara kya banega kuchh na kuchh to is pe sochte magar kabhi hamein gham-e-maal hi nahin raha 
tumhaare KHal-o-KHad pe ek kitab likh rahe the hum magar tumhaara husn be-misal hi nahin raha 
sanwarta nikhaarta main kaise apne aap ko tumhaare baad apna kuchh KHayal hi nahin raha 
zara si baat se dilon mein itna farq aa gaya talluqat ka to phir sawal hi nahin raha

lutf kī un se iltijā na kareñ ham ne aisā kabhī kiyā na kareñ 
mil rahegā jo un se milnā hai lab ko sharminda-e-duā na kareñ 
sabr mushkil hai aarzū bekār kyā kareñ āshiqī meñ kyā na kareñ 
maslak-e-ishq meñ hai fikr harām dil ko tadbīr-āshnā na kareñ 
bhuul hī jaa.eñ ham ko ye to na ho log mere liye duā na kareñ 
marzi-e-yār ke ḳhilāf na ho kaun kahtā hai vo jafā na kareñ 
shauq un kā so miT chukā 'hasrat' kyā kareñ ham agar vafā na kareñ 
lutf ki un se iltija na karen hum ne aisa kabhi kiya na karen 
mil rahega jo un se milna hai lab ko sharminda-e-dua na karen 
sabr mushkil hai aarzu bekar kya karen aashiqi mein kya na karen 
maslak-e-ishq mein hai fikr haram dil ko tadbir-ashna na karen 
bhul hi jaen hum ko ye to na ho log mere liye dua na karen 
marzi-e-yar ke KHilaf na ho kaun kahta hai wo jafa na karen 
shauq un ka so miT chuka 'hasrat' kya karen hum agar wafa na karen

ham jo mast-e-sharāb hote haiñ zarre se āftāb hote haiñ 
hai ḳharābāt sohbat-e-vā.iz log nāhaq ḳharāb hote haiñ 
kyā kaheñ kaise roz o shab ham se amal-e-nā-savāb hote haiñ 
bādshah haiñ gadā, gadā sultān kuchh na.e inqalāb hote haiñ 
ham jo karte haiñ mai-kade meñ duā ahl-e-masjid ko ḳhvāb hote haiñ 
vahī rah jaate haiñ zabānoñ par sher jo intiḳhāb hote haiñ 
kahte haiñ mast rind-e-saudā.ī ḳhuub ham ko ḳhitāb hote haiñ 
āñsuoñ se 'amīr' haiñ rusvā aise laḌke azaab hote haiñ 
hum jo mast-e-sharab hote hain zarre se aaftab hote hain 
hai KHarabaat sohbat-e-waiz log nahaq KHarab hote hain 
kya kahen kaise roz o shab hum se amal-e-na-sawab hote hain 
baadshah hain gada, gada sultan kuchh nae inqalab hote hain 
hum jo karte hain mai-kade mein dua ahl-e-masjid ko KHwab hote hain 
wahi rah jate hain zabanon par sher jo intiKHab hote hain 
kahte hain mast rind-e-saudai KHub hum ko KHitab hote hain 
aansuon se 'amir' hain ruswa aise laDke azab hote hain

pilā saaqī bahār aa.e na aa.e ghaTā phir baar baar aa.e na aa.e 
tujhe ham dekhne ā.eñge sau baar koī dīvāna-vār aa.e na aa.e 
kahe jā.eñge dard-e-dil ham apnā kisī ko e'tibār aa.e na aa.e 
vo aa jaa.eñ idhar khole hue baal nasīm mushk-bār aa.e na aa.e 
tumheñ ārām se sonā mubārak mujhe shab bhar qarār aa.e na aa.e 
havā-e-shauq meñ ab uḌ chale ham havā-e-kū-e-yār aa.e na aa.e 
tire dil meñ masarrat ke khileñ phuul mire dil meñ bahār aa.e na aa.e 
'jalīl' ab mai-kashī kā lutf uThāo phir abr-e-nau-bahār aa.e na aa.e 
pila saqi bahaar aae na aae ghaTa phir bar bar aae na aae 
tujhe hum dekhne aaenge sau bar koi diwana-war aae na aae 
kahe jaenge dard-e-dil hum apna kisi ko e'tibar aae na aae 
wo aa jaen idhar khole hue baal nasim mushk-bar aae na aae 
tumhein aaram se sona mubarak mujhe shab bhar qarar aae na aae 
hawa-e-shauq mein ab uD chale hum hawa-e-ku-e-yar aae na aae 
tere dil mein masarrat ke khilen phul mere dil mein bahaar aae na aae 
'jalil' ab mai-kashi ka lutf uThao phir abr-e-nau-bahaar aae na aae

shīshe kā aadmī huuñ mirī zindagī hai kyā patthar haiñ sab ke haath meñ mujh ko kamī hai kyā 
ab shahr meñ vo phuul se chehre nahīñ rahe kaisī lagī hai aag ye bastī huī hai kyā 
maiñ jal rahā huuñ aur koī dekhtā nahīñ āñkheñ haiñ sab ke paas magar bebasī hai kyā 
tum dost ho to mujh se zarā dushmanī karo kuchh talḳhiyāñ na hoñ to bhalā dostī hai kyā 
ai gardish-e-talāsh na manzil na rāsta merā junūñ hai kyā mirī āvārgī hai kyā 
ḳhush ho ke har fareb zamāne kā khā liyā ye dil hī jāntā hai ki dil par banī hai kyā 
do bol dil ke haiñ jo har ik dil ko chhū sakeñ ai 'ashk' varna sher haiñ kyā shā.irī hai kyā 
shishe ka aadmi hun meri zindagi hai kya patthar hain sab ke hath mein mujh ko kami hai kya 
ab shahr mein wo phul se chehre nahin rahe kaisi lagi hai aag ye basti hui hai kya 
main jal raha hun aur koi dekhta nahin aankhen hain sab ke pas magar bebasi hai kya 
tum dost ho to mujh se zara dushmani karo kuchh talKHiyan na hon to bhala dosti hai kya 
ai gardish-e-talash na manzil na rasta mera junun hai kya meri aawargi hai kya 
KHush ho ke har fareb zamane ka kha liya ye dil hi jaanta hai ki dil par bani hai kya 
do bol dil ke hain jo har ek dil ko chhu saken ai 'ashk' warna sher hain kya shairi hai kya

fareb-e-husn se gabr-o-musalmāñ kā chalan bigḌā ḳhudā kī yaad bhūlā shaiḳh but se barhaman bigḌā 
qabā-e-gul ko phāḌā jab mirā gul-pairahan bigḌā ban aa.ī kuchh na ġhunche se jo vo ġhuncha-dahan bigḌā 
nahīñ be-vaj.h hañsnā is qadar zaḳhm-e-shahīdāñ kā tirī talvār kā muñh kuchh na kuchh ai teġh-zan bigḌā 
takalluf kyā jo khoī jān-e-shīrīñ phoḌ kar sar ko jo thī ġhairat to phir ḳhusrav se hotā kohkan bigḌā 
kisī chashm-e-siyah kā jab huā sābit maiñ dīvāna to mujh se sust hāthī kī tarah jañglī hiran bigḌā 
asar iksīr kā yumn-e-qadam se terī paayā hai jozāmī ḳhāk-e-rah mal kar banāte haiñ badan bigḌā 
tirī taqlīd se kabk-e-darī ne Thokareñ khā.īñ chalā jab jānvar insāñ kī chaal us kā chalan bigḌā 
zavāl husn khilvātā hai meve kī qasam mujh se lagāyā daaġh ḳhat ne aan kar seb-e-zaqan bigḌā 
ruḳh-e-sāda nahīñ us shoḳh kā naqsh-e-adāvat se nazar aate hī aapas meñ har ahl-e-anjuman bigḌā 
jo bad-ḳhū tifl-e-ashk ai chashm-e-tar haiñ dekhnā ik din gharauñde kī tarah se gumbad-e-charḳh-e-kuhan bigḌā 
saf-e-mizhgāñ kī jumbish kā kiyā iqbāl ne kushta shahīdoñ ke hue sālār jab ham se tuman bigḌā 
kisī kī jab koī taqlīd kartā hai maiñ rotā huuñ hañsā gul kī tarah ġhuncha jahāñ us kā dahan bigḌā 
kamāl-e-dostī andesha-e-dushman nahīñ rakhtā kisī bhañvre se kis din koī mār-e-yāsman bigḌā 
rahī nafrat hamesha dāġh-e-uryānī ko phaa.e se huā jab qat.a jaama par hamāre pairahan bigḌā 
ragaḌvā.īñ ye mujh se eḌiyāñ ġhurbat meñ vahshat ne huā masdūd rasta jāda-e-rāh-e-vatan bigḌā 
kahā bulbul ne jab toḌā gul-e-sausan ko gulchīñ ne ilāhī ḳhair kiijo nīl-e-ruḳhsār-e-chaman bigḌā 
irāda mere khāne kā na ai zāġh-o-zaġhan kiijo vo kushta huuñ jise sūñghe se kuttoñ kā badan bigḌā 
amānat kī tarah rakkhā zamīñ ne roz-e-mahshar tak na ik mū kam huā apnā na ik tār-e-kafan bigḌā 
jahāñ ḳhālī nahīñ rahtā kabhī izā-dahindoñ se huā nāsūr-e-nau paidā agar zaḳhm-e-kuhan bigḌā 
tavañgar thā banī thī jab tak us mahbūb-e-ālam se maiñ muflis ho gayā jis roz se vo sīm-tan bigḌā 
lage muñh bhī chiḌhāne dete dete gāliyāñ sāhab zabāñ bigḌī to bigḌī thī ḳhabar liije dahan bigḌā 
banāvaT kaif-e-mai se khul ga.ī us shoḳh kī 'ātish' lagā kar muñh se paimāne ko vo paimāñ-shikan bigḌā 
fareb-e-husn se gabr-o-musalman ka chalan bigDa KHuda ki yaad bhula shaiKH but se barhaman bigDa 
qaba-e-gul ko phaDa jab mera gul-pairahan bigDa ban aai kuchh na ghunche se jo wo ghuncha-dahan bigDa 
nahin be-wajh hansna is qadar zaKHm-e-shahidan ka teri talwar ka munh kuchh na kuchh ai tegh-zan bigDa 
takalluf kya jo khoi jaan-e-shirin phoD kar sar ko jo thi ghairat to phir KHusraw se hota kohkan bigDa 
kisi chashm-e-siyah ka jab hua sabit main diwana to mujh se sust hathi ki tarah jangli hiran bigDa 
asar iksir ka yumn-e-qadam se teri paya hai jozami KHak-e-rah mal kar banate hain badan bigDa

zawal husn khilwata hai mewe ki qasam mujh se lagaya dagh KHat ne aan kar seb-e-zaqan bigDa

jo bad-KHu tifl-e-ashk ai chashm-e-tar hain dekhna ek din gharaunde ki tarah se gumbad-e-charKH-e-kuhan bigDa
