kamal-e-dosti andesha-e-dushman nahin rakhta kisi bhanwre se kis din koi mar-e-yasman bigDa 
rahi nafrat hamesha dagh-e-uryani ko phae se hua jab qata jama par hamare pairahan bigDa 
ragaDwain ye mujh se eDiyan ghurbat mein wahshat ne hua masdud rasta jada-e-rah-e-watan bigDa 
kaha bulbul ne jab toDa gul-e-sausan ko gulchin ne ilahi KHair kijo nil-e-ruKHsar-e-chaman bigDa 
irada mere khane ka na ai zagh-o-zaghan kijo wo kushta hun jise sunghe se kutton ka badan bigDa 
amanat ki tarah rakkha zamin ne roz-e-mahshar tak na ek mu kam hua apna na ek tar-e-kafan bigDa 
jahan KHali nahin rahta kabhi iza-dahindon se hua nasur-e-nau paida agar zaKHm-e-kuhan bigDa 
tawangar tha bani thi jab tak us mahbub-e-alam se main muflis ho gaya jis roz se wo sim-tan bigDa 
lage munh bhi chiDhane dete dete galiyan sahab zaban bigDi to bigDi thi KHabar lije dahan bigDa

bas koī aisī kamī saare safar meñ rah ga.ī jaise koī chiiz chalte vaqt ghar meñ rah ga.ī 
kaun ye chaltā hai mere saath be-jism-o-sadā chaap ye kis kī mirī har rahguzar meñ rah ga.ī 
gūñjte rahte haiñ tanhā.ī meñ bhī dīvār-o-dar kyā sadā us ne mujhe dī thī ki ghar meñ rah ga.ī 
aur to mausam guzar kar jā chukā vaadī ke paar bas zarā sī barf har sūkhe shajar meñ rah ga.ī 
raat dariyā meñ phir ik sho.ala sā chakrātā rahā phir koī jaltī huī kashtī bhañvar meñ rah ga.ī 
raat bhar hotā rahā hai kin ḳhazānoñ kā nuzūl motiyoñ kī sī jhalak har barg-e-tar meñ rah ga.ī 
lauT kar aa.e na kyuuñ jaate hue lamhe 'adīm' kyā kamī merī sadā-e-be-asar meñ rah ga.ī 
bas koi aisi kami sare safar mein rah gai jaise koi chiz chalte waqt ghar mein rah gai 
kaun ye chalta hai mere sath be-jism-o-sada chap ye kis ki meri har rahguzar mein rah gai 
gunjte rahte hain tanhai mein bhi diwar-o-dar kya sada us ne mujhe di thi ki ghar mein rah gai 
aur to mausam guzar kar ja chuka wadi ke par bas zara si barf har sukhe shajar mein rah gai 
raat dariya mein phir ek shoala sa chakraata raha phir koi jalti hui kashti bhanwar mein rah gai 
raat bhar hota raha hai kin KHazanon ka nuzul motiyon ki si jhalak har barg-e-tar mein rah gai 
lauT kar aae na kyun jate hue lamhe 'adim' kya kami meri sada-e-be-asar mein rah gai

bas is taqsīr par apne muqaddar meñ hai mar jaanā tabassum ko tabassum kyuuñ nazar ko kyuuñ nazar jaanā 
ḳhirad vāloñ se husn o ishq kī tanqīd kyā hogī na afsūn-e-nigah samjhā na andāz-e-nazar jaanā 
mai-e-gulfām bhī hai sāz-e-ishrat bhī hai saaqī bhī bahut mushkil hai āshob-e-haqīqat se guzar jaanā 
ġham-e-daurāñ meñ guzrī jis qadar guzrī jahāñ guzrī aur is par lutf ye hai zindagī ko muḳhtasar jaanā 
bas is taqsir par apne muqaddar mein hai mar jaana tabassum ko tabassum kyun nazar ko kyun nazar jaana 
KHirad walon se husn o ishq ki tanqid kya hogi na afsun-e-nigah samjha na andaz-e-nazar jaana 
mai-e-gulfam bhi hai saz-e-ishrat bhi hai saqi bhi bahut mushkil hai aashob-e-haqiqat se guzar jaana 
gham-e-dauran mein guzri jis qadar guzri jahan guzri aur is par lutf ye hai zindagi ko muKHtasar jaana

pukārtī hai ḳhamoshī mirī fuġhāñ kī tarah nigāheñ kahtī haiñ sab rāz-e-dil zabāñ kī tarah 
bigaḌ ga.ī hai yahāñ be-tarah jahāñ kī tarah kahāñ kī vaz.a kahāñ kī adā kahāñ kī tarah 
chhuḌā de qaid se ai barq ham asīroñ ko lagā de aag qafas ko bhī āshiyāñ kī tarah 
kabhī to sulh bhī ho jaa.e zohd o mastī meñ ilāhī shaiḳh bhī mai-ḳhvār ho muġhāñ kī tarah 
jalā ke dāġh-e-mohabbat ne dil ko ḳhaak kiyā bahār aa.ī mire baaġh meñ ḳhizāñ kī tarah 
hayā ne rok liyā jazb-e-dil ne khīñch liyā chale vo tiir kī sūrat khiñchī kamāñ kī tarah 
talāsh-e-yār meñ chhoḌī na sarzamīñ koī hamāre paañv meñ chakkar hai āsmāñ kī tarah 
jo samjhe ḳhizr to qaul-e-shahīd-e-ulfat ko girah meñ bāñdh rakkhe umr-e-jāvedāñ kī tarah 
sune jo hazrat-e-zāhid se vasf jannat ke to saaf phir ga.ī āñkhoñ meñ us makāñ kī tarah 
jhukī hī jaatī hai kuchh ḳhud-ba-ḳhud hayā se vo aañkh girī hī paḌtī hai bīmār-e-nā-tavāñ kī tarah 
ye sadd-e-rāh huā kis kā pās-e-rusvā.ī ruke hue haiñ mire ashk kārvāñ kī tarah 
adā-e-matlab-e-dil ham se siikh jaa.e koī unheñ sunā hī diyā haal dāstāñ kī tarah 
maze haiñ us dahan-e-zaḳhm ke liye kyā kyā jo chūse tiir ke paikān ko zabāñ kī tarah 
samajh ke kījiye barbād merā musht-e-ġhubār ye le na aa.e koī chakkar āsmāñ kī tarah 
ye dil hai aap kā ghar rahiye shauq se lekin shakeb-o-rāhat-o-sabr-o-qarār-e-jāñ kī tarah 
qayāmat aa.ī shab-e-vasl mere ghar ke paas raqīb ne use āvāz dī azaañ kī tarah 
shab us kī bazm meñ thā sham.a par bhī rashk hameñ ki muñh meñ shole ko gul-gīr le zabāñ kī tarah 
mujhe ye hukm hai zinhār tum na karnā ishq nasīhateñ bhī vo karte haiñ imtihāñ kī tarah 
ham apne zo.af ke sadqe biThā diyā aisā hile na dar se tire sañg-e-āstāñ kī tarah 
kuchh un se kahne ko baiThe the ham ki ḳhalvat meñ raqīb aa hī gayā marg-e-nā-gahāñ kī tarah 
shikasta baal huuñ vo murġh-e-nātavāñ-o-za.īf ki maiñ to maiñ na uḌe mere āshiyāñ kī tarah 
na hoñge soz-e-mohabbat ke dil-jale ThanDe bharī hai ātish-e-ġham maġhz-e-ustuḳhvāñ kī tarah 
na chhoḌ said-e-mohabbat ko ḳhaak par sayyād use bhī Daal le tū dosh par kamāñ kī tarah 
zabān-e-ḳhār huī tar hamārī vahshat se ki chhāle phūTe bhī chashm-e-ḳhūñ-fishāñ kī tarah 
ḳhudā qubūl kare 'dāġh' tum jo sū-e-adam chale ho ishq-e-butāñ le ke armuġhāñ kī tarah 
pukarti hai KHamoshi meri fughan ki tarah nigahen kahti hain sab raaz-e-dil zaban ki tarah 
bigaD gai hai yahan be-tarah jahan ki tarah kahan ki waza kahan ki ada kahan ki tarah 
chhuDa de qaid se ai barq hum asiron ko laga de aag qafas ko bhi aashiyan ki tarah 
kabhi to sulh bhi ho jae zohd o masti mein ilahi shaiKH bhi mai-KHwar ho mughan ki tarah 
jala ke dagh-e-mohabbat ne dil ko KHak kiya bahaar aai mere bagh mein KHizan ki tarah 
haya ne rok liya jazb-e-dil ne khinch liya chale wo tir ki surat khinchi kaman ki tarah 
talash-e-yar mein chhoDi na sarzamin koi hamare panw mein chakkar hai aasman ki tarah 
jo samjhe KHizr to qaul-e-shahid-e-ulfat ko girah mein bandh rakkhe umr-e-jawedan ki tarah 
sune jo hazrat-e-zahid se wasf jannat ke to saf phir gai aankhon mein us makan ki tarah 
jhuki hi jati hai kuchh KHud-ba-KHud haya se wo aankh giri hi paDti hai bimar-e-na-tawan ki tarah 
ye sadd-e-rah hua kis ka pas-e-ruswai ruke hue hain mere ashk karwan ki tarah 
ada-e-matlab-e-dil hum se sikh jae koi unhen suna hi diya haal dastan ki tarah 
maze hain us dahan-e-zaKHm ke liye kya kya jo chuse tir ke paikan ko zaban ki tarah

ye dil hai aap ka ghar rahiye shauq se lekin shakeb-o-rahat-o-sabr-o-qarar-e-jaan ki tarah 
qayamat aai shab-e-wasl mere ghar ke pas raqib ne use aawaz di azan ki tarah 
shab us ki bazm mein tha shama par bhi rashk hamein ki munh mein shole ko gul-gir le zaban ki tarah 
mujhe ye hukm hai zinhaar tum na karna ishq nasihaten bhi wo karte hain imtihan ki tarah 
hum apne zoaf ke sadqe biTha diya aisa hile na dar se tere sang-e-astan ki tarah 
kuchh un se kahne ko baiThe the hum ki KHalwat mein raqib aa hi gaya marg-e-na-gahan ki tarah 
shikasta baal hun wo murgh-e-natawan-o-zaif ki main to main na uDe mere aashiyan ki tarah 
na honge soz-e-mohabbat ke dil-jale ThanDe bhari hai aatish-e-gham maghz-e-ustuKHwan ki tarah 
na chhoD said-e-mohabbat ko KHak par sayyaad use bhi Dal le tu dosh par kaman ki tarah 
zaban-e-KHar hui tar hamari wahshat se ki chhaale phuTe bhi chashm-e-KHun-fishan ki tarah

ishq ko taqlīd se āzād kar dil se girya aañkh se fariyād kar 
baaz aa ai banda-e-husn-e-majāz yuuñ na apnī zindagī barbād kar 
ai ḳhayāloñ ke makīñ nazroñ se duur merī vīrāñ ḳhalvateñ ābād kar 
naza.a meñ hichkī nahīñ aa.ī mujhe bhūlne vaale ḳhudā-rā yaad kar 
husn ko duniyā kī āñkhoñ se na dekh apnī ik tarz-e-nazar ījād kar 
ishrat-e-duniyā hai ik ḳhvāb-e-bahār kāba-e-dil dard se ābād kar 
ab kahāñ 'ehsān' duniyā meñ vafā tauba kar nādāñ ḳhudā ko yaad kar 
ishq ko taqlid se aazad kar dil se girya aankh se fariyaad kar 
baz aa ai banda-e-husn-e-majaz yun na apni zindagi barbaad kar 
ai KHayalon ke makin nazron se dur meri viran KHalwaten aabaad kar 
naza mein hichki nahin aai mujhe bhulne wale KHuda-ra yaad kar 
husn ko duniya ki aankhon se na dekh apni ek tarz-e-nazar ijad kar 
ishrat-e-duniya hai ek KHwab-e-bahaar kaba-e-dil dard se aabaad kar 
ab kahan 'ehsan' duniya mein wafa tauba kar nadan KHuda ko yaad kar

ek hī baar nahīñ hai vo dubāra kam hai maiñ vo dariyā huuñ jise apnā kināra kam hai 
vahī takrār hai aur ek vahī yaksānī is shab-o-roz meñ ab apnā guzāra kam hai 
mere din raat meñ karnā nahīñ ab is ko shumār hissa-e-umr koī maiñ ne guzārā kam hai 
maiñ ziyāda huuñ bahut us ke liye ab tak bhī aur mere liye vo saare kā saarā kam hai 
us kī apnī bhī tavajjoh nahīñ mujh par koī ḳhaas aur maiñ ne bhī abhī us ko pukārā kam hai 
aaj paanī jo uchhaltā nahīñ pahle kī tarah aisā lagtā hai ki is meñ koī dhārā kam hai 
haath pair aap hī maiñ maar rahā huuñ filhāl Dūbte ko abhī tinke kā sahārā kam hai 
maiñ to rakhtā huuñ bahut roz ke roz in kā hisāb āsmāñ par koī aaj ek sitāra kam hai 
pesh-raft aur abhī mumkin bhī nahīñ hai ki 'zafar' abhī us shoḳh pe kuchh zor hamārā kam hai 
ek hi bar nahin hai wo dubara kam hai main wo dariya hun jise apna kinara kam hai 
wahi takrar hai aur ek wahi yaksani is shab-o-roz mein ab apna guzara kam hai 
mere din raat mein karna nahin ab is ko shumar hissa-e-umr koi main ne guzara kam hai 
main ziyaada hun bahut us ke liye ab tak bhi aur mere liye wo sare ka sara kam hai 
us ki apni bhi tawajjoh nahin mujh par koi KHas aur main ne bhi abhi us ko pukara kam hai 
aaj pani jo uchhalta nahin pahle ki tarah aisa lagta hai ki is mein koi dhaara kam hai 
hath pair aap hi main mar raha hun filhaal Dubte ko abhi tinke ka sahaara kam hai 
main to rakhta hun bahut roz ke roz in ka hisab aasman par koi aaj ek sitara kam hai 
pesh-raft aur abhi mumkin bhi nahin hai ki 'zafar' abhi us shoKH pe kuchh zor hamara kam hai

aañkh meñ aañsū kā aur dil meñ lahū kā kaal hai hai tamannā kā vahī jo zindagī kā haal hai 
yuuñ dhuāñ dene lagā hai jism aur jaañ kā alaao jaise rag rag meñ ravāñ ik ātish-e-sayyāl hai 
phailte jaate haiñ dām-e-nārasī ke dā.ere tere mere darmiyāñ kin hādsoñ kā jaal hai 
ghir ga.ī hai do zamānoñ kī kashākash meñ hayāt ik taraf zanjīr-e-māzī ek jānib haal hai 
hijr kī rāhoñ se 'akbar' manzil-e-dīdār tak yuuñ hai jaise darmiyāñ ik raushnī kā saal hai 
aankh mein aansu ka aur dil mein lahu ka kal hai hai tamanna ka wahi jo zindagi ka haal hai 
yun dhuan dene laga hai jism aur jaan ka alao jaise rag rag mein rawan ek aatish-e-sayyal hai 
phailte jate hain dam-e-narasi ke daere tere mere darmiyan kin hadson ka jal hai 
ghir gai hai do zamanon ki kashakash mein hayat ek taraf zanjir-e-mazi ek jaanib haal hai 
hijr ki rahon se 'akbar' manzil-e-didar tak yun hai jaise darmiyan ek raushni ka sal hai

yuuñ to jo chāhe yahāñ sāhab-e-mahfil ho jaa.e bazm us shaḳhs kī hai tū jise hāsil ho jaa.e 
nāḳhudā ai mirī kashtī ke chalāne vaale lutf to jab hai ki har mauj hī sāhil ho jaa.e 
is liye chal ke har ik gaam pe ruk jaatā huuñ tā na be-kaif ġham-e-dūri-e-manzil ho jaa.e 
tujh ko apnī hī qasam ye to batā de mujh ko kyā ye mumkin hai kabhī tū mujhe hāsil ho jaa.e 
haa.e us vaqt dil-e-zār kā aalam kyā ho gar mohabbat hī mohabbat ke muqābil ho jaa.e 
phīkā phīkā hai mirī bazm-e-mohabbat kā charāġh tum jo aa jaao to kuchh raunaq-e-mahfil ho jaa.e 
terī nazreñ jo zarā mujh pe karam farmā.eñ terī nazroñ kī qasam phir yahī dil dil ho jaa.e 
hosh us ke haiñ ye jaam us kā hai tū hai us kā mai-kade meñ tire jo shaḳhs bhī ġhāfil ho jaa.e 
fitnagar shauq se 'bahzād' ko kar de pāmāl is se taskīn-e-dilī gar tujhe hāsil ho jaa.e 
yun to jo chahe yahan sahab-e-mahfil ho jae bazm us shaKHs ki hai tu jise hasil ho jae 
naKHuda ai meri kashti ke chalane wale lutf to jab hai ki har mauj hi sahil ho jae 
is liye chal ke har ek gam pe ruk jata hun ta na be-kaif gham-e-duri-e-manzil ho jae 
tujh ko apni hi qasam ye to bata de mujh ko kya ye mumkin hai kabhi tu mujhe hasil ho jae 
hae us waqt dil-e-zar ka aalam kya ho gar mohabbat hi mohabbat ke muqabil ho jae 
phika phika hai meri bazm-e-mohabbat ka charagh tum jo aa jao to kuchh raunaq-e-mahfil ho jae 
teri nazren jo zara mujh pe karam farmaen teri nazron ki qasam phir yahi dil dil ho jae 
hosh us ke hain ye jam us ka hai tu hai us ka mai-kade mein tere jo shaKHs bhi ghafil ho jae 
fitnagar shauq se 'bahzad' ko kar de pamal is se taskin-e-dili gar tujhe hasil ho jae

shām-e-ġham yaad hai kab sham.a jalī yaad nahīñ kab vo ruḳhsat hue kab raat Dhalī yaad nahīñ 
dil se bahte hue paanī kī sadā guzrī thī kab dhuñdlakā huā kab naav chalī yaad nahīñ 
ThanDe mausam meñ pukārā koī ham aate haiñ jis meñ ham khel rahe the vo galī yaad nahīñ 
in mazāfāt meñ chhup chhup ke havā chaltī thī kaise khiltī thī mohabbat kī kalī yaad nahīñ 
jism-o-jāñ Duub ga.e ḳhvāb-e-farāmoshī meñ ab koī baat burī ho ki bhalī yaad nahīñ 
sham-e-gham yaad hai kab shama jali yaad nahin kab wo ruKHsat hue kab raat Dhali yaad nahin 
dil se bahte hue pani ki sada guzri thi kab dhundlaka hua kab naw chali yaad nahin 
ThanDe mausam mein pukara koi hum aate hain jis mein hum khel rahe the wo gali yaad nahin 
in mazafat mein chhup chhup ke hawa chalti thi kaise khilti thi mohabbat ki kali yaad nahin 
jism-o-jaan Dub gae KHwab-e-faramoshi mein ab koi baat buri ho ki bhali yaad nahin

hairat se taktā hai sahrā bārish ke nazrāne ko kitnī duur se aa.ī hai ye ret se haath milāne ko 
saat suroñ kī lahroñ pe halkore lete phuul se haiñ ik mad.hosh fazā suntī hai ik chiḌiyā ke gaane ko 
boltī ho to yuuñ hai jaise phuul pe titlī Doltī ho tum ne kaisā sabz kiyā hai aur kaise vīrāne ko 
lekin un se aur tarah kī raushniyāñ sī phuuT paḌīñ aañsū to mil kar nikle the aañkh ke rañg chhupāne ko 
jaise koī jism ke andar dīvāreñ sī toḌtā hai dekho is pāgal vahshī ko roko is dīvāne ko 
hairat se takta hai sahra barish ke nazrane ko kitni dur se aai hai ye ret se hath milane ko 
sat suron ki lahron pe halkore lete phul se hain ek madhosh faza sunti hai ek chiDiya ke gane ko 
bolti ho to yun hai jaise phul pe titli Dolti ho tum ne kaisa sabz kiya hai aur kaise virane ko 
lekin un se aur tarah ki raushniyan si phuT paDin aansu to mil kar nikle the aankh ke rang chhupane ko 
jaise koi jism ke andar diwaren si toDta hai dekho is pagal wahshi ko roko is diwane ko

maiñ chup khaḌā thā ta.alluq meñ iḳhtisār jo thā usī ne baat banā.ī vo hoshiyār jo thā 
paTaḳh diyā kisī jhoñke ne lā ke manzil par havā ke sar pe koī der se savār jo thā 
mohabbateñ na rahīñ us ke dil meñ mere liye magar vo miltā thā hañs kar ki vaz.a-dār jo thā 
ajab ġhurūr meñ aa kar baras paḌā bādal ki phailtā huā chāroñ taraf ġhubār jo thā 
qadam qadam ram-e-pāmāl se maiñ tañg aa kar tire hī sāmne aayā tirā shikār jo thā 
main chup khaDa tha talluq mein iKHtisar jo tha usi ne baat banai wo hoshiyar jo tha 
paTaKH diya kisi jhonke ne la ke manzil par hawa ke sar pe koi der se sawar jo tha 
mohabbaten na rahin us ke dil mein mere liye magar wo milta tha hans kar ki waza-dar jo tha 
ajab ghurur mein aa kar baras paDa baadal ki phailta hua chaaron taraf ghubar jo tha 
qadam qadam ram-e-pamal se main tang aa kar tere hi samne aaya tera shikar jo tha

phuul khile haiñ likhā huā hai toḌo mat aur machal kar jī kahtā hai chhoḌo mat 
rut matvālī chāñd nashīlā raat javān ghar kā āmad-ḳharch yahāñ to joḌo mat 
abr jhukā hai chāñd ke gore mukhḌe par chhoḌo laaj lago dil se muñh moḌo mat 
dil ko patthar kar dene vaalī yaado ab apnā sar us patthar se phoḌo mat 
mat 'amīq' kī āñkhoñ se dil meñ jhāñko is gahre sāgar se naata joḌo mat 
phul khile hain likha hua hai toDo mat aur machal kar ji kahta hai chhoDo mat 
rut matwali chand nashila raat jawan ghar ka aamad-KHarch yahan to joDo mat 
abr jhuka hai chand ke gore mukhDe par chhoDo laj lago dil se munh moDo mat 
dil ko patthar kar dene wali yaado ab apna sar us patthar se phoDo mat 
mat 'amiq' ki aankhon se dil mein jhanko is gahre sagar se nata joDo mat

bahut din se tumheñ dekhā nahīñ thā badan itnā kabhī suunā nahīñ thā 
vo kaisī shab thī jo kaalī nahīñ thī vo kaisā din thā jo ujlā nahīñ thā 
ye vīrāna na thā vīrān itnā ye sahrā is qadar sahrā nahīñ thā 
vo sab kuchh sochnā ab paḌ rahā hai tire baare meñ jo sochā nahīñ thā 
kisī ik zaḳhm ke lab khul ga.e the maiñ itnī zor se chīḳhā nahīñ thā 
mujhe tum se koī shikva nahīñ hai bahut din ho ga.e royā nahīñ thā 
ka.ī atrāf khulte jā rahe haiñ vo dushman thā magar itnā nahīñ thā 
bahut din se tumhein dekha nahin tha badan itna kabhi suna nahin tha 
wo kaisi shab thi jo kali nahin thi wo kaisa din tha jo ujla nahin tha 
ye virana na tha viran itna ye sahra is qadar sahra nahin tha 
wo sab kuchh sochna ab paD raha hai tere bare mein jo socha nahin tha 
kisi ek zaKHm ke lab khul gae the main itni zor se chiKHa nahin tha 
mujhe tum se koi shikwa nahin hai bahut din ho gae roya nahin tha 
kai atraf khulte ja rahe hain wo dushman tha magar itna nahin tha

firāq se bhī ga.e ham visāl se bhī ga.e subuk hue haiñ to aish-e-malāl se bhī ga.e 
jo but-kade meñ the vo sāhibān-e-kashf-o-kamāl haram meñ aa.e to kashf-o-kamāl se bhī ga.e 
usī nigāh kī narmī se Dagmagā.e qadam usī nigāh ke tevar sambhāl se bhī ga.e 
ġham-e-hayāt o ġham-e-dost kī kashākash meñ ham aise log to rañj-o-malāl se bhī ga.e 
gul o samar kā to ronā alag rahā lekin ye ġham ki farq-e-harām-o-halāl se bhī ga.e 
vo log jin se tirī bazm meñ the hañgāme ga.e to kyā tirī bazm-e-ḳhayāl se bhī ga.e 
ham aise kaun the lekin qafas kī ye duniyā ki par-shikastoñ meñ apnī misāl se bhī ga.e 
charāġh-e-bazm abhī jān-e-anjuman na bujhā ki ye bujhā to tire ḳhatt-o-ḳhāl se bhī ga.e 
firaq se bhi gae hum visal se bhi gae subuk hue hain to aish-e-malal se bhi gae 
jo but-kade mein the wo sahiban-e-kashf-o-kamal haram mein aae to kashf-o-kamal se bhi gae 
usi nigah ki narmi se Dagmagae qadam usi nigah ke tewar sambhaal se bhi gae 
gham-e-hayat o gham-e-dost ki kashakash mein hum aise log to ranj-o-malal se bhi gae 
gul o samar ka to rona alag raha lekin ye gham ki farq-e-haram-o-halal se bhi gae 
wo log jin se teri bazm mein the hangame gae to kya teri bazm-e-KHayal se bhi gae 
hum aise kaun the lekin qafas ki ye duniya ki par-shikaston mein apni misal se bhi gae 
charagh-e-bazm abhi jaan-e-anjuman na bujha ki ye bujha to tere KHatt-o-KHal se bhi gae

mire Thahrāo ko kuchh aur bhī vus.at dī jaa.e ab mujhe ḳhud se nikalne kī ijāzat dī jaa.e 
maut se mil leñ kisī gosha-e-tanhā.ī meñ zindagī se jo kisī din hameñ fursat dī jaa.e 
be-ḳhad-o-ḳhāl sā ik chehrā liye phirtā huuñ chāhtā huuñ ki mujhe shakl-o-shabāhat dī jaa.e 
bhare bāzār meñ baiThā huuñ liye jins-e-vajūd shart ye hai ki mirī ḳhaak kī qīmat dī jaa.e 
bas ki duniyā mirī āñkhoñ meñ samā jā.egī koī din aur mire ḳhvāb ko mohlat dī jaa.e 
mere Thahrao ko kuchh aur bhi wusat di jae ab mujhe KHud se nikalne ki ijazat di jae 
maut se mil len kisi gosha-e-tanhai mein zindagi se jo kisi din hamein fursat di jae 
be-KHad-o-KHal sa ek chehra liye phirta hun chahta hun ki mujhe shakl-o-shabahat di jae 
bhare bazar mein baiTha hun liye jins-e-wajud shart ye hai ki meri KHak ki qimat di jae 
bas ki duniya meri aankhon mein sama jaegi koi din aur mere KHwab ko mohlat di jae

huā jab sāmnā us ḳhūb-rū se uḌā hai rañg gul kā pahle bū se 
ye āñkheñ tar jo rahtī haiñ lahū se vo guzre ishq ke din aabrū se 
ise kahiye shahādat-nāma-e-ishq use likkhā hai ḳhat apne lahū se 
dhuāñ ban kar uḌī missī kī rañgat ye kis ne jal ke tere hoñT chūse 
raqīboñ ko tamannā hai to bāshad tumheñ matlab parā.ī aarzū se 
vo gul-takiya mire marqad meñ rakhnā mo.attar ho jo zulf-e-mushk-bū se 
na.ī zid hai ki dil ham muft leñge bhalā kyā fā.eda is guftugū se 
adū bhī tum ko chāhe ai tirī shaan laḌāte haiñ ham apnī aarzū se 
huā hai tū to shāhid-bāz ai dil bachā.ūñ tujh ko kis kis ḳhūb-rū se 
lagā rakkhī hai ḳhaak us rahguzar kī tayammum apnā baḌh kar hai vuzū se 
hamārā dil use ab DhūñDtā hai thake haiñ paañv jis kī justujū se 
ḳhudā jaane chhalāvā thā ki bijlī abhī niklā hai koī rū-ba-rū se 
huā hai 'dāġh' aasif kā namak-ḳhvār guzar jaa.e ilāhī aabrū se 
hua jab samna us KHub-ru se uDa hai rang gul ka pahle bu se 
ye aankhen tar jo rahti hain lahu se wo guzre ishq ke din aabru se 
ise kahiye shahadat-nama-e-ishq use likkha hai KHat apne lahu se 
dhuan ban kar uDi missi ki rangat ye kis ne jal ke tere honT chuse 
raqibon ko tamanna hai to bashad tumhein matlab parai aarzu se 
wo gul-takiya mere marqad mein rakhna moattar ho jo zulf-e-mushk-bu se 
nai zid hai ki dil hum muft lenge bhala kya faeda is guftugu se 
adu bhi tum ko chahe ai teri shan laDate hain hum apni aarzu se 
hua hai tu to shahid-baz ai dil bachaun tujh ko kis kis KHub-ru se 
laga rakkhi hai KHak us rahguzar ki tayammum apna baDh kar hai wuzu se 
hamara dil use ab DhunDta hai thake hain panw jis ki justuju se 
KHuda jaane chhalawa tha ki bijli abhi nikla hai koi ru-ba-ru se 
hua hai 'dagh' aasif ka namak-KHwar guzar jae ilahi aabru se

fanā kā hosh aanā zindagī kā dard-e-sar jaanā ajal kyā hai ḳhumār-e-bāda-e-hastī utar jaanā 
azīzān-e-vatan ko ġhuncha o barg o samar jaanā ḳhudā ko bāġhbāñ aur qaum ko ham ne shajar jaanā 
urūs-e-jāñ nayā pairāhan-e-hastī badaltī hai faqat tamhīd aane kī hai duniyā se guzar jaanā 
musībat meñ bashar ke jauhar-e-mardāna khulte haiñ mubārak buz-diloñ ko gardish-e-qismat se Dar jaanā 
vo tab'-e-yās-parvar ne mujhe chashm-e-aqīdat dī ki shām-e-ġham kī tārīkī ko bhī nūr-e-sahar jaanā 
bahut saudā rahā vaa.iz tujhe nār-e-jahannam kā maza soz-e-mohabbat kā bhī kuchh ai be-ḳhabar jaanā 
karishma ye bhī hai ai be-ḳhabar iflās-e-qaumī kā talāsh-e-rizq meñ ahl-e-hunar kā dar-ba-dar jaanā 
ajal kī niiñd meñ bhī ḳhvāb-e-hastī gar nazar aayā to phir bekār hai tang aa ke is duniyā se mar jaanā 
vo saudā zindagī kā hai ki ġham insān sahtā hai nahīñ to hai bahut āsān is jiine se mar jaanā 
chaman-zār-e-mohabbat meñ usī ne bāġhbānī kī ki jis ne apnī mehnat ko hī mehnat kā samar jaanā 
sidhārī manzil-e-hastī se kuchh be-e'tinā.ī se tan-e-ḳhākī ko shāyad ruuh ne gard-e-safar jaanā 
fana ka hosh aana zindagi ka dard-e-sar jaana ajal kya hai KHumar-e-baada-e-hasti utar jaana 
azizan-e-watan ko ghuncha o barg o samar jaana KHuda ko baghban aur qaum ko hum ne shajar jaana 
urus-e-jaan naya pairahan-e-hasti badalti hai faqat tamhid aane ki hai duniya se guzar jaana 
musibat mein bashar ke jauhar-e-mardana khulte hain mubarak buz-dilon ko gardish-e-qismat se Dar jaana 
wo tab'-e-yas-parwar ne mujhe chashm-e-aqidat di ki sham-e-gham ki tariki ko bhi nur-e-sahar jaana 
bahut sauda raha waiz tujhe nar-e-jahannam ka maza soz-e-mohabbat ka bhi kuchh ai be-KHabar jaana 
karishma ye bhi hai ai be-KHabar iflas-e-qaumi ka talash-e-rizq mein ahl-e-hunar ka dar-ba-dar jaana 
ajal ki nind mein bhi KHwab-e-hasti gar nazar aaya to phir bekar hai tang aa ke is duniya se mar jaana 
wo sauda zindagi ka hai ki gham insan sahta hai nahin to hai bahut aasan is jine se mar jaana 
chaman-zar-e-mohabbat mein usi ne baghbani ki ki jis ne apni mehnat ko hi mehnat ka samar jaana 
sidhaari manzil-e-hasti se kuchh be-e'tinai se tan-e-KHaki ko shayad ruh ne gard-e-safar jaana

ba-qadr-e-paimāna-e-taḳhayyul surūr har dil meñ hai ḳhudī kā agar na ho ye fareb-e-paiham to dam nikal jaa.e aadmī kā 
bas ek ehsās-e-nā-rasā.ī na josh is meñ na hosh us ko junūñ pe hālat rubūdgī kī ḳhirad pe aalam ġhunūdgī kā 
hai ruuh tārīkiyoñ meñ hairāñ bujhā huā hai charāġh-e-manzil kahīñ sar-e-rāh ye musāfir paTak na de bojh zindagī kā 
ḳhudā kī rahmat pe bhuul baiThūñ yahī na mā'nī hai is ke vaa.iz vo abr kā muntazir khaḌā ho makān jaltā ho jab kisī kā 
vo laakh jhukvā le sar ko mere magar ye dil ab nahīñ jhukegā ki kibriyā.ī se bhī ziyāda mizāj nāzuk hai bandagī kā 
'jamīl' hairat meñ hai zamāna mire taġhazzul kī muflisī par na jazba-e-ijtibā-e-rizvī na kaif 'parvez-shāhidī' kā 
ba-qadr-e-paimana-e-taKHayyul surur har dil mein hai KHudi ka agar na ho ye fareb-e-paiham to dam nikal jae aadmi ka 
bas ek ehsas-e-na-rasai na josh is mein na hosh us ko junun pe haalat rubudgi ki KHirad pe aalam ghunudgi ka 
hai ruh tarikiyon mein hairan bujha hua hai charagh-e-manzil kahin sar-e-rah ye musafir paTak na de bojh zindagi ka 
KHuda ki rahmat pe bhul baiThun yahi na ma'ni hai is ke waiz wo abr ka muntazir khaDa ho makan jalta ho jab kisi ka 
wo lakh jhukwa le sar ko mere magar ye dil ab nahin jhukega ki kibriyai se bhi ziyaada mizaj nazuk hai bandagi ka 
'jamil' hairat mein hai zamana mere taghazzul ki muflisi par na jazba-e-ijtiba-e-rizwi na kaif 'parwez-shahidi' ka

āsān-e-haqīqī hai na kuchh sahl-e-majāzī ma.alūm huī rāh-e-mohabbat kī darāzī 
kuchh lutf o nazar lāzim o malzūm nahīñ haiñ ik ye bhī tamannā kī na ho sho.abada baazī 
dil ḳhuub samajhtā hai tire harf-e-karam ko har-chand vo urdu hai na turkī hai na taazī 
qaa.im hai na vo husn-e-ruḳh-e-yār kā aalam baaqī hai na vo shauq kī hañgāma-navāzī 
ai ishq tirī fat.h bahar-hāl hai sābit mar kar bhī shahīdān-e-mohabbat hue ġhāzī 
kar jald hameñ ḳhatm kahīñ ai ġham-e-jānāñ kaam aa.egī kis roz tirī sīna-gudāzī 
ma.alūm hai duniyā ko ye 'hasrat' kī haqīqat ḳhalvat meñ vo mai-ḳhvār hai jalvat meñ namāzī 
aasan-e-haqiqi hai na kuchh sahl-e-majazi malum hui rah-e-mohabbat ki daraazi 
kuchh lutf o nazar lazim o malzum nahin hain ek ye bhi tamanna ki na ho shoabada bazi 
dil KHub samajhta hai tere harf-e-karam ko har-chand wo urdu hai na turki hai na tazi 
qaim hai na wo husn-e-ruKH-e-yar ka aalam baqi hai na wo shauq ki hangama-nawazi 
ai ishq teri fath bahar-haal hai sabit mar kar bhi shahidan-e-mohabbat hue ghazi 
kar jald hamein KHatm kahin ai gham-e-jaanan kaam aaegi kis roz teri sina-gudazi 
malum hai duniya ko ye 'hasrat' ki haqiqat KHalwat mein wo mai-KHwar hai jalwat mein namazi

sub.h kā bhed milā kyā ham ko lag gayā raat kā dhaḌkā ham ko 
shauq-e-nazzārā kā parda uThThā nazar aane lagī duniyā ham ko 
kashtiyāñ TuuT ga.ī haiñ saarī ab liye phirtā hai dariyā ham ko 
bhiiḌ meñ kho ga.e āḳhir ham bhī na milā jab koī rasta ham ko 
talḳhī-e-ġham kā mudāvā ma.alūm paḌ gayā zahr kā chaskā ham ko 
tere ġham se to sukūñ miltā hai apne sho'loñ ne jalāyā ham ko 
ghar ko yuuñ dekh rahe haiñ jaise aaj hī ghar nazar aayā ham ko 
ham ki sho.ala bhī haiñ aur shabnam bhī tū ne kis rang meñ dekhā ham ko 
jalva-e-lālā-o-gul hai dīvār kabhī milte sar-e-sahrā ham ko 
le uḌī dil ko nasīm-e-saharī bū-e-gul kar ga.ī tanhā ham ko 
sair-e-gulshan ne kiyā āvāra lag gayā rog sabā kā ham ko 
yaad aa.ī haiñ barahna shāḳheñ thaam le ai gul-e-tāza ham ko 
le gayā saath uḌā kar 'bāqī' ek sūkhā huā pattā ham ko 
subh ka bhed mila kya hum ko lag gaya raat ka dhaDka hum ko 
shauq-e-nazzara ka parda uThTha nazar aane lagi duniya hum ko 
kashtiyan TuT gai hain sari ab liye phirta hai dariya hum ko 
bhiD mein kho gae aaKHir hum bhi na mila jab koi rasta hum ko 
talKHi-e-gham ka mudawa malum paD gaya zahr ka chaska hum ko 
tere gham se to sukun milta hai apne sho'lon ne jalaya hum ko 
ghar ko yun dekh rahe hain jaise aaj hi ghar nazar aaya hum ko 
hum ki shoala bhi hain aur shabnam bhi tu ne kis rang mein dekha hum ko 
jalwa-e-lala-o-gul hai diwar kabhi milte sar-e-sahra hum ko 
le uDi dil ko nasim-e-sahari bu-e-gul kar gai tanha hum ko 
sair-e-gulshan ne kiya aawara lag gaya rog saba ka hum ko 
yaad aai hain barahna shaKHen tham le ai gul-e-taza hum ko 
le gaya sath uDa kar 'baqi' ek sukha hua patta hum ko

ranj aur ranj bhī tanhā.ī kā vaqt pahuñchā mirī rusvā.ī kā 
umr shāyad na kare aaj vafā kāTnā hai shab-e-tanhā.ī kā 
tum ne kyuuñ vasl meñ pahlū badlā kis ko da.avā hai shakebā.ī kā 
ek din raah pe jā pahuñche ham shauq thā bādiya-paimā.ī kā 
us se nādān hī ban kar miliye kuchh ijāra nahīñ dānā.ī kā 
saat pardoñ meñ nahīñ Thairtī aañkh hausla kyā hai tamāshā.ī kā 
darmiyāñ pā-e-nazar hai jab tak ham ko da.avā nahīñ bīnā.ī kā 
kuchh to hai qadr tamāshā.ī kī hai jo ye shauq ḳhud-ārā.ī kā 
us ko chhoḌā to hai lekin ai dil mujh ko Dar hai tirī ḳhud-rā.ī kā 
bazm-e-dushman meñ na jī se utrā pūchhnā kyā tirī zebā.ī kā 
yahī anjām thā ai fasl-e-ḳhizāñ gul o bulbul kī shanāsā.ī kā 
madad ai jazba-e-taufīq ki yaañ ho chukā kaam tavānā.ī kā 
mohtasib uzr bahut haiñ lekin izn ham ko nahīñ goyā.ī kā 
hoñge 'hālī' se bahut āvāra ghar abhī duur hai rusvā.ī kā 
ranj aur ranj bhi tanhai ka waqt pahuncha meri ruswai ka 
umr shayad na kare aaj wafa kaTna hai shab-e-tanhai ka 
tum ne kyun wasl mein pahlu badla kis ko dawa hai shakebai ka 
ek din rah pe ja pahunche hum shauq tha baadiya-paimai ka 
us se nadan hi ban kar miliye kuchh ijara nahin danai ka 
sat pardon mein nahin Thairti aankh hausla kya hai tamashai ka 
darmiyan pa-e-nazar hai jab tak hum ko dawa nahin binai ka 
kuchh to hai qadr tamashai ki hai jo ye shauq KHud-arai ka 
us ko chhoDa to hai lekin ai dil mujh ko Dar hai teri KHud-rai ka 
bazm-e-dushman mein na ji se utra puchhna kya teri zebai ka 
yahi anjam tha ai fasl-e-KHizan gul o bulbul ki shanasai ka 
madad ai jazba-e-taufiq ki yan ho chuka kaam tawanai ka 
mohtasib uzr bahut hain lekin izn hum ko nahin goyai ka 
honge 'haali' se bahut aawara ghar abhi dur hai ruswai ka

rone se jo bhaḌās thī dil kī nikal ga.ī aañsū bahā.e chaar tabī.at sambhal ga.ī 
maiñ ne taras taras ke guzārī hai saarī umr merī na hogī jaan jo hasrat nikal ga.ī 
bechain huuñ maiñ jab se nahīñ dil-lagī kahīñ vo dard kyā gayā ki mire dil kī kal ga.ī 
kahtā hai chārāgar ki na pā.egā indimāl achchhā huā ki zaḳhm kī sūrat badal ga.ī 
ai sham.a ham se soz-e-mohabbat ke zabt siikh kam-baḳht ek raat meñ saarī pighal ga.ī 
shāḳh-e-nihāl-e-umr hamārī na phal sakī ye to hai vo kalī jo nikalte hī jal ga.ī 
dekhā jo us ne pyaar se aġhyār kī taraf 'shā.ir' qasam ḳhudā kī mirī jaan jal ga.ī 
rone se jo bhaDas thi dil ki nikal gai aansu bahae chaar tabiat sambhal gai 
main ne taras taras ke guzari hai sari umr meri na hogi jaan jo hasrat nikal gai 
bechain hun main jab se nahin dil-lagi kahin wo dard kya gaya ki mere dil ki kal gai 
kahta hai chaaragar ki na paega indimal achchha hua ki zaKHm ki surat badal gai 
ai shama hum se soz-e-mohabbat ke zabt sikh kam-baKHt ek raat mein sari pighal gai 
shaKH-e-nihaal-e-umr hamari na phal saki ye to hai wo kali jo nikalte hi jal gai 
dekha jo us ne pyar se aghyar ki taraf 'shair' qasam KHuda ki meri jaan jal gai

duniyā hai ye kisī kā na is meñ qusūr thā do dostoñ kā mil ke bichhaḌnā zarūr thā 
us ke karam pe shak tujhe zāhid zarūr thā varna tirā qusūr na karnā qusūr thā 
tum duur jab talak the to naġhma bhī thā fuġhāñ tum paas aa ga.e to alam bhī surūr thā 
us ik nazar ke bazm meñ qisse bane hazār utnā samajh sakā jise jitnā shu.ūr thā 
ik dars thī kisī kī ye fankāri-e-nigāh koī na zad meñ thā na koī zad se duur thā 
bas dekhne hī meñ thiiñ nigāheñ kisī kī talḳh shīrīñ sā ik payām bhī bainassutūr thā 
piite to ham ne shaiḳh ko dekhā nahīñ magar niklā jo mai-kade se to chehre pe nuur thā 
'mullā' kā masjidoñ meñ to ham ne sunā na naam zikr us kā mai-kadoñ meñ magar duur duur thā 
duniya hai ye kisi ka na is mein qusur tha do doston ka mil ke bichhaDna zarur tha 
us ke karam pe shak tujhe zahid zarur tha warna tera qusur na karna qusur tha 
tum dur jab talak the to naghma bhi tha fughan tum pas aa gae to alam bhi surur tha 
us ek nazar ke bazm mein qisse bane hazar utna samajh saka jise jitna shuur tha 
ek dars thi kisi ki ye fankari-e-nigah koi na zad mein tha na koi zad se dur tha 
bas dekhne hi mein thin nigahen kisi ki talKH shirin sa ek payam bhi bainassutur tha 
pite to hum ne shaiKH ko dekha nahin magar nikla jo mai-kade se to chehre pe nur tha 
'mulla' ka masjidon mein to hum ne suna na nam zikr us ka mai-kadon mein magar dur dur tha

kyā chhupāte kisī se haal apnā jī hī jab ho gayā niDhāl apnā 
ham haiñ us ke ḳhayāl kī tasvīr jis kī tasvīr hai ḳhayāl apnā 
vo bhī ab ġham ko ġham samajhte haiñ duur pahuñchā magar malāl apnā 
tū ne rakh lī gunāhgār kī sharm kaam aayā na infi.āl apnā 
dekh dil kī zamīñ laraztī hai yād-e-jānāñ qadam sambhāl apnā 
bā-ḳhabar haiñ vo sab kī hālat se laao ham pūchh leñ na haal apnā 
maut bhī to na mil sakī 'fānī' kis se puurā huā savāl apnā 
kya chhupate kisi se haal apna ji hi jab ho gaya niDhaal apna 
hum hain us ke KHayal ki taswir jis ki taswir hai KHayal apna 
wo bhi ab gham ko gham samajhte hain dur pahuncha magar malal apna 
tu ne rakh li gunahgar ki sharm kaam aaya na infial apna 
dekh dil ki zamin larazti hai yaad-e-jaanan qadam sambhaal apna 
ba-KHabar hain wo sab ki haalat se lao hum puchh len na haal apna 
maut bhi to na mil saki 'fani' kis se pura hua sawal apna

na rūh-e-maz.hab na qalb-e-ārif na shā.irāna zabān baaqī zamīñ hamārī badal ga.ī hai agarche hai āsmān baaqī 
shab-e-guzishta ke saaz o sāmāñ ke ab kahāñ haiñ nishān baaqī zabān-e-shama-e-sahar pe hasrat kī rah ga.ī dāstān baaqī 
jo zikr aatā hai āḳhirat kā to aap hote haiñ saaf munkir ḳhudā kī nisbat bhī dekhtā huuñ yaqīn ruḳhsat gumān baaqī 
fuzūl hai un kī bad-dimāġhī kahāñ hai fariyād ab laboñ par ye vaar par vaar ab abas haiñ kahāñ badan meñ hai jaan baaqī 
maiñ apne miTne ke ġham meñ nālāñ udhar zamāna hai shaad o ḳhandāñ ishāra kartī hai chashm-e-daurāñ jo aan baaqī jahān baaqī 
isī liye rah ga.ī haiñ āñkheñ ki mere miTne kā rañg dekheñ sunūñ vo bāteñ jo hosh uḌā.eñ isī liye haiñ ye kaan baaqī 
ta.ajjub aatā hai tifl-e-dil par ki ho gayā mast-e-nazm-e-'akbar' abhī middle paas tak nahīñ hai bahut se haiñ imtihān baaqī 
na ruh-e-mazhab na qalb-e-arif na shairana zaban baqi zamin hamari badal gai hai agarche hai aasman baqi 
shab-e-guzishta ke saz o saman ke ab kahan hain nishan baqi zaban-e-shama-e-sahar pe hasrat ki rah gai dastan baqi 
jo zikr aata hai aaKHirat ka to aap hote hain saf munkir KHuda ki nisbat bhi dekhta hun yaqin ruKHsat guman baqi 
fuzul hai un ki bad-dimaghi kahan hai fariyaad ab labon par ye war par war ab abas hain kahan badan mein hai jaan baqi 
main apne miTne ke gham mein nalan udhar zamana hai shad o KHandan ishaara karti hai chashm-e-dauran jo aan baqi jahan baqi 
isi liye rah gai hain aankhen ki mere miTne ka rang dekhen sunun wo baaten jo hosh uDaen isi liye hain ye kan baqi 
tajjub aata hai tifl-e-dil par ki ho gaya mast-e-nazm-e-'akbar' abhi middle pas tak nahin hai bahut se hain imtihan baqi

har saañs ke saath jā rahā huuñ maiñ tere qarīb aa rahā huuñ 
ye dil meñ karāhne lagā kaun ro ro ke kise rulā rahā huuñ 
ab ishq ko be-naqāb kar ke maiñ husn ko aazmā rahā huuñ 
asrār-e-jamāl khul rahe haiñ hastī kā surāġh pā rahā huuñ 
tanhā.i-e-shām-e-ġham ke Dar se kuchh un se javāb pā rahā huuñ 
lazzat-kash-e-ārzū huuñ 'fānī' dānista fareb khā rahā huuñ 
har sans ke sath ja raha hun main tere qarib aa raha hun 
ye dil mein karahne laga kaun ro ro ke kise rula raha hun 
ab ishq ko be-naqab kar ke main husn ko aazma raha hun 
asrar-e-jamal khul rahe hain hasti ka suragh pa raha hun 
tanhai-e-sham-e-gham ke Dar se kuchh un se jawab pa raha hun 
lazzat-kash-e-arzu hun 'fani' danista fareb kha raha hun

nigāh-e-nāz ne parde uThā.e haiñ kyā kyā hijāb ahl-e-mohabbat ko aa.e haiñ kyā kyā 
jahāñ meñ thī bas ik afvāh tere jalvoñ kī charāġh-e-dair-o-haram jhilmilā.e haiñ kyā kyā 
do-chār barq-e-tajallī se rahne vāloñ ne fareb narm-nigāhī ke khaa.e haiñ kyā kyā 
diloñ pe karte hue aaj aatī jaatī choT tirī nigāh ne pahlū bachā.e haiñ kyā kyā 
nisār nargis-e-mai-gūñ ki aaj paimāne laboñ tak aa.e hue thartharā.e haiñ kyā kyā 
vo ik zarā sī jhalak barq-e-kam-nigāhī kī jigar ke zaḳhm-e-nihāñ muskurā.e haiñ kyā kyā 
charāġh-e-tūr jale ā.ina-dar-ā.īna hijāb barq-e-adā ne uThā.e haiñ kyā kyā 
ba-qadr-e-zauq-e-nazar dīd-e-husn kyā ho magar nigāh-e-shauq meñ jalve samā.e haiñ kyā kyā 
kahīñ charāġh kahīñ gul kahīñ dil-e-barbād ḳhirām-e-nāz ne fitne uThā.e haiñ kyā kyā 
taġhāful aur baḌhā us ġhazāl-e-ra.anā kā fusūn-e-ġham ne bhī jaadū jagā.e haiñ kyā kyā 
hazār fitna-e-bedār ḳhvāb-e-rañgīñ meñ chaman meñ ġhuncha-e-gul-rañg laa.e haiñ kyā kyā 
tire ḳhulūs-e-nihāñ kā to aah kyā kahnā sulūk uchaTTe bhī dil meñ samā.e haiñ kyā kyā 
nazar bachā ke tire ishva-hā-e-pinhāñ ne diloñ meñ dard-e-mohabbat uThā.e haiñ kyā kyā 
payām-e-husn payām-e-junūñ payām-e-fanā tirī nigah ne fasāne sunā.e haiñ kyā kyā 
tamām husn ke jalve tamām mahrūmī bharam nigāh ne apne gañvā.e haiñ kyā kyā 
'firāq' rāh-e-vafā meñ subuk-ravī terī baḌe-baḌoñ ke qadam Dagmagā.e haiñ kyā kyā 
nigah-e-naz ne parde uThae hain kya kya hijab ahl-e-mohabbat ko aae hain kya kya 
jahan mein thi bas ek afwah tere jalwon ki charagh-e-dair-o-haram jhilmilae hain kya kya 
do-chaar barq-e-tajalli se rahne walon ne fareb narm-nigahi ke khae hain kya kya 
dilon pe karte hue aaj aati jati choT teri nigah ne pahlu bachae hain kya kya 
nisar nargis-e-mai-gun ki aaj paimane labon tak aae hue thartharae hain kya kya 
wo ek zara si jhalak barq-e-kam-nigahi ki jigar ke zaKHm-e-nihan muskurae hain kya kya 
charagh-e-tur jale aaina-dar-aina hijab barq-e-ada ne uThae hain kya kya 
ba-qadr-e-zauq-e-nazar did-e-husn kya ho magar nigah-e-shauq mein jalwe samae hain kya kya 
kahin charagh kahin gul kahin dil-e-barbaad KHiram-e-naz ne fitne uThae hain kya kya 
taghaful aur baDha us ghazal-e-rana ka fusun-e-gham ne bhi jadu jagae hain kya kya 
hazar fitna-e-bedar KHwab-e-rangin mein chaman mein ghuncha-e-gul-rang lae hain kya kya 
tere KHulus-e-nihan ka to aah kya kahna suluk uchaTTe bhi dil mein samae hain kya kya 
nazar bacha ke tere ishwa-ha-e-pinhan ne dilon mein dard-e-mohabbat uThae hain kya kya 
payam-e-husn payam-e-junun payam-e-fana teri nigah ne fasane sunae hain kya kya 
tamam husn ke jalwe tamam mahrumi bharam nigah ne apne ganwae hain kya kya 
'firaq' rah-e-wafa mein subuk-rawi teri baDe-baDon ke qadam Dagmagae hain kya kya

silsila ḳhvāboñ kā sab yūñhī dharā rah jā.egā ek din bistar pe koī jāgtā rah jā.egā 
ek ḳhvāhish dil ko ġhair-ābād kartī jā.egī ik parinda duur tak uḌtā huā rah jā.egā 
chār-sū phailī huī be-chehragī kī dhund meñ ek din be-aks ho kar aa.ina rah jā.egā 
har sadā se bach ke vo ehsās-e-tanhā.ī meñ hai apne hī dīvār-o-dar meñ gūñjtā rah jā.egā 
mudda.ā ham apnā kāġhaz par raqam kar jā.eñge vaqt ke hāthoñ meñ apnā faislā rah jā.egā 
do ghaḌī ke vāste aa kar chale jāoge tum phir mirī tanhā.iyoñ kā silsilā rah jā.egā 
ab diloñ meñ koī gunjā.ish nahīñ miltī 'hayāt' bas kitāboñ meñ likhā harf-e-vafā rah jā.egā 
silsila KHwabon ka sab yunhi dhara rah jaega ek din bistar pe koi jagta rah jaega 
ek KHwahish dil ko ghair-abaad karti jaegi ek parinda dur tak uDta hua rah jaega 
chaar-su phaili hui be-chehragi ki dhund mein ek din be-aks ho kar aaina rah jaega 
har sada se bach ke wo ehsas-e-tanhai mein hai apne hi diwar-o-dar mein gunjta rah jaega 
muddaa hum apna kaghaz par raqam kar jaenge waqt ke hathon mein apna faisla rah jaega 
do ghaDi ke waste aa kar chale jaoge tum phir meri tanhaiyon ka silsila rah jaega 
ab dilon mein koi gunjaish nahin milti 'hayat' bas kitabon mein likha harf-e-wafa rah jaega

qarīne se ajab ārāsta qātil kī mahfil hai jahāñ sar chāhiye sar hai jahāñ dil chāhiye dil hai 
har ik ke vāste kab ishq kī dushvār manzil hai jise āsāñ hai āsāñ hai jise mushkil hai mushkil hai 
zahe taqdīr kis ārām o rāhat se vo bismil hai ki jis ke sar kā takiya der se zānū-e-qātil hai 
tarīq-e-ishq kuchh āsān hai kuchh ham ko mushkil hai idhar rahbar udhar rahzan yahī manzil-ba-manzil hai 
mujhe tujh se rukāvaT aur tū ġhairoñ pe maa.il hai mirā dil ab tirā dil hai tirā dil ab mirā dil hai 
baḌhā dil is qadar fart-e-ḳhushī se vasl kī shab ko mujhe ye vahm thā pahlū meñ ye takiya hai yā dil hai 
tirī talvār ke qurbān ai saffāk kyā kahnā idhar kushte pe kushta hai udhar bismil pe bismil hai 
adam meñ le chalā hai rahnumā-e-ishq kyā mujh ko yahī kahtā hai aa pahuñche haiñ thoḌī duur manzil hai 
unheñ jab mehrbāñ pā kar savāl-e-vasl kar baiThā dabī āvāz se sharmā ke vo bole ye mushkil hai 
sitam bhī ho to mujh par ho jafā bhī ho to mujh par ho mujhe is rashk ne maarā vo kyuuñ aalam kā qātil hai 
masīhā ne tire bīmār ko dekhā to farmāyā na ye jiine ke qābil hai na ye marne ke qābil hai 
zabardastī to dekho haath rakh kar mere siine par vo kis da.ave se kahte haiñ hamārā hī to ye dil hai 
hamāre dil meñ aa kar sair dekho ḳhūb-rūyoñ kī ki indr kā akhāḌā hai parī-zādoñ kī mahfil hai 
madārij ishq ke tai ho sakeñ ye ho nahīñ saktā zamīñ se arsh tak ai be-ḳhabar manzil-ba-manzil hai 
jhiḌakte ho mujhe kyuuñ duur hī se paas aane do baḌhā kar haath dil detā huuñ tum samjhe ho saa.il hai 
sunā bhī tū ne ai dil kyā sadā aatī hai mahshar meñ yahī din imtihāñ kā hai hamāre kaun shāmil hai 
uḌāte haiñ maze duniyā ke ham ai 'dāġh' ghar baiThe dakan meñ ab to afzalganj apnī aish manzil hai 
qarine se ajab aarasta qatil ki mahfil hai jahan sar chahiye sar hai jahan dil chahiye dil hai 
har ek ke waste kab ishq ki dushwar manzil hai jise aasan hai aasan hai jise mushkil hai mushkil hai 
zahe taqdir kis aaram o rahat se wo bismil hai ki jis ke sar ka takiya der se zanu-e-qatil hai 
tariq-e-ishq kuchh aasan hai kuchh hum ko mushkil hai idhar rahbar udhar rahzan yahi manzil-ba-manzil hai 
mujhe tujh se rukawaT aur tu ghairon pe mail hai mera dil ab tera dil hai tera dil ab mera dil hai 
baDha dil is qadar fart-e-KHushi se wasl ki shab ko mujhe ye wahm tha pahlu mein ye takiya hai ya dil hai 
teri talwar ke qurban ai saffak kya kahna idhar kushte pe kushta hai udhar bismil pe bismil hai 
adam mein le chala hai rahnuma-e-ishq kya mujh ko yahi kahta hai aa pahunche hain thoDi dur manzil hai 
unhen jab mehrban pa kar sawal-e-wasl kar baiTha dabi aawaz se sharma ke wo bole ye mushkil hai 
sitam bhi ho to mujh par ho jafa bhi ho to mujh par ho mujhe is rashk ne mara wo kyun aalam ka qatil hai 
masiha ne tere bimar ko dekha to farmaya na ye jine ke qabil hai na ye marne ke qabil hai 
zabardasti to dekho hath rakh kar mere sine par wo kis dawe se kahte hain hamara hi to ye dil hai 
hamare dil mein aa kar sair dekho KHub-ruyon ki ki indr ka akhaDa hai pari-zadon ki mahfil hai 
madarij ishq ke tai ho saken ye ho nahin sakta zamin se arsh tak ai be-KHabar manzil-ba-manzil hai 
jhiDakte ho mujhe kyun dur hi se pas aane do baDha kar hath dil deta hun tum samjhe ho sail hai 
suna bhi tu ne ai dil kya sada aati hai mahshar mein yahi din imtihan ka hai hamare kaun shamil hai 
uDate hain maze duniya ke hum ai 'dagh' ghar baiThe dakan mein ab to afzalganj apni aish manzil hai

āġhāz huā hai ulfat kā ab dekhiye kyā kyā honā hai yā saarī umr kī rāhat hai yā saarī umr kā ronā hai 
shāyad thā bayāz-e-shab meñ kahīñ iksīr kā nusḳha bhī koī ai sub.h ye terī jholī hai yā duniyā bhar kā sonā hai 
tadbīr ke hāthoñ se goyā taqdīr kā parda uThtā hai yā kuchh bhī nahīñ yā sab kuchh hai yā miTī hai yā sonā hai 
TuuTe jo ye band-e-hayāt kahīñ is shor-o-shar se najāt mile maanā ki vo duniyā ai 'afsar' sirf ek lahad kā konā hai 
aaghaz hua hai ulfat ka ab dekhiye kya kya hona hai ya sari umr ki rahat hai ya sari umr ka rona hai 
shayad tha bayaz-e-shab mein kahin iksir ka nusKHa bhi koi ai subh ye teri jholi hai ya duniya bhar ka sona hai 
tadbir ke hathon se goya taqdir ka parda uThta hai ya kuchh bhi nahin ya sab kuchh hai ya miTi hai ya sona hai 
TuTe jo ye band-e-hayat kahin is shor-o-shar se najat mile mana ki wo duniya ai 'afsar' sirf ek lahad ka kona hai

jab se bāñdhā hai tasavvur us ruḳh-e-pur-nūr kā saare ghar meñ nuur phailā hai charāġh-e-tūr kā 
baḳht-e-vāzhūñ se jale kyuuñ dil na mujh mahrūr kā marham-e-kāfūr se muñh aa gayā nāsūr kā 
is qadar mushtāq huuñ zāhid ḳhudā ke nuur kā but bhī banvāyā kabhī maiñ ne to sañg-e-tūr kā 
tujh ko laa.e ghar meñ jannat ko jalāyā rashk se ham-baġhal tujh se hue pahlū dabāyā huur kā 
gor-e-kāfir kis liye hai tīra-o-tār is qadar paḌ gayā saaya magar merī shab-e-dījūr kā 
husn-e-yūsuf aur tere husn meñ itnā hai farq choT ye nazdīk kī hai vaar thā vo daur kā 
qasr-e-tan bigḌā kisī kā gorkan kī ban paḌī ghar kisī kā gir paḌā ghar bin gayā mazdūr kā 
chehra-e-jānāñ se sharmā kar chhupāyā ḳhuld meñ ḳhāma-e-taqdīr ne khīñchā jo naqsha huur kā 
hājat-e-mushshāta kyā ruḳhsār-e-raushan ke liye dekh lo gul kāTtā hai kaun sham-e-tūr kā 
zulf-o-rū-e-yār se nairañg-e-qudrat hai ayaañ mahr ke panje meñ hai dāman shab-e-dījūr kā 
ḳhāksārī kar jo ho manzūr āñkhoñ meñ jagah ḳhaak ho kar surma bin jaatā hai patthar taur kā 
ġhāfiloñ ke kaan kab khulte haiñ san kar shor-e-hashr sone vāloñ ko jagā saktā nahīñ ġhul duur kā 
pūchh lenā sab vatan kā haal ai ahl-e-adam baiTh lene do zarā aatā huuñ uTThā daur kā 
ijz karte haiñ adū-e-jān se bhī ḳhāsān-e-haq jhuk gayā sar aage pā-e-dār par mansūr kā 
maut kyā aa.ī tap-e-furqat se sehat ho ga.ī dam nikalne se badan ThanDā huā ranjūr kā 
jaate haiñ mai-ḳhāna-e-ālam se ham sū-e-adam kah do az-ḳhud-raftagī se hai irāda duur kā 
mūziyoñ ko hādsoñ se dahr ke kyā ḳhauf hai bārish-e-bārāñ se ghar girtā nahīñ zambūr kā 
chashm-e-sāġhar be-sabab har dam lahū rotī nahīñ muġhbachoñ se sāqiyā dil phaT gayā añgūr kā 
jaate haiñ mai-ḳhāna-e-ālam se ham sū-e-adam kah do az-ḳhud-raftagī se hai irāda duur kā 
kī nazar jis par kudūrat se rahā ḳhāmosh vo hai asar gard-e-nigāh-e-yār meñ sindūr kā 
jalva-e-māshūq har jā hai basīrat ho agar kirmak-e-shab-tāb meñ aalam hai sham-e-tūr kā 
mar ke yārān-e-adam ke paas pahuñchūñgā 'amīr' chalte chalte jaan jā.egī safar hai duur kā 
jab se bandha hai tasawwur us ruKH-e-pur-nur ka sare ghar mein nur phaila hai charagh-e-tur ka 
baKHt-e-wazhun se jale kyun dil na mujh mahrur ka marham-e-kafur se munh aa gaya nasur ka 
is qadar mushtaq hun zahid KHuda ke nur ka but bhi banwaya kabhi main ne to sang-e-tur ka 
tujh ko lae ghar mein jannat ko jalaya rashk se ham-baghal tujh se hue pahlu dabaya hur ka 
gor-e-kafir kis liye hai tira-o-tar is qadar paD gaya saya magar meri shab-e-dijur ka 
husn-e-yusuf aur tere husn mein itna hai farq choT ye nazdik ki hai war tha wo daur ka 
qasr-e-tan bigDa kisi ka gorkan ki ban paDi ghar kisi ka gir paDa ghar bin gaya mazdur ka 
chehra-e-jaanan se sharma kar chhupaya KHuld mein KHama-e-taqdir ne khincha jo naqsha hur ka 
hajat-e-mushshata kya ruKHsar-e-raushan ke liye dekh lo gul kaTta hai kaun sham-e-tur ka 
zulf-o-ru-e-yar se nairang-e-qudrat hai ayan mahr ke panje mein hai daman shab-e-dijur ka 
KHaksari kar jo ho manzur aankhon mein jagah KHak ho kar surma bin jata hai patthar taur ka 
ghafilon ke kan kab khulte hain san kar shor-e-hashr sone walon ko jaga sakta nahin ghul dur ka 
puchh lena sab watan ka haal ai ahl-e-adam baiTh lene do zara aata hun uTTha daur ka 
ijz karte hain adu-e-jaan se bhi KHasan-e-haq jhuk gaya sar aage pa-e-dar par mansur ka 
maut kya aai tap-e-furqat se sehat ho gai dam nikalne se badan ThanDa hua ranjur ka 
jate hain mai-KHana-e-alam se hum su-e-adam kah do az-KHud-raftagi se hai irada dur ka 
muziyon ko hadson se dahr ke kya KHauf hai barish-e-baran se ghar girta nahin zambur ka 
chashm-e-saghar be-sabab har dam lahu roti nahin mughbachon se saqiya dil phaT gaya angur ka 
jate hain mai-KHana-e-alam se hum su-e-adam kah do az-KHud-raftagi se hai irada dur ka 
ki nazar jis par kudurat se raha KHamosh wo hai asar gard-e-nigah-e-yar mein sindur ka 
jalwa-e-mashuq har ja hai basirat ho agar kirmak-e-shab-tab mein aalam hai sham-e-tur ka 
mar ke yaran-e-adam ke pas pahunchunga 'amir' chalte chalte jaan jaegi safar hai dur ka

ragoñ meñ zahr-e-ḳhamoshī utarne se zarā pahle bahut taḌpī koī āvāz marne se zarā pahle 
zarā sī baat hai kab yaad hogī in havāoñ ko maiñ ik paikar thā zarroñ meñ bikharne se zarā pahle 
maiñ ashkoñ kī tarah is dard ko bhī zabt kar letā mujhe āgāh to kartā ubharne se zarā pahle 
koī sūraj se ye pūchhe ki kyā mahsūs hotā hai bulandī se nasheboñ meñ utarne se zarā pahle 
kahīñ tasvīr rusvā kar na de mere tasavvur ko musavvir soch meñ hai rañg bharne se zarā pahle 
sunā hai vaqt kuchh ḳhush-rañg lamhe le ke guzrā hai mujhe bhī 'shād' kar jaatā guzarne se zarā pahle 
ragon mein zahr-e-KHamoshi utarne se zara pahle bahut taDpi koi aawaz marne se zara pahle 
zara si baat hai kab yaad hogi in hawaon ko main ek paikar tha zarron mein bikharne se zara pahle 
main ashkon ki tarah is dard ko bhi zabt kar leta mujhe aagah to karta ubharne se zara pahle 
koi suraj se ye puchhe ki kya mahsus hota hai bulandi se nashebon mein utarne se zara pahle 
kahin taswir ruswa kar na de mere tasawwur ko musawwir soch mein hai rang bharne se zara pahle 
suna hai waqt kuchh KHush-rang lamhe le ke guzra hai mujhe bhi 'shad' kar jata guzarne se zara pahle

vasl kī bantī haiñ in bātoñ se tadbīreñ kahīñ ārzūoñ se phirā kartī haiñ taqdīreñ kahīñ 
be-zabānī tarjumān-e-shauq behad ho to ho varna pesh-e-yār kaam aatī haiñ taqrīreñ kahīñ 
miT rahī haiñ dil se yādeñ rozgār-e-aish kī ab nazar kaahe ko ā.eñgī ye tasvīreñ kahīñ 
iltifāt-e-yār thā ik ḳhvāb-e-āġhāz-e-vafā sach huā kartī haiñ in ḳhvāboñ kī ta.abīreñ kahīñ 
terī be-sabrī hai 'hasrat' ḳhām-kārī kī dalīl girya-e-ushshāq meñ hotī haiñ tāsīreñ kahīñ 
wasl ki banti hain in baaton se tadbiren kahin aarzuon se phira karti hain taqdiren kahin 
be-zabani tarjuman-e-shauq behad ho to ho warna pesh-e-yar kaam aati hain taqriren kahin 
miT rahi hain dil se yaaden rozgar-e-aish ki ab nazar kahe ko aaengi ye taswiren kahin 
iltifat-e-yar tha ek KHwab-e-aghaz-e-wafa sach hua karti hain in KHwabon ki tabiren kahin 
teri be-sabri hai 'hasrat' KHam-kari ki dalil girya-e-ushshaq mein hoti hain tasiren kahin

raat bhar tanhā rahā din bhar akelā maiñ hī thā shahr kī ābādiyoñ meñ apne jaisā maiñ hī thā 
maiñ hī dariyā maiñ hī tūfāñ maiñ hī thā har mauj bhī maiñ hī ḳhud ko pī gayā sadiyoñ se pyāsā maiñ hī thā 
kis liye katrā ke jaatā hai musāfir dam to le aaj sūkhā peḌ huuñ kal terā saayā maiñ hī thā 
kitne jazboñ kī nirālī ḳhushbueñ thiiñ mere paas koī un kā chāhne vaalā nahīñ thā maiñ hī thā 
duur hī se chāhne vaale mile har moḌ par fāsle saare miTāne ko taḌapnā maiñ hī thā 
merī aahaT sunñe vaalā dil na thā duniyā ke paas rāste meñ 'ashk' be-maqsad jo bhaTkā maiñ hī thā 
raat bhar tanha raha din bhar akela main hi tha shahr ki aabaadiyon mein apne jaisa main hi tha 
main hi dariya main hi tufan main hi tha har mauj bhi main hi KHud ko pi gaya sadiyon se pyasa main hi tha 
kis liye katra ke jata hai musafir dam to le aaj sukha peD hun kal tera saya main hi tha 
kitne jazbon ki nirali KHushbuen thin mere pas koi un ka chahne wala nahin tha main hi tha 
dur hi se chahne wale mile har moD par fasle sare miTane ko taDapna main hi tha 
meri aahaT sunne wala dil na tha duniya ke pas raste mein 'ashk' be-maqsad jo bhaTka main hi tha

ik ḳhvāb kā ḳhayāl hai duniyā kaheñ jise hai is meñ ik tilism tamannā kaheñ jise 
ik shakl hai tafannun-e-tab'-e-jamāl kī is se ziyāda kuchh nahīñ duniyā kaheñ jise 
ḳhamyāza hai karishma-parasti-e-dahr kā ahl-e-zamāna ālam-e-uqbā kaheñ jise 
ik ashk ārmīda-e-zabt-e-ġham-e-firāq mauj-e-havā-e-shauq hai dariyā kaheñ jise 
bā-vasf-e-zabt-e-rāz mohabbat hai āshkār uqda hai dil kā aqd-e-surayyā kaheñ jise 
barham-zan-e-hijāb hai ḳhud-raftagī-e-husn ik shān-e-be-ḳhudī hai zuleḳhā kaheñ jise 
aks-e-safā-e-qalb kā jauhar hai ā.īna vārafta-e-jamāl ḳhud-ārā kaheñ jise 
ram-sheva hai sanam to hai ram-āshnā ye dil hāsil hai mujh ko aish muhayyā kaheñ jise 
ḳhūnī kafan ye saiñt ke rakkhā hai kis liye qātil vo hai ki rashk-e-masīhā kaheñ jise 
sab kuchh hai aur kuchh bhī nahīñ dahr kā vajūd 'kaifī' ye baat vo hai muammā kaheñ jise 
ek KHwab ka KHayal hai duniya kahen jise hai is mein ek tilism tamanna kahen jise 
ek shakl hai tafannun-e-tab'-e-jamal ki is se ziyaada kuchh nahin duniya kahen jise 
KHamyaza hai karishma-parasti-e-dahr ka ahl-e-zamana aalam-e-uqba kahen jise 
ek ashk aarmida-e-zabt-e-gham-e-firaq mauj-e-hawa-e-shauq hai dariya kahen jise 
ba-wasf-e-zabt-e-raaz mohabbat hai aashkar uqda hai dil ka aqd-e-surayya kahen jise 
barham-zan-e-hijab hai KHud-raftagi-e-husn ek shan-e-be-KHudi hai zuleKHa kahen jise 
aks-e-safa-e-qalb ka jauhar hai aaina warafta-e-jamal KHud-ara kahen jise 
ram-shewa hai sanam to hai ram-ashna ye dil hasil hai mujh ko aish muhayya kahen jise 
KHuni kafan ye saint ke rakkha hai kis liye qatil wo hai ki rashk-e-masiha kahen jise 
sab kuchh hai aur kuchh bhi nahin dahr ka wajud 'kaifi' ye baat wo hai muamma kahen jise

phir ga.ī aap kī do din meñ tabī.at kaisī ye vafā kaisī thī sāhab ye muravvat kaisī 
dost ahbāb se hañs bol ke kaT jā.egī raat rind-e-āzād haiñ ham ko shab-e-furqat kaisī 
jis hasīñ se huī ulfat vahī ma.ashūq apnā ishq kis chiiz ko kahte haiñ tabī.at kaisī 
hai jo qismat meñ vahī hogā na kuchh kam na sivā aarzū kahte haiñ kis chiiz ko hasrat kaisī 
haal khultā nahīñ kuchh dil ke dhaḌakne kā mujhe aaj rah rah ke bhar aatī hai tabī.at kaisī 
kūcha-e-yār meñ jaatā to nazāra kartā qais āvāra hai jañgal meñ ye vahshat kaisī 
phir gai aap ki do din mein tabiat kaisi ye wafa kaisi thi sahab ye murawwat kaisi 
dost ahbab se hans bol ke kaT jaegi raat rind-e-azad hain hum ko shab-e-furqat kaisi 
jis hasin se hui ulfat wahi mashuq apna ishq kis chiz ko kahte hain tabiat kaisi 
hai jo qismat mein wahi hoga na kuchh kam na siwa aarzu kahte hain kis chiz ko hasrat kaisi 
haal khulta nahin kuchh dil ke dhaDakne ka mujhe aaj rah rah ke bhar aati hai tabiat kaisi 
kucha-e-yar mein jata to nazara karta qais aawara hai jangal mein ye wahshat kaisi

ab ishq rahā na vo junūñ hai tūfān ke baad kā sukūñ hai 
ehsās ko zid hai dard-e-dil se kam ho to ye jāniye fuzūñ hai 
raas aa.ī hai ishq ko zabūnī jis haal meñ dekhiye zubūñ hai 
baaqī na jigar rahā na ab dil ashkoñ meñ hunūz rañg-e-ḳhūñ hai 
iz.hār hai dard-e-dil kā 'bismil' ilhām na shā.irī fusūñ hai 
ab ishq raha na wo junun hai tufan ke baad ka sukun hai 
ehsas ko zid hai dard-e-dil se kam ho to ye jaaniye fuzun hai 
ras aai hai ishq ko zabuni jis haal mein dekhiye zubun hai 
baqi na jigar raha na ab dil ashkon mein hunuz rang-e-KHun hai 
izhaar hai dard-e-dil ka 'bismil' ilham na shairi fusun hai

vāqa.ī koī agar maujūd hai phir to ye dukh umr-bhar maujūd hai 
biich kā rasta nahīñ baaqī koī yā ḳhudā hai yā bashar maujūd hai 
us ko paane kī tavaqqo hai bahut jab talak ye chashm-e-tar maujūd hai 
us ke milne hī se pahle jaane kyuuñ us ko kho dene kā Dar maujūd hai 
koī manzil kaise tanhā sar kareñ ham-safar meñ ham-safar maujūd hai 
ādat-e-ḳhāna-ḳharābī hai 'jamāl' varna achchhā-ḳhāsā ghar maujūd hai 
waqai koi agar maujud hai phir to ye dukh umr-bhar maujud hai 
bich ka rasta nahin baqi koi ya KHuda hai ya bashar maujud hai 
us ko pane ki tawaqqo hai bahut jab talak ye chashm-e-tar maujud hai 
us ke milne hi se pahle jaane kyun us ko kho dene ka Dar maujud hai 
koi manzil kaise tanha sar karen ham-safar mein ham-safar maujud hai 
aadat-e-KHana-KHarabi hai 'jamal' warna achchha-KHasa ghar maujud hai

udhar maz.hab idhar insāñ kī fitrat kā taqāzā hai vo dāmān-e-mah-e-kan.āñ hai ye dast-e-zuleḳhā hai 
idhar terī mashiyyat hai udhar hikmat rasūloñ kī ilāhī aadmī ke baab meñ kyā hukm hotā hai 
ye maanā donoñ hī dhoke haiñ rindī ho ki darveshī magar ye dekhnā hai kaun sā rañgīn dhokā hai 
khilaunā to nihāyat shoḳh o rañgīñ hai tamaddun kā muārrif maiñ bhī huuñ lekin khilaunā phir khilaunā hai 
mire aage to ab kuchh din se har aañsū mohabbat kā kanār-e-āb-e-ruknābād o gulgasht-e-musallā hai 
mujhe mālūm hai jo kuchh tamannā hai rasūloñ kī magar kyā dar-haqīqat vo ḳhudā kī bhī tamannā hai 
mashiyyat khelnā zebā nahīñ merī basīrat se uThā le in khilaunoñ ko ye duniyā hai vo uqbā hai 
udhar mazhab idhar insan ki fitrat ka taqaza hai wo daman-e-mah-e-kanan hai ye dast-e-zuleKHa hai 
idhar teri mashiyyat hai udhar hikmat rasulon ki ilahi aadmi ke bab mein kya hukm hota hai 
ye mana donon hi dhoke hain rindi ho ki darweshi magar ye dekhna hai kaun sa rangin dhoka hai 
khilauna to nihayat shoKH o rangin hai tamaddun ka muarrif main bhi hun lekin khilauna phir khilauna hai 
mere aage to ab kuchh din se har aansu mohabbat ka kanar-e-ab-e-ruknabaad o gulgasht-e-musalla hai 
mujhe malum hai jo kuchh tamanna hai rasulon ki magar kya dar-haqiqat wo KHuda ki bhi tamanna hai 
mashiyyat khelna zeba nahin meri basirat se uTha le in khilaunon ko ye duniya hai wo uqba hai

log the jin kī āñkhoñ meñ andesha koī na thā maiñ jis shahr se guzrā us meñ zinda koī na thā 
chīzoñ ke ambār lage the ḳhalq ārām se thī aur mujhe ye rañj vahāñ afsurda koī na thā 
hairānī meñ huuñ āḳhir kis kī parchhā.īñ huuñ vo bhī dhyān meñ aayā jis kā saaya koī na thā 
chauñk paḌā jab yādoñ meñ us kī āvāz sunī bas apnī hī guuñj thī mujh meñ varna koī na thā 
maiñ jis ḳhauf meñ thā us meñ kuchh aur bhī qaidī the maiñ jis ḳhvāb meñ thā us meñ darvāza koī na thā 
log the jin ki aankhon mein andesha koi na tha main jis shahr se guzra us mein zinda koi na tha 
chizon ke ambar lage the KHalq aaram se thi aur mujhe ye ranj wahan afsurda koi na tha 
hairani mein hun aaKHir kis ki parchhain hun wo bhi dhyan mein aaya jis ka saya koi na tha 
chaunk paDa jab yaadon mein us ki aawaz suni bas apni hi gunj thi mujh mein warna koi na tha 
main jis KHauf mein tha us mein kuchh aur bhi qaidi the main jis KHwab mein tha us mein darwaza koi na tha

havā to hai hī muḳhālif mujhe Darātā hai kyā havā se pūchh ke koī diye jalātā hai kyā 
guhar jo haiñ tah-e-dariyā to sañg-o-ḳhisht bhī haiñ ye dekhnā hai mirī dastaras meñ aatā hai kyā 
navāh-e-jāñ meñ jo chaltī hai kaisī āñdhī hai diye kī lo kī tarah mujh meñ thartharātā hai kyā 
gale meñ naam kī taḳhtī gulāb rakhte haiñ charāg apnā ta.āruf kahīñ karātā hai kyā 
nishān-e-qabr bhī chhoḌā nahīñ raqābat ne kisī ko aise koī ḳhaak meñ milātā hai kyā 
fanā ke ba.ad hī miltī hai zindagī ko davā 'talab' ye ramz tumhārī samajh meñ aatā hai kyā 
hawa to hai hi muKHalif mujhe Daraata hai kya hawa se puchh ke koi diye jalata hai kya 
guhar jo hain tah-e-dariya to sang-o-KHisht bhi hain ye dekhna hai meri dastaras mein aata hai kya 
nawah-e-jaan mein jo chalti hai kaisi aandhi hai diye ki lo ki tarah mujh mein thartharaata hai kya 
gale mein nam ki taKHti gulab rakhte hain charag apna taaruf kahin karaata hai kya 
nishan-e-qabr bhi chhoDa nahin raqabat ne kisi ko aise koi KHak mein milata hai kya 
fana ke baad hi milti hai zindagi ko dawa 'talab' ye ramz tumhaari samajh mein aata hai kya

tāsīr-e-barq-e-husn jo un ke suḳhan meñ thī ik larzish-e-ḳhafī mire saare badan meñ thī 
vaañ se nikal ke phir na farāġhat huī nasīb āsūdgī kī jaan tirī anjuman meñ thī 
ik rañg-e-iltifāt bhī us be-ruḳhī meñ thā ik sādgī bhī us nigah-e-sahar fan meñ thī 
mohtāj-e-bū-e-itr na thā jism-e-ḳhūb-e-yār ḳhushbu-e-dilbarī thī jo us pairahan meñ thī 
kuchh dil hī bujh gayā hai mirā varna aaj kal kaifiyat-e-bahār kī shiddat chaman meñ thī 
mālūm ho ga.ī mire dil ko rāh-e-shauq vo baat pyaar kī jo hunūz us dahan meñ thī 
ġhurbat kī sub.h meñ bhī nahīñ hai vo raushnī jo raushnī ki shām-e-savād-e-vatan meñ thī 
aish gudāz-e-dil bhī ġham-e-āshiqī meñ thā ik rāhat-e-latīf bhī zimn-e-mehan meñ thī 
achchhā huā ki ḳhātir-e-'hasrat' se haT ga.ī haibat sī ik jo ḳhatra-e-dār-o-rasan meñ thī 
tasir-e-barq-e-husn jo un ke suKHan mein thi ek larzish-e-KHafi mere sare badan mein thi 
wan se nikal ke phir na faraghat hui nasib aasudgi ki jaan teri anjuman mein thi 
ek rang-e-iltifat bhi us be-ruKHi mein tha ek sadgi bhi us nigah-e-sahar fan mein thi 
mohtaj-e-bu-e-itr na tha jism-e-KHub-e-yar KHushbu-e-dilbari thi jo us pairahan mein thi 
kuchh dil hi bujh gaya hai mera warna aaj kal kaifiyat-e-bahaar ki shiddat chaman mein thi 
malum ho gai mere dil ko rah-e-shauq wo baat pyar ki jo hunuz us dahan mein thi 
ghurbat ki subh mein bhi nahin hai wo raushni jo raushni ki sham-e-sawad-e-watan mein thi 
aish gudaz-e-dil bhi gham-e-ashiqi mein tha ek rahat-e-latif bhi zimn-e-mehan mein thi 
achchha hua ki KHatir-e-'hasrat' se haT gai haibat si ek jo KHatra-e-dar-o-rasan mein thi

jiine kā lutf kuchh to uThāo nashe meñ aao hañste haiñ kaise ġham meñ dikhāo nashe meñ aao 
nashsha pilā ke ḳhuub mirā hāl-e-dil sunā kuchh tum bhī dil kī baat batāo nashe meñ aao 
tum hosh meñ jab aa.e to aafat hī ban ke aa.e ab mere paas jab bhī tum aao nashe meñ aao 
dil meñ ġhubār rakhnā hai tauhīn-e-mai-kashī bas ḳhatm uTh ke haath milāo nashe meñ aao 
ye zindagī kī raat hai tārīk kis qadar donoñ siroñ pe sham.a jalāo nashe meñ aao 
'vāmiq' ye dil kī pyaas bhalā yuuñ bujhegī kyā ab aag hī se aag bujhāo nashe meñ aao 
jine ka lutf kuchh to uThao nashe mein aao hanste hain kaise gham mein dikhao nashe mein aao 
nashsha pila ke KHub mera haal-e-dil suna kuchh tum bhi dil ki baat batao nashe mein aao 
tum hosh mein jab aae to aafat hi ban ke aae ab mere pas jab bhi tum aao nashe mein aao 
dil mein ghubar rakhna hai tauhin-e-mai-kashi bas KHatm uTh ke hath milao nashe mein aao 
ye zindagi ki raat hai tarik kis qadar donon siron pe shama jalao nashe mein aao 
'wamiq' ye dil ki pyas bhala yun bujhegi kya ab aag hi se aag bujhao nashe mein aao

ishq har-chand mirī jaan sadā khātā hai par ye lazzat to vo hai jī hī jise paatā hai 
aah kab tak maiñ bakūñ terī balā suntī hai bāteñ logoñ kī jo kuchh dil mujhe sunvātā hai 
ham-nashīñ pūchh na us shoḳh kī ḳhūbī mujh se kyā kahūñ tujh se ġharaz jī ko mire bhātā hai 
baat kuchh dil kī hamāre to na suljhī ham se aapī ḳhush hove hai phir aap hī ghabrātā hai 
jī kaḌā kar ke tire kūche se jab jaatā huuñ dil-e-dushman ye mujhe gher ke phir laatā hai 
raah peñDe kabhū us shoḳh ke ta.iiñ ham se bhī diid vā diid to hotī hai jo mil jaatā hai 
'dard' kī qadr mire yaar samajhnā vallāh aisā āzād tire daam meñ yuuñ aatā hai 
ishq har-chand meri jaan sada khata hai par ye lazzat to wo hai ji hi jise pata hai 
aah kab tak main bakun teri bala sunti hai baaten logon ki jo kuchh dil mujhe sunwata hai 
ham-nashin puchh na us shoKH ki KHubi mujh se kya kahun tujh se gharaz ji ko mere bhata hai 
baat kuchh dil ki hamare to na suljhi hum se aapi KHush howe hai phir aap hi ghabraata hai 
ji kaDa kar ke tere kuche se jab jata hun dil-e-dushman ye mujhe gher ke phir lata hai 
rah penDe kabhu us shoKH ke tain hum se bhi did wa did to hoti hai jo mil jata hai 
'dard' ki qadr mere yar samajhna wallah aisa aazad tere dam mein yun aata hai

sun bastiyoñ kā haal jo had se guzar ga.iiñ un ummatoñ kā zikr jo rastoñ meñ mar ga.iiñ 
kar yaad un dinoñ ko ki ābād thiiñ yahāñ galiyāñ jo ḳhaak o ḳhuun kī dahshat se bhar ga.iiñ 
sarsar kī zad meñ aa.e hue bām-o-dar ko dekh kaisī havā.eñ kaisā nagar sard kar ga.iiñ 
kyā baab the yahāñ jo sadā se nahīñ khule kaisī duā.eñ thiiñ jo yahāñ be-asar ga.iiñ 
tanhā ujaaḌ burjoñ meñ phirtā hai tū 'munīr' vo zar-fishāniyāñ tire ruḳh kī kidhar ga.iiñ 
sun bastiyon ka haal jo had se guzar gain un ummaton ka zikr jo raston mein mar gain 
kar yaad un dinon ko ki aabaad thin yahan galiyan jo KHak o KHun ki dahshat se bhar gain 
sarsar ki zad mein aae hue baam-o-dar ko dekh kaisi hawaen kaisa nagar sard kar gain 
kya bab the yahan jo sada se nahin khule kaisi duaen thin jo yahan be-asar gain 
tanha ujaD burjon mein phirta hai tu 'munir' wo zar-fishaniyan tere ruKH ki kidhar gain

kaun samjhe 'ishq kī dushvāriyāñ ik junūñ aur laakh zimmedāriyāñ 
ehtimām-e-zindagi-e-ishq dekh roz mar jaane kī haiñ tayyāriyāñ 
'ishq kā ġham vo bhī tere 'ishq kā kaun kar saktā mirī ġham-ḳhvāriyāñ 
be-ḳhūdī-e-ishq jaise ġham kī niind ġham kī nīñdeñ ruuh kī bedāriyāñ 
'ishq bhī hai kis qadar bar-ḳhud-ġhalat un kī bazm-e-nāz aur ḳhuddāriyāñ 
is mohabbat us javānī kī qasam phir na ye nīñdeñ na ye bedāriyāñ 
ye niyāz-e-ārzūmandī na dekh aur kuchh haiñ 'ishq kī ḳhuddāriyāñ 
iḳhtilāj-e-qalb ke daure nahīñ 'ishq kī 'bismil' haiñ dil-āzāriyāñ 
kaun samjhe 'ishq ki dushwariyan ek junun aur lakh zimmedariyan 
ehtimam-e-zindagi-e-ishq dekh roz mar jaane ki hain tayyariyan 
'ishq ka gham wo bhi tere 'ishq ka kaun kar sakta meri gham-KHwariyan 
be-KHudi-e-ishq jaise gham ki nind gham ki ninden ruh ki bedariyan 
'ishq bhi hai kis qadar bar-KHud-ghalat un ki bazm-e-naz aur KHuddariyan 
is mohabbat us jawani ki qasam phir na ye ninden na ye bedariyan 
ye niyaz-e-arzumandi na dekh aur kuchh hain 'ishq ki KHuddariyan 
iKHtilaj-e-qalb ke daure nahin 'ishq ki 'bismil' hain dil-azariyan

chāñdnī raat meñ shānoñ se Dhalaktī chādar jism hai yā koī shamshīr nikal aa.ī hai 
muddatoñ ba.ad uThā.e the purāne kāġhaz saath tere mirī tasvīr nikal aa.ī hai 
kahkashāñ dekh ke aksar ye ḳhayāl aatā hai terī pāzeb se zanjīr nikal aa.ī hai 
sehn-e-gulshan meñ mahakte hue phūloñ kī qatār tere ḳhat se koī tahrīr nikal aa.ī hai 
chāñd kā ruup to rāñjhe kī nazar māñge hai ren-Dolī se koī hiir nikal aa.ī hai 
chandni raat mein shanon se Dhalakti chadar jism hai ya koi shamshir nikal aai hai 
muddaton baad uThae the purane kaghaz sath tere meri taswir nikal aai hai 
kahkashan dekh ke aksar ye KHayal aata hai teri pazeb se zanjir nikal aai hai 
sehn-e-gulshan mein mahakte hue phulon ki qatar tere KHat se koi tahrir nikal aai hai 
chand ka rup to ranjhe ki nazar mange hai ren-Doli se koi hir nikal aai hai

jo vo nazar basar-e-lutf aam ho jaa.e ajab nahīñ ki hamārā bhī kaam ho jaa.e 
sharāb-e-shauq kī qīmat hai naqd-e-jān-e-azīz agar ye bā.is-e-kaif-e-davām ho jaa.e 
rahīn-e-yās raheñ ahl-e-ārzū kab tak kabhī to aap kā darbār aam ho jaa.e 
jo aur kuchh ho tirī diid ke sivā manzūr to mujh pe ḳhvāhish-e-jannat harām ho jaa.e 
vo duur hī se hameñ dekh leñ yahī hai bahut magar qubūl hamārā salām ho jaa.e 
agar vo husn-e-dil-ārā kabhī ho jalva farosh faroġh-e-nūr meñ gum zarf-e-bām ho jaa.e 
sunā hai bar-sar-e-baḳhshish hai aaj piir muġhāñ hameñ bhī kaash atā koī jaam ho jaa.e 
tire karam pe hai mauqūf kāmrāni-e-shauq ye nā-tamām ilāhī tamām ho jaa.e 
sitam ke baad karam hai jafā ke baad atā hameñ hai bas jo yahī iltizām ho jaa.e 
atā ho soz vo yā rab junūn-e-'hasrat' ko ki jis se puḳhta ye saudā-e-ḳhām ho jaa.e 
jo wo nazar basar-e-lutf aam ho jae ajab nahin ki hamara bhi kaam ho jae 
sharab-e-shauq ki qimat hai naqd-e-jaan-e-aziz agar ye bais-e-kaif-e-dawam ho jae 
rahin-e-yas rahen ahl-e-arzu kab tak kabhi to aap ka darbar aam ho jae 
jo aur kuchh ho teri did ke siwa manzur to mujh pe KHwahish-e-jannat haram ho jae 
wo dur hi se hamein dekh len yahi hai bahut magar qubul hamara salam ho jae 
agar wo husn-e-dil-ara kabhi ho jalwa farosh farogh-e-nur mein gum zarf-e-baam ho jae 
suna hai bar-sar-e-baKHshish hai aaj pir mughan hamein bhi kash ata koi jam ho jae 
tere karam pe hai mauquf kaamrani-e-shauq ye na-tamam ilahi tamam ho jae 
sitam ke baad karam hai jafa ke baad ata hamein hai bas jo yahi iltizam ho jae 
ata ho soz wo ya rab junun-e-'hasrat' ko ki jis se puKHta ye sauda-e-KHam ho jae

pachhtāoge phir ham se sharārat nahīñ achchhī ye shoḳh-nigāhī dam-e-ruḳhsat nahīñ achchhī 
sach ye hai ki ghar se tire jannat nahīñ achchhī hūroñ kī tire sāmne sūrat nahīñ achchhī 
bhūle se kahā maan bhī lete haiñ kisī kā har baat meñ takrār kī aadat nahīñ achchhī 
kyuuñ kal kī tarah vasl meñ tashvīsh hai itnī tum aaj bhī kah do ki tabī.at nahīñ achchhī 
jab itnī samajh hai to samajh kyuuñ nahīñ jaate maiñ bhī yahī kahtā huuñ ki hujjat nahīñ achchhī 
hūroñ kī taraf aañkh uThā kar bhī na dekhā kyuuñ ab bhī kahoge tirī nīyat nahīñ achchhī 
pahuñchā hai qayāmat meñ bhī afsāna-e-ulfat itnī bhī kisī baat kī shohrat nahīñ achchhī 
ham aib samajhte haiñ har ik apne hunar ko kyā kījiye majbūr haiñ qismat nahīñ achchhī 
mil aa.iye dekh aa.iye aaj aap bhī jā kar 'beḳhud' kī ka.ī roz se hālat nahīñ achchhī 
pachhtaoge phir hum se shararat nahin achchhi ye shoKH-nigahi dam-e-ruKHsat nahin achchhi 
sach ye hai ki ghar se tere jannat nahin achchhi huron ki tere samne surat nahin achchhi 
bhule se kaha man bhi lete hain kisi ka har baat mein takrar ki aadat nahin achchhi 
kyun kal ki tarah wasl mein tashwish hai itni tum aaj bhi kah do ki tabiat nahin achchhi 
jab itni samajh hai to samajh kyun nahin jate main bhi yahi kahta hun ki hujjat nahin achchhi 
huron ki taraf aankh uTha kar bhi na dekha kyun ab bhi kahoge teri niyat nahin achchhi 
pahuncha hai qayamat mein bhi afsana-e-ulfat itni bhi kisi baat ki shohrat nahin achchhi 
hum aib samajhte hain har ek apne hunar ko kya kijiye majbur hain qismat nahin achchhi 
mil aaiye dekh aaiye aaj aap bhi ja kar 'beKHud' ki kai roz se haalat nahin achchhi

farq nahīñ paḌtā ham dīvānoñ ke ghar meñ hone se vīrānī umDī paḌtī hai ghar ke kone kone se 
apnī is kam-zarfī kā ehsās kahāñ le jā.ūñ maiñ sun rakkhā thā uljhan kuchh kam ho jaatī hai rone se 
bād-az-vaqt pashīmāñ ho kar zaḳhm nahīñ bhar sakte tum dāman ke dhabbe albatta miT sakte haiñ dhone se 
kāñTe bone vaale sach-much tū bhī kitnā bholā hai jaise raahī ruk jā.eñge tere kāñTe bone se 
mere tīkhe sher kī qīmat dukhtī rag par kaarī choT chiknī chupḌī ġhazleñ be-shak aap ḳharīdeñ sone se 
āñkhoñ meñ ye raat kaTe to Thiik 'muzaffar' hanafī jī rahzan jhunjhlāyā baiThā hai ik manzil sar hone se 
farq nahin paDta hum diwanon ke ghar mein hone se virani umDi paDti hai ghar ke kone kone se 
apni is kam-zarfi ka ehsas kahan le jaun main sun rakkha tha uljhan kuchh kam ho jati hai rone se 
baad-az-waqt pashiman ho kar zaKHm nahin bhar sakte tum daman ke dhabbe albatta miT sakte hain dhone se 
kanTe bone wale sach-much tu bhi kitna bhola hai jaise rahi ruk jaenge tere kanTe bone se 
mere tikhe sher ki qimat dukhti rag par kari choT chikni chupDi ghazlen be-shak aap KHariden sone se 
aankhon mein ye raat kaTe to Thik 'muzaffar' hanafi ji rahzan jhunjhlaya baiTha hai ek manzil sar hone se

kam se kam duniyā se itnā mirā rishta ho jaa.e koī merā bhī burā chāhne vaalā ho jaa.e 
isī majbūrī meñ ye bhiiḌ ikaTThā hai yahāñ jo tire saath nahīñ aa.e vo tanhā ho jaa.e 
shukr us kā adā karne kā ḳhayāl aa.e kise abr jab itnā ghanā ho ki añdherā ho jaa.e 
haañ nahīñ chāhiye us darja mohabbat terī ki mirā sach bhī tire jhuuT kā hissa ho jaa.e 
band āñkhoñ ne sarāboñ se bachāyā hai mujhe aañkh vaalā ho to is khel meñ andhā ho jaa.e 
maiñ bhī qatra huuñ tirī baat samajh saktā huuñ ye ki miT jaane ke Dar se koī dariyā ho jaa.e 
bas isī baat pe ā.īnoñ se bigḌī merī chāhtā thā mirā apnā koī chehra ho jaa.e 
bazm-e-yārāñ meñ yahī rañg to dete haiñ maza koī ro.e to hañsī se koī dohrā ho jaa.e 
kam se kam duniya se itna mera rishta ho jae koi mera bhi bura chahne wala ho jae 
isi majburi mein ye bhiD ikaTTha hai yahan jo tere sath nahin aae wo tanha ho jae 
shukr us ka ada karne ka KHayal aae kise abr jab itna ghana ho ki andhera ho jae 
han nahin chahiye us darja mohabbat teri ki mera sach bhi tere jhuT ka hissa ho jae 
band aankhon ne sarabon se bachaya hai mujhe aankh wala ho to is khel mein andha ho jae 
main bhi qatra hun teri baat samajh sakta hun ye ki miT jaane ke Dar se koi dariya ho jae 
bas isi baat pe aainon se bigDi meri chahta tha mera apna koi chehra ho jae 
bazm-e-yaran mein yahi rang to dete hain maza koi roe to hansi se koi dohra ho jae

havas balā kī mohabbat hameñ balā kī hai kabhī butoñ kī ḳhushāmad kabhī ḳhudā kī hai 
kisī ko chāhne vaale yahī to karte haiñ baḌā kamāl kiyā hai agar vafā kī hai 
guzar basar hai hamārī faqat qanā.at par nasīb ne yahī daulat hameñ atā kī hai 
tamām raat paḌī thī guzārne ke liye chunāñche ḳhatm surāhī zarā zarā kī hai 
sharāb se koī raġhbat nahīñ hai muhtasibo hakīm ne hameñ tajvīz ye davā kī hai 
zarā sī der ko aa.e the shaiḳh idhar lekin yahīñ janāb ne maġhrib yahīñ ishā kī hai 
tumhārā chehra-e-pur-nūr dekhtā huuñ to yaqīn hī nahīñ aatā ki jism ḳhākī hai 
mujhe aziiz na ho kyuuñ rijā.iyat apnī ye ġham-sharīk mire daur-e-ibtilā kī hai 
'shu.ūr' ḳhud ko zahīn aadmī samajhte haiñ ye sādgī hai to vallāh intihā kī hai 
hawas bala ki mohabbat hamein bala ki hai kabhi buton ki KHushamad kabhi KHuda ki hai 
kisi ko chahne wale yahi to karte hain baDa kamal kiya hai agar wafa ki hai 
guzar basar hai hamari faqat qanaat par nasib ne yahi daulat hamein ata ki hai 
tamam raat paDi thi guzarne ke liye chunanche KHatm surahi zara zara ki hai 
sharab se koi raghbat nahin hai muhtasibo hakim ne hamein tajwiz ye dawa ki hai 
zara si der ko aae the shaiKH idhar lekin yahin janab ne maghrib yahin isha ki hai 
tumhaara chehra-e-pur-nur dekhta hun to yaqin hi nahin aata ki jism KHaki hai 
mujhe aziz na ho kyun rijaiyat apni ye gham-sharik mere daur-e-ibtila ki hai 
'shuur' KHud ko zahin aadmi samajhte hain ye sadgi hai to wallah intiha ki hai

kabhī avval nazar aanā kabhī āḳhir honā aur vaqfoñ se mirā ġhā.eb o hāzir honā 
maiñ kisī aur zamāne ke liye huuñ shāyad is zamāne meñ hai mushkil mirā zāhir honā 
maiñ na hone pe hī ḳhush thā magar aise huā phir mujh ko nā-chār paḌā aap kī ḳhātir honā 
duur ho jā.ūñ bhī is bāġh-e-badan se lekin kahīñ mumkin hī nahīñ aise manāzir honā 
vāqa.ī tum ko dikhā.ī hī nahīñ detā huuñ yā zarūrat hai tumhārī mirā munkir honā 
rāsta aap banānā hī koī sahl nahīñ phir usī rāste kā aap musāfir honā 
vo maqāmāt-e-muqaddas vo tire gumbad o qaus aur mirā aise nishānāt kā zaa.er honā 
bādaloñ aur havāoñ meñ uḌā phirtā maiñ kaash hotā mirī taqdīr meñ taa.ir honā 
kaam niklā hai kuchh utnā hī ye pechīda 'zafar' jitnā āsāñ nazar aayā mujhe shā.er honā 
kabhi awwal nazar aana kabhi aaKHir hona aur waqfon se mera ghaeb o hazir hona 
main kisi aur zamane ke liye hun shayad is zamane mein hai mushkil mera zahir hona 
main na hone pe hi KHush tha magar aise hua phir mujh ko na-chaar paDa aap ki KHatir hona 
dur ho jaun bhi is bagh-e-badan se lekin kahin mumkin hi nahin aise manazir hona 
waqai tum ko dikhai hi nahin deta hun ya zarurat hai tumhaari mera munkir hona 
rasta aap banana hi koi sahl nahin phir usi raste ka aap musafir hona 
wo maqamat-e-muqaddas wo tere gumbad o qaus aur mera aise nishanat ka zaer hona 
baadalon aur hawaon mein uDa phirta main kash hota meri taqdir mein tair hona 
kaam nikla hai kuchh utna hi ye pechida 'zafar' jitna aasan nazar aaya mujhe shaer hona

maiñ bazm-e-tasavvur meñ use laa.e hue thā jo saath na aane kī qasam khaa.e hue thā 
dil jurm-e-mohabbat se kabhī rah na sakā baaz hālāñki bahut baar sazā paa.e hue thā 
ham chāhte the koī sune baat hamārī ye shauq hameñ ghar se nikalvā.e hue thā 
hone na diyā ḳhud pe musallat use maiñ ne jis shaḳhs ko jī jaan se apnā.e hue thā 
baiThe the 'shu.ūr' aaj mire paas vo gum-sum maiñ kho.e hue thā na unheñ paa.e hue thā 
main bazm-e-tasawwur mein use lae hue tha jo sath na aane ki qasam khae hue tha 
dil jurm-e-mohabbat se kabhi rah na saka baz haalanki bahut bar saza pae hue tha 
hum chahte the koi sune baat hamari ye shauq hamein ghar se nikalwae hue tha 
hone na diya KHud pe musallat use main ne jis shaKHs ko ji jaan se apnae hue tha 
baiThe the 'shuur' aaj mere pas wo gum-sum main khoe hue tha na unhen pae hue tha

baiThe haiñ sunahrī kashtī meñ aur sāmne niilā paanī hai vo hañstī āñkheñ pūchhtī haiñ ye kitnā gahrā paanī hai 
betāb havā ke jhoñkoñ kī fariyād sune to kaun sune maujoñ pe taḌaptī kashtī hai aur gūñgā bahrā paanī hai 
har mauj meñ giryāñ rahtā hai girdāb meñ raqsāñ rahtā hai betāb bhī hai be-ḳhvāb bhī hai ye kaisā zinda paanī hai 
bastī ke gharoñ ko kyā dekhe buniyād kī hurmat kyā jaane sailāb kā shikva kaun kare sailāb to andhā paanī hai 
is bastī meñ is dhartī par sairābī-e-jāñ kā haal na pūchh yaañ āñkhoñ āñkhoñ aañsū haiñ aur dariyā dariyā paanī hai 
ye raaz samajh meñ kab aatā āñkhoñ kī namī se samjhā huuñ is gard-o-ġhubār kī duniyā meñ har chiiz se sachchā paanī hai 
baiThe hain sunahri kashti mein aur samne nila pani hai wo hansti aankhen puchhti hain ye kitna gahra pani hai 
betab hawa ke jhonkon ki fariyaad sune to kaun sune maujon pe taDapti kashti hai aur gunga bahra pani hai 
har mauj mein giryan rahta hai girdab mein raqsan rahta hai betab bhi hai be-KHwab bhi hai ye kaisa zinda pani hai 
basti ke gharon ko kya dekhe buniyaad ki hurmat kya jaane sailab ka shikwa kaun kare sailab to andha pani hai 
is basti mein is dharti par sairabi-e-jaan ka haal na puchh yan aankhon aankhon aansu hain aur dariya dariya pani hai 
ye raaz samajh mein kab aata aankhon ki nami se samjha hun is gard-o-ghubar ki duniya mein har chiz se sachcha pani hai

un kā yā apnā tamāshā dekho jo dikhātā hai zamāna dekho 
vaqt ke paas haiñ kuchh tasvīreñ koī Duubā hai ki ubhrā dekho 
rañg sāhil kā nikhar aa.egā do ghaḌī jānib-e-dariyā dekho 
tilmilā uTThā ghanā sannāTā phir koī niiñd se chauñkā dekho 
ham-safar ġhair hue jaate haiñ fāsla rah gayā kitnā dekho 
barf ho jaatā hai sadiyoñ kā lahū ek Thahrā huā lamha dekho 
rañg uḌte haiñ tabassum kī tarah ā.ina-ḳhānoñ kā daavā dekho 
dil kī bigḌī huī sūrat hai yahāñ ab koī aur ḳharāba dekho 
yā kisī parde meñ gum ho jaao yā uThā kar koī pardā dekho 
dostī ḳhūn-e-jigar chāhtī hai kaam mushkil hai to rasta dekho 
saada kāġhaz kī tarah dil chup hai hāsil-e-rañg-e-tamannā dekho 
yahī taskīn kī sūrat hai to phir chaar din ġham ko bhī apnā dekho 
ġham-gusāroñ kā sahārā kab tak ḳhud pe bhī kar ke bharosā dekho 
apnī nīyat pe na jaao 'bāqī' ruḳh zamāne kī havā kā dekho 
un ka ya apna tamasha dekho jo dikhata hai zamana dekho 
waqt ke pas hain kuchh taswiren koi Duba hai ki ubhra dekho 
rang sahil ka nikhar aaega do ghaDi jaanib-e-dariya dekho 
tilmila uTTha ghana sannaTa phir koi nind se chaunka dekho 
ham-safar ghair hue jate hain fasla rah gaya kitna dekho 
barf ho jata hai sadiyon ka lahu ek Thahra hua lamha dekho 
rang uDte hain tabassum ki tarah aaina-KHanon ka dawa dekho 
dil ki bigDi hui surat hai yahan ab koi aur KHaraba dekho 
ya kisi parde mein gum ho jao ya uTha kar koi parda dekho 
dosti KHun-e-jigar chahti hai kaam mushkil hai to rasta dekho 
sada kaghaz ki tarah dil chup hai hasil-e-rang-e-tamanna dekho 
yahi taskin ki surat hai to phir chaar din gham ko bhi apna dekho 
gham-gusaron ka sahaara kab tak KHud pe bhi kar ke bharosa dekho 
apni niyat pe na jao 'baqi' ruKH zamane ki hawa ka dekho

ajnabī hairān mat honā ki dar khultā nahīñ jo yahāñ ābād haiñ un par bhī ghar khultā nahīñ 
rāste kab gard ho jaate haiñ aur manzil sarāb har musāfir par tilism-e-rahguzar khultā nahīñ 
dekhne vaale taġhāful kār-farmā hai abhī vo darīcha khul gayā husn-e-nazar khultā nahīñ 
jaane kyuuñ terī taraf se dil ko dhaḌkā hī rahā is takalluf se to koī nāma-bar khultā nahīñ 
intizār aur dastakoñ ke darmiyāñ kaTtī hai umr itnī āsānī se to bāb-e-hunar khultā nahīñ 
ham bhī us ke saath gardish meñ haiñ barsoñ se 'salīm' jo sitāra saath rahtā hai magar khultā nahīñ 
ajnabi hairan mat hona ki dar khulta nahin jo yahan aabaad hain un par bhi ghar khulta nahin 
raste kab gard ho jate hain aur manzil sarab har musafir par tilism-e-rahguzar khulta nahin 
dekhne wale taghaful kar-farma hai abhi wo daricha khul gaya husn-e-nazar khulta nahin 
jaane kyun teri taraf se dil ko dhaDka hi raha is takalluf se to koi nama-bar khulta nahin 
intizar aur dastakon ke darmiyan kaTti hai umr itni aasani se to bab-e-hunar khulta nahin 
hum bhi us ke sath gardish mein hain barson se 'salim' jo sitara sath rahta hai magar khulta nahin

vahshī the bū-e-gul kī tarah is jahāñ meñ ham nikle to phir ke aa.e na apne makāñ meñ ham 
sākin haiñ josh-e-ashk se āb-e-ravāñ meñ ham rahte haiñ misl-e-mardum-e-ābī jahāñ meñ ham 
shaidā-e-rū-e-gul na to shaidā-e-qadd-e-sarv sayyād ke shikār haiñ is bostāñ meñ ham 
niklī laboñ se aah ki gardūñ nishāna thā goyā ki tiir joḌe hue the kamāñ meñ ham 
ālūda-e-gunāh hai apnā riyāz bhī shab kāTte haiñ jaag ke muġh kī dukāñ meñ ham 
himmat pas-az-fanā sabab-e-zikr-e-ḳhair hai murdoñ kā naam sunte haiñ har dāstāñ meñ ham 
saaqī hai yār-e-māh-liqā hai sharāb hai ab bādshāh-e-vaqt haiñ apne makāñ meñ ham 
nairañg-e-rozgār se aiman haiñ shakl-e-sarv rakhte haiñ ek haal bahār-o-ḳhizāñ meñ ham 
duniyā o āḳhirat meñ talabgār haiñ tire hāsil tujhe samajhte haiñ donoñ jahāñ meñ ham 
paidā huā hai apne liye boriyā-e-faqr ye nīstāñ hai sher haiñ is nīstāñ meñ ham 
ḳhvāhāñ koī nahīñ to kuchh is kā ojab nahīñ jins-e-girāñ-bahā haiñ falak kī dukāñ meñ ham 
likkhā hai kis ke ḳhanjar-e-mizhgāñ kā us ne vasf ik zaḳhm dekhte haiñ qalam kī zabāñ meñ ham 
kyā haal hai kisī ne na pūchhā hazār haif nālāñ rahe jaras kī tarah kārvāñ meñ ham 
aayā hai yaar fātiha paḌhne ko qabr par bedār baḳht-e-ḳhufta hai ḳhvāb-e-girāñ meñ ham 
shāgird tarz-e-ḳhanda-zanī meñ hai gul tirā ustād-e-andalīb haiñ soz-o-fuġhāñ meñ ham 
bāġh-e-jahāñ ko yaad kareñge adam meñ kyā kunj-e-qafas se tañg rahe āshiyāñ meñ ham 
allāh-re be-qarārī-e-dil hijr-e-yār meñ gaahe zamīñ meñ the to gahe āsmāñ meñ ham 
darvāza band rakhte haiñ misl-e-hubāb-e-bahr qufl-e-durūñ-ḳhāna haiñ apne makāñ meñ ham 
'ātish' suḳhan kī qadr zamāne se uTh ga.ī maqdūr ho to qufl lagā deñ zabāñ meñ ham 
wahshi the bu-e-gul ki tarah is jahan mein hum nikle to phir ke aae na apne makan mein hum 
sakin hain josh-e-ashk se aab-e-rawan mein hum rahte hain misl-e-mardum-e-abi jahan mein hum 
shaida-e-ru-e-gul na to shaida-e-qadd-e-sarw sayyaad ke shikar hain is bostan mein hum 
nikli labon se aah ki gardun nishana tha goya ki tir joDe hue the kaman mein hum 
aaluda-e-gunah hai apna riyaz bhi shab kaTte hain jag ke mugh ki dukan mein hum 
himmat pas-az-fana sabab-e-zikr-e-KHair hai murdon ka nam sunte hain har dastan mein hum
