saqi hai yar-e-mah-liqa hai sharab hai ab baadshah-e-waqt hain apne makan mein hum 
nairang-e-rozgar se aiman hain shakl-e-sarw rakhte hain ek haal bahaar-o-KHizan mein hum 
duniya o aaKHirat mein talabgar hain tere hasil tujhe samajhte hain donon jahan mein hum 
paida hua hai apne liye boriya-e-faqr ye nistan hai sher hain is nistan mein hum 
KHwahan koi nahin to kuchh is ka ojab nahin jins-e-giran-baha hain falak ki dukan mein hum 
likkha hai kis ke KHanjar-e-mizhgan ka us ne wasf ek zaKHm dekhte hain qalam ki zaban mein hum 
kya haal hai kisi ne na puchha hazar haif nalan rahe jaras ki tarah karwan mein hum 
aaya hai yar fatiha paDhne ko qabr par bedar baKHt-e-KHufta hai KHwab-e-giran mein hum 
shagird tarz-e-KHanda-zani mein hai gul tera ustad-e-andalib hain soz-o-fughan mein hum 
bagh-e-jahan ko yaad karenge adam mein kya kunj-e-qafas se tang rahe aashiyan mein hum 
allah-re be-qarari-e-dil hijr-e-yar mein gahe zamin mein the to gahe aasman mein hum 
darwaza band rakhte hain misl-e-hubab-e-bahr qufl-e-durun-KHana hain apne makan mein hum 
'atish' suKHan ki qadr zamane se uTh gai maqdur ho to qufl laga den zaban mein hum

jab ye aalam ho to likhiye lab-o-ruḳhsār pe ḳhaak uḌtī hai ḳhāna-e-dil ke dar-o-dīvār pe ḳhaak 
tū ne miTTī se ulajhne kā natīja dekhā Daal dī mere badan ne tirī talvār pe ḳhaak 
ham ne muddat se ulaT rakkhā hai kaasa apnā dast-e-dādār tire dirham-o-dīnār pe ḳhaak 
putliyāñ garmī-e-nazzāra se jal jaatī haiñ aañkh kī ḳhair miyāñ raunaq-e-bāzār pe ḳhaak 
jo kisī aur ne likkhā hai use kyā ma.alūm lauh-e-taqdīr bajā chehra-e-aḳhbār pe ḳhaak 
chaar dīvār-e-anāsir kī haqīqat kitnī ye bhī ghar Duub gayā dīda-e-ḳhūñ-bār pe ḳhaak 
pā-e-vahshat ne ajab naqsh banā.e the yahāñ ai havā-e-sar-e-sahrā tirī raftār pe ḳhaak 
ye ġhazal likh ke harīfoñ pe uḌā dī maiñ ne jam rahī thī mire ā.īna-e-ash.ār pe ḳhaak 
ye bhī dekho ki kahāñ kaun bulātā hai tumheñ mahzar-e-shauq paḌho mahzar-e-sarkār pe ḳhaak 
aap kyā naqd-e-do-ālam se ḳharīdeñge ise ye to dīvāne kā sar hai sar-e-pindār pe ḳhaak 
jab ye aalam ho to likhiye lab-o-ruKHsar pe KHak uDti hai KHana-e-dil ke dar-o-diwar pe KHak 
tu ne miTTi se ulajhne ka natija dekha Dal di mere badan ne teri talwar pe KHak 
hum ne muddat se ulaT rakkha hai kasa apna dast-e-dadar tere dirham-o-dinar pe KHak 
putliyan garmi-e-nazzara se jal jati hain aankh ki KHair miyan raunaq-e-bazar pe KHak 
jo kisi aur ne likkha hai use kya malum lauh-e-taqdir baja chehra-e-aKHbar pe KHak 
chaar diwar-e-anasir ki haqiqat kitni ye bhi ghar Dub gaya dida-e-KHun-bar pe KHak 
pa-e-wahshat ne ajab naqsh banae the yahan ai hawa-e-sar-e-sahra teri raftar pe KHak 
ye ghazal likh ke harifon pe uDa di main ne jam rahi thi mere aaina-e-ashaar pe KHak 
ye bhi dekho ki kahan kaun bulata hai tumhein mahzar-e-shauq paDho mahzar-e-sarkar pe KHak 
aap kya naqd-e-do-alam se KHaridenge ise ye to diwane ka sar hai sar-e-pindar pe KHak

nahīñ maiñ hausla to kar rahā thā zarā tere sukūñ se Dar rahā thā 
achānak jheñp kar hañsne lagā maiñ bahut rone kī koshish kar rahā thā 
bhañvar meñ phir hameñ kuchh mashġhale the vo bechāra to sāhil par rahā thā 
larazte kāñpte hāthoñ se būḌhā chilam meñ phir koī dukh bhar rahā thā 
achānak lau uThī aur jal gayā maiñ bujhī kirnoñ ko yakjā kar rahā thā 
gila kyā thā agar sab saath hote vo bas tanhā safar se Dar rahā thā 
ġhalat thā roknā ashkoñ ko yuuñ bhī ki buniyādoñ meñ paanī mar rahā thā 
nahin main hausla to kar raha tha zara tere sukun se Dar raha tha 
achanak jhenp kar hansne laga main bahut rone ki koshish kar raha tha 
bhanwar mein phir hamein kuchh mashghale the wo bechaara to sahil par raha tha 
larazte kanpte hathon se buDha chilam mein phir koi dukh bhar raha tha 
achanak lau uThi aur jal gaya main bujhi kirnon ko yakja kar raha tha 
gila kya tha agar sab sath hote wo bas tanha safar se Dar raha tha 
ghalat tha rokna ashkon ko yun bhi ki buniyaadon mein pani mar raha tha

bazm-e-dushman meñ bulāte ho ye kyā karte ho aur phir aañkh churāte ho ye kyā karte ho 
ba.ad mere koī mujh sā na milegā tum ko ḳhaak meñ kis ko milāte ho ye kyā karte ho 
ham to dete nahīñ kuchh ye bhī zabardastī hai chhīn kar dil liye jaate ho ye kyā karte ho 
kar chuke bas mujhe pāmāl adū ke aage kyuuñ mirī ḳhaak uḌāte ho ye kyā karte ho 
chhīñTe paanī ke na do niiñd bharī āñkhoñ par sote fitne ko jagāte ho ye kyā karte ho 
ho na jaa.e kahīñ dāman kā chhuḌānā mushkil mujh ko dīvāna banāte ho ye kyā karte ho 
mohtasib ek balā-nosh hai ai pīr-e-muġhāñ chaaT par kis ko lagāte ho ye kyā karte ho 
kaam kyā dāġh-e-suvaidā kā hamāre dil par naqsh-e-ulfat ko miTāte ho ye kyā karte ho 
phir isī muñh pe nazākat kā karoge da.avā ġhair ke naaz uThāte ho ye kyā karte ho 
us sitam-kesh ke chakmoñ meñ na aanā 'beḳhud' hāl-e-dil kis ko sunāte ho ye kyā karte ho 
bazm-e-dushman mein bulate ho ye kya karte ho aur phir aankh churaate ho ye kya karte ho 
baad mere koi mujh sa na milega tum ko KHak mein kis ko milate ho ye kya karte ho 
hum to dete nahin kuchh ye bhi zabardasti hai chhin kar dil liye jate ho ye kya karte ho 
kar chuke bas mujhe pamal adu ke aage kyun meri KHak uDate ho ye kya karte ho 
chhinTe pani ke na do nind bhari aankhon par sote fitne ko jagate ho ye kya karte ho 
ho na jae kahin daman ka chhuDana mushkil mujh ko diwana banate ho ye kya karte ho 
mohtasib ek bala-nosh hai ai pir-e-mughan chaT par kis ko lagate ho ye kya karte ho 
kaam kya dagh-e-suwaida ka hamare dil par naqsh-e-ulfat ko miTate ho ye kya karte ho 
phir isi munh pe nazakat ka karoge dawa ghair ke naz uThate ho ye kya karte ho 
us sitam-kesh ke chakmon mein na aana 'beKHud' haal-e-dil kis ko sunate ho ye kya karte ho

havā ke par katarnā ab zarūrī ho gayā hai mirā parvāz bharnā ab zarūrī ho gayā hai 
mire andar ka.ī ehsās patthar ho rahe haiñ ye shīrāza bikharnā ab zarūrī ho gayā hai 
maiñ aksar zindagī ke un marāhil se bhī guzrā jahāñ lagtā thā marnā ab zarūrī ho gayā hai 
mirī ḳhāmoshiyāñ ab mujh pe haavī ho rahī haiñ ki khul kar baat karnā ab zarūrī ho gayā hai 
bulandī bhī nasheboñ kī tarah lagne lagī hai bulandī se utarnā ab zarūrī ho gayā hai 
maiñ is yak-rañgi-e-hālāt se uktā chukā huuñ haqīqat se mukarnā ab zarūrī ho gayā hai 
mirī āñkheñ bahut vīrān hotī jā rahī haiñ ḳhalā meñ rañg bharnā ab zarūrī ho gayā hai 
hawa ke par katarna ab zaruri ho gaya hai mera parwaz bharna ab zaruri ho gaya hai 
mere andar kai ehsas patthar ho rahe hain ye shiraaza bikharna ab zaruri ho gaya hai 
main aksar zindagi ke un marahil se bhi guzra jahan lagta tha marna ab zaruri ho gaya hai 
meri KHamoshiyan ab mujh pe hawi ho rahi hain ki khul kar baat karna ab zaruri ho gaya hai 
bulandi bhi nashebon ki tarah lagne lagi hai bulandi se utarna ab zaruri ho gaya hai 
main is yak-rangi-e-haalat se ukta chuka hun haqiqat se mukarna ab zaruri ho gaya hai 
meri aankhen bahut viran hoti ja rahi hain KHala mein rang bharna ab zaruri ho gaya hai

aa.eñ aañsū agar āñkhoñ meñ to bas pī jaa.eñ haal sab pūchhte haiñ ham na kahīñ bhī jaa.eñ 
dekhte ho jo kabhī mahv-e-suḳhan ḳhud se hameñ haiñ vo bāteñ bhī ki ḳhud se jo faqat kī jaa.eñ 
ham ka.ī roz se be-vaj.h bahut ḳhush haiñ chalo zindagī kī ye adā.eñ bhī to dekhī jaa.eñ 
ham to yuuñ chup haiñ ki kyā baat kisī se kī jaa.e phir bhī muñh se ka.ī bāteñ to nikal hī jaa.eñ 
raah chalte maiñ jise dekhtā huuñ lagtā hai jaise be-vaj.h sī āñkheñ haiñ ki taktī jaa.eñ 
kyā mileñ 'talḳh' kisī se kabhī aate jaate ghar kī chaukhaT pe qadam rakh ke palaT bhī jaa.eñ 
aaen aansu agar aankhon mein to bas pi jaen haal sab puchhte hain hum na kahin bhi jaen 
dekhte ho jo kabhi mahw-e-suKHan KHud se hamein hain wo baaten bhi ki KHud se jo faqat ki jaen 
hum kai roz se be-wajh bahut KHush hain chalo zindagi ki ye adaen bhi to dekhi jaen 
hum to yun chup hain ki kya baat kisi se ki jae phir bhi munh se kai baaten to nikal hi jaen 
rah chalte main jise dekhta hun lagta hai jaise be-wajh si aankhen hain ki takti jaen 
kya milen 'talKH' kisi se kabhi aate jate ghar ki chaukhaT pe qadam rakh ke palaT bhi jaen

aaj bhaḌkī rag-e-vahshat tire dīvānoñ kī qismateñ jāgne vaalī haiñ bayābānoñ kī 
phir ghaTāoñ meñ hai naqqāra-e-vahshat kī sadā Toliyāñ bañdh ke chalīñ dasht ko dīvānoñ kī 
aaj kyā suujh rahī hai tire dīvānoñ ko dhajjiyāñ DhūñDhte phirte haiñ garebānoñ kī 
rūh-e-majnūñ abhī betāb hai sahrāoñ meñ ḳhaak be-vaj.h nahīñ uḌtī bayābānoñ kī 
us ne 'ehsān' kuchh is naaz se muḌ kar dekhā dil meñ tasvīr utar aa.ī parī-ḳhānoñ kī 
aaj bhaDki rag-e-wahshat tere diwanon ki qismaten jagne wali hain bayabanon ki 
phir ghaTaon mein hai naqqara-e-wahshat ki sada Toliyan bandh ke chalin dasht ko diwanon ki 
aaj kya sujh rahi hai tere diwanon ko dhajjiyan DhunDhte phirte hain garebanon ki 
ruh-e-majnun abhi betab hai sahraon mein KHak be-wajh nahin uDti bayabanon ki 
us ne 'ehsan' kuchh is naz se muD kar dekha dil mein taswir utar aai pari-KHanon ki

agar maiñ sach kahūñ to sabr hī kī āzmā.ish hai ye miTTī imtihāñ pyāre ye paanī āzmā.ish hai 
nikal kar ḳhud se bāhar bhāgne se ḳhud meñ aane tak farār āḳhir hai ye kaisā ye kaisī āzmā.ish hai 
talāsh-e-zāt meñ ham ko kisī bāzār-e-hastī meñ tirā milnā tirā khonā alag hī āzmā.ish hai 
nabūd o buud ke phaile hue is kār-ḳhāne meñ uchhaltī kūdtī duniyā hamārī āzmā.ish hai 
mire dil ke darīche se uchak kar jhāñktī bāhar gulābī eḌiyoñ vaalī anokhī āzmā.ish hai 
ye tū jo ḳhud pe nāfiz ho gayā hai shaam kī sūrat to jaanī shaam kī kab hai ye terī āzmā.ish hai 
diye ke aur havāoñ ke marāsim khul nahīñ paate nahīñ khultā ki in meñ se ye kis kī āzmā.ish hai 
agar main sach kahun to sabr hi ki aazmaish hai ye miTTi imtihan pyare ye pani aazmaish hai 
nikal kar KHud se bahar bhagne se KHud mein aane tak farar aaKHir hai ye kaisa ye kaisi aazmaish hai 
talash-e-zat mein hum ko kisi bazar-e-hasti mein tera milna tera khona alag hi aazmaish hai 
nabud o bud ke phaile hue is kar-KHane mein uchhalti kudti duniya hamari aazmaish hai 
mere dil ke dariche se uchak kar jhankti bahar gulabi eDiyon wali anokhi aazmaish hai 
ye tu jo KHud pe nafiz ho gaya hai sham ki surat to jaani sham ki kab hai ye teri aazmaish hai 
diye ke aur hawaon ke marasim khul nahin pate nahin khulta ki in mein se ye kis ki aazmaish hai

kyā tarz-e-kalām ho ga.ī hai har baat payām ho ga.ī hai 
kuchh zahr na thī sharāb-e-añgūr kyā chiiz harām ho ga.ī hai 
aage to nahīñ nahīñ sunī thī ab takiya-kalām ho ga.ī hai 
jaate jaate payām-bar ko har sub.h se shaam ho ga.ī hai 
ab dekhiye mashq-e-pā.emālī tārīf-e-ḳhirām ho ga.ī hai 
pahuñche haiñ jab us kī bazm meñ ham majlis hī tamām ho ga.ī hai 
aalam ko hai dāva-e-mohabbat ye ḳhaas bhī aam ho ga.ī hai 
us but ke hamīñ nahīñ haiñ bande maḳhlūq ġhulām ho ga.ī hai 
barbād na hogī terī ulfat tajvīz maqām ho ga.ī hai 
jāgīr junūñ kī qais ke ba.ad ab 'dāġh' ke naam ho ga.ī hai 
kya tarz-e-kalam ho gai hai har baat payam ho gai hai 
kuchh zahr na thi sharab-e-angur kya chiz haram ho gai hai 
aage to nahin nahin suni thi ab takiya-kalam ho gai hai 
jate jate payam-bar ko har subh se sham ho gai hai 
ab dekhiye mashq-e-paemali tarif-e-KHiram ho gai hai 
pahunche hain jab us ki bazm mein hum majlis hi tamam ho gai hai 
aalam ko hai dawa-e-mohabbat ye KHas bhi aam ho gai hai 
us but ke hamin nahin hain bande maKHluq ghulam ho gai hai 
barbaad na hogi teri ulfat tajwiz maqam ho gai hai 
jagir junun ki qais ke baad ab 'dagh' ke nam ho gai hai

dar khol ke dekhūñ zarā idrāk se bāhar ye shor sā kaisā hai mirī ḳhaak se bāhar 
rūdād-e-guzishta to sunī kūza-garī kī fardā kā bhī kar zikr jo hai chaak se bāhar 
ḳhush aayā ajab ishq ko ye jāma-e-zebā niklā nahīñ phir hijr kī poshāk se bāhar 
chāhā thā mafar dil ne magar zulf-e-girah-gīr pechāk banātī rahī pechāk se bāhar 
aatā nahīñ kuchh yaad ki ai sā.at-e-nisyāñ kyā rakkhā tire taaq pe kyā taaq se bāhar 
suntā huuñ kahīñ duur se naqqārā sabā kā utrī hai bahār ab ke bhī ḳhāshāk se bāhar 
kuchh der Thahar aur zarā dekh tamāshā nāpaid haiñ ye raunaqeñ is ḳhaak se bāhar 
maujūd ḳhalā meñ haiñ agar aur zamīneñ aflāk bhī hoñge kahīñ aflāk se bāhar 
dar khol ke dekhun zara idrak se bahar ye shor sa kaisa hai meri KHak se bahar 
rudad-e-guzishta to suni kuza-gari ki farda ka bhi kar zikr jo hai chaak se bahar 
KHush aaya ajab ishq ko ye jama-e-zeba nikla nahin phir hijr ki poshak se bahar 
chaha tha mafar dil ne magar zulf-e-girah-gir pechaak banati rahi pechaak se bahar 
aata nahin kuchh yaad ki ai saat-e-nisyan kya rakkha tere taq pe kya taq se bahar 
sunta hun kahin dur se naqqara saba ka utri hai bahaar ab ke bhi KHashak se bahar 
kuchh der Thahar aur zara dekh tamasha napaid hain ye raunaqen is KHak se bahar 
maujud KHala mein hain agar aur zaminen aflak bhi honge kahin aflak se bahar

faqīrī meñ ye thoḌī sī tan-āsānī bhī karte haiñ ki ham dast-e-karam duniyā pe arzānī bhī karte haiñ 
dar-e-rūhāniyāñ kī chākarī bhī kaam hai apnā butoñ kī mamlikat meñ kār-e-sultānī bhī karte haiñ 
junūñ vāloñ kī ye shā.istagī turfa-tamāshā hai rafū bhī chāhte haiñ chāk-dāmānī bhī karte haiñ 
mujhe kuchh shauq-e-nazzāra bhī hai phūloñ ke chehroñ kā magar kuchh phuul chehre merī nigrānī bhī karte haiñ 
jo sach pūchho to zabt-e-ārzū se kuchh nahīñ hotā parinde mere siine meñ pur-afshānī bhī karte haiñ 
hamāre dil ko ik āzār hai aisā nahīñ lagtā ki ham daftar bhī jaate haiñ ġhazal-ḳhvānī bhī karte haiñ 
bahut nauhagarī karte haiñ dil ke TuuT jaane kī kabhī aap apnī chīzoñ kī nigahbānī bhī karte haiñ 
faqiri mein ye thoDi si tan-asani bhi karte hain ki hum dast-e-karam duniya pe arzani bhi karte hain 
dar-e-ruhaniyan ki chaakari bhi kaam hai apna buton ki mamlikat mein kar-e-sultani bhi karte hain 
junun walon ki ye shaistagi turfa-tamasha hai rafu bhi chahte hain chaak-damani bhi karte hain 
mujhe kuchh shauq-e-nazzara bhi hai phulon ke chehron ka magar kuchh phul chehre meri nigrani bhi karte hain 
jo sach puchho to zabt-e-arzu se kuchh nahin hota parinde mere sine mein pur-afshani bhi karte hain 
hamare dil ko ek aazar hai aisa nahin lagta ki hum daftar bhi jate hain ghazal-KHwani bhi karte hain 
bahut nauhagari karte hain dil ke TuT jaane ki kabhi aap apni chizon ki nigahbani bhi karte hain

ab vo aglā sā iltifāt nahīñ jis pe bhūle the ham vo baat nahīñ 
mujh ko tum se e'timād-e-vafā tum ko mujh se par iltifāt nahīñ 
rañj kyā kyā haiñ ek jaan ke saath zindagī maut hai hayāt nahīñ 
yūñhī guzre to sahl hai lekin fursat-e-ġham ko bhī sabāt nahīñ 
koī dil-soz ho to kiije bayāñ sarsarī dil kī vārdāt nahīñ 
zarra zarra hai maz.har-e-ḳhurshīd jaag ai aañkh din hai raat nahīñ 
qais ho kohkan ho yā 'hālī' āshiqī kuchh kisī kī zaat nahīñ 
ab wo agla sa iltifat nahin jis pe bhule the hum wo baat nahin 
mujh ko tum se e'timad-e-wafa tum ko mujh se par iltifat nahin 
ranj kya kya hain ek jaan ke sath zindagi maut hai hayat nahin 
yunhi guzre to sahl hai lekin fursat-e-gham ko bhi sabaat nahin 
koi dil-soz ho to kije bayan sarsari dil ki wardat nahin 
zarra zarra hai mazhar-e-KHurshid jag ai aankh din hai raat nahin 
qais ho kohkan ho ya 'haali' aashiqi kuchh kisi ki zat nahin

zard pattoñ kā ġhubār uḌtā huā ḳhema-e-gul meñ sharār uḌtā huā 
bah chukī gadrā.e jismoñ kī sharāb lams-e-avval kā ḳhumār uḌtā huā 
sab ne dekhā aur sab ḳhāmosh the ek suufī kā mazār uḌtā huā 
lag chukī hai sabz dariyāoñ meñ aag bhaap ban kar ābshār uḌtā huā 
mutma.in dīvār par hai chhipkalī ḳhud hī aa.egā shikār uḌtā huā 
us ne aa kar haath māthe par rakhā aur mintoñ meñ buḳhār uḌtā huā 
zard patton ka ghubar uDta hua KHema-e-gul mein sharar uDta hua 
bah chuki gadrae jismon ki sharab lams-e-awwal ka KHumar uDta hua 
sab ne dekha aur sab KHamosh the ek sufi ka mazar uDta hua 
lag chuki hai sabz dariyaon mein aag bhap ban kar aabshaar uDta hua 
mutmain diwar par hai chhipkali KHud hi aaega shikar uDta hua 
us ne aa kar hath mathe par rakha aur minton mein buKHar uDta hua

haqīqat jis jagah hotī hai tābānī batātī hai koī parde meñ hotā hai to chilman jagmagātī hai 
vo aa.e bhī nahīñ aur zindagī kī raat jaatī hai sahar hotī hai aur sham-e-tamannā jhilmilātī hai 
sitāroñ kā sahārā le ke dhartī baiTh jaatī hai falak ko dekh kar jis dam ġharībī muskurātī hai 
maiñ dāman thāmtā huuñ aur adā dāman chhuḌātī hai mohabbat hai to kuchh be-gāngī bhī paa.ī jaatī hai 
mirī nākāmi-e-ġham zauq-e-hairānī banātī hai ye duniyā duur se merī nazar meñ jagmagātī hai 
sukūt-e-vasl kā lamha bhī kyā bedār-ḳhvābī hai mohabbat jāgtī hai aur javānī soī jaatī hai 
vo jab sanjīda hote haiñ adā añgḌā.ī letī hai vo jab ḳhāmosh hote haiñ javānī gungunātī hai 
zamāna hai ki dil-gīrī meñ afsurda sā rahtā hai tabī.at hai ki ġhamgīnī meñ jaulānī pe aatī hai 
havā-e-dāman-e-nikhat-fazā kā vāsta tum ko zarā Thahro charāġh-e-zīst kī lau thartharātī hai 
musalsal gulshan-e-hastī meñ kāñTe us ne bo.e haiñ ye duniyā phir inhīñ kāñToñ se kyuuñ dāman bachātī hai 
na ġham fursat hī detā hai na aañsū band hote haiñ barastā jā rahā hai meñh badlī bantī jaatī hai 
yahī hastī 'nushūr' ik roz hai anjām-e-hastī bhī yahī duniyā kisī manzil pe uqbā ho ke aatī hai 
haqiqat jis jagah hoti hai tabani batati hai koi parde mein hota hai to chilman jagmagati hai 
wo aae bhi nahin aur zindagi ki raat jati hai sahar hoti hai aur sham-e-tamanna jhilmilati hai 
sitaron ka sahaara le ke dharti baiTh jati hai falak ko dekh kar jis dam gharibi muskuraati hai 
main daman thamta hun aur ada daman chhuDati hai mohabbat hai to kuchh be-gangi bhi pai jati hai 
meri nakaami-e-gham zauq-e-hairani banati hai ye duniya dur se meri nazar mein jagmagati hai 
sukut-e-wasl ka lamha bhi kya bedar-KHwabi hai mohabbat jagti hai aur jawani soi jati hai 
wo jab sanjida hote hain ada angDai leti hai wo jab KHamosh hote hain jawani gungunati hai 
zamana hai ki dil-giri mein afsurda sa rahta hai tabiat hai ki ghamgini mein jaulani pe aati hai 
hawa-e-daman-e-nikhat-faza ka wasta tum ko zara Thahro charagh-e-zist ki lau thartharaati hai 
musalsal gulshan-e-hasti mein kanTe us ne boe hain ye duniya phir inhin kanTon se kyun daman bachati hai 
na gham fursat hi deta hai na aansu band hote hain barasta ja raha hai meinh badli banti jati hai 
yahi hasti 'nushur' ek roz hai anjam-e-hasti bhi yahi duniya kisi manzil pe uqba ho ke aati hai

log yak-rangī-e-vahshat se bhī uktā.e haiñ ham bayābāñ se yahī ek ḳhabar laa.e haiñ 
pyaas buniyād hai jiine kī bujhā leñ kaise ham ne ye ḳhvāb na dekhe haiñ na dikhlā.e haiñ 
ham thake-hāre haiñ ai azm-e-safar ham ko sañbhāl kahīñ saaya jo nazar aayā hai ghabrā.e haiñ 
zindagī DhūñDh le tū bhī kisī dīvāne ko us ke gesū to mire pyaar ne suljhā.e haiñ 
yaad jis chiiz ko kahte haiñ vo parchhā.īñ hai aur saa.e bhī kisī shaḳhs ke haath aa.e haiñ 
haañ unhīñ logoñ se duniyā meñ shikāyat hai hameñ haañ vahī log jo aksar hameñ yaad aa.e haiñ 
is bayābān-e-dar-o-bām meñ kyā rakkhā hai ham hī dīvāne haiñ sahrā se chale aa.e haiñ 
log yak-rangi-e-wahshat se bhi uktae hain hum bayaban se yahi ek KHabar lae hain 
pyas buniyaad hai jine ki bujha len kaise hum ne ye KHwab na dekhe hain na dikhlae hain 
hum thake-haare hain ai azm-e-safar hum ko sanbhaal kahin saya jo nazar aaya hai ghabrae hain 
zindagi DhunDh le tu bhi kisi diwane ko us ke gesu to mere pyar ne suljhae hain 
yaad jis chiz ko kahte hain wo parchhain hai aur sae bhi kisi shaKHs ke hath aae hain 
han unhin logon se duniya mein shikayat hai hamein han wahi log jo aksar hamein yaad aae hain 
is bayaban-e-dar-o-baam mein kya rakkha hai hum hi diwane hain sahra se chale aae hain

sabr vahshat-asar na ho jaa.e kahīñ sahrā bhī ghar na ho jaa.e 
rashk-e-paiġhām hai ināñ-kash-e-dil nāma-bar rāhbar na ho jaa.e 
dekho mat dekhiyo ki ā.īna ġhash tumheñ dekh kar na ho jaa.e 
hijr-e-parda-nashīñ meñ marte haiñ zindagī parda-e-dar na ho jaa.e 
kasrat-e-sajda se vo naqsh-e-qadam kahīñ pāmāl-e-sar na ho jaa.e 
mere taġh.īr-e-rañg ko mat dekh tujh ko apnī nazar na ho jaa.e 
mere aañsū na poñchhnā dekho kahīñ dāmān tar na ho jaa.e 
baat nāseh se karte Dartā huuñ ki fuġhāñ be-asar na ho jaa.e 
ai qayāmat na aa.iyo jab tak vo mirī gor par na ho jaa.e 
māna-e-zulm hai taġhāful-e-yār baḳht-e-bad ko ḳhabar na ho jaa.e 
ġhair se be-hijāb milte ho shab-e-āshiq sahar na ho jaa.e 
rashk-e-dushman kā fā.eda mālūm muft jī kā zarar na ho jaa.e 
ai dil āhista āh-e-tāb-shikan dekh TukḌe jigar na ho jaa.e 
'momin' īmāñ qubūl dil se mujhe vo but āzurda gar na ho jaa.e 
sabr wahshat-asar na ho jae kahin sahra bhi ghar na ho jae 
rashk-e-paigham hai inan-kash-e-dil nama-bar rahbar na ho jae 
dekho mat dekhiyo ki aaina ghash tumhein dekh kar na ho jae 
hijr-e-parda-nashin mein marte hain zindagi parda-e-dar na ho jae 
kasrat-e-sajda se wo naqsh-e-qadam kahin pamal-e-sar na ho jae 
mere taghir-e-rang ko mat dekh tujh ko apni nazar na ho jae 
mere aansu na ponchhna dekho kahin daman tar na ho jae 
baat naseh se karte Darta hun ki fughan be-asar na ho jae 
ai qayamat na aaiyo jab tak wo meri gor par na ho jae 
mana-e-zulm hai taghaful-e-yar baKHt-e-bad ko KHabar na ho jae 
ghair se be-hijab milte ho shab-e-ashiq sahar na ho jae 
rashk-e-dushman ka faeda malum muft ji ka zarar na ho jae 
ai dil aahista aah-e-tab-shikan dekh TukDe jigar na ho jae 
'momin' iman qubul dil se mujhe wo but aazurda gar na ho jae

dilāsā de vagarna aañkh ko girya pakaḌ legā tire jaate hī phir mujh ko ġham-e-duniyā pakaḌ legā 
safar go vāpsī kā hai magar tū saath rah mere mujhe ye ḳhauf hai mujh ko mirā saaya pakaḌ legā 
tū apne dil hī dil meñ bas mujhe āvāz detā rah samā.at ko mirī varna ye sannāTā pakaḌ legā 
nikalnā ghar se bāhar bhī alāmat hai tasādum kī jise tanhā.ī chhoḌegī use ḳhatra pakaḌ legā 
mire kho.e hue lamhe kahīñ se DhūñD kar lā do magar hushiyār rahnā paañv ko rasta pakaḌ legā 
agar maiñ lauT jā.ūñ ishq se pahle ke aalam meñ to us ke qurb se guzrā huā lamha pakaḌ legā 
tū ḳhud bhī jāgtā rah aur mujh ko bhī jagātā rah nahīñ to zindagī ko dūsrā qissa pakaḌ legā 
dilasa de wagarna aankh ko girya pakaD lega tere jate hi phir mujh ko gham-e-duniya pakaD lega 
safar go wapsi ka hai magar tu sath rah mere mujhe ye KHauf hai mujh ko mera saya pakaD lega 
tu apne dil hi dil mein bas mujhe aawaz deta rah samaat ko meri warna ye sannaTa pakaD lega 
nikalna ghar se bahar bhi alamat hai tasadum ki jise tanhai chhoDegi use KHatra pakaD lega 
mere khoe hue lamhe kahin se DhunD kar la do magar hushiyar rahna panw ko rasta pakaD lega 
agar main lauT jaun ishq se pahle ke aalam mein to us ke qurb se guzra hua lamha pakaD lega 
tu KHud bhi jagta rah aur mujh ko bhi jagata rah nahin to zindagi ko dusra qissa pakaD lega

ban ke duniyā kā tamāshā mo'atabar ho jā.eñge sab ko hañstā dekh kar ham chashm-e-tar ho jā.eñge 
mujh ko qadroñ ke badalne se ye hogā fā.eda mere jitne aib haiñ saare hunar ho jā.eñge 
aaj apne jism ko tū jis qadar chāhe chhupā rafta rafta tere kapḌe muḳhtasar ho jā.eñge 
rafta rafta un se uḌ jā.egī yakjā.ī kī bū aaj jo ghar meñ vo sab dīvār-o-dar ho jā.eñge 
aate jaate rahravoñ ko dekhtā huuñ is tarah raah chalte log jaise ham-safar ho jā.eñge 
aadmī ḳhud apne andar karbalā ban jā.egā saare jazbe ḳhair ke nezoñ pe sar ho jā.eñge 
garmi-e-raftār se vo aag hai zer-e-qadam mere naqsh-e-pā charāġh-e-rahguzar ho jā.eñge 
kaise qisse the ki chhiḌ jaa.eñ to uḌ jaatī thī niiñd kyā ḳhabar thī vo bhī harf-e-muḳhtasar ho jā.eñge 
kyā kaheñ aise taqāze haiñ mohabbat ke to ham apnī betābī se ham raqs-e-sharar ho jā.eñge 
ek saa.at aisī aa.egī ki ye vasl o firāq mere rañg-e-be-dilī se yak-digar ho jā.eñge 
kāḳh-o-kū-e-ahl-e-daulat kī binā hai ret par ik dhamāke se ye sab zer-o-zabar ho jā.eñge 
ye ajab shab hai unheñ sone na do varna 'salīm' ḳhvāb bachchoñ ke liye vahshat-asar ho jā.eñge 
ban ke duniya ka tamasha mo'atabar ho jaenge sab ko hansta dekh kar hum chashm-e-tar ho jaenge 
mujh ko qadron ke badalne se ye hoga faeda mere jitne aib hain sare hunar ho jaenge 
aaj apne jism ko tu jis qadar chahe chhupa rafta rafta tere kapDe muKHtasar ho jaenge 
rafta rafta un se uD jaegi yakjai ki bu aaj jo ghar mein wo sab diwar-o-dar ho jaenge 
aate jate rahrawon ko dekhta hun is tarah rah chalte log jaise ham-safar ho jaenge 
aadmi KHud apne andar karbala ban jaega sare jazbe KHair ke nezon pe sar ho jaenge 
garmi-e-raftar se wo aag hai zer-e-qadam mere naqsh-e-pa charagh-e-rahguzar ho jaenge 
kaise qisse the ki chhiD jaen to uD jati thi nind kya KHabar thi wo bhi harf-e-muKHtasar ho jaenge 
kya kahen aise taqaze hain mohabbat ke to hum apni betabi se hum raqs-e-sharar ho jaenge 
ek saat aisi aaegi ki ye wasl o firaq mere rang-e-be-dili se yak-digar ho jaenge 
kaKH-o-ku-e-ahl-e-daulat ki bina hai ret par ek dhamake se ye sab zer-o-zabar ho jaenge 
ye ajab shab hai unhen sone na do warna 'salim' KHwab bachchon ke liye wahshat-asar ho jaenge

yādoñ ke sab rañg uḌā kar tanhā huuñ apnī bastī se duur aa kar tanhā huuñ 
koī nahīñ hai mere jaisā chāroñ or apne gird ik bhiiḌ sajā kar tanhā huuñ 
jitne log haiñ utnī hī āvāzeñ haiñ lahjoñ kā tūfān uThā kar tanhā huuñ 
raushniyoñ ke aadī kaise jāneñge āñkhoñ meñ do diip jalā kar tanhā huuñ 
jis manzar se guzrī thī maiñ us ke saath aaj usī manzar men aa kar tanhā huuñ 
paanī kī lahroñ par bahtī āñkhoñ meñ kitne bhūle ḳhvāb jagā kar tanhā huuñ 
merā pyārā sāthī kab ye jānegā dariyā kī āġhosh tak aa kar tanhā huuñ 
apnā aap bhī kho dene kī ḳhvāhish meñ us kā bhī ik naam bhulā kar tanhā huuñ 
yaadon ke sab rang uDa kar tanha hun apni basti se dur aa kar tanha hun 
koi nahin hai mere jaisa chaaron or apne gird ek bhiD saja kar tanha hun 
jitne log hain utni hi aawazen hain lahjon ka tufan uTha kar tanha hun 
raushniyon ke aadi kaise jaanenge aankhon mein do dip jala kar tanha hun 
jis manzar se guzri thi main us ke sath aaj usi manzar mein aa kar tanha hun 
pani ki lahron par bahti aankhon mein kitne bhule KHwab jaga kar tanha hun 
mera pyara sathi kab ye jaanega dariya ki aaghosh tak aa kar tanha hun 
apna aap bhi kho dene ki KHwahish mein us ka bhi ek nam bhula kar tanha hun

husn-e-be-mehr ko parvā-e-tamannā kyā ho jab ho aisā to ilāj-e-dil-e-shaidā kyā ho 
kasrat-e-husn kī ye shaan na dekhī na sunī barq larzāñ hai koī garm-e-tamāshā kyā ho 
be-misālī ke haiñ ye rang jo bā-vasf-e-hijāb be-naqābī pe tirā jalva-e-yaktā kyā ho 
dekheñ ham bhī jo tire husn-e-dil-ārā kī bahār is meñ nuqsān tirā ai gul-e-rā'nā kyā ho 
ham ġharaz-mand kahāñ martaba-e-ishq kahāñ ham ko samjheñ vo havas-kār to bejā kyā ho 
dil-farebī hai tirī bā.is-e-sad josh o ḳharosh haal ye ho to dil-e-zār shakebā kyā ho 
raat din rahne lagī us sitam-ījād kī yaad 'hasrat' ab dekhiye anjām hamārā kyā ho 
husn-e-be-mehr ko parwa-e-tamanna kya ho jab ho aisa to ilaj-e-dil-e-shaida kya ho 
kasrat-e-husn ki ye shan na dekhi na suni barq larzan hai koi garm-e-tamasha kya ho 
be-misali ke hain ye rang jo ba-wasf-e-hijab be-naqabi pe tera jalwa-e-yakta kya ho 
dekhen hum bhi jo tere husn-e-dil-ara ki bahaar is mein nuqsan tera ai gul-e-ra'na kya ho 
hum gharaz-mand kahan martaba-e-ishq kahan hum ko samjhen wo hawas-kar to beja kya ho 
dil-farebi hai teri bais-e-sad josh o KHarosh haal ye ho to dil-e-zar shakeba kya ho 
raat din rahne lagi us sitam-ijad ki yaad 'hasrat' ab dekhiye anjam hamara kya ho

kyā ḳhabar thī rāz-e-dil apnā ayaañ ho jā.egā kyā ḳhabar thī aah kā shola zabāñ ho jā.egā 
hashr hone de sitamgar ham dikhā deñge tujhe pyārā pyārā ye garebāñ uñgliyāñ ho jā.egā 
raat bhar kī haiñ bahāreñ sham.a kyā parvāna kyā sub.h hote hote ruḳhsat kārvāñ ho jā.egā 
hashr meñ insāf hogā bas yahī sunte raho kuchh yahāñ hotā rahā hai kuchh vahāñ ho jā.egā 
is ko kahte haiñ jahāñ meñ log sachchī ulfateñ tiir jab dil se khichegā to kamāñ ho jā.egā 
aaḌī sīdhī paḌtī haiñ nazreñ tumhīñ par aaj to majma-e-tār-e-nazar kyā baddhiyāñ ho jā.egā 
hai yahī rañg-e-suḳhan to 'shā.ir' shīrīñ-zabāñ tū bhī ik din tūti-e-hindustāñ ho jā.egā 
kya KHabar thi raaz-e-dil apna ayan ho jaega kya KHabar thi aah ka shola zaban ho jaega 
hashr hone de sitamgar hum dikha denge tujhe pyara pyara ye gareban ungliyan ho jaega 
raat bhar ki hain bahaaren shama kya parwana kya subh hote hote ruKHsat karwan ho jaega 
hashr mein insaf hoga bas yahi sunte raho kuchh yahan hota raha hai kuchh wahan ho jaega 
is ko kahte hain jahan mein log sachchi ulfaten tir jab dil se khichega to kaman ho jaega 
aaDi sidhi paDti hain nazren tumhin par aaj to majma-e-tar-e-nazar kya baddhiyan ho jaega 
hai yahi rang-e-suKHan to 'shair' shirin-zaban tu bhi ek din tuti-e-hindustan ho jaega

āñdhī meñ charāġh jal rahe haiñ kyā log havā meñ pal rahe haiñ 
ai jaltī ruto gavāh rahnā ham nañge paañv chal rahe haiñ 
kohsāroñ pe barf jab se pighlī dariyā tevar badal rahe haiñ 
miTTī meñ abhī namī bahut hai paimāne hunūz Dhal rahe haiñ 
kah de koī jā ke tā.eroñ se chyūñTī ke bhī par nikal rahe haiñ 
kuchh ab ke hai dhuup meñ bhī tezī kuchh ham bhī sharar ugal rahe haiñ 
paanī pe zarā sambhal ke chalnā hastī ke qadam phisal rahe haiñ 
kah de ye koī musāfiroñ se shaam aa.ī hai saa.e Dhal rahe haiñ 
gardish meñ nahīñ zamīñ hī 'aḳhtar' ham bhī dabe paañv chal rahe haiñ 
aandhi mein charagh jal rahe hain kya log hawa mein pal rahe hain 
ai jalti ruto gawah rahna hum nange panw chal rahe hain 
kohsaron pe barf jab se pighli dariya tewar badal rahe hain 
miTTi mein abhi nami bahut hai paimane hunuz Dhal rahe hain 
kah de koi ja ke taeron se chyunTi ke bhi par nikal rahe hain 
kuchh ab ke hai dhup mein bhi tezi kuchh hum bhi sharar ugal rahe hain 
pani pe zara sambhal ke chalna hasti ke qadam phisal rahe hain 
kah de ye koi musafiron se sham aai hai sae Dhal rahe hain 
gardish mein nahin zamin hi 'aKHtar' hum bhi dabe panw chal rahe hain

kahāñ kī guuñj dil-e-nā-tavāñ meñ rahtī hai ki thartharī sī ajab jism-o-jāñ meñ rahtī hai 
qadam qadam pe vahī chashm o lab vahī gesū tamām umr nazar imtihāñ meñ rahtī hai 
maza to ye hai ki vo ḳhud to hai na.e ghar meñ aur us kī yaad purāne makāñ meñ rahtī hai 
pata to fasl-e-gul-o-lāla kā nahīñ mālūm sunā hai qurb-o-javār-e-ḳhizāñ meñ rahtī hai 
maiñ kitnā vahm karūñ lekin ik shuā-e-yaqīñ kahīñ navāh-e-dil-e-bad-gumāñ meñ rahtī hai 
hazār jaan khapātā rahūñ magar phir bhī kamī sī kuchh mire tarz-e-bayāñ meñ rahtī hai 
kahan ki gunj dil-e-na-tawan mein rahti hai ki tharthari si ajab jism-o-jaan mein rahti hai 
qadam qadam pe wahi chashm o lab wahi gesu tamam umr nazar imtihan mein rahti hai 
maza to ye hai ki wo KHud to hai nae ghar mein aur us ki yaad purane makan mein rahti hai 
pata to fasl-e-gul-o-lala ka nahin malum suna hai qurb-o-jawar-e-KHizan mein rahti hai 
main kitna wahm karun lekin ek shua-e-yaqin kahin nawah-e-dil-e-bad-guman mein rahti hai 
hazar jaan khapata rahun magar phir bhi kami si kuchh mere tarz-e-bayan mein rahti hai

dhuup ke saath gayā saath nibhāne vaalā ab kahāñ aa.egā vo lauT ke aane vaalā 
ret par chhoḌ gayā naqsh hazāroñ apne kisī pāgal kī tarah naqsh miTāne vaalā 
sabz shāḳheñ kabhī aise to nahīñ chīḳhtī haiñ kaun aayā hai parindoñ ko Darāne vaalā 
āriz-e-shām kī surḳhī ne kiyā faash use parda-e-abr meñ thā aag lagāne vaalā 
safar-e-shab kā taqāzā hai mire saath raho dasht pur-haul hai tūfān hai aane vaalā 
mujh ko dar-parda sunātā rahā qissa apnā agle vaqtoñ kī hikāyāt sunāne vaalā 
shabnamī ghaas ghane phuul laraztī kirneñ kaun aayā hai ḳhazānoñ ko luTāne vaalā 
ab to ārām kareñ sochtī āñkheñ merī raat kā āḳhirī taarā bhī hai jaane vaalā 
dhup ke sath gaya sath nibhane wala ab kahan aaega wo lauT ke aane wala 
ret par chhoD gaya naqsh hazaron apne kisi pagal ki tarah naqsh miTane wala 
sabz shaKHen kabhi aise to nahin chiKHti hain kaun aaya hai parindon ko Darane wala 
aariz-e-sham ki surKHi ne kiya fash use parda-e-abr mein tha aag lagane wala 
safar-e-shab ka taqaza hai mere sath raho dasht pur-haul hai tufan hai aane wala 
mujh ko dar-parda sunata raha qissa apna agle waqton ki hikayat sunane wala 
shabnami ghas ghane phul larazti kirnen kaun aaya hai KHazanon ko luTane wala 
ab to aaram karen sochti aankhen meri raat ka aaKHiri tara bhi hai jaane wala

kyā hue bād-e-bayābāñ ke pukāre hue log chāk-dar-chāk garebāñ ko sañvāre hue log 
ḳhuuñ huā dil ki pashemān-e-sadāqat hai vafā ḳhush huā jī ki chalo aaj tumhāre hue log 
ye bhī kyā rañg hai ai nargis-e-ḳhvāb-ālūda shahr meñ sab tire jaadū ke haiñ maare hue log 
ḳhatt-e-māzūlī-e-arbāb-e-sitam khīñch ga.e ye rasan-basta salīboñ se utāre hue log 
vaqt hī vo ḳhat-e-fāsil hai ki ai ham-nafaso duur hai mauj-e-balā aur kināre hue log 
ai harīfān-e-ġham-e-gardish-e-ayyām aao ek hī ġhol ke ham log haiñ haare hue log 
un ko ai narm havā ḳhvāb-e-junūñ se na jagā raat mai-ḳhāne kī aa.e haiñ guzāre hue log 
kya hue baad-e-bayaban ke pukare hue log chaak-dar-chaak gareban ko sanware hue log 
KHun hua dil ki pasheman-e-sadaqat hai wafa KHush hua ji ki chalo aaj tumhaare hue log 
ye bhi kya rang hai ai nargis-e-KHwab-aluda shahr mein sab tere jadu ke hain mare hue log 
KHatt-e-mazuli-e-arbab-e-sitam khinch gae ye rasan-basta salibon se utare hue log 
waqt hi wo KHat-e-fasil hai ki ai ham-nafaso dur hai mauj-e-bala aur kinare hue log 
ai harifan-e-gham-e-gardish-e-ayyam aao ek hi ghol ke hum log hain haare hue log 
un ko ai narm hawa KHwab-e-junun se na jaga raat mai-KHane ki aae hain guzare hue log

chhupā huā jo numūdār se nikal aayā ye farq bhī tire inkār se nikal aayā 
palaT paḌā jo maiñ sar phoḌ kar mohabbat meñ to rāsta isī dīvār se nikal aayā 
mujhe ḳharīdnā kuchh bhī na thā isī ḳhātir maiñ ḳhud ko bech ke bāzār se nikal aayā 
abhī to apne khañDar hī kī sair thī baaqī ye tū kahāñ mire āsār se nikal aayā 
bahut se aur tilismāt muntazir haiñ mire agar kabhī tire asrār se nikal aayā 
mujhe bhī de rahe the ḳhil.at-e-vafā lekin nazar bachā ke maiñ darbār se nikal aayā 
sire se jo kahīñ maujūd hī na thā āḳhir vo naqs bhī mire kirdār se nikal aayā 
na.ī fazā na.e āfāq haiñ usī ke liye jo aaj uḌtī huī Daar se nikal aayā 
usī ko ek ġhanīmat qarār dūñgā 'zafar' jo ek sher bhī tūmār se nikal aayā 
chhupa hua jo numudar se nikal aaya ye farq bhi tere inkar se nikal aaya 
palaT paDa jo main sar phoD kar mohabbat mein to rasta isi diwar se nikal aaya 
mujhe KHaridna kuchh bhi na tha isi KHatir main KHud ko bech ke bazar se nikal aaya 
abhi to apne khanDar hi ki sair thi baqi ye tu kahan mere aasar se nikal aaya 
bahut se aur tilismat muntazir hain mere agar kabhi tere asrar se nikal aaya 
mujhe bhi de rahe the KHilat-e-wafa lekin nazar bacha ke main darbar se nikal aaya 
sire se jo kahin maujud hi na tha aaKHir wo naqs bhi mere kirdar se nikal aaya 
nai faza nae aafaq hain usi ke liye jo aaj uDti hui Dar se nikal aaya 
usi ko ek ghanimat qarar dunga 'zafar' jo ek sher bhi tumar se nikal aaya

ghar se jaatā huuñ roz shaam se maiñ raat bhar ke programme se maiñ 
ai merī jān-e-intishār-pasand tañg huuñ tere intizām se maiñ 
ye jo laḌtā-jhagaḌtā huuñ sab se bach rahā huuñ qubūl-e-ām se maiñ 
maiñ utārā gayā thā arsh se aur farsh par gir paḌā dhaḌām se maiñ 
shakl kā lāhiqa nahīñ ham-rāh jaanā jaatā huuñ sirf naam se maiñ 
kyā kahūñ uubne lagā huuñ 'jamāl' ek hī jaise sub.h o shaam se maiñ 
ghar se jata hun roz sham se main raat bhar ke programme se main 
ai meri jaan-e-intishaar-pasand tang hun tere intizam se main 
ye jo laDta-jhagaDta hun sab se bach raha hun qubul-e-am se main 
main utara gaya tha arsh se aur farsh par gir paDa dhaDam se main 
shakl ka lahiqa nahin ham-rah jaana jata hun sirf nam se main 
kya kahun ubne laga hun 'jamal' ek hi jaise subh o sham se main

ai ajal ai jān-e-'fānī' tū ne ye kyā kar diyā maar Daalā marne vaale ko ki achchhā kar diyā 
jab tirā zikr aa gayā ham daf.atan chup ho ga.e vo chhupāyā rāz-e-dil ham ne ki ifshā kar diyā 
kis qadar be-zār thā dil mujh se zabt-e-shauq par jab kahā dil kā kiyā zālim ne rusvā kar diyā 
yuuñ churā.īñ us ne āñkheñ sādgī to dekhiye bazm meñ goyā mirī jānib ishārā kar diyā 
dardmandān-e-azal par ishq kā ehsāñ nahīñ dard yaañ dil se gayā kab thā ki paidā kar diyā 
dil ko pahlū se nikal jaane kī phir raT lag ga.ī phir kisī ne āñkhoñ āñkhoñ meñ taqāzā kar diyā 
ranj paayā dil diyā sach hai magar ye to kaho kyā kisī ne de ke paayā kis ne kyā pā kar diyā 
bach rahā thā ek āñsū-dār-o-gīr-e-zabt se joshish-e-ġham ne phir is qatre ko dariyā kar diyā 
'fānī'-e-mahjūr thā aaj ārzū-mand-e-ajal aap ne aa kar pashīmān-e-tamannā kar diyā 
ai ajal ai jaan-e-'fani' tu ne ye kya kar diya mar Dala marne wale ko ki achchha kar diya 
jab tera zikr aa gaya hum dafatan chup ho gae wo chhupaya raaz-e-dil hum ne ki ifsha kar diya 
kis qadar be-zar tha dil mujh se zabt-e-shauq par jab kaha dil ka kiya zalim ne ruswa kar diya 
yun churain us ne aankhen sadgi to dekhiye bazm mein goya meri jaanib ishaara kar diya 
dardmandan-e-azal par ishq ka ehsan nahin dard yan dil se gaya kab tha ki paida kar diya 
dil ko pahlu se nikal jaane ki phir raT lag gai phir kisi ne aankhon aankhon mein taqaza kar diya 
ranj paya dil diya sach hai magar ye to kaho kya kisi ne de ke paya kis ne kya pa kar diya 
bach raha tha ek aansu-dar-o-gir-e-zabt se joshish-e-gham ne phir is qatre ko dariya kar diya 
'fani'-e-mahjur tha aaj aarzu-mand-e-ajal aap ne aa kar pashiman-e-tamanna kar diya

raat apne ḳhvāb kī qīmat kā andāza huā ye sitāra niiñd kī tahzīb se paidā huā 
zehn kī zarḳhez miTTī se na.e chehre uge jo mirī yādoñ meñ zinda hai sarāsīma huā 
merī āñkhoñ meñ anokhe jurm kī tajvīz thī sirf dekhā thā use us kā badan mailā huā 
vo koī ḳhush-bū hai merī saañs meñ bahtī huī maiñ koī aañsū huuñ us kī ruuh meñ girtā huā 
us ke milne aur bichhaḌ jaane kā manzar ek hai kaun itne fāsloñ meñ be-hijāb aisā huā 
raat apne KHwab ki qimat ka andaza hua ye sitara nind ki tahzib se paida hua 
zehn ki zarKHez miTTi se nae chehre uge jo meri yaadon mein zinda hai sarasima hua 
meri aankhon mein anokhe jurm ki tajwiz thi sirf dekha tha use us ka badan maila hua 
wo koi KHush-bu hai meri sans mein bahti hui main koi aansu hun us ki ruh mein girta hua 
us ke milne aur bichhaD jaane ka manzar ek hai kaun itne faslon mein be-hijab aisa hua

raushnī rahtī thī dil meñ zaḳhm jab tak taaza thā ab jahāñ dīvār hai pahle vahāñ darvāza thā 
dard kī ik mauj har ḳhvāhish bahā kar le ga.ī kyā Thahartīñ bastiyāñ paanī hī be-andāza thā 
raat saarī ḳhvāb kī galiyoñ meñ ham chalte rahe khiḌkiyāñ raushan thiiñ lekin band har darvāza thā 
raushni rahti thi dil mein zaKHm jab tak taza tha ab jahan diwar hai pahle wahan darwaza tha 
dard ki ek mauj har KHwahish baha kar le gai kya Thahartin bastiyan pani hi be-andaza tha 
raat sari KHwab ki galiyon mein hum chalte rahe khiDkiyan raushan thin lekin band har darwaza tha

ham maut bhī aa.e to masrūr nahīñ hote majbūr-e-ġham itne bhī majbūr nahīñ hote 
dil hī meñ nahīñ rahte āñkhoñ meñ bhī rahte ho tum duur bhī rahte ho to duur nahīñ hote 
paḌtī haiñ abhī dil par sharmā.ī huī nazreñ jo vaar vo karte haiñ bharpūr nahīñ hote 
ummīd ke vādoñ se jī kuchh to bahaltā thā ab ye bhī tire ġham ko manzūr nahīñ hote 
arbāb-e-mohabbat par tum zulm ke baanī ho ye varna mohabbat ke dastūr nahīñ hote 
kaunain pe bhārī hai allāh re ġhurūr un kā itne bhī adā vaale maġhrūr nahīñ hote 
hai ishq tirā 'fānī' tash.hīr bhī shohrat bhī rusvā-e-mohabbat yuuñ mash.hūr nahīñ hote 
hum maut bhi aae to masrur nahin hote majbur-e-gham itne bhi majbur nahin hote 
dil hi mein nahin rahte aankhon mein bhi rahte ho tum dur bhi rahte ho to dur nahin hote 
paDti hain abhi dil par sharmai hui nazren jo war wo karte hain bharpur nahin hote 
ummid ke wadon se ji kuchh to bahalta tha ab ye bhi tere gham ko manzur nahin hote 
arbab-e-mohabbat par tum zulm ke bani ho ye warna mohabbat ke dastur nahin hote 
kaunain pe bhaari hai allah re ghurur un ka itne bhi ada wale maghrur nahin hote 
hai ishq tera 'fani' tashhir bhi shohrat bhi ruswa-e-mohabbat yun mashhur nahin hote

aa.ina sīna-e-sāhab-nazarāñ hai ki jo thā chehra-e-shāhid-e-maqsūd ayaañ hai ki jo thā 
ishq-e-gul meñ vahī bulbul kā fuġhāñ hai ki jo thā partav-e-mah se vahī hāl-e-katāñ hai ki jo thā 
ālam-e-husn ḳhudā-dād-e-butāñ hai ki jo thā nāz-o-andāz balā-e-dil-o-jāñ hai ki jo thā 
raah meñ terī shab-o-roz basar kartā huuñ vahī miil aur vahī sañg-e-nishāñ hai ki jo thā 
roz karte haiñ shab-e-hijr ko bedārī meñ apnī āñkhoñ meñ subuk ḳhvāb-e-girāñ hai ki jo thā 
ek aalam meñ ho har-chand masīhā mash.hūr nām-e-bīmār se tum ko ḳhafaqāñ hai ki jo thā 
daulat-e-ishq kā ganjīna vahī siina hai dāġh-e-dil zaḳhm-e-jigar mohr-o-nishāñ hai ki jo thā 
nāz-o-andāz-o-adā se tumheñ sharm aane lagī aarzī husn kā aalam vo kahāñ hai ki jo thā 
jaañ kī taskīñ ke liye hālat-e-dil kahte haiñ be yaqīnī kā tirī ham ko gumāñ hai ki jo thā 
asar-e-manzil-e-maqsūd nahīñ duniyā meñ raah meñ qāfila-e-reg-e-ravāñ hai ki jo thā 
dahan us rū-e-kitābī meñ hai par nā-paidā ism-e-āzam vahī qur.āñ meñ nihāñ hai ki jo thā 
ka.aba-e-madd-e-nazar qibla-numā hai tā-hāl kū-e-jānāñ kī taraf dil nigarāñ hai ki jo thā 
koh-o-sahrā-o-gulistāñ meñ phirā kartā hai mutalāshī vo tirā āb-e-ravāñ hai ki jo thā 
sozish-e-dil se tasalsul hai vahī aahoñ kā uud ke jalne se mujmir meñ dhuāñ hai ki jo thā 
raat kaT jaatī hai bāteñ vahī sunte sunte sham-e-mahfil sanam-e-charb-zabāñ hai ki jo thā 
pā-e-ḳham mastoñ ke hū-haq kā jo aalam hai so hai sar-e-mimbar vahī vaa.iz kā bayāñ hai ki jo thā 
kaun se din na.ī qabreñ nahīñ is meñ bantīñ ye ḳharāba vahī ibrat kā makāñ hai ki jo thā 
be-ḳhabar shauq se mere nahīñ vo nūr-e-nigāh qāsid-e-ashk shab-o-roz vahāñ hai ki jo thā 
lailatul-qadr kināya na shab-e-vasl se ho us kā afsāna miyān-e-ramazāñ hai ki jo thā 
dīn-o-duniyā kā talabgār hanūz 'ātish' hai ye gadā sā.il-e-nadq-e-do-jahāñ hai ki jo thā 
aaina sina-e-sahab-nazaran hai ki jo tha chehra-e-shahid-e-maqsud ayan hai ki jo tha 
ishq-e-gul mein wahi bulbul ka fughan hai ki jo tha partaw-e-mah se wahi haal-e-katan hai ki jo tha 
aalam-e-husn KHuda-dad-e-butan hai ki jo tha naz-o-andaz bala-e-dil-o-jaan hai ki jo tha 
rah mein teri shab-o-roz basar karta hun wahi mil aur wahi sang-e-nishan hai ki jo tha 
roz karte hain shab-e-hijr ko bedari mein apni aankhon mein subuk KHwab-e-giran hai ki jo tha 
ek aalam mein ho har-chand masiha mashhur nam-e-bimar se tum ko KHafaqan hai ki jo tha 
daulat-e-ishq ka ganjina wahi sina hai dagh-e-dil zaKHm-e-jigar mohr-o-nishan hai ki jo tha 
naz-o-andaz-o-ada se tumhein sharm aane lagi aarzi husn ka aalam wo kahan hai ki jo tha 
jaan ki taskin ke liye haalat-e-dil kahte hain be yaqini ka teri hum ko guman hai ki jo tha 
asar-e-manzil-e-maqsud nahin duniya mein rah mein qafila-e-reg-e-rawan hai ki jo tha 
dahan us ru-e-kitabi mein hai par na-paida ism-e-azam wahi quran mein nihan hai ki jo tha 
kaba-e-madd-e-nazar qibla-numa hai ta-haal ku-e-jaanan ki taraf dil nigaran hai ki jo tha 
koh-o-sahra-o-gulistan mein phira karta hai mutalashi wo tera aab-e-rawan hai ki jo tha 
sozish-e-dil se tasalsul hai wahi aahon ka ud ke jalne se mujmir mein dhuan hai ki jo tha 
raat kaT jati hai baaten wahi sunte sunte sham-e-mahfil sanam-e-charb-zaban hai ki jo tha 
pa-e-KHam maston ke hu-haq ka jo aalam hai so hai sar-e-mimbar wahi waiz ka bayan hai ki jo tha 
kaun se din nai qabren nahin is mein bantin ye KHaraba wahi ibrat ka makan hai ki jo tha 
be-KHabar shauq se mere nahin wo nur-e-nigah qasid-e-ashk shab-o-roz wahan hai ki jo tha 
lailatul-qadr kinaya na shab-e-wasl se ho us ka afsana miyan-e-ramazan hai ki jo tha 
din-o-duniya ka talabgar hanuz 'atish' hai ye gada sail-e-nadq-e-do-jahan hai ki jo tha

raushnī rañgoñ meñ simTā huā dhokā hī na ho maiñ jise jism samajhtā huuñ vo saayā hī na ho 
ā.īna TuuT gayā chuntā huuñ reza reza isī ā.īne meñ merā kahīñ chehrā hī na ho 
maiñ to dīvār ke is paar ravāñ huuñ kab se koī dīvār ke us paar bhī chaltā hī na ho 
vo jo suntā hai mirī baat baḌe ġhaur ke saath baad jaane ke mire mujh pe vo hañstā hī na ho 
jāgtī āñkhoñ meñ kyuuñ phailtā jaatā hai ḳhalā khā ga.ī hai jise duurī tirā rasta hī na ho 
moḌ har raah pe paañv se lipaT jaate haiñ vo mujhe chhoḌ ke chal de kahīñ aisā hī na ho 
us ke milne pe bhī mahsūs huā hai 'sarmad' us ne dekhā hī na ho maiñ ne bulāyā hī na ho 
raushni rangon mein simTa hua dhoka hi na ho main jise jism samajhta hun wo saya hi na ho 
aaina TuT gaya chunta hun reza reza isi aaine mein mera kahin chehra hi na ho 
main to diwar ke is par rawan hun kab se koi diwar ke us par bhi chalta hi na ho 
wo jo sunta hai meri baat baDe ghaur ke sath baad jaane ke mere mujh pe wo hansta hi na ho 
jagti aankhon mein kyun phailta jata hai KHala kha gai hai jise duri tera rasta hi na ho 
moD har rah pe panw se lipaT jate hain wo mujhe chhoD ke chal de kahin aisa hi na ho 
us ke milne pe bhi mahsus hua hai 'sarmad' us ne dekha hi na ho main ne bulaya hi na ho

paane kī tarah kā na to khone kī tarah kā honā bhī yahāñ par hai na hone kī tarah kā 
ma.alūm nahīñ niiñd kise kahte haiñ lekin kartā to huuñ ik kaam maiñ sone kī tarah kā 
hañsne kī tarah kā koī mausam mire bāhar manzar mire andar koī rone kī tarah kā 
aisī koī hālat hai ki muddat se badan ko ik marhala darpesh hai Dhone kī tarah kā 
pahle kī tarah aadmī miltā to hai lekin aadhe kī tarah kā kabhī paune kī tarah kā 
pane ki tarah ka na to khone ki tarah ka hona bhi yahan par hai na hone ki tarah ka 
malum nahin nind kise kahte hain lekin karta to hun ek kaam main sone ki tarah ka 
hansne ki tarah ka koi mausam mere bahar manzar mere andar koi rone ki tarah ka 
aisi koi haalat hai ki muddat se badan ko ek marhala darpesh hai Dhone ki tarah ka 
pahle ki tarah aadmi milta to hai lekin aadhe ki tarah ka kabhi paune ki tarah ka

so.e hue palañg ke saa.e jagā gayā khiḌkī khulī to āsmāñ kamre meñ aa gayā 
āñgan meñ terī yaad kā jhoñkā jo aa gayā tanhā.ī ke daraḳht se patte uḌā gayā 
hañste chamakte ḳhvāb ke chehre bhī miT ga.e battī jalī to man meñ añdherā sā chhā gayā 
aayā thā kaale ḳhuun kā sailāb pichhlī raat barsoñ purānī jism kī dīvār Dhā gayā 
tasvīr meñ jo qaid thā vo shaḳhs raat ko ḳhud hī frame toḌ ke pahlū meñ aa gayā 
vo chaa.e pī rahā thā kisī dūsre ke saath mujh par nigāh paḌte hī kuchh jheñp sā gayā 
soe hue palang ke sae jaga gaya khiDki khuli to aasman kamre mein aa gaya 
aangan mein teri yaad ka jhonka jo aa gaya tanhai ke daraKHt se patte uDa gaya 
hanste chamakte KHwab ke chehre bhi miT gae batti jali to man mein andhera sa chha gaya 
aaya tha kale KHun ka sailab pichhli raat barson purani jism ki diwar Dha gaya 
taswir mein jo qaid tha wo shaKHs raat ko KHud hi frame toD ke pahlu mein aa gaya 
wo chae pi raha tha kisi dusre ke sath mujh par nigah paDte hi kuchh jhenp sa gaya

jab dil meñ tire ġham ne hasrat kī binā Daalī duniyā mirī rāhat kī qismat ne miTā Daalī 
ab barq-e-nasheman ko har shāḳh se kyā matlab jis shāḳh ko taakā thā vo shāḳh jalā Daalī 
iz.hār-e-mohabbat kī hasrat ko ḳhudā samjhe ham ne ye kahānī bhī sau baar sunā Daalī 
jiine bhī nahīñ dete marne bhī nahīñ dete kyā tum ne mohabbat kī har rasm uThā Daalī 
jiine meñ na ab 'fānī' marne meñ shumār apnā mātam kī bisāt us ne kyā kah ke uThā Daalī 
jab dil mein tere gham ne hasrat ki bina Dali duniya meri rahat ki qismat ne miTa Dali 
ab barq-e-nasheman ko har shaKH se kya matlab jis shaKH ko taka tha wo shaKH jala Dali 
izhaar-e-mohabbat ki hasrat ko KHuda samjhe hum ne ye kahani bhi sau bar suna Dali 
jine bhi nahin dete marne bhi nahin dete kya tum ne mohabbat ki har rasm uTha Dali 
jine mein na ab 'fani' marne mein shumar apna matam ki bisat us ne kya kah ke uTha Dali

havā ke saath ye kaisā mo.āmla huā hai bujhā chukī thī jise vo diyā jalā huā hai 
huzūr aap koī faisla kareñ to sahī haiñ sar jhuke hue darbār bhī lagā huā hai 
khaḌe haiñ sāmne kab se magar nahīñ paḌhte vo ek lafz jo dīvār par likhā huā hai 
hai kis kā aks jo dekhā hai ā.īne se alag ye kaisā naqsh hai jo ruuh par banā huā hai 
ye kis kā ḳhvāb hai tābīr ke ta.āqub meñ ye kaisā ashk hai jo ḳhaak meñ milā huā hai 
ye kis kī yaad kī bārish meñ bhīgtā hai badan ye kaisā phuul sar-e-shāḳh-e-jāñ khilā huā hai 
sitāra TūTte dekhā to Dar ga.ī 'rāhat' ḳhabar na thī yahī taqdīr meñ likhā huā hai 
hawa ke sath ye kaisa moamla hua hai bujha chuki thi jise wo diya jala hua hai 
huzur aap koi faisla karen to sahi hain sar jhuke hue darbar bhi laga hua hai 
khaDe hain samne kab se magar nahin paDhte wo ek lafz jo diwar par likha hua hai 
hai kis ka aks jo dekha hai aaine se alag ye kaisa naqsh hai jo ruh par bana hua hai 
ye kis ka KHwab hai tabir ke taaqub mein ye kaisa ashk hai jo KHak mein mila hua hai 
ye kis ki yaad ki barish mein bhigta hai badan ye kaisa phul sar-e-shaKH-e-jaan khila hua hai 
sitara TuTte dekha to Dar gai 'rahat' KHabar na thi yahi taqdir mein likha hua hai

imtihāñ ham ne diye is dār-e-fānī meñ bahut rañj khīñche ham ne apnī lā-makānī meñ bahut 
vo nahīñ us sā to hai ḳhvāb-e-bahār-e-jāvedāñ asl kī ḳhushbū uḌī hai us ke saanī meñ bahut 
raat din ke aane jaane meñ ye sonā jāgnā fikr vāloñ ko pate haiñ is nishānī meñ bahut 
koyaleñ kūkīñ bahut dīvār-e-gulshan kī taraf chāñd damkā hauz ke shaffāf paanī meñ bahut 
us ko kyā yādeñ thiiñ kyā aur kis jagah par rah ga.iiñ tez hai dariyā-e-dil apnī ravānī meñ bahut 
aaj us mahfil meñ tujh ko bolte dekhā 'munīr' to ki jo mash.hūr thā yuuñ be-zabānī meñ bahut 
imtihan hum ne diye is dar-e-fani mein bahut ranj khinche hum ne apni la-makani mein bahut 
wo nahin us sa to hai KHwab-e-bahaar-e-jawedan asl ki KHushbu uDi hai us ke sani mein bahut 
raat din ke aane jaane mein ye sona jagna fikr walon ko pate hain is nishani mein bahut 
koyalen kukin bahut diwar-e-gulshan ki taraf chand damka hauz ke shaffaf pani mein bahut 
us ko kya yaaden thin kya aur kis jagah par rah gain tez hai dariya-e-dil apni rawani mein bahut 
aaj us mahfil mein tujh ko bolte dekha 'munir' to ki jo mashhur tha yun be-zabani mein bahut

asl hālat kā bayāñ zāhir ke sāñchoñ meñ nahīñ baat jo dil meñ hai mere mere lafzoñ meñ nahīñ 
ik zamāna thā ki ik duniyā mire hamrāh thī aur ab dekhūñ to rasta bhī nigāhoñ meñ nahīñ 
koī āseb-e-balā hai shahr par chhāyā huā bū-e-ādam-zād tak ḳhālī makānoñ meñ nahīñ 
rafta rafta sab hamārī raah par aate ga.e baat hai jo ham buroñ meñ achchhe achchhoñ meñ nahīñ 
apne hī dam se charāġhāñ hai vagarna 'āftāb' ik sitāra bhī mirī vīrān shāmoñ meñ nahīñ 
asl haalat ka bayan zahir ke sanchon mein nahin baat jo dil mein hai mere mere lafzon mein nahin 
ek zamana tha ki ek duniya mere hamrah thi aur ab dekhun to rasta bhi nigahon mein nahin 
koi aaseb-e-bala hai shahr par chhaya hua bu-e-adam-zad tak KHali makanon mein nahin 
rafta rafta sab hamari rah par aate gae baat hai jo hum buron mein achchhe achchhon mein nahin 
apne hi dam se charaghan hai wagarna 'aftab' ek sitara bhi meri viran shamon mein nahin

siyahkār the bā-safā ho ga.e ham tire ishq meñ kyā se kyā ho ga.e ham 
na jaanā ki shauq aur bhaḌkegā merā vo samjhe ki us se judā ho ga.e ham 
dam-e-vāpsīñ aa.e pursish ko nāhaq bas ab jaao tum se ḳhafā ho ga.e ham 
hue mahv kis kī tamannā meñ aise ki mustaġhni-e-mā-sivā ho ga.e ham 
unheñ ranj ab kyuuñ huā ham to ḳhush haiñ ki mar kar shahīd-e-vafā ho ga.e ham 
jab un se adab ne na kuchh muñh se māñgā to ik paikar-e-iltijā ho ga.e ham 
tirī fikr kā mubtilā ho gayā dil magar qaid-e-ġham se rihā ho ga.e ham 
fanā ho ke rāh-e-mohabbat meñ 'hasrat' sazā-vār-e-ḳhuld-e-baqā ho ga.e ham 
siyahkar the ba-safa ho gae hum tere ishq mein kya se kya ho gae hum 
na jaana ki shauq aur bhaDkega mera wo samjhe ki us se juda ho gae hum 
dam-e-wapsin aae pursish ko nahaq bas ab jao tum se KHafa ho gae hum 
hue mahw kis ki tamanna mein aise ki mustaghni-e-ma-siwa ho gae hum 
unhen ranj ab kyun hua hum to KHush hain ki mar kar shahid-e-wafa ho gae hum 
jab un se adab ne na kuchh munh se manga to ek paikar-e-iltija ho gae hum 
teri fikr ka mubtila ho gaya dil magar qaid-e-gham se riha ho gae hum 
fana ho ke rah-e-mohabbat mein 'hasrat' saza-war-e-KHuld-e-baqa ho gae hum

hameñ sab ahl-e-havas nā-pasand rakhte haiñ ki ham navā-e-mohabbat buland rakhte haiñ 
isī liye to ḳhafā haiñ sitam-shi.ār ki ham nigāh-e-narm o dil-e-dardmand rakhte haiñ 
agarche dil vahī raj.at-pasand hai apnā magar zabān taraqqī-pasand rakhte haiñ 
ham aise arsh-nashīnoñ se vo daraḳht achchhe jo āñdhiyoñ meñ bhī sar ko buland rakhte haiñ 
chale ho dekhne 'mushtāq' jin ko pichhlī raat vo log shaam se darvāza band rakhte haiñ 
hamein sab ahl-e-hawas na-pasand rakhte hain ki hum nawa-e-mohabbat buland rakhte hain 
isi liye to KHafa hain sitam-shiar ki hum nigah-e-narm o dil-e-dardmand rakhte hain 
agarche dil wahi rajat-pasand hai apna magar zaban taraqqi-pasand rakhte hain 
hum aise arsh-nashinon se wo daraKHt achchhe jo aandhiyon mein bhi sar ko buland rakhte hain 
chale ho dekhne 'mushtaq' jin ko pichhli raat wo log sham se darwaza band rakhte hain

sāzgār hai hamdam in dinoñ jahāñ apnā ishq shādmāñ apnā shauq kāmrāñ apnā 
aah be-asar kis kī naala nā-rasā kis kā kaam bār-hā aayā jazba-e-nihāñ apnā 
kab kiyā thā is dil par husn ne karam itnā mehrbāñ aur is darja kab thā āsmāñ apnā 
uljhanoñ se ghabrā.e mai-kade meñ dar aa.e kis qadar tan-āsāñ hai zauq-e-rā.egāñ apnā 
kuchh na pūchh ai hamdam in dinoñ mirā aalam mutrib-e-hasīñ apnā sāqi-e-javāñ apnā 
ishq aur rusvā.ī kaun sī na.ī shai hai ishq to azal se thā rusvā-e-jahāñ apnā 
tum 'majāz' dīvāne maslahat se begāne varna ham banā lete tum ko rāz-dāñ apnā 
sazgar hai hamdam in dinon jahan apna ishq shadman apna shauq kaamran apna 
aah be-asar kis ki nala na-rasa kis ka kaam bar-ha aaya jazba-e-nihan apna 
kab kiya tha is dil par husn ne karam itna mehrban aur is darja kab tha aasman apna 
uljhanon se ghabrae mai-kade mein dar aae kis qadar tan-asan hai zauq-e-raegan apna 
kuchh na puchh ai hamdam in dinon mera aalam mutrib-e-hasin apna saqi-e-jawan apna 
ishq aur ruswai kaun si nai shai hai ishq to azal se tha ruswa-e-jahan apna 
tum 'majaz' diwane maslahat se begane warna hum bana lete tum ko raaz-dan apna

manzar kī dīvār ke pīchhe ik manzar kaalī chādar se muñh Dhāñpe ik manzar 
maiñ jaise hī ik manzar taḳhlīq karūñ aa kar fauran us ko kaaTe ik manzar 
chehra paḌhnā chāhūñ to ojhal ho jaa.e duur khaḌā phir haath hilā.e ik manzar 
ik manzar chāqū se guude jism mirā phir aa kar zaḳhmoñ ko chāTe ik manzar 
ik manzar meñ saañp gale se aa lipTe phir rag rag meñ zahr utāre ik manzar 
biich bhañvar surāḳhoñ vaalī ik kashtī mujhe mirī pahchān karā.e ik manzar 
kab tak āñkheñ nīchī kar ke guzroge aate jaate raah meñ Toke ik manzar 
dhartī aur ākāsh pareshāñ donoñ haiñ ek sā aalam uupar nīche ik manzar 
ho saktā hai ik manzar kā ho jā.ūñ aa kar āñkhoñ meñ chubh jaa.e ik manzar 
manzar ki diwar ke pichhe ek manzar kali chadar se munh Dhanpe ek manzar 
main jaise hi ek manzar taKHliq karun aa kar fauran us ko kaTe ek manzar 
chehra paDhna chahun to ojhal ho jae dur khaDa phir hath hilae ek manzar 
ek manzar chaqu se gude jism mera phir aa kar zaKHmon ko chaTe ek manzar 
ek manzar mein sanp gale se aa lipTe phir rag rag mein zahr utare ek manzar 
bich bhanwar suraKHon wali ek kashti mujhe meri pahchan karae ek manzar 
kab tak aankhen nichi kar ke guzroge aate jate rah mein Toke ek manzar 
dharti aur aakash pareshan donon hain ek sa aalam upar niche ek manzar 
ho sakta hai ek manzar ka ho jaun aa kar aankhon mein chubh jae ek manzar

mohabbat kī gavāhī apne hone kī ḳhabar le jā jidhar vo shaḳhs rahtā hai mujhe ai dil! udhar le jā 
sajī hai bazm-e-shabnam to tabassum kaam aa.egā ta.āruf phuul kā darpesh hai to chashm-e-tar le jā 
añdhere meñ gayā vo raushnī meñ lauT aa.egā diyā jo dil meñ jaltā hai usī ko baam par le jā 
uḌānoñ āsmānoñ āshiyānoñ ke liye tā.ir! ye par TuuTe hue mere ye meyār-e-nazar le jā 
zamānoñ ko uḌāneñ barq ko raftār detā thā magar mujh se kahā Thahre hue shām-o-sahar le jā 
koī muñh pher letā hai to 'qāsir' ab shikāyat kyā tujhe kis ne kahā thā aa.ine ko toḌ kar le jā 
mohabbat ki gawahi apne hone ki KHabar le ja jidhar wo shaKHs rahta hai mujhe ai dil! udhar le ja 
saji hai bazm-e-shabnam to tabassum kaam aaega taaruf phul ka darpesh hai to chashm-e-tar le ja 
andhere mein gaya wo raushni mein lauT aaega diya jo dil mein jalta hai usi ko baam par le ja 
uDanon aasmanon aashiyanon ke liye tair! ye par TuTe hue mere ye meyar-e-nazar le ja 
zamanon ko uDanen barq ko raftar deta tha magar mujh se kaha Thahre hue sham-o-sahar le ja 
koi munh pher leta hai to 'qasir' ab shikayat kya tujhe kis ne kaha tha aaine ko toD kar le ja

har chiiz se māvarā ḳhudā hai duniyā kā ajiib silsila hai 
kyā aa.e nazar ki rāstoñ meñ sadiyoñ kā ġhubār uḌ rahā hai 
jitnī ki qarīb-tar hai duniyā utnā hī tavīl fāsla hai 
alfāz meñ band haiñ ma.ānī unvān-e-kitāb-e-dil khulā hai 
kāñToñ meñ gulāb khil rahe haiñ zehnoñ meñ alaao jal rahā hai 
har chiz se mawara KHuda hai duniya ka ajib silsila hai 
kya aae nazar ki raston mein sadiyon ka ghubar uD raha hai 
jitni ki qarib-tar hai duniya utna hi tawil fasla hai 
alfaz mein band hain maani unwan-e-kitab-e-dil khula hai 
kanTon mein gulab khil rahe hain zehnon mein alao jal raha hai

yahī nahīñ ki nazar ko jhukānā paḌtā hai palak uThā.ūñ to ik tāziyāna paḌtā hai 
vo saath meñ hai magar sab amānateñ de kar tamām bojh hamīñ ko uThānā paḌtā hai 
maiñ us dayār meñ bhejā gayā huuñ sar de kar qadam qadam pe jahāñ āstāna paḌtā hai 
añdherā itnā hai ab shahr ke muhāfiz ko har ek raat koī ghar jalānā paḌtā hai 
tamām bazm ḳhafā hai magar na jaane kyuuñ mushā.ire meñ 'shafaq' ko bulānā paḌtā hai 
yahi nahin ki nazar ko jhukana paDta hai palak uThaun to ek taziyana paDta hai 
wo sath mein hai magar sab amanaten de kar tamam bojh hamin ko uThana paDta hai 
main us dayar mein bheja gaya hun sar de kar qadam qadam pe jahan aastana paDta hai 
andhera itna hai ab shahr ke muhafiz ko har ek raat koi ghar jalana paDta hai 
tamam bazm KHafa hai magar na jaane kyun mushaire mein 'shafaq' ko bulana paDta hai

sāqi-e-gulfām bā-sad ehtimām aa hī gayā naġhma bar lab ḳhum ba sar baada ba jaam aa hī gayā 
apnī nazroñ meñ nashāt-e-jalva-e-ḳhūbāñ liye ḳhalvati-e-ḳhās sū-e-bazm-e-ām aa hī gayā 
merī duniyā jagmagā uTThī kisī ke nuur se mere gardūñ par mirā māh-e-tamām aa hī gayā 
jhuum jhuum uTThe shajar kaliyoñ ne āñkheñ khol diiñ jānib-e-gulshan koī mast-e-ḳhirām aa hī gayā 
phir kisī ke sāmne chashm-e-tamannā jhuk ga.ī shauq kī shoḳhī meñ rañg-e-ehtarām aa hī gayā 
merī shab ab merī shab hai merā baada mere jaam vo mirā sarv-e-ravāñ māh-e-tamām aa hī gayā 
bār-hā aisā huā hai yaad tak dil meñ na thī bār-hā mastī meñ lab par un kā naam aa hī gayā 
zindagī ke ḳhāka-e-sāda ko rañgīñ kar diyā husn kaam aa.e na aa.e ishq kaam aa hī gayā 
khul ga.ī thī saaf gardūñ kī haqīqat ai 'majāz' ḳhairiyat guzrī ki shāhīñ zer-e-dām aa hī gayā 
saqi-e-gulfam ba-sad ehtimam aa hi gaya naghma bar lab KHum ba sar baada ba jam aa hi gaya 
apni nazron mein nashat-e-jalwa-e-KHuban liye KHalwati-e-KHas su-e-bazm-e-am aa hi gaya 
meri duniya jagmaga uTThi kisi ke nur se mere gardun par mera mah-e-tamam aa hi gaya 
jhum jhum uTThe shajar kaliyon ne aankhen khol din jaanib-e-gulshan koi mast-e-KHiram aa hi gaya 
phir kisi ke samne chashm-e-tamanna jhuk gai shauq ki shoKHi mein rang-e-ehtaram aa hi gaya 
meri shab ab meri shab hai mera baada mere jam wo mera sarw-e-rawan mah-e-tamam aa hi gaya 
bar-ha aisa hua hai yaad tak dil mein na thi bar-ha masti mein lab par un ka nam aa hi gaya 
zindagi ke KHaka-e-sada ko rangin kar diya husn kaam aae na aae ishq kaam aa hi gaya 
khul gai thi saf gardun ki haqiqat ai 'majaz' KHairiyat guzri ki shahin zer-e-dam aa hi gaya

hijāb duur tumhārā shabāb kar degā ye vo nasha hai tumheñ be-hijāb kar degā 
mirā ḳhayāl mujhe kāmyāb kar degā ḳhudā isī ko zuleḳhā kā ḳhvāb kar degā 
mirī duā ko ḳhudā mustajāb kar degā tirā ġhurūr mujhe kāmyāb kar degā 
ye daaġh khaa.e haiñ jis ke firāq meñ ham ne vo ik nazar meñ unheñ āftāb kar degā 
kiyā hai jis ke laḌakpan ne dil mirā TukḌe kaleja ḳhuun ab us kā shabāb kar degā 
sunī nahīñ ye masal ghar kā bhedī lanka Dhaa.e tujhe to dil kī ḳhabar iztirāb kar degā 
na dekhnā kabhī ā.īna bhuul kar dekho tumhāre husn kā paidā javāb kar degā 
kisī ke hijr meñ is dard se duā māñgī nidā.eñ aa.iiñ ḳhudā kāmyāb kar degā 
ġham-e-firāq meñ girye ko shaġhl samjhā thā ḳhabar na thī mirī miTTī ḳharāb kar degā 
kise ḳhabar thī tire zulm ke liye allāh mujhī ko roz-e-azal intiḳhāb kar degā 
uThā na hashr ke fitna ko chaal se nādāñ tire shahīd kā be-lutf ḳhvāb kar degā 
vo gāliyāñ hameñ deñ aur ham duā.eñ deñ ḳhajil unheñ ye hamārā javāb kar degā 
javāb-e-sāf na de mujh ko ye vo aafat hai mire sukūn ko bhī iztirāb kar degā 
kahīñ chhupā.e se chhuptā hai laal gudḌī meñ faroġh-e-husn tujhe be-naqāb kar degā 
tirī nigāh se baḌh kar hai charḳh kī gardish mujhe tabāh ye ḳhāna-ḳharāb kar degā 
Dubo.egī mujhe ye chashm-e-tar mohabbat meñ ḳharāb kaam mirā iztirāb kar degā 
raqīb naam na le ishq kā jatā denā ye shola vo hai jalā kar kabāb kar degā 
vafā to ḳhaak karegā mirā udū tum se vafā ke naam kī miTTī ḳharāb kar degā 
ajiib shaḳhs hai pīr-e-muġhāñ se mil zāhid nashe meñ chuur tujhe be-sharāb kar degā 
baḌoñ kī baat baḌī hai hameñ nahīñ bāvar jo āsmāñ se na hogā habāb kar degā 
bhalā.ī apnī hai sab kī bhalā.ī meñ 'beḳhud' kabhī hameñ bhī ḳhudā kāmyāb kar degā 
hijab dur tumhaara shabab kar dega ye wo nasha hai tumhein be-hijab kar dega 
mera KHayal mujhe kaamyab kar dega KHuda isi ko zuleKHa ka KHwab kar dega 
meri dua ko KHuda mustajab kar dega tera ghurur mujhe kaamyab kar dega 
ye dagh khae hain jis ke firaq mein hum ne wo ek nazar mein unhen aaftab kar dega 
kiya hai jis ke laDakpan ne dil mera TukDe kaleja KHun ab us ka shabab kar dega 
suni nahin ye masal ghar ka bhedi lanka Dhae tujhe to dil ki KHabar iztirab kar dega 
na dekhna kabhi aaina bhul kar dekho tumhaare husn ka paida jawab kar dega 
kisi ke hijr mein is dard se dua mangi nidaen aain KHuda kaamyab kar dega 
gham-e-firaq mein girye ko shaghl samjha tha KHabar na thi meri miTTi KHarab kar dega 
kise KHabar thi tere zulm ke liye allah mujhi ko roz-e-azal intiKHab kar dega 
uTha na hashr ke fitna ko chaal se nadan tere shahid ka be-lutf KHwab kar dega 
wo galiyan hamein den aur hum duaen den KHajil unhen ye hamara jawab kar dega 
jawab-e-saf na de mujh ko ye wo aafat hai mere sukun ko bhi iztirab kar dega 
kahin chhupae se chhupta hai lal gudDi mein farogh-e-husn tujhe be-naqab kar dega 
teri nigah se baDh kar hai charKH ki gardish mujhe tabah ye KHana-KHarab kar dega 
Duboegi mujhe ye chashm-e-tar mohabbat mein KHarab kaam mera iztirab kar dega 
raqib nam na le ishq ka jata dena ye shola wo hai jala kar kabab kar dega 
wafa to KHak karega mera udu tum se wafa ke nam ki miTTi KHarab kar dega 
ajib shaKHs hai pir-e-mughan se mil zahid nashe mein chur tujhe be-sharab kar dega 
baDon ki baat baDi hai hamein nahin bawar jo aasman se na hoga habab kar dega 
bhalai apni hai sab ki bhalai mein 'beKHud' kabhi hamein bhi KHuda kaamyab kar dega

ik pal kī dauḌ dhuup meñ aisā thakā badan maiñ ḳhud to jāgtā huuñ magar so gayā badan 
bachcha bhī dekh le to humak kar lapak paḌe aisī hī ek chiiz hai vo dūdhiyā badan 
jī chāhtā hai haath lagā kar bhī dekh leñ us kā badan qabā hai ki us kī qabā badan 
jab se chalā hai tañg qamīsoñ kā ye rivāj nā-āshnā badan bhī lage āshnā badan 
gañgā ke pāniyoñ sā pavitra kaheñ jise āñkhoñ ke taT pe tairtā hai jo gayā badan 
bistar pe tere mere sivā aur kaun hai mahsūs ho rahā hai koī tīsrā badan 
dhartī ne mausamoñ kā asar kar liyā qubūl rut phir ga.ī to ho gayā us kā harā badan 
is ko kahāñ kahāñ se rafū kījiye 'nazar' behtar yahī hai oḌhiye ab dūsrā badan 
ek pal ki dauD dhup mein aisa thaka badan main KHud to jagta hun magar so gaya badan 
bachcha bhi dekh le to humak kar lapak paDe aisi hi ek chiz hai wo dudhiya badan 
ji chahta hai hath laga kar bhi dekh len us ka badan qaba hai ki us ki qaba badan 
jab se chala hai tang qamison ka ye riwaj na-ashna badan bhi lage aashna badan 
ganga ke paniyon sa pawitra kahen jise aankhon ke taT pe tairta hai jo gaya badan 
bistar pe tere mere siwa aur kaun hai mahsus ho raha hai koi tisra badan 
dharti ne mausamon ka asar kar liya qubul rut phir gai to ho gaya us ka hara badan 
is ko kahan kahan se rafu kijiye 'nazar' behtar yahi hai oDhiye ab dusra badan

tuur thā ka.aba thā dil thā jalva-zār-e-yār thā ishq sab kuchh thā magar phir ālam-e-asrār thā 
nashsha-e-sad-jām kaif-e-intizār-e-yār thā hijr meñ Thahrā huā dil sāġhar-e-sarshār thā 
alvidā.a ai bazm-e-anjum hijr kī shab al-firāq tā-ba-daur-e-zindagānī intizār-e-yār thā 
ek adā se be-niyāz-e-qurb-o-dūrī kar diyā māvrā-e-vasl-o-hijrāñ husn kā iqrār thā 
jauhar-e-ā.īna-e-ālam bane aañsū mire yuuñ to sach ye hai ki ronā ishq meñ bekār thā 
shoḳhī-e-raftār vaj.h-e-hastī-e-barbād thī zindagī kyā thī ġhubār-e-rahguzār-e-yār thā 
ulfat-e-derīna kā jab zikr ishāroñ meñ kiyā muskurā kar mujh se pūchhā tum ko kis se pyaar thā 
dil-dukhe ro.e haiñ shāyad is jagah ai kū-e-dost ḳhaak kā itnā chamak jaanā zarā dushvār thā 
zarra zarra aa.ina thā ḳhud-numā.ī kā 'firāq' sar-ba-sar sahrā-e-ālam jalva-zār-e-yār thā 
tur tha kaba tha dil tha jalwa-zar-e-yar tha ishq sab kuchh tha magar phir aalam-e-asrar tha 
nashsha-e-sad-jam kaif-e-intizar-e-yar tha hijr mein Thahra hua dil saghar-e-sarshaar tha 
alwidaa ai bazm-e-anjum hijr ki shab al-firaq ta-ba-daur-e-zindagani intizar-e-yar tha 
ek ada se be-niyaz-e-qurb-o-duri kar diya mawra-e-wasl-o-hijran husn ka iqrar tha 
jauhar-e-aina-e-alam bane aansu mere yun to sach ye hai ki rona ishq mein bekar tha 
shoKHi-e-raftar wajh-e-hasti-e-barbaad thi zindagi kya thi ghubar-e-rahguzar-e-yar tha 
ulfat-e-derina ka jab zikr ishaaron mein kiya muskura kar mujh se puchha tum ko kis se pyar tha 
dil-dukhe roe hain shayad is jagah ai ku-e-dost KHak ka itna chamak jaana zara dushwar tha 
zarra zarra aaina tha KHud-numai ka 'firaq' sar-ba-sar sahra-e-alam jalwa-zar-e-yar tha

na bahte ashk to tāsīr meñ sivā hote sadaf meñ rahte ye motī to be-bahā hote 
mujh aise rind se rakhte zarūr hī ulfat janāb-e-shaiḳh agar āshiq-e-ḳhudā hote 
gunāhgāroñ ne dekhā jamāl-e-rahmat ko kahāñ nasīb ye hotā jo be-ḳhatā hote 
janāb-e-hazrat-e-nāseh kā vaah kyā kahnā jo ek baat na hotī to auliyā hote 
mazāq-e-ishq nahīñ sheḳh meñ ye hai afsos ye chāshnī bhī jo hotī to kyā se kyā hote 
mahall-e-shukr haiñ 'akbar' ye darafshāñ nazmeñ har ik zabāñ ko ye motī nahīñ atā hote 
na bahte ashk to tasir mein siwa hote sadaf mein rahte ye moti to be-baha hote 
mujh aise rind se rakhte zarur hi ulfat janab-e-shaiKH agar aashiq-e-KHuda hote 
gunahgaron ne dekha jamal-e-rahmat ko kahan nasib ye hota jo be-KHata hote 
janab-e-hazrat-e-naseh ka wah kya kahna jo ek baat na hoti to auliya hote 
mazaq-e-ishq nahin sheKH mein ye hai afsos ye chashni bhi jo hoti to kya se kya hote 
mahall-e-shukr hain 'akbar' ye darafshan nazmen har ek zaban ko ye moti nahin ata hote

ishva hai naaz hai ġhamza hai adā hai kyā hai qahr hai sehr hai jaadū hai balā hai kyā hai 
yaar se merī jo karte haiñ sifārish aġhyār makr hai uzr hai qaabū hai daġhā hai kyā hai 
tujh ko kis naam se ai faḳhr mire yaad karūñ baap hai piir hai murshid hai ḳhudā hai kyā hai 
tum jo be-vaj.h sunāte ho mirī jaan mujhe ḳhuub hai nek hai behtar hai bhalā hai kyā hai 
rū-ba-rū us ke kabhū baat na sudhrī ham se hilm hai chain hai dahshat hai hayā hai kyā hai 
nazm ko sun ke mirī hañs ke ye bolā vo shoḳh mad.h hai shukr hai shikva hai gila hai kyā hai 
ye jo us shoḳh pe kartā hai 'bayāñ' jaan nisār ḳhabt hai ishq hai saudā hai vafā hai kyā hai 
ishwa hai naz hai ghamza hai ada hai kya hai qahr hai sehr hai jadu hai bala hai kya hai 
yar se meri jo karte hain sifarish aghyar makr hai uzr hai qabu hai dagha hai kya hai 
tujh ko kis nam se ai faKHr mere yaad karun bap hai pir hai murshid hai KHuda hai kya hai 
tum jo be-wajh sunate ho meri jaan mujhe KHub hai nek hai behtar hai bhala hai kya hai 
ru-ba-ru us ke kabhu baat na sudhri hum se hilm hai chain hai dahshat hai haya hai kya hai 
nazm ko sun ke meri hans ke ye bola wo shoKH madh hai shukr hai shikwa hai gila hai kya hai 
ye jo us shoKH pe karta hai 'bayan' jaan nisar KHabt hai ishq hai sauda hai wafa hai kya hai

nazar hai jalva-e-jānāñ hai dekhiye kyā ho shikast-e-ishq kā imkāñ hai dekhiye kyā ho 
abhī bahār-e-guzishta kā ġham miTā bhī nahīñ phir ehtimām-e-bahārāñ hai dekhiye kyā ho 
qadam uThe bhī nahīñ bazm-e-nāz kī jānib ḳhayāl abhī se pareshāñ hai dekhiye kyā ho 
kisī kī raah meñ kāñTe kisī kī raah meñ phuul hamārī raah meñ tūfāñ hai dekhiye kyā ho 
ḳhirad kā zor hai ārā.ish-e-gulistāñ par junūñ harīf-e-bahārāñ hai dekhiye kyā ho 
jis ek shāḳh pe buniyād hai nasheman kī vo ek shāḳh bhī larzāñ hai dekhiye kyā ho 
hai aaj bazm meñ phir izn-e-ām saaqī kā 'qamar' hunūz musalmāñ hai dekhiye kyā ho 
nazar hai jalwa-e-jaanan hai dekhiye kya ho shikast-e-ishq ka imkan hai dekhiye kya ho 
abhi bahaar-e-guzishta ka gham miTa bhi nahin phir ehtimam-e-bahaaran hai dekhiye kya ho 
qadam uThe bhi nahin bazm-e-naz ki jaanib KHayal abhi se pareshan hai dekhiye kya ho 
kisi ki rah mein kanTe kisi ki rah mein phul hamari rah mein tufan hai dekhiye kya ho 
KHirad ka zor hai aaraish-e-gulistan par junun harif-e-bahaaran hai dekhiye kya ho 
jis ek shaKH pe buniyaad hai nasheman ki wo ek shaKH bhi larzan hai dekhiye kya ho 
hai aaj bazm mein phir izn-e-am saqi ka 'qamar' hunuz musalman hai dekhiye kya ho

ishq kī duniyā meñ ik hañgāma barpā kar diyā ai ḳhayāl-e-dost ye kyā ho gayā kyā kar diyā 
zarre zarre ne mirā afsāna sun kar daad dī maiñ ne vahshat meñ jahāñ ko terā shaidā kar diyā 
tuur par rāh-e-vafā meñ bo diye kāñTe kalīm ishq kī vus.at ko masdūd-e-taqāzā kar diyā 
bistar-e-mashriq se sūraj ne uThāyā apnā sar kis ne ye mahfil meñ zikr-e-husn-e-yaktā kar diyā 
chashm-e-nargis jā-e-shabnam ḳhuun ro.egī nadīm maiñ ne jis din gulsitāñ kā raaz ifshā kar diyā 
qais ye merāj-e-ulfat hai ki ejāz-e-junūñ najd ke har zarre ko tasvīr-e-lailā kar diyā 
mudda.ā-e-dil kahūñ 'ehsān' kis ummīd par vo jo chāheñge kareñge aur jo chāhā kar diyā 
ishq ki duniya mein ek hangama barpa kar diya ai KHayal-e-dost ye kya ho gaya kya kar diya 
zarre zarre ne mera afsana sun kar dad di main ne wahshat mein jahan ko tera shaida kar diya 
tur par rah-e-wafa mein bo diye kanTe kalim ishq ki wusat ko masdud-e-taqaza kar diya 
bistar-e-mashriq se suraj ne uThaya apna sar kis ne ye mahfil mein zikr-e-husn-e-yakta kar diya 
chashm-e-nargis ja-e-shabnam KHun roegi nadim main ne jis din gulsitan ka raaz ifsha kar diya 
qais ye meraj-e-ulfat hai ki ejaz-e-junun najd ke har zarre ko taswir-e-laila kar diya 
muddaa-e-dil kahun 'ehsan' kis ummid par wo jo chahenge karenge aur jo chaha kar diya

thapak thapak ke jinheñ ham sulāte rahte haiñ vo ḳhvāb ham ko hamesha jagāte rahte haiñ 
umīdeñ jāgtī rahtī haiñ sotī rahtī haiñ darīche sham.a jalāte bujhāte rahte haiñ 
na jaane kis kā hameñ intizār rahtā hai ki bām-o-dar ko hamesha sajāte rahte haiñ 
kisī ko DhūñDte haiñ ham kisī ke paikar meñ kisī kā chehra kisī se milāte rahte haiñ 
vo naqsh-e-ḳhvāb mukammal kabhī nahīñ hotā tamām umr jise ham banāte rahte haiñ 
usī kā aks har ik rañg meñ jhalaktā hai vo ek dard jise sab chhupāte rahte haiñ 
hameñ ḳhabar hai kabhī lauT kar na ā.eñge ga.e dinoñ ko magar ham bulāte rahte haiñ 
ye khel sirf tumhīñ khelte nahīñ 'ālam' sabhī ḳhalā meñ lakīreñ banāte rahte haiñ 
thapak thapak ke jinhen hum sulate rahte hain wo KHwab hum ko hamesha jagate rahte hain 
umiden jagti rahti hain soti rahti hain dariche shama jalate bujhate rahte hain 
na jaane kis ka hamein intizar rahta hai ki baam-o-dar ko hamesha sajate rahte hain 
kisi ko DhunDte hain hum kisi ke paikar mein kisi ka chehra kisi se milate rahte hain 
wo naqsh-e-KHwab mukammal kabhi nahin hota tamam umr jise hum banate rahte hain 
usi ka aks har ek rang mein jhalakta hai wo ek dard jise sab chhupate rahte hain 
hamein KHabar hai kabhi lauT kar na aaenge gae dinon ko magar hum bulate rahte hain 
ye khel sirf tumhin khelte nahin 'alam' sabhi KHala mein lakiren banate rahte hain

paanī ko patthar kahte haiñ kyā kuchh dīda-var kahte haiñ 
ḳhush-fahmī kī had hotī haiñ ḳhud ko dānish-var kahte haiñ 
kaun lagī-lipTī rakhtā hai ham tere muñh par kahte haiñ 
Thiik hī kahte hoñge phir to jab ye professor kahte haiñ 
sab un ko andar samjhe the vo ḳhud ko bāhar kahte haiñ 
terā is meñ kyā jaatā hai apne khañDar ko ghar kahte haiñ 
nazm samajh meñ kab aatī hai dekh is ko mantar kahte haiñ 
pani ko patthar kahte hain kya kuchh dida-war kahte hain 
KHush-fahmi ki had hoti hain KHud ko danish-war kahte hain 
kaun lagi-lipTi rakhta hai hum tere munh par kahte hain 
Thik hi kahte honge phir to jab ye professor kahte hain 
sab un ko andar samjhe the wo KHud ko bahar kahte hain 
tera is mein kya jata hai apne khanDar ko ghar kahte hain 
nazm samajh mein kab aati hai dekh is ko mantar kahte hain

chaak karte haiñ garebāñ is farāvānī se ham roz ḳhil.at paate haiñ darbār-e-uryānī se ham 
muntaḳhab karte haiñ maidān-e-shikast apne liye ḳhaak par girte haiñ lekin auj-e-sultānī se ham 
ham zamīn-e-qatl-gah par chalte haiñ siine ke bal jāda-e-shamshīr sar karte haiñ peshānī se ham 
haañ miyāñ duniyā kī cham-ḳham ḳhuub hai apnī jagah ik zarā ghabrā ga.e haiñ dil kī vīrānī se ham 
zof hai had se ziyāda lekin is ke bāvajūd zindagī se haath uThā sakte haiñ āsānī se ham 
dil se bāhar aaj tak ham ne qadam rakkhā nahīñ dekhne meñ zāhirā lagte haiñ sailānī se ham 
daulat-e-duniyā kahāñ rakkheñ jagah bhī ho kahīñ bhar chuke haiñ apnā ghar be-sāz-o-sāmānī se ham 
zarra zarra jagmagātī jalva-bārāni-e-dost dekhte haiñ rauzan-e-dīvār hairānī se ham 
aql vaalo ḳhair jaane do nahīñ samjhoge tum jis jagah pahuñche haiñ rāh-e-chāk-dāmānī se ham 
kārobār-e-zindagī se jī churāte haiñ sabhī jaise durveshī se tum maslan jahāñbānī se ham 
chaak karte hain gareban is farawani se hum roz KHilat pate hain darbar-e-uryani se hum 
muntaKHab karte hain maidan-e-shikast apne liye KHak par girte hain lekin auj-e-sultani se hum 
hum zamin-e-qatl-gah par chalte hain sine ke bal jada-e-shamshir sar karte hain peshani se hum 
han miyan duniya ki cham-KHam KHub hai apni jagah ek zara ghabra gae hain dil ki virani se hum 
zof hai had se ziyaada lekin is ke bawajud zindagi se hath uTha sakte hain aasani se hum 
dil se bahar aaj tak hum ne qadam rakkha nahin dekhne mein zahira lagte hain sailani se hum 
daulat-e-duniya kahan rakkhen jagah bhi ho kahin bhar chuke hain apna ghar be-saz-o-samani se hum 
zarra zarra jagmagati jalwa-barani-e-dost dekhte hain rauzan-e-diwar hairani se hum 
aql walo KHair jaane do nahin samjhoge tum jis jagah pahunche hain rah-e-chaak-damani se hum 
karobar-e-zindagi se ji churaate hain sabhi jaise durweshi se tum maslan jahanbani se hum

kaisā ajiib aayā hai is saal kā bajaT murġhī kā jo bajaT hai vahī daal kā bajaT 
jitnī hai ik clerk kī tanḳhvāh aaj kal utnā hai begamāt ke ik gaal kā bajaT 
sirf ek din meñ biis musāfir hue halāk hāzir hai sā.īñ gulshan-e-iqbāl kā bajaT 
T.v kā ye mazāq adīboñ ke saath hai shā.er se dugnā rakh diyā qavvāl kā bajaT 
bichhḌe the jab ye log mahīna thā june kā sohnī banā rahī thī mahīñvāl kā bajaT 
dāmād ko nikāl ke jab bhī huā hai pesh sāloñ ne paas kar diyā sasurāl kā bajaT 
biktī hai ab kitāb bhī cassette ke rate pe kaise banegā 'ġhālib' o 'iqbāl' kā bajaT 
maañ kah rahī thī rañg lipstick ke dekh kar chaT kar diyā bahū ne mire laal kā bajaT 
donoñ bane haiñ bā.is-e-taklīf āj-kal 'is.hāq'-Dār aur na.e saal kā bajaT 
kaisa ajib aaya hai is sal ka bajaT murghi ka jo bajaT hai wahi dal ka bajaT 
jitni hai ek clerk ki tanKHwah aaj kal utna hai begamat ke ek gal ka bajaT 
sirf ek din mein bis musafir hue halak hazir hai sain gulshan-e-iqbaal ka bajaT 
Tw ka ye mazaq adibon ke sath hai shaer se dugna rakh diya qawwal ka bajaT 
bichhDe the jab ye log mahina tha june ka sohni bana rahi thi mahinwal ka bajaT 
damad ko nikal ke jab bhi hua hai pesh salon ne pas kar diya sasural ka bajaT 
bikti hai ab kitab bhi cassette ke rate pe kaise banega 'ghaalib' o 'iqbaal' ka bajaT 
man kah rahi thi rang lipstick ke dekh kar chaT kar diya bahu ne mere lal ka bajaT 
donon bane hain bais-e-taklif aaj-kal 'ishaq'-Dar aur nae sal ka bajaT

zamīñ se rishta-e-dīvār-o-dar bhī rakhnā hai sañvārne ke liye apnā ghar bhī rakhnā hai 
havā se aag se paanī se muttasil rah kar inhīñ se apnī tabāhī kā Dar bhī rakhnā hai 
makāñ banāte hue chhat bahut zarūrī hai bachā ke sehn meñ lekin shajar bhī rakhnā hai 
ye kyā safar ke liye hijrateñ javāz baneñ jo vāpsī kā ho aisā safar bhī rakhnā hai 
hamārī nasl sañvartī hai dekh kar ham ko so apne-āp ko shaffāf-tar bhī rakhnā hai 
havā ke ruḳh ko badalnā agar nahīñ mumkin havā kī zad pe safar kā hunar bhī rakhnā hai 
nishān-e-rāh se baḌh kar haiñ ḳhvāb manzil ke inheñ bachānā hai aur raah par bhī rakhnā hai 
javāz kuchh bhī ho itnā to sab hī jānte haiñ safar ke saath javāz-e-safar bhī rakhnā hai 
zamin se rishta-e-diwar-o-dar bhi rakhna hai sanwarne ke liye apna ghar bhi rakhna hai 
hawa se aag se pani se muttasil rah kar inhin se apni tabahi ka Dar bhi rakhna hai 
makan banate hue chhat bahut zaruri hai bacha ke sehn mein lekin shajar bhi rakhna hai 
ye kya safar ke liye hijraten jawaz banen jo wapsi ka ho aisa safar bhi rakhna hai 
hamari nasl sanwarti hai dekh kar hum ko so apne-ap ko shaffaf-tar bhi rakhna hai 
hawa ke ruKH ko badalna agar nahin mumkin hawa ki zad pe safar ka hunar bhi rakhna hai 
nishan-e-rah se baDh kar hain KHwab manzil ke inhen bachana hai aur rah par bhi rakhna hai 
jawaz kuchh bhi ho itna to sab hi jaante hain safar ke sath jawaz-e-safar bhi rakhna hai

pārsā.ī un kī jab yaad aa.egī mujh se merī aarzū sharmā.egī 
gar yahī hai pās-e-ādāb-e-sukūt kis tarah fariyād lab tak aa.egī 
ye to maanā dekh aa.eñ kū-e-yār phir tamannā aur kuchh farmā.egī 
jaane de sabr o qarār o hosh ko tū kahāñ ai be-qarārī jā.egī 
hijr kī shab gar yahī hai iztirāb niiñd ai 'taslīm' kyūñkar aa.egī 
parsai un ki jab yaad aaegi mujh se meri aarzu sharmaegi 
gar yahi hai pas-e-adab-e-sukut kis tarah fariyaad lab tak aaegi 
ye to mana dekh aaen ku-e-yar phir tamanna aur kuchh farmaegi 
jaane de sabr o qarar o hosh ko tu kahan ai be-qarari jaegi 
hijr ki shab gar yahi hai iztirab nind ai 'taslim' kyunkar aaegi

zindagī ḳhaak meñ bhī thī tire dīvāne se ab na uTThegā bagūlā koī vīrāne se 
is qadar ho ga.ī kasrat tire dīvānoñ kī qais ghabrā ke chalā shahr ko vīrāne se 
jal-marā aag mohabbat kī ise kahte haiñ jalnā dekhā na gayā sham.a kā parvāne se 
kis kī begāna-vashī se ye tahayyur aayā ki ab apne bhī nazar aate haiñ begāne se 
shaiḳh sāhab bhī hue motaqid-e-pīr-e-muġhāñ aaj ye taaza ḳhabar aa.ī hai mai-ḳhāne se 
itnī tauhīn na kar merī balā-noshī kī sāqiyā mujh ko na de maap ke paimāne se 
ai 'vafā' apne bhī jab aañkh churā lete haiñ be-ruḳhī kā ho gilā kyā kisī begāne se 
zindagi KHak mein bhi thi tere diwane se ab na uTThega bagula koi virane se 
is qadar ho gai kasrat tere diwanon ki qais ghabra ke chala shahr ko virane se 
jal-mara aag mohabbat ki ise kahte hain jalna dekha na gaya shama ka parwane se 
kis ki begana-washi se ye tahayyur aaya ki ab apne bhi nazar aate hain begane se 
shaiKH sahab bhi hue motaqid-e-pir-e-mughan aaj ye taza KHabar aai hai mai-KHane se 
itni tauhin na kar meri bala-noshi ki saqiya mujh ko na de map ke paimane se 
ai 'wafa' apne bhi jab aankh chura lete hain be-ruKHi ka ho gila kya kisi begane se

sitam bhī kartā hai us kā sila bhī detā hai ki mere haal pe vo muskurā bhī detā hai 
shanāvaroñ ko usī ne Dubo diyā shāyad jo Dūbtoñ ko kināre lagā bhī detā hai 
yahī sukūt yahī dasht-e-jāñ kā sannāTā jo sunñā chāhe koī to sadā bhī detā hai 
ajiib kūcha-e-qātil kī rasm hai ki yahāñ jo qatl kartā hai vo ḳhūñ-bahā bhī detā hai 
vo kaun hai ki jalātā hai dil meñ sham-e-umīd phir apne haath se us ko bujhā bhī detā hai 
vo kaun hai ki banātā hai naqsh paanī par to pattharoñ kī lakīreñ miTā bhī detā hai 
vo kaun hai ki jo bantā hai raah meñ dīvār aur us ke ba.ad na.ī rah dikhā bhī detā hai 
vo kaun hai ki dikhātā hai rañg rañg ke ḳhvāb añdherī rātoñ meñ lekin jagā bhī detā hai 
vo kaun hai ki ġhamoñ se navāztā hai mujhe ġhamoñ ko sahne kā phir hausla bhī detā hai 
mujhī se koī chhupātā hai rāz-e-ġham sar-e-shām mujhī ko āḳhir-e-shab phir batā bhī detā hai 
sitam bhi karta hai us ka sila bhi deta hai ki mere haal pe wo muskura bhi deta hai 
shanawaron ko usi ne Dubo diya shayad jo Dubton ko kinare laga bhi deta hai 
yahi sukut yahi dasht-e-jaan ka sannaTa jo sunna chahe koi to sada bhi deta hai 
ajib kucha-e-qatil ki rasm hai ki yahan jo qatl karta hai wo KHun-baha bhi deta hai 
wo kaun hai ki jalata hai dil mein sham-e-umid phir apne hath se us ko bujha bhi deta hai 
wo kaun hai ki banata hai naqsh pani par to pattharon ki lakiren miTa bhi deta hai 
wo kaun hai ki jo banta hai rah mein diwar aur us ke baad nai rah dikha bhi deta hai 
wo kaun hai ki dikhata hai rang rang ke KHwab andheri raaton mein lekin jaga bhi deta hai 
wo kaun hai ki ghamon se nawazta hai mujhe ghamon ko sahne ka phir hausla bhi deta hai
