mujhi se koi chhupata hai raaz-e-gham sar-e-sham mujhi ko aaKHir-e-shab phir bata bhi deta hai

shurū-e-ishq meñ logoñ ne itnī shiddat kī ki rafta rafta kamī ho ga.ī mohabbat kī 
ye kārgāh-e-zehānat hai is meñ chhoTe kyā baḌe-baḌoñ ne yahāñ par baḌī himāqat kī 
jahāñ se ilm kā ham ko ġhurūr hotā hai vahīñ se hotī hai bas ibtidā jahālat kī 
jo aadmī hai talāsh-e-sakūñ meñ sadiyoñ se usī ne kar dī yahāñ intihā bhī vahshat kī 
purāne logoñ ko har daur meñ rahā shikva na.e dimāġhoñ ne har ahd meñ baġhāvat kī 
dikhā.ī detā nahīñ apnā mom ho jaanā shikāyateñ haiñ hameñ dhuup se tamāzat kī 
isī liye to añdhere meñ aaj baiThe haiñ ki ham ne apne charāġhoñ kī kab hifāzat kī 
shuru-e-ishq mein logon ne itni shiddat ki ki rafta rafta kami ho gai mohabbat ki 
ye kargah-e-zehanat hai is mein chhoTe kya baDe-baDon ne yahan par baDi himaqat ki 
jahan se ilm ka hum ko ghurur hota hai wahin se hoti hai bas ibtida jahaalat ki 
jo aadmi hai talash-e-sakun mein sadiyon se usi ne kar di yahan intiha bhi wahshat ki 
purane logon ko har daur mein raha shikwa nae dimaghon ne har ahd mein baghawat ki 
dikhai deta nahin apna mom ho jaana shikayaten hain hamein dhup se tamazat ki 
isi liye to andhere mein aaj baiThe hain ki hum ne apne charaghon ki kab hifazat ki

kahāñ vo ab lutf-e-bāhamī hai mohabbatoñ meñ bahut kamī hai chalī hai kaisī havā ilāhī ki har tabī.at meñ barhamī hai 
mirī vafā meñ hai kyā tazalzul mirī itā.at meñ kyā kamī hai ye kyuuñ nigāheñ phirī haiñ mujh se mizāj meñ kyuuñ ye barhamī hai 
vahī hai fazl-e-ḳhudā se ab tak taraqqi-e-kār-e-husn o ulfat na vo haiñ mashq-e-sitam meñ qāsir na ḳhūn-e-dil kī yahāñ kamī hai 
ajiib jalve haiñ hosh-dushman ki vahm ke bhī qadam ruke haiñ ajiib manzar haiñ hairat-afzā nazar jahāñ thī vahīñ thamī hai 
na koī takrīm-e-bāhamī hai na pyaar baaqī hai ab diloñ meñ ye sirf tahrīr meñ Dear sir hai yā janāb-e-mukarramī hai 
kahāñ ke muslim kahāñ ke hindū bhulā.ī haiñ sab ne aglī rasmeñ aqīde sab ke haiñ tīn-terah na gyārahvīñ hai na ashTamī hai 
nazar mirī aur hī taraf hai hazār rañg-e-zamāna badle hazār bāteñ banā.e nāseh jamī hai dil meñ jo kuchh jamī hai 
agarche maiñ riñd-e-mohtaram huuñ magar ise shaiḳh se na pūchho ki un ke aage to is zamāne meñ saarī duniyā jahannamī hai 
kahan wo ab lutf-e-bahami hai mohabbaton mein bahut kami hai chali hai kaisi hawa ilahi ki har tabiat mein barhami hai 
meri wafa mein hai kya tazalzul meri itaat mein kya kami hai ye kyun nigahen phiri hain mujh se mizaj mein kyun ye barhami hai 
wahi hai fazl-e-KHuda se ab tak taraqqi-e-kar-e-husn o ulfat na wo hain mashq-e-sitam mein qasir na KHun-e-dil ki yahan kami hai 
ajib jalwe hain hosh-dushman ki wahm ke bhi qadam ruke hain ajib manzar hain hairat-afza nazar jahan thi wahin thami hai 
na koi takrim-e-bahami hai na pyar baqi hai ab dilon mein ye sirf tahrir mein Dear sir hai ya janab-e-mukarrami hai 
kahan ke muslim kahan ke hindu bhulai hain sab ne agli rasmen aqide sab ke hain tin-terah na gyarahwin hai na ashTami hai 
nazar meri aur hi taraf hai hazar rang-e-zamana badle hazar baaten banae naseh jami hai dil mein jo kuchh jami hai 
agarche main rind-e-mohtaram hun magar ise shaiKH se na puchho ki un ke aage to is zamane mein sari duniya jahannami hai

jiine kī hai ummīd na marne kā yaqīñ hai ab dil kā ye aalam hai na duniyā hai na diiñ hai 
gum haiñ reh-e-taslīm meñ tālib bhī talab bhī sajda hī dar-e-yār hai sajda hī jabīñ hai 
kuchh maz.har-e-bātin huuñ to kuchh mahram-e-zāhir merī hī vo hastī hai ki hai aur nahīñ hai 
iizā ke sivā lazzat-e-īzā bhī milegī kyuuñ jalva-gah-e-hosh yahāñ dil bhī kahīñ hai 
māyūs sahī hasrati-e-maut huuñ 'fānī' kis muñh se kahūñ dil meñ tamannā hī nahīñ hai 
jine ki hai ummid na marne ka yaqin hai ab dil ka ye aalam hai na duniya hai na din hai 
gum hain reh-e-taslim mein talib bhi talab bhi sajda hi dar-e-yar hai sajda hi jabin hai 
kuchh mazhar-e-baatin hun to kuchh mahram-e-zahir meri hi wo hasti hai ki hai aur nahin hai 
iza ke siwa lazzat-e-iza bhi milegi kyun jalwa-gah-e-hosh yahan dil bhi kahin hai 
mayus sahi hasrati-e-maut hun 'fani' kis munh se kahun dil mein tamanna hi nahin hai

bas ek māh-e-junūñ-ḳhez kī ziyā ke sivā nagar meñ kuchh nahīñ baaqī rahā havā ke sivā 
hai ek aur bhī sūrat kahīñ mirī hī tarah ik aur shahr bhī hai qarya-e-sadā ke sivā 
ik aur samt bhī hai us se jā ke milne kī nishān aur bhī hai ek nishān-e-pā ke sivā 
zavāl-e-asr hai kuufe meñ aur gadāgar haiñ khulā nahīñ koī dar bāb-e-iltijā ke sivā 
makān-e-zar lab-e-goyā had-e-sipahr-o-zamīñ dikhā.ī detā hai sab kuchh yahāñ ḳhudā ke sivā 
mirī hī ḳhvāhisheñ baa.is haiñ mere ġham kī 'munīr' azaab mujh pe nahīñ harf-e-mudda.ā ke sivā 
bas ek mah-e-junun-KHez ki ziya ke siwa nagar mein kuchh nahin baqi raha hawa ke siwa 
hai ek aur bhi surat kahin meri hi tarah ek aur shahr bhi hai qarya-e-sada ke siwa 
ek aur samt bhi hai us se ja ke milne ki nishan aur bhi hai ek nishan-e-pa ke siwa 
zawal-e-asr hai kufe mein aur gadagar hain khula nahin koi dar bab-e-iltija ke siwa 
makan-e-zar lab-e-goya had-e-sipahr-o-zamin dikhai deta hai sab kuchh yahan KHuda ke siwa 
meri hi KHwahishen bais hain mere gham ki 'munir' azab mujh pe nahin harf-e-muddaa ke siwa

chaman meñ shab ko jo vo shoḳh be-naqāb aayā yaqīn ho gayā shabnam ko āftāb aayā 
un añkhḌiyoñ meñ agar nashsha-e-sharāb aayā salām jhuk ke karūñgā jo phir hijāb aayā 
kisī ke mahram-e-āb-e-ravāñ kī yaad aa.ī habāb ke jo barābar kabhī habāb aayā 
shab-e-firāq meñ mujh ko sulāne aayā thā jagāyā maiñ ne jo afsāna-go ko ḳhvāb aayā 
adam meñ hastī se jā kar yahī kahūñgā maiñ hazār hasrat-e-zinda ko gaaḌ daab aayā 
chakor husn-e-mah-e-chār-dah ko bhuul gayā murād par jo tirā ālam-e-shabāb aayā 
mohabbat-e-mai-o-māshūq tark kar 'ātish' safed baal hue mausam-e-ḳhizāb aayā 
chaman mein shab ko jo wo shoKH be-naqab aaya yaqin ho gaya shabnam ko aaftab aaya 
un ankhDiyon mein agar nashsha-e-sharab aaya salam jhuk ke karunga jo phir hijab aaya 
kisi ke mahram-e-ab-e-rawan ki yaad aai habab ke jo barabar kabhi habab aaya 
shab-e-firaq mein mujh ko sulane aaya tha jagaya main ne jo afsana-go ko KHwab aaya 
adam mein hasti se ja kar yahi kahunga main hazar hasrat-e-zinda ko gaD dab aaya 
chakor husn-e-mah-e-chaar-dah ko bhul gaya murad par jo tera aalam-e-shabab aaya 
mohabbat-e-mai-o-mashuq tark kar 'atish' safed baal hue mausam-e-KHizab aaya

mire badan meñ lahū kā kaTāv aisā thā ki merā har-bun-e-mū ek ghaav aisā thā 
bichhaḌte vaqt ajab uljhanoñ meñ Daal gayā vo ek shaḳhs ki sīdhe subhāv aisā thā 
chalī jo baat koī raat ke ta.āqub meñ to baat baat se niklī bahāv aisā thā 
maiñ puurā puurā ravāna thā abjadoñ kī taraf hisāb-e-umr tirā chal-chalāv aisā thā 
gul-e-nashāt kī ḳhushbū bhī baar thī mujh ko mire mizāj meñ ġham kā rachāv aisā thā 
kanār-e-lab meñ na rahtī thī mauj-e-goyā.ī tabī.atoñ meñ suḳhan kā bahāv aisā thā 
Thahartā kyā mirī ḳhākistarī nigāhoñ meñ tirā vajūd to raushan alaav aisā thā 
nikal sakī na koī bhī farār kī sūrat sipāh-e-zīst kā mujh par paḌāv aisā thā 
na chaah kar bhī use dil se chāhte the ham kisī kī laag meñ 'tābish' lagāv aisā thā 
mere badan mein lahu ka kaTaw aisa tha ki mera har-bun-e-mu ek ghaw aisa tha 
bichhaDte waqt ajab uljhanon mein Dal gaya wo ek shaKHs ki sidhe subhaw aisa tha 
chali jo baat koi raat ke taaqub mein to baat baat se nikli bahaw aisa tha 
main pura pura rawana tha abjadon ki taraf hisab-e-umr tera chal-chalaw aisa tha 
gul-e-nashat ki KHushbu bhi bar thi mujh ko mere mizaj mein gham ka rachaw aisa tha 
kanar-e-lab mein na rahti thi mauj-e-goyai tabiaton mein suKHan ka bahaw aisa tha 
Thaharta kya meri KHakistari nigahon mein tera wajud to raushan alaw aisa tha 
nikal saki na koi bhi farar ki surat sipah-e-zist ka mujh par paDaw aisa tha 
na chah kar bhi use dil se chahte the hum kisi ki lag mein 'tabish' lagaw aisa tha

tujh se vābastagī rahegī abhī dil ko ye bekalī rahegī abhī 
sar ko dīvār hī nahīñ miltī so ye dīvāngī rahegī abhī 
koī din fursat-e-tamannā hai koī din sar ḳhushī rahegī abhī 
kāsa-e-umr bhar chukā phir bhī kahīñ koī kamī rahegī abhī 
shab vahī hai jamāl-e-ḳhvāb vahī aañkh apnī lagī rahegī abhī 
jis qayāmat kī aamad aamad hai vo qayāmat Talī rahegī abhī 
ham yaqīnan yahāñ nahīñ hoñge ġhāliban zindagī rahegī abhī 
kuchh abhī ranj-e-ārzū hai hameñ aañkh meñ kuchh namī rahegī abhī 
tū abhī mubtalā-e-duniyā nahīñ tujh meñ ye sādgī rahegī abhī 
lā-ta.alluq huuñ us ta.alluq se aur ye dostī rahegī abhī 
jī uchaTtā nahīñ hai lagtā nahīñ so ye begānagī rahegī abhī 
kahīñ koī charāġh jaltā hai kuchh na kuchh raushnī rahegī abhī 
tujh se wabastagi rahegi abhi dil ko ye bekali rahegi abhi 
sar ko diwar hi nahin milti so ye diwangi rahegi abhi 
koi din fursat-e-tamanna hai koi din sar KHushi rahegi abhi 
kasa-e-umr bhar chuka phir bhi kahin koi kami rahegi abhi 
shab wahi hai jamal-e-KHwab wahi aankh apni lagi rahegi abhi 
jis qayamat ki aamad aamad hai wo qayamat Tali rahegi abhi 
hum yaqinan yahan nahin honge ghaaliban zindagi rahegi abhi 
kuchh abhi ranj-e-arzu hai hamein aankh mein kuchh nami rahegi abhi 
tu abhi mubtala-e-duniya nahin tujh mein ye sadgi rahegi abhi 
la-talluq hun us talluq se aur ye dosti rahegi abhi 
ji uchaTta nahin hai lagta nahin so ye beganagi rahegi abhi 
kahin koi charagh jalta hai kuchh na kuchh raushni rahegi abhi

jo ab jahān-e-barhana kā isti.āra huā maiñ zindagī tirā ik pairahan utārā huā 
siyāh-ḳhūn Tapaktā hai lamhe lamhe se na jaane raat pe shab-ḳhūñ hai kis ne maarā huā 
jakaḌ ke sāñsoñ meñ tash.hīr ho rahī hai mirī maiñ ek qaid sipāhī huuñ jañg haarā huā 
phir is ke baad vo aañsū utar gayā dil meñ zarā sī der ko āñkhoñ meñ ik sharāra huā 
ḳhudā kā shukr mirī tishnagī palaT aa.ī chalī ga.ī thī samundar kā jab ishāra huā 
amiir imaam mubārak ho fat.h-e-ishq tumheñ ye dard-e-māl-e-ġhanīmat hai sab tumhārā huā 
jo ab jahan-e-barhana ka istiara hua main zindagi tera ek pairahan utara hua 
siyah-KHun Tapakta hai lamhe lamhe se na jaane raat pe shab-KHun hai kis ne mara hua 
jakaD ke sanson mein tashhir ho rahi hai meri main ek qaid sipahi hun jang haara hua 
phir is ke baad wo aansu utar gaya dil mein zara si der ko aankhon mein ek sharara hua 
KHuda ka shukr meri tishnagi palaT aai chali gai thi samundar ka jab ishaara hua 
amir imam mubarak ho fath-e-ishq tumhein ye dard-e-mal-e-ghanimat hai sab tumhaara hua

dil kiye tasḳhīr baḳhshā faiz-e-rūhānī mujhe hubb-e-qaumī ho gayā naqsh-e-sulaimānī mujhe 
manzil-e-ibrat hai duniyā ahl-e-duniyā shaad haiñ aisī dil-jam.ī se hotī hai pareshānī mujhe 
jāñchtā huuñ vus.at-e-dil hamla-e-ġham ke liye imtihāñ hai ranj-o-hirmāñ kī farāvānī mujhe 
haq-parastī kī jo maiñ ne but-parastī chhoḌ kar barhaman kahne lage ilhād kā baanī mujhe 
kulfat-e-duniyā miTe bhī to saḳhī ke faiz se haath dhone ko mile bahtā huā paanī mujhe 
ḳhud-parastī miT ga.ī qadr-e-mohabbat baḌh ga.ī mātam-e-ahbāb hai tālīm-e-rūhānī mujhe 
qaum kā ġham mol le kar dil kā ye aalam huā yaad bhī aatī nahīñ apnī pareshānī mujhe 
zarra zarra hai mire kashmīr kā mehmāñ-navāz raah meñ patthar ke TukḌoñ ne diyā paanī mujhe 
lucknow meñ phir huī ārāsta bazm-e-suḳhan baad muddat phir huā zauq-e-ġhazal-ḳhvānī mujhe 
dil kiye tasKHir baKHsha faiz-e-ruhani mujhe hubb-e-qaumi ho gaya naqsh-e-sulaimani mujhe 
manzil-e-ibrat hai duniya ahl-e-duniya shad hain aisi dil-jami se hoti hai pareshani mujhe 
jaanchta hun wusat-e-dil hamla-e-gham ke liye imtihan hai ranj-o-hirman ki farawani mujhe 
haq-parasti ki jo main ne but-parasti chhoD kar barhaman kahne lage ilhad ka bani mujhe 
kulfat-e-duniya miTe bhi to saKHi ke faiz se hath dhone ko mile bahta hua pani mujhe 
KHud-parasti miT gai qadr-e-mohabbat baDh gai matam-e-ahbab hai talim-e-ruhani mujhe 
qaum ka gham mol le kar dil ka ye aalam hua yaad bhi aati nahin apni pareshani mujhe 
zarra zarra hai mere kashmir ka mehman-nawaz rah mein patthar ke TukDon ne diya pani mujhe 
lucknow mein phir hui aarasta bazm-e-suKHan baad muddat phir hua zauq-e-ghazal-KHwani mujhe

tumhāre husn kī tasḳhīr aam hotī hai ki ik nigāh meñ duniyā tamām hotī hai 
jahāñ pe jalva-e-jānāñ hai anjuman-ārā vahāñ nigāh kī manzil tamām hotī hai 
vahī ḳhalish vahī sozish vahī tapish vahī dard hameñ sahar bhī ba-andāz-e-shām hotī hai 
nigāh-e-husn mubārak tujhe dar-andāzī kabhī kabhī mirī mahfil bhī aam hotī hai 
zahe nasīb meñ qurbān apnī qismat ke tire liye mirī duniyā tamām hotī hai 
namāz-e-ishq kā hai inhisār ashkoñ tak ye be-niyāz-e-sujūd-o-qayām hotī hai 
tirī nigāh ke qurbāñ tirī nigāh kī Tiis ye nā-tamām hī rah kar tamām hotī hai 
vahāñ pe chal mujhe le kar mire samand-e-ḳhayāl jahāñ nigāh kī mastī harām hotī hai 
kisī ke zikr se 'bahzād' mubtalā ab tak jigar meñ ik ḳhalish-e-nā-tamām hotī hai 
tumhaare husn ki tasKHir aam hoti hai ki ek nigah mein duniya tamam hoti hai 
jahan pe jalwa-e-jaanan hai anjuman-ara wahan nigah ki manzil tamam hoti hai 
wahi KHalish wahi sozish wahi tapish wahi dard hamein sahar bhi ba-andaz-e-sham hoti hai 
nigah-e-husn mubarak tujhe dar-andazi kabhi kabhi meri mahfil bhi aam hoti hai 
zahe nasib mein qurban apni qismat ke tere liye meri duniya tamam hoti hai 
namaz-e-ishq ka hai inhisar ashkon tak ye be-niyaz-e-sujud-o-qayam hoti hai 
teri nigah ke qurban teri nigah ki Tis ye na-tamam hi rah kar tamam hoti hai 
wahan pe chal mujhe le kar mere samand-e-KHayal jahan nigah ki masti haram hoti hai 
kisi ke zikr se 'bahzad' mubtala ab tak jigar mein ek KHalish-e-na-tamam hoti hai

ainak ke donoñ shīshe hī aTe hue the dhuul meñ haath paḌ gayā kāñToñ par phūloñ ke badle bhuul meñ 
chhūte hī āshā.eñ bikhrīñ jaise sapne TuuT ga.e kis ne aTkā.e the ye kāġhaz ke phuul babūl meñ 
ishq ke hijje bhī jo na jāneñ vo haiñ ishq ke dāvedār jaise ġhazleñ raT kar gaate haiñ bachche schōl meñ 
ab rātoñ ko bhī bāzāroñ meñ āvāra phirte haiñ pahle bhañvre ho jaate the band kañval ke phuul meñ 
moTī Dāloñ vaale peḌ ke patte kaise piile haiñ kis ne dekhā kaun rog hai chhupā huā jaḌ muul meñ 
ainak ke donon shishe hi aTe hue the dhul mein hath paD gaya kanTon par phulon ke badle bhul mein 
chhute hi aashaen bikhrin jaise sapne TuT gae kis ne aTkae the ye kaghaz ke phul babul mein 
ishq ke hijje bhi jo na jaanen wo hain ishq ke dawedar jaise ghazlen raT kar gate hain bachche school mein 
ab raaton ko bhi bazaron mein aawara phirte hain pahle bhanwre ho jate the band kanwal ke phul mein 
moTi Dalon wale peD ke patte kaise pile hain kis ne dekha kaun rog hai chhupa hua jaD mul mein

vo daur qarīb aa rahā hai jab dād-e-hunar na mil sakegī 
us shab kā nuzūl ho rahā hai jis shab kī sahar na mil sakegī 
pūchhoge har ik se ham kahāñ haiñ aur apnī ḳhabar na mil sakegī 
āsāñ bhī na hogā ghar meñ rahnā taufīq-e-safar na mil sakegī 
ḳhanjar sī zabāñ kā zaḳhm khā ke marham sī nazar na mil sakegī 
is rāh-e-safar meñ sāya-e-afgan ik shāḳh-e-shajar na mil sakegī 
jāoge kisī kī anjuman meñ par us se nazar na mil sakegī 
ik jins-e-vafā hai jis ko har-sū DhūñDoge magar na mil sakegī 
sailāb-e-havas umaD rahā hai ik tishna nazar na mil sakegī 
wo daur qarib aa raha hai jab dad-e-hunar na mil sakegi 
us shab ka nuzul ho raha hai jis shab ki sahar na mil sakegi 
puchhoge har ek se hum kahan hain aur apni KHabar na mil sakegi 
aasan bhi na hoga ghar mein rahna taufiq-e-safar na mil sakegi 
KHanjar si zaban ka zaKHm kha ke marham si nazar na mil sakegi 
is rah-e-safar mein saya-e-afgan ek shaKH-e-shajar na mil sakegi 
jaoge kisi ki anjuman mein par us se nazar na mil sakegi 
ek jins-e-wafa hai jis ko har-su DhunDoge magar na mil sakegi 
sailab-e-hawas umaD raha hai ek tishna nazar na mil sakegi

ye kyā tilism hai duniyā pe baar guzrī hai vo zindagī jo sar-e-rahguzār guzrī hai 
guloñ kī gum-shudagī se surāġh miltā hai kahīñ chaman se nasīm-e-bahār guzrī hai 
kahīñ sahar kā ujālā huā hai ham-nafaso ki mauj-e-barq sar-e-shāḳh-sār guzrī hai 
rahā hai ye sar-e-shorīda misl-e-shola buland agarche mujh pe qayāmat hazār guzrī hai 
ye hādisa bhī huā hai ki ishq-e-yār kī yaad dayār-e-qalb se begāna-vār guzrī hai 
unhīñ ko arz-e-vafā kā thā ishtiyāq bahut unhīñ ko arz-e-vafā nā-gavār guzrī hai 
harīm-e-shauq mahaktā hai aaj tak 'ābid' yahāñ se nik.hat-e-gesu-e-yār guzrī hai 
ye kya tilism hai duniya pe bar guzri hai wo zindagi jo sar-e-rahguzar guzri hai 
gulon ki gum-shudagi se suragh milta hai kahin chaman se nasim-e-bahaar guzri hai 
kahin sahar ka ujala hua hai ham-nafaso ki mauj-e-barq sar-e-shaKH-sar guzri hai 
raha hai ye sar-e-shorida misl-e-shola buland agarche mujh pe qayamat hazar guzri hai 
ye hadisa bhi hua hai ki ishq-e-yar ki yaad dayar-e-qalb se begana-war guzri hai 
unhin ko arz-e-wafa ka tha ishtiyaq bahut unhin ko arz-e-wafa na-gawar guzri hai 
harim-e-shauq mahakta hai aaj tak 'abid' yahan se nikhat-e-gesu-e-yar guzri hai

ek majzūb udāsī mere andar gum hai is samundar meñ koī aur samundar gum hai 
bebasī kaisā parinda hai tumheñ kyā mālūm use mālūm hai jo mere barābar gum hai 
charḳh-e-sau rañg ko fursat ho to DhūñDe us ko nīl-gūñ soch meñ jo mast qalandar gum hai 
dhuup chhāñv kā koī khel hai bīnā.ī bhī aañkh ko DhūñD ke laayā huuñ to manzar gum hai 
sañg-rezoñ meñ mahaktā hai koī surḳh gulāb vo jo māthe pe lagā thā vahī patthar gum hai 
ek madfūn dafīna inhīñ atrāf meñ thā ḳhaak uḌtī hai yahāñ aur vo gauhar gum hai 
ek majzub udasi mere andar gum hai is samundar mein koi aur samundar gum hai 
bebasi kaisa parinda hai tumhein kya malum use malum hai jo mere barabar gum hai 
charKH-e-sau rang ko fursat ho to DhunDe us ko nil-gun soch mein jo mast qalandar gum hai 
dhup chhanw ka koi khel hai binai bhi aankh ko DhunD ke laya hun to manzar gum hai 
sang-rezon mein mahakta hai koi surKH gulab wo jo mathe pe laga tha wahi patthar gum hai 
ek madfun dafina inhin atraf mein tha KHak uDti hai yahan aur wo gauhar gum hai

jab tak khulī nahīñ thī asrār lag rahī thī ye zindagī mujhe bhī dushvār lag rahī thī 
mujh par jhukī huī thī phūloñ kī ek Daalī lekin vo mere sar par talvār lag rahī thī 
chhūte hī jaane kaise qadmoñ meñ aa girī vo jo fāsle se ūñchī dīvār lag rahī thī 
shahroñ meñ aa ke kaise āhista-rau huā maiñ sahrā meñ tez apnī raftār lag rahī thī 
lahroñ ke jāgne par kuchh bhī na kaam aa.ī kyā chiiz thī jo mujh ko patvār lag rahī thī 
ab kitnī kār-āmad jañgal meñ lag rahī hai vo raushnī jo ghar meñ bekār lag rahī thī 
TuuTā huā hai shāyad vo bhī hamāre jaisā āvāz us kī jaise jhankār lag rahī thī 
'ālam' ġhazal meñ Dhal kar kyā ḳhuub lag rahī hai jo Tiis mere dil kā āzār lag rahī thī 
jab tak khuli nahin thi asrar lag rahi thi ye zindagi mujhe bhi dushwar lag rahi thi 
mujh par jhuki hui thi phulon ki ek Dali lekin wo mere sar par talwar lag rahi thi 
chhute hi jaane kaise qadmon mein aa giri wo jo fasle se unchi diwar lag rahi thi 
shahron mein aa ke kaise aahista-rau hua main sahra mein tez apni raftar lag rahi thi 
lahron ke jagne par kuchh bhi na kaam aai kya chiz thi jo mujh ko patwar lag rahi thi 
ab kitni kar-amad jangal mein lag rahi hai wo raushni jo ghar mein bekar lag rahi thi 
TuTa hua hai shayad wo bhi hamare jaisa aawaz us ki jaise jhankar lag rahi thi 
'alam' ghazal mein Dhal kar kya KHub lag rahi hai jo Tis mere dil ka aazar lag rahi thi

vo nīchī nigāheñ vo hayā yaad rahegī mil kar bhī na milne kī adā yaad rahegī 
mumkin hai mire baad bhulā deñ mujhe lekin tā umr unheñ merī vafā yaad rahegī 
jab maiñ hī nahīñ yaad rafīqān-e-safar ko hairāñ huuñ ki manzil unheñ kyā yaad rahegī 
kuchh yaad rahe yā na rahe zikr-e-gulistāñ ġhunchoñ ke chaTakne kī sadā yaad rahegī 
mahrūm rahe ahl-e-chaman nik.hat-e-gul se be-gānagi-e-mauj-e-sabā yaad rahegī 
palkoñ pe larazte rahe 'anvar' jo shab-e-ġham mujh ko unhīñ tāroñ kī ziyā yaad rahegī 
wo nichi nigahen wo haya yaad rahegi mil kar bhi na milne ki ada yaad rahegi 
mumkin hai mere baad bhula den mujhe lekin ta umr unhen meri wafa yaad rahegi 
jab main hi nahin yaad rafiqan-e-safar ko hairan hun ki manzil unhen kya yaad rahegi 
kuchh yaad rahe ya na rahe zikr-e-gulistan ghunchon ke chaTakne ki sada yaad rahegi 
mahrum rahe ahl-e-chaman nikhat-e-gul se be-ganagi-e-mauj-e-saba yaad rahegi 
palkon pe larazte rahe 'anwar' jo shab-e-gham mujh ko unhin taron ki ziya yaad rahegi

us ke jaate hī ye kyā ho ga.ī ghar kī sūrat na vo dīvār kī sūrat hai na dar kī sūrat 
kis se paimān-e-vafā bāñdh rahī hai bulbul kal na pahchān sakegī gul-e-tar kī sūrat 
hai ġham-e-roz-e-judā.ī na nashāt-e-shab-e-vasl ho ga.ī aur hī kuchh shām-o-sahar kī sūrat 
apnī jeboñ se raheñ saare namāzī hushyār ik buzurg aate haiñ masjid meñ ḳhizar kī sūrat 
dekhiye shaiḳh musavvir se khiche yā na khiche sūrat aur aap se be-aib bashar kī sūrat 
vā.izo ātish-e-dozaḳh se jahāñ ko tum ne ye Darāyā hai ki ḳhud ban ga.e Dar kī sūrat 
kyā ḳhabar zāhid-e-qāne ko ki kyā chiiz hai hirs us ne dekhī hī nahīñ kīsa-e-zar kī sūrat 
maiñ bachā tīr-e-havādis se nishāna ban kar aaḌe aa.ī mirī taslīm-e-sipar kī sūrat 
shauq meñ us ke mazā dard meñ us ke lazzat nāseho us se nahīñ koī mafar kī sūrat 
hamla apne pe bhī ik bād-e-hazīmat hai zarūr rah ga.ī hai yahī ik fat.h o zafar kī sūrat 
rahnumāoñ ke hue jaate haiñ ausān ḳhatā raah meñ kuchh nazar aatī hai ḳhatar kī sūrat 
yuuñ to aayā hai tabāhī meñ ye beḌā sau baar par Darātī hai bahut aaj bhañvar kī sūrat 
un ko 'hālī' bhī bulāte haiñ ghar apne mehmāñ dekhnā aap kī aur aap ke ghar kī sūrat 
us ke jate hi ye kya ho gai ghar ki surat na wo diwar ki surat hai na dar ki surat 
kis se paiman-e-wafa bandh rahi hai bulbul kal na pahchan sakegi gul-e-tar ki surat 
hai gham-e-roz-e-judai na nashat-e-shab-e-wasl ho gai aur hi kuchh sham-o-sahar ki surat 
apni jebon se rahen sare namazi hushyar ek buzurg aate hain masjid mein KHizar ki surat 
dekhiye shaiKH musawwir se khiche ya na khiche surat aur aap se be-aib bashar ki surat 
waizo aatish-e-dozaKH se jahan ko tum ne ye Daraya hai ki KHud ban gae Dar ki surat 
kya KHabar zahid-e-qane ko ki kya chiz hai hirs us ne dekhi hi nahin kisa-e-zar ki surat 
main bacha tir-e-hawadis se nishana ban kar aaDe aai meri taslim-e-sipar ki surat 
shauq mein us ke maza dard mein us ke lazzat naseho us se nahin koi mafar ki surat 
hamla apne pe bhi ek baad-e-hazimat hai zarur rah gai hai yahi ek fath o zafar ki surat 
rahnumaon ke hue jate hain ausan KHata rah mein kuchh nazar aati hai KHatar ki surat 
yun to aaya hai tabahi mein ye beDa sau bar par Daraati hai bahut aaj bhanwar ki surat 
un ko 'haali' bhi bulate hain ghar apne mehman dekhna aap ki aur aap ke ghar ki surat

sozish-e-ġham ke sivā kāhish-e-furqat ke sivā ishq meñ kuchh bhī nahīñ dard kī lazzat ke sivā 
dil meñ ab kuchh bhī nahīñ un kī mohabbat ke sivā sab fasāne haiñ haqīqat meñ haqīqat ke sivā 
kaun kah saktā hai ye ahl-e-tarīqat ke sivā saare jhagḌe haiñ jahāñ meñ tirī nisbat ke sivā 
kitne chehroñ ne mujhe dāvat-e-jalva baḳhshī koī sūrat na milī aap kī sūrat ke sivā 
ġham-e-uqbā ġham-e-daurāñ ġham-e-hastī kī qasam aur bhī ġham haiñ zamāne meñ mohabbat ke sivā 
bazm-e-jānāñ meñ are zauq-e-farāvāñ ab tak kuchh bhī hāsil na huā dīda-e-hairat ke sivā 
vo shab-e-hijr vo tārīk fazā vo vahshat koī ġham-ḳhvār na thā dard kī shiddat ke sivā 
mohtasib aao chaleñ aaj to mai-ḳhāne meñ ek jannat hai vahāñ aap kī jannat ke sivā 
jo tahī-dast bhī hai aur tahī-dāman bhī vo kahāñ jā.egā tere dar-e-daulat ke sivā 
jis ne qudrat ke har iqdām se Takkar lī hai vo pashīmāñ na huā jabr-e-mashiyyat ke sivā 
mujh se ye pūchh rahe haiñ mire ahbāb 'azīz' kyā milā shahr-e-suḳhan meñ tumheñ shohrat ke sivā 
sozish-e-gham ke siwa kahish-e-furqat ke siwa ishq mein kuchh bhi nahin dard ki lazzat ke siwa 
dil mein ab kuchh bhi nahin un ki mohabbat ke siwa sab fasane hain haqiqat mein haqiqat ke siwa 
kaun kah sakta hai ye ahl-e-tariqat ke siwa sare jhagDe hain jahan mein teri nisbat ke siwa 
kitne chehron ne mujhe dawat-e-jalwa baKHshi koi surat na mili aap ki surat ke siwa 
gham-e-uqba gham-e-dauran gham-e-hasti ki qasam aur bhi gham hain zamane mein mohabbat ke siwa 
bazm-e-jaanan mein are zauq-e-farawan ab tak kuchh bhi hasil na hua dida-e-hairat ke siwa 
wo shab-e-hijr wo tarik faza wo wahshat koi gham-KHwar na tha dard ki shiddat ke siwa 
mohtasib aao chalen aaj to mai-KHane mein ek jannat hai wahan aap ki jannat ke siwa 
jo tahi-dast bhi hai aur tahi-daman bhi wo kahan jaega tere dar-e-daulat ke siwa 
jis ne qudrat ke har iqdam se Takkar li hai wo pashiman na hua jabr-e-mashiyyat ke siwa 
mujh se ye puchh rahe hain mere ahbab 'aziz' kya mila shahr-e-suKHan mein tumhein shohrat ke siwa

māshūq hameñ baat kā puurā nahīñ miltā dil jis se milā.eñ koī aisā nahīñ miltā 
duniyā meñ agar DhūñDiye to kyā nahīñ miltā sab milte haiñ ik chāhne vaalā nahīñ miltā 
ushshāq se yuuñ aañkh tumhārī nahīñ miltī aġhyār se dil jaise hamārā nahīñ miltā 
rahtī hai kasar ek na ik baat kī sab meñ ham ko to in achchhoñ meñ bhī achchhā nahīñ miltā 
kuchh haal sune kuchh hameñ tadbīr batā.e ġham-ḳhvār to kaisā koī itnā nahīñ miltā 
kyā muft meñ tum dil ke ḳharīdār bane ho be-ḳharch kiye daam ye saudā nahīñ miltā 
jab dekhiye hamrāh hai dushman kā tasavvur ham se to vo ḳhalvat meñ bhī tanhā nahīñ miltā 
dil koī milātā nahīñ TuuTe hue dil se duniyā meñ hameñ joḌ hamārā nahīñ miltā 
barbād kiyā yaas ne yuuñ ḳhāna-e-dil ko DhūñDe se bhī ab dāġh-e-tamannā nahīñ miltā 
jo baat hai duniyā se nirālī hai na.ī hai andāz kisī meñ bhī tumhārā nahīñ miltā 
āñkheñ kahe detī haiñ ki dil saaf nahīñ hai miltā hai vo is rañg se goyā nahīñ miltā 
kahte haiñ jalāne ko ham aġhyār ke muñh par aisoñ se to vo rashk-e-masīhā nahīñ miltā 
zāhir hai mulāqāt hai bātin meñ judā.ī tum milte ho dil ham se tumhārā nahīñ miltā 
afsos to ye hai ki tumheñ qadr nahīñ hai āshiq to zamāne meñ bhī DhūñDā nahīñ miltā 
kahnā vo sharārat se tirā dil ko churā kar kyā DhūñDte ho ham se kaho kyā nahīñ miltā 
'beḳhud' nigah-e-lutf pe de Dāliye dil ko jo miltā hai sarkār se thoḌā nahīñ miltā 
mashuq hamein baat ka pura nahin milta dil jis se milaen koi aisa nahin milta 
duniya mein agar DhunDiye to kya nahin milta sab milte hain ek chahne wala nahin milta 
ushshaq se yun aankh tumhaari nahin milti aghyar se dil jaise hamara nahin milta 
rahti hai kasar ek na ek baat ki sab mein hum ko to in achchhon mein bhi achchha nahin milta 
kuchh haal sune kuchh hamein tadbir batae gham-KHwar to kaisa koi itna nahin milta 
kya muft mein tum dil ke KHaridar bane ho be-KHarch kiye dam ye sauda nahin milta 
jab dekhiye hamrah hai dushman ka tasawwur hum se to wo KHalwat mein bhi tanha nahin milta 
dil koi milata nahin TuTe hue dil se duniya mein hamein joD hamara nahin milta 
barbaad kiya yas ne yun KHana-e-dil ko DhunDe se bhi ab dagh-e-tamanna nahin milta 
jo baat hai duniya se nirali hai nai hai andaz kisi mein bhi tumhaara nahin milta 
aankhen kahe deti hain ki dil saf nahin hai milta hai wo is rang se goya nahin milta 
kahte hain jalane ko hum aghyar ke munh par aison se to wo rashk-e-masiha nahin milta 
zahir hai mulaqat hai baatin mein judai tum milte ho dil hum se tumhaara nahin milta 
afsos to ye hai ki tumhein qadr nahin hai aashiq to zamane mein bhi DhunDa nahin milta 
kahna wo shararat se tera dil ko chura kar kya DhunDte ho hum se kaho kya nahin milta 
'beKHud' nigah-e-lutf pe de Daliye dil ko jo milta hai sarkar se thoDa nahin milta

husn-e-parī ik jalva-e-mastāna hai us kā hushyār vahī hai ki jo dīvāna hai us kā 
gul aate haiñ hastī meñ adam se hama-tan-gosh bulbul kā ye naala nahīñ afsāna hai us kā 
giryāñ hai agar sham.a to sar dhuntā hai shola mālūm huā soḳhta-parvāna hai us kā 
vo shoḳh nihāñ-ganj kī mānind hai us meñ māmūra-e-ālam jo hai vīrāna hai us kā 
jo chashm ki hairāñ huī ā.īna hai us kī jo siina ki sad chaak huā shāna hai us kā 
dil qasr-e-shahanshah hai vo shoḳh us meñ shahanshāh arsa ye do aalam kā jilau ḳhāna hai us kā 
vo yaad hai us kī ki bhulā de do jahāñ ko hālat ko kare ġhair vo yārāna hai us kā 
yūsuf nahīñ jo haath lage chand diram se qīmat jo do aalam kī hai bai.āna hai us kā 
āvārgi-e-nik.hat-e-gul hai ye ishāra jaame se vo bāhar hai jo dīvāna hai us kā 
ye haal huā us ke faqīroñ se huvaidā ālūda-e-duniyā jo hai begāna hai us kā 
shukrāna-e-sāqi-e-azal kartā hai 'ātish' labrez mai-e-shauq se paimāna hai us kā 
husn-e-pari ek jalwa-e-mastana hai us ka hushyar wahi hai ki jo diwana hai us ka 
gul aate hain hasti mein adam se hama-tan-gosh bulbul ka ye nala nahin afsana hai us ka 
giryan hai agar shama to sar dhunta hai shola malum hua soKHta-parwana hai us ka 
wo shoKH nihan-ganj ki manind hai us mein mamura-e-alam jo hai virana hai us ka 
jo chashm ki hairan hui aaina hai us ki jo sina ki sad chaak hua shana hai us ka 
dil qasr-e-shahanshah hai wo shoKH us mein shahanshah arsa ye do aalam ka jilau KHana hai us ka 
wo yaad hai us ki ki bhula de do jahan ko haalat ko kare ghair wo yarana hai us ka 
yusuf nahin jo hath lage chand diram se qimat jo do aalam ki hai baiana hai us ka 
aawargi-e-nikhat-e-gul hai ye ishaara jame se wo bahar hai jo diwana hai us ka 
ye haal hua us ke faqiron se huwaida aaluda-e-duniya jo hai begana hai us ka 
shukrana-e-saqi-e-azal karta hai 'atish' labrez mai-e-shauq se paimana hai us ka

go javānī meñ thī kaj-rā.ī bahut par javānī ham ko yaad aa.ī bahut 
zer-e-burqa.a tū ne kyā dikhlā diyā jam.a haiñ har sū tamāshā.ī bahut 
haT pe is kī aur pis jaate haiñ dil raas hai kuchh us ko ḳhud-rā.ī bahut 
sarv yā gul aañkh meñ jachte nahīñ dil pe hai naqsh us kī rānā.ī bahut 
chuur thā zaḳhmoñ meñ aur kahtā thā dil rāhat is taklīf meñ paa.ī bahut 
aa rahī hai chāh-e-yūsuf se sadā dost yaañ thoḌe haiñ aur bhaa.ī bahut 
vasl ke ho ho ke sāmāñ rah ga.e meñh na barsā aur ghaTā chhā.ī bahut 
jāñ-nisārī par vo bol uTThe mirī haiñ fidā.ī kam tamāshā.ī bahut 
ham ne har adnā ko aalā kar diyā ḳhāksārī apnī kaam aa.ī bahut 
kar diyā chup vāqi.āt-e-dahr ne thī kabhī ham meñ bhī goyā.ī bahut 
ghaT ga.iiñ ḳhud talḳhiyāñ ayyām kī yā ga.ī kuchh baḌh shakebā.ī bahut 
ham na kahte the ki 'hālī' chup raho rāst-goī meñ hai rusvā.ī bahut 
go jawani mein thi kaj-rai bahut par jawani hum ko yaad aai bahut 
zer-e-burqa tu ne kya dikhla diya jama hain har su tamashai bahut 
haT pe is ki aur pis jate hain dil ras hai kuchh us ko KHud-rai bahut 
sarw ya gul aankh mein jachte nahin dil pe hai naqsh us ki ranai bahut 
chur tha zaKHmon mein aur kahta tha dil rahat is taklif mein pai bahut 
aa rahi hai chah-e-yusuf se sada dost yan thoDe hain aur bhai bahut 
wasl ke ho ho ke saman rah gae meinh na barsa aur ghaTa chhai bahut 
jaan-nisari par wo bol uTThe meri hain fidai kam tamashai bahut 
hum ne har adna ko aala kar diya KHaksari apni kaam aai bahut 
kar diya chup waqiat-e-dahr ne thi kabhi hum mein bhi goyai bahut 
ghaT gain KHud talKHiyan ayyam ki ya gai kuchh baDh shakebai bahut 
hum na kahte the ki 'haali' chup raho rast-goi mein hai ruswai bahut

jo mujh ko dekh ke kal raat ro paḌā thā bahut vo merā kuchh bhī na thā phir bhī āshnā thā bahut 
maiñ ab bhī raat ga.e us kī guuñj suntā huuñ vo harf kam thā bahut kam magar sadā thā bahut 
zamīñ ke siine meñ sūraj kahāñ se utre haiñ falak pe duur koī baiThā sochtā thā bahut 
mujhe jo dekhā to kāġhaz ko purze purze kiyā vo apnī shakl ke ḳhāke banā rahā thā bahut 
maiñ apne haath se niklā to phir kahīñ na milā zamāna mere ta.āqub meñ bhī gayā thā bahut 
shikast-o-reḳht badan kī ab apne bas meñ nahīñ use batā.ūñ ki vo ramz-āshnā thā bahut 
bisāt us ne ulaT dī na jaane soch ke kyā abhī to logoñ meñ jiine kā hauslā thā bahut 
ajab sharīk-e-safar thā ki jab paḌāv kiyā vo mere paas na Thahrā magar rukā thā bahut 
sehr ke chāk-e-garebāñ ko dekhne ke liye vo shaḳhs sub.h talak shab ko jāgtā thā bahut 
vo kam-suḳhan thā magar aisā kam-suḳhan bhī na thā ki sach hī boltā thā jab bhī boltā thā bahut 
havā ke lams se chehre pe phuul khilte the vo chāñdnī sā badan mauja-e-sabā thā bahut 
pas-e-darīcha do āñkheñ chamaktī rahtī thiiñ ki us ko niiñd meñ chalne kā āriza thā bahut 
kahāniyoñ kī fazā bhī use thī raas 'aḳhtar' haqīqatoñ se bhī ohda-bar-ā huā thā bahut 
jo mujh ko dekh ke kal raat ro paDa tha bahut wo mera kuchh bhi na tha phir bhi aashna tha bahut 
main ab bhi raat gae us ki gunj sunta hun wo harf kam tha bahut kam magar sada tha bahut 
zamin ke sine mein suraj kahan se utre hain falak pe dur koi baiTha sochta tha bahut 
mujhe jo dekha to kaghaz ko purze purze kiya wo apni shakl ke KHake bana raha tha bahut 
main apne hath se nikla to phir kahin na mila zamana mere taaqub mein bhi gaya tha bahut 
shikast-o-reKHt badan ki ab apne bas mein nahin use bataun ki wo ramz-ashna tha bahut 
bisat us ne ulaT di na jaane soch ke kya abhi to logon mein jine ka hausla tha bahut 
ajab sharik-e-safar tha ki jab paDaw kiya wo mere pas na Thahra magar ruka tha bahut 
sehr ke chaak-e-gareban ko dekhne ke liye wo shaKHs subh talak shab ko jagta tha bahut 
wo kam-suKHan tha magar aisa kam-suKHan bhi na tha ki sach hi bolta tha jab bhi bolta tha bahut 
hawa ke lams se chehre pe phul khilte the wo chandni sa badan mauja-e-saba tha bahut 
pas-e-daricha do aankhen chamakti rahti thin ki us ko nind mein chalne ka aariza tha bahut 
kahaniyon ki faza bhi use thi ras 'aKHtar' haqiqaton se bhi ohda-bar-a hua tha bahut

chale chalo jahāñ le jaa.e valvala dil kā dalīl-e-rāh-e-mohabbat hai faisla dil kā 
havā-e-kūcha-e-qātil se bas nahīñ chaltā kashāñ-kashāñ liye jaatā hai valvala dil kā 
gila kise hai ki qātil ne nīm-jāñ chhoḌā taḌap taḌap ke nikālūñgā hausla dil kā 
ḳhudā bachā.e ki nāzuk hai un meñ ek se ek tunak-mizājoñ se Thahrā mo.āmla dil kā 
dikhā rahā hai ye donoñ jahāñ kī kaifiyat karegā sāġhar-e-jam kyā muqābla dil kā 
havā se vādi-e-vahshat meñ bāteñ karte ho bhalā yahāñ koī suntā bhī hai gila dil kā 
qayāmat aa.ī khulā rāz-e-ishq kā daftar baḌā ġhazab huā phūTā hai aabla dil kā 
kisī ke ho raho achchhī nahīñ ye āzādī kisī kī zulf se lāzim hai silsila dil kā 
pyāla ḳhālī uThā kar lagā liyā muñh se ki 'yās' kuchh to nikal jaa.e hausla dil kā 
chale chalo jahan le jae walwala dil ka dalil-e-rah-e-mohabbat hai faisla dil ka 
hawa-e-kucha-e-qatil se bas nahin chalta kashan-kashan liye jata hai walwala dil ka 
gila kise hai ki qatil ne nim-jaan chhoDa taDap taDap ke nikalunga hausla dil ka 
KHuda bachae ki nazuk hai un mein ek se ek tunak-mizajon se Thahra moamla dil ka 
dikha raha hai ye donon jahan ki kaifiyat karega saghar-e-jam kya muqabla dil ka 
hawa se wadi-e-wahshat mein baaten karte ho bhala yahan koi sunta bhi hai gila dil ka 
qayamat aai khula raaz-e-ishq ka daftar baDa ghazab hua phuTa hai aabla dil ka 
kisi ke ho raho achchhi nahin ye aazadi kisi ki zulf se lazim hai silsila dil ka 
pyala KHali uTha kar laga liya munh se ki 'yas' kuchh to nikal jae hausla dil ka

hameñ vaqf-e-ġham sar-ba-sar dekh lete vo tum kuchh na karte magar dekh lete 
na karte kabhī ḳhvāhish-e-sair-e-jannat jo vaa.iz tirā rahguzar dekh lete 
rasā.ī kahāñ bazm-e-dushman meñ apnī ki ham bhī unheñ ik nazar dekh lete 
tamannā ko phir kuchh shikāyat na rahtī jo tum bhuul kar bhī idhar dekh lete 
na rahtī ḳhabar diin o duniyā kī 'hasrat' jo sote unheñ be-ḳhabar dekh lete 
hamein waqf-e-gham sar-ba-sar dekh lete wo tum kuchh na karte magar dekh lete 
na karte kabhi KHwahish-e-sair-e-jannat jo waiz tera rahguzar dekh lete 
rasai kahan bazm-e-dushman mein apni ki hum bhi unhen ek nazar dekh lete 
tamanna ko phir kuchh shikayat na rahti jo tum bhul kar bhi idhar dekh lete 
na rahti KHabar din o duniya ki 'hasrat' jo sote unhen be-KHabar dekh lete

ek ḳhudā par takiya kar ke baiTh ga.e haiñ dekho ham bhī kyā kyā kar ke baiTh ga.e haiñ 
pūchh rahe haiñ log are vo shaḳhs kahāñ hai jaane kaun tamāshā kar ke baiTh ga.e haiñ 
utre the maidān meñ sab kuchh Thiik kareñge sab kuchh ulTā sīdhā kar ke baiTh ga.e haiñ 
saare shajar shādābī sameTe apnī apnī dhuup meñ gahrā saaya kar ke baiTh ga.e haiñ 
lauT ga.e sab soch ke ghar meñ koī nahīñ hai aur ye ham ki añdherā kar ke baiTh ga.e haiñ 
ek KHuda par takiya kar ke baiTh gae hain dekho hum bhi kya kya kar ke baiTh gae hain 
puchh rahe hain log are wo shaKHs kahan hai jaane kaun tamasha kar ke baiTh gae hain 
utre the maidan mein sab kuchh Thik karenge sab kuchh ulTa sidha kar ke baiTh gae hain 
sare shajar shadabi sameTe apni apni dhup mein gahra saya kar ke baiTh gae hain 
lauT gae sab soch ke ghar mein koi nahin hai aur ye hum ki andhera kar ke baiTh gae hain

kabhī dekho to maujoñ kā taḌapnā kaisā lagtā hai ye dariyā itnā paanī pī ke pyāsā kaisā lagtā hai 
ham us se thoḌī duurī par hamesha ruk se jaate haiñ na jaane us se milne kā irāda kaisā lagtā hai 
maiñ dhīre dhīre un kā dushman-e-jāñ bantā jaatā huuñ vo āñkheñ kitnī qātil haiñ vo chehra kaisā lagtā hai 
zavāl-e-jism ko dekho to kuchh ehsās ho is kā bikhartā zarra zarra koī sahrā kaisā lagtā hai 
falak par uḌte jaate bādaloñ ko dekhtā huuñ maiñ havā kahtī hai mujh se ye tamāshā kaisā lagtā hai 
kabhi dekho to maujon ka taDapna kaisa lagta hai ye dariya itna pani pi ke pyasa kaisa lagta hai 
hum us se thoDi duri par hamesha ruk se jate hain na jaane us se milne ka irada kaisa lagta hai 
main dhire dhire un ka dushman-e-jaan banta jata hun wo aankhen kitni qatil hain wo chehra kaisa lagta hai 
zawal-e-jism ko dekho to kuchh ehsas ho is ka bikharta zarra zarra koi sahra kaisa lagta hai 
falak par uDte jate baadalon ko dekhta hun main hawa kahti hai mujh se ye tamasha kaisa lagta hai

jism par sābun thā paanī ġhusl-ḳhāne se gayā aap kī mistake Thahrī maiñ nahāne se gayā 
ik minister ne sajā.ī mahfil-e-raqs-o-surūr nāchne vaalī kā bil qaumī ḳhazāne se gayā 
qādrī ne DaañT kuchh aisī pilā.ī sher ko sher muslim-league kā thā dum hilāne se gayā 
aa gayā thā ek shā.er dost pakistan se chaa.e se Thahrā rahā whiskey pilāne se gayā 
film taqsīm-e-virāsat kā yahī the-end hai dard kuchh aisā thā jo gardan dabāne se gayā 
ik ġharīb ustād kī tuition Thikāne lag ga.ī mājida dulhan banī teacher paḌhāne se gayā 
us ke gāloñ par ka.ī dast-e-hinā.ī sabt haiñ ishq kā nashsha thā āḳhir maar khāne se gayā 
itnī mahñgā.ī hai biryānī koī laatā nahīñ phir koī bhūkā mujāvar āstāne se gayā 
us kī mayyat meñ sabhī aḳhbār paḌh paḌh kar ga.e 'ḳhālid'-e-irfān shā.er thā bulāne se gayā 
jism par sabun tha pani ghusl-KHane se gaya aap ki mistake Thahri main nahane se gaya 
ek minister ne sajai mahfil-e-raqs-o-surur nachne wali ka bil qaumi KHazane se gaya 
qadri ne DanT kuchh aisi pilai sher ko sher muslim-league ka tha dum hilane se gaya 
aa gaya tha ek shaer dost pakistan se chae se Thahra raha whiskey pilane se gaya 
film taqsim-e-wirasat ka yahi the-end hai dard kuchh aisa tha jo gardan dabane se gaya 
ek gharib ustad ki tuition Thikane lag gai majida dulhan bani teacher paDhane se gaya 
us ke galon par kai dast-e-hinai sabt hain ishq ka nashsha tha aaKHir mar khane se gaya 
itni mahngai hai biryani koi lata nahin phir koi bhuka mujawar aastane se gaya 
us ki mayyat mein sabhi aKHbar paDh paDh kar gae 'KHalid'-e-irfan shaer tha bulane se gaya

hone kī gavāhī ke liye ḳhaak bahut hai yā kuchh bhī nahīñ hone kā idrāk bahut hai 
ik bhūlī huī baat hai ik TuuTā huā ḳhvāb ham ahl-e-mohabbat ko ye imlāk bahut hai 
kuchh dar-badarī raas bahut aa.ī hai mujh ko kuchh ḳhāna-ḳharāboñ meñ mirī dhaak bahut hai 
parvāz ko par khol nahīñ paatā huuñ apne aur dekhne meñ vus.at-e-aflāk bahut hai 
kyā us se mulāqāt kā imkāñ bhī nahīñ ab kyuuñ in dinoñ mailī tirī poshāk bahut hai 
āñkhoñ meñ haiñ mahfūz tire ishq ke lamhāt dariyā ko ḳhayāl-e-ḳhas-o-ḳhāshāk bahut hai 
nādim hai bahut tū bhī 'jamāl' apne kiye par aur dekh le vo aañkh bhī namnāk bahut hai 
hone ki gawahi ke liye KHak bahut hai ya kuchh bhi nahin hone ka idrak bahut hai 
ek bhuli hui baat hai ek TuTa hua KHwab hum ahl-e-mohabbat ko ye imlak bahut hai 
kuchh dar-badari ras bahut aai hai mujh ko kuchh KHana-KHarabon mein meri dhak bahut hai 
parwaz ko par khol nahin pata hun apne aur dekhne mein wusat-e-aflak bahut hai 
kya us se mulaqat ka imkan bhi nahin ab kyun in dinon maili teri poshak bahut hai 
aankhon mein hain mahfuz tere ishq ke lamhat dariya ko KHayal-e-KHas-o-KHashak bahut hai 
nadim hai bahut tu bhi 'jamal' apne kiye par aur dekh le wo aankh bhi namnak bahut hai

kyā kyā na rañg tere talabgār lā chuke mastoñ ko josh sūfiyoñ ko haal aa chuke 
hastī ko misl-e-naqsh-e-kaf-e-pā miTā chuke āshiq naqāb-e-shāhid-e-maqsūd uThā chuke 
kaabe se dair dair se kaabe ko jā chuke kyā kyā na is do-rāhe meñ ham pher khā chuke 
gustāḳh haath tauq-e-kamar yaar ke hue hadd-e-adab se paañv ko aage baḌhā chuke 
kan.āñ se shahr-e-misr meñ yūsuf ko le ga.e bāzār meñ bhī husn ko āḳhir dikhā chuke 
pahuñche taḌap taḌap ke bhī jallād tak na ham tāqat se haath paañv ziyāda hilā chuke 
hotī hai tan meñ ruuh payām-e-ajal se shaad din vāda-e-visāl ke nazdīk aa chuke 
paimāna merī umr kā labrez ho kahīñ saaqī mujhe bhī ab to pyāla pilā chuke 
dīvāna jānte haiñ tirā hoshyār unheñ jaame ko jism ke bhī jo purze uḌā chuke 
be-vaj.h har dam aa.ina pesh-e-nazar nahīñ samjhe ham aap āñkhoñ meñ apnī samā chuke 
us dilrubā se vasl huā de ke jaan ko yūsuf ko mol le chuke qīmat chukā chuke 
uTThā naqāb chehra-e-zebā-e-yār se dīvār darmiyāñ jo thī ham us ko Dhā chuke 
zer-e-zamīñ bhī taḌpeñge ai āsmān-e-husn betāb tere gor meñ bhī chain pā chuke 
ārā.ish-e-jamāl balā kā nuzūl hai andher kar diyā jo vo missī lagā chuke 
do abrū aur do lab-e-jāñ-baḳhsh yaar ke zindoñ ko qatl kar chuke murde jilā chuke 
majbūr kar diyā hai mohabbat ne yaar kī bāhar ham iḳhtiyār se haiñ apne jā chuke 
sadmoñ ne ishq-e-husn ke dam kar diyā fanā 'ātish' sazā gunāh-e-mohabbat kī pā chuke 
kya kya na rang tere talabgar la chuke maston ko josh sufiyon ko haal aa chuke 
hasti ko misl-e-naqsh-e-kaf-e-pa miTa chuke aashiq naqab-e-shahid-e-maqsud uTha chuke 
kabe se dair dair se kabe ko ja chuke kya kya na is do-rahe mein hum pher kha chuke 
gustaKH hath tauq-e-kamar yar ke hue hadd-e-adab se panw ko aage baDha chuke 
kanan se shahr-e-misr mein yusuf ko le gae bazar mein bhi husn ko aaKHir dikha chuke 
pahunche taDap taDap ke bhi jallad tak na hum taqat se hath panw ziyaada hila chuke 
hoti hai tan mein ruh payam-e-ajal se shad din wada-e-visal ke nazdik aa chuke 
paimana meri umr ka labrez ho kahin saqi mujhe bhi ab to pyala pila chuke 
diwana jaante hain tera hoshyar unhen jame ko jism ke bhi jo purze uDa chuke 
be-wajh har dam aaina pesh-e-nazar nahin samjhe hum aap aankhon mein apni sama chuke 
us dilruba se wasl hua de ke jaan ko yusuf ko mol le chuke qimat chuka chuke 
uTTha naqab chehra-e-zeba-e-yar se diwar darmiyan jo thi hum us ko Dha chuke 
zer-e-zamin bhi taDpenge ai aasman-e-husn betab tere gor mein bhi chain pa chuke 
aaraish-e-jamal bala ka nuzul hai andher kar diya jo wo missi laga chuke 
do abru aur do lab-e-jaan-baKHsh yar ke zindon ko qatl kar chuke murde jila chuke 
majbur kar diya hai mohabbat ne yar ki bahar hum iKHtiyar se hain apne ja chuke 
sadmon ne ishq-e-husn ke dam kar diya fana 'atish' saza gunah-e-mohabbat ki pa chuke

malbūs jab havā ne badan se churā liye doshīzgān-e-sub.h ne chehre chhupā liye 
ham ne to apne jism pe zaḳhmoñ ke aa.ine har hādse kī yaad samajh ke sajā liye 
mīzān-e-adl terā jhukāo hai jis taraf us samt se diloñ ne baḌe zaḳhm khā liye 
dīvār kyā girī mire ḳhasta makān kī logoñ ne mere sahn meñ raste banā liye 
logoñ kī chādaroñ pe banātī rahī vo phuul paivand us ne apnī qabā meñ sajā liye 
har marhale ke dosh pe tarkash ko dekh kar maaoñ ne apnī god meñ bachche chhupā liye 
malbus jab hawa ne badan se chura liye doshizgan-e-subh ne chehre chhupa liye 
hum ne to apne jism pe zaKHmon ke aaine har hadse ki yaad samajh ke saja liye 
mizan-e-adl tera jhukao hai jis taraf us samt se dilon ne baDe zaKHm kha liye 
diwar kya giri mere KHasta makan ki logon ne mere sahn mein raste bana liye 
logon ki chadaron pe banati rahi wo phul paiwand us ne apni qaba mein saja liye 
har marhale ke dosh pe tarkash ko dekh kar maon ne apni god mein bachche chhupa liye

jab fikroñ par bādal se mañDlāte hoñge insāñ ghaT kar saa.e se rah jaate hoñge 
do din ko gulshan pe bahār aane ko hogī panchhī dil meñ raag sadā ke gaate hoñge 
duniyā to sīdhī hai lekin duniyā vaale jhūTī sachchī kah ke use bahkāte hoñge 
yaad aa jaatā hogā koī jab raahī ko chalte chalte paañv vahīñ ruk jaate hoñge 
kalī kalī birhan kī chitā ban jaatī hogī kaale bādal ghir kar aage lagāte hoñge 
dukh meñ kyā karte hoñge daulat ke pujārī ruup khilaunā toḌ ke man bahlāte hoñge 
jab fikron par baadal se manDlate honge insan ghaT kar sae se rah jate honge 
do din ko gulshan pe bahaar aane ko hogi panchhi dil mein rag sada ke gate honge 
duniya to sidhi hai lekin duniya wale jhuTi sachchi kah ke use bahkate honge 
yaad aa jata hoga koi jab rahi ko chalte chalte panw wahin ruk jate honge 
kali kali birhan ki chita ban jati hogi kale baadal ghir kar aage lagate honge 
dukh mein kya karte honge daulat ke pujari rup khilauna toD ke man bahlate honge

haqīqat mahram-e-asrār se pūchh mazā añgūr kā mai-ḳhvār se pūchh 
vafā aġhyār kī aġhyār se sun mirī ulfat dar o dīvār se pūchh 
hamārī āh-e-be-tāsīr kā haal kuchh apne dil se kuchh aġhyār se pūchh 
diloñ meñ Dālnā zauq-e-asīrī kamand-e-gesū-e-ḳhamdār se pūchh 
dil-e-mahjūr se sun lazzat-e-vasl nashāt-e-āfiyat bīmār se pūchh 
nahīñ juz girya-e-ġham hāsil-e-ishq hamārī chashm-e-dariyā-bār se pūchh 
nahīñ āb-e-baqā juz jalva-e-dost kisī lab-tishna-e-dīdār se pūchh 
fareb-e-vāda-e-dildār kī qadr shahīd-e-ḳhanjar-e-inkār se pūchh 
fuġhān-e-shauq ko maane nahīñ vasl ye nukta andalīb-e-zār se pūchh 
tasavvur meñ kiyā karte haiñ jo ham vo tasvīr-e-ḳhayāl-e-yār se pūchh 
matā-e-be-bahā hai sher-e-'hālī' mirī qīmat mirī guftār se pūchh 
haqiqat mahram-e-asrar se puchh maza angur ka mai-KHwar se puchh 
wafa aghyar ki aghyar se sun meri ulfat dar o diwar se puchh 
hamari aah-e-be-tasir ka haal kuchh apne dil se kuchh aghyar se puchh 
dilon mein Dalna zauq-e-asiri kamand-e-gesu-e-KHamdar se puchh 
dil-e-mahjur se sun lazzat-e-wasl nashat-e-afiyat bimar se puchh 
nahin juz girya-e-gham hasil-e-ishq hamari chashm-e-dariya-bar se puchh 
nahin aab-e-baqa juz jalwa-e-dost kisi lab-tishna-e-didar se puchh 
fareb-e-wada-e-dildar ki qadr shahid-e-KHanjar-e-inkar se puchh 
fughan-e-shauq ko mane nahin wasl ye nukta andalib-e-zar se puchh 
tasawwur mein kiya karte hain jo hum wo taswir-e-KHayal-e-yar se puchh 
mata-e-be-baha hai sher-e-'haali' meri qimat meri guftar se puchh

paiham mauj-e-imkānī meñ aglā paañv na.e paanī meñ 
saf-e-shafaq se mire bistar tak sātoñ rañg farāvānī meñ 
badan visāl-āhañg havā sā qabā ajiib pareshānī meñ 
kyā sālim pahchān hai us kī vo ki nahīñ apne saanī meñ 
Tok ke jaane kyā kahtā vo us ne sunā sab be-dhyānī meñ 
yaad tirī jaise ki sar-e-shām dhund utar jaa.e paanī meñ 
ḳhud se kabhī mil letā huuñ maiñ sannāTe meñ vīrānī meñ 
āḳhir sochā dekh hī liije kyā kartā hai vo man-mānī meñ 
ek diyā ākāsh meñ 'bānī' ek charāġh sā peshānī meñ 
paiham mauj-e-imkani mein agla panw nae pani mein 
saf-e-shafaq se mere bistar tak saton rang farawani mein 
badan visal-ahang hawa sa qaba ajib pareshani mein 
kya salim pahchan hai us ki wo ki nahin apne sani mein 
Tok ke jaane kya kahta wo us ne suna sab be-dhyani mein 
yaad teri jaise ki sar-e-sham dhund utar jae pani mein 
KHud se kabhi mil leta hun main sannaTe mein virani mein 
aaKHir socha dekh hi lije kya karta hai wo man-mani mein 
ek diya aakash mein 'bani' ek charagh sa peshani mein

phuul allāh ne banā.e haiñ mahakne ke liye aur bulbul ko banāyā hai chahakne ke liye 
ātish-e-ġham se banāyā hai mire siine meñ dil ko añgāre kī mānind dahakne ke liye 
bache kam-baḳht vo dil kyūñki bhalā jis dil ke musta.id ho nigah-e-shoḳh uchakne ke liye 
rind kahte haiñ ki ḳhāliq ne kiyā hai paidā raat din nāseh-e-behūda ko bakne ke liye 
rahm ai chashm banāyā hai kahīñ kyā dil ko qatra-e-ashk ho mizhgāñ se Tapakne ke liye 
shaiḳh ko rindoñ se kah do ki nazar meñ rakkheñ kyūñki ab DhūñDe hai qaabū vo khisakne ke liye 
'aish' batlā to banā hai dil-e-hairāñ terā misl-e-ā.īna ye kis shakl ke takne ke liye 
phul allah ne banae hain mahakne ke liye aur bulbul ko banaya hai chahakne ke liye 
aatish-e-gham se banaya hai mere sine mein dil ko angare ki manind dahakne ke liye 
bache kam-baKHt wo dil kyunki bhala jis dil ke mustaid ho nigah-e-shoKH uchakne ke liye 
rind kahte hain ki KHaliq ne kiya hai paida raat din naseh-e-behuda ko bakne ke liye 
rahm ai chashm banaya hai kahin kya dil ko qatra-e-ashk ho mizhgan se Tapakne ke liye 
shaiKH ko rindon se kah do ki nazar mein rakkhen kyunki ab DhunDe hai qabu wo khisakne ke liye 
'aish' batla to bana hai dil-e-hairan tera misl-e-aina ye kis shakl ke takne ke liye

dil-e-betāb ke hamrāh safar meñ rahnā ham ne dekhā hī nahīñ chain se ghar meñ rahnā 
svāñg bharnā kabhī shāhī kabhī durveshī kā kisī sūrat se mujhe us kī nazar meñ rahnā 
ek hālat pe basar ho nahīñ saktī merī jāma-e-ḳhāk kabhī ḳhil.at-e-zar meñ rahnā 
din meñ hai fikr-e-pas-andāzi-e-sarmāya-e-shab raat bhar kāvish-e-sāmān-e-sahar meñ rahnā 
dil se bhāge to liyā dīda-e-tar ne goyā aag se bach ke nikalnā to bhañvar meñ rahnā 
ahl-e-duniyā bahut ārām se rahte haiñ magar kab mayassar hai tirī rāhguzar meñ rahnā 
vasl kī raat ga.ī hijr kā din bhī guzrā mujhe vāraftagi-e-hāl-e-digar meñ rahnā 
kar chukā hai koī aflāk o zamīñ kī takmīl phir bhī har aan mujhe arz-e-hunar meñ rahnā 
dil-e-betab ke hamrah safar mein rahna hum ne dekha hi nahin chain se ghar mein rahna 
swang bharna kabhi shahi kabhi durweshi ka kisi surat se mujhe us ki nazar mein rahna 
ek haalat pe basar ho nahin sakti meri jama-e-KHak kabhi KHilat-e-zar mein rahna 
din mein hai fikr-e-pas-andazi-e-sarmaya-e-shab raat bhar kawish-e-saman-e-sahar mein rahna 
dil se bhage to liya dida-e-tar ne goya aag se bach ke nikalna to bhanwar mein rahna 
ahl-e-duniya bahut aaram se rahte hain magar kab mayassar hai teri rahguzar mein rahna 
wasl ki raat gai hijr ka din bhi guzra mujhe waraftagi-e-haal-e-digar mein rahna 
kar chuka hai koi aflak o zamin ki takmil phir bhi har aan mujhe arz-e-hunar mein rahna

kab paañv figār nahīñ hote kab sar meñ dhuul nahīñ hotī tirī raah pe chalne vāloñ se lekin kabhī bhuul nahīñ hotī 
sar-e-kūcha-e-ishq aa pahuñche ho lekin zarā dhyān rahe ki yahāñ koī nekī kaam nahīñ aatī koī duā qubūl nahīñ hotī 
har-chand andesha-e-jāñ hai bahut lekin is kār-e-mohabbat meñ koī pal bekār nahīñ jaatā koī baat fuzūl nahīñ hotī 
tire vasl kī aas badalte hue tire hijr kī aag meñ jalte hue kab dil masrūf nahīñ rahtā kab jaañ mashġhūl nahīñ hotī 
har rañg-e-junūñ bharne vaalo shab-bedārī karne vaalo hai ishq vo mazdūrī jis meñ mehnat bhī vasūl nahīñ hotī 
kab panw figar nahin hote kab sar mein dhul nahin hoti teri rah pe chalne walon se lekin kabhi bhul nahin hoti 
sar-e-kucha-e-ishq aa pahunche ho lekin zara dhyan rahe ki yahan koi neki kaam nahin aati koi dua qubul nahin hoti 
har-chand andesha-e-jaan hai bahut lekin is kar-e-mohabbat mein koi pal bekar nahin jata koi baat fuzul nahin hoti 
tere wasl ki aas badalte hue tere hijr ki aag mein jalte hue kab dil masruf nahin rahta kab jaan mashghul nahin hoti 
har rang-e-junun bharne walo shab-bedari karne walo hai ishq wo mazduri jis mein mehnat bhi wasul nahin hoti

pahlū ke ār-pār guzartā huā sā ho ik shaḳhs aa.ine meñ utartā huā sā ho 
jiitā huā sā ho kabhī martā huā sā ho ik shahr apne aap se Dartā huā sā ho 
saare kabīra aap hī kartā huā sā ho ilzām dūsre hī pe dhartā huā sā ho 
har ik nayā ḳhayāl jo Tapke hai zehn se yuuñ lag rahā hai jaise ki bartā huā sā ho 
qailūla kar rahe hoñ kisī niim ke tale maidāñ meñ raḳhsh-e-umr bhī chartā huā sā ho 
ma.ashūq aisā DhūñDiye qahtur-rijāl meñ har baat meñ agartā magartā huā sā ho 
phir ba.ad meñ vo qatl bhī kar de to harj kyā lekin vo pahle pyaar bhī kartā huā sā ho 
gar daad tū na de na sahī gāliyāñ sahī apnā bhī koī aib hunartā huā sā ho 
pahlu ke aar-par guzarta hua sa ho ek shaKHs aaine mein utarta hua sa ho 
jita hua sa ho kabhi marta hua sa ho ek shahr apne aap se Darta hua sa ho 
sare kabira aap hi karta hua sa ho ilzam dusre hi pe dharta hua sa ho 
har ek naya KHayal jo Tapke hai zehn se yun lag raha hai jaise ki barta hua sa ho 
qailula kar rahe hon kisi nim ke tale maidan mein raKHsh-e-umr bhi charta hua sa ho 
mashuq aisa DhunDiye qahtur-rijal mein har baat mein agarta magarta hua sa ho 
phir baad mein wo qatl bhi kar de to harj kya lekin wo pahle pyar bhi karta hua sa ho 
gar dad tu na de na sahi galiyan sahi apna bhi koi aib hunarta hua sa ho

vahshat meñ bhī ruḳh jānib-e-sahrā na kareñge jab tak ki tumheñ shahr meñ rusvā na kareñge 
ghabrā ga.e betābi-e-dil dekh ke ai jaan Thahro to abhī hijr meñ kyā kyā na kareñge 
mar jā.ūñ to mar jā.ūñ burā māneñ to māneñ phir kaise masīhā haiñ jo achchhā na kareñge 
vo husn meñ kāmil haiñ to ham sabr meñ yaktā tā umr kabhī zikr bhī un kā na kareñge 
chhup chhup ke kaheñge jo chhupāne ke suḳhan haiñ ham tum se kisī baat kā parda na kareñge 
badnāmī se Darte ho abas ishq meñ ai 'barq' kab tak bashar is baat kā charchā na kareñge 
wahshat mein bhi ruKH jaanib-e-sahra na karenge jab tak ki tumhein shahr mein ruswa na karenge 
ghabra gae betabi-e-dil dekh ke ai jaan Thahro to abhi hijr mein kya kya na karenge 
mar jaun to mar jaun bura manen to manen phir kaise masiha hain jo achchha na karenge 
wo husn mein kaamil hain to hum sabr mein yakta ta umr kabhi zikr bhi un ka na karenge 
chhup chhup ke kahenge jo chhupane ke suKHan hain hum tum se kisi baat ka parda na karenge 
badnami se Darte ho abas ishq mein ai 'barq' kab tak bashar is baat ka charcha na karenge

ishq meñ jis ke ye ahvāl banā rakkhā hai ab vahī kahtā hai is vaz.a meñ kyā rakkhā hai 
le chale ho mujhe is bazm meñ yaaro lekin kuchh mirā haal bhī pahle se sunā rakkhā hai 
hāl-e-dil kaun sunā.e use fursat kis ko sab ko is aañkh ne bātoñ meñ lagā rakkhā hai 
dil burā thā ki bhalā kaam vafā ke aayā yaar jaane bhī de is bahas meñ kyā rakkhā hai 
ai sabā aa ki dikhā.eñ tujhe vo gul jis ne bātoñ hī bātoñ meñ gulzār khilā rakkhā hai 
dekh ai dil na kahīñ baat ye us tak pahuñche chashm-e-namnāk ne tūfān uThā rakkhā hai 
husn chāhe jise hañs bol ke apnā kar le dil ne apnoñ ko bhī begāna banā rakkhā hai 
dil jo is bazm meñ aatā hai to jaatā hī nahīñ ek din dekhnā dīvāna huā rakkhā hai 
haal mat pūchh mohabbat kā havā hai kuchh aur lā ke kis ne ye sar-e-rāh diyā rakkhā hai 
intizām aisā ki ghaTtī hī nahīñ raunaq-e-bazm ham se kitne haiñ ki vaade pe lagā rakkhā hai 
hosh to pahle hī kho aa.e the us mahfil meñ ab agar jaa.eñ to phir dil bhī gayā rakkhā hai 
tere aane kī ḳhabar pā ke abhī se dil ne shikve ko aur kisī din pe uThā rakkhā hai 
bār-hā yuuñ bhī huā terī mohabbat kī qasam jaan kar ham ne tujhe ḳhud se ḳhafā rakkhā hai 
dasht o dar ḳhair manā.eñ ki abhī vahshat meñ ishq ne pahlā qadam nām-e-ḳhudā rakkhā hai 
hijr meñ ranj bhī karte haiñ pe itnā bhī salīm yaar tū ne to ajab haal banā rakkhā hai 
ishq mein jis ke ye ahwal bana rakkha hai ab wahi kahta hai is waza mein kya rakkha hai 
le chale ho mujhe is bazm mein yaro lekin kuchh mera haal bhi pahle se suna rakkha hai 
haal-e-dil kaun sunae use fursat kis ko sab ko is aankh ne baaton mein laga rakkha hai 
dil bura tha ki bhala kaam wafa ke aaya yar jaane bhi de is bahas mein kya rakkha hai 
ai saba aa ki dikhaen tujhe wo gul jis ne baaton hi baaton mein gulzar khila rakkha hai 
dekh ai dil na kahin baat ye us tak pahunche chashm-e-namnak ne tufan uTha rakkha hai 
husn chahe jise hans bol ke apna kar le dil ne apnon ko bhi begana bana rakkha hai 
dil jo is bazm mein aata hai to jata hi nahin ek din dekhna diwana hua rakkha hai 
haal mat puchh mohabbat ka hawa hai kuchh aur la ke kis ne ye sar-e-rah diya rakkha hai 
intizam aisa ki ghaTti hi nahin raunaq-e-bazm hum se kitne hain ki wade pe laga rakkha hai 
hosh to pahle hi kho aae the us mahfil mein ab agar jaen to phir dil bhi gaya rakkha hai 
tere aane ki KHabar pa ke abhi se dil ne shikwe ko aur kisi din pe uTha rakkha hai 
bar-ha yun bhi hua teri mohabbat ki qasam jaan kar hum ne tujhe KHud se KHafa rakkha hai 
dasht o dar KHair manaen ki abhi wahshat mein ishq ne pahla qadam nam-e-KHuda rakkha hai 
hijr mein ranj bhi karte hain pe itna bhi salim yar tu ne to ajab haal bana rakkha hai

bane haiñ kaam sab uljhan se mere yahī atvār haiñ bachpan se mere 
havā bhī pūchhne aatī nahīñ ab vo ḳhushbū kyā ga.ī āñgan se mere 
zamīñ hamvār ho kar rah ga.ī hai uḌī hai dhuul vo dāman se mere 
suno is dasht kā ham-zād huuñ maiñ ye vāqif hai akele-pan se mere 
havā-e-be-dilī bhī ḳhuub niklī ḳhalish tak le uḌī jīvan se mere 
bane hain kaam sab uljhan se mere yahi atwar hain bachpan se mere 
hawa bhi puchhne aati nahin ab wo KHushbu kya gai aangan se mere 
zamin hamwar ho kar rah gai hai uDi hai dhul wo daman se mere 
suno is dasht ka ham-zad hun main ye waqif hai akele-pan se mere 
hawa-e-be-dili bhi KHub nikli KHalish tak le uDi jiwan se mere

ġham tirā jalva-gah-e-kaun-o-makāñ hai ki jo thā ya.anī insān vahī sho.ala-ba-jāñ hai ki jo thā 
phir vahī rañg-e-takallum nigah-e-nāz meñ hai vahī andāz vahī husn-e-bayāñ hai ki jo thā 
kab hai inkār tire lutf-o-karam se lekin tū vahī dushman-e-dil dushman-e-jāñ hai ki jo thā 
ishq afsurda nahīñ aaj bhī afsurda bahut vahī kam kam asar-e-soz-e-nihāñ hai ki jo thā 
qurb hī kam hai na duurī hī ziyāda lekin aaj vo rabt kā ehsās kahāñ hai ki jo thā 
nazar aa jaate haiñ tum ko to bahut nāzuk baal dil mirā kyā vahī ai shīsha-girāñ hai ki jo thā 
jaan de baiThe the ik baar havas vaale bhī phir vahī marhala-e-sūd-o-ziyāñ hai ki jo thā 
husn ko khīñch to letā hai abhī tak lekin vo asar jazb-e-mohabbat meñ kahāñ hai ki jo thā 
aaj bhī said-gah-e-ishq meñ husn-e-saffāk liye abrū kī lachaktī sī kamāñ hai ki jo thā 
phir tirī chashm-e-suḳhan-sanj ne chheḌī koī baat vahī jaadū hai vahī husn-e-bayāñ hai ki jo thā 
phir sar-e-mai-kada-e-ishq hai ik bārish-e-nūr chhalke jāmoñ se charāġhāñ kā samāñ hai ki jo thā 
phir vahī ḳhair-nigāhī hai tire jalvoñ se vahī aalam tirā ai barq-e-damāñ hai ki jo thā 
aaj bhī aag dabī hai dil-e-insāñ meñ 'firāq' aaj bhī sīnoñ se uThtā vo dhuāñ hai ki jo thā 
gham tera jalwa-gah-e-kaun-o-makan hai ki jo tha yani insan wahi shoala-ba-jaan hai ki jo tha 
phir wahi rang-e-takallum nigah-e-naz mein hai wahi andaz wahi husn-e-bayan hai ki jo tha 
kab hai inkar tere lutf-o-karam se lekin tu wahi dushman-e-dil dushman-e-jaan hai ki jo tha 
ishq afsurda nahin aaj bhi afsurda bahut wahi kam kam asar-e-soz-e-nihan hai ki jo tha 
qurb hi kam hai na duri hi ziyaada lekin aaj wo rabt ka ehsas kahan hai ki jo tha 
nazar aa jate hain tum ko to bahut nazuk baal dil mera kya wahi ai shisha-giran hai ki jo tha 
jaan de baiThe the ek bar hawas wale bhi phir wahi marhala-e-sud-o-ziyan hai ki jo tha 
husn ko khinch to leta hai abhi tak lekin wo asar jazb-e-mohabbat mein kahan hai ki jo tha 
aaj bhi said-gah-e-ishq mein husn-e-saffak liye abru ki lachakti si kaman hai ki jo tha 
phir teri chashm-e-suKHan-sanj ne chheDi koi baat wahi jadu hai wahi husn-e-bayan hai ki jo tha 
phir sar-e-mai-kada-e-ishq hai ek barish-e-nur chhalke jamon se charaghan ka saman hai ki jo tha 
phir wahi KHair-nigahi hai tere jalwon se wahi aalam tera ai barq-e-daman hai ki jo tha 
aaj bhi aag dabi hai dil-e-insan mein 'firaq' aaj bhi sinon se uThta wo dhuan hai ki jo tha

phir kisī ḳhvāb ke parde se pukārā jā.ūñ phir kisī yaad kī talvār se maarā jā.ūñ 
phir koī vus.at-e-āfāq pe saaya Daale phir kisī aañkh ke nuqte meñ utārā jā.ūñ 
din ke hañgāmoñ meñ dāman kahīñ mailā ho jaa.e raat kī nuqra.ī ātish meñ nikhārā jā.ūñ 
ḳhushk kho.e hue gumnām jazīre kī tarah dard ke kaale samundar se ubhārā jā.ūñ 
apnī khoī huī jannat kā talabgār banūñ dast-e-yazdāñ se gunahgār sañvārā jā.ūñ 
phir kisi KHwab ke parde se pukara jaun phir kisi yaad ki talwar se mara jaun 
phir koi wusat-e-afaq pe saya Dale phir kisi aankh ke nuqte mein utara jaun 
din ke hangamon mein daman kahin maila ho jae raat ki nuqrai aatish mein nikhaara jaun 
KHushk khoe hue gumnam jazire ki tarah dard ke kale samundar se ubhaara jaun 
apni khoi hui jannat ka talabgar banun dast-e-yazdan se gunahgar sanwara jaun

use dekh kar apnā mahbūb pyārā bahut yaad aayā vo jugnū thā us se hameñ ik sitāra bahut yaad aayā 
yahī shaam kā vaqt thā ghar se nikle ki yaad aa gayā thā bahut din hue aaj vo sab dobāra bahut yaad aayā 
sahar jab huī to bahut ḳhāmushī thī zamīñ shabnamī thī kabhī ḳhāk-e-dil meñ thā koī sharāra bahut yaad aayā 
baraste the bādal dhuāñ phailtā thā ajab chaar jānib fazā khil uThī to sarāpā tumhārā bahut yaad aayā 
kabhī us ke baare meñ sochā na thā aur sochā to dekho samundar koī be-sadā be-kināra bahut yaad aayā 
use dekh kar apna mahbub pyara bahut yaad aaya wo jugnu tha us se hamein ek sitara bahut yaad aaya 
yahi sham ka waqt tha ghar se nikle ki yaad aa gaya tha bahut din hue aaj wo sab dobara bahut yaad aaya 
sahar jab hui to bahut KHamushi thi zamin shabnami thi kabhi KHak-e-dil mein tha koi sharara bahut yaad aaya 
baraste the baadal dhuan phailta tha ajab chaar jaanib faza khil uThi to sarapa tumhaara bahut yaad aaya 
kabhi us ke bare mein socha na tha aur socha to dekho samundar koi be-sada be-kinara bahut yaad aaya

mudāvā-e-dil-e-dīvāna karte ye karte ham to kuchh achchhā na karte 
vafā sādiq agar hotī hamārī vo karte bhī to jaur itnā na karte 
ham achchhā thā jo bahr-e-parda-poshī mohabbat kā tirī charchā na karte 
tumhārī fitna-pardāzī kā shikvā jo ham karte to kuchh bejā na karte 
nigāheñ āshiqoñ kī thī havas-kār vo kyā karte agar pardā na karte 
jo phir milne kī hotī kuchh bhī ummīd to ham us ke liye kyā kyā na karte 
talab kā hausla hotā to ik din ḳhitāb us but se bebākāna na karte 
hamārā paas unheñ kuchh bhī jo hotā kisī kī aur ham parvā na karte 
shakebā.ī kā dam rakhte to 'hasrat' unheñ yuuñ shauq se dekhā na karte 
mudawa-e-dil-e-diwana karte ye karte hum to kuchh achchha na karte 
wafa sadiq agar hoti hamari wo karte bhi to jaur itna na karte 
hum achchha tha jo bahr-e-parda-poshi mohabbat ka teri charcha na karte 
tumhaari fitna-pardazi ka shikwa jo hum karte to kuchh beja na karte 
nigahen aashiqon ki thi hawas-kar wo kya karte agar parda na karte 
jo phir milne ki hoti kuchh bhi ummid to hum us ke liye kya kya na karte 
talab ka hausla hota to ek din KHitab us but se bebakana na karte 
hamara pas unhen kuchh bhi jo hota kisi ki aur hum parwa na karte 
shakebai ka dam rakhte to 'hasrat' unhen yun shauq se dekha na karte

achchhe mausam meñ tag-o-tāz bhī kar letā huuñ par nikal aate haiñ parvāz bhī kar letā huuñ 
tujh se ye kaisā ta.alluq hai jise jab chāhūñ ḳhatm kar detā huuñ āġhāz bhī kar letā huuñ 
ġhumbad-e-zāt meñ jab gūñjne lagtā huuñ bahut ḳhāmushī toḌ ke āvāz bhī kar letā huuñ 
yuuñ to is habs se mānūs haiñ sāñseñ merī vaise dīvār meñ dar baaz bhī kar letā huuñ 
sab ke sab ḳhvāb maiñ taqsīm nahīñ kar detā ek do ḳhvāb pas-andāz bhī kar letā huuñ 
achchhe mausam mein tag-o-taz bhi kar leta hun par nikal aate hain parwaz bhi kar leta hun 
tujh se ye kaisa talluq hai jise jab chahun KHatm kar deta hun aaghaz bhi kar leta hun 
ghumbad-e-zat mein jab gunjne lagta hun bahut KHamushi toD ke aawaz bhi kar leta hun 
yun to is habs se manus hain sansen meri waise diwar mein dar baz bhi kar leta hun 
sab ke sab KHwab main taqsim nahin kar deta ek do KHwab pas-andaz bhi kar leta hun

bisāt-e-vaqt pe sadiyoñ ke fāsle ham log kanār-e-shām-o-sahar meñ kahāñ Dhale ham log 
na kārvāñ na musāfir magar jaras na thamī na raushnī na harārat magar jale ham log 
maqām jin kā muarriḳh ke hāfize meñ nahīñ shikast o fat.h ke mābain marhale ham log 
numūd-e-jism kī shorīda ḳhvāhisheñ duniyā fishār-e-rūh ke nādīda valvale ham log 
na jaane kab koī karvaT hameñ jagā Daale zamīñ ke batn meñ ḳhvābīda zalzale ham log 
fasād-e-koh-kanī hīla-hā-e-parvezī hazār rañg ke kāñToñ meñ aable ham log 
amīr-e-shahr kī moTī samajh meñ kyā aate zamīr-e-dahr ke nāzuk muāmle ham log 
hujūm-e-sañg-e-aziyyat meñ sar jhukā.e hue ravāñ haiñ le ke mashiyyat ke qāfile ham log 
zabāñ-burīda o be-dast-o-pā sahī lekin zamīr-e-kaun-o-makāñ haiñ bure bhale ham log 
bisat-e-waqt pe sadiyon ke fasle hum log kanar-e-sham-o-sahar mein kahan Dhale hum log 
na karwan na musafir magar jaras na thami na raushni na hararat magar jale hum log

numud-e-jism ki shorida KHwahishen duniya fishaar-e-ruh ke nadida walwale hum log

fasad-e-koh-kani hila-ha-e-parwezi hazar rang ke kanTon mein aable hum log 
amir-e-shahr ki moTi samajh mein kya aate zamir-e-dahr ke nazuk muamle hum log 
hujum-e-sang-e-aziyyat mein sar jhukae hue rawan hain le ke mashiyyat ke qafile hum log

girā to gir ke sar-e-ḳhāk-e-ibtizāl aayā maiñ teġh-e-tez thā lekin mujhe zavāl aayā 
ajab huā ki sitāra-shanās se mil kar shikast-e-anjum-e-nau-ḳhez kā ḳhayāl aayā 
maiñ ḳhāk-e-sard pe soyā to mere pahlū meñ phir ek ḳhwāb-e-shikast ā.ina-misāl aayā 
kamān-e-shāḳh se gul kis hadaf ko jaate haiñ nasheb-e-ḳhāk meñ jā kar mujhe ḳhayāl aayā 
koī nahīñ thā magar sāhil-e-tamannā par havā-e-shām meñ jab rañg-e-indimāl aayā 
yahī hai vasl dil-e-kam-muāmla ke liye ki aa.ine meñ vo ḳhurshīd-e-ḳhadd-o-ḳhāl aayā 
gira to gir ke sar-e-KHak-e-ibtizal aaya main tegh-e-tez tha lekin mujhe zawal aaya 
ajab hua ki sitara-shanas se mil kar shikast-e-anjum-e-nau-KHez ka KHayal aaya 
main KHak-e-sard pe soya to mere pahlu mein phir ek KHwab-e-shikast aaina-misal aaya 
kaman-e-shaKH se gul kis hadaf ko jate hain nasheb-e-KHak mein ja kar mujhe KHayal aaya 
koi nahin tha magar sahil-e-tamanna par hawa-e-sham mein jab rang-e-indimal aaya 
yahi hai wasl dil-e-kam-muamla ke liye ki aaine mein wo KHurshid-e-KHadd-o-KHal aaya

kisī ke dosh na markab se istifāda kiyā yahāñ talak kā safar ham ne pā-pyāda kiyā 
jahāñ pe dekhe qadam apne kuchh bhaTakte hue vahīñ Thahar ke farozāñ charāġh-e-bāda kiyā 
libās badle nahīñ ham ne mausamoñ kī tarah ki zeb-e-tan jo kiyā ek hī labāda kiyā 
amīr-e-shahr sabhī the sharīk-e-mashq-e-sitam kisī ne kam to kisī ne sitam ziyāda kiyā 
har ek baar qadam but-kade meñ lauT aa.e ḳhudā gavāh hai masjid kā jab irāda kiyā 
bichhaḌne vāloñ meñ ham jis se āshnā kam the na jaane dil ne use yaad kyuuñ ziyāda kiyā 
koī akelā to maiñ sādgī-pasand na thā pasand us ne bhī rañgoñ meñ rañg saada kiyā 
bahut hī tañg thī 'mohsin' ye rahguzār-e-ġhazal ham ahle-e-fikr-o-nazar ne ise kushāda kiyā 
kisi ke dosh na markab se istifada kiya yahan talak ka safar hum ne pa-pyaada kiya 
jahan pe dekhe qadam apne kuchh bhaTakte hue wahin Thahar ke farozan charagh-e-baada kiya 
libas badle nahin hum ne mausamon ki tarah ki zeb-e-tan jo kiya ek hi labaada kiya 
amir-e-shahr sabhi the sharik-e-mashq-e-sitam kisi ne kam to kisi ne sitam ziyaada kiya 
har ek bar qadam but-kade mein lauT aae KHuda gawah hai masjid ka jab irada kiya 
bichhaDne walon mein hum jis se aashna kam the na jaane dil ne use yaad kyun ziyaada kiya 
koi akela to main sadgi-pasand na tha pasand us ne bhi rangon mein rang sada kiya 
bahut hi tang thi 'mohsin' ye rahguzar-e-ghazal hum ahle-e-fikr-o-nazar ne ise kushada kiya

ham ne rakkhā thā jise apnī kahānī meñ kahīñ ab vo tahrīr hai aurāq-e-ḳhizānī meñ kahīñ 
bas ye ik sā.at-e-hijrāñ hai ki jaatī hī nahīñ koī Thahrā bhī hai is ālam-e-fānī meñ kahīñ 
jitnā sāmāñ bhī ikaTThā kiyā is ghar ke liye bhuul jā.eñge use naql-e-makānī meñ kahīñ 
ḳhair auroñ kā to kyā zikr ki ab lagtā hai tū bhī shāmil hai mire ranj-e-zamānī meñ kahīñ 
chashm-e-namnāk ko is darja haqārat se na dekh tujh ko mil jaanā hai ik din isī paanī meñ kahīñ 
markaz-e-jāñ to vahī tū hai magar tere sivā log haiñ aur bhī is yaad purānī meñ kahīñ 
jashn-e-mātam bhī hai raunaq sī tamāshā.ī ko koī naġhma bhī hai is marsiya-ḳhvānī meñ kahīñ 
aaj ke din meñ kisī aur hī din kī hai jhalak shaam hai aur hī is shaam suhānī meñ kahīñ 
kyā samajh aa.e kisī ko mujhe mālūm bhī hai baat kar jaatā huuñ maiñ apnī ravānī meñ kahīñ 
hum ne rakkha tha jise apni kahani mein kahin ab wo tahrir hai auraq-e-KHizani mein kahin 
bas ye ek saat-e-hijran hai ki jati hi nahin koi Thahra bhi hai is aalam-e-fani mein kahin 
jitna saman bhi ikaTTha kiya is ghar ke liye bhul jaenge use naql-e-makani mein kahin 
KHair auron ka to kya zikr ki ab lagta hai tu bhi shamil hai mere ranj-e-zamani mein kahin 
chashm-e-namnak ko is darja haqarat se na dekh tujh ko mil jaana hai ek din isi pani mein kahin 
markaz-e-jaan to wahi tu hai magar tere siwa log hain aur bhi is yaad purani mein kahin 
jashn-e-matam bhi hai raunaq si tamashai ko koi naghma bhi hai is marsiya-KHwani mein kahin 
aaj ke din mein kisi aur hi din ki hai jhalak sham hai aur hi is sham suhani mein kahin 
kya samajh aae kisi ko mujhe malum bhi hai baat kar jata hun main apni rawani mein kahin

daavā to kiyā husn-e-jahāñ-soz kā sab ne duniyā kā magar ruup baḌhāyā tirī chhab ne 
tū niind meñ bhī merī taraf dekh rahā thā sone na diyā mujh ko siyah-chashmi-e-shab ne 
har zaḳhm pe dekhī haiñ tire pyaar kī mohreñ ye gul bhī khilā.e haiñ terī surḳhi-e-lab ne 
ḳhushbu-e-badan aa.ī hai phir mauj-e-sabā se phir kis ko pukārā hai tire shahr tarab ne 
darkār hai mujh ko to faqat izn-e-tabassum patthar se agar phuul ugaa.e mire rab ne 
vo husn hai insān kī merāj-e-tasavvur jis husn ko puujā hai mire sher o adab ne 
dawa to kiya husn-e-jahan-soz ka sab ne duniya ka magar rup baDhaya teri chhab ne 
tu nind mein bhi meri taraf dekh raha tha sone na diya mujh ko siyah-chashmi-e-shab ne 
har zaKHm pe dekhi hain tere pyar ki mohren ye gul bhi khilae hain teri surKHi-e-lab ne 
KHushbu-e-badan aai hai phir mauj-e-saba se phir kis ko pukara hai tere shahr tarab ne 
darkar hai mujh ko to faqat izn-e-tabassum patthar se agar phul ugae mere rab ne 
wo husn hai insan ki meraj-e-tasawwur jis husn ko puja hai mere sher o adab ne

samajhnā fahm gar kuchh hai tabī.ī se ilāhī ko shahādat ġhaib kī ḳhātir to hāzir hai gavāhī ko 
nahīñ mumkin ki ham se zulmat-e-imkān zaa.il ho chhuḌā de aah koī kyuuñ ke zañgī se siyāhī ko 
ajab aalam hai īdhar se hameñ hastī satātī hai udhar se nīstī aatī hai dauḌī uzr-ḳhvāhī ko 
na rah jaave kahīñ tū zāhidā mahrūm rahmat se gunahgāroñ meñ samjhā kariyo apnī be-gunāhī ko 
na lāzim nīstī us ko na hastī hī zarūrī hai bayāñ kyā kījiye ai 'dard' mumkin kī nanāhī ko 
samajhna fahm gar kuchh hai tabii se ilahi ko shahadat ghaib ki KHatir to hazir hai gawahi ko 
nahin mumkin ki hum se zulmat-e-imkan zail ho chhuDa de aah koi kyun ke zangi se siyahi ko 
ajab aalam hai idhar se hamein hasti satati hai udhar se nisti aati hai dauDi uzr-KHwahi ko 
na rah jawe kahin tu zahida mahrum rahmat se gunahgaron mein samjha kariyo apni be-gunahi ko 
na lazim nisti us ko na hasti hi zaruri hai bayan kya kijiye ai 'dard' mumkin ki nanahi ko

zamīñ par shor-e-mahshar roz o shab hotā hī rahtā hai ham apne giit gaa.eñ ye to sab hotā hī rahtā hai 
ye ham ne bhī sunā hai ālam-e-asbāb hai duniyā yahāñ phir bhī bahut kuchh be-sabab hotā hī rahtā hai 
tirī ḳhātir ka.ī sachchā.iyoñ se kaT ga.e rishte mohabbat meñ to ye tark-e-nasab hotā hī rahtā hai 
musāfir raat ko is dasht meñ bhī ruk hī jaate haiñ hamāre dil meñ bhī jashn-e-tarab hotā hī rahtā hai 
koī shai tasht meñ ham sar se kam qīmat nahīñ rakhte so aksar ham se nazrāna talab hotā hī rahtā hai 
zamin par shor-e-mahshar roz o shab hota hi rahta hai hum apne git gaen ye to sab hota hi rahta hai 
ye hum ne bhi suna hai aalam-e-asbab hai duniya yahan phir bhi bahut kuchh be-sabab hota hi rahta hai 
teri KHatir kai sachchaiyon se kaT gae rishte mohabbat mein to ye tark-e-nasab hota hi rahta hai 
musafir raat ko is dasht mein bhi ruk hi jate hain hamare dil mein bhi jashn-e-tarab hota hi rahta hai 
koi shai tasht mein hum sar se kam qimat nahin rakhte so aksar hum se nazrana talab hota hi rahta hai

dil gayā be-qarāriyāñ na ga.iiñ ishq kī ḳhām-kāriyāñ na ga.iiñ 
mar miTe naam par vafā ke ham terī be-e'tibāriyāñ na ga.iiñ 
lab pe aayā na us kā naam kabhī ġham kī parhez-gāriyāñ na ga.iiñ 
khap ga.ī jaan bujh ga.e tevar ashk kī tābdāriyāñ na ga.iiñ 
tauba karne ko ham ne kī to magar tauba kī sharmsāriyāñ na ga.iiñ 
jaan aa hī ga.ī laboñ pe magar shauq kī parda-dāriyāñ na ga.iiñ 
vo hai kiina ki sard-mehrī hai apnī jānib se yāriyāñ na ga.iiñ 
girya bhī hai 'asar' kā mastāna na ga.iiñ bāda-ḳhvāriyāñ na ga.iiñ 
dil gaya be-qarariyan na gain ishq ki KHam-kariyan na gain 
mar miTe nam par wafa ke hum teri be-e'tibariyan na gain 
lab pe aaya na us ka nam kabhi gham ki parhez-gariyan na gain 
khap gai jaan bujh gae tewar ashk ki tabdariyan na gain 
tauba karne ko hum ne ki to magar tauba ki sharmsariyan na gain 
jaan aa hi gai labon pe magar shauq ki parda-dariyan na gain 
wo hai kina ki sard-mehri hai apni jaanib se yariyan na gain 
girya bhi hai 'asar' ka mastana na gain baada-KHwariyan na gain

duniyā se tan ko Dhāñp qayāmat se jaan ko do chādareñ bahut haiñ tirī ān-bān ko 
ik maiñ hī rah gayā huuñ kiye sar ko bār-e-dosh kyā pūchhte ho bhaa.ī mire ḳhāndān ko 
jis din se apne chāk-e-garebāñ kā shor hai taale lagā ga.e haiñ rafūgar dukān ko 
filhāl dil pe dil to liye jā rahe ho tum aur jo hisāb bhuul gayā kal-kalān ko 
dil meñ se chun ke ham bhī koī ġhuncha ai nasīm bhejeñge tere haath kabhī gulsitān ko 
mashġhūl haiñ safā.ī-o-tausi-e-dil meñ ham tañgī na is makān meñ ho mehmān ko 
duniya se tan ko Dhanp qayamat se jaan ko do chadaren bahut hain teri aan-ban ko 
ek main hi rah gaya hun kiye sar ko bar-e-dosh kya puchhte ho bhai mere KHandan ko 
jis din se apne chaak-e-gareban ka shor hai tale laga gae hain rafugar dukan ko 
filhaal dil pe dil to liye ja rahe ho tum aur jo hisab bhul gaya kal-kalan ko 
dil mein se chun ke hum bhi koi ghuncha ai nasim bhejenge tere hath kabhi gulsitan ko 
mashghul hain safai-o-tausi-e-dil mein hum tangi na is makan mein ho mehman ko

go mire dil ke zaḳhm zaatī haiñ in kī Tīseñ to kā.enātī haiñ 
aadmī shash-jahāt kā dūlhā vaqt kī gardisheñ barātī haiñ 
faisle kar rahe haiñ arsh-nashīñ āfateñ aadmī pe aatī haiñ 
kaliyāñ kis daur ke tasavvur meñ ḳhuun hote hī muskurātī haiñ 
tere vaade hoñ jin ke shāmil-e-hāl vo umañgeñ kahāñ samātī haiñ 
go mere dil ke zaKHm zati hain in ki Tisen to kaenati hain 
aadmi shash-jahat ka dulha waqt ki gardishen baraati hain 
faisle kar rahe hain arsh-nashin aafaten aadmi pe aati hain 
kaliyan kis daur ke tasawwur mein KHun hote hi muskuraati hain 
tere wade hon jin ke shamil-e-haal wo umangen kahan samati hain

na koī rok sakā ḳhvāb ke safīroñ ko udaas kar ga.e nīñdoñ ke rāhgīroñ ko 
vo mauj ban ke uThī yaad ke samundar se tabāh kar ga.ī tanhā.ī ke jazīroñ ko 
laraz ke TuuT ga.iiñ haft-rañg dīvāreñ havā chalī to rihā.ī milī asīroñ ko 
dafīne paañv tale se guzar ga.e kitne maiñ dekhtā hī rahā haath meñ lakīroñ ko 
na koi rok saka KHwab ke safiron ko udas kar gae nindon ke rahgiron ko 
wo mauj ban ke uThi yaad ke samundar se tabah kar gai tanhai ke jaziron ko 
laraz ke TuT gain haft-rang diwaren hawa chali to rihai mili asiron ko 
dafine panw tale se guzar gae kitne main dekhta hi raha hath mein lakiron ko

sitam ho jaa.e tamhīd-e-karam aisā bhī hotā hai mohabbat meñ batā ai zabt-e-ġham aisā bhī hotā hai 
bhulā detī haiñ sab ranj o alam hairāniyāñ merī tirī tamkīn-e-behad kī qasam aisā bhī hotā hai 
jafā-e-yār ke shikve na kar ai ranj-e-nākāmī ummīd o yaas donoñ hoñ baham aisā bhī hotā hai 
mire pās-e-vafā kī bad-gumānī hai ba-jā tum se kahīñ be-vaj.h iz.hār-e-karam aisā bhī hotā hai 
tirī dildāriyoñ se sūrat-e-begānagī niklī ḳhushī aisī bhī hotī hai alam aisā bhī hotā hai 
vaqār-e-sabr khoyā girya-hā-e-be-qarārī ne kahīñ ai e'tibār-e-chashm-e-nam aisā bhī hotā hai 
ba-dāvā-e-vafā kyuuñ shikva-sanj-e-jaur hai 'hasrat' dayār-e-shauq meñ ai mahv-e-ġham aisā bhī hotā hai 
sitam ho jae tamhid-e-karam aisa bhi hota hai mohabbat mein bata ai zabt-e-gham aisa bhi hota hai 
bhula deti hain sab ranj o alam hairaniyan meri teri tamkin-e-behad ki qasam aisa bhi hota hai 
jafa-e-yar ke shikwe na kar ai ranj-e-nakaami ummid o yas donon hon baham aisa bhi hota hai 
mere pas-e-wafa ki bad-gumani hai ba-ja tum se kahin be-wajh izhaar-e-karam aisa bhi hota hai 
teri dildariyon se surat-e-beganagi nikli KHushi aisi bhi hoti hai alam aisa bhi hota hai 
waqar-e-sabr khoya girya-ha-e-be-qarari ne kahin ai e'tibar-e-chashm-e-nam aisa bhi hota hai 
ba-dawa-e-wafa kyun shikwa-sanj-e-jaur hai 'hasrat' dayar-e-shauq mein ai mahw-e-gham aisa bhi hota hai

ye nahīñ kahtā ki dobāra vahī āvāz de koī āsānī to paidā kar koī āvāz de 
maiñ use sun kar bhī aane kā nahīñ majbūr huuñ phir bhī apne ḳhvāb-ḳhāne se kabhī āvāz de 
ho sake donoñ zamānoñ meñ ham-āhañgī koī maiñ purānā huuñ to kyā mujh ko na.ī āvāz de 
maut ke sāhil par istāda huuñ to mujh ko kahīñ zindagī ke pāniyoñ meñ Dūbtī āvāz de 
Thiik hai tū ne pukārā hogā jis-tis ko magar mere hisse meñ koī aa.ī huī āvāz de 
bin bulāyā hī chalā ā.ūñgā maiñ shāyad kabhī lekin itne shor meñ to aap bhī āvāz de 
maiñ use pahchān hī pā.ūñ na pahlī baar to koī āvāzoñ ke jañgal meñ ghirī āvāz de 
muñh se kuchh kah to sahī is ḳhāmushī ke ār-pār mustaqil ko chhoḌ koī sarsarī āvāz de 
tū ne to har haal meñ sunñā hai ab tujh ko 'zafar' raushnī āvāz de yā tīrgī āvāz de 
ye nahin kahta ki dobara wahi aawaz de koi aasani to paida kar koi aawaz de 
main use sun kar bhi aane ka nahin majbur hun phir bhi apne KHwab-KHane se kabhi aawaz de 
ho sake donon zamanon mein ham-ahangi koi main purana hun to kya mujh ko nai aawaz de 
maut ke sahil par istada hun to mujh ko kahin zindagi ke paniyon mein Dubti aawaz de 
Thik hai tu ne pukara hoga jis-tis ko magar mere hisse mein koi aai hui aawaz de 
bin bulaya hi chala aaunga main shayad kabhi lekin itne shor mein to aap bhi aawaz de 
main use pahchan hi paun na pahli bar to koi aawazon ke jangal mein ghiri aawaz de 
munh se kuchh kah to sahi is KHamushi ke aar-par mustaqil ko chhoD koi sarsari aawaz de 
tu ne to har haal mein sunna hai ab tujh ko 'zafar' raushni aawaz de ya tirgi aawaz de

vaañ agar jaa.eñ to le kar jaa.eñ kyā muñh use ham jā ke ye dikhlā.eñ kyā 
dil meñ hai baaqī vahī hirs-e-gunāh phir kiye se apne ham pachhtā.eñ kyā 
aao leñ us ko hamīñ jā kar manā us kī be-parvā.iyoñ par jaa.eñ kyā 
dil ko masjid se na mandir se hai uns aise vahshī ko kahīñ bahlā.eñ kyā 
jāntā duniyā ko hai ik khel tū khel qudrat ke tujhe dikhlā.eñ kyā 
umr kī manzil to juuñ tuuñ kaT ga.ī marhale ab dekhiye pesh aa.eñ kyā 
dil ko sab bātoñ kī hai nāseh ḳhabar samjhe samjhā.e ko bas samjhā.eñ kyā 
maan liije shaiḳh jo da.avā kare ik buzurg-e-dīñ ko ham jhuTlā.eñ kyā 
ho chuke 'hālī' ġhazal-ḳhvānī ke din rāgnī be-vaqt kī ab gaa.eñ kyā 
wan agar jaen to le kar jaen kya munh use hum ja ke ye dikhlaen kya 
dil mein hai baqi wahi hirs-e-gunah phir kiye se apne hum pachhtaen kya 
aao len us ko hamin ja kar mana us ki be-parwaiyon par jaen kya 
dil ko masjid se na mandir se hai uns aise wahshi ko kahin bahlaen kya 
jaanta duniya ko hai ek khel tu khel qudrat ke tujhe dikhlaen kya 
umr ki manzil to jun tun kaT gai marhale ab dekhiye pesh aaen kya 
dil ko sab baaton ki hai naseh KHabar samjhe samjhae ko bas samjhaen kya 
man lije shaiKH jo dawa kare ek buzurg-e-din ko hum jhuTlaen kya 
ho chuke 'haali' ghazal-KHwani ke din ragni be-waqt ki ab gaen kya

paañv rukte hī nahīñ zehn Thahartā hī nahīñ koī nashsha hai thakan kā ki utartā hī nahīñ 
din guzarte haiñ guzarte hī chale jaate haiñ ek lamha jo kisī tarah guzartā hī nahīñ 
bhārī darvāza-e-āhan ki nahīñ khul paatā mere siine meñ ye sannāTā utartā hī nahīñ 
dast-e-jāñ se maiñ uThā luuñ use pī luuñ lekin dil vo zahrāb pyāla hai ki bhartā hī nahīñ 
kyā liye phirtā huuñ maiñ aab sarāb āñkhoñ meñ Dūbtā hī nahīñ koī ki ubhartā hī nahīñ 
ye pighaltī hī nahīñ sham.a ki jaltī hī nahīñ ye bikhartā hī nahīñ dasht ki martā hī nahīñ 
kuchh na kahiye to bhalā yuuñ hī samajhte rahiye pūchh liije to vo aiboñ se mukartā hī nahīñ 
panw rukte hi nahin zehn Thaharta hi nahin koi nashsha hai thakan ka ki utarta hi nahin 
din guzarte hain guzarte hi chale jate hain ek lamha jo kisi tarah guzarta hi nahin 
bhaari darwaza-e-ahan ki nahin khul pata mere sine mein ye sannaTa utarta hi nahin 
dast-e-jaan se main uTha lun use pi lun lekin dil wo zahrab pyala hai ki bharta hi nahin 
kya liye phirta hun main aab sarab aankhon mein Dubta hi nahin koi ki ubharta hi nahin 
ye pighalti hi nahin shama ki jalti hi nahin ye bikharta hi nahin dasht ki marta hi nahin 
kuchh na kahiye to bhala yun hi samajhte rahiye puchh lije to wo aibon se mukarta hi nahin

bijliyāñ TuuT paḌīñ jab vo muqābil se uThā mil ke palTī thiiñ nigāheñ ki dhuāñ dil se uThā 
jalva mahsūs sahī aañkh ko āzād to kar qaid-e-ādāb-e-tamāshā bhī to mahfil se uThā 
phir to mizrāb-e-junūñ sāz-e-anā-lailā chheḌ haa.e vo shor-e-anal-qais ki mahmil se uThā 
iḳhtiyār ek adā thī mirī majbūrī kī lutf-e-sa.i-e-amal is matlab-e-hāsil se uThā 
umr-e-ummīd ke do din bhī girāñ the zālim bār-e-fardā na tire vāda-e-bātil se uThā 
ḳhabar-e-qāfila-e-gum-shuda kis se pūchhūñ ik bagūla bhī na ḳhāk-e-rah-e-manzil se uThā 
hosh jab tak hai galā ghoñT ke mar jaane kā dam-e-shamshīr kā ehsāñ tire bismil se uThā
