maut hastī pe vo tohmat thī ki āsāñ na uThī zindagī mujh pe vo ilzām ki mushkil se uThā 
kis kī kashtī tah-e-girdāb-e-fanā jā pahuñchī shor-e-labbaik jo 'fānī' lab-e-sāhil se uThā 
bijliyan TuT paDin jab wo muqabil se uTha mil ke palTi thin nigahen ki dhuan dil se uTha 
jalwa mahsus sahi aankh ko aazad to kar qaid-e-adab-e-tamasha bhi to mahfil se uTha 
phir to mizrab-e-junun saz-e-ana-laila chheD hae wo shor-e-anal-qais ki mahmil se uTha 
iKHtiyar ek ada thi meri majburi ki lutf-e-sai-e-amal is matlab-e-hasil se uTha 
umr-e-ummid ke do din bhi giran the zalim bar-e-farda na tere wada-e-baatil se uTha 
KHabar-e-qafila-e-gum-shuda kis se puchhun ek bagula bhi na KHak-e-rah-e-manzil se uTha 
hosh jab tak hai gala ghonT ke mar jaane ka dam-e-shamshir ka ehsan tere bismil se uTha 
maut hasti pe wo tohmat thi ki aasan na uThi zindagi mujh pe wo ilzam ki mushkil se uTha 
kis ki kashti tah-e-girdab-e-fana ja pahunchi shor-e-labbaik jo 'fani' lab-e-sahil se uTha

ye kis rashk-e-masīhā kā makāñ hai zamīñ yaañ kī chahārum āsmāñ hai 
ḳhudā pinhāñ hai aalam āshkārā nihāñ hai ganj vīrāna ayaañ hai 
dil-e-raushan hai raushan-gar kī manzil ye ā.īna sikandar kā makāñ hai 
takalluf se barī hai husn-e-zātī qabā-e-gul meñ gul-būTā kahāñ hai 
pasījegā kabhī to dil kisī kā hamesha apnī aahoñ kā dhuāñ hai 
ba-rañg-e-bū huuñ gulshan meñ maiñ bulbul baġhal ġhunche ke merā āshiyāñ hai 
shagufta rahtī hai ḳhātir hamesha qanā.at bhī bahār-e-be-ḳhizāñ hai 
chaman kī sair par hotā hai jhagḌā kamar merī hai dast-e-bāġhbāñ hai 
bahut aatā hai yaad ai sabr-e-miskīñ ḳhudā ḳhush rakkhe tujh ko tū jahāñ hai 
ilāhī ek dil kis kis ko duuñ maiñ hazāroñ but haiñ yaañ hindostāñ hai 
yaqīñ hotā hai ḳhushbūī se is ke kisī gul-rū kā ġhuncha itr-dāñ hai 
vatan meñ apne ahl-e-shauq kī tarah safar meñ roz-o-shab reg-e-ravāñ hai 
sahar hove kahīñ shabnam kare kuuch gul o bulbul kā dariyā darmiyāñ hai 
sa.ādat-mand qismat par haiñ shākir humā ko maġhz-e-bādām ustuḳhvāñ hai 
dil-e-betāb jo is meñ gire haiñ zaqan jānāñ kā paara kā kuaañ hai 
jaras ke saath dil rahte haiñ nālāñ mire yūsuf kā āshiq kārvāñ hai 
na kah rindoñ ko harf-e-saḳht vaa.iz durusht ahl-e-jahannum kī zabāñ hai 
qad-e-mahbūb ko shā.er kaheñ sarv qayāmat kā ye ai 'ātish' nishāñ hai 
ye kis rashk-e-masiha ka makan hai zamin yan ki chahaarum aasman hai 
KHuda pinhan hai aalam aashkara nihan hai ganj virana ayan hai 
dil-e-raushan hai raushan-gar ki manzil ye aaina sikandar ka makan hai 
takalluf se bari hai husn-e-zati qaba-e-gul mein gul-buTa kahan hai 
pasijega kabhi to dil kisi ka hamesha apni aahon ka dhuan hai 
ba-rang-e-bu hun gulshan mein main bulbul baghal ghunche ke mera aashiyan hai 
shagufta rahti hai KHatir hamesha qanaat bhi bahaar-e-be-KHizan hai 
chaman ki sair par hota hai jhagDa kamar meri hai dast-e-baghban hai 
bahut aata hai yaad ai sabr-e-miskin KHuda KHush rakkhe tujh ko tu jahan hai 
ilahi ek dil kis kis ko dun main hazaron but hain yan hindostan hai 
yaqin hota hai KHushbui se is ke kisi gul-ru ka ghuncha itr-dan hai 
watan mein apne ahl-e-shauq ki tarah safar mein roz-o-shab reg-e-rawan hai 
sahar howe kahin shabnam kare kuch gul o bulbul ka dariya darmiyan hai 
saadat-mand qismat par hain shakir huma ko maghz-e-baadam ustuKHwan hai 
dil-e-betab jo is mein gire hain zaqan jaanan ka para ka kuan hai 
jaras ke sath dil rahte hain nalan mere yusuf ka aashiq karwan hai 
na kah rindon ko harf-e-saKHt waiz durusht ahl-e-jahannum ki zaban hai 
qad-e-mahbub ko shaer kahen sarw qayamat ka ye ai 'atish' nishan hai

raat phir rañg pe thī us ke badan kī ḳhushbū dil kī dhaḌkan thī ki uḌte the lahū meñ jugnū 
jaise har shai ho kisī ḳhvāb-e-farāmosh meñ gum chāñd chamkā na kisī yaad ne badlā pahlū 
sub.h ke zīna-e-ḳhāmosh pe qadmoñ ke gulāb shaam kī band havelī meñ hañsī kā jaadū 
sehn ke sabz añdhere meñ damakte ruḳhsār saaf bistar ke ujāle meñ chamakte gesū 
jhilmilāte rahe vo ḳhvāb jo puure na hue dard bedār Tapaktā rahā aañsū aañsū 
raat phir rang pe thi us ke badan ki KHushbu dil ki dhaDkan thi ki uDte the lahu mein jugnu 
jaise har shai ho kisi KHwab-e-faramosh mein gum chand chamka na kisi yaad ne badla pahlu 
subh ke zina-e-KHamosh pe qadmon ke gulab sham ki band haweli mein hansi ka jadu 
sehn ke sabz andhere mein damakte ruKHsar saf bistar ke ujale mein chamakte gesu 
jhilmilate rahe wo KHwab jo pure na hue dard bedar Tapakta raha aansu aansu

un kī mahfil meñ hamesha se yahī dekhā rivāj aañkh se bīmār karte haiñ tabassum se ilaaj 
maiñ jo royā un kī āñkhoñ meñ bhī aañsū aa ga.e husn kī fitrat meñ shāmil hai mohabbat kā mizāj 
merī ḳhātir ḳhud uThāte haiñ vo taklīf-e-karam kaun rakhtā varna mujh jaise gunahgāroñ kī laaj 
mere hone aur na hone par hī kyā mauqūf hai maut par un kī hukūmat zindagī par un kā raaj 
uf vo aariz jis ke jalvoñ par fidā mehr-e-mubīñ aah vo lab jin ko dete haiñ mah o anjum ḳhirāj 
maiñ huuñ 'anvar' un kī zāt-e-pāk kā adnā ġhulām hai sar-e-aqdas pe jin ke rahmat-e-yazdāñ kā taaj 
un ki mahfil mein hamesha se yahi dekha riwaj aankh se bimar karte hain tabassum se ilaj 
main jo roya un ki aankhon mein bhi aansu aa gae husn ki fitrat mein shamil hai mohabbat ka mizaj 
meri KHatir KHud uThate hain wo taklif-e-karam kaun rakhta warna mujh jaise gunahgaron ki laj 
mere hone aur na hone par hi kya mauquf hai maut par un ki hukumat zindagi par un ka raj 
uf wo aariz jis ke jalwon par fida mehr-e-mubin aah wo lab jin ko dete hain mah o anjum KHiraj 
main hun 'anwar' un ki zat-e-pak ka adna ghulam hai sar-e-aqdas pe jin ke rahmat-e-yazdan ka taj

us kī ik duniyā huuñ maiñ aur merī ik duniyā hai vo dasht meñ tanhā huuñ maiñ aur shahr meñ tanhā hai vo 
maiñ bhī kaisā aa.ina huuñ ā.ina-dar-ā.ina duur tak chehrā-ba-chehrā bas nazar aatā hai vo 
us kī ḳhush-bū se mahak kar phuul ban jaatā hai dil mausam-e-gul kī tarah aatā hai vo jaatā hai vo 
zindagī apnī musalsal chāhatoñ kā ik safar is safar meñ bār-hā mil kar bichhaḌ jaatā hai vo 
ḳhvāb kyā hai ik khañDar hai ye khañDar kitnā hasīñ is khañDar meñ sair karne ke liye aatā hai vo 
maiñ sarāpā aarzū huuñ ārzū-e-nā-tamām mujh ko har manzil se aage kī ḳhabar detā hai vo 
husn kyā hai ik ġhazal hai 'ashk' ik taaza ġhazal jaam hai miinā hai vo sāġhar hai vo sahbā hai vo 
us ki ek duniya hun main aur meri ek duniya hai wo dasht mein tanha hun main aur shahr mein tanha hai wo 
main bhi kaisa aaina hun aaina-dar-aina dur tak chehra-ba-chehra bas nazar aata hai wo 
us ki KHush-bu se mahak kar phul ban jata hai dil mausam-e-gul ki tarah aata hai wo jata hai wo 
zindagi apni musalsal chahaton ka ek safar is safar mein bar-ha mil kar bichhaD jata hai wo 
KHwab kya hai ek khanDar hai ye khanDar kitna hasin is khanDar mein sair karne ke liye aata hai wo 
main sarapa aarzu hun aarzu-e-na-tamam mujh ko har manzil se aage ki KHabar deta hai wo 
husn kya hai ek ghazal hai 'ashk' ek taza ghazal jam hai mina hai wo saghar hai wo sahba hai wo

nazzāra-e-paiham kā silā mere liye hai har samt vo ruḳh jalva-numā mere liye hai 
us chehra-e-anvar kī ziyā mere liye hai vo zulf-e-siyah tāb-e-dotā mere liye hai 
zinhār agar ahl-e-havas tujh pe fidā huuñ ye martaba-e-sadq-o-safā mere liye hai 
ban kar maiñ razākār muhayyā-e-fanā huuñ āvāza-e-haq bāñg-e-darā mere liye hai 
ḳhush-nūdi-e-fujjār ke pairav haiñ yazīdī taqlīd-e-shah-e-karb-o-balā mere liye hai 
mahrūm huuñ majbūr huuñ be-tāb-o-tavāñ huuñ maḳhsūs tire ġham kā mazā mere liye hai 
sarmāya-e-rāhat hai fanā kī mujhe talḳhī is zahr meñ sāmān-e-baqā mere liye hai 
jannat kī havas ho to maiñ kāfir ki pareshāñ us shoḳh kī ḳhushbu-e-qabā mere liye hai 
pahle bhī kuchh ummīd na thī chāragaroñ ko aur ab to davā hai na duā mere liye hai 
mar jā.ūñgā mai-ḳhāne se niklā jo kabhī maiñ nazzāra-e-mai rūh-fazā mere liye hai 
tashḳhīs-e-tabībāñ pe hañsī aatī hai 'hasrat' ye dard-e-jigar hai ki davā mere liye hai 
nazzara-e-paiham ka sila mere liye hai har samt wo ruKH jalwa-numa mere liye hai 
us chehra-e-anwar ki ziya mere liye hai wo zulf-e-siyah tab-e-dota mere liye hai 
zinhaar agar ahl-e-hawas tujh pe fida hun ye martaba-e-sadq-o-safa mere liye hai 
ban kar main razakar muhayya-e-fana hun aawaza-e-haq bang-e-dara mere liye hai 
KHush-nudi-e-fujjar ke pairaw hain yazidi taqlid-e-shah-e-karb-o-bala mere liye hai 
mahrum hun majbur hun be-tab-o-tawan hun maKHsus tere gham ka maza mere liye hai 
sarmaya-e-rahat hai fana ki mujhe talKHi is zahr mein saman-e-baqa mere liye hai 
jannat ki hawas ho to main kafir ki pareshan us shoKH ki KHushbu-e-qaba mere liye hai 
pahle bhi kuchh ummid na thi chaaragaron ko aur ab to dawa hai na dua mere liye hai 
mar jaunga mai-KHane se nikla jo kabhi main nazzara-e-mai ruh-faza mere liye hai 
tashKHis-e-tabiban pe hansi aati hai 'hasrat' ye dard-e-jigar hai ki dawa mere liye hai

kyā zarūrat be-zarūrat dekhnā tum na ā.īne kī sūrat dekhnā 
phir ga.iiñ bīmār-e-ġham ko dekh kar apnī āñkhoñ kī muravvat dekhnā 
ham kahāñ ai dil kahāñ dīdār-e-yār ho gayā terī badaulat dekhnā 
hai vo jab dil meñ to kaisī justujū DhūñDne vāloñ kī ġhaflat dekhnā 
sāmne tārīf pīchhe gāliyāñ un kī muñh dekhī mohabbat dekhnā 
jin ko baaqī hī na ho ummīd kuchh aise māyūsoñ kī hasrat dekhnā 
mirā ḳhat ye kah ke ġhairoñ ko diyā ik zarā is kī ibārat dekhnā 
aur kuchh tum ko na aa.egā nazar dil meñ rah kar dil kī hasrat dekhnā 
sub.h uTh kar dekhnā 'ahsan' kā muñh aise vaisoñ kī na sūrat dekhnā 
kya zarurat be-zarurat dekhna tum na aaine ki surat dekhna 
phir gain bimar-e-gham ko dekh kar apni aankhon ki murawwat dekhna 
hum kahan ai dil kahan didar-e-yar ho gaya teri badaulat dekhna 
hai wo jab dil mein to kaisi justuju DhunDne walon ki ghaflat dekhna 
samne tarif pichhe galiyan un ki munh dekhi mohabbat dekhna 
jin ko baqi hi na ho ummid kuchh aise mayuson ki hasrat dekhna 
mera KHat ye kah ke ghairon ko diya ek zara is ki ibarat dekhna 
aur kuchh tum ko na aaega nazar dil mein rah kar dil ki hasrat dekhna 
subh uTh kar dekhna 'ahsan' ka munh aise waison ki na surat dekhna

vasl kī shab bhī ḳhafā vo but-e-maġhrūr rahā hausla dil kā jo thā dil meñ ba-dastūr rahā 
umr-e-rafta ke talaf hone kā aayā to ḳhayāl lekin ik dam kī talāfī kā na maqdūr rahā 
jam.a kis din na hue mausam-e-gul meñ mai-kash roz hañgāma tah-e-sāya-e-angūr rahā 
gardish-e-baḳht kahāñ se hameñ laa.ī hai kahāñ manziloñ vādī-e-ġhurbat se vatan duur rahā 
rāst-bāzī kar agar nāmvarī hai darkār daar se ḳhalq meñ āvāz-e-mansūr rahā 
vo to hai charḳh chahārum pe ye pach mohalle par sach hai iisā se bhī baalā tirā mazdūr rahā 
fasl-e-gul aa.ī ga.ī sehn-e-chaman meñ sau baar apne sar meñ thā jo saudā vo ba-dastūr rahā 
jalva-e-barq-e-tajallī nazar aayā na kabhī muddatoñ jā ke vahāñ meñ shajar-e-tūr rahā 
zulf o ruḳh donoñ haiñ jaane se javānī ke ḳharāb mushk vo mushk na kāfūr vo kāfūr rahā 
ġhol-e-sahrā ne mirā saath na chhoḌā shab bhar le ke mash.al kabhī nazdīk kabhī duur rahā 
ham bhī maujūd the kal mahfil-e-jānāñ meñ 'amīr' raat ko der talak aap kā mazkūr rahā 
wasl ki shab bhi KHafa wo but-e-maghrur raha hausla dil ka jo tha dil mein ba-dastur raha 
umr-e-rafta ke talaf hone ka aaya to KHayal lekin ek dam ki talafi ka na maqdur raha 
jama kis din na hue mausam-e-gul mein mai-kash roz hangama tah-e-saya-e-angur raha 
gardish-e-baKHt kahan se hamein lai hai kahan manzilon wadi-e-ghurbat se watan dur raha 
rast-bazi kar agar namwari hai darkar dar se KHalq mein aawaz-e-mansur raha 
wo to hai charKH chahaarum pe ye pach mohalle par sach hai isa se bhi baala tera mazdur raha 
fasl-e-gul aai gai sehn-e-chaman mein sau bar apne sar mein tha jo sauda wo ba-dastur raha 
jalwa-e-barq-e-tajalli nazar aaya na kabhi muddaton ja ke wahan mein shajar-e-tur raha 
zulf o ruKH donon hain jaane se jawani ke KHarab mushk wo mushk na kafur wo kafur raha 
ghol-e-sahra ne mera sath na chhoDa shab bhar le ke mashal kabhi nazdik kabhi dur raha 
hum bhi maujud the kal mahfil-e-jaanan mein 'amir' raat ko der talak aap ka mazkur raha

rabt hai nāz-e-butāñ ko to mirī jaan ke saath jī hai vābasta mirā un kī har ik aan ke saath 
apne hāthoñ ke bhī maiñ zor kā dīvāna huuñ raat din kushtī hī rahtī hai garebān ke saath 
jo jafā-jū haiñ unheñ sañg-dilī lāzim hai kaam talvār ko rahtā hai sadā saan ke saath 
gar masīhā-nafasī hai yahī mutrib to ḳhair jī hī jaate haiñ chale terī har ik taan ke saath 
'dard' har-chand maiñ zāhir meñ to huuñ mor-e-za.īf zor nisbat hai vale mujh ko 'sulaimān' ke saath 
rabt hai naz-e-butan ko to meri jaan ke sath ji hai wabasta mera un ki har ek aan ke sath 
apne hathon ke bhi main zor ka diwana hun raat din kushti hi rahti hai gareban ke sath 
jo jafa-ju hain unhen sang-dili lazim hai kaam talwar ko rahta hai sada san ke sath 
gar masiha-nafasi hai yahi mutrib to KHair ji hi jate hain chale teri har ek tan ke sath 
'dard' har-chand main zahir mein to hun mor-e-zaif zor nisbat hai wale mujh ko 'sulaiman' ke sath

tire ḳhayāl ko zanjīr kartā rahtā huuñ maiñ apne ḳhvāb kī tābīr kartā rahtā huuñ 
tamām rañg adhūre lage tire aage so tujh ko lafz meñ tasvīr kartā rahtā huuñ 
jo baat dil se zabāñ tak safar nahīñ kartī usī ko sher meñ tahrīr kartā rahtā huuñ 
dukhoñ ko apne chhupātā huuñ maiñ dafīnoñ sā magar ḳhushī ko hama-gīr kartā rahtā huuñ 
guzishta rut kā amiiñ huuñ na.e makān meñ bhī purānī iiñT se ta.amīr kartā rahtā huuñ 
mujhe bhī shauq hai duniyā ko zer karne kā maiñ apne aap ko tasḳhīr kartā rahtā huuñ 
zamīn hai ki badaltī nahīñ kabhī mehvar maiñ kaisī kaisī tadābīr kartā rahtā huuñ 
jo maiñ huuñ us ko chhupātā huuñ saare aalam se jo maiñ nahīñ huuñ vo tash.hīr kartā rahtā huuñ 
tere KHayal ko zanjir karta rahta hun main apne KHwab ki tabir karta rahta hun 
tamam rang adhure lage tere aage so tujh ko lafz mein taswir karta rahta hun 
jo baat dil se zaban tak safar nahin karti usi ko sher mein tahrir karta rahta hun 
dukhon ko apne chhupata hun main dafinon sa magar KHushi ko hama-gir karta rahta hun 
guzishta rut ka amin hun nae makan mein bhi purani inT se tamir karta rahta hun 
mujhe bhi shauq hai duniya ko zer karne ka main apne aap ko tasKHir karta rahta hun 
zamin hai ki badalti nahin kabhi mehwar main kaisi kaisi tadabir karta rahta hun 
jo main hun us ko chhupata hun sare aalam se jo main nahin hun wo tashhir karta rahta hun

sañg-e-dar dekh ke sar yaad aayā koī dīvāna magar yaad aayā 
phir vo andāz-e-nazar yaad aayā chāk-e-dil tā-ba jigar yaad aayā 
zauq-e-arbāb-e-nazar yaad aayā sajda be-minnat-e-sar yaad aayā 
har tabassum pe ye khātā huuñ fareb ki unheñ dīda-e-tar yaad aayā 
phir tirā naqsh-e-qadam hai darkār sajda-e-rāhguzar yaad aayā 
jamā kartā huuñ ġhubār-e-rah-e-dost sar-e-shorīda magar yaad aayā 
haa.e vo mārka-e-nāvak-e-nāz dil bachāyā to jigar yaad aayā 
ā.īna ab nahīñ dekhā jaatā maiñ ba-unvān-e-digar yaad aayā 
dard ko phir hai mire dil kī talāsh ḳhāna-barbād ko ghar yaad aayā 
us ko bhūle to hue ho 'fānī' kyā karoge vo agar yaad aayā 
sang-e-dar dekh ke sar yaad aaya koi diwana magar yaad aaya 
phir wo andaz-e-nazar yaad aaya chaak-e-dil ta-ba jigar yaad aaya 
zauq-e-arbab-e-nazar yaad aaya sajda be-minnat-e-sar yaad aaya 
har tabassum pe ye khata hun fareb ki unhen dida-e-tar yaad aaya 
phir tera naqsh-e-qadam hai darkar sajda-e-rahguzar yaad aaya 
jama karta hun ghubar-e-rah-e-dost sar-e-shorida magar yaad aaya 
hae wo marka-e-nawak-e-naz dil bachaya to jigar yaad aaya 
aaina ab nahin dekha jata main ba-unwan-e-digar yaad aaya 
dard ko phir hai mere dil ki talash KHana-barbaad ko ghar yaad aaya 
us ko bhule to hue ho 'fani' kya karoge wo agar yaad aaya

sab pech-o-tāb-e-shauq ke tūfān tham ga.e vo zulf khul ga.ī to havāoñ ke ḳham ga.e 
saarī fazā thī vādī-e-majnūñ kī ḳhvāb-nāk jo rūshanās-e-marg-e-mohabbat the kam ga.e 
vahshat sī ek lāla-e-ḳhūnīñ kafan se thī ab ke bahār aa.ī to samjho ki ham ga.e 
ab jin ke ġham kā terā tabassum hai parda-dār āḳhir vo kaun the ki ba-mizhgān-e-nam ga.e 
ai jāda-e-ḳhirām-e-mah-o-mahr dekhnā terī taraf bhī aaj havā ke qadam ga.e 
maiñ aur tere band-e-qabā kī hadīs-e-ishq nā-dīda ḳhvāb-e-ishq ka.ī be-raqam ga.e 
aisī koī ḳhabar to nahīñ sākinān-e-shahr dariyā mohabbatoñ ke jo bahte the tham ga.e 
sab pech-o-tab-e-shauq ke tufan tham gae wo zulf khul gai to hawaon ke KHam gae 
sari faza thi wadi-e-majnun ki KHwab-nak jo rushanas-e-marg-e-mohabbat the kam gae 
wahshat si ek lala-e-KHunin kafan se thi ab ke bahaar aai to samjho ki hum gae 
ab jin ke gham ka tera tabassum hai parda-dar aaKHir wo kaun the ki ba-mizhgan-e-nam gae 
ai jada-e-KHiram-e-mah-o-mahr dekhna teri taraf bhi aaj hawa ke qadam gae 
main aur tere band-e-qaba ki hadis-e-ishq na-dida KHwab-e-ishq kai be-raqam gae 
aisi koi KHabar to nahin sakinan-e-shahr dariya mohabbaton ke jo bahte the tham gae

baat baḌhtī ga.ī aage mirī nādānī se kitnā arzāñ huā maiñ apnī farāvānī se 
ḳhaak hī ḳhaak nazar aa.ī mujhe chāroñ taraf jal ga.e chāñd sitāre mirī tābānī se 
be-tahāsha jiye ham log hameñ hosh nahīñ vaqt ārām se guzrā ki pareshānī se 
ab mire gird Thahartī nahīñ dīvār koī bandisheñ haar ga.iiñ be-sar-o-sāmānī se 
aa.egā aisā bhī ik moḌ safar meñ 'rāhī' gard bhī merī na pāoge tum āsānī se 
baat baDhti gai aage meri nadani se kitna arzan hua main apni farawani se 
KHak hi KHak nazar aai mujhe chaaron taraf jal gae chand sitare meri tabani se 
be-tahasha jiye hum log hamein hosh nahin waqt aaram se guzra ki pareshani se 
ab mere gird Thaharti nahin diwar koi bandishen haar gain be-sar-o-samani se 
aaega aisa bhi ek moD safar mein 'rahi' gard bhi meri na paoge tum aasani se

tumhāre paas raheñ ham to maut bhī kyā hai magar jo duur kaTe tum se zindagī kyā hai 
jab uTh ke chal diye tum tīrgī umaD aa.ī jo tum na ho to charāġhoñ kī raushnī kyā hai 
kuchh aise phuul bhī guzre haiñ merī nazroñ se jo khil ke bhī na samajh paa.e zindagī kyā hai 
bas un kī yaad ke ham paañv chuum lete haiñ hameñ ḳhabar nahīñ merāj-e-bandagī kyā hai 
kabhī jo gosh-bar-āvāz ho ke us ko suno tumheñ pata bhī chale sāz-e-ḳhāmushī kyā hai 
mirī nigāh ne kyā kyā na ḳhvāb dekhe haiñ tirī nigāh ne ik baat sī kahī kyā hai 
hamīñ ne zulmat-e-hastī meñ dil jalā.e haiñ ye ham samajhte haiñ darmān-e-tīrgī kyā hai 
ubhar rahī hai jo rah rah ke dil kī dhaḌkan meñ vo aarzū hai ki hai us kī bebasī kyā hai 
ḳhizāñ-nasīb hoñ nazreñ jo ahl-e-gulshan kī to phir bahār ke jalvoñ kī tāzgī kyā hai 
jahāñ meñ ye kabhī majbūr hai kabhī muḳhtār hai ek sho.abada 'āzād' aadmī kyā hai 
tumhaare pas rahen hum to maut bhi kya hai magar jo dur kaTe tum se zindagi kya hai 
jab uTh ke chal diye tum tirgi umaD aai jo tum na ho to charaghon ki raushni kya hai 
kuchh aise phul bhi guzre hain meri nazron se jo khil ke bhi na samajh pae zindagi kya hai 
bas un ki yaad ke hum panw chum lete hain hamein KHabar nahin meraj-e-bandagi kya hai 
kabhi jo gosh-bar-awaz ho ke us ko suno tumhein pata bhi chale saz-e-KHamushi kya hai 
meri nigah ne kya kya na KHwab dekhe hain teri nigah ne ek baat si kahi kya hai 
hamin ne zulmat-e-hasti mein dil jalae hain ye hum samajhte hain darman-e-tirgi kya hai 
ubhar rahi hai jo rah rah ke dil ki dhaDkan mein wo aarzu hai ki hai us ki bebasi kya hai 
KHizan-nasib hon nazren jo ahl-e-gulshan ki to phir bahaar ke jalwon ki tazgi kya hai 
jahan mein ye kabhi majbur hai kabhi muKHtar hai ek shoabada 'azad' aadmi kya hai

chāhtā huuñ pahle ḳhud-bīnī se maut aa.e mujhe aap ko dekhūñ ḳhudā vo din na dikhlā.e mujhe 
aas kyā ab to umīd-e-nā-umīdī bhī nahīñ kaun de mujh ko tasallī kaun bahlā.e mujhe 
dil dhaḌaktā hai shab-e-ġham meñ kahīñ aisā na ho marg bhī ban kar mizāj-e-yār tarsā.e mujhe 
le chalo lillāh koī ḳhizr-e-mīnā ke huzūr ālam-e-gum-gashtagī kī raah batlā.e mujhe 
ab to josh-e-ārzū 'taslīm' kahtā hai yahī rauza-e-shāh-e-najaf-allāh dikhlā.e mujhe 
chahta hun pahle KHud-bini se maut aae mujhe aap ko dekhun KHuda wo din na dikhlae mujhe 
aas kya ab to umid-e-na-umidi bhi nahin kaun de mujh ko tasalli kaun bahlae mujhe 
dil dhaDakta hai shab-e-gham mein kahin aisa na ho marg bhi ban kar mizaj-e-yar tarsae mujhe 
le chalo lillah koi KHizr-e-mina ke huzur aalam-e-gum-gashtagi ki rah batlae mujhe 
ab to josh-e-arzu 'taslim' kahta hai yahi rauza-e-shah-e-najaf-allah dikhlae mujhe

is hādse ko dekh ke āñkhoñ meñ dard hai apnī jabīñ pe apne hī qadmoñ kī gard hai 
aa thoḌī der baiTh ke bāteñ kareñ yahāñ tere to yaar lahje meñ apnā sā dard hai 
kyā ho ga.iiñ na jaane tirī garm-joshiyāñ mausam se aaj haath sivā terā sard hai 
tārīḳh bhī huuñ utne baras kī mo.arriḳho chehre pe mere jitne baras kī ye gard hai 
ai raat tere chāñd sitāroñ meñ vo kahāñ bujhte hue charāġh kī lau meñ jo dard hai 
'az.har' jo qatl ho gayā vo bhaa.ī thā magar qātil bhī mere apne qabīle kā fard hai 
is hadse ko dekh ke aankhon mein dard hai apni jabin pe apne hi qadmon ki gard hai 
aa thoDi der baiTh ke baaten karen yahan tere to yar lahje mein apna sa dard hai 
kya ho gain na jaane teri garm-joshiyan mausam se aaj hath siwa tera sard hai 
tariKH bhi hun utne baras ki moarriKHo chehre pe mere jitne baras ki ye gard hai 
ai raat tere chand sitaron mein wo kahan bujhte hue charagh ki lau mein jo dard hai 
'azhar' jo qatl ho gaya wo bhai tha magar qatil bhi mere apne qabile ka fard hai

ye ham ko kaun sī duniyā kī dhun āvāra rakhtī hai ki ḳhud sābit-qadam rah kar hameñ sayyāra rakhtī hai 
agar bujhne lageñ ham to havā-e-shām-e-tanhā.ī kisī mehrāb meñ jā kar hameñ dobāra rakhtī hai 
chalo ham dhuup jaise log hī us ko nikāl aa.eñ sunā hai vo nadī tah meñ koī mah-pāra rakhtī hai 
hameñ kis kaam par māmūr kartī hai ye duniyā bhī ki tarsīl-e-ġham-e-dil ke liye harkāra rakhtī hai 
kabhī sar phoḌne detī nahīñ dīvār se 'tābish' ye kyā dīvāngī hai jo hameñ nākāra rakhtī hai 
ye hum ko kaun si duniya ki dhun aawara rakhti hai ki KHud sabit-qadam rah kar hamein sayyara rakhti hai 
agar bujhne lagen hum to hawa-e-sham-e-tanhai kisi mehrab mein ja kar hamein dobara rakhti hai 
chalo hum dhup jaise log hi us ko nikal aaen suna hai wo nadi tah mein koi mah-para rakhti hai 
hamein kis kaam par mamur karti hai ye duniya bhi ki tarsil-e-gham-e-dil ke liye harkara rakhti hai 
kabhi sar phoDne deti nahin diwar se 'tabish' ye kya diwangi hai jo hamein nakara rakhti hai

aur ab ye kahtā huuñ ye jurm to ravā rakhtā maiñ umr apne liye bhī to kuchh bachā rakhtā 
ḳhayāl-sub.hoñ kiran-sāhiloñ kī oT sadā maiñ motiyoñ jaḌī bansī kī lai jagā rakhtā 
jab āsmāñ pe ḳhudāoñ ke lafz Takrāte maiñ apnī soch kī be-harf lau jalā rakhtā 
havā ke sāyoñ meñ hijr aur hijratoñ ke vo ḳhvāb maiñ apne dil meñ vo sab manzileñ sajā rakhtā 
inhīñ hadoñ tak ubhartī ye lahar jis meñ huuñ maiñ agar maiñ sab ye samundar bhī vaqt kā rakhtā 
palaT paḌā huuñ shuāoñ ke chīthḌe oḌhe nasheb-e-zīna-e-ayyām par asā rakhtā 
ye kaun hai jo mirī zindagī meñ aa aa kar hai mujh meñ kho.e mire jī ko DhūñDtā rakhtā 
ġhamoñ ke sabz tabassum se kunj mahke haiñ samay ke sam ke samar haiñ maiñ aur kyā rakhtā 
kisī ḳhayāl meñ huuñ yā kisī ḳhalā meñ huuñ kahāñ huuñ koī jahāñ to mirā patā rakhtā 
jo shikva ab hai yahī ibtidā meñ thā 'amjad' karīm thā mirī koshish meñ intihā rakhtā 
aur ab ye kahta hun ye jurm to rawa rakhta main umr apne liye bhi to kuchh bacha rakhta 
KHayal-subhon kiran-sahilon ki oT sada main motiyon jaDi bansi ki lai jaga rakhta 
jab aasman pe KHudaon ke lafz Takraate main apni soch ki be-harf lau jala rakhta 
hawa ke sayon mein hijr aur hijraton ke wo KHwab main apne dil mein wo sab manzilen saja rakhta 
inhin hadon tak ubharti ye lahar jis mein hun main agar main sab ye samundar bhi waqt ka rakhta 
palaT paDa hun shuaon ke chithDe oDhe nasheb-e-zina-e-ayyam par asa rakhta 
ye kaun hai jo meri zindagi mein aa aa kar hai mujh mein khoe mere ji ko DhunDta rakhta 
ghamon ke sabz tabassum se kunj mahke hain samay ke sam ke samar hain main aur kya rakhta 
kisi KHayal mein hun ya kisi KHala mein hun kahan hun koi jahan to mera pata rakhta 
jo shikwa ab hai yahi ibtida mein tha 'amjad' karim tha meri koshish mein intiha rakhta

ḳhūn-e-dil se kisht-e-ġham ko sīñchtā rahtā huuñ maiñ ḳhālī kāġhaz par lakīreñ khīñchtā rahtā huuñ maiñ 
aaj se mujh par mukammal ho gayā dīn-e-firāq haañ tasavvur meñ bhī ab tujh se judā rahtā huuñ maiñ 
tū dayār-e-husn hai ūñchī rahe terī fasīl maiñ huuñ darvāza mohabbat kaa, khulā rahtā huuñ maiñ 
shaam tak khīñche liye phirte haiñ is duniyā ke kaam sub.h tak farsh-e-nadāmat par paḌā rahtā huuñ maiñ 
haañ kabhī mujh par bhī ho jaatā hai mausam kā asar haañ kisī din shākī-e-āb-o-havā rahtā huuñ maiñ 
ahl-e-duniyā se ta.alluq qat.a hotā hī nahīñ bhuul jaane par bhī sūrat-āshnā rahtā huuñ maiñ 
KHun-e-dil se kisht-e-gham ko sinchta rahta hun main KHali kaghaz par lakiren khinchta rahta hun main 
aaj se mujh par mukammal ho gaya din-e-firaq han tasawwur mein bhi ab tujh se juda rahta hun main 
tu dayar-e-husn hai unchi rahe teri fasil main hun darwaza mohabbat ka, khula rahta hun main 
sham tak khinche liye phirte hain is duniya ke kaam subh tak farsh-e-nadamat par paDa rahta hun main 
han kabhi mujh par bhi ho jata hai mausam ka asar han kisi din shaki-e-ab-o-hawa rahta hun main 
ahl-e-duniya se talluq qata hota hi nahin bhul jaane par bhi surat-ashna rahta hun main

manzar thā raakh aur tabī.at udaas thī har-chand terī yaad mire aas paas thī 
mīloñ thī ik jhulastī huī dopahar kī qaash siine meñ band saiñkaḌoñ sadiyoñ kī pyaas thī 
uTThe nahā ke sho.aloñ meñ apne to ye khulā saare jahāñ meñ phailī huī terī baas thī 
kaise kahūñ ki maiñ ne kahāñ kā safar kiyā ākāsh be-charāġh zamīñ be-libās thī 
ab dhuul meñ aTī huī rāhoñ pe hai safar vo din ga.e ki pāñv-tale narm ghaas thī 
manzar tha rakh aur tabiat udas thi har-chand teri yaad mere aas pas thi 
milon thi ek jhulasti hui dopahar ki qash sine mein band sainkaDon sadiyon ki pyas thi 
uTThe naha ke shoalon mein apne to ye khula sare jahan mein phaili hui teri bas thi 
kaise kahun ki main ne kahan ka safar kiya aakash be-charagh zamin be-libas thi 
ab dhul mein aTi hui rahon pe hai safar wo din gae ki panw-tale narm ghas thi

dil kī dil ko ḳhabar nahīñ miltī jab nazar se nazar nahīñ miltī 
sahar aa.ī hai din kī dhuup liye ab nasīm-e-sahar nahīñ miltī 
dil-e-māsūm kī vo pahlī choT dostoñ se nazar nahīñ miltī 
jitne lab utne us ke afsāne ḳhabar-e-mo'tabar nahīñ miltī 
hai maqām-e-junūñ se hosh kī rah sab ko ye rahguzar nahīñ miltī 
nahīñ 'mullā' pe us fuġhāñ kā asar jis meñ āh-e-bashar nahīñ miltī 
dil ki dil ko KHabar nahin milti jab nazar se nazar nahin milti 
sahar aai hai din ki dhup liye ab nasim-e-sahar nahin milti 
dil-e-masum ki wo pahli choT doston se nazar nahin milti 
jitne lab utne us ke afsane KHabar-e-mo'tabar nahin milti 
hai maqam-e-junun se hosh ki rah sab ko ye rahguzar nahin milti 
nahin 'mulla' pe us fughan ka asar jis mein aah-e-bashar nahin milti

asar zulf kā barmalā ho gayā balāoñ se mil kar balā ho gayā 
junūñ le ke hamrāh aa.ī bahār na.e sir se phir valvalā ho gayā 
diyā ġhair ne bhī dil āḳhir use mujhe dekh kar man-chalā ho gayā 
samā.ī dil-e-tañg kī dekhiye ki aalam meñ sābit ḳhalā ho gayā 
ta.allī zamīñ se jo nāloñ ne kī falak par ayaañ zalzala ho gayā 
huā qatl be-jurm maiñ jā ke 'barq' vo kūcha mujhe karbalā ho gayā 
asar zulf ka barmala ho gaya balaon se mil kar bala ho gaya 
junun le ke hamrah aai bahaar nae sir se phir walwala ho gaya 
diya ghair ne bhi dil aaKHir use mujhe dekh kar man-chala ho gaya 
samai dil-e-tang ki dekhiye ki aalam mein sabit KHala ho gaya 
talli zamin se jo nalon ne ki falak par ayan zalzala ho gaya 
hua qatl be-jurm main ja ke 'barq' wo kucha mujhe karbala ho gaya

jis ko maanā thā ḳhudā ḳhaak kā paikar niklā haath aayā jo yaqīñ vahm sarāsar niklā 
ik safar dasht-e-ḳharābī se sarāboñ tak hai aañkh kholī to jahāñ ḳhvāb kā manzar niklā 
kal jahāñ zulm ne kaaTī thiiñ saroñ kī fasleñ nam huī hai to usī ḳhaak se lashkar niklā 
ḳhushk āñkhoñ se uThī mauj to duniyā Duubī ham jise samjhe the sahrā vo samundar niklā 
zer-e-pā ab na zamīñ hai na falak hai sar par sail-e-taḳhlīq bhī girdāb kā manzar niklā 
gum haiñ jibrīl o nabī gum haiñ kitāb o īmāñ āsmāñ ḳhud bhī ḳhalāoñ kā samundar niklā 
arsh par aaj utartī hai zamīnoñ kī vahī kurra-e-ḳhāk sitāroñ se munavvar niklā 
har payambar se sahīfe kā taqāzā na huā haq kā ye qarz bhī niklā to hamīñ par niklā 
guuñj uThā naġhma-e-kun dasht-e-tamannā meñ 'vahīd' pā-e-vahshat had-e-imkāñ se jo bāhar niklā 
jis ko mana tha KHuda KHak ka paikar nikla hath aaya jo yaqin wahm sarasar nikla 
ek safar dasht-e-KHarabi se sarabon tak hai aankh kholi to jahan KHwab ka manzar nikla 
kal jahan zulm ne kaTi thin saron ki faslen nam hui hai to usi KHak se lashkar nikla 
KHushk aankhon se uThi mauj to duniya Dubi hum jise samjhe the sahra wo samundar nikla 
zer-e-pa ab na zamin hai na falak hai sar par sail-e-taKHliq bhi girdab ka manzar nikla 
gum hain jibril o nabi gum hain kitab o iman aasman KHud bhi KHalaon ka samundar nikla 
arsh par aaj utarti hai zaminon ki wahi kurra-e-KHak sitaron se munawwar nikla 
har payambar se sahife ka taqaza na hua haq ka ye qarz bhi nikla to hamin par nikla 
gunj uTha naghma-e-kun dasht-e-tamanna mein 'wahid' pa-e-wahshat had-e-imkan se jo bahar nikla

umīdoñ se dil-e-barbād ko ābād kartā huuñ miTāne ke liye duniyā na.ī ījād kartā huuñ 
umidon se dil-e-barbaad ko aabaad karta hun miTane ke liye duniya nai ijad karta hun

kise batāte ki manzar nigāh meñ kyā thā har ek rañg meñ apnā hī bas tamāshā thā 
ham aaj tak to koī imtiyāz kar na sake yahāñ to jo bhī milā hai vo tere jaisā thā 
ajiib ḳhvāb thā ta.abīr kyā huī us kī ki ek dariyā havāoñ ke ruḳh pe bahtā thā 
na koī zulm na halchal na mas.ala koī abhī kī baat hai maiñ hādse ugātā thā 
har ek shaḳhs ne apne se munsalik samjhī koī kahānī kisī kī kisī se kahtā thā 
hamārā naam thā āshufta-hāl logoñ meñ ḳhizāñ-pasand tabī.at kā apnī charchā thā 
kise batate ki manzar nigah mein kya tha har ek rang mein apna hi bas tamasha tha 
hum aaj tak to koi imtiyaz kar na sake yahan to jo bhi mila hai wo tere jaisa tha 
ajib KHwab tha tabir kya hui us ki ki ek dariya hawaon ke ruKH pe bahta tha 
na koi zulm na halchal na masala koi abhi ki baat hai main hadse ugata tha 
har ek shaKHs ne apne se munsalik samjhi koi kahani kisi ki kisi se kahta tha 
hamara nam tha aashufta-haal logon mein KHizan-pasand tabiat ka apni charcha tha

jis dil meñ tirī zulf kā saudā nahīñ hotā vo dil nahīñ hotā nahīñ hotā nahīñ hotā 
āshiq jise kahte haiñ vo paidā nahīñ hotā aur ho.e bhī bil-farz to mujh sā nahīñ hotā 
jo kushta-e-teġh-e-nigah-e-yār haiñ un par kuchh kārgar ejāz-e-masīhā nahīñ hotā 
maanā ki sitam karte haiñ ma.ashūq magar aap jo mujh pe ravā rakhte haiñ aisā nahīñ hotā 
jo mast hai saaqī nigah-e-mast kā vo tū minnat-kash-e-jām-o-mai-o-mīnā nahīñ hotā 
kahtā hai koī sho.ala-e-javvāla koī barq is dil pe gumāñ logoñ ko kyā kyā nahīñ hotā 
zāhid ho do-chār-e-nigah-e-mast to dekheñ ālūda ba-mai kyūñki musallā nahīñ hotā 
haañ kuchh to bayān-e-havas-e-dil meñ hai lazzat jo lab se judā harf-e-tamannā nahīñ hotā 
taskīn-e-dil-e-soḳhta-e-shamm.a kī ḳhātir kis shab par-e-parvāna se pañkhā nahīñ hotā 
dil ishq ne itnā bhī na chhoḌā ki jo kahveñ taqsīm juz-e-lā-yatajazzā nahīñ hotā 
de baiThe ho dil 'aish' tum un logoñ ko jin kī bedād kā vaañ bhī koī shunvā nahīñ hotā 
jis dil mein teri zulf ka sauda nahin hota wo dil nahin hota nahin hota nahin hota 
aashiq jise kahte hain wo paida nahin hota aur hoe bhi bil-farz to mujh sa nahin hota 
jo kushta-e-tegh-e-nigah-e-yar hain un par kuchh kargar ejaz-e-masiha nahin hota 
mana ki sitam karte hain mashuq magar aap jo mujh pe rawa rakhte hain aisa nahin hota 
jo mast hai saqi nigah-e-mast ka wo tu minnat-kash-e-jam-o-mai-o-mina nahin hota 
kahta hai koi shoala-e-jawwala koi barq is dil pe guman logon ko kya kya nahin hota 
zahid ho do-chaar-e-nigah-e-mast to dekhen aaluda ba-mai kyunki musalla nahin hota 
han kuchh to bayan-e-hawas-e-dil mein hai lazzat jo lab se juda harf-e-tamanna nahin hota 
taskin-e-dil-e-soKHta-e-shamma ki KHatir kis shab par-e-parwana se pankha nahin hota 
dil ishq ne itna bhi na chhoDa ki jo kahwen taqsim juz-e-la-yatajazza nahin hota 
de baiThe ho dil 'aish' tum un logon ko jin ki bedad ka wan bhi koi shunwa nahin hota

jhuuT raushan hai ki sachchā.ī nahīñ jānte haiñ log ab vahm o gumāñ ko hī yaqīñ jānte haiñ 
ye alag baat ki aatī nahīñ duniyā-dārī ahl-e-duniyā ko magar gosha-nashīñ jānte haiñ 
taaq o mehrāb kā ronā ho ki dīvār kā ġham baam o dar par jo guzartī hai makīñ jānte haiñ 
varaq-e-dil pe abhī naqsh hai shab-nāma-e-ġham phir bhī har sub.h ko ham sub.h-e-hasīñ jānte haiñ 
jhuk ke milte to haiñ vo ḳhāk-nashīnoñ se magar āsmāñ vāloñ ko ham ahl-e-zamīñ jānte haiñ 
sab ke hoñToñ pe munavvar haiñ hamāre qisse aur ham apnī kahānī bhī nahīñ jānte haiñ 
koī dar qābil-e-tāzīm nazar to aa.e sar jhukānā hai kahāñ ahl-e-jabīñ jānte haiñ 
jhuT raushan hai ki sachchai nahin jaante hain log ab wahm o guman ko hi yaqin jaante hain 
ye alag baat ki aati nahin duniya-dari ahl-e-duniya ko magar gosha-nashin jaante hain 
taq o mehrab ka rona ho ki diwar ka gham baam o dar par jo guzarti hai makin jaante hain 
waraq-e-dil pe abhi naqsh hai shab-nama-e-gham phir bhi har subh ko hum subh-e-hasin jaante hain 
jhuk ke milte to hain wo KHak-nashinon se magar aasman walon ko hum ahl-e-zamin jaante hain 
sab ke honTon pe munawwar hain hamare qisse aur hum apni kahani bhi nahin jaante hain 
koi dar qabil-e-tazim nazar to aae sar jhukana hai kahan ahl-e-jabin jaante hain

ye vo safar hai jahāñ ḳhūñ-bahā zarūrī hai vahī na dekhnā jo dekhnā zarūrī hai 
badaltī samtoñ kī tārīḳh likh rahā huuñ maiñ har ek moḌ pe ab hādsa zarūrī hai 
nuqūsh chehroñ ke alfāz bante jaate haiñ kuchh aur is se ziyāda bhī kyā zarūrī hai 
ye sone vaale tujhe sañgsār kar deñge ye kah ke dekh kabhī jāgnā zarūrī hai 
añdherī raat meñ us rahguzār par yaaro mirī tarah se ye jaltā diyā zarūrī hai 
jahāñ jahāñ se maiñ guzrūñ udaas rātoñ meñ vahāñ vahāñ tirī āvāz-e-pā zarūrī hai 
bahut sī bāteñ zabāñ se kahī nahīñ jātīñ savāl kar ke use dekhnā zarūrī hai 
ye wo safar hai jahan KHun-baha zaruri hai wahi na dekhna jo dekhna zaruri hai 
badalti samton ki tariKH likh raha hun main har ek moD pe ab hadsa zaruri hai 
nuqush chehron ke alfaz bante jate hain kuchh aur is se ziyaada bhi kya zaruri hai 
ye sone wale tujhe sangsar kar denge ye kah ke dekh kabhi jagna zaruri hai 
andheri raat mein us rahguzar par yaro meri tarah se ye jalta diya zaruri hai 
jahan jahan se main guzrun udas raaton mein wahan wahan teri aawaz-e-pa zaruri hai 
bahut si baaten zaban se kahi nahin jatin sawal kar ke use dekhna zaruri hai

na sah sakūñgā ġham-e-zāt go akelā maiñ kahāñ tak aur kisī par karūñ bharosā maiñ 
hunar vo hai ki jiyūñ chāñd ban kar āñkhoñ meñ rahūñ diloñ meñ qayāmat kī tarah barpā maiñ 
vo rañg rañg ke chhīñTe paḌe ki is ke ba.ad kabhī na phir na.e kapḌe pahan ke niklā maiñ 
na sirf ye ki zamāna hī mujh pe hañstā hai banā huā huuñ ḳhud apne liye tamāshā maiñ 
mujhe sameTne aayā bhī thā koī jis vaqt dayār o dasht o daman meñ bikhar rahā thā maiñ 
ye kis tarah kī mohabbat thī kaisā rishta thā ki hijr ne na rulāyā use na taḌpā maiñ 
paḌā rahūñ na qafas meñ to kyā karūñ āḳhir ki dekhtā huuñ bahut duur tak dhuñdlakā maiñ 
bahut malūl huuñ ai sūrat-āshnā tujh se ki tere sāmne kyuuñ aa gayā sarāpā maiñ 
yahī nahīñ ki tujhī ko na thī umiid aisī mujhe bhī ilm nahīñ thā ki ye karūñgā maiñ 
maiñ ḳhaak hī se banā thā tū kaash yuuñ bantā ki us ke haath se girte hī TuuT jaatā maiñ 
na sah sakunga gham-e-zat go akela main kahan tak aur kisi par karun bharosa main 
hunar wo hai ki jiyun chand ban kar aankhon mein rahun dilon mein qayamat ki tarah barpa main 
wo rang rang ke chhinTe paDe ki is ke baad kabhi na phir nae kapDe pahan ke nikla main 
na sirf ye ki zamana hi mujh pe hansta hai bana hua hun KHud apne liye tamasha main 
mujhe sameTne aaya bhi tha koi jis waqt dayar o dasht o daman mein bikhar raha tha main 
ye kis tarah ki mohabbat thi kaisa rishta tha ki hijr ne na rulaya use na taDpa main 
paDa rahun na qafas mein to kya karun aaKHir ki dekhta hun bahut dur tak dhundlaka main 
bahut malul hun ai surat-ashna tujh se ki tere samne kyun aa gaya sarapa main 
yahi nahin ki tujhi ko na thi umid aisi mujhe bhi ilm nahin tha ki ye karunga main 
main KHak hi se bana tha tu kash yun banta ki us ke hath se girte hi TuT jata main

taaza havā bahār kī dil kā malāl le ga.ī pā-e-junūñ se halqa-e-gardish-e-hāl le ga.ī 
jur.at-e-shauq ke sivā ḳhalvatiyān-e-ḳhās ko ik tire ġham kī āgahī tā-ba-savāl le ga.ī 
shola-e-dil bujhā bujhā ḳhāk-e-zabāñ uḌī uḌī dasht-e-hazār-dām se mauj-e-ḳhayāl le ga.ī 
raat kī raat bū-e-gul kūza-e-gul meñ bas ga.ī rañg-e-hazār mai-kada rūh-e-sifāl le ga.ī 
tez havā kī chaap se tīra-banoñ meñ lau uThī rūh-e-taġhayyur-e-jahāñ aag se faal le ga.ī 
nāfa-e-āhu-e-tatār zaḳhm-e-numūd kā shikār dasht se zindagī kī rau ek misāl le ga.ī 
hijr o visāl o nek o bad gardish-e-sad-hazār-o-sad tujh ko kahāñ kahāñ mire sarv-e-kamāl le ga.ī 
narm havā pe yuuñ khule kuchh tire pairahan ke raaz sab tire jism-e-nāz ke rāz-e-visāl le ga.ī 
mātam-e-marg-e-qais kī kis se banegī dāstāñ nauha-e-be-zabāñ koī chashm-e-ġhazāl le ga.ī 
taza hawa bahaar ki dil ka malal le gai pa-e-junun se halqa-e-gardish-e-haal le gai 
jurat-e-shauq ke siwa KHalwatiyan-e-KHas ko ek tere gham ki aagahi ta-ba-sawal le gai 
shola-e-dil bujha bujha KHak-e-zaban uDi uDi dasht-e-hazar-dam se mauj-e-KHayal le gai 
raat ki raat bu-e-gul kuza-e-gul mein bas gai rang-e-hazar mai-kada ruh-e-sifal le gai 
tez hawa ki chap se tira-banon mein lau uThi ruh-e-taghayyur-e-jahan aag se fal le gai 
nafa-e-ahu-e-tatar zaKHm-e-numud ka shikar dasht se zindagi ki rau ek misal le gai 
hijr o visal o nek o bad gardish-e-sad-hazar-o-sad tujh ko kahan kahan mere sarw-e-kamal le gai 
narm hawa pe yun khule kuchh tere pairahan ke raaz sab tere jism-e-naz ke raaz-e-visal le gai 
matam-e-marg-e-qais ki kis se banegi dastan nauha-e-be-zaban koi chashm-e-ghazal le gai

agar āshiq koī paidā na hotā to māshūqoñ kā ye charchā na hotā 
garebāñ chaak kar rote kahāñ ham agar ye dāman-e-sahrā na hotā 
sadā rahtī tavaqqo bulbuloñ ko agar ye ġhuncha-e-gul vā na hotā 
judā.ī meñ agar āñkheñ na rotīñ to hargiz rāz-e-dil ifshā na hotā 
'fuġhāñ' kaun ab ḳharīdār-e-suḳhan thā agar ye hazrat-e-saudā na hotā 
agar aashiq koi paida na hota to mashuqon ka ye charcha na hota 
gareban chaak kar rote kahan hum agar ye daman-e-sahra na hota 
sada rahti tawaqqo bulbulon ko agar ye ghuncha-e-gul wa na hota 
judai mein agar aankhen na rotin to hargiz raaz-e-dil ifsha na hota 
'fughan' kaun ab KHaridar-e-suKHan tha agar ye hazrat-e-sauda na hota

bārish kā hai aisā kaal sūkhe paḌe haiñ dil ke taal 
ye hī mere dukh sukh haiñ kapḌā lattā aaTā daal 
dillī kā taḳhta ulTā dil kī jamī hai magar chaupāl 
ā.inda kī fikr na kar varna dekh le merā haal 
aañsū piinā ġham khānā kaafī hai ye rizq-e-halāl 
duniyā aur duniyā kī chaah jhūTā dariyā naqlī jaal 
dil kā guzārā kaise ho saare yaar hue kañgāl 
jīvan nañgā parbat hai kaThin chaḌhā.ī beDhab Dhaal 
aag se yaarī mat karnā aise dil ko bhaaḌ meñ Daal 
miTTī ko parvā hī nahīñ kis kā chāñd hai kis kā laal 
barish ka hai aisa kal sukhe paDe hain dil ke tal 
ye hi mere dukh sukh hain kapDa latta aaTa dal 
dilli ka taKHta ulTa dil ki jami hai magar chaupal 
aainda ki fikr na kar warna dekh le mera haal 
aansu pina gham khana kafi hai ye rizq-e-halal 
duniya aur duniya ki chah jhuTa dariya naqli jal 
dil ka guzara kaise ho sare yar hue kangal 
jiwan nanga parbat hai kaThin chaDhai beDhab Dhaal 
aag se yari mat karna aise dil ko bhaD mein Dal 
miTTi ko parwa hi nahin kis ka chand hai kis ka lal

ḳhvāb meñ yā ḳhayāl meñ mujhe mil tū kabhī ḳhadd-o-ḳhāl meñ mujhe mil 
mere dil kī dhamāl meñ mujhe dekh mere sur merī taal meñ mujhe mil 
merī miTTī ko aañkh dī hai to phir kisī mauj-e-visāl meñ mujhe mil 
mujhe kyuuñ arsa-e-hayāt diyā ab inheñ māh-o-sāl meñ mujhe mil 
kisī sub.h-e-firāq meñ mujhe chhoḌ kisī shām-e-malāl meñ mujhe mil 
tū ḳhud apnī misāl hai vo to hai isī apnī misāl meñ mujhe mil 
tere shāyān-e-shāñ hai vasf yahī kisī vaqt-e-muhāl meñ mujhe mil 
mere kal kā pata nahīñ merī jaañ tū abhī mere haal meñ mujhe mil 
mujhe mil ke 'urūj de yā na de mere vaqt-e-zavāl meñ mujhe mil 
KHwab mein ya KHayal mein mujhe mil tu kabhi KHadd-o-KHal mein mujhe mil 
mere dil ki dhamal mein mujhe dekh mere sur meri tal mein mujhe mil 
meri miTTi ko aankh di hai to phir kisi mauj-e-visal mein mujhe mil 
mujhe kyun arsa-e-hayat diya ab inhen mah-o-sal mein mujhe mil 
kisi subh-e-firaq mein mujhe chhoD kisi sham-e-malal mein mujhe mil 
tu KHud apni misal hai wo to hai isi apni misal mein mujhe mil 
tere shayan-e-shan hai wasf yahi kisi waqt-e-muhaal mein mujhe mil 
mere kal ka pata nahin meri jaan tu abhi mere haal mein mujhe mil 
mujhe mil ke 'uruj de ya na de mere waqt-e-zawal mein mujhe mil

ishq sāmān bhī hai be-sar-o-sāmānī bhī usī darvesh ke qadmoñ meñ hai sultānī bhī 
ham bhī vaise na rahe dasht bhī vaisā na rahā umr ke saath hī Dhalne lagī vīrānī bhī 
vo jo barbād hue the tire hāthoñ vahī log dam-ba-ḳhud dekh rahe haiñ tirī hairānī bhī 
āḳhir ik roz utarnī hai libādoñ kī tarah tan-e-malbūs! ye pahnī huī uryānī bhī 
ye jo maiñ itnī sahūlat se tujhe chāhtā huuñ dost ik umr meñ miltī hai ye āsānī bhī 
ishq saman bhi hai be-sar-o-samani bhi usi darwesh ke qadmon mein hai sultani bhi 
hum bhi waise na rahe dasht bhi waisa na raha umr ke sath hi Dhalne lagi virani bhi 
wo jo barbaad hue the tere hathon wahi log dam-ba-KHud dekh rahe hain teri hairani bhi 
aaKHir ek roz utarni hai libaadon ki tarah tan-e-malbus! ye pahni hui uryani bhi 
ye jo main itni sahulat se tujhe chahta hun dost ek umr mein milti hai ye aasani bhi

sheḳh ne nāqūs ke sur meñ jo ḳhud hī taan lī phir to yāroñ ne bhajan gaane kī khul kar Thaan lī 
muddatoñ qaa.im raheñgī ab diloñ meñ garmiyāñ maiñ ne photo le liyā us ne nazar pahchān lī 
ro rahe haiñ dost merī laash par be-iḳhtiyār ye nahīñ daryāft karte kis ne is kī jaan lī 
maiñ to engine kī gale-bāzī kā qaa.il ho gayā rah ga.e naġhme hudī-ḳhvānoñ ke aisī taan lī 
hazrat-e-'akbar' ke istiqlāl kā huuñ mo'tarif ta-ba-marg us par rahe qaa.im jo dil meñ Thaan lī 
sheKH ne naqus ke sur mein jo KHud hi tan li phir to yaron ne bhajan gane ki khul kar Than li 
muddaton qaim rahengi ab dilon mein garmiyan main ne photo le liya us ne nazar pahchan li 
ro rahe hain dost meri lash par be-iKHtiyar ye nahin daryaft karte kis ne is ki jaan li 
main to engine ki gale-bazi ka qail ho gaya rah gae naghme hudi-KHwanon ke aisi tan li 
hazrat-e-'akbar' ke istiqlal ka hun mo'tarif ta-ba-marg us par rahe qaim jo dil mein Than li

aks kī sūrat dikhā kar aap kā saanī mujhe saath apne le gayā bahtā huā paanī mujhe 
maiñ badan ko dard ke malbūs pahnātā rahā ruuh tak phailī huī miltī hai uryānī mujhe 
is tarah qaht-e-havā kī zad meñ hai merā vajūd āñdhiyāñ pahchān letī haiñ ba-āsānī mujhe 
baḌh gayā is rut meñ shāyad nik.hatoñ kā e'tibār din ke āñgan meñ lubhā.e raat kī raanī mujhe 
munjamid sajdoñ kī yaḳh-basta munājātoñ kī ḳhair aag ke nazdīk le aa.ī hai peshānī mujhe 
aks ki surat dikha kar aap ka sani mujhe sath apne le gaya bahta hua pani mujhe 
main badan ko dard ke malbus pahnata raha ruh tak phaili hui milti hai uryani mujhe 
is tarah qaht-e-hawa ki zad mein hai mera wajud aandhiyan pahchan leti hain ba-asani mujhe 
baDh gaya is rut mein shayad nikhaton ka e'tibar din ke aangan mein lubhae raat ki rani mujhe 
munjamid sajdon ki yaKH-basta munajaton ki KHair aag ke nazdik le aai hai peshani mujhe

zavāl-e-shab meñ kisī kī sadā nikal aa.e sitāra Duube sitāra-numā nikal aa.e 
ajab nahīñ ki ye dariyā nazar kā dhokā ho ajab nahīñ ki koī rāsta nikal aa.e 
ye kis ne dast-e-burīda kī fasl boī thī tamām shahr meñ naḳhl-e-duā nikal aa.e 
baḌī ghuTan hai charāġhoñ kā kyā ḳhayāl karūñ ab is taraf koī mauj-e-havā nikal aa.e 
ḳhudā kare saf-e-sardādgāñ na ho ḳhālī jo maiñ girūñ to koī dūsrā nikal aa.e 
zawal-e-shab mein kisi ki sada nikal aae sitara Dube sitara-numa nikal aae 
ajab nahin ki ye dariya nazar ka dhoka ho ajab nahin ki koi rasta nikal aae 
ye kis ne dast-e-burida ki fasl boi thi tamam shahr mein naKHl-e-dua nikal aae 
baDi ghuTan hai charaghon ka kya KHayal karun ab is taraf koi mauj-e-hawa nikal aae 
KHuda kare saf-e-sardadgan na ho KHali jo main girun to koi dusra nikal aae

butoñ ke vāste to dīn-o-īmāñ bech Daale haiñ ye vo māshūq haiñ jo ham ne kaabe se nikāle haiñ 
vo dīvāna huuñ jis ne koh o sahrā chhān Daale haiñ unhīñ talvoñ se to TuuTe hue kāñTe nikāle haiñ 
tarāshī haiñ vo bāteñ us sitamgar ne sar-e-mahfil kaleje se hazāroñ tiir chun chun kar nikāle haiñ 
jigar dil ke varaq haiñ vāda-e-dīdār se raushan unheñ kyuuñ duuñ kisī ko ye to jannat ke qabāle haiñ 
agar muñh se kahā kuchh to bikhar hī jā.eñge TukḌe baḌī mushkil se ham TuuTe hue dil ko sambhāle haiñ 
hamīñ haiñ mojid-e-bāb-e-fasāhat hazrat-e-'shā.ir' zamāna sīkhtā hai ham se ham vo dillī vaale haiñ 
buton ke waste to din-o-iman bech Dale hain ye wo mashuq hain jo hum ne kabe se nikale hain 
wo diwana hun jis ne koh o sahra chhan Dale hain unhin talwon se to TuTe hue kanTe nikale hain 
tarashi hain wo baaten us sitamgar ne sar-e-mahfil kaleje se hazaron tir chun chun kar nikale hain 
jigar dil ke waraq hain wada-e-didar se raushan unhen kyun dun kisi ko ye to jannat ke qabaale hain 
agar munh se kaha kuchh to bikhar hi jaenge TukDe baDi mushkil se hum TuTe hue dil ko sambhaale hain 
hamin hain mojid-e-bab-e-fasahat hazrat-e-'shair' zamana sikhta hai hum se hum wo dilli wale hain

kitne hī faisle kiye par kahāñ ruk sakā huuñ maiñ aaj bhī apne vaqt par ghar se nikal paḌā huuñ maiñ 
abr se aur dhuup se rishta hai ek sā mirā aa.ine aur charāġh ke biich kā fāsla huuñ maiñ 
tujh ko chhuā to der tak ḳhud ko hī DhūñDtā rahā itnī sī der meñ bhalā tujh se kahāñ milā huuñ maiñ 
ḳhushbū tire vajūd kī ghere hue hai aaj bhī tere laboñ kā zā.iqa bhuul nahīñ sakā huuñ maiñ 
āyatoñ jaise nā-gahāñ jāvedāñ lams kī qasam tere achhūte jism kā pahlā mukālima huuñ maiñ 
vaise to merā dā.era puurā nahīñ huā abhī aisī hī koī qaus thī jis se juḌā huā huuñ maiñ 
jitnī bhī tez dhuup ho shāḳheñ haiñ mehrbāñ tirī chhāñv parā.ī hī sahī saañs to le rahā huuñ maiñ 
kitne hi faisle kiye par kahan ruk saka hun main aaj bhi apne waqt par ghar se nikal paDa hun main 
abr se aur dhup se rishta hai ek sa mera aaine aur charagh ke bich ka fasla hun main 
tujh ko chhua to der tak KHud ko hi DhunDta raha itni si der mein bhala tujh se kahan mila hun main 
KHushbu tere wajud ki ghere hue hai aaj bhi tere labon ka zaiqa bhul nahin saka hun main 
aayaton jaise na-gahan jawedan lams ki qasam tere achhute jism ka pahla mukalima hun main 
waise to mera daera pura nahin hua abhi aisi hi koi qaus thi jis se juDa hua hun main 
jitni bhi tez dhup ho shaKHen hain mehrban teri chhanw parai hi sahi sans to le raha hun main

jo naqsh hai hastī kā dhokā nazar aatā hai parde pe musavvir hī tanhā nazar aatā hai 
nairañg-e-tamāshā vo jalva nazar aatā hai āñkhoñ se agar dekho parda nazar aatā hai 
lau sham-e-haqīqat kī apnī hī jagah par hai fānūs kī gardish se kyā kyā nazar aatā hai 
ai parda-nashīñ zid hai kyā chashm-e-tamannā ko tū daftar-e-gul meñ bhī rusvā nazar aatā hai 
nazzāra bhī ab gum hai be-ḳhud hai tamāshā.ī ab kaun kahe is ko jalva nazar aatā hai 
jo kuchh thī yahāñ raunaq sab bād-e-chaman se thī ab kunj-e-qafas mujh ko suunā nazar aatā hai 
ehsās meñ paidā hai phir rañg-e-gulistānī phir daaġh koī dil meñ taaza nazar aatā hai 
thī fard-e-amal 'asġhar' kyā dast-e-mashiyyat meñ ik ek varaq is kā saadā nazar aatā hai 
jo naqsh hai hasti ka dhoka nazar aata hai parde pe musawwir hi tanha nazar aata hai 
nairang-e-tamasha wo jalwa nazar aata hai aankhon se agar dekho parda nazar aata hai 
lau sham-e-haqiqat ki apni hi jagah par hai fanus ki gardish se kya kya nazar aata hai 
ai parda-nashin zid hai kya chashm-e-tamanna ko tu daftar-e-gul mein bhi ruswa nazar aata hai 
nazzara bhi ab gum hai be-KHud hai tamashai ab kaun kahe is ko jalwa nazar aata hai 
jo kuchh thi yahan raunaq sab baad-e-chaman se thi ab kunj-e-qafas mujh ko suna nazar aata hai 
ehsas mein paida hai phir rang-e-gulistani phir dagh koi dil mein taza nazar aata hai 
thi fard-e-amal 'asghar' kya dast-e-mashiyyat mein ek ek waraq is ka sada nazar aata hai

lutf o karam ke putle ho ab qahr o sitam kā naam nahīñ dil pe ḳhudā kī maar ki phir bhī chain nahīñ ārām nahīñ 
jitne muñh haiñ utnī bāteñ dil kā pata kyā ḳhaak chale jis ne dil kī chorī kī hai ek usī kā naam nahīñ 
jalva o dil meñ farq nahīñ jalve ko hī ab dil kahte haiñ yaanī ishq kī hastī kā āġhāz to hai anjām nahīñ 
ruk ke jo sāñseñ aa.iiñ ga.iiñ maanā ki vo aaheñ thiiñ lekin aap ne tevar kyuuñ badle aahoñ meñ kisī kā naam nahīñ 
ishq ke āzārī bhī kahīñ mar jaane se jī jaate haiñ le ye tasallī rahne de ai maut ye terā kaam nahīñ 
kab se paḌī haiñ dil meñ tere zikr kī saarī rāheñ band barsoñ guzre is bastī meñ rasm-e-salām-o-payām nahīñ 
had thī ye betābi-e-dil kī jāniye ab kyā honā hai sabr kī had bhī hone aa.ī sub.h nahīñ yā shaam nahīñ 
dil pe apnā bas nahīñ chaltā un kī shikāyat kyā kiije aap ham apne dushman Thahre dost pe kuchh ilzām nahīñ 
dil se kisī kī āñkhoñ tak kuchh raaz kī bāteñ pahuñchī haiñ aañkh se dil tak aayā ho aisā to koī paiġhām nahīñ 
naza.a meñ 'fānī' tū ne ye kis kā chupke chupke naam liyā kyuuñ o kāfir terī zabāñ par ab bhī ḳhudā kā naam nahīñ 
lutf o karam ke putle ho ab qahr o sitam ka nam nahin dil pe KHuda ki mar ki phir bhi chain nahin aaram nahin 
jitne munh hain utni baaten dil ka pata kya KHak chale jis ne dil ki chori ki hai ek usi ka nam nahin 
jalwa o dil mein farq nahin jalwe ko hi ab dil kahte hain yani ishq ki hasti ka aaghaz to hai anjam nahin 
ruk ke jo sansen aain gain mana ki wo aahen thin lekin aap ne tewar kyun badle aahon mein kisi ka nam nahin 
ishq ke aazari bhi kahin mar jaane se ji jate hain le ye tasalli rahne de ai maut ye tera kaam nahin 
kab se paDi hain dil mein tere zikr ki sari rahen band barson guzre is basti mein rasm-e-salam-o-payam nahin 
had thi ye betabi-e-dil ki jaaniye ab kya hona hai sabr ki had bhi hone aai subh nahin ya sham nahin 
dil pe apna bas nahin chalta un ki shikayat kya kije aap hum apne dushman Thahre dost pe kuchh ilzam nahin 
dil se kisi ki aankhon tak kuchh raaz ki baaten pahunchi hain aankh se dil tak aaya ho aisa to koi paigham nahin 
naza mein 'fani' tu ne ye kis ka chupke chupke nam liya kyun o kafir teri zaban par ab bhi KHuda ka nam nahin

bhītar basne vaalā ḳhud bāhar kī sair kare maulā ḳhair kare ik mūrat ko chāhe phir ka.abe ko dair kare maulā ḳhair kare 
ishq-vishiq ye chāhat-vāhat man kā bhulāvā phir man bhī apnā kyā yaar ye kaisā rishta jo apnoñ ko ġhair kare maulā ḳhair kare 
ret kā tuudā āñdhī kī faujoñ par tiir chalā.e Tahnī peḌ chabā.e chhoTī machhlī dariyā meñ ghaḌiyāl se bair kare maulā ḳhair kare 
soch ki kāfir har mūrat pe jaan chhiḌaktā hai bin paañv thiraktā hai man kā musalmāñ ab qible kī jānib pair kare maulā ḳhair kare 
fikr kī chaak pe maaTī kī tū shakl badaltā hai yā ḳhud hī Dhaltā hai 'bekal' be-par lafzoñ kī taḳh.īl ko tair kare maulā ḳhair kare 
bhitar basne wala KHud bahar ki sair kare maula KHair kare ek murat ko chahe phir kabe ko dair kare maula KHair kare 
ishq-wishiq ye chahat-wahat man ka bhulawa phir man bhi apna kya yar ye kaisa rishta jo apnon ko ghair kare maula KHair kare 
ret ka tuda aandhi ki faujon par tir chalae Tahni peD chabae chhoTi machhli dariya mein ghaDiyal se bair kare maula KHair kare 
soch ki kafir har murat pe jaan chhiDakta hai bin panw thirakta hai man ka musalman ab qible ki jaanib pair kare maula KHair kare 
fikr ki chaak pe maTi ki tu shakl badalta hai ya KHud hi Dhalta hai 'bekal' be-par lafzon ki taKHil ko tair kare maula KHair kare

hai ye takiya tirī atāoñ par vahī isrār hai ḳhatāoñ par 
raheñ nā-āshnā zamāne se haq hai terā ye āshnāoñ par 
rahravo bā-ḳhabar raho ki gumāñ rahzanī kā hai rahnumāoñ par 
hai vo der āshnā to aib hai kyā marte haiñ ham inhīñ adāoñ par 
us ke kūche meñ haiñ vo be-par o baal uḌte phirte haiñ jo havāoñ par 
shahsavāroñ pe band hai jo raah vaqf hai yaañ barahna paañv par 
nahīñ mun.im ko us kī buuñd nasīb meñh barastā hai jo gadāoñ par 
nahīñ mahdūd baḳhshisheñ terī zāhidoñ par na pārsāoñ par 
haq se darḳhvāst afv kī 'hālī' kiije kis muñh se in ḳhatāoñ par 
hai ye takiya teri ataon par wahi israr hai KHataon par 
rahen na-ashna zamane se haq hai tera ye aashnaon par 
rahrawo ba-KHabar raho ki guman rahzani ka hai rahnumaon par 
hai wo der aashna to aib hai kya marte hain hum inhin adaon par 
us ke kuche mein hain wo be-par o baal uDte phirte hain jo hawaon par 
shahsawaron pe band hai jo rah waqf hai yan barahna panw par 
nahin munim ko us ki bund nasib meinh barasta hai jo gadaon par 
nahin mahdud baKHshishen teri zahidon par na parsaon par 
haq se darKHwast afw ki 'haali' kije kis munh se in KHataon par

tasvīr-e-zindagī meñ nayā rañg bhar ga.e vo hādse jo dil pe hamāre guzar ga.e 
duniyā se haT ke ik na.ī duniyā banā sakeñ kuchh ahl-e-ārzū isī hasrat meñ mar ga.e 
niklā jo qāfile se na.ī justujū liye kuchh duur saath saath mire rāhbar ga.e 
nairañgiyāñ chaman kī pashemān ho ga.iiñ ruḳh par kisī ke aaj jo gesū bikhar ga.e 
phūTī jo us jabīñ se ināyat kī ik kiran maġhmūm ārzūoñ ke chehre nikhar ga.e 
har shai se be-niyāz rahe jin meñ husn o ishq ai zindagī batā ki vo lamhe kidhar ga.e 
ai 'naqsh' kar rahā thā jinheñ ġharq nāḳhudā tūfāñ ke zor se vo safīne ubhar ga.e 
taswir-e-zindagi mein naya rang bhar gae wo hadse jo dil pe hamare guzar gae 
duniya se haT ke ek nai duniya bana saken kuchh ahl-e-arzu isi hasrat mein mar gae 
nikla jo qafile se nai justuju liye kuchh dur sath sath mere rahbar gae 
nairangiyan chaman ki pasheman ho gain ruKH par kisi ke aaj jo gesu bikhar gae 
phuTi jo us jabin se inayat ki ek kiran maghmum aarzuon ke chehre nikhar gae 
har shai se be-niyaz rahe jin mein husn o ishq ai zindagi bata ki wo lamhe kidhar gae 
ai 'naqsh' kar raha tha jinhen gharq naKHuda tufan ke zor se wo safine ubhar gae

niiñd mastoñ ko kahāñ aur kidhar kā takiya ḳhisht-e-ḳhum-ḳhāna hai yaañ apne to sar kā takiya 
laḳht-e-dil aa ke musāfir se Thaharte haiñ yahāñ chashm hai ham se gadāoñ kī guzar kā takiya 
jis taraf aañkh uThā dekhiye ho jaa.e asar ham to rakhte haiñ faqat apnī nazar kā takiya 
chain hargiz nahīñ maḳhmal ke use takiye par us parī ke liye ho huur ke par kā takiya 
haath apne ke sivā aur to kyā ho haihāt vālih o dar-ba-dar o ḳhāk-basar kā takiya 
sar to chāhe hai mirā hove mayassar tere haath kā baazū kā zaanū kā kamar kā takiya 
ye to hāsil hai kahāñ bhej de lekin mujh ko jis meñ bāloñ kī ho bū tere ho sar kā takiya 
tīkhe-pan ke tire qurbān akaḌ ke sadqe kyā hī baiThā hai lagā kar ke sipar kā takiya 
garche ham saḳht gunahgār haiñ lekin vallāh dil meñ jo Dar hai hameñ hai usī Dar kā takiya 
girya o āh-o-fuġhāñ naala o yā rab fariyād sab ko hai har shab-o-roz apne asar kā takiya 
rind o āzād hue chhoḌ ilāqa sab kā DhūñDhte kab haiñ pidar aur pisar kā takiya 
gar bharosā hai hameñ ab to bharosā terā aur takiya hai agar tere hī dar kā takiya 
shauq se soiye sar rakh ke mire zaanū par us ko mat samajhiye kuchh ḳhauf-o-ḳhatar kā takiya 
jab talak aap na jāgeñge rahegā yuuñ hī sarkegā tab hī ki jab kahiyegā sarkā takiya 
lutf-e-īzadī hī se ummīd hai inshā-allāh kuchh nahīñ rakhte haiñ ham fazl o hunar kā takiya 
nind maston ko kahan aur kidhar ka takiya KHisht-e-KHum-KHana hai yan apne to sar ka takiya 
laKHt-e-dil aa ke musafir se Thaharte hain yahan chashm hai hum se gadaon ki guzar ka takiya 
jis taraf aankh uTha dekhiye ho jae asar hum to rakhte hain faqat apni nazar ka takiya 
chain hargiz nahin maKHmal ke use takiye par us pari ke liye ho hur ke par ka takiya 
hath apne ke siwa aur to kya ho haihat walih o dar-ba-dar o KHak-basar ka takiya 
sar to chahe hai mera howe mayassar tere hath ka bazu ka zanu ka kamar ka takiya 
ye to hasil hai kahan bhej de lekin mujh ko jis mein baalon ki ho bu tere ho sar ka takiya 
tikhe-pan ke tere qurban akaD ke sadqe kya hi baiTha hai laga kar ke sipar ka takiya 
garche hum saKHt gunahgar hain lekin wallah dil mein jo Dar hai hamein hai usi Dar ka takiya 
girya o aah-o-fughan nala o ya rab fariyaad sab ko hai har shab-o-roz apne asar ka takiya 
rind o aazad hue chhoD ilaqa sab ka DhunDhte kab hain pidar aur pisar ka takiya 
gar bharosa hai hamein ab to bharosa tera aur takiya hai agar tere hi dar ka takiya 
shauq se soiye sar rakh ke mere zanu par us ko mat samajhiye kuchh KHauf-o-KHatar ka takiya 
jab talak aap na jagenge rahega yun hi sarkega tab hi ki jab kahiyega sarka takiya 
lutf-e-izadi hi se ummid hai insha-allah kuchh nahin rakhte hain hum fazl o hunar ka takiya

husn se sharh huī ishq ke afsāne kī sham.a lau de ke zabāñ ban ga.ī parvāne kī 
shaan bastī se nahīñ kam mire vīrāne kī ruuh har boñDle meñ hai kisī dīvāne kī 
āmad-e-mausam-e-gul kī hai ḳhabar daur-e-digar tāzgī chāhiye kuchh sāḳht meñ paimāne kī 
aa.ī hai kaaT ke mī.ād-e-asīrī kī bahār hatkaḌī khul ke girī jaatī hai dīvāne kī 
sard ai sham.a na ho garmi-e-bāzār-e-jamāl phūñk de ruuh na.ī laash meñ parvāne kī 
uTh khaḌā ho to bagūlā hai jo baiThe to ġhubār ḳhaak ho kar bhī vahī shaan hai dīvāne kī 
'ārzū' ḳhatm haqīqat pe huā daur-e-majāz Daalī ka.abe kī binā aaḌ se but-ḳhāne kī 
husn se sharh hui ishq ke afsane ki shama lau de ke zaban ban gai parwane ki 
shan basti se nahin kam mere virane ki ruh har bonDle mein hai kisi diwane ki 
aamad-e-mausam-e-gul ki hai KHabar daur-e-digar tazgi chahiye kuchh saKHt mein paimane ki 
aai hai kaT ke miad-e-asiri ki bahaar hatkaDi khul ke giri jati hai diwane ki 
sard ai shama na ho garmi-e-bazar-e-jamal phunk de ruh nai lash mein parwane ki 
uTh khaDa ho to bagula hai jo baiThe to ghubar KHak ho kar bhi wahi shan hai diwane ki 
'arzu' KHatm haqiqat pe hua daur-e-majaz Dali kabe ki bina aaD se but-KHane ki

ruḳhsat-e-shab kā samāñ pahle kabhī dekhā na thā itnā raushan āsmāñ pahle kabhī dekhā na thā 
duur tak phailā huā sahrā nazar aayā mujhe ek zarra bhī jahāñ pahle kabhī dekhā na thā 
dīdanī thā mauj-e-dariyā kā nashāt be-panāh jalva-e-āb-e-ravāñ pahle kabhī dekhā na thā 
ahl-e-duniyā to hamesha hī se aise the magar ishq itnā nā-tavāñ pahle kabhī dekhā na thā 
dil pareshāñ ho gayā rañg-e-zavāl-e-husn se aag dekhī thī dhuāñ pahle kabhī dekhā na thā 
is qadar hairāñ na ho āñkhoñ meñ aañsū dekh kar tujh ko itnā mehrbāñ pahle kabhī dekhā na thā 
ruKHsat-e-shab ka saman pahle kabhi dekha na tha itna raushan aasman pahle kabhi dekha na tha 
dur tak phaila hua sahra nazar aaya mujhe ek zarra bhi jahan pahle kabhi dekha na tha 
didani tha mauj-e-dariya ka nashat be-panah jalwa-e-ab-e-rawan pahle kabhi dekha na tha 
ahl-e-duniya to hamesha hi se aise the magar ishq itna na-tawan pahle kabhi dekha na tha 
dil pareshan ho gaya rang-e-zawal-e-husn se aag dekhi thi dhuan pahle kabhi dekha na tha 
is qadar hairan na ho aankhon mein aansu dekh kar tujh ko itna mehrban pahle kabhi dekha na tha

khaḌe haiñ dil meñ jo barg-o-samar lagā.e hue tumhāre haath ke haiñ ye shajar lagā.e hue 
bahut udaas ho tum aur maiñ bhī baiThā huuñ ga.e dinoñ kī kamar se kamar lagā.e hue 
abhī sipāh-e-sitam ḳhema-zan hai chaar taraf abhī paḌe raho zanjīr-e-dar lagā.e hue 
kahāñ kahāñ na ga.e ālam-e-ḳhayāl meñ ham nazar kisī ke dar-o-bām par lagā.e hue 
vo shab ko chiir ke sūraj nikāl bhī laa.e ham aaj tak haiñ ummīd-e-sahar lagā.e hue 
diloñ kī aag jalāo ki ek umr huī sadā-e-nāla-e-dūd-o-sharar lagā.e hue 
khaDe hain dil mein jo barg-o-samar lagae hue tumhaare hath ke hain ye shajar lagae hue 
bahut udas ho tum aur main bhi baiTha hun gae dinon ki kamar se kamar lagae hue 
abhi sipah-e-sitam KHema-zan hai chaar taraf abhi paDe raho zanjir-e-dar lagae hue 
kahan kahan na gae aalam-e-KHayal mein hum nazar kisi ke dar-o-baam par lagae hue 
wo shab ko chir ke suraj nikal bhi lae hum aaj tak hain ummid-e-sahar lagae hue 
dilon ki aag jalao ki ek umr hui sada-e-nala-e-dud-o-sharar lagae hue

lab pe hai fariyād ashkoñ kī ravānī ho chukī ik kahānī chhiḌ rahī hai ik kahānī ho chukī 
mehr ke parde meñ puurī dil-sitānī ho chukī banda-parvar rahm kījiye mehrbānī ho chukī 
merā dil taakā gayā jaur o jafā ke vāste jab ki puure rañg par un kī javānī ho chukī 
jā.iye bhī kyuuñ mujhe jhūTī tashaffī dījiye aap se aur mere dil kī tarjumānī ho chukī 
aa gayā ai sunñe vaale ab mujhe pās-e-vafā ab bayāñ rūdād-e-dil merī zabānī ho chukī 
āḳhirī aañsū mirī chashm-e-alam se gir chukā sunñe vaalo ḳhatm ab merī kahānī ho chukī 
ham bhī tañg aa hī ga.e āḳhir niyāz o naaz se haañ ḳhushā qismat ki un kī mehrbānī ho chukī 
sunñe vaale sūrat-e-tasvīr baiThe haiñ tamām hazrat-e-'bahzād' bas jādū-bayānī ho chukī 
lab pe hai fariyaad ashkon ki rawani ho chuki ek kahani chhiD rahi hai ek kahani ho chuki 
mehr ke parde mein puri dil-sitani ho chuki banda-parwar rahm kijiye mehrbani ho chuki 
mera dil taka gaya jaur o jafa ke waste jab ki pure rang par un ki jawani ho chuki 
jaiye bhi kyun mujhe jhuTi tashaffi dijiye aap se aur mere dil ki tarjumani ho chuki 
aa gaya ai sunne wale ab mujhe pas-e-wafa ab bayan rudad-e-dil meri zabani ho chuki 
aaKHiri aansu meri chashm-e-alam se gir chuka sunne walo KHatm ab meri kahani ho chuki 
hum bhi tang aa hi gae aaKHir niyaz o naz se han KHusha qismat ki un ki mehrbani ho chuki 
sunne wale surat-e-taswir baiThe hain tamam hazrat-e-'bahzad' bas jadu-bayani ho chuki

jis zamīñ par tirā naqsh-e-kaf-e-pā hotā hai ek ik zarra vahāñ qibla-numā hotā hai 
kaash vo dil pe rakhe haath aur itnā pūchhe kyuuñ taḌap uThtā hai kyā baat hai kyā hotā hai 
bazm-e-dushman hai ḳhudā ke liye ārām se baiTh baar baar ai dil-e-nādāñ tujhe kyā hotā hai 
merī sūrat mirī hālat mirī rañgat dekhī aap ne dekh liyā ishq meñ kyā hotā hai 
ai sabā ḳhār-e-muġhīlāñ ko sunā de muzhda āzim-e-dasht koī ābla-pā hotā hai 
ham jo kahte haiñ hamesha hī ġhalat kahte haiñ aap kā hukm durust aur bajā hotā hai 
jis zamin par tera naqsh-e-kaf-e-pa hota hai ek ek zarra wahan qibla-numa hota hai 
kash wo dil pe rakhe hath aur itna puchhe kyun taDap uThta hai kya baat hai kya hota hai 
bazm-e-dushman hai KHuda ke liye aaram se baiTh bar bar ai dil-e-nadan tujhe kya hota hai 
meri surat meri haalat meri rangat dekhi aap ne dekh liya ishq mein kya hota hai 
ai saba KHar-e-mughilan ko suna de muzhda aazim-e-dasht koi aabla-pa hota hai 
hum jo kahte hain hamesha hi ghalat kahte hain aap ka hukm durust aur baja hota hai

baḌh ga.ī mai piine se dil kī tamannā aur bhī sadqa apnā sāqiyā yak jām-e-sahbā aur bhī 
ek to maiñ aap nāseh huuñ pareshāñ ḳhasta-jāñ dil dukhā detī hai terī pind-e-bejā aur bhī 
dāstān-e-shauq-e-dil aisī nahīñ thī muḳhtasar jī lagā kar tum agar sunte maiñ kahtā aur bhī 
kuchh to pahle se dil-e-betāb thā vahshī-mizāj be-tire din raat ghabrātā hai tanhā aur bhī 
dekhte hī dekhte 'taslīm' vo chhupne lage baḌh gayā be-pardagī meñ mujh se parda aur bhī 
baDh gai mai pine se dil ki tamanna aur bhi sadqa apna saqiya yak jam-e-sahba aur bhi 
ek to main aap naseh hun pareshan KHasta-jaan dil dukha deti hai teri pind-e-beja aur bhi 
dastan-e-shauq-e-dil aisi nahin thi muKHtasar ji laga kar tum agar sunte main kahta aur bhi 
kuchh to pahle se dil-e-betab tha wahshi-mizaj be-tire din raat ghabraata hai tanha aur bhi 
dekhte hi dekhte 'taslim' wo chhupne lage baDh gaya be-pardagi mein mujh se parda aur bhi

thī titliyoñ ke ta.āqub meñ zindagī merī vo shahr kyā huā jis kī thī har galī merī 
maiñ apnī zaat kī tashrīh kartā phirtā thā na jaane phir kahāñ āvāz kho ga.ī merī 
ye sarguzisht-e-zamāna ye dāstān-e-hayāt adhūrī baat meñ bhī rah ga.ī kamī merī 
havā-e-koh-e-nidā ik zarā Thahar ki abhī zamāna ġhaur se suntā hai an-kahī merī 
maiñ itne zor se chīḳhā chaTaḳh gayā hai badan phir is ke ba.ad kisī ne nahīñ sunī merī 
ye darmiyāñ kā ḳhalā hī mirā nahīñ varna ye āsmān bhī merā zamīn bhī merī 
kise ḳhabar ki guhar kaise haath aate haiñ samundaroñ se bhī gahrī hai ḳhāmushī merī 
koī to aa.e mire paas do ghaḌī baiThe ki kar ga.ī mujhe tanhā ḳhud-āgahī merī 
kabhī kabhī to zamāna rahā nigāhoñ meñ kabhī kabhī nazar aa.ī na shakl bhī merī 
mujhe ḳhabar hai kahāñ huuñ maiñ kaun huuñ 'aḳhtar' ki mere naam se sūrat girī huī merī 
thi titliyon ke taaqub mein zindagi meri wo shahr kya hua jis ki thi har gali meri 
main apni zat ki tashrih karta phirta tha na jaane phir kahan aawaz kho gai meri 
ye sarguzisht-e-zamana ye dastan-e-hayat adhuri baat mein bhi rah gai kami meri 
hawa-e-koh-e-nida ek zara Thahar ki abhi zamana ghaur se sunta hai an-kahi meri 
main itne zor se chiKHa chaTaKH gaya hai badan phir is ke baad kisi ne nahin suni meri 
ye darmiyan ka KHala hi mera nahin warna ye aasman bhi mera zamin bhi meri 
kise KHabar ki guhar kaise hath aate hain samundaron se bhi gahri hai KHamushi meri 
koi to aae mere pas do ghaDi baiThe ki kar gai mujhe tanha KHud-agahi meri 
kabhi kabhi to zamana raha nigahon mein kabhi kabhi nazar aai na shakl bhi meri 
mujhe KHabar hai kahan hun main kaun hun 'aKHtar' ki mere nam se surat giri hui meri

mar ke TuuTā hai kahīñ silsila-e-qaid-e-hayāt magar itnā hai ki zanjīr badal jaatī hai 
asar-e-ishq taġhāful bhī hai bedād bhī hai vahī taqsīr hai tāzīr badal jaatī hai 
kahte kahte mirā afsāna gila hotā hai dekhte dekhte taqdīr badal jaatī hai 
roz hai dard-e-mohabbat kā nirālā andāz roz dil meñ tirī tasvīr badal jaatī hai 
ghar meñ rahtā hai tire dam se ujālā hī kuchh aur mah o ḳhurshīd kī tanvīr badal jaatī hai 
ġham nasīboñ meñ hai 'fānī' ġham-e-duniyā ho ki ishq dil kī taqdīr se tadbīr badal jaatī hai 
mar ke TuTa hai kahin silsila-e-qaid-e-hayat magar itna hai ki zanjir badal jati hai 
asar-e-ishq taghaful bhi hai bedad bhi hai wahi taqsir hai tazir badal jati hai 
kahte kahte mera afsana gila hota hai dekhte dekhte taqdir badal jati hai 
roz hai dard-e-mohabbat ka nirala andaz roz dil mein teri taswir badal jati hai 
ghar mein rahta hai tere dam se ujala hi kuchh aur mah o KHurshid ki tanwir badal jati hai 
gham nasibon mein hai 'fani' gham-e-duniya ho ki ishq dil ki taqdir se tadbir badal jati hai

betāb raheñ hijr meñ kuchh dil to nahīñ ham taḌpeñ jo tujhe dekh ke bismil to nahīñ ham 
haiñ yaad bahut makr o fareb aise hameñ bhī muTThī meñ jo aa jaa.eñ tirī dil to nahīñ ham 
ab aap koī kaam sikhā dījiye ham ko ma.alūm huā ishq ke qābil to nahīñ ham 
kahne ko vafādār tumheñ laakh meñ kah deñ dil se magar is baat ke qaa.il to nahīñ ham 
kyuuñ ḳhizr ke pairav hoñ tirī rāh-e-talab meñ āvāra o gum-karda-e-manzil to nahīñ ham 
kahte haiñ tamannā-e-shahādat ko vo sun kar kyuuñ qatl kareñ aap ko qātil to nahīñ ham 
haiñ dil meñ agar tālib-e-dīdār tumheñ kyā kuchh tum se kisī baat ke saa.il to nahīñ ham 
vo pūchhte haiñ mujh se ye mazmūñ to nayā hai terī hī tarah se kahīñ be-dil to nahīñ ham 
ham jaate haiñ yā hazrat-e-dil aap sidhāreñ jā.eñge ab us bazm meñ shāmil to nahīñ ham 
in āñkhoñ se ham ne bhī to dekhā hai zamāna ham se na kaho ġhair pe maa.il to nahīñ ham 
marne ke liye vaqt koī taak rahe haiñ is kaam ko samjhe abhī mushkil to nahīñ ham 
kahte haiñ tujhe dekh ke aatā hai hameñ rashk baiThe hue dushman ke muqābil to nahīñ ham 
har saañs meñ rahtā hai tirī yaad kā khaTkā 'beḳhud' haiñ to hoñ kaam se ġhāfil to nahīñ ham 
betab rahen hijr mein kuchh dil to nahin hum taDpen jo tujhe dekh ke bismil to nahin hum 
hain yaad bahut makr o fareb aise hamein bhi muTThi mein jo aa jaen teri dil to nahin hum 
ab aap koi kaam sikha dijiye hum ko malum hua ishq ke qabil to nahin hum 
kahne ko wafadar tumhein lakh mein kah den dil se magar is baat ke qail to nahin hum 
kyun KHizr ke pairaw hon teri rah-e-talab mein aawara o gum-karda-e-manzil to nahin hum 
kahte hain tamanna-e-shahadat ko wo sun kar kyun qatl karen aap ko qatil to nahin hum 
hain dil mein agar talib-e-didar tumhein kya kuchh tum se kisi baat ke sail to nahin hum 
wo puchhte hain mujh se ye mazmun to naya hai teri hi tarah se kahin be-dil to nahin hum 
hum jate hain ya hazrat-e-dil aap sidhaaren jaenge ab us bazm mein shamil to nahin hum 
in aankhon se hum ne bhi to dekha hai zamana hum se na kaho ghair pe mail to nahin hum 
marne ke liye waqt koi tak rahe hain is kaam ko samjhe abhi mushkil to nahin hum 
kahte hain tujhe dekh ke aata hai hamein rashk baiThe hue dushman ke muqabil to nahin hum 
har sans mein rahta hai teri yaad ka khaTka 'beKHud' hain to hon kaam se ghafil to nahin hum

kahāñ kahāñ na tasavvur ne daam phailā.e hudūd-e-shām-o-sahr se nikal ke dekh aa.e 
nahīñ payām rah-e-nāma-o-payām tū hai abhī sabā se kaho un ke dil ko bahlā.e 
ġhurūr-e-jādā-shanāsī bajā sahī lekin surāġh-e-manzil-e-maqsūd bhī koī paa.e 
ḳhudā vo din na dikhā.e ki rāhbar ye kahe chale the jaane kahāñ se kahāñ nikal aa.e 
guzar gayā koī darmāñda-rāh ye kahtā ab is fazā meñ koī qāfile na Thahrā.e 
na jaane un ke muqaddar meñ kyuuñ hai tīra-shabī vo ham-navā jo sahar ko qarīb-tar laa.e 
koī fareb-e-nazar hai ki tābnāk fazā kise ḳhabar ki yahāñ kitne chāñd gahnā.e 
ġham-e-zamāna tirī zulmateñ hī kyā kam thiiñ ki baḌh chale haiñ ab un gesuoñ ke bhī saa.e 
bahut buland hai is se mirā maqām-e-ġhazal agarche maiñ ne mohabbat ke giit bhī gaa.e 
'hafīz' apnā muqaddar 'hafīz' apnā nasīb gire the phuul magar ham ne zaḳhm hī khaa.e 
kahan kahan na tasawwur ne dam phailae hudud-e-sham-o-sahr se nikal ke dekh aae 
nahin payam rah-e-nama-o-payam tu hai abhi saba se kaho un ke dil ko bahlae 
ghurur-e-jada-shanasi baja sahi lekin suragh-e-manzil-e-maqsud bhi koi pae 
KHuda wo din na dikhae ki rahbar ye kahe chale the jaane kahan se kahan nikal aae 
guzar gaya koi darmanda-rah ye kahta ab is faza mein koi qafile na Thahrae 
na jaane un ke muqaddar mein kyun hai tira-shabi wo ham-nawa jo sahar ko qarib-tar lae 
koi fareb-e-nazar hai ki tabnak faza kise KHabar ki yahan kitne chand gahnae 
gham-e-zamana teri zulmaten hi kya kam thin ki baDh chale hain ab un gesuon ke bhi sae 
bahut buland hai is se mera maqam-e-ghazal agarche main ne mohabbat ke git bhi gae 
'hafiz' apna muqaddar 'hafiz' apna nasib gire the phul magar hum ne zaKHm hi khae

husn par dastaras kī baat na kar ye havas hai havas kī baat na kar 
pūchh agle baras meñ kyā hogā mujh se pichhle baras kī baat na kar 
ye batā haal kyā hai lākhoñ kā mujh se do chaar das kī baat na kar 
ye batā qāfile pe kyā guzrī mahaz bāñg-e-jaras kī baat na kar 
ishq-e-jān āfrīñ kā haal sunā husn-e-īsā nafas kī baat na kar 
ye batā 'arsh' soz hai kitnā saaz par dastaras kī baat na kar 
husn par dastaras ki baat na kar ye hawas hai hawas ki baat na kar 
puchh agle baras mein kya hoga mujh se pichhle baras ki baat na kar 
ye bata haal kya hai lakhon ka mujh se do chaar das ki baat na kar 
ye bata qafile pe kya guzri mahaz bang-e-jaras ki baat na kar 
ishq-e-jaan aafrin ka haal suna husn-e-isa nafas ki baat na kar 
ye bata 'arsh' soz hai kitna saz par dastaras ki baat na kar

ham-sar-e-zulf qad-e-hūr-e-shamā.il Thahrā laam kā ḳhuub alif madd-e-muqābil Thahrā 
dīda-e-tar se jo dāman meñ girā dil Thahrā bahte bahte ye safīna lab-e-sāhil Thahrā 
kī nazar rū-e-kitābī pe to kuchh dil Thahrā maktab-e-shauq bhī qur.ān kī manzil Thahrā 
nighat-e-gul se pareshān huā us kā dimāġh ḳhanda-e-gul na huā shor-e-anādil Thahrā 
najd se qais jo aayā mare zindāñ kī taraf der tak gosh-bar-āvāz-e-salāsil Thahrā 
husn jis tifl kā chamkā vo huā bā.is-e-qatl jis ne talvār sambhālī mirā qātil Thahrā 
ḳhat jo niklā ruḳh-e-jānāñ pe milā bosa-e-ḳhāl yahī daana faqat is kisht kā hāsil Thahrā 
alam ik nuqta jo mash.hūr thā ai josh-e-junūñ ġhaur se kī jo nazar nuqta-e-bātil Thahrā 
duur jab tak the taḌaptā thā meñ kaisā kaisā paas aa kar vo jo Thahre to mirā dil Thahrā 
kasrat-e-dāġh se gul-dasta banā dil to kyā zīnat-e-bāġh na ārā.ish-e-mahfil Thahrā 
dauḌtā qais bhī aatā hai nihāyat hī qarīb ik zarā naaqe ko ai sāhib-e-mahmil Thahrā 
dam jo betāb thā muddat se mire siine meñ teġh-e-qātil ke tale kuchh dam-e-bismil Thahrā 
ham baḌī duur se aa.e haiñ tumhārā hai ye haal ghar se darvāze tak aanā ka.ī manzil Thahrā 
ab tak aatī hai sadā turbat-e-lailā se 'amīr' sārbān ab to ḳhudā ke liye mahmil Thahrā 
ham-sar-e-zulf qad-e-hur-e-shamail Thahra lam ka KHub alif madd-e-muqabil Thahra 
dida-e-tar se jo daman mein gira dil Thahra bahte bahte ye safina lab-e-sahil Thahra 
ki nazar ru-e-kitabi pe to kuchh dil Thahra maktab-e-shauq bhi quran ki manzil Thahra 
nighat-e-gul se pareshan hua us ka dimagh KHanda-e-gul na hua shor-e-anadil Thahra 
najd se qais jo aaya mare zindan ki taraf der tak gosh-bar-awaz-e-salasil Thahra 
husn jis tifl ka chamka wo hua bais-e-qatl jis ne talwar sambhaali mera qatil Thahra 
KHat jo nikla ruKH-e-jaanan pe mila bosa-e-KHal yahi dana faqat is kisht ka hasil Thahra 
alam ek nuqta jo mashhur tha ai josh-e-junun ghaur se ki jo nazar nuqta-e-baatil Thahra 
dur jab tak the taDapta tha mein kaisa kaisa pas aa kar wo jo Thahre to mera dil Thahra 
kasrat-e-dagh se gul-dasta bana dil to kya zinat-e-bagh na aaraish-e-mahfil Thahra 
dauDta qais bhi aata hai nihayat hi qarib ek zara naqe ko ai sahib-e-mahmil Thahra 
dam jo betab tha muddat se mere sine mein tegh-e-qatil ke tale kuchh dam-e-bismil Thahra 
hum baDi dur se aae hain tumhaara hai ye haal ghar se darwaze tak aana kai manzil Thahra 
ab tak aati hai sada turbat-e-laila se 'amir' sarban ab to KHuda ke liye mahmil Thahra

ejaaz hai ye terī pareshāñ-nazarī kā ilzām na dhar ishq pe shorīda-sarī kā 
is vaqt mire kalba-e-ġham meñ tirā aanā bhaTkā huā jhoñkā hai nasīm-e-saharī kā 
tujh se tire kūche kā pata pūchh rahā huuñ is vaqt ye aalam hai mirī be-ḳhabarī kā 
ye farsh tire raqs se jo guuñj rahā hai hai arsh-e-mo.allā mirī ālī-nazarī kā 
kohre meñ taḌapte hue ai sub.h ke taare ehsān hai shā.ir pe tirī chāragarī kā 
ejaz hai ye teri pareshan-nazari ka ilzam na dhar ishq pe shorida-sari ka 
is waqt mere kalba-e-gham mein tera aana bhaTka hua jhonka hai nasim-e-sahari ka 
tujh se tere kuche ka pata puchh raha hun is waqt ye aalam hai meri be-KHabari ka 
ye farsh tere raqs se jo gunj raha hai hai arsh-e-moalla meri aali-nazari ka 
kohre mein taDapte hue ai subh ke tare ehsan hai shair pe teri chaaragari ka

jo chiiz thī kamre meñ vo be-rabt paḌī thī tanhā.ī-e-shab band-e-qabā khol rahī thī 
āvāz kī dīvār bhī chup-chāp khaḌī thī khiḌkī se jo dekhā to galī uuñgh rahī thī 
bāloñ ne tirā lams to mahsūs kiyā thā lekin ye ḳhabar dil ne baḌī der se dī thī 
hāthoñ meñ nayā chāñd paḌā haañp rahā thā rānoñ pe barahna sī namī reñg rahī thī 
yādoñ ne use toḌ diyā maar ke patthar ā.īne kī ḳhandaq meñ jo parchhā.īñ paḌī thī 
duniyā kī guzarte hue paḌtī thiiñ nigāheñ shīshe kī jagah khiḌkī meñ rusvā.ī jaḌī thī 
TuuTī huī mehrāb se gumbad ke khañDar tak ik būḌhe mo.azzin kī sadā guuñj rahī thī 
jo chiz thi kamre mein wo be-rabt paDi thi tanhai-e-shab band-e-qaba khol rahi thi 
aawaz ki diwar bhi chup-chap khaDi thi khiDki se jo dekha to gali ungh rahi thi 
baalon ne tera lams to mahsus kiya tha lekin ye KHabar dil ne baDi der se di thi 
hathon mein naya chand paDa hanp raha tha ranon pe barahna si nami reng rahi thi 
yaadon ne use toD diya mar ke patthar aaine ki KHandaq mein jo parchhain paDi thi 
duniya ki guzarte hue paDti thin nigahen shishe ki jagah khiDki mein ruswai jaDi thi 
TuTi hui mehrab se gumbad ke khanDar tak ek buDhe moazzin ki sada gunj rahi thi

sabā dekh ik din idhar aan kar ke ye dil bhī paḌā hai gulistān kar ke 
yahī dil jo ik buuñd hai bahr-e-ġham kī Dubo degā sab shahr tūfān kar ke 
miyāñ dil ko is ā.ina-rū ke aage jo rakhnā to yak-laḳht hairān kar ke 
ḳhudā jaane kyā asliyat ġhair kī hai dikhe hai banī-nau-e-insān kar ke 
use ab raqīboñ meñ paate haiñ aksar rakhā jis ko ḳhud se bhī anjān kar ke 
dikhā deñge achchhā isī fasl-e-gul meñ garebān ko ham garebān kar ke 
hamāre to ik ghar bhī hai bhaa.ī majnūñ paḌe haiñ usī ko bayābān kar ke 
saba dekh ek din idhar aan kar ke ye dil bhi paDa hai gulistan kar ke 
yahi dil jo ek bund hai bahr-e-gham ki Dubo dega sab shahr tufan kar ke 
miyan dil ko is aaina-ru ke aage jo rakhna to yak-laKHt hairan kar ke 
KHuda jaane kya asliyat ghair ki hai dikhe hai bani-nau-e-insan kar ke 
use ab raqibon mein pate hain aksar rakha jis ko KHud se bhi anjaan kar ke 
dikha denge achchha isi fasl-e-gul mein gareban ko hum gareban kar ke 
hamare to ek ghar bhi hai bhai majnun paDe hain usi ko bayaban kar ke

aaj phir dhuup kī shiddat ne baḌā kaam kiyā ham ne is dasht ko lamhoñ meñ kañval-fām kiyā 
mere hujre ko bhī tash.hīr milī us ke sabab aur āñdhī ne bhī is baar bahut naam kiyā 
roz ham jaltī huī ret pe chalte hī na the ham ne saa.e meñ khajūroñ ke bhī ārām kiyā 
dil kī bāñhoñ meñ sajāte rahe aahoñ kī dhanak zehn ko ham ne rah-e-ishq meñ gum-nām kiyā 
shahr meñ rah ke ye jañgal kī adā bhuul ga.e ham ne in shoḳh ġhazāloñ ko abas raam kiyā 
apne pairoñ meñ bhī bijlī kī adā.eñ thiiñ magar dekh kar tūr-e-jahāñ ḳhud ko subuk-gām kiyā 
shāh-rāhoñ pe hamīñ to nahīñ maslūb hue qatl-e-mahtāb ne ḳhud ko bhī lab-e-bām kiyā 
jaane kyā soch ke phir in ko rihā.ī de dī ham ne ab ke bhī parindoñ ko tah-e-dām kiyā 
ḳhatm ho gī ye kaḌī dhuup bhī 'amabar' dekho ek kohsār ko mausam ne gul-andām kiyā 
aaj phir dhup ki shiddat ne baDa kaam kiya hum ne is dasht ko lamhon mein kanwal-fam kiya 
mere hujre ko bhi tashhir mili us ke sabab aur aandhi ne bhi is bar bahut nam kiya 
roz hum jalti hui ret pe chalte hi na the hum ne sae mein khajuron ke bhi aaram kiya 
dil ki banhon mein sajate rahe aahon ki dhanak zehn ko hum ne rah-e-ishq mein gum-nam kiya 
shahr mein rah ke ye jangal ki ada bhul gae hum ne in shoKH ghazalon ko abas ram kiya 
apne pairon mein bhi bijli ki adaen thin magar dekh kar tur-e-jahan KHud ko subuk-gam kiya 
shah-rahon pe hamin to nahin maslub hue qatl-e-mahtab ne KHud ko bhi lab-e-baam kiya 
jaane kya soch ke phir in ko rihai de di hum ne ab ke bhi parindon ko tah-e-dam kiya 
KHatm ho gi ye kaDi dhup bhi 'amabar' dekho ek kohsar ko mausam ne gul-andam kiya

ḳhumār-e-shab meñ jo ik dūsre pe girte haiñ vo log mai se ziyāda nashe pe girte haiñ 
sameT legā vo apnī kushāda bāñhoñ meñ jo gir rahe haiñ isī aasre pe girte haiñ 
ye ishq hai ki havas in dinoñ to parvāne diye kī lau ko baḌhā kar diye pe girte haiñ 
guzārtā huuñ jo shab ishq-e-be-ma.āsh ke saath to sub.h ashk mire nāshte pe girte haiñ 
ilāj-e-ahl-e-sitam chāhiye abhī se 'zafar' abhī to sañg zarā fāsle pe girte haiñ 
KHumar-e-shab mein jo ek dusre pe girte hain wo log mai se ziyaada nashe pe girte hain 
sameT lega wo apni kushada banhon mein jo gir rahe hain isi aasre pe girte hain 
ye ishq hai ki hawas in dinon to parwane diye ki lau ko baDha kar diye pe girte hain 
guzarta hun jo shab ishq-e-be-maash ke sath to subh ashk mere nashte pe girte hain 
ilaj-e-ahl-e-sitam chahiye abhi se 'zafar' abhi to sang zara fasle pe girte hain

junūñ kār-farmā huā chāhtā hai qadam dasht paimā huā chāhtā hai 
dam-e-girya kis kā tasavvur hai dil meñ ki ashk ashk dariyā huā chāhtā hai 
ḳhat aane lage shikva-āmez un ke milāp un se goyā huā chāhtā hai 
bahut kaam lene the jis dil se ham ko vo sarf-e-tamannā huā chāhtā hai 
abhī lene paa.e nahīñ dam jahāñ meñ ajal kā taqāzā huā chāhtā hai 
mujhe kal ke vaade pe karte haiñ ruḳhsat koī va.ada puurā huā chāhtā hai 
fuzūñ tar hai kuchh in dinoñ zauq-e-isyāñ dar-e-rahmat ab vā huā chāhtā hai 
qalaq gar yahī hai to rāz-e-nihānī koī din meñ rusvā huā chāhtā hai 
vafā shart-e-ulfat hai lekin kahāñ tak dil apnā bhī tujh sā huā chāhtā hai 
bahut haz uThātā hai dil tujh se mil kar qalaq dekhiye kyā huā chāhtā hai 
ġham-e-rashk ko talḳh samjhe the hamdam so vo bhī gavārā huā chāhtā hai 
bahut chain se din guzarte haiñ 'hālī' koī fitna barpā huā chāhtā hai 
junun kar-farma hua chahta hai qadam dasht paima hua chahta hai 
dam-e-girya kis ka tasawwur hai dil mein ki ashk ashk dariya hua chahta hai 
KHat aane lage shikwa-amez un ke milap un se goya hua chahta hai 
bahut kaam lene the jis dil se hum ko wo sarf-e-tamanna hua chahta hai 
abhi lene pae nahin dam jahan mein ajal ka taqaza hua chahta hai 
mujhe kal ke wade pe karte hain ruKHsat koi wada pura hua chahta hai 
fuzun tar hai kuchh in dinon zauq-e-isyan dar-e-rahmat ab wa hua chahta hai 
qalaq gar yahi hai to raaz-e-nihani koi din mein ruswa hua chahta hai 
wafa shart-e-ulfat hai lekin kahan tak dil apna bhi tujh sa hua chahta hai 
bahut haz uThata hai dil tujh se mil kar qalaq dekhiye kya hua chahta hai 
gham-e-rashk ko talKH samjhe the hamdam so wo bhi gawara hua chahta hai 
bahut chain se din guzarte hain 'haali' koi fitna barpa hua chahta hai

ham din ke payāmī haiñ magar kushta-e-shab haiñ is haal meñ bhī raunaq-e-ālam kā sabab haiñ 
zāhir meñ ham insān haiñ miTTī ke khilaune bātin meñ magar tund anāsir kā ġhazab haiñ 
haiñ halqa-e-zanjīr kā ham ḳhanda-e-jāved zindāñ meñ basā.e hue ik shahr-e-tarab haiñ 
chaTkī huī ye husn-e-gurezāñ kī kalī hai yā shiddat-e-jazbāt se khulte hue lab haiñ
