āġhosh meñ mahkoge dikhā.ī nahīñ doge tum nik.hat-e-gulzār ho ham parda-e-shab haiñ 
hum din ke payami hain magar kushta-e-shab hain is haal mein bhi raunaq-e-alam ka sabab hain 
zahir mein hum insan hain miTTi ke khilaune baatin mein magar tund anasir ka ghazab hain 
hain halqa-e-zanjir ka hum KHanda-e-jawed zindan mein basae hue ek shahr-e-tarab hain 
chaTki hui ye husn-e-gurezan ki kali hai ya shiddat-e-jazbaat se khulte hue lab hain 
aaghosh mein mahkoge dikhai nahin doge tum nikhat-e-gulzar ho hum parda-e-shab hain

ḳhabar kuchh aisī uḌaa.ī kisī ne gaañv meñ udaas phirte haiñ ham bairiyoñ kī chhāñv meñ 
nazar nazar se nikaltī hai dard kī Tīseñ qadam qadam pe vo kāñTe chubhe haiñ paañv meñ 
har ek samt se uḌ uḌ ke ret aatī hai abhī hai zor vahī dasht kī havāoñ meñ 
ġhamoñ kī bhiiḌ meñ ummīd kā vo aalam hai ki jaise ek saḳhī ho ka.ī gadāoñ meñ 
abhī hai gosh bar-āvāz ghar kā sannāTā abhī koshish hai baḌī duur kī sadāoñ meñ 
chale to haiñ kisī aahaT kā aasrā le kar bhaTak na jaa.eñ kahīñ ajnabī fazāoñ meñ 
dhuāñ dhuāñ sī hai khetoñ kī chāñdnī 'bāqī' ki aag shahr kī ab aa ga.ī hai gaañv meñ 
KHabar kuchh aisi uDai kisi ne ganw mein udas phirte hain hum bairiyon ki chhanw mein 
nazar nazar se nikalti hai dard ki Tisen qadam qadam pe wo kanTe chubhe hain panw mein 
har ek samt se uD uD ke ret aati hai abhi hai zor wahi dasht ki hawaon mein 
ghamon ki bhiD mein ummid ka wo aalam hai ki jaise ek saKHi ho kai gadaon mein 
abhi hai gosh bar-awaz ghar ka sannaTa abhi koshish hai baDi dur ki sadaon mein 
chale to hain kisi aahaT ka aasra le kar bhaTak na jaen kahin ajnabi fazaon mein 
dhuan dhuan si hai kheton ki chandni 'baqi' ki aag shahr ki ab aa gai hai ganw mein

baat ye hai ki koī baat purānī bhī nahīñ aur is ḳhaak meñ ab koī nishānī bhī nahīñ 
ye to zāhir meñ tamavvuj thā balā kā lekin ye badan merā jahāñ koī ravānī bhī nahīñ 
yā to ik mauj-e-balā-ḳhez hai merī ḳhātir yā ki mashkīza-e-jāñ meñ kahīñ paanī bhī nahīñ 
baat ye hai ki sabhī bhaa.ī mire dushman haiñ mas.ala ye hai ki maiñ yūsuf-e-sānī bhī nahīñ 
sach to ye hai ki mire paas hī dirham kam haiñ varna is shahr meñ is darja girānī bhī nahīñ 
saare kirdār haiñ añgusht-ba-dandāñ mujh meñ ab to kahne ko mire paas kahānī bhī nahīñ 
ek benām-o-nasab sach mirā iz.hār huā varna alfāz meñ vo sail-e-ma.ānī bhī nahīñ 
baat ye hai ki koi baat purani bhi nahin aur is KHak mein ab koi nishani bhi nahin 
ye to zahir mein tamawwuj tha bala ka lekin ye badan mera jahan koi rawani bhi nahin 
ya to ek mauj-e-bala-KHez hai meri KHatir ya ki mashkiza-e-jaan mein kahin pani bhi nahin 
baat ye hai ki sabhi bhai mere dushman hain masala ye hai ki main yusuf-e-sani bhi nahin 
sach to ye hai ki mere pas hi dirham kam hain warna is shahr mein is darja girani bhi nahin 
sare kirdar hain angusht-ba-dandan mujh mein ab to kahne ko mere pas kahani bhi nahin 
ek benam-o-nasab sach mera izhaar hua warna alfaz mein wo sail-e-maani bhi nahin

azal se tā-ba-abad ek hī kahānī hai isī se ham ko na.ī dāstāñ banānī hai 
ujaḌ to saktā hai lekin badal nahīñ saktā vo haq-shanās jo ik ahd kī nishānī hai 
ḳhirad kī bāteñ kahāñ tak karoge dīvāno ḳhirad ke naam pe kuchh ḳhaak bhī uḌānī hai 
tumhāre rañg-e-jafā ko bhī hai qayām kahīñ hamāre ishq kī manzil to kāmrānī hai 
faqat samajhne ke andāz haiñ qadīm o jadīd fasāna-go ke to lab par vahī kahānī hai 
hayāt laakh ho faanī magar ye sun rakhiye hayāt se jo hai maqsūd ġhair-fānī hai 
sunī-sunā.ī pe tarjīh laakh baar us ko kitāb-e-dil kī 'razā' baat āsmānī hai 
azal se ta-ba-abad ek hi kahani hai isi se hum ko nai dastan banani hai 
ujaD to sakta hai lekin badal nahin sakta wo haq-shanas jo ek ahd ki nishani hai 
KHirad ki baaten kahan tak karoge diwano KHirad ke nam pe kuchh KHak bhi uDani hai 
tumhaare rang-e-jafa ko bhi hai qayam kahin hamare ishq ki manzil to kaamrani hai 
faqat samajhne ke andaz hain qadim o jadid fasana-go ke to lab par wahi kahani hai 
hayat lakh ho fani magar ye sun rakhiye hayat se jo hai maqsud ghair-fani hai 
suni-sunai pe tarjih lakh bar us ko kitab-e-dil ki 'raza' baat aasmani hai

koī dil-lagī dil lagānā nahīñ hai qayāmat hai ye dil kā aanā nahīñ hai 
manā.eñ unheñ vasl meñ kis tarah ham ye rūThe kā koī manānā nahīñ hai 
hai manzūr unheñ imtihāñ shauq-e-dil kā nazākat kā ḳhālī bahāna nahīñ hai 
vafā par daġhā sulh meñ dushmanī hai bhalā.ī kā hargiz zamāna nahīñ hai 
shab-e-ġham bhī ho jā.egī ik din āḳhir kabhī ik ravish par zamānā nahīñ hai 
hai kū-e-butāñ bas ghar us kā hī 'kaifī' zamāne meñ jis ko Thikānā nahīñ hai 
koi dil-lagi dil lagana nahin hai qayamat hai ye dil ka aana nahin hai 
manaen unhen wasl mein kis tarah hum ye ruThe ka koi manana nahin hai 
hai manzur unhen imtihan shauq-e-dil ka nazakat ka KHali bahana nahin hai 
wafa par dagha sulh mein dushmani hai bhalai ka hargiz zamana nahin hai 
shab-e-gham bhi ho jaegi ek din aaKHir kabhi ek rawish par zamana nahin hai 
hai ku-e-butan bas ghar us ka hi 'kaifi' zamane mein jis ko Thikana nahin hai

vo dekhte jaate haiñ kanakhiyoñ se idhar bhī chaltā huā jaadū hai mohabbat kī nazar bhī 
uThne kī nahīñ dekhiye shamshīr-e-nazar bhī pahle hī lachaktī hai kalā.ī bhī kamar bhī 
phūTeñ mirī āñkheñ jo kuchh aatā ho nazar bhī duniyā se alag chiiz hai furqat kī sahar bhī 
saaqī kabhī mil jaa.e mohabbat kā samar bhī in āñkhoñ kā sadqa koī sāġhar to idhar bhī 
betāb huuñ kyā chiiz churā lī hai nazar ne hone ko to dil bhī hai mire paas jigar bhī 
ghar samjhā huuñ jis ko kahīñ turbat to nahīñ hai aatī hai yahāñ shaam kī sūrat meñ sahar bhī 
ḳhāmosh huuñ maiñ aur vo kuchh pūchh rahe haiñ māthe pe shikan bhī hai ināyat kī nazar bhī 
us ke lab-e-rañgīñ kī nazākat hai na rañgat ġhunche bhī bahut dekh liye haiñ gul-e-tar bhī 
aatī hai nazar duur hī se husn kī ḳhūbī kuchh aur hī hotī hai javānī kī nazar bhī 
haTtī hai jo ā.īna se paḌ jaatī hai dil par kyā shoḳh nazar hai ki udhar bhī hai idhar bhī 
bīmār-e-mohabbat kā ḳhudā hai jo sambhal jaa.e hai shaam bhī maḳhdūsh judā.ī kī sahar bhī 
mai-ḳhāna-e-ishrat na sahī kunj-e-garebāñ āñkhoñ ke chhalakte hue sāġhar haiñ idhar bhī 
mil jaa.eñ agar mujh ko to maiñ ḳhizr se pūchhūñ dekhī hai kahīñ shām-e-judā.ī kī sahar bhī 
ai shauq-e-shahādat kahīñ qismat na palaT jaa.e bāñdhī to hai talvār bhī qātil ne kamar bhī 
ai dil tirī aaheñ to sunīñ kānoñ se ham ne ab ye tū batā us pe kareñgī ye asar bhī 
ik rashk kā pahlū to hai samjhūñ ki na samjhūñ gardan bhī hai ḳham aap kī nīchī hai nazar bhī 
kuchh kaan meñ kal aap ne irshād kiyā thā mushtāq usī baat kā huuñ bār-e-digar bhī 
sofār bhī rañgīn kiye haath bhī us ne aayā hai baḌe kaam merā ḳhūn-e-jigar bhī 
chhuptī hai koī baat chhupā.e se sar-e-bazm uḌte ho jo tum ham se to uḌtī hai ḳhabar bhī 
yuuñ hijr meñ barsoñ kabhī lagtī hī nahīñ aañkh so jaatā huuñ jab aa ke vo kah detī haiñ mar bhī 
khultā hī nahīñ beḳhud-e-badnām kā kuchh haal kahte haiñ farishta bhī use log bashar bhī 
wo dekhte jate hain kanakhiyon se idhar bhi chalta hua jadu hai mohabbat ki nazar bhi 
uThne ki nahin dekhiye shamshir-e-nazar bhi pahle hi lachakti hai kalai bhi kamar bhi 
phuTen meri aankhen jo kuchh aata ho nazar bhi duniya se alag chiz hai furqat ki sahar bhi 
saqi kabhi mil jae mohabbat ka samar bhi in aankhon ka sadqa koi saghar to idhar bhi 
betab hun kya chiz chura li hai nazar ne hone ko to dil bhi hai mere pas jigar bhi 
ghar samjha hun jis ko kahin turbat to nahin hai aati hai yahan sham ki surat mein sahar bhi 
KHamosh hun main aur wo kuchh puchh rahe hain mathe pe shikan bhi hai inayat ki nazar bhi 
us ke lab-e-rangin ki nazakat hai na rangat ghunche bhi bahut dekh liye hain gul-e-tar bhi 
aati hai nazar dur hi se husn ki KHubi kuchh aur hi hoti hai jawani ki nazar bhi 
haTti hai jo aaina se paD jati hai dil par kya shoKH nazar hai ki udhar bhi hai idhar bhi 
bimar-e-mohabbat ka KHuda hai jo sambhal jae hai sham bhi maKHdush judai ki sahar bhi 
mai-KHana-e-ishrat na sahi kunj-e-gareban aankhon ke chhalakte hue saghar hain idhar bhi 
mil jaen agar mujh ko to main KHizr se puchhun dekhi hai kahin sham-e-judai ki sahar bhi 
ai shauq-e-shahadat kahin qismat na palaT jae bandhi to hai talwar bhi qatil ne kamar bhi 
ai dil teri aahen to sunin kanon se hum ne ab ye tu bata us pe karengi ye asar bhi 
ek rashk ka pahlu to hai samjhun ki na samjhun gardan bhi hai KHam aap ki nichi hai nazar bhi 
kuchh kan mein kal aap ne irshad kiya tha mushtaq usi baat ka hun bar-e-digar bhi 
sofar bhi rangin kiye hath bhi us ne aaya hai baDe kaam mera KHun-e-jigar bhi 
chhupti hai koi baat chhupae se sar-e-bazm uDte ho jo tum hum se to uDti hai KHabar bhi 
yun hijr mein barson kabhi lagti hi nahin aankh so jata hun jab aa ke wo kah deti hain mar bhi 
khulta hi nahin beKHud-e-badnam ka kuchh haal kahte hain farishta bhi use log bashar bhi

taḳhlīq pe fitrat kī guzartā hai gumāñ aur is ādam-e-ḳhākī ne banāyā hai jahāñ aur 
ye sub.h hai sūraj kī siyāhī se añdherī aa.egī abhī ek sahar mahr-chakāñ aur 
baḌhnī hai abhī aur bhī mazlūm kī tāqat ghaTnī hai abhī zulm kī kuchh tāb-o-tavāñ aur 
tar hogī zamīñ aur abhī ḳhūn-e-bashar se ro.egā abhī dīda-e-ḳhūnāba-fiashāñ aur 
baḌhne do zarā aur abhī kuchh dast-e-talab ko baḌh jā.egī do chaar shikan-e-zulf-e-butāñ aur 
karnā hai abhī ḳhūn-e-jigar sarf-e-bahārāñ kuchh der uThānā hai abhī nāz-e-ḳhizāñ aur 
ham haiñ vo balā-kash ki masā.ib se jahāñ ke ho jaate haiñ shā.ista-e-ġham-hā-e-jahāñ aur 
taKHliq pe fitrat ki guzarta hai guman aur is aadam-e-KHaki ne banaya hai jahan aur 
ye subh hai suraj ki siyahi se andheri aaegi abhi ek sahar mahr-chakan aur 
baDhni hai abhi aur bhi mazlum ki taqat ghaTni hai abhi zulm ki kuchh tab-o-tawan aur 
tar hogi zamin aur abhi KHun-e-bashar se roega abhi dida-e-KHunaba-fiashan aur 
baDhne do zara aur abhi kuchh dast-e-talab ko baDh jaegi do chaar shikan-e-zulf-e-butan aur 
karna hai abhi KHun-e-jigar sarf-e-bahaaran kuchh der uThana hai abhi naz-e-KHizan aur 
hum hain wo bala-kash ki masaib se jahan ke ho jate hain shaista-e-gham-ha-e-jahan aur

vo bhī milne na.ī poshāk badal kar aayā maiñ jo kal pairahan-e-ḳhāk badal kar aayā 
ai zamīñ-zād tirī rif.ateñ chhūne ke liye tujh talak maiñ ka.ī aflāk badal kar aayā 
us ko raas aa.ī hai ye bazm-e-jahāñ jo bhī yahāñ apnā paimāna-e-idrāk badal kar aayā 
ishq meñ koī takalluf kī zarūrat to nahīñ phir vo kyuuñ dīda-e-namnāk badal kar aayā 
ham se kar be-sar-o-sāmānī-e-hijrat pe savāl us se mat pūchh jo imlāk badal kar aayā 
āñsuoñ se na badal paayā ruḳh-e-bād 'jamāl' par mizāj-e-ḳhas-o-ḳhāshāk badal kar aayā 
wo bhi milne nai poshak badal kar aaya main jo kal pairahan-e-KHak badal kar aaya 
ai zamin-zad teri rifaten chhune ke liye tujh talak main kai aflak badal kar aaya 
us ko ras aai hai ye bazm-e-jahan jo bhi yahan apna paimana-e-idrak badal kar aaya 
ishq mein koi takalluf ki zarurat to nahin phir wo kyun dida-e-namnak badal kar aaya 
hum se kar be-sar-o-samani-e-hijrat pe sawal us se mat puchh jo imlak badal kar aaya 
aansuon se na badal paya ruKH-e-baad 'jamal' par mizaj-e-KHas-o-KHashak badal kar aaya

havā-e-shab bhī hai ambar-afshāñ uruuj bhī hai mah-e-mubīñ kā nisār hone kī do ijāzat mahal nahīñ hai nahīñ nahīñ kā 
agar ho zauq-e-sujūd paidā sitāra ho auj par jabīñ kā nishān-e-sajda zamīn par ho to faḳhr hai vo ruḳh-e-zamīñ kā 
sabā bhī us gul ke paas aa.ī to mere dil ko huā ye khaTkā koī shagūfa na ye khilā.e payām laa.ī na ho kahīñ kā 
na mehr o mah par mirī nazar hai na lāla-o-gul kī kuchh ḳhabar hai faroġh-e-dil ke liye hai kaafī tasavvur us rū-e-ātishīñ kā 
na ilm-e-fitrat meñ tum ho māhir na zauq-e-tā.at hai tum se zāhir ye be-usūlī bahut burī hai tumheñ na rakkhegī ye kahīñ kā 
hawa-e-shab bhi hai ambar-afshan uruj bhi hai mah-e-mubin ka nisar hone ki do ijazat mahal nahin hai nahin nahin ka 
agar ho zauq-e-sujud paida sitara ho auj par jabin ka nishan-e-sajda zamin par ho to faKHr hai wo ruKH-e-zamin ka 
saba bhi us gul ke pas aai to mere dil ko hua ye khaTka koi shagufa na ye khilae payam lai na ho kahin ka 
na mehr o mah par meri nazar hai na lala-o-gul ki kuchh KHabar hai farogh-e-dil ke liye hai kafi tasawwur us ru-e-atishin ka 
na ilm-e-fitrat mein tum ho mahir na zauq-e-taat hai tum se zahir ye be-usuli bahut buri hai tumhein na rakkhegi ye kahin ka

ye ḳhud ko dekhte rahne kī hai jo ḳhū mujh meñ chhupā huā hai kahīñ vo shagufta-rū mujh meñ 
mah o nujūm ko terī jabīñ se nisbat duuñ ab is qadar bhī nahīñ ādat-e-ġhulū mujh meñ 
taġhayyurāt-e-jahāñ dil pe kyā asar karte hai terī ab bhī vahī shakl hū-ba-hū mujh meñ 
rafūgaroñ ne ajab tab.a-āzmā.ī kī rahī sire se na gunjā.ish-e-rafū mujh meñ 
vo jis ke sāmne merī zabāñ nahīñ khultī usī ke saath to hotī hai guftugū mujh meñ 
ḳhudā kare ki use dil kā rāsta mil jaa.e bhaTak rahī hai koī chaap kū-ba-kū mujh meñ 
us ek zohra-jabīñ ke tufail jaarī hai tamām zohra-jabīnoñ kī justujū mujh meñ 
nahīñ pasand mujhe sher-o-shā.erī karnā kabhī-kabhār bas uThtī hai ek hū mujh meñ 
maiñ zindagī huuñ mujhe is qadar na chaah 'shu.ūr' musāfirāna iqāmat-guzīñ hai tū mujh meñ 
ye KHud ko dekhte rahne ki hai jo KHu mujh mein chhupa hua hai kahin wo shagufta-ru mujh mein 
mah o nujum ko teri jabin se nisbat dun ab is qadar bhi nahin aadat-e-ghulu mujh mein 
taghayyuraat-e-jahan dil pe kya asar karte hai teri ab bhi wahi shakl hu-ba-hu mujh mein 
rafugaron ne ajab taba-azmai ki rahi sire se na gunjaish-e-rafu mujh mein 
wo jis ke samne meri zaban nahin khulti usi ke sath to hoti hai guftugu mujh mein 
KHuda kare ki use dil ka rasta mil jae bhaTak rahi hai koi chap ku-ba-ku mujh mein 
us ek zohra-jabin ke tufail jari hai tamam zohra-jabinon ki justuju mujh mein 
nahin pasand mujhe sher-o-shaeri karna kabhi-kabhaar bas uThti hai ek hu mujh mein 
main zindagi hun mujhe is qadar na chah 'shuur' musafirana iqamat-guzin hai tu mujh mein

behtar kī gunjā.ish baaqī rah jaatī hai kamī kahīñ poshīda koī rah jaatī hai 
man-chāhī tasvīr banāne meñ mujh se hunar-varī meñ kuchh kotāhī rah jaatī hai 
sailāb aa jaane par us bastī kī saarī puḳhta-kārī kachchī rah jaatī hai 
banñe vaalī baat vahī hotī hai vo jo bante bante yaksar bantī rah jaatī hai 
rah jaatī hai aate aate aatī saa.at honī hote hote hotī rah jaatī hai 
vaqt guzar jaatā hai lekin dil kī ranjish dil meñ baiThī kī baiThī hī rah jaatī hai 
chalte rah jaate haiñ roz o shab ke dhande gañgā ulTī sīdhī bahtī rah jaatī hai 
phāñk liye jaane ko ḳhaak masāfat kī rāhoñ par hī chhānī-phaTkī rah jaatī hai 
aa jaatī hai birhā aur dulhniyāñ chhat par apne giile baal sukhātī rah jaatī hai 
behtar ki gunjaish baqi rah jati hai kami kahin poshida koi rah jati hai 
man-chahi taswir banane mein mujh se hunar-wari mein kuchh kotahi rah jati hai 
sailab aa jaane par us basti ki sari puKHta-kari kachchi rah jati hai 
banne wali baat wahi hoti hai wo jo bante bante yaksar banti rah jati hai 
rah jati hai aate aate aati saat honi hote hote hoti rah jati hai 
waqt guzar jata hai lekin dil ki ranjish dil mein baiThi ki baiThi hi rah jati hai 
chalte rah jate hain roz o shab ke dhande ganga ulTi sidhi bahti rah jati hai 
phank liye jaane ko KHak masafat ki rahon par hi chhani-phaTki rah jati hai 
aa jati hai birha aur dulhniyan chhat par apne gile baal sukhati rah jati hai

ḳhatm kiyā sabā ne raqs gul pe nisār ho chukī josh-e-nashāt ho chukā saut-e-hazār ho chukī 
rañg-e-banafsha miT gayā sumbul-e-tar nahīñ rahā sehn-e-chaman meñ zīnat-e-naqsh-o-nigār ho chukī 
masti-e-lāla ab kahāñ us kā pyāla ab kahāñ daur-e-tarab guzar gayā āmad-e-yār ho chukī 
rut vo jo thī badal ga.ī aa.ī bas aur nikal ga.ī thī jo havā meñ nik.hat-e-mushk-e-tatār ho chukī 
ab tak usī ravish pe hai 'akbar'-e-mast-o-be-ḳhabar kah de koī azīz-e-man fasl-e-bahār ho chukī 
KHatm kiya saba ne raqs gul pe nisar ho chuki josh-e-nashat ho chuka saut-e-hazar ho chuki 
rang-e-banafsha miT gaya sumbul-e-tar nahin raha sehn-e-chaman mein zinat-e-naqsh-o-nigar ho chuki 
masti-e-lala ab kahan us ka pyala ab kahan daur-e-tarab guzar gaya aamad-e-yar ho chuki 
rut wo jo thi badal gai aai bas aur nikal gai thi jo hawa mein nikhat-e-mushk-e-tatar ho chuki 
ab tak usi rawish pe hai 'akbar'-e-mast-o-be-KHabar kah de koi aziz-e-man fasl-e-bahaar ho chuki

be-sabab ham se judā.ī na karo mujh se āshiq se burā.ī na karo 
ḳhāksārāñ ko na kariye pāmāl jag meñ fir.auñ sī ḳhudā.ī na karo 
be-gunāhāñ kuuñ na kar Daalo qatl aah kuuñ tīr-e-havā.ī na karo 
ek dil tum se nahīñ hai raazī jag meñ har ik suuñ burā.ī na karo 
mahv hai 'fā.ez'-e-shaidā tum par us se har lahza bakhā.ī na karo 
be-sabab hum se judai na karo mujh se aashiq se burai na karo 
KHaksaran ko na kariye pamal jag mein firaun si KHudai na karo 
be-gunahan kun na kar Dalo qatl aah kun tir-e-hawai na karo 
ek dil tum se nahin hai raazi jag mein har ek sun burai na karo 
mahw hai 'faez'-e-shaida tum par us se har lahza bakhai na karo

libās us kā alāmat kī tarah thā badan raushan ibārat kī tarah thā 
fazā saiqal samā.at kī tarah thī sukūt us kā amānat kī tarah thā 
adā mauj-e-tajassus kī tarah thī nafas ḳhushbū kī shohrat kī tarah thā 
bisāt-e-rañg thī muTThī meñ us kī qadam us kā bashārat kī tarah thā 
gurezāñ aañkh dāvat kī tarah thī takalluf ik ināyat kī tarah thā 
ḳhalish bedār nashshe kī tarah thī ragoñ meñ ḳhuuñ musībat kī tarah thā 
tasavvur par hinā bikhrī huī thī samāñ āġhosh-e-ḳhalvat kī tarah thā 
havas andhī zarūrat kī tarah thī vo ḳhud daa.im mohabbat kī tarah thā 
vahī uslūb-e-sāda sharh-e-dil kā kisī zinda rivāyat kī tarah thā 
libas us ka alamat ki tarah tha badan raushan ibarat ki tarah tha 
faza saiqal samaat ki tarah thi sukut us ka amanat ki tarah tha 
ada mauj-e-tajassus ki tarah thi nafas KHushbu ki shohrat ki tarah tha 
bisat-e-rang thi muTThi mein us ki qadam us ka bashaarat ki tarah tha 
gurezan aankh dawat ki tarah thi takalluf ek inayat ki tarah tha 
KHalish bedar nashshe ki tarah thi ragon mein KHun musibat ki tarah tha 
tasawwur par hina bikhri hui thi saman aaghosh-e-KHalwat ki tarah tha 
hawas andhi zarurat ki tarah thi wo KHud daim mohabbat ki tarah tha 
wahi uslub-e-sada sharh-e-dil ka kisi zinda riwayat ki tarah tha

āshnā hote hī us ishq ne maarā mujh ko na milā bahr-e-mohabbat kā kinārā mujh ko 
kyuuñ mire qatl ko talvār barahna kī hai teġh-e-abrū kā to kaafī hai ishārā mujh ko 
ḳhud tire daam meñ aayā koī afsūñ na chalā ai parī tū ne to shīshe meñ utārā mujh ko 
mere iisā kā zarā dekhnā e.ajāz-e-ḳhirām ek Thokar se milī umr dobārā mujh ko 
maan.e daulat-e-dīdār na ho ai girya ruḳh-e-mahbūb kā karne de nazārā mujh ko 
dil meñ ik gauhar-e-ḳhūbī kī mohabbat kā hai josh āj-kal bhātā hai dariyā kā kinārā mujh ko 
Dam-dilāse hī meñ Taalā kiye har roz āḳhir sūkhe ghaaT ai gul-e-tar ḳhuub utārā mujh ko 
naqd-e-jāñ nazr karūñ tere phir ai qātil-e-ḳhalq zinda kar de agar allāh dobārā mujh ko 
phalv-e-yār ko ġhairoñ se jo ḳhālī paayā dil-e-betāb ne kyā kyā na ubhārā mujh ko 
maiñ yahāñ muntazir-e-va.ada rahā lekin vo rah ga.e aur kahīñ de ke sahārā mujh ko 
āḳhir insān huuñ patthar kā to rakhtā nahīñ dil ai buto itnā satāo na ḳhudā-rā mujh ko 
apne begāne se ab mujh ko shikāyat na rahī dushmanī kar ke mire dost ne maarā mujh ko 
phande meñ phañs ke maiñ us ke na huā phir jāñ-bar tār-e-gesū ne tire maar utārā mujh ko 
un ko sūjhā na zarā past-o-buland ulfat ġhair se chiḌh ga.e nazroñ se utārā mujh ko 
sadma-sohbat-e-aġhyār na uThegā kabhī aur jo zulm karo sab haiñ gavārā mujh ko 
shaad us se hoñ ki is qātil-e-ālam ne ḳhud aaj kah ke o āshiq-e-nāshād pukārā mujh ko 
jaañ dī ishq meñ us huur ke maiñ ne jo 'qalaq' qabr meñ aa ke farishtoñ ne utārā mujh ko 
aashna hote hi us ishq ne mara mujh ko na mila bahr-e-mohabbat ka kinara mujh ko 
kyun mere qatl ko talwar barahna ki hai tegh-e-abru ka to kafi hai ishaara mujh ko 
KHud tere dam mein aaya koi afsun na chala ai pari tu ne to shishe mein utara mujh ko 
mere isa ka zara dekhna eajaz-e-KHiram ek Thokar se mili umr dobara mujh ko 
mane daulat-e-didar na ho ai girya ruKH-e-mahbub ka karne de nazara mujh ko 
dil mein ek gauhar-e-KHubi ki mohabbat ka hai josh aaj-kal bhata hai dariya ka kinara mujh ko 
Dam-dilase hi mein Tala kiye har roz aaKHir sukhe ghaT ai gul-e-tar KHub utara mujh ko 
naqd-e-jaan nazr karun tere phir ai qatil-e-KHalq zinda kar de agar allah dobara mujh ko 
phalw-e-yar ko ghairon se jo KHali paya dil-e-betab ne kya kya na ubhaara mujh ko 
main yahan muntazir-e-wada raha lekin wo rah gae aur kahin de ke sahaara mujh ko 
aaKHir insan hun patthar ka to rakhta nahin dil ai buto itna satao na KHuda-ra mujh ko 
apne begane se ab mujh ko shikayat na rahi dushmani kar ke mere dost ne mara mujh ko 
phande mein phans ke main us ke na hua phir jaan-bar tar-e-gesu ne tere mar utara mujh ko 
un ko sujha na zara past-o-buland ulfat ghair se chiDh gae nazron se utara mujh ko 
sadma-sohbat-e-aghyar na uThega kabhi aur jo zulm karo sab hain gawara mujh ko 
shad us se hon ki is qatil-e-alam ne KHud aaj kah ke o aashiq-e-nashad pukara mujh ko 
jaan di ishq mein us hur ke main ne jo 'qalaq' qabr mein aa ke farishton ne utara mujh ko

umr guzrī hai iltijā karte qissa-e-ġham lab-āshnā karte 
jiine vaale tire baġhair ai dost mar na jaate to aur kyā karte 
haa.e vo qahr-e-sādgī-āmez kaash ham phir unheñ ḳhafā karte 
rañg hotā kuchh aur duniyā kā shaiḳh merā agar kahā karte 
aap karte jo ehtirām-e-butāñ but-kade ḳhud ḳhudā ḳhudā karte 
rind hote jo bā-shu.ūr 'anvar' kyā batā.ūñ tumheñ vo kyā karte 
umr guzri hai iltija karte qissa-e-gham lab-ashna karte 
jine wale tere baghair ai dost mar na jate to aur kya karte 
hae wo qahr-e-sadgi-amez kash hum phir unhen KHafa karte 
rang hota kuchh aur duniya ka shaiKH mera agar kaha karte 
aap karte jo ehtiram-e-butan but-kade KHud KHuda KHuda karte 
rind hote jo ba-shuur 'anwar' kya bataun tumhein wo kya karte

be-ḳhudī pe thā 'fānī' kuchh na iḳhtiyār apnā umr bhar kiyā nāhaq ham ne intizār apnā 
tāb-e-zabt-e-ġham ne bhī de diyā javāb āḳhir un ke dil se uThtā hai aaj e'tibār apnā 
ishq zindagī Thahrā lekin ab ye mushkil hai zindagī se hotā hai ahd ustuvār apnā 
shikva barmalā karte ḳhair ye to kyā karte haañ magar jo ban paḌtā shikva ek baar apnā 
ġham hī jī kā dushman thā ġham se duur rahte the ġham hī rah gayā āḳhir ek ġham-gusār apnā 
le gayā chaman ko bhī mausam-e-bahār aa kar ab qafas kā gosha hai hāsil-e-bahār apnā 
jhuuT hī sahī vaada kyuuñ yaqīñ na kar lete baat dil-fareb un kī dil umīd-vār apnā 
inqilāb-e-ālam meñ varna der hī kyā thī un ke āstāñ tak thā ḳhair se ġhubār apnā 
dil hai muztarib 'fānī' aañkh mahv-e-hairat hai dil ne de diyā shāyad aañkh ko qarār apnā 
be-KHudi pe tha 'fani' kuchh na iKHtiyar apna umr bhar kiya nahaq hum ne intizar apna 
tab-e-zabt-e-gham ne bhi de diya jawab aaKHir un ke dil se uThta hai aaj e'tibar apna 
ishq zindagi Thahra lekin ab ye mushkil hai zindagi se hota hai ahd ustuwar apna 
shikwa barmala karte KHair ye to kya karte han magar jo ban paDta shikwa ek bar apna 
gham hi ji ka dushman tha gham se dur rahte the gham hi rah gaya aaKHir ek gham-gusar apna 
le gaya chaman ko bhi mausam-e-bahaar aa kar ab qafas ka gosha hai hasil-e-bahaar apna 
jhuT hi sahi wada kyun yaqin na kar lete baat dil-fareb un ki dil umid-war apna 
inqilab-e-alam mein warna der hi kya thi un ke aastan tak tha KHair se ghubar apna 
dil hai muztarib 'fani' aankh mahw-e-hairat hai dil ne de diya shayad aankh ko qarar apna

huā ḳhatm dariyā to sahrā lagā safar kā tasalsul kahāñ jā lagā 
'ajab raat bastī kā naqsha lagā har ik naqsh andar se TuuTā lagā 
tumhārā hazāroñ se rishta lagā kaho sā.īñ kā kaam kaisā lagā 
abhī khiñch hī jaatī lahū kī dhanak miyāñ tiir Tuk terā tirchhā lagā 
lahū meñ utartī rahī chāñdnī badan raat kā kitnā ThanDā lagā 
ta'ajjub ke sūrāḳh se dekhte añdhere meñ kaise nishāna lagā 
hua KHatm dariya to sahra laga safar ka tasalsul kahan ja laga 
'ajab raat basti ka naqsha laga har ek naqsh andar se TuTa laga 
tumhaara hazaron se rishta laga kaho sain ka kaam kaisa laga 
abhi khinch hi jati lahu ki dhanak miyan tir Tuk tera tirchha laga 
lahu mein utarti rahi chandni badan raat ka kitna ThanDa laga 
ta'ajjub ke suraKH se dekhte andhere mein kaise nishana laga

chāñd ko reshmī bādal se ulajhtā dekhūñ vo havā hai kabhī āñchal kabhī chehra dekhūñ 
dekhne niklā huuñ duniyā ko magar kyā dekhūñ jis taraf aañkh uThā.ūñ vahī chehra dekhūñ 
dā.era khīñch ke baiThā huuñ baḌī muddat se ḳhud se niklūñ to kisī aur kā rasta dekhūñ 
ye vo darvāza hai kholūñ to koī aa na sake aur agar band karūñ dil hī meñ duniyā dekhūñ 
vo ajab chiiz hai us kā koī chehra hī nahīñ ek parda jo uThe dūsrā parda dekhūñ 
vo chakā-chauñd hai niklegā na ghar se koī dhuup agar chhiTke vo hañstā huā chehra dekhūñ 
merā saaya ho ki maiñ koī to dhokā hai zarūr ghar meñ ā.īna ki ghar se pare dariyā dekhūñ 
koī phal phuul nahīñ maġhribī chaTTānoñ par chāñd jis gaañv se ugtā hai vo duniyā dekhūñ 
chand ko reshmi baadal se ulajhta dekhun wo hawa hai kabhi aanchal kabhi chehra dekhun 
dekhne nikla hun duniya ko magar kya dekhun jis taraf aankh uThaun wahi chehra dekhun 
daera khinch ke baiTha hun baDi muddat se KHud se niklun to kisi aur ka rasta dekhun 
ye wo darwaza hai kholun to koi aa na sake aur agar band karun dil hi mein duniya dekhun 
wo ajab chiz hai us ka koi chehra hi nahin ek parda jo uThe dusra parda dekhun 
wo chaka-chaund hai niklega na ghar se koi dhup agar chhiTke wo hansta hua chehra dekhun 
mera saya ho ki main koi to dhoka hai zarur ghar mein aaina ki ghar se pare dariya dekhun 
koi phal phul nahin maghribi chaTTanon par chand jis ganw se ugta hai wo duniya dekhun

pareshānī hai jī ghabrā rahā hai koī dhīme suroñ meñ gā rahā hai 
kahūñ kyā hāl-e-nākām-e-mohabbat tamannāoñ se jī bahlā rahā hai 
koī shab kī ḳhamoshī meñ hai giryāñ tasavvur meñ koī samjhā rahā hai 
tasavvur kī ye maqsad-āfrīnī maiñ samjhā koī sach-much aa rahā hai 
jo rasta ḳhuld meñ niklā hai jā kar vo dozaḳh se nikal kar jā rahā hai 
pareshani hai ji ghabra raha hai koi dhime suron mein ga raha hai 
kahun kya haal-e-nakaam-e-mohabbat tamannaon se ji bahla raha hai 
koi shab ki KHamoshi mein hai giryan tasawwur mein koi samjha raha hai 
tasawwur ki ye maqsad-afrini main samjha koi sach-much aa raha hai 
jo rasta KHuld mein nikla hai ja kar wo dozaKH se nikal kar ja raha hai

āsāñ nahīñ hai tanhā dar us kā baaz karnā lāzim hai pāsbāñ se ab ham ko saaz karnā 
gar ham mushīr hote allāh ke to kahte yaanī visāl kī shab yā rab darāz karnā 
us kā salām mujh se ab kyā hai gardish-e-rau tiflī meñ maiñ sikhāyā jis ko namāz karnā 
az-bas-ki ḳhuun dil kā khātā hai josh har dam mushkil huā hai ham ko iḳhfā-e-rāz karnā 
bā-yak-niyāz us se kyūñkar koī bar aave aatā ho sau tarah se jis ko ki naaz karnā 
karte haiñ choT āḳhir ye āhuān-e-badmast āñkhoñ se us kī ai dil Tuk ehtirāz karnā 
ai aah us ke dil meñ tāsīr ho to jānūñ hai varna kaam kitnā patthar gudāz karnā 
hovegī sub.h raushan ik dam meñ vasl kī shab band-e-qabā ko apne zālim na baaz karnā 
ai 'mus.hafī' haiñ do chiiz ab yād-gār-e-daurāñ us se tū naaz karnā mujh se niyāz karnā 
aasan nahin hai tanha dar us ka baz karna lazim hai pasban se ab hum ko saz karna 
gar hum mushir hote allah ke to kahte yani visal ki shab ya rab daraaz karna 
us ka salam mujh se ab kya hai gardish-e-rau tifli mein main sikhaya jis ko namaz karna 
az-bas-ki KHun dil ka khata hai josh har dam mushkil hua hai hum ko iKHfa-e-raaz karna 
ba-yak-niyaz us se kyunkar koi bar aawe aata ho sau tarah se jis ko ki naz karna 
karte hain choT aaKHir ye aahuan-e-badmast aankhon se us ki ai dil Tuk ehtiraaz karna 
ai aah us ke dil mein tasir ho to jaanun hai warna kaam kitna patthar gudaz karna 
howegi subh raushan ek dam mein wasl ki shab band-e-qaba ko apne zalim na baz karna 
ai 'mushafi' hain do chiz ab yaad-gar-e-dauran us se tu naz karna mujh se niyaz karna

musāfiroñ meñ abhī talḳhiyāñ purānī haiñ safar nayā hai magar kashtiyāñ purānī haiñ 
ye kah ke us ne shajar ko tane se kaaT diyā ki is daraḳht meñ kuchh Tahniyāñ purānī haiñ 
ham is liye bhī na.e ham-safar talāsh kareñ hamāre haath meñ baisākhiyāñ purānī haiñ 
ajiib soch hai is shahr ke makīnoñ kī makāñ na.e haiñ magar khiḌkiyāñ purānī haiñ 
palaT ke gaañv meñ maiñ is liye nahīñ aayā mire badan pe abhī dhajjiyāñ purānī haiñ 
safar-pasand tabī.at ko ḳhauf-e-sahrā kyā 'sabā' havā kī vahī sīTiyāñ purānī haiñ 
musafiron mein abhi talKHiyan purani hain safar naya hai magar kashtiyan purani hain 
ye kah ke us ne shajar ko tane se kaT diya ki is daraKHt mein kuchh Tahniyan purani hain 
hum is liye bhi nae ham-safar talash karen hamare hath mein baisakhiyan purani hain 
ajib soch hai is shahr ke makinon ki makan nae hain magar khiDkiyan purani hain 
palaT ke ganw mein main is liye nahin aaya mere badan pe abhi dhajjiyan purani hain 
safar-pasand tabiat ko KHauf-e-sahra kya 'saba' hawa ki wahi siTiyan purani hain

dālān meñ kabhī kabhī chhat par khaḌā huuñ maiñ sāyoñ ke intizār meñ shab bhar khaḌā huuñ maiñ 
kyā ho gayā ki baiTh ga.ī ḳhaak bhī mirī kyā baat hai ki apne hī uupar khaḌā huuñ maiñ 
phailā huā hai sāmne sahrā-e-be-kanār āñkhoñ meñ apnī le ke samundar khaḌā huuñ maiñ 
sannāTā mere chāroñ taraf hai bichhā huā bas dil kī dhaḌkanoñ ko pakaḌ kar khaḌā huuñ maiñ 
soyā huā hai mujh meñ koī shaḳhs aaj raat lagtā hai apne jism se bāhar khaḌā huuñ maiñ 
ik haath meñ hai ā.īna-e-zāt-o-kā.enāt ik haath meñ liye hue patthar khaḌā huuñ maiñ 
dalan mein kabhi kabhi chhat par khaDa hun main sayon ke intizar mein shab bhar khaDa hun main 
kya ho gaya ki baiTh gai KHak bhi meri kya baat hai ki apne hi upar khaDa hun main 
phaila hua hai samne sahra-e-be-kanar aankhon mein apni le ke samundar khaDa hun main 
sannaTa mere chaaron taraf hai bichha hua bas dil ki dhaDkanon ko pakaD kar khaDa hun main 
soya hua hai mujh mein koi shaKHs aaj raat lagta hai apne jism se bahar khaDa hun main 
ek hath mein hai aaina-e-zat-o-kaenat ek hath mein liye hue patthar khaDa hun main

mire log ḳhema-e-sabr meñ mire shahr gard-e-malāl meñ abhī kitnā vaqt hai ai ḳhudā in udāsiyoñ ke zavāl meñ 
kabhī mauj-e-ḳhvāb meñ kho gayā kabhī thak ke ret pe so gayā yūñhī umr saarī guzār dī faqat ārzū-e-visāl meñ 
kahīñ gardishoñ ke bhañvar meñ huuñ kisī chaak par maiñ chaḌhā huā kahīñ merī ḳhaak jamī huī kisī dasht-e-barf-misāl meñ 
ye havā-e-ġham ye fazā-e-nam mujhe ḳhauf hai ki na Daal de koī parda merī nigāh par koī raḳhna tere jamāl meñ 
mere log KHema-e-sabr mein mere shahr gard-e-malal mein abhi kitna waqt hai ai KHuda in udasiyon ke zawal mein 
kabhi mauj-e-KHwab mein kho gaya kabhi thak ke ret pe so gaya yunhi umr sari guzar di faqat aarzu-e-visal mein 
kahin gardishon ke bhanwar mein hun kisi chaak par main chaDha hua kahin meri KHak jami hui kisi dasht-e-barf-misal mein 
ye hawa-e-gham ye faza-e-nam mujhe KHauf hai ki na Dal de koi parda meri nigah par koi raKHna tere jamal mein

vahī chitvan kī ḳhūñ-ḳhvārī jo aage thī so ab bhī hai tirī āñkhoñ kī bīmārī jo aage thī so ab bhī hai 
vahī nashv-o-numā-e-sabza hai gor-e-ġharībāñ par havā-e-charḳh-e-zañgārī jo aage thī so ab bhī hai 
ta.alluq hai vahī tā-hāl un zulfoñ ke saude se salāsil kī giraftārī jo aage thī so ab bhī hai 
vahī sar kā paTaknā hai vahī ronā hai din bhar kā vahī rātoñ kī bedārī jo aage thī so ab bhī hai 
rivāj-e-ishq ke aa.iiñ vahī haiñ kishvar-e-dil meñ rah-o-rasm-e-vafā jaarī jo aage thī so ab bhī hai 
vahī jī kā jalānā hai pakānā hai vahī dil kā vo us kī garm-bāzārī jo aage thī so ab bhī hai 
niyāz-e-ḳhādimāna hai vahī fazl-e-ilāhī se butoñ kī nāz-bardārī jo aage thī so ab bhī hai 
firāq-e-yār meñ jis tarah se martā thā martā huuñ vo ruuh o tan kī be-zārī jo aage thī so ab bhī hai 
vahī saudā-e-kākul kā hai aalam jo ki sābiq thā ye shab bīmār par bhārī jo aage thī so ab bhī hai 
junūñ kī garm-joshī hai vahī dīvānoñ se apnī vahī dāġhoñ kī gul-kārī jo aage thī so ab bhī hai 
vahī bāzār-e-garmī hai mohabbat kī hanūz 'ātish' vo yūsuf kī ḳharīdārī jo aage thī so ab bhī hai 
wahi chitwan ki KHun-KHwari jo aage thi so ab bhi hai teri aankhon ki bimari jo aage thi so ab bhi hai 
wahi nashw-o-numa-e-sabza hai gor-e-ghariban par hawa-e-charKH-e-zangari jo aage thi so ab bhi hai 
talluq hai wahi ta-haal un zulfon ke saude se salasil ki giraftari jo aage thi so ab bhi hai 
wahi sar ka paTakna hai wahi rona hai din bhar ka wahi raaton ki bedari jo aage thi so ab bhi hai 
riwaj-e-ishq ke aain wahi hain kishwar-e-dil mein rah-o-rasm-e-wafa jari jo aage thi so ab bhi hai 
wahi ji ka jalana hai pakana hai wahi dil ka wo us ki garm-bazari jo aage thi so ab bhi hai 
niyaz-e-KHadimana hai wahi fazl-e-ilahi se buton ki naz-bardari jo aage thi so ab bhi hai 
firaq-e-yar mein jis tarah se marta tha marta hun wo ruh o tan ki be-zari jo aage thi so ab bhi hai 
wahi sauda-e-kakul ka hai aalam jo ki sabiq tha ye shab bimar par bhaari jo aage thi so ab bhi hai 
junun ki garm-joshi hai wahi diwanon se apni wahi daghon ki gul-kari jo aage thi so ab bhi hai 
wahi bazar-e-garmi hai mohabbat ki hanuz 'atish' wo yusuf ki KHaridari jo aage thi so ab bhi hai

hameñ ḳhabar thī bachāne kā us meñ yaarā nahīñ so ham bhī Duub ga.e aur use pukārā nahīñ 
ḳhud āftāb mirī raah kā charāġh bane magar ye baat mire chāñd ko gavārā nahīñ 
jo us meñ utrī to tūfān hī mileñge mujhe maiñ jāntī huuñ ki vo mauj hai kinārā nahīñ 
ajab fazā hai ki rañg-e-numūd-e-sub.h bhī hai siyāh raat ne bhī pairahan utārā nahīñ 
vajūd jis ko kisī mo'tabar shajar ne diyā havā kī zad meñ bhī tinkā vo be-sahārā nahīñ 
jalegā ḳhud bhī sahar tak mujhe bhī lau degā charāġh-e-shām koī baḳht kā sitārā nahīñ 
hamein KHabar thi bachane ka us mein yara nahin so hum bhi Dub gae aur use pukara nahin 
KHud aaftab meri rah ka charagh bane magar ye baat mere chand ko gawara nahin 
jo us mein utri to tufan hi milenge mujhe main jaanti hun ki wo mauj hai kinara nahin 
ajab faza hai ki rang-e-numud-e-subh bhi hai siyah raat ne bhi pairahan utara nahin 
wajud jis ko kisi mo'tabar shajar ne diya hawa ki zad mein bhi tinka wo be-sahaara nahin 
jalega KHud bhi sahar tak mujhe bhi lau dega charagh-e-sham koi baKHt ka sitara nahin

parda ulaT ke us ne jo chehrā dikhā diyā rañg-e-ruḳh-e-bahār-e-gulistāñ uḌā diyā 
vahshat meñ qaid-e-dair-o-haram dil se uTh ga.ī haqqā ki mujh ko ishq ne rastā batā diyā 
phir jhāñk-tāk āñkhoñ ne merī shurūa kī phir ġham kā mere nāloñ ne laggā lagā diyā 
añgḌā.ī donoñ haath uThā kar jo us ne lī par lag ga.e paroñ ne parī ko uḌā diyā 
sīkhī hai us javān ne pīr-e-falak kī chaal hir-phir ke mujh ko ḳhaak meñ āḳhir milā diyā 
vo sair ko jo aa.e to sadqe meñ un ko 'barq' har ek gul ne tā.ir-e-nik.hat uḌā diyā 
parda ulaT ke us ne jo chehra dikha diya rang-e-ruKH-e-bahaar-e-gulistan uDa diya 
wahshat mein qaid-e-dair-o-haram dil se uTh gai haqqa ki mujh ko ishq ne rasta bata diya 
phir jhank-tak aankhon ne meri shurua ki phir gham ka mere nalon ne lagga laga diya 
angDai donon hath uTha kar jo us ne li par lag gae paron ne pari ko uDa diya 
sikhi hai us jawan ne pir-e-falak ki chaal hir-phir ke mujh ko KHak mein aaKHir mila diya 
wo sair ko jo aae to sadqe mein un ko 'barq' har ek gul ne tair-e-nikhat uDa diya

hameñ ḳhabar nahīñ kuchh kaun hai kahāñ koī hai hamesha shaad ho ābād ho jahāñ koī hai 
jagah na chhoḌe ki sail-e-balā hai tez bahut uḌā paḌā hī rahe ab jahāñ tahāñ koī hai 
fishār-e-girya kisī taur be-maqām nahīñ dayār-e-ġham hai kahīñ par pas-e-fuġhāñ koī hai 
vo koī ḳhadsha hai yā vahm-e-ḳhvāb hai ki ḳhayāl ki ho na ho mire dil apne darmiyāñ koī hai 
kabhī to aisā hai jaise kahīñ pe kuchh bhī nahīñ kabhī ye lagtā hai jaise yahāñ vahāñ koī hai 
kabhī kabhī to ye lagtā hai fard fard haiñ ham ye aur baat hamārā bhī kārvāñ koī hai 
kahīñ pahuñchnā nahīñ hai use magar phir bhī misāl-e-bād-e-bahārāñ ravāñ-davāñ koī hai 
huā hai apne safar se hazar se begāna vahīñ vahīñ pe nahīñ hai jahāñ jahāñ koī hai 
chhalak jo uThtī hai ye aañkh fart-e-vasl meñ bhī to sarḳhushī meñ abhī ranj-e-rā.egāñ koī hai 
shikast-e-dil hai to kyā rāh-e-ishq tark na kar ye dekh kyā kahīñ parvarda-e-ziyāñ koī hai 
ab us nigāh-e-fusūñ-kār kā qusūr hai kyā hameñ dikhāo agar zaḳhm kā nishāñ koī hai 
kahīñ pe aaj bhī vo ghar hai hañstā bastā huā ye vahm sā hai tire dil ko yā gumāñ koī hai 
javār-e-qarya-e-yārāñ meñ jā nikaltā huuñ ki jaise ab bhī vahīñ merā mehrbāñ koī hai 
hamein KHabar nahin kuchh kaun hai kahan koi hai hamesha shad ho aabaad ho jahan koi hai 
jagah na chhoDe ki sail-e-bala hai tez bahut uDa paDa hi rahe ab jahan tahan koi hai 
fishaar-e-girya kisi taur be-maqam nahin dayar-e-gham hai kahin par pas-e-fughan koi hai 
wo koi KHadsha hai ya wahm-e-KHwab hai ki KHayal ki ho na ho mere dil apne darmiyan koi hai 
kabhi to aisa hai jaise kahin pe kuchh bhi nahin kabhi ye lagta hai jaise yahan wahan koi hai 
kabhi kabhi to ye lagta hai fard fard hain hum ye aur baat hamara bhi karwan koi hai 
kahin pahunchna nahin hai use magar phir bhi misal-e-baad-e-bahaaran rawan-dawan koi hai 
hua hai apne safar se hazar se begana wahin wahin pe nahin hai jahan jahan koi hai 
chhalak jo uThti hai ye aankh fart-e-wasl mein bhi to sarKHushi mein abhi ranj-e-raegan koi hai 
shikast-e-dil hai to kya rah-e-ishq tark na kar ye dekh kya kahin parwarda-e-ziyan koi hai 
ab us nigah-e-fusun-kar ka qusur hai kya hamein dikhao agar zaKHm ka nishan koi hai 
kahin pe aaj bhi wo ghar hai hansta basta hua ye wahm sa hai tere dil ko ya guman koi hai 
jawar-e-qarya-e-yaran mein ja nikalta hun ki jaise ab bhi wahin mera mehrban koi hai

aañsū kī tarah dīda-e-pur-āb meñ rahnā har gaam mujhe ḳhāna-e-sailāb meñ rahnā 
vo abru-e-ḳhamdār nazar aa.e to samjhe āñkhoñ kī tarah sāya-e-mehrāb meñ rahnā 
ġhaflat hī meñ kaTte haiñ shab-o-roz hamāre har aan kisī dhyān kisī ḳhvāb meñ rahnā 
din bhar kisī dīvār ke saa.e meñ tag-o-tāz shab justujū-e-chādar-e-mahtāb meñ rahnā 
vīrāna-e-duniyā meñ guzarte haiñ mire din rātoñ ko ravāq-e-dil-e-betāb meñ rahnā 
miTTī to har ik haal meñ miTTī hī rahegī kyā TaaT meñ kyā qāqum o sanjāb meñ rahnā 
ghar aur bayābāñ meñ koī farq nahīñ hai lāzim hai magar ishq ke ādāb meñ rahnā 
ik pal ko bhī āñkheñ na lagīñ ḳhāna-e-dil meñ har lamha nigahbāni-e-asbāb meñ rahnā 
aansu ki tarah dida-e-pur-ab mein rahna har gam mujhe KHana-e-sailab mein rahna 
wo abru-e-KHamdar nazar aae to samjhe aankhon ki tarah saya-e-mehrab mein rahna 
ghaflat hi mein kaTte hain shab-o-roz hamare har aan kisi dhyan kisi KHwab mein rahna 
din bhar kisi diwar ke sae mein tag-o-taz shab justuju-e-chadar-e-mahtab mein rahna 
virana-e-duniya mein guzarte hain mere din raaton ko rawaq-e-dil-e-betab mein rahna 
miTTi to har ek haal mein miTTi hi rahegi kya TaT mein kya qaqum o sanjab mein rahna 
ghar aur bayaban mein koi farq nahin hai lazim hai magar ishq ke aadab mein rahna 
ek pal ko bhi aankhen na lagin KHana-e-dil mein har lamha nigahbani-e-asbab mein rahna

girī gir kar uThī palTī to jo kuchh thā uThā laa.ī nazar kyā kīmiyā thī rañg chehroñ se uḌā laa.ī 
ḳhudā ke vāste saffākiyāñ ye kis se sīkhī haiñ nazar se pyaar māñgā thā vo ik ḳhanjar uThā laa.ī 
na hasrat hī nikaltī hai na dil ko aag lagtī hai mirī hastī mire dāman meñ kyā kāñTā lagā laa.ī 
vo sab badmastiyāñ thiiñ zar kī ab zar hai na piite haiñ hamārī muflisī ḳhud raah par ham ko lagā laa.ī 
miTāne ko hamāre ye zamīn-o-āsmāñ donoñ hamesha mil ke chalte haiñ ba-īñ pastī-o-bālā.ī 
jo kuchh dekhā na dekhā jo sunī vo an-sunī 'shā.ir' na aa.e ham yahāñ ye zindagī muft-e-ḳhudā laa.ī 
giri gir kar uThi palTi to jo kuchh tha uTha lai nazar kya kimiya thi rang chehron se uDa lai 
KHuda ke waste saffakiyan ye kis se sikhi hain nazar se pyar manga tha wo ek KHanjar uTha lai 
na hasrat hi nikalti hai na dil ko aag lagti hai meri hasti mere daman mein kya kanTa laga lai 
wo sab badmastiyan thin zar ki ab zar hai na pite hain hamari muflisi KHud rah par hum ko laga lai 
miTane ko hamare ye zamin-o-asman donon hamesha mil ke chalte hain ba-in pasti-o-baalai 
jo kuchh dekha na dekha jo suni wo an-suni 'shair' na aae hum yahan ye zindagi muft-e-KHuda lai

vahī un kī satīza-kārī hai vahī bechārgī hamārī hai 
vahī un kā taġhāful paiham vahī apnī gila-guzārī hai 
vahī ruḳhsār o chashm o lab un ke vahī be-chehragī hamārī hai 
husn ho ḳhair ho sadāqat ho sab pe un kī ijāra-dārī hai 
haath uThā tosan-e-taḳhayyul se ye kisī aur kī savārī hai 
wahi un ki satiza-kari hai wahi bechaargi hamari hai 
wahi un ka taghaful paiham wahi apni gila-guzari hai 
wahi ruKHsar o chashm o lab un ke wahi be-chehragi hamari hai 
husn ho KHair ho sadaqat ho sab pe un ki ijara-dari hai 
hath uTha tosan-e-taKHayyul se ye kisi aur ki sawari hai

ḳhaak o ḳhuuñ kī vus.atoñ se bā-ḳhabar kartī huī ik nazar imkāñ-hazār-imkāñ safar kartī huī 
ik ajab bechain manzar aañkh meñ Dhaltā huā ik ḳhalish saffāk sī siine meñ ghar kartī huī 
ik kitāb-e-sad-hunar tashrīh-e-zā.il kā shikār ek mohmal baat jaadū kā asar kartī huī 
jism aur ik nīm-poshīda havas-āmādgī aañkh aur sair-e-libās-e-muḳhtasar kartī huī 
tishnagī kā zahr siine ko siyah kartā huā ik talab apne nashe ko tez-tar kartī huī 
vo nigah apne liye hai sad-hisāb-e-ārzū aur mujhe begāna-e-naf-o-zarar kartī huī 
KHak o KHun ki wusaton se ba-KHabar karti hui ek nazar imkan-hazar-imkan safar karti hui 
ek ajab bechain manzar aankh mein Dhalta hua ek KHalish saffak si sine mein ghar karti hui 
ek kitab-e-sad-hunar tashrih-e-zail ka shikar ek mohmal baat jadu ka asar karti hui 
jism aur ek nim-poshida hawas-amadgi aankh aur sair-e-libas-e-muKHtasar karti hui 
tishnagi ka zahr sine ko siyah karta hua ek talab apne nashe ko tez-tar karti hui 
wo nigah apne liye hai sad-hisab-e-arzu aur mujhe begana-e-naf-o-zarar karti hui

āġhosh meñ jo jalvagar ik nāznīñ huā añgushtarī banā mirā tan vo nagīñ huā 
raunaq-fazā lahad pe jo vo mah-jabīñ huā gumbad hamārī qabr kā charḳh-e-barīñ huā 
kanda jahāñ meñ koī na aisā nagīñ huā jaisā ki terā naam mire dil-nashīñ huā 
raushan huā ye mujh pe ki fānūs meñ hai sham.a haath us kā jalvagar jo tah-e-āstīñ huā 
rakhtā hai ḳhaak par vo qadam jab ki naaz se kahtā hai āsmān na kyuuñ maiñ zamīñ huā 
raushan shabāb meñ jo huī sham-e-rū-e-yār dūd-e-charāġh husn-e-ḳhat-e-ambarīñ huā 
yā rab girā adū pe 'amānat' ke tū vo barq do TukḌe jis se shahpar-e-rūhul-amīñ huā 
aaghosh mein jo jalwagar ek naznin hua angushtari bana mera tan wo nagin hua 
raunaq-faza lahad pe jo wo mah-jabin hua gumbad hamari qabr ka charKH-e-barin hua 
kanda jahan mein koi na aisa nagin hua jaisa ki tera nam mere dil-nashin hua 
raushan hua ye mujh pe ki fanus mein hai shama hath us ka jalwagar jo tah-e-astin hua 
rakhta hai KHak par wo qadam jab ki naz se kahta hai aasman na kyun main zamin hua 
raushan shabab mein jo hui sham-e-ru-e-yar dud-e-charagh husn-e-KHat-e-ambarin hua 
ya rab gira adu pe 'amanat' ke tu wo barq do TukDe jis se shahpar-e-ruhul-amin hua

aise meñ roz roz koī DhūñDtā mujhe āvāz de rahī thī udhar kī havā mujhe 
aisā huā ki ghar se na niklā tamām din jaise ki ḳhud se aaj koī kaam thā mujhe 
parde ke ās-pās koī baaġh hī na ho khiḌkī khulī to phuul kā dhokā huā mujhe 
ye peḌ jis pe phuul na pattī na Tahniyāñ das biis saal ba.ad jo ḳhud sā lagā mujhe 
maiñ aaj bhī vahī huuñ vafā thī jise aziiz fursat mile to aa ke kabhī dekh jā mujhe 
āñkhoñ meñ dil utar paḌā ā.īna dekh kar aayā thā ik ḳhayāl bahut duur kā mujhe 
ye fikr aa paḌī hai ki badle ga.e na hoñ saa.e se kah rahā huuñ zarā dekhnā mujhe 
kahte haiñ yār-dost agar bevafā kaheñ ai 'ashk' āñsuoñ ne bhī kyā de diyā mujhe 
aise mein roz roz koi DhunDta mujhe aawaz de rahi thi udhar ki hawa mujhe 
aisa hua ki ghar se na nikla tamam din jaise ki KHud se aaj koi kaam tha mujhe 
parde ke aas-pas koi bagh hi na ho khiDki khuli to phul ka dhoka hua mujhe 
ye peD jis pe phul na patti na Tahniyan das bis sal baad jo KHud sa laga mujhe 
main aaj bhi wahi hun wafa thi jise aziz fursat mile to aa ke kabhi dekh ja mujhe 
aankhon mein dil utar paDa aaina dekh kar aaya tha ek KHayal bahut dur ka mujhe 
ye fikr aa paDi hai ki badle gae na hon sae se kah raha hun zara dekhna mujhe 
kahte hain yar-dost agar bewafa kahen ai 'ashk' aansuon ne bhi kya de diya mujhe

kuchh shafaq Dūbte sūraj kī bachā lī jaa.e rañg-e-imkāñ se koī shakl banā lī jaa.e 
harf mohmal sā koī haath pe us ke rakh do qaht kaisā hai ki har saañs savālī jaa.e 
shahr-e-malbūs meñ kyuuñ itnā barahna rahiye koī chhat yā koī dīvār-e-ḳhayālī jaa.e 
saath ho letā hai har shaam vahī sannāTā ghar ko jaane kī na.ī raah nikālī jaa.e 
pheñk āñkhoñ ko kisī jhiil kī gahrā.ī meñ but koī soch ki āvāra ḳhayālī jaa.e 
tishna-e-zaḳhm na rahne de badan ko 'ahmad' aisī talvār sar-e-shahr uchhālī jaa.e 
kuchh shafaq Dubte suraj ki bacha li jae rang-e-imkan se koi shakl bana li jae 
harf mohmal sa koi hath pe us ke rakh do qaht kaisa hai ki har sans sawali jae 
shahr-e-malbus mein kyun itna barahna rahiye koi chhat ya koi diwar-e-KHayali jae 
sath ho leta hai har sham wahi sannaTa ghar ko jaane ki nai rah nikali jae 
phenk aankhon ko kisi jhil ki gahrai mein but koi soch ki aawara KHayali jae 
tishna-e-zaKHm na rahne de badan ko 'ahmad' aisi talwar sar-e-shahr uchhaali jae

khile haiñ phuul kī sūrat tire visāl ke din tire jamāl kī rāteñ tire ḳhayāl ke din 
nafas nafas na.ī tahdāriyoñ meñ zaat kī khoj ajab haiñ tere badan tere ḳhadd-o-ḳhāl ke din 
ba-zauq-e-sher ba-jabr-e-ma.āsh yakjā haiñ mire uruuj kī rāteñ mire zavāl ke din 
ḳharīd baiThe haiñ dhoke meñ jins-e-umr-e-darāz hameñ dikhā.e the maktab ne kuchh misāl ke din 
na hādse na tasalsul na rabt-e-umr kahīñ bikhar ke rah ga.e lamhoñ meñ māh-o-sāl ke din 
maiñ baḌhte baḌhte kisī roz tujh ko chhū letā ki gin ke rakh diye tū ne mirī majāl ke din 
ye tajrabāt kī vus.at ye qaid-e-saut-o-sadā na pūchh kaise kaḌe haiñ ye arz-e-hāl ke din 
khile hain phul ki surat tere visal ke din tere jamal ki raaten tere KHayal ke din 
nafas nafas nai tahdariyon mein zat ki khoj ajab hain tere badan tere KHadd-o-KHal ke din 
ba-zauq-e-sher ba-jabr-e-maash yakja hain mere uruj ki raaten mere zawal ke din 
KHarid baiThe hain dhoke mein jins-e-umr-e-daraaz hamein dikhae the maktab ne kuchh misal ke din 
na hadse na tasalsul na rabt-e-umr kahin bikhar ke rah gae lamhon mein mah-o-sal ke din 
main baDhte baDhte kisi roz tujh ko chhu leta ki gin ke rakh diye tu ne meri majal ke din 
ye tajrabaat ki wusat ye qaid-e-saut-o-sada na puchh kaise kaDe hain ye arz-e-haal ke din

mere lahū meñ us ne nayā rañg bhar diyā sūraj kī raushnī ne baḌā kaam kar diyā 
hāthoñ pe mere apne lahū kā nishān thā logoñ ne us ke qatl kā ilzām dhar diyā 
gandum kā biij paanī kī chhāgal aur ik charāġh jab maiñ chalā to us ne ye zād-e-safar diyā 
jaagā to māhtāb kī kunjī sirhāne thī maiñ ḳhvāb meñ thā jab mujhe raushan nagar diyā 
us ko to us ke shahr ne kuchh bhī diyā nahīñ aur us ne phir bhī shahr ko tohfe meñ sar diyā 
merā badan to radd-e-amal meñ ḳhamosh thā merī zabāñ ne zā.iqa-e-ḳhushk-o-tar diyā 
vo harf-āshnā hai mujhe ye gumāñ na thā us ne to sab ko naqsh-ba-dīvār kar diyā 
yuuñ bhī to us ne hausla-afzā.ī kī mirī harf-e-suḳhan ke saath hī zaḳhm-e-hunar diyā 
aḳhtar yahī nahīñ ki mujhe bāl-o-par mile us ne to umr bhar mujhe ehsās-e-par diyā 
mere lahu mein us ne naya rang bhar diya suraj ki raushni ne baDa kaam kar diya 
hathon pe mere apne lahu ka nishan tha logon ne us ke qatl ka ilzam dhar diya 
gandum ka bij pani ki chhagal aur ek charagh jab main chala to us ne ye zad-e-safar diya 
jaga to mahtab ki kunji sirhane thi main KHwab mein tha jab mujhe raushan nagar diya 
us ko to us ke shahr ne kuchh bhi diya nahin aur us ne phir bhi shahr ko tohfe mein sar diya 
mera badan to radd-e-amal mein KHamosh tha meri zaban ne zaiqa-e-KHushk-o-tar diya 
wo harf-ashna hai mujhe ye guman na tha us ne to sab ko naqsh-ba-diwar kar diya 
yun bhi to us ne hausla-afzai ki meri harf-e-suKHan ke sath hi zaKHm-e-hunar diya 
aKHtar yahi nahin ki mujhe baal-o-par mile us ne to umr bhar mujhe ehsas-e-par diya

har ek baat tirī be-sabāt kitnī hai palaTnā baat ko dam bhar meñ baat kitnī hai 
abhī to shaam huī hai abhī to aa.e ho abhī se pūchh rahe ho ki raat kitnī hai 
vo sunte sunte jo ghabrā.e hāl-e-dil bole bayān kitnī huī vārdāt kitnī hai 
tire shahīd ko dūlhā banā huā dekhā ravāñ janāze ke pīchhe barāt kitnī hai 
kisī tarah nahīñ kaTtī nahīñ guzar chuktī ilāhī saḳht ye qaid-e-hayāt kitnī hai 
hamārī jaan hai qīmat to dil hai bai.āna girāñ-bahā lab-e-nāzuk kī baat kitnī hai 
jo shab ko khilte haiñ ġhunche vo din ko jhaḌte haiñ bahār-e-bāġh-e-jahāñ be-sabāt kitnī hai 
mahīnoñ ho ga.e dekhī nahīñ hai sub.h-e-ummīd kise ḳhabar ye musībat kī raat kitnī hai 
udū ke sāmne ye dekhnā hai ham ko bhī kidhar ko hai nigah-e-iltifāt kitnī hai 
ġhazal likheñ bhī to kyā ḳhaak ham likheñ 'beḳhud' zamīn dekhiye ye vāhiyāt kitnī hai 
har ek baat teri be-sabaat kitni hai palaTna baat ko dam bhar mein baat kitni hai 
abhi to sham hui hai abhi to aae ho abhi se puchh rahe ho ki raat kitni hai 
wo sunte sunte jo ghabrae haal-e-dil bole bayan kitni hui wardat kitni hai 
tere shahid ko dulha bana hua dekha rawan janaze ke pichhe baraat kitni hai 
kisi tarah nahin kaTti nahin guzar chukti ilahi saKHt ye qaid-e-hayat kitni hai 
hamari jaan hai qimat to dil hai baiana giran-baha lab-e-nazuk ki baat kitni hai 
jo shab ko khilte hain ghunche wo din ko jhaDte hain bahaar-e-bagh-e-jahan be-sabaat kitni hai 
mahinon ho gae dekhi nahin hai subh-e-ummid kise KHabar ye musibat ki raat kitni hai 
udu ke samne ye dekhna hai hum ko bhi kidhar ko hai nigah-e-iltifat kitni hai 
ghazal likhen bhi to kya KHak hum likhen 'beKHud' zamin dekhiye ye wahiyat kitni hai

kisī kā qahr kisī kī duā mile to sahī sahī vo dushman-e-jāñ-āshnā mile to sahī 
abhī to laal harī battiyoñ ko dekhte haiñ mile kisī kī ḳhabar silsila mile to sahī 
ye qaid hai to rihā.ī bhī ab zarūrī hai kisī bhī samt koī rāsta mile to sahī 
ye shām-e-sard meñ har sū alaav jalte haiñ siyah ḳhamoshī meñ koī sadā mile to sahī 
qabā-e-jism ki hai taar taar nazr kareñ kabhī kahīñ vahī pāgal havā mile to sahī 
kisi ka qahr kisi ki dua mile to sahi sahi wo dushman-e-jaan-ashna mile to sahi 
abhi to lal hari battiyon ko dekhte hain mile kisi ki KHabar silsila mile to sahi 
ye qaid hai to rihai bhi ab zaruri hai kisi bhi samt koi rasta mile to sahi 
ye sham-e-sard mein har su alaw jalte hain siyah KHamoshi mein koi sada mile to sahi 
qaba-e-jism ki hai tar tar nazr karen kabhi kahin wahi pagal hawa mile to sahi

kyā ḳhabar thī ik balā-e-nā-gahānī aa.egī nā-murādī kī nishānī ye javānī aa.egī 
sab kaheñge kaun kartā hai hamāre raaz faash jab mire lab par mohabbat kī kahānī aa.egī 
nā-murādī se kaho muñh pher le apnā zarā merī duniyā meñ urūs-e-kāmrānī aa.egī 
jab ḳhizāñ kī nazr ho jā.egī duniyā se shabāb yaad 'aḳhtar' ye sitam-ārā javānī aa.egī 
kya KHabar thi ek bala-e-na-gahani aaegi na-muradi ki nishani ye jawani aaegi 
sab kahenge kaun karta hai hamare raaz fash jab mere lab par mohabbat ki kahani aaegi 
na-muradi se kaho munh pher le apna zara meri duniya mein urus-e-kaamrani aaegi 
jab KHizan ki nazr ho jaegi duniya se shabab yaad 'aKHtar' ye sitam-ara jawani aaegi

zamīn par hī rahe āsmāñ ke hote hue kahīñ na ghar se ga.e kārvāñ ke hote hue 
maiñ kis kā naam na luuñ aur naam luuñ kis kā hazāroñ phuul khile the ḳhizāñ ke hote hue 
badan ki jaise havāoñ kī zad meñ koī charāġh ye apnā haal thā ik mehrbāñ ke hote hue 
hameñ ḳhabar hai koī ham-safar na thā phir bhī yaqīñ kī manzileñ tai kiiñ gumāñ ke hote hue 
vo be-niyāz haiñ ham mustaqil kahīñ na ruke kisī ke naqsh-e-qadam āstāñ ke hote hue 
har ek raḳht-e-safar ko uThā.e phirtā thā koī makīñ na kahīñ thā makāñ ke hote hue 
ye sāneha bhī mire āñsuoñ pe guzrā hai nigāh boltī thī tarjumāñ ke hote hue 
hidāyatoñ kā hai mohtāj nāma-bar kī tarah faqīh-e-shahr tilism-e-bayāñ ke hote hue 
ajiib nuur se rishta thā nuur kā aḳhtar ka.ī charāġh jale kahkashāñ ke hote hue 
zamin par hi rahe aasman ke hote hue kahin na ghar se gae karwan ke hote hue 
main kis ka nam na lun aur nam lun kis ka hazaron phul khile the KHizan ke hote hue 
badan ki jaise hawaon ki zad mein koi charagh ye apna haal tha ek mehrban ke hote hue 
hamein KHabar hai koi ham-safar na tha phir bhi yaqin ki manzilen tai kin guman ke hote hue 
wo be-niyaz hain hum mustaqil kahin na ruke kisi ke naqsh-e-qadam aastan ke hote hue 
har ek raKHt-e-safar ko uThae phirta tha koi makin na kahin tha makan ke hote hue 
ye saneha bhi mere aansuon pe guzra hai nigah bolti thi tarjuman ke hote hue 
hidayaton ka hai mohtaj nama-bar ki tarah faqih-e-shahr tilism-e-bayan ke hote hue 
ajib nur se rishta tha nur ka aKHtar kai charagh jale kahkashan ke hote hue

yaqīn hai ki gumāñ hai mujhe nahīñ mālūm ye aag hai ki dhuāñ hai mujhe nahīñ mālūm 
ye har taraf hai koī mahfil-e-tarab barpā ki bazm-e-ġham-e-zadagāñ hai mujhe nahīñ mālūm 
liye to phirtā huuñ ik mausam-e-vajūd ko maiñ bahār hai ki ḳhizāñ hai mujhe nahīñ mālūm 
vo rañg-e-gul to usī ḳhaak meñ ghulā thā kahīñ magar mahak vo kahāñ hai mujhe nahīñ mālūm 
ḳhabar to hai ki yahīñ qarya-e-malāl bhī hai ye kaun mahv-e-fuġhāñ hai mujhe nahīñ mālūm 
maiñ tujh se duur usī dasht-e-nā-rasī meñ huuñ gum idhar tū nauha-kunāñ hai mujhe nahīñ mālūm 
ye dāġh-e-ishq jo miTtā bhī hai chamaktā bhī hai ye zaḳhm hai ki nishāñ hai mujhe nahīñ mālūm 
guzartā jaatā huuñ ik arsa-e-gurez se maiñ ye lā-makāñ ki makāñ hai mujhe nahīñ mālūm 
ravāñ-davāñ to hai ye ju-e-zindagī har dam magar kidhar ko ravāñ hai mujhe nahīñ mālūm 
ye kashmakash jo man-o-tū ke darmiyāñ hai so hai miyān-e-sūd-o-ziyāñ hai mujhe nahīñ mālūm 
ye kū-e-ḳhāk hai yā phir dayār-e-ḳhvāb koī zamīn hai ki zamāñ hai mujhe nahīñ mālūm 
yahīñ kahīñ pe vo ḳhush-rū thā aaj se pahle magar vo aaj kahāñ hai mujhe nahīñ mālūm 
yaqin hai ki guman hai mujhe nahin malum ye aag hai ki dhuan hai mujhe nahin malum 
ye har taraf hai koi mahfil-e-tarab barpa ki bazm-e-gham-e-zadagan hai mujhe nahin malum 
liye to phirta hun ek mausam-e-wajud ko main bahaar hai ki KHizan hai mujhe nahin malum 
wo rang-e-gul to usi KHak mein ghula tha kahin magar mahak wo kahan hai mujhe nahin malum 
KHabar to hai ki yahin qarya-e-malal bhi hai ye kaun mahw-e-fughan hai mujhe nahin malum 
main tujh se dur usi dasht-e-na-rasi mein hun gum idhar tu nauha-kunan hai mujhe nahin malum 
ye dagh-e-ishq jo miTta bhi hai chamakta bhi hai ye zaKHm hai ki nishan hai mujhe nahin malum 
guzarta jata hun ek arsa-e-gurez se main ye la-makan ki makan hai mujhe nahin malum 
rawan-dawan to hai ye ju-e-zindagi har dam magar kidhar ko rawan hai mujhe nahin malum 
ye kashmakash jo man-o-tu ke darmiyan hai so hai miyan-e-sud-o-ziyan hai mujhe nahin malum 
ye ku-e-KHak hai ya phir dayar-e-KHwab koi zamin hai ki zaman hai mujhe nahin malum 
yahin kahin pe wo KHush-ru tha aaj se pahle magar wo aaj kahan hai mujhe nahin malum

ye jo sūraj hai ye sūraj bhī kahāñ thā pahle barf se uThtā huā ek dhuāñ thā pahle 
mujh se ābād huī hai tirī duniyā varna is ḳharābe meñ koī aur kahāñ thā pahle 
ek hī dā.ere meñ qaid haiñ ham log yahāñ ab jahāñ tum ho koī aur vahāñ thā pahle 
us ko ham jaise ka.ī mil ga.e majnūñ varna ishq logoñ ke liye kār-e-ziyāñ thā pahle 
ye jo ab ret nazar aatā hai afzal 'gauhar' isī dariyā meñ kabhī āb-e-ravāñ thā pahle 
ye jo suraj hai ye suraj bhi kahan tha pahle barf se uThta hua ek dhuan tha pahle 
mujh se aabaad hui hai teri duniya warna is KHarabe mein koi aur kahan tha pahle 
ek hi daere mein qaid hain hum log yahan ab jahan tum ho koi aur wahan tha pahle 
us ko hum jaise kai mil gae majnun warna ishq logon ke liye kar-e-ziyan tha pahle 
ye jo ab ret nazar aata hai afzal 'gauhar' isi dariya mein kabhi aab-e-rawan tha pahle

ishq jo nā-gahāñ nahīñ hotā vo kabhī jāvedāñ nahīñ hotā 
ishq rakhtā hai jis jagah dil ko maiñ bhī aksar vahāñ nahīñ hotā 
mujh pe hote haiñ mehrbāñ jab vo ḳhud par apnā gumāñ nahīñ hotā 
ishq hotā hai dil kā ik aalam aur dil kā bayāñ nahīñ hotā 
maiñ ne dekhā hai un kī mahfil meñ kuchh zamān o makāñ nahīñ hotā 
ishq hotā hai dil-ba-dil mahsūs ye fasāna bayāñ nahīñ hotā 
ishq jo na-gahan nahin hota wo kabhi jawedan nahin hota 
ishq rakhta hai jis jagah dil ko main bhi aksar wahan nahin hota 
mujh pe hote hain mehrban jab wo KHud par apna guman nahin hota 
ishq hota hai dil ka ek aalam aur dil ka bayan nahin hota 
main ne dekha hai un ki mahfil mein kuchh zaman o makan nahin hota 
ishq hota hai dil-ba-dil mahsus ye fasana bayan nahin hota

lahū hī kitnā hai jo chashm-e-tar se niklegā yahāñ bhī kaam na 'arz-e-hunar se niklegā 
har ek shaḳhs hai be-samtiyoñ kī dhund meñ gum batā.e kaun ki sūraj kidhar se niklegā 
karo jo kar sako bikhre hue vujūd ko jam' ki kuchh na kuchh to ġhubār-e-safar se niklegā 
maiñ apne aap se mil kar huā bahut māyūs ḳhabar thī garm ki vo aaj ghar se niklegā 
haiñ barf barf abhī mere 'ahd kī rāteñ ufuq jaleñge to sho'la sahar se niklegā 
ye kyā ḳhabar thī ki ai ranj-e-rā.egāñ-nafsī dhuāñ bhī sīna-e-ahl-e-nazar se niklegā 
mirī zamīñ ne ḳhalā meñ bhī khīñch dī dīvār tū āsmāñ sahī kis rahguzar se niklegā 
tamām log isī hasrat meñ dhuup dhuup jale kabhī to saaya ghanere shajar se niklegā 
samo na tāroñ meñ mujh ko ki huuñ vo sail-e-navā jo zindagī ke lab-e-mo'tabar se niklegā 
phirā huuñ kaasa liye lafz lafz ke pīchhe tamām 'umr ye saudā na sar se niklegā 
'fazā' matā-e-qalam ko sañbhāl kar rakkho ki āftāb isī durj-e-guhar se niklegā 
lahu hi kitna hai jo chashm-e-tar se niklega yahan bhi kaam na 'arz-e-hunar se niklega 
har ek shaKHs hai be-samtiyon ki dhund mein gum batae kaun ki suraj kidhar se niklega 
karo jo kar sako bikhre hue wujud ko jam' ki kuchh na kuchh to ghubar-e-safar se niklega 
main apne aap se mil kar hua bahut mayus KHabar thi garm ki wo aaj ghar se niklega 
hain barf barf abhi mere 'ahd ki raaten ufuq jalenge to sho'la sahar se niklega 
ye kya KHabar thi ki ai ranj-e-raegan-nafsi dhuan bhi sina-e-ahl-e-nazar se niklega 
meri zamin ne KHala mein bhi khinch di diwar tu aasman sahi kis rahguzar se niklega 
tamam log isi hasrat mein dhup dhup jale kabhi to saya ghanere shajar se niklega 
samo na taron mein mujh ko ki hun wo sail-e-nawa jo zindagi ke lab-e-mo'tabar se niklega 
phira hun kasa liye lafz lafz ke pichhe tamam 'umr ye sauda na sar se niklega 
'faza' mata-e-qalam ko sanbhaal kar rakkho ki aaftab isi durj-e-guhar se niklega

sunā kar haal qismat aazmā kar lauT aa.e haiñ unheñ kuchh aur begāna banā kar lauT aa.e haiñ 
phir ik TuuTā huā rishta phir ik ujḌī huī duniyā phir ik dilchasp afsāna sunā kar lauT aa.e haiñ 
fareb-e-ārzū ab to na de ai marg-e-mayūsī ham ummīdoñ kī ik duniyā luTā kar lauT aa.e haiñ 
ḳhudā shāhid hai ab to un sā bhī koī nahīñ miltā ba-zom-e-ḳhvesh un ko aazmā kar lauT aa.e haiñ 
bichhe jaate haiñ yā rab kyuuñ kisī kāfir ke qadmoñ meñ vo sajde jo dar-e-ka.aba pe jā kar lauT aa.e haiñ 
suna kar haal qismat aazma kar lauT aae hain unhen kuchh aur begana bana kar lauT aae hain 
phir ek TuTa hua rishta phir ek ujDi hui duniya phir ek dilchasp afsana suna kar lauT aae hain 
fareb-e-arzu ab to na de ai marg-e-mayusi hum ummidon ki ek duniya luTa kar lauT aae hain 
KHuda shahid hai ab to un sa bhi koi nahin milta ba-zom-e-KHwesh un ko aazma kar lauT aae hain 
bichhe jate hain ya rab kyun kisi kafir ke qadmon mein wo sajde jo dar-e-kaba pe ja kar lauT aae hain

koī jal meñ ḳhush hai koī jaal meñ mast haiñ sab apne apne haal meñ 
jāda-e-shamshīr ho yā farsh-e-gul farq kab aayā hamārī chaal meñ 
ek aañsū se kamī aa jā.egī ġhāliban dariyāoñ ke iqbāl meñ 
shola-e-sad-rañg kī sī kaifiyat tujh meñ hai yā tere ḳhadd-o-ḳhāl meñ 
ek lamha merā yār-e-ġhār hai is musībat-gāh-e-māh-o-sāl meñ 
ye jo mere jī ko chain aatā nahīñ hind meñ īrān meñ bañgāl meñ 
roz kā ronā lagā hai apne saath ham ne āñkheñ bāñdh liiñ rumāl meñ 
diida o dil ne kiyā hai kaam band Thap hai kārobār is haḌtāl meñ 
is nigāh-e-nāz kī ek ek baat hai hamāre piir ke aqvāl meñ 
dil pe saaya hai kisī sultān kā varna kyā rakkhā hai is kañgāl meñ 
koi jal mein KHush hai koi jal mein mast hain sab apne apne haal mein 
jada-e-shamshir ho ya farsh-e-gul farq kab aaya hamari chaal mein 
ek aansu se kami aa jaegi ghaaliban dariyaon ke iqbaal mein 
shola-e-sad-rang ki si kaifiyat tujh mein hai ya tere KHadd-o-KHal mein 
ek lamha mera yar-e-ghaar hai is musibat-gah-e-mah-o-sal mein 
ye jo mere ji ko chain aata nahin hind mein iran mein bangal mein 
roz ka rona laga hai apne sath hum ne aankhen bandh lin rumal mein 
dida o dil ne kiya hai kaam band Thap hai karobar is haDtal mein 
is nigah-e-naz ki ek ek baat hai hamare pir ke aqwal mein 
dil pe saya hai kisi sultan ka warna kya rakkha hai is kangal mein

na dil bharā hai na ab nam rahā hai āñkhoñ meñ kabhū jo ro.e the ḳhuuñ jam rahā hai āñkhoñ meñ 
maiñ mar chukā huuñ pe tere hī dekhne ke liye habāb-vār tanik dam rahā hai āñkhoñ meñ 
muvāfaqat kī bahut shahriyoñ se maiñ lekin vahī ġhazāl abhī ram rahā hai āñkhoñ meñ 
vo mahv huuñ ki misāl-e-habāb-e-ā.īna jigar se ashk nikal tham rahā hai āñkhoñ meñ 
basān-e-ashk hai 'qā.em' tū jab se āvāra vaqār tab se tirā kam rahā hai āñkhoñ meñ 
na dil bhara hai na ab nam raha hai aankhon mein kabhu jo roe the KHun jam raha hai aankhon mein 
main mar chuka hun pe tere hi dekhne ke liye habab-war tanik dam raha hai aankhon mein 
muwafaqat ki bahut shahriyon se main lekin wahi ghazal abhi ram raha hai aankhon mein 
wo mahw hun ki misal-e-habab-e-aina jigar se ashk nikal tham raha hai aankhon mein 
basan-e-ashk hai 'qaem' tu jab se aawara waqar tab se tera kam raha hai aankhon mein

ishq ko tark-e-junūñ se kyā ġharaz charḳh-e-gardāñ ko sukūñ se kyā ġharaz 
dil meñ hai ai ḳhizr gar sidaq-e-talab rāh-rau ko rah-numoñ se kyā ġharaz 
hājiyo hai ham ko ghar vaale se kaam ghar ke mehrāb o sutūñ se kyā ġharaz 
gungunā kar aap ro paḌte haiñ jo un ko chañg o arġhanūñ se kyā ġharaz 
nek kahnā nek jis ko dekhnā ham ko taftīsh-e-darūñ se kyā ġharaz 
dost haiñ jab zaḳhm-e-dil se be-ḳhabar un ko apne ashk-e-ḳhūñ se kyā ġharaz 
ishq se hai mujtanib zāhid abas sher ko said-e-zabūñ se kyā ġharaz 
kar chukā jab shaiḳh tasḳhīr-e-qulūb ab use duniyā-e-dūñ se kyā ġharaz 
aa.e ho 'hālī' pa.e-taslīm yaañ aap ko chūn-o-chagūñ se kyā ġharaz 
ishq ko tark-e-junun se kya gharaz charKH-e-gardan ko sukun se kya gharaz 
dil mein hai ai KHizr gar sidaq-e-talab rah-rau ko rah-numon se kya gharaz 
hajiyo hai hum ko ghar wale se kaam ghar ke mehrab o sutun se kya gharaz 
gunguna kar aap ro paDte hain jo un ko chang o arghanun se kya gharaz 
nek kahna nek jis ko dekhna hum ko taftish-e-darun se kya gharaz 
dost hain jab zaKHm-e-dil se be-KHabar un ko apne ashk-e-KHun se kya gharaz 
ishq se hai mujtanib zahid abas sher ko said-e-zabun se kya gharaz 
kar chuka jab shaiKH tasKHir-e-qulub ab use duniya-e-dun se kya gharaz 
aae ho 'haali' pae-taslim yan aap ko chun-o-chagun se kya gharaz

maqām aur bhī ā.eñge lā-makān ke baad zarūr hoñge jahāñ aur is jahān ke baad 
shikasta par the mire aur ḳhatm thī parvāz ik āsmān thā baaqī ik āsmān ke baad 
jo kāmyābī milī vo hameñ ubūrī milī kuchh imtihān the baaqī har imtihān ke baad 
vo jaisā tai thā vahāñ kuchh bhī to na thā aisā nishān koī nahīñ thā us ik nishān ke baad 
zavāl aisā ki saare farāz past hue nasheb-e-vahm bahut thā hadd-e-gumān ke baad 
tavaqqo us kī thī mahdūd maiñ bhī chup hī rahā safar ke aur bhī tohfe the armuġhān ke baad 
vo pahlā ziina thā manzil jise abas jaanā kuchh āgahī ke marāhil the aur dhyān ke baad 
ik us kā TūTnā goyā shikast merī thī chalā na tiir koī mujh se us kamān ke baad 
rahā vo josh na vo daad hī rahī 'betāb' sukūt rah gayā phir ḳhatm dāstān ke baad 
maqam aur bhi aaenge la-makan ke baad zarur honge jahan aur is jahan ke baad 
shikasta par the mere aur KHatm thi parwaz ek aasman tha baqi ek aasman ke baad 
jo kaamyabi mili wo hamein uburi mili kuchh imtihan the baqi har imtihan ke baad 
wo jaisa tai tha wahan kuchh bhi to na tha aisa nishan koi nahin tha us ek nishan ke baad 
zawal aisa ki sare faraaz past hue nasheb-e-wahm bahut tha hadd-e-guman ke baad 
tawaqqo us ki thi mahdud main bhi chup hi raha safar ke aur bhi tohfe the armughan ke baad 
wo pahla zina tha manzil jise abas jaana kuchh aagahi ke marahil the aur dhyan ke baad 
ek us ka TuTna goya shikast meri thi chala na tir koi mujh se us kaman ke baad 
raha wo josh na wo dad hi rahi 'betab' sukut rah gaya phir KHatm dastan ke baad

jahān-e-marg-e-sadā meñ ik aur silsila ḳhatm ho gayā hai kalām ya.anī ḳhudā kā ham se mukālima ḳhatm ho gayā hai 
hameñ to bas ye pata chalā thā ki ūñToñ vaale chale ga.e haiñ kisī ko is kī ḳhabar nahīñ jo mo.āmla ḳhatm ho gayā hai 
na titliyoñ jaisī dopahar hai na ab vo sūraj gulāb jaisā jise mohabbat kahā gayā vo muġhālta ḳhatm ho gayā hai 
tumhārī bātoñ ke jin pe shahtūt jhaḌ rahe hoñ vahī batā.eñ ki talḳh-ābād meñ hamārā to zā.iqa ḳhatm ho gayā hai 
hamārī āñkhoñ se ḳhvāb o ḳhas ke tamām pushte haTā.e jaa.eñ hamārā nārāz pāniyoñ se muāhida ḳhatm ho gayā hai 
ab is liye bhī hameñ mohabbat ko tuul denā paḌegā 'tābish' kisī ne pūchhā to kyā kaheñge ki silsila ḳhatm ho gayā hai 
jahan-e-marg-e-sada mein ek aur silsila KHatm ho gaya hai kalam yani KHuda ka hum se mukalima KHatm ho gaya hai 
hamein to bas ye pata chala tha ki unTon wale chale gae hain kisi ko is ki KHabar nahin jo moamla KHatm ho gaya hai 
na titliyon jaisi dopahar hai na ab wo suraj gulab jaisa jise mohabbat kaha gaya wo mughaalta KHatm ho gaya hai 
tumhaari baaton ke jin pe shahtut jhaD rahe hon wahi bataen ki talKH-abaad mein hamara to zaiqa KHatm ho gaya hai 
hamari aankhon se KHwab o KHas ke tamam pushte haTae jaen hamara naraaz paniyon se muahida KHatm ho gaya hai 
ab is liye bhi hamein mohabbat ko tul dena paDega 'tabish' kisi ne puchha to kya kahenge ki silsila KHatm ho gaya hai

yaqīñ kī ḳhaak uḌāte gumāñ banāte haiñ magar ye turfa imārat kahāñ banāte haiñ 
lagā rahe haiñ na.e zā.eqoñ ke zaḳhm abhī asās-e-fikr na tarz-e-bayāñ banāte haiñ 
qarīb-o-dūr se bejoḌ aks ashiyā ke talāsh karte haiñ aur dāstāñ banāte haiñ 
ki mil sake na hamārā surāġh ham ko bhī binā-e-abr-o-havā par makāñ banāte haiñ 
purāne zulm meñ lazzat nahīñ hamāre liye ham apne sar pe nayā āsmāñ banāte haiñ 
nahīñ nasīb meñ marnā savād-e-sāhil par jo Dūbne ke liye kashtiyāñ banāte haiñ 
falak pe DhūñDte haiñ gard-e-rañg-e-rafta-e-dil zamīñ pe shām-e-talab kā nishāñ banāte haiñ 
vo jis kī lai pe laraztā hai barg barg badan us ek rañg se naqsh-e-ḳhizāñ banāte haiñ 
'zafar' ye vaqt hī batlā.egā ki āḳhir ham bigāḌte haiñ zabāñ yā zabāñ banāte haiñ 
yaqin ki KHak uDate guman banate hain magar ye turfa imarat kahan banate hain 
laga rahe hain nae zaeqon ke zaKHm abhi asas-e-fikr na tarz-e-bayan banate hain 
qarib-o-dur se bejoD aks ashiya ke talash karte hain aur dastan banate hain 
ki mil sake na hamara suragh hum ko bhi bina-e-abr-o-hawa par makan banate hain 
purane zulm mein lazzat nahin hamare liye hum apne sar pe naya aasman banate hain 
nahin nasib mein marna sawad-e-sahil par jo Dubne ke liye kashtiyan banate hain 
falak pe DhunDte hain gard-e-rang-e-rafta-e-dil zamin pe sham-e-talab ka nishan banate hain 
wo jis ki lai pe larazta hai barg barg badan us ek rang se naqsh-e-KHizan banate hain 
'zafar' ye waqt hi batlaega ki aaKHir hum bigaDte hain zaban ya zaban banate hain

donoñ hī kī jānib se ho gar ahd-e-vafā ho chāhat kā mazā jab hai ki tum bhī mujhe chāho 
ye ham nahīñ kahte haiñ ki dushman ko na chāho is chaah kā anjām magar dekhiye kyā ho 
shamshīr se baḌh kar haiñ hasīnoñ kī adā.eñ be-maut kiyā qatl un achchhoñ kā burā ho 
ma.ashūq tarah-dār ho andāz ho achchhā dil aa.e na aise pe to phir dil kā burā ho 
puurā koī hotā nazar aatā nahīñ armāñ un ko to ye zid hai ki hamārā hī kahā ho 
tum mujh ko pilāte to ho mai siina pe chaḌh kar us vaqt agar koī chalā aa.e to kyā ho 
va.ada vo tumhārā hai ki lab tak nahīñ aatā matlab ye hamārā hai ki bātoñ meñ adā ho 
ḳhanjar kī zarūrat hai na shamshīr kī hājat tirchhī sī nazar ho koī bāñkī sī adā ho 
ḳhālī to na jaa.eñ dam-e-ruḳhsat mire naale fitna koī uTThe jo qayāmat na bapā ho 
chorī kī to kuchh baat nahīñ mujh ko batā do merā dil-e-betāb agar tum ne liyā ho 
un se dam-e-raftār ye kahtī hai qayāmat fitne se na ḳhālī koī naqsh-e-kaf-e-pā ho 
bad-zan haiñ vo is tarah ki surma use samjheñ bīmār kī āñkhoñ meñ agar niil Dhalā ho 
ḳhat khol ke paḌhte hue Dartā huuñ kisī kā lipTī huī ḳhat meñ na kahīñ merī qazā ho 
marnā hai usī kā jo tujhe dekh ke mar jaa.e jiinā hai usī kā jo mohabbat meñ jiyā ho 
hai dil kī jagah siine meñ kāvish abhī baaqī paikāñ koī pahlū meñ mire rah na gayā ho 
mujh ko bhī kahīñ aur se aayā hai bulāvā achchhā hai chalo aaj bhī va.ada na vafā ho 
'beḳhud' kā fasāna to hai mash.hūr-e-zamāna ye zikr to shāyad kabhī tum ne bhī sunā ho 
donon hi ki jaanib se ho gar ahd-e-wafa ho chahat ka maza jab hai ki tum bhi mujhe chaho 
ye hum nahin kahte hain ki dushman ko na chaho is chah ka anjam magar dekhiye kya ho 
shamshir se baDh kar hain hasinon ki adaen be-maut kiya qatl un achchhon ka bura ho 
mashuq tarah-dar ho andaz ho achchha dil aae na aise pe to phir dil ka bura ho 
pura koi hota nazar aata nahin arman un ko to ye zid hai ki hamara hi kaha ho 
tum mujh ko pilate to ho mai sina pe chaDh kar us waqt agar koi chala aae to kya ho 
wada wo tumhaara hai ki lab tak nahin aata matlab ye hamara hai ki baaton mein ada ho 
KHanjar ki zarurat hai na shamshir ki hajat tirchhi si nazar ho koi banki si ada ho 
KHali to na jaen dam-e-ruKHsat mere nale fitna koi uTThe jo qayamat na bapa ho 
chori ki to kuchh baat nahin mujh ko bata do mera dil-e-betab agar tum ne liya ho 
un se dam-e-raftar ye kahti hai qayamat fitne se na KHali koi naqsh-e-kaf-e-pa ho 
bad-zan hain wo is tarah ki surma use samjhen bimar ki aankhon mein agar nil Dhala ho 
KHat khol ke paDhte hue Darta hun kisi ka lipTi hui KHat mein na kahin meri qaza ho 
marna hai usi ka jo tujhe dekh ke mar jae jina hai usi ka jo mohabbat mein jiya ho 
hai dil ki jagah sine mein kawish abhi baqi paikan koi pahlu mein mere rah na gaya ho 
mujh ko bhi kahin aur se aaya hai bulawa achchha hai chalo aaj bhi wada na wafa ho 
'beKHud' ka fasana to hai mashhur-e-zamana ye zikr to shayad kabhi tum ne bhi suna ho

jaadū thī sehr thī balā thī zālim ye tirī nigāh kyā thī 
kīdhar hai kahāñ hai ḳhush-dilī tū ham se bhī kabhū tū āshnā thī 
shīrīñ bhī tujhī sī thī sitamgar lailā bhī agarche bevafā thī 
farhād pe is qadar na thā zulm majnūñ pe na ye ġhazab jafā thī 
maarā hai 'bayāñ' ko jin ne ai shoḳh kyā jāniye kaun sī adā thī 
jadu thi sehr thi bala thi zalim ye teri nigah kya thi 
kidhar hai kahan hai KHush-dili tu hum se bhi kabhu tu aashna thi 
shirin bhi tujhi si thi sitamgar laila bhi agarche bewafa thi 
farhad pe is qadar na tha zulm majnun pe na ye ghazab jafa thi 
mara hai 'bayan' ko jin ne ai shoKH kya jaaniye kaun si ada thi

gaalī sahī adā sahī chīn-e-jabīñ sahī ye sab sahī par ek nahīñ kī nahīñ sahī 
marnā mirā jo chāhe to lag jā gale se Tuk aTkā hai dam mirā ye dam-e-vāpsīñ sahī 
gar nāznīñ ke kahne se maanā burā ho kuchh merī taraf ko dekhiye maiñ nāznīñ sahī 
kuchh paḌ gayā hai aañkh meñ ronā kahe hai tū kyuuñ maiñ abas ko bahsūñ yahī dil-nashīñ sahī 
aage baḌhe jo jaate ho kyuuñ kaun hai yahāñ jo baat ham ko kahnī hai tum se yahīñ sahī 
manzūr dostī jo tumheñ hai har ek se achchhā to kyā muzā.eqa 'inshā' se kiiñ sahī 
gali sahi ada sahi chin-e-jabin sahi ye sab sahi par ek nahin ki nahin sahi 
marna mera jo chahe to lag ja gale se Tuk aTka hai dam mera ye dam-e-wapsin sahi 
gar naznin ke kahne se mana bura ho kuchh meri taraf ko dekhiye main naznin sahi 
kuchh paD gaya hai aankh mein rona kahe hai tu kyun main abas ko bahsun yahi dil-nashin sahi 
aage baDhe jo jate ho kyun kaun hai yahan jo baat hum ko kahni hai tum se yahin sahi 
manzur dosti jo tumhein hai har ek se achchha to kya muzaeqa 'insha' se kin sahi

jaan dete hī banī ishq ke dīvāne se sham.a kā haal na dekhā gayā parvāne se 
ātish-e-ishq se jal jal ga.e parvāne se pahle ye aag lagī kaaba o but-ḳhāne se 
sāqiyā girya-e-ġham se mujhe majbūr samajh ḳhuun ristā hai ye TuuTe hue paimāne se 
raat kī raat chaman meñ hai numūd-e-shabnam sub.h hote hī bikhar jā.eñge sab daane se 
dam-e-āḳhir tirī āñkhoñ kī balā.eñ le luuñ aur dam bhar jo na chhalke mire paimāne se 
haa.e kyā chiiz thiiñ vo mast nigāheñ 'shā.ir' jhūmtā-jhāmtā niklā huuñ parī-ḳhāne se 
jaan dete hi bani ishq ke diwane se shama ka haal na dekha gaya parwane se 
aatish-e-ishq se jal jal gae parwane se pahle ye aag lagi kaba o but-KHane se 
saqiya girya-e-gham se mujhe majbur samajh KHun rista hai ye TuTe hue paimane se 
raat ki raat chaman mein hai numud-e-shabnam subh hote hi bikhar jaenge sab dane se 
dam-e-aKHir teri aankhon ki balaen le lun aur dam bhar jo na chhalke mere paimane se 
hae kya chiz thin wo mast nigahen 'shair' jhumta-jhamta nikla hun pari-KHane se

kaun sī duniyā meñ huuñ kis kī nigahbānī meñ huuñ zindagī hai saḳht mushkil phir bhī āsānī meñ huuñ 
chāñd hai paanī meñ yā bhūle hue chehre kā aks sāhil-e-dariyā pe dekho maiñ bhī hairānī meñ huuñ 
qatra-e-shabnam ke bhī ehsān yaad aane lage hoñT sūkhe jā rahe haiñ jab se maiñ paanī meñ huuñ 
bhūlī-bisrī yaad ik aa.ī hai mere dil ke paas maiñ bhī goyā aaj kal is dil kī darbānī meñ huuñ 
ai ḳhizāñ kuchh der ko ye fasl-e-gul jiine to de āj-kal masrūf maiñ bhī chāk-dāmānī meñ huuñ 
kaun si duniya mein hun kis ki nigahbani mein hun zindagi hai saKHt mushkil phir bhi aasani mein hun 
chand hai pani mein ya bhule hue chehre ka aks sahil-e-dariya pe dekho main bhi hairani mein hun 
qatra-e-shabnam ke bhi ehsan yaad aane lage honT sukhe ja rahe hain jab se main pani mein hun 
bhuli-bisri yaad ek aai hai mere dil ke pas main bhi goya aaj kal is dil ki darbani mein hun 
ai KHizan kuchh der ko ye fasl-e-gul jine to de aaj-kal masruf main bhi chaak-damani mein hun

fazā ki phir āsmān bhar thī ḳhushī safar kī uḌaan bhar thī 
vo kyā badan bhar ḳhafā thā mujh se ki aañkh bhī chup gumān bhar thī 
ufuq ki phir ho gayā munavvar lakīr sī ik ki dhyān bhar thī 
vo mauj kyā TuuT kar girī hai to kyā ye bas imtihān bhar thī 
vo ik fasāna zabān bhar thā ye ik samā.at ki kaan bhar thī 
sabab ki ab tak vo pūchhtā hai mirī udāsī ki aan bhar thī 
khulā samundar ki chāñd bhar thā havā ki shab bādbān bhar thī 
hamīñ ne mismār kar dikhā.ī vo ik rukāvaT chaTān bhar thī 
shafaq banī āsmāñ meñ jā kar jo ḳhuuñ kī buuñd ik nishān bhar thī 
na lauT paayā vo jāntā thā ki vāpsī darmiyān bhar thī 
kisī ġhazal meñ na aa.ī 'bānī' vo ik aziyyat ki jaan bhar thī 
faza ki phir aasman bhar thi KHushi safar ki uDan bhar thi 
wo kya badan bhar KHafa tha mujh se ki aankh bhi chup guman bhar thi 
ufuq ki phir ho gaya munawwar lakir si ek ki dhyan bhar thi 
wo mauj kya TuT kar giri hai to kya ye bas imtihan bhar thi 
wo ek fasana zaban bhar tha ye ek samaat ki kan bhar thi 
sabab ki ab tak wo puchhta hai meri udasi ki aan bhar thi 
khula samundar ki chand bhar tha hawa ki shab baadban bhar thi 
hamin ne mismar kar dikhai wo ek rukawaT chaTan bhar thi 
shafaq bani aasman mein ja kar jo KHun ki bund ek nishan bhar thi 
na lauT paya wo jaanta tha ki wapsi darmiyan bhar thi 
kisi ghazal mein na aai 'bani' wo ek aziyyat ki jaan bhar thi

hazār vaqt ke partav-nazar meñ hote haiñ ham ek halqa-e-vahshat-asar meñ hote haiñ 
kabhī kabhī nigah-e-āshnā ke afsāne usī hadīs-e-sar-e-rahguzar meñ hote haiñ 
vahī haiñ aaj bhī us jism-e-nāznīñ ke ḳhutūt jo shāḳh-e-gul meñ jo mauj-e-guhar meñ hote haiñ 
khulā ye dil pe ki tāmīr-e-bām-o-dar hai fareb bagūle qālib-e-dīvār-o-dar meñ hote haiñ 
guzar rahā hai tū āñkheñ churā ke yuuñ na guzar ġhalat-bayāñ bhī bahut rah-guzar meñ hote haiñ 
qafas vahī hai jahāñ ranj-e-nau-ba-nau ai dost nigāh-dārī ehsās par meñ hote haiñ 
sirisht-e-gul hī meñ pinhāñ haiñ saare naqsh-o-nigār hunar yahī to kaf-e-kūza-gar meñ hote haiñ 
Tilism-e-ḳhvāb-e-zuleḳhā o dām-e-barda-farosh hazār tarah ke qisse safar meñ hote haiñ 
hazar waqt ke partaw-nazar mein hote hain hum ek halqa-e-wahshat-asar mein hote hain 
kabhi kabhi nigah-e-ashna ke afsane usi hadis-e-sar-e-rahguzar mein hote hain 
wahi hain aaj bhi us jism-e-naznin ke KHutut jo shaKH-e-gul mein jo mauj-e-guhar mein hote hain 
khula ye dil pe ki tamir-e-baam-o-dar hai fareb bagule qalib-e-diwar-o-dar mein hote hain 
guzar raha hai tu aankhen chura ke yun na guzar ghalat-bayan bhi bahut rah-guzar mein hote hain 
qafas wahi hai jahan ranj-e-nau-ba-nau ai dost nigah-dari ehsas par mein hote hain 
sirisht-e-gul hi mein pinhan hain sare naqsh-o-nigar hunar yahi to kaf-e-kuza-gar mein hote hain 
Tilism-e-KHwab-e-zuleKHa o dam-e-barda-farosh hazar tarah ke qisse safar mein hote hain

ba-qaid-e-vaqt ye muzhda sunā rahā hai koī ki inqalāb ke parde meñ aa rahā hai koī 
ḳhudī ko rāh-e-ḳhudā.ī pe lā rahā hai koī abhī dimāġh-e-bashar aazmā rahā hai koī 
jahāñ ḳharāba-e-hastī miTā rahā hai koī vahīñ kahīñ na.ī duniyā banā rahā hai koī 
abhī naqāb-kushā.ī-e-husn hai dushvār vahī uThe hue parde uThā rahā hai koī 
jo zehn meñ hai vo tasvīr ban nahīñ chuktī banā banā ke hayūle miTā rahā hai koī 
bhulā rahā hai kisī ko tū bar-binā-e-ma.āl ye ġhaur kar ki bhulāyā bhī jā rahā hai koī 
dil-e-fasurda kī bātoñ pe ye tabassum-e-nāz kalī ko phuul banānā sikhā rahā hai koī 
vafā kī daad hai kotāhī-e-vafā kī dalīl maiñ jāntā huuñ ki himmat baḌhā rahā hai koī 
hadīs-e-kohna hai rūdād-e-inqilāb-e-chaman sunī huī sī kahānī sunā rahā hai koī 
mirī vafāoñ kā hai e'tirāf mere ba.ad ḳhoshā-nasīb mujhe kho ke pā rahā hai koī 
hai apne saa.e se vahshat meñ kis qadar taskīñ samajh rahā huuñ mire saath aa rahā hai koī 
nasīb-e-zauq ho 'sīmāb' qismat-e-mūsā hameñ bhī tuur kī jānib bulā rahā hai koī 
ba-qaid-e-waqt ye muzhda suna raha hai koi ki inqalab ke parde mein aa raha hai koi 
KHudi ko rah-e-KHudai pe la raha hai koi abhi dimagh-e-bashar aazma raha hai koi 
jahan KHaraba-e-hasti miTa raha hai koi wahin kahin nai duniya bana raha hai koi 
abhi naqab-kushai-e-husn hai dushwar wahi uThe hue parde uTha raha hai koi 
jo zehn mein hai wo taswir ban nahin chukti bana bana ke hayule miTa raha hai koi 
bhula raha hai kisi ko tu bar-bina-e-maal ye ghaur kar ki bhulaya bhi ja raha hai koi 
dil-e-fasurda ki baaton pe ye tabassum-e-naz kali ko phul banana sikha raha hai koi 
wafa ki dad hai kotahi-e-wafa ki dalil main jaanta hun ki himmat baDha raha hai koi 
hadis-e-kohna hai rudad-e-inqilab-e-chaman suni hui si kahani suna raha hai koi 
meri wafaon ka hai e'tiraf mere baad KHosha-nasib mujhe kho ke pa raha hai koi 
hai apne sae se wahshat mein kis qadar taskin samajh raha hun mere sath aa raha hai koi 
nasib-e-zauq ho 'simab' qismat-e-musa hamein bhi tur ki jaanib bula raha hai koi

jab bhī tanhā.ī ke ehsās se ghabrātā huuñ maiñ har ik chiiz meñ tahlīl sā ho jaatā huuñ 
maiñ kisī jism pe pheñkā huā patthar to na thā bār-hā apnā lahū dekh ke sharmātā huuñ 
raat jo kuchh mujhe detī hai sahar se pahle vaqt ke gahre samundar meñ utaar aatā huuñ 
din ke hañgāme jilā dete haiñ mujh ko varna sub.h se pahle ka.ī martaba mar jaatā huuñ 
ek nashshe kī tarah TuuT gayā huuñ ḳhud se apne nazdīk bhī mushkil se nazar aatā huuñ 
jab bhi tanhai ke ehsas se ghabraata hun main har ek chiz mein tahlil sa ho jata hun 
main kisi jism pe phenka hua patthar to na tha bar-ha apna lahu dekh ke sharmata hun 
raat jo kuchh mujhe deti hai sahar se pahle waqt ke gahre samundar mein utar aata hun 
din ke hangame jila dete hain mujh ko warna subh se pahle kai martaba mar jata hun 
ek nashshe ki tarah TuT gaya hun KHud se apne nazdik bhi mushkil se nazar aata hun

jo zamāne kā ham-zabāñ na rahā vo kahīñ bhī to kāmrāñ na rahā 
is tarah kuchh badal ga.ī hai zamīñ ham ko ab ḳhauf-e-āsmāñ na rahā 
jaane kin mushkiloñ se jiite haiñ kyā kareñ koī mehrbāñ na rahā 
aisī begānagī nahīñ dekhī ab kisī kā koī yahāñ na rahā 
har jagah bijliyoñ kī yūrish hai kyā kahīñ apnā āshiyāñ na rahā 
muflisī kyā gila kareñ tujh se saath terā kahāñ kahāñ na rahā 
hasrateñ baḌh ke chūmtī haiñ qadam manziloñ kā koī nishāñ na rahā 
ḳhūn-e-dil apnā jal rahā hai magar sham.a ke sar pe vo dhuāñ na rahā 
ġham nahīñ ham tabāh ho ke rahe hādsa bhī to nā-gahāñ na rahā 
qāfile ḳhud sambhal sambhal ke baḌhe jab koī mīr-e-kārvāñ na rahā 
jo zamane ka ham-zaban na raha wo kahin bhi to kaamran na raha 
is tarah kuchh badal gai hai zamin hum ko ab KHauf-e-asman na raha 
jaane kin mushkilon se jite hain kya karen koi mehrban na raha 
aisi beganagi nahin dekhi ab kisi ka koi yahan na raha 
har jagah bijliyon ki yurish hai kya kahin apna aashiyan na raha 
muflisi kya gila karen tujh se sath tera kahan kahan na raha 
hasraten baDh ke chumti hain qadam manzilon ka koi nishan na raha 
KHun-e-dil apna jal raha hai magar shama ke sar pe wo dhuan na raha 
gham nahin hum tabah ho ke rahe hadsa bhi to na-gahan na raha 
qafile KHud sambhal sambhal ke baDhe jab koi mir-e-karwan na raha

diloñ kī uqda-kushā.ī kā vaqt hai ki nahīñ ye aadmī kī ḳhudā.ī kā vaqt hai ki nahīñ 
kaho sitāra-shanāso falak kā haal kaho ruḳhoñ se parda-kushā.ī kā vaqt hai ki nahīñ 
havā kī narm-ravī se javāñ huā hai koī fareb-e-tañg-qabā.ī kā vaqt hai ki nahīñ
