ḳhalal-pazīr huā rabt-e-mehr-o-māh meñ vaqt batā ye tujh se judā.ī kā vaqt hai ki nahīñ 
alag siyāsat-e-darbāñ se dil meñ hai ik baat ye vaqt merī rasā.ī kā vaqt hai ki nahīñ 
diloñ ko markaz-e-asrār kar ga.ī jo nigah usī nigah kī gadā.ī kā vaqt hai ki nahīñ 
dilon ki uqda-kushai ka waqt hai ki nahin ye aadmi ki KHudai ka waqt hai ki nahin 
kaho sitara-shanaso falak ka haal kaho ruKHon se parda-kushai ka waqt hai ki nahin 
hawa ki narm-rawi se jawan hua hai koi fareb-e-tang-qabai ka waqt hai ki nahin 
KHalal-pazir hua rabt-e-mehr-o-mah mein waqt bata ye tujh se judai ka waqt hai ki nahin 
alag siyasat-e-darban se dil mein hai ek baat ye waqt meri rasai ka waqt hai ki nahin 
dilon ko markaz-e-asrar kar gai jo nigah usi nigah ki gadai ka waqt hai ki nahin

sukūt-e-shab se ik naġhma sunā hai vahī kānoñ meñ ab tak gūñjtā hai 
ġhanīmat hai ki apne ġham-zadoñ ko vo husn-e-ḳhud-nigar pahchāntā hai 
jise kho kar bahut maġhmūm huuñ maiñ sunā hai us kā ġham mujh se sivā hai 
kuchh aise ġham bhī haiñ jin se abhī tak dil-e-ġham-āshnā nā-āshnā hai 
bahut chhoTe haiñ mujh se mere dushman jo merā dost hai mujh se baḌā hai 
mujhe har aan kuchh banñā paḌegā mirī har saañs merī ibtidā hai 
sukut-e-shab se ek naghma suna hai wahi kanon mein ab tak gunjta hai 
ghanimat hai ki apne gham-zadon ko wo husn-e-KHud-nigar pahchanta hai 
jise kho kar bahut maghmum hun main suna hai us ka gham mujh se siwa hai 
kuchh aise gham bhi hain jin se abhi tak dil-e-gham-ashna na-ashna hai 
bahut chhoTe hain mujh se mere dushman jo mera dost hai mujh se baDa hai 
mujhe har aan kuchh banna paDega meri har sans meri ibtida hai

zamīñ se aage bhalā jaanā thā kahāñ maiñ ne uThā.e rakkhā yūñhī sar pe āsmāñ maiñ ne 
kisī ke hijr meñ shab se kalām karte hue diye kī lau ko banāyā thā ham-zabāñ maiñ ne 
shajar ko aag kisī aur ne lagā.ī thī na jaane saañs meñ kyuuñ bhar liyā dhuāñ maiñ ne 
kabhī to ā.eñge us samt se gulāb o charāġh ye nahr yuuñ hī nikālī nahīñ yahāñ maiñ ne 
mirī to aañkh mirā ḳhvāb TūTne se khulī na jaane paañv dharā niiñd meñ kahāñ maiñ ne 
zamin se aage bhala jaana tha kahan main ne uThae rakkha yunhi sar pe aasman main ne 
kisi ke hijr mein shab se kalam karte hue diye ki lau ko banaya tha ham-zaban main ne 
shajar ko aag kisi aur ne lagai thi na jaane sans mein kyun bhar liya dhuan main ne 
kabhi to aaenge us samt se gulab o charagh ye nahr yun hi nikali nahin yahan main ne 
meri to aankh mera KHwab TuTne se khuli na jaane panw dhara nind mein kahan main ne

vahshat meñ nikal aayā huuñ idrāk se aage ab DhūñDh mujhe majma-e-ushshāq se aage 
ik surḳh samundar meñ tirā zikr bahut hai ai shaḳhs guzar dīda-e-namnāk se aage 
us paar se aatā koī dekhūñ to ye pūchhūñ aflāk se pīchhe huuñ ki aflāk se aage 
dam toḌ na de ab kahīñ ḳhvāhish kī havā bhī ye ḳhaak to uḌtī nahīñ ḳhāshāk se aage 
jo naqsh ubhāre the miTā.e bhī haiñ us ne darpesh phir ik chaak hai is chaak se aage 
ā.īne ko toḌā hai to mālūm huā hai guzrā huuñ kisī dasht-e-ḳhatarnāk se aage 
ham-zād kī sūrat hai mire yaar kī sūrat maiñ kaise nikal saktā huuñ chālāk se aage 
wahshat mein nikal aaya hun idrak se aage ab DhunDh mujhe majma-e-ushshaq se aage 
ek surKH samundar mein tera zikr bahut hai ai shaKHs guzar dida-e-namnak se aage 
us par se aata koi dekhun to ye puchhun aflak se pichhe hun ki aflak se aage 
dam toD na de ab kahin KHwahish ki hawa bhi ye KHak to uDti nahin KHashak se aage 
jo naqsh ubhaare the miTae bhi hain us ne darpesh phir ek chaak hai is chaak se aage 
aaine ko toDa hai to malum hua hai guzra hun kisi dasht-e-KHatarnak se aage 
ham-zad ki surat hai mere yar ki surat main kaise nikal sakta hun chaalak se aage

shamīm-e-yār na jab tak chaman meñ chhū aa.e na rañg aa.e kisī phuul meñ na bū aa.e 
maza to jab hai shahādat kā maiñ idhar se baḌhūñ udhar se teġh-e-jafā khiñch ke tā gulū aa.e 
dimāġh de jo ḳhudā gulshan-e-mohabbat meñ har ek gul se tire pairahan kī bū aa.e 
zabāñ darāz sināñ zaḳhm meñ darīda dahan kahīñ na donoñ meñ ranjish kī guftugū aa.e 
dikhā.eñ husn-e-bayāñ shā.irī meñ kyā 'taslīm' zabān aa.e na andāz-e-guftugū aa.e 
shamim-e-yar na jab tak chaman mein chhu aae na rang aae kisi phul mein na bu aae 
maza to jab hai shahadat ka main idhar se baDhun udhar se tegh-e-jafa khinch ke ta gulu aae 
dimagh de jo KHuda gulshan-e-mohabbat mein har ek gul se tere pairahan ki bu aae 
zaban daraaz sinan zaKHm mein darida dahan kahin na donon mein ranjish ki guftugu aae 
dikhaen husn-e-bayan shairi mein kya 'taslim' zaban aae na andaz-e-guftugu aae

gar yahī hai ādat-e-takrār hañste bolte muñh kī ik din khā.eñge aġhyār hañste bolte 
thī tamannā bāġh-e-ālam meñ gul o bulbul kī tarah baiTh kar ham tum kahīñ ai yaar hañste bolte 
merī qismat se zabān-e-tīr bhī goyā nahīñ varna kyā kyā zaḳhm-e-dāman-dār hañste bolte 
dil-lagī meñ hasrat-e-dil kuchh nikal jaatī to hai bose le lete haiñ ham do-chār hañste bolte 
aaj uzr-e-ittiqā 'taslīm' kal tak yaar se aap ko dekhā sar-e-bāzār hañste bolte 
gar yahi hai aadat-e-takrar hanste bolte munh ki ek din khaenge aghyar hanste bolte 
thi tamanna bagh-e-alam mein gul o bulbul ki tarah baiTh kar hum tum kahin ai yar hanste bolte 
meri qismat se zaban-e-tir bhi goya nahin warna kya kya zaKHm-e-daman-dar hanste bolte 
dil-lagi mein hasrat-e-dil kuchh nikal jati to hai bose le lete hain hum do-chaar hanste bolte 
aaj uzr-e-ittiqa 'taslim' kal tak yar se aap ko dekha sar-e-bazar hanste bolte

sunñe vaale fasāna terā hai sirf tarz-e-bayāñ hī merā hai 
yaas kī tīrgī ne gherā hai har taraf haul-nāk añdherā hai 
is meñ koī mirā sharīk nahīñ merā dukh aah sirf merā hai 
chāndnī chāndnī nahīñ 'aḳhtar' raat kī god meñ saverā hai 
sunne wale fasana tera hai sirf tarz-e-bayan hi mera hai 
yas ki tirgi ne ghera hai har taraf haul-nak andhera hai 
is mein koi mera sharik nahin mera dukh aah sirf mera hai 
chandni chandni nahin 'aKHtar' raat ki god mein sawera hai

zikr ham se be-talab kā kyā talabgārī ke din tum hameñ sochoge ik din ḳhud se be-zārī ke din 
munhamik masrūf ek ik kaam nimTāte hue saaf se raushan se ye chalne kī tayyārī ke din 
roz ik bujhtī huī sīlan bhare kamre kī shaam khiḌkiyoñ meñ roz murjhāte ye bīmārī ke din 
nam nashīlī sā.atoñ kī sard zahrīlī sī raat ḳhvāb hote jā rahe hoñ jaise bedārī ke din 
hāfize kī sust-rau lahroñ meñ halchal kyā huī jaag uTThe dhaḌkanoñ kī tez-raftārī ke din 
zehan ke sahrā meñ uThtā ik bagūla sā kabhī gaahe gaahe kār-āmad se ye bekārī ke din 
dam-ba-dam tahlīl sā hotā huā manzar kā bojh sahl se hote hue palkoñ pe dushvārī ke din 
umr ke bāzār kī had par navādir kī dukāñ kuchh parakhte dekhte chunte ḳharīdārī ke din 
rah ga.ī kāġhaz pe khiñch kar lafz se aarī lakīr 'sāz' shāyad bhar ga.e haiñ ab mire qaarī ke din 
zikr hum se be-talab ka kya talabgari ke din tum hamein sochoge ek din KHud se be-zari ke din 
munhamik masruf ek ek kaam nimTate hue saf se raushan se ye chalne ki tayyari ke din 
roz ek bujhti hui silan bhare kamre ki sham khiDkiyon mein roz murjhate ye bimari ke din 
nam nashili saaton ki sard zahrili si raat KHwab hote ja rahe hon jaise bedari ke din 
hafize ki sust-rau lahron mein halchal kya hui jag uTThe dhaDkanon ki tez-raftari ke din 
zehan ke sahra mein uThta ek bagula sa kabhi gahe gahe kar-amad se ye bekari ke din 
dam-ba-dam tahlil sa hota hua manzar ka bojh sahl se hote hue palkon pe dushwari ke din 
umr ke bazar ki had par nawadir ki dukan kuchh parakhte dekhte chunte KHaridari ke din 
rah gai kaghaz pe khinch kar lafz se aari lakir 'saz' shayad bhar gae hain ab mere qari ke din

jo aa.e vo hisāb-e-āb-o-dāna karne vaale the ga.e vo log jo kār-e-zamāna karne vaale the 
uḌāne ke liye kuchh kam nahīñ hai ḳhaak ghar meñ bhī vo mausam hī nahīñ haiñ jo divāna karne vaale the 
mirī gum-gashtagī mere liye chhat ban ga.ī varna ye duniyā vaale mujh ko be-Thikāna karne vaale the 
na dete saare manzar aks hī thoḌe se de dete ham āvāra kahāñ taz.īn-e-ḳhāna karne vaale the 
samundar le gayā ham se vo saarī sīpiyāñ vāpas jinheñ ham jamma kar ke ik ḳhazāna karne vaale the 
'zafar' be-ḳhānamāñ apne ko ḳhud hī kar liyā tum ne ye kār-e-ḳhair to ahl-e-zamāna karne vaale the 
jo aae wo hisab-e-ab-o-dana karne wale the gae wo log jo kar-e-zamana karne wale the 
uDane ke liye kuchh kam nahin hai KHak ghar mein bhi wo mausam hi nahin hain jo diwana karne wale the 
meri gum-gashtagi mere liye chhat ban gai warna ye duniya wale mujh ko be-Thikana karne wale the 
na dete sare manzar aks hi thoDe se de dete hum aawara kahan tazin-e-KHana karne wale the 
samundar le gaya hum se wo sari sipiyan wapas jinhen hum jamma kar ke ek KHazana karne wale the 
'zafar' be-KHanaman apne ko KHud hi kar liya tum ne ye kar-e-KHair to ahl-e-zamana karne wale the

junūñ kā rañg bhī ho shola-e-numū kā bhī ho sukūt-e-shab meñ ik andāz guftugū kā bhī ho 
maiñ jis ko apnī gavāhī meñ le ke aayā huuñ ajab nahīñ ki vahī aadmī adū kā bhī ho 
vo jis ke chāk-e-garebāñ pe tohmateñ haiñ bahut usī ke haath meñ shāyad hunar rafū kā bhī ho 
vo jis ke Dūbte hī naav Dagmagāne lagī kise ḳhabar vahī taarā sitāra-jū kā bhī ho 
subūt-e-mohkamī-e-jāñ thī jis kī burrish-nāz usī kī teġh se rishta rag-e-gulū kā bhī ho 
vafā ke baab meñ kār-e-suḳhan tamām huā mirī zamīn pe ik ma.arka lahū kā bhī ho 
junun ka rang bhi ho shola-e-numu ka bhi ho sukut-e-shab mein ek andaz guftugu ka bhi ho 
main jis ko apni gawahi mein le ke aaya hun ajab nahin ki wahi aadmi adu ka bhi ho 
wo jis ke chaak-e-gareban pe tohmaten hain bahut usi ke hath mein shayad hunar rafu ka bhi ho 
wo jis ke Dubte hi naw Dagmagane lagi kise KHabar wahi tara sitara-ju ka bhi ho 
subut-e-mohkami-e-jaan thi jis ki burrish-naz usi ki tegh se rishta rag-e-gulu ka bhi ho 
wafa ke bab mein kar-e-suKHan tamam hua meri zamin pe ek marka lahu ka bhi ho

galī kā manzar badal rahā thā qadīm sūraj nikal rahā thā 
sitāre hairān ho rahe the charāġh miTTī meñ jal rahā thā 
dikhā.ī dene lagī thī ḳhushbū maiñ phuul āñkhoñ pe mal rahā thā 
ghaḌe meñ tasbīh kartā paanī vazū kī ḳhātir uchhal rahā thā 
shafīq poroñ kā lams pā kar badan sahīfe meñ Dhal rahā thā 
duā.eñ khiḌkī se jhāñktī thiiñ maiñ apne ghar se nikal rahā thā 
za.iif uñglī ko thaam kar maiñ baḌī sahūlat se chal rahā thā 
ajiib hasrat se dekhtā huuñ maiñ jin makānoñ meñ kal rahā thā 
gali ka manzar badal raha tha qadim suraj nikal raha tha 
sitare hairan ho rahe the charagh miTTi mein jal raha tha 
dikhai dene lagi thi KHushbu main phul aankhon pe mal raha tha 
ghaDe mein tasbih karta pani wazu ki KHatir uchhal raha tha 
shafiq poron ka lams pa kar badan sahife mein Dhal raha tha 
duaen khiDki se jhankti thin main apne ghar se nikal raha tha 
zaif ungli ko tham kar main baDi sahulat se chal raha tha 
ajib hasrat se dekhta hun main jin makanon mein kal raha tha

us kī chaah meñ ab ke ye bhī kamāl huā ḳhud se maiñ bāhar aayā to ek misāl huā 
dard kī beḌī shaam se hī baj uThtī hai maiñ to us ke firāq meñ aur niDhāl huā 
vo merī tārīf kā ab mohtāj nahīñ vo chehra to ḳhud hī ek misāl huā 
ḳhud hī charāġh ab apnī lau se nālāñ hai naqsh ye kyā ubhrā ye kaisā zavāl huā 
ab to sannāTā bhī boltā lagtā hai apne aap meñ ye bhī ek kamāl huā 
maiñ apnī tanhā.ī se shāyad aajiz thā is aahaT kā varna kaise ḳhayāl huā 
vo bhī mujh ko bhulā ke bahut ḳhush baiThā hai maiñ bhī us ko chhoḌ ke 'tūr' nihāl huā 
us ki chah mein ab ke ye bhi kamal hua KHud se main bahar aaya to ek misal hua 
dard ki beDi sham se hi baj uThti hai main to us ke firaq mein aur niDhaal hua 
wo meri tarif ka ab mohtaj nahin wo chehra to KHud hi ek misal hua 
KHud hi charagh ab apni lau se nalan hai naqsh ye kya ubhra ye kaisa zawal hua 
ab to sannaTa bhi bolta lagta hai apne aap mein ye bhi ek kamal hua 
main apni tanhai se shayad aajiz tha is aahaT ka warna kaise KHayal hua 
wo bhi mujh ko bhula ke bahut KHush baiTha hai main bhi us ko chhoD ke 'tur' nihaal hua

ḳhushbū ko rañgtoñ pe ubhartā huā bhī dekh naqsh-e-zar-e-bahār chamaktā huā bhī dekh 
rakh ke madār-e-shauq kisī āftāb par tū sañg-e-intizār pighaltā huā bhī dekh 
āñkhoñ ke gird jhāñkte halqe na dekh tū sail-e-ḳhajista-ḳhū ko utartā huā bhī dekh 
be-faiz dasht-e-dard meñ āhistagī ke saath āhū-sarisht logoñ ko chaltā huā bhī dekh 
rañg-e-hinā ko naqsh-e-qadam se judā bhī kar sahrā meñ raḳhsh-e-shauq ko girtā huā bhī bhī dekh 
mahsūs kar chhalakte hue shauq kī jalan yaḳh chāñdnī meñ jism ko jaltā huā bhī dekh 
har chiiz de ke jaatī hai apnī nishāniyāñ har gul meñ rañg-e-sub.h jhalaktā huā bhī dekh 
'nāhīd' chīra-e-dastī-e-yārāñ aziiz rakh mauqe ke saath un ko badaltā huā bhī dekh 
KHushbu ko rangton pe ubharta hua bhi dekh naqsh-e-zar-e-bahaar chamakta hua bhi dekh 
rakh ke madar-e-shauq kisi aaftab par tu sang-e-intizar pighalta hua bhi dekh 
aankhon ke gird jhankte halqe na dekh tu sail-e-KHajista-KHu ko utarta hua bhi dekh 
be-faiz dasht-e-dard mein aahistagi ke sath aahu-sarisht logon ko chalta hua bhi dekh 
rang-e-hina ko naqsh-e-qadam se juda bhi kar sahra mein raKHsh-e-shauq ko girta hua bhi bhi dekh 
mahsus kar chhalakte hue shauq ki jalan yaKH chandni mein jism ko jalta hua bhi dekh 
har chiz de ke jati hai apni nishaniyan har gul mein rang-e-subh jhalakta hua bhi dekh 
'nahid' chira-e-dasti-e-yaran aziz rakh mauqe ke sath un ko badalta hua bhi dekh

to phir maiñ kyā agar anfās ke sab taar gum us meñ mire hone na hone ke sabhī āsār gum us meñ 
mirī āñkhoñ meñ ik mausam hamesha sabz rahtā hai ḳhudā jaane haiñ aise kaun se ashjār gum us meñ 
hazāroñ saal chal kar bhī abhī ḳhud tak nahīñ pahuñchī ye duniyā kaash ho jaa.e kabhī ik baar gum us meñ 
vo jaisā abr bheje jo havā sar par chalā.e vo mire dariyā mire sahrā mire kohsār gum us meñ 
nahīñ mālūm āḳhir kis ne kis ko thaam rakkhā hai vo mujh meñ gum hai aur mere dar o dīvār gum us meñ 
'zafar' us ke the ham to kab talak us se alag rahte hue ham ek din honā thā āḳhir-kār gum us meñ 
to phir main kya agar anfas ke sab tar gum us mein mere hone na hone ke sabhi aasar gum us mein 
meri aankhon mein ek mausam hamesha sabz rahta hai KHuda jaane hain aise kaun se ashjar gum us mein 
hazaron sal chal kar bhi abhi KHud tak nahin pahunchi ye duniya kash ho jae kabhi ek bar gum us mein 
wo jaisa abr bheje jo hawa sar par chalae wo mere dariya mere sahra mere kohsar gum us mein 
nahin malum aaKHir kis ne kis ko tham rakkha hai wo mujh mein gum hai aur mere dar o diwar gum us mein 
'zafar' us ke the hum to kab talak us se alag rahte hue hum ek din hona tha aaKHir-kar gum us mein

ik nazar meñ dard kho denā dil-e-bīmār kā ye to adnā sā karishma hai nigāh-e-yār kā 
ġhair mumkin hai ki ho pāmāl koī hashr meñ ho na jab tak kuchh ishāra aap kī raftār kā 
hazrat-e-ādam se tā iiñ dam hue sab ishq dost hai azal se daur daura husn kī sarkār kā 
ham jo mar kar jī uThe is par ta.ajjub kyā ki hai vo karāmat chaal kī ye mojaza guftār kā 
aap ke ġhamze uThā.ūñ ġhair ke taane sunūñ banda parvar maiñ ne chhoḌā ishq bhī sarkār kā 
ābloñ ko sar uThāne kī zarā mohlat nahīñ hai karam sahrā-navardī meñ ye nok-e-ḳhār kā 
is se baḌh kar aap 'ahsan' chāhte haiñ aur kyā dostoñ kī daad hai goyā sila ash.ār kā 
ek nazar mein dard kho dena dil-e-bimar ka ye to adna sa karishma hai nigah-e-yar ka 
ghair mumkin hai ki ho pamal koi hashr mein ho na jab tak kuchh ishaara aap ki raftar ka 
hazrat-e-adam se ta in dam hue sab ishq dost hai azal se daur daura husn ki sarkar ka 
hum jo mar kar ji uThe is par tajjub kya ki hai wo karamat chaal ki ye mojaza guftar ka 
aap ke ghamze uThaun ghair ke tane sunun banda parwar main ne chhoDa ishq bhi sarkar ka 
aablon ko sar uThane ki zara mohlat nahin hai karam sahra-nawardi mein ye nok-e-KHar ka 
is se baDh kar aap 'ahsan' chahte hain aur kya doston ki dad hai goya sila ashaar ka

piirī se mirā nau digar-hāl huā hai vo qad jo alif sā thā so ab daal huā hai 
maqbūl mire qaul se qavvāl huā hai suufī ko ġhazal sun ke mirī haal huā hai 
un hāthoñ kī daulat se kaḌā maal huā hai un paañv se āvāz-e-ḳhalḳhāl huā hai 
alminnat o lillāh ba-sad-minnat udhar se inkār thā jis shai kā ab iqbāl huā hai 
jab qatl kiyā hai kisī āshiq ko to vaañ se jallād kī talvār ko rūmāl huā hai 
kis uqde ko is zulf kī kholā nahīñ ham ne suljhāyā hai uljhā huā jo baal huā hai 
kis sar ko nahīñ yaar kī raftār kā saudā me.arāj vo samjhā hai jo pāmāl huā hai 
bīmār rahā barsoñ maiñ īsā-nafasoñ meñ pūchhā na kisī ne kabhī kyā haal huā hai 
ai abr-e-karam tū hī safed us ko karegā barsoñ meñ siyah nāma-e-a.amāl huā hai 
jo naaz kare yaar sazā-vār hai 'ātish' ḳhush-rū o ḳhush-uslūb o ḳhush-iqbāl huā hai 
piri se mera nau digar-haal hua hai wo qad jo alif sa tha so ab dal hua hai 
maqbul mere qaul se qawwal hua hai sufi ko ghazal sun ke meri haal hua hai 
un hathon ki daulat se kaDa mal hua hai un panw se aawaz-e-KHalKHal hua hai 
alminnat o lillah ba-sad-minnat udhar se inkar tha jis shai ka ab iqbaal hua hai 
jab qatl kiya hai kisi aashiq ko to wan se jallad ki talwar ko rumal hua hai 
kis uqde ko is zulf ki khola nahin hum ne suljhaya hai uljha hua jo baal hua hai 
kis sar ko nahin yar ki raftar ka sauda mearaj wo samjha hai jo pamal hua hai 
bimar raha barson main isa-nafason mein puchha na kisi ne kabhi kya haal hua hai 
ai abr-e-karam tu hi safed us ko karega barson mein siyah nama-e-amal hua hai 
jo naz kare yar saza-war hai 'atish' KHush-ru o KHush-uslub o KHush-iqbaal hua hai

vo ruuh ke gumbad meñ sadā ban ke milegā ik din vo mujhe merā ḳhudā ban ke milegā 
bhaTkūñgā maiñ is shahr kī galiyoñ meñ akelā vo mujh ko mire dil kā ḳhalā ban ke milegā 
vo daur bhī aa.egā ki har lamha-e-hastī mujh se tire milne kī duā ban ke milegā 
kis zo.am se bichhḌā hai magar dekhnā ye bhī tū ḳhud se ḳhud apnī hī sazā ban ke milegā 
ash.ār meñ dhaḌke.eñge mulāqāt ke lamhe tū sab se mire fan kī baqā ban ke milegā 
wo ruh ke gumbad mein sada ban ke milega ek din wo mujhe mera KHuda ban ke milega 
bhaTkunga main is shahr ki galiyon mein akela wo mujh ko mere dil ka KHala ban ke milega 
wo daur bhi aaega ki har lamha-e-hasti mujh se tere milne ki dua ban ke milega 
kis zoam se bichhDa hai magar dekhna ye bhi tu KHud se KHud apni hi saza ban ke milega 
ashaar mein dhaDkeenge mulaqat ke lamhe tu sab se mere fan ki baqa ban ke milega

ḳhāksārī thī ki bin dekhe hī ham ḳhaak hue aur kabhī mārka-e-fat.h-o-zafar dekh na paa.e 
us ne dekhā hai to phir dekhnā kyā ho jaa.e dekhte rahnā hai zālim ko idhar dekh na paa.e 
be-hunar dekh na sakte the magar dekhne aa.e dekh sakte the magar ahl-e-hunar dekh na paa.e 
ho ga.e ḳhvāhish-e-nazzāra se be-ḳhud itne dekhnā chāhte the us ko magar dekh na paa.e 
kab use lauT ke dekheñge ye dekhā jaa.e ham ne duniyā to bahut dekh lī ghar dekh na paa.e 
log jab dekhne par aa.e to itnā dekhā aañkh pathrā ga.ī aur had-e-nazar dekh na paa.e 
vo bhī kyā dekhnā thā dekhne vaale bole jalva har-chand rahā pesh-e-nazar dekh na paa.e 
diip jalte rahe tāqoñ meñ ujālā na huā aañkh pāband-e-tahayyur thī udhar dekh na paa.e 
ye tayaqqun nahīñ hotā thā kidhar dekh sake ye ta'ayyun nahīñ hotā thā kidhar dekh na paa.e 
vo taġhāful thā ki us ne hameñ dekhā hī nahīñ vo tasāhul thā ki ham us kī nazar dekh na paa.e 
is qadar tez chalī ab ke havā-e-nā-būd chaah kar shahr-e-tamannā kā khañDar dekh na paa.e 
yuuñ huā dil-zadagāñ lauT ga.e āḳhir-e-shab raat to jaag ke kaaTī thī sahar dekh na paa.e 
kis ne dekhī hai ujāloñ se sulagtī huī raat aur jo dekh sake ḳhvāb-e-sahar dekh na paa.e 
KHaksari thi ki bin dekhe hi hum KHak hue aur kabhi marka-e-fath-o-zafar dekh na pae 
us ne dekha hai to phir dekhna kya ho jae dekhte rahna hai zalim ko idhar dekh na pae 
be-hunar dekh na sakte the magar dekhne aae dekh sakte the magar ahl-e-hunar dekh na pae 
ho gae KHwahish-e-nazzara se be-KHud itne dekhna chahte the us ko magar dekh na pae 
kab use lauT ke dekhenge ye dekha jae hum ne duniya to bahut dekh li ghar dekh na pae 
log jab dekhne par aae to itna dekha aankh pathra gai aur had-e-nazar dekh na pae 
wo bhi kya dekhna tha dekhne wale bole jalwa har-chand raha pesh-e-nazar dekh na pae 
dip jalte rahe taqon mein ujala na hua aankh paband-e-tahayyur thi udhar dekh na pae 
ye tayaqqun nahin hota tha kidhar dekh sake ye ta'ayyun nahin hota tha kidhar dekh na pae 
wo taghaful tha ki us ne hamein dekha hi nahin wo tasahul tha ki hum us ki nazar dekh na pae 
is qadar tez chali ab ke hawa-e-na-bud chah kar shahr-e-tamanna ka khanDar dekh na pae 
yun hua dil-zadagan lauT gae aaKHir-e-shab raat to jag ke kaTi thi sahar dekh na pae 
kis ne dekhi hai ujalon se sulagti hui raat aur jo dekh sake KHwab-e-sahar dekh na pae

kashkol hai to lā idhar aa kar lagā sadā maiñ pyaas bāñTtā huuñ zarūrat nahīñ to jā 
maiñ shahr shahr ḳhvāboñ kī gaThrī liye phirā be-dām thā ye maal pe gāhak koī na thā 
patthar pighal ke ret ke mānind narm hai dard itnī der saath rahā raas aa gayā 
sīnoñ meñ iztirāb hai girya havā meñ hai kyā vaqt hai ki shor machā hai duā duā 
himmat hai to buland kar āvāz kā alam chup baiThne se hal nahīñ hone kā mas.ala 
vaañ shab-gazīda sīnoñ ko sūraj atā hue tum bhī vahāñ ga.e the 'ziyā' tum ko kyā milā 
kashkol hai to la idhar aa kar laga sada main pyas banTta hun zarurat nahin to ja 
main shahr shahr KHwabon ki gaThri liye phira be-dam tha ye mal pe gahak koi na tha 
patthar pighal ke ret ke manind narm hai dard itni der sath raha ras aa gaya 
sinon mein iztirab hai girya hawa mein hai kya waqt hai ki shor macha hai dua dua 
himmat hai to buland kar aawaz ka alam chup baiThne se hal nahin hone ka masala 
wan shab-gazida sinon ko suraj ata hue tum bhi wahan gae the 'ziya' tum ko kya mila

sabā banāte haiñ ġhuncha-dahan banāte haiñ tumhāre vāste kyā kyā suḳhan banāte haiñ 
sinān o tiir kī lazzat lahū meñ ram kare hai ham apne aap ko kis kā hiran banāte haiñ 
ye dhaj khilātī hai kyā gul zarā patā to chale ki ḳhāk-e-pā ko tirī pairahan banāte haiñ 
vo gul-izār idhar aa.egā sau dāġhoñ se ham apne siine ko rashk-e-chaman banāte haiñ 
shahīd-e-nāz ġhazab ke hunar-varāñ nikle lahū ke chhīñToñ se apnā kafan banāte haiñ 
tumhārī zaat havāla hai surḳh-rūī kā tumhāre zikr ko sab shart-e-fan banāte haiñ 
saba banate hain ghuncha-dahan banate hain tumhaare waste kya kya suKHan banate hain 
sinan o tir ki lazzat lahu mein ram kare hai hum apne aap ko kis ka hiran banate hain 
ye dhaj khilati hai kya gul zara pata to chale ki KHak-e-pa ko teri pairahan banate hain 
wo gul-izar idhar aaega sau daghon se hum apne sine ko rashk-e-chaman banate hain 
shahid-e-naz ghazab ke hunar-waran nikle lahu ke chhinTon se apna kafan banate hain 
tumhaari zat hawala hai surKH-rui ka tumhaare zikr ko sab shart-e-fan banate hain

piinā nahīñ harām, hai zahr-e-vafā kī shart aao uThā deñ aaj mai-e-jāñ-fazā kī shart 
shorīdgi-e-sar ke liye sañg-e-dar kī qaid zanjīr-e-ġham ke vāste zulf-e-dotā kī shart 
ho dopahar kī dhuup to palkoñ ke sā.ebāñ rāteñ guzārnī hoñ to kaalī balā kī shart 
ye kyā zarūr ho mizha-e-ishq ḳhūñ-fishāñ kyuuñ dast-e-nāz ke liye rañg-e-hinā kī shart 
har dil-figār ke liye kyuuñ chāk-e-pairahan har dil-navāz ke liye band-e-qabā kī shart 
kyā farz hai ki ham bhī baneñ qais-e-āmirī rāh-e-junūñ meñ kyuuñ ho kisī naqsh-e-pā kī shart 
kyuuñ dil ke toḌne ko kaheñ rasm-e-dilbarī kyuuñ ho kisī se vāda-e-sabr-āzmā kī shart 
kyuuñ ho kisī ko kūcha-e-qātil kī justujū kyuuñ imtihāñ ke vāste teġh-e-jafā kī shart 
kyuuñ zindagī ko jabr-e-musalsal kā naam deñ kyuuñ ārzū-e-maut ko dast-e-duā kī shart 
kyuuñ har ghaḌī zabāñ pe ho jurm-o-sazā kā zikr kyuuñ har amal kī fikr meñ ḳhauf-e-ḳhudā kī shart 
ham ne ḳhud apne-āp zamāne kī sair kī ham ne qubūl kī na kisī rahnumā kī shart 
pina nahin haram, hai zahr-e-wafa ki shart aao uTha den aaj mai-e-jaan-faza ki shart 
shoridgi-e-sar ke liye sang-e-dar ki qaid zanjir-e-gham ke waste zulf-e-dota ki shart 
ho dopahar ki dhup to palkon ke saeban raaten guzarni hon to kali bala ki shart 
ye kya zarur ho mizha-e-ishq KHun-fishan kyun dast-e-naz ke liye rang-e-hina ki shart 
har dil-figar ke liye kyun chaak-e-pairahan har dil-nawaz ke liye band-e-qaba ki shart 
kya farz hai ki hum bhi banen qais-e-amiri rah-e-junun mein kyun ho kisi naqsh-e-pa ki shart 
kyun dil ke toDne ko kahen rasm-e-dilbari kyun ho kisi se wada-e-sabr-azma ki shart 
kyun ho kisi ko kucha-e-qatil ki justuju kyun imtihan ke waste tegh-e-jafa ki shart 
kyun zindagi ko jabr-e-musalsal ka nam den kyun aarzu-e-maut ko dast-e-dua ki shart 
kyun har ghaDi zaban pe ho jurm-o-saza ka zikr kyun har amal ki fikr mein KHauf-e-KHuda ki shart 
hum ne KHud apne-ap zamane ki sair ki hum ne qubul ki na kisi rahnuma ki shart

mirī anā mire dushman ko tāziyāna hai isī charāġh se raushan ġharīb-ḳhāna hai 
maiñ ik taraf huuñ kisī kunj-e-kam-numā.ī meñ aur ek samt jahāñ-dāri-e-zamāna hai 
ye tā.eroñ kī qatāreñ kidhar ko jaatī haiñ na koī daam bichhā hai kahīñ na daana hai 
abhī nahīñ hai mujhe maslahat kī dhuup kā ḳhauf abhī to sar pe baġhāvat kā shāmiyāna hai 
mirī ġhazal meñ rajaz kī hai ghan-garaj to kyā suḳhan-varī bhī to kār-e-sipāhiyāna hai 
meri ana mere dushman ko taziyana hai isi charagh se raushan gharib-KHana hai 
main ek taraf hun kisi kunj-e-kam-numai mein aur ek samt jahan-dari-e-zamana hai 
ye taeron ki qataren kidhar ko jati hain na koi dam bichha hai kahin na dana hai 
abhi nahin hai mujhe maslahat ki dhup ka KHauf abhi to sar pe baghawat ka shamiyana hai 
meri ghazal mein rajaz ki hai ghan-garaj to kya suKHan-wari bhi to kar-e-sipahiyana hai

gahre suroñ meñ arz-e-navā-e-hayāt kar siine pe ek dard kī sil rakh ke baat kar 
ye dūriyoñ kā sail-e-ravāñ barg-e-nāma bhej ye fāsloñ ke bañd-e-girāñ koī baat kar 
terā dayār raat mirī bāñsurī kī lai is ḳhvāb-e-dil-nashīñ ko mirī kā.enāt kar 
mere ġhamoñ ko apne ḳhayāloñ meñ baar de in uljhanoñ ko silsila-e-vāqi.āt kar 
aa ek din mire dil-e-vīrāñ meñ baiTh kar is dasht ke sukūt-e-suḳhan-jū se baat kar 
'amjad' nashāt-e-zīst isī kashmakash meñ hai marne kā qasd jiine kā azm ek saat kar 
gahre suron mein arz-e-nawa-e-hayat kar sine pe ek dard ki sil rakh ke baat kar 
ye duriyon ka sail-e-rawan barg-e-nama bhej ye faslon ke band-e-giran koi baat kar 
tera dayar raat meri bansuri ki lai is KHwab-e-dil-nashin ko meri kaenat kar 
mere ghamon ko apne KHayalon mein bar de in uljhanon ko silsila-e-waqiat kar 
aa ek din mere dil-e-viran mein baiTh kar is dasht ke sukut-e-suKHan-ju se baat kar 
'amjad' nashat-e-zist isi kashmakash mein hai marne ka qasd jine ka azm ek sat kar

be-zauq-e-nazar bazm-e-tamāshā na rahegī muñh pher liyā ham ne to duniyā na rahegī 
iizā na rahegī jo gavārā na rahegī chheḌā mujhe duniyā ne to duniyā na rahegī 
dil le ke ye kyā zid hai ki ab jaan bhī kyuuñ ho ye bhī na rahegī bahut achchhā na rahegī 
ye dard-e-mohabbat ġham-e-duniyā to nahīñ hai ab maut bhī jiine kā sahārā na rahegī 
aisā bhī koī din mirī qismat meñ hai 'fānī' jis din mujhe marne kī tamannā na rahegī 
be-zauq-e-nazar bazm-e-tamasha na rahegi munh pher liya hum ne to duniya na rahegi 
iza na rahegi jo gawara na rahegi chheDa mujhe duniya ne to duniya na rahegi 
dil le ke ye kya zid hai ki ab jaan bhi kyun ho ye bhi na rahegi bahut achchha na rahegi 
ye dard-e-mohabbat gham-e-duniya to nahin hai ab maut bhi jine ka sahaara na rahegi 
aisa bhi koi din meri qismat mein hai 'fani' jis din mujhe marne ki tamanna na rahegi

dil sard ho gayā hai tabī.at bujhī huī ab kyā hai vo utar ga.ī naddī chaḌhī huī 
tum jaan de ke lete ho ye bhī na.ī huī lete nahīñ saḳhī to koī chiiz dī huī 
is TuuTe phūTe dil ko na chheḌo pare haTo kyā kar rahe ho aag hai is meñ dabī huī 
lo ham batā.eñ ġhuncha-o-gul meñ hai farq kyā ik baat hai kahī huī ik be-kahī huī 
ḳhūñ-rez jis qadar haiñ vo rahte haiñ sar-nigūñ ḳhanjar huā kaTār huī yā chhurī huī 
'shā.ir' ḳhudā ke vāste tauba kā kyā qusūr hai kis ke muñh se phir ye subūhī lagī huī 
dil sard ho gaya hai tabiat bujhi hui ab kya hai wo utar gai naddi chaDhi hui 
tum jaan de ke lete ho ye bhi nai hui lete nahin saKHi to koi chiz di hui 
is TuTe phuTe dil ko na chheDo pare haTo kya kar rahe ho aag hai is mein dabi hui 
lo hum bataen ghuncha-o-gul mein hai farq kya ek baat hai kahi hui ek be-kahi hui 
KHun-rez jis qadar hain wo rahte hain sar-nigun KHanjar hua kaTar hui ya chhuri hui 
'shair' KHuda ke waste tauba ka kya qusur hai kis ke munh se phir ye subuhi lagi hui

kisī ke ḳhvāb ko ehsās se bāñdhā huā hai bahut puḳhta bahut hī paas se bāñdhā huā hai 
hamāre taḳht ko mashrūt kar rakkhā hai us ne hamāre taaj ko ban-bās se bāñdhā huā hai 
siyāhī umr bhar mere ta.āqub meñ rahegī ki maiñ ne jism ko qirtās se bāñdhā huā hai 
mire isbāt kī chābī ko apne paas rakh kar mire inkār ko ehsās se bāñdhā huā hai 
hamāre ba.ad in ābādiyoñ kī ḳhair kiijo samundar ham ne apnī pyaas se bāñdhā huā hai 
sajā rakkhī hai us ne apnī ḳhātir ek masnad mire āfāq ko anfās se bāñdhā huā hai 
ajab pahre mire afkār par rakkhe haiñ 'ḳhālid' ajab khaTkā mire ehsās se bāñdhā huā hai 
kisi ke KHwab ko ehsas se bandha hua hai bahut puKHta bahut hi pas se bandha hua hai 
hamare taKHt ko mashrut kar rakkha hai us ne hamare taj ko ban-bas se bandha hua hai 
siyahi umr bhar mere taaqub mein rahegi ki main ne jism ko qirtas se bandha hua hai 
mere isbaat ki chabi ko apne pas rakh kar mere inkar ko ehsas se bandha hua hai 
hamare baad in aabaadiyon ki KHair kijo samundar hum ne apni pyas se bandha hua hai 
saja rakkhi hai us ne apni KHatir ek masnad mere aafaq ko anfas se bandha hua hai 
ajab pahre mere afkar par rakkhe hain 'KHalid' ajab khaTka mere ehsas se bandha hua hai

'ravāñ' kis ko ḳhabar unvān-e-āġhāz-e-jahā.an kyā thā zamīñ kā kyā thā naqsha aur rañg-e-āsmāñ kyā thā 
yahī hastī isī hastī ke kuchh TuuTe hue rishte vagarna aisā parda mere un ke darmiyāñ kyā thā 
tirā baḳhshā huā dil aur dil kī ye havas-kārī mirā is meñ qusūr ai dast-gīr-e-āsiyāñ kyā thā 
agar kuchh roz zinda rah ke mar jaanā muqaddar hai to is duniyā meñ āḳhir bā.is-e-taḳhlīq-e-jāñ kyā thā 
ham itne fāsle par aa ga.e haiñ ahd-e-māzī se ḳhabar ye bhī nahīñ ajdād kā nām-o-nishāñ kyā thā 
kisī barq-e-tajallī par zarā sā ġhaur kar lenā agar ye jānñā ho ālam-e-rūh-e-'ravāñ kyā thā 
'rawan' kis ko KHabar unwan-e-aghaz-e-jahaan kya tha zamin ka kya tha naqsha aur rang-e-asman kya tha 
yahi hasti isi hasti ke kuchh TuTe hue rishte wagarna aisa parda mere un ke darmiyan kya tha 
tera baKHsha hua dil aur dil ki ye hawas-kari mera is mein qusur ai dast-gir-e-asiyan kya tha 
agar kuchh roz zinda rah ke mar jaana muqaddar hai to is duniya mein aaKHir bais-e-taKHliq-e-jaan kya tha 
hum itne fasle par aa gae hain ahd-e-mazi se KHabar ye bhi nahin ajdad ka nam-o-nishan kya tha 
kisi barq-e-tajalli par zara sa ghaur kar lena agar ye jaanna ho aalam-e-ruh-e-'rawan kya tha

dil ā.īna hai magar ik nigāh karne ko ye ghar banāyā hai us ne tabāh karne ko 
gul-e-visāl abhī dekhā na thā ki aa pahuñchī shab-e-firāq bhī āñkheñ siyāh karne ko 
galīm o taḳht utāre haiñ ġhaib se us ne mujhe faqīr tujhe bādshāh karne ko 
saje haiñ dasht o bayābāñ ajab qarīne se tujhe savār mujhe gard-e-rāh karne ko 
milī mujhe tirī ham-sā.egī so duniyā meñ tamīz-e-martaba-e-koh-o-kāh karne ko 
damīda har shajar-e-gard-bād naḳhl-e-junūñ hamāre chāk-e-garebāñ se raah karne ko 
Dil-e-gudāḳhta o chashm-e-tar hī kaafī hai futūh-e-mamlikat-e-mehr-o-māh karne ko 
dil aaina hai magar ek nigah karne ko ye ghar banaya hai us ne tabah karne ko 
gul-e-visal abhi dekha na tha ki aa pahunchi shab-e-firaq bhi aankhen siyah karne ko 
galim o taKHt utare hain ghaib se us ne mujhe faqir tujhe baadshah karne ko 
saje hain dasht o bayaban ajab qarine se tujhe sawar mujhe gard-e-rah karne ko 
mili mujhe teri ham-saegi so duniya mein tamiz-e-martaba-e-koh-o-kah karne ko 
damida har shajar-e-gard-baad naKHl-e-junun hamare chaak-e-gareban se rah karne ko 
Dil-e-gudaKHta o chashm-e-tar hi kafi hai futuh-e-mamlikat-e-mehr-o-mah karne ko

niiñd aa.ī na khulā raat kā bistar mujh se guftugū kartā rahā chāñd barābar mujh se 
apnā saaya use ḳhairāt meñ de aayā huuñ dhuup ke Dar se jo lipTā rahā din bhar mujh se 
kaun sī aisī kamī mere ḳhad-o-ḳhāl meñ hai aa.ina ḳhush nahīñ hotā kabhī mil kar mujh se 
kyā musībat hai ki har din kī mashaqqat ke evaz bāñdh jaatā hai koī raat kā patthar mujh se 
dasht kī samt nikal aayā hai merā dariyā bas isī par haiñ ḳhafā saare samundar mujh se 
apne hāthoñ ko jo kashkol banāyā 'gauhar' gir paḌā jaane kahāñ merā muqaddar mujh se 
nind aai na khula raat ka bistar mujh se guftugu karta raha chand barabar mujh se 
apna saya use KHairaat mein de aaya hun dhup ke Dar se jo lipTa raha din bhar mujh se 
kaun si aisi kami mere KHad-o-KHal mein hai aaina KHush nahin hota kabhi mil kar mujh se 
kya musibat hai ki har din ki mashaqqat ke ewaz bandh jata hai koi raat ka patthar mujh se 
dasht ki samt nikal aaya hai mera dariya bas isi par hain KHafa sare samundar mujh se 
apne hathon ko jo kashkol banaya 'gauhar' gir paDa jaane kahan mera muqaddar mujh se

tirī talāsh meñ nikle haiñ tere dīvāne kahāñ sahar ho kahāñ shaam ho ḳhudā jaane 
haram hamīñ se hamīñ se haiñ aaj but-ḳhāne ye aur baat hai duniyā hameñ na pahchāne 
haram kī raah meñ haa.il nahīñ haiñ but-ḳhāne haram se ahl-e-haram ho ga.e haiñ begāne 
ye ġhaur tū ne kiyā bhī ki hashr kyā hogā taḌap uTThe jo qayāmat meñ tere dīvāne 
'azīz' apnā irāda kabhī badal na sakā haram kī raah meñ aa.e hazār but-ḳhāne 
teri talash mein nikle hain tere diwane kahan sahar ho kahan sham ho KHuda jaane 
haram hamin se hamin se hain aaj but-KHane ye aur baat hai duniya hamein na pahchane 
haram ki rah mein hail nahin hain but-KHane haram se ahl-e-haram ho gae hain begane 
ye ghaur tu ne kiya bhi ki hashr kya hoga taDap uTThe jo qayamat mein tere diwane 
'aziz' apna irada kabhi badal na saka haram ki rah mein aae hazar but-KHane

rah jaa.e yā balā se ye jaan rah na jaa.e terā to ai sitam-gar armān rah na jaa.e 
jo dil kī hasrateñ haiñ sab dil meñ hoñ to behtar is ghar se koī bāhar mehmān rah na jaa.e 
iqrār-e-vasl to hai aisā na ho na aa.eñ mushkil hamārī ho kar āsān rah na jaa.e 
ai soz-e-ġham jalā de ai dard ḳhuuñ rulā de kuchh un kī dil-lagī kā sāmān rah na jaa.e 
sab manzileñ huiiñ tai mahshar hai aur ai dil ye ek rah gayā hai maidān rah na jaa.e 
vo jām-e-kufr-parvar bhar de ki mast kar de mastoñ ke dil meñ saaqī īmān rah na jaa.e 
aa kar palaT na ḳhālī ai marg jaan le jā 'fānī' ke sar pe terā ehsān rah na jaa.e 
rah jae ya bala se ye jaan rah na jae tera to ai sitam-gar arman rah na jae 
jo dil ki hasraten hain sab dil mein hon to behtar is ghar se koi bahar mehman rah na jae 
iqrar-e-wasl to hai aisa na ho na aaen mushkil hamari ho kar aasan rah na jae 
ai soz-e-gham jala de ai dard KHun rula de kuchh un ki dil-lagi ka saman rah na jae 
sab manzilen huin tai mahshar hai aur ai dil ye ek rah gaya hai maidan rah na jae 
wo jam-e-kufr-parwar bhar de ki mast kar de maston ke dil mein saqi iman rah na jae 
aa kar palaT na KHali ai marg jaan le ja 'fani' ke sar pe tera ehsan rah na jae

badal ke rakh deñge ye tasavvur ki aadmī kā vaqār kyā hai ḳhalā meñ vo chāñd nāchtā hai zamāñ makāñ kā hisār kyā hai 
bahak ga.e the sambhal ga.e haiñ sitam kī had se nikal ga.e haiñ ham ahl-e-dil ye samajh ga.e haiñ kashākash-e-rozgār kyā hai 
abhī na pūchho ki lāla-zāroñ se uTh rahā hai dhuāñ vo kaisā magar ye dekho ki phuul banñe kā ārzū-mand ḳhaar kyā hai 
vahī bane dushman-e-tamannā jinheñ sikhāyā thā ham ne jiinā agar ye pūchheñ to kis se pūchheñ ki dostī kā shi.ār kyā hai 
kabhī hai shabnam kabhī sharārā falak se TuuTā to ek taarā ġham-e-mohabbat ke rāzdāro ye gauhar-e-ābdār kyā hai 
bahār kī tum na.ī kalī ho abhī abhī jhuum kar khilī ho magar kabhī ham se yūñhī pūchho ki hasratoñ kā mazār kyā hai 
ba-īñ tabāhī dikhā.e ham ne vo mo.ajize āshiqī ke tum ko ba-īñ adāvat kabhī na kahnā ki aap sā ḳhāksār kyā hai 
bane koī ilm o fan kā mālik ki maiñ huuñ rāh-e-vafā kā sālik nahīñ hai shohrat kī fikr 'bāqar' ġhazal kā ik rāzdār kyā hai 
badal ke rakh denge ye tasawwur ki aadmi ka waqar kya hai KHala mein wo chand nachta hai zaman makan ka hisar kya hai 
bahak gae the sambhal gae hain sitam ki had se nikal gae hain hum ahl-e-dil ye samajh gae hain kashakash-e-rozgar kya hai 
abhi na puchho ki lala-zaron se uTh raha hai dhuan wo kaisa magar ye dekho ki phul banne ka aarzu-mand KHar kya hai 
wahi bane dushman-e-tamanna jinhen sikhaya tha hum ne jina agar ye puchhen to kis se puchhen ki dosti ka shiar kya hai 
kabhi hai shabnam kabhi sharara falak se TuTa to ek tara gham-e-mohabbat ke raazdaro ye gauhar-e-abdar kya hai 
bahaar ki tum nai kali ho abhi abhi jhum kar khili ho magar kabhi hum se yunhi puchho ki hasraton ka mazar kya hai 
ba-in tabahi dikhae hum ne wo moajize aashiqi ke tum ko ba-in adawat kabhi na kahna ki aap sa KHaksar kya hai 
bane koi ilm o fan ka malik ki main hun rah-e-wafa ka salik nahin hai shohrat ki fikr 'baqar' ghazal ka ek raazdar kya hai

rahte hue qarīb judā ho ga.e ho tum banda-navāz jaise ḳhudā ho ga.e ho tum 
majbūriyoñ ko dekh ke ahl-e-niyāz kī shāyān-e-e'tibār-e-jafā ho ga.e ho tum 
hotā nahīñ hai koī kisī kā jahāñ rafīq un manziloñ meñ rāh-numā ho ga.e ho tum 
tanhā tumhīñ ho jin kī mohabbat kā aasrā un bekasoñ ke dil kī duā ho ga.e ho tum 
de kar naved-e-naġhma-e-ġham sāz-e-ishq ko TuuTe hue diloñ kī sadā ho ga.e ho tum 
'anvar' gunāhgār o ḳhatā-vār hī sahī sar-tāba-pā atā hī atā ho ga.e ho tum 
rahte hue qarib juda ho gae ho tum banda-nawaz jaise KHuda ho gae ho tum 
majburiyon ko dekh ke ahl-e-niyaz ki shayan-e-e'tibar-e-jafa ho gae ho tum 
hota nahin hai koi kisi ka jahan rafiq un manzilon mein rah-numa ho gae ho tum 
tanha tumhin ho jin ki mohabbat ka aasra un bekason ke dil ki dua ho gae ho tum 
de kar nawed-e-naghma-e-gham saz-e-ishq ko TuTe hue dilon ki sada ho gae ho tum 
'anwar' gunahgar o KHata-war hi sahi sar-taba-pa ata hi ata ho gae ho tum

sulagnā andar andar misra-e-tar sochte rahnā badan par Daal kar zaḳhmoñ kī chādar sochte rahnā 
nahīñ kam jāñ-gusil ye marhala bhī ḳhud-shanāsī kā ki apne hī ma.ānī lafz ban kar sochte rahnā 
zabāñ se kuchh na kahnā bāvajūd-e-tāb-e-goyā.ī khulī āñkhoñ se bas manzar ba manzar sochte rahnā 
kisī lamhe to ḳhud se lā-ta.alluq bhī raho logo masā.il kam nahīñ phir zindagī bhar sochte rahnā 
charāġh-e-zindagī hai yā bisāt-e-ātish-e-rafta jalā kar raushnī dahlīz-e-jāñ par sochte rahnā 
ajab shai hai 'fazā' zehn o nazar kī ye asīrī bhī musalsal dekhte rahnā barābar sochte rahnā 
sulagna andar andar misra-e-tar sochte rahna badan par Dal kar zaKHmon ki chadar sochte rahna 
nahin kam jaan-gusil ye marhala bhi KHud-shanasi ka ki apne hi maani lafz ban kar sochte rahna 
zaban se kuchh na kahna bawajud-e-tab-e-goyai khuli aankhon se bas manzar ba manzar sochte rahna 
kisi lamhe to KHud se la-talluq bhi raho logo masail kam nahin phir zindagi bhar sochte rahna 
charagh-e-zindagi hai ya bisat-e-atish-e-rafta jala kar raushni dahliz-e-jaan par sochte rahna 
ajab shai hai 'faza' zehn o nazar ki ye asiri bhi musalsal dekhte rahna barabar sochte rahna

nihāl-e-vasl nahīñ sañg-bār karne ko bas ek phuul hai kaafī bahār karne ko 
kabhī to apne faqīroñ kī dil-kushā.ī kar ka.ī ḳhazāne haiñ tujh par nisār karne ko 
ye ek lamhe kī duurī bahut hai mere liye tamām umr tirā intizār karne ko 
kashish kare hai vo mahtāb dil ko zoroñ kī chalā ye qatra bhī qulzum nisār karne ko 
to phir ye dil hī na le aa.uuñ ḳhuub chamkā kar tire jamāl kā ā.īna-dār karne ko 
qabā-e-marg ho yā raḳht-e-zindagī ai dost mile haiñ donoñ mujhe taar taar karne ko 
bahut sā kaam diyā hai mujhe un āñkhoñ ne havāla-e-dil-e-nā-kardā-kār karne ko 
nihaal-e-wasl nahin sang-bar karne ko bas ek phul hai kafi bahaar karne ko 
kabhi to apne faqiron ki dil-kushai kar kai KHazane hain tujh par nisar karne ko 
ye ek lamhe ki duri bahut hai mere liye tamam umr tera intizar karne ko 
kashish kare hai wo mahtab dil ko zoron ki chala ye qatra bhi qulzum nisar karne ko 
to phir ye dil hi na le aaun KHub chamka kar tere jamal ka aaina-dar karne ko 
qaba-e-marg ho ya raKHt-e-zindagi ai dost mile hain donon mujhe tar tar karne ko 
bahut sa kaam diya hai mujhe un aankhon ne hawala-e-dil-e-na-karda-kar karne ko

ham falak ke aadmī the sākinān-e-qarya-e-mahtāb the ham tire hāthoñ meñ kaise aa ga.e ham to baḌe nāyāb the 
vaqt ne ham ko agar patthar banā Daalā hai to ham kyā kareñ yaad haiñ vo din bhī ham ko ham bhī jab mehr o vafā kā baab the 
zar luTāte guzre mausam aane vaalī raushnī laatī ruteñ chand yādeñ chand ummīdeñ hamārī ziist ke asbāb the 
ḳhvāb aur tābīr haiñ do intihāoñ par hameñ ye ilm thā ham jiye jaate the phir bhī apne kyā faulād ke āsāb the 
ho sakī haiñ kab ḳhayāloñ kī ham-āhañgī kī zāmin qurbateñ ek hī bistar pe sone vāloñ ke bhī apne apne ḳhvāb the 
jo 'riyāz' aatā thā ham ko yaad vo ik qarya-e-sarsabz thā chand raushan taaq the kuchh nuur meñ Duube hue mehrāb the 
hum falak ke aadmi the sakinan-e-qarya-e-mahtab the hum tere hathon mein kaise aa gae hum to baDe nayab the 
waqt ne hum ko agar patthar bana Dala hai to hum kya karen yaad hain wo din bhi hum ko hum bhi jab mehr o wafa ka bab the 
zar luTate guzre mausam aane wali raushni lati ruten chand yaaden chand ummiden hamari zist ke asbab the 
KHwab aur tabir hain do intihaon par hamein ye ilm tha hum jiye jate the phir bhi apne kya faulad ke aasab the 
ho saki hain kab KHayalon ki ham-ahangi ki zamin qurbaten ek hi bistar pe sone walon ke bhi apne apne KHwab the 
jo 'riyaz' aata tha hum ko yaad wo ek qarya-e-sarsabz tha chand raushan taq the kuchh nur mein Dube hue mehrab the

ye zarā sā kuchh aur ek-dam be-hisāb sā kuchh sar-e-shām siine meñ hāñptā hai sarāb sā kuchh 
vo chamak thī kyā jo pighal ga.ī hai navāh-e-jāñ meñ ki ye aañkh meñ kyā hai shola-e-zer-e-āb sā kuchh 
kabhī mehrbāñ aañkh se parakh is ko kyā hai ye shai hameñ kyuuñ hai siine meñ is sabab iztirāb sā kuchh 
vo fazā na jaane savāl karne ke baa'd kyā thī ki hile to the lab, milā ho shāyad javāb sā kuchh 
mire chaar jānib ye khiñch ga.ī hai qanāt kaisī ye dhuāñ hai ḳhatm-e-safar kā yā TuuTe ḳhvāb sā kuchh 
vo kahe zarā kuchh to dil ko kyā kyā ḳhalal satā.e ki na jaane us kī hai baat meñ kyā ḳharāb sā kuchh 
na ye ḳhaak kā ijtināb hī koī rāsta de na uḌaan bharne de sar pe ye pech-o-tāb sā kuchh 
sar-e-sharh-o-iz.hār jaane kaisī havā chalī hai ki bikhar gayā hai suḳhan suḳhan intiḳhāb sā kuchh 
ye bahār-e-be-sāḳhta chalī aa.ī hai kahāñ se tan-e-zard meñ khil uThā hai piile gulāb sā kuchh 
are kyā batā.eñ havā-e-imkāñ ke khel kyā haiñ ki diloñ meñ bantā hai TūTtā hai habāb sā kuchh 
kabhī ek pal bhī na saañs lī khul ke ham ne 'bānī' rahā 'umr bhar bas-ki jism o jaañ meñ 'azāb sā kuchh 
ye zara sa kuchh aur ek-dam be-hisab sa kuchh sar-e-sham sine mein hanpta hai sarab sa kuchh 
wo chamak thi kya jo pighal gai hai nawah-e-jaan mein ki ye aankh mein kya hai shola-e-zer-e-ab sa kuchh 
kabhi mehrban aankh se parakh is ko kya hai ye shai hamein kyun hai sine mein is sabab iztirab sa kuchh 
wo faza na jaane sawal karne ke ba'd kya thi ki hile to the lab, mila ho shayad jawab sa kuchh 
mere chaar jaanib ye khinch gai hai qanat kaisi ye dhuan hai KHatm-e-safar ka ya TuTe KHwab sa kuchh 
wo kahe zara kuchh to dil ko kya kya KHalal satae ki na jaane us ki hai baat mein kya KHarab sa kuchh 
na ye KHak ka ijtinab hi koi rasta de na uDan bharne de sar pe ye pech-o-tab sa kuchh 
sar-e-sharh-o-izhaar jaane kaisi hawa chali hai ki bikhar gaya hai suKHan suKHan intiKHab sa kuchh 
ye bahaar-e-be-saKHta chali aai hai kahan se tan-e-zard mein khil uTha hai pile gulab sa kuchh 
are kya bataen hawa-e-imkan ke khel kya hain ki dilon mein banta hai TuTta hai habab sa kuchh 
kabhi ek pal bhi na sans li khul ke hum ne 'bani' raha 'umr bhar bas-ki jism o jaan mein 'azab sa kuchh

ḳhamoshī saaz hotī jā rahī hai nazar āvāz hotī jā rahī hai 
nazar terī jo ik dil kī kiran thī zamāna-sāz hotī jā rahī hai 
nahīñ aatā samajh meñ shor-e-hastī bas ik āvāz hotī jā rahī hai 
ḳhamoshī jo kabhī thī parda-e-ġham yahī ġhammāz hotī jā rahī hai 
badī ke sāmne nekī abhī tak sipar-andāz hotī jā rahī hai 
ġhazal 'mullā' tire sehr-e-bayāñ se ajab ejaaz hotī jā rahī hai 
KHamoshi saz hoti ja rahi hai nazar aawaz hoti ja rahi hai 
nazar teri jo ek dil ki kiran thi zamana-saz hoti ja rahi hai 
nahin aata samajh mein shor-e-hasti bas ek aawaz hoti ja rahi hai 
KHamoshi jo kabhi thi parda-e-gham yahi ghammaz hoti ja rahi hai 
badi ke samne neki abhi tak sipar-andaz hoti ja rahi hai 
ghazal 'mulla' tere sehr-e-bayan se ajab ejaz hoti ja rahi hai

muddatoñ se koī paiġhām nahīñ aatā hai jazba-e-dil bhī mire kaam nahīñ aatā hai 
haa.e andāz-e-taġhāful ki dam-e-zikr-e-vafā yaad un ko bhī mirā naam nahīñ aatā hai 
uf vo māsūm o hayā-rez nigāheñ jin par qatl ke baad bhī ilzām nahīñ aatā hai 
kaam kuchh merī tabāhī ke sivā duniyā meñ tujh ko ai gardish-e-ayyām nahīñ aatā hai 
mehrbāñ dīda-e-sāqī ko usī par dekhā jis ko tarz-e-talab-e-jām nahīñ aatā hai 
ab hai ye ālam-e-māyūs-e-mohabbat 'anvar' un ke jalvoñ se bhī ārām nahīñ aatā hai 
muddaton se koi paigham nahin aata hai jazba-e-dil bhi mere kaam nahin aata hai 
hae andaz-e-taghaful ki dam-e-zikr-e-wafa yaad un ko bhi mera nam nahin aata hai 
uf wo masum o haya-rez nigahen jin par qatl ke baad bhi ilzam nahin aata hai 
kaam kuchh meri tabahi ke siwa duniya mein tujh ko ai gardish-e-ayyam nahin aata hai 
mehrban dida-e-saqi ko usi par dekha jis ko tarz-e-talab-e-jam nahin aata hai 
ab hai ye aalam-e-mayus-e-mohabbat 'anwar' un ke jalwon se bhi aaram nahin aata hai

ranjish tirī har dam kī gavārā na kareñge ab aur hī māshūq se yārāna kareñge 
bāñdheñge kisī aur hī joḌe kā tasavvur sar dhyān meñ us zulf ke maarā na kareñge 
imkān se ḳhārij hai ki huuñ tujh se muḳhātib hamnām ko bhī tere pukārā na kareñge 
yak baar kabhī bhūle se aa jaa.eñ to aa jaa.eñ lekin guzar is ghar meñ dobārā na kareñge 
kyā ḳhuub kahā tū ne jo kholūñ abhī āġhosh milne se mire aap kinārā na kareñge 
go ḳhaak meñ mil jaa.eñ ham aur vaz.a badal jaa.eñ par tujh se mulāqāt ḳhud-ārā na kareñge 
us nargis-e-'bīmār' se rakhte haiñ shabāhat hargiz sū-e-ab.har bhī ishārā na kareñge 
ranjish teri har dam ki gawara na karenge ab aur hi mashuq se yarana karenge 
bandhenge kisi aur hi joDe ka tasawwur sar dhyan mein us zulf ke mara na karenge 
imkan se KHarij hai ki hun tujh se muKHatib hamnam ko bhi tere pukara na karenge 
yak bar kabhi bhule se aa jaen to aa jaen lekin guzar is ghar mein dobara na karenge 
kya KHub kaha tu ne jo kholun abhi aaghosh milne se mere aap kinara na karenge 
go KHak mein mil jaen hum aur waza badal jaen par tujh se mulaqat KHud-ara na karenge 
us nargis-e-'bimar' se rakhte hain shabahat hargiz su-e-abhar bhi ishaara na karenge

dil kī kaayā ġham ne vo palTī ki tujh sā ban gayā dard meñ dil Duub kar qatre se dariyā ban gayā 
un ke āġhosh-e-mashiyyat meñ hai nākāmī mirī kaam kuchh is tarah bigḌā hai ki goyā ban gayā 
dil kī rut aisī to yād-e-yār ne badlī na thī ye chaman ujḌā hī is Dhab se ki sahrā ban gayā 
naqsh-e-mauhūm-e-hayāt afsāna-dar-afsāna thā jab ye naqsh ubhrā to ik harf-e-tamannā ban gayā 
lo mubārak lazzat-e-ġham bhī hai ab to nāgavār dil mohabbat meñ jo banñā chāhiye thā ban gayā 
jalva-e-kasrat ḳhud apnā shauq-e-be-andāza thā mahfil-e-lailā mirī nazroñ meñ lailā ban gayā 
merī mahrūmī bhī rusvā hai ki 'fānī' hāl-e-dil un ke kānoñ tak na pahuñchā aur fasānā ban gayā 
dil ki kaya gham ne wo palTi ki tujh sa ban gaya dard mein dil Dub kar qatre se dariya ban gaya 
un ke aaghosh-e-mashiyyat mein hai nakaami meri kaam kuchh is tarah bigDa hai ki goya ban gaya 
dil ki rut aisi to yaad-e-yar ne badli na thi ye chaman ujDa hi is Dhab se ki sahra ban gaya 
naqsh-e-mauhum-e-hayat afsana-dar-afsana tha jab ye naqsh ubhra to ek harf-e-tamanna ban gaya 
lo mubarak lazzat-e-gham bhi hai ab to nagawar dil mohabbat mein jo banna chahiye tha ban gaya 
jalwa-e-kasrat KHud apna shauq-e-be-andaza tha mahfil-e-laila meri nazron mein laila ban gaya 
meri mahrumi bhi ruswa hai ki 'fani' haal-e-dil un ke kanon tak na pahuncha aur fasana ban gaya

zahr kī chuTkī hī mil jaa.e barā.e dard-e-dil kuchh na kuchh to chāhiye baabā davā-e-dard-e-dil 
raat ko ārām se huuñ maiñ na din ko chain se haa.e haa.e vahshat-e-dil haa.e haa.e dard-e-dil 
dard-e-dil ne to hameñ behāl kar ke rakh diyā kaash koī aur ġham hotā bajā.e dard-e-dil 
us ne ham se ḳhairiyat pūchhī to ham chup ho ga.e koī lafzoñ meñ bhalā kaise batā.e dard-e-dil 
do balā.eñ aaj kal apnī sharīk-e-hāl haiñ ik balā-e-dard-e-duniyā ik balā-e-dard-e-dil 
zindagī meñ har tarah ke log milte haiñ 'shu.ūr' āshnā-e-dard-e-dil nā-āshnā-e-dard-e-dil 
zahr ki chuTki hi mil jae barae dard-e-dil kuchh na kuchh to chahiye baba dawa-e-dard-e-dil 
raat ko aaram se hun main na din ko chain se hae hae wahshat-e-dil hae hae dard-e-dil 
dard-e-dil ne to hamein behaal kar ke rakh diya kash koi aur gham hota bajae dard-e-dil 
us ne hum se KHairiyat puchhi to hum chup ho gae koi lafzon mein bhala kaise batae dard-e-dil 
do balaen aaj kal apni sharik-e-haal hain ek bala-e-dard-e-duniya ek bala-e-dard-e-dil 
zindagi mein har tarah ke log milte hain 'shuur' aashna-e-dard-e-dil na-ashna-e-dard-e-dil

dil ke tātār meñ yādoñ ke ab aahū bhī nahīñ ā.īna māñge jo ham se vo parī-rū bhī nahīñ 
dasht-e-tanhā.ī meñ āvāz ke ghuñgrū bhī nahīñ aur aisā bhī ki sannāTe kā jaadū bhī nahīñ 
zindagī jin kī rifāqat pe bahut nāzāñ thī un se bichhḌī to koī aañkh meñ aañsū bhī nahīñ 
chāhte haiñ rah-e-mai-ḳhāna na qadmoñ ko mile lekin is shoḳhi-e-raftār pe qaabū bhī nahīñ 
talḳhiyāñ niim ke pattoñ kī milī haiñ har sū ye mirā shahr kisī phuul kī ḳhushbū bhī nahīñ 
jaane kyā soch ke ham ruk ga.e vīrānoñ meñ partav-e-ruḳh bhī nahīñ sāya-e-gesū bhī nahīñ 
husn-e-imroz ko tashbīhoñ meñ tauleñ kaise ab vo pahle se ḳham-e-kākul-o-abrū bhī nahīñ 
ham ne paa.ī hai un ash.ār pe bhī daad 'zubair' jin meñ us shoḳh kī tārīf ke pahlū bhī nahīñ 
dil ke tatar mein yaadon ke ab aahu bhi nahin aaina mange jo hum se wo pari-ru bhi nahin 
dasht-e-tanhai mein aawaz ke ghungru bhi nahin aur aisa bhi ki sannaTe ka jadu bhi nahin 
zindagi jin ki rifaqat pe bahut nazan thi un se bichhDi to koi aankh mein aansu bhi nahin 
chahte hain rah-e-mai-KHana na qadmon ko mile lekin is shoKHi-e-raftar pe qabu bhi nahin 
talKHiyan nim ke patton ki mili hain har su ye mera shahr kisi phul ki KHushbu bhi nahin 
jaane kya soch ke hum ruk gae viranon mein partaw-e-ruKH bhi nahin saya-e-gesu bhi nahin 
husn-e-imroz ko tashbihon mein taulen kaise ab wo pahle se KHam-e-kakul-o-abru bhi nahin 
hum ne pai hai un ashaar pe bhi dad 'zubair' jin mein us shoKH ki tarif ke pahlu bhi nahin

bande zamīn aur āsmāñ sarmā kī shab kahāniyāñ sachchī haiñ ye rifāqateñ baaqī haiñ sab kahāniyāñ 
ḳheme ukhaḌ ujaḌ ga.e aisī havā-e-shab chalī kirneñ zamīñ pe likh ga.iiñ kaisī ajab kahāniyāñ 
vus.at-e-dasht ke makīñ vaadī meñ kuuch kar ga.e shāḳhoñ pe barf likh ga.ī naġhma-ba-lab kahāniyāñ 
chāñd kī ḳhaak aa ga.ī pairoñ tale hayāt ke aisī kaThin rivāyateñ aisī kaDhab kahāniyāñ 
jauhar-e-haq nahīñ milā mujh ko kisī kitāb meñ miTTī se sun rahā huuñ maiñ ālī-nasab kahāniyāñ 
vus.at-e-koh-o-dasht ho shahr o nagar kā gasht ho merā safar hikāyateñ merā adab kahāniyāñ 
shahroñ ko kyā ḳhabar ki maiñ kaun huuñ kis fazā meñ huuñ likhnī haiñ ek din mujhe sabr-talab kahāniyāñ 
bande zamin aur aasman sarma ki shab kahaniyan sachchi hain ye rifaqaten baqi hain sab kahaniyan 
KHeme ukhaD ujaD gae aisi hawa-e-shab chali kirnen zamin pe likh gain kaisi ajab kahaniyan 
wusat-e-dasht ke makin wadi mein kuch kar gae shaKHon pe barf likh gai naghma-ba-lab kahaniyan 
chand ki KHak aa gai pairon tale hayat ke aisi kaThin riwayaten aisi kaDhab kahaniyan 
jauhar-e-haq nahin mila mujh ko kisi kitab mein miTTi se sun raha hun main aali-nasab kahaniyan 
wusat-e-koh-o-dasht ho shahr o nagar ka gasht ho mera safar hikayaten mera adab kahaniyan 
shahron ko kya KHabar ki main kaun hun kis faza mein hun likhni hain ek din mujhe sabr-talab kahaniyan

zamīñ kī god meñ baiThā humak rahā huuñ maiñ falak pe chāñd kī jānib lapak rahā huuñ maiñ 
nahīñ hai apnī zamīñ kī koī ḳhabar lekin ḳhalā meñ duur kisī shai ko tak rahā huuñ maiñ 
nahā gayā huuñ ḳhud apne lahū meñ sar-tā-pā junūñ kī aag meñ lekin dahak rahā huuñ maiñ 
agarche zulmat-e-shab meñ kamī nahīñ aa.ī misāl-e-māh-e-daraḳhshāñ chamak rahā huuñ maiñ 
har ek samt badaltī rutoñ kā mātam hai shagufta ġhunche kī sūrat chaTak rahā huuñ maiñ 
parakhne vaale mujhe dekh is tarah bhī zarā agar hai khoT to kaise chamak rahā huuñ maiñ 
girī hī jaatī hai dīvār-e-girya har lahza kisī kī aañkh se shāyad Dhalak rahā huuñ maiñ 
tamām shahr ne dīdār kar liyā 'kausar' ab apnī laash ke chehre ko Dhak rahā huuñ maiñ 
zamin ki god mein baiTha humak raha hun main falak pe chand ki jaanib lapak raha hun main 
nahin hai apni zamin ki koi KHabar lekin KHala mein dur kisi shai ko tak raha hun main 
naha gaya hun KHud apne lahu mein sar-ta-pa junun ki aag mein lekin dahak raha hun main 
agarche zulmat-e-shab mein kami nahin aai misal-e-mah-e-daraKHshan chamak raha hun main 
har ek samt badalti ruton ka matam hai shagufta ghunche ki surat chaTak raha hun main 
parakhne wale mujhe dekh is tarah bhi zara agar hai khoT to kaise chamak raha hun main 
giri hi jati hai diwar-e-girya har lahza kisi ki aankh se shayad Dhalak raha hun main 
tamam shahr ne didar kar liya 'kausar' ab apni lash ke chehre ko Dhak raha hun main

sitāre so ga.e to āsmāñ kaisā lagegā jahān-e-tīrgī meñ ye jahāñ kaisā lagegā 
bichhaḌ ke sāhiloñ se mauj-e-dil kaisī lagegī bikhar ke āñdhiyoñ meñ bādbāñ kaisā lagegā 
Thahar jā.eñgī jab ye kashtiyāñ kaisī lageñgī guzar jā.egā jab āb-e-ravāñ kaisā lagegā 
imārat Dhah chukī hogī jo sāñseñ TūTne se to phir vo sāya-e-dīvār-e-jāñ kaisā lagegā 
utar jā.egā rañg-e-āshiqī jab is ke ḳhuuñ se to dil begāna-e-sūd-o-ziyāñ kaisā lagegā 
qafas kaisā lagegā uḌ ga.e jab gaate panchhī na hogā jab koī shor o fuġhāñ kaisā lagegā 
bikhar jā.eñgī zanjīreñ sabhī zindāniyoñ kī zavāl-e-naḳhvat-e-nā-mehrbāñ kaisā lagegā 
bahut rañgīniyāñ hoñgī agarche rah meñ lekin musāfir kho gayā to kārvāñ kaisā lagegā 
jahāñ tum se bahut pahle pahuñch jā.eñge ham log na jaane āḳhirī vo ḳhāk-dāñ kaisā lagegā 
sitare so gae to aasman kaisa lagega jahan-e-tirgi mein ye jahan kaisa lagega 
bichhaD ke sahilon se mauj-e-dil kaisi lagegi bikhar ke aandhiyon mein baadban kaisa lagega 
Thahar jaengi jab ye kashtiyan kaisi lagengi guzar jaega jab aab-e-rawan kaisa lagega 
imarat Dhah chuki hogi jo sansen TuTne se to phir wo saya-e-diwar-e-jaan kaisa lagega 
utar jaega rang-e-ashiqi jab is ke KHun se to dil begana-e-sud-o-ziyan kaisa lagega 
qafas kaisa lagega uD gae jab gate panchhi na hoga jab koi shor o fughan kaisa lagega 
bikhar jaengi zanjiren sabhi zindaniyon ki zawal-e-naKHwat-e-na-mehrban kaisa lagega 
bahut ranginiyan hongi agarche rah mein lekin musafir kho gaya to karwan kaisa lagega 
jahan tum se bahut pahle pahunch jaenge hum log na jaane aaKHiri wo KHak-dan kaisa lagega

nazar us chashm pe hai jaam liye baiThā huuñ hai na piine kā ye matlab ki piye baiThā huuñ 
raḳhna-andāzi-e-andoh se ġhāfil nahīñ maiñ hai jigar chaak to kyā hoñT siye baiThā huuñ 
kyā karūñ dil ko jo lene nahīñ detā hai qarār jo muqaddar ne diyā hai vo liye baiThā huuñ 
iltifāt ai nigah-e-hosh-rubā ab kyuuñ hai paas jo kuchh thā vo pahle se diye baiThā huuñ 
dil-e-pur-kaif salāmat ki akele meñ bhī ek botal se baġhal garm kiye baiThā huuñ 
'ārzū' jalte hue dil ke sharāre haiñ ye ashk aag paanī ke kaToroñ meñ liye baiThā huuñ 
nazar us chashm pe hai jam liye baiTha hun hai na pine ka ye matlab ki piye baiTha hun 
raKHna-andazi-e-andoh se ghafil nahin main hai jigar chaak to kya honT siye baiTha hun 
kya karun dil ko jo lene nahin deta hai qarar jo muqaddar ne diya hai wo liye baiTha hun 
iltifat ai nigah-e-hosh-ruba ab kyun hai pas jo kuchh tha wo pahle se diye baiTha hun 
dil-e-pur-kaif salamat ki akele mein bhi ek botal se baghal garm kiye baiTha hun 
'arzu' jalte hue dil ke sharare hain ye ashk aag pani ke kaToron mein liye baiTha hun

lutf ab ziist kā ai gardish-e-ayyām nahīñ mai nahīñ yaar nahīñ shīsha nahīñ jaam nahīñ 
kab mujhe yaad ruḳh o zulf-e-siyah-fām nahīñ koī shaġhl is ke sivā sub.h se tā shaam nahīñ 
har suḳhan par mujhe detā hai vo bad-ḳhū dushnām kaun sī baat mirī qābil-e-in.ām nahīñ 
nek-nāmī meñ dilā firqa-e-ushshāq haiñ ishq hai vo badnām mohabbat meñ jo badnām nahīñ 
chehra-e-yār ke saude meñ kahā kartā huuñ ruḳh hai ye sub.h nahīñ zulf hai ye shaam nahīñ 
bosa āñkhoñ kā jo māñgā to vo hañs kar bole dekh lo duur se khāne ke ye bādām nahīñ 
halqa-e-zulf-e-butāñ meñ hai bharī nik.hat-e-gul ai dil is laam meñ bū-e-gul-e-islām nahīñ 
ibtidā ishq kī hai dekh 'amānat' hushyār ye vo āġhāz hai jis kā koī anjām nahīñ 
lutf ab zist ka ai gardish-e-ayyam nahin mai nahin yar nahin shisha nahin jam nahin 
kab mujhe yaad ruKH o zulf-e-siyah-fam nahin koi shaghl is ke siwa subh se ta sham nahin 
har suKHan par mujhe deta hai wo bad-KHu dushnam kaun si baat meri qabil-e-inam nahin 
nek-nami mein dila firqa-e-ushshaq hain ishq hai wo badnam mohabbat mein jo badnam nahin 
chehra-e-yar ke saude mein kaha karta hun ruKH hai ye subh nahin zulf hai ye sham nahin 
bosa aankhon ka jo manga to wo hans kar bole dekh lo dur se khane ke ye baadam nahin 
halqa-e-zulf-e-butan mein hai bhari nikhat-e-gul ai dil is lam mein bu-e-gul-e-islam nahin 
ibtida ishq ki hai dekh 'amanat' hushyar ye wo aaghaz hai jis ka koi anjam nahin

rah-rav-e-rāh-e-mohabbat kaun sī manzil meñ hai dil hai be-zār-e-mohabbat aur mohabbat dil meñ hai 
kyā zabāñ par hai kisī kī kyā kisī ke dil meñ hai jis kī mahfil hai vahī jaane vo jis mushkil meñ hai 
kārvān-e-husn-o-ishq ab tak kahīñ Thahrā nahīñ qais abhī sahrā meñ hai lailā abhī mahmil meñ hai 
ishrat-e-rafta kā ronā kyā ġham-e-imroz meñ aish-e-fardā bhī vo maazī hai jo mustaqbil meñ hai 
rañg-e-mahfil meñ nazar aatā hai ik rañg-e-digar terī mahfil ke sivā bhī kuchh tirī mahfil meñ hai 
ham-safar kuchh din rahe lekin ḳhudā jaane ki ab ishq hai kis marhale meñ husn kis manzil meñ hai 
manzil-e-maqsūd 'bismil' vo nazar aane lagī har nazar manzil pe jaise har qadam manzil meñ hai 
rah-raw-e-rah-e-mohabbat kaun si manzil mein hai dil hai be-zar-e-mohabbat aur mohabbat dil mein hai 
kya zaban par hai kisi ki kya kisi ke dil mein hai jis ki mahfil hai wahi jaane wo jis mushkil mein hai 
karwan-e-husn-o-ishq ab tak kahin Thahra nahin qais abhi sahra mein hai laila abhi mahmil mein hai 
ishrat-e-rafta ka rona kya gham-e-imroz mein aish-e-farda bhi wo mazi hai jo mustaqbil mein hai 
rang-e-mahfil mein nazar aata hai ek rang-e-digar teri mahfil ke siwa bhi kuchh teri mahfil mein hai 
ham-safar kuchh din rahe lekin KHuda jaane ki ab ishq hai kis marhale mein husn kis manzil mein hai 
manzil-e-maqsud 'bismil' wo nazar aane lagi har nazar manzil pe jaise har qadam manzil mein hai

hijr-zada ā.ankhoñ se jab aañsū nikle ḳhāmoshī se kisī ne samjhā raat samay do diip jale ḳhāmoshī se 
maiñ bhī aag lagā saktā huuñ is barsāt ke mausam meñ thoḌī duur talak vo mere saath chale ḳhāmoshī se 
shaam kī dhīmī aañch meñ jab ḳhurshīd nahā kar so jaa.e manzar aapas meñ milte haiñ ḳhuub gale ḳhāmoshī se 
barf kī parteñ jab bhī dekhūñ maiñ ūñchī dīvāroñ par jism sulagne lagtā hai aur dil pighle ḳhāmoshī se 
chāhat ke phir phuul khileñge aap kī ye ḳhush-fahmī hai kapḌe mere sāmne mausam ne badle ḳhāmoshī se 
din ke ujāloñ meñ shāyad maiñ ḳhud se bichhḌā rahtā huuñ raat kī tārīkī meñ ik ḳhvāhish machle ḳhāmoshī se 
jab bhī nādīda sapnoñ ne man āñgan meñ raqs kiyā terī yaad ke jugnū chamke raat Dhale ḳhāmoshī se 
mulk-e-suḳhan ke shahzādoñ kī saf meñ khaḌā ho jā.egā gar tire lahje kī dhaḌkan ḳhushbū ugle ḳhāmoshī se 
hijr-zada aaankhon se jab aansu nikle KHamoshi se kisi ne samjha raat samay do dip jale KHamoshi se 
main bhi aag laga sakta hun is barsat ke mausam mein thoDi dur talak wo mere sath chale KHamoshi se 
sham ki dhimi aanch mein jab KHurshid naha kar so jae manzar aapas mein milte hain KHub gale KHamoshi se 
barf ki parten jab bhi dekhun main unchi diwaron par jism sulagne lagta hai aur dil pighle KHamoshi se 
chahat ke phir phul khilenge aap ki ye KHush-fahmi hai kapDe mere samne mausam ne badle KHamoshi se 
din ke ujalon mein shayad main KHud se bichhDa rahta hun raat ki tariki mein ek KHwahish machle KHamoshi se 
jab bhi nadida sapnon ne man aangan mein raqs kiya teri yaad ke jugnu chamke raat Dhale KHamoshi se 
mulk-e-suKHan ke shahzadon ki saf mein khaDa ho jaega gar tere lahje ki dhaDkan KHushbu ugle KHamoshi se

ye jo alfāz ko mahkār banāyā huā hai ek gul kā ye sab asrār banāyā huā hai 
soch ko suujh kahāñ hai ki jo kuchh kah paa.e dil ne kyā kyā pas-e-dīvār banāyā huā hai 
pair jaate haiñ ye dariyā-e-shab-o-roz aksar baaġh ik sair ko us paar banāyā huā hai 
shauq-e-dahlīz pe be-tāb khaḌā hai kab se dard gūñdhe hue haiñ haar banāyā huā hai 
ye to apnoñ hī ke charkoñ kī sulag hai varna dil ne har aag ko gulzār banāyā huā hai 
toḌnā hai jo ta.alluq to tazabzub kaisā shāḳh-e-ehsās pe kyā baar banāyā huā hai 
jaañ khapāte haiñ ġham-e-ishq meñ ḳhush ḳhush 'ālī' kaisī lazzat kā ye āzār banāyā huā hai 
ye jo alfaz ko mahkar banaya hua hai ek gul ka ye sab asrar banaya hua hai 
soch ko sujh kahan hai ki jo kuchh kah pae dil ne kya kya pas-e-diwar banaya hua hai 
pair jate hain ye dariya-e-shab-o-roz aksar bagh ek sair ko us par banaya hua hai 
shauq-e-dahliz pe be-tab khaDa hai kab se dard gundhe hue hain haar banaya hua hai 
ye to apnon hi ke charkon ki sulag hai warna dil ne har aag ko gulzar banaya hua hai 
toDna hai jo talluq to tazabzub kaisa shaKH-e-ehsas pe kya bar banaya hua hai 
jaan khapate hain gham-e-ishq mein KHush KHush 'ali' kaisi lazzat ka ye aazar banaya hua hai

kuchh bhī nahīñ hai ālam-e-zarrāt se aage ik ālam-e-hū ālam-e-asvāt se aage 
milte haiñ smāvāt smavāt se aage har gaam hijābāt hijābāt se aage 
is dahr meñ ham ḳhud bhī haiñ minjumala ḳhurāfāt kis tarah nazar jaa.e ḳhurāfāt se aage 
ai raat ke maaro tumheñ kis tarah bujhā.ūñ ik sub.h bhī ik din bhī hai is raat se aage 
insāñ haiñ magar biich kī manzil meñ khaḌe haiñ haivān se pīchhe haiñ jamādāt se aage 
jo kuchh hai yahāñ vo hai ḳharābāt ke andar kuchh bhī nahīñ ai riñd ḳharābāt se aage 
kyā sochte ho zehn meñ vo aa nahīñ saktā kyā sochte ho hai vo ḳhayālāt se aage 
hone ko vo jaisā bhī ho ham haiñ to vo hogā ḳhāmoshī hī ḳhāmoshī hai is baat se aage 
samjheñge vahī zehn 'jamīl' apne suḳhan ko jaatī hai nazar jin kī tabī.āt se aage 
kuchh bhi nahin hai aalam-e-zarraat se aage ek aalam-e-hu aalam-e-aswat se aage 
milte hain smawat smawat se aage har gam hijabaat hijabaat se aage 
is dahr mein hum KHud bhi hain minjumala KHurafat kis tarah nazar jae KHurafat se aage 
ai raat ke maro tumhein kis tarah bujhaun ek subh bhi ek din bhi hai is raat se aage 
insan hain magar bich ki manzil mein khaDe hain haiwan se pichhe hain jamadat se aage 
jo kuchh hai yahan wo hai KHarabaat ke andar kuchh bhi nahin ai rind KHarabaat se aage 
kya sochte ho zehn mein wo aa nahin sakta kya sochte ho hai wo KHayalat se aage 
hone ko wo jaisa bhi ho hum hain to wo hoga KHamoshi hi KHamoshi hai is baat se aage 
samjhenge wahi zehn 'jamil' apne suKHan ko jati hai nazar jin ki tabiat se aage

hijāb-e-rañg-o-bū hai aur maiñ huuñ ye dhokā thā ki tū hai aur maiñ huuñ 
maqām-e-be-niyāzī aa gayā hai vo jān-e-ārzū hai aur maiñ huuñ 
fareb-e-shauq se aksar ye samjhā ki vo begāna-ḳhū hai aur maiñ huuñ 
kabhī saudā thā terī justujū kā ab apnī justujū hai aur maiñ huuñ 
kabhī dekhā thā ik ḳhvāb-e-mohabbat ab us kī aarzū hai aur maiñ huuñ 
faqat ik tum nahīñ to kuchh nahīñ hai chaman hai aabjū hai aur maiñ huuñ 
phir us ke baad hai is hū kā aalam bas ik had tak hī tū hai aur maiñ huuñ 
hijab-e-rang-o-bu hai aur main hun ye dhoka tha ki tu hai aur main hun 
maqam-e-be-niyazi aa gaya hai wo jaan-e-arzu hai aur main hun 
fareb-e-shauq se aksar ye samjha ki wo begana-KHu hai aur main hun 
kabhi sauda tha teri justuju ka ab apni justuju hai aur main hun 
kabhi dekha tha ek KHwab-e-mohabbat ab us ki aarzu hai aur main hun 
faqat ek tum nahin to kuchh nahin hai chaman hai aabju hai aur main hun 
phir us ke baad hai is hu ka aalam bas ek had tak hi tu hai aur main hun

nikal jaa.e yūñhī furqat meñ dam kyā na hogā aap kā mujh par karam kyā 
hañse bhī ro.e bhī lekin na samjhe ḳhushī kyā chiiz hai duniyā meñ ġham kyā 
mubārak zālimoñ ko zulm ham par jo apnā hī kiyā hai us kā ġham kyā 
miTā jab imtiyāz-e-kufr o īmāñ makān-e-kāba kyā baitus-sanam kyā 
nahīñ jab quvvat-e-ehsās dil meñ ġham-e-duniyā surūr-e-jām-e-jam kyā 
guzar hī jā.eñge ġhurbat ke din bhī kareñ do din ko ab aḳhlāq kam kyā 
mirī bigḌī huī taqdīr bhī hai tumhāre turra-e-gesū kā ḳham kyā 
mirī taqdīr meñ likkhā hai tū ne batā ai mālik-e-lauh o qalam kyā 
bhulā degī hameñ do din meñ duniyā hamārī shā.irī kyā aur ham kyā 
har ik mushkil ko hal kartī hai jab maut karūñ aage kisī ke sar ko ḳham kyā 
'ravāñ' ke dard kā aalam na pūchho koī yuuñ hogā mast-e-jām-e-jam kyā 
nikal jae yunhi furqat mein dam kya na hoga aap ka mujh par karam kya 
hanse bhi roe bhi lekin na samjhe KHushi kya chiz hai duniya mein gham kya 
mubarak zalimon ko zulm hum par jo apna hi kiya hai us ka gham kya 
miTa jab imtiyaz-e-kufr o iman makan-e-kaba kya baitus-sanam kya 
nahin jab quwwat-e-ehsas dil mein gham-e-duniya surur-e-jam-e-jam kya 
guzar hi jaenge ghurbat ke din bhi karen do din ko ab aKHlaq kam kya 
meri bigDi hui taqdir bhi hai tumhaare turra-e-gesu ka KHam kya 
meri taqdir mein likkha hai tu ne bata ai malik-e-lauh o qalam kya 
bhula degi hamein do din mein duniya hamari shairi kya aur hum kya 
har ek mushkil ko hal karti hai jab maut karun aage kisi ke sar ko KHam kya 
'rawan' ke dard ka aalam na puchho koi yun hoga mast-e-jam-e-jam kya

samundar aañkh se ojhal zarā nahīñ hotā nadī ko Dar kisī chaTTān kā nahīñ hotā 
vo jab bhī rotā hai maiñ saath saath rotā huuñ maze kī baat hai us ko patā nahīñ hotā 
musāfiroñ ke liye manzileñ hī hotī haiñ musāfiroñ ke liye rāsta nahīñ hotā 
tamāshā-gāh meñ kis kā tamāshā hotā hai tamāsh-bīnoñ ko us kā patā nahīñ hotā 
maiñ roz phone par us ko sadā.eñ detā huuñ ḳhudā ke saath mirā rābta nahīñ hotā 
jahāñ mileñ unheñ sajda guzāriye sāhab mohabbatoñ ke liye sochnā nahīñ hotā 
vahāñ charāġh jalātā huuñ zindagī kā 'ashk' jahāñ havā ke liye rāsta nahīñ hotā 
samundar aankh se ojhal zara nahin hota nadi ko Dar kisi chaTTan ka nahin hota 
wo jab bhi rota hai main sath sath rota hun maze ki baat hai us ko pata nahin hota 
musafiron ke liye manzilen hi hoti hain musafiron ke liye rasta nahin hota 
tamasha-gah mein kis ka tamasha hota hai tamash-binon ko us ka pata nahin hota 
main roz phone par us ko sadaen deta hun KHuda ke sath mera rabta nahin hota 
jahan milen unhen sajda guzariye sahab mohabbaton ke liye sochna nahin hota 
wahan charagh jalata hun zindagi ka 'ashk' jahan hawa ke liye rasta nahin hota

mirī nigāh kahāñ dīd-e-husn-e-yār kahāñ ho e'tibār to phir tāb-e-intizār kahāñ 
diloñ meñ farq huā jab to chaah pyaar kahāñ chaman chaman hī nahīñ aa.egī bahār kahāñ 
jise ye kah ke vo hañs deñ ki qissa achchhā hai vo raaz khul ke bhī hotā hai āshkār kahāñ 
umañg thī ye javānī kī yā koī āñdhī milā ke ḳhaak meñ ham ko ga.ī bahār kahāñ 
umīd-vār banāne se mudda.ā kyā thā jab aas tum ne dilā dī to ab qarār kahāñ 
milī hai is liye do-chār din kī āzādī ki sarf kartā hai dekheñ ye iḳhtiyār kahāñ 
ye shauq le ke chalā hai chaman se shakl-e-nasīm ki dekheñ miltī hai jaatī huī bahār kahāñ 
hai ek shart vafā kī vo qaid-e-be-zanjīr sab iḳhtiyār haiñ aur kuchh bhī iḳhtiyār kahāñ 
miTe nishāñ pe nazar kar ke ro jise chāhe tire sitam kī hai turbat mirā mazār kahāñ 
tum aisā ahd-shikan 'ārzū' sā nā-ummīd kaho jo sach bhī to aatā hai e'tibār kahāñ 
meri nigah kahan did-e-husn-e-yar kahan ho e'tibar to phir tab-e-intizar kahan 
dilon mein farq hua jab to chah pyar kahan chaman chaman hi nahin aaegi bahaar kahan 
jise ye kah ke wo hans den ki qissa achchha hai wo raaz khul ke bhi hota hai aashkar kahan 
umang thi ye jawani ki ya koi aandhi mila ke KHak mein hum ko gai bahaar kahan 
umid-war banane se muddaa kya tha jab aas tum ne dila di to ab qarar kahan 
mili hai is liye do-chaar din ki aazadi ki sarf karta hai dekhen ye iKHtiyar kahan 
ye shauq le ke chala hai chaman se shakl-e-nasim ki dekhen milti hai jati hui bahaar kahan 
hai ek shart wafa ki wo qaid-e-be-zanjir sab iKHtiyar hain aur kuchh bhi iKHtiyar kahan 
miTe nishan pe nazar kar ke ro jise chahe tere sitam ki hai turbat mera mazar kahan 
tum aisa ahd-shikan 'arzu' sa na-ummid kaho jo sach bhi to aata hai e'tibar kahan

chārasāz-e-zaḳhm-e-dil vaqt-e-rafū rone lagā jī bhar aayā dīda-e-sozan lahū rone lagā 
bas ki thī rone kī aadat vasl meñ bhī yaar se kah ke apnā aap hāl-e-ārzū rone lagā 
ḳhanda-e-zaḳhm-e-jigar ne dil dukhāyā aur bhī jis ghaḌī TuuTā koī tār-e-rafū rone lagā 
sadma-e-be-rahmi-e-sāqī na uTThā bazm meñ jī bhar aayā dekh kar ḳhālī subū rone lagā 
thā adam meñ khīñch laayā āb-o-dāna jab yahāñ dekh kar bechārgī se chaar sū rone lagā 
aa gayā kaabe meñ jab mehrāb-e-abrū kā ḳhayāl baiTh kar 'taslīm'-e-ḳhasta qibla-rū rone lagā 
chaarasaz-e-zaKHm-e-dil waqt-e-rafu rone laga ji bhar aaya dida-e-sozan lahu rone laga 
bas ki thi rone ki aadat wasl mein bhi yar se kah ke apna aap haal-e-arzu rone laga 
KHanda-e-zaKHm-e-jigar ne dil dukhaya aur bhi jis ghaDi TuTa koi tar-e-rafu rone laga 
sadma-e-be-rahmi-e-saqi na uTTha bazm mein ji bhar aaya dekh kar KHali subu rone laga 
tha adam mein khinch laya aab-o-dana jab yahan dekh kar bechaargi se chaar su rone laga 
aa gaya kabe mein jab mehrab-e-abru ka KHayal baiTh kar 'taslim'-e-KHasta qibla-ru rone laga

har lamha sairābī kī arzānī hai miTTī ke kuuze meñ ThanDā paanī hai 
chupke chupke rotā hai tanhā.ī meñ vo jo shahr ke har mele kā baanī hai 
nadī kināre shahr panāheñ bāloñ kī sāvan kī bauchhāreñ haiñ tuġhyānī hai 
bāhar dhuup samundar surḳh bagūle bhī andar har ḳhuliye meñ rut barfānī hai 
us ne har zarre ko tilism-ābād kiyā haath hamāre lagī faqat hairānī hai 
mere dasht ko shāyad us ne dekh liyā dhuup shabnamī har-sū manzar dhānī hai 
jaane kyā barsā thā raat charāġhoñ se bhor samay sūraj bhī paanī paanī hai 
us ne har lamha ḳhud ko yuuñ raam kiyā har paikar meñ us kī rām-kahānī hai 
kachchā ghar aatā hai yaad bahut 'amabar' kahne ko shahroñ meñ har āsānī hai 
har lamha sairabi ki arzani hai miTTi ke kuze mein ThanDa pani hai 
chupke chupke rota hai tanhai mein wo jo shahr ke har mele ka bani hai 
nadi kinare shahr panahen baalon ki sawan ki bauchhaaren hain tughyani hai 
bahar dhup samundar surKH bagule bhi andar har KHuliye mein rut barfani hai 
us ne har zarre ko tilism-abaad kiya hath hamare lagi faqat hairani hai 
mere dasht ko shayad us ne dekh liya dhup shabnami har-su manzar dhani hai 
jaane kya barsa tha raat charaghon se bhor samay suraj bhi pani pani hai 
us ne har lamha KHud ko yun ram kiya har paikar mein us ki ram-kahani hai 
kachcha ghar aata hai yaad bahut 'amabar' kahne ko shahron mein har aasani hai

bhūlā huuñ maiñ aalam ko sarshār ise kahte haiñ mastī meñ nahīñ ġhāfil hushyār ise kahte haiñ 
gesū ise kahte haiñ ruḳhsār ise kahte haiñ sumbul ise kahte haiñ gulzār ise kahte haiñ 
ik rishta-e-ulfat meñ gardan hai hazāroñ kī tasbīh ise kahte haiñ zunnār ise kahte haiñ 
mahshar kā kiyā va.ada yaañ shakl na dikhlā.ī iqrār ise kahte haiñ inkār ise kahte haiñ 
Takrātā huuñ sar apnā kyā kyā dar-e-jānāñ se jumbish bhī nahīñ kartī dīvār ise kahte haiñ 
dil ne shab-e-furqat meñ kyā saath diyā merā mūnis ise kahte haiñ ġham-ḳhvār ise kahte haiñ 
ḳhāmosh 'amānat' hai kuchh uf bhī nahīñ kartā kyā kyā nahīñ ai pyāre aġhyār ise kahte haiñ 
bhula hun main aalam ko sarshaar ise kahte hain masti mein nahin ghafil hushyar ise kahte hain 
gesu ise kahte hain ruKHsar ise kahte hain sumbul ise kahte hain gulzar ise kahte hain 
ek rishta-e-ulfat mein gardan hai hazaron ki tasbih ise kahte hain zunnar ise kahte hain 
mahshar ka kiya wada yan shakl na dikhlai iqrar ise kahte hain inkar ise kahte hain 
Takraata hun sar apna kya kya dar-e-jaanan se jumbish bhi nahin karti diwar ise kahte hain 
dil ne shab-e-furqat mein kya sath diya mera munis ise kahte hain gham-KHwar ise kahte hain 
KHamosh 'amanat' hai kuchh uf bhi nahin karta kya kya nahin ai pyare aghyar ise kahte hain

hashr tak yaañ dil shakebā chāhiye kab mileñ dilbar se dekhā chāhiye 
hai tajallī bhī naqāb-e-rū-e-yār us ko kin āñkhoñ se dekhā chāhiye 
ġhair-mumkin hai na ho tāsīr-e-ġham hāl-e-dil phir us ko likkhā chāhiye 
hai dil-afgāroñ kī dildārī zarūr gar nahīñ ulfat madārā chāhiye 
hai kuchh ik baaqī ḳhalish ummīd kī ye bhī miT jaa.e to phir kyā chāhiye 
dostoñ kī bhī na ho parvā jise be-niyāzī us kī dekhā chāhiye 
bhā ga.e haiñ aap ke andāz o naaz kījiye iġhmāz jitnā chāhiye 
shaiḳh hai in kī nigah jaadū bharī sohbat-e-rindāñ se bachnā chāhiye 
lag ga.ī chup 'hālī'-e-ranjūr ko haal is kā kis se pūchhā chāhiye 
hashr tak yan dil shakeba chahiye kab milen dilbar se dekha chahiye 
hai tajalli bhi naqab-e-ru-e-yar us ko kin aankhon se dekha chahiye 
ghair-mumkin hai na ho tasir-e-gham haal-e-dil phir us ko likkha chahiye 
hai dil-afgaron ki dildari zarur gar nahin ulfat madara chahiye 
hai kuchh ek baqi KHalish ummid ki ye bhi miT jae to phir kya chahiye 
doston ki bhi na ho parwa jise be-niyazi us ki dekha chahiye 
bha gae hain aap ke andaz o naz kijiye ighmaz jitna chahiye 
shaiKH hai in ki nigah jadu bhari sohbat-e-rindan se bachna chahiye 
lag gai chup 'haali'-e-ranjur ko haal is ka kis se puchha chahiye

na saath aa mire maiñ girte fāsloñ meñ huuñ ġhubār-e-dasht huuñ aur tez āñdhiyoñ meñ huuñ 
na jaane qasd kahāñ kā hai kyuuñ nikāle qadam zamāna biit gayā kaisī hijratoñ meñ huuñ 
ḳhud apne shaam o sahar meñ ulajh gayā aisā maiñ āsmāñ huuñ magar apnī gardishoñ meñ huuñ 
bahut kushāda falak hai baḌī basīt zamīñ magar ye sab maiñ sameTe hue paroñ meñ huuñ 
uThā.e phirte haiñ sar merā ek neze par buland huuñ maiñ yahāñ bhī jo dushmanoñ meñ huuñ 
koī bhī hādsa-e-jāñ ho us kā manzar meñ uThā ke dekh lo aḳhbār surḳhiyoñ meñ huuñ 
koī sadā koī halchal nahīñ hai bāhar kī maiñ apnī guuñj meñ huuñ apnī āhaToñ meñ huuñ 
koī bhī aks nahīñ jis meñ merā chehra ho maiñ ā.īna huuñ magar kitnī hairatoñ meñ huuñ 
nasha hai niiñd kā āñkhoñ meñ TūTtā hai badan ki jaise maiñ bhī lagātār ratjagoñ meñ huuñ 
ki jaise mujh ko Duboyā gayā hai paanī meñ ki jaise maiñ koī shātir shanāvaroñ meñ huuñ 
ki jaise mujh ko chaḌhāyā gayā hai suulī par ki jaise maiñ bhī baḌe ūñche sar-phiroñ meñ huuñ 
ki jaise mujh pe hai chhāyā shikār kā aaseb ki jaise maiñ bhī ḳhatarnāk jañgaloñ meñ huuñ 
ki jaise log mujhe dekhne ko aa.e haiñ ki jaise maiñ luTe-hāre musāfiroñ meñ huuñ 
rahūñ maiñ ḳhud ko sameTe hue sambhāle hue ye 'ramz' merī sazā hai ki dostoñ meñ huuñ 
na sath aa mere main girte faslon mein hun ghubar-e-dasht hun aur tez aandhiyon mein hun 
na jaane qasd kahan ka hai kyun nikale qadam zamana bit gaya kaisi hijraton mein hun 
KHud apne sham o sahar mein ulajh gaya aisa main aasman hun magar apni gardishon mein hun 
bahut kushada falak hai baDi basit zamin magar ye sab main sameTe hue paron mein hun 
uThae phirte hain sar mera ek neze par buland hun main yahan bhi jo dushmanon mein hun 
koi bhi hadsa-e-jaan ho us ka manzar mein uTha ke dekh lo aKHbar surKHiyon mein hun 
koi sada koi halchal nahin hai bahar ki main apni gunj mein hun apni aahaTon mein hun 
koi bhi aks nahin jis mein mera chehra ho main aaina hun magar kitni hairaton mein hun 
nasha hai nind ka aankhon mein TuTta hai badan ki jaise main bhi lagatar ratjagon mein hun 
ki jaise mujh ko Duboya gaya hai pani mein ki jaise main koi shatir shanawaron mein hun 
ki jaise mujh ko chaDhaya gaya hai suli par ki jaise main bhi baDe unche sar-phiron mein hun 
ki jaise mujh pe hai chhaya shikar ka aaseb ki jaise main bhi KHatarnak jangalon mein hun 
ki jaise log mujhe dekhne ko aae hain ki jaise main luTe-haare musafiron mein hun 
rahun main KHud ko sameTe hue sambhaale hue ye 'ramz' meri saza hai ki doston mein hun

ajab kashākash-e-bīm-o-rajā hai tanhā.ī tire baġhair tirā sāmnā hai tanhā.ī 
na.e dinoñ kī salībeñ ga.e dinoñ ke mazār azaab ḳhud se mulāqāt kā hai tanhā.ī 
fazā meñ haiñ kisī tūfān-e-tund ke āsār safar tavīl hai aur rāstā hai tanhā.ī 
bahut udaas hai dil dostoñ kī mahfil meñ har ek aañkh meñ chehra-numā hai tanhā.ī 
shagufta phūloñ kā gul-dasta sohbat-e-yārāñ bikharte pattoñ kā ik Dher sā hai tanhā.ī 
maiñ āftāb ko kaise dikhā.ūñ tārīkī tujhe maiñ kaise batā.ūñ ki kyā hai tanhā.ī 
ajab sukūn thā shab āñsuoñ kī bārish meñ vo ġham-gusār vo dard-āshnā hai tanhā.ī 
vo ḳhvāb kyā thā ki jis kī hayāt hai ta.abīr vo jurm kyā thā ki jis kī sazā hai tanhā.ī 
nahīñ mile the to tanhā.ī kis qadar thī 'ziyā' vo mil ke bichhḌe to us se sivā hai tanhā.ī 
ajab kashakash-e-bim-o-raja hai tanhai tere baghair tera samna hai tanhai 
nae dinon ki saliben gae dinon ke mazar azab KHud se mulaqat ka hai tanhai 
faza mein hain kisi tufan-e-tund ke aasar safar tawil hai aur rasta hai tanhai 
bahut udas hai dil doston ki mahfil mein har ek aankh mein chehra-numa hai tanhai 
shagufta phulon ka gul-dasta sohbat-e-yaran bikharte patton ka ek Dher sa hai tanhai 
main aaftab ko kaise dikhaun tariki tujhe main kaise bataun ki kya hai tanhai 
ajab sukun tha shab aansuon ki barish mein wo gham-gusar wo dard-ashna hai tanhai 
wo KHwab kya tha ki jis ki hayat hai tabir wo jurm kya tha ki jis ki saza hai tanhai 
nahin mile the to tanhai kis qadar thi 'ziya' wo mil ke bichhDe to us se siwa hai tanhai

us kī jām-e-jam āñkheñ shīsha-e-badan merā us kī band muTThī meñ saarā bāñkpan merā 
maiñ ne apne chehre par sab hunar sajā.e the faash kar gayā mujh ko saada pairahan merā 
dil bhī kho gayā shāyad shahr ke sarāboñ meñ ab mirī tarah se hai dard be-vatan merā 
ek dasht-e-ḳhāmoshī ab mirā muqaddar hai yaad be-sadā terī zaḳhm be-chaman merā 
aao aaj ham donoñ apnā apnā ghar chun leñ tum navāh-e-dil le lo ḳhitta-e-badan merā 
roz apne ḳhvāboñ kā ḳhuun kartā rahtā huuñ haa.e kin ġhanīmoñ se aa paḌā hai ran merā 
gaañv kī havāoñ ne phir sandesa bhejā hai muntazir tumhārā hai ḳhushbuoñ kā ban merā 
us ki jam-e-jam aankhen shisha-e-badan mera us ki band muTThi mein sara bankpan mera

lutf ho hashr meñ kuchh baat banā.e na bane aañkh bhī shoḳh sitam-gar se churā.e na bane 
mujh ko uThvā to diyā us ne bharī mahfil se kaun thā ye koī pūchhe to batā.e na bane 
baat saarī ye hai vo zid pe aḌe baiThe haiñ yaad kī bhuul ho to laakh jatā.e na bane 
tum se ab kyā kaheñ vo chiiz hai dāġh-e-ġham-e-ishq ki chhupā.e na chhupe aur dikhā.e na bane 
sīdhī bātoñ pe hai matlūb sanad aur subūt haiñ vo kaj-bahas zabāñ un se milā.e na bane 
fat.h kā raaz hai sābit-qadmī aur himmat kaam bhī hai koī aisā ki banā.e na bane 
baat vo kah ga.e aa.e bhī to kis tarah yaqīñ aur sehr is meñ kuchh aisā hai bhulā.e na bane 
be-kasī kī hai musībat meñ shikāyat be-sūd kab paḌā vaqt ki apne bhī parā.e na bane 
ġham jo pyāre se mile kyuuñ na ho vo bhī pyārā bhūlnā bhī use chāheñ to bhulā.e na bane 
hai nazar meñ vo samāñ naqsh hai jis kā dil par dard vo naam hai lab tak jise laa.e na bane 
be-ḳhudī kā hai jahāñ be-asar naaz o niyāz sarkashī bhī na chale sar bhī jhukā.e na bane 
āh-e-sard aur bhī bhaḌkātī hai shola dil meñ ye diyā vo hai jo phūñkoñ se bujhā.e na bane 
sard āzād hai dil rashk o numā.ish hai abas ḳhaar khaa.e na bane gul bhī khilā.e na bane 
ain yak-rañgī hai nairañg-e-tamāshā har chand ye vo uryānī kā parda hai uThā.e na bane 
be-ḳhudī meñ bhī to 'kaifī' kī ye ḳhuddārī hai hāl-e-dil pūchh bhī leñ vo to sunā.e na bane 
lutf ho hashr mein kuchh baat banae na bane aankh bhi shoKH sitam-gar se churae na bane 
mujh ko uThwa to diya us ne bhari mahfil se kaun tha ye koi puchhe to batae na bane 
baat sari ye hai wo zid pe aDe baiThe hain yaad ki bhul ho to lakh jatae na bane 
tum se ab kya kahen wo chiz hai dagh-e-gham-e-ishq ki chhupae na chhupe aur dikhae na bane 
sidhi baaton pe hai matlub sanad aur subut hain wo kaj-bahas zaban un se milae na bane 
fath ka raaz hai sabit-qadmi aur himmat kaam bhi hai koi aisa ki banae na bane 
baat wo kah gae aae bhi to kis tarah yaqin aur sehr is mein kuchh aisa hai bhulae na bane 
be-kasi ki hai musibat mein shikayat be-sud kab paDa waqt ki apne bhi parae na bane 
gham jo pyare se mile kyun na ho wo bhi pyara bhulna bhi use chahen to bhulae na bane 
hai nazar mein wo saman naqsh hai jis ka dil par dard wo nam hai lab tak jise lae na bane 
be-KHudi ka hai jahan be-asar naz o niyaz sarkashi bhi na chale sar bhi jhukae na bane 
aah-e-sard aur bhi bhaDkati hai shola dil mein ye diya wo hai jo phunkon se bujhae na bane 
sard aazad hai dil rashk o numaish hai abas KHar khae na bane gul bhi khilae na bane 
ain yak-rangi hai nairang-e-tamasha har chand ye wo uryani ka parda hai uThae na bane
