hañgāma-e-ḳhudī se tū be-niyāz ho jā gum ho ke be-ḳhudī meñ āgāh-e-rāz ho jā 
had bhī to chāhiye kuchh be-e'tinā.iyoñ kī ġhārat-gar-e-tahammul taskīñ-navāz ho jā 
ai sarmadī tarāne har shai meñ soz bhar de ye kis ne kah diyā hai pāband-e-sāz ho jā 
ġhairat kī chilmanoñ se āvāz aa rahī hai mahv-e-niyāz-mandī aa be-niyāz ho jā 
aa mil ke phir banā.eñ mai-ḳhāna-e-mohabbat maiñ jur.a-kash banūñ tū paimāna-sāz ho jā 
siine meñ soz ban kar kab tak chhupā rahegā unvān-e-rāzdārī tafsīl-e-rāz ho jā 
ab so chukī ummīdeñ ab thak chukīñ nigāheñ jān-e-niyāz-mandī masrūf-e-nāz ho jā 
soz-e-nazar se chhalkeñ naġhmāt-e-rāz-e-hastī ai uqda-e-taġhāful rūdād-e-nāz ho jā 
'ehsān' kaash uTTheñ ye rañg-o-bū ke parde ai mahfil-e-haqīqat bazm-e-majāz ho jā 
hangama-e-KHudi se tu be-niyaz ho ja gum ho ke be-KHudi mein aagah-e-raaz ho ja 
had bhi to chahiye kuchh be-e'tinaiyon ki ghaarat-gar-e-tahammul taskin-nawaz ho ja 
ai sarmadi tarane har shai mein soz bhar de ye kis ne kah diya hai paband-e-saz ho ja 
ghairat ki chilmanon se aawaz aa rahi hai mahw-e-niyaz-mandi aa be-niyaz ho ja 
aa mil ke phir banaen mai-KHana-e-mohabbat main jura-kash banun tu paimana-saz ho ja 
sine mein soz ban kar kab tak chhupa rahega unwan-e-raazdari tafsil-e-raaz ho ja 
ab so chuki ummiden ab thak chukin nigahen jaan-e-niyaz-mandi masruf-e-naz ho ja 
soz-e-nazar se chhalken naghmat-e-raaz-e-hasti ai uqda-e-taghaful rudad-e-naz ho ja 
'ehsan' kash uTThen ye rang-o-bu ke parde ai mahfil-e-haqiqat bazm-e-majaz ho ja

hamesha dil havas-e-intiqām par rakkhā ḳhud apnā naam bhī dushman ke naam par rakkhā 
vo bādshāh-e-firāq-o-visāl hai us ne jo baar sab pa girāñ thā ġhulām par rakkhā 
kiye haiñ sab ko atā us ne ohda o mansab mujhe bhī sīna-ḳharāshī ke kaam par rakkhā 
koī savār uThā hai pas-e-ġhubār-e-fanaā qazā ne haath kulāh o niyām par rakkhā 
kisī ne be-sar-o-pā.ī ke bāvajūd mujhe zamīn-e-sajda o arz-e-qayām par rakkhā 
hamesha dil hawas-e-intiqam par rakkha KHud apna nam bhi dushman ke nam par rakkha 
wo baadshah-e-firaq-o-visal hai us ne jo bar sab pa giran tha ghulam par rakkha 
kiye hain sab ko ata us ne ohda o mansab mujhe bhi sina-KHarashi ke kaam par rakkha 
koi sawar uTha hai pas-e-ghubar-e-fanaa qaza ne hath kulah o niyam par rakkha 
kisi ne be-sar-o-pai ke bawajud mujhe zamin-e-sajda o arz-e-qayam par rakkha

pastī-e-har-bulandi-e-duniyā muntahā-e-nigāh se pūchho 
'arsh par kyuuñ dimāġh 'arsh' uḌā muft kī vaah vaah se pūchho 
dard ka haal aah se puchho dil ki baaten nigah se puchho 
azmat-e-rahmat-e-KHudawandi aarzu-e-gunah se puchho 
un ki paiham nawazishon ka asar mere haal-e-tabah se puchho 
dil-e-KHuddar ki zabun-haali hosh izz o jah se puchho 
pasti-e-har-bulandi-e-duniya muntaha-e-nigah se puchho

havā-e-hirs-o-havas se mafar bhī karnā hai isī daraḳht ke saa.e meñ ghar bhī karnā hai 
anā hī dost anā hī harīf hai merī isī se jañg isī ko sipar bhī karnā hai 
chal aa tujhe kisī mahfūz ghar meñ pahuñchā duuñ phir is ke baad mujhe to safar bhī karnā hai 
yahī nahīñ ki pahuñchnā hai āsmānoñ par duā-e-vasl tujhe ab asar bhī karnā hai 
hameñ to sham.a ke donoñ sire jalāne haiñ ġhazal bhī kahnī hai shab ko basar bhī karnā hai 
hawa-e-hirs-o-hawas se mafar bhi karna hai isi daraKHt ke sae mein ghar bhi karna hai 
ana hi dost ana hi harif hai meri isi se jang isi ko sipar bhi karna hai 
chal aa tujhe kisi mahfuz ghar mein pahuncha dun phir is ke baad mujhe to safar bhi karna hai 
yahi nahin ki pahunchna hai aasmanon par dua-e-wasl tujhe ab asar bhi karna hai 
hamein to shama ke donon sire jalane hain ghazal bhi kahni hai shab ko basar bhi karna hai

chalte chalte rāhoñ se kaT jaanā paḌtā hai hote hote manzar se haT jaanā paḌtā hai 
dekhnā paḌ jaatā hai ḳhud ko kar ke ek tamāshā.ī apnī dhuul uḌā kar ḳhud aT jaanā paḌtā hai 
ḳhattātī se duur bhaTakne vaale soch ke dāman ko kore kāġhaz ke hāthoñ phaT jaanā paḌtā hai 
sāzīna jab qadam baḌhātā hai us kī pāzeboñ kā kānoñ ko jhankār kī aahaT jaanā paḌtā hai 
ḳhvāhish mar jaa.e to us kī chitā ko aag dikhāne meñ dhaḌkan dhaḌkan dil ke marghaT jaanā paḌtā hai 
taab nahīñ ho jis meñ kāñch ko reza reza karne kī us patthar ko TukḌoñ meñ baT jaanā paḌtā hai 
ḳhud ke mutlāshī ko ek na ik din āḳhir-kār apne bhūle-bisre hue kī chaukhaT jaanā paḌtā hai 
sachchā.ī vo jang hai jis meñ ba.az auqāt sipāhī ko aap muqābil apne hī DaT jaanā paḌtā hai 
ik chingārī aag lagā jaatī hai ban meñ aur kabhī ek kiran se zulmat ko chhaT jaanā paḌtā hai 
baat riyā-kārī ke bin ban paatī nahīñ hai 'ḳhāvar' is dozaḳh meñ karvaT karvaT jaanā paḌtā hai 
chalte chalte rahon se kaT jaana paDta hai hote hote manzar se haT jaana paDta hai 
dekhna paD jata hai KHud ko kar ke ek tamashai apni dhul uDa kar KHud aT jaana paDta hai 
KHattati se dur bhaTakne wale soch ke daman ko kore kaghaz ke hathon phaT jaana paDta hai 
sazina jab qadam baDhata hai us ki pazebon ka kanon ko jhankar ki aahaT jaana paDta hai 
KHwahish mar jae to us ki chita ko aag dikhane mein dhaDkan dhaDkan dil ke marghaT jaana paDta hai 
tab nahin ho jis mein kanch ko reza reza karne ki us patthar ko TukDon mein baT jaana paDta hai 
KHud ke mutlashi ko ek na ek din aaKHir-kar apne bhule-bisre hue ki chaukhaT jaana paDta hai 
sachchai wo jang hai jis mein baz auqat sipahi ko aap muqabil apne hi DaT jaana paDta hai 
ek chingari aag laga jati hai ban mein aur kabhi ek kiran se zulmat ko chhaT jaana paDta hai 
baat riya-kari ke bin ban pati nahin hai 'KHawar' is dozaKH mein karwaT karwaT jaana paDta hai

ik āfat-e-jāñ hai jo mudāvā mire dil kā achchhā koī phir kyuuñ ho masīhā mire dil kā 
kyuuñ bhiiḌ lagā.ī hai mujhe dekh ke betāb kyā koī tamāshā hai taḌapnā mire dil kā 
bāzār-e-mohabbat meñ kamī kartī hai taqdīr ban ban ke bigaḌ jaatā hai saudā mire dil kā 
gar vo na hue faisala-e-hashr pe raazī kyā hogā phir anjām ḳhudāyā mire dil kā 
kyā kohkan o qais ko dete dam-e-taqsīm hissa thā ġham-e-hausla-farsā mire dil kā 
go maiñ na rahūñ mahfil-e-jānāñ meñ magar roz 'taslīm' yuuñ hī zikr rahegā mire dil kā 
ek aafat-e-jaan hai jo mudawa mere dil ka achchha koi phir kyun ho masiha mere dil ka 
kyun bhiD lagai hai mujhe dekh ke betab kya koi tamasha hai taDapna mere dil ka 
bazar-e-mohabbat mein kami karti hai taqdir ban ban ke bigaD jata hai sauda mere dil ka 
gar wo na hue faisala-e-hashr pe raazi kya hoga phir anjam KHudaya mere dil ka 
kya kohkan o qais ko dete dam-e-taqsim hissa tha gham-e-hausla-farsa mere dil ka 
go main na rahun mahfil-e-jaanan mein magar roz 'taslim' yun hi zikr rahega mere dil ka

gul-e-vīrāna huuñ koī nahīñ hai qadr-dāñ merā tū hī dekh ai mire ḳhallāq husn-e-rā.egāñ merā 
ye kah kar ruuh niklī hai tan-e-āshiq se furqat meñ mujhe ujlat hai baḌh jaa.e na aage kārvāñ merā 
havā us ko uḌā le jaa.e ab yā phūñk de bijlī hifāzat kar nahīñ saktā mirī jab āshiyāñ merā 
zamīñ par baar huuñ aur āsmān se duur ai mālik nahīñ mālūm kuchh āḳhir Thikānā hai kahāñ merā 
mujhe naġhme kā lutf aatā hai rātoñ kī ḳhamoshī meñ dil-e-bashikasta hai ik sāz-e-āhañg fuġhāñ merā 
vahīñ se ibtidā-e-kūcha-e-dildār kī had hai qadam ḳhud chalte chalte aa ke ruk jaa.e jahāñ merā 
zarā duur aur hai ai kashti-e-umr-e-ravāñ sāhil ki is bahr-e-jahāñ meñ har nafas hai bādbāñ merā 
huī jaatī hai tanhā.ī meñ lazzat ruuh kī zaa.e.a luTā jaatā hai vīrāne meñ ganj-e-shā.egāñ merā 
anāsir hañste haiñ duniyā kī vus.at muskurātī hai kisī se pūchhte haiñ ahl-e-bīnash jab nishāñ merā 
mire ba.ad aur phir koī nazar mujh sā nahīñ aatā bahut din tak rakkheñge sog ahl-e-ḳhāndāñ merā 
ġhanīmat hai nafas do chaar jo baaqī haiñ ab varna kabhī kā luT chukā sarmāya-e-sod-o-ziyāñ merā 
abhī tak fasl-e-gul meñ ik sadā-e-dard aatī hai vahāñ kī ḳhaak se pahle jahāñ thā āshiyāñ merā 
'ravāñ' sach hai mohabbat kā asar zaa.e.a nahīñ hotā vo ro dete haiñ ab bhī zikr aatā hai jahāñ merā 
gul-e-virana hun koi nahin hai qadr-dan mera tu hi dekh ai mere KHallaq husn-e-raegan mera 
ye kah kar ruh nikli hai tan-e-ashiq se furqat mein mujhe ujlat hai baDh jae na aage karwan mera 
hawa us ko uDa le jae ab ya phunk de bijli hifazat kar nahin sakta meri jab aashiyan mera 
zamin par bar hun aur aasman se dur ai malik nahin malum kuchh aaKHir Thikana hai kahan mera 
mujhe naghme ka lutf aata hai raaton ki KHamoshi mein dil-e-bashikasta hai ek saz-e-ahang fughan mera 
wahin se ibtida-e-kucha-e-dildar ki had hai qadam KHud chalte chalte aa ke ruk jae jahan mera 
zara dur aur hai ai kashti-e-umr-e-rawan sahil ki is bahr-e-jahan mein har nafas hai baadban mera 
hui jati hai tanhai mein lazzat ruh ki zaea luTa jata hai virane mein ganj-e-shaegan mera 
anasir hanste hain duniya ki wusat muskuraati hai kisi se puchhte hain ahl-e-binash jab nishan mera 
mere baad aur phir koi nazar mujh sa nahin aata bahut din tak rakkhenge sog ahl-e-KHandan mera 
ghanimat hai nafas do chaar jo baqi hain ab warna kabhi ka luT chuka sarmaya-e-sod-o-ziyan mera 
abhi tak fasl-e-gul mein ek sada-e-dard aati hai wahan ki KHak se pahle jahan tha aashiyan mera 
'rawan' sach hai mohabbat ka asar zaea nahin hota wo ro dete hain ab bhi zikr aata hai jahan mera

barā.e naam sahī din ke haath piile haiñ kahīñ kahīñ pe abhī raushnī ke Tiile haiñ 
tamām raat mire ġham kā zahr chūsā hai isī liye tirī yādoñ ke hoñT niile haiñ 
hamāre zabt kī dīvār āhanī na sahī tumhāre tanz ke neze kahāñ nukīle haiñ 
unheñ bhī aaj kī tahzīb chaaT jā.egī kahīñ kahīñ pe jo simTe hue qabīle haiñ 
har ek shaḳhs hai paiġhambarāna soch meñ ġharq husūl-e-zīst ke shāyad yahī vasīle haiñ 
hamārī sāda-mizājī pe rashk karte haiñ vo sāda-posh jo be-intihā rañgīle haiñ 
badan kā loch laboñ kī miThās qurb kā lams tasavvurāt ke sab zā.iqe rasīle haiñ 
ḳhulūs-e-dil se samā'at kā imtihān to lo ġham-e-hayāt ke naġhme baḌe surīle haiñ 
barae nam sahi din ke hath pile hain kahin kahin pe abhi raushni ke Tile hain 
tamam raat mere gham ka zahr chusa hai isi liye teri yaadon ke honT nile hain 
hamare zabt ki diwar aahani na sahi tumhaare tanz ke neze kahan nukile hain 
unhen bhi aaj ki tahzib chaT jaegi kahin kahin pe jo simTe hue qabile hain 
har ek shaKHs hai paighambarana soch mein gharq husul-e-zist ke shayad yahi wasile hain 
hamari sada-mizaji pe rashk karte hain wo sada-posh jo be-intiha rangile hain 
badan ka loch labon ki miThas qurb ka lams tasawwuraat ke sab zaiqe rasile hain 
KHulus-e-dil se sama'at ka imtihan to lo gham-e-hayat ke naghme baDe surile hain

jab vāhime āvāz kī buniyād se nikle ghabrā.e hue ham suḳhan-ābād se nikle 
samtoñ kā ta.ayyun to sitāroñ se huā hai lekin ye sitāre mirī fariyād se nikle 
maiñ baiTh gayā ḳhaak pe tasvīr banāne jo kibr the mujh meñ vo tirī yaad se nikle 
ḳhud ko maiñ bhalā zer-e-zamīñ kaise dabātā jitne bhī khañDar nikle vo ābād se nikle 
dil pahuñchā achānak hī tayaqqun kī fazā tak sab vahm-o-gumāñ ishq kī asnād se nikle 
maiñ dars use ab koī detā bhī to kaise pahle se use saare sabaq yaad se nikle 
jab wahime aawaz ki buniyaad se nikle ghabrae hue hum suKHan-abaad se nikle 
samton ka tayyun to sitaron se hua hai lekin ye sitare meri fariyaad se nikle 
main baiTh gaya KHak pe taswir banane jo kibr the mujh mein wo teri yaad se nikle 
KHud ko main bhala zer-e-zamin kaise dabaata jitne bhi khanDar nikle wo aabaad se nikle 
dil pahuncha achanak hi tayaqqun ki faza tak sab wahm-o-guman ishq ki asnad se nikle 
main dars use ab koi deta bhi to kaise pahle se use sare sabaq yaad se nikle

maqām-e-shauq se aage bhī ik rasta nikaltā hai kaheñ kyā silsila dil kā kahāñ par jā nikaltā hai 
mizha tak aatā jaatā hai badan kā sab lahū khiñch kar kabhī kyā is tarah bhī yaad kā kāñTā nikaltā hai 
dukān-e-dil baḌhāte haiñ hisāb-e-besh-o-kam kar lo hamāre naam par jis jis kā bhī jitnā nikaltā hai 
abhī hai husn meñ husn-e-nazar kī kār-farmā.ī abhī se kyā batā.eñ ham ki vo kaisā nikaltā hai 
miyān-e-shahr haiñ yā ā.inoñ ke rū-ba-rū haiñ ham jise bhī dekhte haiñ kuchh hamīñ jaisā nikaltā hai 
ye dil kyuuñ Duub jaatā hai usī se pūchh lūñgā maiñ sitāra shām-e-hijrāñ kā idhar bhī aa nikaltā hai 
dil-e-muztar vafā ke baab meñ ye jald-bāzī kyā zarā ruk jaa.eñ aur dekheñ natīja kyā nikaltā hai 
maqam-e-shauq se aage bhi ek rasta nikalta hai kahen kya silsila dil ka kahan par ja nikalta hai 
mizha tak aata jata hai badan ka sab lahu khinch kar kabhi kya is tarah bhi yaad ka kanTa nikalta hai 
dukan-e-dil baDhate hain hisab-e-besh-o-kam kar lo hamare nam par jis jis ka bhi jitna nikalta hai 
abhi hai husn mein husn-e-nazar ki kar-farmai abhi se kya bataen hum ki wo kaisa nikalta hai 
miyan-e-shahr hain ya aainon ke ru-ba-ru hain hum jise bhi dekhte hain kuchh hamin jaisa nikalta hai 
ye dil kyun Dub jata hai usi se puchh lunga main sitara sham-e-hijran ka idhar bhi aa nikalta hai 
dil-e-muztar wafa ke bab mein ye jald-bazi kya zara ruk jaen aur dekhen natija kya nikalta hai

aañch aa.egī na andar kī zabāñ tak ai dil kitnī der aur mirī jaan kahāñ tak ai dil 
had ziyāda se ziyāda kī koī to hogī aur is hirs kā phailāv kahāñ tak ai dil 
tajraba tajraba āzād rag-o-pai meñ rahā kitnī afsurdagī hai dahr se jaañ tak ai dil 
mahak uḌ jā.egī tafhīm ke lab khulne se sahar iblāġh kā hai zabt-e-bayāñ tak ai dil 
aks o ā.īne kī sūrat hai hamārā rishta huuñ tire saath tū merā hai jahāñ tak ai dil 
hairat-āsār ajab ḳhvāb liye baiThā huuñ shāyad aa jaa.e koī merī dukāñ tak ai dil 
shor se ahl-e-ḳhabar ke hai 'riyāz' āzurda koī le jaa.e use be-ḳhabrāñ tak ai dil 
aanch aaegi na andar ki zaban tak ai dil kitni der aur meri jaan kahan tak ai dil 
had ziyaada se ziyaada ki koi to hogi aur is hirs ka phailaw kahan tak ai dil 
tajraba tajraba aazad rag-o-pai mein raha kitni afsurdagi hai dahr se jaan tak ai dil 
mahak uD jaegi tafhim ke lab khulne se sahar iblagh ka hai zabt-e-bayan tak ai dil 
aks o aaine ki surat hai hamara rishta hun tere sath tu mera hai jahan tak ai dil 
hairat-asar ajab KHwab liye baiTha hun shayad aa jae koi meri dukan tak ai dil 
shor se ahl-e-KHabar ke hai 'riyaz' aazurda koi le jae use be-KHabran tak ai dil

aam ho faiz-e-bahārāñ to mazā aa jaa.e chaak hoñ sab ke garebāñ to mazā aa jaa.e 
vā.izo maiñ bhī tumhārī hī tarah masjid meñ bech duuñ daulat-e-īmāñ to mazā aa jaa.e 
kaisī kaisī hai shab-e-tār yahāñ chīñ-ba-jabīñ sub.h ik roz ho ḳhandāñ to mazā aa jaa.e 
sāqiyā hai tirī mahfil meñ ḳhudāoñ kā hujūm mahfil-afroz ho insāñ to mazā aa jaa.e 
aam ho faiz-e-bahaaran to maza aa jae chaak hon sab ke gareban to maza aa jae 
waizo main bhi tumhaari hi tarah masjid mein bech dun daulat-e-iman to maza aa jae 
kaisi kaisi hai shab-e-tar yahan chin-ba-jabin subh ek roz ho KHandan to maza aa jae 
saqiya hai teri mahfil mein KHudaon ka hujum mahfil-afroz ho insan to maza aa jae

shab-e-siyāh pe vā raushnī kā baab to ho magar ye shart hai koī sitāra-yāb to ho 
maiñ harf ban ke tirī ruuh meñ utar jā.ūñ mirā suḳhan tirī mahfil meñ bāryāb to ho 
savād-e-shab ke safar meñ sitāra-vār chalūñ tire jamāl kī lau merī ham-rikāb to ho 
kisī tarah to ghaTe dil kī be-qarārī bhī chalo vo chashm nahīñ kam se kam sharāb to ho 
asās-e-jism uThā.ūñ na.e sire se magar ye sochtā huuñ ki miTTī mirī ḳharāb to ho 
vo 'āftāb' lab-e-bām bhī utar aa.e magar kisī meñ use dekhne kī taab to ho 
shab-e-siyah pe wa raushni ka bab to ho magar ye shart hai koi sitara-yab to ho 
main harf ban ke teri ruh mein utar jaun mera suKHan teri mahfil mein baryab to ho 
sawad-e-shab ke safar mein sitara-war chalun tere jamal ki lau meri ham-rikab to ho 
kisi tarah to ghaTe dil ki be-qarari bhi chalo wo chashm nahin kam se kam sharab to ho 
asas-e-jism uThaun nae sire se magar ye sochta hun ki miTTi meri KHarab to ho 
wo 'aftab' lab-e-baam bhi utar aae magar kisi mein use dekhne ki tab to ho

kab se ulajh rahe haiñ dam-e-vāpsīñ se ham do ashk poñchhne ko tirī āstīñ se ham 
hogā tumhārā naam hī unvān-e-har-varaq aurāq-e-zindagī ko ulaT deñ kahīñ se ham 
sañg-e-dar-e-adū pe hamārī jabīñ nahīñ ye sajde kar rahe haiñ tumhārī jabīñ se ham 
dohrā.ī jā sakegī na ab dāstān-e-ishq kuchh vo kahīñ se bhuul ga.e haiñ kahīñ se ham 
'bismil' harīm-e-husn meñ haiñ kām-yāb-e-shauq josh-e-shabāb o rañg-e-ruḳh-e-ātishīñ se ham 
kab se ulajh rahe hain dam-e-wapsin se hum do ashk ponchhne ko teri aastin se hum 
hoga tumhaara nam hi unwan-e-har-waraq auraq-e-zindagi ko ulaT den kahin se hum 
sang-e-dar-e-adu pe hamari jabin nahin ye sajde kar rahe hain tumhaari jabin se hum 
dohrai ja sakegi na ab dastan-e-ishq kuchh wo kahin se bhul gae hain kahin se hum 
'bismil' harim-e-husn mein hain kaam-yab-e-shauq josh-e-shabab o rang-e-ruKH-e-atishin se hum

lab-e-rañgīñ se agar tū guhar-afshāñ hotā lucknow lāloñ ke mādan se badaḳhshāñ hotā 
ai parī tū vo parī hai ki tirī dekh ke shakl har farishta kī tamannā hai ki insāñ hotā 
rah gayā parda mirā varna tire jaate hī na ye dāman nazar aatā na garebāñ hotā 
aa nikaltā kabhī zāhid jo tirī mahfil meñ haath meñ shīsha-e-mai taaq pe qur.āñ hotā 
ḳhair guzrī jo khule bāloñ ko us ne bāñdhā varna majmūa anāsir kā pareshāñ hotā 
mar gayā zulf kī maiñ pech uThā kar ai 'barq' kyuuñ na afsāna mirā ḳhvāb-e-pareshāñ hotā 
lab-e-rangin se agar tu guhar-afshan hota lucknow lalon ke madan se badaKHshan hota 
ai pari tu wo pari hai ki teri dekh ke shakl har farishta ki tamanna hai ki insan hota 
rah gaya parda mera warna tere jate hi na ye daman nazar aata na gareban hota 
aa nikalta kabhi zahid jo teri mahfil mein hath mein shisha-e-mai taq pe quran hota 
KHair guzri jo khule baalon ko us ne bandha warna majmua anasir ka pareshan hota 
mar gaya zulf ki main pech uTha kar ai 'barq' kyun na afsana mera KHwab-e-pareshan hota

rah-ravī hai na rahnumā.ī hai aaj daur-e-shikasta-pā.ī hai 
aql le aa.ī zindagī ko kahāñ ishq-e-nādāñ tirī duhā.ī hai 
hai ufuq dar ufuq rah-e-hastī har rasā.ī meñ nā-rasā.ī hai 
shikve kartā hai kyā dil-e-nākām āshiqī kis ko raas aa.ī hai 
ho ga.ī gum kahāñ sahar apnī raat jā kar bhī raat aa.ī hai 
jis meñ ehsās ho asīrī kā vo rihā.ī koī rihā.ī hai 
kārvāñ hai ḳhud apnī gard meñ gum paañv kī ḳhaak sar pe aa.ī hai 
ban ga.ī hai vo iltijā aañsū jo nazar meñ samā na paa.ī hai 
barq nāhaq chaman meñ hai badnām aag phūloñ ne ḳhud lagā.ī hai 
vo bhī chup haiñ ḳhamosh huuñ maiñ bhī ek nāzuk sī baat aa.ī hai 
aur karte hī kyā mohabbat meñ jo paḌī dil pe vo uThā.ī hai 
na.e saafī meñ ho na ālā.ish yahī 'mullā' kī pārsā.ī hai 
rah-rawi hai na rahnumai hai aaj daur-e-shikasta-pai hai 
aql le aai zindagi ko kahan ishq-e-nadan teri duhai hai 
hai ufuq dar ufuq rah-e-hasti har rasai mein na-rasai hai 
shikwe karta hai kya dil-e-nakaam aashiqi kis ko ras aai hai 
ho gai gum kahan sahar apni raat ja kar bhi raat aai hai 
jis mein ehsas ho asiri ka wo rihai koi rihai hai 
karwan hai KHud apni gard mein gum panw ki KHak sar pe aai hai 
ban gai hai wo iltija aansu jo nazar mein sama na pai hai 
barq nahaq chaman mein hai badnam aag phulon ne KHud lagai hai 
wo bhi chup hain KHamosh hun main bhi ek nazuk si baat aai hai 
aur karte hi kya mohabbat mein jo paDi dil pe wo uThai hai 
nae safi mein ho na aalaish yahi 'mulla' ki parsai hai

mire ḳheme ḳhasta-hāl meñ haiñ mire raste dhund ke jaal meñ haiñ mujhe shaam huī hai jañgal meñ mire saare sitāre zavāl meñ haiñ 
mujhe rañgoñ se koī shaġhl nahīñ mujhe ḳhushbū meñ koī daḳhl nahīñ mire naam kā koī naḳhl nahīñ mire mausam ḳhāk-e-malāl meñ haiñ 
ākāsh hai qadmoñ ke nīche dariyā kā paanī sar par hai ik machhlī naav pe baiThī hai aur sab machhuvāre jaal meñ haiñ 
ye duniyā akbar zulmoñ kī ham majbūrī kī anārkalī ham dīvāroñ ke biich meñ haiñ ham narġha-e-jabr-o-jalāl meñ haiñ 
mire dil ke nuur se baḌh ke nahīñ mirī jaañ ke surūr se baḌh ke nahīñ jo maah o mehr falak par haiñ jo laal o guhar pātāl meñ haiñ 
ik maġhrib aayā mashriq meñ mirī fauj ke TukḌe kar Daale ab aadhe sipāhī junūb meñ haiñ aur aadhe sipāhī shumāl meñ haiñ 
īmān kī chhāgal phuuT ga.ī āmāl kī lāThī TuuT ga.ī ham aise gallabānoñ ke sab naaqe ḳhauf-e-qitāl meñ haiñ 
mere KHeme KHasta-haal mein hain mere raste dhund ke jal mein hain mujhe sham hui hai jangal mein mere sare sitare zawal mein hain 
mujhe rangon se koi shaghl nahin mujhe KHushbu mein koi daKHl nahin mere nam ka koi naKHl nahin mere mausam KHak-e-malal mein hain 
aakash hai qadmon ke niche dariya ka pani sar par hai ek machhli naw pe baiThi hai aur sab machhuware jal mein hain 
ye duniya akbar zulmon ki hum majburi ki anarkali hum diwaron ke bich mein hain hum nargha-e-jabr-o-jalal mein hain 
mere dil ke nur se baDh ke nahin meri jaan ke surur se baDh ke nahin jo mah o mehr falak par hain jo lal o guhar patal mein hain 
ek maghrib aaya mashriq mein meri fauj ke TukDe kar Dale ab aadhe sipahi junub mein hain aur aadhe sipahi shumal mein hain 
iman ki chhagal phuT gai aamal ki laThi TuT gai hum aise gallabanon ke sab naqe KHauf-e-qital mein hain

uTh chukā dil mirā zamāne se uḌ gayā murġh āshiyāne se 
dekh kar dil ko muḌ ga.ī mizhgāñ tiir ḳhālī paḌā nishāne se 
chashm ko naqsh-e-pā karūñ kyūñkar duur ho ḳhaak āstāne se 
ham ne paayā to ye sanam paayā is ḳhudā.ī ke kār-ḳhāne se 
terī zanjīr-e-zulf se nikle ye tavaqqo na thī divāne se 
ai 'fuġhāñ' dard-e-dil sunūñ kab tak uḌ ga.ī niind is fasāne se 
uTh chuka dil mera zamane se uD gaya murgh aashiyane se 
dekh kar dil ko muD gai mizhgan tir KHali paDa nishane se 
chashm ko naqsh-e-pa karun kyunkar dur ho KHak aastane se 
hum ne paya to ye sanam paya is KHudai ke kar-KHane se 
teri zanjir-e-zulf se nikle ye tawaqqo na thi diwane se 
ai 'fughan' dard-e-dil sunun kab tak uD gai nind is fasane se

raat jo mauj-e-havā ne gul se dil kī baat kahī ik ik barg-e-chaman ne kaisī kaisī baat kahī 
āñkheñ rañg ba-rañg saje rastoñ sarshār huiiñ dil kī ḳhalish ne manzar manzar ek hī baat kahī 
har iz.har kī tah meñ ek hī ma.ānī pinhā the apnī taraf se sab ne apnī apnī baat kahī 
aaj bhī harf o bayāñ ke sab paimāne hairāñ haiñ kaise ġhazal ne do satroñ meñ puurī baat kahī 
sīdhe-sāde se lafzoñ meñ kahnā mushkil thā is liye to aisī aaḌī tirchhī baat kahī 
tum kyuuñ apnī marzī ke mafhūm nikālo ho utnā hī matlab hai hamārā jitnī baat kahī 
tum bhī to mazmūn-tarāshī meñ masrūf rahe tum ne bhī to 'ālī' kam kam aslī baat kahī 
raat jo mauj-e-hawa ne gul se dil ki baat kahi ek ek barg-e-chaman ne kaisi kaisi baat kahi 
aankhen rang ba-rang saje raston sarshaar huin dil ki KHalish ne manzar manzar ek hi baat kahi 
har izhar ki tah mein ek hi maani pinha the apni taraf se sab ne apni apni baat kahi 
aaj bhi harf o bayan ke sab paimane hairan hain kaise ghazal ne do satron mein puri baat kahi 
sidhe-sade se lafzon mein kahna mushkil tha is liye to aisi aaDi tirchhi baat kahi 
tum kyun apni marzi ke mafhum nikalo ho utna hi matlab hai hamara jitni baat kahi 
tum bhi to mazmun-tarashi mein masruf rahe tum ne bhi to 'ali' kam kam asli baat kahi

havā ke hoñT khuleñ sā.at-e-kalām to aa.e ye ret jaisā badan āñdhiyoñ ke kaam to aa.e 
munāfiqat kī sabhī tohmateñ mujhe de de mire tufail rafīqoñ meñ terā naam to aa.e 
use udaas na kar de ye merī sust-ravī maiñ ab ke sust chalūñ vo subuk-ḳhirām to aa.e 
ġham-e-hayāt ġham-e-rozgār be-vatanī sukūn se jo Dhale kaash aisī shaam to aa.e 
hawa ke honT khulen saat-e-kalam to aae ye ret jaisa badan aandhiyon ke kaam to aae 
munafiqat ki sabhi tohmaten mujhe de de mere tufail rafiqon mein tera nam to aae 
use udas na kar de ye meri sust-rawi main ab ke sust chalun wo subuk-KHiram to aae 
gham-e-hayat gham-e-rozgar be-watani sukun se jo Dhale kash aisi sham to aae

kab tak kareñge jabr dil-e-nā-subūr par muusā to jā ke baiTh rahe koh-e-tūr par 
koī mujhe batā.e ki ab kyā javāb duuñ vo mujh se uzr karte haiñ mere qusūr par 
tālib haiñ jo tire unheñ jannat se kyā ġharaz paḌtī nahīñ hai aañkh shahīdoñ kī huur par 
jalva dikhā.iye hameñ bas uzr ho chukā jalne ke vāste nahīñ aa.e haiñ tuur par 
zāhid bhī is zamāne ke āshiq mizāj haiñ jiite haiñ us ko dekh ke marte haiñ huur par 
ghar kar ga.iiñ na dil meñ mirī ḳhāksāriyāñ nāzāñ the aap bhī bahut apne ġhurūr par 
baḳhshe ga.e na ham se jo do-chār bāda-ḳhvār bhinkeñgī makkhiyāñ haiñ sharāb-e-tuhūr par 
kuchh shoḳhiyoñ ke rañg bhī betābiyoñ meñ haiñ kis kī nazar paḌī hai dil-e-nā-subūr par 
zāhid kī tarah ham ko bhī jannat kī hai talāsh apnā bhī aa gayā hai dil ik rashk-e-hūr par 
rakkhe kahīñ ye shauq-e-rihā.ī mujhe na qaid taḌpā agar yahīñ to raheñge zarūr par 
'beḳhud' na DhūñD koī vasīla najāt kā ye munhasir hai rahmat-e-rabb-e-ġhafūr par 
kab tak karenge jabr dil-e-na-subur par musa to ja ke baiTh rahe koh-e-tur par 
koi mujhe batae ki ab kya jawab dun wo mujh se uzr karte hain mere qusur par 
talib hain jo tere unhen jannat se kya gharaz paDti nahin hai aankh shahidon ki hur par 
jalwa dikhaiye hamein bas uzr ho chuka jalne ke waste nahin aae hain tur par 
zahid bhi is zamane ke aashiq mizaj hain jite hain us ko dekh ke marte hain hur par 
ghar kar gain na dil mein meri KHaksariyan nazan the aap bhi bahut apne ghurur par 
baKHshe gae na hum se jo do-chaar baada-KHwar bhinkengi makkhiyan hain sharab-e-tuhur par 
kuchh shoKHiyon ke rang bhi betabiyon mein hain kis ki nazar paDi hai dil-e-na-subur par 
zahid ki tarah hum ko bhi jannat ki hai talash apna bhi aa gaya hai dil ek rashk-e-hur par 
rakkhe kahin ye shauq-e-rihai mujhe na qaid taDpa agar yahin to rahenge zarur par 
'beKHud' na DhunD koi wasila najat ka ye munhasir hai rahmat-e-rabb-e-ghafur par

āḳhirul-amr tirī samt safar karte haiñ aaj is naḳhl-e-masāfat ko shajar karte haiñ 
jo hai ābād tirī ā.ina-sāmānī se ham isī ḳhāna-e-hairat meñ basar karte haiñ 
dil to vo peT kā halkā hai ki bas kuchh na kaho apnī hālat se kab aisoñ ko ḳhabar karte haiñ 
vasl aur hijr haiñ donoñ hī miyāñ se bai.at dekhiye kis pe ināyat kī nazar karte haiñ 
dil ne kuchh zor dikhāyā to ye sunñā ik din ham bhī alvand-e-ġham-e-yār ko sar karte haiñ 
tum ko to diin kī bhī fikr hai duniyā kī bhī bhaa.ī ham to yūñhī bekār basar karte haiñ 
aaKHirul-amr teri samt safar karte hain aaj is naKHl-e-masafat ko shajar karte hain 
jo hai aabaad teri aaina-samani se hum isi KHana-e-hairat mein basar karte hain 
dil to wo peT ka halka hai ki bas kuchh na kaho apni haalat se kab aison ko KHabar karte hain 
wasl aur hijr hain donon hi miyan se baiat dekhiye kis pe inayat ki nazar karte hain 
dil ne kuchh zor dikhaya to ye sunna ek din hum bhi alwand-e-gham-e-yar ko sar karte hain 
tum ko to din ki bhi fikr hai duniya ki bhi bhai hum to yunhi bekar basar karte hain

dushvār hai ab rāstā āsān se aage rakh umar-e-kuhan pichhlā qadam dhyān se aage 
aTkā huā sūraj hai isī ek sabaq par baḌhtā nahīñ din raat kī gardān se aage 
qismat kī ḳharābī hai ki jaatā huuñ ġhalat samt paḌtā hai bayābān bayābān se aage 
pahuñchā to nahīñ maiñ dar-e-vaslat pe magar haañ suntā huuñ kahīñ hai shab-e-hijrān se aage 
na taḳht na ābād koī shahr sabā kā ik girya hai dīvār-e-sulaimān se aage 
ḳhamyāza hai is ādat-e-isrāf kā aur bas jo be-sar-o-sāmānī hai sāmān se aage 
kal shor bapā dil meñ thā pahchān kī ḳhātir ab sakta hai āzār kā pahchān se aage 
niklī na kisī ek kī ta.abīr muāfiq sau ḳhvāb the har ḳhvāb-e-pareshān se aage 
dushwar hai ab rasta aasan se aage rakh umar-e-kuhan pichhla qadam dhyan se aage 
aTka hua suraj hai isi ek sabaq par baDhta nahin din raat ki gardan se aage 
qismat ki KHarabi hai ki jata hun ghalat samt paDta hai bayaban bayaban se aage 
pahuncha to nahin main dar-e-waslat pe magar han sunta hun kahin hai shab-e-hijran se aage 
na taKHt na aabaad koi shahr saba ka ek girya hai diwar-e-sulaiman se aage 
KHamyaza hai is aadat-e-israf ka aur bas jo be-sar-o-samani hai saman se aage 
kal shor bapa dil mein tha pahchan ki KHatir ab sakta hai aazar ka pahchan se aage 
nikli na kisi ek ki tabir muafiq sau KHwab the har KHwab-e-pareshan se aage

bahut dinoñ meñ kahīñ rāste badalte the vo log kaise the jo saath saath chalte the 
vo kār-gah na rahī aur na vo sifāl rahī ḳhudā ke daur meñ kyā aadmī nikalte the 
zarā se rizq meñ barkat bhī kitnī hotī thī aur ik charāġh se kitne charāġh jalte the 
guzārne kī vo sūrat qayām-e-ḳhvāb meñ thī jahāñ se aur ka.ī rāste nikalte the 
falak pe apnā baserā thā aur ham aksar falak ke āḳhirī kone pe jā nikalte the 
bahut dinon mein kahin raste badalte the wo log kaise the jo sath sath chalte the 
wo kar-gah na rahi aur na wo sifal rahi KHuda ke daur mein kya aadmi nikalte the 
zara se rizq mein barkat bhi kitni hoti thi aur ek charagh se kitne charagh jalte the 
guzarne ki wo surat qayam-e-KHwab mein thi jahan se aur kai raste nikalte the 
falak pe apna basera tha aur hum aksar falak ke aaKHiri kone pe ja nikalte the

raat din gardish meñ haiñ lekin paḌā rahtā huuñ maiñ kaam kyā merā yahāñ hai sochtā rahtā huuñ maiñ 
bāhar andar ke jahānoñ se milā mujh ko farāġh tīsrī duniyā ke chakkar kāTtā rahtā huuñ maiñ 
ek be-ḳhaufī mujhe le aa.ī sāhil ke qarīb aa ke ab nazdīk sāhil ke Darā rahtā huuñ maiñ 
jaane kaisī raushnī thī kar ga.ī andhā mujhe is bhayānak tīrgī meñ bhī bujhā rahtā huuñ maiñ 
kar diyā kis ne mirā ā.īna-e-dil gard gard aks huuñ kis kā havā se pūchhtā rahtā huuñ maiñ 
ek jangal sā ugā hai mere tan ke chāroñ or aur apne man ke andar zard sā rahtā huuñ maiñ 
ek nuqte se ubhartī hai ye saarī kā.enāt ek nuqte par simaTtā phailtā rahtā huuñ maiñ 
raushnī meñ lafz ke tahlīl ho jaane se qabl ik ḳhalā paḌtā hai jis meñ ghūmtā rahtā huuñ maiñ 
saañs kī lai par thiraktī hai koī azlī tarañg rañg-e-'sānī' dekh kar hairat-zada rahtā huuñ maiñ 
raat din gardish mein hain lekin paDa rahta hun main kaam kya mera yahan hai sochta rahta hun main 
bahar andar ke jahanon se mila mujh ko faragh tisri duniya ke chakkar kaTta rahta hun main 
ek be-KHaufi mujhe le aai sahil ke qarib aa ke ab nazdik sahil ke Dara rahta hun main 
jaane kaisi raushni thi kar gai andha mujhe is bhayanak tirgi mein bhi bujha rahta hun main 
kar diya kis ne mera aaina-e-dil gard gard aks hun kis ka hawa se puchhta rahta hun main 
ek jangal sa uga hai mere tan ke chaaron or aur apne man ke andar zard sa rahta hun main 
ek nuqte se ubharti hai ye sari kaenat ek nuqte par simaTta phailta rahta hun main 
raushni mein lafz ke tahlil ho jaane se qabl ek KHala paDta hai jis mein ghumta rahta hun main 
sans ki lai par thirakti hai koi azli tarang rang-e-'sani' dekh kar hairat-zada rahta hun main

apnī hī ravānī meñ bahtā nazar aatā hai ye shahr bulandī se dariyā nazar aatā hai 
detā hai koī apne dāman kī havā us ko sho'la sā mire dil meñ jaltā nazar aatā hai 
us haath kā tohfa thā ik daaġh mire dil par vo daaġh bhī ab lekin jaatā nazar aatā hai 
āñkhoñ ke muqābil hai kaisā ye 'ajab manzar sahrā to nahīñ lekin sahrā nazar aatā hai 
ik shakl sī bantī hai har shab mirī nīñdoñ meñ ik phuul sā ḳhvāboñ meñ khiltā nazar aatā hai 
āñkhoñ ne nahīñ dekhī us jism kī rā'nā.ī ye chaar taraf jis kā saayā nazar aatā hai 
dariyā ko kināre se kyā dekhte rahte ho andar se kabhī dekho kaisā nazar aatā hai 
phir zau meñ 'nadīm' apnī kuchh kam hai sitāra vo ye raat kā ā.īna dhuñdlā nazar aatā hai 
apni hi rawani mein bahta nazar aata hai ye shahr bulandi se dariya nazar aata hai 
deta hai koi apne daman ki hawa us ko sho'la sa mere dil mein jalta nazar aata hai 
us hath ka tohfa tha ek dagh mere dil par wo dagh bhi ab lekin jata nazar aata hai 
aankhon ke muqabil hai kaisa ye 'ajab manzar sahra to nahin lekin sahra nazar aata hai 
ek shakl si banti hai har shab meri nindon mein ek phul sa KHwabon mein khilta nazar aata hai 
aankhon ne nahin dekhi us jism ki ra'nai ye chaar taraf jis ka saya nazar aata hai 
dariya ko kinare se kya dekhte rahte ho andar se kabhi dekho kaisa nazar aata hai 
phir zau mein 'nadim' apni kuchh kam hai sitara wo ye raat ka aaina dhundla nazar aata hai

hai mujh ko rabt bas-ki ġhazālān-e-ram ke saath chaukūñ huuñ dekh saa.e ko apne qadam ke saath 
hai zāt-e-haq javāhir o aġhrāz se barī tashbīh kyā hai us ko vajūd o 'adam ke saath 
kyā ain o mulk o vaz' o izāfat kā daḳhl vaañ hai infi.āl o fe.al matā kaif-o-kam ke saath 
dekhā maiñ saath Dhol ke suulī par un kā sar faḳhriyya vo jo phirte the tabl-o-alam ke saath 
dekhī ye chaah un kī añdhere kueñ ke biich pheñkā lapeT kushte ko apne gulam ke saath 
kū-e-butāñ se tauf-e-haram ko chale to ham lekin kamāl-e-hasrat o hirmān o ġham ke saath 
thiiñ apnī āñkheñ halqa-e-zanjīr kī namat paivasta hil rahī dar-e-baitus-sanam ke saath 
kahte ho vuuñ se ho ke idhar aao vuuñ chaleñ kyā ḳhuub kyuuñ na dauḌ paḌūñ aise dam ke saath 
tum aur baat maano ajī sab nazar meñ hai dāñtoñ tale zabān dabānī qasam ke saath 
ab chheḌ chhāḌ kī ġhazal 'inshā' ik aur likh haiñ laakh shoḳhiyāñ tirī nok-e-qalam ke saath 
hai mujh ko rabt bas-ki ghazalan-e-ram ke sath chaukun hun dekh sae ko apne qadam ke sath 
hai zat-e-haq jawahir o aghraaz se bari tashbih kya hai us ko wajud o 'adam ke sath 
kya ain o mulk o waz' o izafat ka daKHl wan hai infial o feal mata kaif-o-kam ke sath 
dekha main sath Dhol ke suli par un ka sar faKHriyya wo jo phirte the tabl-o-alam ke sath 
dekhi ye chah un ki andhere kuen ke bich phenka lapeT kushte ko apne gulam ke sath 
ku-e-butan se tauf-e-haram ko chale to hum lekin kamal-e-hasrat o hirman o gham ke sath 
thin apni aankhen halqa-e-zanjir ki namat paiwasta hil rahi dar-e-baitus-sanam ke sath 
kahte ho wun se ho ke idhar aao wun chalen kya KHub kyun na dauD paDun aise dam ke sath 
tum aur baat mano aji sab nazar mein hai danton tale zaban dabani qasam ke sath 
ab chheD chhaD ki ghazal 'insha' ek aur likh hain lakh shoKHiyan teri nok-e-qalam ke sath

ga.e the vahāñ jī meñ kyā Thaan kar ke chale aa.e īrān tūrān kar ke 
agar dil kā bil-farz gul naam paḌ jaa.e to phir hai ye siina gulistān kar ke 
diyā ham ne dil un parī-chehragāñ ko zarū-e-qayās aadmī jaan kar ke 
ye duniyā hameñ ḳhush na aa.egī phir bhī raheñ ḳhvāh ḳhud ko sulaimān kar ke 
tire ġham meñ jis se mizha tar karūñ huuñ vo ik qatra hai qulzumistān kar ke 
dikhā hī diyā āḳhirash ahl-e-dil ne isī daane se khet khaliyān kar ke 
ye kyā chiiz tāmīr karne chale ho binā-e-mohabbat ko vīrān kar ke 
miyāñ ham to 'jāved' ko le ga.e the diyā hī nahīñ us ne pahchān kar ke 
gae the wahan ji mein kya Than kar ke chale aae iran turan kar ke 
agar dil ka bil-farz gul nam paD jae to phir hai ye sina gulistan kar ke 
diya hum ne dil un pari-chehragan ko zaru-e-qayas aadmi jaan kar ke 
ye duniya hamein KHush na aaegi phir bhi rahen KHwah KHud ko sulaiman kar ke 
tere gham mein jis se mizha tar karun hun wo ek qatra hai qulzumistan kar ke 
dikha hi diya aaKHirash ahl-e-dil ne isi dane se khet khaliyan kar ke 
ye kya chiz tamir karne chale ho bina-e-mohabbat ko viran kar ke 
miyan hum to 'jawed' ko le gae the diya hi nahin us ne pahchan kar ke

tujhe chhū kar bhī mirī ruuh meñ shiddat nahīñ hai dil-lagī sī hai ye dar-asl mohabbat nahīñ hai 
apne andar hī ghuTā rahne lagā huuñ ab to tere ġham meñ abhī rone kī nazākat nahīñ hai 
mere jazboñ meñ mirī ruuh kī pākīzgī hai jo bhī likhtā huuñ mujhe us kī malāmat nahīñ hai 
dar-e-imkān kī dastak mujhe bhejī ga.ī hai merī qismat meñ to maujūd kī daulat nahīñ hai 
ek sarshār aziyyat meñ giraftār huuñ maiñ magar afsos ki ye terī badaulat nahīñ hai 
mere andar koī kohrām machā rahtā hai ai zamāne tujhe sunñe kī zarūrat nahīñ hai 
tujhe chhu kar bhi meri ruh mein shiddat nahin hai dil-lagi si hai ye dar-asl mohabbat nahin hai 
apne andar hi ghuTa rahne laga hun ab to tere gham mein abhi rone ki nazakat nahin hai 
mere jazbon mein meri ruh ki pakizgi hai jo bhi likhta hun mujhe us ki malamat nahin hai 
dar-e-imkan ki dastak mujhe bheji gai hai meri qismat mein to maujud ki daulat nahin hai 
ek sarshaar aziyyat mein giraftar hun main magar afsos ki ye teri badaulat nahin hai 
mere andar koi kohram macha rahta hai ai zamane tujhe sunne ki zarurat nahin hai

maiñ ḳhud se duur thā aur mujh se duur thā vo bhī bahāo tez thā aur zad meñ aa gayā vo bhī 
chhuā hī thā ki fazā meñ bikhar ke phail gayā mirī hī tarah dhueñ kī lakīr thā vo bhī 
ye dekhne ke liye phir palaT na jā.ūñ kahīñ maiñ gum na ho gayā jab tak khaḌā rahā vo bhī 
abhī to kāñToñ-bharī jhāḌiyoñ meñ aTkā hai kabhī dikhā.ī diyā thā harā-bharā vo bhī 
bichhaḌne vaale kisī ke liye nahīñ rukte phir aisā vaqt bhī aayā bichhaḌ gayā vo bhī 
main KHud se dur tha aur mujh se dur tha wo bhi bahao tez tha aur zad mein aa gaya wo bhi 
chhua hi tha ki faza mein bikhar ke phail gaya meri hi tarah dhuen ki lakir tha wo bhi 
ye dekhne ke liye phir palaT na jaun kahin main gum na ho gaya jab tak khaDa raha wo bhi 
abhi to kanTon-bhari jhaDiyon mein aTka hai kabhi dikhai diya tha hara-bhara wo bhi 
bichhaDne wale kisi ke liye nahin rukte phir aisa waqt bhi aaya bichhaD gaya wo bhi

dil kī masarrateñ na.ī jaañ kā malāl hai nayā merī ġhazal meñ aaj phir ek savāl hai nayā 
ab jo khile haiñ dil meñ phuul un kī bahār hai na.ī ab jo lagī hai dil meñ aag us kā jalāl hai nayā 
us ke liye bhī ġham-za-e-nāz-o-adā kā vaqt hai apne liye bhī mausam-e-hijr-o-visāl hai nayā 
us meñ bhī ḳhud-numā.ī ke rañg bahut haiñ in dinoñ apne liye bhī arsa-e-ḳhvāb-o-ḳhayāl hai nayā 
jaag uThā hai ik chaman merī hudūd-e-zāt meñ us ke qarīb hī kahīñ dasht-e-malāl hai nayā 
ruuh meñ jal uThe haiñ aaj lazzat-e-qurb ke charāġh soz-o-gudāz-e-hijr bhī shāmil-e-hāl hai nayā 
jhuum uThe haiñ barg-o-bār phuul khile haiñ be-shumār ai merī rūh-e-be-qarār terā to haal hai nayā 
us ne mirī nigāh ke saare suḳhan samajh liye phir bhī mirī nigāh meñ ek savāl hai nayā 
dil ki masarraten nai jaan ka malal hai naya meri ghazal mein aaj phir ek sawal hai naya 
ab jo khile hain dil mein phul un ki bahaar hai nai ab jo lagi hai dil mein aag us ka jalal hai naya 
us ke liye bhi gham-za-e-naz-o-ada ka waqt hai apne liye bhi mausam-e-hijr-o-visal hai naya 
us mein bhi KHud-numai ke rang bahut hain in dinon apne liye bhi arsa-e-KHwab-o-KHayal hai naya 
jag uTha hai ek chaman meri hudud-e-zat mein us ke qarib hi kahin dasht-e-malal hai naya 
ruh mein jal uThe hain aaj lazzat-e-qurb ke charagh soz-o-gudaz-e-hijr bhi shamil-e-haal hai naya 
jhum uThe hain barg-o-bar phul khile hain be-shumar ai meri ruh-e-be-qarar tera to haal hai naya 
us ne meri nigah ke sare suKHan samajh liye phir bhi meri nigah mein ek sawal hai naya

yahāñ jo peḌ the apnī jaḌoñ ko chhoḌ chuke qadam jamātī huī sab rutoñ ko chhoḌ chuke 
koī tasavvur-e-zindāñ bhī ab nahīñ baaqī ham us zamāne ke sab dostoñ ko chhoḌ chuke 
bhaTak rahe haiñ ab uḌte hue ġhubār ke saath musāfir apne sabhī rāstoñ ko chhoḌ chuke 
nikal chuke haiñ tire roz o shab se ab aage dinoñ ko chhoḌ chuke ham shaboñ ko chhoḌ chuke 
na jaane kis liye hijrat pe vo hue majbūr parinde apne sabhī ghoñsloñ ko chhoḌ chuke 
jo mar ga.e unheñ zindān se nikāleñge nahīñ ki ahl-e-qafas qaidiyoñ ko chhoḌ chuke 
agarche aisā nahīñ lag rahā hai aisā magar ki raahī saare 'zafar' rahbaroñ ko chhoḌ chuke 
yahan jo peD the apni jaDon ko chhoD chuke qadam jamati hui sab ruton ko chhoD chuke 
koi tasawwur-e-zindan bhi ab nahin baqi hum us zamane ke sab doston ko chhoD chuke 
bhaTak rahe hain ab uDte hue ghubar ke sath musafir apne sabhi raston ko chhoD chuke 
nikal chuke hain tere roz o shab se ab aage dinon ko chhoD chuke hum shabon ko chhoD chuke 
na jaane kis liye hijrat pe wo hue majbur parinde apne sabhi ghonslon ko chhoD chuke 
jo mar gae unhen zindan se nikalenge nahin ki ahl-e-qafas qaidiyon ko chhoD chuke 
agarche aisa nahin lag raha hai aisa magar ki rahi sare 'zafar' rahbaron ko chhoD chuke

maiñ fat.h-e-zāt manzar tak na pahuñchā mirā tesha mire sar tak na pahuñchā 
use memār likkhā bastiyoñ ne ki jo pahle hī patthar tak na pahuñchā 
tijārat dil kī dhaḌkan gin rahī hai ta.alluq lutf-e-manzar tak na pahuñchā 
shagufta gaal tīkhe ḳhat kā mausam dobāra naḳhl-e-paikar tak na pahuñchā 
bahut chhoTā safar thā zindagī kā maiñ apne ghar ke andar tak na pahuñchā 
ye kaisā pyaas kā mausam hai 'ahmad' samundar dīda-e-tar tak na pahuñchā 
main fath-e-zat manzar tak na pahuncha mera tesha mere sar tak na pahuncha 
use memar likkha bastiyon ne ki jo pahle hi patthar tak na pahuncha 
tijarat dil ki dhaDkan gin rahi hai talluq lutf-e-manzar tak na pahuncha 
shagufta gal tikhe KHat ka mausam dobara naKHl-e-paikar tak na pahuncha 
bahut chhoTa safar tha zindagi ka main apne ghar ke andar tak na pahuncha 
ye kaisa pyas ka mausam hai 'ahmad' samundar dida-e-tar tak na pahuncha

sab ko batā rahā huuñ yahī saaf saaf maiñ jalte diye se kaise karūñ inhirāf meñ 
maiñ ne to āsmān ke rañgoñ kī baat kī kahne lagī zamīn badal duuñ ġhilāf meñ 
gumrāh kab kiyā hai kisī raah ne mujhe chalne lagā huuñ aap hī apne ḳhilāf meñ 
miltā nahīñ hai phir bhī sirā āsmān kā kar kar ke thak chukā huuñ zamīñ kā tavāf meñ 
ab tū bhī aa.ine kī tarah bolne lagā patthar se bhar na duuñ tire muñh kā shigāf meñ 
sab ko bata raha hun yahi saf saf main jalte diye se kaise karun inhiraf mein 
main ne to aasman ke rangon ki baat ki kahne lagi zamin badal dun ghilaf mein 
gumrah kab kiya hai kisi rah ne mujhe chalne laga hun aap hi apne KHilaf mein 
milta nahin hai phir bhi sira aasman ka kar kar ke thak chuka hun zamin ka tawaf mein 
ab tu bhi aaine ki tarah bolne laga patthar se bhar na dun tere munh ka shigaf mein

bahār aa.ī hai phir chaman meñ nasīm iThlā ke chal rahī hai har ek ġhuncha chaTak rahā hai guloñ kī rañgat badal rahī hai 
vo aa ga.e lo vo jī uThā maiñ adū kī ummīd-e-yās Thahrī ajab tamāshā hai dil-lagī hai qazā khaḌī haath mal rahī hai 
batāo dil duuñ na duuñ kaho to ajiib nāzuk mo.āmla hai idhar to dekho nazar milāo ye kis kī shoḳhī machal rahī hai 
taḌap rahā huuñ yahāñ maiñ tanhā vahāñ adū se vo ham-baġhal haiñ kisī ke dam par banī huī hai kisī kī hasrat nikal rahī hai 
ghaTā vo chhā.ī vo abr uTThā yahī to hai vaqt mai-kashī kā bulāo 'shā.ir' ko hai kahāñ vo sharāb shīshe se Dhal rahī hai 
bahaar aai hai phir chaman mein nasim iThla ke chal rahi hai har ek ghuncha chaTak raha hai gulon ki rangat badal rahi hai 
wo aa gae lo wo ji uTha main adu ki ummid-e-yas Thahri ajab tamasha hai dil-lagi hai qaza khaDi hath mal rahi hai 
batao dil dun na dun kaho to ajib nazuk moamla hai idhar to dekho nazar milao ye kis ki shoKHi machal rahi hai 
taDap raha hun yahan main tanha wahan adu se wo ham-baghal hain kisi ke dam par bani hui hai kisi ki hasrat nikal rahi hai 
ghaTa wo chhai wo abr uTTha yahi to hai waqt mai-kashi ka bulao 'shair' ko hai kahan wo sharab shishe se Dhal rahi hai

tirī nigah se ise bhī gumāñ huā ki maiñ huuñ vagarna dil to mirā māntā na thā ki maiñ huuñ 
ajiib lamha vo dīdār-e-husn-e-yār kā thā us ek pal kī tajallī meñ ye khulā ki maiñ huuñ 
na jaane be-ḳhabarī ke vo kis maqām pe thā nazar uThātā to har gul pukārtā ki maiñ huuñ 
tire jamāl kī kuchh raushnī sī paḌtī hai batā rahā hai mujhe rañg-e-ā.ina ki maiñ huuñ 
jise bhulā ke ye dil mutma.in thā muddat se kal us ke zikr pe ik ahd bol uThā ki maiñ huuñ 
par-e-zamāna to parvāz-e-nūr se bhī hai tez kahāñ hai kaun thā jis ne abhī kahā ki maiñ huuñ 
kahāñ pe sarhad-e-nā-būd-o-būd miltī hai subūt ho ki na ho e'tibār kyā ki maiñ huuñ 
hayāt ḳhud hai dahān-e-nahañg-e-lā-ya.anī jo hai adam kā musāfir hai maiñ chalā ki maiñ huuñ 
na raftagāñ haiñ na ab yād-e-raftagāñ baaqī maiñ kyā huuñ juz ram-e-yak-mauja-e-fanā ki maiñ huuñ 
mujh aise zarroñ kā honā na honā ek sā hai bagūle in se uThe to pata chalā ki maiñ huuñ 
khulā paḌā hai sar-e-rāh be-his-o-harakat jo haath kal tak uThā chīḳhtā rahā ki maiñ huuñ 
abhī tarīq-e-tahammul nahīñ mizājoñ meñ abhī faqīhoñ meñ hañgāma hai bapā ki maiñ huuñ 
kahīñ kahīñ abhī tauqīr-e-lafz baaqī hai suḳhan sunā.ī diyā harf-e-dard kā ki maiñ huuñ 
ajiib ālam-e-hū thā 'ziyā' jab āḳhir-e-shab kisī ko dil ne ye kahte hue sunā ki maiñ huuñ 
teri nigah se ise bhi guman hua ki main hun wagarna dil to mera manta na tha ki main hun 
ajib lamha wo didar-e-husn-e-yar ka tha us ek pal ki tajalli mein ye khula ki main hun 
na jaane be-KHabari ke wo kis maqam pe tha nazar uThata to har gul pukarta ki main hun 
tere jamal ki kuchh raushni si paDti hai bata raha hai mujhe rang-e-aina ki main hun 
jise bhula ke ye dil mutmain tha muddat se kal us ke zikr pe ek ahd bol uTha ki main hun 
par-e-zamana to parwaz-e-nur se bhi hai tez kahan hai kaun tha jis ne abhi kaha ki main hun 
kahan pe sarhad-e-na-bud-o-bud milti hai subut ho ki na ho e'tibar kya ki main hun 
hayat KHud hai dahan-e-nahang-e-la-yani jo hai adam ka musafir hai main chala ki main hun 
na raftagan hain na ab yaad-e-raftagan baqi main kya hun juz ram-e-yak-mauja-e-fana ki main hun 
mujh aise zarron ka hona na hona ek sa hai bagule in se uThe to pata chala ki main hun 
khula paDa hai sar-e-rah be-his-o-harakat jo hath kal tak uTha chiKHta raha ki main hun 
abhi tariq-e-tahammul nahin mizajon mein abhi faqihon mein hangama hai bapa ki main hun 
kahin kahin abhi tauqir-e-lafz baqi hai suKHan sunai diya harf-e-dard ka ki main hun 
ajib aalam-e-hu tha 'ziya' jab aaKHir-e-shab kisi ko dil ne ye kahte hue suna ki main hun

saa.e phail ga.e khetoñ par kaisā mausam hone lagā dil meñ jo Thahrāo thā ik dam darham-barham hone lagā 
pardesī kā vāpas aanā jhūTī ḳhabar hī niklī nā būḌhī maañ kī aañkh kā taara phir se maddham hone lagā 
bachpan yaad ke rañg-mahal meñ kaise kaise phuul khile Dhol baje aur aañsū Tapke kahīñ moharram hone lagā 
Dhor Dañgar aur pañkh pakherū hazrat-e-insāñ kaaTh kabāḌ ik sailāb meñ bahte bahte sab kā sañgam hone lagā 
sab se yaqīn uThāyā ham ne dost paḌosī din tārīḳh īd-milan ko ghar se nikle shor-e-mātam hone lagā 
sae phail gae kheton par kaisa mausam hone laga dil mein jo Thahrao tha ek dam darham-barham hone laga 
pardesi ka wapas aana jhuTi KHabar hi nikli na buDhi man ki aankh ka tara phir se maddham hone laga 
bachpan yaad ke rang-mahal mein kaise kaise phul khile Dhol baje aur aansu Tapke kahin moharram hone laga 
Dhor Dangar aur pankh pakheru hazrat-e-insan kaTh kabaD ek sailab mein bahte bahte sab ka sangam hone laga 
sab se yaqin uThaya hum ne dost paDosi din tariKH id-milan ko ghar se nikle shor-e-matam hone laga

niiñd ke āb-e-ravāñ ko maat dene ā.ūñgā ai shab-e-nā-ḳhvāb terā saath dene ā.ūñgā 
jab sitāre nuqta-e-anfās par bujh jā.eñge maiñ ḳhudā ko jaan bhī us raat dene ā.ūñgā 
nuur kī maujeñ mire hamrāh hoñgī aur maiñ raat ke hāthoñ meñ apnā haath dene ā.ūñgā 
āsmāñ ke niile gumbad se nikal kar ek din maiñ zamīñ ko qurmuzī ḳhairāt dene ā.ūñgā 
band ho jā.eñge jab saare darīche kashf ke us ghaḌī meñ chand imkānāt dene ā.ūñgā 
nind ke aab-e-rawan ko mat dene aaunga ai shab-e-na-KHwab tera sath dene aaunga 
jab sitare nuqta-e-anfas par bujh jaenge main KHuda ko jaan bhi us raat dene aaunga 
nur ki maujen mere hamrah hongi aur main raat ke hathon mein apna hath dene aaunga 
aasman ke nile gumbad se nikal kar ek din main zamin ko qurmuzi KHairaat dene aaunga 
band ho jaenge jab sare dariche kashf ke us ghaDi mein chand imkanat dene aaunga

mire andar ravānī ḳhatm hotī jā rahī hai so lagtā hai kahānī ḳhatm hotī jā rahī hai 
use chhū kar laboñ se phuul jhaḌne lag ga.e haiñ mirī ātish-fishānī ḳhatm hotī jā rahī hai 
sulagte dasht meñ ab dhuup sahnā paḌ ga.ī hai tumhārī sā.ebānī ḳhatm hotī jā rahī hai 
hamārā dil zamāne se ulajhne lag gayā hai tumhārī hukmarānī ḳhatm hotī jā rahī hai 
samundar se simaT kar jhiil bante jā rahe haiñ hamārī be-karānī ḳhatm hotī jā rahī hai 
mere andar rawani KHatm hoti ja rahi hai so lagta hai kahani KHatm hoti ja rahi hai 
use chhu kar labon se phul jhaDne lag gae hain meri aatish-fishani KHatm hoti ja rahi hai 
sulagte dasht mein ab dhup sahna paD gai hai tumhaari saebani KHatm hoti ja rahi hai 
hamara dil zamane se ulajhne lag gaya hai tumhaari hukmarani KHatm hoti ja rahi hai 
samundar se simaT kar jhil bante ja rahe hain hamari be-karani KHatm hoti ja rahi hai

kal to tire ḳhvāboñ ne mujh par yuuñ arzānī kī saarī hasrat nikal ga.ī mirī tan-āsānī kī 
paḌā huā huuñ shaam se maiñ usī bāġh-e-tāza meñ mujh meñ shāḳh nikal aa.ī hai raat kī raanī kī 
is chaupāl ke paas ik būḌhā bargad hotā thā ek alāmat gum hai yahāñ se mirī kahānī kī 
tum ne kuchh paḌh kar phūñkā miTTī ke pyāle meñ yā miTTī meñ guñdhī huī tāsīr hai paanī kī 
kyā batlā.ūñ tum ko tum tak arz guzārne meñ dil ne apne aap se kitnī khīñchā-tānī kī 
kal to tere KHwabon ne mujh par yun arzani ki sari hasrat nikal gai meri tan-asani ki 
paDa hua hun sham se main usi bagh-e-taza mein mujh mein shaKH nikal aai hai raat ki rani ki 
is chaupal ke pas ek buDha bargad hota tha ek alamat gum hai yahan se meri kahani ki 
tum ne kuchh paDh kar phunka miTTi ke pyale mein ya miTTi mein gundhi hui tasir hai pani ki 
kya batlaun tum ko tum tak arz guzarne mein dil ne apne aap se kitni khincha-tani ki

chāñd sitāroñ se kyā pūchhūñ kab din mere phirte haiñ vo to bichāre ḳhud haiñ bhikārī Dere Dere phirte haiñ 
jin galiyoñ meñ ham ne sukh kī sej pe rāteñ kaaTī thiiñ un galiyoñ meñ byākul ho kar sāñjh savere phirte haiñ 
rūp-sarūp kī jot jagānā us nagrī meñ jokham hai chāroñ khūñT bagūle ban kar ghor añdhere phirte haiñ 
jin ke shyām-baran saa.e meñ merā man sustāyā thā ab tak āñkhoñ ke aage vo baal ghanere phirte haiñ 
koī hameñ bhī ye samjhā do un par dil kyuuñ riijh gayā dekhī chitvan bāñkī chhab vaale bahtere phirte haiñ 
ik din us ne nain milā ke sharmā ke mukh moḌā thā tab se sundar sundar sapne man ko ghere phirte haiñ 
us nagrī ke baaġh aur man kī yaaro lailā nyārī hai panchhī apne sar pe uThā kar apne basere phirte haiñ 
log to dāman sī lete haiñ jaise ho jī lete haiñ 'ābid' ham dīvāne haiñ jo baal bikhere phirte haiñ 
chand sitaron se kya puchhun kab din mere phirte hain wo to bichaare KHud hain bhikari Dere Dere phirte hain 
jin galiyon mein hum ne sukh ki sej pe raaten kaTi thin un galiyon mein byakul ho kar sanjh sawere phirte hain 
rup-sarup ki jot jagana us nagri mein jokham hai chaaron khunT bagule ban kar ghor andhere phirte hain 
jin ke shyam-baran sae mein mera man sustaya tha ab tak aankhon ke aage wo baal ghanere phirte hain 
koi hamein bhi ye samjha do un par dil kyun rijh gaya dekhi chitwan banki chhab wale bahtere phirte hain 
ek din us ne nain mila ke sharma ke mukh moDa tha tab se sundar sundar sapne man ko ghere phirte hain 
us nagri ke bagh aur man ki yaro laila nyari hai panchhi apne sar pe uTha kar apne basere phirte hain 
log to daman si lete hain jaise ho ji lete hain 'abid' hum diwane hain jo baal bikhere phirte hain

har saañs meñ ḳhud apne na hone kā gumāñ thā vo sāmne aa.e to mujhe hosh kahāñ thā 
kartī haiñ ulaT-pher yūñhī un kī nigāheñ kaaba hai vahīñ aaj sanam-ḳhāna jahāñ thā 
taqsīr-e-nazar dekhne vāloñ kī hai varna un kā koī jalva na ayaañ thā na nihāñ thā 
badlī jo zarā chashm-e-mashīyat koī dam ko har samt bapā mahshar-e-fariyād-o-fuġhāñ thā 
lapkā hai bagūla sā abhī un kī taraf ko shāyad kisī majbūr kī aahoñ kā dhuāñ thā 
'anvar' mire kaam aa.ī qayāmat meñ nidāmat rahmat kā taqāzā mirā har ashk-e-ravāñ thā 
har sans mein KHud apne na hone ka guman tha wo samne aae to mujhe hosh kahan tha 
karti hain ulaT-pher yunhi un ki nigahen kaba hai wahin aaj sanam-KHana jahan tha 
taqsir-e-nazar dekhne walon ki hai warna un ka koi jalwa na ayan tha na nihan tha 
badli jo zara chashm-e-mashiyat koi dam ko har samt bapa mahshar-e-fariyaad-o-fughan tha 
lapka hai bagula sa abhi un ki taraf ko shayad kisi majbur ki aahon ka dhuan tha 
'anwar' mere kaam aai qayamat mein nidamat rahmat ka taqaza mera har ashk-e-rawan tha

matlab na kaabe se na irāda kanisht kā pāband ye faqīr nahīñ sañg-o-ḳhisht kā 
sarsabz huuñ jo aap dikhā diije ḳhat-e-sabz kushtoñ ko khet meñ abhī aalam ho kisht kā 
us huur kī jo gulshan-e-āriz kī yaad thī dekhā kiyā firāq meñ aalam bahisht kā 
kyā munshi-e-azal kī ye san.at hai dekhnā māhir nahīñ kisī kī koī sarnavisht kā 
nādān e'tirāz hai saane pe ġhaur kar bejā hai imtiyāz yahāñ ḳhuub o zisht kā 
ai 'barq' sair karte haiñ ham to jahān kī har kūcha-e-sanam hai namūna bahisht kā 
matlab na kabe se na irada kanisht ka paband ye faqir nahin sang-o-KHisht ka 
sarsabz hun jo aap dikha dije KHat-e-sabz kushton ko khet mein abhi aalam ho kisht ka 
us hur ki jo gulshan-e-ariz ki yaad thi dekha kiya firaq mein aalam bahisht ka 
kya munshi-e-azal ki ye sanat hai dekhna mahir nahin kisi ki koi sarnawisht ka 
nadan e'tiraaz hai sane pe ghaur kar beja hai imtiyaz yahan KHub o zisht ka 
ai 'barq' sair karte hain hum to jahan ki har kucha-e-sanam hai namuna bahisht ka

thak ga.e tum hasrat-e-zauq-e-shahādat kam nahīñ mujh se dam le lo agar teġh-e-sitam meñ dam nahīñ 
dardmandān-e-azal rakhte nahīñ darmāñ kā ġham sīna-e-sad-chāk gul minnat-kash-e-marham nahīñ 
roz marte haiñ hazāroñ dekh kar nairañg-e-husn gar yahī aalam tumhārā hai to ye aalam nahīñ 
mar miTe ham ishq ke shohre vahī haiñ chaar sū shor-e-rusvā.ī pas-e-murdan bhī apnā kam nahīñ 
nāla-e-ātish-fishāñ yuuñ hī agar hai auj par tū nahīñ ai āsmān-e-fitnagar yā ham nahīñ 
be-sabātī par bahār-e-bāġh kī rotā hai charḳh rū-e-gul par qatra-hā-e-ashk haiñ shabnam nahīñ 
ḳhush haiñ mere marne se 'taslīm' ḳhvesh o aqribā ḳhāna-e-shādī hai goyā ḳhāna-e-mātam nahīñ 
thak gae tum hasrat-e-zauq-e-shahadat kam nahin mujh se dam le lo agar tegh-e-sitam mein dam nahin 
dardmandan-e-azal rakhte nahin darman ka gham sina-e-sad-chaak gul minnat-kash-e-marham nahin 
roz marte hain hazaron dekh kar nairang-e-husn gar yahi aalam tumhaara hai to ye aalam nahin 
mar miTe hum ishq ke shohre wahi hain chaar su shor-e-ruswai pas-e-murdan bhi apna kam nahin 
nala-e-atish-fishan yun hi agar hai auj par tu nahin ai aasman-e-fitnagar ya hum nahin 
be-sabaati par bahaar-e-bagh ki rota hai charKH ru-e-gul par qatra-ha-e-ashk hain shabnam nahin 
KHush hain mere marne se 'taslim' KHwesh o aqriba KHana-e-shadi hai goya KHana-e-matam nahin

bas ik tasalsul-e-takrār-e-qurb-o-dūrī thā visāl o hijr kā har marhala ubūrī thā 
mirī shikast bhī thī merī zaat se mansūb ki merī fikr kā har faisla shu.ūrī thā 
thī jiitī jāgtī duniyā mirī mohabbat kī na ḳhvāb kā sā vo aalam ki lā-shu.ūrī thā 
ta.alluqāt meñ aisā bhī ek moḌ aayā ki qurbatoñ pe bhī dil ko gumān-e-dūrī thā 
rivāyatoñ se kināra-kashī bhī lāzim thī aur ehtirām-e-rivāyāt bhī zarūrī thā 
mashīnī daur ke āzār se huā sābit ki aadmī kā malāl aadmī se duurī thā 
khulā hai kab koī jauhar hijāb meñ 'akbar' guhar ke baab meñ tark-e-sadaf zarūrī thā 
bas ek tasalsul-e-takrar-e-qurb-o-duri tha visal o hijr ka har marhala uburi tha 
meri shikast bhi thi meri zat se mansub ki meri fikr ka har faisla shuuri tha 
thi jiti jagti duniya meri mohabbat ki na KHwab ka sa wo aalam ki la-shuuri tha 
talluqat mein aisa bhi ek moD aaya ki qurbaton pe bhi dil ko guman-e-duri tha 
riwayaton se kinara-kashi bhi lazim thi aur ehtiram-e-riwayat bhi zaruri tha 
mashini daur ke aazar se hua sabit ki aadmi ka malal aadmi se duri tha 
khula hai kab koi jauhar hijab mein 'akbar' guhar ke bab mein tark-e-sadaf zaruri tha

shaam ajiib shaam thī jis meñ koī ufaq na thā phuul bhī kaise phuul the jin ko suḳhan kā haq na thā 
yaar ajiib yaar thā jis ke hazār naam the shahr ajiib shahr thā jis meñ koī tabaq na thā 
haath meñ sab ke jild thī jis ke ajiib rañg the jis pe ajiib naam the aur koī varaq na thā 
jaise adam se aa.e hoñ log ajiib tarah ke jin kā lahū safed thā jin kā kaleja shaq na thā 
jin ke ajiib taur the jin meñ koī kiran na thī jin ke ajiib dars the jin meñ koī sabaq na thā 
log kaTe hue idhar log paḌe hue udhar jin ko koī alam na thā jin ko koī qalaq na thā 
jin kā jigar siyā huā jin kā lahū bujhā huā jin kā rafū kiyā huā chehra bahut adaq na thā 
kaisā tilismī shahr thā jis ke tufail raat bhī mere lahū meñ gard thī ā.īna-e-shafaq na thā 
sham ajib sham thi jis mein koi ufaq na tha phul bhi kaise phul the jin ko suKHan ka haq na tha 
yar ajib yar tha jis ke hazar nam the shahr ajib shahr tha jis mein koi tabaq na tha 
hath mein sab ke jild thi jis ke ajib rang the jis pe ajib nam the aur koi waraq na tha 
jaise adam se aae hon log ajib tarah ke jin ka lahu safed tha jin ka kaleja shaq na tha 
jin ke ajib taur the jin mein koi kiran na thi jin ke ajib dars the jin mein koi sabaq na tha 
log kaTe hue idhar log paDe hue udhar jin ko koi alam na tha jin ko koi qalaq na tha 
jin ka jigar siya hua jin ka lahu bujha hua jin ka rafu kiya hua chehra bahut adaq na tha 
kaisa tilismi shahr tha jis ke tufail raat bhi mere lahu mein gard thi aaina-e-shafaq na tha

sair-e-shab-e-lā-makāñ aur maiñ ek hue raftagāñ aur maiñ 
saañs ḳhalāoñ ne lī siina bhar phail gayā āsmāñ aur maiñ 
sar meñ sulagtī havā tishna-tar dam se ulajhtā dhuāñ aur maiñ 
ism-e-abad kī talāsh-e-tavīl husn-e-shuru-e-gumāñ aur maiñ 
merī farāvāniyāñ nau-ba-nau ab hai nashāt-e-ziyāñ aur maiñ 
donoñ taraf jañgaloñ kā sukūt shor bahut darmiyāñ aur maiñ 
ḳhaak o ḳhalā be-charāġh aur shab naqsh o navā be-nishāñ aur maiñ 
phir mire dil meñ koī taaza khoT phir koī saḳht imtihāñ aur maiñ 
kab se bhaTakte haiñ bāham alag lamha-e-kam-mehrbāñ aur maiñ 
duur chhatoñ par barastā thā qahr chup rahe kyuuñ tum yahāñ aur maiñ 
ġhair matālib kahīñ aur DhūñD sahl bahut sharh-e-jāñ aur maiñ 
sair-e-shab-e-la-makan aur main ek hue raftagan aur main 
sans KHalaon ne li sina bhar phail gaya aasman aur main 
sar mein sulagti hawa tishna-tar dam se ulajhta dhuan aur main 
ism-e-abad ki talash-e-tawil husn-e-shuru-e-guman aur main 
meri farawaniyan nau-ba-nau ab hai nashat-e-ziyan aur main 
donon taraf jangalon ka sukut shor bahut darmiyan aur main 
KHak o KHala be-charagh aur shab naqsh o nawa be-nishan aur main 
phir mere dil mein koi taza khoT phir koi saKHt imtihan aur main 
kab se bhaTakte hain baham alag lamha-e-kam-mehrban aur main 
dur chhaton par barasta tha qahr chup rahe kyun tum yahan aur main 
ghair matalib kahin aur DhunD sahl bahut sharh-e-jaan aur main

bahār aa.ī hai sote ko Tuk jagā denā junūñ zarā mirī zanjīr ko hilā denā 
tire laboñ se agar ho sake masīhā.ī to ek baat meñ jiitā huuñ maiñ jilā denā 
ab aage dekhiyo jītūñ na jītūñ yā qismat mirī bisāt meñ dil hai ise lagā denā 
rahūñ na garmī-e-majlis se maiñ tirī mahrūm sipand-vār mujhe bhī zarā tū jā denā 
ḳhudā kare tirī zulf-e-siyah kī umr darāz kabhī balā mujhe lenā kabhī duā denā 
ba-rañg-e-ġhuncha zar-e-gul ke ta.iiñ girah mat bāñdh 'fuġhāñ' jo haath meñ aave use uḌā denā 
bahaar aai hai sote ko Tuk jaga dena junun zara meri zanjir ko hila dena 
tere labon se agar ho sake masihai to ek baat mein jita hun main jila dena 
ab aage dekhiyo jitun na jitun ya qismat meri bisat mein dil hai ise laga dena 
rahun na garmi-e-majlis se main teri mahrum sipand-war mujhe bhi zara tu ja dena 
KHuda kare teri zulf-e-siyah ki umr daraaz kabhi bala mujhe lena kabhi dua dena 
ba-rang-e-ghuncha zar-e-gul ke tain girah mat bandh 'fughan' jo hath mein aawe use uDa dena

hamārī ham-nafasī ko bhī kyā davām huā vo abr-e-surḳh to maiñ naḳhl-e-intiqām huā 
yahīñ se mere adū kā ḳhamīr uTThā thā zamīn dekh ke maiñ teġh-e-be-niyām huā 
ḳhabar nahīñ hai mire bādshāh ko shāyad hazār martaba āzād ye ġhulām huā 
ajab safar thā ajab-tar musāfirat merī zamīñ shurū huī aur maiñ tamām huā 
vo kāhilī hai ki dil kī taraf se ġhāfil haiñ ḳhud apne ghar kā bhī ham se na intizām huā 
huī hai ḳhatm dar-o-bām kī kam-asbābī mayassar aaj vo sāmān-e-inhidām huā 
hamari ham-nafasi ko bhi kya dawam hua wo abr-e-surKH to main naKHl-e-intiqam hua 
yahin se mere adu ka KHamir uTTha tha zamin dekh ke main tegh-e-be-niyam hua 
KHabar nahin hai mere baadshah ko shayad hazar martaba aazad ye ghulam hua 
ajab safar tha ajab-tar musafirat meri zamin shuru hui aur main tamam hua 
wo kahili hai ki dil ki taraf se ghafil hain KHud apne ghar ka bhi hum se na intizam hua 
hui hai KHatm dar-o-baam ki kam-asbabi mayassar aaj wo saman-e-inhidam hua

naved-e-vasl-e-yār aa.e na aa.e barābar hai bahār aa.e na aa.e 
tujhe karnā hai jo kuchh aaj kar le ki phir ye rozgār aa.e na aa.e 
kiye jā dard-e-dil ai nā-murādī kisī ko e'tibār aa.e na aa.e 
koī pursāñ na ho jab hāl-e-bad kā tamannā sogvār aa.e na aa.e 
jo vo bil-farz ho pursish pa maa.il dil-e-bismil qarār aa.e na aa.e 
sitam se jab talāfī ho sitam kī tumhīñ kah do ki pyaar aa.e na aa.e 
'asar' hai aur lazzat be-ḳhudī kī vo jān-e-intizār aa.e na aa.e 
nawed-e-wasl-e-yar aae na aae barabar hai bahaar aae na aae 
tujhe karna hai jo kuchh aaj kar le ki phir ye rozgar aae na aae 
kiye ja dard-e-dil ai na-muradi kisi ko e'tibar aae na aae 
koi pursan na ho jab haal-e-bad ka tamanna sogwar aae na aae 
jo wo bil-farz ho pursish pa mail dil-e-bismil qarar aae na aae 
sitam se jab talafi ho sitam ki tumhin kah do ki pyar aae na aae 
'asar' hai aur lazzat be-KHudi ki wo jaan-e-intizar aae na aae

safar rasta sa.ūbat ḳhvāb sahrā samundar vāhima ḳhūnāb sahrā 
safīne bārisheñ tūfān mausam jazīre kashtiyāñ sailāb sahrā 
musāfir ret DanThal pyaas paanī khajūreñ baaġh ghar tālāb sahrā 
kalīsā maulvī rāhib pujārī kalas mīnār but mehrāb sahrā 
mashīneñ ghar dhuāñ gandum qatāreñ mulāzim niind bachche ḳhvāb sahrā 
zamīñ patthar shajar nahreñ kināre ḳhalā naqshe hadeñ girdāb sahrā 
safar rasta saubat KHwab sahra samundar wahima KHunab sahra 
safine barishen tufan mausam jazire kashtiyan sailab sahra 
musafir ret DanThal pyas pani khajuren bagh ghar talab sahra 
kalisa maulwi rahib pujari kalas minar but mehrab sahra 
mashinen ghar dhuan gandum qataren mulazim nind bachche KHwab sahra 
zamin patthar shajar nahren kinare KHala naqshe haden girdab sahra

māya-e-nāz-e-rāz haiñ ham log mahram-e-rāz-e-nāz haiñ ham log 
bazm-e-dil meñ diyā na aish ko baar sāhib-e-imtiyāz haiñ ham log 
ham se miltī hai barq-e-tūr ko daad vo tabassum-navāz haiñ ham log 
aql aajiz hai be-ḳhabar hai hosh chashm-e-bad-dūr raaz haiñ ham log 
hashr-e-ummīd se murād haiñ ham gila-hā-e-darāz haiñ ham log 
terī nāz-āfrīniyāñ haiñ gavāh ki sarāpā niyāz haiñ ham log 
husn be-jalva kuchh sahī 'fānī' jalva-e-jalva-sāz haiñ ham log 
maya-e-naz-e-raaz hain hum log mahram-e-raaz-e-naz hain hum log 
bazm-e-dil mein diya na aish ko bar sahib-e-imtiyaz hain hum log 
hum se milti hai barq-e-tur ko dad wo tabassum-nawaz hain hum log 
aql aajiz hai be-KHabar hai hosh chashm-e-bad-dur raaz hain hum log 
hashr-e-ummid se murad hain hum gila-ha-e-daraaz hain hum log 
teri naz-afriniyan hain gawah ki sarapa niyaz hain hum log 
husn be-jalwa kuchh sahi 'fani' jalwa-e-jalwa-saz hain hum log

khoyā huā thā hāsil hone vaalā huuñ maiñ kāġhaz par nāzil hone vaalā huuñ 
chhoḌ aayā huuñ pīchhe sab āvāzoñ ko ḳhāmoshī meñ dāḳhil hone vaalā huuñ 
ḳhud hī apnā rasta dekh rahā huuñ maiñ ḳhud hī apnī manzil hone vaalā huuñ 
mujh ko sharīk-e-mahfil bhī kab samjheñ vo maiñ jo jān-e-mahfil hone vaalā huuñ 
jaane kyā kah jā.egā Dar lagtā hai ā.īñe ke muqābil hone vaalā huuñ 
ruuh sulagtī aur pighaltī jaatī hai ek badan meñ shāmil hone vaalā huuñ 
āḳhir kab tak apne naaz uThā.ūñ 'shāz' aaj apnā hī qātil hone vaalā huuñ 
khoya hua tha hasil hone wala hun main kaghaz par nazil hone wala hun 
chhoD aaya hun pichhe sab aawazon ko KHamoshi mein daKHil hone wala hun 
KHud hi apna rasta dekh raha hun main KHud hi apni manzil hone wala hun 
mujh ko sharik-e-mahfil bhi kab samjhen wo main jo jaan-e-mahfil hone wala hun 
jaane kya kah jaega Dar lagta hai aaine ke muqabil hone wala hun 
ruh sulagti aur pighalti jati hai ek badan mein shamil hone wala hun 
aaKHir kab tak apne naz uThaun 'shaz' aaj apna hi qatil hone wala hun

zulf terī ne pareshāñ kiyā ai yaar mujhe terī āñkhoñ ne kiyā aap sā bīmār mujhe 
dil bujhā jaa.e hai aġhyār kī shorish pe mirā sard kartī hai tirī garmi-e-bāzār mujhe 
aql hī maujib-e-taklīf huī hai nādāñ kar ga.ī be-ḳhabarī aa ke ḳhabar-dār mujhe 
taḳht aur chhitr salātīñ ko mubārak hove bas hai kūche meñ tire sāya-e-dīvār mujhe 
juuñ misāl us kī numūdār huī tuuñ hī 'bayāñ' tapish-e-dil ne kiyā ḳhvāb se bedār mujhe 
zulf teri ne pareshan kiya ai yar mujhe teri aankhon ne kiya aap sa bimar mujhe 
dil bujha jae hai aghyar ki shorish pe mera sard karti hai teri garmi-e-bazar mujhe 
aql hi maujib-e-taklif hui hai nadan kar gai be-KHabari aa ke KHabar-dar mujhe 
taKHt aur chhitr salatin ko mubarak howe bas hai kuche mein tere saya-e-diwar mujhe 
jun misal us ki numudar hui tun hi 'bayan' tapish-e-dil ne kiya KHwab se bedar mujhe

jis ne tujhe ḳhalvat meñ bhī tanhā nahīñ dekhā us dekhne vaale kā kaleja nahīñ dekhā 
uf uf vo uchaTtī sī nigāh-e-ġhalat-andāz is tarah se dekhā hai ki goyā nahīñ dekhā 
jis gul ko ye sab DhūñDtī phirtī haiñ havā.eñ tū ne to use nargis-e-shahlā nahīñ dekhā 
dam āñkhoñ meñ aTkā hai ḳhudā ke liye aao phir ye na gila ho mirā rastā nahīñ dekhā 
'shā.ir' ye ġhazal likkhī hai yā jaḌ diye motī duniyā meñ qalamkār bhī aisā nahīñ dekhā 
jis ne tujhe KHalwat mein bhi tanha nahin dekha us dekhne wale ka kaleja nahin dekha 
uf uf wo uchaTti si nigah-e-ghalat-andaz is tarah se dekha hai ki goya nahin dekha 
jis gul ko ye sab DhunDti phirti hain hawaen tu ne to use nargis-e-shahla nahin dekha 
dam aankhon mein aTka hai KHuda ke liye aao phir ye na gila ho mera rasta nahin dekha 
'shair' ye ghazal likkhi hai ya jaD diye moti duniya mein qalamkar bhi aisa nahin dekha

maiñ ḳhud ko is liye manzar pe laane vaalā nahīñ ki aa.ina mirī sūrat dikhāne vaalā nahīñ 
tire falak kā agar chāñd bujh gayā hai to kyā diyā zamīñ pe bhī koī jalāne vaalā nahīñ 
samundaroñ kī taraf jā rahā huuñ jaltā huā ki merī aag ko bādal bujhāne vaalā nahīñ 
ye kaun niind meñ aakar sirhāne baiTh gayā maiñ apnā ḳhvāb kisī ko batāne vaalā nahīñ 
ab is qadar bhī takalluf se mil rahe ho kyuuñ tumhāre saath to rishta zamāne vaalā nahīñ 
kamar kamān huī jā rahī yuuñ 'gauhar' maiñ jaise ḳhud ko dobāra uThāne vaalā nahīñ 
main KHud ko is liye manzar pe lane wala nahin ki aaina meri surat dikhane wala nahin 
tere falak ka agar chand bujh gaya hai to kya diya zamin pe bhi koi jalane wala nahin 
samundaron ki taraf ja raha hun jalta hua ki meri aag ko baadal bujhane wala nahin 
ye kaun nind mein aakar sirhane baiTh gaya main apna KHwab kisi ko batane wala nahin 
ab is qadar bhi takalluf se mil rahe ho kyun tumhaare sath to rishta zamane wala nahin 
kamar kaman hui ja rahi yun 'gauhar' main jaise KHud ko dobara uThane wala nahin

dam na niklā yaar kī nā-mehrbānī dekh kar saḳht hairāñ huuñ maiñ apnī saḳht-jānī dekh kar 
shaam se tā-sub.h-e-furqat sub.h se tā-shām-e-hijr ham chale kyā kyā na lutf-e-zindagānī dekh kar 
yuuñ to lākhoñ ġham-zada hoñge magar ai āsmāñ jab tujhe jānūñ ki lā de merā saanī dekh kar 
ab tap-e-furqat se ye kuchh zof taarī hai ki aah dañg rah jaatī hai ham ko nā-tavānī dekh kar 
vāste jis ke hue bahr-e-fanā ke āshnā vo pasījā bhī na apnī jāñ-fishānī dekh kar 
baaz aa 'bīmār' us ke ishq se jaane bhī de taras aatā hai ye terī naujavānī dekh kar 
dam na nikla yar ki na-mehrbani dekh kar saKHt hairan hun main apni saKHt-jaani dekh kar 
sham se ta-subh-e-furqat subh se ta-sham-e-hijr hum chale kya kya na lutf-e-zindagani dekh kar 
yun to lakhon gham-zada honge magar ai aasman jab tujhe jaanun ki la de mera sani dekh kar 
ab tap-e-furqat se ye kuchh zof tari hai ki aah dang rah jati hai hum ko na-tawani dekh kar 
waste jis ke hue bahr-e-fana ke aashna wo pasija bhi na apni jaan-fishani dekh kar 
baz aa 'bimar' us ke ishq se jaane bhi de taras aata hai ye teri naujawani dekh kar

mohabbat karne vāloñ ke bahār-afroz sīnoñ meñ rahā kartī hai shādābī ḳhizāñ ke bhī mahīnoñ meñ 
ziyā-e-mehr āñkhoñ meñ hai tauba mah-jabīnoñ ke ki fitrat ne bharā hai husn ḳhud apnā hasīnoñ meñ 
havā-e-tund hai girdāb hai pur-shor dhārā hai liye jaate haiñ zauq-e-āfiyat sī shai safīnoñ meñ 
maiñ hañstā huuñ magar ai dost aksar hañste hue bhī chhupā.e hote haiñ daaġh aur nāsūr apne sīnoñ meñ 
maiñ un meñ huuñ jo ho kar āstān-e-dost se mahrūm liye phirte haiñ sajdoñ kī taḌap apnī jabīnoñ meñ 
mirī ġhazleñ paḌheñ sab ahl-e-dil aur mast ho jaa.eñ mai-e-jazbāt laayā huuñ maiñ lafzī ābgīnoñ meñ 
mohabbat karne walon ke bahaar-afroz sinon mein raha karti hai shadabi KHizan ke bhi mahinon mein 
ziya-e-mehr aankhon mein hai tauba mah-jabinon ke ki fitrat ne bhara hai husn KHud apna hasinon mein 
hawa-e-tund hai girdab hai pur-shor dhaara hai liye jate hain zauq-e-afiyat si shai safinon mein 
main hansta hun magar ai dost aksar hanste hue bhi chhupae hote hain dagh aur nasur apne sinon mein 
main un mein hun jo ho kar aastan-e-dost se mahrum liye phirte hain sajdon ki taDap apni jabinon mein 
meri ghazlen paDhen sab ahl-e-dil aur mast ho jaen mai-e-jazbaat laya hun main lafzi aabginon mein

duā kī raakh pe marmar kā itr-dāñ us kā gazīdgī ke liye dast-e-mehrbāñ us kā 
gahan ke roz vo dāġhī huī jabīñ us kī shab-e-shikast vahī jism be-amāñ us kā 
kamand-e-ġhair meñ sab asp o gosfand us ke nasheb-e-ḳhāk meñ ḳhufta-sitāra-dāñ us kā 
tannūr-e-yaḳh meñ ThiThurte haiñ ḳhvāb o ḳhuuñ us ke likhā hai naam sar-e-lauh-e-raftagāñ us kā 
chunī huī haiñ tah-e-ḳhisht uñgliyāñ us kī khulā huā hai pas-e-reg bādbāñ us kā 
vo ik charāġh hai dīvār-e-ḳhastagī pe rukā havā ho tez to har haal meñ ziyāñ us kā 
usī se dhuup hai ambār-e-dhund hai rū-posh giraft-e-ḳhvāb se barsar hai kārvāñ us kā 
dua ki rakh pe marmar ka itr-dan us ka gazidgi ke liye dast-e-mehrban us ka 
gahan ke roz wo daghi hui jabin us ki shab-e-shikast wahi jism be-aman us ka 
kamand-e-ghair mein sab asp o gosfand us ke nasheb-e-KHak mein KHufta-sitara-dan us ka 
tannur-e-yaKH mein ThiThurte hain KHwab o KHun us ke likha hai nam sar-e-lauh-e-raftagan us ka 
chuni hui hain tah-e-KHisht ungliyan us ki khula hua hai pas-e-reg baadban us ka 
wo ek charagh hai diwar-e-KHastagi pe ruka hawa ho tez to har haal mein ziyan us ka 
usi se dhup hai ambar-e-dhund hai ru-posh giraft-e-KHwab se barsar hai karwan us ka

ġham-zada haiñ mubtalā-e-dard haiñ nāshād haiñ ham kisī afsāna-e-ġhamnāk ke afrād haiñ 
gardish-e-aflāk ke hāthoñ bahut barbād haiñ ham lab-e-ayyām par ik dukh bharī fariyād haiñ 
hāfize par ishratoñ ke naqsh baaqī haiñ abhī tū ne jo sadme sahe ai dil tujhe bhī yaad haiñ 
raat bhar kahte haiñ taare dil se rūdād-e-shabāb in ko merī vo shabāb-afroz rāteñ yaad haiñ 
aḳhtar'-e-nā-shād kī parchhā.īñ se bachte raheñ jo zamāne meñ shagufta-ḳhātir o dil-e-shād haiñ 
gham-zada hain mubtala-e-dard hain nashad hain hum kisi afsana-e-ghamnak ke afrad hain 
gardish-e-aflak ke hathon bahut barbaad hain hum lab-e-ayyam par ek dukh bhari fariyaad hain 
hafize par ishraton ke naqsh baqi hain abhi tu ne jo sadme sahe ai dil tujhe bhi yaad hain 
raat bhar kahte hain tare dil se rudad-e-shabab in ko meri wo shabab-afroz raaten yaad hain 
aKHtar'-e-na-shad ki parchhain se bachte rahen jo zamane mein shagufta-KHatir o dil-e-shad hain

tajdīd-e-rasm-o-rāh-e-mulāqāt kījiye mujh se nazar milā ke zarā baat kījiye 
dair o haram meñ ruuh kī taskīñ na ho sakī ab ehtirām-e-pīr-e-ḳharābāt kījiye 
āḳhir janāb-e-shaiḳh haiñ mehmān-e-mai-kada do-chār jaam de ke mudārāt kījiye 
guftār-e-talḳh sheva-e-vā.iz hai mai-kasho shīrīñ dahan kī aap se kyā baat kījiye 
aayā hai koī pursish-e-ahvāl ke liye pesh āñsuoñ kī aap bhī sauġhāt kījiye 
'anvar' ḳhayāl-e-dost meñ likh kar koī ġhazal takmīl-e-tarjumāni-e-jazbāt kījiye 
tajdid-e-rasm-o-rah-e-mulaqat kijiye mujh se nazar mila ke zara baat kijiye 
dair o haram mein ruh ki taskin na ho saki ab ehtiram-e-pir-e-KHarabaat kijiye 
aaKHir janab-e-shaiKH hain mehman-e-mai-kada do-chaar jam de ke mudaraat kijiye 
guftar-e-talKH shewa-e-waiz hai mai-kasho shirin dahan ki aap se kya baat kijiye 
aaya hai koi pursish-e-ahwal ke liye pesh aansuon ki aap bhi saughat kijiye 
'anwar' KHayal-e-dost mein likh kar koi ghazal takmil-e-tarjumani-e-jazbaat kijiye

kashish to ab bhī ġhazab kī hai nāznīnoñ meñ magar vo chāñd chamaktā nahīñ jabīnoñ meñ 
ye sab ke chehroñ meñ yaksāniyat sī kaisī hai hasīn-tar koī jachtā nahīñ hasīnoñ meñ 
jo mere zehn meñ thī sabza-zār ḳhvāb meñ thī kahāñ vo fasl ugaa.ī ga.ī zamīnoñ meñ 
shu.ūr-e-umr se afzūñ huī hai umr-e-shu.ūr hamāre saal guzarne lage mahīnoñ meñ 
zabāñ se roz maiñ tā.īd-e-izn kartā huuñ chhupe haiñ but bhī magar merī āstīnoñ meñ 
numā.isheñ na furūī takallufāt yahāñ kahāñ tum aa ga.e ham boriyā-nashīnoñ meñ 
ba-juz tumhāre nahīñ koī ḳhānqāhī ab maiñ kis kā naam likhūñ apne nukta-chīnoñ meñ 
kashish to ab bhi ghazab ki hai nazninon mein magar wo chand chamakta nahin jabinon mein 
ye sab ke chehron mein yaksaniyat si kaisi hai hasin-tar koi jachta nahin hasinon mein 
jo mere zehn mein thi sabza-zar KHwab mein thi kahan wo fasl ugai gai zaminon mein 
shuur-e-umr se afzun hui hai umr-e-shuur hamare sal guzarne lage mahinon mein 
zaban se roz main taid-e-izn karta hun chhupe hain but bhi magar meri aastinon mein 
numaishen na furui takallufat yahan kahan tum aa gae hum boriya-nashinon mein 
ba-juz tumhaare nahin koi KHanqahi ab main kis ka nam likhun apne nukta-chinon mein

qamar kī vo ḳhurshīd tasvīr hai gale meñ sitāroñ kī zanjīr hai 
kahāñ pā-e-jānāñ kahāñ merā sar ye taal.e ye qismat ye taqdīr hai 
ḳhafā aap se aap hote ho kyuuñ batā do jo kuchh merī taqsīr hai 
na kholo ḳhat us kā dhaḌaktā hai dil ḳhudā jaane kyā is meñ tahrīr hai 
numāyāñ hai qaus-e-quzah abr meñ misī par likhauTe kī tahrīr hai 
munāsib hai kuchh khā ke mar jaao 'barq' yahī dard-e-furqat kī tadbīr hai 
qamar ki wo KHurshid taswir hai gale mein sitaron ki zanjir hai 
kahan pa-e-jaanan kahan mera sar ye tale ye qismat ye taqdir hai 
KHafa aap se aap hote ho kyun bata do jo kuchh meri taqsir hai 
na kholo KHat us ka dhaDakta hai dil KHuda jaane kya is mein tahrir hai 
numayan hai qaus-e-quzah abr mein misi par likhauTe ki tahrir hai 
munasib hai kuchh kha ke mar jao 'barq' yahi dard-e-furqat ki tadbir hai

tilism-e-kār-e-jahāñ kā asar tamām huā ki ḳhaak baiTh ga.ī ab safar tamām huā 
bas ik sukūt bikhartā huā hai chāroñ taraf har ek ma.arka-e-ḳhair-o-shar tamām huā 
kahīñ sakūñ na milā ishq se farār ke ba.ad kisī tarah na mirā dard-e-sar tamām huā 
gharoñ meñ Dhaltī huī raat thak ke baiTh ga.ī ki ab fasāna-e-dīvār-o-dar tamām huā 
sab apnī apnī ḳhabar le rahe haiñ vaqt-e-zavāl diloñ se be-ḳhabarī kā asar tamām huā 
phir us ke rū-ba-rū ham dil kī baat kah na sake hamārā hausla bār-e-digar tamām huā 
har ek dāstāñ tujh se shurūa hotī hai har ek qissa tire naam par tamām huā 
na koī baat mukammal huī mirī 'aḳhtar' na koī kaam mirā sar-ba-sar tamām huā 
tilism-e-kar-e-jahan ka asar tamam hua ki KHak baiTh gai ab safar tamam hua 
bas ek sukut bikharta hua hai chaaron taraf har ek marka-e-KHair-o-shar tamam hua 
kahin sakun na mila ishq se farar ke baad kisi tarah na mera dard-e-sar tamam hua 
gharon mein Dhalti hui raat thak ke baiTh gai ki ab fasana-e-diwar-o-dar tamam hua 
sab apni apni KHabar le rahe hain waqt-e-zawal dilon se be-KHabari ka asar tamam hua 
phir us ke ru-ba-ru hum dil ki baat kah na sake hamara hausla bar-e-digar tamam hua 
har ek dastan tujh se shurua hoti hai har ek qissa tere nam par tamam hua 
na koi baat mukammal hui meri 'aKHtar' na koi kaam mera sar-ba-sar tamam hua

do ghaḌī baiThe the zulf-e-ambarīñ kī chhāñv meñ chubh gayā kāñTā dil-e-hasrat-zada ke paañv meñ 
kam nahīñ haiñ jab ki shahroñ meñ bhī kuchh vīrāniyāñ kis tavaqqo' par koī jā.egā ab sahrāoñ meñ 
kachchī kaliyāñ pakkī fasleñ sar chhupā.eñgī kahāñ aag shahroñ kī lapak kar aa rahī hai gaañv meñ 
zaḳhm-e-nazzārā haiñ jismoñ kī barahna Tahniyāñ aise patjhaḌ meñ khileñge phuul kyā āshāoñ meñ 
kyā kahūñ tūl-e-shab-e-ġham pal meñ sadiyāñ Dhal ga.iiñ vaqt yuuñ guzrā ki jaise aable hoñ paañv meñ 
zindagī meñ aisī kuchh tuġhyāniyāñ aatī rahīñ bah ga.iiñ haiñ 'umr bhar kī nekiyāñ dariyāoñ meñ 
jalte mausam meñ koī fāriġh nazar aatā nahīñ Dūbtā jaatā hai har ik peḌ apnī chhāñv meñ 
do ghaDi baiThe the zulf-e-ambarin ki chhanw mein chubh gaya kanTa dil-e-hasrat-zada ke panw mein 
kam nahin hain jab ki shahron mein bhi kuchh viraniyan kis tawaqqo' par koi jaega ab sahraon mein 
kachchi kaliyan pakki faslen sar chhupaengi kahan aag shahron ki lapak kar aa rahi hai ganw mein 
zaKHm-e-nazzara hain jismon ki barahna Tahniyan aise patjhaD mein khilenge phul kya aashaon mein 
kya kahun tul-e-shab-e-gham pal mein sadiyan Dhal gain waqt yun guzra ki jaise aable hon panw mein 
zindagi mein aisi kuchh tughyaniyan aati rahin bah gain hain 'umr bhar ki nekiyan dariyaon mein 
jalte mausam mein koi farigh nazar aata nahin Dubta jata hai har ek peD apni chhanw mein

jal bujhā huuñ maiñ magar saarā jahāñ taak meñ hai koī tāsīr to maujūd mirī ḳhaak meñ hai 
kheñchtī rahtī hai har lamha mujhe apnī taraf jaane kyā chiiz hai jo parda-e-aflāk meñ hai 
koī sūrat bhī nahīñ miltī kisī sūrat meñ kūza-gar kaisā karishma tire is chaak meñ hai 
kaise Thahrūñ ki kisī shahr se miltā hī nahīñ ek naqsha jo mire dīda-e-namnāk meñ hai 
ye ilāqa bhī magar dil hī ke taabe Thahrā ham samajhte the amaañ gosha-e-idrāk meñ hai 
qatl hote haiñ yahāñ nāra-e-elān ke saath vaz.a-dārī to abhī ālam-e-saffāk meñ hai 
kitnī chīzoñ ke bhalā naam tujhe ginvā.ūñ saarī duniyā hī to shāmil mirī imlāk meñ hai 
rā.egāñ koī bhī shai hotī nahīñ hai 'ālam' ġhaur se dekhiye kyā kyā ḳhas-o-ḳhāshāk meñ hai 
jal bujha hun main magar sara jahan tak mein hai koi tasir to maujud meri KHak mein hai 
khenchti rahti hai har lamha mujhe apni taraf jaane kya chiz hai jo parda-e-aflak mein hai 
koi surat bhi nahin milti kisi surat mein kuza-gar kaisa karishma tere is chaak mein hai 
kaise Thahrun ki kisi shahr se milta hi nahin ek naqsha jo mere dida-e-namnak mein hai 
ye ilaqa bhi magar dil hi ke tabe Thahra hum samajhte the aman gosha-e-idrak mein hai 
qatl hote hain yahan nara-e-elan ke sath waza-dari to abhi aalam-e-saffak mein hai 
kitni chizon ke bhala nam tujhe ginwaun sari duniya hi to shamil meri imlak mein hai 
raegan koi bhi shai hoti nahin hai 'alam' ghaur se dekhiye kya kya KHas-o-KHashak mein hai

na kū-e-yār meñ Thahrā na anjuman meñ rahā adā-e-nāz se ye dil sarā-e-fan meñ rahā 
hazāroñ tūfāñ uThā.e haiñ vaqt aane par lahū bhī ḳhaas adā se mire badan meñ rahā 
maiñ ek rañg thā rañg-e-ḳhayāl-e-āvāra kisī dhanak meñ kisī rut ke pairahan meñ rahā 
anā hī thī ki na jhukne diyā kabhī mujh ko pahāḌ sar pe uThā kar bhī bāñkpan meñ rahā 
vo maiñ hī thā ki koī aur thā nahīñ ma.alūm tamām umr jo mere hī jaan o tan meñ rahā 
safīr-e-jāñ ke liye manzileñ nahīñ hotīñ koī paḌāv bhī aayā to vo thakan meñ rahā 
uThī jo saif-e-sitam be-niyāz-e-maut-o-hayāt qalam-ba-dast khaḌā vādī-e-suḳhan meñ rahā 
na ku-e-yar mein Thahra na anjuman mein raha ada-e-naz se ye dil sara-e-fan mein raha 
hazaron tufan uThae hain waqt aane par lahu bhi KHas ada se mere badan mein raha 
main ek rang tha rang-e-KHayal-e-awara kisi dhanak mein kisi rut ke pairahan mein raha 
ana hi thi ki na jhukne diya kabhi mujh ko pahaD sar pe uTha kar bhi bankpan mein raha 
wo main hi tha ki koi aur tha nahin malum tamam umr jo mere hi jaan o tan mein raha 
safir-e-jaan ke liye manzilen nahin hotin koi paDaw bhi aaya to wo thakan mein raha 
uThi jo saif-e-sitam be-niyaz-e-maut-o-hayat qalam-ba-dast khaDa wadi-e-suKHan mein raha

kisī kā dhyān mah-e-nīm-māh meñ aayā safar kī raat thī aur ḳhvāb raah meñ aayā 
tulū-e-sā.at-e-shab-ḳhūñ hai aur merā dil kisī sitāra-e-bad kī nigāh meñ aayā 
mah o sitāra se dil kī taraf chalā vo javāñ adū kī qaid se apnī sipāh meñ aayā 
jihād-e-ġham meñ koī sust zarb merī tarah giraft-e-maisara-e-ashk-o-āh meñ aayā 
sitāre Duub ga.e aur vo sitāra-gar thakan se chuur zamīñ kī panāh meñ aayā 
charāġh hai mirī rātoñ kā ek ḳhvāb-e-visāl jo koī pal tirī chashm-e-siyāh meñ aayā 
dukhī diloñ kī salāmī qubūl karte hue nazar jhukā.e koī ḳhānqāh meñ aayā 
kisi ka dhyan mah-e-nim-mah mein aaya safar ki raat thi aur KHwab rah mein aaya 
tulu-e-saat-e-shab-KHun hai aur mera dil kisi sitara-e-bad ki nigah mein aaya 
mah o sitara se dil ki taraf chala wo jawan adu ki qaid se apni sipah mein aaya 
jihad-e-gham mein koi sust zarb meri tarah giraft-e-maisara-e-ashk-o-ah mein aaya 
sitare Dub gae aur wo sitara-gar thakan se chur zamin ki panah mein aaya 
charagh hai meri raaton ka ek KHwab-e-visal jo koi pal teri chashm-e-siyah mein aaya 
dukhi dilon ki salami qubul karte hue nazar jhukae koi KHanqah mein aaya

lutf hī lutf hai jo kuchh hai ināyat ke sivā hai mohabbat se sivā jo hai mohabbat ke sivā 
dostoñ ke karam-e-ḳhās se bachne ke liye koī gosha na milā gosha-e-uzlat ke sivā 
mujh se shikva bhī jo karte haiñ to ye kahte haiñ kuchh bhī aatā hī nahīñ tujh ko shikāyat ke sivā 
aap ke ḳhat ko maiñ kis baat kā ġhammāz kahūñ is meñ sab kuchh hai bas ik harf-e-mohabbat ke sivā 
jis qadar chāho gunāhoñ pe hañso ḳhuub hañso ye ilaaj aur bhī hai ashk-e-nidāmat ke sivā 
vo jo kahte haiñ ki hai fahm o firāsat ham se aise logoñ meñ sabhī kuchh hai firāsat ke sivā 
is na.ī baat ko bhī 'arsh' kabhī sochā hai aaj kal sher meñ jiddat hai to jiddat ke sivā 
lutf hi lutf hai jo kuchh hai inayat ke siwa hai mohabbat se siwa jo hai mohabbat ke siwa 
doston ke karam-e-KHas se bachne ke liye koi gosha na mila gosha-e-uzlat ke siwa 
mujh se shikwa bhi jo karte hain to ye kahte hain kuchh bhi aata hi nahin tujh ko shikayat ke siwa 
aap ke KHat ko main kis baat ka ghammaz kahun is mein sab kuchh hai bas ek harf-e-mohabbat ke siwa 
jis qadar chaho gunahon pe hanso KHub hanso ye ilaj aur bhi hai ashk-e-nidamat ke siwa
