wo jo kahte hain ki hai fahm o firasat hum se aise logon mein sabhi kuchh hai firasat ke siwa 
is nai baat ko bhi 'arsh' kabhi socha hai aaj kal sher mein jiddat hai to jiddat ke siwa

bahut na hausala-e-izz-o-jāh mujh se huā faqat farāz-e-nagīn-o-nigāh mujh se huā 
charāġh-e-shab ne mujhe apne ḳhvāb meñ dekhā sitāra-e-saharī ḳhush-nigāh mujh se huā 
giraft-e-kūzā se ik ḳhaak merī samt baḌhī saf-e-sarāb koī sadd-e-rāh mujh se huā 
shab-e-fasāna-o-farsañg us se mil aayā jo māvarā-e-safed-o-siyāh mujh se huā 
sar-e-gurez-o-gumāñ us ne imtihān liyā jo ham-kanār mirā kam-nigāh mujh se huā 
Kamān-e-ḳhāna-e-aflāk ke muqābil bhī maiñ us se aur vo phir kaj-kulāh mujh se huā 
jo sail-e-hijrat-e-gul thā mire qadam se rukā kamand lamha-e-sad-ishtibāh mujh se huā 
niyām-zad na huī mujh se teġh-e-hairānī shikaste-e-ā.ina-e-intibāh mujh se huā 
bahut na hausala-e-izz-o-jah mujh se hua faqat faraaz-e-nagin-o-nigah mujh se hua 
charagh-e-shab ne mujhe apne KHwab mein dekha sitara-e-sahari KHush-nigah mujh se hua 
giraft-e-kuza se ek KHak meri samt baDhi saf-e-sarab koi sadd-e-rah mujh se hua 
shab-e-fasana-o-farsang us se mil aaya jo mawara-e-safed-o-siyah mujh se hua 
sar-e-gurez-o-guman us ne imtihan liya jo ham-kanar mera kam-nigah mujh se hua 
Kaman-e-KHana-e-aflak ke muqabil bhi main us se aur wo phir kaj-kulah mujh se hua 
jo sail-e-hijrat-e-gul tha mere qadam se ruka kamand lamha-e-sad-ishtibah mujh se hua 
niyam-zad na hui mujh se tegh-e-hairani shikaste-e-aina-e-intibah mujh se hua

kidhar jā.ūñ kahīñ rastā nahīñ hai kahāñ Dūbūñ ki dil dariyā nahīñ hai 
idhar bādal kabhī barsā nahīñ hai jahāñ tak shāḳh hai patta nahīñ hai 
use chhat par khaḌe dekhā thā maiñ ne ki jis ke ghar kā darvāza nahīñ hai 
vahī hai ghoñsla chimnī ke pīchhe magar chiḌiyoñ kā vo joḌā nahīñ hai 
badan ke loch tak āzād hai vo use tahzīb ne bāñdhā nahīñ hai 
tire hoñToñ ko chhū dekhūñ to kahiyo mire hoñToñ meñ kyā aisā nahīñ hai 
badan Dhāñpe hue phirtā huuñ yaanī havas ke naam par dhāgā nahīñ hai 
sabhī insāñ farishte ho ga.e haiñ kisī dīvār meñ saaya nahīñ hai 
maiñ is darja muazzaz ho gayā huuñ vo mere sāmne hañstā nahīñ hai 
kidhar jaun kahin rasta nahin hai kahan Dubun ki dil dariya nahin hai 
idhar baadal kabhi barsa nahin hai jahan tak shaKH hai patta nahin hai 
use chhat par khaDe dekha tha main ne ki jis ke ghar ka darwaza nahin hai 
wahi hai ghonsla chimni ke pichhe magar chiDiyon ka wo joDa nahin hai 
badan ke loch tak aazad hai wo use tahzib ne bandha nahin hai 
tere honTon ko chhu dekhun to kahiyo mere honTon mein kya aisa nahin hai 
badan Dhanpe hue phirta hun yani hawas ke nam par dhaga nahin hai 
sabhi insan farishte ho gae hain kisi diwar mein saya nahin hai 
main is darja muazzaz ho gaya hun wo mere samne hansta nahin hai

khulā na mujh se tabī.at kā thā bahut gahrā hazār us se rahā rābta bahut gahrā 
bas is qadar ki ye hijrat kī umr kaT jaa.e na mujh ġharīb se rakh silsila bahut gahrā 
sab apne ā.īne us ne mujhī ko sauñp diye use shikast kā ehsās thā bahut gahrā 
mujhe tilism samajhtā thā vo sarāboñ kā baḌhā jo aage samundar milā bahut gahrā 
shadīd pyaas ke aalam meñ Dūbne se bachā qadah to kyā mujhe qatra lagā bahut gahrā 
tū us kī zad meñ jo aayā to Duub jā.egā ba-qadr-e-āb hai har aa.ina bahut gahrā 
mileñge raah meñ tujh ko charāġh jalte hue kahīñ kahīñ hai mirā naqsh-e-pā bahut gahrā 
talāsh-e-ma.ani-e-maqsūd itnī sahl na thī maiñ lafz lafz utartā gayā bahut gahrā 
jo baat jān-e-suḳhan thī vahī rahī ojhal liyā to us ne mirā jā.eza bahut gahrā 
qadīm hote hue mujh se bhī jadīd hai vo asar hai us pe mire daur kā bahut gahrā 
'fazā' hameñ to hai kaafī yahī ḳhumār-e-vajūd hai be-sharāb bhī hāsil nasha bahut gahrā 
khula na mujh se tabiat ka tha bahut gahra hazar us se raha rabta bahut gahra 
bas is qadar ki ye hijrat ki umr kaT jae na mujh gharib se rakh silsila bahut gahra 
sab apne aaine us ne mujhi ko saunp diye use shikast ka ehsas tha bahut gahra 
mujhe tilism samajhta tha wo sarabon ka baDha jo aage samundar mila bahut gahra 
shadid pyas ke aalam mein Dubne se bacha qadah to kya mujhe qatra laga bahut gahra 
tu us ki zad mein jo aaya to Dub jaega ba-qadr-e-ab hai har aaina bahut gahra 
milenge rah mein tujh ko charagh jalte hue kahin kahin hai mera naqsh-e-pa bahut gahra 
talash-e-mani-e-maqsud itni sahl na thi main lafz lafz utarta gaya bahut gahra 
jo baat jaan-e-suKHan thi wahi rahi ojhal liya to us ne mera jaeza bahut gahra 
qadim hote hue mujh se bhi jadid hai wo asar hai us pe mere daur ka bahut gahra 
'faza' hamein to hai kafi yahi KHumar-e-wajud hai be-sharab bhi hasil nasha bahut gahra

jab bhī mausam-e-hunar harf o bayāñ le jaa.e yuuñ lage jism se jaise koī jaañ le jaa.e 
ham ki haiñ naqsh sar-e-reg-e-ravāñk kyā jaane kab koī mauj-e-havā apnā nishāñ le jaa.e 
ek āzādī ki zindānī-e-ḳhvāhish kar de ik asīrī ki karāñ-tā-ba-karāñ le jaa.e 
vahshat-e-shauq muqaddar thī so bachte kab tak ab to ye sail-e-balā-ḳhez jahāñ le jaa.e 
ek parchhā.īñ ke pīchhe haiñ azal se 'ālī' ye ta.āqub hameñ kyā jaane kahāñ le jaa.e 
jab bhi mausam-e-hunar harf o bayan le jae yun lage jism se jaise koi jaan le jae 
hum ki hain naqsh sar-e-reg-e-rawank kya jaane kab koi mauj-e-hawa apna nishan le jae 
ek aazadi ki zindani-e-KHwahish kar de ek asiri ki karan-ta-ba-karan le jae 
wahshat-e-shauq muqaddar thi so bachte kab tak ab to ye sail-e-bala-KHez jahan le jae 
ek parchhain ke pichhe hain azal se 'ali' ye taaqub hamein kya jaane kahan le jae

ḳhuun āñkhoñ se nikaltā hī rahā kārvān-e-ashk chaltā hī rahā 
is kaf-e-pā par tire rañg-e-hinā jin ne dekhā haath maltā hī rahā 
sub.h hote bujh ga.e saare charāġh dāġh-e-dil tā shaam jaltā hī rahā 
kab huā bekār putlā ḳhaak kā ye to sau qālib meñ Dhaltā hī rahā 
beh hue kab daaġh mere jism ke ye shajar har vaqt phaltā hī rahā 
kab thamā āñkhoñ se merī ḳhūn-e-dil josh khā khā kar ubaltā hī rahā 
kyā huā marham lagāne se 'fuġhāñ' zaḳhm-e-dil siine meñ saltā hī rahā 
KHun aankhon se nikalta hi raha karwan-e-ashk chalta hi raha 
is kaf-e-pa par tere rang-e-hina jin ne dekha hath malta hi raha 
subh hote bujh gae sare charagh dagh-e-dil ta sham jalta hi raha 
kab hua bekar putla KHak ka ye to sau qalib mein Dhalta hi raha 
beh hue kab dagh mere jism ke ye shajar har waqt phalta hi raha 
kab thama aankhon se meri KHun-e-dil josh kha kha kar ubalta hi raha 
kya hua marham lagane se 'fughan' zaKHm-e-dil sine mein salta hi raha

lakīr-e-sañg ko anqā-misāl ham ne kiyā bhulā diyā use dil se kamāl ham ne kiyā 
shurū us ne kiyā thā tamāsha qurbat kā phir us ke baad to saarā dhamāl ham ne kiyā 
ulaT ke rakh diye ham ne junūñ ke saare usuul junūb-e-dasht ko shahr-e-shimāl ham ne kiyā 
faroġh-e-zaḳhm se raushan rakhā siyāhī ko atā-e-hijr ko najm-e-visāl ham ne kiyā 
basā liyā tirī ḳhushbū ko mazra-e-jāñ meñ shaguft-e-ġham tujhe kaisā nihāl ham ne kiyā 
ik aur mauj thī is mauj-e-āgahī se udhar so auj-e-aql ko nazr-e-zavāl ham ne kiyā 
bahāna koī nahīñ ab safar meñ rahne kā zamīn-e-ḳhvāb tujhe pā.emāl ham ne kiyā 
ye be-niyāzī zarūrī thī kār-e-ulfat meñ so ḳhud kā dhyān na terā ḳhayāl ham ne kiyā 
sabā to ḳhud hī muḳhātib thī ai fazā-e-qafas gavāh rahiyo na koī savāl ham ne kiyā 
dhanak sī ban ga.ī goyā.ī se samā.at tak ye kis ke rañg ko juzv-e-maqāl ham ne kiyā 
hamāre zaḳhm kī surḳhī baḌhā gayā 'arshad' vo barg-e-sabz jise dast-māl ham ne kiyā 
lakir-e-sang ko anqa-misal hum ne kiya bhula diya use dil se kamal hum ne kiya 
shuru us ne kiya tha tamasha qurbat ka phir us ke baad to sara dhamal hum ne kiya 
ulaT ke rakh diye hum ne junun ke sare usul junub-e-dasht ko shahr-e-shimal hum ne kiya 
farogh-e-zaKHm se raushan rakha siyahi ko ata-e-hijr ko najm-e-visal hum ne kiya 
basa liya teri KHushbu ko mazra-e-jaan mein shaguft-e-gham tujhe kaisa nihaal hum ne kiya 
ek aur mauj thi is mauj-e-agahi se udhar so auj-e-aql ko nazr-e-zawal hum ne kiya 
bahana koi nahin ab safar mein rahne ka zamin-e-KHwab tujhe paemal hum ne kiya 
ye be-niyazi zaruri thi kar-e-ulfat mein so KHud ka dhyan na tera KHayal hum ne kiya 
saba to KHud hi muKHatib thi ai faza-e-qafas gawah rahiyo na koi sawal hum ne kiya 
dhanak si ban gai goyai se samaat tak ye kis ke rang ko juzw-e-maqal hum ne kiya 
hamare zaKHm ki surKHi baDha gaya 'arshad' wo barg-e-sabz jise dast-mal hum ne kiya

baḳhsh dī hāl-e-zabūñ ne jalva-sāmānī mujhe kaash mil jaa.e zamāne kī pareshānī mujhe 
ai nigāh-e-dost ai sarmāya-dār-e-be-ḳhudī hosh aatā hai to hotī hai pareshānī mujhe 
khul chukā haañ khul chukā dil par tirā rañgīñ fareb de na dhokā ai tilism-e-hasti-e-fānī mujhe 
phir na sābit ho kahīñ nañg-e-bayābāñ jism-e-rāz soch kar karnā junūñ maa.il ye uryānī mujhe 
muntahā-e-zauq-e-sajda ye ki ik fareb kufr tak le aa.ī takmīl-e-musalmānī mujhe 
manziloñ 'ehsān' pīchhe rah ga.e dair o haram le chalā jaane kahāñ sailāb-e-hairanī mujhe 
baKHsh di haal-e-zabun ne jalwa-samani mujhe kash mil jae zamane ki pareshani mujhe 
ai nigah-e-dost ai sarmaya-dar-e-be-KHudi hosh aata hai to hoti hai pareshani mujhe 
khul chuka han khul chuka dil par tera rangin fareb de na dhoka ai tilism-e-hasti-e-fani mujhe 
phir na sabit ho kahin nang-e-bayaban jism-e-raaz soch kar karna junun mail ye uryani mujhe 
muntaha-e-zauq-e-sajda ye ki ek fareb kufr tak le aai takmil-e-musalmani mujhe 
manzilon 'ehsan' pichhe rah gae dair o haram le chala jaane kahan sailab-e-hairani mujhe

gardish kā ik lamha yuuñ bebāk huā sone chāñdī kā har manzar ḳhaak huā 
nahr kināre ek samundar pyāsā hai Dhalte hue sūraj kā siina chaak huā 
ik shaffāf tabī.at vaalā sahrā.ī shahr meñ rah kar kis darja chālāk huā 
shab ujlī dastāreñ kyā sar-garm huiiñ bhor samay saarā manzar namnāk huā 
vo to ujāloñ jaisā thā us kī ḳhātir aane vaalā har lamha saffāk huā 
ḳhāl-o-ḳhad manzar paikar aur gul buuTe ḳhuub hue mere hāthoñ meñ chaak huā 
ik tālāb kī lahroñ se laḌte laḌte vo bhī kaale dariyā kā pairāk huā 
mausam ne karvaT lī kyā āñdhī aa.ī ab ke to kohsār ḳhas-o-ḳhāshāk huā 
bātin kī saarī lahreñ thiiñ joban par us ke aariz kā til bhī bebāk huā 
chand suhāne manzar kuchh kaḌvī yādeñ āḳhir 'amabar' kā bhī qissa paak huā 
gardish ka ek lamha yun bebak hua sone chandi ka har manzar KHak hua 
nahr kinare ek samundar pyasa hai Dhalte hue suraj ka sina chaak hua 
ek shaffaf tabiat wala sahrai shahr mein rah kar kis darja chaalak hua 
shab ujli dastaren kya sar-garm huin bhor samay sara manzar namnak hua 
wo to ujalon jaisa tha us ki KHatir aane wala har lamha saffak hua 
KHal-o-KHad manzar paikar aur gul buTe KHub hue mere hathon mein chaak hua 
ek talab ki lahron se laDte laDte wo bhi kale dariya ka pairak hua 
mausam ne karwaT li kya aandhi aai ab ke to kohsar KHas-o-KHashak hua 
baatin ki sari lahren thin joban par us ke aariz ka til bhi bebak hua 
chand suhane manzar kuchh kaDwi yaaden aaKHir 'amabar' ka bhi qissa pak hua

ġham-e-hayāt kahānī hai qissa-ḳhvāñ huuñ maiñ dil-e-sitam-zada hai rāz-dāñ huuñ maiñ 
ziyāda is se koī aaj tak batā na sakā ki ek nukta-e-nā-qābil-e-bayāñ huuñ maiñ 
nazar ke sāmne kaundī thī ek bijlī sī mujhe batāo ḳhudā-rā ki ab kahāñ huuñ maiñ 
ḳhizāñ ne luuT liyā gulshan-e-shabāb magar kisī bahār ke armān meñ javāñ huuñ maiñ 
ye kah rahī hai nazar kī ġham-e-āfrīñ jumbish kisī ke dil kī tabāhī kī dāstāñ huuñ maiñ 
ḳhizāñ kahtī thī maiñ shoḳhi-e-bahārāñ huuñ bahār kahtī hai rañgīni-e-ḳhizāñ huuñ maiñ 
shabāb naam hai us jāñ-navāz lamhe kā jab aadmī ko ye mahsūs ho javāñ huuñ maiñ 
jahān-e-dard-o-alam pūjtā hai mujh ko aah tapish-e-jabīñ hai lahū sajda āstāñ huuñ maiñ 
vo din bhī the ki maiñ jān-e-shabāb thā 'aḳhtar' ab apne ahd-e-javānī kī dāstāñ huuñ maiñ 
gham-e-hayat kahani hai qissa-KHwan hun main dil-e-sitam-zada hai raaz-dan hun main 
ziyaada is se koi aaj tak bata na saka ki ek nukta-e-na-qabil-e-bayan hun main 
nazar ke samne kaundi thi ek bijli si mujhe batao KHuda-ra ki ab kahan hun main 
KHizan ne luT liya gulshan-e-shabab magar kisi bahaar ke arman mein jawan hun main 
ye kah rahi hai nazar ki gham-e-afrin jumbish kisi ke dil ki tabahi ki dastan hun main 
KHizan kahti thi main shoKHi-e-bahaaran hun bahaar kahti hai rangini-e-KHizan hun main 
shabab nam hai us jaan-nawaz lamhe ka jab aadmi ko ye mahsus ho jawan hun main 
jahan-e-dard-o-alam pujta hai mujh ko aah tapish-e-jabin hai lahu sajda aastan hun main 
wo din bhi the ki main jaan-e-shabab tha 'aKHtar' ab apne ahd-e-jawani ki dastan hun main

vaqt jab raah kī dīvār huā koī sailāb numūdār huā 
us ne peḌoñ se haTā liiñ shāḳheñ baaġh meñ se tū ka.ī baar huā 
maiñ ne jo dil meñ chhupānā chāhā mere chehre se numūdār huā 
sāhilī-shām kā phailā manzar kuchh lakīroñ meñ giraftār huā 
raat ik shaḳhs bahut yaad aayā jis ghaḌī chāñd numūdār huā 
waqt jab rah ki diwar hua koi sailab numudar hua 
us ne peDon se haTa lin shaKHen bagh mein se tu kai bar hua 
main ne jo dil mein chhupana chaha mere chehre se numudar hua 
sahili-sham ka phaila manzar kuchh lakiron mein giraftar hua 
raat ek shaKHs bahut yaad aaya jis ghaDi chand numudar hua

ye jahāñ-navard kī dāstāñ ye fasāna Dolte saa.e kā mire sar-burīda ḳhayāl haiñ ki dhuāñ hai suunī sarā.e kā 
vo havā kā chupke se jhāñknā kisī bhūle bisre madār se kahīñ ghar meñ shahr kī zulmateñ kahīñ chhat pe chāñd kirā.e kā 
gil-e-māh ghūmte chaak par kaf-e-kūza-gar se phisal ga.ī ki bisāt-e-gardish-e-sāl-o-sin yahī farq apne parā.e kā 
mirā nutq bhī hai nigāh bhī mirī shā.irī kā gavāh bhī tirī dostī ke mahāz par vo laraztā aks kinā.e kā 
ki usī ke naam tak aa.e the ye sadā-o-sidq ke silsile vahī shaḳhs jis ne tire liye kiyā qatl sochtī raa.e kā 
ye jahan-naward ki dastan ye fasana Dolte sae ka mere sar-burida KHayal hain ki dhuan hai suni sarae ka 
wo hawa ka chupke se jhankna kisi bhule bisre madar se kahin ghar mein shahr ki zulmaten kahin chhat pe chand kirae ka 
gil-e-mah ghumte chaak par kaf-e-kuza-gar se phisal gai ki bisat-e-gardish-e-sal-o-sin yahi farq apne parae ka 
mera nutq bhi hai nigah bhi meri shairi ka gawah bhi teri dosti ke mahaz par wo larazta aks kinae ka 
ki usi ke nam tak aae the ye sada-o-sidq ke silsile wahi shaKHs jis ne tere liye kiya qatl sochti rae ka

laakh laakh ehsān jis ne dard paidā kar diyā jis ne is dil ko hathelī kā phaphūlā kar diyā 
dekhnā maġhrib kī jānib ye shafaq kā phūlnā Dūbte sūraj ne sone meñ suhāgā kar diyā 
zindagī aur maut meñ ik umr se thī kashmakash vaqt par do hichkiyoñ ne paak jhagḌā kar diyā 
ik sharāra sā qarīb-e-sham.a jā kar mil gayā ātish-e-parvāna ne shole ko duunā kar diyā 
bulbul-e-tasvīr huuñ ab bolnā hai nāgavār terī is hañgāma ārā.ī ne chupkā kar diyā 
is ko kahte haiñ lagī parvāne jal bujh Duub mar rote rote sham.a ne āḳhir saverā kar diyā 
de diyā āñkheñ laḌā kar is parī-paikar ne jaam maiñ nashe meñ chuur thā hī aur andhā kar diyā 
kyā girāmī hastiyāñ haiñ hazrat-e-'usmān'-o-'shād' 'shā.ir' in donoñ ne duniyā meñ ujālā kar diyā 
lakh lakh ehsan jis ne dard paida kar diya jis ne is dil ko hatheli ka phaphula kar diya 
dekhna maghrib ki jaanib ye shafaq ka phulna Dubte suraj ne sone mein suhaga kar diya 
zindagi aur maut mein ek umr se thi kashmakash waqt par do hichkiyon ne pak jhagDa kar diya 
ek sharara sa qarib-e-shama ja kar mil gaya aatish-e-parwana ne shole ko duna kar diya 
bulbul-e-taswir hun ab bolna hai nagawar teri is hangama aarai ne chupka kar diya 
is ko kahte hain lagi parwane jal bujh Dub mar rote rote shama ne aaKHir sawera kar diya 
de diya aankhen laDa kar is pari-paikar ne jam main nashe mein chur tha hi aur andha kar diya 
kya girami hastiyan hain hazrat-e-'usman'-o-'shad' 'shair' in donon ne duniya mein ujala kar diya

ḳhūbāñ ke biich jānāñ mumtāz hai sarāpā andāz-e-dilbarī meñ e'jāz hai sarāpā 
pal pal maTak ke dekhe Dag Dag chale laTak ke vo shoḳh chhal chhabīlā tannāz hai sarāpā 
tirchhī nigāh karnā katrā ke baat sunñā majlis meñ 'āshiqoñ kī andāz hai sarāpā 
nainoñ meñ us kī jaadū zulfāñ meñ us kī phāñdā dil ke shikār meñ vo shahbāz hai sarāpā 
ġhamza nigah taġhāful añkhiyāñ siyāh o chanchal yā rab nazar na laage andāz hai sarāpā 
us ke ḳhirām uupar tā.ūs mast haigā vo miir dil-rabābī tannāz hai sarāpā 
kisht-e-umīd kartā sarsabz sabza-e-ḳhat anjām-e-husn us kā āġhāz hai sarāpā 
vaqt-e-nazāra 'fā.ez' dildār kā yahī hai bistar nahīñ badan par tan-bāz hai sarāpā 
KHuban ke bich jaanan mumtaz hai sarapa andaz-e-dilbari mein e'jaz hai sarapa 
pal pal maTak ke dekhe Dag Dag chale laTak ke wo shoKH chhal chhabila tannaz hai sarapa 
tirchhi nigah karna katra ke baat sunna majlis mein 'ashiqon ki andaz hai sarapa 
nainon mein us ki jadu zulfan mein us ki phanda dil ke shikar mein wo shahbaz hai sarapa 
ghamza nigah taghaful ankhiyan siyah o chanchal ya rab nazar na lage andaz hai sarapa 
us ke KHiram upar taus mast haiga wo mir dil-rababi tannaz hai sarapa 
kisht-e-umid karta sarsabz sabza-e-KHat anjam-e-husn us ka aaghaz hai sarapa 
waqt-e-nazara 'faez' dildar ka yahi hai bistar nahin badan par tan-baz hai sarapa

har aa.ine meñ tirā hī dhuāñ dikhā.ī diyā mirā vajūd hī mujh ko kahāñ dikhā.ī diyā 
ye kaisī dhuup ke mausam meñ ghar se niklā huuñ ki har parinda mujhe sā.ebāñ dikhā.ī diyā 
maiñ apnī lahr meñ lipTā huā samundar huuñ maiñ kyā karūñ jo tirā bādbāñ dikhā.ī diyā 
kahā hī thā ki salām ai imām-e-ālī-maqām hamārī pyaas ko āb-e-ravāñ dikhā.ī diyā 
mirī nazar to ḳhalāoñ ne bāñdh rakkhī thī mujhe zamīñ se kahāñ āsmāñ dikhā.ī diyā 
har aaine mein tera hi dhuan dikhai diya mera wajud hi mujh ko kahan dikhai diya 
ye kaisi dhup ke mausam mein ghar se nikla hun ki har parinda mujhe saeban dikhai diya 
main apni lahr mein lipTa hua samundar hun main kya karun jo tera baadban dikhai diya 
kaha hi tha ki salam ai imam-e-ali-maqam hamari pyas ko aab-e-rawan dikhai diya 
meri nazar to KHalaon ne bandh rakkhi thi mujhe zamin se kahan aasman dikhai diya

zauq-e-amal ke sāmne duurī simaT ga.ī darvāza ham ne kholā to dīvār haT ga.ī 
beTe ko apne dekh ke ik baap ne kahā tum ho ga.e javān magar 'umr ghaT ga.ī 
pahle to ḳhud ko dekh ke hairat-zada huī chiḌiyā phir aa.ine se lapak kar chimaT ga.ī 
patvār bhī uThāne kī mohlat na mil sakī aisī chalī havā.eñ ki kashtī ulaT ga.ī 
nārāz ho gayā hai ḳhudā sab se ai 'shafaq' duniyā tamām pyaar ke rishte se kaT ga.ī 
zauq-e-amal ke samne duri simaT gai darwaza hum ne khola to diwar haT gai 
beTe ko apne dekh ke ek bap ne kaha tum ho gae jawan magar 'umr ghaT gai 
pahle to KHud ko dekh ke hairat-zada hui chiDiya phir aaine se lapak kar chimaT gai 
patwar bhi uThane ki mohlat na mil saki aisi chali hawaen ki kashti ulaT gai 
naraaz ho gaya hai KHuda sab se ai 'shafaq' duniya tamam pyar ke rishte se kaT gai

ḳhvāhish-e-aish nahīñ dard-e-nihānī kī qasam bul-havas khāyā kareñ ishrat-e-fānī kī qasam 
ik ġham-angez haqīqat hai hamārī hastī qissa-ḳhvāñ terī ġham-angez kahānī kī qasam 
dil kī gahrā.iyoñ meñ aag dabī rakhtā huuñ chashm-e-giryāñ se baraste hue paanī kī qasam 
jab se aa.ī hai ḳhudā rakkhe javānī 'aḳhtar' ham har ik baat pe khāte haiñ javānī kī qasam 
KHwahish-e-aish nahin dard-e-nihani ki qasam bul-hawas khaya karen ishrat-e-fani ki qasam 
ek gham-angez haqiqat hai hamari hasti qissa-KHwan teri gham-angez kahani ki qasam 
dil ki gahraiyon mein aag dabi rakhta hun chashm-e-giryan se baraste hue pani ki qasam 
jab se aai hai KHuda rakkhe jawani 'aKHtar' hum har ek baat pe khate hain jawani ki qasam

aks bhī kab shab-e-hijrāñ kā tamāshā.ī hai ek maiñ aap huuñ yā gosha-e-tanhā.ī hai 
dil to ruktā hai agar band-e-qabā baaz na ho chaak kartā huuñ garebāñ ko to rusvā.ī hai 
tāqat-e-zabt kahāñ ab to jigar jaltā hai aah siine se nikal lab pe mire aa.ī hai 
maiñ to vo huuñ ki mire laakh ḳharīdār haiñ ab lek is dil se dhaḌaktā huuñ ki saudā.ī hai 
dil-e-betāb 'fuġhāñ' ummat-e-ayyūb nahīñ na use sabr hai hargiz na shakebā.ī hai 
aks bhi kab shab-e-hijran ka tamashai hai ek main aap hun ya gosha-e-tanhai hai 
dil to rukta hai agar band-e-qaba baz na ho chaak karta hun gareban ko to ruswai hai 
taqat-e-zabt kahan ab to jigar jalta hai aah sine se nikal lab pe mere aai hai 
main to wo hun ki mere lakh KHaridar hain ab lek is dil se dhaDakta hun ki saudai hai 
dil-e-betab 'fughan' ummat-e-ayyub nahin na use sabr hai hargiz na shakebai hai

kuchh kam nahīñ haiñ sham.a se dil kī lagan meñ ham fānūs meñ vo jaltī hai yaañ pairahan meñ ham 
haiñ tufta-jāñ mufāraqat-e-gul-badan meñ ham aisā na ho ki aag lagā deñ chaman meñ ham 
gum hoñge bū-e-zulf-e-shikan-dar-shikan meñ ham qabza kareñge chiin ko le kar ḳhutan meñ ham 
gar ye hī chheḌ dast-e-junūñ kī rahī to bas mar kar bhī siina chaak kareñge kafan meñ ham 
mahv-e-ḳhayāl-e-zulf-e-butāñ umr bhar rahe mash.hūr kyuuñ na hoñ kaho dīvāna-pan meñ ham 
hoñge aziiz ḳhalq kī nazroñ meñ dekhnā gir kar bhī apne yaar ke chāh-e-zaqan meñ ham 
chhakke hī chhūT jā.eñge ġhairoñ ke dekhnā aa nikle haañ kabhī jo tirī anjuman meñ ham 
ai andalīb dāva-e-behūda par kahīñ ek aadh gul kā muñh na masal deñ chaman meñ ham 
āshiq hue haiñ parda-nashīñ par bas is liye rakhte haiñ soz-e-ishq nihāñ jaan o tan meñ ham 
zālim kī sach masal hai ki rassī darāz hai misdāq us kā paate haiñ charḳh-e-kuhan meñ ham 
anqā kā 'aish' naam to hai go nishāñ nahīñ yaañ vo bhī kho chuke haiñ talāsh-e-dahan meñ ham 
kuchh kam nahin hain shama se dil ki lagan mein hum fanus mein wo jalti hai yan pairahan mein hum 
hain tufta-jaan mufaraqat-e-gul-badan mein hum aisa na ho ki aag laga den chaman mein hum 
gum honge bu-e-zulf-e-shikan-dar-shikan mein hum qabza karenge chin ko le kar KHutan mein hum 
gar ye hi chheD dast-e-junun ki rahi to bas mar kar bhi sina chaak karenge kafan mein hum 
mahw-e-KHayal-e-zulf-e-butan umr bhar rahe mashhur kyun na hon kaho diwana-pan mein hum 
honge aziz KHalq ki nazron mein dekhna gir kar bhi apne yar ke chah-e-zaqan mein hum 
chhakke hi chhuT jaenge ghairon ke dekhna aa nikle han kabhi jo teri anjuman mein hum 
ai andalib dawa-e-behuda par kahin ek aadh gul ka munh na masal den chaman mein hum 
aashiq hue hain parda-nashin par bas is liye rakhte hain soz-e-ishq nihan jaan o tan mein hum 
zalim ki sach masal hai ki rassi daraaz hai misdaq us ka pate hain charKH-e-kuhan mein hum 
anqa ka 'aish' nam to hai go nishan nahin yan wo bhi kho chuke hain talash-e-dahan mein hum

taqdīr jab muāvin-e-tadbīr ho ga.ī miTTī pe kī nigāh to iksīr ho ga.ī 
dil jaañ nisār-e-mai hai zabāñ tā.ib-e-sharāb is kashmakash meñ ruuh kī tāzīr ho ga.ī 
chhīñTeñ jo ḳhuuñ kī dāman-e-qātil meñ rah ga.iiñ mahshar meñ mere qalb kī tafsīr ho ga.ī 
yā qatl kījiye mujhe yā baḳhsh dījiye ab ho ga.ī huzūr jo taqsīr ho ga.ī 
shabnam oḌhī guloñ se mirā naqsha khiñch gayā murjhā ga.ī kalī mirī tasvīr ho ga.ī 
zindāniyān-e-kākul-e-hastī kidhar ko jaa.eñ ik zulf sab ke paañv kī zanjīr ho ga.ī 
maiñ kah chalā thā dāvar-e-mahshar se hāl-e-dil ik surmagīñ nigāh gulū-gīr ho ga.ī 
bas tham gayā safīr-e-amal kah ke yā nasīb jis jā pe ḳhatm manzil-e-tadbīr ho ga.ī 
toḌā hai dam abhī abhī bīmār-e-hijr ne aa.e magar huzūr ko tāḳhīr ho ga.ī 
jab apne aap par hameñ qaabū milā 'ravāñ' āsān rāz-e-dahr kī tafsīr ho ga.ī 
taqdir jab muawin-e-tadbir ho gai miTTi pe ki nigah to iksir ho gai 
dil jaan nisar-e-mai hai zaban taib-e-sharab is kashmakash mein ruh ki tazir ho gai 
chhinTen jo KHun ki daman-e-qatil mein rah gain mahshar mein mere qalb ki tafsir ho gai 
ya qatl kijiye mujhe ya baKHsh dijiye ab ho gai huzur jo taqsir ho gai 
shabnam oDhi gulon se mera naqsha khinch gaya murjha gai kali meri taswir ho gai 
zindaniyan-e-kakul-e-hasti kidhar ko jaen ek zulf sab ke panw ki zanjir ho gai 
main kah chala tha dawar-e-mahshar se haal-e-dil ek surmagin nigah gulu-gir ho gai 
bas tham gaya safir-e-amal kah ke ya nasib jis ja pe KHatm manzil-e-tadbir ho gai 
toDa hai dam abhi abhi bimar-e-hijr ne aae magar huzur ko taKHir ho gai 
jab apne aap par hamein qabu mila 'rawan' aasan raaz-e-dahr ki tafsir ho gai

dil ab us dil-shikan ke paas kahāñ chiil ke ghoñsle meñ maas kahāñ 
sabr bīmār-e-ishq kī hai davā par tabī.at se merī raas kahāñ 
sub.h aane kā us ke vaada hai mujh ko par raat bhar kī aas kahāñ 
dushman-e-jāñ ko dost samjhā maiñ vo kahāñ maiñ kahāñ qayās kahāñ 
kyā huā us ko dekhte hī 'bayāñ' hosh kīdhar ga.e havās kahāñ 
dil ab us dil-shikan ke pas kahan chil ke ghonsle mein mas kahan 
sabr bimar-e-ishq ki hai dawa par tabiat se meri ras kahan 
subh aane ka us ke wada hai mujh ko par raat bhar ki aas kahan 
dushman-e-jaan ko dost samjha main wo kahan main kahan qayas kahan 
kya hua us ko dekhte hi 'bayan' hosh kidhar gae hawas kahan

sañg-e-dar ban kar bhī kyā hasrat mire dil meñ nahīñ tere qadmoñ meñ huuñ lekin terī mahfil meñ nahīñ 
rāh-e-ulfat kā nishāñ ye hai ki vo hai be-nishāñ jaada kaisā naqsh-e-pā tak koī manzil meñ nahīñ 
kho chuke ro ro ke ghar bāhar kī saarī kā.enāt ashk kaise aañkh meñ ab ḳhuun bhī dil meñ nahīñ 
bazm-ārā.ī se pahle dekh o nādān dekh kaun hai mahfil meñ terī kaun mahfil meñ nahīñ 
pūchhtā hai aarzū 'ahsan' kī tū kyā baar baar tere milne ke sivā koī havas dil meñ nahīñ 
sang-e-dar ban kar bhi kya hasrat mere dil mein nahin tere qadmon mein hun lekin teri mahfil mein nahin 
rah-e-ulfat ka nishan ye hai ki wo hai be-nishan jada kaisa naqsh-e-pa tak koi manzil mein nahin 
kho chuke ro ro ke ghar bahar ki sari kaenat ashk kaise aankh mein ab KHun bhi dil mein nahin 
bazm-arai se pahle dekh o nadan dekh kaun hai mahfil mein teri kaun mahfil mein nahin 
puchhta hai aarzu 'ahsan' ki tu kya bar bar tere milne ke siwa koi hawas dil mein nahin

roz-e-avval se asiir ai dil-e-nāshād haiñ ham parvarish-yāfta-e-ḳhāna-e-sayyād haiñ ham 
kis tarah se na pise dil ruḳh-e-gandum-gūñ par āqibat hazrat-e-ādam hī kī aulād haiñ ham 
jo laḌakpan se hai gahvāra-e-betābī kī nāz-parvarda-e-ishq-e-sitam ījād haiñ ham 
kyuuñ na ho ranj-e-asīrī-e-qafas se rāhat ḳhāna-zād-e-chaman-e-gulshan-e-bedād haiñ ham 
ḳhusrav-e-shahr-e-adā hai jo vo rashk-e-shīrīñ koh-e-andoh-o-ġham-o-yās ke farhād haiñ ham 
dīd-e-san.at se hai yaañ ġhāyat-e-dīd-e-sān.e.a ai buto shefta-e-husn-e-ḳhudā-dād haiñ ham 
qiil se roke use ham pe jab laate haiñ tifl-e-ashk apne ye kahte haiñ ki ustād haiñ ham 
qaid se bhī na rihā ho ke havā kuchh dil shaad mubtalā-e-ġham-e-tanhāi-e-sayyād haiñ ham 
chaman-e-dahr meñ be-vaj.h nahīñ haiñ nālāñ andalīb-e-gul-e-ruḳhsāra-e-sayyād haiñ ham 
apnī mīrās meñ haiñ dasht-o-jabal ai vahshat jā-nashīñ qais ke haiñ vāris-e-farhād haiñ ham 
hathkaḌī kartī hai bai.at to qadam lete haiñ ḳhaar tere dīvāne jo ai rashk-e-parī-zād haiñ ham 
qadr apnī na jahāñ meñ huī bā-vasf-kamāl sifat-e-bū-e-gul is baaġh meñ barbād haiñ ham 
shikva kartā huuñ tabāhī ke to farmāte haiñ ḳhāna-barbādī-e-ushshāq kī buniyād haiñ ham 
jāñ-nisāroñ se hai teġh-e-nigah-e-yār kā qaul dam meñ lākhoñ ko kareñ qatl vo jallād haiñ ham 
ham shikāyat nahīñ kuchh karte tumhīñ munsif ho vājibur-rahm haiñ yā qābil-e-bedād haiñ ham 
ham samajhte haiñ paḌhā.ī huī bāteñ na karo tifl-e-maktab ho tum ai jaañ abhī ustād haiñ ham 
gesū-e-yār ke saude ne kiyā ḳhāna-ḳharāb kyā huā ḳhvāhī-e-sayyad meñ barbād haiñ ham 
aaj hotī hai 'qalaq' qata-e-ummīd-e-dīdār nigarāñ is liye sū-e-ruḳh-e-jallād haiñ ham 
roz-e-awwal se asir ai dil-e-nashad hain hum parwarish-yafta-e-KHana-e-sayyaad hain hum 
kis tarah se na pise dil ruKH-e-gandum-gun par aaqibat hazrat-e-adam hi ki aulad hain hum 
jo laDakpan se hai gahwara-e-betabi ki naz-parwarda-e-ishq-e-sitam ijad hain hum 
kyun na ho ranj-e-asiri-e-qafas se rahat KHana-zad-e-chaman-e-gulshan-e-bedad hain hum 
KHusraw-e-shahr-e-ada hai jo wo rashk-e-shirin koh-e-andoh-o-gham-o-yas ke farhad hain hum 
did-e-sanat se hai yan ghayat-e-did-e-sanea ai buto shefta-e-husn-e-KHuda-dad hain hum 
qil se roke use hum pe jab late hain tifl-e-ashk apne ye kahte hain ki ustad hain hum 
qaid se bhi na riha ho ke hawa kuchh dil shad mubtala-e-gham-e-tanhai-e-sayyaad hain hum 
chaman-e-dahr mein be-wajh nahin hain nalan andalib-e-gul-e-ruKHsara-e-sayyaad hain hum 
apni miras mein hain dasht-o-jabal ai wahshat ja-nashin qais ke hain waris-e-farhad hain hum 
hathkaDi karti hai baiat to qadam lete hain KHar tere diwane jo ai rashk-e-pari-zad hain hum 
qadr apni na jahan mein hui ba-wasf-kamal sifat-e-bu-e-gul is bagh mein barbaad hain hum 
shikwa karta hun tabahi ke to farmate hain KHana-barbaadi-e-ushshaq ki buniyaad hain hum 
jaan-nisaron se hai tegh-e-nigah-e-yar ka qaul dam mein lakhon ko karen qatl wo jallad hain hum 
hum shikayat nahin kuchh karte tumhin munsif ho wajibur-rahm hain ya qabil-e-bedad hain hum 
hum samajhte hain paDhai hui baaten na karo tifl-e-maktab ho tum ai jaan abhi ustad hain hum 
gesu-e-yar ke saude ne kiya KHana-KHarab kya hua KHwahi-e-sayyad mein barbaad hain hum 
aaj hoti hai 'qalaq' qata-e-ummid-e-didar nigaran is liye su-e-ruKH-e-jallad hain hum

daftar jo guloñ ke vo sanam khol rahā hai aġhyār to kyā dil bhī idhar bol rahā hai 
āsār-e-rihā.ī haiñ ye dil bol rahā hai sayyād sitamgar mire par khol rahā hai 
ġhairoñ se mire vāste jo bol rahā hai āb-e-dard-e-nidā nahīñ vo sam ghol rahā hai 
kis kis kā nahīñ tā.ir-e-dil daam meñ us ke tuutī ḳhatt-e-āriz kā tire bol rahā hai 
jaame se huā jaatā hai bāhar jo har ik gul kyā baaġh meñ vo band-e-qabā khol rahā hai 
shāhoñ kī tarah kī hai basar dasht-e-junūñ meñ dīvānoñ kā ham-rāh mire ġhol rahā hai 
kyā kyā nahīñ dukh qaid musībat ke sahe haiñ barsoñ dil-e-nāshād mirī avval rahā hai 
raqs aap kā jo dekh ke behāl huā thā ghuñghrū usī pāmāl kā ab bol rahā hai 
yaad aatī hai kis but kī mire ḳhāna-e-dil meñ chhātī ke kivāḌ aaj koī khol rahā hai 
karne ko hai said aaj kisī tā.ir-e-dil shāhīñ nigah-e-yār kā par tol rahā hai 
taskīñ ko ye kahte rahe furqat kī shab ahbāb lo sub.h huī murġh-e-sahar bol rahā hai 
bulbul hai fidā kartī nahīñ naqd-e-dil us par gulzār meñ ġhuncha bhī girah khol rahā hai 
dānā.ī se ḳhālī thā na dīvāna-pan us kā duniyā meñ baḌī chain se bahlol rahā hai 
maqtal meñ gire paḌte haiñ jāñbāz pe jāñbāz talvār se ḳhaak khaḌā rol rahā hai 
dil to diyā mīzāñ nahīñ paTtī nazar aatī nazroñ meñ vo ḳhush-chashm mujhe taul rahā hai 
sandūqcha argan kā hai yā ḳhāna-e-sayyād har murġh-e-nafas haañk na.ī bol rahā hai 
miTte nahīñ dekhī hai shikan ham ne jabīn kī jab farsh par us ke kahīñ kuchh jhol rahā hai 
mahrūm tumhīñ rah ga.e kahte haiñ ye sab log jāñ-bāzoñ ko kas kar vo kamar khol rahā hai 
kyā garm hai bāzār-e-ḳharīdārī-e-bulbul gulzār meñ kāñTā zar-e-gul tol rahā hai 
kam qadr kabhī dekhī nahīñ jins-e-mohabbat saudā ye hamesha 'qalaq' anmol rahā hai 
daftar jo gulon ke wo sanam khol raha hai aghyar to kya dil bhi idhar bol raha hai 
aasar-e-rihai hain ye dil bol raha hai sayyaad sitamgar mere par khol raha hai 
ghairon se mere waste jo bol raha hai aab-e-dard-e-nida nahin wo sam ghol raha hai 
kis kis ka nahin tair-e-dil dam mein us ke tuti KHatt-e-ariz ka tere bol raha hai 
jame se hua jata hai bahar jo har ek gul kya bagh mein wo band-e-qaba khol raha hai 
shahon ki tarah ki hai basar dasht-e-junun mein diwanon ka ham-rah mere ghol raha hai 
kya kya nahin dukh qaid musibat ke sahe hain barson dil-e-nashad meri awwal raha hai 
raqs aap ka jo dekh ke behaal hua tha ghunghru usi pamal ka ab bol raha hai 
yaad aati hai kis but ki mere KHana-e-dil mein chhati ke kiwaD aaj koi khol raha hai 
karne ko hai said aaj kisi tair-e-dil shahin nigah-e-yar ka par tol raha hai 
taskin ko ye kahte rahe furqat ki shab ahbab lo subh hui murgh-e-sahar bol raha hai 
bulbul hai fida karti nahin naqd-e-dil us par gulzar mein ghuncha bhi girah khol raha hai 
danai se KHali tha na diwana-pan us ka duniya mein baDi chain se bahlol raha hai 
maqtal mein gire paDte hain jaanbaz pe jaanbaz talwar se KHak khaDa rol raha hai 
dil to diya mizan nahin paTti nazar aati nazron mein wo KHush-chashm mujhe taul raha hai 
sanduqcha argan ka hai ya KHana-e-sayyaad har murgh-e-nafas hank nai bol raha hai 
miTte nahin dekhi hai shikan hum ne jabin ki jab farsh par us ke kahin kuchh jhol raha hai 
mahrum tumhin rah gae kahte hain ye sab log jaan-bazon ko kas kar wo kamar khol raha hai 
kya garm hai bazar-e-KHaridari-e-bulbul gulzar mein kanTa zar-e-gul tol raha hai 
kam qadr kabhi dekhi nahin jins-e-mohabbat sauda ye hamesha 'qalaq' anmol raha hai

na hoñge ham to ye rañg-e-gulistāñ kaun dekhegā bahāroñ se hī taḳhrīb-e-bahārāñ kaun dekhegā 
sar-e-mahshar jafāoñ kī shikāyat bar-mahal lekin phir in māsūm nazroñ ko pashīmāñ kaun dekhegā 
bajā hai laala o gul kī tabāhī kā tasavvur bhī magar ye manzar-e-mahshar-ba-dāmāñ kaun dekhegā 
mujhe taslīm hai qaid-e-qafas se maut behtar hai nasheman par hujūm-e-barq-o-bārāñ kaun dekhegā 
hasīñ tābīr-e-mustaqbil sahī is kī magar 'anvar' na.e fitnoñ kā ab ḳhvāb-e-pareshāñ kaun dekhegā 
na honge hum to ye rang-e-gulistan kaun dekhega bahaaron se hi taKHrib-e-bahaaran kaun dekhega 
sar-e-mahshar jafaon ki shikayat bar-mahal lekin phir in masum nazron ko pashiman kaun dekhega 
baja hai lala o gul ki tabahi ka tasawwur bhi magar ye manzar-e-mahshar-ba-daman kaun dekhega 
mujhe taslim hai qaid-e-qafas se maut behtar hai nasheman par hujum-e-barq-o-baran kaun dekhega 
hasin tabir-e-mustaqbil sahi is ki magar 'anwar' nae fitnon ka ab KHwab-e-pareshan kaun dekhega

ruuh ko rāh-e-adam meñ mirā tan yaad aayā dasht-e-ġhurbat meñ musāfir ko vatan yaad aayā 
chuTkiyāñ dil meñ mire lene lagā nāḳhun-e-ishq gul-badan dekh ke us gul kā badan yaad aayā 
vahm hī vahm meñ apnī huī auqāt basar kamar-e-yār ko bhūle to dahan yaad aayā 
barg-e-gul dekh ke āñkhoñ meñ tire phir ga.e lab ġhuncha chaTkā to mujhe lutf-e-suḳhan yaad aayā 
dar-ba-dar phir ke dilā ghar kī hameñ qadr huī rāh-e-ġhurbat meñ jo bhūle to vatan yaad aayā 
aah kyuuñ kheñch ke āñkhoñ meñ bhar aa.e aañsū kyā qafas meñ tujhe ai murġh-e-chaman yaad aayā 
phir 'amānat' mirā dil bhuul gayā aish o tarab phir mujhe rauza-e-sultān-e-zaman yaad aayā 
ruh ko rah-e-adam mein mera tan yaad aaya dasht-e-ghurbat mein musafir ko watan yaad aaya 
chuTkiyan dil mein mere lene laga naKHun-e-ishq gul-badan dekh ke us gul ka badan yaad aaya 
wahm hi wahm mein apni hui auqat basar kamar-e-yar ko bhule to dahan yaad aaya 
barg-e-gul dekh ke aankhon mein tere phir gae lab ghuncha chaTka to mujhe lutf-e-suKHan yaad aaya 
dar-ba-dar phir ke dila ghar ki hamein qadr hui rah-e-ghurbat mein jo bhule to watan yaad aaya 
aah kyun khench ke aankhon mein bhar aae aansu kya qafas mein tujhe ai murgh-e-chaman yaad aaya 
phir 'amanat' mera dil bhul gaya aish o tarab phir mujhe rauza-e-sultan-e-zaman yaad aaya

kab ik maqām pe ruktī hai sar-phirī hai havā tamām shahr o bayābāñ ko chhāntī hai havā 
nasīb-e-pā-e-junūñ hai sadā kī dar-badrī havā-e-jāda-o-manzil meñ kab chalī hai havā 
ye pech-o-tāb hai kaisā sabab nahīñ khultā banā banā ke bagūle bigāḌtī hai havā 
sivā.e ḳhaak na kuchh haath aaj tak aayā sarāb ret se sahrā meñ chhāntī hai havā 
ġhazab kā ġhaiz o ġhazab thā jo ham na bikhre the bikhar ga.e haiñ to kaisī Darī khaḌī hai havā 
ukhāḌ toḌ ke bastī ke sab makānoñ ko chhipī khañDar meñ pashīmān ro rahī hai havā 
vo ek baat jo ḳhud se bhī ham na kahte the zabāñ zabāñ pe vahī baat dhar ga.ī hai havā 
tamām laala o gul ke charāġh raushan haiñ shajar shajar pe shagūfoñ meñ jal rahī hai havā 
kab apnā haath pahuñchtā gulāb tak 'bilqīs' mire nasīb se shāḳhoñ meñ jā phañsī hai havā 
kab ek maqam pe rukti hai sar-phiri hai hawa tamam shahr o bayaban ko chhanti hai hawa 
nasib-e-pa-e-junun hai sada ki dar-badri hawa-e-jada-o-manzil mein kab chali hai hawa 
ye pech-o-tab hai kaisa sabab nahin khulta bana bana ke bagule bigaDti hai hawa 
siwae KHak na kuchh hath aaj tak aaya sarab ret se sahra mein chhanti hai hawa 
ghazab ka ghaiz o ghazab tha jo hum na bikhre the bikhar gae hain to kaisi Dari khaDi hai hawa 
ukhaD toD ke basti ke sab makanon ko chhipi khanDar mein pashiman ro rahi hai hawa 
wo ek baat jo KHud se bhi hum na kahte the zaban zaban pe wahi baat dhar gai hai hawa 
tamam lala o gul ke charagh raushan hain shajar shajar pe shagufon mein jal rahi hai hawa 
kab apna hath pahunchta gulab tak 'bilqis' mere nasib se shaKHon mein ja phansi hai hawa

har vaqt nauha-ḳhvāñ sī rahtī haiñ merī āñkheñ ik dukh bharī kahānī kahtī haiñ merī āñkheñ 
jazbāt-e-dil kī shiddat sahtī haiñ merī āñkheñ gul-rañg aur shafaq-gūñ rahtī haiñ merī āñkheñ 
aish o tarab ke jalse dard o alam ke manzar kyā kuchh na ham ne dekhā kahtī haiñ merī āñkheñ 
jab se dil o jigar kī hamdard ban ga.ī haiñ ġhamgīniyoñ meñ Duubī rahtī haiñ merī āñkheñ 
labrez ho ke dil kā sāġhar chhalak uThā hai shāyad isī sabab se bahtī haiñ merī āñkheñ 
har jumbish-e-nazar hai rūdād-e-ishq 'aḳhtar' haiñ be-zabāñ magar kuchh kahtī haiñ merī āñkheñ 
har waqt nauha-KHwan si rahti hain meri aankhen ek dukh bhari kahani kahti hain meri aankhen 
jazbaat-e-dil ki shiddat sahti hain meri aankhen gul-rang aur shafaq-gun rahti hain meri aankhen 
aish o tarab ke jalse dard o alam ke manzar kya kuchh na hum ne dekha kahti hain meri aankhen 
jab se dil o jigar ki hamdard ban gai hain ghamginiyon mein Dubi rahti hain meri aankhen 
labrez ho ke dil ka saghar chhalak uTha hai shayad isi sabab se bahti hain meri aankhen 
har jumbish-e-nazar hai rudad-e-ishq 'aKHtar' hain be-zaban magar kuchh kahti hain meri aankhen

phir ik tiir sambhālā us ne mujh pe nazar Daalī āḳhirī nekī thī tarkash meñ vo bhī kar Daalī 
Thahro yahīñ ai qāfile vaalo aayā dasht-e-balā us ne ye kah ke apne sar par ḳhāk-e-safar Daalī 
aur koī duniyā hai terī jis kī khoj karūñ zehn meñ phir ik samt bikherī rāhguzar Daalī 
haath havā ke baḌhne lage haiñ bastī ke atrāf dekho us ne chingārī ab kis ke ghar Daalī 
chashm-e-falak kā ik aañsū hai gardish kartī zamīñ kyā pesh aayā jo us ne binā-e-dīda-e-tar Daalī 
vaqt se pūchho vaqt se sachchā shāhid koī nahīñ kis ne teġh uThā.ī ran meñ kis ne sipar Daalī 
maiñ to bas gauhar se ḳhālī ek sadaf huuñ 'ramz' mushkil hogī us ne koī baat agar Daalī 
phir ek tir sambhaala us ne mujh pe nazar Dali aaKHiri neki thi tarkash mein wo bhi kar Dali 
Thahro yahin ai qafile walo aaya dasht-e-bala us ne ye kah ke apne sar par KHak-e-safar Dali 
aur koi duniya hai teri jis ki khoj karun zehn mein phir ek samt bikheri rahguzar Dali 
hath hawa ke baDhne lage hain basti ke atraf dekho us ne chingari ab kis ke ghar Dali 
chashm-e-falak ka ek aansu hai gardish karti zamin kya pesh aaya jo us ne bina-e-dida-e-tar Dali 
waqt se puchho waqt se sachcha shahid koi nahin kis ne tegh uThai ran mein kis ne sipar Dali 
main to bas gauhar se KHali ek sadaf hun 'ramz' mushkil hogi us ne koi baat agar Dali

bas-ki dīdār tirā jalva-e-quddūsī hai dāman-e-vasl bhī ālūda-e-māyūsī hai 
hai kahāñ bū-e-vafā us dahan-e-shīrīñ meñ ġhuncha-lab terī zabāñ ham ne bahut chūsī hai 
yaar go ḳhuun mirā misl-e-hinā ho pāmāl lekin apne ta.iiñ manzūr qadam-bosī hai 
dil mirā ḳhaak shagufta ho chaman meñ jā kar gul meñ ye rang kahāñ ek tirī bū sī hai 
ek din zulf ke muñh par na chaḌhī ye kāfir yād-e-kākul ko faqat sheva-e-jāsūsī hai 
vo sajī teġh ki dam meñ kare lākhoñ ko qatl kaun kahtā hai miyāñ terī kamar mū sī hai 
shaiḳh rotā hai ise sun ke brahman yaksū pur-asar bas ki mirā nālā-e-nāqūsī hai 
chashm-e-namnāk ne az bas-ki bujhāyā us ko ātish-e-'ishq kahāñ dil meñ magar lū sī hai 
ai 'fuġhāñ' ishq kahāñ dil meñ ba-qaul-e-'minnat' haañ ye sach milne kī ḳhūbāñ se to ik ḳhū sī hai 
bas-ki didar tera jalwa-e-quddusi hai daman-e-wasl bhi aaluda-e-mayusi hai 
hai kahan bu-e-wafa us dahan-e-shirin mein ghuncha-lab teri zaban hum ne bahut chusi hai 
yar go KHun mera misl-e-hina ho pamal lekin apne tain manzur qadam-bosi hai 
dil mera KHak shagufta ho chaman mein ja kar gul mein ye rang kahan ek teri bu si hai 
ek din zulf ke munh par na chaDhi ye kafir yaad-e-kakul ko faqat shewa-e-jasusi hai 
wo saji tegh ki dam mein kare lakhon ko qatl kaun kahta hai miyan teri kamar mu si hai 
shaiKH rota hai ise sun ke brahman yaksu pur-asar bas ki mera nala-e-naqusi hai 
chashm-e-namnak ne az bas-ki bujhaya us ko aatish-e-'ishq kahan dil mein magar lu si hai 
ai 'fughan' ishq kahan dil mein ba-qaul-e-'minnat' han ye sach milne ki KHuban se to ek KHu si hai

kahīñ ye lamha-e-maujūd vāhima hī na ho jo ho rahā hai ye sab pahle ho chukā hī na ho 
vo sadma jis ke sabab maiñ huuñ sar-ba-zānū abhī ajab nahīñ mirī dānist meñ huā hī na ho 
tire ġhayāb meñ jo kuchh kiyā hikāyat maiñ kahīñ vo gufta o nā-gufta se sivā hī na ho 
kalām kartī huī lahreñ chup na hoñ mire baad mire liye kahīñ paanī rukā huā hī na ho 
guzartī shaam daraḳht aabjū sukūt aur maiñ suḳhan-misāl ye manzar bhī gūñjtā hī na ho 
ye kyā ki maiñ nayā chehra liye uThūñ har roz ye kyā ki 'turk' mirā ḳhvāb TūTtā hī na ho 
kahin ye lamha-e-maujud wahima hi na ho jo ho raha hai ye sab pahle ho chuka hi na ho 
wo sadma jis ke sabab main hun sar-ba-zanu abhi ajab nahin meri danist mein hua hi na ho 
tere ghayab mein jo kuchh kiya hikayat main kahin wo gufta o na-gufta se siwa hi na ho 
kalam karti hui lahren chup na hon mere baad mere liye kahin pani ruka hua hi na ho 
guzarti sham daraKHt aabju sukut aur main suKHan-misal ye manzar bhi gunjta hi na ho 
ye kya ki main naya chehra liye uThun har roz ye kya ki 'turk' mera KHwab TuTta hi na ho

terā hī nishān-e-pā rahā huuñ maiñ ye pahāḌ jo uThā rahā huuñ maiñ 
ek umr kī munāfarat ke baad ab tujhe samajh meñ aa rahā huuñ maiñ 
to udhar se aa jidhar ruke haiñ sab dūsrī taraf se aa rahā huuñ maiñ 
ek pal kabhī to tham mire liye saarī umr dauḌtā rahā huuñ maiñ 
merī nā-rasā.iyoñ kī had hai ye apne sāmne se aa rahā huuñ maiñ 
tera hi nishan-e-pa raha hun main ye pahaD jo uTha raha hun main 
ek umr ki munafarat ke baad ab tujhe samajh mein aa raha hun main 
to udhar se aa jidhar ruke hain sab dusri taraf se aa raha hun main 
ek pal kabhi to tham mere liye sari umr dauDta raha hun main 
meri na-rasaiyon ki had hai ye apne samne se aa raha hun main

itnā tilism yaad ke chaqmāq meñ rahā raushan charāġh duur kisī taaq meñ rahā 
maḳhfī bhī thā visāl kā vo bāb-e-muḳhtasar kuchh dil bhī mahv hijr ke asbāq meñ rahā 
sahrā ke ishtirāk pe raazī the sab farīq mahmil kā jo fasād thā ushshāq meñ rahā 
mafqūd ho gayā hai siyāq-o-sabāq se jo harf-e-umr saikaḌoñ aurāq meñ rahā 
maiñ thā ki jis ke vāste pāband ahd-e-hijr vo aur ek hijr ke mīsāq meñ rahā 
atvār us ke dekh ke aatā nahīñ yaqīñ insāñ sunā gayā hai ki āfāq meñ rahā 
ḳhufta the daa.eñ baa.eñ ka.ī mār-e-āstīñ zahrāb kā asar mire tiryāq meñ rahā 
tārīḳh ne pasand kiyā bhī kisī sabab yā bas ki shāh-e-vaqt thā aurāq meñ rahā 
itna tilism yaad ke chaqmaq mein raha raushan charagh dur kisi taq mein raha 
maKHfi bhi tha visal ka wo bab-e-muKHtasar kuchh dil bhi mahw hijr ke asbaq mein raha 
sahra ke ishtirak pe raazi the sab fariq mahmil ka jo fasad tha ushshaq mein raha 
mafqud ho gaya hai siyaq-o-sabaq se jo harf-e-umr saikaDon auraq mein raha 
main tha ki jis ke waste paband ahd-e-hijr wo aur ek hijr ke misaq mein raha 
atwar us ke dekh ke aata nahin yaqin insan suna gaya hai ki aafaq mein raha 
KHufta the daen baen kai mar-e-astin zahrab ka asar mere tiryaq mein raha 
tariKH ne pasand kiya bhi kisi sabab ya bas ki shah-e-waqt tha auraq mein raha

rañg se pairahan-e-sāda hinā.ī ho jaa.e pahne zanjīr jo chāñdī kī talā.ī ho jaa.e 
ḳhud-faroshī ko jo tū nikle ba-shakl-e-yūsuf ai sanam terī ḳharīdār ḳhudā.ī ho jaa.e 
ḳhat-e-to.am kī tarah āshiq o māshūq haiñ ek donoñ bekār haiñ jis vaqt judā.ī ho jaa.e 
tañgi-e-gosha-e-uzlat hai bayāñ se bāhar nahīñ imkān ki chyūñTī kī samā.ī ho jaa.e 
yahī har uzv se aatī hai sadā furqat meñ vaqt ye vo hai judā bhaa.ī se bhaa.ī ho jaa.e 
apnī hī aag meñ ai 'barq' jalā jaatā huuñ unsur-e-ḳhāk ho turbat jo laḌā.ī ho jaa.e 
rang se pairahan-e-sada hinai ho jae pahne zanjir jo chandi ki talai ho jae 
KHud-faroshi ko jo tu nikle ba-shakl-e-yusuf ai sanam teri KHaridar KHudai ho jae 
KHat-e-toam ki tarah aashiq o mashuq hain ek donon bekar hain jis waqt judai ho jae 
tangi-e-gosha-e-uzlat hai bayan se bahar nahin imkan ki chyunTi ki samai ho jae 
yahi har uzw se aati hai sada furqat mein waqt ye wo hai juda bhai se bhai ho jae 
apni hi aag mein ai 'barq' jala jata hun unsur-e-KHak ho turbat jo laDai ho jae

bulāvā kaun sā koh-e-nidā meñ rakkhā hai charāġh ham ne jo apnā havā meñ rakkhā hai 
vo chāhe baḳhsh de zillat ki sarfarāz kare bas ik yaqīñ hai jo ham ne ḳhudā meñ rakkhā hai 
adam vajūd meñ bhartī hai ik rag-e-maujūd ab aur is ke sivā kyā duā meñ rakkhā hai 
na ḳhud-shanāsī agar ho to kyā nashāt-e-ishq raqam na ho to kyā harf-e-navā meñ rakkhā hai 
safar na ho to ye lutf-e-safar hai be-ma.anī badan na ho to bhalā kyā qabā meñ rakkhā hai 
jo dekho ġhaur se kuchh kam nahīñ hai ye bhī 'tūr' ik iztirār sukūn-e-havā meñ rakkhā hai 
bulawa kaun sa koh-e-nida mein rakkha hai charagh hum ne jo apna hawa mein rakkha hai 
wo chahe baKHsh de zillat ki sarfaraaz kare bas ek yaqin hai jo hum ne KHuda mein rakkha hai 
adam wajud mein bharti hai ek rag-e-maujud ab aur is ke siwa kya dua mein rakkha hai 
na KHud-shanasi agar ho to kya nashat-e-ishq raqam na ho to kya harf-e-nawa mein rakkha hai 
safar na ho to ye lutf-e-safar hai be-mani badan na ho to bhala kya qaba mein rakkha hai 
jo dekho ghaur se kuchh kam nahin hai ye bhi 'tur' ek iztirar sukun-e-hawa mein rakkha hai

maiñ agar rone lagūñ rutba-e-vālā baḌh jaa.e paanī dene se nihāl-e-qad-e-bāla baḌh jaa.e 
josh-e-vahshat yahī kahtā hai nihāyat kam hai do jahāñ se bhī agar vus.at-e-sahrā baḌh jaa.e 
qumriyāñ dekh ke gulzār meñ dhoka khā.eñ tauq minnat kā jo ai sarv-e-tamannā baḌh jaa.e 
haath par haath agar maar ke dauḌūñ bāham rāh-e-ulfat meñ qadam qais se merā baḌh jaa.e 
daaġh par daaġh se ai 'barq' mujhe rāhat hai dard kam ho to shab-e-hijr meñ iizā baḌh jaa.e 
main agar rone lagun rutba-e-wala baDh jae pani dene se nihaal-e-qad-e-baala baDh jae 
josh-e-wahshat yahi kahta hai nihayat kam hai do jahan se bhi agar wusat-e-sahra baDh jae 
qumriyan dekh ke gulzar mein dhoka khaen tauq minnat ka jo ai sarw-e-tamanna baDh jae 
hath par hath agar mar ke dauDun baham rah-e-ulfat mein qadam qais se mera baDh jae 
dagh par dagh se ai 'barq' mujhe rahat hai dard kam ho to shab-e-hijr mein iza baDh jae

mahv-e-fariyād ho gayā hai dil aah barbād ho gayā hai dil 
sīna-kāvī meñ apne nāḳhun se rashk-e-farhād ho gayā hai dil 
dekhte dekhte sitam terā saḳht nāshād ho gayā hai dil 
karte hī karte tere qad kā ḳhayāl misl-e-shamshād ho gayā hai dil 
ho ke pāband tere kākul se sar se āzād ho gayā hai dil 
ulfat-e-ahl-e-bait se 'āgāh' Hyderabad ho gayā hai dil 
mahw-e-fariyaad ho gaya hai dil aah barbaad ho gaya hai dil 
sina-kawi mein apne naKHun se rashk-e-farhad ho gaya hai dil 
dekhte dekhte sitam tera saKHt nashad ho gaya hai dil 
karte hi karte tere qad ka KHayal misl-e-shamshad ho gaya hai dil 
ho ke paband tere kakul se sar se aazad ho gaya hai dil 
ulfat-e-ahl-e-bait se 'agah' Hyderabad ho gaya hai dil

duur the hosh-o-havās apne se bhī begāna thā un ko bazm-e-nāz thī aur mujh ko ḳhalvat-ḳhāna thā 
khīñch laayā thā ye kis aalam se kis aalam meñ hosh apnā haal apne liye jaise koī afsāna thā 
chhoTe chhoTe do varaq jal jal ke daftar ban ga.e dars-e-hasrat de rahā thā jo par-e-parvāna thā 
jaan kar vārafta un ke chheḌne kī der thī phir to dil ik hosh meñ aayā huā dīvāna thā 
zau-fishāñ hone lagā jab dil meñ husn-e-ḳhud-numā phir to kaaba 'ārzū' kaaba na thā but-ḳhāna thā 
dur the hosh-o-hawas apne se bhi begana tha un ko bazm-e-naz thi aur mujh ko KHalwat-KHana tha 
khinch laya tha ye kis aalam se kis aalam mein hosh apna haal apne liye jaise koi afsana tha 
chhoTe chhoTe do waraq jal jal ke daftar ban gae dars-e-hasrat de raha tha jo par-e-parwana tha 
jaan kar warafta un ke chheDne ki der thi phir to dil ek hosh mein aaya hua diwana tha 
zau-fishan hone laga jab dil mein husn-e-KHud-numa phir to kaba 'arzu' kaba na tha but-KHana tha

Thahar Thahar ke mirā intizār kartā chal ye saḳht-rāh bhī ab iḳhtiyār kartā chal 
safar kī raat hai har gaam ehtiyāt barat palaT palaT ke añdheroñ pe vaar kartā chal 
liye jā kaam tū apnī firāḳh-dastī se qadam qadam pe mujhe zer-e-bār kartā chal 
idhar udhar jo khaḌe ho ga.e haiñ tere liye unheñ bhī apne safar meñ shumār kartā chal 
kisī Thikāne pe tujh ko agar pahuñchnā hai to naqsh-e-pā kā mire e'tibār kartā chal 
na khīñch dasht o jabal bahr o bar se qadmoñ ko ye sab rukāvaTeñ haiñ in ko paar kartā chal 
Thahar Thahar ke mera intizar karta chal ye saKHt-rah bhi ab iKHtiyar karta chal 
safar ki raat hai har gam ehtiyat barat palaT palaT ke andheron pe war karta chal 
liye ja kaam tu apni firaKH-dasti se qadam qadam pe mujhe zer-e-bar karta chal 
idhar udhar jo khaDe ho gae hain tere liye unhen bhi apne safar mein shumar karta chal 
kisi Thikane pe tujh ko agar pahunchna hai to naqsh-e-pa ka mere e'tibar karta chal 
na khinch dasht o jabal bahr o bar se qadmon ko ye sab rukawaTen hain in ko par karta chal

bahut se dard the par ḳhud ko joḌ kar rakkhā vo maiñ ki ātish o aahan meñ jis ne sar rakkhā 
maiñ vo huuñ jis ne ta.āqub meñ apne maut rakhī aur apne sar ko sadā us kī maar par rakkhā 
nashāt o fat.h mirī dastaras meñ the lekin kitāb-e-umr meñ dukh-dard besh-tar rakkhā 
mile hue the mujhe chāhatoñ ke dar kitne magar maiñ vo ki havāoñ pe mustaqar rakkhā 
bahut se log mire vāste the dast-kushā magar nazar meñ tirā hī dayār-o-dar rakkhā 
kabhī huī hī nahīñ mujh ko be-gharī mahsūs ḳhud apne paañv pe jab se hai apnā ghar rakkhā 
gavāh haiñ mire misroñ ke bast-o-dar 'kāshif' chunā jo harf use kar ke bārvar rakkhā 
bahut se dard the par KHud ko joD kar rakkha wo main ki aatish o aahan mein jis ne sar rakkha 
main wo hun jis ne taaqub mein apne maut rakhi aur apne sar ko sada us ki mar par rakkha 
nashat o fath meri dastaras mein the lekin kitab-e-umr mein dukh-dard besh-tar rakkha 
mile hue the mujhe chahaton ke dar kitne magar main wo ki hawaon pe mustaqar rakkha 
bahut se log mere waste the dast-kusha magar nazar mein tera hi dayar-o-dar rakkha 
kabhi hui hi nahin mujh ko be-ghari mahsus KHud apne panw pe jab se hai apna ghar rakkha 
gawah hain mere misron ke bast-o-dar 'kashif' chuna jo harf use kar ke barwar rakkha

hayāt insāñ kī sar tā pā zabāñ mālūm hotī hai ye duniyā inqilāb-e-āsmāñ mālūm hotī hai 
mukaddar hai ḳhizāñ ke ḳhuun se aish-e-bahār-e-gul ḳhizāñ kī rut bahār-e-be-ḳhizāñ mālūm hotī hai 
mujhe nākāmi-e-paiham se māyūsī nahīñ hotī abhī ummīd merī naujavāñ mālūm hotī hai 
koī jab naala kartā hai kaleja thaam letā huuñ fuġhān-e-ġhair bhī apnī fuġhāñ mālūm hotī hai 
ma.āl-e-dard-o-ġham dekho sadā-e-sāz-e-ishrat bhī utar jaatī hai jab dil meñ fuġhāñ mālūm hotī hai 
chaman meñ andalīb-e-zār kī fariyād ai 'aḳhtar' dil-e-nādāñ ko apnī dāstāñ mālūm hotī hai 
hayat insan ki sar ta pa zaban malum hoti hai ye duniya inqilab-e-asman malum hoti hai 
mukaddar hai KHizan ke KHun se aish-e-bahaar-e-gul KHizan ki rut bahaar-e-be-KHizan malum hoti hai 
mujhe nakaami-e-paiham se mayusi nahin hoti abhi ummid meri naujawan malum hoti hai 
koi jab nala karta hai kaleja tham leta hun fughan-e-ghair bhi apni fughan malum hoti hai 
maal-e-dard-o-gham dekho sada-e-saz-e-ishrat bhi utar jati hai jab dil mein fughan malum hoti hai 
chaman mein andalib-e-zar ki fariyaad ai 'aKHtar' dil-e-nadan ko apni dastan malum hoti hai

haibat-e-husn se alfāz kī hairānī tak baat pahuñchī thī abhī chāñd kī peshānī tak 
aap kyā dirham-o-dīnār liye phirte haiñ ham to Thukrā bhī chuke taḳht-e-sulaimānī tak 
vasl ke qisse to tamhīd haiñ sunte rahiye baat pahuñchegī abhī quvvat-e-īmānī tak 
qissa-e-rafta mukammal nahīñ hogā varna zikr jaarī rahe aqdār kī arzānī tak 
aap mohsin haiñ magar khel kī majbūrī hai dil to aatā hī nahīñ raah meñ sultānī tak 
us ne kuchh soch ke sahrā kī taraf moḌ diyā pyaas bas pahuñchne vaalī thī abhī paanī tak 
daf.atan vaqt ne raftār baḌhā dī varna bhāgtā maiñ bhī rahā ik had-e-imkānī tak 
haibat-e-husn se alfaz ki hairani tak baat pahunchi thi abhi chand ki peshani tak 
aap kya dirham-o-dinar liye phirte hain hum to Thukra bhi chuke taKHt-e-sulaimani tak 
wasl ke qisse to tamhid hain sunte rahiye baat pahunchegi abhi quwwat-e-imani tak 
qissa-e-rafta mukammal nahin hoga warna zikr jari rahe aqdar ki arzani tak 
aap mohsin hain magar khel ki majburi hai dil to aata hi nahin rah mein sultani tak 
us ne kuchh soch ke sahra ki taraf moD diya pyas bas pahunchne wali thi abhi pani tak 
dafatan waqt ne raftar baDha di warna bhagta main bhi raha ek had-e-imkani tak

maiñ jo Thahrā Thahartā chalā jā.ūñgā yā zamīñ meñ utartā chalā jā.ūñgā 
jis jagah nuur kī bārisheñ tham ga.iiñ vo jagah tujh se bhartā chalā jā.ūñgā 
darmiyāñ meñ agar maut aa bhī ga.ī us ke sar se guzartā chalā jā.ūñgā 
tere qadmoñ ke āsār jis jā mile is hathelī pe dhartā chalā jā.ūñgā 
duur hotā chalā jā.ūñgā duur tak paas hī se ubhartā chalā jā.ūñgā 
raushnī rakhtā jā.egā tū haath par aur maiñ tahrīr kartā chalā jā.ūñgā 
main jo Thahra Thaharta chala jaunga ya zamin mein utarta chala jaunga 
jis jagah nur ki barishen tham gain wo jagah tujh se bharta chala jaunga 
darmiyan mein agar maut aa bhi gai us ke sar se guzarta chala jaunga 
tere qadmon ke aasar jis ja mile is hatheli pe dharta chala jaunga 
dur hota chala jaunga dur tak pas hi se ubharta chala jaunga 
raushni rakhta jaega tu hath par aur main tahrir karta chala jaunga

jab pursish-e-hāl vo farmāte haiñ jāniye kyā ho jaatā hai kuchh yuuñ bhī zabāñ nahīñ khultī kuchh dard sivā ho jaatā hai 
ab ḳhair se un kī bazm kā itnā rañg to badlā mere ba.ad jab naam mirā aa jaatā hai kuchh zikr-e-vafā ho jaatā hai 
yaktā-e-zamāna hone par sāhab ye ġhurūr ḳhudā.ī kā sab kuchh ho magar ḳhākam-ba-dahan kyā koī ḳhudā ho jaatā hai 
qatra qatra rahtā hai dariyā se judā rah sakne tak jo tāb-e-judā.ī lā na sake vo qatra fanā ho jaatā hai 
phir dil se 'fānī' saare ke saare naqsh-e-jafā miT jaate haiñ jis vaqt vo zālim sāmne aa kar jān-e-hayā ho jaatā hai 
jab pursish-e-haal wo farmate hain jaaniye kya ho jata hai kuchh yun bhi zaban nahin khulti kuchh dard siwa ho jata hai 
ab KHair se un ki bazm ka itna rang to badla mere baad jab nam mera aa jata hai kuchh zikr-e-wafa ho jata hai 
yakta-e-zamana hone par sahab ye ghurur KHudai ka sab kuchh ho magar KHakam-ba-dahan kya koi KHuda ho jata hai 
qatra qatra rahta hai dariya se juda rah sakne tak jo tab-e-judai la na sake wo qatra fana ho jata hai 
phir dil se 'fani' sare ke sare naqsh-e-jafa miT jate hain jis waqt wo zalim samne aa kar jaan-e-haya ho jata hai

mirī giraft meñ hai tā.er-e-ḳhayāl mirā magar uḌaa.e liye jā rahā hai jaal mirā 
yaqīn itnā nahīñ merā jitnā nabz kā hai mirī zabān se suntā nahīñ vo haal mirā 
kamāl kī vo imārat mirī huī mismār khañDar kī shakl meñ baaqī rahā zavāl mirā 
fazā meñ jhoñk de āñdhī ke baad paanī bhī uḌaa.ī ḳhaak to ab ḳhuun bhī uchhāl mirā 
zabān apnī badalne pe koī raazī nahīñ vahī javāb hai us kā vahī savāl mirā 
maiñ sar kiye hue baiThā huuñ ik na.ī choTī kuchh aur fāsle se dekh ab kamāl mirā 
meri giraft mein hai taer-e-KHayal mera magar uDae liye ja raha hai jal mera 
yaqin itna nahin mera jitna nabz ka hai meri zaban se sunta nahin wo haal mera 
kamal ki wo imarat meri hui mismar khanDar ki shakl mein baqi raha zawal mera 
faza mein jhonk de aandhi ke baad pani bhi uDai KHak to ab KHun bhi uchhaal mera 
zaban apni badalne pe koi raazi nahin wahi jawab hai us ka wahi sawal mera 
main sar kiye hue baiTha hun ek nai choTi kuchh aur fasle se dekh ab kamal mera

fitna uThā to razm-gah-e-ḳhāk se uThā sūraj kisī ke pairhan-e-chāk se uThā 
ye dil uThā rahā hai baḌe hausle ke saath vo baar jo zamīñ se na aflāk se uThā 
sab mojazoñ ke baab meñ ye mojaza bhī ho jo log mar ga.e haiñ unheñ ḳhaak se uThā 
sūraj kī zau charāġh-e-shikasta kī lau se ho qulzum kī mauj dīda-e-namnāk se uThā 
pūchhā jo us ne ahd-e-jarāhat kā mājrā dariyā lahū kā har rag-e-poshāk se uThā 
fitna uTha to razm-gah-e-KHak se uTha suraj kisi ke pairhan-e-chaak se uTha 
ye dil uTha raha hai baDe hausle ke sath wo bar jo zamin se na aflak se uTha 
sab mojazon ke bab mein ye mojaza bhi ho jo log mar gae hain unhen KHak se uTha 
suraj ki zau charagh-e-shikasta ki lau se ho qulzum ki mauj dida-e-namnak se uTha 
puchha jo us ne ahd-e-jarahat ka majra dariya lahu ka har rag-e-poshak se uTha

vāda-e-vasl hai lazzat-e-intizār uThā aur phir umr bhar ik ġham-e-e'tibār uThā 
us kā ġham mere dil meñ hai ab bāñsurī kī tarah naġhma-e-dard se zaḳhma-e-iḳhtiyār uThā 
maiñ uThā to falak se bahut chāñd taare gire aur sahrā-e-jāñ meñ bahut ġham-e-ġhubār uThā 
kuchh rahā mere dil meñ to ik iztirāb rahā maiñ sadā apnī hī ḳhaak se be-qarār uThā 
ai ḳhudā rizq-e-parvāz de shahparoñ ko mire mere atrāf se āsmāñ kā hisār uThā 
tū mujhe āsmāñ de na de be-zamīn na kar dasht-e-jāñ se mire mausam-e-tāb-kār uThā 
yā mirī aañkh se chhīn le sab ḳhazāna-e-ḳhvāb yā mirī ḳhaak se zindagī kā fishār uThā 
wada-e-wasl hai lazzat-e-intizar uTha aur phir umr bhar ek gham-e-e'tibar uTha 
us ka gham mere dil mein hai ab bansuri ki tarah naghma-e-dard se zaKHma-e-iKHtiyar uTha 
main uTha to falak se bahut chand tare gire aur sahra-e-jaan mein bahut gham-e-ghubar uTha 
kuchh raha mere dil mein to ek iztirab raha main sada apni hi KHak se be-qarar uTha 
ai KHuda rizq-e-parwaz de shahparon ko mere mere atraf se aasman ka hisar uTha 
tu mujhe aasman de na de be-zamin na kar dasht-e-jaan se mere mausam-e-tab-kar uTha 
ya meri aankh se chhin le sab KHazana-e-KHwab ya meri KHak se zindagi ka fishaar uTha

dam-e-aḳhīr bhī ham ne zabāñ se kuchh na kahā jahāñ se uTh ga.e ahl-e-jahāñ se kuchh na kahā 
chalī jo kashti-e-umr-e-ravāñ to chalne dī rukī to kashti-e-umr-e-ravāñ se kuchh na kahā 
ḳhatā-e-ishq kī itnī sazā hī kaafī thī badal ke rah ga.e tevar zabāñ se kuchh na kahā 
balā se ḳhaak huā jal ke āshiyāñ apnā taḌap ke rah ga.e barq-e-tapāñ se kuchh na kahā 
gila kiyā na kabhī un se bevafā.ī kā zabāñ thī laakh dahan meñ zabāñ se kuchh na kahā 
ḳhushī se ranj sahe 'nāz' umr bhar ham ne ḳhudā-gavāh kabhī āsmāñ se kuchh na kahā 
dam-e-aKHir bhi hum ne zaban se kuchh na kaha jahan se uTh gae ahl-e-jahan se kuchh na kaha 
chali jo kashti-e-umr-e-rawan to chalne di ruki to kashti-e-umr-e-rawan se kuchh na kaha 
KHata-e-ishq ki itni saza hi kafi thi badal ke rah gae tewar zaban se kuchh na kaha 
bala se KHak hua jal ke aashiyan apna taDap ke rah gae barq-e-tapan se kuchh na kaha 
gila kiya na kabhi un se bewafai ka zaban thi lakh dahan mein zaban se kuchh na kaha 
KHushi se ranj sahe 'naz' umr bhar hum ne KHuda-gawah kabhi aasman se kuchh na kaha

merī tanhā.ī ke ejaaz meñ shāmil hai vahī raqs meñ hai dil-e-dīvāna ki mahfil hai vahī 
ye alag baat na vo tamkanat-ārā hai na maiñ hai chaman bhī vahī aur shor-e-anādil hai vahī 
vahī lailā-e-suḳhan ab bhī sarāpā-e-tilism merī jaañ ab bhī vahī hai ki mirā dil hai vahī 
dasht-e-hairat meñ vahī merā junūñ mahv-e-ḳhirām aa ke dekho ki yahāñ garmi-e-mahfil hai vahī 
us meñ jo Duub gayā paar utar jā.egā mauj-dar-mauj vo dariyā hai to sāhil hai vahī 
aaj bhī us ke mire biich hai duniyā haa.il aaj bhī us ke mire biich kī mushkil hai vahī 
meri tanhai ke ejaz mein shamil hai wahi raqs mein hai dil-e-diwana ki mahfil hai wahi 
ye alag baat na wo tamkanat-ara hai na main hai chaman bhi wahi aur shor-e-anadil hai wahi 
wahi laila-e-suKHan ab bhi sarapa-e-tilism meri jaan ab bhi wahi hai ki mera dil hai wahi 
dasht-e-hairat mein wahi mera junun mahw-e-KHiram aa ke dekho ki yahan garmi-e-mahfil hai wahi 
us mein jo Dub gaya par utar jaega mauj-dar-mauj wo dariya hai to sahil hai wahi 
aaj bhi us ke mere bich hai duniya hail aaj bhi us ke mere bich ki mushkil hai wahi

fikr hai shauq-e-kamar ishq-e-dahāñ paidā karūñ chāhtā huuñ ek dil meñ do makāñ paidā karūñ 
tab-e-ālī se agar auj-e-bayāñ paidā karūñ maiñ zamīn-e-sher meñ bhī āsmāñ paidā karūñ 
huuñ maiñ vo dil-soḳhta tāsīr-e-āh-e-garm se gulshan-e-jannat meñ bhī daur-e-ḳhizāñ paidā karūñ 
paañv kahte haiñ tire kūche meñ aa kar zo.af se tū girā de aur maiñ ḳhvāb-e-girāñ paidā karūñ 
ab bhī tum aao to maiñ āñkhoñ meñ bahr-e-yak-nazar DhūñD kar thoḌī sī jān-e-nā-tavāñ paidā karūñ 
maiñ huuñ ai 'taslīm' shāgird-e-'nasīm'-e-dahlavī chāhiye ustād kā tarz-e-bayāñ paidā karūñ 
fikr hai shauq-e-kamar ishq-e-dahan paida karun chahta hun ek dil mein do makan paida karun 
tab-e-ali se agar auj-e-bayan paida karun main zamin-e-sher mein bhi aasman paida karun 
hun main wo dil-soKHta tasir-e-ah-e-garm se gulshan-e-jannat mein bhi daur-e-KHizan paida karun 
panw kahte hain tere kuche mein aa kar zoaf se tu gira de aur main KHwab-e-giran paida karun 
ab bhi tum aao to main aankhon mein bahr-e-yak-nazar DhunD kar thoDi si jaan-e-na-tawan paida karun 
main hun ai 'taslim' shagird-e-'nasim'-e-dahlawi chahiye ustad ka tarz-e-bayan paida karun

asar dekhā duā jab raat bhar kī ziyā kuchh kuchh hai tāroñ meñ sahar kī 
hue ruḳhsat jahāñ se sub.h hote kahānī hijr kī yuuñ muḳhtasar kī 
taḌap uTThe lahad ke sone vaale zamīñ kī samt kyuuñ tum ne nazar kī 
sahar dekheñ ye hasrat le ga.e ham batā.eñ kyā tumheñ kyūñkar sahar kī 
asar dekha dua jab raat bhar ki ziya kuchh kuchh hai taron mein sahar ki 
hue ruKHsat jahan se subh hote kahani hijr ki yun muKHtasar ki 
taDap uTThe lahad ke sone wale zamin ki samt kyun tum ne nazar ki 
sahar dekhen ye hasrat le gae hum bataen kya tumhein kyunkar sahar ki

koī kisī kā kahīñ āshnā nahīñ dekhā sivā.e us ke in āñkhoñ ne kyā nahīñ dekhā 
ye log manā jo karte haiñ ishq se mujh ko inhoñ ne yaar ko dekhā hai yā nahīñ dekhā 
bhalā.ī kyā dil-e-kāfir ne but meñ paa.ī hai jahāñ meñ koī itnā burā nahīñ dekhā 
kuchh us jahāñ meñ na dekheñge kyūñki andhe haiñ isī jahāñ meñ jinhoñ ne ḳhudā nahīñ dekhā 
ba-rañg-e-sāya o ḳhurshīd ai 'bayāñ' maiñ ne kabhū raqīb se us ko judā nahīñ dekhā 
koi kisi ka kahin aashna nahin dekha siwae us ke in aankhon ne kya nahin dekha 
ye log mana jo karte hain ishq se mujh ko inhon ne yar ko dekha hai ya nahin dekha 
bhalai kya dil-e-kafir ne but mein pai hai jahan mein koi itna bura nahin dekha 
kuchh us jahan mein na dekhenge kyunki andhe hain isi jahan mein jinhon ne KHuda nahin dekha 
ba-rang-e-saya o KHurshid ai 'bayan' main ne kabhu raqib se us ko juda nahin dekha

kabhī to multavī zikr-e-jahāñ-gardāñ bhī honā thā kabhī to ehtimām-e-sohbat-e-yārāñ bhī honā thā 
tavaqqo ke mutābiq hai ye tabdīlī to hairat kyā use mushkil bhī honā thā mujhe āsāñ bhī honā thā 
riyā-kāroñ pe kal tak jis ke darvāze muqaffal the usī jannat meñ jashn-e-fitna-pardāzāñ bhī honā thā 
kabhī dekhā na thā yuuñ ham ne bāzār-e-vafā vīrāñ to kyā is shahr meñ qahat-e-ḳharīdārāñ bhī honā thā 
abhī tak jo kināre se ba-zāhir shānt lagtā thā usī dariyā ko ab tūfāñ pas-e-tūfāñ bhī honā thā 
bil-āḳhir ham bhī shab bhar jāgte rahne se baaz aa.e dayār-e-hijr meñ kuchh vasl kā sāmāñ bhī honā thā 
ye taaza bāb-e-dānā.ī yahāñ aa kar maiñ shashdar huuñ jo kal tak the bahut daanā unheñ nādāñ bhī honā thā 
kabhi to multawi zikr-e-jahan-gardan bhi hona tha kabhi to ehtimam-e-sohbat-e-yaran bhi hona tha 
tawaqqo ke mutabiq hai ye tabdili to hairat kya use mushkil bhi hona tha mujhe aasan bhi hona tha 
riya-karon pe kal tak jis ke darwaze muqaffal the usi jannat mein jashn-e-fitna-pardazan bhi hona tha 
kabhi dekha na tha yun hum ne bazar-e-wafa viran to kya is shahr mein qahat-e-KHaridaran bhi hona tha 
abhi tak jo kinare se ba-zahir shant lagta tha usi dariya ko ab tufan pas-e-tufan bhi hona tha 
bil-aKHir hum bhi shab bhar jagte rahne se baz aae dayar-e-hijr mein kuchh wasl ka saman bhi hona tha 
ye taza bab-e-danai yahan aa kar main shashdar hun jo kal tak the bahut dana unhen nadan bhi hona tha

qismat bure kisī ke na is tarah laa.e din aafat na.ī hai roz musībat hai aa.e din 
din san ye aur din diye allāh kī panāh us maah ne to ḳhuub hī ham se ginā.e din 
hai dam-shumārī din ko to aḳhtar-shumārī shab is tarah to ḳhudā na kisī ke kaTā.e din 
un kī nazar phirī ho to kyā apne din phireñ abr-e-siyah ghirā ho to kyā muñh dikhā.e din 
jī jāntā hai kyūñki ye kaTte haiñ roz o shab dushman ko bhī ḳhudā na kabhī ye dikhā.e din 
kyā lutf-e-zīst bharte haiñ din zindagī ke ham 'kaifī' bure kisī ke na taqdīr laa.e din 
qismat bure kisi ke na is tarah lae din aafat nai hai roz musibat hai aae din 
din san ye aur din diye allah ki panah us mah ne to KHub hi hum se ginae din 
hai dam-shumari din ko to aKHtar-shumari shab is tarah to KHuda na kisi ke kaTae din 
un ki nazar phiri ho to kya apne din phiren abr-e-siyah ghira ho to kya munh dikhae din 
ji jaanta hai kyunki ye kaTte hain roz o shab dushman ko bhi KHuda na kabhi ye dikhae din 
kya lutf-e-zist bharte hain din zindagi ke hum 'kaifi' bure kisi ke na taqdir lae din

maskan vahīñ kahīñ hai vahīñ āshiyāñ kahīñ do aaḌe sīdhe rakh liye tinke jahāñ kahīñ 
phūloñ kī sej phūloñ kī haiñ baddhiyāñ kahīñ kāñToñ pe ham taḌapte haiñ o āsmāñ kahīñ 
jaate kidhar ho tum saf-e-mehshar meñ ḳhair hai dāman na ho ḳhudā ke liye dhajjiyāñ kahīñ 
pahrā biThā diyā hai ye qaid-e-hayāt ne saaya bhī saath saath hai jā.ūñ jahāñ kahīñ 
bas mujh ko daad mil ga.ī mehnat vasūl hai sun le ġhazal ye bulbul-e-hindustāñ kahīñ 
'shā'ir' vo aaj phir vahīñ jaate hue mile dushman ke sar pe TuuT paḌe āsmāñ kahīñ 
maskan wahin kahin hai wahin aashiyan kahin do aaDe sidhe rakh liye tinke jahan kahin 
phulon ki sej phulon ki hain baddhiyan kahin kanTon pe hum taDapte hain o aasman kahin 
jate kidhar ho tum saf-e-mehshar mein KHair hai daman na ho KHuda ke liye dhajjiyan kahin 
pahra biTha diya hai ye qaid-e-hayat ne saya bhi sath sath hai jaun jahan kahin 
bas mujh ko dad mil gai mehnat wasul hai sun le ghazal ye bulbul-e-hindustan kahin 
'sha'ir' wo aaj phir wahin jate hue mile dushman ke sar pe TuT paDe aasman kahin

yā ilāhī mujh ko ye kyā ho gayā dostī kā terī saudā ho gayā 
dostī kyā ham-sarī kā dhyān hai qaid se āzād itnā ho gayā 
kaisī āzādī asīrī chiiz kyā jab fanā rañg-e-tamannā ho gayā 
jab tamannā aur Dar jaatā rahā to har ik shai se mubarrā ho gayā 
yuuñ mubarrā ho ga.ī jab koī zaat band phir naġhma sifat kā ho gayā 
jab huā ausāf se koī barī aib kyūñkar us meñ paidā ho gayā 
ḳhud-parastī is ko yā jo kuchh kaho ab to ye aalam hamārā ho gayā 
be-ḳhudī ne mahv-e-hairat kar diyā aap meñ apnā tamāshā ho gayā 
jis ko dekhā aap hī aayā nazar rañg ab 'kaifī' ye apnā ho gayā 
ya ilahi mujh ko ye kya ho gaya dosti ka teri sauda ho gaya 
dosti kya ham-sari ka dhyan hai qaid se aazad itna ho gaya 
kaisi aazadi asiri chiz kya jab fana rang-e-tamanna ho gaya 
jab tamanna aur Dar jata raha to har ek shai se mubarra ho gaya 
yun mubarra ho gai jab koi zat band phir naghma sifat ka ho gaya 
jab hua ausaf se koi bari aib kyunkar us mein paida ho gaya 
KHud-parasti is ko ya jo kuchh kaho ab to ye aalam hamara ho gaya 
be-KHudi ne mahw-e-hairat kar diya aap mein apna tamasha ho gaya 
jis ko dekha aap hi aaya nazar rang ab 'kaifi' ye apna ho gaya

gardish-e-jām nahīñ ruk saktī jo bhī ai gardish-e-daurāñ guzre 
sub.h-e-mahshar hai balā-e-zāhir kisī sūrat shab-e-hijrāñ guzre 
koī barsā na sar-e-kisht-e-vafā kitne bādal guhar-afshāñ guzre 
ibn-e-ādam ko na aayā koī raas ka.ī aazar ka.ī yazdāñ guzre 
ai ġham-e-yār tirī rāhoñ se umr-bhar soḳhta-sāmāñ guzre 
vo jo parvāne jale raat kī raat manzil-e-ishq se āsāñ guzre 
ġham-e-hastī ke bayābānoñ se kuchh hamīñ the jo ġhazal-ḳhvāñ guzre 
ġham ke tārīk ufuq par 'ābid' kuchh sitāre sar-e-mizhgāñ guzre 
gardish-e-jam nahin ruk sakti jo bhi ai gardish-e-dauran guzre 
subh-e-mahshar hai bala-e-zahir kisi surat shab-e-hijran guzre 
koi barsa na sar-e-kisht-e-wafa kitne baadal guhar-afshan guzre 
ibn-e-adam ko na aaya koi ras kai aazar kai yazdan guzre 
ai gham-e-yar teri rahon se umr-bhar soKHta-saman guzre 
wo jo parwane jale raat ki raat manzil-e-ishq se aasan guzre 
gham-e-hasti ke bayabanon se kuchh hamin the jo ghazal-KHwan guzre 
gham ke tarik ufuq par 'abid' kuchh sitare sar-e-mizhgan guzre

musāfirat ke tahayyur se kaT ke kab aa.e jo chauthī samt ko nikle palaT ke kab aa.e 
ab apne aks ko pahchānñā bhī mushkil hai ham apne aap meñ hairat se haT ke kab aa.e 
ik intishār thā ghar meñ bhī ghar se bāhar bhī sañvar ke nikle the kis din simaT ke kab aa.e 
ham aise ḳhalvatiyoñ se mukālme ko ye log jahān bhar kī sadāoñ se aT ke kab aa.e 
ye guftugū to hai radd-e-amal tirī chup kā jo kah rahe haiñ ye ham ghar se raT ke kab aa.e 
jab apne aap meñ masrūf ho gayā vo bahut ham us kī samt zamāne se kaT ke kab aa.e 
'riyāz' dhyān ham-āġhosh aa.ine se rahā ḳhayāl us ke tasavvur se haT ke kab aa.e 
musafirat ke tahayyur se kaT ke kab aae jo chauthi samt ko nikle palaT ke kab aae 
ab apne aks ko pahchanna bhi mushkil hai hum apne aap mein hairat se haT ke kab aae 
ek intishaar tha ghar mein bhi ghar se bahar bhi sanwar ke nikle the kis din simaT ke kab aae 
hum aise KHalwatiyon se mukalme ko ye log jahan bhar ki sadaon se aT ke kab aae 
ye guftugu to hai radd-e-amal teri chup ka jo kah rahe hain ye hum ghar se raT ke kab aae 
jab apne aap mein masruf ho gaya wo bahut hum us ki samt zamane se kaT ke kab aae 
'riyaz' dhyan ham-aghosh aaine se raha KHayal us ke tasawwur se haT ke kab aae

zindagī go kushta-e-ālām hai phir bhī rāhat kī umīd-e-ḳhām hai 
haañ abhī terī mohabbat ḳhaam hai tere dil meñ kāvish-e-anjām hai 
ishq hai maiñ huuñ dil-e-nākām hai is ke aage bas ḳhudā kā naam hai 
aa kahāñ hai tū fareb-e-ārzū aaj nākāmī se lenā kaam hai 
maiñ vahī huuñ dil vahī armāñ vahī ek dhokā gardish-e-ayyām hai 
apne jī meñ ye ki duniyā chhoḌ deñ aur duniyā ko hamīñ se kaam hai 
jal chuke chashm-e-a.izzā meñ charāġh so bhī jā 'mullā' ki vaqt-e-shām hai 
zindagi go kushta-e-alam hai phir bhi rahat ki umid-e-KHam hai 
han abhi teri mohabbat KHam hai tere dil mein kawish-e-anjam hai 
ishq hai main hun dil-e-nakaam hai is ke aage bas KHuda ka nam hai 
aa kahan hai tu fareb-e-arzu aaj nakaami se lena kaam hai 
main wahi hun dil wahi arman wahi ek dhoka gardish-e-ayyam hai 
apne ji mein ye ki duniya chhoD den aur duniya ko hamin se kaam hai 
jal chuke chashm-e-aizza mein charagh so bhi ja 'mulla' ki waqt-e-sham hai

saarī tartīb-e-zamānī mirī dekhī huī hai is kī tashkīl purānī mirī dekhī huī hai 
zarre zarre ko batātā phirūñ kyā bahr thā maiñ reg-e-sahrā ne ravānī mirī dekhī huī hai 
ye jo hastī hai kabhī ḳhvāb huā kartī thī ḳhvāb kī naql-e-makānī mirī dekhī huī hai 
yūñhī to kunj-e-qanā.at meñ nahīñ aayā huuñ khusravī shāh-jahānī mirī dekhī huī hai 
dil ke bāzār meñ kyā suud o ziyāñ hotā thā us kī arzānī girānī mirī dekhī huī hai 
ik zamāne meñ to maiñ lafz huā kartā thā tañgi-e-jū-e-ma.ānī mirī dekhī huī hai 
tum jo sunte ho charāġhoñ kī zabānī to suno shab kī har ek kahānī mirī dekhī huī hai 
maiñ tire vasl ke gardāb meñ aane kā nahīñ is kī har mauj purānī mirī dekhī huī hai 
sari tartib-e-zamani meri dekhi hui hai is ki tashkil purani meri dekhi hui hai 
zarre zarre ko batata phirun kya bahr tha main reg-e-sahra ne rawani meri dekhi hui hai 
ye jo hasti hai kabhi KHwab hua karti thi KHwab ki naql-e-makani meri dekhi hui hai 
yunhi to kunj-e-qanaat mein nahin aaya hun khusrawi shah-jahani meri dekhi hui hai 
dil ke bazar mein kya sud o ziyan hota tha us ki arzani girani meri dekhi hui hai 
ek zamane mein to main lafz hua karta tha tangi-e-ju-e-maani meri dekhi hui hai 
tum jo sunte ho charaghon ki zabani to suno shab ki har ek kahani meri dekhi hui hai 
main tere wasl ke gardab mein aane ka nahin is ki har mauj purani meri dekhi hui hai

yaas hai hasrat hai ġham hai aur shab-e-dījūr hai itne sāthī haiñ magar tanhā dil-e-ranjūr hai 
terā jaanā thā ki ġham-ḳhāne pe vahshat chhā ga.ī maiñ ye samjhā thā mire ghar se bayābāñ duur hai 
shab kī ḳhāmoshī meñ hai terā tasavvur terī yaad haa.e kyā sāmān-e-taskīn-e-dil-e-ranjūr hai 
yas hai hasrat hai gham hai aur shab-e-dijur hai itne sathi hain magar tanha dil-e-ranjur hai 
tera jaana tha ki gham-KHane pe wahshat chha gai main ye samjha tha mere ghar se bayaban dur hai 
shab ki KHamoshi mein hai tera tasawwur teri yaad hae kya saman-e-taskin-e-dil-e-ranjur hai

kahtā hai kaun hijr mujhe sub.h o shaam ho par vasl meñ bhī lutf nahīñ jo mudām ho 
shikva kiyā ho mere lab-e-zaḳhm ne kabhū to mujh pe āb-e-teġh ilāhī harām ho 
sāhab tum apne muñh ko chhupāte ho mujh se kyuuñ hai us se kyā hijāb jo apnā ġhulām ho 
muñh lagne se raqīb ke ab sar chaḌhe haiñ sab kar Daale us ko zab.h abhī intizām ho 
mat dard-e-dil ko pūchh ba-qaul-e-'fuġhāñ' 'bayāñ' ik umr chāhiye mirā qissa tamām ho 
kahta hai kaun hijr mujhe subh o sham ho par wasl mein bhi lutf nahin jo mudam ho 
shikwa kiya ho mere lab-e-zaKHm ne kabhu to mujh pe aab-e-tegh ilahi haram ho 
sahab tum apne munh ko chhupate ho mujh se kyun hai us se kya hijab jo apna ghulam ho 
munh lagne se raqib ke ab sar chaDhe hain sab kar Dale us ko zabh abhi intizam ho 
mat dard-e-dil ko puchh ba-qaul-e-'fughan' 'bayan' ek umr chahiye mera qissa tamam ho

utar ke dhuup jab aa.egī shab ke ziine se uḌegī ḳhuun kī ḳhushbū mire pasīne se 
maiñ vo ġharīb ki huuñ chand be-sadā alfāz adā huī na koī baat bhī qarīne se 
guzishta raat bahut jhuum ke ghaTā barsī magar vo aag jo lipTī huī hai siine se 
lahū kā chīḳhtā dariyā dhyān meñ rakhnā kisī kī pyaas bujhī hai na os piine se 
vo saañp jis ko bahut duur dafn kar aa.e palaT na aa.e kahīñ vaqt ke dafīne se 
diloñ ko mauj-e-balā raas aa ga.ī shāyad rahī na koī shikāyat kisī safīne se 
vajūd shola-e-sayyāl ho gayā hai 'shamīm' uThī hai aañch ajab dil ke ābgīne se 
utar ke dhup jab aaegi shab ke zine se uDegi KHun ki KHushbu mere pasine se 
main wo gharib ki hun chand be-sada alfaz ada hui na koi baat bhi qarine se 
guzishta raat bahut jhum ke ghaTa barsi magar wo aag jo lipTi hui hai sine se 
lahu ka chiKHta dariya dhyan mein rakhna kisi ki pyas bujhi hai na os pine se 
wo sanp jis ko bahut dur dafn kar aae palaT na aae kahin waqt ke dafine se 
dilon ko mauj-e-bala ras aa gai shayad rahi na koi shikayat kisi safine se 
wajud shola-e-sayyal ho gaya hai 'shamim' uThi hai aanch ajab dil ke aabgine se

dhuāñ shorish ravānī be-yaqīnī havā raftār paanī be-yaqīnī 
ḳhalā insān vahshat ḳhaak hijrat makāñ raste nishānī be-yaqīnī 
azal bābīl raavī ḳhuun aadam abad qābīl saanī be-yaqīnī 
azal ḳhālī ḳhalā anjām āḳhir abad ābād faanī be-yaqīnī 
badan āġhosh rasta kaam gandum davā bachche javānī be-yaqīnī 
fazā raushan añdherā jashn galiyāñ ḳhushī mātam kahānī be-yaqīnī 
masājid shañkh mābad but kalīse yaqīñ sar bhiiḌ paanī be-yaqīnī 
dhuan shorish rawani be-yaqini hawa raftar pani be-yaqini 
KHala insan wahshat KHak hijrat makan raste nishani be-yaqini 
azal babil rawi KHun aadam abad qabil sani be-yaqini 
azal KHali KHala anjam aaKHir abad aabaad fani be-yaqini 
badan aaghosh rasta kaam gandum dawa bachche jawani be-yaqini 
faza raushan andhera jashn galiyan KHushi matam kahani be-yaqini 
masajid shankh mabad but kalise yaqin sar bhiD pani be-yaqini

ġhubār-e-dasht-e-yaksānī se niklā ye rasta merī be-dhyānī se niklā 
na ham vahshat meñ apne ghar se nikle na sahrā apnī vīrānī se niklā 
na niklā kaam koī zabt-e-ġham se na ashkoñ kī farāvānī se niklā 
na āñkheñ hī huiiñ ġharqāb-e-dariyā na koī aks hī paanī se niklā 
udhar niklī vo ḳhushbū shahr-e-gul se idhar maiñ bāġh-e-vīrānī se niklā 
huā ġharqāb shahr-e-jāñ to ye dil ye dariyā apnī tuġhyānī se niklā 
jo niklā shām-e-dasht-e-karbalā se sitāra ḳhanda-peshānī se niklā 
ghubar-e-dasht-e-yaksani se nikla ye rasta meri be-dhyani se nikla 
na hum wahshat mein apne ghar se nikle na sahra apni virani se nikla 
na nikla kaam koi zabt-e-gham se na ashkon ki farawani se nikla 
na aankhen hi huin gharqab-e-dariya na koi aks hi pani se nikla 
udhar nikli wo KHushbu shahr-e-gul se idhar main bagh-e-virani se nikla 
hua gharqab shahr-e-jaan to ye dil ye dariya apni tughyani se nikla 
jo nikla sham-e-dasht-e-karbala se sitara KHanda-peshani se nikla

phir usī dhun meñ usī dhyān meñ aa jaatā huuñ tujhe miltā huuñ to ausān meñ aa jaatā huuñ 
be-nishāñ ho rahūñ jab tak tirī āvāz ke saath phir kisī lafz sā imkān meñ aa jaatā huuñ 
jism se jaise ta.alluq nahīñ rahtā koī beshtar dīda-e-hairān meñ aa jaatā huuñ 
shāḳh-e-gul se jo havā haath milātī hai kahīñ isī asnā isī daurān meñ aa jaatā huuñ 
tū kisī sub.h sī āñgan meñ utar aatī hai maiñ kisī dhuup sā dālān meñ aa jaatā huuñ 
phir usi dhun mein usi dhyan mein aa jata hun tujhe milta hun to ausan mein aa jata hun 
be-nishan ho rahun jab tak teri aawaz ke sath phir kisi lafz sa imkan mein aa jata hun 
jism se jaise talluq nahin rahta koi beshtar dida-e-hairan mein aa jata hun 
shaKH-e-gul se jo hawa hath milati hai kahin isi asna isi dauran mein aa jata hun 
tu kisi subh si aangan mein utar aati hai main kisi dhup sa dalan mein aa jata hun

ruḳhsār ke partav se bijlī kī na.ī dhaj hai kyuuñ aañkh jhapaktī hai kyā sāmne sūraj hai 
duniyā kī zamīnoñ se ai charḳh tū kyā vāqif ik ik yahāñ pinhāñ kā.vus hai iiraj hai 
darvāze pe us but ke sau baar hameñ jaanā apnā to yahī kaaba apnā to yahī haj hai 
ai abru-e-jānāñ tū itnā to batā ham ko kis ruḳh se kareñ sajda qible meñ zarā kaj hai 
insāf karo logo insāf karo pyāro 'shā.ir' kī zamāne meñ duniyā se na.ī dhaj hai 
ruKHsar ke partaw se bijli ki nai dhaj hai kyun aankh jhapakti hai kya samne suraj hai 
duniya ki zaminon se ai charKH tu kya waqif ek ek yahan pinhan kawus hai iraj hai 
darwaze pe us but ke sau bar hamein jaana apna to yahi kaba apna to yahi haj hai 
ai abru-e-jaanan tu itna to bata hum ko kis ruKH se karen sajda qible mein zara kaj hai 
insaf karo logo insaf karo pyaro 'shair' ki zamane mein duniya se nai dhaj hai

duniyā se pare jism ke is baab meñ aa.e ham ḳhud se judā ho ke tire ḳhvāb meñ aa.e 
kuchh aise bhī hamvār kī har sat.h ko apnī maujoñ kī tarah ham tire pāyāb meñ aa.e 
un ko bhī abad ke kisī sāhil pe utāro vo lams jo is raat ke sailāb meñ aa.e 
ik naqsh to Thahrā thā ravānī ke badan par jab ban ke bhañvar ham tire girdāb meñ aa.e 
bikhrāo ke shahpar pe ham utre pe zamīñ par kuchh phail ke is nuqta-e-nāyāb meñ aa.e 
the ġhaib ke teshe se tarāshe hue ham tab añgḌā.ī kī sūrat tirī mehrāb meñ aa.e 
duniya se pare jism ke is bab mein aae hum KHud se juda ho ke tere KHwab mein aae 
kuchh aise bhi hamwar ki har sath ko apni maujon ki tarah hum tere payab mein aae 
un ko bhi abad ke kisi sahil pe utaro wo lams jo is raat ke sailab mein aae 
ek naqsh to Thahra tha rawani ke badan par jab ban ke bhanwar hum tere girdab mein aae 
bikhrao ke shahpar pe hum utre pe zamin par kuchh phail ke is nuqta-e-nayab mein aae 
the ghaib ke teshe se tarashe hue hum tab angDai ki surat teri mehrab mein aae

tirī mahfil meñ farq-e-kufr-o-īmāñ kaun dekhegā fasāna hī nahīñ koī to unvāñ kaun dekhegā 
yahāñ to ek lailā ke na jaane kitne majnūñ haiñ yahāñ apnā garebāñ apnā dāmāñ kaun dekhegā 
bahut nikle haiñ lekin phir bhī kuchh armān haiñ dil meñ ba-juz tere mirā ye soz-e-pinhāñ kaun dekhegā 
agar parde kī jumbish se laraztā hai to phir ai dil tajalli-e-jamāl-e-rū-e-jānāñ kaun dekhegā 
agar ham se ḳhafā honā hai to ho jā.iye hazrat hamāre ba.ad phir andāz-e-yazdāñ kaun dekhegā 
mujhe pī kar bahakne meñ bahut hī lutf aatā hai na tum dekhoge to phir mujh ko farhāñ kaun dekhegā 
jise kahtā hai ik aalam 'azīz'-e-vāris-e-ālam use aalam meñ hairān-o-pareshāñ kaun dekhegā 
teri mahfil mein farq-e-kufr-o-iman kaun dekhega fasana hi nahin koi to unwan kaun dekhega 
yahan to ek laila ke na jaane kitne majnun hain yahan apna gareban apna daman kaun dekhega 
bahut nikle hain lekin phir bhi kuchh arman hain dil mein ba-juz tere mera ye soz-e-pinhan kaun dekhega 
agar parde ki jumbish se larazta hai to phir ai dil tajalli-e-jamal-e-ru-e-jaanan kaun dekhega 
agar hum se KHafa hona hai to ho jaiye hazrat hamare baad phir andaz-e-yazdan kaun dekhega 
mujhe pi kar bahakne mein bahut hi lutf aata hai na tum dekhoge to phir mujh ko farhan kaun dekhega 
jise kahta hai ek aalam 'aziz'-e-waris-e-alam use aalam mein hairan-o-pareshan kaun dekhega

ishq mukammal ḳhvāb-e-pareshāñ husn hama tābīr-e-gurezāñ 
qatre meñ dariyā kī samā.ī dard-e-do-ālam ik dil-e-insāñ 
ishq ba-har andāz-e-tajallī larzāñ larzāñ raqsāñ raqsāñ 
ishq ba-rañg-e-shola-o-shabnam sozish-e-pinhāñ ashk numāyāñ 
merī nigāh-e-fikr meñ 'anvar' ishq fasāna husn hai uryāñ 
ishq mukammal KHwab-e-pareshan husn hama tabir-e-gurezan 
qatre mein dariya ki samai dard-e-do-alam ek dil-e-insan 
ishq ba-har andaz-e-tajalli larzan larzan raqsan raqsan 
ishq ba-rang-e-shola-o-shabnam sozish-e-pinhan ashk numayan 
meri nigah-e-fikr mein 'anwar' ishq fasana husn hai uryan

mayassar aaj sarokār se ziyāda hai diye kī raushnī miqdār se ziyāda hai 
ye jhāñk letī hai andar se ārzū-ḳhāna havā kā qad mirī dīvār se ziyāda hai 
ghuTan se Darte maiñ shahr-e-havā meñ aayā thā magar ye tāzgī darkār se ziyāda hai 
yūñhī maiñ aañkh se bāhar nikal ke dekhtā huuñ mirā qadam mirī raftār se ziyāda hai 
maiñ roz ghar kī ḳhamoshī meñ us ko suntā huuñ jo shor raunaq-e-bāzār se ziyāda hai 
maiñ muttaqī huuñ magar hausla gunāhoñ kā mire badan meñ gunahgār se ziyāda hai 
mayassar aaj sarokar se ziyaada hai diye ki raushni miqdar se ziyaada hai 
ye jhank leti hai andar se aarzu-KHana hawa ka qad meri diwar se ziyaada hai
