ghuTan se Darte main shahr-e-hawa mein aaya tha magar ye tazgi darkar se ziyaada hai 
yunhi main aankh se bahar nikal ke dekhta hun mera qadam meri raftar se ziyaada hai 
main roz ghar ki KHamoshi mein us ko sunta hun jo shor raunaq-e-bazar se ziyaada hai 
main muttaqi hun magar hausla gunahon ka mere badan mein gunahgar se ziyaada hai

duur tak bas ik dhundalkā gard-e-tanhā.ī kā thā rāstoñ ko ranj merī ābla-pā.ī kā thā 
fasl-e-gul ruḳhsat huī to vahshateñ bhī miT ga.iiñ haT gayā saaya jo ik āseb-e-sahrā.ī kā thā 
toḌ hī Daalā samundar ne tilism-e-ḳhud-sarī zom kyā kyā sāhiloñ ko apnī pahnā.ī kā thā 
aur mub.ham ho gayā paiham mulāqātoñ ke saath vo jo ik mauhūm sā rishta shanāsā.ī kā thā 
ḳhaak ban kar pattiyāñ mauj-e-havā se jā milīñ der se 'akbar' guloñ par qarz purvā.ī kā thā 
dur tak bas ek dhundalka gard-e-tanhai ka tha raston ko ranj meri aabla-pai ka tha 
fasl-e-gul ruKHsat hui to wahshaten bhi miT gain haT gaya saya jo ek aaseb-e-sahrai ka tha 
toD hi Dala samundar ne tilism-e-KHud-sari zom kya kya sahilon ko apni pahnai ka tha 
aur mubham ho gaya paiham mulaqaton ke sath wo jo ek mauhum sa rishta shanasai ka tha 
KHak ban kar pattiyan mauj-e-hawa se ja milin der se 'akbar' gulon par qarz purwai ka tha

barg-e-sadā ko lab se uḌe der ho ga.ī ham ko bhī ab to ḳhaak hue der ho ga.ī 
ab sāhiloñ pe kis ko sadā de rahe ho tum lamhoñ ke bādbān khule der ho ga.ī 
ai husn-e-ḳhud-parast zarā soch to sahī mehr-o-vafā se tujh ko mile der ho ga.ī 
terā visāl ḳhair ab ik vāqi.a huā ab apne-āp se bhī mile der ho ga.ī 
sadiyoñ kī ret Dhāñp kar āsūda ho ga.e sar ko hamāre tan se kaTe der ho ga.ī 
sarsar ho yā sabā ho ki hoñ tez āñdhiyāñ ham ko fasīl-e-shab pe jale der ho ga.ī 
terī galī ke moḌ pe pahuñche the jald ham par tere ghar ko aate hue der ho ga.ī 
ik daur thā 'shanās' sadā thī mirī buland aur ab to mere hoñT sile der ho ga.ī 
barg-e-sada ko lab se uDe der ho gai hum ko bhi ab to KHak hue der ho gai 
ab sahilon pe kis ko sada de rahe ho tum lamhon ke baadban khule der ho gai 
ai husn-e-KHud-parast zara soch to sahi mehr-o-wafa se tujh ko mile der ho gai 
tera visal KHair ab ek waqia hua ab apne-ap se bhi mile der ho gai 
sadiyon ki ret Dhanp kar aasuda ho gae sar ko hamare tan se kaTe der ho gai 
sarsar ho ya saba ho ki hon tez aandhiyan hum ko fasil-e-shab pe jale der ho gai 
teri gali ke moD pe pahunche the jald hum par tere ghar ko aate hue der ho gai 
ek daur tha 'shanas' sada thi meri buland aur ab to mere honT sile der ho gai

tasavvur ke sahāre yuuñ shab-e-ġham ḳhatm kī maiñ ne jahāñ dil kī ḳhalish ubhrī tumheñ āvāz dī maiñ ne 
talab kī raah meñ khā kar shikast-e-āgahī maiñ ne junūñ kī kāmyābī par mubārakbād dī maiñ ne 
dam-e-āḳhir bahut achchhā kiyā tashrīf le aa.e salām-e-ruḳhsatāna ko pukārā thā abhī maiñ ne 
zabāñ se jab na kuchh yārā-e-sharh-e-ārzū paayā nigāhoñ se huzūr-e-husn aksar baat kī maiñ ne 
nasheman ko bhī ik partav qafas kā jaan kar 'anvar' basā-auqāt kī hai bijliyoñ kī rahbarī maiñ ne 
tasawwur ke sahaare yun shab-e-gham KHatm ki main ne jahan dil ki KHalish ubhri tumhein aawaz di main ne 
talab ki rah mein kha kar shikast-e-agahi main ne junun ki kaamyabi par mubarakbaad di main ne 
dam-e-aKHir bahut achchha kiya tashrif le aae salam-e-ruKHsatana ko pukara tha abhi main ne 
zaban se jab na kuchh yara-e-sharh-e-arzu paya nigahon se huzur-e-husn aksar baat ki main ne 
nasheman ko bhi ek partaw qafas ka jaan kar 'anwar' basa-auqat ki hai bijliyon ki rahbari main ne

kuchh bachā le abhī aañsū mujhe rone vaale sānehe aur bhī haiñ rū-numā hone vaale 
vaqt ke ghaaT utar kar nahīñ vāpas lauTe daaġh malbūs-e-mah-o-mahr ke dhone vaale 
daa.em ābād rahe dār-e-fanā ke baasī fikr meñ rūh-e-baqāyāb samone vaale 
thartharātī rahe ab ḳhvāh hama-vaqt zamīñ so ga.e ḳhāk-e-abad oḌh ke sone vaale 
jis pe bhī paañv dharā maiñ ne usī naav meñ aa.e āsār nazar ḳhud ko Dubone vaale 
ab liye phirtā hai kyā dāman-e-sad-chāk apnā kyā hue ab vo tire siine pirone vaale 
jā nikaltā hai achānak vahīñ rasta merā dar pa-e-pā hoñ jahāñ ḳhaar chubhone vaale 
gard hai haath meñ un ke mirī kisht-e-zar-ḳhez ḳhār-o-ḳhas se jo 'alāva nahīñ bone vaale 
ye bhī ik turfa tamāsha hai ki haiñ añdhiyāre resha-e-shab meñ sitāroñ ko pirone vaale 
kar ga.e ḳhushk bharī jhiil ta.assuf ke kañval suukh kar kāñTā hue raat bhigone vaale 
de gayā hai jo hameñ ahd-e-marāsim us kā us ḳhazāne ko nahīñ ham nahīñ khone vaale 
kuchh bacha le abhi aansu mujhe rone wale sanehe aur bhi hain ru-numa hone wale 
waqt ke ghaT utar kar nahin wapas lauTe dagh malbus-e-mah-o-mahr ke dhone wale 
daem aabaad rahe dar-e-fana ke basi fikr mein ruh-e-baqayab samone wale 
thartharaati rahe ab KHwah hama-waqt zamin so gae KHak-e-abad oDh ke sone wale 
jis pe bhi panw dhara main ne usi naw mein aae aasar nazar KHud ko Dubone wale 
ab liye phirta hai kya daman-e-sad-chaak apna kya hue ab wo tere sine pirone wale 
ja nikalta hai achanak wahin rasta mera dar pa-e-pa hon jahan KHar chubhone wale 
gard hai hath mein un ke meri kisht-e-zar-KHez KHar-o-KHas se jo 'alawa nahin bone wale 
ye bhi ek turfa tamasha hai ki hain andhiyare resha-e-shab mein sitaron ko pirone wale 
kar gae KHushk bhari jhil tassuf ke kanwal sukh kar kanTa hue raat bhigone wale 
de gaya hai jo hamein ahd-e-marasim us ka us KHazane ko nahin hum nahin khone wale

ham aksar tīrgī meñ apne pīchhe chhup ga.e haiñ magar jab rāstoñ meñ chāñd ubhrā chal paḌe haiñ 
zamāna apnī 'uryānī pe ḳhuuñ ro.egā kab tak hameñ dekho ki apne aap ko oḌhe hue haiñ 
mirā bistar kisī fōtpath par jā kar lagā do mire bachche abhī se mujh se tarka māñgte haiñ 
buland āvāz de kar dekh lo koī to hogā jo galiyāñ so ga.ī haiñ to parinde jāgte haiñ 
koī tafsīl ham se pūchhnā ho pūchh liije ki ham bhī aa.ine ke sāmne barsoñ rahe haiñ 
abhī ai dāstāñ-go dāstāñ kahtā chalā jā abhī ham jāgte haiñ jumbish-e-lab dekhte haiñ 
havā apne hī jhoñkoñ kā ta'āqub kar rahī hai ki uḌte patte phir āñkhoñ se ojhal ho rahe haiñ 
hameñ bhī is kahānī kā koī kirdār samjho ki jis meñ lab pe mohreñ haiñ darīche bolte haiñ 
idhar se pāniyoñ kā relā kab kā jā chukā hai magar bachche daraḳhtoñ se abhī chimTe hue haiñ 
mujhe to chalte rahnā hai kisī jānib bhī jā.ūñ ki 'aḳhtar' mere qadmoñ meñ abhī tak rāste haiñ 
hum aksar tirgi mein apne pichhe chhup gae hain magar jab raston mein chand ubhra chal paDe hain 
zamana apni 'uryani pe KHun roega kab tak hamein dekho ki apne aap ko oDhe hue hain 
mera bistar kisi footpath par ja kar laga do mere bachche abhi se mujh se tarka mangte hain 
buland aawaz de kar dekh lo koi to hoga jo galiyan so gai hain to parinde jagte hain 
koi tafsil hum se puchhna ho puchh lije ki hum bhi aaine ke samne barson rahe hain 
abhi ai dastan-go dastan kahta chala ja abhi hum jagte hain jumbish-e-lab dekhte hain 
hawa apne hi jhonkon ka ta'aqub kar rahi hai ki uDte patte phir aankhon se ojhal ho rahe hain 
hamein bhi is kahani ka koi kirdar samjho ki jis mein lab pe mohren hain dariche bolte hain 
idhar se paniyon ka rela kab ka ja chuka hai magar bachche daraKHton se abhi chimTe hue hain 
mujhe to chalte rahna hai kisi jaanib bhi jaun ki 'aKHtar' mere qadmon mein abhi tak raste hain

itnā yaqīn rakh ki gumāñ baaqī rahe ek zarā kār-e-jahāñ baaqī rahe 
baaqī rahe yādoñ kī ik qaus-e-quzah yaanī mirī jā-e-amāñ baaqī rahe 
shorish-e-ḳhūñ raqs-e-junūñ ḳhatm na ho qahqaha-e-ham-nafasāñ baaqī rahe 
aatā rahe yuuñ hī sadā mausam-e-gul silsila-e-dil-zadagāñ baaqī rahe 
qāfla-e-ġham guzrāñ kī bhī sunā hausla-e-ham-safarāñ baaqī rahe 
qaid-e-qafas shor-e-nafas kis ke liye kis ke liye rishta-e-jāñ baaqī rahe 
āñkhoñ se chhin jaa.eñ ik ik ḳhvāb magar us kī talab dil kā dhuāñ baaqī rahe 
itna yaqin rakh ki guman baqi rahe ek zara kar-e-jahan baqi rahe 
baqi rahe yaadon ki ek qaus-e-quzah yani meri ja-e-aman baqi rahe 
shorish-e-KHun raqs-e-junun KHatm na ho qahqaha-e-ham-nafasan baqi rahe 
aata rahe yun hi sada mausam-e-gul silsila-e-dil-zadagan baqi rahe 
qafla-e-gham guzran ki bhi suna hausla-e-ham-safaran baqi rahe 
qaid-e-qafas shor-e-nafas kis ke liye kis ke liye rishta-e-jaan baqi rahe 
aankhon se chhin jaen ek ek KHwab magar us ki talab dil ka dhuan baqi rahe

vo jo sarf-e-nigāh kartā hai is tamāshe kā ek hissa hai 
ik añdherā huuñ sar se paañv tak phir ye pahlū meñ kyā chamaktā hai 
ek din un ko zinda dekhā thā jan buzurgoñ kā ye asāsa hai 
shahr-e-mātam kī is balā se na Dar ā.īna bhī tilism rakhtā hai 
kis ke pairoñ ke naqsh haiñ mujh meñ mere andar ye kaun chaltā hai 
naqsh hai kaun āsmānoñ meñ in zamīnoñ meñ kis kā chehra hai 
maiñ ne banjar dinoñ meñ kholī hai aañkh maiñ ne peḌoñ ko marte dekhā hai 
wo jo sarf-e-nigah karta hai is tamashe ka ek hissa hai 
ek andhera hun sar se panw tak phir ye pahlu mein kya chamakta hai 
ek din un ko zinda dekha tha jan buzurgon ka ye asasa hai 
shahr-e-matam ki is bala se na Dar aaina bhi tilism rakhta hai 
kis ke pairon ke naqsh hain mujh mein mere andar ye kaun chalta hai 
naqsh hai kaun aasmanon mein in zaminon mein kis ka chehra hai 
main ne banjar dinon mein kholi hai aankh main ne peDon ko marte dekha hai

lamha lamha roz o shab ko der hotī jā.egī ye safar aisā hai sab ko der hotī jā.egī 
sabz lamhoñ ko ugāne kā hunar bhī sīkhnā varna is rañg-e-talab ko der hotī jā.egī 
is havā meñ aadmī patthar kā hotā jā.egā aur rone ke sabab ko der hotī jā.egī 
dekhnā terā havāla kuchh se kuchh ho jā.egā dekhnā sher o adab ko der hotī jā.egī 
rafta rafta jism kī parteñ utartī jā.eñgī kāġhzī naam o nasab ko der hotī jā.egī 
aam ho jā.egā kāġhaz ke gulāboñ kā chalan aur ḳhushbū ke sabab ko der hotī jā.egī 
saarā manzar hī badal jā.egā 'ahmad' dekhnā mausam-e-ruḳhsār-o-lab ko der hotī jā.egī 
lamha lamha roz o shab ko der hoti jaegi ye safar aisa hai sab ko der hoti jaegi 
sabz lamhon ko ugane ka hunar bhi sikhna warna is rang-e-talab ko der hoti jaegi 
is hawa mein aadmi patthar ka hota jaega aur rone ke sabab ko der hoti jaegi 
dekhna tera hawala kuchh se kuchh ho jaega dekhna sher o adab ko der hoti jaegi 
rafta rafta jism ki parten utarti jaengi kaghzi nam o nasab ko der hoti jaegi 
aam ho jaega kaghaz ke gulabon ka chalan aur KHushbu ke sabab ko der hoti jaegi 
sara manzar hi badal jaega 'ahmad' dekhna mausam-e-ruKHsar-o-lab ko der hoti jaegi

ghanī siyah zulf badliyoñ sī bilā sabab mujh meñ jāgtī hai vo ḳhvāhish-e-nā-murād ab tak tamām shab mujh meñ jāgtī hai 
vo ek bastī jo so ga.ī hai udaas be-nām ho ga.ī hai ba-harf-o-saut ab bhī chīḳhtī hai ba-chashm-o-lab mujh meñ jāgtī hai 
tire ḳhayāloñ kī mamlikat ke tamām asnām gir chuke haiñ bas ik tamannā-e-kāfirāna bas ik talab mujh meñ jāgtī hai 
maiñ us ghaḌī apne aap kā sāmnā bhī karne se bhāgtā huuñ vo ziina ziina utarne vaalī shabīh jab mujh meñ jāgtī hai 
is ik nigah meñ maiñ kab huuñ larzāñ use bhī is kī ḳhabar nahīñ hai maiñ ḳhud bhī is baat ko nahīñ jāntā vo kab mujh meñ jāgtī hai 
ghani siyah zulf badliyon si bila sabab mujh mein jagti hai wo KHwahish-e-na-murad ab tak tamam shab mujh mein jagti hai 
wo ek basti jo so gai hai udas be-nam ho gai hai ba-harf-o-saut ab bhi chiKHti hai ba-chashm-o-lab mujh mein jagti hai 
tere KHayalon ki mamlikat ke tamam asnam gir chuke hain bas ek tamanna-e-kafirana bas ek talab mujh mein jagti hai 
main us ghaDi apne aap ka samna bhi karne se bhagta hun wo zina zina utarne wali shabih jab mujh mein jagti hai 
is ek nigah mein main kab hun larzan use bhi is ki KHabar nahin hai main KHud bhi is baat ko nahin jaanta wo kab mujh mein jagti hai

ye hasīn fitrat ke husn kā anīlā-pan zindagī ke aariz par ye karīh pīlā-pan 
uf ye biitī rātoñ kī yaad kā kaTīlā-pan aane vaalī sub.hoñ ke dhyān kā rasīlā-pan 
khā.egā shikast ik din sabr-o-zabt-e-paiham se dard kā tasalsul aur jabr kā haTīlā-pan 
zindagī kī mausīqī kis sitam kī shākī hai huzn hai navāoñ meñ lai meñ hai chaTīlā-pan 
ye hasin fitrat ke husn ka anila-pan zindagi ke aariz par ye karih pila-pan 
uf ye biti raaton ki yaad ka kaTila-pan aane wali subhon ke dhyan ka rasila-pan 
khaega shikast ek din sabr-o-zabt-e-paiham se dard ka tasalsul aur jabr ka haTila-pan 
zindagi ki mausiqi kis sitam ki shaki hai huzn hai nawaon mein lai mein hai chaTila-pan

mirī bhī maan mirā aks mat dikhā mujh ko maiñ ro paḌūñgā mire sāmne na lā mujh ko 
maiñ band kamre kī majbūriyoñ meñ leTā rahā pukārtī phirī bāzār meñ havā mujh ko 
tū sāmne hai to āvāz kaun suntā hai jo ho sake to kahīñ duur se bulā mujh ko 
tū aks ban ke mire ā.īne meñ baiThā rahā tamām umar koī dekhtā huā mujh ko 
varaq varaq yuuñ hī phirtā rahūñ kahāñ tak maiñ kitāb jaan ke bōk-shelf par sajā mujh ko 
ḳhudā to ab bhī hai vo 'ashk' kyā bigaḌ jaatā agar vo aur tarīqe se sochtā mujh ko 
meri bhi man mera aks mat dikha mujh ko main ro paDunga mere samne na la mujh ko 
main band kamre ki majburiyon mein leTa raha pukarti phiri bazar mein hawa mujh ko 
tu samne hai to aawaz kaun sunta hai jo ho sake to kahin dur se bula mujh ko 
tu aks ban ke mere aaine mein baiTha raha tamam umar koi dekhta hua mujh ko 
waraq waraq yun hi phirta rahun kahan tak main kitab jaan ke book-shelf par saja mujh ko 
KHuda to ab bhi hai wo 'ashk' kya bigaD jata agar wo aur tariqe se sochta mujh ko

le ke dil us shoḳh ne ik daaġh siine par diyā jo liyā us kā evaz us se mujhe behtar diyā 
duur tujh se sāġhar-e-mai par nazar maiñ ne jo kī kaasa apnā chashm ne ḳhūnāb-e-dil se bhar diyā 
jo sulūk ab dil meñ aaveñ kar mujhe taqdīr ne dast o baazū bāñdh kar tere havāle kar diyā 
dilbaroñ ke shahr meñ begānagī andher hai āshnā.ī DhūñDtā phirtā huuñ maiñ le kar diyā 
baaze hī auqāt rāhat ham ko dī hai charḳh ne ranj o ġham hī us sitamgar ne 'bayāñ' aksar diyā 
le ke dil us shoKH ne ek dagh sine par diya jo liya us ka ewaz us se mujhe behtar diya 
dur tujh se saghar-e-mai par nazar main ne jo ki kasa apna chashm ne KHunab-e-dil se bhar diya 
jo suluk ab dil mein aawen kar mujhe taqdir ne dast o bazu bandh kar tere hawale kar diya 
dilbaron ke shahr mein beganagi andher hai aashnai DhunDta phirta hun main le kar diya 
baze hi auqat rahat hum ko di hai charKH ne ranj o gham hi us sitamgar ne 'bayan' aksar diya

ḳhvāboñ kī kirchiyāñ mirī muTThī meñ bhar na jaa.e ā.inda lamha ab ke bhī yūñhī guzar na jaa.e 
rassī laTak rahī hai gale ko na bheñch le ḳhanjar chamak rahā hai badan meñ utar na jaa.e 
muñh phāḌtī haiñ ghar kī darāḌeñ idhar udhar ik qahqaha ki jaise fazā meñ bikhar na jaa.e 
kyuuñ us ke saath hī na rahā jaa.e chand roz jo aadmī ki raat meñ bhī apne ghar na jaa.e 
kyā jaane baat kyā hai ki ruktā nahīñ koī kab se pukārtā huuñ ki koī udhar na jaa.e 
kaise phir apne aap ko zinda kahūñgā maiñ ik aur shaḳhs mujh meñ hai shāmil vo mar na jaa.e 
jis ko ki urf-e-ām meñ kahte haiñ zindagī ye nashsha apne vaqt se pahle utar na jaa.e 
KHwabon ki kirchiyan meri muTThi mein bhar na jae aainda lamha ab ke bhi yunhi guzar na jae 
rassi laTak rahi hai gale ko na bhench le KHanjar chamak raha hai badan mein utar na jae 
munh phaDti hain ghar ki daraDen idhar udhar ek qahqaha ki jaise faza mein bikhar na jae 
kyun us ke sath hi na raha jae chand roz jo aadmi ki raat mein bhi apne ghar na jae 
kya jaane baat kya hai ki rukta nahin koi kab se pukarta hun ki koi udhar na jae 
kaise phir apne aap ko zinda kahunga main ek aur shaKHs mujh mein hai shamil wo mar na jae 
jis ko ki urf-e-am mein kahte hain zindagi ye nashsha apne waqt se pahle utar na jae

detā thā jo saayā vo shajar kaaT rahā hai ḳhud apne tahaffuz kī vo jaḌ kaaT rahā hai 
be-samt uḌānoñ se pashīmāñ parinda ab apnī hī minqār se par kaaT rahā hai 
mahbūs huuñ ġhāroñ meñ magar āzar-e-taḳhīl chaTTānoñ meñ ashkāl-e-hunar kaaT rahā hai 
ik zarb-e-musalsal hai ki ruktī hī nahīñ hai har tār-e-nafas dard-e-jigar kaaT rahā hai 
hai kaun kamīñ-gāh meñ ye kaise batā.ūñ har tiir magar mere hī par kaaT rahā hai 
ummīd ujāle kā liye tesha har ik dil har raat ba-andāz-e-sahar kaaT rahā hai 
kartā hai fuzūñ vahshat-e-dil dasht kā mausam 'bilqīs' magar kyā karūñ ghar kaaT rahā hai 
deta tha jo saya wo shajar kaT raha hai KHud apne tahaffuz ki wo jaD kaT raha hai 
be-samt uDanon se pashiman parinda ab apni hi minqar se par kaT raha hai 
mahbus hun ghaaron mein magar aazar-e-taKHil chaTTanon mein ashkal-e-hunar kaT raha hai 
ek zarb-e-musalsal hai ki rukti hi nahin hai har tar-e-nafas dard-e-jigar kaT raha hai 
hai kaun kamin-gah mein ye kaise bataun har tir magar mere hi par kaT raha hai 
ummid ujale ka liye tesha har ek dil har raat ba-andaz-e-sahar kaT raha hai 
karta hai fuzun wahshat-e-dil dasht ka mausam 'bilqis' magar kya karun ghar kaT raha hai

kaho butoñ se ki ham tab.a saada rakhte haiñ phir un se arz-e-vafā kā irāda rakhte haiñ 
yahī ḳhatā hai ki is gīr-o-dār meñ ham log dil-e-shagufta jabīn-e-kushāda rakhte haiñ 
ḳhudā gavāh ki asnām se hai kam raġhbat sanam-garī kī tamannā ziyāda rakhte haiñ 
dukān-e-bāda-faroshāñ ke sahn meñ 'ābid' farishte ḳhuld kā ik dar kushāda rakhte haiñ 
kaho buton se ki hum taba sada rakhte hain phir un se arz-e-wafa ka irada rakhte hain 
yahi KHata hai ki is gir-o-dar mein hum log dil-e-shagufta jabin-e-kushada rakhte hain 
KHuda gawah ki asnam se hai kam raghbat sanam-gari ki tamanna ziyaada rakhte hain 
dukan-e-baada-faroshan ke sahn mein 'abid' farishte KHuld ka ek dar kushada rakhte hain

ḳhayāl-e-yār kā sikka uchhālne meñ gayā junūñ ḳharīta-e-zar thā sambhālne meñ gayā 
lahū jigar kā huā sarf-e-rañg-e-dast-e-hinā jo saudā sar meñ thā sahrā khañgālne meñ gayā 
gurez-pā thā bahut husn-pāra-e-hastī so arsa umr kā zanjīr Dālne meñ gayā 
nihāl yādoñ kī chāñdī meñ shab to din saarā kisī ke zikr kā sonā uchhālne meñ gayā 
thī dast-gāh bayāñ par magar kamāl-e-hunar ġham-e-hayāt ke qissoñ ko Tālne meñ gayā 
KHayal-e-yar ka sikka uchhaalne mein gaya junun KHarita-e-zar tha sambhaalne mein gaya 
lahu jigar ka hua sarf-e-rang-e-dast-e-hina jo sauda sar mein tha sahra khangalne mein gaya 
gurez-pa tha bahut husn-para-e-hasti so arsa umr ka zanjir Dalne mein gaya 
nihaal yaadon ki chandi mein shab to din sara kisi ke zikr ka sona uchhaalne mein gaya 
thi dast-gah bayan par magar kamal-e-hunar gham-e-hayat ke qisson ko Talne mein gaya

na sharh-e-shauq na taskīn jān-e-zār meñ hai mazā jo apnī mohabbat ke e'tibār meñ hai 
abhī se hosh na kho baiTh ai nasīm-e-chaman abhī to ek shikan zulf-e-tābdār meñ hai 
ḳhud apne ishq kī rañgīniyoñ meñ gum ho jā nahīñ kuchh aur agar ye to iḳhtiyār meñ hai 
ye mahviyat koī dekhe ki misl-e-ā.īna junūn-e-ḳhud-nigarī apne intizār meñ hai 
na hai nasīb milī aur ba-qadr-e-zarf milī supurdagī kī jo ik shaan iḳhtiyār meñ hai 
harīf-e-bazm-e-tamāshā tirī nigāh nahīñ vagarna husn to ḳhud tere intizār meñ hai 
'asar' mujhe hai vahāñ ruḳhsat-e-navā-sanjī ki naġhma ik lab-e-ḳhāmosh jab dayār meñ hai 
na sharh-e-shauq na taskin jaan-e-zar mein hai maza jo apni mohabbat ke e'tibar mein hai 
abhi se hosh na kho baiTh ai nasim-e-chaman abhi to ek shikan zulf-e-tabdar mein hai 
KHud apne ishq ki ranginiyon mein gum ho ja nahin kuchh aur agar ye to iKHtiyar mein hai 
ye mahwiyat koi dekhe ki misl-e-aina junun-e-KHud-nigari apne intizar mein hai 
na hai nasib mili aur ba-qadr-e-zarf mili supurdagi ki jo ek shan iKHtiyar mein hai 
harif-e-bazm-e-tamasha teri nigah nahin wagarna husn to KHud tere intizar mein hai 
'asar' mujhe hai wahan ruKHsat-e-nawa-sanji ki naghma ek lab-e-KHamosh jab dayar mein hai

kise ḳhabar jab maiñ shahr-e-jāñ se guzar rahā thā zamīñ thī pahlū meñ sūraj ik kos par rahā thā 
havā meñ ḳhushbueñ merī pahchān ban ga.ī thiiñ maiñ apnī miTTī se phuul ban kar ubhar rahā thā 
ajiib sargoshiyoñ kā aalam thā anjuman meñ maiñ sun rahā thā zamāna tanqīd kar rahā thā 
vo kaisī chhat thī jo mujh ko āvāz de rahī thī vo kyā nagar thā jahāñ maiñ chup-chāp utar rahā thā 
maiñ dekhtā thā ki uñgliyoñ meñ diye kī lau hai maiñ jāgtā thā ki rañg ḳhvāboñ meñ bhar rahā thā 
ye baat alag hai ki maiñ ne jhāñkā nahīñ galī meñ ye sach hai koī sadā.eñ detā guzar rahā thā 
ye chand be-harf-o-saut ḳhāke mirā asāsa maiñ jin ko ġhazloñ kā naam de kar sañvar rahā thā 
zamāna shabnam ke bhes meñ aayā aur duā dī maiñ zard-rut meñ jab apnī bāhoñ meñ mar rahā thā 
mujhe kisī se naqab-zanī kā ḳhatar nahīñ thā maiñ 'aḳhtar' apne hī jasad-e-ḳhākī se Dar rahā thā 
kise KHabar jab main shahr-e-jaan se guzar raha tha zamin thi pahlu mein suraj ek kos par raha tha 
hawa mein KHushbuen meri pahchan ban gai thin main apni miTTi se phul ban kar ubhar raha tha 
ajib sargoshiyon ka aalam tha anjuman mein main sun raha tha zamana tanqid kar raha tha 
wo kaisi chhat thi jo mujh ko aawaz de rahi thi wo kya nagar tha jahan main chup-chap utar raha tha 
main dekhta tha ki ungliyon mein diye ki lau hai main jagta tha ki rang KHwabon mein bhar raha tha 
ye baat alag hai ki main ne jhanka nahin gali mein ye sach hai koi sadaen deta guzar raha tha 
ye chand be-harf-o-saut KHake mera asasa main jin ko ghazlon ka nam de kar sanwar raha tha 
zamana shabnam ke bhes mein aaya aur dua di main zard-rut mein jab apni bahon mein mar raha tha 
mujhe kisi se naqab-zani ka KHatar nahin tha main 'aKHtar' apne hi jasad-e-KHaki se Dar raha tha

sahrā se naddī ke safar meñ ravāñ thī ḳhaak yaanī apnī asl meñ ik imkāñ thī ḳhaak 
aisī tāza-kārī is bosīda-varaq par merī shakl meñ aane se pahle kahāñ thī ḳhaak 
havā uḌaa.ī us ne ik ik aalam kī ye us daur kī baat hai jab ki javāñ thī ḳhaak 
ik ḳhushbū kī zad meñ thā us kā har raqs aur isī ḳhushbū ke liye makāñ thī ḳhaak 
us meñ jitnī girheñ thiiñ sab aab kī thiiñ varna apne rang meñ to āsāñ thī ḳhaak 
sahra se naddi ke safar mein rawan thi KHak yani apni asl mein ek imkan thi KHak 
aisi taza-kari is bosida-waraq par meri shakl mein aane se pahle kahan thi KHak 
hawa uDai us ne ek ek aalam ki ye us daur ki baat hai jab ki jawan thi KHak 
ek KHushbu ki zad mein tha us ka har raqs aur isi KHushbu ke liye makan thi KHak 
us mein jitni girhen thin sab aab ki thin warna apne rang mein to aasan thi KHak

raat us tunuk-mizāj se kuchh baat baḌh ga.ī vo ruuTh kar gayā to ġhazab raat baḌh ga.ī 
ye kahiyo ham-nashīñ mujhe kyā kyā na kah ga.e maiñ ghaT gayā na aap kī kuchh zaat baḌh ga.ī 
bose ke naam hī pe lage kāTne zabāñ kitnī amal se aage mukāfāt baḌh ga.ī 
chashmoñ se mere shahr meñ tūfān-e-girya hai nādān jānte haiñ ki barsāt baḌh ga.ī 
samjhā thā maiñ kamar hī talak zulf kā kamāl vo paañv se bhī aage ka.ī haat baḌh ga.ī 
aġhyār se nahīñ hai sarokār yaar ko mere ba-raġhm un pe ināyāt baḌh ga.ī 
be-tauriyoñ se us kī 'bayāñ' maiñ to khiñch rahā ġhairoñ kī us ke saath mulāqāt baḌh ga.ī 
raat us tunuk-mizaj se kuchh baat baDh gai wo ruTh kar gaya to ghazab raat baDh gai 
ye kahiyo ham-nashin mujhe kya kya na kah gae main ghaT gaya na aap ki kuchh zat baDh gai 
bose ke nam hi pe lage kaTne zaban kitni amal se aage mukafat baDh gai 
chashmon se mere shahr mein tufan-e-girya hai nadan jaante hain ki barsat baDh gai 
samjha tha main kamar hi talak zulf ka kamal wo panw se bhi aage kai hat baDh gai 
aghyar se nahin hai sarokar yar ko mere ba-raghm un pe inayat baDh gai 
be-tauriyon se us ki 'bayan' main to khinch raha ghairon ki us ke sath mulaqat baDh gai

husn-e-azal kā jalva hamārī nazar meñ hai jo tuur par huā thā dil-e-dīda-var meñ hai 
dair o haram meñ kis liye āvāra-gardiyāñ jis kī tujhe talāsh hai vo dil ke ghar meñ hai 
jo dekhne kī aañkh hai tujh ko nahīñ milī vo nuur qad meñ varna shajar meñ hajar meñ hai 
ḳhāmoshiyoñ meñ mahfil-e-anjum kī us ko dekh hañgāma-mast kyuuñ tū numūd-e-sahar meñ hai 
dekhā hai aur phir nahīñ aayā nazar tujhe vo husn vo jalāl jo shams o qamar meñ hai 
us ko natīje illat-e-ġhā.ī kī is ko dhun farq is qadar hī be-ḳhabar o bā-ḳhabar meñ hai 
DhūñDā hai jis ne us ne hī paayā sunā nahīñ likkhā huā ye hukm qazā-o-qadar meñ hai 
haañ haañ ḳhudā ḳhudā hī hai aur hai bashar bashar is uqde kā jo hal hai vo qalb-e-bashar meñ hai 
vo bhī to haiñ nazāra-e-kul juz meñ hai jinheñ poshīda rāz-e-dīd to husn-e-nazar meñ hai 
hai ishq juzv-e-lā-yatajazzā yaqīn jaan ye qīmat-e-majāz-o-haqīqat ḳhatar meñ hai 
kyā shauq-e-dīd tujh pe to ġhālib hai lutf-e-dīd jo baat tere dil meñ hai apnī nazar meñ hai 
nikle na phañs ke gesu-e-pur-pech-o-ḳham se dil sāhil pe ḳhaak pahuñche jo kashtī bhañvar meñ hai 
ulfat hai kis kī kaisī mohabbat kahāñ kā ishq ma.adūm tū to fikr-e-dahān-o-kamar meñ hai 
nāqis thī ibtidā to hai anjām-e-ishq bhī be-rabtī mubtadā meñ jo thī vo ḳhabar meñ hai 
'kaifī' masīh-e-sher haiñ ahbāb aur bhī ik tujh se jān-e-tāza nahīñ is Dhachar meñ hai 
husn-e-azal ka jalwa hamari nazar mein hai jo tur par hua tha dil-e-dida-war mein hai 
dair o haram mein kis liye aawara-gardiyan jis ki tujhe talash hai wo dil ke ghar mein hai 
jo dekhne ki aankh hai tujh ko nahin mili wo nur qad mein warna shajar mein hajar mein hai 
KHamoshiyon mein mahfil-e-anjum ki us ko dekh hangama-mast kyun tu numud-e-sahar mein hai 
dekha hai aur phir nahin aaya nazar tujhe wo husn wo jalal jo shams o qamar mein hai 
us ko natije illat-e-ghai ki is ko dhun farq is qadar hi be-KHabar o ba-KHabar mein hai 
DhunDa hai jis ne us ne hi paya suna nahin likkha hua ye hukm qaza-o-qadar mein hai 
han han KHuda KHuda hi hai aur hai bashar bashar is uqde ka jo hal hai wo qalb-e-bashar mein hai 
wo bhi to hain nazara-e-kul juz mein hai jinhen poshida raaz-e-did to husn-e-nazar mein hai 
hai ishq juzw-e-la-yatajazza yaqin jaan ye qimat-e-majaz-o-haqiqat KHatar mein hai 
kya shauq-e-did tujh pe to ghaalib hai lutf-e-did jo baat tere dil mein hai apni nazar mein hai 
nikle na phans ke gesu-e-pur-pech-o-KHam se dil sahil pe KHak pahunche jo kashti bhanwar mein hai 
ulfat hai kis ki kaisi mohabbat kahan ka ishq madum tu to fikr-e-dahan-o-kamar mein hai 
naqis thi ibtida to hai anjam-e-ishq bhi be-rabti mubtada mein jo thi wo KHabar mein hai 
'kaifi' masih-e-sher hain ahbab aur bhi ek tujh se jaan-e-taza nahin is Dhachar mein hai

ye ghūmtā huā ā.īna apnā Thahrā ke zarā dikhā mirā rafta tū charḳh palTā ke 
hai kā.enāt muamma judā tarīqe kā faqat sulajhtā hai aapas meñ girheñ uljhā ke 
natīja ek sā niklā dimāġh aur dil kā ki donoñ haar ga.e imtihāñ meñ duniyā ke 
musāfiroñ se rahā hai vo rāstā ābād palaT ke aa.e nahīñ jis se pesh-rau jā ke 
ye hijr-zād samajhtā hai kam visāl kī baat batā jo ramz-o-kināya haiñ ḳhuub phailā ke 
ki band rahtā hai shahr-e-talab kā darvāza yaqīn aayā mujhe baar baar jā aa ke 
ḳhafīf ho ke maiñ chehre ko pher letā huuñ agar guzartā hai tujh āshnā sā katrā ke 
javāb merā ġhalat thā savāl us kā durust khulā ye mujh pe kisī nā-samajh ko samjhā ke 
ye ghumta hua aaina apna Thahra ke zara dikha mera rafta tu charKH palTa ke 
hai kaenat muamma juda tariqe ka faqat sulajhta hai aapas mein girhen uljha ke 
natija ek sa nikla dimagh aur dil ka ki donon haar gae imtihan mein duniya ke 
musafiron se raha hai wo rasta aabaad palaT ke aae nahin jis se pesh-rau ja ke 
ye hijr-zad samajhta hai kam visal ki baat bata jo ramz-o-kinaya hain KHub phaila ke 
ki band rahta hai shahr-e-talab ka darwaza yaqin aaya mujhe bar bar ja aa ke 
KHafif ho ke main chehre ko pher leta hun agar guzarta hai tujh aashna sa katra ke 
jawab mera ghalat tha sawal us ka durust khula ye mujh pe kisi na-samajh ko samjha ke

hujra-e-ḳhvāb se bāhar niklā kaun ye mere barābar niklā 
phaḌ-phaḌāyā mire bāhar koī aur parinda mire andar niklā 
aañkh se ashk nikal aa.e haiñ ret se jaise samundar niklā 
hijr ko ḳhvāb meñ dekhā ik din aur phir ḳhvāb-e-muqaddar niklā 
mere pīchhe mirī vahshat bhāgī maiñ jo dīvār girā kar niklā 
aañkh bīnā.ī gañvā baiThī to terī tasvīr se manzar niklā 
raat siine kī havelī gūñjī aur dil shor machā kar niklā 
shaam phailī to khulā az-sar-e-nau merā saaya mirā paikar niklā 
hujra-e-KHwab se bahar nikla kaun ye mere barabar nikla 
phaD-phaDaya mere bahar koi aur parinda mere andar nikla 
aankh se ashk nikal aae hain ret se jaise samundar nikla 
hijr ko KHwab mein dekha ek din aur phir KHwab-e-muqaddar nikla 
mere pichhe meri wahshat bhagi main jo diwar gira kar nikla 
aankh binai ganwa baiThi to teri taswir se manzar nikla 
raat sine ki haweli gunji aur dil shor macha kar nikla 
sham phaili to khula az-sar-e-nau mera saya mera paikar nikla

bāni-e-jaur-o-jafā haiñ sitam-ījād haiñ sab rāhat-e-jāñ koī dilbar nahīñ jallād haiñ sab 
kabhī tuubā tire qāmat se na hogā baalā bāteñ kahne kī ye ai ġhairat-e-shamshād haiñ sab 
mizha o abrū o chashm o nigah o ġhamza o naaz haq jo pūchho to mirī jaan ke jallād haiñ sab 
sarv ko dekh ke kahtā hai dil-e-basta-e-zulf ham giraftār haiñ is baaġh meñ āzād haiñ sab 
kuchh hai behūda o nāqis to 'amānat' kā kalām yuuñ to kahne ko fan-e-sher meñ ustād haiñ sab 
bani-e-jaur-o-jafa hain sitam-ijad hain sab rahat-e-jaan koi dilbar nahin jallad hain sab 
kabhi tuba tere qamat se na hoga baala baaten kahne ki ye ai ghairat-e-shamshad hain sab 
mizha o abru o chashm o nigah o ghamza o naz haq jo puchho to meri jaan ke jallad hain sab 
sarw ko dekh ke kahta hai dil-e-basta-e-zulf hum giraftar hain is bagh mein aazad hain sab 
kuchh hai behuda o naqis to 'amanat' ka kalam yun to kahne ko fan-e-sher mein ustad hain sab

talḳhāba-e-ġham ḳhanda-jabīñ ho ke piye jā mauhūm umīdoñ ke sahāroñ pe jiye jā 
māyūs na ho be-ruḳhī-e-chashm-e-jahāñ se shā.ista-e-ehsās koī kaam kiye jā 
shikva na kar is daur-e-junūñ-zād kā koī taqdīr-e-ḳhirad-soz ko ilzām diye jā 
auroñ ko garebāñ kī tujhe fikr hī kyuuñ ho tū apnī hī sad-chāki-e-dāmāñ ko siye jā 
har lamha taġhayyur pe nigāhoñ ko jamā.e tū jā.iza-e-gardish-e-ayyām liye jā 
is jabr-e-mashiyyat ko to sahnā hī paḌegā be-kaif sahī un ke ishāroñ pe jiye jā 
saaqī kī nazar se koī nisbat hai to 'anvar' piine kī adā ye bhī hai be-jām piye jā 
talKHaba-e-gham KHanda-jabin ho ke piye ja mauhum umidon ke sahaaron pe jiye ja 
mayus na ho be-ruKHi-e-chashm-e-jahan se shaista-e-ehsas koi kaam kiye ja 
shikwa na kar is daur-e-junun-zad ka koi taqdir-e-KHirad-soz ko ilzam diye ja 
auron ko gareban ki tujhe fikr hi kyun ho tu apni hi sad-chaaki-e-daman ko siye ja 
har lamha taghayyur pe nigahon ko jamae tu jaiza-e-gardish-e-ayyam liye ja 
is jabr-e-mashiyyat ko to sahna hi paDega be-kaif sahi un ke ishaaron pe jiye ja 
saqi ki nazar se koi nisbat hai to 'anwar' pine ki ada ye bhi hai be-jam piye ja

nigah-e-shauq ko yuuñ ā.ina-sāmānī de ishq ko husn banā husn ko hairānī de 
dil-navāzī meñ bhī iizā hai mohabbat kī qasam tujh ko fursat jo kabhī shuġhl-e-sitam-rānī de 
kuchh tirī chashm-e-suḳhan-sāz kā iimā na khulā lab-e-mai-nosh ko taklīf-e-gul-afshānī de 
phuul vo hai jo mayassar chaḌhe ye suntā thā ab khulā dil kī rah-e-ishq meñ qurbānī de 
aa.ina sañg-e-dar-e-dost huā bhī to kyā sar jo sajde meñ jhuke lau tirī peshānī de 
uf vo purkār jo sunte hī taġhāful kā gila ishva-o-nāz ko ta.alīm-e-pashīmānī de 
dil-e-betāb-e-tamāshā kī tasallī ma.alūm apne har jalve ko ik paikar-e-insānī de 
us kī añgḌā.ī kā aalam to kabhī dekh ai gul aur hī husn tirī chāk-garebānī de 
aao shīrāza-e-hastī ko pareshāñ kar deñ yuuñ ki us zulf ko paiġhām-e-pareshānī de 
terī sarkār ġhanī terā gadā bhī hai ġhanī kuchh na de aur jo de ġham kī farāvānī de 
is tavaqqo pe huuñ ḳhāmosh ki vo shoḳh-nigāh phir Tahokā pa-e-taqrīb-e-ġhazal-ḳhvānī de 
nigah-e-shauq ko yun aaina-samani de ishq ko husn bana husn ko hairani de 
dil-nawazi mein bhi iza hai mohabbat ki qasam tujh ko fursat jo kabhi shughl-e-sitam-rani de 
kuchh teri chashm-e-suKHan-saz ka ima na khula lab-e-mai-nosh ko taklif-e-gul-afshani de 
phul wo hai jo mayassar chaDhe ye sunta tha ab khula dil ki rah-e-ishq mein qurbani de 
aaina sang-e-dar-e-dost hua bhi to kya sar jo sajde mein jhuke lau teri peshani de 
uf wo purkar jo sunte hi taghaful ka gila ishwa-o-naz ko talim-e-pashimani de 
dil-e-betab-e-tamasha ki tasalli malum apne har jalwe ko ek paikar-e-insani de 
us ki angDai ka aalam to kabhi dekh ai gul aur hi husn teri chaak-garebani de 
aao shiraaza-e-hasti ko pareshan kar den yun ki us zulf ko paigham-e-pareshani de 
teri sarkar ghani tera gada bhi hai ghani kuchh na de aur jo de gham ki farawani de 
is tawaqqo pe hun KHamosh ki wo shoKH-nigah phir Tahoka pa-e-taqrib-e-ghazal-KHwani de

shāyad mirī fariyād sunā.ī nahīñ detī qudarat jo mujhe hukm-e-rihā.ī nahīñ detī 
thā pahle bahut shor nihāñ-ḳhāna-e-dil meñ ab to koī siskī bhī sunā.ī nahīñ detī 
ḳhvāboñ kī tijārat meñ yahī ek kamī hai chaltī hai dukāñ ḳhuub kamā.ī nahīñ detī 
har tār-e-nafas hai mut.harrik mutvātir ruḳhsat hī mujhe naġhma-sarā.ī nahīñ detī 
kyā dhund hai ashkoñ kī musallat dil o jaañ par dekhī huī duniyā bhī dikhā.ī nahīñ detī 
chalne ko to sab yaar kamar-basta khaḌe haiñ jis raah pe chalnā hai sujhā.ī nahīñ detī 
kāñToñ pe chalātī hai koī aur hī lazzat vahshat kā sila ābla-pā.ī nahīñ detī 
maiñ qaid-e-mahālāt se dam bhar meñ nikal jā.ūñ hāsil kī havas mujh ko rihā.ī nahīñ detī 
maiñ apnī hī miTTī se banā letā huuñ 'mid.hat' vo chiiz jo auroñ kī ḳhudā.ī nahīñ detī 
shayad meri fariyaad sunai nahin deti qudarat jo mujhe hukm-e-rihai nahin deti 
tha pahle bahut shor nihan-KHana-e-dil mein ab to koi siski bhi sunai nahin deti 
KHwabon ki tijarat mein yahi ek kami hai chalti hai dukan KHub kamai nahin deti 
har tar-e-nafas hai mutharrik mutwatir ruKHsat hi mujhe naghma-sarai nahin deti 
kya dhund hai ashkon ki musallat dil o jaan par dekhi hui duniya bhi dikhai nahin deti 
chalne ko to sab yar kamar-basta khaDe hain jis rah pe chalna hai sujhai nahin deti 
kanTon pe chalati hai koi aur hi lazzat wahshat ka sila aabla-pai nahin deti 
main qaid-e-mahaalat se dam bhar mein nikal jaun hasil ki hawas mujh ko rihai nahin deti 
main apni hi miTTi se bana leta hun 'midhat' wo chiz jo auron ki KHudai nahin deti

fasl-e-gul saath liye baaġh meñ kyā aatī hai bulbul-e-naġhma-sarā rū-ba-qazā aatī hai 
dil dhaḌaktā hai ye kahte hue us mahfil meñ yaañ kisī ko ḳhafaqāñ kī bhī davā aatī hai 
aaj vo shoḳh hai aur kasrat-e-ārā.ish hai dekh kis vāste pisne ko hinā aatī hai 
kyā khule baaġh meñ vo chashm-e-hijāb-ālūda aañkh uThāte hue nargis ko hayā aatī hai 
jāñ-kanī husn-parastoñ ko girāñ kyā guzre bhes meñ hūr-e-bahishtī ke qazā aatī hai 
is liye rashk-e-chaman baaġh meñ gul hañste haiñ ki uḌātī tirī raftār sabā aatī hai 
maraz-e-ishq se 'bīmār' jo ghabrātā hai yaar kahtā hai mujhe ḳhuub davā aatī hai 
fasl-e-gul sath liye bagh mein kya aati hai bulbul-e-naghma-sara ru-ba-qaza aati hai 
dil dhaDakta hai ye kahte hue us mahfil mein yan kisi ko KHafaqan ki bhi dawa aati hai 
aaj wo shoKH hai aur kasrat-e-araish hai dekh kis waste pisne ko hina aati hai 
kya khule bagh mein wo chashm-e-hijab-aluda aankh uThate hue nargis ko haya aati hai 
jaan-kani husn-paraston ko giran kya guzre bhes mein hur-e-bahishti ke qaza aati hai 
is liye rashk-e-chaman bagh mein gul hanste hain ki uDati teri raftar saba aati hai 
maraz-e-ishq se 'bimar' jo ghabraata hai yar kahta hai mujhe KHub dawa aati hai

hañgām-e-havas-kār mohabbat ke liye hai hai jo bhī kashākash vo nadāmat ke liye hai 
jiinā to alag baat hai marnā bhī yahāñ par har shaḳhs kī apnī hī zarūrat ke liye hai 
milne tujhe aayā huuñ na milne ke liye hī aamad ye mirī asl meñ ruḳhsat ke liye hai 
āḳhir ko yahī kār-garī-e-barf pighal kar maujoñ ke tavassul se harārat ke liye hai 
maiñ haath na aane kā huuñ tere ai zamāne ya.anī mirā honā tirī hasrat ke liye hai 
maiñ niiñd kā dar khole hue huuñ tirī ḳhātir har ḳhvāb mirā terī sahūlat ke liye hai 
vo hai ki nazar aatā nahīñ aur kisī ko vo hai ki faqat merī basārat ke liye hai 
qudarat hī ko manzūr hai kuchh aur vagarna har lamha-e-ā.inda qayāmat ke liye hai 
imkān ne jo shahr basāyā hai vahāñ par har chashm-e-tamāshā na.ī hairat ke liye hai 
hangam-e-hawas-kar mohabbat ke liye hai hai jo bhi kashakash wo nadamat ke liye hai 
jina to alag baat hai marna bhi yahan par har shaKHs ki apni hi zarurat ke liye hai 
milne tujhe aaya hun na milne ke liye hi aamad ye meri asl mein ruKHsat ke liye hai 
aaKHir ko yahi kar-gari-e-barf pighal kar maujon ke tawassul se hararat ke liye hai 
main hath na aane ka hun tere ai zamane yani mera hona teri hasrat ke liye hai 
main nind ka dar khole hue hun teri KHatir har KHwab mera teri sahulat ke liye hai 
wo hai ki nazar aata nahin aur kisi ko wo hai ki faqat meri basarat ke liye hai 
qudarat hi ko manzur hai kuchh aur wagarna har lamha-e-ainda qayamat ke liye hai 
imkan ne jo shahr basaya hai wahan par har chashm-e-tamasha nai hairat ke liye hai

mere lahū kī sarshārī kyā us kī fazā bhī kitnī der tere kaf-e-nāzuk pe rahegā rañg-e-hinā bhī kitnī der 
us kī nazar kī halkī sī jumbish kyā kyā jauhar rakhtī hai lā saktā hai tāb-e-tamāshā ā.īna bhī kitnī der 
ab ke vasl kā mausam yūñhī bechainī meñ biit gayā us ke hoñToñ par chāhat kā phuul khilā bhī kitnī der 
koī takallum koī ishāra koī aahaT paas nahīñ zinda rahe vīrāna-e-jāñ meñ dil kī sadā bhī kitnī der 
bikhrā diiñ atrāf-e-junūñ meñ kaisī kaisī ḳhushbueñ kūcha-e-yār meñ Thahrī hogī bād-e-sabā bhī kitnī der 
mere dil meñ gahrā.ī tak zaḳhm haiñ andhī ḳhvāhish ke aur abhī hoñToñ pe rahegā zahr-e-duā bhī kitnī der 
apnī ek adā rakhtī hai us ke ba.ad kī gudāzī bhī kuchh to socho us pe chalegā sehr-e-qabā bhī kitnī der 
aage dhund hai be-samtī kī pīchhe ġhubār-e-gum-shudagī mere sar meñ saath rahegī merī anā bhī kitnī der 
us ke taġhāful kā bhī bharam rakh us se itnī chheḌ na kar 'ramz' barastī hai be-mausam koī ghaTā bhī kitnī der 
mere lahu ki sarshaari kya us ki faza bhi kitni der tere kaf-e-nazuk pe rahega rang-e-hina bhi kitni der 
us ki nazar ki halki si jumbish kya kya jauhar rakhti hai la sakta hai tab-e-tamasha aaina bhi kitni der 
ab ke wasl ka mausam yunhi bechaini mein bit gaya us ke honTon par chahat ka phul khila bhi kitni der 
koi takallum koi ishaara koi aahaT pas nahin zinda rahe virana-e-jaan mein dil ki sada bhi kitni der 
bikhra din atraf-e-junun mein kaisi kaisi KHushbuen kucha-e-yar mein Thahri hogi baad-e-saba bhi kitni der 
mere dil mein gahrai tak zaKHm hain andhi KHwahish ke aur abhi honTon pe rahega zahr-e-dua bhi kitni der 
apni ek ada rakhti hai us ke baad ki gudazi bhi kuchh to socho us pe chalega sehr-e-qaba bhi kitni der 
aage dhund hai be-samti ki pichhe ghubar-e-gum-shudagi mere sar mein sath rahegi meri ana bhi kitni der 
us ke taghaful ka bhi bharam rakh us se itni chheD na kar 'ramz' barasti hai be-mausam koi ghaTa bhi kitni der

gir paḌe daañt hue mū-e-sar ai yaar safed kyuuñ na ho ḳhauf-e-ajal se ye siyahkār safed 
do qadam fart-e-nazākat se nahīñ chal saktā rañg ho jaatā hai us kā dam-e-raftār safed 
us masīhā kī jo āñkheñ huiiñ gulzār meñ surḳh ho ga.ī ḳhauf se bas nargis-e-bīmār safed 
gul-e-nasrīñ ko nahīñ josh chaman meñ bulbul hai nazākat ke sabab chehra-e-gulzār safed 
ghar mire shab ko jo vo rashk-e-qamar aa niklā ho ga.e partav-e-ruḳh se dar o dīvār safed 
lab o dandāñ ke tasavvur meñ jo royā maiñ kabhī ashk do-chār bahe surḳh to do-chār safed 
huī sarsabz jo sohbat meñ 'amānat' kī ġhazal rañg dushman kā huā rashk se ik baar safed 
gir paDe dant hue mu-e-sar ai yar safed kyun na ho KHauf-e-ajal se ye siyahkar safed 
do qadam fart-e-nazakat se nahin chal sakta rang ho jata hai us ka dam-e-raftar safed 
us masiha ki jo aankhen huin gulzar mein surKH ho gai KHauf se bas nargis-e-bimar safed 
gul-e-nasrin ko nahin josh chaman mein bulbul hai nazakat ke sabab chehra-e-gulzar safed 
ghar mere shab ko jo wo rashk-e-qamar aa nikla ho gae partaw-e-ruKH se dar o diwar safed 
lab o dandan ke tasawwur mein jo roya main kabhi ashk do-chaar bahe surKH to do-chaar safed 
hui sarsabz jo sohbat mein 'amanat' ki ghazal rang dushman ka hua rashk se ek bar safed

ye aarzū hai ki vo nāma-bar se le kāġhaz balā se phaaḌ ke phir haath meñ na le kāġhaz 
vo kaun din hai ki ġhairoñ ko ḳhat nahīñ likhtā qalam ke ban ko lage aag aur jale kāġhaz 
tamām shahr meñ tash.hīr mere bad-ḳhū ne payām-bar ko kiyā bāñdh kar gale kāġhaz 
bahā duuñ aise ka.ī daftar ashk kī rau meñ kiye haiñ jamā are ġhāfilo bhale kāġhaz 
payām-bar mujhe aisā koī nahīñ miltā ki hīla-jū se mire le hī kar Tale kāġhaz 
'bayāñ' ko zof hai itnā ki bād-e-tund ke roz jo ḳhat likhe to use le ke uḌ chale kāġhaz 
ye aarzu hai ki wo nama-bar se le kaghaz bala se phaD ke phir hath mein na le kaghaz 
wo kaun din hai ki ghairon ko KHat nahin likhta qalam ke ban ko lage aag aur jale kaghaz 
tamam shahr mein tashhir mere bad-KHu ne payam-bar ko kiya bandh kar gale kaghaz 
baha dun aise kai daftar ashk ki rau mein kiye hain jama are ghafilo bhale kaghaz 
payam-bar mujhe aisa koi nahin milta ki hila-ju se mere le hi kar Tale kaghaz 
'bayan' ko zof hai itna ki baad-e-tund ke roz jo KHat likhe to use le ke uD chale kaghaz

sab ḳhalāoñ ko ḳhalāoñ se bhigo saktā hai aadmī ruuh ke andar bhī to ro saktā hai 
ye siyāhī kā sirā jaane kahāñ haath aa.e mirā saayā tirā bātin bhī to ho saktā hai 
dastaras tere samundar kī hai tujh se bhī pare tū mujhe aañkh se bāhar bhī Dubo saktā hai 
le to aayā hai mujhe maut kī gardish se alag tū mujhe saañs ke mahvar pe bhī kho saktā hai 
apne anfās kī tahrīk pe bikhrā hai magar tū mere lams meñ yakjā bhī to ho saktā hai 
terī miTTī ne samoyā nahīñ to kyā hai 'riyāz' tū to is jism ke bāhar kahīñ so saktā hai 
sab KHalaon ko KHalaon se bhigo sakta hai aadmi ruh ke andar bhi to ro sakta hai 
ye siyahi ka sira jaane kahan hath aae mera saya tera baatin bhi to ho sakta hai 
dastaras tere samundar ki hai tujh se bhi pare tu mujhe aankh se bahar bhi Dubo sakta hai 
le to aaya hai mujhe maut ki gardish se alag tu mujhe sans ke mahwar pe bhi kho sakta hai 
apne anfas ki tahrik pe bikhra hai magar tu mere lams mein yakja bhi to ho sakta hai 
teri miTTi ne samoya nahin to kya hai 'riyaz' tu to is jism ke bahar kahin so sakta hai

ye jo biphre hue dhāre liye phirtā huuñ maiñ apne hamrāh kināre liye phirtā huuñ maiñ 
tābish o taab liye aa.egā sūraj merā raat bhar sar pe sitāre liye phirtā huuñ maiñ 
barg-e-āvāra-sifat saath mujhe bhī le chal tere andāz to saare liye phirtā huuñ maiñ 
ye alag baat churā letā hai nazreñ apnī us kī āñkhoñ meñ nazāre liye phirtā huuñ maiñ 
kohr meñ Duubī ye sarmā kī saver ai duniyā tum samajhtī ho tumhāre liye phirtā huuñ maiñ 
jaane kyā baat hai puure hī nahīñ hote haiñ jaane kyā dil meñ ḳhasāre liye phirtā huuñ maiñ 
phuul hoñToñ pe hañsī ke haiñ mahakte hue 'shāz' aur sāñsoñ meñ sharāre liye phirtā huuñ maiñ 
ye jo biphre hue dhaare liye phirta hun main apne hamrah kinare liye phirta hun main 
tabish o tab liye aaega suraj mera raat bhar sar pe sitare liye phirta hun main 
barg-e-awara-sifat sath mujhe bhi le chal tere andaz to sare liye phirta hun main 
ye alag baat chura leta hai nazren apni us ki aankhon mein nazare liye phirta hun main 
kohr mein Dubi ye sarma ki sawer ai duniya tum samajhti ho tumhaare liye phirta hun main 
jaane kya baat hai pure hi nahin hote hain jaane kya dil mein KHasare liye phirta hun main 
phul honTon pe hansi ke hain mahakte hue 'shaz' aur sanson mein sharare liye phirta hun main

navāh-e-jāñ meñ kahīñ abtarī sī lagtī hai sukūn ho to ajab bekalī sī lagtī hai 
ik aarzū mujhe kyā kyā fareb detī hai bujhe charāġh meñ bhī raushnī sī lagtī hai 
ga.ī rutoñ ke tasarruf meñ aa gayā shāyad ab āñsuoñ meñ lahū kī kamī sī lagtī hai 
usī ko yaad dilātā hai baar baar dimāġh vo ek baat jo dil meñ anī sī lagtī hai 
ki roz ek nayā gul khilātī rahtī hai ye kā.enāt kisī kī galī sī lagtī hai 
kabhī to lagtā hai gumrāh kar ga.ī mujh ko suḳhan-varī kabhī paiġhambarī sī lagtī hai 
janāb-e-shaiḳh kī mahfil se uTh chalo ki 'suhail' yahāñ to nabz-e-do-ālam rukī sī lagtī hai 
nawah-e-jaan mein kahin abtari si lagti hai sukun ho to ajab bekali si lagti hai 
ek aarzu mujhe kya kya fareb deti hai bujhe charagh mein bhi raushni si lagti hai 
gai ruton ke tasarruf mein aa gaya shayad ab aansuon mein lahu ki kami si lagti hai 
usi ko yaad dilata hai bar bar dimagh wo ek baat jo dil mein ani si lagti hai 
ki roz ek naya gul khilati rahti hai ye kaenat kisi ki gali si lagti hai 
kabhi to lagta hai gumrah kar gai mujh ko suKHan-wari kabhi paighambari si lagti hai 
janab-e-shaiKH ki mahfil se uTh chalo ki 'suhail' yahan to nabz-e-do-alam ruki si lagti hai

kahā aġhyār kā haq meñ mire manzūr mat kiijo mujhe nazdīk se apne kabhū tū duur mat kiijo 
hue sañg-e-jafā se shīsha-e-dil ke ka.ī TukḌe bas ab is se ziyāda aur chaknāchūr mat kiijo 
mire marham-guzār us shoḳh-e-be-parvā se ye kahiyo ki zālim zaḳhm taaza hai use nāsūr mat kiijo 
haqārat apne āshiq kī nahīñ māshūq ko bhātī 'bayāñ' sa.ī apnī rusvā.ī meñ tā maqdūr mat kiijo 
kahā thā sār-bāñ ke kaan meñ lailā ne āhista ki majnūñ kī ḳharābī kā kahīñ mazkūr mat kiijo 
kaha aghyar ka haq mein mere manzur mat kijo mujhe nazdik se apne kabhu tu dur mat kijo 
hue sang-e-jafa se shisha-e-dil ke kai TukDe bas ab is se ziyaada aur chaknachur mat kijo 
mere marham-guzar us shoKH-e-be-parwa se ye kahiyo ki zalim zaKHm taza hai use nasur mat kijo 
haqarat apne aashiq ki nahin mashuq ko bhati 'bayan' sai apni ruswai mein ta maqdur mat kijo 
kaha tha sar-ban ke kan mein laila ne aahista ki majnun ki KHarabi ka kahin mazkur mat kijo

'iqbāl' yūñhī kab tak ham qaid-e-anā kāTeñ mil baiTh ke logoñ meñ aa apne ḳhalā kāTeñ 
jo karnā hai ab kar leñ ham tum se na kahte the ab sañg-sitam chāheñ hone kī sazā kāTeñ 
ab bāñjh zamīnoñ se ummīd bhī kyā rakhnā ro.eñ bhī to lā-hāsil bo.eñ bhī to kyā kāTeñ 
par le ke kidhar jaa.eñ kuchh duur tak uḌ aa.eñ dam jitnā mayassar hai ye Thahrī havā kāTeñ 
is marhala-e-shab meñ ab ek hī sūrat hai yā dasht-e-talab pāTeñ yā gardish-e-pā kāTeñ 
'iqbaal' yunhi kab tak hum qaid-e-ana kaTen mil baiTh ke logon mein aa apne KHala kaTen 
jo karna hai ab kar len hum tum se na kahte the ab sang-sitam chahen hone ki saza kaTen 
ab banjh zaminon se ummid bhi kya rakhna roen bhi to la-hasil boen bhi to kya kaTen 
par le ke kidhar jaen kuchh dur tak uD aaen dam jitna mayassar hai ye Thahri hawa kaTen 
is marhala-e-shab mein ab ek hi surat hai ya dasht-e-talab paTen ya gardish-e-pa kaTen

rahtā hai zulf-e-yār mire man se man lagā ai naag tire haath ye kyā ḳhuub man lagā 
dekhā hai jin ne rū-e-dil-afroz ko tire be-shak nazar meñ bāġh-e-iram us kī ban lagā 
sarsabz nit rakheñge unheñ mere ashk o aah ai nau-bahār-e-husn jo chāhe chaman lagā 
siina sipar kar ā.ūñgā kūche meñ maiñ tire garche raqīb baiThe haiñ vaañ tan se tan lagā 
kyā fā.eda hai qissa-e-rizvān se tujhe koī sham.a-rū parī sate tū bhī lagan lagā 
'āgāh' ḳhaar ḳhaar judā.ī se hai hazīñ yak-bār tū gale se use gul-badan lagā 
rahta hai zulf-e-yar mere man se man laga ai nag tere hath ye kya KHub man laga 
dekha hai jin ne ru-e-dil-afroz ko tere be-shak nazar mein bagh-e-iram us ki ban laga 
sarsabz nit rakhenge unhen mere ashk o aah ai nau-bahaar-e-husn jo chahe chaman laga 
sina sipar kar aaunga kuche mein main tere garche raqib baiThe hain wan tan se tan laga 
kya faeda hai qissa-e-rizwan se tujhe koi shama-ru pari sate tu bhi lagan laga 
'agah' KHar KHar judai se hai hazin yak-bar tu gale se use gul-badan laga

sab ko gumān bhī ki maiñ āgāh-e-rāz thā kis darja kāmyāb fareb-e-majāz thā 
misl-e-mah-e-do-hafta vahī sarfarāz thā jis kī jabīn-e-shauq pe dāġh-e-niyāz thā 
pūchho na hāl-e-kashmakash-e-yās-o-ārzū vo bhī ajiib marhala-e-jāñ-gudāz thā 
jab tak haqīqatoñ se mirā dil thā be-ḳhabar bechāra mubtalā-e-ġham-e-imtiyāz thā 
jhoñkā havā-e-sarv kā rindoñ ke vāste ḳhum-ḳhāna-e-bahār se hukm-e-javāz thā 
ahl-e-jahāñ ke kufr o tavahhum kā kyā ilaaj ā.īna kah rahā hai ki ā.īna-sāz thā 
muzmir the merī zaat meñ asrār-e-kā.enāt maiñ aap raaz aap hī ḳhud sharah-e-rāz thā 
aa.eñ pasand kyā use duniyā kī rāhateñ jo lazzat-āshnā-e-sitam-hā-e-nāz thā 
ḳhilqat samajh rahī thī jise iztirāb-e-dil pinhāñ usī meñ hasti-e-āshiq kā raaz thā 
achchhā huā hamesha ko chup ho gayā 'ravāñ' ik ik nafas ġharīb kā hastī-gudāz thā 
sab ko guman bhi ki main aagah-e-raaz tha kis darja kaamyab fareb-e-majaz tha 
misl-e-mah-e-do-hafta wahi sarfaraaz tha jis ki jabin-e-shauq pe dagh-e-niyaz tha 
puchho na haal-e-kashmakash-e-yas-o-arzu wo bhi ajib marhala-e-jaan-gudaz tha 
jab tak haqiqaton se mera dil tha be-KHabar bechaara mubtala-e-gham-e-imtiyaz tha 
jhonka hawa-e-sarw ka rindon ke waste KHum-KHana-e-bahaar se hukm-e-jawaz tha 
ahl-e-jahan ke kufr o tawahhum ka kya ilaj aaina kah raha hai ki aaina-saz tha 
muzmir the meri zat mein asrar-e-kaenat main aap raaz aap hi KHud sharah-e-raaz tha 
aaen pasand kya use duniya ki rahaten jo lazzat-ashna-e-sitam-ha-e-naz tha 
KHilqat samajh rahi thi jise iztirab-e-dil pinhan usi mein hasti-e-ashiq ka raaz tha 
achchha hua hamesha ko chup ho gaya 'rawan' ek ek nafas gharib ka hasti-gudaz tha

kyā kyā na tere sadme se bād-e-ḳhizāñ girā gul barg sarv fāḳhta kā āshiyāñ girā 
likhne lagī qazā jo hamārī fatādgī sau baar haath se qalam-e-do-zabāñ girā 
jab pahuñche ham kināra-e-maqsūd ke qarīb tab nāḳhudā jahāñ se uThā bādbāñ girā 
mūbāf-e-surḳh choTī se kyā un kī khul paḌā ek sā.iqa sā dil pe mire nā-gahāñ girā 
tā āsmāñ pahuñch ke huī aah sar-nigūñ yā rab ho ḳhair fauj-e-alam kā nishāñ girā 
uTh kar chalā jo paas se un ke to ghar talak har har qadam pe zof se maiñ nā-tavāñ girā 
dekhā jo dasht-e-najd meñ hāl-e-tabāh-e-qais mahmil se lailā kuud paḌī sār-bāñ girā 
dozaḳh pe kyuuñ na ho dil-e-'bīmār' tāna-zan ātish se ishq kī hai patiñgā yahāñ girā 
kya kya na tere sadme se baad-e-KHizan gira gul barg sarw faKHta ka aashiyan gira 
likhne lagi qaza jo hamari fatadgi sau bar hath se qalam-e-do-zaban gira 
jab pahunche hum kinara-e-maqsud ke qarib tab naKHuda jahan se uTha baadban gira 
mubaf-e-surKH choTi se kya un ki khul paDa ek saiqa sa dil pe mere na-gahan gira 
ta aasman pahunch ke hui aah sar-nigun ya rab ho KHair fauj-e-alam ka nishan gira 
uTh kar chala jo pas se un ke to ghar talak har har qadam pe zof se main na-tawan gira 
dekha jo dasht-e-najd mein haal-e-tabah-e-qais mahmil se laila kud paDi sar-ban gira 
dozaKH pe kyun na ho dil-e-'bimar' tana-zan aatish se ishq ki hai patinga yahan gira

maiñ tire Dar se ro nahīñ saktā gard-e-ġham dil se dho nahīñ saktā 
ashk yuuñ tham rahe haiñ mizhgāñ par koī motī piro nahīñ saktā 
shab mirā shor-e-girya sun ke kahā maiñ to is ġhul meñ so nahīñ saktā 
maslahat tark-e-ishq hai nāseh lek ye ham se ho nahīñ saktā 
kuchh 'bayāñ' tuḳhm-e-dostī ke sivā mazra-e-dil meñ bo nahīñ saktā 
main tere Dar se ro nahin sakta gard-e-gham dil se dho nahin sakta 
ashk yun tham rahe hain mizhgan par koi moti piro nahin sakta 
shab mera shor-e-girya sun ke kaha main to is ghul mein so nahin sakta 
maslahat tark-e-ishq hai naseh lek ye hum se ho nahin sakta 
kuchh 'bayan' tuKHm-e-dosti ke siwa mazra-e-dil mein bo nahin sakta

sabz-khetoñ se umaDtī raushnī tasvīr kī maiñ ne apnī aañkh se ik harf-gah tāmīr kī 
sun qatār andar qatār ashjār kī sargoshiyāñ aur kahānī paḌh ḳhizāñ ne raat jo tahrīr kī 
kachchī qabroñ par sajī ḳhushbū kī bikhrī laash par ḳhāmushī ne ik na.e andāz meñ taqrīr kī 
bachpane kī dars-gāhoñ meñ purāne TaaT par dil ne hairānī kī pahlī bārgah tasḳhīr kī 
raushnī meñ raqs karte ḳhaak ke zarrāt ne intihā-e-āb-o-gil kī avvalīñ tafsīr kī 
kohsāroñ ke saroñ par bādaloñ kī pagḌiyāñ ek tamsīl-e-numāyāñ āya-e-tat.hīr kī 
dhund ke lashkar kā chāroñ or pahrā thā magar ik diye ne raushnī kī raat bhar tash.hīr kī 
aaj phir āb-e-muqaddas aañkh se hijrat kiyā ghar pahuñchne meñ kisī ne aaj phir tāḳhīr kī 
sabz-kheton se umaDti raushni taswir ki main ne apni aankh se ek harf-gah tamir ki 
sun qatar andar qatar ashjar ki sargoshiyan aur kahani paDh KHizan ne raat jo tahrir ki 
kachchi qabron par saji KHushbu ki bikhri lash par KHamushi ne ek nae andaz mein taqrir ki 
bachpane ki dars-gahon mein purane TaT par dil ne hairani ki pahli bargah tasKHir ki 
raushni mein raqs karte KHak ke zarraat ne intiha-e-ab-o-gil ki awwalin tafsir ki 
kohsaron ke saron par baadalon ki pagDiyan ek tamsil-e-numayan aaya-e-tathir ki 
dhund ke lashkar ka chaaron or pahra tha magar ek diye ne raushni ki raat bhar tashhir ki 
aaj phir aab-e-muqaddas aankh se hijrat kiya ghar pahunchne mein kisi ne aaj phir taKHir ki

Dūbnā hai us se ye iqrār kar lenā mirā phir ba-āsānī samundar paar kar lenā mirā 
kaun pūchhe mujh se merī gosha-gīrī kā sabab kaun samjhe dar kabhī dīvār kar lenā mirā 
ek ḳhushbū ban ke guzre sar se saare garm o sard us kā chehra thāmnā aur pyaar kar lenā mirā 
ban gayā logoñ kī shān-e-kaj-kulāhī kā savāl apne sar ko lā.eq-e-dastār kar lenā mirā 
'ramz' us ko de gayā ik tarz-e-fariyād-o-fuġhāñ band āñkhoñ ko lab-e-iz.hār kar lenā mirā 
Dubna hai us se ye iqrar kar lena mera phir ba-asani samundar par kar lena mera 
kaun puchhe mujh se meri gosha-giri ka sabab kaun samjhe dar kabhi diwar kar lena mera 
ek KHushbu ban ke guzre sar se sare garm o sard us ka chehra thamna aur pyar kar lena mera 
ban gaya logon ki shan-e-kaj-kulahi ka sawal apne sar ko laeq-e-dastar kar lena mera 
'ramz' us ko de gaya ek tarz-e-fariyaad-o-fughan band aankhon ko lab-e-izhaar kar lena mera

charāġh hāthoñ ke bujh rahe haiñ sitāra har rah-guzar meñ rakh de utaar de chāñd us ke dar par siyāh din mere ghar meñ rakh de 
kahīñ kahīñ koī rabt-e-maḳhfī ibārat-e-muntashar meñ rakh de gurez par haiñ nishān saare taraf bhī koī safar meñ rakh de 
talab talab ā.ina-sifat hai ḳharāb-o-ḳhasta haiñ aks saare ye nekiyāñ bhī haiñ sar-barahna latāfat-e-ḳhair shar meñ rakh de 
nashāt-āvar hai ye udāsī kā ek uḌtā huā sā lamha mabādā tāq-e-rajā ho vīrāñ sharāra ik chashm-e-tar meñ rakh de 
ye sarf-o-hāsil-gazīda duniyā na din hī mere na merī rāteñ kahāñ talak dekhtā hī jā.ūñ samā.ateñ kuchh nazar meñ rakh de 
mire ḳhudā mere jism-o-jāñ ke ḳhudā mire haath jhaḌ na jaa.eñ duā tah-e-sañg-e-lab gaḌī hai asar zarā sā asar meñ rakh de 
badan hai yā qila-e-havā hai kahīñ se aa.uuñ kahīñ se jā.ūñ hazāroñ raḳhne paḌe hue haiñ uThā ke dīvār dar meñ rakh de 
charagh hathon ke bujh rahe hain sitara har rah-guzar mein rakh de utar de chand us ke dar par siyah din mere ghar mein rakh de 
kahin kahin koi rabt-e-maKHfi ibarat-e-muntashar mein rakh de gurez par hain nishan sare taraf bhi koi safar mein rakh de 
talab talab aaina-sifat hai KHarab-o-KHasta hain aks sare ye nekiyan bhi hain sar-barahna latafat-e-KHair shar mein rakh de 
nashat-awar hai ye udasi ka ek uDta hua sa lamha mabaada taq-e-raja ho viran sharara ek chashm-e-tar mein rakh de 
ye sarf-o-hasil-gazida duniya na din hi mere na meri raaten kahan talak dekhta hi jaun samaaten kuchh nazar mein rakh de 
mere KHuda mere jism-o-jaan ke KHuda mere hath jhaD na jaen dua tah-e-sang-e-lab gaDi hai asar zara sa asar mein rakh de 
badan hai ya qila-e-hawa hai kahin se aaun kahin se jaun hazaron raKHne paDe hue hain uTha ke diwar dar mein rakh de

jagmagātī raushnī ke paar kyā thā dekhte dhuul kā tūfāñ añdhere bo rahā thā dekhte 
sabz Tahnī par magan thī fāḳhta gaatī huī ek shakra paas hī baiThā huā thā dekhte 
ham añdhere Tāpuoñ meñ zindagī karte rahe chāñdnī ke des meñ kyā ho rahā thā dekhte 
jaan dene kā hunar har shaḳhs ko aatā nahīñ sohnī ke haath meñ kachchā ghaḌā thā dekhte 
zehn meñ bastī rahī har baar huuhī kī kalī bair ke jañgal se ham ko kyā milā thā dekhte 
aam ke peḌoñ ke saare phal sunahre ho ga.e is baras bhī rāsta kyuuñ ro rahā thā dekhte 
us ke hoñToñ ke tabassum pe the sab chauñke hue us kī āñkhoñ kā samundar kyā huā thā dekhte 
raat ujle pairahan vaale the ḳhvāboñ meñ magan dūdhiyā pūnam ko kis ne Das liyā thā dekhte 
biich meñ dhuñdle manāzir the agarche saf-ba-saf phir bhī 'amabar' hāshiya to hañs rahā thā dekhte 
jagmagati raushni ke par kya tha dekhte dhul ka tufan andhere bo raha tha dekhte 
sabz Tahni par magan thi faKHta gati hui ek shakra pas hi baiTha hua tha dekhte 
hum andhere Tapuon mein zindagi karte rahe chandni ke des mein kya ho raha tha dekhte 
jaan dene ka hunar har shaKHs ko aata nahin sohni ke hath mein kachcha ghaDa tha dekhte 
zehn mein basti rahi har bar huhi ki kali bair ke jangal se hum ko kya mila tha dekhte 
aam ke peDon ke sare phal sunahre ho gae is baras bhi rasta kyun ro raha tha dekhte 
us ke honTon ke tabassum pe the sab chaunke hue us ki aankhon ka samundar kya hua tha dekhte 
raat ujle pairahan wale the KHwabon mein magan dudhiya punam ko kis ne Das liya tha dekhte 
bich mein dhundle manazir the agarche saf-ba-saf phir bhi 'amabar' hashiya to hans raha tha dekhte

sannāTā chhā gayā hai shab-e-ġham kī chaap par sūraj ko thā yaqīn bahut apne-āp par 
vo sā.iqa mizāj hai maiñ sard barf sā hairat-zada haiñ log tamām is milāp par 
maiñ huuñ fasurda shaam kī afsurdagī hai aur dhundlā sā aks-e-yār hai yādoñ kī bhaap par 
maiñ manziloñ kī justujū meñ thā ba-rañg-e-mauj ab raqs kar rahā huuñ mohabbat kī thaap par 
lāzim ye pesh-ḳhema-e-āfāt hai 'ḳhayāl' bejā jamā nahīñ haiñ parinde alaap par 
sannaTa chha gaya hai shab-e-gham ki chap par suraj ko tha yaqin bahut apne-ap par 
wo saiqa mizaj hai main sard barf sa hairat-zada hain log tamam is milap par 
main hun fasurda sham ki afsurdagi hai aur dhundla sa aks-e-yar hai yaadon ki bhap par 
main manzilon ki justuju mein tha ba-rang-e-mauj ab raqs kar raha hun mohabbat ki thap par 
lazim ye pesh-KHema-e-afat hai 'KHayal' beja jama nahin hain parinde alap par

fazā meñ karb kā ehsās gholtī huī raat havas kī khiḌkiyāñ darvāze kholtī huī raat 
'ajīb rishte banātī hai toḌ detī hai na.ī rutoñ ke safīroñ se boltī huī raat 
ye dhaḌkanoñ ke añdhere ye zaḳhm zaḳhm charāġh kivāḌ ḳhālī makānoñ ke kholtī huī raat 
athāh gahrā añdherā ġhazab kā sannāTā fazā meñ dard kā tezāb gholtī huī raat 
kidhar se aatī hai āvāra ḳhushbuoñ kī tarah barahna jism ke saa.e TaToltī huī raat 
na ratjagoñ ke haiñ charche na koī ġham kā alaav sambhal ke aa.e zarā ghar meñ Doltī huī raat 
kahāñ se lā.eñge sabr-o-sukūn ke lamhe ki mere ghar meñ hai kohrām taultī huī raat 
hamāre saath hai tanhā.iyoñ kī bhiiḌ meñ 'rind' kisī ke lams kī ḳhairāt roltī huī raat 
faza mein karb ka ehsas gholti hui raat hawas ki khiDkiyan darwaze kholti hui raat 
'ajib rishte banati hai toD deti hai nai ruton ke safiron se bolti hui raat 
ye dhaDkanon ke andhere ye zaKHm zaKHm charagh kiwaD KHali makanon ke kholti hui raat 
athah gahra andhera ghazab ka sannaTa faza mein dard ka tezab gholti hui raat 
kidhar se aati hai aawara KHushbuon ki tarah barahna jism ke sae TaTolti hui raat 
na ratjagon ke hain charche na koi gham ka alaw sambhal ke aae zara ghar mein Dolti hui raat 
kahan se laenge sabr-o-sukun ke lamhe ki mere ghar mein hai kohram taulti hui raat 
hamare sath hai tanhaiyon ki bhiD mein 'rind' kisi ke lams ki KHairaat rolti hui raat

shāḳhoñ par ib.hām ke paikar laTak rahe haiñ lafzoñ ke jañgal meñ ma.anī bhaTak rahe haiñ 
pākīza aḳhlāq musallat hai jazbe par ḳhvāhish kī ā.ankhoñ meñ kāñTe khaTak rahe haiñ 
malhāreñ gaate haiñ meñDak taal kināre āsamān par bhūre bādal maTak rahe haiñ 
matle par yādoñ kī pau sī phuuT rahī hai man par kaale saañp apne phan paTak rahe haiñ 
ḳhushbū kī chorī kā daaġh lagā hai un par sab gul-būTe apne dāman jhaTak rahe haiñ 
aisī jiddat se ham ko kyā mil jā.egā paḌhne vaale har misra.a par aTak rahe haiñ 
shaKHon par ibham ke paikar laTak rahe hain lafzon ke jangal mein mani bhaTak rahe hain 
pakiza aKHlaq musallat hai jazbe par KHwahish ki aaankhon mein kanTe khaTak rahe hain 
malhaaren gate hain meinDak tal kinare aasaman par bhure baadal maTak rahe hain 
matle par yaadon ki pau si phuT rahi hai man par kale sanp apne phan paTak rahe hain 
KHushbu ki chori ka dagh laga hai un par sab gul-buTe apne daman jhaTak rahe hain 
aisi jiddat se hum ko kya mil jaega paDhne wale har misra par aTak rahe hain

ghuT ke mar jaane se pahle apnī dīvār-e-nafas meñ dar nikālo dard ke vīrāñ khañDar se manzar-e-be-nām ko bāhar nikālo 
ab ye aalam hai ki har-sū māvarā-e-muntahā tak haiñ uḌāneñ āshiyāñ to ik qafas hai bāhar aa bhī jaao bāl-o-par nikālo 
ḳhud tumhāre apne zad par aa rahe haiñ itnī saffākī bhī chhoḌo kuchh ziyāda ho gayā hai teġh-e-irshādāt se jauhar nikālo 
dekh lenā maat khā jā.egā shah pā kar ye TeḌhā chalne vaalā chaal uljhī hai koī paidal jamā.e rakkho koī ghar nikālo 
āñkheñ kholo ab to mere zaḳhm-e-dil bhī mundamil hone lage haiñ maan jaao phir koī talvār uThāo phir koī ḳhanjar nikālo 
tah-nashīñ maujoñ ke pahre saḳht kar detā hai qasr-e-āb par vo ḳhuun paanī kar ke apnā pattharoñ kī oT se gauhar nikālo 
ab ḳhudā jaane kahāñ le jā ke bikhrā.e havā-e-vaqt mujh ko aao haath apnā baḌhā kar tum bhī merī ḳhaak chuTkī-bhar nikālo 
kis liye 'ramz' itnī ūñchī tum ne kar rakkhī haiñ dīvāreñ hunar kī dekho apne sāthiyoñ ko rauzan-e-ḳhud-āgahī se sar nikālo 
ghuT ke mar jaane se pahle apni diwar-e-nafas mein dar nikalo dard ke viran khanDar se manzar-e-be-nam ko bahar nikalo 
ab ye aalam hai ki har-su mawara-e-muntaha tak hain uDanen aashiyan to ek qafas hai bahar aa bhi jao baal-o-par nikalo 
KHud tumhaare apne zad par aa rahe hain itni saffaki bhi chhoDo kuchh ziyaada ho gaya hai tegh-e-irshadat se jauhar nikalo 
dekh lena mat kha jaega shah pa kar ye TeDha chalne wala chaal uljhi hai koi paidal jamae rakkho koi ghar nikalo 
aankhen kholo ab to mere zaKHm-e-dil bhi mundamil hone lage hain man jao phir koi talwar uThao phir koi KHanjar nikalo 
tah-nashin maujon ke pahre saKHt kar deta hai qasr-e-ab par wo KHun pani kar ke apna pattharon ki oT se gauhar nikalo 
ab KHuda jaane kahan le ja ke bikhrae hawa-e-waqt mujh ko aao hath apna baDha kar tum bhi meri KHak chuTki-bhar nikalo 
kis liye 'ramz' itni unchi tum ne kar rakkhi hain diwaren hunar ki dekho apne sathiyon ko rauzan-e-KHud-agahi se sar nikalo

ravāñ davāñ nahīñ yaañ ashk chashm-e-tar kī tarah girah meñ rakhte haiñ ham aabrū guhar kī tarah 
sunī sifat kisī ḳhush-chashm kī jo mardum se ḳhayāl dauḌ gayā aañkh par nazar kī tarah 
chhupī na ḳhalq-e-ḳhudā se haqīqat-e-ḳhat-e-shauq uḌā jahāñ meñ kabūtar mirā ḳhabar kī tarah 
sivā.e yaar na dekhā kuchh aur aalam meñ samā gayā vo mirī aañkh meñ nazar kī tarah 
adam kī raah meñ khaTkā rahā jahannam kā safar ne dil ko jalāyā mire saqar kī tarah 
khule jo sab to bañdhā taar mīThī bātoñ kā shakar girah meñ vo rakhte haiñ neshkar kī tarah 
vo andalīb huuñ shahpar jo merā mil jaa.e chaḌhā.eñ sar pe salātīñ humā ke par kī tarah 
zakāt de zar-e-gul kī bahār meñ gulchīñ chaman meñ phuul luTā ashrafī ke zar kī tarah 
girī hai chhuT ke jo zaanū pe shaam ko afshāñ sitāre yaar ke dāman meñ haiñ sahar kī tarah 
mushā.ire kā 'amānat' hai kis ko hijr meñ hosh kahāñ ke sher kahāñ kī ġhazal kidhar kī tarah 
rawan dawan nahin yan ashk chashm-e-tar ki tarah girah mein rakhte hain hum aabru guhar ki tarah 
suni sifat kisi KHush-chashm ki jo mardum se KHayal dauD gaya aankh par nazar ki tarah 
chhupi na KHalq-e-KHuda se haqiqat-e-KHat-e-shauq uDa jahan mein kabutar mera KHabar ki tarah 
siwae yar na dekha kuchh aur aalam mein sama gaya wo meri aankh mein nazar ki tarah 
adam ki rah mein khaTka raha jahannam ka safar ne dil ko jalaya mere saqar ki tarah 
khule jo sab to bandha tar miThi baaton ka shakar girah mein wo rakhte hain neshkar ki tarah 
wo andalib hun shahpar jo mera mil jae chaDhaen sar pe salatin huma ke par ki tarah 
zakat de zar-e-gul ki bahaar mein gulchin chaman mein phul luTa ashrafi ke zar ki tarah 
giri hai chhuT ke jo zanu pe sham ko afshan sitare yar ke daman mein hain sahar ki tarah 
mushaire ka 'amanat' hai kis ko hijr mein hosh kahan ke sher kahan ki ghazal kidhar ki tarah

vo mere naale kā shor hī thā shab-e-siyah kī nihāyatoñ meñ maiñ ek zarra ināyatoñ par maiñ ek gardish kasāfatoñ meñ 
giraft aur us kī kar rahā huuñ jo aab hai in basāratoñ kī kamand aur us pe pheñktā huuñ jo tah-e-nashīñ hai samā.atoñ meñ 
mire liye shahr-e-kaj meñ rakkhā hī kyā hai jo apne ġham gañvā.ūñ vo ek dāmāñ bahut hai mujh ko sukūt-afzā farāġhatoñ meñ 
maiñ ek shab kitnī rāteñ jaagā vo maah biite ki saal guzre pahāḌ sā vaqt kāTtā huuñ shumār kartā huuñ sā.atoñ meñ 
tire falak hī se TūTne vaalī raushnī ke haiñ aks saare kahīñ kahīñ jo chamak rahe haiñ hurūf merī ibāratoñ meñ 
vo bojh sar par uThā rakhā hai ki jism o jaañ tak haiñ chuur jin se pachās barsoñ kī zillateñ jo hameñ milī thiiñ virāsatoñ meñ 
wo mere nale ka shor hi tha shab-e-siyah ki nihayaton mein main ek zarra inayaton par main ek gardish kasafaton mein 
giraft aur us ki kar raha hun jo aab hai in basaraton ki kamand aur us pe phenkta hun jo tah-e-nashin hai samaaton mein 
mere liye shahr-e-kaj mein rakkha hi kya hai jo apne gham ganwaun wo ek daman bahut hai mujh ko sukut-afza faraghaton mein 
main ek shab kitni raaten jaga wo mah bite ki sal guzre pahaD sa waqt kaTta hun shumar karta hun saaton mein 
tere falak hi se TuTne wali raushni ke hain aks sare kahin kahin jo chamak rahe hain huruf meri ibaraton mein 
wo bojh sar par uTha rakha hai ki jism o jaan tak hain chur jin se pachas barson ki zillaten jo hamein mili thin wirasaton mein

shikva apne tāle.oñ kī nā-rasā.ī kā karūñ yā gila ai shoḳh terī bevafā.ī kā karūñ 
vo ki ik muddat talak jis ko bhalā kahtā rahā aah ab kis muñh se zikr us kī burā.ī kā karūñ 
āb-e-zamzam se maiñ dho luuñ apnī peshānī ke ta.iiñ dar pe tab us ke irāda jab.ha-sā.ī kā karūñ 
ḳhuub sī tambīh karnā ai judā.ī tū mujhe gar kisī se phir kabhī qasd āshnā.ī kā karūñ 
gar musaḳhḳhar hove vo ḳhurshīd-rū merā 'bayāñ' bādshāhī kyā ki maiñ daavā ḳhudā.ī kā karūñ 
shikwa apne taleon ki na-rasai ka karun ya gila ai shoKH teri bewafai ka karun 
wo ki ek muddat talak jis ko bhala kahta raha aah ab kis munh se zikr us ki burai ka karun 
aab-e-zamzam se main dho lun apni peshani ke tain dar pe tab us ke irada jabha-sai ka karun 
KHub si tambih karna ai judai tu mujhe gar kisi se phir kabhi qasd aashnai ka karun 
gar musaKHKHar howe wo KHurshid-ru mera 'bayan' baadshahi kya ki main dawa KHudai ka karun

mire supurd kahāñ vo ḳhazāna kartā thā sulūk kartā thā aur ġhā.ebāna kartā thā 
ajiib us kī talab thī ajab thā asp-e-savār ki mulk-o-māl kī parvā zarā na kartā thā 
shi.ār-e-zīst hunar thā so ham na jaan sake jo kaam ham nai kiyā dūsrā na kartā thā 
safar-girafta rahe kushtagān-e-nān-o-namak hamāre haq meñ koī faisla na kartā thā 
fazā meñ haath to uTThe the ek saath ka.ī kisī ke vāste koī duā na kartā thā 
tamām sūrat-e-tartīb is ko aatī hai agarche ḳhair ko shar se judā na kartā thā 
vo qalb-gāh-e-tamannā meñ ik charāġh kī lau ko tez rakhtā thā nazr-e-havā na kartā thā 
uThā rakhā thā usī par se e'tibār tamām aur intizār bhī us kā zamāna kartā thā 
unhīñ gharoñ se ibārat hai apnī shām-e-jahāñ charāġh-e-tāq bhī aksar jalā na kartā thā 
mere supurd kahan wo KHazana karta tha suluk karta tha aur ghaebana karta tha 
ajib us ki talab thi ajab tha asp-e-sawar ki mulk-o-mal ki parwa zara na karta tha 
shiar-e-zist hunar tha so hum na jaan sake jo kaam hum nai kiya dusra na karta tha 
safar-girafta rahe kushtagan-e-nan-o-namak hamare haq mein koi faisla na karta tha 
faza mein hath to uTThe the ek sath kai kisi ke waste koi dua na karta tha 
tamam surat-e-tartib is ko aati hai agarche KHair ko shar se juda na karta tha 
wo qalb-gah-e-tamanna mein ek charagh ki lau ko tez rakhta tha nazr-e-hawa na karta tha 
uTha rakha tha usi par se e'tibar tamam aur intizar bhi us ka zamana karta tha 
unhin gharon se ibarat hai apni sham-e-jahan charagh-e-taq bhi aksar jala na karta tha

kuchh aur din abhī is jā qayām karnā thā yahāñ charāġh vahāñ par sitāra dharnā thā 
vo raat niind kī dahlīz par tamām huī abhī to ḳhvāb pe ik aur ḳhvāb dharnā thā 
agar rasā meñ na thā vo bharā bharā sā badan rañg-e-ḳhayāl se us ko tulū karnā thā 
nigāh aur charāġh aur ye asāsa-e-jāñ tamām hotī huī shab ke naam karnā thā 
gurez hotā chalā jā rahā thā mujh se vo aur ek pal ke sire par mujhe Thaharnā thā 
kuchh aur din abhi is ja qayam karna tha yahan charagh wahan par sitara dharna tha 
wo raat nind ki dahliz par tamam hui abhi to KHwab pe ek aur KHwab dharna tha 
agar rasa mein na tha wo bhara bhara sa badan rang-e-KHayal se us ko tulu karna tha 
nigah aur charagh aur ye asasa-e-jaan tamam hoti hui shab ke nam karna tha 
gurez hota chala ja raha tha mujh se wo aur ek pal ke sire par mujhe Thaharna tha

ḳhāna-e-zanjīr kā pāband rahtā huuñ sadā ghar abas ho pūchhte mujh ḳhānamāñ-barbād kā 
ishq-e-qadd-e-yār meñ kyā nā-tavānī kā hai zor ġhash mujhe aayā jo saaya paḌ gayā shamshād kā 
ḳhud-farāmoshī tumhārī ġhair ke kaam aa ga.ī yaad rakhiyegā zarā bhūle se kahnā yaad kā 
ḳhat likhā karte haiñ ab vo yak qalam mujh ko shikast pech se dil toḌte haiñ āshiq-e-nāshād kā 
ishq-e-pechāñ kā chaman meñ jaal phailā dekh kar bulbuloñ ko sarv par dhokā huā sayyād kā 
qāmat-e-jānāñ se kartā hai akaḌ kar ham-sarī hausla dekhe to koī sarv-e-be-buniyād kā 
be-zabānī meñ 'amānat' kī vo haiñ gul-reziyāñ nātiqa ho band ai dil bulbul-e-nāshād kā 
KHana-e-zanjir ka paband rahta hun sada ghar abas ho puchhte mujh KHanaman-barbaad ka 
ishq-e-qadd-e-yar mein kya na-tawani ka hai zor ghash mujhe aaya jo saya paD gaya shamshad ka 
KHud-faramoshi tumhaari ghair ke kaam aa gai yaad rakhiyega zara bhule se kahna yaad ka 
KHat likha karte hain ab wo yak qalam mujh ko shikast pech se dil toDte hain aashiq-e-nashad ka 
ishq-e-pechan ka chaman mein jal phaila dekh kar bulbulon ko sarw par dhoka hua sayyaad ka 
qamat-e-jaanan se karta hai akaD kar ham-sari hausla dekhe to koi sarw-e-be-buniyaad ka 
be-zabani mein 'amanat' ki wo hain gul-reziyan natiqa ho band ai dil bulbul-e-nashad ka

kaun guzrā thā mehrāb-e-jāñ se abhī ḳhāmushī ḳhāmushī shor bhartā huā dhund meñ koī shai juuñ damaktī huī ik badan sā badan se ubhartā huā 
sarf kartī huī jaise sā'at koī lamha koī farāmosh kartā huā phir na jaane kahāñ TuuT kar jā girā ek saaya saroñ se guzartā huā 
ek 'umr-e-gurezāñ kī mohlat bahut phailtā hī gayā maiñ ufuq-tā-ufuq mere bātin ko chhūtī huī vo nigah aur maiñ chāroñ taraf paañv dhartā huā 
ye jo uḌtī huī sā.at-e-ḳhvāb hai kitnī mahsūs hai kitnī nāyāb hai phuul palkoñ se chuntī huī raushnī aur maiñ ḳhushbueñ tahrīr kartā huā 
mere bas meñ the saare zamān-o-makāñ lek maiñ dekhtā rah gayā iin o aañ chal diyā le ke chuTkī meñ koī zamīñ āsmāñ āsmāñ gard kartā huā 
apnī maujūdgī se thā maiñ be-ḳhabar dekhtā kyā huuñ aise meñ yak-dam idhar qat' kartī huī shab ke pahlū meñ ik aadmī TūTtā aur bikhartā huā 
kaun guzra tha mehrab-e-jaan se abhi KHamushi KHamushi shor bharta hua dhund mein koi shai jun damakti hui ek badan sa badan se ubharta hua 
sarf karti hui jaise sa'at koi lamha koi faramosh karta hua phir na jaane kahan TuT kar ja gira ek saya saron se guzarta hua 
ek 'umr-e-gurezan ki mohlat bahut phailta hi gaya main ufuq-ta-ufuq mere baatin ko chhuti hui wo nigah aur main chaaron taraf panw dharta hua 
ye jo uDti hui saat-e-KHwab hai kitni mahsus hai kitni nayab hai phul palkon se chunti hui raushni aur main KHushbuen tahrir karta hua 
mere bas mein the sare zaman-o-makan lek main dekhta rah gaya in o aan chal diya le ke chuTki mein koi zamin aasman aasman gard karta hua 
apni maujudgi se tha main be-KHabar dekhta kya hun aise mein yak-dam idhar qat' karti hui shab ke pahlu mein ek aadmi TuTta aur bikharta hua

kisī kī ishva-garī se ba-ġhair-e-fasl-e-bahār sabhī kā chaak girebāñ hai dekhiye kyā ho 
tumheñ ḳhabar hī nahīñ ai tuyūr-e-naġhma-sarā yahī chaman yahī zindāñ hai dekhiye kyā ho 
jahāñ kashūd-e-navā par ḳhizāñ ke pahre haiñ vahīñ bahār-e-ġhazal-ḳhvāñ hai dekhiye kyā ho 
subū uThā ki ye nāzuk maqām hai saaqī na ahrman hai na yazdāñ hai dekhiye kyā ho 
ravāñ hai mauj-e-gul-o-lāla mauj-e-ḳhūñ kī tarah chaman shahīd-e-bahārāñ hai dekhiye kyā ho 
darāzi-e-shab-e-hijrāñ se mujh ko ḳhauf na thā kisī kī zulf-e-pareshāñ hai dekhiye kyā ho 
havā kā rañg ye hai āshiyāñ to ek taraf qafas bhī shāḳh pe larzāñ hai dekhiye kyā ho 
yahī hai dil se shikāyat ki merā mahram-e-rāz mujhī se dast-o-girebāñ hai dekhiye kyā ho 
hamīñ haiñ pīr-e-muġhāñ kāfiroñ ke ai 'ābid' hamīñ ko dāvā-e-īmāñ hai dekhiye kyā ho 
kisi ki ishwa-gari se ba-ghair-e-fasl-e-bahaar sabhi ka chaak gireban hai dekhiye kya ho 
tumhein KHabar hi nahin ai tuyur-e-naghma-sara yahi chaman yahi zindan hai dekhiye kya ho 
jahan kashud-e-nawa par KHizan ke pahre hain wahin bahaar-e-ghazal-KHwan hai dekhiye kya ho 
subu uTha ki ye nazuk maqam hai saqi na ahrman hai na yazdan hai dekhiye kya ho 
rawan hai mauj-e-gul-o-lala mauj-e-KHun ki tarah chaman shahid-e-bahaaran hai dekhiye kya ho 
daraazi-e-shab-e-hijran se mujh ko KHauf na tha kisi ki zulf-e-pareshan hai dekhiye kya ho 
hawa ka rang ye hai aashiyan to ek taraf qafas bhi shaKH pe larzan hai dekhiye kya ho 
yahi hai dil se shikayat ki mera mahram-e-raaz mujhi se dast-o-gireban hai dekhiye kya ho 
hamin hain pir-e-mughan kafiron ke ai 'abid' hamin ko dawa-e-iman hai dekhiye kya ho
Poetry Text

ranjish hī sahī dil hī dukhāne ke liye aa aa phir se mujhe chhoḌ ke jaane ke liye aa 
kuchh to mire pindār-e-mohabbat kā bharam rakh tū bhī to kabhī mujh ko manāne ke liye aa 
pahle se marāsim na sahī phir bhī kabhī to rasm-o-rah-e-duniyā hī nibhāne ke liye aa 
kis kis ko batā.eñge judā.ī kā sabab ham tū mujh se ḳhafā hai to zamāne ke liye aa 
ik umr se huuñ lazzat-e-girya se bhī mahrūm ai rāhat-e-jāñ mujh ko rulāne ke liye aa 
ab tak dil-e-ḳhush-fahm ko tujh se haiñ umīdeñ ye āḳhirī sham'eñ bhī bujhāne ke liye aa 
ranjish hi sahi dil hi dukhane ke liye aa aa phir se mujhe chhoD ke jaane ke liye aa 
kuchh to mere pindar-e-mohabbat ka bharam rakh tu bhi to kabhi mujh ko manane ke liye aa 
pahle se marasim na sahi phir bhi kabhi to rasm-o-rah-e-duniya hi nibhane ke liye aa 
kis kis ko bataenge judai ka sabab hum tu mujh se KHafa hai to zamane ke liye aa 
ek umr se hun lazzat-e-girya se bhi mahrum ai rahat-e-jaan mujh ko rulane ke liye aa 
ab tak dil-e-KHush-fahm ko tujh se hain umiden ye aaKHiri sham'en bhi bujhane ke liye aa 
yuuñ bhī tirā ehsān hai aane ke liye aa ai dost kisī roz na jaane ke liye aa 
yun bhi tera ehsan hai aane ke liye aa ai dost kisi roz na jaane ke liye aa

chupke chupke raat din aañsū bahānā yaad hai ham ko ab tak āshiqī kā vo zamānā yaad hai 
bā-hazārāñ iztirāb o sad-hazārāñ ishtiyāq tujh se vo pahle-pahal dil kā lagānā yaad hai 
baar baar uThnā usī jānib nigāh-e-shauq kā aur tirā ġhurfe se vo āñkheñ laḌānā yaad hai 
tujh se kuchh milte hī vo bebāk ho jaanā mirā aur tirā dāñtoñ meñ vo uñglī dabānā yaad hai 
khīñch lenā vo mirā parde kā konā daf.atan aur dupaTTe se tirā vo muñh chhupānā yaad hai 
jaan kar sotā tujhe vo qasd-e-pā-bosī mirā aur tirā Thukrā ke sar vo muskurānā yaad hai 
tujh ko jab tanhā kabhī paanā to az-rāh-e-lihāz hāl-e-dil bātoñ hī bātoñ meñ jatānā yaad hai 
jab sivā mere tumhārā koī dīvāna na thā sach kaho kuchh tum ko bhī vo kār-ḳhānā yaad hai 
ġhair kī nazroñ se bach kar sab kī marzī ke ḳhilāf vo tirā chorī-chhupe rātoñ ko aanā yaad hai 
aa gayā gar vasl kī shab bhī kahīñ zikr-e-firāq vo tirā ro ro ke mujh ko bhī rulānā yaad hai 
dopahar kī dhuup meñ mere bulāne ke liye vo tirā koThe pe nañge paañv aanā yaad hai 
aaj tak nazroñ meñ hai vo sohbat-e-rāz-o-niyāz apnā jaanā yaad hai terā bulānā yaad hai 
mīThī mīThī chheḌ kar bāteñ nirālī pyaar kī zikr dushman kā vo bātoñ meñ uḌānā yaad hai 
dekhnā mujh ko jo bargashta to sau sau naaz se jab manā lenā to phir ḳhud ruuTh jaanā yaad hai 
chorī chorī ham se tum aa kar mile the jis jagah muddateñ guzrīñ par ab tak vo Thikānā yaad hai 
shauq meñ mehñdī ke vo be-dast-o-pā honā tirā aur mirā vo chheḌnā vo gudgudānā yaad hai 
bāvajūd-e-iddi.ā-e-ittiqā 'hasrat' mujhe aaj tak ahd-e-havas kā vo fasānā yaad hai 
chupke chupke raat din aansu bahana yaad hai hum ko ab tak aashiqi ka wo zamana yaad hai 
ba-hazaran iztirab o sad-hazaran ishtiyaq tujh se wo pahle-pahal dil ka lagana yaad hai 
bar bar uThna usi jaanib nigah-e-shauq ka aur tera ghurfe se wo aankhen laDana yaad hai 
tujh se kuchh milte hi wo bebak ho jaana mera aur tera danton mein wo ungli dabana yaad hai 
khinch lena wo mera parde ka kona dafatan aur dupaTTe se tera wo munh chhupana yaad hai 
jaan kar sota tujhe wo qasd-e-pa-bosi mera aur tera Thukra ke sar wo muskurana yaad hai 
tujh ko jab tanha kabhi pana to az-rah-e-lihaz haal-e-dil baaton hi baaton mein jatana yaad hai 
jab siwa mere tumhaara koi diwana na tha sach kaho kuchh tum ko bhi wo kar-KHana yaad hai 
ghair ki nazron se bach kar sab ki marzi ke KHilaf wo tera chori-chhupe raaton ko aana yaad hai 
aa gaya gar wasl ki shab bhi kahin zikr-e-firaq wo tera ro ro ke mujh ko bhi rulana yaad hai 
dopahar ki dhup mein mere bulane ke liye wo tera koThe pe nange panw aana yaad hai 
aaj tak nazron mein hai wo sohbat-e-raaz-o-niyaz apna jaana yaad hai tera bulana yaad hai 
miThi miThi chheD kar baaten nirali pyar ki zikr dushman ka wo baaton mein uDana yaad hai 
dekhna mujh ko jo bargashta to sau sau naz se jab mana lena to phir KHud ruTh jaana yaad hai 
chori chori hum se tum aa kar mile the jis jagah muddaten guzrin par ab tak wo Thikana yaad hai 
shauq mein mehndi ke wo be-dast-o-pa hona tera aur mera wo chheDna wo gudgudana yaad hai 
bawajud-e-iddia-e-ittiqa 'hasrat' mujhe aaj tak ahd-e-hawas ka wo fasana yaad hai

vo jo ham meñ tum meñ qarār thā tumheñ yaad ho ki na yaad ho vahī ya.anī va.ada nibāh kā tumheñ yaad ho ki na yaad ho 
vo jo lutf mujh pe the beshtar vo karam ki thā mire haal par mujhe sab hai yaad zarā zarā tumheñ yaad ho ki na yaad ho 
vo na.e gile vo shikāyateñ vo maze maze kī hikāyateñ vo har ek baat pe rūThnā tumheñ yaad ho ki na yaad ho 
kabhī baiThe sab meñ jo rū-ba-rū to ishāratoñ hī se guftugū vo bayān shauq kā barmalā tumheñ yaad ho ki na yaad ho 
hue ittifāq se gar baham to vafā jatāne ko dam-ba-dam gila-e-malāmat-e-aqribā tumheñ yaad ho ki na yaad ho 
koī baat aisī agar huī ki tumhāre jī ko burī lagī to bayāñ se pahle hī bhūlnā tumheñ yaad ho ki na yaad ho 
kabhī ham meñ tum meñ bhī chaah thī kabhī ham se tum se bhī raah thī kabhī ham bhī tum bhī the āshnā tumheñ yaad ho ki na yaad ho 
suno zikr hai ka.ī saal kā ki kiyā ik aap ne va.ada thā so nibāhane kā to zikr kyā tumheñ yaad ho ki na yaad ho 
kahā maiñ ne baat vo koThe kī mire dil se saaf utar ga.ī to kahā ki jaane mirī balā tumheñ yaad ho ki na yaad ho 
vo bigaḌnā vasl kī raat kā vo na mānñā kisī baat kā vo nahīñ nahīñ kī har aan adā tumheñ yaad ho ki na yaad ho 
jise aap ginte the āshnā jise aap kahte the bā-vafā maiñ vahī huuñ 'momin'-e-mubtalā tumheñ yaad ho ki na yaad ho 
wo jo hum mein tum mein qarar tha tumhein yaad ho ki na yaad ho wahi yani wada nibah ka tumhein yaad ho ki na yaad ho 
wo jo lutf mujh pe the beshtar wo karam ki tha mere haal par mujhe sab hai yaad zara zara tumhein yaad ho ki na yaad ho 
wo nae gile wo shikayaten wo maze maze ki hikayaten wo har ek baat pe ruThna tumhein yaad ho ki na yaad ho 
kabhi baiThe sab mein jo ru-ba-ru to ishaaraton hi se guftugu wo bayan shauq ka barmala tumhein yaad ho ki na yaad ho 
hue ittifaq se gar baham to wafa jatane ko dam-ba-dam gila-e-malamat-e-aqriba tumhein yaad ho ki na yaad ho 
koi baat aisi agar hui ki tumhaare ji ko buri lagi to bayan se pahle hi bhulna tumhein yaad ho ki na yaad ho 
kabhi hum mein tum mein bhi chah thi kabhi hum se tum se bhi rah thi kabhi hum bhi tum bhi the aashna tumhein yaad ho ki na yaad ho 
suno zikr hai kai sal ka ki kiya ek aap ne wada tha so nibahane ka to zikr kya tumhein yaad ho ki na yaad ho 
kaha main ne baat wo koThe ki mere dil se saf utar gai to kaha ki jaane meri bala tumhein yaad ho ki na yaad ho 
wo bigaDna wasl ki raat ka wo na manna kisi baat ka wo nahin nahin ki har aan ada tumhein yaad ho ki na yaad ho 
jise aap ginte the aashna jise aap kahte the ba-wafa main wahi hun 'momin'-e-mubtala tumhein yaad ho ki na yaad ho

itnī muddat ba.ad mile ho kin sochoñ meñ gum phirte ho 
itne ḳhā.if kyuuñ rahte ho har aahaT se Dar jaate ho 
tez havā ne mujh se pūchhā ret pe kyā likhte rahte ho 
kaash koī ham se bhī pūchhe raat ga.e tak kyuuñ jaage ho 
meñ dariyā se bhī Dartā huuñ tum dariyā se bhī gahre ho 
kaun sī baat hai tum meñ aisī itne achchhe kyuuñ lagte ho 
pīchhe muḌ kar kyuuñ dekhā thā patthar ban kar kyā takte ho 
jaao jiit kā jashn manāo meñ jhūTā huuñ tum sachche ho 
apne shahar ke sab logoñ se merī ḳhātir kyuuñ uljhe ho 
kahne ko rahte ho dil meñ phir bhī kitne duur khaḌe ho 
raat hameñ kuchh yaad nahīñ thā raat bahut hī yaad aa.e ho 
ham se na pūchho hijr ke qisse apnī kaho ab tum kaise ho 
'mohsin' tum badnām bahut ho jaise ho phir bhī achchhe ho 
itni muddat baad mile ho kin sochon mein gum phirte ho 
itne KHaif kyun rahte ho har aahaT se Dar jate ho 
tez hawa ne mujh se puchha ret pe kya likhte rahte ho 
kash koi hum se bhi puchhe raat gae tak kyun jage ho 
mein dariya se bhi Darta hun tum dariya se bhi gahre ho 
kaun si baat hai tum mein aisi itne achchhe kyun lagte ho 
pichhe muD kar kyun dekha tha patthar ban kar kya takte ho 
jao jit ka jashn manao mein jhuTa hun tum sachche ho 
apne shahar ke sab logon se meri KHatir kyun uljhe ho 
kahne ko rahte ho dil mein phir bhi kitne dur khaDe ho 
raat hamein kuchh yaad nahin tha raat bahut hi yaad aae ho 
hum se na puchho hijr ke qisse apni kaho ab tum kaise ho 
'mohsin' tum badnam bahut ho jaise ho phir bhi achchhe ho

koī fariyād tire dil meñ dabī ho jaise tū ne āñkhoñ se koī baat kahī ho jaise
