mere mustaqbil-e-mohabbat par zindagi ke hain tajribe KHamosh 
zehn-e-azar hai KHwab-gah-e-jumud fikr-o-fan ke hain but-kade KHamosh
Poetry Text

siine meñ jalan āñkhoñ meñ tūfān sā kyuuñ hai is shahr meñ har shaḳhs pareshān sā kyuuñ hai 
dil hai to dhaḌakne kā bahāna koī DhūñDe patthar kī tarah be-his o be-jān sā kyuuñ hai 
tanhā.ī kī ye kaun sī manzil hai rafīqo tā-hadd-e-nazar ek bayābān sā kyuuñ hai 
ham ne to koī baat nikālī nahīñ ġham kī vo zūd-pashemān pashemān sā kyuuñ hai 
kyā koī na.ī baat nazar aatī hai ham meñ ā.īna hameñ dekh ke hairān sā kyuuñ hai 
sine mein jalan aankhon mein tufan sa kyun hai is shahr mein har shaKHs pareshan sa kyun hai 
dil hai to dhaDakne ka bahana koi DhunDe patthar ki tarah be-his o be-jaan sa kyun hai 
tanhai ki ye kaun si manzil hai rafiqo ta-hadd-e-nazar ek bayaban sa kyun hai 
hum ne to koi baat nikali nahin gham ki wo zud-pasheman pasheman sa kyun hai 
kya koi nai baat nazar aati hai hum mein aaina hamein dekh ke hairan sa kyun hai

justujū jis kī thī us ko to na paayā ham ne is bahāne se magar dekh lī duniyā ham ne 
sab kā ahvāl vahī hai jo hamārā hai aaj ye alag baat ki shikva kiyā tanhā ham ne 
ḳhud pashīmān hue ne use sharminda kiyā ishq kī vaz.a ko kyā ḳhuub nibhāyā ham ne 
kaun sā qahr ye āñkhoñ pe huā hai nāzil ek muddat se koī ḳhvāb na dekhā ham ne 
umr bhar sach hī kahā sach ke sivā kuchh na kahā ajr kyā is kā milegā ye na sochā ham ne 
justuju jis ki thi us ko to na paya hum ne is bahane se magar dekh li duniya hum ne 
sab ka ahwal wahi hai jo hamara hai aaj ye alag baat ki shikwa kiya tanha hum ne 
KHud pashiman hue ne use sharminda kiya ishq ki waza ko kya KHub nibhaya hum ne 
kaun sa qahr ye aankhon pe hua hai nazil ek muddat se koi KHwab na dekha hum ne 
umr bhar sach hi kaha sach ke siwa kuchh na kaha ajr kya is ka milega ye na socha hum ne

ye kyā jagah hai dosto ye kaun sā dayār hai had-e-nigāh tak jahāñ ġhubār hī ġhubār hai 
har ek jism ruuh ke azaab se niDhāl hai har ek aañkh shabnamī har ek dil figār hai 
hameñ to apne dil kī dhaḌkanoñ pe bhī yaqīñ nahīñ ḳhoshā vo log jin ko dūsroñ pe e'tibār hai 
na jis kā naam hai koī na jis kī shakl hai koī ik aisī shai kā kyuuñ hameñ azal se intizār hai 
ye kya jagah hai dosto ye kaun sa dayar hai had-e-nigah tak jahan ghubar hi ghubar hai 
har ek jism ruh ke azab se niDhaal hai har ek aankh shabnami har ek dil figar hai 
hamein to apne dil ki dhaDkanon pe bhi yaqin nahin KHosha wo log jin ko dusron pe e'tibar hai 
na jis ka nam hai koi na jis ki shakl hai koi ek aisi shai ka kyun hamein azal se intizar hai

siyāh raat nahīñ letī naam Dhalne kā yahī to vaqt hai sūraj tire nikalne kā 
yahāñ se guzre haiñ guzreñge ham se ahl-e-vafā ye rāsta nahīñ parchhā.iyoñ ke chalne kā 
kahīñ na sab ko samundar bahā ke le jaa.e ye khel ḳhatm karo kashtiyāñ badalne kā 
bigaḌ gayā jo ye naqsha havas ke hāthoñ se to phir kisī ke sambhāle nahīñ sambhalne kā 
zamīñ ne kar liyā kyā tīrgī se samjhautā ḳhayāl chhoḌ chuke kyā charāġh jalne kā 
siyah raat nahin leti nam Dhalne ka yahi to waqt hai suraj tere nikalne ka 
yahan se guzre hain guzrenge hum se ahl-e-wafa ye rasta nahin parchhaiyon ke chalne ka 
kahin na sab ko samundar baha ke le jae ye khel KHatm karo kashtiyan badalne ka 
bigaD gaya jo ye naqsha hawas ke hathon se to phir kisi ke sambhaale nahin sambhalne ka 
zamin ne kar liya kya tirgi se samjhauta KHayal chhoD chuke kya charagh jalne ka

shadīd pyaas thī phir bhī chhuā na paanī ko maiñ dekhtā rahā dariyā tirī ravānī ko 
siyāh raat ne behāl kar diyā mujh ko ki tuul de nahīñ paayā kisī kahānī ko 
bajā.e mere kisī aur kā taqarrur ho qubūl jo kare ḳhvāboñ kī pāsbānī ko 
amaañ kī jā mujhe ai shahr tū ne dī to hai bhulā na pā.ūñgā sahrā kī be-karānī ko 
jo chāhtā hai ki iqbāl ho sivā terā to sab meñ baañT barābar se shādmānī ko 
shadid pyas thi phir bhi chhua na pani ko main dekhta raha dariya teri rawani ko 
siyah raat ne behaal kar diya mujh ko ki tul de nahin paya kisi kahani ko 
bajae mere kisi aur ka taqarrur ho qubul jo kare KHwabon ki pasbani ko 
aman ki ja mujhe ai shahr tu ne di to hai bhula na paunga sahra ki be-karani ko 
jo chahta hai ki iqbaal ho siwa tera to sab mein banT barabar se shadmani ko

āsmāñ kuchh bhī nahīñ ab tere karne ke liye maiñ ne sab tayyāriyāñ kar lī haiñ marne ke liye 
is bulandī ḳhauf se āzād ho us ne kahā chāñd se jab bhī kahā nīche utarne ke liye 
ab zamīñ kyuuñ tere naqshe se nahīñ haTtī nazar rañg kyā koī bachā hai is meñ bharne ke liye 
ye jagah hairat-sarā.e hai kahāñ thī ye ḳhabar yūñhī aa niklā thā maiñ to sair karne ke liye 
kitnā āsāñ lag rahā hai mujh ko aage kā safar chhoḌ aayā pīchhe parchhā.īñ ko Darne ke liye 
aasman kuchh bhi nahin ab tere karne ke liye main ne sab tayyariyan kar li hain marne ke liye 
is bulandi KHauf se aazad ho us ne kaha chand se jab bhi kaha niche utarne ke liye 
ab zamin kyun tere naqshe se nahin haTti nazar rang kya koi bacha hai is mein bharne ke liye 
ye jagah hairat-sarae hai kahan thi ye KHabar yunhi aa nikla tha main to sair karne ke liye 
kitna aasan lag raha hai mujh ko aage ka safar chhoD aaya pichhe parchhain ko Darne ke liye

ummīd se kam chashm-e-ḳharīdār meñ aa.e ham log zarā der se bāzār meñ aa.e 
sach ḳhud se bhī ye log nahīñ bolne vaale ai ahl-e-junūñ tum yahāñ bekār meñ aa.e 
ye aag havas kī hai jhulas degī ise bhī sūraj se kaho sāya-e-dīvār meñ aa.e 
baḌhtī hī chalī jaatī hai tanhā.ī hamārī kyā soch ke ham vādī-e-inkār meñ aa.e 
ummid se kam chashm-e-KHaridar mein aae hum log zara der se bazar mein aae 
sach KHud se bhi ye log nahin bolne wale ai ahl-e-junun tum yahan bekar mein aae 
ye aag hawas ki hai jhulas degi ise bhi suraj se kaho saya-e-diwar mein aae 
baDhti hi chali jati hai tanhai hamari kya soch ke hum wadi-e-inkar mein aae

pahle nahā.ī os meñ phir āñsuoñ meñ raat yuuñ buuñd buuñd utrī hamāre gharoñ meñ raat 
kuchh bhī dikhā.ī detā nahīñ duur duur tak chubhtī hai sūiyoñ kī tarah jab ragoñ meñ raat 
vo khurdurī chaTāneñ vo dariyā vo ābshār sab kuchh sameT le ga.ī apne paroñ meñ raat 
āñkhoñ ko sab kī niiñd bhī dī ḳhvāb bhī diye ham ko shumār kartī rahī dushmanoñ meñ raat 
be-samt manziloñ ne bulāyā hai phir hameñ sannāTe phir bichhāne lagī rāstoñ meñ raat 
pahle nahai os mein phir aansuon mein raat yun bund bund utri hamare gharon mein raat 
kuchh bhi dikhai deta nahin dur dur tak chubhti hai suiyon ki tarah jab ragon mein raat 
wo khurduri chaTanen wo dariya wo aabshaar sab kuchh sameT le gai apne paron mein raat 
aankhon ko sab ki nind bhi di KHwab bhi diye hum ko shumar karti rahi dushmanon mein raat 
be-samt manzilon ne bulaya hai phir hamein sannaTe phir bichhane lagi raston mein raat

kahāñ tak vaqt ke dariyā ko ham Thahrā huā dekheñ ye hasrat hai ki in āñkhoñ se kuchh hotā huā dekheñ 
bahut muddat huī ye aarzū karte hue ham ko kabhī manzar kahīñ ham koī an-dekhā huā dekheñ 
sukūt-e-shām se pahle kī manzil saḳht hotī hai kaho logoñ se sūraj ko na yuuñ Dhaltā huā dekheñ 
havā.eñ bādbāñ kholīñ lahū-āsār bārish ho zamīn-e-saḳht tujh ko phūltā-phaltā huā dekheñ 
dhueñ ke bādaloñ meñ chhup ga.e ujle makāñ saare ye chāhā thā ki manzar shahr kā badlā huā dekheñ 
hamārī be-hisī pe rone vaalā bhī nahīñ koī chalo jaldī chalo phir shahr ko jaltā huā dekheñ 
kahan tak waqt ke dariya ko hum Thahra hua dekhen ye hasrat hai ki in aankhon se kuchh hota hua dekhen 
bahut muddat hui ye aarzu karte hue hum ko kabhi manzar kahin hum koi an-dekha hua dekhen 
sukut-e-sham se pahle ki manzil saKHt hoti hai kaho logon se suraj ko na yun Dhalta hua dekhen 
hawaen baadban kholin lahu-asar barish ho zamin-e-saKHt tujh ko phulta-phalta hua dekhen 
dhuen ke baadalon mein chhup gae ujle makan sare ye chaha tha ki manzar shahr ka badla hua dekhen 
hamari be-hisi pe rone wala bhi nahin koi chalo jaldi chalo phir shahr ko jalta hua dekhen

shikva koī dariyā kī ravānī se nahīñ hai rishta hī mirī pyaas kā paanī se nahīñ hai 
kal yuuñ thā ki ye qaid-e-zamānī se the bezār fursat jinheñ ab sair-e-makānī se nahīñ hai 
chāhā to yaqīñ aa.e na sachchā.ī pe us kī ḳhā.if koī gul ahd-e-ḳhizānī se nahīñ hai 
dohrātā nahīñ maiñ bhī ga.e logoñ kī bāteñ is daur ko nisbat bhī kahānī se nahīñ hai 
kahte haiñ mire haq meñ suḳhan-fahm bas itnā sheroñ meñ jo ḳhūbī hai muānī se nahīñ hai 
shikwa koi dariya ki rawani se nahin hai rishta hi meri pyas ka pani se nahin hai 
kal yun tha ki ye qaid-e-zamani se the bezar fursat jinhen ab sair-e-makani se nahin hai 
chaha to yaqin aae na sachchai pe us ki KHaif koi gul ahd-e-KHizani se nahin hai 
dohraata nahin main bhi gae logon ki baaten is daur ko nisbat bhi kahani se nahin hai 
kahte hain mere haq mein suKHan-fahm bas itna sheron mein jo KHubi hai muani se nahin hai

dil pareshāñ ho magar aañkh meñ hairānī na ho ḳhvāb dekho ki haqīqat se pashemānī na ho 
kyā huā ahl-e-junūñ ko ki duā māñgte haiñ shahr meñ shor na ho dasht meñ vīrānī na ho 
DhūñDte DhūñDte sab thak ga.e lekin na milā ik ufuq aisā ki jo dhund kā zindānī na ho 
ġham kī daulat baḌī mushkil se milā kartī hai sauñp do ham ko agar tum se nigahbānī na ho 
nafratoñ kā vahī malbūs pahan lo phir se ain mumkin hai ye duniyā tumheñ pahchānī na ho 
dil pareshan ho magar aankh mein hairani na ho KHwab dekho ki haqiqat se pashemani na ho 
kya hua ahl-e-junun ko ki dua mangte hain shahr mein shor na ho dasht mein virani na ho 
DhunDte DhunDte sab thak gae lekin na mila ek ufuq aisa ki jo dhund ka zindani na ho 
gham ki daulat baDi mushkil se mila karti hai saunp do hum ko agar tum se nigahbani na ho 
nafraton ka wahi malbus pahan lo phir se ain mumkin hai ye duniya tumhein pahchani na ho

sabhī ko ġham hai samundar ke ḳhushk hone kā ki khel ḳhatm huā kashtiyāñ Dubone kā 
barahna-jism bagūloñ kā qatl hotā rahā ḳhayāl bhī nahīñ aayā kisī ko rone kā 
sila koī nahīñ parchhā.iyoñ kī puujā kā ma.aal kuchh nahīñ ḳhvāboñ kī fasl bone kā 
bichhaḌ ke tujh se mujhe ye gumān hotā hai ki merī āñkheñ haiñ patthar kī jism sone kā 
hujūm dekhtā huuñ jab to kaañp uThtā huuñ agarche ḳhauf nahīñ ab kisī ke khone kā 
ga.e the log to dīvār-e-qahqaha kī taraf magar ye shor musalsal hai kaisā rone kā 
mire vajūd pe nafrat kī gard jamtī rahī milā na vaqt use āñsuoñ se dhone kā 
sabhi ko gham hai samundar ke KHushk hone ka ki khel KHatm hua kashtiyan Dubone ka 
barahna-jism bagulon ka qatl hota raha KHayal bhi nahin aaya kisi ko rone ka 
sila koi nahin parchhaiyon ki puja ka maal kuchh nahin KHwabon ki fasl bone ka 
bichhaD ke tujh se mujhe ye guman hota hai ki meri aankhen hain patthar ki jism sone ka 
hujum dekhta hun jab to kanp uThta hun agarche KHauf nahin ab kisi ke khone ka 
gae the log to diwar-e-qahqaha ki taraf magar ye shor musalsal hai kaisa rone ka 
mere wajud pe nafrat ki gard jamti rahi mila na waqt use aansuon se dhone ka

ye jab hai ki ik ḳhvāb se rishta hai hamārā din Dhalte hī dil Dūbne lagtā hai hamārā 
chehroñ ke samundar se guzarte rahe phir bhī ik aks ko ā.īna tarastā hai hamārā 
un logoñ se kyā kahiye ki kyā biit rahī hai ahvāl magar tū to samajhtā hai hamārā 
har moḌ pe paḌtā hai hameñ vāsta is se duniyā se alag kahne ko rasta hai hamārā 
ye jab hai ki ek KHwab se rishta hai hamara din Dhalte hi dil Dubne lagta hai hamara 
chehron ke samundar se guzarte rahe phir bhi ek aks ko aaina tarasta hai hamara 
un logon se kya kahiye ki kya bit rahi hai ahwal magar tu to samajhta hai hamara 
har moD pe paDta hai hamein wasta is se duniya se alag kahne ko rasta hai hamara

tū kahāñ hai tujh se ik nisbat thī merī zaat ko kab se palkoñ par uThā.e phir rahā huuñ raat ko 
mere hisse kī zamīñ banjar thī maiñ vāqif na thā be-sabab ilzām maiñ detā rahā barsāt ko 
kaisī bastī thī jahāñ par koī bhī aisā na thā munkashif maiñ jis pe kartā apne dil kī baat ko 
saarī duniyā ke masā.il yuuñ mujhe darpesh haiñ terā ġham kaafī na ho jaise guzar-auqāt ko 
tu kahan hai tujh se ek nisbat thi meri zat ko kab se palkon par uThae phir raha hun raat ko 
mere hisse ki zamin banjar thi main waqif na tha be-sabab ilzam main deta raha barsat ko 
kaisi basti thi jahan par koi bhi aisa na tha munkashif main jis pe karta apne dil ki baat ko 
sari duniya ke masail yun mujhe darpesh hain tera gham kafi na ho jaise guzar-auqat ko

tere sivā bhī koī mujhe yaad aane vaalā thā maiñ varna yuuñ hijr se kab ghabrāne vaalā thā 
jān-būjh kar samajh kar maiñ ne bhulā diyā har vo qissa jo dil ko bahlāne vaalā thā 
mujh ko nadāmat bas is par hai log bahut ḳhush haiñ is lamhe ko kho kar jo pachhtāne vaalā thā 
ye to ḳhair huī dariyā ne ruḳh tabdīl kiyā merā shahr bhī us kī zad meñ aane vaalā thā 
ik ik kar ke sab raste kitne sunsān hue yaad aayā maiñ lambe safar par jaane vaalā thā 
tere siwa bhi koi mujhe yaad aane wala tha main warna yun hijr se kab ghabrane wala tha 
jaan-bujh kar samajh kar main ne bhula diya har wo qissa jo dil ko bahlane wala tha 
mujh ko nadamat bas is par hai log bahut KHush hain is lamhe ko kho kar jo pachhtane wala tha 
ye to KHair hui dariya ne ruKH tabdil kiya mera shahr bhi us ki zad mein aane wala tha 
ek ek kar ke sab raste kitne sunsan hue yaad aaya main lambe safar par jaane wala tha

bhūlī-bisrī yādoñ kī bārāt nahīñ aa.ī ik muddat se hijr kī lambī raat nahīñ aa.ī 
aatī thī jo roz galī ke suune nukkaḌ tak aaj huā kyā vo parchhā.īñ saat nahīñ aa.ī 
mujh ko ta.āqub meñ le aa.ī ik anjān jagah ḳhushbū to ḳhushbū thī mere haat nahīñ aa.ī 
is duniyā se un kā rishta ādhā-adhūrā hai jin logoñ tak ḳhvāboñ kī sauġhāt nahīñ aa.ī 
uupar vaale kī man-mānī khalne lagī hai ab meñh barsā do-chār dafa barsāt nahīñ aa.ī 
bhuli-bisri yaadon ki baraat nahin aai ek muddat se hijr ki lambi raat nahin aai 
aati thi jo roz gali ke sune nukkaD tak aaj hua kya wo parchhain sat nahin aai 
mujh ko taaqub mein le aai ek anjaan jagah KHushbu to KHushbu thi mere hat nahin aai 
is duniya se un ka rishta aadha-adhura hai jin logon tak KHwabon ki saughat nahin aai 
upar wale ki man-mani khalne lagi hai ab meinh barsa do-chaar dafa barsat nahin aai

ye kyā huā ki tabī.at sambhaltī jaatī hai tire baġhair bhī ye raat Dhaltī jaatī hai 
us ik ufuq pe abhī tak hai e'tibār mujhe magar nigāh-e-manāzir badaltī jaatī hai 
chahār samt se gherā hai tez āñdhī ne kisī charāġh kī lau phir bhī jaltī jaatī hai 
maiñ apne jism kī sargoshiyoñ ko suntā huuñ tire visāl kī saa.at nikaltī jaatī hai 
ye dekho aa ga.ī mere zavāl kī manzil maiñ ruk gayā mirī parchhā.īñ chaltī jaatī hai 
ye kya hua ki tabiat sambhalti jati hai tere baghair bhi ye raat Dhalti jati hai 
us ek ufuq pe abhi tak hai e'tibar mujhe magar nigah-e-manazir badalti jati hai 
chahaar samt se ghera hai tez aandhi ne kisi charagh ki lau phir bhi jalti jati hai 
main apne jism ki sargoshiyon ko sunta hun tere visal ki saat nikalti jati hai 
ye dekho aa gai mere zawal ki manzil main ruk gaya meri parchhain chalti jati hai

nahīñ rok sakoge jism kī in parvāzoñ ko baḌī bhuul huī jo chheḌ diyā ka.ī sāzoñ ko 
koī nayā makīn nahīñ aayā to hairat kyā kabhī tum ne khulā chhoḌā hī nahīñ darvāzoñ ko 
kabhī paar bhī kar pā.eñgī sukūt ke sahrā ko darpesh hai kitnā aur safar āvāzoñ ko 
mujhe kuchh logoñ kī rusvā.ī manzūr nahīñ nahīñ aam kiyā jo maiñ ne apne rāzoñ ko 
kahīñ ho na ga.ī ho zamīn parindoñ se ḳhālī khule āsmān par dekhtā huuñ phir bāzoñ ko 
nahin rok sakoge jism ki in parwazon ko baDi bhul hui jo chheD diya kai sazon ko 
koi naya makin nahin aaya to hairat kya kabhi tum ne khula chhoDa hi nahin darwazon ko 
kabhi par bhi kar paengi sukut ke sahra ko darpesh hai kitna aur safar aawazon ko 
mujhe kuchh logon ki ruswai manzur nahin nahin aam kiya jo main ne apne raazon ko 
kahin ho na gai ho zamin parindon se KHali khule aasman par dekhta hun phir bazon ko

aks ko qaid ki parchhā.īñ ko zanjīr kareñ sā.at-e-hijr tujhe kaise jahāñgīr kareñ 
paañv ke nīche koī shai hai zamīñ kī sūrat chand din aur isī vahm kī tash.hīr kareñ 
shahr-e-ummīd haqīqat meñ nahīñ ban saktā to chalo us ko tasavvur hī meñ ta.amīr kareñ 
ab to le de ke yahī kaam hai in āñkhoñ kā jin ko dekhā nahīñ un ḳhvāboñ kī ta.abīr kareñ 
ham meñ jur.at kī kamī kal kī tarah aaj bhī hai tishnagī kis ke laboñ par tujhe tahrīr kareñ 
umr kā baaqī safar karnā hai is shart ke saath dhuup dekheñ to ise saa.e se ta.abīr kareñ 
aks ko qaid ki parchhain ko zanjir karen saat-e-hijr tujhe kaise jahangir karen 
panw ke niche koi shai hai zamin ki surat chand din aur isi wahm ki tashhir karen 
shahr-e-ummid haqiqat mein nahin ban sakta to chalo us ko tasawwur hi mein tamir karen 
ab to le de ke yahi kaam hai in aankhon ka jin ko dekha nahin un KHwabon ki tabir karen 
hum mein jurat ki kami kal ki tarah aaj bhi hai tishnagi kis ke labon par tujhe tahrir karen 
umr ka baqi safar karna hai is shart ke sath dhup dekhen to ise sae se tabir karen

mom ke jismoñ vaalī is maḳhlūq ko rusvā mat karnā mish.al-e-jāñ ko raushan karnā lekin itnā mat karnā 
haq-goī aur vo bhī itnī jiinā dūbhar ho jaa.e jaisā kuchh ham karte rahe haiñ tum sab vaisā mat karnā 
pichhle safar meñ jo kuchh biitā biit gayā yaaro lekin aglā safar jab bhī tum karnā dekho tanhā mat karnā 
bhuuk se rishta TuuT gayā to ham behis ho jā.eñge ab ke jab bhī qaht paḌe to fasleñ paidā mat karnā 
ai yaado jiine do ham ko bas itnā ehsān karo dhuup ke dasht meñ jab ham nikleñ ham par saayā mat karnā 
mom ke jismon wali is maKHluq ko ruswa mat karna mishal-e-jaan ko raushan karna lekin itna mat karna 
haq-goi aur wo bhi itni jina dubhar ho jae jaisa kuchh hum karte rahe hain tum sab waisa mat karna 
pichhle safar mein jo kuchh bita bit gaya yaro lekin agla safar jab bhi tum karna dekho tanha mat karna 
bhuk se rishta TuT gaya to hum behis ho jaenge ab ke jab bhi qaht paDe to faslen paida mat karna 
ai yaado jine do hum ko bas itna ehsan karo dhup ke dasht mein jab hum niklen hum par saya mat karna
Poetry Text

sādgī to hamārī zarā dekhiye e.atibār aap ke va.ade par kar liyā baat to sirf ik raat kī thī magar intizār aap kā umr-bhar kar liyā 
ishq meñ uljhaneñ pahle hī kam na thiiñ aur paidā nayā dard-e-sar kar liyā log Darte haiñ qātil kī parchhā.īñ se ham ne qātil ke dil meñ bhī ghar kar liyā 
zikr ik bevafā aur sitamgar kā thā aap kā aisī bātoñ se kyā vāsta aap to bevafā aur sitamgar nahīñ aap ne kis liye muñh udhar kar liyā 
zindagī-bhar ke shikve gile the bahut vaqt itnā kahāñ thā ki dohrāte ham ek hichkī meñ kah Daalī sab dāstāñ ham ne qisse ko yuuñ muḳhtasar kar liyā 
be-qarārī milegī mujhe na sukūñ chain chhin jā.egā niiñd uḌ jā.egī apnā anjām sab ham ko ma.alūm thā aap ne dil kā saudā magar kar liyā 
zindagī ke safar meñ bahut duur tak jab koī dost aaya na ham ko nazar ham ne ghabrā ke tanhā.iyoñ se 'sabā' ek dushman ko ḳhud ham-safar kar liyā 
sadgi to hamari zara dekhiye eatibar aap ke wade par kar liya baat to sirf ek raat ki thi magar intizar aap ka umr-bhar kar liya 
ishq mein uljhanen pahle hi kam na thin aur paida naya dard-e-sar kar liya log Darte hain qatil ki parchhain se hum ne qatil ke dil mein bhi ghar kar liya 
zikr ek bewafa aur sitamgar ka tha aap ka aisi baaton se kya wasta aap to bewafa aur sitamgar nahin aap ne kis liye munh udhar kar liya 
zindagi-bhar ke shikwe gile the bahut waqt itna kahan tha ki dohraate hum ek hichki mein kah Dali sab dastan hum ne qisse ko yun muKHtasar kar liya 
be-qarari milegi mujhe na sukun chain chhin jaega nind uD jaegi apna anjam sab hum ko malum tha aap ne dil ka sauda magar kar liya 
zindagi ke safar mein bahut dur tak jab koi dost aaya na hum ko nazar hum ne ghabra ke tanhaiyon se 'saba' ek dushman ko KHud ham-safar kar liya

hai kahāñ kā irāda tumhārā sanam kis ke dil ko adāoñ se bahlāoge sach batāo ke is chāñdnī raat meñ kis se va.ada kiyā hai kahāñ jāoge 
dekho achchhā nahīñ ye tumhārā chalan ye javānī ke din aur ye shoḳhiyāñ yuuñ na aaya karo baal khole hue varna duniyā meñ badnām ho jāoge 
aaj jaao na bechain kar ke mujhe jān-e-jāñ dil dukhānā burī baat hai ham taḌapte raheñge yahāñ rāt-bhar tum to ārām kī niiñd so jāoge 
paas aao to tum ko lagā.eñ gale muskurāte ho kyoñ duur se dekh kar yūñhī guzre agar ye javānī ke din ham bhī pachhtā.eñge tum bhī pachhtāoge 
bevafā be-muravvat hai in kī nazar ye badal jā.eñge zindagī luuT kar husn vāloñ se dil ko lagāyā agar ai 'fanā' dekho be-maut mar jāoge 
hai kahan ka irada tumhaara sanam kis ke dil ko adaon se bahlaoge sach batao ke is chandni raat mein kis se wada kiya hai kahan jaoge 
dekho achchha nahin ye tumhaara chalan ye jawani ke din aur ye shoKHiyan yun na aaya karo baal khole hue warna duniya mein badnam ho jaoge 
aaj jao na bechain kar ke mujhe jaan-e-jaan dil dukhana buri baat hai hum taDapte rahenge yahan raat-bhar tum to aaram ki nind so jaoge 
pas aao to tum ko lagaen gale muskuraate ho kyon dur se dekh kar yunhi guzre agar ye jawani ke din hum bhi pachhtaenge tum bhi pachhtaoge 
bewafa be-murawwat hai in ki nazar ye badal jaenge zindagi luT kar husn walon se dil ko lagaya agar ai 'fana' dekho be-maut mar jaoge

aañkh uTThī mohabbat ne añgḌā.ī lī dil kā saudā huā chāñdnī raat meñ un kī nazroñ ne kuchh aisā jaadū kiyā luT ga.e ham to pahlī mulāqāt meñ 
saath apnā vafā meñ na chhūTe kabhī pyaar kī Dor bañdh kar na TuuTe kabhī chhūT jaa.e zamāna koī ġham nahīñ haath terā rahe bas mire haath meñ 
rut hai barsāt kī dekho zid mat karo raat añdherī hai bādal haiñ chhā.e hue ruk bhī jaao sanam tum ko merī qasam ab kahāñ jāoge aisī barsāt meñ 
hai terī yaad is dil meñ lipTī huī har ghaḌī hai tasavvur tire husn kā terī ulfat kā pahra lagā hai sanam kaun aa.egā mere ḳhayālāt meñ 
aankh uTThi mohabbat ne angDai li dil ka sauda hua chandni raat mein un ki nazron ne kuchh aisa jadu kiya luT gae hum to pahli mulaqat mein 
sath apna wafa mein na chhuTe kabhi pyar ki Dor bandh kar na TuTe kabhi chhuT jae zamana koi gham nahin hath tera rahe bas mere hath mein 
rut hai barsat ki dekho zid mat karo raat andheri hai baadal hain chhae hue ruk bhi jao sanam tum ko meri qasam ab kahan jaoge aisi barsat mein 
hai teri yaad is dil mein lipTi hui har ghaDi hai tasawwur tere husn ka teri ulfat ka pahra laga hai sanam kaun aaega mere KHayalat mein

aisā banñā sañvarnā mubārak tumheñ kam se kam itnā kahnā hamārā karo chāñd sharmā.egā chāñdnī raat meñ yuuñ na zulfoñ ko apnī sañvārā karo 
ye tabassum ye aariz ye raushan jabīñ ye adā ye nigāheñ ye zulfeñ hasīñ aa.ine kī nazar lag na jaa.e kahīñ jān-e-jāñ apnā sadqa utārā karo 
dil to kyā chiiz hai jaan se jā.eñge maut aane se pahle hī mar jā.eñge ye adā dekhne vaale luT jā.eñge yuuñ na hañs hañs ke dilbar ishāra karo 
fikr-e-uqbā kī mastī utar jā.egī tauba TuuTī to qismat sañvar jā.egī tum ko duniyā meñ jannat nazar aa.egī shaiḳh jī mai-kade kā nazāra karo 
ḳhūbsūrat ghaTāoñ-bharī raat meñ lutf uThāyā karo aisī barsāt meñ jaam le kar chhalaktā huā haath meñ mai-kade meñ bhī ik shab guzārā karo 
kaam aa.e na mushkil meñ koī yahāñ matlabī dost haiñ matlabī yaar haiñ is jahāñ meñ nahīñ koī ahl-e-vafā ai 'fanā' is jahāñ se kināra karo 
aisa banna sanwarna mubarak tumhein kam se kam itna kahna hamara karo chand sharmaega chandni raat mein yun na zulfon ko apni sanwara karo 
ye tabassum ye aariz ye raushan jabin ye ada ye nigahen ye zulfen hasin aaine ki nazar lag na jae kahin jaan-e-jaan apna sadqa utara karo 
dil to kya chiz hai jaan se jaenge maut aane se pahle hi mar jaenge ye ada dekhne wale luT jaenge yun na hans hans ke dilbar ishaara karo 
fikr-e-uqba ki masti utar jaegi tauba TuTi to qismat sanwar jaegi tum ko duniya mein jannat nazar aaegi shaiKH ji mai-kade ka nazara karo 
KHubsurat ghaTaon-bhari raat mein lutf uThaya karo aisi barsat mein jam le kar chhalakta hua hath mein mai-kade mein bhi ek shab guzara karo 
kaam aae na mushkil mein koi yahan matlabi dost hain matlabi yar hain is jahan mein nahin koi ahl-e-wafa ai 'fana' is jahan se kinara karo

na rukte haiñ aañsū na thamte haiñ naale kaho koī kaise mohabbat chhupā le 
kare koī kyā gar vo aa.eñ yakāyak nigāhoñ ko roke ki dil ko sañbhāle 
chaman vaale bijlī se bole na chāle ġharīboñ ke ghar be-ḳhatā phūñk Daale 
qayāmat haiñ zālim kī nīchī nigāheñ ḳhudā jaane kyā ho jo nazreñ uThā le 
karūñ aisā sajda vo ghabrā ke kah deñ ḳhudā ke liye ab to sar ko uThā le 
tumheñ banda-parvar hamīñ jānte haiñ baḌe sīdhe-sādhe baḌe bhole-bhāle 
bas itnī sī duurī ye maiñ huuñ ye manzil kahāñ aa ke phūTe haiñ paaoñ ke chhāle 
'qamar' maiñ huuñ muḳhtār tanzīm-e-shab kā haiñ mere hī bas meñ añdhere ujāle 
na rukte hain aansu na thamte hain nale kaho koi kaise mohabbat chhupa le 
kare koi kya gar wo aaen yakayak nigahon ko roke ki dil ko sanbhaale 
chaman wale bijli se bole na chaale gharibon ke ghar be-KHata phunk Dale 
qayamat hain zalim ki nichi nigahen KHuda jaane kya ho jo nazren uTha le 
karun aisa sajda wo ghabra ke kah den KHuda ke liye ab to sar ko uTha le 
tumhein banda-parwar hamin jaante hain baDe sidhe-sadhe baDe bhole-bhaale 
bas itni si duri ye main hun ye manzil kahan aa ke phuTe hain paon ke chhaale 
'qamar' main hun muKHtar tanzim-e-shab ka hain mere hi bas mein andhere ujale

kahnā ġhalat ġhalat to chhupānā sahī sahī qāsid kahā jo us ne batānā sahī sahī 
ye sub.h sub.h chehre kī rangat uḌī huī kal raat tum kahāñ the batānā sahī sahī 
dil le ke merā haath meñ kahte haiñ mujh se vo kyā loge is kā daam batānā sahī sahī 
āñkheñ milāo ġhair se do ham ko jām-e-mai saaqī tumheñ qasam hai pilānā sahī sahī 
ai mai-farosh bhiiḌ hai terī dukān par gāhak haiñ ham bhī maal dikhānā sahī sahī 
'sājid' to jān-o-dil se faqat aap kā hai bas kyā aap bhī haiñ us ke batānā sahī sahī 
kahna ghalat ghalat to chhupana sahi sahi qasid kaha jo us ne batana sahi sahi 
ye subh subh chehre ki rangat uDi hui kal raat tum kahan the batana sahi sahi 
dil le ke mera hath mein kahte hain mujh se wo kya loge is ka dam batana sahi sahi 
aankhen milao ghair se do hum ko jam-e-mai saqi tumhein qasam hai pilana sahi sahi 
ai mai-farosh bhiD hai teri dukan par gahak hain hum bhi mal dikhana sahi sahi 
'sajid' to jaan-o-dil se faqat aap ka hai bas kya aap bhi hain us ke batana sahi sahi

un kī taraf se tark-e-mulāqāt ho ga.ī ham jis se Dar rahe the vahī baat ho ga.ī 
ā.īna dekhne meñ na.ī baat ho ga.ī un se hī aaj un kī mulāqāt ho ga.ī 
tai un se roz-e-hashr mulāqāt ho ga.ī itnī sī baat kitnī baḌī baat ho ga.ī 
kam-zarfī-e-hayāt se tang aa gayā thā maiñ achchhā huā qazā se mulāqāt ho ga.ī 
din meñ bhaTak rahe haiñ jo manzil kī raah se ye log kyā kareñge agar raat ho ga.ī 
aa.e haiñ vo marīz-e-mohabbat ko dekh kar aañsū batā rahe haiñ koī baat ho ga.ī 
thā aur kaun pūchhne vaalā marīz kā tum aa ga.e to pursish-e-hālāt ho ga.ī 
ai bulbul-e-bahār-e-chaman apnī ḳhair maañg sayyād-o-bāġhbāñ meñ mulāqāt ho ga.ī 
jab zulf yaad aa ga.ī yuuñ ashk bah ga.e jaise añdherī raat meñ barsāt ho ga.ī 
gulshan kā hosh ahl-e-junūñ ko bhalā kahāñ sahrā meñ paḌ rahe to basar raat ho ga.ī 
dar-parda bazm-e-ġhair meñ donoñ kī guftugū uTThī udhar nigāh idhar baat ho ga.ī 
kab tak 'qamar' ho shaam ke va.ade kā intizār sūraj chhupā charāġh jale raat ho ga.ī 
un ki taraf se tark-e-mulaqat ho gai hum jis se Dar rahe the wahi baat ho gai 
aaina dekhne mein nai baat ho gai un se hi aaj un ki mulaqat ho gai 
tai un se roz-e-hashr mulaqat ho gai itni si baat kitni baDi baat ho gai 
kam-zarfi-e-hayat se tang aa gaya tha main achchha hua qaza se mulaqat ho gai 
din mein bhaTak rahe hain jo manzil ki rah se ye log kya karenge agar raat ho gai 
aae hain wo mariz-e-mohabbat ko dekh kar aansu bata rahe hain koi baat ho gai 
tha aur kaun puchhne wala mariz ka tum aa gae to pursish-e-haalat ho gai 
ai bulbul-e-bahaar-e-chaman apni KHair mang sayyaad-o-baghban mein mulaqat ho gai 
jab zulf yaad aa gai yun ashk bah gae jaise andheri raat mein barsat ho gai 
gulshan ka hosh ahl-e-junun ko bhala kahan sahra mein paD rahe to basar raat ho gai 
dar-parda bazm-e-ghair mein donon ki guftugu uTThi udhar nigah idhar baat ho gai 
kab tak 'qamar' ho sham ke wade ka intizar suraj chhupa charagh jale raat ho gai

mast nazroñ se allāh bachā.e mah-jamāloñ se allah bachā.e har balā sar pe aa jaa.e merī husn vāloñ se allah bachā.e 
in kī ma.asūmiyat par na jaanā in ke dhoke meñ hargiz na aanā luuT lete haiñ ye muskurā kar in kī chāloñ se allah bachā.e 
bholī sūrat hai bāteñ haiñ bholī muñh meñ kuchh hai magar dil meñ kuchh hai laakh chehrā sahī chāñd jaisā dil ke kāloñ se allah bachā.e 
dil meñ hai ḳhvāhish-e-hūr-o-jannat aur zāhir meñ shauq-e-ibādat bas hameñ shaiḳh jī aap jaise allāh-vāloñ se allah bachā.e 
in kī fitrat meñ hai bevafā.ī jāntī hai ye saarī ḳhudā.ī achchhe-achchhoñ ko dete haiñ dhokā bhole-bhāloñ se allah bachā.e 
mast nazron se allah bachae mah-jamalon se allah bachae har bala sar pe aa jae meri husn walon se allah bachae 
in ki masumiyat par na jaana in ke dhoke mein hargiz na aana luT lete hain ye muskura kar in ki chaalon se allah bachae 
bholi surat hai baaten hain bholi munh mein kuchh hai magar dil mein kuchh hai lakh chehra sahi chand jaisa dil ke kalon se allah bachae 
dil mein hai KHwahish-e-hur-o-jannat aur zahir mein shauq-e-ibaadat bas hamein shaiKH ji aap jaise allah-walon se allah bachae 
in ki fitrat mein hai bewafai jaanti hai ye sari KHudai achchhe-achchhon ko dete hain dhoka bhole-bhaalon se allah bachae

phirūñ DhūñDtā mai-kada tauba tauba mujhe āj-kal itnī fursat nahīñ hai salāmat rahe terī āñkhoñ kī mastī mujhe mai-kashī kī zarūrat nahīñ hai 
ye tark-e-ta.alluq kā kyā tazkira hai tumhāre sivā koī apnā nahīñ hai agar tum kaho to maiñ ḳhud ko bhulā duuñ tumheñ bhuul jaane kī tāqat nahīñ hai 
hamesha mire sāmne se guzarnā nigāheñ churā kar mujhe dekh lenā mirī jaan tum mujh ko itnā batā do ye kyā chiiz hai gar mohabbat nahīñ hai 
hazāroñ tamannā.eñ hotī haiñ dil meñ hamārī to bas ik tamanna yahī hai mujhe ik dafa apnā kah ke pukāro bas is ke sivā koī hasrat nahīñ hai 
phirun DhunDta mai-kada tauba tauba mujhe aaj-kal itni fursat nahin hai salamat rahe teri aankhon ki masti mujhe mai-kashi ki zarurat nahin hai 
ye tark-e-talluq ka kya tazkira hai tumhaare siwa koi apna nahin hai agar tum kaho to main KHud ko bhula dun tumhein bhul jaane ki taqat nahin hai 
hamesha mere samne se guzarna nigahen chura kar mujhe dekh lena meri jaan tum mujh ko itna bata do ye kya chiz hai gar mohabbat nahin hai 
hazaron tamannaen hoti hain dil mein hamari to bas ek tamanna yahi hai mujhe ek dafa apna kah ke pukaro bas is ke siwa koi hasrat nahin hai

sahar qarīb hai tāroñ kā haal kyā hogā ab intizār ke māroñ kā haal kyā hogā 
tirī nigāh ne zālim kabhī hai ye sochā tirī nigāh ke māroñ kā haal kyā hogā 
muqābla hai tire husn kā bahāroñ se na jaane aaj bahāroñ kā haal kyā hogā 
naqāb un kā ulaTnā to chāhtā huuñ magar bigaḌ ga.e to nazāroñ kā haal kyā hogā 
mazāq-e-dīd hī 'sahbā' agar badal jaa.e to zindagī kī bahāroñ kā haal kyā hogā 
sahar qarib hai taron ka haal kya hoga ab intizar ke maron ka haal kya hoga 
teri nigah ne zalim kabhi hai ye socha teri nigah ke maron ka haal kya hoga 
muqabla hai tere husn ka bahaaron se na jaane aaj bahaaron ka haal kya hoga 
naqab un ka ulaTna to chahta hun magar bigaD gae to nazaron ka haal kya hoga 
mazaq-e-did hi 'sahba' agar badal jae to zindagi ki bahaaron ka haal kya hoga

aaj koī baat ho ga.ī vo na aa.e raat ho ga.ī 
jab vo mere saath ho ga.e duniyā mere saath ho ga.ī 
jab vo milne aa.e raat ko merī chāñd-rāt ho ga.ī 
mujh se barham aap kyā hue saarī kā.enāt ho ga.ī 
mar ga.e tire marīz-e-ġham dard se najāt ho ga.ī 
ai dil-e-tabāh ġham ye hai rusvā un kī zaat ho ga.ī 
'purnam' aa ga.e vo mere ghar mutma.in hayāt ho ga.ī 
aaj koi baat ho gai wo na aae raat ho gai 
jab wo mere sath ho gae duniya mere sath ho gai 
jab wo milne aae raat ko meri chand-raat ho gai 
mujh se barham aap kya hue sari kaenat ho gai 
mar gae tere mariz-e-gham dard se najat ho gai 
ai dil-e-tabah gham ye hai ruswa un ki zat ho gai 
'purnam' aa gae wo mere ghar mutmain hayat ho gai

merī āñkhoñ ko baḳhshe haiñ aañsū dil ko dāġh-e-alam de ga.e haiñ is ināyat pe qurbān jā.ūñ pyaar māñgā thā ġham de ga.e haiñ 
dene aa.e the ham ko tasallī vo tasallī to kyā ham ko dete toḌ kar ka.aba-e-dil hamārā hasratoñ ke sanam de ga.e haiñ 
dil taḌaptā hai fariyād kar ke aañkh Dartī hai aañsū bahā ke aisī ulfat se vo jaate jaate mujh ko apnī qasam de ga.e haiñ 
marhabā mai-kashoñ kā muqaddar ab to piinā ibādat hai 'anvar' aaj rindoñ ko piine kī dāvat vā.iz-e-mohtaram de ga.e haiñ 
meri aankhon ko baKHshe hain aansu dil ko dagh-e-alam de gae hain is inayat pe qurban jaun pyar manga tha gham de gae hain 
dene aae the hum ko tasalli wo tasalli to kya hum ko dete toD kar kaba-e-dil hamara hasraton ke sanam de gae hain 
dil taDapta hai fariyaad kar ke aankh Darti hai aansu baha ke aisi ulfat se wo jate jate mujh ko apni qasam de gae hain 
marhaba mai-kashon ka muqaddar ab to pina ibaadat hai 'anwar' aaj rindon ko pine ki dawat waiz-e-mohtaram de gae hain

shahr-e-fasl-e-gul se chal kar pattharoñ ke darmiyāñ zindagī aa jā kabhī ham be-gharoñ ke darmiyāñ 
maiñ huuñ vo tasvīr jis meñ hādse bharte haiñ rang ḳhāl-o-ḳhat khulte haiñ mere ḳhanjaroñ ke darmiyāñ 
pahle ham ne ghar banā kar fāsle paidā kiye phir uThā diiñ aur dīvāreñ gharoñ ke darmiyāñ 
ahd-e-hāzir meñ uḳhuvvat kā tasavvur hai magar tazkaroñ meñ kāġhazoñ par rahbaroñ ke darmiyāñ 
un shahīdān-e-vafā ke naam mere sab suḳhan sar-bulandī jin ko hāsil hai saroñ ke darmiyāñ 
kaisā fan kaisī zehānat ye zamāna aur hai siikh lo kuchh sho'bde bāzīgaroñ ke darmiyāñ 
uḌ gayā to shāḳh kā saarā badan jalne lagā dhuup rakh lī thī parinde ne paroñ ke darmiyāñ 
ye jo ḳhāna hai sukūnat kā yahāñ likh do 'bashīr' phuul huuñ lekin khilā huuñ pattharoñ ke darmiyāñ 
shahr-e-fasl-e-gul se chal kar pattharon ke darmiyan zindagi aa ja kabhi hum be-gharon ke darmiyan 
main hun wo taswir jis mein hadse bharte hain rang KHal-o-KHat khulte hain mere KHanjaron ke darmiyan 
pahle hum ne ghar bana kar fasle paida kiye phir uTha din aur diwaren gharon ke darmiyan 
ahd-e-hazir mein uKHuwwat ka tasawwur hai magar tazkaron mein kaghazon par rahbaron ke darmiyan 
un shahidan-e-wafa ke nam mere sab suKHan sar-bulandi jin ko hasil hai saron ke darmiyan 
kaisa fan kaisi zehanat ye zamana aur hai sikh lo kuchh sho'bde bazigaron ke darmiyan 
uD gaya to shaKH ka sara badan jalne laga dhup rakh li thi parinde ne paron ke darmiyan 
ye jo KHana hai sukunat ka yahan likh do 'bashir' phul hun lekin khila hun pattharon ke darmiyan
